Title: MATEO 1
Content:
Yesu Kristo weku kpa
(Luka 3.23-38)
1Yesu Kristo, David biɔ, Abraham bi ɔ, fɔmi he womi ji nɛ ɔ nɛ. 2Abraham fɔ Isak, nɛ Isak fɔ Yakob, nɛ Yakob fɔ Yuda kɛ e nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ. 3Yuda kɛ Tamar fɔ Perez kɛ Zera, nɛ Perez fɔ Hezron, nɛ Hezron fɔ Ram; 4nɛ Ram fɔ Aminadab, nɛ Aminadab fɔ Naasson, nɛ Naasson fɔ Salmon; 5nɛ Salmon kɛ Rahab fɔ Boaz, nɛ Boaz kɛ Rut fɔ Obed, nɛ Obed fɔ Isai; 6nɛ Isai fɔ matsɛ David enɛ matsɛ David kɛ Uria yo ɔ fɔ Salomo.
7Nɛ Salomo fɔ Rehabeam, nɛ Rehabeam fɔ Abia, nɛ Abia fɔ Asa, 8nɛ Asa fɔ Yehosafat, nɛ Yehosafat fɔ Yoram, nɛ Yoram fɔ Uzia; 9nɛ Uzia fɔ Yotam, nɛ Yotam fɔ Ahaɛ, nɛ Ahaɛ fɔ Hezekia; 10nɛ Hezekia fɔ Manase, nɛ Manase fɔ Amon, nɛ Amon fɔ Yosia; 11nɛ Yosia fɔ Yékonia kɛ e nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ benɛ a ba ngɔ mɛ nyɔguɛ kɛ ho Babilon ya a.
12Benɛ a ngɔ mɛ nyɔguɛ kɛ ho Babilon ya se ɔ, Yokonia fɔ Sealtiel, nɛ Sealtiel fɔ Zerubabel; 13nɛ Zerubabel fɔ Abiud, nɛ Abiud fɔ Eliakim, nɛ Eliakim fɔ Azor; 14nɛ Azor fɔ Sadok, nɛ Sadok fɔ Akim, nɛ Akim fɔ Eliud; 15nɛ Eliud fɔ Eleazar, nɛ Eleazar fɔ Matan, nɛ Matan fɔ Yakob; 16nɛ Yakob fɔ Yosef nɛ ji Maria nɛ fɔ Yesu nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Kristo ɔ huno ɔ.
17Lɛɛ yi nɔhi tsuo nɛ je Abraham nɔ kɛ ba su David nɔ ɔ, yi nɔ nyɔngma kɛ eywiɛ; nɛ kɛ je David nɔ kɛ ba su benɛ a ngɔ mɛ nyɔguɛ kɛ ya Babilon ɔ, yi nɔ nyɔngma kɛ eywiɛ; nɛ kɛ je Babilon nyɔguɛ ngɔmi ɔ kɛ ba su Kristo nɔ ɔ, yi nɔ nyɔngma kɛ eywiɛ.
Yesu Kristo fɔmi
(Luka 2.1-7)
18Jeha nɛ ɔ, bɔ nɛ Yesu Kristo fɔmi ɔ ngɛ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: e nyɛ Maria a, benɛ Yosef ya bi e si nɛ e na we nɛ e kpee lɛ ɔ, Maria na kaa e hɛɛ muklii kɛ je Mumi klɔuklɔu ɔ mi. 19Se Yosef, e huno ɔ, akɛnɛ dalɔ ji lɛ nɛ e hla we kaa e bɔ lɛ ahlua a, e susu kaa e maa ngmɛɛ e he kpoo. 20Se benɛ e ngɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ kulaa a he susue ɔ, oʼɛ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bɔfo je e he kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ lɛ ngɛ nlami mi, nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Yosef, David bi, koo ye o yo Maria a ngɔmi gbeye, se hɔ nɛ e hɛɛ nɛ ɔ ɔ, e je Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ mi; 21e ma fɔ binyumu, nɛ o maa wo lɛ biɛ ke Yesu, ejakaa e ma he e ma a yi wmai kɛ je a he yayami ɔmɛ a mi.”
22Se a pee enɛ ɔmɛ tsuo konɛ nɔ́ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de kɛ gu gbalɔ ɔ nɔ ɔ nɛ ba mi ke: 23“Oʼɛ, zangmayo ɔ ma na muklii, nɛ e ma fɔ binyumu, nɛ a maa wo lɛ biɛ ke: Yimanuel” (e sisi ji: “Mawu kɛ wɔ ngɛ”).
24Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, benɛ Yosef hɛ̃ tsɛ̃ kɛ je mahɛ ɔ mi ɔ, e pee bɔ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bɔfo ɔ de lɛ ɔ, nɛ e ngɔ e yo ɔ; 25se e li lɛ nyumu kɛ yo hluu kɛ ya su be nɛ e fɔ e bi tete ɔ, nɛ e wo lɛ biɛ ke Yesu.

Title: MATEO 2
Content:
Nileli nɛ je beleku ɔ
1Benɛ pa fɔ Yesu ngɛ Betlehem ngɛ Yudea ngɛ matsɛ Herode yi nɔ se ɔ, oʼɛ, ni leli je beleku ba Yerusalem ba bi ke: 2“Jije Yudafo ɔmɛ a matsɛ ɔ nɛ a fɔ ɔ ngɛ? Wa na edodoe ngɛ beleku, nɛ wa ma lɛ jami.” 3Benɛ matsɛ Herode nu enɛ ɔ, e kɛ Yerusalem tsuo nu sawale; 4nɛ e bua ma a mi osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ tsuo a nya kɛ kpe nɛ e bi mɛ he nɛ a ma fɔ Kristo ɔ ngɛ. 5Nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Ngɛ Betlehem ngɛ Yudea; se bɔ nɛ gbalɔ ɔ ngma ji nɛ ɔ nɛ:
6‘Nɛ mo, Betlehem, Yuda zugba a, pi
mo ji nyafii pe kulaa ngɛ
Yuda ganɔ ɔmɛ a kpɛti.
Se o mi nɛ ganɔ nɛ ma kpaka
ye ma Israel ɔ maa je.’ ”
7Kɛkɛ nɛ Herode tsɛ ni leli ɔmɛ zaa nɛ e bi mɛ fitsofitso be mi nɛ dodoe ɔ je. 8Nɛ e ha a ya Betlehem nɛ e ke: “Nyɛɛ ya nɛ nyɛ ya hla bimwɔyo ɔ fitsofitso, nɛ ke nyɛ na lɛ ɔ, nyɛ ba de mi konɛ imi hu ma ba nɛ ma ba ja lɛ.” 9Se benɛ a nu matsɛ ɔ munyu ɔ, a pue nɔ kɛ ho. Nɛ oʼɛ, dodoe ɔ nɛ a na ngɛ beleku ɔ nyɛɛ a hɛ mi hluu kɛ ya si dodoe ɔ ba da he nɛ bimwɔyo ɔ ngɛ ɔ yi mi. 10Nɛ benɛ a na dodoe ɔ, a na bua jɔmi wawɛɛ nitse. 11Nɛ a ya we ɔ mi, nɛ a ya na bimwɔyo ɔ kɛ e nyɛ Maria a, nɛ a kpla si nɛ a ja lɛ, nɛ a pɛne a kotoku ɔmɛ a nya; nɛ a ke lɛ nihi: sika tsu kɛ mimɛ kɛ mire. 12Nɛ akɛnɛ Mawu je tsɔɔ mɛ ngɛ nlɛmi mi ke a ko kpale a se kɛ ya Herode ngɔ hu ɔ, a gu blɔ kpa kɛ ho a zugba a nɔ ya.
Fotumi kɛ Mizraim yami
13Nɛ benɛ a je se ɔ, oʼɛ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ Bɔfo je e he kpo tsɔɔ Yosef ngɛ nlami mi nɛ e ke: “Tee si, ngɔɔ bimwɔyo ɔ kɛ e nyɛ ɔ, nɛ o tu fo kɛ ya Mizraim, nɛ o hi lejɛ ɔ kɛ yaa su be nɛ ma de mo; se Herode ma hla bimwɔyo ɔ nɛ e gbe.” 14Nɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e te si nɛ e ngɔ bimwɔyo ɔ kɛ e nyɛ ɔ nyɔ mi, nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho Mizraim ya. 15Nɛ e hi lejɛ ɔ kɛ ya su be nɛ Herode gbo; konɛ nɔ́ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de ngɛ gbalɔ ɔ nya a nɛ ba mi ke: “Mizraim i tse ye bi ɔ kɛ je.”
Betlehem jokuɛwi ɔmɛ a gbemi
16Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ Herode na kaa ni leli ɔmɛ sisi lɛ ɔ, e muklii mi fu wawɛɛ, nɛ e tsɔ a ya gbe jokuɛ nyumuwi tsuo nɛ ngɛ Betlehem kɛ lejɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi tsuo, ninɛmɛ nɛ ye jeha enyɔ kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ yi ja ngɛ be nɛ e bi ni leli ɔmɛ fitsofitso ɔ nya.
17Kɛkɛ nɛ nɔ́ nɛ gbalɔ Yeremia de ɔ ba mi ke:
18“A nu gbi ko ngɛ Rama,
kɔmɔ yemi kɛ ya fomi kɛ ya peemi fuu,
Rahel ngɛ e bimɛ ɔmɛ foe
nɛ e kplɛɛ we kpatami; ejakaa a gbo.”
Sekpalemi kɛ Mizraim jemi
19Se Herode gbenɔ se ɔ, oʼɛ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bɔfo je e he kpo tsɔɔ Yosef ngɛ nlami mi ngɛ Mizraim, 20nɛ e ke: “Tee si nɛ o ngɔ bimwɔyo ɔ kɛ e nyɛ ɔ, nɛ o ya Israel zugba a nɔ se ninɛmɛ nɛ hla kaa a gbe bimwɔyo ɔ gbo.”
21Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yosef te si nɛ e ngɔ bimwɔyo ɔ kɛ e nyɛ ɔ nɛ e ba Israel zugba a nɔ.
22Bene e nu kaa Arkelao ngɛ matsɛ yee ngɛ Yudea ngɛ e tsɛ Herode se ɔ, Yosef ye lejɛ ɔ yami gbeye; nɛ akɛnɛ a je kpo tsɔɔ lɛ ngɛ nlami mi he ɔ, e plɛ e yi kɛ ho Galilea ni ɔmɛ a mi ya. 23Nɛ e ba ba hi ma ko nɛ a tsɛɛ Nazaret ɔ mi; konɛ nɔ́ nɛ gbalɔ ɔ de ɔ nɛ ba mi ke: “A ma tsɛ lɛ Nazareno.”

Title: MATEO 3
Content:
Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ fiɛmi
(Marko 1.1-8; Luka 3.1-18; Yohane 1.19-28)
1Jamɛ a be ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, Yohane, Baptisilɔ ɔ, ba ba fiɛ ngɛ Yudea nga a nɔ, 2nɛ e de ke: “Nyɛɛ kpale kɛ je nyɛ blɔ yaya amɛ a nɔ, se hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ su si ta.” 3Ejakaa nɔ nɛ ɔ ji nɔ he nɛ gbalɔ Yesaia de ngɛ ke:
“Nɔ ko ngɛ ngmlaa kpae boboobo ngɛ nga a nɔ ke:
‘Nyɛ dla Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ blɔ ɔ.
Nyɛ ha e blɔ ɔ nɛ da tlɔmɔɔ!’ ”
4Se Yohane ɔ afukpɔngɔ he bwɔmi a kɛ lo e tade ɔ, nɛ lohwe he womi kpa fi e mlɛ mi, nɛ e ni yeni ji baalɛ kɛ nga nɔ hwo. 5Kɛkɛ nɛ nihi je Yerusalem kɛ Yudea kɛ Yordan ni ɔmɛ a mi tsuo ba e ngɔ, 6nɛ e baptisi mɛ ngɛ Yordan mi benɛ a ngɛ a he yayami ɔmɛ jajee ɔ.
7Se benɛ Yohane na Farisifo ɔmɛ kɛ Sakukifo ɔmɛ a ti nihi fuu nɛ ma e baptisimi ɔ he ɔ, e de mɛ ke: “Sinɔhi a nina, mɛnɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ ke nyɛɛ tu muklii mi la nɛ ma a nya fo? 8Ke nyɛ tsake nyɛ tsui ɔ lɛɛ nyɛɛ wo yiblii nɛ sa tsui tsakemi mɔ! 9Nɛ nyɛ ko susu ngɛ nyɛ mi nɛ nyɛ de ke: ‘Wɔ ɔ lɛɛ wa tsɛ ji Abraham;’ se i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Mawu ma nyɛ kaa a tleɔ bihi a si kɛ jee tɛ nɛ ɔmɛ a mi ngɔ haa Abraham. 10Se amlɔ nɛ ɔ ɔ, gbiɛ ɔ fɔ́ɔ si ngɛ tso poku ɔmɛ a nɔ momo, konɛ tso tsuaa tso nɛ wui yiblii kpakpahi ɔ, a po lɛ ngɔ fɔ si, nɛ a sake ngɔ fɔ la mi. 11Imi lɛɛ nyu i kɛ ngɛ nyɛ baptisie ha tsui tsakemi, se nɔ nɛ ma ngɛ ye se ɔ he wa pe mi, e tokotahi tete i sɛ́ nɔ nɛ hɛo; lɛ e kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu kɛ la maa baptisi nyɛ. 12Nɔ nɛ hɛɛ e nɔ mi sami tsimi ngɛ e dɛ, nɛ e maa bɛɛ e zugba a nɔ fitsofitso nɛ e ma bua ngma a nya ngɔ to e gba mi; se tsakati ɔ, e kɛ la nɛ gbo we maa sa.”
Yesu baptisimi
(Marko 1.9-11; Luka 3.21-22)
13Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu je Galilea kɛ ba Yohane ngɔ ngɛ Yordan nya konɛ Yohane nɛ baptisi lɛ. 14Se Yohane ka lɛ blɔ tsimi ke: “Imi mohu nɛ e hia kaa mo o baptisii mi ɔ, nɛ mo o ma ye ngɔ nɛ ɔ?” 15Se Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Moo kplɛɛ kɛkɛ, se kikɛmɛ a blɔ nɔ a maa gu kɛ pee Mawu suɔmi nya ni.” Kɛkɛ nɛ Yohane kplɛɛ ha lɛ.
16Nɛ benɛ e baptisi Yesu ɔ, e je kpo amlɔ kɛ je nyu ɔ mi nɛ oʼɛ, a bli hiɔwe nya ha lɛ, nɛ e na Mawu Mumi ɔ nɛ ngɛ si kplee kaa okpo kɛ ma e nɔ. 17Nɛ oʼɛ, gbi ko je hiɔwe ke: “Nɔ nɛ ɔ ji ye suɔmi bi nɛ i ngɛ e he tsui ɔ nɛ.”

Title: MATEO 4
Content:
Abosiami ka Yesu
(Marko 1.12-13; Luka 4.1-13)
1Kɛkɛ nɛ Mumi ɔ ngɔ Yesu kɛ ho nga a nɔ ya konɛ abosiami ya ka lɛ. 2Nɛ benɛ e ha hwɔ nyɔ kɛ pia ligbi nyingmi eywiɛ ɔ, lɔ ɔ se ɔ hwɔ ye lɛ. 3Nɛ nya tsɔlɔ ɔ ba e ngɔ ba de lɛ ke: “Ke Mawu bi ji mo ɔ, de konɛ tɛ nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ plɛ abolo.” 4Se Yesu he nɔ ke: “A ngma ke: ‘Pi abolo kɛkɛ nɛ haa nɔmlɔ yi naa wa; se mohu munyu tsuaa munyu nɛ jee Mawu nya mi ɔ.’ ”
5Kɛkɛ nɛ Abosiami ɔ ngɔ lɛ kɛ ya ma klɔuklɔu ɔ mi, nɛ e kɛ lɛ ya da sɔlemi we ɔ yi mi ploplooplo, 6nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Ke Mawu bi ji mo ɔ, ngɔɔ o he ngɔ fia si; ejakaa pa ngma ke:
‘O he ɔ, Mawu ma fa e bɔfo ɔmɛ nɛ a maa hɛɛ mo
ngɛ a dɛ mi, konɛ o nane ko si tɛ ko.’ ”
7Yesu de lɛ ke: “A ngma ekohu ke: ‘Koo ka Nyɔmtsɛ o Mawu ɔ!’ ”
8Jeha nɛ ɔ bosiami ngɔ lɛ kɛ ho yoku kpetekpleenyɛ nɛ ya hiɔwe ko nɔ ya nɛ e ngɔ je mi matsɛ yemi hehi tsuo kɛ a nyami ɔmɛ ngɔ tsɔɔ lɛ; 9nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Ma ngɔ enɛ ɔmɛ tsuo ha mo, ke o kpla si nɛ o ja mi ɔ.” 10Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Jee ye nɔ, Satan! ejakaa a ngma ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, o Mawu ɔ, o ja, nɛ lɛ kɛkɛ o sɔmɔ!’ ”
11Keke nɛ abosiami si lɛ, nɛ oʼɛ, hiɔwe bɔfohi ba nɛ sa ba sɔmɔ lɛ.
Yesu je e nitsumi sisi ngɛ Galilea
(Marko 1.14-15; Luka 4.14-15)
12Benɛ Yesu nu kaa a nu Yohane ɔ, e pue nɔ kɛ ho Galilea ya; 13nɛ e je Nazaret kɛ ba hi Kapernaum nɛ ngɛ wo nya a, ngɛ Zebulon kɛ Naftali ni ɔmɛ a mi; 14konɛ gbalɔ Yesaia munyu ɔ nɛ ba mi ke:
15“Zebulon zugba a kɛ Naftali zugba a nɛ ngɛ wo
nya blɔ ɔ, ngɛ Yordan se ɔ, majemajali a
Galilea a,
16Ma nɛ hii si ngɛ diblii mi ɔ na la kpetekpleenyɛ,
nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ hii si ngɛ gbenɔ zugba kɛ e hɔ́ ɔ
mi ɔ, la te si ha mɛ!”
17Kɛ je jamɛ a ligbi ɔ, Yesu bɔni fiɛmi nɛ e ke: “Nyɛɛ kpale kɛ je nyɛ blɔ yaya amɛ a nɔ. Nyɛ tsake nyɛ tsui, se hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ su si haa.”
Yesu tsɛ wohɛli eywiɛ
(Marko 1.16-20; Luka 5.1-11)
18Se benɛ Yesu ngɛ si kpae ngɛ Galilea wo ɔ nya a, e na nyɛmimɛ enyɔ, Simon nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Petro, kɛ e nyɛmi Andrea nɛ a ngɛ hɛe ngɛ wo ɔ mi, ejakaa wohɛli ji mɛ. 19Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ba nyɛɛ ye se nɛ ma pee nyɛ nimli a hɛli.” 20Nɛ amlɔ ɔ a si a ya amɛ, nɛ a ba nyɛɛ e se.
21Ne benɛ e je lejɛ ɔ kɛ yaa a, e na nyɛmimɛ kpa enyɔ kome, Zebedeo bi Yakobo kɛ e nyɛmi Yohane kɛ a tsɛ Zebedeo ngɛ lɛ mi nɛ a ngɛ a ya amɛ dlae; nɛ e tsɛ mɛ. 22Nɛ amlɔ ɔ mɛ hu a si lɛ ɔ kɛ a tsɛ ɔ nɛ a ba nyɛɛ e se.
Yesu nitsɔɔmi, e fiɛmi kɛ e nɔtsami
(Luka 6.17-19)
23Nɛ Yesu kpa Galilea tsuo, e tsɔɔ ni ngɛ a kpe he ɔmɛ, nɛ e fiɛ matsɛ yemi ɔ he Sane Kpakpa a tsɔɔ, nɛ e tsa hiɔ tsuaa hiɔ kɛ he hiami tsuaa he hiami ngɛ ma a mi. 24Nɛ e he sane gbɛ fia Siria tsuo, nɛ a kɛ nihi nɛ be saminya nɛ hiɔhi kɛ piimi slɔɔtohi hɛɛ mɛ kɛ nihi nɛ mumi yayamihi ngɛ a mi kɛ godotsɛmɛ kɛ nihi nɛ a gbɔjɔ ba e ngɔ nɛ e tsa mɛ. 25Nɛ nihi fuu je Galilea kɛ Decapoli kɛ Yerusalem kɛ Yudea kɛ Yordan se nyɛɛ e se.

Title: MATEO 5
Content:
Yoku nɔ fiɛmi
1Benɛ Yesu na asafo ɔ, e kuɔ kɛ ya yoku ɔ nɔ, nɛ e ya hi si. E kaseli ɔmɛ ba e ngɔ, 2nɛ e bɔni mɛ ni tsɔɔmi ke:
Buajɔmi nitsɛ
(Luka 6.20-23)
3“A gbaa ninɛmɛ nɛ le kaa mumi mi ohiafohi ji mɛ ɔ:
se a nɔ ji hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ nɛ.
4“A gbaa ninɛmɛ nɛ yeɔ kɔmɔ ɔ:
se Mawu maa jɔɔ a bua.
5“A gbaa ninɛmɛ nɛ he jɔ ɔ;
se a ma na nɔ nɛ Mawu wo si ɔ.
6“A gbaa ninɛmɛ nɛ a suɔmi nya ni ji kaa a pee
nɔ nɛ Mawu suɔ ɔ:
se Mawu ma ha a maa to kɛ bua jɔmi.
7“A gbaa ninɛmɛ nɛ naa ni kpahi mɔbɔ ɔ,
se Mawu maa na mɛ mɔbɔ.
8“A gbaa ninɛmɛ nɛ a tsui mi tsɔ ɔ;
se a maa na Mawu.
9“A gbaa ninɛmɛ nɛ kpataa a:
se a ma tsɛ mɛ Mawu bimɛ.
10“A gbaa ninɛmɛ nɛ a waa mɛ yi mi ejakaa a peɔ
Mawu suɔmi nya ni ɔ:
se a nɔ ji hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ nɛ.
11“A gbaa nyɛ ke nihi jɛ nyɛ nɛ a wa nyɛ yi mi nɛ a ngɔ nya kɛ tu munyu yaya tsuaa munyu yaya ngɔ si nyɛ ejakaa ye kaseli ji nyɛ ɔ. 12Nyɛ nya nɛ nyɛ bua nɛ jɔ; ejakaa hiɔwo ngua ngɛ ha nyɛ ngɛ hiɔwe; ejakaa ja a wa gbali nɛ sɛ nyɛ hlami ɔ yi mi.”
Ngo kɛ la
(Marko 9.50; Luka 14.34-35)
13“Nyɛ ji ngo kɛ ha adesahi tsuo. Se ke ngo nya nyu gbo ɔ, mɛni a kɛ maa wo lɛ ngo ekohu? E he be senami hu, ja a tsɛ pue he nɛ nimli naa nɔ.
14“Nyɛ ji la ha je ɔ tsuo. Ma nɛ a bɔ ngɛ yoku nɔ ɔ, e be nyɛe maa laa. 15Jeha nɛ ɔ hu, nɔ ko su we kane kɛ mɛ́ sowe sisi: se mohu e kɛ maa kane tso nɔ, nɛ e tsoo haa nihi nɛ ngɛ we ɔ mi tsuo kulaa. 16Ja nɔuu nyɛ ha nyɛ la nɛ tso ngɛ nimli a hɛ mi konɛ a na nyɛ ni peemi ni kpakpa amɛ nɛ ɛ wo nyɛ tsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ hɛ mi nyami.
Mlaa he nitsɔɔmi
17“Nyɛ ko susu kaa imi Yesu i ba Mose mlaa aloo gbali ɔmɛ a tsɔɔmi ɔmɛ gumi; i bɛ mɛ gumi, se i ba nɛ ma ba gbe nya. 18Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Be abɔ nɛ hiɔwe kɛ zugba ngɛ lolo nɛ ɔ ɔ, kpɔ kake loo ngu nyafii pe kulaa be mlaa a mi jee ja a gbe nihi tsuo kulaa nya. 19Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ma tɔ kita nɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti nyafii kake nɔ, nɛ e maa tsɔɔ ni kpahi ke a pee ja a, e maa pee nyafii pe kulaa ngɛ hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ mi; se nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ yeɔ mlaa a nɔ nɛ e tsɔɔ ni kpahi hu ke a pee ja a, e maa pee nɔ ngua ngɛ hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ mi. 20I ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Ke nyɛ dami ɔ pa we mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a nɔ ɔ, nyɛ be hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ mi sɛe kulaa.”
Mukliimifumi he nitsɔɔmi
21“Tse nyɛ nu kaa a de blematsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ke: ‘koo gbe nɔmlɔ, se nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ maa gbe nɔmlɔ ɔ, a kɛ lɛ maa ba kojolɔ ɔ hɛ mi.’ 22Se i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ muklii mi fuɔ e nyɛmi (yaka a), a kɛ lɛ maa ba kojolɔ ɔ hɛ mi; nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ deɔ e nyɛmi ke: ‘Yaka nɔmlɔ’ ɔ, a kɛ lɛ maa ba gua ngua a hɛ mi; nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ tsɛɛ e nyɛmi ke kuasia nɛ he be senami ɔ, e maa ye abosiami a je la a mi yami fɔ? 23Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ke o kɛ o nike ni ma Mawu hami ngɛ bɔ sami latɛ ɔ hɛ mi, nɛ o kai ngɛ lejɛ ɔ kaa o nyɛmi kɛ mo kpɛti ngɛ sane ko ɔ, 24si o nike ni ɔ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ngɛ bɔ sami latɛ ɔ hɛ mi, nɛ o ya nɔuu nɛ o kɛ o nyɛmi ɔ ya kpata lolo, konɛ o kpale ba nɛ o kɛ o nike ni ɔ ba ha Mawu.
25“O kɛ o pɛbilɔ ɔ nɛ tsa mla benɛ nyɛ ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ kɛ yaa a, ke pi ja a, nyɛ lejɛ ɔ sumi nɔuu ɔ e maa ngɔ mo ngɔ ha kojolɔ ɔ, nɛ lɛ hu e maa ngɔ mo ngɔ ha tsɔlɔ ɔ, nɛ a maa wo mo tsu mi. 26Niinɛ, i ngɛ mo dee ke: O be lejɛ ɔ jee kɛ yaa si o maa wo nyagbe pɛsɛwa a.”
Gbapuɛmi he nitsɔɔmi
27“Tse nyɛ nu kaa a de blematsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ke: ‘Ko puɛ gba!’ 28Se i ngɛ nyɛ e nɔ dee: Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ hyɛɛ yo nɛ e he peɔ lɛ akɔnɔ ɔ, e yeɔ fɔ ejakaa e kɛ lɛ puɛ gba momo ngɛ e tsui mi. 29Ke o hiɛ ɔ nɔ hɛngmɛ haa o peɔ yayami ɔ, hia nɛ o sake ngɔ fɔ he; ejakaa e hi ha mo kaa o nɔmlɔ tso ɔ he nɔ́ ko laa pe nɔ nɛ a ma sake o nɔmlɔ tso mluku ɔ tsuo ngɔ fɔ abosiami a je la a mi. 30Nɛ ke o hiɛ ɔ nine haa o peɔ yayami ɔ, poo, nɛ o sake ngɔ fɔ he; ejakaa e hi ma mo kaa o laa o nine kake pe nɔ́ nɛ a maa ngɔ o nɔmlɔ tso mluku ɔ tsuo ngɔ wo abosiami a je la a mi.”
Gbamipomi he nitsɔɔmi
(Mateo 19.9; Marko 10.11-12; Luka 16.18)
31“A de hulɔ ke: ‘Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ fieɔ e yo ɔ, sa nɛ e ha lɛ hemi womi.’ 32Se imi lɛɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ fieɔ e yo nɛ pi ajuama bɔmi he ʼi ɔ, lɛɛ e yeɔ fɔ kaa e haa yo ɔ bɔɔ ajuama ke e ya gba ekohu; nɛ nyumu nɛ ya ngɔɔ lɛ ɔ hu puɛɔ gba.”
Kitakami he nitsɔɔmi
33“Tse nyɛ nu hulɔ kaa a de blematsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ke: ‘Ko ka kita gu, se mohu ye o kita amɛ a nɔ ha Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ.’ 34Se imi lɛɛ i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nyɛ ko ka kita kulaa! Nyɛ ko ka hiɔwe, ejakaa Mawu matsɛ sɛ ʼi, 35loo zugba, ejakaa Mawu nane si sɛ ʼi, loo Yerusalem, ejakaa e ji matsɛ ngua a ma. 36Ko ka o yi tete, ejakaa o be nyɛe yi bwɔmi kake, ehiɔ loo eyumu, maa pee. 37Ke nyɛ ke: ‘Ee’ ɔ, e pee: ‘Ee;’ nɛ ke nyɛ ke: ‘Dɛbi’ ɔ, e pee: ‘Dɛbi’; nɔ́ kpa ko nɛ pe enɛ ɔ ɔ, je abosiami dɛ mi.”
Peemi kɛ nanemitomi he nitsɔɔmi
(Luka 6.29-30)
38“Tse nyɛ nu nɛ a de ke: ‘Hɛngmɛ ngɛ hɛngmɛ nane mi,’ (kɛ) ‘lungu ngɛ lungu nane mi.’ 39Se imi lɛɛ i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nɔ nɛ maa pee nyɛ yayami ɔ, nyɛ ko pee lɛ ngɔ to nane mi; se ke nɔ ko gba o hiɛ ɔ nɔ tue mi ɔ, plɛ kake ɔ hu ha lɛ. 40Nɛ ke nɔ ko ngɔ mo kɛ ya kojomi he nɛ e ya sama mo ngɛ o gugue tade he ɔ, ha nɛ e ngɔ o hiɔwe tade ɔ hulɔ. 41Nɛ ke nɔ ko nyɛ o nɔ ke o kɛ lɛ nɛ ya si tomi nya kake ɔ, o kɛ lɛ nɛ ya enyɔ. 42Ha nɔ nɛ ngɛ mo nɔ́ bae ɔ, nɛ nɔ nɛ ngɛ hlae nɛ o pa lɛ nɔ́ ko ɔ, koo nyɛ lɛ he.”
Henyɛli a suɔmi
(Luka 6.27-28; 6.32-36)
43“Tse nyɛ nu nɛ a de ke: ‘Suɔ o huɛ nɛ o nyɛ o henyɛlɔ.’ 44Se imi lɛɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nyɛɛ suɔ nyɛ henyɛli, nyɛɛ sɔle ha nihi nɛ waa nyɛ yi mi ɔ, 45enɛ ɔ ma ha nyɛ ma plɛ nyɛ tsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ bimɛ, ejakaa e haa e pu jee ngɛ nimli yayamihi kɛ nimli kpakpahi a nɔ, nɛ e haa hiɔmi nɛɛ haa dali kɛ yayami peeli. 46Se ke nyɛ suɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ suɔ nyɛ ɔ, mɛni hiɔwo nyɛ ngɛ? Anɛ to tsuli ɔmɛ tete pee we ja nɔuu lo? 47Nɛ ke nyɛ ngaa nyɛ nyɛmimɛ kɛkɛ ɔ, anɛ nyɛ pee nɔ́ ko tsɔ pe bɔ nɛ sa peemi lo? Anɛ wɔ jali ɔmɛ tete pee we ja nɔuu lo? 48Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛɛ hi kɛ pi si, kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ tsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ hu hi kɛ pi si ɔ.”

Title: MATEO 6
Content:
Kpakpapeemi he nitsɔɔmi
1“Nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ hi nɛ nyɛ ko pee nyɛ dami nihi ngɛ ma hɛ mi, ke nyɛ pee ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ, nyɛ be hiɔwo ko ngɛ nyɛ tsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ ngɔ.
2“Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ke o ngɛ kpakpa pee ɔ, ko kpa titimati ngɛ o hlami, kaa bɔ nɛ osatotsɛmɛ ɔmɛ peɔ ngɛ kpe hehi kɛ magbɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ konɛ nihi nɛ je a yi ɔ. I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: A nine su a hiɔwo nɔ mo. 3Se mo o lɛɛ, ke o ngɛ kpakpa pee ɔ, ko ha o muɔ nine nɛ le nɔ nɛ o hiɛ ɔ nine peɔ. 4O kpakpa peemi ɔ nɛ hi laami mi, nɛ o tsɛ nɛ naa laami mi nihi ɔ nitse maa wo mo hiɔ.”
Pɛɛkpami he nitsɔɔmi
(Luka 11.2-4)
5“Nɛ ke nyɛ ngɛ sɔlee ɔ, nyɛ ko pee kaa osatotsɛmɛ ɔmɛ, se a suɔ kaa a da kpe he ɔmɛ kɛ gbɛjegbɛ ɔmɛ a kɔ nyahi kɛ sɔle konɛ nihi nɛ na mɛ. Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: A nine su a hiɔwo nɔ mo. 6Se ke o ngɛ sɔlee ɔ, sɛ o se tsu mi, nɛ po nga sinya a nɛ o sɔle ngɔ ha o tsɛ ngɛ laami mi, nɛ o tsɛ nɛ naa laami mi nihi ɔ maa wo mo hiɔ.
7“Ke nyɛ ngɛ sɔlee ɔ nyɛ ko tu munyu fuu kaa wɔ jali ɔmɛ; se a susuu kaa a munyu fuu ɔ he a maa bu mɛ tue. 8Nyɛ ko pee kaa mɛ; se nyɛ tsɛ ɔ le nihi nɛ hiaa nyɛ loko nyɛ biɔ lɛ. 9Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛɛ sɔle kikɛ:
‘Wa tsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe,
O biɛ ɔ he nɛ tsɔ;
10O matsɛ yemi ɔ nɛ ba;
A pee nɔ nɛ o suɔ ngɛ zugba a nɔ
kaa a peɔ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ.
11Ha wɔ mwɔnɛ wa daa ngma;
12Nɛ o kɛ wa hiɔ ɔmɛ nɛ ke wɔ
Kaa bɔ nɛ wɔ hu waa kɛ kee ninɛmɛ
nɛ hɛɛ wɔ hiɔ ɔ.
13Nɛ o kɛ wɔ ko ya kami mi
se je wɔ kɛ je nɔ yayami ɔ dɛ mi.’
14Nɛ ke nyɛɛ kɛ nihi a tɔmihi pa mɛ ɔ, nyɛ tsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ kɛ maa pa nyɛ hulɔ. 15Se ke nyɛɛ kɛ nihi a tɔmihi pɛ́ mɛ ɔ, nyɛ tsɛ ɔ hu kɛ nyɛ tɔmi ɔmɛ be nyɛ pae.”
Hwɔhami he nitsɔɔmi
16“Se ke nyɛ ngɛ hwɔ hae ɔ, nyɛ ko pee nyɛ hɛ mi nɔbɔmɔbɔ kaa osatotsɛmɛ ɔmɛ; a peɔ a hɛ mi nyanyaanya konɛ nimli nɛ na kaa a ngɛ hwɔ hae. Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: A nine su a hiɔwo nɔ mo? 17Se mo lɛɛ ke o ngɛ hwɔ hae ɔ kpa o yi mi nu nɛ o fɔ o hɛ mi; 18konɛ ni kpahi ko na kaa o ngɛ hwɔ hae, ja o tsɛ nɛ ngɛ laami mi ɔ; nɛ o tsɛ nɛ naa laami mi ni ɔ maa wo mo hiɔ.”
Hiɔwe juetli
(Luka 12.33-34)
19“Nyɛ ko to juetli ha nyɛ he ngɛ zugba nɛ ɔ nɔ, he nɛ wɔyewɔye kɛ kana puɛɔ nihi nɛ juli guu kɛ sɛɛ mi ya juɔ ngɛ ɔ. 20Se nyɛɛ to juetli ha nyɛ he ngɛ hiɔwe he nɛ wɔyewɔye kɛ kana puɛ we nihi nɛ juli gui kɛ sɛ we mi yajui ngɛ ɔ. 21Ejakaa he nɛ o juetli ngɛ ɔ, lejɛ ɔ o tsui maa hi.”
Nɔmlɔ tso ɔ la
(Luka 11.34-36)
22“Nɔmlɔ tso ɔ la ji hɛngmɛ. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ke o hɛngme nɔ tsɔ ɔ, o nɔmlɔ tso mluku ɔ tsuo ma hyi kɛ la; 23se ke o hɛngmɛ nɔ tsɔ we ɔ, o nɔmlɔ tso mluku ɔ tsuo maa wo diblii. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ke la nɛ ngɛ o mi ɔ ji diblii ɔ, kɛ jamɛ a diblii ɔ mi ma ti kɛɛ!”
Mawu kɛ ninami
(Luka 16.13; 12.22-31)
24“Nɔ ko be nyɔmtsɛmɛ enyɔ nyɛe ma sɔmɔ; ejakaa eko ɔ e maa nyɛ nɔ kake nɛ e maa suɔ nɔ kpa a; aloo e maa pɛtɛ nɔ kake he, nɛ e maa gbe nɔ kpa a he guɛ. Nyɛ be Mawu kɛ mamona (ni nami) nyɛe ma sɔmɔ.
25“Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nyɛ ko hao ngɛ nyɛ wami he, nɔ nɛ nyɛ maa ye kɛ nɔ nɛ nyɛ maa nu, aloo nɔ nɛ nyɛ maa wo ngɛ nyɛ nɔmlɔ tso ɔ he. Anɛ wami pa we ngma, nɛ nɔmlɔ tso pa we tade lo? 26Nyɛɛ hyɛ hiɔwe lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ ɔmɛ; a du we ni nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu a kpɔ we, pohu a bua we nya ngɔ wui ngma gba mi; se nyɛ tsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ lɛɛ mɛ kɛ̃. Anɛ nyɛ he jua wɛ́ hluu pi mɛ lo? 27Se nyɛ ti mɛnɔ kɛ yeyeeye peemi ma nyɛ tsa e kami nya nine kpɔ mi kami kake?
28“Nɛ mɛ he je nɛ nyɛ peɔ yeyeeye ngɛ tade he? Nyɛ susu nga nɔ mɔmɔ ɔmɛ a he, bɔ nɛ a puɛɛ ɔ: atsu we ni, jeha nɔ hu a tsɛ̃ we kpa. 29Se i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Salmo kɛ e nyami ɔ tsuo tete mia we kaa enɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti kake. 30Jeha nɛ ɔ ke nga nɔ hu nɛ mwɔnɛ e ngɛ nɛ hwɔ nɛ a kɛ woɔ abolo tsu mi nɛ Mawu miaa lɛ kikɛ ɔ, anɛ e be nɔ́ nɛ pe enɛ pee ha nyɛ nɛ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi pi ɔ lo? 31Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ ko hao nyɛ he nɛ nyɛ de ke: ‘Mɛni wa maa ye, aloo mɛni wa maa nu, mɛni hu wa ma ngɔ ha wa he?’ 32(Ejakaa ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo a se majemajeli a bimɛ ɔmɛ dii.) Nyɛ tsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ le kaa ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo a he ngɛ nyɛ hiae. 33Nyɛ hla Mɛwu matsɛ yemi ɔ kɛ e dami kekle, nɛ akɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo maa piɛ he ngɔ ha nyɛ. 34Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ ko hao nyɛ he ngɔ to hwɔɔ; ejakaa hwɔɔ nitse maa hao ngɛ lɛ nitse e he. Ligbi tsuaa ligbi nɔ yayami ɔ hiɛ ha lɛ.”

Title: MATEO 7
Content:
Kojomi
(Luka 6.37-38; 6.41-42)
1“Nyɛ ko kojo konɛ a ko kojo nyɛ? 2Ejakaa kojomi nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ kojoɔ ɔ, a kɛ maa kojo nyɛ, nɛ susumi nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ susuu ɔ, a kɛ ma susu ha nyɛ. 3Se mɛni he je o naa ngu nyafii nɛ ngɛ o nyɛmi hɛngmɛ nɔ ɔ, nɛ mo nitse o hɛngmɛ nɔ plai ɔ lɛɛ o nɛ ɔ? 4Aloo kɛ maa pee kɛ nɛ o ma de o nyɛmi ke: ‘Ha ma je ngu nyafii ɔ ngɛ o hɛngmɛ nɔ,’ be mi nɛ plai ngɛ mo nitse o hɛngmɛ nɔ ɔ? 5Osatotsɛ, je plai ɔ ngɛ mo nitse o hɛngmɛ nɔ kekle, nɛ lɔ ɔ loko o maa hyɛ nɔ paa nɛ o ma je ngu nyafii ɔ ngɛ o nyɛmi ɔ hɛngmɛ nɔ.
6“Nyɛ ko ngɔ nɔ́ nɛ ji klɔuklɔu ɔ ngɔ ha gbehi; jeha nɛ ɔ hu nyɛ ko sake nyɛ juinehi ngɔ pue kpotoohi a hɛ mi nɛ a ba naa nɔ ngɛ a nane si, nɛ a plɛ a hɛ mi nɛ a ba tsɔtskɔɔ nyɛ mi.”
Nyɛ bi, nyɛ hla, nyɛ si
(Luka 11.9-13)
7“Nyɛ bi, nɛ a ma ha nyɛ; nyɛ hla nɛ nyɛ maa na; nyɛ si, nɛ a ma bli ha nyɛ. 8Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ biɔ ɔ, e nine suu nɔ; nɛ nɔ nɛ hlaa a, e naa; nɛ nɔ nɛ siɔ ɔ, a bliɔ haa lɛ. 9Nyɛ ti mɛnɔ nɛ ke e bi bi lɛ abolo nɛ e ma ha lɛ tɛ? 10Aloo ke e bi lɛ wo mi lo, nɛ e ma ha lɛ sinɔ? 11Lɛɛ ke nyɛ nɛ nyɛ ji nimli yayamihi ɔ nyɛ le bɔ nɛ nyɛ peɔ ngɔɔ ni kpakpahi ngɔ haa nyɛ bimɛ ɔ, enyɛmɛ nɔuu nɛ nyɛ tsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ be ni kpakpahi ngɔe kɛ ha nihi nɛ biɔ lɛ ɔ?
12“Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ hlaa kaa nihi nɛ pee ngɔ ha nyɛ ɔ, nyɛ hu nyɛɛ pee ja nɔuu ngɔ ha mɛ, ejakaa enɛ ɔ ji mlaa a kɛ gbali ɔmɛ.”
Agbo tokofii ɔ
(Luka 13.24)
13“Nyɛɛ sɛ agbo tokofii ɔ mi! Ejakaa agbo nɛ bli kɛ blɔ gbajaa ji nɔ nɛ kɛ nɔ yaa hemi kpatami mi ɔ nɛ, nɛ nihi babauu lɛ sɛɛ mi.
14Se agbo tokofii kɛ blɔ nɛ hɛ ji nɔ nɛ kɛ nɔ yaa wami mi ɔ nɛ, nɛ nihi bɔɔ ji nihi nɛ naa kɔlɔ ɔ.”
Tso kɛ e yiblii
(Luka 6.43-44)
15“Nyɛɛ hyɛ saminya ngɛ osato gbali ɔmɛ a he, ejakaa a ngɔɔ to he womi ngɔ haa a he kɛ baa nyɛ ngɔ, se a mi mi je ɔ ogbetee ni hali ji mɛ. 16A yiblii ɔmɛ nyɛ ma kɛ le mɛ. Anɛ a tsɔɔ wai yiblii ngɛ mio tsohi a nɔ, aloo a tsɔɔ ngmɔkɔ ngɛ sezlehi anɔ? 17Ja nɔuu tso tsuaa tso nɛ ji tso kpakpa a woɔ yiblii kpakpahi; se tso yaya woɔ yiblii yayahi. 18Tso kpakpa be yiblii yaya nyɛe maa wo nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu tso yaya be yiblii kpakpahi nyɛe maa wo. 19Tso tsuaa tso nɛ wui yiblii kpakpahi ɔ, a maa hɛ nɛ a maa ngɔ ngɔ wo la mi? 20Lɔ ɔ he ɔ a yiblii ɔmɛ nyɛɛ kɛ maa le mɛ.”
I li nyɛ kulaa
(Luka 13.25-27)
21“Pi nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ deɔ mi ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, Nyɔmtsɛ’ ɔ nɛ maa sɛ hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ mi; se mohu nɔ nɛ peɔ Tsaatsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ suɔmi nya ni ɔ. 22Nihi fuu ma de mi ngɛ jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔ ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, Nyɔmtsɛ, anɛ pi mo o biɛ ɔ mi nɛ wa gba ngɛ, nɛ o biɛ ɔ mi wa hia numi yayamihi ngɛ, nɛ o biɛ ɔ mi wa pee he wami nihi fuu ngɛ lo?’ 23Nɛ lɔ ɔ lɛɛ ma gba mi ma de me ke: ‘I li nyɛ kulaa, nyɛɛ je ye nɔ, nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ tsuɔ nihi nɛ dɛ blɔ!’ ”
Tsumali enyɔ ɔ
(Luka 6.47-49)
24“Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ nuɔ ye munyu nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ e yeɔ nɔ ɔ, ma ngɔ lɛ ngɔ to ga lelɔ nɛ ma e tsu ngɛ tɛ sa nɔ ɔ he. 25Nɛ hiɔmi nɛ, nɛ pahi hia, nɛ kɔɔhiɔ fia, nɛ a si tsu ɔ, se e hule we ejakaa a to sisi ngɛ tɛ sa nɔ. 26Nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ nuɔ ye munyu nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ e yi nɔ ɔ, a maa ngɔ lɛ ngɔ to nyumu kuasia nɛ ma e tsu ngɛ zia nɔ ɔ he. 27Nɛ hiɔmi nɛ, nɛ pahi hia, nɛ kɔɔhiɔ fia, nɛ a si tsuɔ ɔ, nɛ e hule, nɛ e hulemi ɔ kle.”
He blɔ nɛ Yesu ngɛ
28Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ Yesu gbe munyu nɛ ɔmɛ a nya a, ni ɔmɛ a he nya si mɛ ngɛ e ni tsɔɔmi ɔ he; 29ejakaa e tsɔɔ mɛ ni kaa nɔ ko nɛ ngɛ he blɔ, se pi kaa a mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ.

Title: MATEO 8
Content:
Yesu tsa tsitsɛ ko
(Marko 1.40-45; Luka 5.12-16)
1Benɛ Yesu kple si kɛ je yoku ɔ nɔ ɔ, nihi tuu nyɛɛ e se. 2Nɛ oʼɛ, tsitsɛ ko ba kpla si ngɛ e hɛ mi nɛ e ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, ke o suɔ ɔ, o ma nyɛ ma ha ye he nɛ tsɔ!” 3Nɛ Yesu kpa e nine mi nɛ e ta e he nɛ e de lɛ ke: “I suɔ, o he nɛ tsɔ!” Nɛ amlɔ ɔ tsi ɔ ta ngɛ e he. 4Nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Hyɛ nɛ o ko de nɔ ko; se mohu yaa nɛ o kɛ o he ya tsɔɔ osɔfo ɔ, nɛ o ha ke ni nɛ Mose to ɔ kɛ ye odase.”
Yesu tsa aslaafohi lafa a nyatsɛ wenyumu ko
(Luka 7.1-10)
5Benɛ Yesu sɛ Kapernaum ɔ, aslaafohi lafa a nyatsɛ ko ba e ngɔ ba kpa lɛ pɛɛ 6nɛ e de ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, ye wenyumu fɔɔ si ngɛ we mi kɛ hulemi hiɔ, e ngɛ nɔ nae wawɛɛ.” 7Nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “I ma nɛ ma ba tsa lɛ.” 8Se aslaafohi lafa a nyatsɛ ɔ he nɔ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, e sɛ mi kaa o baa ye kue ɔ mi, se mohu tu munyu kɛkɛ, nɛ a ma tsa ye wenyumu ɔ. 9Ejakaa imi po nɛ i ji nɔmlɔ nɛ a yeɔ e nɔ ɔ, i ngɛ aslaafohi ngɛ ye sisi, nɛ ke i de nɔ kake ke: ‘Yaa’ a, e yaa, nɛ ke i de nɔ kpa hu ke: ‘Ba’ a, e baa, nɛ ke i de ye tsɔlɔ ke: ‘Pee enɛ ɔ’ ɔ, e peɔ.” 10Se benɛ Yesu nu enɛ ɔ ɔ, e hɛ mi pee lɛ yaa, nɛ e de nihi nɛ nyɛɛ e se ɔ ke: “Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Israel mi tete i nɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ kle kaa enɛ ɔ lolo! 11Se i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nihi fuu maa je beleku (pu je he) kɛ bonyoku (pu si nɔ he) maa ba nɛ a kɛ Abraham kɛ Isak kɛ Yakob ma ba hi si ngɛ hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ mi; 12se matsɛ yemi ɔ mi bimɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, lɛɛ a ma sake mɛ ngɔ fɔ blɔ se diblii ɔ mi; lejɛ ɔ ya fomi kɛ lungu nya kpemi maa hi.” 13Nɛ Yesu de aslaafohi lafa a nyatsɛ ɔ ke: “Yaa, bɔ nɛ o he ye ɔ, a pee ja ha mo.” Nɛ a tsa e wenyumu ɔ ngɛ lɛ ngmlɛfia a nɔuu nɔ.
Yesu tsa nihi babauu
(Marko 1.29-34; Luka 4.38-41)
14Benɛ Yesu ba Petro we ɔ mi ɔ, e na Petro nganyɛ nɛ fɔɔ si kɛ asla. 15Nɛ e nu e nine si, nɛ asla a po ngɛ e nɔ, nɛ e te si nɛ e sɔmɔ mɛ.
16Jamɛ a gbɔkuɛ ɔ, a kɛ nihi fuu nɛ mumi yayamihi ngɛ a mi ba e ngɔ. Nɛ e kɛ e munyu hia mumi ɔmɛ, nɛ e tsa hiɔtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ tsuo. 17Konɛ nɔ́ nɛ gbalɔ Yesaia de ɔ nɛ ba mi ke: “Lɛ nitsɛ e wo wa dengme ɔmɛ, nɛ e tloo wa hiɔ ɔmɛ.”
Yesu senyɛɛmi
(Luka 9.57-62)
18Benɛ Yesu na nihi fuu ngɛ e he ɔ, e fa ke a po wo ɔ nɛ a ya e se je. 19Nɛ mlaa tsɔɔlɔ ko ba e ngɔ ba de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, he tsuaa he nɛ o yaa a ma nyɛɛ o se.” 20Yesu de lɛ ke: “Kɔkɔbohi ngɛ muɔhi, nɛ hiɔwe lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ ngɛ tsuhi; se Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ be he nɛ e kɛ e yi fɔɔ.” 21Se e kaseli ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kpa ko hu de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, ngmɛɛ mi blɔ nɛ ma ya pu ye tsɛ lolo.” 22Se Yesu de lɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ye se, nɛ o ha ni gbogboe ɔmɛ a pu mɛ nitsɛmɛ a ni gbogboehi.”
Yesu jɔɔ wo nɔ kɔɔyɔ ko he
(Marko 4.35-41; Luka 8.22-25)
23Nɛ Yesu sɛ lɛ ko mi nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ nyɛɛ e se. 24Nɛ si kake ɔ, wo ɔ pee hamahama, nɛ oslɔke ɔmɛ ngɛ kue kɛ ngɛ lɛ ɔ mi woe; se lɛɛ e hwɔ mahɛ. 25Nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ a ba tsɛɛ lɛ de ke: “Mawetsɛ, he wa yiwami, wa ngɛ laae!” 26Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nyɛ ngɛ gbeye yee kikɛ, nyɛ nɛ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi pi?” Kɛkɛ nɛ e te se nɛ e ke kɔɔhiɔ ɔ kɛ wo ɔ yi nɛ a ngmɛ dii. 27Se ni ɔmɛ a hɛ mi pee mɛ yaa nɛ a ke: “Mɛni nɔmlɔ slɔɔto ji nɛ nɛ kɔɔhiɔ kɛ wo tete boɔ lɛ tue nɛ ɔ?”
Yesu tsa ni enyɔ nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ a mi
(Marko 5.1-20; Luka 8.26-39)
28Benɛ Yesu ba se ɔ blɔ ngɛ Gadarabi ɔmɛ a zugba a nɔ ɔ, ni enyɔ nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ a mi kɛ lɛ ba kpe, a je ni gbogboehi a pu he ɔ nɛ a hɛ wo la tsɔ, bɔ nɛ nɔ ko nyɛ we jamɛ a blɔ ɔ nɔ nɛ e gu. 29Nɛ oʼɛ, a kpa ngmlaa ke: “Mɛni sane waa kɛ mo ngɛ mo Yesu, Mawu bi ɔ? Anɛ o ba wɔ dengme womi loko be ɔ nɛ su lo?” 30Nɛ kpotoohi a kuu ngua ko ngɛ ni yee ngɛ lokoo. 31Nɛ mumi yayami ɔmɛ kpa Yesu pɛɛ ke: “Ke o hia wɔ ɔ, ngmɛɛ wɔ blɔ nɛ wa ya sɛ kpotoohi a kuu ɔ mi.” 32Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ya!” Nɛ a je kpo ya sɛ kpotoohi a kuu ɔ mi; nɛ oʼɛ, kuu mluku ɔ tsuo wo fo kɛ je yoku ɔ nɔ kɛ ya pue wo ɔ mi, nɛ a gbo ngɛ nyu ɔ mi.
33Nɛ kpotoohyɛli ɔmɛ tu fo kɛ ho ma a mi ya nɛ a ya sɛɛ sane ɔmɛ tsuo kɛ nihi nɛ mumi yayamihi ngɛ a mi ɔmɛ a nɔ́ ɔ hulɔ. 34Nɛ oʼɛ, ma mluku ɔ tsuo je kpo nɛ a kɛ Yesu ya kpe, nɛ benɛ a na lɛ ɔ, a kpa lɛ pɛɛ ke e je a kpo ɔmɛ a nɔ nɛ e ho.

Title: MATEO 9
Content:
Yesu tsa hulemi hiɔtsɛ ko
(Marko 2.1-12; Luka 5.17-26)
1Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu sɛ lɛ mi, nɛ e po wo ɔ, nɛ e ba lɛ nitsɛ e ma a mi. 2Nɛ oʼɛ, a kɛ nɔ ko nɛ ngɛ hulemi hiɔ nue nɛ fɔɔ si ngɛ sa nɔ ba e ngɔ. Nɛ benɛ Yesu na a hemi kɛ yemi ɔ, e de hiɔtsɛ ɔ ke: “Bi, ha o tsui nɛ nɔ o mi, a kɛ o he yayami ɔmɛ pa mo!” 3Nɛ oʼɛ, mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ a ti ni kome de ngɛ a mi ke: “Musu nɔ nɛ ɔ ngɛ bɔe nɔ nɛ.” 4Nɛ benɛ Yesu na a juɛmi ɔ, e ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ nyɛ ngɛ ni yayahi susue ngɛ nyɛ tsui mi nɛɔ? 5Jeha nɛ ɔ nɔ́ nɛ a ma de ke: ‘A kɛ o he yayami ɔmɛ pa mo’ ɔ, aloo nɔ́ nɛ a ma de ke: ‘Tee si nɛ o nyɛɛ’ ɔ, te e mi nɔ́ nɛ demi wɛ hu? 6Se benɛ pee nɛ nyɛ na le kaa Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ngɛ he blɔ ngɛ zugba a nɔ kaa e ngɔɔ yayamihi ngɔ paa a,” e de hiɔtsɛ ɔ ke: “Tee si, wo o sa a nɛ o ya o we mi!” 7Nɛ e te si kɛ ho e we mi ya. 8Se benɛ asafo ɔ na a, a nya kpɛ a he, nɛ a wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami kaa e ngɔ kikɛmɛ a he blɔ ha nimli.
Yesu tsɛ Mateo
(Marko 2.13-17; Luka 5.27-32)
9Benɛ Yesu je lejɛ ɔ kɛ yaa a, e na nyumu ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Mateo nɛ e hii si ngɛ onia tsumi he ɔ, nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ye se!” Nɛ e te si nɛ e nyɛɛ e se.
10Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ Yesu hii si ngɛ niyeni si ngɛ we ɔ mi ɔ, oʼɛ, onia tsuli kɛ yayami peeli babauu ba nɛ a kɛ lɛ kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ba ye ni. 11Benɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ na a, a bi e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nyɛ tsɔɔlɔ ɔ kɛ onia tsuli kɛ yayami peeli ngɛ ni yee nɛ ɔ?” 12Se benɛ Yesu nu ɔ, e de mɛ ke: “Nihi nɛ ngɛ he wami ɔ tsopatsɛ he hia we mɛ, se mohu nihi nɛ ngɛ gboe ɔ. 13Nyɛɛ ya nɛ nyɛ ya kase enɛ ɔ sisi: ‘Mɔbɔ nami i ngɛ hlae, se pi bɔ sami!’ Ejakaa i bɛ dali a tsemi, se mohu yayami peeli nɛ a tsake a tsui.”
Hwɔhami he sane
(Marko 2.18-22; Luka 5.33-39)
14Kɛkɛ nɛ Yohane kaseli ɔmɛ ba e ngɔ ba de ke: “Mɛni he je waa kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ pɔɔ hwɔ hami, nɛ o kaseli ɔmɛ lɛɛ a hɛ́ hwɔ ɔ?” 15Nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Anɛ yo kpeemi ɔ he biali ɔmɛ ma nyɛ maa ye kɔmɔ be abɔ nɛ ayɛflo huno ɔ kɛ mɛ ngɛ ɔ lo? Se be maa ba mo nɛ a maa ngɔ ayɛflo huno ɔ kɛ maa je a kpɛti kɛ ho, nɛ lɔ ɔ loko a maa ha hwɔ.”
16“Nɔ ko ngɔɛ bo nya he kɛ ta we tade momo mi; ejakaa nɔ́ nɛ a kɛ ta a nɛ jinɛ a kɛ tsi puɔ ɔ, yeɔ tade ɔ, nɛ puɔ ɔ bliɔ mohu pe kekle ɔ. 17Jeha nɛ ɔ a ngɔɛ wai he wui lohwe he womi tɔ momohi a mi; lɔ ɔ lɛɛ lohwe he womi tɔ ɔmɛ ma pɛ, nɛ wai ɔ ma pue si, nɛ lohwe he womi tɔ ɔmɛ ma puɛ; se wai he ɔ, lohwe he womi tɔ hehi a mi mohu a kɛ woɔ, nɛ enyɔ kulaa puɛ we.”
Ma nɔkɔtɔma bi yo ɔ kɛ Yo nɛ ta Yesu tade ɔ he ɔ
(Marko 5.21-43; Luka 8.40-56)
18Benɛ Yesu ngɛ munyu nɛ ɔmɛ tue kɛ ngɛ mɛ tsɔɔe ɔ, oʼɛ, nɔkɔtɔma ko ba ba kpla si ngɛ e hɛ mi nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Ye biyo je mi amlɔ nɛ ɔ; se ba nɛ o ba ngɔ o nine ngɔ fɔ e nɔ, nɛ e hɛ maa tsɛ.” 19Nɛ Yesu te si nɛ e kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ nyɛɛ nyumu ɔ se.
20Nɛ oʼɛ, yo ko nɛ ngɛ muɔdɛmi hiɔ nue jeha nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ ba je e se je nɛ e ta e tade ɔ nya a he. 21Ejakaa e de ngɛ e mi ke: “Ke i na e tade ɔ he ta kɛkɛ ɔ ye he maa wa mi.” 22Yesu plɛ e he, nɛ benɛ e na lɛ ɔ, e ke: “Biyo, ha otsui nɛ nɔ o mi, o hemi kɛ yemi ɔ he o yiwami!” Nɛ yo ɔ he wa lɛ jamɛ a ngmlɛfia a nɔ nɔuu.
23Nɛ benɛ Yesu ba nɔkɔtɔma a we ɔ mi nɛ e na bɛ kpali kɛ nihi fuu nɛ a ngɛ hoo pee ɔ, 24e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ je hiɛ ɔ, yiheyo ɔ gbo we, se mahɛ kɛkɛ e ngɛ hwɔe.” Nɛ a muɔ lɛ. 25Nɛ benɛ a fie ni ɔmɛ ɔ, e sɛ tsu ɔ mi nɛ e pɛtɛ yiheyo ɔ nine si kɛkɛ nɛ yiheyo ɔ te si. 26Nɛ kikɛmɛ a sane nɛ ɔ gbɛ fia lejɛ ɔ zugba a tsuo nɔ.
Yesu tsa hɛyuyuili enyɔ
27Nɛ benɛ Yesu le jejɛ ɔ kɛ bee ɔ hɛ yuyuili enyɔ nyɛɛ e se nɛ a ngɛ ngmlaa kpae ke: “Moo na wɔ mɔbɔ, David Bi!” 28Nɛ benɛ e sɛ we ɔ mi ɔ, hɛ yuyuili ɔmɛ ba e ngɔ; nɛ Yesu bi mɛ ke: “Nyɛ heɔ yeɔ kaa ma nyɛ enɛ ɔ ma pee lo?” A de lɛ ke: “Ee, Mawetsɛ!” 29Kɛkɛ nɛ e ta a hɛngmɛ ɔmɛ a he nɛ e ke: “Bɔ nɛ nyɛ heɔ yeɔ ɔ, a pee ja ngɔ ha nyɛ;” 30nɛ a hɛngmɛ ɔmɛ bli. Nɛ Yesu bɔ mɛ kɔkɔ ke: “Nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ nɔ ko ko le enɛ ɔ!” 31Se mɛɛ lɛɛ, benɛ a je lejɛ ɔ, a ya je e yi ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi tsuo.
Yesu tsa amuɛti ko
32Benɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ kpo jee ɔ, oʼɛ, a kɛ amuɛti ko nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ e mi ba e ngɔ. 33Nɛ benɛ e hia mumi yayami ɔ, amuɛti ɔ tu munyu. Nɛ asafo ɔ he nya si mɛ nɛ a ke: “A nɛ́ kikɛmɛ a nɔ́ ko hyɛ ngɛ Israel!” 34Se Farisifo ɔmɛ de ke: “Mumi yayami ɔmɛ a tsɛ ɔ hewami nya e hiaa muni yayami ɔmɛ ɔ nɛ.”
Yesu mukliimisami
35Nɛ Yesu kpa ma amɛ kɛ kɔpe ɔmɛ tsuo a nɔ nɛ e tsɔɔ ni ngɛ a kpe he ɔmɛ nɛ e fiɛɔ matsɛ yemi ɔ he sane kpakpa a, nɛ e tsaa hiɔ tsuaa hiɔ kɛ dengme tsuaa dengme. 36Se benɛ e na nihi babauu ɔ, e muklii mi sa lɛ ngɛ a he, ejakaa pɔ tɔ mɛ nɛ a dɛ yaa kaa tohi nɛ be hyɛlɔ. 37Kɛkɛ nɛ e de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Ni kpami ɔ hiɛ se mohu ni tsuli ɔmɛ pi. 38Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ kpa ni kpami nyɔmtsɛ ɔ pɛɛ konɛ e wo ni tsuli blɔ kɛ ba e ni kpami ɔ mi.”

Title: MATEO 10
Content:
Kaseli nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ
(Marko 3.13-19; Luka 6.12-16)
1Yesu tsɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ kɛ ba nɛ e ha mɛ mumi yayami ɔmɛ a nɔ he wami ke a hia mɛ nɛ a tsa hiɔ tsuaa hiɔ kɛ dengme tsuaa dengme. 2Kaseli nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ a biɛhi ji nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ: Kekle nɔ ɔ, Simon nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Petro, kɛ e nyɛmi Andrea; Yakobo, Zebedeo bi ɔ kɛ e nyɛmi Yohane; 3Filipo kɛ Bartolomeo; Toma kɛ Mateo, onia tsulɔ ɔ; Yakobo, Alfeo bi ɔ, kɛ Lebeo nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Tadeo hulɔ ɔ; 4Simon Kanaanno ɔ; kɛ Yuda Iskariot nɔ nɛ ba tsɔɔ Yesu se blɔ ɔ.
Kaseli nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ a tsɔmi
(Marko 6.7; Luka 9.1-16)
5Kikɛmɛ a nimli nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ nɛ ɔmɛ Yesu tsɔ, nɛ e fa mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ko gu majeli a bimɛ ɔmɛ a ngɔ, nɛ nyɛ ko sɛ Samariabi ɔmɛ a ma ko mi hulɔ; 6se mohu nyɛɛ ya Israel we tohi nɛ laa amɛ a ngɔ? 7Se nɛ nyɛ yaa nɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ fiɛ de ke: ‘Hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ su si ta.’ 8Nyɛ tsa hiɔtsɛmɛ, nyɛ ha tsitsɛmɛ a he nɛ tsɔ, nyɛ tle ni gbogboehi a si, nyɛɛ hia mumi yayamihi; yaka nyɛ na, yaka nyɛ ngɔ ha! 9Nyɛ ko hɛɛ sika tsu loo sika hiɔ loo kaplɛ ngɛ nyɛ mlɛ mi fimi nihi a mi; 10jeha nɛ ɔ hu, nyɛ ko hɛɛ blɔ hiami kotoku loo hiɔwe tade enyɔ, loo tokotahi; loo dɛma tso tete, pse ni tsulɔ ɔ e ngma sa lɛ.
11“Nɛ ma tsuaa ma aloo kɔpe tsuaa kɔpe mi nɛ nyɛ maa sɛ ɔ, nyɛ bi nɔ nɛ sa si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, nɛ nyɛ ya to lejɛ ɔ kɛ yaa su be nɛ nyɛ maa je. 12Nɛ ke nyɛ ngɛ we ɔ mi sɛe ɔ nyɛ nga we ɔ. 13Nɛ ke we ɔ sa a, nyɛ ha nyɛ he jɔmi ɔ nɛ ba e nɔ; se ke e sɛ́ ɔ, lɛɛ nyɛ he jɔmi ɔ nɛ kpale ba nyɛ ngɔ ekohu. 14Nɛ ke nɔ ko he we nyɛ nɛ e bui nyɛ munyu ɔmɛ a tue ɔ, ke nyɛ ngɛ jamɛ a we ɔ loo ma a mi jee ɔ, rnyɛ blɛ nyɛ nane he bunyuku ɔ. 15Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: E be wae ha Sodom kɛ Gomora zugba a ngɛ kojomi ligbi ɔ nɔ kaa jamɛ a ma a.”
Yiwami nɛ maa ba
(Marko 13.9-13; Luka 12.12-17)
16“Oʼɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ hsɔe kaa jijɔhi ngɛ ogbeteehi a kpɛti; lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ hɛ mi nɛ tɛ kaa sinɔhi, nɛ nyɛɛ pee kpoo kaa okpohi. 17Nyɛ hɛ nɛ hi nyɛ he nɔ ngɛ nimli a he; ejakaa a maa ngɔ nyɛ kɛ maa ya guahi a mi nɛ a maa fia nyɛ kpa ngɛ a kpe he ɔmɛ; 18nɛ ganɔhi kɛ matsɛmɛ a hɛ mi tete po a kɛ nyɛ maa ya ngɛ ye he, konɛ a kɛ ye odase ha mɛ kɛ majeli ɔmɛ. 19Se ke a ngɔ nyɛ kɛ ho ɔ, nyɛ ko hao nyɛ he ngɛ bɔ nɛ loo nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ ma de he; se a maa ngɔ nɔ nɛ nyɛ ma de ɔ ngɔ ha nyɛ ngɛ jamɛ a ngmlɛfia a mi nɔuu? 20Ejakaa pi nyɛ ji ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ munyu ɔ tue ɔ, se mohu nyɛ tsɛ ɔ mumi ɔ lɛ ngɛ munyu tue ngɛ nyɛ mi.
21“Nyɛmi maa ngɔ nyɛmi ngɔ ha gbenɔ, nɛ tsɛ maa ngɔ bi ngɔ ha, nɛ bimɛ maa te si ngɔ wo a fɔli nɛ a ma ha nɛ a gbe mɛ. 22Nɛ nihi tsuo maa nyɛ nyɛ ngɛ ye biɛ ɔ he; se nɔ nɛ hɛɔ mi kɛ pii si ɔ, lɛ ji nɔ nɛ a ma he e yi wami? 23Se ke a ngɛ nyɛ yi mi wae ngɛ ma nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, nyɛɛ tu fo kɛ ya ekpa mi; se niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nyɛ be Israel ma amɛ tsuo nya gbee loko Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ maa ba.
24“Kaselɔ pa we e tsɔɔlɔ, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu nyɔguɛ pa we e nyɔmtsɛ. 25E hiɛ kaa kaselɔ maa pee kaa e tsɔɔlɔ, nɛ nyɔguɛ hu maa pee kaa e nyɔmtsɛ. Ke a tsɛ wetsɛ ɔ Beelzebul ɔ, e webi ɔmɛ lɛɛ si enyɛmɛ a be mɛ tsɛe ja?”
Nɔ nɛ sa gbeyeyemi
(Luka 12.2-7)
26“Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ ko ye mɛ gbeye; ejakaa nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko be nɛ a bu nɔ nɛ a be nɔ tlee nɛ a laa we nɔ́ ko nɛ a be lee. 27Nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ nyɛ dee ngɛ diblii mi ɔ, nyɛ de ngɛ la hɛ mi; nɛ nɔ́ nɛ i woɔ nyɛ tue mi nɛ i deɔ nyɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ fiɛ ngɛ tsuhi a yi mi. 28Nɛ nyɛ ko ye ninɛmɛ nɛ gbee nɔmlɔ tso ɔ nɛ a nyɛ we klaa a nɛ a gbe ɔ gbeye; se mohu nyɛɛ ye nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ klaa a kɛ nɔmlɔ tso ɔ tsuo hɛ mi kpataa ngɛ gehena mi ɔ gbeye. 29Anɛ otokliihi enyɔ ɔ pi pɛsɛwa nɛ a juaa nɛ a heɔ lo? Se a ti nɔ kake be zugba nɔe, ja e je nyɛ tsɛ ɔ dɛ mi. 30Se nyɛ yi bwɔmi po ɔ a kane kulaa. 31Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ ko ye gbeye; nyɛ he jua wa hluu pe otokliihi babauu.”
Kristo biɛtawomi ngɛ nimli a hɛ mi
(Luka 12.8-9)
32“Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ gbaa mi woɔ ye ta ngɛ nimli a hɛ mi ɔ, imi hu ma gba mi ma mo e ta ngɛ Tsaatsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ hɛ mi. 33Se nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ kuaa mi ngɛ nimli a hɛ mi ɔ, imi hu ma kua lɛ ngɛ ye tsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ hɛ mi.”
Pi hejɔmi se klaate
(Luka 12.51-53; 14.26-27)
34“Nyɛ ko susu kaa i ba nɛ ma ba ha he jɔmi nɛ ba zugba a nɔ; pi he jɔmi hami nɛ i ba, se klaate mohu. 35Ejakaa i ba nɛ ma ba ha bi nɛ te si kɛ si e tsɛ, kɛ bi yo hu kɛ si e nyɛ, kɛ nganyɛ hu kɛ si e nganyɛ. 36Nɛ nɔ nitse we mi bimɛ ma plɛ e henyɛli.
37“Nɔ nɛ dɔɔ e tsɛ loo e nyɛ he pe mi ɔ, e sɛ́ mi; nɛ nɔ nɛ dɔɔ binyumu loo biyo he pe mi ɔ e se sɛ́ mi. 38Nɔ nɛ wo we e seumi tso kɛ nyɛɛ we ye se ɔ, e sɛ mi? 39Nɔ nɛ baa e klaa yi ɔ, e maa laa lɛ; nɛ nɔ nɛ laa e klaa ngɛ ye he ɔ, e nine maa su nɔ.”
Hiɔwomi
(Marko 9.41)
40“Nɔ nɛ heɔ nyɛ ɔ, e heɔ mi; nɛ nɔ nɛ heɔ mi ɔ, e heɔ nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ. 41Nɔ nɛ heɔ gbalɔ ngɛ gbalɔ biɛ mi ɔ, gbalɔ hiɔwo e ma na; nɛ nɔ nɛ heɔ dalɔ ngɛ dalɔ biɛ mi ɔ, dalɔ hiɔwo e ma na. 42Nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ma ha ni tsɔwi nɛ ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake nyu hɔ tsimi kake pɛ nɛ e nu ngɛ kaselɔ biɛ mi ɔ, niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke e hiɔwo be lɛ fɔe gblegbleegblee.”

Title: MATEO 11
Content:
Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ tsɔ kɛ ba Yesu ngɔ
(Luka 7.18-23)
1Nɛ e ba mi kaa, benɛ Yesu to e kaseli nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ blɔ nya ta a, e je lejɛ ɔ nɛ e ya tsɔɔ ni nɛ e fiɛ ngɛ a ma amɛ a mi. 2Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ Yohane nu Kristo ni tsumi ɔmɛ a he ngɛ tsu ɔ mi ɔ e tsɔ e kaseli ɔmɛ ekomɛ, 3nɛ a ba bi lɛ ke: “Anɛ mo ji nɔ nɛ ma a, aloo waa hyɛ nɔ kpa ko blɔ?” 4Nɛ Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ya nɛ nyɛ ya sɛɛ ha Yohane nɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nue kɛ nɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ hyɛe nɔ; 5hɛyuyuili ngɛ nɔ hyɛe, nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ a hule ɔ ngɛ nyɛɛe; tsitsɛmɛ a he ngɛ tsɔe, nɛ otokuli ngɛ nɔ nue; ni gbogboehi ngɛ si tee, nɛ ohiafo ɔmɛ ɔ, a ngɛ Sane Kpakpa a fiee kɛ ngɛ mɛ tsɔɔe? 6A gbaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ye he sane be e nane kpatae.”
Yesu ye Yohane he odase
(Luka 7.24-35)
7Benɛ Yohane kaseli ɔmɛ yaa a, Yesu bɔni Yohane he munyu tumi kɛ ngɛ nihi babauu ɔ tsɔɔe ke: “Mɛni nyɛ ho hyemi ya ngɛ nga a nɔ ɔ? Gla nɛ kɔɔhiɔ mimiɛɛ ɔ lo? 8Aloo mɛni nyɛ ho hyɛmi ya? Nɔmlɔ nɛ woɔ tade bɔdɔɔ? Oʼɛ, nimli nɛ woɔ tade bɔdɔɔ ɔ, matsɛmɛ a wehi a mi a hii. 9Aloo mɛni nyɛ ho hyemi ya? Gbalɔ? Ee, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, nɔ nɛ pe gbalɔ tete. 10Ejakaa nɔ nɛ ɔ ji nɔ he nɛ a ngma ngɛ ke: ‘Oʼɛ, i ngɛ ye tsɔlɔ ɔ tsɔe kɛ sɛ o hlami, nɔ nɛ ma dla o blɔ ɔ ngɔ to mo ɔ.’ 11Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nihi nɛ yihi fɔ ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ, nɔ ko ti si hyɛ nɛ pe Yohane, Baptisilɔ ɔ; se kɛ ɔ, nɔ nɛ ji nyafii kulaa ngɛ hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ mi ɔ pe lɛ. 12Se kɛ je Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ yi nɔ kɛ ma nɛ ɔ, pani nya a ngɔɔ hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ, nɛ hewali sãa lɛ he wami nya. 13Se gbali ɔmɛ tsuo kɛ Mlaa a gba kɛ ba su Yohane nɔ. 14Nɛ ke nyɛ suɔ kaa nyɛ maa hɛɛ mi ɔ, nɔ nɛ ɔ ji Elia nɛ maa ba a nɛ. 15Nɔ nɛ ngɛ tue nɛ e kɛ maa nu ɔ, e nu!
16“Se mɛni he ma ngɔ kikɛmɛ a yi nɔ bi nɛ ɔmɛ ngɔ to? A ngɛ kaa jokuɛwi nɛ hii si ngɛ jua nɔ nɛ a tsɛɛ a huɛmɛ ke: 17‘Wa kpã bɛ ha nyɛ, nɛ nyɛ dui; wa je ya ha nyɛ, nɛ nyɛ fo we.’ 18Ejakaa Yohane ba nɛz e yi ni nɛ pohu e nui nɔ́ ko, nɛ a de ke: ‘Mumi yayami ngɛ e mi.’ 19Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ba nɛ e yeɔ ni nɛ jeha nɛ e nuu nɔ ko ɔ, a de ke: ‘Oʼɛ, nyumu jiklɔɔtsɛ kɛ da nulɔ onia tsuli kɛ yayami peeli a huɛ ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ!’ Nɛ a bu Nawu ni lemi ɔ bemi ngɛ e ni tsumi ɔmɛ a nya.”
Mahi nɛ he we yi ɔ
(Luka 10.13-15)
20Kɛkɛ nɛ e bɔni mahi, hehi nɛ e tsu e he wami ni tsumihi babauu titli ngɛ ɔ a hɛ mi kami akɛnɛ a tsakee we a tsui ɔ, nɛ e ke: 21“Musu tloo mo, Korazin! Musu tloo mo, Betsaida! Ejakaa he wami ni tsumihi nɛ a tsu ngɛ nyɛ mi ɔ, a na nɛ a tsu ngɛ Tiro kɛ Zidon jinɛ a tsake a tsui ngɛ kpekpe kɛ lazu mi momoomo. 22Se i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, e be wae ha Tiro kɛ Zidon ngɛ kojomi ligbi ɔ nɔ kaa nyɛ. 23Nɛ mo Kapernaum, pi hiɔwe lokoo nɛ a wo o nɔ kɛ su? Gbeje lokoo a maa ba mo si kɛ maa ya; ejakaa he wami ni tsumihi nɛ a tsu ngɛ o mi ɔ, a na nɛ a tsu ngɛ Sodom jinɛ e maa si kɛ ba su mwɔ nɛ ɔ. 24Se i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, e be wae ha Sodom zugba a ngɛ kojomi ligbi ɔ nɔ kaa mo Kapernaum.”
Nyɛɛ ba ye ngɔ nɛ ma ha nyɛɛ jɔɔ hyɛ he
(Luka 10.21-22)
25Jamɛ a be ɔ mi ɔ, Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de ke: “I ngɛ o yi jee, Tsaatsɛ, hiɔwe kɛ zugba nyɔmtsɛ, kaa o ngɔ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngɔ laa ga leli kɛ ni leli, nɛ o je tsɔɔ bimwɔwi; 26Ee, Tsaatsɛ, bɔ nɛ sa o hɛ mi ji ja.
27“Tsaatsɛ tu nihi kulaa ngɔ wo ye dɛ mi; nɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko li Bi ɔ, kaa ja Tsɛ ɔ kɛkɛ; jeha nɛ ɔ, nɔ ko nɔ ko li Tsɛ ɔ, kaa ja Bi ɔ, kɛ nɔ nɛ Bi ɔ suɔ kaa e je lɛ kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ ɔ.
28“Nyɛɛ ba ye ngɔ, nyɛ nihi tsuo nɛ pɔ tɔ nyɛ nɛ nyɛ tlomihi pã nyɛ ɔ, nɛ ma ha nyɛ he jɔmi? 29Nyɛ wo ye kuɛpã tso ɔ ngɔ fɔ nyɛ nɔ, nɛ nyɛɛ kase mi; se ye he jɔ, nɛ i baa ye he si kɛ jee ye tsui mi; nɛ nyɛ ma na he jɔmi ngɔ ha nyɛ klaa amɛ. 30Ejakaa ye kuɛpa tso ɔ tloomi wɛ, nɛ ye tlomi ɔ hu jii we.”

Title: MATEO 12
Content:
Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ he sane
(Marko 2.23-28; Luka 6.1-5)
1Jamɛ a be ɔ mi ɔ Yesu ya gu blɛfo mgmɔhi a mi ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ; nɛ hwɔ ye e kaseli ɔmɛ, nɛ a bɔni blɛfo ɔ kpɔmi kɛ kpemi. 2Se benɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ na a, a de lɛ ke: “Oʼɛ, o kaseli ɔmɛ ngɛ nɔ nɛ a ngmɛ́ blɔ kaa a peɔ ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ pee.” 3Se e de mɛ ke: “Anɛ nyɛ kane we nɔ nɛ David pee benɛ hwɔ ye lɛ kɛ nihi nɛ kɛ lɛ ngɛ ɔ? 4Bɔ nɛ e sɛ Mawu we ɔ nɛ e ya ye hɛ mi mami abolo nɛ e dɛ blɔ kaa lɛ loo nihi nɛ kɛ lɛ ngɛ ɔ yeɔ ɔ, kaa ja osɔfɔ ɔmɛ kɛkɛ ɔ? 5Aloo nyɛ kane we ngɛ Mlaa a mi kaa Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔmɛ a nɔ ɔ, osɔfohi bleɔ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ nɛ a yi fɔ ɔ? 6Jeha nɛ ɔ i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: nɔ́ nɛ pe sɔlemi we ɔ ngɛ hiɛ ɔ. 7Se kaa nyɛ le nɔ́ nɛ ji: ‘Mɔbɔ nami i hlaa se pi bɔ’ ɔ sisi jinɛ, nyɛ be ninɛmɛ nɛ yi fɔ ɔ fɔ bue. 8Ejakaa Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nyɔmtsɛ ji Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ.”
Nyumu ko nɛ nine kake gbo ɔ
(Marko 3.1-6; Luka 6.6-11)
9Nɛ e je lejɛ ɔ nɛ e ya sɛ a kpe he ɔ. 10Nɛ oʼɛ, nyumu ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ e nine kake gbo. Nɛ a bi lɛ ke: “Anɛ e da blɔ kaa a tsaa nɔ ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ lo?” A de enɛ ɔ benɛ pee nɛ e ya po e nya? 11Se e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ti mɛnɔ nɛ ngɛ to kake, nɛ ke e ya nɔ muɔ mi ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, nɛ e be e he pɛtɛe nɛ e je lɛ? 12Anɛ nɔmlɔ he jua wɛ babauu pi to lo? Lɔ ɔ he ɔ e da blɔ kaa a peɔ kpakpa ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ.” 13Kɛkɛ nɛ e de nyumu ɔ ke: “Kpa o nine ɔ mi!” Nɛ e kpa mi, nɛ e kɛ kake ɔ sɔ. 14Enɛ ɔ he ɔ Farisifo ɔmɛ je kpo ya so e yi nɔ, bɔ nɛ a maa pee nɛ a kpata e hɛ mi.
Mawu tsɔlɔ nɛ e hia
15Se benɛ Yesu kpa enɛ ɔ si ɔ, e sa e he si kɛ je lejɛ ɔ. Nɛ nihi babauu nyɛɛ e se, nɛ e tsa mɛ tsuo, 16nɛ e bɔ mɛ kɔkɔ ke a ko ha nɛ a nu e he; 17benɛ pee nɛ nɔ nɛ gbalɔ “Yesaia de ɔ nɛ ba mi ke:
18“Oʼɛ, ye tsɔlɔ nɛ i hla a,
Ye suɔlɔ nɛ ye klaa naa e he tsui ɔ,
I kɛ ye mumi ɔ maa to e nɔ,
Nɛ e maa fiɛ kojomi ngɔ tsɔɔ majeli ɔmɛ.
19E be pɛe, nɛ e be ngmlaa kpae hulɔ,
Nɛ nɔ ko be e gbi nue ngɛ magbɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ
20Gla nɛ a kɔ ɔ, e be kue,
Nɛ kane mi tako nɛ ngɛ tsoe suhi ɔ e be gbee,
Kɛ maa su be nɛ e ma ha kojomi maa su kunimi yemi mi.
21Nɛ e biɛ ɔ nɔ majeli ɔmɛ maa ngɔ a hɛ ngɔ fɔ.”
Yesu kɛ Beelzebul
(Marko 3.20-30; Luka 11.14-23)
22Kɛkɛ nɛ a kɛ nɔ ko nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ e mi nɛ ji hɛ yuyuilɔ kɛ amuɛti tsuo ɔ ba e ngɔ; nɛ e tsa lɛ, nɛ hɛ yuyuilɔ nɛ ji amuɛti hulɔ ɔ tu munyu nɛ e hyɛ nɔ. 23Nɛ asafo ɔ tsuo nyɛ kpɛ a he nɛ a de ke: “Anɛ pi David bi ɔ ji nɛ ɔ?” 24Se benɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ nu ɔ, a ke: “Pi yaka nɛ nɔ nɛ ɔ ngɛ mumi yayamihi hiae ɔ, se mumi yayamihi a tsɛ Beelzebul ɔ he wami nyɛ ʼi.” 25Se nɛ Yesu na a juɛmi ɔ, e de mɛ ke: “Matsɛ yemi tsuaa matsɛ yemi nɛ gbaa woɔ lɛ nitsɛ e he ɔ, e ywia; nɛ ma tsuaa ma aloo we tsuaa we nɛ gbaa woɔ lɛ nitse e he ɔ, e dɛ si. 26Nɛ ke satan hia satan a, e gba wo lɛ nitse e he; lɛɛ kɛ e matsɛ yemi ɔ maa pee kɛ da si kɛɛ? 27Nɛ ke imi ɔ, Beelzebul he wami nya i hiaa mumi yayamihi ngɛ ɔ, nyɛ bimɛ nyumu ɔmɛ ɔ, mɛnɔ he wami nya a hiaa mɛ ngɛ? Lɔ ɔ he ɔ mɛ nɔuu a maa kojo nyɛ. 28Se ke imi lɛɛ, Mawu Mumi ɔ nya i hiaa mumi yayami ɔmɛ ngɛ ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ pe Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ na nyɛ nɛ ɔ nɛ.
29“Kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ nɔ ko ma nyɛ he walɔ we mi nɛ e sɛ nɛ e ya ha e nihi, kaa ja e fi he walɔ ɔ lolo loko e ma nyɛ e we ɔ mi ni ha.
30“Nɔ nɛ be ye blɔfami ɔ, e te si ngɔ wo mi; nɛ nɔ nɛ kɛ mi bua we nya a, e ngɛ gbɛe kɛ ngɛ fiae. 31Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: A maa ngɔ yayami kɛ musu bɔmi tsuo ngɔ pa nimli: se Mumi ɔ he musu bɔmi ɔ, a kɛ be nimli pae. 32Nɛ ɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ maa tu munyu ko ngɔ si Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ, a kɛ maa pa lɛ; se nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ maa tu munyu ngɔ si Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ, a kɛ be lɛ pae ngɛ je nɛ ɔ mi aloo je nɛ maa ba a mi.”
Tso kɛ e yiblii
(Luka 6.43-45)
33“Nyɛ ha tso ɔ nɛ pee kpakpa nɛ e wo yiblii kpakpahi; aloo nyɛ ha tso ɔ nɛ pee tso yaya nɛ e wo yiblii yayahi; ejakaa tso yiblii a kɛ leɔ tso. 34Nyɛ sinɔhi a nina! Kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ nyɛ nɛ nyɛ ji nimli yayamihi ɔ, nyɛ ma nyɛ munyu kpakpa maa tu? Ejakaa nɔ́ nɛ hyi tsui kɛ be nɔ ɔ, lɔ ɔ nɔuu nya deɔ. 35Nɔmlɔ kpakpa jeɔ ni kpakpahi kɛ jee e tsui mi juetli kpakpa a mi; nɛ nɔmlɔ yayami hu jeɔ ni yayahi kɛ jee e tsui mi juetli yaya a mi.
36“Se i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, yaka munyu tsuaa yaka munyu nɛ nimli tuɔ ɔ, a maa bu he akɔɔtaa ngɛ kojomi ligbi ɔ nɔ. 37Ejakaa o munyu ɔmɛ a mi a maa je kɛ wo mo nguɔ, nɛ o munyu ɔmɛ a mi a maa je kɛ bu mo fɔ.”
Farisifo ɔmɛ ngɛ okadi hlae
(Marko 8.11-12; Luka 11.29-32)
38Kɛkɛ nɛ mlaa tsɔɔli kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ he nɔ nɛ a de ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, wa ngɛ o nine nya okadi ko hlae nɛ waa hyɛ.” 39Se Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Yi nɔ bi yayahi kɛ gba puɛli ngɛ okadi hlae; se a be mɛ okadi ko hae, kaa ja gbalɔ Yona okadi ɔ. 40Ejakaa bɔ nɛ Yona ye nyɔ kɛ pia ligbi etɛ ngɛ wo mi lo ngua a muklii mi ɔ, jã Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ maa ye nyɔ kɛ pia ligbi etɛ ngɛ zugba a muklii mi. 41Ninive nyumu ɔmɛ maa te si ngɔ wo kikɛ yi nɔ bi nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ kojomi ɔ mi, nɛ a maa bu mɛ fɔ; ejakaa a tsake a tsui ngɛ Yona fiɛmi ɔ nya; nɛ oʼɛ, nɔ́ nɛ pe Yona ngɛ hiɛ ɔ. 42Leneyi (Wo yi je) manye ɔ maa te si ngɔ wo kikɛmɛ a yi nɔ bi nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ kojomi ɔ mi, nɛ e maa bu mɛ fɔ; ejakaa e je zugba a nyagbe he ba bu Salomo ni lemi ɔ tue; nɛ oʼɛ, nɔ́ nɛ pe Salomo ngɛ hiɛ ɔ.”
Mumi yayami ɔmɛ a sekpalemi
(Luka 11.24-26)
43“Se mumi yayami ɔ, ke e je nɔmlɔ mi ɔ, e ya nyɛɛ he gbigblihi hlaa he jɔɔmi, se e nɛ́ eko. 44Nɛ e deɔ ke: ‘Ma kpale ye se kɛ ya ye we he nɛ i je ɔ.’ Nɛ ke ba a, e naa kaa e fɔɔ si gu, nɛ a bɛɛ mi, nɛ a dla mi. 45Kɛkɛ ɔ, e yaa nɛ e ya ngɔɔ mumi kpahi kpaago nɛ ji mumi yayamihi pe lɛ kɛ piɛɛ e he; nɛ a baa ba hii lejɛ ɔ; nɛ jamɛ a nɔmlɔ ɔ nyagbe si himi ɔ plɛɔ yayami pe kekle nɔ ɔ. Ja nɔuu e maa ba mi ngɛ yi nɔ yaya nɛ ɔ hu he.”
Yesu nyɛ kɛ enyɛmimɛ nyumu ɔmɛ
(Marko 3.31-35; Luka 8.19-21)
46Yesu kɛ asafo ɔmɛ ngɛ nɔ ngɛ munyu tue nɔuu kɛkɛ nɛ oʼɛ, e nyɛ kɛ e nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ ba da agbo ɔ nya; a ngɛ hlae nɛ a kɛ lɛ maa tu munyu? 47Nɛ nɔ ko ba de lɛ ke: “Oʼɛ, o nyɛ kɛ o nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ daa si ngɛ agbo ɔ nya ngɛ hlae nɛ a kɛ mo maa tu munyu.” 48Se e he nɔ nɛ e de nɔ nɛ ba de lɛ ɔ ke: “Mɛnɔ ji ye nyɛ, nɛ mɛnɔmɛ ji ye nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ?” 49Nɛ e je e nine ngɔ tsɔɔ e kaseli ɔmɛ nɛ e ke: “Ne, ye nyɛ kɛ ye nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ! 50Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ peɔ Tsaatsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ suɔmi nya ni ɔ, lɛ nɔuu ji ye nyɛmi nyumu kɛ ye nyɛmi yo kɛ ye nyɛ.”

Title: MATEO 13
Content:
Nidulɔ ɔ he abɛ ɔ
(Marko 4.1-9; Luka 8.4-8)
1Jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔ nɔuu ɔ, Yesu je we ɔ mi nɛ e ya hi si ngɛ wo ɔ nya. 2Asafo babauu ba bua a he nya ngɛ e ngɔ, nɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e ya sɛ lɛ ko mi nɛ e ya hi si, nɛ asafo ɔ tsuo daa si ngɛ wo ɔ nya. 3Nɛ e tu munyuhi fuu kɛ tsɔɔ mɛ ngɛ abɛhi a mi, nɛ e ke: “Oʼɛ, ni dulɔ ko pue nɔ kɛ ho ni dumi ya. 4Nɛ benɛ e ngɛ due ɔ, ekomɛ ya pue blɔ he, nɛ lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ ba ba kukuɔ. 5Nɛ ekomɛ hu ya pue tɛ sahi a nɔ he nɛ a nɛ́ zu fuu ngɛ; nɛ amlɔ ɔ, akɛnɛ a nɛ́ zu nɛ mi kuɔ he je ɔ, a puɛ mla, 6se benɛ pu te si ɔ, a sã, nɛ akɛnɛ a be poku ko he je ɔ a ngla. 7Nɛ ekomɛ hu ya pue miohi a kpɛti, nɛ mio ɔmɛ te si nɛ a gbe tso ɔmɛ. 8Se ekomɛ hu ya pue zugba kpakpa nɔ, nɛ a wo yiblii, eko lafa, eko nyingmi ekpa, kɛ eko nyingmi etɛ. 9Nɔ nɛ ngɛ tue ɔ, e nu.”
Nɔ́ nɛ he je nɛ Yesu bu abɛhi
(Marko 4.10-12; Luka 8.9-10)
10Nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ba e ngɔ ba bi lɛ ke: “Mɛni he je o kɛ mɛ ngɛ munyu tue ngɛ abɛhi a mi ɔ?” 11Se e he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Ejakaa nyɛɛ lɛɛ a ngɔ hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ mi laami sane ɔmɛ ngɔ ha nyɛ ke nyɛɛ le, se mɛɛ lɛɛ a kɛ hi me. 12Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ngɛ nɔ́ ko ɔ, a ma ha lɛ nɛ e na kɛ be nɔ; se nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ be nɔ́ ko tsɔ ko ɔ, bɔɔ nɛ e ngɛ ɔ tete a ma kpɔ ngɛ e dɛ. 13E nɛ ɔ he je nɛ i kɛ mɛ tuɔ munyu ngɛ abɛhi a mi ɔ nɛ, ejakaa a ngɛ hyɛe se a nɛ́, nɛ a ngɛ nue se a nui, nɛ a nɛ́ sisi hulɔ. 14Nɛ Yesaia gbami ɔ ba mi ngɛ a he, nɔ́ nɛ deɔ ke:
‘Numi ɔ nyɛ maa nu lɛɛ, se nyɛ be sisi nue;
Nɛ nami ɔ nyɛ maa na lɛɛ, se nyɛ be se kɔe.
15Ejakaa kikɛmɛ a ma nɛ ɔ tsui ti,
Nɛ a tue wa,
Nɛ a ma a hɛngmɛ;
Konɛ a ko hyɛ nɔ kɛ a hɛngmɛ,
Nɛ a ko nu nɔ kɛ a tue,
Nɛ a tsui hu ko na sisi,
Nɛ a kpale nɛ a tsa mɛ.’
16Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ a gbaa nyɛ hɛngmɛ ɔmɛ, kaa a ngɛ nɔ hyɛe, kɛ nyɛ tue ɔmɛ, kaa a ngɛ nɔ nue. 17Ejakaa niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, gbali kɛ dali fuu hla nɛ a na nihi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nae nɛ ɔ, nɛ a ya nɛ́, aloo nɛ a nu nihi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nue nɛ ɔ, nɛ a ya nui.”
Yesu tsɔɔ nidulɔ ɔ he abɛ ɔ sisi
(Marko 4.13-20; Luka 8.11-15)
18“Jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛɛ bu ni dulɔ ɔ he abɛ ɔ tue. 19Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ nuɔ mɛtsɛ yemi ɔ he munyu ɔ nɛ e kɔ we se ɔ, nɔ yayami ɔ baa ba saa nɔ́ nɛ a du ngɛ e tsui ɔ mi ɔ. Nɔ nɛ ɔ ji nɔ́ nɛ a du ngɛ blɔ tue ɔ nɛ. 20Se nɔ́ nɛ a du ngɛ tɛ sa nɔ ɔ, lɛ ji nɔ nɛ nuɔ munyu ɔ nɛ e heɔ amlɔ kɛ bua jɔmi; 21se akɛnɛ e be poku ngɛ e mi ɔ, e hii si be bɔɔ kɛkɛ; nɛ ke haomi loo yi wami ba ngɛ munyu ɔ he ɔ, e kɛ we kɛkɛ ɔ e nane kpataa. 22Se nɔ́ nɛ a du ngɛ miohi a kpɛti ɔ, lɛ ji nɔ nɛ nuɔ munyu ɔ, se je nɛ ɔ mi he nya gbami kɛ nihi fuu a he mlɔɔmi ɔ gbee munyu ɔ, nɛ e wui yiblii. 23Se nɔ́ nɛ a du ngɛ zugba kpakpa nɔ ɔ, lɛ ji nɔ nɛ nuɔ munyu ɔ nɛ e kɔɔ se, nɛ e pa woɔ yiblii hulɔ, nɛ e baa, nɔ ko lafa, nɔ ko hu nyingmi ekpa, kɛ nɔ ko hu nyingmi etɛ.”
Hu ɔ he abɛ ɔ
24Yesu bu mɛ abɛ kpa ko hu nɛ e ke: “Hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ kaa nyumu ko nɛ duɔ dumi ni kpakpahi ngɛ e ngmɔ mi. 25Se benɛ ni ɔmɛ hwɔ si ɔ, e he nyɛlɔ ko ba ba du hu kɛ futu ngma a, nɛ e je. 26Se benɛ e puɛ nɛ e wo yiblii ɔ, kɛkɛ nɛ hu ɔ hu yi je kpo. 27Wetsɛ ɔ webi ɔmɛ ba e ngɔ ba bi lɛ ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, anɛ pi dumi ni kpakpahi nɛ o du ngɛ o ngmɔ ɔ mi ɔ lo? Jije hu nɛ ɔmɛ je mɔ?’ 28Se e de mɛ ke: ‘Henyɛlɔ ko lɛ pee enɛ ɔ nɛ.’ Nɛ e webi ɔmɛ de lɛ ke: ‘Lɛɛ o suɔ kaa waa ya nɛ wa ya hia lo?’ 29Se e ke: ‘Dɛbi, eko ɔ alinɔ hu ɔmɛ a hiami mi ɔ, nyɛ maa hia ngma a hu ngɔ futu mi. 30Nyɛ ha enyɔ ɔ tsuo nɛ wa kɛ ya si ngma kpami be ɔ, nɛ ngma kpami be ɔ, ma de ngma kpali ɔmɛ ke: Nyɛ bua hu ɔ nya kekle, nɛ nyɛɛ fi konɛ a sã; se ngma a lɛɛ nyɛ bua nya ngɔ wo ye gba a mi.’ ”
Sinapi wu ɔ he abɛ ɔ
(Marko 4.30-32; Luka 13.18-19)
31E bu mɛ abɛ kpa ke: “Hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ kaa sinapi wu nɛ nɔ ko kɛ̃ nɛ e ya du ngɛ e ngmɔ mi; 32e ji dumi nihi tsuo a kpɛti nyafii kulaa, se ke e puɛ ɔ, e kle pe pui bahi tsuo, nɛ e peɔ tso, nɛ hiɔwe lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ baa ba peɔ tsuhi ngɛ e kɔni ɔmɛ a mi.”
Ma sasɛ ɔ he abɛ ɔ
(Luka 13.20-21)
33E bu mɛ abɛ kpa ke: “Hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ kaa ma sasɛ nɛ yo ko ngɔ nɛ e kɛ hɔ ma sowe etɛ mi kɛ ya su be nɛ lɛ tsuo sa.”
Yesu kɛ abɛhi tsɔɔ ni
(Marko 4.33-34)
34Abɛhi a mi Yesu gu kɛ tu munyu nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo kɛ tsɔɔ asafo ɔmɛ, nɛ abɛhi a mi sɔuu kɛkɛ e kɛ mɛ tuɔ munyu ngɛ; 35konɛ nɔ́ nɛ gbalɔ ɔ de ɔ ne ba mi ke:
“Ma bli ye nya ngɛ abɛhi a mi;
Ma fiɛ nihi nɛ a ngɔ laa kɛ je je mi sisije ɔ.”
Yesu tsɔɔ hu ɔ he abɛ ɔ sisi
36Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu je asafo ɔmɛ blɔ nɛ e sɛ we ɔ mi. Nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ba e ngɔ ba de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔ wɔ ngmɔ ɔ mi hu ɔ he abɛ ɔ sisi.” 37Nɛ e he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Dumi ni kpakpahi a dulɔ ɔ ji Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ; 38ngmɔ ɔ ji je nɛ ɔ mi; dumi ni kpakpa amɛ ji matsɛ yemi mi bimɛ ɔmɛ; hu ɔ ji nɔ yayami ɔ bimɛ ɔmɛ; 39he nyɛlɔ nɛ du mɛ ɔ ji abosiami; ngma kpami be ɔ ji je nɛ ɔ nyagbe ɔ nɛ, nɛ ngma kpali ɔmɛ ji hiɔwe bɔfo ɔmɛ. 40Jeha nɛ ɔ bɔ nɛ a buaa hu ɔ nya nɛ a kɛ la sãa a, ja nɔuu a maa pee ngɛ je nɔ nyagbe mi. 41Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ maa tsɔ e bɔfo ɔmɛ nɛ a ma bua nane kpatami nihi tsuo kɛ nihi nɛ tsuɔ mlaa kuami ni ɔmɛ a nya kɛ maa je e matsɛ yemi ɔ mi, 42nɛ a maa ngɔ mɛ ngɔ wo la abolo tsu ɔ mi; lejɛ ɔ ya fomi kɛ lungu nya kpemi maa hi. 43Nɛ dali ɔmɛ ma kpɛ kaa pu ngɛ a tsɛ matsɛ yemi ɔ mi. Nɔ nɛ ngɛ tue ɔ, e nu!”
Juetli nɛ a ngɔ laa a he abɛ ɔ
44“Jeha nɛ ɔ hu, hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ kaa juetli nɛ a kɛ laa ngɛ ngmɔ mi, nɛ benɛ nɔ ko ya na a, e ngɔ laa, nɛ lɔ ɔ he bua jɔmi nɛ e na a he je ɔ e ho nɛ e ya jua nihi tsuo nɛ e ngɛ ɔ, nɛ e kɛ he jamɛ a ngmɔ ɔ.”
Adiagba he abɛ ɔ
45“Jeha nɛ ɔ hu, hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ kaa guɛ yelɔ ko nɛ ngɛ adiagba saminyawi hlae, 46nɛ benɛ e ya na adiagba kake nɛ he jua wa a, e ho nɛ e ya jua nihi tsuo nɛ e ngɛ ɔ, nɛ e kɛ he.”
Ya a he abɛ ɔ
47“Jeha nɛ ɔ hu, hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ kaa ya nɛ afɔ́ ngɛ wo mi nɛ e gbe lo slɔɔtohi tsuo eko; 48nɛ benɛ e hyi ɔ, a sã kɛ ba wo ɔ nya, nɛ a hi si nɛ a bua kpakpa amɛ a nya ngɔ wo plɔhi a mi; se lohi nɛ hi ɔmɛ ɔ a sake pue he. 49Ja nɔuu a maa pee ngɛ je nɛ ɔ nyagbe mi. Hiɔwe bɔfo ɔmɛ maa je kpo maa ba nɛ a maa hla nimli yayami ɔmɛ ngɛ dali ɔmɛ a kpɛti; 50nɛ a kɛ mɛ maa wo la abolo tsu ɔ mi. Lejɛ ɔ ya fomi kɛ lungu nya kpemi maa hi.”
Juetli momo kɛ ehe
51Yesu bi mɛ ke: “Nyɛ na ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo nya lo?” A de lɛ ke: “Ee, Mawetsɛ.” 52Se e de mɛ ke: “Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mlaa tsɔɔlɔ tsuaa mlaa tsɔɔlɔ nɛ a pee lɛ kaselɔ kɛ ha hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ, e ngɛ kaa wetsɛ ko nɛ jeɔ ni hehi kɛ ni momohi kɛ jee e juetli to he ɔ.”
A kua Yesu ngɛ Nazaret
(Marko 6.1-6; Luka 4.16-30)
53Benɛ Yesu gbe abɛ nɛ ɔmɛ a bumi nya a, e je lejɛ ɔ; 54nɛ benɛ e ba lɛ nitse e ma a mi ɔ, e tsɔɔ mɛ ni ngɛ a kpe he ɔ, nɛ e ha a he nya si mɛ nɛ a ke: “Jije nɔ nɛ ɔ ya na ni lemi kɛ he wami ni nɛ ɔmɛ kɛ je? 55Anɛ pi kapitɛ ɔ bi ɔji nɛ ɔ? Anɛ pi e nyɛ nɛ a tsɛɛ Maria a, kɛ e nyɛmimɛ nyumuhi Yakobo kɛ Yose kɛ Simon kɛ Yuda a? 56Nɛ e nyɛmimɛ yi ɔmɛ, anɛ pi waa kɛ mɛ tsuo nɛ ngɛ ɔ? Jije nɔ nɛ ɔ ya na ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo kɛ je mɔ?” 57Nɛ e plɛ kpangme ha mɛ. Se Yesu de mɛ ke: “A buu gbalɔ ngɛ he tsuaa he, ja lɛ nitse e ma mi kɛ lɛ nitsɛ e we mi kɛkɛ.” 58Nɛ akɛnɛ a he we yi he je ɔ, e pee we he wami nihi fuu ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ.

Title: MATEO 14
Content:
Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ gbenɔ
(Marko 6.14-29; Luka 9.7-9)
1Jamɛ a be ɔ mi ɔ amlaalo Herode nu Yesu he sane; 2nɛ e de e sɔmɔli ɔmɛ ke: “Yohane, Baptisilɔ ʼi; lɛ nɛ te si kɛ je gbeje, lɔ ɔ he nɛ he wami ɔmɛ ngɛ ni tsue ngɛ e mi nɛ ɔ nɛ.”
3Se Herode nu Yohane nɛ e fi lɛ, nɛ e wo lɛ tsu mi ngɛ Herodia, e nyɛmi Filipo yo ɔ he; 4ejakaa Yohane de lɛ ke: “E dɛ́ kaa o ngɔɔ lɛ.” 5Nɛ jinɛ e hla kaa e gbe lɛ, se e ya ye asafo ɔ gbeye, ejakaa a buu Yohane gbalɔ. 6Benɛ a ngɛ Herode fɔmi ligbi yee ɔ, Herodia biyo ɔ ba do ngɛ ni ɔmɛ a hɛ mi, nɛ e pee Herode fɛu. 7Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e ka kita kɛ wo lɛ si ke nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ e ma bi lɛ ɔ e ma ha lɛ. 8Nɛ e nyɛ wo lɛ ga nɛ e ba de ke: “Ngɔɔ Yohane, Baptiɔilɔ ɔ, yi ngɔ fɔ ka mi ha mi ngɛ hiɛ ɔ!” 9Nɛ e dɔ matsɛ ɔ; se e kitahi nɛ e ka amɛ, kɛ nihi nɛ kɛ lɛ hii si ngɛ niyeni si ɔ he je ɔ, e fa ke a ngɔ ha lɛ. 10Nɛ e tsɔ nɛ a ya po Yohane yi ngɛ tsu ɔ mi. 11Nɛ a ngɔ e yi ngɔ fɔ ka mi kɛ ba, nɛ a ngɔ ha yiheyo ɔ, nɛ e kɛ ya ha e nyɛ. 12Nɛ Yohane kaseli ɔmɛ ba nɛ a ba wo e gbogboe ɔ nɛ a ya pu, nɛ a ho nɛ a ya de Yesu.
Yesu ha nimli akpe enuɔ niyeni
(Marko 6.30-44; Luka 9.10-17; Yohane 6.1-14)
13Se benɛ Yesu nu ɔ, e gu lɛ mi kɛ je lejɛ ɔ kɛ ho nga nɔ he ko banee ya. Nɛ benɛ asafo ɔmɛ nu ɔ, a je ma amɛ a mi nɛ a nyɛɛ nane kɛ nyɛɛ e se. 14Nɛ benɛ Yesu je kpo ɔ e ba na asafo babauu, nɛ e muklii mi sã lɛ ngɛ a he, nɛ e tsa a kpɛti hiɔtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ.
15Nɛ benɛ su gbɔkuɛ ɔ, e kaseli ɔmɛ ba e ngɔ ba de lɛ ke: “Nga nɔ ji hiɛ ɔ, nɛ je ngɛ jɔe; je asafo ɔ blɔ nɛ a ya ma amɛ a mi nɛ a ya he niyeni.” 16Se Yesu de mɛ ke: “E hia we kaa a ya, nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ ha mɛ ni nɛ a ye.” 17Se a de lɛ ke: “Abolo enuɔ kɛ lo enyɔ pɛ wa ngɛ ngɛ hiɛ ɔ!” 18Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ kɛ ba ha mi ngɛ hiɛ ɔ!” 19Nɛ e fa asafo ke a hi si ngɛ nga a nɔ. Nɛ e kukuɔ abolo enuɔ kɛ lo enyɔ ɔ, nɛ e hyɛ hiɔwe nɛ e gbaa nɔ, nɛ e kuɔ mi, nɛ e ngɔ ha e kaseli ɔmɛ, nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ngɔ ha asafo ɔ. 20Nɛ mɛ tsuo a ye nɛ a tɔ, nɛ a kukuɔ bibli nɛ piɛ ɔ ngɔ wo kusii nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ mi nɛ a hyi tɔtɔɔtɔ. 21Ninli nɛ ye ɔ maa su nyumuhi akpe enyɔ, e slɔ yihi kɛ jokuɛwi.
Yesu nyɛɛ wo hɛ mi
(Marko 6.45-52; Yohane 6.15-21)
22Nɛ amlɔ ɔ Yesu tsɛ̃ e kaseli ɔmɛ a yi se nɛ a sɛ lɛ mi nɛ a sɛ e hlami kɛ ya wo ɔ se je, konɛ e wo asafo ɔmɛ blɔ lolo. 23Nɛ benɛ e wo asafo ɔmɛ blɔ ɔ, e kuɔ yoku ɔ, lɛ e nɔ kake, nɛ e ya sɔle. Se benɛ je jɔ ɔ, lɛ e nɔ kake too e ngɛ lejɛ ɔ? 24Se lɛ ɔ su wo ɔ kpɛti mo, nɛ oslɔke ɔmɛ ngɛ lɛ ɔ hɛɛe, ejakaa e ngɛ kɔɔhiɔ kpee. 25Se makɛ ngmlɛ eywiɛ mi ɔ, Yesu nyɛɛ wo ɔ hɛ mi kɛ ba a ngɔ. 26Nɛ benɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ na lɛ nɛ e nyɛɛ wo ɔ hɛ mi ɔ, a tsui po, nɛ a de ke: “Kpade ʼi!” Nɛ a kɛ gbeye kpa ngmlaa. 27Se amlɔ ɔ, Yesu wo e nya nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ na tsui, ami ʼi; nyɛ ko ye gbeye!” 28Se Petro he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Mawetsɛ, ke mo ʼi ɔ, fa mi konɛ ma nyɛɛ nyu ɔ hɛ mi kɛ ba o ngɔ,” 29Nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Ba!” Nɛ Petro je lɛ ɔ mi, nɛ e nyɛɛ nyu ɔ hɛ mi kɛ yaa Yesu ngɔ. 30Se benɛ e na kaa kɔɔhiɔ ɔ ngɛ fiae huu ɔ, e ye gbeye nɛ e bɔni mumi, nɛ e kpa ngmlaa ke: “Mawetsɛ, he mi!” 31Nɛ amlɔ ɔ Yesu kpa e nine mi nɛ e pɛtɛ e he, nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Mo nɛ o hemi kɛ yemi pi, mɛni he je o je nguane?” 32Nɛ benɛ a sɛ lɛ ɔ mi ɔ, kɔɔhiɔ ɔ jɔɔ fiami. 33Nɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ lɛ ɔ mi ɔ ba ba ja lɛ de ke: “Niinɛ, Mawu bi ji mo!”
Yesu tsa hiɔtsɛmɛ ngɛ Genesarɛt
(Marko 6.53-56)
34Nɛ benɛ a po wo ɔ, a ba Genesarɛt zugba a nɔ. 35Nɛ benɛ lejɛ ɔ tsɛmɛ na kaa Yesu ʼi ɔ, a tsɔ kɛ ya lejɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi tsuo, nɛ a ya ngɔ hiɔtsɛmɛ tsuo kɛ ba e ngɔ; 36nɛ a ba kpa lɛ pɛɛ wawɛɛ kaa e ha a na e tade ɔ nya a he kɛkɛ nɛ a ta: nɛ nihi abɔ nɛ ta he ɔ tsuo he wa mɛ kulaa.

Title: MATEO 15
Content:
Blematsɛmɛ a tsɔɔmi
(Marko 7.1-13)
1Kɛkɛ nɛ mlaa tsɔɔli kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ nɛ je Yerusalem ɔ ba Yesu ngɔ ba de ke: 2“Mɛni he je nɛ o kaseli ɔmɛ tɔɔ nikɔtɔmɛ amɛ a kɔ ɔmɛ a nɔ ɔ? Ejakaa a fɔ we a dɛ loko a yeɔ ni.” 3Se e he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ nyɛ hu nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛ blema kɔ ɔmɛ tɔɔ Mawu kita a nɔ ɔ? 4Ejakaa Mawu ke: ‘Buu o tsɛ kɛ e nyɛ,’ nɛ: ‘Nɔ nɛ gbiɛɛ e tsɛ loo e nyɛ ɔ, a maa gbe lɛ!’ 5Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ deɔ ke: Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ma de e tsɛ loo e nyɛ ke: ‘Nɔ́ nɛ jinɛ o ma na ngɛ ye dɛ mi ɔ, i kɛ ke Mawu’ ɔ, lɛɛ e ko pa bu e tsɛ loo e nyɛ hu. 6Nɛ nyɛ blema kɔ ɔmɛ a he ɔ, nyɛ kua Mawu kita a. 7Osatotsɛmɛ! Niinɛ nɛ Yesaia gba ngɛ nyɛ he ke:
8‘Ma nɛ ɔ kɛ a nya buu mi;
Se a tsui tsɛ̃ e he kɛ je ye he kɛ ho lokoo ya.
9Se yakatsuaa a jaa mi ɔ nɛ,
Ejakaa a tsɔɔ tsɔɔmihi nɛ ji nimli a kitahi.’ ”
Nihi nɛ bleɔ nɔmlɔ
(Marko 7.14-23)
10Nɛ Yesu tsɛ asafo ɔ kɛ ba nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ bu tue nɛ nyɛɛ nu sisi! 11Pi nɔ́ nɛ yaa nɔ nya mi ɔ nɛ bleɔ nɔmlɔ; se mohu nɔ nɛ jee nɔ nya mi ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛ bleɔ nɔmlɔ.”
12Kɛkɛ nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ba e ngɔ ba de lɛ ke: “O le kaa benɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ nu kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔ ɔ, e pee mɛ tai ɔ?” 13Se e he nɔ ke: “Tso tsuaa tso nɛ pi ye hiɔwe Tsɛ ɔ nɛ ma a, a maa hia. 14Nyɛ ko di a se! Hɛ yuyuili nɛ tsɔɔ hɛ yuyuili a blɔ ji mɛ; nɛ ke hɛ yuyuilɔ ngɛ hɛ yuyuilɔ blɔ tsɔe ɔ, mɛ ni enyɔ ɔ tsuo a maa nɔ muɔ mi.” 15Nɛ Petro he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔ wɔ abɛ nɛ ɔ sisi!” 16Nɛ Yesu ke: “Anɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ li ni kɛ mwɔɔ? 17Anɛ nyɛ kpa we si kaa nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ yaa nɔ nya mi ɔ, muklii mi e sɛɛ nɛ a jeɔ woɔ agbotso mi lo? 18Se nihi nɛ jee nya mi jee kpo ɔ, tsui mi a jee nɛ kɔlɔ ɔmɛ lɛ bleɔ nɔ ɔ nɛ. 19Ejakaa tsui mi nɛ susumi yayahi, nɔmlɔ gbemi, gba puɛmihi, ajuama bɔmihi, jumihi, lakpa odase yemihi kɛ musu bɔmihi jee. 20Enɛ ɔmɛ ji nihi nɛ bleɔ nɔmlɔ; se dɛ nɛ a fɔ we loko a yeɔ ni ɔ, lɔ ɔ ble we nɔ.”
Yo ko hemi kɛ yemi
(Marko 7.24-30)
21Nɛ Yesu je lejɛ ɔ nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho Tiro kɛ Zidon ni ɔmɛ a mi ya. 22Nɛ oʼɛ, Kanaanyo ko nɛ je lejɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi nɔuu ɔ ba kpa ngmlaa wo lɛ ke: “Naa mi mɔbɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ, David Bi; ye bi yo ngɛ nɔ nae kɛ mumi yayami.” 23Se e pui e nya mi. Nɛ ekaseli ɔmɛ ba ba kpa lɛ pɛɛ, nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Wo lɛ blɔ nɛ e ho, se e ngɛ ngmlaa kpae kɛ ngɛ wa se nyɛɛ!” 24Se e he nɔ ke: “Israel we tohi nɛ laa amɛ a ngɔ kɛkɛ a tsɔ mi.” 25Se yo ɔ ba ba kpla si ngɛ e hɛ mi nɛ e ke: “Mawetsɛ, pee he eko ha mi!” 26Se e he nɔ ke: “E dɛ kaa a ngɔɔ bimɛ abolo ɔ sakee fɔɔ he haa gbehi a bimɛ.” 27Se e ke: “Mawetsɛ, e ngɛ mi ja mohu; se tse gbehi a bimɛ ɔmɛ hu yeɔ bibli nɛ pueɔ a nyɔmtsɛ ɔmɛ a kplɔɔ ɔ sisi ɔ eko!” 28Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Oo, yo, o hemi kɛ yemi kle! A pee ha mo kaa bɔ nɛ o ngɛ hlae ɔ!” Nɛ a tsa e bi yo ɔ ngɛ jamɛ a ngmlɛfia a nɔ nɔuu.
Yesu tsa nihi fuu
29Nɛ Yesu je lejɛ ɔ kɛ ba Galilea Wo ɔ nya. Nɛ e kuɔ kɛ ya yoku ɔ nɔ nɛ e ya hi si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ. 30Nɛ asafo babauu ba e ngɔ nɛ a hɛɛ nihi nɛ a hule kɛ hɛ yuyuili kɛ amuɛtihi kɛ glɔtsɛmɛ kɛ ni kpahi fuu; nɛ a kɛ mɛ ba pue Yesu nane nya; nɛ e tsa mɛ. 31Nɛ asafo ɔmɛ a nya kpɛ a he, benɛ a na kaa amuɛti ɔmɛ ngɛ munyu tue, nɛ glɔtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a he mi wa mɛ, nɛ nihi nɛ a hule ɔmɛ ngɛ nyɛɛ, nɛ hɛ yuyuili ɔmɛ ngɛ nɔ hyɛe ɔ, nɛ a wo Israel Mawu ɔ hɛ mi nyami.
Yesu ha nimli akpe eywiɛ niyeni
(Marko 8.1-10)
32Yesu tsɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ kɛ ba nɛ e ke: “Ye muklii mi ngɛ mi sae ngɛ asafo ɔmɛ a he, kaa mwɔnɛ ji ligbi etɛ nɛ a kɛ mi hi si, nɛ a be nɔ́ ko nɛ a maa ye; nɛ i sume kaa ma wo mɛ blɔ kɛ hwɔ nɛ eko ɔ klibi ya po mɛ ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ.” 33Nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ bi lɛ ke: “Jije wa ma na abolo nɛ hiɛ fuu ngɛ ngɛ nga nɛ ɔ nɔ, bɔ nɛ maa su asafo babauu nɛ ɔ nya?” 34Nɛ Yesu bi mɛ ke: “Abolo enyɛmɛ nyɛ ngɛ?” A de lɛ ke: “Kpaago, kɛ lo tsɔwi bɔɔ ko.” 35Nɛ e fa asafo ɔmɛ ke a hi si ngɛ zugba mi. 36Nɛ e kukuɔ abolo kpaago ɔ kɛ lo ɔmɛ, nɛ e na si, nɛ e kuɔ mi, nɛ e ngɔ ha e kaseli ɔmɛ nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ kɛ ha asafo ɔ. 37Nɛ mɛ tsuo a ye nɛ a tɔ; nɛ a kukuɔ bibli nɛ piɛ ɔ kusii kpaago nɛ a hyi tɔtɔɔtɔ. 38Nɛ nihi nɛ ye ɔ a nya ji nyumuhi akpe eywiɛ, e slɔ yi kɛ jokuɛwi. 39Nɛ benɛ e wo asafo ɔ blɔ ɔ, e sɛ lɛ mi, nɛ e ba Magdala ni ɔmɛ a mi.

Title: MATEO 16
Content:
Okadi ko bimi
(Marko 8.11-13; Luka 12.54-56)
1Nɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ kɛ Sadukifo ɔmɛ ba ba da lɛ nɛ a bi lɛ ke e tsɔɔ mɛ hiɔwe okadi ko? 2Se e he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Gbɔkuɛ mi ɔ nyɛ deɔ ke: ‘Je mi ma tsɔ, ejakaa hiɔwe tsu.’ 3Nɛ mɔtu ɔ nyɛ deɔ ke: ‘Mwɔnɛ hiɔmi maa nɛ; ejakaa hiɔwe tsu nɛ e hɛ mi ha.’ Osatotsɛmɛ, nyɛ le hiɔwe je nihi a mi bumi, se yi nɔ omɛ a he okadi ɔmɛ ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ nyɛ we nɛ nyɛɛ bu lo? 4Yi nɔ bimɛ yayamihi kɛ gba puɛli ngɛ okadi hlae, se a be mɛ okadi ko hae, ja gbalɔ Yona okadi ɔ.” Nɛ e si mɛ nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho.
Farisifohi kɛ Sadukifo ɔmɛ a ma sasɛ ɔ
(Marko 8.14-21)
5Nɛ benɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ yaa wo ɔ se ɔ, a hɛ je nɔ kaa a maa hɛɛ abolo. 6Yesu de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ nyɛ hɛ hi nyɛ he nɔ ngɛ Farisifohi kɛ Sadukifo ɔmɛ a mɛ sasɛ ɔ he!” 7Se a tu he munyu ngɛ a kpɛti ke: “Abolo nɛ wa hɛɛ we ɔ he je!” 8Se nɛ Yesu na le ja a, e ke: “Nyɛ nɛ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi pi, mɛni he je nyɛ ngɛ munyu tue ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti kɛ abolo nɛ nyɛ hɛɛ we ɔ he je ɔ? 9Nyɛ nɛ nihi a nya kɛ mwɔɔ, nɛ nyɛ pa kai we nimli akpe enuɔ ɔ kɛ abolo enuɔ ɔ kɛ kusiihi abɔ nɛ nyɛ kukuɔ ɔ? 10Aloo nimli akpe eywiɛ ɔ kɛ abolo ‘kpaago ɔ kɛ kusiihi abɔ nɛ nyɛ kukuɔ ɔ? 11Kɛ ji lɛ kɛɛ ne nyɛ nɛ́ nya kaa pi abolo he je nɛ i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke nyɛ hɛ nɛ hi nyɛ he nɔ ngɛ Farisifohi kɛ Sadukifo ɔmɛ a ma sasɛ ɔ he ɔ?” 12Jeha nɛ ɔ a kɔ se kaa pi abolo ma sasɛ ɔ he je nɛ e ke, a hɛ nɛ hi a he nɔ ɔ, se mohu Farisifohi kɛ Sadukifo ɔmɛ a tsɔɔmi ɔ he je.
Petro ye Yesu he odase
(Marko 8.27-30; Luka 9.18-21)
13Se benɛ Yesu ba Kaisaria Filipi ni ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, e bi e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Mɛnɔ nihi deɔ ke Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ji?” 14Se a de lɛ ke: “Ni komɛ deɔ ke Yohane, Baptisilɔ ɔ ʼi, nɛ ni komɛ hu deɔ ke Elia ʼi, nɛ ni kpahi komɛ deɔ ke Yeremia aloo gbali ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake ʼi.” 15E bi mɛ ke: “Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ mɛnɔ nyɛ deɔ ke i ji?” 16Petro he nɔ ke: “Mo ji Kristo ɔ, Mawu hɛ kalɔ ɔ, bi ɔ.” 17Nɛ Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “A gbaa mo, Simon, Yona bi; ejakaa pi he lo kɛ muɔ nɛ je enɛ ɔ tsɔɔ mo, se mohu Tsaatsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ ʼi. 18Nɛ imi hu i ngɛ mo dee ke: Mo ji Petro ɔ nɛ, nɛ kikɛmɛ a tɛ sa nɛ ɔ nɔ ma fia ye safo ɔ ngɔ ma, nɛ gbeje agbo ɔmɛ be nyɛe e nɔ maa ye. 19Nɛ ma ngɔ hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ nya safe ɔmɛ ngɔ ha mo; nɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ o maa fi ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ, a maa fi ngɛ hiɔwe; nɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ o maa pɛne ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ, a maa pɛne ngɛ hiɔwe.” 20Kɛkɛ nɛ e wo e kaseli ɔmɛ si veveeve ke a ko de nɔ ko ke lɛ ji Yesu, Kristo ɔ.
Yesu tu e gbenɔ kɛ e sitemi he munyu
(Marko 8.31—9.1; Luka 9.22-27)
21Kɛ je jamɛ a be ɔ, nɛ Yesu bɔni e kaseli ɔmɛ tsɔɔmi kaa ja e ya Yerusalem nɛ e ya na amanehlu babauu ngɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ a dɛ mi, nɛ a gbe lɛ, nɛ ligbi nɛ ji ligbi etɛ ɔ nɛ a tle lɛ si ekohu. 22Nɛ Petro tsɛ lɛ kɛ ya se nɛ e bɔni lɛ kɔkɔ bɔmi ke: “Mawu nɛ ko ha nɛ enɛ ɔ nɛ ba o nɔ, Mawetsɛ, enɛ ɔ ya je ngɛ se lokoo!” 23Se Yesu plɛ e he nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Jee ye nɔ, Satan! O ngɛ ye nane kpatae; ejakaa o susuu we Mawu nihi a he, se nimli a nihi a he mohu o susuu.”
24Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Ke nɔ ko suɔ kaa e nyɛɛ ye se ɔ, e kua e he nɛ e wo e sɛumi tso ɔ nɛ e nyɛɛ ye se? 25Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ hlaa kaa e baa e klaa yi ɔ, e maa laa lɛ; se nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ laa e klaa ngɛ ye he ɔ, e nine maa su nɔ. 26Ejakaa mɛni se nɔmlɔ ma na, ke e nine su je mluku ɔ tsuo nɔ, se e laa e klaa a? Aloo mɛni nɔmlɔ ma ngɔ ha nɛ e kɛ kpɔ e klaa? 27Ejakaa nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ maa ba ngɛ e tsɛ nyami ɔ mi kɛ e bɔfo ɔmɛ; nɛ lɛ be ɔ mi ɔ, e maa wo nɔ tsuaa nɔ hiɔ ngɛ e ni tsumi nya. 28Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Ni kome ngɛ nihi nɛ daa si ngɛ hiɛ ɔ nɛ ɔ a kpɛti nɛ a be gboe kɛ yaa su be nɛ a maa na Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ nɛ e ma ngɛ e matsɛ yemi ɔ mi.”

Title: MATEO 17
Content:
Yesu nɔmlɔ tso su tsake
(Marko 9.2-13; Luka 9.28-36)
1Ligbi ekpa se ɔ, Yesu ngɔ Petro kɛ Yakobo kɛ e nyɛmi Yohane, nɛ e kɛ mɛ ya yoku nɛ ya hiɔwe ko nɔ, mɛ pɛ. 2Nɛ e nɔmlɔ tso su tsake ngɛ a hɛ mi, nɛ e hɛ mi kpɛ kaa pu, nɛ e tade ɔmɛ hiɛ kaa pu la. 3Nɛ oʼɛ, Mose kɛ Elia ba je a he kpo tsɔɔ mɛ, nɛ a kɛ lɛ ngɛ munyu tue. 4Nɛ maa je Petro nya a, e de Yesu ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, e hi ha wɔ kaa waa hi hiɛ ɔ; ke o suɔ ɔ, ma pee bo tsuhi etɛ ngɛ hiɛ ɔ, o nɔ kake, kɛ Mose nɔ kake, kɛ Elia nɔ kake.” 5Benɛ a ngɛ munyu ɔ tue kɛ mwɔɔ ɔ, oʼɛ, bɔku hleii ko ba ha a nɔ, nɛ oʼɛ, gbi je bɔku ɔ mi de ke: “Nɔ nɛ ɔ ji ye suɔmi bi nɛ i naa e he tsui ɔ nɛ; nyɛɛ bu lɛ tue!” 6Nɛ benɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ nu ɔ, a kɛ a hɛ mi bu si, nɛ a ye gbeye wawɛɛ. 7Nɛ Yesu ba nɛ e ba pɛtɛ a he nɛ e ke: “Nyɛɛ te si, nyɛ ko ye gbeye!” 8Se benɛ a wo a hɛ nɔ ɔ, a nɛ́ nɔ ko kaa ja Yesu nɔ kake pɛ.
9Nɛ benɛ a ngɛ yoku ɔ kplee ɔ Yesu wo mɛ si veveeve ke: “Nyɛ ko sɛɛ ni nami nɛ ɔ ha nɔ ko, ja Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ te si kɛ je gbeje lolo.” 10Nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ bi lɛ ke: “Mɛni he je mɔ nɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ deɔ ke, ja Elia ba lolo ɔ?” 11Se Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Elia ma niinɛ, nɛ e maa to nihi tsuo blɔ nɔ ekohu. 12Se i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, Elia ba mo, nɛ a yo we lɛ, se mohu a pee lɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ a suɔ. Ja nɔuu Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ hu maa na amanehlu ngɛ a dɛ mi.” 13Kɛkɛ nɛ kaseli ɔmɛ kɔ se kaa Yohane, baptisilɔ ɔ, he munyu e kɛ mɛ ngɛ tue ɔ nɛ.
Yesu tsa jokuɛ nyumuyo ko nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ e mi
(Marko 9.14-29; Luka 9.37-43)
14Nɛ benɛ a su asafo ɔ ngɔ ɔ, nyumu ko ba e ngɔ, nɛ e ba kpla si ngɛ e hɛ mi, 15nɛ e ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, naa ye bi nyumu ɔ mɔbɔ, se e ngɛ kɔkɔ nue nɛ e ngɛ nɔ nae wawɛɛ; ejakaa bɔɔ kɛ bɔɔ e ya nɔ la mi, nɛ bɔɔ kɛ bɔɔ e ya nɔ nyu mi. 16Nɛ i kɛ lɛ ba o kaseli ɔmɛ a ngɔ, se a nyɛ we lɛ nɛ a tsa.” 17Se Yesu he nɔ nɛ e ke: “Oo yi nɔ bi nɛ he we yi nɛ be a hanɔ! Mɛni be i kɛ nyɛ maa hi si kɛ ya su? Mɛni be nɔuu ma to ye tsui si ha nyɛ kɛ ya su? Nyɛɛ kɛ lɛ nɛ ba ye ngɔ ngɛ hiɛ ɔ.” 18Nɛ Yesu nga e yi, nɛ mumi yayami ɔ je e mi kɛ je kpo, nɛ jokuɛ ɔ he wa lɛ ngɛ jamɛ a ngmlɛfia a nɔ nɔuu.
19Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu kaseli ɔmɛ ba e ngɔ ngɛ se, nɛ a ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ wɔɔ lɛɛ wa nyɛ we lɛ nɛ waa hia a?” 20Se Yesu de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ pi ɔ he je. Ejakaa niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Ke nyɛ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ ngɛ kaa sinapi wu ɔ, nyɛ ma de yoku nɛ ɔ ke: ‘Hia ngɛ hiɛ ɔ kɛ ya lejɛ ɔ.’ Nɛ e maa hia; nɛ nɔ ko be nɛ nyɛ be nyɛe maa pee. [ 21Se kikɛmɛ a henɔ nɛ ɔ, a nyɛ we lɛ hiami kaa ja sɔlemi kɛ hwɔ hami nya kɛkɛ.”]
Yesu tu e gbenɔ kɛ e sitemi he munyu ekohu
(Marko 9.30-32; Luka 9.43-45)
22Benɛ a ngɛ si kpae ngɛ Galilea a, Yesu de mɛ ke: “A maa ngɔ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ngɔ wo nimli a dɛ mi, 23nɛ a maa gbe lɛ, nɛ ligbi nɛ ji ligbi etɛ ɔ, a ma tle lɛ si.” Nɛ e dɔ mɛ wawɛɛ.
Sɔlemi we ɔ he oniatsumi
24Benɛ a ba Kapernaum ɔ, onia tsuli ɔmɛ ba Petro ngɔ nɛ a ba bi lɛ ke: “Anɛ nyɛ tsɔɔlɔ ɔ ha we jeha onia a lo?” 25E ke: “E hãa.” Nɛ benɛ e ba we mi ɔ, Yesu sɛ hlami bi lɛ ke: “Kɛ o susuu kɛɛ, Simon? Zugba a nɔ matsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, mɛnɔmɛ a dɛ a heɔ too loo onia ngɛ? Ngɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a bimɛ a dɛ aloo ma se tsɛmɛ a dɛ?” 26Petro de lɛ ke: “Ngɛ ma se tsɛmɛ a dɛ.” Yesu de lɛ ke: “Lɛɛ bimɛ ɔmɛ yeɔ a he mɔ. 27Se benɛ pee nɛ wa ko tsɔ a nya a, yaa wo ɔ nya nɛ o ya fɔ gbowe, nɛ kekleekle lo nɛ ma ba mi gbowe ɔ, sa lɛ, nɛ ke o pa e nya mi ɔ, o maa na sika nɛ nya suu yi enyɔ; je nɛ o ngɔ ha mɛ, ha i kɛ mo tsuo.”

Title: MATEO 18
Content:
Mɛnɔ ji nɔmlɔ ngua pe kulaa
(Marko 9.33-37; Luka 9.46-48)
1Jamɛ a ngmlɛfia a mi nɔuu ɔ, kaseli ɔmɛ na Yesu ngɔ nɛ a ba bi lɛ ke: “Mɛnɔ ji nɔmlɔ ngua pe kulaa ngɛ hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ mi?” 2Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yesu tsɛ jokuɛ nyafii ko kɛ ba e ngɔ, nɛ e kɛ lɛ da a kpɛti, 3nɛ e ke: “Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Ke nyɛ tsakee we nɛ nyɛ plɛ kaa jokuɛ tsɔwi ɔ, nyɛ be hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ mi sɛe kulaa. 4Lɔ ɔ he je ɔ, nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ baa e he si kaa jokuɛ nɛ ɔ, lɛ ji nɔmlɔ ngua pe kulaa ngɛ hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ mi. 5Nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ngɔɔ jokuɛ nyafii kake kaa nɔ nɛ ɔ ngɛ ye biɛ mi ɔ, e ngɔɔ mi.”
Nanekpatami he kɔkɔbɔmi
(Marko 9.42-48; Luka 17.1-2)
6“Se nɔ nɛ kpataa tsɔwi nɛ ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake nɛ heɔ ye nɔ yeɔ ɔ nane ɔ, afani nɛ a kɛ teji wɛ muɔ e kuɛ nɛ a ngɔ lɛ wo wo mi. 7Musu tloo je ɔ ngɛ nane kpatami sanehi a he! Ejakaa nane kpatami sane ɔmɛ maa bɛ kɛ̃ mohu; se musu tloo nɔmlɔ nɛ nane kpatami ɔ guu e nɔ kɛ baa a!
8“Ke o nine loo o nane ngɛ o nane kpatae ɔ, poo ngɛ o he nɛ o sake ngɔ fɔ he; afani nɛ o kɛ nine popoe loo nane popoe sɛ wami mi pe nɛ o ngɛ nine enyɔ loo nane enyɔ nɛ a ma sake mo ngɔ fɔ neneene la a mi. 9Nɛ ke o hɛngmɛ ngɛ o nane kpatae ɔ, hia nɛ o sake ngɔ fɔ he; afani nɛ o kɛ hɛngmɛ kake sɛ wami mi pe nɛ o ngɛ hɛngmɛ enyɔ nɛ a ma sake mo ngɔ fɔ gehena la a mi.”
To nɛ laa a he abɛ ɔ
(Luka 15.3-7)
10“Nyɛɛ hyɛ saminyɛ konɛ nyɛ ko gbe ni tsɔwi nɛ ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake he guɛ; ejakaa i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, a bɔfohi nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ hyɛɛ Tsaatsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ hɛ mi daa.” [ 11Se Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ba nɔ nɛ laa a yi wami hemi.]
12“Kɛ nyɛ susuu kɛɛ, ke nɔ ko ngɛ to lafa nɛ a kpɛti kake laa blɔ ɔ, anɛ e be nyingmi nɛɛ kɛ nɛɛ ɔ sie ngɛ yoku ɔmɛ a nɔ nɛ e ya nɛ e ya hla nɔ nɛ laa blɔ ɔ lo? 13Se ke e ba mi kaa e na lɛ ɔ, niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, e bua jɔɔ e he ngɛ lɔ ɔ he pe nyingmi nɛɛ kɛ nɛɛ ɔ nɛ laa we blɔ ɔ. 14Ja nɔuu nɛ nyɛ tsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ sume kaa tsɔwi nɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti kake laa.”
Nyɛmi nɛ peɔ yayami
15“Ke o nyɛmi ko tɔ o nɔ ɔ, yaa nɛ o ya tsɔɔ lɛ e tɔmi ɔ, o kɛ lɛ ni enyɔ kɛkɛ. Ke e bu mo tue ɔ, nyɛmi pee nyɛmi. 16Se ke e bui mo tue ɔ, ngɔɔ nɔ kake loo ni enyɔ ngɔ piɛ o he, konɛ odaseyeli enyɔ loo etɛ a munyu nya a, sane tsuaa sane nya nɛ ma si. 17Se ke mɛ hu e bui mɛ tue ɔ, ya de asafo ɔ; nɛ ke e tue gbo ngɛ asafo ɔ hu nɔ ɔ, buu lɛ kaa wɔ jalɔ kɛ onia tsulɔ.”
Fimi kɛ pɛnemi
18“Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ nyɛ maa fi ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ, a maa fi ngɛ hiɔwe; nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nyɛ maa pɛne ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ, a maa pɛne ngɛ hiɔwe.
19“Jeha nɛ ɔ hu, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, ke nyɛ kpɛti ni enyɔ so ngɛ zugba nɛ ɔ nɔ ngɛ sane tsuaa sane nɛ a biɔ ɔ he ɔ, Tsaatsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ maa pee ha mɛ. 20Ejakaa he nɛ ni enyɔ loo ni etɛ bua a he nyɛ ngɛ, ngɛ ye biɛ mi ɔ, i ngɛ a kpɛti ngɛ lejɛ ɔ.”
Sɔmɔlɔ nɛ kɛ nɔ́ ki ɔ he abɛ
21Kɛkɛ nɛ Petro ba Yesu ngɔ nɛ e ba bi lɛ ke: “Mawetsɛ, si enyɛmɛ ye nyɛmi nɛ tɔ ye nɔ nɛ ma kɛ pa lɛ? Kɛ ya su si kpaago lo?” 22Yesu de lɛ ke: “I de we mo ke kɛ ya su si kpaago; se mohu si kpaago totoe nyingmi kpaago? 23Lɔ ɔ he ɔ hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ kaa matsɛ ko nɛ hlaa kaa e kɛ e sɔmɔli ba bu akɔɔtaa. 24Nɛ benɛ e bɔni bumi ɔ, akɛ nɔ ko nɛ hɛɛ lɛ hiɔ cedi akpe nyɔngma ba e ngɔ. 25Se akɛnɛ e nɛ nɔ́ ko nɛ e kɛ maa wo lɛ ɔ, e nyɔmtsɛ ɔ fa ke a jua lɛ kɛ e yo kɛ e bimɛ kɛ nihi tsuo kulaa nɛ e ngɛ ɔ, nɛ a kɛ wo hiɔ ɔ. 26Kɛkɛ nɛ sɔmɔlɔ ɔ kpla si nɛ e kpa lɛ pɛɛ ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, moo to o tsui si ha mi, nɛ ma wo mo hiɔ ɔ tsuo!’ 27Nɛ sɔmɔlɔ nɛ ɔ nyɔmtsɛ ɔ muklii mi sa lɛ nɛ e ngmɛɛ e he, nɛ e kɛ hiɔ ɔ ke lɛ.
28“Se benɛ jamɛ a sɔmɔlɔ ɔ je kpo ɔ, e ya na e huɛmɛ sɔmɔli ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake nɛ hɛɛ lɛ hiɔ cedi lafa; nɛ e nu lɛ́ nɛ e mia e kuɔ si, nɛ e ke: ‘Wo mi hiɔ nɛ o hɛɛ mi ɔ!’ 29Kɛkɛ nɛ e huɛ sɔmɔlɔ ɔ kpla si kpa lɛ pɛɛ ke: ‘To o tsui si ha mi, nɛ ma wo mo hiɔ ɔ tsuo kulaa.’ 30Se lɛɛ e kplɛɛ we; se mohu e ya wo lɛ tsu mi kɛ yaa su be nɛ e maa wo lɛ hiɔ ɔ. 31Se benɛ e huɛmɛ sɔmɔli ɔmɛ na nɔ́ nɛ a pee ɔ, e dɔ mɛ wawɛɛ nɛ a ba sɛɛ nɔ́ nɛ a pee ɔ tsuo ngɔ ha a nyɔmtsɛ ɔ. 32Kɛkɛ nɛ e nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ha a ya tsɛ lɛ kɛ ba nɛ e de lɛ ke: ‘Sɔmɔlɔ yayami! Akɛnɛ o kpa mi pɛɛ he je ɔ i ngɔ kikɛmɛ a hiɔ nɛ ɔ tsuo ngɔ ke mo; 33anɛ jinɛ mo hu pi o blɔ nya ji kaa o naa o huɛ sɔmɔlɔ ɔ mɔbɔ, bɔ nɛ imi hu i na mo mɔbɔ ɔ lo?’ 34Nɛ e nyɔmtsɛ ɔ muklii mi fu, nɛ e kɛ lɛ ha nɛ a pii lɛ kɛ maa su be nɛ e maa wo lɛ hiɔ ɔ tsuo kulaa. 35Ja nɔuu Tsaatsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ hu ma ngɔ pee nyɛ, ke nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ ngɔɛ e nyɛmi nɔ tɔmi ngɔ ki lɛ kɛ ji e tsui mi ɔ.”

Title: MATEO 19
Content:
Gbamipomi he nitsɔɔmi
(Marko 10.1-12)
1Benɛ Yesu gbe munyu ɔmɛ a nya a, e je Galilea kɛ ba Yudea kpo ɔmɛ a nɔ ngɛ Yordan se. 2Nihi fuu nyɛɛ e se nɛ e tsa mɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ.
3Farisifo ɔmɛ ekomɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ a ba da lɛ de ke: “Anɛ e da blɔ kaa nyumu fieɔ e yo ngɛ munyu tsuaa munyu he lo?” 4Nɛ e he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Anɛ nyɛ kane we ke, nɔ hɛ bɔ nɔmlɔ ngɛ sisi je ɔ mi ɔ, nyumu kɛ yo e bɔ mɛ ɔ lo?” 5Nɛ e ke: “Enɛ ɔ he je nɛ nyumu ma si e tsɛ kɛ e nyɛ ne e maa pɛtɛ e yo he, nɛ mɛ ni enyɔ ɔ tsuo a ma plɛ he lo kake? 6Lɛɛ jeha nɛ ɔ, a pi nimli enyɔ hu, se mohu he lo kake; lɔ ɔ he ɔ nɔ́ nɛ Mɛwu ngɔ tsa a, a ko ha nɔmlɔ nɛ gba mi.” 7A bi lɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ Mose wo kita ke a ha yo fiemi womi nɛ a fie lɛ ɔ mɔ?” 8E de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ tsui wami he je nɛ Mose ha nyɛ he blɔ ke nyɛɛ fie nyɛ yi ɔmɛ ɔ nɛ; se sisije ɔ, e be ja. 9Jeha nɛ ɔ i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ pi ajuama bɔmi he je nɛ e maa fie e yo nɛ e ma ya ngɔ yo kpa a, e puɛ gba; nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ngɔɔ yo nɛ a fie lɛ ɔ, lɛ hu e puɛ gba.” 10E kaseli ɔmɛ de lɛ ke: “Ke kikɛ ɔ nyumu kɛ yo sane ngɛ ɔ, lɛɛ e sɛ́ kaa a ngɔɔ yo mɔ.” 11Se e de mɛ ke: “Pi nihi tsuo nɛ ma nyɛ munyu nɛ ɔ he maa pɛtɛ, ja nihi nɛ a ngɔ ha mɛ ɔ kɛkɛ. 12Ejakaa puɛhi komɛ ngɛ nɛ a fɔ mɛ ja kɛ je a nyɛmɛ a muklii mi; nɛ puɛhi komɛ ngɛ nɛ nimli lɛ puɛ mɛ; nɛ puɛ kpahi komɛ hu ngɛ nɛ hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ he nɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a puɛ a he. Nɔ nɛ ma nyɛ he pɛtɛ ɔ, e pɛtɛ he.”
Yesu kɛ jokuɛwi
(Marko 10.13-16; Luka 18.15-17)
13Kɛkɛ nɛ a kɛ jokuɛwi tsɔwi ba Yesu ngɔ, konɛ e ngɔ e ninehi ngɔ pue a nɔ nɛ e sɔle. Se e kaseli ɔmɛ gbɛ wo mɛ. 14Nɛ Yesu ke: “Nyɛ ha jokuɛwi ɔmɛ nɛ a ba ye ngɔ, nɛ nyɛ ko tsi mɛ blɔ; ejakaa nihi nɛ ngɛ kaa ni nɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ ji hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ nɛ.” 15Nɛ e ngɔ e ninehi pue a nɔ; nɛ e je lejɛ ɔ.
Niheyo niatsɛ ɔ
(Marko 10.17-31; Luka 18.18-30)
16Nɛ oʼɛ nɔ ko ba e ngɔ nɛ e ba bi lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, mɛni nɔ́ kpakpa po ma pee nɛ ma na neneene wami?” 17Nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Meni he je o ngɛ mi nɔ́ kpakpa he sane bie? Nɔ kake ngɛ nɛ ji nɔ kpakpa. Se ke o ngɛ hlae kaa o sɛ wami mi ɔ, ye kita amɛ a nɔ.” 18E bi lɛ ke: “Te nihi nɛ ji hu?” Nɛ Yesu ke: “Koo gbe nɔmlɔ; ko puɛ gba; koo ju; koo ye lakpa odase; 19buu o tsɛ kɛ o nyɛ; kɛ suɔ o nyɛmi nɔmlɔ kaa bɔ nɛ o suɔ mo nitse o he.” 20Niheyo ɔ de lɛ ke: “Enɛ ɔmɛ tsuo ɔ, i ye nɔ kɛ je ye jokuɛwi a si; mɛni pa piɛ mi?” 21Yesu de lɛ ke: “Ke o ngɛ hlae kaa o hii kɛ pii si ɔ, yaa nɛ o ya jua nihi nɛ o ngɛ ɔ, nɛ o ngɔ ha ohiafohi, nɛ o ma na juetli ngɛ hiɔwe; nɛ o ba nɛ o ba nyɛɛ ye se.” 22Se benɛ niheyo ɔ nu munyu nɛ ɔ ɔ, e dɔ lɛ nɛ e je kɛ ho; ejakaa e ngɛ nihi babauu.
23Nɛ Yesu de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: E maa wa ha niatsɛ kaa e maa sɛ hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ mi. 24Se jeha nɛ ɔ hu i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: E wɛ́ hi afukpɔngɔ kaa e maa gu abui hɛngmɛ mi, kaa bɔ nɛ e waa haa nitsɛ kaa e maa sɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi ɔ.” 25Benɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ nu enɛ ɔ ɔ, a he nya si mɛ tsɔ nɛ a de ke: “Lɛɛ mɛnɔ yi wami a ma nyɛ ma he mɔ?” 26Se Yesu hyɛ mɛ kɛ kpe, nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nimli a blɔfami ɔ, a be enɛ ɔ nyɛe maa pee; se Mawu blɔfami ɔ a ma nyɛ nihi tsuo maa pee.”
27Kɛkɛ nɛ Petro he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Oʼɛ, wɔɔ lɛɛ wa si nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ wa ba nyɛɛ o se, lɛɛ mɛni wa ma na?” 28Se Yesu de mɛ ke: “Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke; nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ nyɛɛ ye se nɛ ɔ ɔ, benɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ maa hi e nyami sɛ nɔ ngɛ je he ɔ mi ɔ, nyɛ hu nyɛ maa hi sɛ nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ nɔ, nɛ nyɛ maa kojo Israel wetso nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ. 29Nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ si wehi loo nyɛmimɛ nyumuhi loo nyɛmimɛ yihi loo tsɛ loo nyɛ loo bimɛ loo zugbahi ngɛ ye biɛ ɔ he ɔ, a maa ma lɛ nane mi totoe lafa, nɛ e ma na neneene wami. 30Se kekletsɛmɛ fuu ma plɛ se kpɛli, nɛ se kpɛli ma plɛ kekletsɛmɛ.”

Title: MATEO 20
Content:
Wai ngmɔ ɔ mi nitsuli ɔmɛ
1“Hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ kaa nyumu we tsɛ ko nɛ je kpo makɛ mla nɛ e ya bɔ ni tsuli apaa kɛ ya e wai ngmɔ mi. 2Nɛ benɛ e kɛ ni tsuli ɔmɛ ye nya cedi kake ligbi kake ɔ, e wo mɛ blɔ kɛ ho e wai ngmɔ ɔ mi ya. 3Nɛ kɛ ma mɔtu ngmlɛ nɛɛ mi ɔ, e je kpo ekohu nɛ e ya na ni kpahi komɛ nɛ a daa si yaka ngɛ jua a nɔ; 4nɛ e de ni nɛ ɔmɛ hu ke: ‘Nyɛ hu nyɛɛ ya wai ngmɔ ɔ mi, nɛ nɔ́ nɛ sa a ma ha nyɛ.’ 5Nɛ a ho. Jeha nɛ ɔ kɛ ma ngmlɛ nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ kɛ ngmlɛ etɛ mi ɔ, e je kpo nɛ e ya pee ja nɔuu. 6Nɛ kɛ ma gbɔkuɛ ngmlɛ enuɔ mi ɔ, e je kpo nɛ e ya na ni kpahi komɛ hu nɛ a daa si yaka gu, nɛ e bi mɛ ke: ‘Mɛni he je nɛ nyɛ daa si yaka gu ngɛ hiɛ ɔ je nami nɛ ɔ tsuo nɛ ɔ?’ 7A de lɛ ke: ‘Akɛnɛ nɔ ko bɔɛ wɔ apaa a he je.’ E de mɛ ke: ‘Nyɛɛ hu nyɛɛ ya wai ngmɔ ɔ mi.’
8“Nɛ bene su gbɔkuɛ ɔ, wai ngmɔtsɛ ɔ de e tsɔlɔ nɔkɔtɔma a ke: ‘Tsɛ ni tsuli ɔmɛ nɛ o wo mɛ hiɔ, nɛ o bɔni kɛ je sekpɛtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ kɛ ya su kekletsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ.’ 9Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, benɛ gbɔkuɛ ngmlɛ enuɔtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ba a, mɛ tsuo a na cedi kakaaka. 10Nɛ benɛ keklebi ɔmɛ ba a, a susu kaa a maa fɔ a nɔ ɔ nɔ; se mɛ hu a na cedi kakaaka. 11Se benɛ e su a dɛ ɔ, a pɛ ngɛ a nya he kɛ si we tsɛ ɔ, 12a ke: ‘Sekpɛtsɛmɛ nɛ ɔmɛ, ngmlɛfia kake kɛkɛ a tsu ni, nɛ o ha mɛ kɛ wɔ nɛ wa tsu ni je nami nɛ pɔ tɔ wɔ nɛ latsa tsa wɔ ɔ tsuo pɛ.’ 13Se e he nɔ nɛ e de a ti nɔ kake ke: ‘Ye huɛ, i pee we mo yayami ko; anɛ pi cedi kake nɛ i kɛ mo ye nya lo? 14Ngɔɔ nɔ́ nɛ ji o nɔ́ ɔ nɛ o ho. Se i suɔ kaa ma ha sekpɛ nɔ nɛ ɔ kaa bɔ nɛ i ha mo mo ɔ kɛ̃, 15Aloo i be he blɔ kaa i kɛ imi nitse ye nihi peɔ nɔ́ nɛ i suɔ lo? Anɛ ye mi mi jɔmi nɛ ɔ he je o hɛngmɛ tsu nɛ ɔ?’ ” 16Kikɛ nɛ ɔ, “Sekpɛtsɛmɛ ma plɛ kekletsɛmɛ, nɛ kekletsɛmɛ ma plɛ sekpɛtsɛmɛ.”
Yesu tu e gbenɔ he munyu nɔ nɛ ji si etɛ
(Marko 10.32-34; Luka 18.31-34)
17Nɛ benɛ Yesu yaa Yerusalem ɔ, e ngɔ e kaseli nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ kɛ ya se ngɛ blɔ ɔ kpɛti, nɛ e de mɛ ke: 18“Oʼɛ, wa yaa Yerusalem, nɛ a maa ngɔ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ngɔ wo osɔfo nikɔtɔmahi kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ a dɛ mi, nɛ a maa bu lɛ gbenɔ fɔ. 19Nɛ a maa ngɔ lɛ ngɔ ha majeli ɔmɛ, nɛ a ye e he fɛu, nɛ a fia lɛ kplibi nɛ a sɛu lɛ; nɛ ligbi nɛ ji ligbi etɛ ɔ a ma tle lɛ si ekohu.”
Nyɛ ko nɔbami
(Marko 10.35-45)
20Kɛkɛ nɛ Zebedeo bimɛ ɔmɛ a nyɛ kɛ e bimɛ nyumu ɔmɛ ba Yesu ngɔ ba kpla si nɛ e ba lɛ nɔ ko. 21Nɛ Yesu bi lɛ ke: “Mɛni o ngɛ hlae?” Yo ɔ he nɔ ke: “De nɛ ye bimɛ enyɔ nɛ ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake nɛ hi o hiɛ ɔ nɔ, nɛ nɔ kake hu nɛ hi o muɔ nɔ ngɛ o matsɛ yemi ɔ mi.” 22Se Yesu he nɔ ke: “Nyɛ li nɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ bie ɔ. Anɛ nyɛ ma nyɛ kplu nɛ ma nu ɔ maa nu?” A de lɛ ke: “Wa ma nyɛ.” 23Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Ye kplu ɔ nyɛ maa nu ji nɛ ɔ lɛɛ, se ye hiɛ ɔ nɔ kɛ ye muɔ nɔ himi ɔ, e pi ye nɔ nɛ i kɛ haa, se mohu nihi nɛ Tsaatsɛ ngɔ ha momo ɔ a nɔ ʼi.”
24Nɛ benɛ ni nyɔngma a nu ɔ, a muklii mi fu nyɛmimɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ. 25Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yesu tsɛ mɛ kɛ ba e ngɔ, nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ le kaa ma amɛ a nɔ ganɔ ɔmɛ yeɔ a nɔ, nɛ a kpɛti nimli ngua amɛ hu ngɛ he wami ngɛ a nɔ. 26E ko ba ja ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti; se nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ suɔ kaa e plɛ nɔmlɔ ngua ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti ɔ, le mohu e plɛ nyɛ sɔmɔlɔ. 27Nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ suɔ kaa e plɛ nɔkɔtɔma ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti ɔ, lɛ mohu e plɛ nyɛ tsɔlɔ. 28Kaa bɔ nɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ bɛ nɛ a sɔmɔ lɛ, se e ba sɔmɔmi mohu, nɛ e ngɔ e klaa a kɛ ha kaa kpɔmi nɔ kɛ ha nihi fuu ɔ.”
Yesu tsa hɛyuyuili enyɔ
(Marko 10.46-52; Luka 18.35-43)
