29Nɛ benɛ a je Yeriko kɛ yaa a, asafo babauu nyɛɛ Yesu se. 30Nɛ oʼɛ nyumuhi hɛ yuyuili enyɔ hii si ngɛ blɔ ɔ tue, nɛ benɛ a nu kaa Yesu bee ɔ, a kpa ngmlɛɛ ke: “Naa wɔ mɔbɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ, David bi!” 31Se asafo ɔ ke a yi ke a ma a nya; se a kpa ngmlaa pe kekle ɔ ke: “Naa wɔ mɔbɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ, David bi!” 32Nɛ Yesu da si nɛ e tsɛ mɛ nɛ e ke: “Mɛni nyɛ ngɛ hlae nɛ ma pee ha nyɛ?” 33A de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, kaa a bli wa hɛngmɛ ɔmɛ!” 34Nɛ Yesu mi mi sa lɛ ngɛ a he, nɛ e ta a yɛngmɛ omɛ a he, nɛ amlɔ ɔ a hyɛ nɔ, nɛ a nyɛɛ e se.

Title: MATEO 21
Content:
Yesu Yerusalem sɛmi
(Marko 11.1-11; Luka 19.28-40; Yohane 12.12-19)
1Nɛ benɛ a ngɛ Yerusalem sua nɛ a su Betfage ngɛ Nuyoku ɔ he ɔ, Yesu tsɔ e kaseli ɔmɛ a ti ni enyɔ, 2nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ya kɔpe nɛ ngɛ nyɛ hɛ kpɛ nɛ ɔ mi, nɛ amlɔ ɔ, nyɛ maa na teji yo nɛ a muɔ lɛ si kɛ e bi; nyɛɛ pɛne mɛ ba ha mi. 3Nɛ ke nɔ ko bi nyɛ munyu ko ɔ, nyɛ de lɛ ke: ‘A he ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hiae;’ nɛ amlɔ ɔ, e ma ha nyɛɛ kɛ mɛ maa ba.”
4A pee enɛ ɔ tsuo, konɛ nɔ́ nɛ gbalɔ ɔ de ɔ nɛ ba mi ke:
5“Nyɛ de Zion biyo ɔ ke:
Oʼɛ, o matsɛ ɔ ma o ngɔ,
E he jɔ nɛ e hi teji nɔ
Kɛ teji nɛ ji ni tsumi lohwe ɔ bi nɔ.”
6Lɔ ɔ he ɔ kaseli ɔmɛ ho nɛ a ya pee bɔ nɛ Yesu fa mɛ ɔ. 7Nɛ a kɛ teji ɔ kɛ e bi ɔ ba, nɛ a ngɔ a tade ɔmɛ ngɔ pue e nɔ, nɛ e kuɔ hi nɔ. 8Nɛ nihi fuu ngɔ a tadehi ngɔ ha blɔ ɔ nɔ, nɛ ni komɛ hu po tsohi a kɔnihi ngɔ pue blɔ ɔ nɔ; 9nɛ nihi nɛ nyɛɛ hɛ kpɛ kɛ nihi nɛ nyɛɛ se ɔ tsuo wɔ lele ke: “Hosiana David bi ɔ! A gbaa nɔ nɛ ma ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ biɛ mi ɔ! Hosiana ngɛ hiɔwe lokoo!”
10Nɛ benɛ e sɛ Yerusalem ɔ, ma mluku ɔ tsuo bu hoo ke: “Mɛnɔ ji nɛ?” 11Se asafo ɔ ke: “Nɔ nɛ ɔ ji Yesu, gbalɔ nɛ je Nazaret ngɛ Galilea a nɛ.”
Yesu ya sɔlemi we ɔ
(Marko 11.15-19; Luka 19.45-48; Yohane 2.13-22)
12Nɛ Yesu ya Mawu sɔlemi we ɔ nɛ e ya fie nihi nɛ ngɛ ni juae kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ ni hee ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, nɛ e sake sika tsakeli ɔmɛ a kplɔɔ ɔmɛ kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ lahuɛ ɔmɛ juae ɔ a sɛ ɔmɛ ngɔ fia si. 13Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “A ngma ke: ‘A ma tsɛ ye we ɔ sɔlemi we’ se nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛɛ kɛ pee ojo fiali a kplo.”
14Nɛ hɛ yuyuili kɛ nihi nɛ a hule ba e ngɔ ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, nɛ e tsa mɛ. 15Se benɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ na nyakpɛ nihi nɛ e pee kɛ jokuɛwi ɔmɛ nɛ a ngɛ lele wɔe ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ ke: “Hosiana David bi” ɔ, a muklii mi wo la, 16nɛ a de lɛ ke: “O ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ dee nɛ ɔ nue loo” Nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Ee, anɛ nyɛ kane we hyɛ ke: ‘Bimwɔwi kɛ nyɔ nya bimɛ a nya nɛ o dla yi jemi ngɔ to ngɛ’ ɔ lo?” 17Nɛ e si mɛ nɛ e je ma a mi kɛ ho Betania ya, nɛ e ya hwɔ lejɛ ɔ.
Yesu gbiɛ ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ
(Marko 11.12-14; 11.20-24)
18Se mɔtu benɛ e kpale e se nɛ e yaa ma a mi ɔ, hwɔ ye lɛ. 19Nɛ e na ngmɔkɔ tso ko ngɛ blɔ ɔ he, nɛ e gba kɛ ya he, se e nɛ nɔ́ ko ngɛ nɔ kaa ja bahi kɛkɛ; nɛ e de ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ ke: “Kɛ je be nɛ ɔ kɛ yaa a, o be yiblii ko woe gblegblee hu!” Nɛ ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ ngla amlɔ ɔ nɔuu. 20Nɛ benɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ na a, a nya kpɛ a he nɛ a ke: “Kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ ngla amlɔ nɛ ɔ ɔ?” 21Se Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: ke nyɛ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ nyɛ ji nguane ɔ, pi nɔ́ nɛ a pee ngmɔkɔ tso nɛ ɔ kɛkɛ nɛ nyɛ maa pee; se ke nyɛ de yoku nɛ ɔ tete ke: ‘Hia nɛ o ya nɔ wo mi’ ɔ, e maa ba mi ja. 22Nɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ maa sɔle ma bi kɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ, nyɛ nine maa su nɔ.”
He blɔ nɛ Yesu ngɛ
(Marko 11.27-33; Luka 20.1-8)
23Nɛ benɛ Yesu ba sɔlemi we ɔ nɛ e ngɛ mɛ ni tsɔɔe ɔ, osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ ma nikɔtɔma amɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ a ba bi lɛ ke: “Mɛni he blɔ o ngɛ he je nɛ o peɔ kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ, nɛ mɛnɔ ha mo kikɛmɛ a he blɔ nɛ ɔ?” 24Se Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Imi hu ma bi nyɛ munyu ko nɛ ke nyɛ tsɔɔ mi ɔ, imi hu ma tsɔɔ nyɛ he blɔ nɛ i ngɛ he je nɛ i peɔ kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ. 25Yohane baptisimi ɔ jije e je? Hiɔwe e je loo nimli a dɛ mi?” Nɛ a hla mi ngɛ a kpɛti ke: “Ke wa ke ‘e je hiɔwe’ ɔ, e ma de wɔ ke: ‘Mɛni he je nyɛ he we lɛ yi mɔ?’ 26Nɛ ke wa ke: ‘E je nimli a dɛ mi’ ɔ, lɔ ɔ hu wa ngɛ asafo ɔ gbeye yee; ejakaa nihi tsuo buu Yohane gbalɔ.” 27Kɛkɛ nɛ a he nɔ nɛ a de Yesu ke: “Wa li.” Lɛ hu e de mɛ ke: “Lɛɛ imi hu i be nyɛ tsɔɔe nɔ he blɔ nɛ i ngɛ he je nɛ i peɔ kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ mɔ.”
Bimɛ nyumuhi enyɔ ɔmɛ a he abɛ
28“Se jeha nɛ ɔ, kɛ nyɛ susuu kɛɛ? Nyumu ko ngɛ bimɛ enyɔ; nɛ e ya nɔkɔtɔma a ngɔ nɛ e ke: ‘Ye bi, mwɔnɛ ya tsu ni ngɛ ye wai ngmɔ ɔ mi.’ 29Nɛ e he nɔ ke: ‘I be yae.’ Se pee se ɔ e pia e he, nɛ e ya. 30Nɛ e ya jokuɛ ɔ hu ngɔ, nɛ e de lɛ ja nɔuu. Se lɛɛ e he nɔ ke: ‘Tsaatsɛ ma ya!’ se e yɛ. 31Ni enyɔ nɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti mɛnɔ lɛ pee nɔ́ nɛ a tsɛɔ suɔ ɔ?” A de lɛ ke: “Nɔkɔtɔma a ʼi.” Yesu de mɛ ke: “Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, onia tsuli ɔmɛ kɛ ajuama amɛ ngɛ nyɛ hlami sɛe kɛ yaa hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ mi. 32Ejakaa Yohane ba nyɛ ngɔ ngɛ dami blɔ nɔ, nɛ nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ he we lɛ yi; se onia tsuli ɔmɛ kɛ ajuama amɛ he lɛ ye. Nɛ pee se benɛ nyɛ na le hu ɔ, nyɛ pia we nyɛ he tete, konɛ nyɛ he lɛ nyɛɛ ye.”
Wai ngmɔ ɔ mi huli yaya amɛ
(Marko 12.1-12; Luka 20.9-19)
33Yesu ke: “Nyɛɛ bu abɛ kpa ko hu tue: Wetsɛ ko ngɛ, nɛ e pee wai ngmɔ, nɛ e po piɛ wo he kɛ kpe, nɛ e tsua tɛ muɔ ngɛ mi, nɛ e ma mɔ ngɛ mi; nɛ e kɛ ha ni tsuli apaa humi; nɛ e doma? 34Nɛ benɛ yiblii kpami be su ɔ, e tsɔ e tsɔli kɛ ya huli ɔmɛ a ngɔ ke a ya ngɔ e yiblii ɔ kɛ ba ha lɛ. 35Se huli ɔmɛ nu e tsɔli ɔmɛ, nɛ a fia nɔ kake kpa, nɛ a gbe nɔ kake, nɛ a fia nɔ kake hu tɛ. 36Jeha nɛ ɔ, e tsɔ tsɔli kpahi nɛ hiɛ pe kekle ni ɔmɛ, nɛ a pee mɛ ja nɔuu. 37Se lɛ tsuo se ɔ, e tsɔ e bi kɛ ya a ngɔ ke: ‘Ye bi ɔ lɛɛ a ma gbo lɛ zo.’ 38Se huli ɔmɛ, benɛ a na bi ɔ mohu ɔ, a de a he ke: ‘Ni yelɔ ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ? Nyɛɛ ba, nyɛ ha waa gbe lɛ, konɛ waa ye e ni ɔmɛ!’ 39Nɛ a nu lɛ nɛ a tsitsɛɛ e kuɛ se kɛ je wain ngmɔ ɔ mi, nɛ a gbe lɛ.
40“Jeha nɛ ɔ, ke wain ngmɔtsɛ ɔ ba a, kɛ e maa pee huli nɛ ɔmɛ kɛɛ?” 41A de lɛ ke: “E ma kpata kikɛmɛ a nimli yayami nɛ ɔmɛ a hɛ mi butuu, nɛ e maa ngɔ wain ngmɔ ɔ ngɔ ha huli kpahi apaa humi, nihi nɛ kɛ yiblii ma ba ha lɛ ngɛ be nɛ sa mi.” 42Yesu de mɛ ke: “Anɛ nyɛ kane we gblee ngɛ ngami ɔmɛ a mi ke:
‘Tɛ ɔ nɛ tsufiali ɔmɛ sake fɔ he ɔ,
Kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu lɛ plɛ kɔ nya tɛ.
Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ dɛ mi enɛ ɔ je,
Nɛ e ngɛ nyakpɛ ngɛ wa hɛngmɛ mi.’
43Lɔ ɔ he je ɔ i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: A ma kpɔ Mɛwu matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ nyɛ dɛ; nɛ a ma ngɔ ha majeli a ma ko nɛ woɔ yiblii. [ 44Nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ maa nɔ tɛ nɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ, e mi ma tsɔtslɔɔ; se nɔ nɔ nɛ tɛ ɔ maa nɔ ɔ, e maa gblɛ lɛ mɔnyɔmɔnyɔ.]”
45Nɛ benɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ nu e bɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, a kɔ se kaa a he munyu e ngɛ tue ɔ nɛ. 46Nɛ jinɛ a ngɛ hlae kaa a nu lɛ; se a ya ye asafo ɔmɛ gbeye ejakaa a buu lɛ gbalɔ.

Title: MATEO 22
Content:
Matsɛ bi ɔ yokpeemi he abɛ
(Luka 14.15-24)
1Nɛ Yesu wo e nya nɔ nɛ e kɛ mɛ tu munyu ekohu ngɛ abɛhi a mi ke: 2“Hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ kaa matsɛ ko nɛ ngmɛ yo kpeemi okplɔɔ ha e bi. 3Nɛ e tsɔ e tsɔli ke a ya tsɛ nihi nɛ a kpee ɔ kɛ ba yo kpeemi ɔ he; se a mi bami. 4E kpale tsɔ tsɔli kpahi nɛ e ke: ‘Nyɛ ya de nihi nɛ a kpee ɔ ke: oʼɛ, i gbe ye niyeni ɔmɛ a nya; a gbe ye na amɛ kɛ ye lohwe lɛlɛɛ ɔmɛ, nɛ a gbe nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nya; nyɛɛ ba yo kpeemi ɔ he!’ 5Se mɛɛ lɛɛ a bui po, nɛ a ngɔ a blɔhi, nɔ kake ho e ngmɔ mi ya, nɛ nɔ kpa hu ho e guɛyemi ya. 6Nɛ nihi nɛ piɛ ɔ nu e tsɔli ɔmɛ nɛ a wa mɛ yi mi, nɛ a gbe mɛ. 7Se benɛ matsɛ ɔ nu ɔ, e mi mi fu, nɛ e tsɔ e aslaafohi, nɛ a ya gbe kikɛmɛ a awiyeli nɛ ɔmɛ, nɛ a sã a ma a. 8Kɛkɛ nɛ e de e tsɔli ɔmɛ ke: ‘A to yo kpeemi ɔ he ni gbe nyɛ mohu, se nihi nɛ a kpee ɔ, a sɛ́.’ 9Lɔ ɔ he je ɔ, nyɛɛ ya magbɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ, nɛ nihi abɔ nɛ nyɛ maa na a, nyɛɛ kpee mɛ kɛ ba yo kpeemi ɔ he. 10Lɔ ɔ he ɔ tsɔli ɔmɛ je kpo kɛ ya blɔ ɔmɛ a nɔ, nɛ a ya bua nihi tsuo nɛ a na amɛ a nya, nimli yayamihi kɛ nimli kpakpahi, nɛ yo kpeemi he ɔ hyi tɔ kɛ nimli.
11“Se benɛ matsɛ ɔ ba ni ɔmɛ a hyɛmi ɔ, e ba na nɔ ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ wui yo kpeemi tade; 12nɛ e de lɛ ke: ‘Huɛ, kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ o ba hiɛ ɔ nɛ ɔ nɛ o wui yo kpeemi tade ɔ?’ Nɛ e nya ma. 13Kɛkɛ nɛ matsɛ ɔ de e tsɔli ɔmɛ ke: ‘Nyɛɛ fi e nine kɛ e nane nɛ nyɛ wo lɛ ya sake ngɔ fɔ blɔ se diblii ɔ mi! Lejɛ ɔ ya fomi kɛ lungu nya kpemi ngɛ.’ 14Ejakaa a tsɛ nihi fuu mohu, se nihi bɔɔ ahla.”
Oniatsumi he sane
(Marko 12.13-17; Luka 20.20-26)
15Kɛkɛ nɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ ho nɛ a ya da, bɔ nɛ a maa pee nɛ a wo e nya tso kpɛ. 16Nɛ a tsɔ a kaseli ɔmɛ kɛ Herodebi ɔmɛ kɛ ba e ngɔ ba de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, wa le kaa anɔkualetsɛ ji mo, nɛ o tsɔɔ Mawu blɔ ɔ ngɛ anɔkuale mi, nɛ o hlɛ́ nimli a mi; ejakaa o hyɛ we nimli a hɛ mi; 17lɔ ɔ he ɔ de wɔ bɔ nɛ o susuu. Anɛ e da kaa a tsuɔ onia haa Kaisare, aloo e dɛ?” 18Se Yesu kpa a yi mi tomi yaya a si, nɛ e ke: “Osatotsɛmɛ, mɛni he je nyɛ ngɛ mi dae? 19Nyɛɛ kɛ onia tsumi sika a nɛ tsɔɔ mi!” Nɛ a kɛ denario (cedi) tsɔɔ lɛ. 20Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Mɛnɔ foni ji nɛ ɔ kɛ nɔ nɛ a ngmɛ ngɛ nɔ nɛ ɔ?” 21A de lɛ ke: “Kaisare nɔ ʼi.” Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Lɛɛ, ynyɛɛ ngɔ Kaisare nihi ngɔ ha Kaisare, nɛ Mawu ni ɔmɛ nyɛ ngɔ ha Mawu!” 22Nɛ benɛ a nu enɛ ɔ ɔ, a nya kpɛ a he, nɛ a si lɛ nɛ a je.
Ni gbogboehi a sitemi he sane
(Marko 12.18-27; Luka 20.27-40)
23Jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔ nɔuu ɔ, Sadukifohi nɛ deɔ ke ni gbogboehi a si temi ko be ɔ hu ba e ngɔ ba bi lɛ ke: 24“Tsɔɔlɔ, Mose de ke: ‘Ke nɔ ko gbo nɛ e be bimɛ ɔ, e nyɛmi nɛ ngɔ e yo ɔ, konɛ e wo nina ngɔ ha e nyɛmi ɔ.’ 25Jeha nɛ ɔ, nyɛmimɛ kpaago hi wa kpɛti, nɛ bi nɔkɔtɔma a ngɔ yo, nɛ e gbo, nɛ akɛnɛ e si we bimɛ nge e se ɔ, e si e yo ɔ ha e senɔ ɔ. 26Ja nɔuu e tsa nɔ kɛ gu nɔ nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ kɛ nɔ nɛ ji etɛ ɔ nɔ kɛ ya su nɔ nɛ ji kpaago ɔ nɔ. 27Se mɛ tsuo a se ɔ yo ɔ hu ba gbo. 28Lɛɛ ni gbogboehi a sitemi ɔ mi ɔ, ni kpaago ɔmɛ a kpɛti mɛnɔ yo e maa pee, ejakaa mɛ tsuo a kɛ lɛ hi si?”
29Se Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ngɛ tɔe, ejakaa nyɛ li ngmami ɔmɛ aloo Mawu he wami ɔ, 30ejakaa ni gbogboehi a si temi ɔ mi ɔ a ngɔɛ yo, nɛ a kɛ yi ha we gba hulɔ; se mohu a ngɛ kaa Mawu bɔfohi ngɛ hiɔwe. 31Se ngɛ ni gbogboehi a si temi ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ kane we nɔ nɛ Mawu de nyɛ ke: 32‘Imi lɛɛ, Abraham Mawu kɛ Isak Mawu kɛ Yakob Mawu ji mi’ ɔ? Mawu ɔ pi ni gbogboehi a Mawu, se mohu hɛkali a Mawu ʼi.” 33Nɛ benɛ asafo ɔmɛ nu enɛ ɔ ɔ, a he nya si mɛ ngɛ e tsɔɔmi ɔ he.
Kita ngua a
(Marko 12.28-34; Luka 10.25-28)
34Se benɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ nu kaa e ku Sadukifo ɔmɛ a nya a, a ba bua a he nya ngɛ he kake; 35nɛ a ti nɔ kake nɛ ji mlaa tsɔɔlɔ ɔ da lɛ nɛ e bi lɛ ke: 36“Tsɔɔlɔ, te nɔ nɛ ji mlaa a mi kita ngua a nɛɛ? 37Nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Suɔ Nyɔmtsɛ o Mawu ɔ, kɛ o tsui tsuo kɛ o klaa tsuo kɛ o juɛmi tsuo? 38Kita amɛ a mi kekleekle nɔ kɛ ngua ji nɛ ɔ nɛ. 39Nɛ nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ se ɔ ngɛ kaa kɔlɔ ɔ ke: ‘Suɔ o nyɛmi nɔmlɔ kaa bɔ nɛ o suɔ mo nitsɛ o he.’ 40Kita enyɔ nɛ ɔmɛ Mlaa a kɛ gbali ɔmɛ tsuo kpla.”
David bi ɔ he sane
(Marko 12.35-37; Luka 20.41-44)
41Nɛ benɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a nya ba bua a, Yesu bi mɛ ke: 42“Kɛ nyɛ susuu ngɛ Kristo ɔ he kɛɛ? Mɛnɔ bi ji lɛ?” A de lɛ ke “David bi ʼi.” 43E bi mɛ ke “Mɛni he je mɔ nɛ David, ngɛ mumi ɔ nya a, tsɛɛ lɛ ‘Nyɔmtsɛ’ nɛ e deɔ ke:
44‘Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de ye nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ke:
Hii ye hiɛ ɔ nɔ
Kɛ maa su be nɛ ma ngɔ o henyɛli ɔmɛ
Ngɔ wo o nane si’ ɔ’?
45“Jeha nɛ ɔ ke David tsɛ lɛ ‘Nyɔmtsɛ’ ɔ, kɛ peɔ kɛɛ nɛ e pa peɔ e bi mɔ?” 46Nɛ nɔ ko nyɛ we lɛ heto ko nɛ e ha, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu kɛ je jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, nɔ ko kɛ́ lɛ nɔ́ ko bimi hu.

Title: MATEO 23
Content:
Yesu ka Mlaatsɔɔli kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a hɛ mi
(Marko 12.38-39; Luka 11.43, 46; 20.45-46)
1Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu tu munyu tsɔɔ asafo ɔmɛ kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ nɛ e de mɛ ke: 2“Mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ ɔ, Mose sɛ ɔ nɔ a hii si ngɛ ɔ nɛ; 3lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ a ma de nyɛ ke nyɛɛ ye nɔ ɔ, nyɛɛ ye nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ pee; se a ni peemi ni ɔmɛ ɔ nyɛ ko pee; ejakaa a deɔ mohu se a pee we. 4Se a boɔ tlomi nɛ jiɔ nɛ tloomi wa kɛ pueɔ nimli a konɔ; se mɛ nitsɛmɛ lɛɛ, a sume kaa a kɛ a nguɛ kake tsɛɛ. 5Se a nihi tsuo ɔ a peɔ konɛ nihi nɛ na. Ejakaa a haa a kaimi sɛbɛ ɔmɛ bliɔ nɛ a peɔ a tade nya fiami ɔmɛ nguahi; 6nɛ a suɔ okplɔɔ yi himi ngɛ niyeni si, kɛ nikɔtɔmahi a sihi hehi ngɛ kpe he ɔmɛ, 7kɛ jua nɔ ngamihi, nɛ a suɔ nɛ nihi nɛ tsɛ mɛ: ‘Rabi, Rabi.’ 8Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ, a ko tsɛ nyɛ ‘Rabi’; ejakaa nɔ kake ji nyɛ tsɔɔlɔ, se nyɛ tsuo kulaa a nyɛmimɛ ji nyɛ. 9Nɛ nyɛ ko tsɛ nɔ ko nyɛ tsɛ hulɔ ngɛ zugba a nɔ; ejakaa nɔ kake ji nyɛ tsɛ, nɔ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ. 10Jeha nɛ ɔ a ko tsɛ nyɛ tsɔɔli hulɔ; ejakaa nɔ kake ji nyɛ tsɔɔlɔ, lɛ ji Kristo. 11Se nɔ nɛ ji ngua ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti ɔ, e plɛ nyɛ tsɔlɔ. 12Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ma wo e he nɔ ɔ, a maa ba lɛ si, nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ maa ba ehe si ɔ, a ma wo e nɔ.”
Yesu gbe a satopeemi ɔ he guɛ
(Marko 12.40; Luka 11.39-42, 44, 52; 20.47)
13“Musu tloo nyɛ, mlaa tsɔɔli kɛ Farisifohi, osatotsɛmɛ, ejakaa nyɛ ngaa hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ nya ngɛ nimli a hɛ mi; se nyɛ nitsɛmɛ ɔ nyɛ sɛ we mi, nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ hlaa nɛ a sɛ mi ɔ hu ɔ, nyɛ ha we mɛ e mi sɛmi he blɔ.
[ 14“Musu tloo nyɛ, mlaa tsɔɔli kɛ Farisifohi osatotsɛmɛ, ejakaa nyɛ guu sɔlemi gagahi a he lakpa tomi nɔ nyɛ mii yalɔyi a we ɔmɛ. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ kojomi maa pe nine!]
15“Musu tloo nyɛ, mlaa tsɔɔli kɛ Farisifohi, osatotsɛmɛ, ejakaa nyɛ bɔlee wo kɛ zugba kɛ kpee, konɛ nyɛ na nɔ kake ne e plɛ Yudafono; nɛ benɛ nɔ ɔ plɛ ja a, nyɛ peɔ lɛ abosiami bi si enyɔ pe nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ he.
16“Musu tloo nyɛ, blɔt sɔɔli hɛ yuyuili, nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ deɔ ke: ‘Nɔ nɛ ma ka sɔlemi tsu ɔ kita a, lɔ ɔ pi nɔ ko; se nɔ nɛ ma ka sɔlemi tsu ɔ he sika a kita a, e tloo musu? 17Kuasiahi kɛ hɛ yuyuili, te nɔ nɛ pe nɛɛ, sika a, aloo sɔlemi tsu ɔ nɛ haa sika a peɔ klɔuklɔu ɔ? 18Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu: ‘Nɔ nɛ ma ka bɔ sami latɛ ɔ kita a, lɔ ɔ pi nɔ ko, se nɔ nɛ ma ka enɔ bɔ ɔ kita a, e tloo musu? 19Hɛ yuyuili, te nɔ nɛ pe nɛɛ, bɔ ɔ, aloo bɔ sami latɛ ɔ nɛ haa bɔ ɔ peɔ klɔuklɔu ɔ? 20Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ nɛ ma ka bɔ sami lɛta ɔ kita a, e ka kɔlɔ ɔ kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ nɔ ɔ tsuo kulaa kita. 21Nɛ nɔ nɛ kaa sɔlemi tsu ɔ kita a, e ka kɔlɔ ɔ kɛ nɔ nɛ hii mi ɔ kita. 22Nɛ nɔ nɛ kaa hiɔwe kita a, e ka Mawu sɛ ɔ kɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ nɔ ɔ hu kita?
23“Musu tloo nyɛ mlaa tsɔɔli kɛ Farisifohi, osatotsɛmɛ, ejakaa nyɛ haa kowɛ kɛ anisi kɛ kumino mi dlami nyɔngma-nyɔngma se Mlaa a mi nihi nɛ he hia nɛ ji dami kojomi kɛ mɔbɔ nami kɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mohu ɔ nyɛ siɔ; se jinɛ e da kaa nyɛ peɔ enɛ ɔmɛ; nɛ nyɛ ko si ekpa amɛ hulɔ. 24Blɔ tsɔɔli hɛ yuyuili, nyɛ tsleɔ nɔ́ nɔ anunui, se nyɛ mii afukpɔngɔ!
25“Musu tloo nyɛ, mlaa tsɔɔli kɛ Farisifohi, osatotsɛmɛ, ejakaa nyɛ tsuo kplu he kɛ kã se; se a mi hyi tɔtɔɔtɔ kɛ ojo fiami kɛ adufude yemi. 26Farisifono hɛ yuyuilɔ, ha kplu ɔ kɛ kã a kekle mi nɛ je, loko e se ɔ hu nɛ je!
27“Musu tloo nyɛ mlaa tsɔɔli kɛ Farisifohi osatotsɛmɛ, ejakaa nyɛ ngɛ kaa yɔkɔhi nɛ a sa he nɛ a he pee fɛu mohu, sɛ a mi hyi tɔtɔɔtɔ kɛ ni gbogboehi a wuhi kɛ mu slɔɔtohi tsuo. 28Ja nɔuu a naa nyɛ hu ngɛ nimli a hɛ mi kaa dali, se osato kɛ mlaa tɔmi hyi nyɛ mi tɔ.”
Yesu gba Farisifo ɔmɛ a tuegblami
(Luka 11.47-51)
29“Musu tloo nyɛ, mlaa tsɔɔli kɛ Farisifohi osatotsɛmɛ, ejakaa nyɛ maa gbali ɔmɛ a yɔkɔ ɔmɛ nɛ nyɛ dlaa dali ɔmɛ a yɔkɔ ɔmɛ, 30nɛ nyɛ deɔ ke: ‘E ji wa tsɛmɛ a yi nɔ ɔ wa ngɛ je mi jinɛ, wa be a he piɛe nɛ a pue gbali ɔmɛ a muɔ si.’ 31Lɛɛ nyɛ ngɛ nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ he odase yee kaa nihi nɛ gbe gbali ɔmɛ a bimɛ ji nyɛ? 32Nyɛ hu nyɛɛ wo nyɛ tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a tsimi ɔ fuu tɔ mɔ! 33Sinɔhi kɛ si kpali a nina! Kɛ nyɛ maa pee kɛ tu abosiami a je fɔbu ɔ nya fo kɛɛ? 34Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, oʼɛ; imi i ngɛ gbali kɛ ni leli kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli tsɔe kɛ ba nyɛ ngɔ, nɛ nyɛ maa gbe a ti ni komɛ nɛ nyɛ maa sɛu ni komɛ, nɛ ni komɛ ɔ nyɛ maa fia mɛ kplibi ngɛ nyɛ kpe he ɔmɛ, nɛ nyɛ maa wa mɛ yi mi kɛ maa je ma mi kɛ maa ya ma mi. 35Benɛ pee nɛ dali a muɔ tsuo nɛ a pue si ngɛ zugba a nɔ kɛ je Abel, dalɔ ɔ, muɔ ɔ nɔ kɛ ba su Zakaria, Barakia bi ɔ, nɛ nyɛ gbe ngɛ sɔlemi tsu ɔ kɛ bɔ sami latɛ ɔ kpɛti ɔ, muɔ ɔ nɛ ba nyɛ nɔ. 36Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Enɛ ɔmɛ tsuo maa ba yi nɔ bi nɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ.”
Suɔmi nɛ Yesu ngɛ kɛ ha Yerusalem
(Luka 13.34-35)
37“Oo Yerusalem, Yerusalem, mo nɛ o gbee gbali ɔmɛ nɛ o fiaa nihi nɛ a tsɔ mɛ o ngɔ ɔ tɛ; si nyɛmɛ i hla kaa jinɛ i buaa o bimɛ a nya kaa bɔ nɛ kungwɔ buaa e bimɛ a nya woɔ e pɛlihi a sisi ɔ, nɛ nyɛ kplɛɛ we! 38oʼɛ, a ma si nyɛ we ɔ we doku ha nyɛ! 39Ejakaa i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Kɛ je be nɛ ɔ kɛ yaa nɛ ɔ, nyɛ be mi nae hu kɛ maa su be nɛ nyɛ ma de ke: ‘A gbaa nɔ nɛ ma ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ biɛ mi ɔ.’ ”

Title: MATEO 24
Content:
Yesu tu sɔlemi tsu ɔ puɛmi he munyu
(Marko 13.1-2; Luka 21.5-6)
1Nɛ benɛ Yesu je kpo kɛ je sɔlemi we ɔ kɛ yaa a, e kaseli ɔmɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ a ba tsɔɔ lɛ sɔlemi we ɔ tsu ɔmɛ. 2Se Yesu de mɛ ke: “Tse nyɛ ngɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo hyɛe? Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: A be tɛ kake sie ngɛ eko nɔ ngɛ hiɛ ɔ nɛ a be kpae ngɔ bu si.”
Haomi kɛ yiwami
(Marko 13.3-13; Luka 21.7-19)
3Benɛ Yesu hii si ngɛ Nuyoku ɔ nɔ ɔ, e kaseli ɔmɛ ba e ngɔ ngɛ se ba de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔ wɔ be nɛ a maa pee ni nɛ ɔmɛ, nɛ mɛni ji o bami kɛ je nɛ ɔ nyagbe ɔ he okadi?”
4Nɛ Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ hi konɛ nɔ ko ko ba mlɔɔ nyɛ. 5Ejakaa nihi fuu kɛ ye biɛ maa ba, nɛ a ma ba de ke: ‘Imi ji Kristo ɔ nɛ!’ Nɛ a maa mlɔɔ nihi fuu. 6Se nyɛ maa nu tahi kɛ tahi a ta womihi a he; nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ nyɛ tsui ko po; se e sa kaa ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo nɛ ba mi, se kɛ̃ ɔ, nyagbe ɔ sui lolo. 7Ejakaa ma maa te si ngɔ wo ma, nɛ matsɛ yemi maa te si ngɔ wo matsɛ yemi; nɛ hwɔ kɛ zugba mimiɛmi maa ba hehi slɔɔtohi tsuo. 8Se enɛ ɔmɛ tsuo ɔ kɔɔmi ɔmɛ a sisi jemi ʼi.
9“Lɛ be ɔ mi ɔ, a ma je nyɛ ngɔ wo dengme mi, nɛ a maa gbe nyɛ; nɛ ye biɛ ɔ he ɔ majemaje tsuo maa nyɛ nyɛ. 10Nɛ jamɛ a be ɔ mi ɔ, nihi fuu a nane ma kpata, nɛ a maa tsɔɔ a huɛmɛ a se blɔ, nɛ a maa nyɛ a he. 11Nɛ lakpa gbali fuu maa te si, nɛ a maa mlɔɔ nihi fuu. 12Nɛ nɔ́ nɛ mlaa kuami maa hiɛ he je ɔ, nihi fuu a suɔmi ɔ he maa jɔ. 13Se nɔ nɛ hɛɛ mi kɛ pii si ɔ, lɛ e yiwami a ma he. 14Nɛ a maa fiɛ matsɛ yemi ɔ Sane Kpakpa nɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ je ɔ tsuo, nɛ a kɛ ye majemaje ɔ tsuo odase; nɛ kɔlɔ ɔ loko nyagbe ɔ maa ba.”
Hehiami ngua a
(Marko 13.14-23; Luka 21.20-24)
15“Lɔ ɔ he je ɔ, ke nyɛ na ma doku ninye ni nɛ gbalɔ Daniel tu he munyu ɔ kaa e maa si ngɛ he klɔuklɔu ɔ” (nɔ nɛ ngɛ kanee ɔ, e kɔ se!) 16“Lɔ ɔ lɛɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ Yudea a, a tu fo kɛ ya yoku ɔmɛ a nɔ; 17nɔ nɛ ngɛ tsu yi mi ɔ e ko kple si ya ngɔ nɔ ko kɛ je e we mi; 18nɛ nɔ nɛ ngɛ ngmɔ si ɔ, e ko kpale e se ya ngɔ e tade. 19Se i ngɛ yihi nɛ hɛɛ muklii kɛ nyɔ nyu hali ngɛ jamɛ a be ɔmɛ a mi ɔ kpo mo hae. 20Se nyɛɛ sɔle konɛ nyɛ fo tumi ɔ nɛ ko ba ngɛ fiɛ be mi aloo ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ. 21Ejakaa jamɛ a be ɔ mi ɔ, he hiami babauu maa ba nɛ a nɛ e nɔ gblee kɛ je je ɔ sisije kɛ ba su mwɔnɛ mwɔnɛ, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ a be e nɔ nae gblegbleegblee. 22Nɛ ke a pui jamɛ a ligbi ɔmɛ a nɔ kpiti ɔ, jinɛ a be he lo ko he lo ko yiwami hee; se nihi nɛ a hla amɛ a he ɔ, a maa po jamɛ a ligbi ɔmɛ a nɔ kpiti.
23“Lɛ be ɔ mi ɔ, ke nɔ ko de nyɛ ke: ‘Oʼɛ, Kristo ɔ ngɛ hiɛ ɔ loo hiɛ ɔ’ ɔ, nyɛ ko he ye. 24Ejakaa lakpa kristohi kɛ lakpa gbali maa te si nɛ a maa pee okadi nguahi kɛ nyakpɛ nihi kɛ maa tsɔɔ, nɛ kaa e maa hi jinɛ a maa mlɔɔ nihi na a hla amɛ tete. 25Oʼɛ, i de nyɛ ngɔ to. 26“Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ke a de nyɛ ke: ‘Oʼɛ, e ngɛ nga a nɔ’ ɔ, nyɛ ko ya; aloo ‘Oʼɛ e ngɛ se tsu ɔmɛ a mi’ ɔ, nyɛ ko he ye. 27Ejakaa bɔ nɛ slaba jee beleku ngaa kɛ yaa bonyoku ɔ ja nɔuu Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ bami ɔ maa pee.
28“Ejakaa he tsuaa he nɛ gbogboe fɔɔ si ngɛ ɔ, lejɛ ɔ okpokuhi buaa a he nya ngɛ.”
Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ bami
(Marko 13.24-27; Luka 21.25-28)
29“Se jamɛ a ligbi ɔmɛ a nɔ he hiami ɔmɛ a se ɔ, e be kee nɛ pu maa tsɔ diblii, nɛ nyɔhiɔ be kpee hu, nɛ dodoehi ma tsɔ kɛ maa je hiɔwe ngɔ fia si, nɛ hiɔwe he wami ɔmɛ ma mimiɛ. 30Kɛkɛ ɔ, Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ okadi ɔ maa je kpo ngɛ hiɔwe, nɛ lɔ ɔ lɛɛ zugba a nɔ wetso ɔmɛ tsuo maa wo ya, nɛ a maa na Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ kaa we ma ngɛ hiɔwe bɔku ɔmɛ a nɔ kɛ he wami dɛ hɛ mi nyami babauu. 31Nɛ e maa tsɔ e bɔfo ɔmɛ kɛ Titimati nɛ gbi nya wa, nɛ a ma bua e nihi nɛ a hla amɛ a nya kɛ maa je kɔɔhiɔ eywiɛ ɔ nɔ, kɛ maa je hiɔwe nyagbe he kake nɔ kɛ yaa su nyagbe he kpa nɔ.”
Ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ he nikasemi
(Marko 13.28-31; Luka 21.29-33)
32“Nyɛɛ kase ngmɔkɔ tso abɛ nɛ e bu ɔ: benɛ e kɔni ɔmɛ plɔke nɛ e bɔni bahi fumi ɔ, nyɛ le kaa latsa be ɔ su ti ta. 33Ja nɔuu nyɛ hu, benɛ nyɛ maa na ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo ɔ, nyɛɛ le kaa e su agbo ɔmɛ a nya ta. 34Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Kikɛmɛ a yi nɔ nɛ ɔ be bee, ja ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo ba mi lolo. 35Hiɔwe kɛ zugba maa be kɛ ho, se ye nyumu ɔmɛ be bee kɛ ho.”
Nɔ ko li ligbi ɔ kɛ ngmlɛfia a
(Marko 13.32-37; Luka 17.26-30; Luka 17.34-36)
36“Se jamɛ a ligbi ɔ kɛ jamɛ a ngmlɛfia a, nɔ ko nɔ ko li. Bɔfohi nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ tete li, nɛ Bi ɔ tete li, ja Tsaatsɛ nɔ kake kɛkɛ. 37Se bɔ nɛ Noa ligbi ɔmɛ pee ɔ, ja Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ bami ɔ hu maa pee. 38Ejakaa bɔ nɛ e ngɛ ngɛ ligbihi nɛ nyɛɛ nyu afua a hɛ mi, nɛ ni ɔmɛ hɛɛ ni yemi kɛ ni numi kɛ yo ngɔmi kɛ gba hami mi hluu kɛ ya su ligbi nɛ Noa ya sɛ daka a mi, 39nɛ a hɛ be a he nɔ kɛ ya su nyu afua a ba muɔ mɛ tsuo kɛ ho ɔ, ja nɔuu Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ bami ɔ maa pee. 40Lɛ be ɔ mi ɔ, ni enyɔ maa hi ngmɔ si, a maa ngɔ nɔ kake, nɛ a ma si nɔ kpa a. 41Yi enyɔ maa wɛɛ ngɛ wɛ se; a maa ngɔ nɔ kake, nɛ a ma si nɔ kpã a. 42Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛɛ huɔ, ejakaa nyɛ li ngmlɛfia nɔ nɛ nyɛ nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ma. 43Se nyɛ na nɛ nyɛɛ le kaa, ke wetsɛ ko le ngmlɛfia nɔ nɛ juɔ baa a, jinɛ e maa huɔ nɛ e be blɔ ngmɛe nɛ a yua e we ɔ ngɔ wo mi. 44Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ hu nyɛ dla nyɛ he ngɔ to, ejakaa ngmlɛfia nɛ nyɛ susuu we ɔ nɔ nɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ma.”
Tsɔlɔ kpakpa kɛ tsɔlɔ yayami
(Luka 12.41-48)
45“Lɛɛ mɛnɔ ji tsɔlɔ anɔkualetsɛ kɛ ni lelɔ mɔ nɛ e nyɔmtsɛ ngɔ lɛ ngɔ to e webi ɔmɛ a nya konɛ e ha mɛ a nya mi ngma ngɛ be nɛ sa mi ɔ? 46A gbaa jamɛ ɛ tsɔlɔ ɔ, nɔ nɛ benɛ e nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ba a, nɛ e ma ba na lɛ kaa e ngɛ jã pee ɔ. 47Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, e maa ngɔ lɛ ngɔ to e nihi tsuo kulaa nya. 48Se ke jamɛ a tsɔlɔ ɔ ji tsɔlɔ yayami ɔ, e ma de ngɛ e tsui mi ke: ‘Ye nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ngɛ e bami be ɔ tsɛe kɛ ngɛ toe;’ 49nɛ e ma bɔni e huɛmɛ tsɔli ɔmɛ kpa fiami, nɛ e kɛ da deli maa ye nɛ e kɛ mɛ maa nu ɔ, 50jamɛ a tsɔlɔ ɔ nyɔmtsɛ ɔ maa ba ligbi nɛ e hyɛ we lɛ blɔ kɛ ngmlɛfia nɛ e li, 51nɛ e ma tsɔtslɔɔ e mi nɛ e ma ha lɛ e blɔfami nɔ́ ngɛ osatotsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti. Lejɛ ɔ ya fomi kɛ lungu nyakpemi maa hi.”

Title: MATEO 25
Content:
Yihewi nyɔngma amɛ a he abɛ ɔ
1“Jamɛ a be ɔ, hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ maa pee kaa yihewi nyɔngma nɛ wo a kanehi ke a yaa kpee ayɛflo huno. 2Se a kpɛti ni enuɔ ɔ kuasiahi ʼi, nɛ ni enuɔ ɔ lɛɛ ni leli ji mɛ. 3Nihi nɛ ji kuasia amɛ wo a kane ɔmɛ, se a ngɔɛ nu ngɔ piɛ we he. 4Se ni leli ɔmɛ hɛɛ nu kɛ tɔ ngɔ piɛ a kane ɔmɛ a he. 5Se benɛ ayɛflo huno ɔ se kɛ ɔ, mahɛ ngɔ mɛ tsuo nɛ a hwɔ mahɛ.
6“Se nyɔ mi kpɛti ɔ, a nu huhui ke: ‘Oʼɛ, ayɛflo huno ɔ ma oo! Nyɛɛ je kpo nɛ nyɛ ya kpee lɛ!’ 7Kɛkɛ nɛ jamɛ a yihewi ɔmɛ tsuo te si nɛ a tsɛ̃ a kane ɔmɛ a mi. 8Nɛ kuasia a mɛ de ni leli ɔmɛ ke: ‘Nyɛ ha wɔ nyɛ nu ɔ eko, ejakaa wa kane ɔmɛ ngɛ gboe.’ 9Se ni leli ɔmɛ he nɔ nɛ a de mɛ ke: ‘Eko ɔ e ba be waa kɛ nyɛ tsuo sue; se mohu nyɛɛ ya nihi nɛ juaa amɛ a ngɔ nɛ nyɛ ya he eko ngɔ ha nyɛ he.’ 10Se benɛ, a ho hemi ya a, ayɛflo huno ɔ ba, nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ dla a he to lɛ ɔ kɛ lɛ ho yo kpeemi he ɔ ya, nɛ a nga sinya a.
11“Lɔ ɔ se ɔ, yihewi kpa amɛ hu ba nɛ a ba de ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, Nyɔmtsɛ, bli wɔ!’ 12Se e he nɔ ke: ‘Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke i li nyɛ.’ 13Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛɛ huɔ, ejakaa nyɛ li jamɛ a ligbi ɔ loo ngmlɛfia a.”
Sɔmɔli etɛ ɔmɛ a he abɛ ɔ
(Luka 19.11-27)
14“E ngɛ kaa nyumu ko nɛ benɛ e maa doma a, e tsɛ e sɔmɔli ɔmɛ, nɛ e tu e nihi ngɔ wo a dɛ; 15e ha nɔ kake talenta enuɔ, nɔ kake hu enyɔ, nɛ nɔ kake hu kake, bɔ nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ ma nyɛ maa hyɛ nɔ; nɛ amlɔ ɔ e doma. 16Se nɔ nɛ na talenta enuɔ ɔ ho nɛ e ya plɛ he, nɛ e na talenta enuɔ kɛ bɔ he. 17Ja nɔuu nɔ nɛ na enyɔ ɔ hu ya na enyɔ kɛ bɔ he. 18Se nɔ nɛ na kake ɔ ho nɛ e ya tsua zugba mi, nɛ e pu e nyɔmtsɛ ɔ sika a.
19“Se e ngɛ mi hluu ɔ, sɔmɔli nɛ ɔmɛ a nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ba, nɛ e kɛ mɛ ba bu akɔɔtaa. 20Nɛ nɔ nɛ na talenta enuɔ ɔ ba, nɛ e kɛ talenta enuɔ kpã hu ba bɔ he nɛ e ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ o ngɔ talenta enuɔ ngɔ ha mi, oʼɛ, i kɛ na talenta enuɔ hu ngɔ piɛ he.’ 21E nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de lɛ ke: ‘Ayekoo, sɔmɔlɔ kpakpa kɛ anɔkualetsɛ, o ye anɔkuale ngɛ nihi bɔɔ mi, ma ha o pee nihi fuu a nyatsɛ: sɛ o nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bua jɔmi ɔ mi.’ 22Nɛ nɔ nɛ na talenta enyɔ ɔ hu ba nɛ e ba de ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, o ngɔ talenta enyɔ ngɔ ha mi, oʼɛ, i kɛ na talenta enyɔ hu ngɔ piɛ he.’ 23E nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de lɛ ke: Ayekoo, sɔmɔlɔ kpakpa kɛ anɔkualetsɛ, o ye anɔkuale ngɛ nihi bɔɔ mi, ma ha o pee nihi fuu a nyatsɛ: sɛ o nyɔmtsɛ bua jɔmi ɔ mi.’ 24Se nɔ nɛ na talenta kake ɔ hu ba de ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, i le mo kaa yi mi walɔ ji mo; o kpaa ni ngɛ he nɛ o du we nɔ́ ko ngɛ, nɛ o buaa nihi a nya ngɛ he nɛ o fia we nɔ́ ko ngɛ; 25nɛ lɔ ɔ ha i ye gbeye, nɛ i ho nɛ i ya pu o talenta a ngɛ zugba mi; ne o ni.’ 26Se e nyɔmtsɛ ɔ he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: ‘Sɔmɔlɔ yaya kɛ alitsɛ, nɛ o le kaa i kpaa ni ngɛ he nɛ i du we nɔ́ ko ngɛ, nɛ i buaa nihi a nya ngɛ he nɛ i fia we nɔ́ ko ngɛ ɔ, 27Jinɛ o blɔ nya ji kaa o ngɔɔ ye sika a ngɔ woɔ tsakeli a dɛ, konɛ ke i ba a nɛ ma ba he ye ni kɛ hekpa. 28Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ he talenta a ngɛ e dɛ nɛ nyɛ ngɔ ha nɔ nɛ ngɛ talenta nyɔngma a. 29Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ngɛ nɔ́ ko ɔ, a ma ha lɛ konɛ e na kɛ be nɔ, se nɔ nɛ be nɔ́ ko ɔ, a ma he bɔɔ nɛ e ngɛ ɔ tete ngɛ e dɛ. 30Nɛ sɔmɔlɔ nɛ he be se nami ko nɛ ɔ ɔ, nyɛɛ tsɛ̃ lɛ ngɔ wo blɔ se diblii ɔ mi; lejɛ ɔ ya fomi kɛ lungu nya kpemi maa hi!’ ”
Kojomi ligbi ngua a
31“Se benɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ maa ba ngɛ e nyami ɔ mi, nɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ tsuo maa piɛ e he ɔ, lɛ be ɔ mi ɔ, e maa hi e nyami sɛ ɔ nɔ; 32nɛ a ma bua majemaje tsuo nya ngɛ e hɛ mi, nɛ e ma gba a mi, kaa bɔ nɛ to hyɛlɔ gbaa jijɔhi kɛ apletsihi a mi ɔ. 33Nɛ e maa ngɔ jijɔ ɔmɛ ngɔ da e hiɛ ɔ nɔ, se apletsi ɔmɛ ɔ, e maa ngɔ mɛ ngɔ da e muɔ nɔ? 34Kɛkɛ nɛ matsɛ ɔ ma de nihi nɛ ngɛ e hiɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ ke: ‘Nyɛɛ ba, nyɛ nihi nɛ ye tsɛ gbaa nyɛ, nyɛ ba ngɔ matsɛ yemi ɔ nɛ a dla to nyɛ, kɛ je je mi sisije ɔ! 35Ejakaa hwɔ ye mi, nɛ nyɛ ha mi ni ye; kuma ye mi nɛ nyɛ ha mi nyu nu; nibwɔ ji mi, nɛ nyɛ ha i ba to nyɛ ngɔ; 36i hɛɛ ye he gu nɛ nyɛ wo mi tade; i nu hiɔ, nɛ nyɛ ba slaa mi; a wo mi tsu mi, nɛ nyɛ ba ye ngɔ.’ 37Kɛkɛ ɔ dali ɔmɛ maa he nɔ de ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, te ligbi nɛ wa na mo kaa hwɔ ngɛ mo yee nɛ wa ha mo ni ye nɛɛ? Aloo kaa, kuma ngɛ mo yee nɛ wa ha mo nɛ ko nu? 38Nɛ te ligbi nɛ wa na mo kaa nibwɔ ji mo, nɛ wa ha o ba to wa ngɔ nɛɛ? Aloo kaa o hɛɛ o he gu nɛ wa wo mo tade nɛɛ? 39Jeha nɛ ɔ te ligbi nɛ wa na mo kaa o ngɛ gboe aloo a wo mo tsu mi, nɛ wa ba o ngɔ nɛɛ?’ 40Nɛ matsɛ ɔ ma he nɔ nɛ e ma de mɛ ke: ‘Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Ligbi abɔ kɛ̃ nɛ nyɛ pee ngɔ ha ye nyɛmimɛ nɛ ɔmɛ a ti nyafii kake ɔ, imi nɔuu nyɛ pee ngɔ ha a nɛ.’
41“Kɛkɛ ɔ, e ma de ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ e muɔ nɔ hu ke: ‘Nyɛɛ je ye nɔ, nyɛ nihi nɛ a gbiɛ nyɛ, nyɛɛ ya neneene la a nɛ a dla to abosiami kɛ e bɔfo ɔmɛ ɔ mi! 42Ejakaa hwɔ ye mi, nɛ nyɛ ha we mi ni ma ye; kuma ye mi, nɛ nyɛ ha we mi nyu ma nu; 43nibwɔ ji mi; nɛ nyɛ ha we nɛ ma ba to nyɛ ngɔ; i hɛɛ ye he gu, nɛ nyɛ wui mi tade; i nu hiɔ, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu a wo mi tsu mi, nɛ nyɛ ba slaa we mi.’ 44Kɛkɛ ɔ, mɛ hu a ma he nɔ de ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, te ligbi nɛ wa na mo kaa hwɔ ngɛ mo yee aloo kuma ngɛ mo yee aloo nibwɔ ji mo aloo o hɛɛ o he gu aloo o ngɛ gboe aloo a wo mo tsu mi, nɛ wa ba sɔmɔ we mo ɔ?’ 45Kɛkɛ ɔ, e ma he nɔ nɛ e ma de mɛ ke: ‘Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Ligbi abɔ kɛ̃ nɛ nyɛ pee we ngɔ hi nihi tsɔwi kulaa nɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɔ kake ɔ, nyɛ pee we ngɔ hi mi hulɔ!’ 46Nɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, a maa ya neneene he hiami mi; se dali ɔmɛ maa ya neneene wami mi.”

Title: MATEO 26
Content:
A so Yesu yi nɔ
(Marko 14.1-2; Luka 22.1-2; Yohane 11.45-53)
1Benɛ Yesu gbe munyu nɛ ɔmɛ kulaa tumi nya a, e de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: 2“Nyɛ le kaa e piɛ ligbi enyɔ nɛ a yeɔ Hetsɔmi ɔ, nɛ a ma je Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ngɔ ha nɛ a sɛu lɛ.”
3Lɛ be ɔ mi ɔ, osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ kɛ ma nikɔtɔma amɛ ya bua a he nya ngɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Kaiafa a mɔ ɔ mi. 4Nɛ a ya so bɔ nɛ a maa pee nɛ a nu Yesu ga mi nɛ a gbe lɛ; 5se a ke: “Pi ngɛ Hejɔɔmi ligbi ɔ nɔ, konɛ basabasa peemi nɛ ko ba ma a mi.”
A pɔ Yesu nu ngɛ Betania
(Marko 14.3-9; Yohane 12.1-8)
6Benɛ Yesu ngɛ Betania ngɛ Simon, tsitsɛ ɔ, we ɔ mi ɔ, 7yo ko hɛɛ alabastro tɔ kɛ e mi nu kɛ e he via nɛ he jua wa kɛ ba e kasa nya, nɛ benɛ e hii si ngɛ niyeni si ɔ, e plɛ ngɔ pue e yi mi. 8Se benɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ na a, a mi mi wo la nɛ a de ke: “Kɛ ji yaka ni puɛmi nɛ ɔ sisi kɛɛ? 9Ejakaa nu kɛ e he via nɛ ɔ, jinɛ a ma nyɛ jua sika fuu nɛ a ngɔ ha ohiafohi.” 10Se benɛ Yesu na enɛ ɔ ɔ, e de mɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nyɛ ngɛ yo ɔ nya dooe? E tsu nitsumi saminya ha mi. 11Ejakaa ohiafo ɔmɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ kɛ mɛ ngɛ daa, se imi lɛɛ, pi daa nɛ i kɛ nyɛ maa hi si. 12Ejakaa nu kɛ e he via nɛ ɔ nɛ e plɛ ngɔ pue ye nɔmlɔ tso ɔ nɔ nɛ ɔ, e pee ngɔ to ye pumi. 13Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: He tsuaa he nɛ a maa fiɛ Sane Kpakpa nɛ ɔ ngɛ, ngɛ je mi tsuo ɔ, a maa wo nɔ́ nɛ yo nɛ ɔ pee nɛ ɔ hu tã ma ngɔ kai lɛ.”
Yuda kplɛɛ kaa e maa tsɔɔ Yesu se blɔ
(Marko 14.10-11; Luka 22.3-6)
14Kɛkɛ nɛ ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɔ kake nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Yuda Iskariot ɔ pue nɔ kɛ ho osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ a ngɔ ya, 15nɛ e ya de mɛ ke: “Mɛni nyɛ ma ha mi, nɛ ma je lɛ ngɔ wo nyɛ dɛ mi?” Nɛ a kane sika hiɔ yi nyingmi etɛ ngɔ ha lɛ. 16Nɛ kɛ je jamɛ a be ɔ nɔ ɔ, e hla e he blɔ konɛ e ngɔ lɛ ngɔ wo a dɛ mi.
Yesu kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ye Hetsɔmi niyeni ɔ
(Marko 14.12-21; Luka 22.7-14; 22.21-23; Yohane 13.21-30)
17Se akpiti nyami ligbi ɔmɛ a mi kekle ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, kaseli ɔmɛ ba Yesu ngɔ ba bi lɛ ke: “Jije o suɔ kaa wa ya dla ha mo nɛ o ya ye Hetsɔmi ɔ ngɛ?” 18Nɛ e ke: “Nyɛɛ ya ma a mi nɛ nyɛ ya de asimasi ke: ‘Tsɔɔlɔ ɔ ke: Ye be ɔ su ta; o we ɔ mi i kɛ ye kaseli ɔmɛ maa ye Hetsɔmi ɔ ngɛ.’ ” 19Nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ya pee bɔ nɛ Yesu de mɛ ɔ, nɛ a dla Hetsɔmi ni ɔ ngɔ to.
20Se benɛ e su gbɔkuɛ ɔ, e kɛ ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ ya hi si ngɛ niyeni ɔ he. 21Nɛ benɛ a ngɛ ni ɔ yee ɔ, e ke: “Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nyɛ ti nɔ kake maa tsɔɔ ye se blɔ.” 22Nɛ e dɔ mɛ saminyɛ, nɛ a bɔni lɛ bimi kakaaka ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, imi lo?” 23Se e he nɔ ke: “Nɔ nɛ nine nɛ kɛ ye nine kpee ngɛ ka a mi ɔ, lɛ nɔuu lɛ e maa tsɔɔ ye se blɔ ɔ nɛ. 24Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ma gbo kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma ngɛ e he ɔ mohu; se musu tloo jamɛ a nɔmlɔ ɔ nɛ tsɔɔ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ se blɔ ɔ; afani nɛ a na we a nɛ a fɔ jamɛ a nɔmlɔ ɔ.” 25Nɛ Yuda e se blɔ tɔsslɔ ɔ, he nɔ ke: “Anɛ imi lo, Rabi?” E de lɛ ke: “Ja o de ɔ nɛ!”
Nyɔmitsɛ niyeni ɔ sisitomi
(Marko 14.22-26; Luka 22.15-20)
26Se benɛ a ngɛ ni ɔ yee ɔ, Yesu kɛ̃ abolo, nɛ e gbaa nɔ nɛ e kuɔ mi, nɛ e ngɔ ha e kaseli ɔmɛ nɛ e ke: “Nyɛ he nɛ nyɛɛ ye! Enɛ ɔ ji ye nɔmlɔ tso ɔ nɛ.” 27Nɛ e wo kplu ɔ, nɛ e na si, nɛ e ngɔ ha mɛ nɛ e ke: “Nyɛ tsuo kulaa nyɛɛ nu enɛ ɔ eko! 28Ejakaa enɛ ɔ ji ye muɔ nɛ ji somi ɔ nɔ ɔ nɛ a plɛ pue si ngɛ nihi fuu a he ha yayami pami. 29Se i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Kɛ je nɛ ɔ nɔ kɛ yaa nɛ ɔ ɔ, i be wai tso yiblii nɛ ɔ eko nue hu, kɛ maa su ligbi nɛ i kɛ nya maa nu lɛ ehe ngɛ Tsaatsɛ matsɛ yemi ɔ mi.” 30Nɛ benɛ a la yi jemi la ko ɔ, a je kpo kɛ ho Nuyoku ɔ nɔ ya.
Yesu gba Petro kuami ngɔ to
(Marko 14.27-31; Luka 22.31-34; Yohane 12.36-38)
31Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Nyɔ nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, ye he sane ma ha nyɛ tsuo nyɛ nane ma kpata; ejakaa a ngma ke: ‘Ma fia tohyɛlɔ ɔ nɔ, nɛ to asafo ɔ maa gbɛ fia.’ 32Se ye si temi ɔ se ɔ, ma sɛ nyɛ hlami kɛ maa ya Galilea.” 33Se Petro he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Ke ni ɔmɛ tsuo a nane ma kpata a, imi lɛɛ ye nane be kpatae gblegbleegblee.” 34Yesu de lɛ ke: “Niinɛ, i ngɛ mo dee ke: Nyɔ nɛ ɔ mi nɔuu, loko kungwɔ ma kpã nɔ ɔ, o ma kpa ngɛ ye si etɛ.” 35Petro de lɛ ke: “Ke i kɛ mo ma gbo tete po ɔ, i be kpae ngɛ o se!” Jã nɔuu kaseli ɔmɛ tsuo hu de.
Yesu ya sɔle ngɛ Getsemane
(Marko 14.32-42; Luka 22.39-46)
36Jeha nɛ ɔ Yesu kɛ mɛ ba he ko nɛ tsɛɛ lejɛ ɔ Getsemane; nɛ e de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ hi si ngɛ hiɛ ɔ, konɛ ma ya nɛ ma ya sɔle.” 37Nɛ e ngɔ Petro kɛ Zebedeo bimɛ nyumuhi enyɔ ɔ ngɔ piɛ e he nɛ e ywlɛ ho e he nɛ e hao. 38Kɛkɛ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Ye klaa ngɛ haoe kɛ maa su gbenɔ mi po; nyɛɛ hi si ngɛ hiɛ ɔ nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ mi nɛ fɔ nyɔ!” 39Nɛ e ya e hɛ mi bɔɔ nɛ e ngɔ e hɛ mi ngɔ bu si, nɛ e sɔle ke: “Tsaatsɛ, ke e maa hi ɔ, ha nɛ kplu nɛ ɔ be ye he kɛ ho; se kɛ̃ ɔ, pi bɔ nɛ imi i suɔ, se mohu bɔ nɛ mo o suɔ.”
40Nɛ benɛ e ba kaseli ɔmɛ a ngɔ ɔ, e na kaa a hwɔ mahɛ; nɛ e de Petro ke: “Anɛ nyɛ nyɛ we nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ mi nɛ fɔ nyɔ ngmlɛfia kake pɛ lo? 41Nyɛɛ fɔ nyɔ nɛ nyɛɛ sɔle, konɛ nyɛ ko sɛ ka mi; mumi ɔ ngɛ kplɛɛ e mohu, se he lo ɔ gbede.”
42E pue nɔ kɛ ho ekohu nɔ nɛ ji si enyɔ, nɛ e ya sɔle ke: “Tsaatsɛ, ke kplu nɛ ɔ be nyɛe ye he bemi kɛ ho kaa ja i nu ɔ, a pee bɔ nɛ o suɔ.” 43Nɛ benɛ e ba a, e na kaa a hwɔ mahɛ ekohu; ejakaa nyɔ gbe mɛ.
44Nɛ e kpale si mɛ kɛ ho ekohu, nɛ e ya sɔle nɔ nɛ ji si etɛ, nɛ e tu jamɛ a munyu ɔ nɔuu. 45Kɛkɛ nɛ e ba e kaseli ɔmɛ a ngɔ, nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ he mi jɔ nyɛ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ mahɛ hwɔe nɛ ɔ? Oʼɛ, ngmlɛfia a su ta, nɛ a maa ngɔ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ngɔ wo yayami peeli a dɛ mi. 46Nyɛɛ te si, nyɛ ha waa ho; oʼɛ, nɔ nɛ maa tsɔɔ ye se blɔ ɔ su si ta.”
Yesu numi
(Marko 14.43-50; Luka 22.47-53; Yohane 18.3-12)
47Nɛ benɛ e ngɛ munyu ɔ tue kɛ mwɔ ɔ, oʼɛ, Yuda, ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɔ kake ɔ, ba, nɛ asafo fuu nɛ je osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ ma nikɔtɔma amɛ a ngɔ ɔ kɛ lɛ nyɛɛ, nɛ a hɛɛ klaate kɛ tsokpotihi. 48Se nɔ nɛ ngɛ e se blɔ tsɔɔe ɔ to mɛ okadi ke: “Nɔ nya he nɛ ma fiɔ ɔ, lɛ ʼi; nyɛɛ nu lɛ!” 49Nɛ amlɔ ɔ e ba Yesu ngɔ ba de ke: “He manye, Rabi,” nɛ e fiɔ e nya he. 50Se Yesu de lɛ ke: “Huɛ, pee nɔ́ nɛ o ma peemi ɔ.” Kɛkɛ nɛ ni ɔmɛ ba tua Yesu nɛ a nu lɛ. 51Nɛ oʼɛ, nihi nɛ kɛ Yesu ngɛ ɔ a ti nɔ kake kpa e nine mi nɛ e hia klaate nɛ e kɛ ja osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a tsɔlɔ, nɛ e po e tue. 52Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Ngɔɔ o klaate ɔ ngɔ to e to he; ejakaa nihi tsuo nɛ hiaa klaate ɔ, klaate nɔuu a kɛ ma kpata a hɛ mi. 53Aloo o susu kaa i be nyɛe Tsaatsɛ pɛɛ ma kpa nɛ amlɔ nɛ ɔ nɔuu e ma ha mi hiɔwe bɔfohi pe asafo nyɔnmga kɛ enyɔ nɛ a ba fã ye he? 54Se lɔ ɔ lɛɛ kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ ngmami ɔmɛ maa ba mi, kaa ja a pee kikɛ ɔ nɔuu?”
55Jamɛ a ngmlɛfia a nɔ nɔuu ɔ, Yesu de asafo ɔ ke: “Imi numi nyɛ ba kaa a nuu ojo fialɔ ko ke klaate kɛ tsokpotihi nɛ ɔ? I hii sɔlemi we ɔ daa nɛ i tsɔɔ ni, nɛ nyɛ nui mi. 56Se a pee enɛ ɔ tsuo konɛ nihi nɛ gbali ɔmɛ ngma a nɛ ba mi.” Kɛkɛ nɛ kaseli ɔmɛ tsuo tu fo si lɛ.
Yesu ngɛ gua a hɛ mi
(Marko 14.53-65; Luka 22.54-55; 22.63-71; Yohane 18.13-14; 18.19-24)
57Se ninɛmɛ nɛ nu Yesu ɔ kpaka lɛ kɛ ho Kaiafa, osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a, ngɔ ya, he nɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ bua a he nyɛ ngɛ ɔ. 58Petro nyɛɛ e se ngɛ lokoo kɛ ba osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a mɔ ɔ mi, nɛ e ya sɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ e kɛ sɔmɔli ɔmɛ ya hii si, konɛ e hyɛ bɔ nɛ nyagbe ɔ maa ba ha. 59Osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ gua a tsuo hla lakpa odase ngɛ Yesu he, konɛ a gbe lɛ; 60se a nɛ eko, pohu lakpa odase yeli fuu ba, se kɛ ɔ a nɛ eko. Pee se ɔ, lakpa odase yeli enyɔ ba 61nɛ a ba de ke: “Nɔ nɛ ɔ de ke: ‘Ma nyɛ Mawu Sɔlemi we ɔ ma kuɔ, nɛ ma fia lɛ ligbi etɛ.’ ”
62Nɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a te si nɛ e bi lɛ ke: “O be odase nɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ yee ngɛ o he ɔ nya jee?” 63Se Yesu pɛ̃ e nya mi. Nɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “I na Mawu hɛ kalɔ ɔ kaa, ke mo ji Kristo, Mawu bi ɔ, de wɔ!” 64Yesu de lɛ ke: “Jã o de ɔ nɛ! Se i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Kɛ je be nɛ ɔ kɛ yaa a, nyɛ maa na Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ kaa e hii si ngɛ he wami ɔ hiɛ ɔ nɔ, nɛ e ma ngɛ hiɔwe bɔku ɔmɛ a mi.” 65Kɛkɛ nɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a gba e tadehi nɛ e ke: “E bɔ musu! Mɛni wa pa ngɛ odase yeli hlae ya pee ekohu oʼɛ, jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛ nu e musu bɔmi ɔ! 66Kɛ nyɛ susu kɛɛ?” A he nɔ nɛ a ke: “E sa gbenɔ!” 67Kɛkɛ nɛ a la lada ngɔ pue e hɛ mi, nɛ a gba lɛ mahi; nɛ ni komɛ hu fia lɛ ni, 68nɛ a ke: “Kristo, gbaa tsɔɔ wɔ, mɛnɔ ji nɔ nɛ gbe mo ɔ?”
Petro kua Yesu
(Marko 14.66-72; Luka 22.56-62; Yohane 18.15-18; 18.25-27)
69Se Petro hii si ngɛ se lokoo ngɛ kpo ɔ kpɛti; nɛ sɔmɔlɔ yo ko ba e ngɔ ba de lɛ ke: “Mo hu tse o kɛ Yesu, Galiliano ɔ lɛ ngɛ!” 70Se e kua ngɛ mɛ tsuo a hɛ mi, nɛ e ke: “I li nɔ́ nɛ o ngɛ dee nɛ ɔ.” 71Se benɛ e te si kɛ ho kue ɔ si ya a, sɔmɔlɔ yo kpa ko hu na lɛ, nɛ e de nihi nɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ke: “Nɔ nɛ ɔ hu kɛ Yesu Nazareno ɔ lɛ ngɛ.” 72Nɛ e kua ekohu kɛ kitakami ke: “I li nɔmlɔ ɔ.” 73Se pee se bɔɔ ɔ, nihi nɛ daa si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ba de Petro ke: “Anɔkuale ji kaa, a ti nɔ kake ji mo; ejakaa o munyu tete ngɛ mo si jee!” 74Kɛkɛ nɛ e bɔni gbiɛmi kɛ kita kami ke: “I li nɔmlɔ ɔ!” Nɛ amlɔ ɔ kungwɔ kpa nɔ. 75Nɛ Petro kai Yesu munyu nɛ e tu lɛ ke: “Loko kungwɔ ma kpa nɔ ɔ, o ma kpa ngɛ ye se si etɛ” ɔ. Nɛ e je kpo ya fo ya wawɛɛ.

Title: MATEO 27
Content:
Yesu ngɛ Pilato hɛ mi
(Marko 15.1; Luka 23.1-2; Yohane 18.28-32)
1Benɛ je na a, osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ ma nikɔtɔma amɛ tsuo so Yesu yi nɔ, konɛ a gbe lɛ. 2Nɛ a fi e nine nɛ a kpaka lɛ kɛ ho ya ha amlaalo Pontio Pilato.
Yuda gbenɔ
(Bɔfo 1.18-19)
3Benɛ Yuda, nɔ nɛ tsɔɔ Yesu se blɔ ɔ, na kaa a bu Yesu fɔ ɔ, e pia e he, nɛ e kpale sika yi nyingmi etɛ ɔ ya ha osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ ekohu, 4nɛ e ke: “I pee yayami kaa i tsɔɔ muɔ nɛ yayami ko be e he ɔ se blɔ.” Se mɛ lɛɛ a ke: “Lɔ ɔ pi wa he sane ko; mo nitsɛ hyɛ nɔ!” 5Nɛ e ya sake sika a ngɔ pue si ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho nɛ e ya wo e kuɛ kpa.
6Osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ ya kukuɔ sika hiɔ ɔ, nɛ a ke: “E dɛ́ kaa a kɛ woɔ nito he ɔ; ejakaa muɔ yi ni ʼi.” 7Nɛ a ya da nɛ a kɛ he buɛ puɛlɔ ɔ abɔɔ ɔ, konɛ a pu nibwɔhi ngɛ lejɛ ɔ. 8Lɔ ɔ he ɔ a tsɛɛ jamɛ a abɔɔ ɔ Muɔ abɔɔ kɛ mwɔnɛ.
9Kɔlɔ ɔ ha gbalɔ Yeremia munyu ɔ ba mi ke: “Nɛ a ngɔ sika hiɔ yi nyingmi etɔ ɔ, nɛ ji jua nɛ Israelbi ɔmɛ wo ɔ, 10nɛ a kɛ he buɛ puɛlɔ ɔ abɔɔ ɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de mi ɔ.”
Pilato bi Yesu munyu
(Marko 15.2-5; Luka 23.3-5; Yohane 18.33-38)
11Nɛ a kɛ Yesu ba da amlaalo ɔ hɛ mi, nɛ amlaalo ɔ bi lɛ ke: “Mo ji Yudafo ɔmɛ a matsɛ ɔ lo?” Nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Ja o de ɔ nɛ.” 12Se benɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ ngɛ e nya poe ɔ, pe je we nya. 13Kɛkɛ nɛ Pilato bi lɛ ke: “Anɛ o nui sanehi sɔuu nɛ a kɛ ngɛ o nɔ puee nɛ ɔ?” 14Se e pui e nya mi kulaa; nɛ amlaalo ɔ nya kpɛ e nitsɛ nitsɛ?
A bu Yesu gbenɔ fɔ
(Marko 15.6-15; Luka 23.13-25; Yohane 18.39—19.16)
15Se daa, ke e su nyami ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, amlaalo ɔ ngmɛɛ pamino kake nɛ asafo ɔ suɔ he haa mɛ. 16Se lɛ be ɔ mi ɔ, a ngɛ pamino ku ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Baraba. 17Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, benɛ asafo ɔ ba bua a he nya a, Pilato bi mɛ ke: “Mɛnɔ he nyɛ suɔ kaa ma ngmɛɛ ha nyɛ: Baraba, loo Yesu nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Kristo ɔ?” 18Ejakaa Pilato le kaa ninye he nɛ a ngɔ lɛ ha a nɛ.
19Se benɛ Pilato hii si ngɛ kojomi sɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ, e yo tsɔ kɛ ha e ngɔ ba de lɛ ke: “O kɛ dalɔ nɛ ɔ ko ye sane ko; ejakaa e he je ɔ, ye he hia mi babauu ngɛ nlami mi mwɔnɛ.”
20Se osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ wo asafo ɔmɛ a yi mi ke, a bi Baraba mohu, nɛ a gbe Yesu. 21Lɔ ɔ he ɔ amlaalo ɔ he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Mɛ ni enyɔ ɔmɛ akpɛti mɛnɔ he nyɛ suɔ kaa ma ngmɛɛ ha nyɛ?” Nɛ a ke: “Baraba.” 22Pilato bi mɛ ke: “Lɛɛ mɛni ma pee Yesu nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Kristo ɔ he mɔ?” Mɛ tsuo a ke: “Ha nɛ a sɛu lɛ!” 23Nɛ amlaalo ɔ bi ke: “Mɛni yayami e pee?” Se enɛ ɔ mohu ha a kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ ke: “Ha nɛ a sɛu lɛ!” 24Se benɛ Pilato na kaa e nyɛ we he nɔ́ ko nɛ e pee, se mohu basabasa ngɛ hlae nɛ maa te si ɔ, e ngɔ nyu nɛ se fɔ e dɛ ngɛ asafo ɔ hɛ mi, nɛ e ke: “Imi lɛɛ i yi dalɔ nɛ ɔ muɔ he musu; nyɛ, nyɛ sane ʼi!” 25Nɛ ma a tsuo he nɔ ke: “E muɔ nɛ ba waa kɛ wa bimɛ a nɔ!” 26Kɛkɛ nɛ e ngmɛɛ Baraba he ngɔ ha mɛ; se Yesu ɔ, e ha a fia lɛ kplibi nɛ e ngɔ lɛ ngɔ ha nɛ a ya sɛu.
Aslaafo ɔmɛ ye Yesu he fɛu
(Marko 15.16-20; Yohane 19.2-3)
27Kɛkɛ nɛ amlaalo ɔ aslaafo ɔmɛ ngɔ Yesu kɛ ho kojomi he ɔ ya, nɛ a ya bua aslaafohi a kuu ɔ tsuo nya kɛ ba e he; 28nɛ a je e he tade ɔmɛ, nɛ a ngɔ tade tsu klɔii ko ngɔ wo lɛ; 29nɛ a pee mio jlasi ngɔ fi e yi, nɛ a kɛ paplo ha lɛ nɛ e hɛɛ ngɛ e hiɛ ɔ nine mi, nɛ a kpla si ngɛ e hɛ mi nɛ a ye e he fɛu ke: “Wa nga mo oo, Yudafohi a matsɛ!” 30Nɛ a la lada ngɔ pue e nɔ, nɛ a he paplo ɔ ngɛ e dɛ nɛ a ngɔ fia e yi kpɛti. 31Nɛ benɛ a ye e he fɛu ta a, a je tade klɔii ɔ ngɛ e he, nɛ a ngɔ lɛ nitse e tade ɔmɛ ngɔ wo lɛ, nɛ a kpaka lɛ kɛ ho konɛ a ya sɛu.
Yesu sɛumi
(Marko 15.21-32; Luka 23.26-43; Yohane 19.17-27)
32Se benɛ a yaa a, a na nyumu Kireneno ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Simon, nɛ a nyɛ e nɔ ke e wo e sɛumi tso ɔ. 33Nɛ benɛ a su he nɛ a tsɛɛ lejɛ ɔ Golgota nɛ e sisi ji “Yikoklodonya” a, 34a ngɔ wai nɛ a kɛ duɔ futu mi ha lɛ ke e nu; se benɛ e tso hyɛ ɔ, e sume kaa e nuu.
35Nɛ benɛ a sɛu lɛ ɔ, a fɔ sɔ kɛ dla e tade ɔmɛ. 36Nɛ a hi si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ a bu e he. 37Nɛ a ngma sane nɛ a kɛ fɔ e nɔ ɔ ngɔ mɛtɛ e yi je ke: “Yesu Yudafo ɔmɛ a matsɛ ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ!” 38Lɛ be ɔ mi ɔ, a sɛu ojo fiali enyɔ ngɔ piɛ e he; nɔ kake ngɛ e hiɛ ɔ nɔ, nɛ nɔ kake hu ngɛ e muɔ nɔ? 39Nihi nɛ bee ɔ tu musu bɔmi munyuhi ngɔ si lɛ, nɛ a hwanya a yi, 40nɛ a ke: “Mo nɛ o kuɔ sɔlemi we ɔ nɛ o kpaleɔ fia ligbi etɛ ɔ, he mo nitsɛ o yi wami! Ke Mawu bi ji mo ɔ, jee seumi tso ɔ nɔ kple si koo!” 41Ja nɔuu osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ ye e he fɛu de ke: 42“Ni kpahi a yiwami e he, se lɛ nitsɛ e nɔ ɔ e nyɛ we nɛ e he. Ke Israel matsɛ ɔ ji lɛ ɔ, ha nɛ e je sɛumi tso ɔ nɔ heja nɛ ɔ kɛ kple si, nɛ wa ma he lɛ ngɔ ye. 43E ke Mawu nɔ e hɛ ngɛ: Ha nɛ e je lɛ koo, ke e ngɛ e he tsui ɔ; ejakaa e de ke: ‘Mawu bi ji mi.’ ” 44Ja nɔuu awi yeli ɔmɛ nɛ a sɛu ngɔ piɛ e he ɔ hu bɔ lɛ ahlua.
Yesu gbenɔ
(Marko 15.33-41; Luka 23.44-49; Yohane 19.28-30)
45Se kɛ je piani ngmlɛ nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ kɛ ya su ngmlɛ etɛ ɔ, diblii wo ngɛ zugba a tsuo nɔ. 46Se ngmlɛ etɛ mi ɔ, Yesu kpa ngmlaa kɛ gbi wawɛɛ ke: “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” E sisi ji: “Ye Mawu, ye Mawu, mɛni he je o kua mi?” 47Se benɛ nihi nɛ daa si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ a kpɛti ni komɛ nu ɔ, a ke: “Elia nɔ nɛ ɔ ngɛ tsɛe ɔ nɛ.” 48Nɛ amlɔ ɔ a ti nɔ kake sa fo nɛ e ya ngɔ wosuma, nɛ e kɛ sɔ da nɛ kua mi, nɛ e ngɔ ma paplo nya ha lɛ ke e nu. 49Se nihi nɛ piɛ ɔ de lɛ ke: “Mlɛ! Ha waa hyɛ kaa Elia maa ba ba je lɛ lo?” 50Nɛ Yesu kpa ngmlaa ekohu kɛ gbi wawɛɛ, nɛ e ngɔ e nya.
51Nɛ oʼɛ, sɔlemi tsu ɔ mi pomi bo ɔ mi gba enyɔ kɛ je hiɔwe kɛ ba ma si, nɛ zugba mimiɛ, nɛ tɛ sahi a mi gba; 52nɛ yɔkɔhi a nya bli, nɛ klɔuklɔubihi nɛ hwɔ mahɛ ɔmɛ a nɔmlɔ tsohi fuu te si; 53nɛ e sitemi ɔ se ɔ, a je kpo kɛ je a muɔ ɔmɛ a mi, nɛ a ya ma klɔuklɔu ɔ mi ya je a he kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ nihi fuu.
54Se benɛ aslaafohi lafa a nyatsɛ ɔ kɛ nihi nɛ kɛ lɛ ngɛ Yesu he bue ɔ, na zugba mimiɛmi ɔ kɛ nihi nɛ a pee ɔ, a ye gbeye wawɛɛ, nɛ a ke: “Niinɛ, Mawu bi ji nɛ ɔ nɛ!” 55Se yihi fuu ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ daa si ngɛ se lokoo ngɛ hyɛe; mɛ ji ninɛmɛ nɛ nyɛɛ Yesu se kɛ je Galilea nɛ a sɔmɔɔ lɛ ɔ nɛ; 56a kpɛti ni komɛ ji Maria Magdalena, kɛ Maria nɛ ji Yakobo kɛ Yose nyɛ ɔ, kɛ Zebedeo bimɛ ɔmɛ a nyɛ ɔ.
Yesu pumi
(Marko 15.42-47; Luka 23.50-56; Yohane 19.38-42)
57Benɛ su gbɔkuɛ ɔ, niatsɛ ko nɛ je Arimatia nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Yosef ɔ ba, nɛ lɛ hu Yesu kaseli ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake ji lɛ; 58lɛ lɛ e ya Pilato ngɔ ya kpa lɛ pɛɛ konɛ e ngɔ Yesu gbogboe ɔ ngɔ ha lɛ. Kɛkɛ nɛ Pilato fã ke a ngɔ nɔ gbogboe ɔ ngɔ ha lɛ. 59Nɛ Yosef ngɔ nɔ gbogboe ɔ, nɛ e ngɔ kploba falefale ngɔ blaa lɛ, 60nɛ e kɛ lɛ ya fɔ lɛ nitse e yɔkɔ he nɛ e ha a kpɛ ngɛ tɛsa mi ɔ mi, nɛ e kpɛne tɛ kpetekpleenyɛ kɛ tsi yɔkɔ ɔ nya, nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho. 61Se Maria Magdalena kɛ Maria kpã ko ɔ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, a hii si ngɛ yɔkɔ ɔ he.
Yesu yɔkɔ ɔ he bumi
62Se hedlami-kɛ-tomi ligbi ɔ nɔ je na a, osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a nya ba bua ngɛ Pilato ngɔ, 63a ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, wa kai kaa benɛ sisilɔ nɛ ɔ hɛ ngɛ ɔ, e ke: ‘Ligbi nɛ ji ligbi etɛ ɔ e ma te si ekohu.’ 64Lɔ ɔ he ɔ fã nɛ a ya bu yɔkɔ ɔ he saminya kɛ maa su ligbi nɛ ji ligbi etɛ ɔ, konɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ko ba ju lɛ kɛ ho, nɛ a ya de ma a ke: ‘E te si kɛ je gbeje;’ nɛ sekpɛ sisimi ɔ ba pee yayami pe kekle nɔ ɔ.” 65Pilato de mɛ ke: “Oʼɛ, aslaafohi, nyɛɛ ya nɛ nyɛ ya bu bɔ nɛ nyɛ ma nyɛ.” 66Kɛkɛ nɛ a pue nɔ kɛ ho, nɛ a ya sɔu yɔkɔ ɔ nya, nɛ a ha aslaafo ɔmɛ bu he.

Title: MATEO 28
Content:
Yesu sitemi
(Marko 16.1-10; Luka 24.1-12; Yohane 20.1-10)
1Hejɔɔmi ligbi ɔ nyagbe, benɛ je bɔni nami kɛ ma otsi ɔ kekleekle ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, Maria Magdalena kɛ Maria kpa ko ɔ ba yɔkɔ ɔ slaami. 2Nɛ oʼɛ, zugba mimiɛ wawɛɛ, ejakaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bɔfo je hiɔwe kple si, nɛ e ba kpɛne tɛ ɔ kɛ je muɔ ɔ nya kɛ ya se, nɛ e ho hi nɔ. 3Nɛ e hɛ mi kpɛ kaa slaba la, nɛ e tade ɔ hu hiɛ futafuta kaa snoo. 4Gbeye nɛ nu buli ɔmɛ he je ɔ, a he do blibliibli nɛ a plɛ kaa ni gbogboehi.
5Se bɔfo ɔ de yi ɔmɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ ko ye gbeye, ejakaa i le kaa nyɛ ngɛ Yesu nɔ nɛ a sɛu ɔ hlae; 6e be hiɛ ɔ, ejakaa e te si, kaa bɔ nɛ e de ɔ. Nyɛɛ ba nɛ nyɛ ba hyɛ he nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ fɔ si ngɛ ɔ. 7Nɛ nyɛɛ ya esɔ esɔ nɛ nyɛ ya de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke e te si kɛ je gbeje; nɛ oʼɛ, e ngɛ nyɛ hlami sɛe kɛ yaa Galilea; lejɛ ɔ nyɛ maa na lɛ ngɛ; oʼɛ; i de nyɛ.” 8Nɛ a pue nɔ kɛ je nɔpu he ɔ esɔ esɔ kɛ gbeye kɛ nyami babauu, nɛ a hɛɛ fo konɛ a ya sɛɛ ha e kaseli ɔmɛ.
9Nɛ benɛ yi ɔmɛ yaa nɛ a ya sɛɛ ha e kaseli ɔmɛ ɔ, oʼɛ, Yesu kɛ mɛ ba kpe nɛ e ke: “I ngaa nyɛ!” Nɛ a ba nu e nane, nɛ a kpla si nɛ a ja lɛ. 10Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ko ye gbeye; nyɛɛ ya nɛ nyɛ ya de ye nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ konɛ a ya Galilea; se lejɛ ɔ a maa na mi ngɛ.”
Nikɔtɔma amɛ ha buli ɔmɛ nyɔ mi mi
11Se benɛ a yaa a, oʼɛ, buli ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ ba ma a mi, nɛ a ba sɛɛ nihi nɛ a pee ɔ tsuo kulaa ngɔ tsɔɔ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ. 12Nɛ benɛ a kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ bɔ gua nɛ a ya da a, a ha aslaafo ɔmɛ sika fuu, 13a ke: “Nyɛ de ke nyɔ mi, benɛ wa hwɔ mahɛ ɔ, lɛ be ɔ mi e kaseli ɔmɛ ba nɛ a ba ju lɛ kɛ ho. 14Nɛ ke amlaalo ɔ nu he ɔ, wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa maa mlɔɔ e hɛ mi, konɛ nyɛ ko na sane.” 15Kɛkɛ nɛ aslaafo ɔmɛ he sika a, nɛ a pee bɔ nɛ a tsɔɔ mɛ ɔ. Nɛ kikɛmɛ a sane nɛ ɔ gbɛ fia ngɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a kpɛti kɛ ba si mwɔnɛ ɔ.
Yesu je e he kpo tsɔɔ e kaseli ɔmɛ
(Marko 16.14-18; Luka 24.36-49; Yohane 20.19-23; Bɔfo 1.6-8)
16Kɛkɛ nɛ e kaseli nyɔngma kɛ kake ɔ pue nɔ kɛ ho Galilea yoku ɔ nɔ ya he nɛ Yesu tsɔɔ mɛ ɔ. 17Benɛ a na lɛ ɔ a kpla si nɛ a ja lɛ; se ni komɛ je nɔ́. 18Nɛ Yesu ba nɛ e kɛ mɛ ba tu munyu ke: “A ngɔ he blɔ tsuo ngɔ ha mi ngɛ hiɔwe kɛ zugba a nɔ. 19Lɔ ɔ he ɔ rnyɛɛ ya nɛ nyɛ ya pee majemaje tsuo ye kaseli, nyɛɛ baptisi mɛ ngɔ wo Tsɛ ɔ kɛ Bi ɔ kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ biɛ mi, 20nɛ nyɛɛ tsɔɔ mɛ nɛ a ye nihi tsuo kulaa nɛ i de nyɛ ɔ nɔ. Nɛ oʼɛ, i kɛ nyɛ ngɛ daa kɛ yaa su je mi nyagbe.”

Title: MARKO 1
Content:
Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ fiɛmi
(Mateo 3.1-12; Luka 3.1-18; Yohane 1.19-28)
1Yesu Kristo, Mawu bi ɔ, he sane kpakpa a ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: 2Munyu ɔ je sisi kaa bɔ nɛ gbalɔ Yesai a ngma a ke:
“Ye tsɔlɔ ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ; ma tsɔ lɛ kɛ sɛ o hlami nɛ
e ya dla o blɔ ɔ ngɔ to mo.
3Nɔ ko ngɛ ngmlaa kpae boboobo ngɛ nga a nɔ ke:
‘Nyɛ dla Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ blɔ ɔ.
Nyɛ ha e blɔ ɔ nɛ da tlɔmɔɔ.’ ”
4Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yohane ba hia si ngɛ nga a nɔ; e ngɛ baptisie nɛ e ngɛ fiɛe ke: “Nyɛɛ kpale kɛ je nyɛ he yayami ɔmɛ a he nɛ a baptisi nyɛ, nɛ Mawu kɛ nyɛ he yayami ɔmɛ maa pa nyɛ.” 5Nihi tsuo pɛpɛɛpɛ nɛ ngɛ Yudea zugba a nɔ kɛ Yerusalem ma ngua a mi ɔ je kpo kɛ ho ya bu Yohane tue. A jaje a he yayami ɔmɛ nɛ a baptisi mɛ ngɛ Yordan pa a mi. 6Yohane ɔ, afukpɔngɔ he bwɔmi tade e woɔ, nɛ lohwe he womi kpa fi e mlɛ mi, nɛ e yeɔ baalɛ kɛ nga nɔ hwo. 7E fiɛ tsɔɔ ni ɔmɛ ke: “Nɔ nɛ maa ba ngɛ ye se ɔ kle pe mi kulaa; i sɛ́ nɔ nɛ kplaa si pɛneɔ e tokotahi a nya kpa tete. 8Imi lɛɛ nyu i kɛ ngɛ nyɛ baptisie, se lɛɛ, Mumi Klɔuklɔu e kɛ maa baptisi nyɛ.
Yesu baptisimi kɛ e kami
(Mateo 3.13—4.11; Luka 3.21-22; 4.1-13)
9Be bɔɔ ko se ɔ, Yesu je ma nɛ a tsɛɛ Nazaret ngɛ Galilea zugba a nɔ ɔ mi ba nɛ Yohane baptisi lɛ ngɛ Yordan mi.
10Yesu je kpo kɛ je pa a mi nɔuu pɛ, kɛkɛ nɛ e na nɛ hiɔwe nya ngɛ blie, nɛ Mumi ɔ ngɛ si kplee kaa lahuɛ kɛ ma e nɔ. 11Nɛ e nu gbi ko kɛ je hiɔwe de ke: “Mo ji imi nitsɛ ye suɔmi bi. I ngɛ o he suɔmi!”
12Amlɔ nɔuu ɔ, Mumi ɔ kpaka lɛ kɛ ho nga a nɔ ya. 13E ye ligbi nyingmi eywiɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, nɛ Satan ka lɛ. Nga mi lohwehi hu ngɛ lejɛ ɔ; nɛ hiɔwe bɔfohi ba ba sɔmɔ lɛ.
Yesu tsɛ wohɛli eywiɛ
(Mateo 4.12-22; Luka 4.14-15; 5.1-11)
14Bene a nu Yohane wo tsu mi se ɔ, Yesu ba Galilea nɛ e ba fiɛ sane kpakpa a nɛ je Mawu ngɔ ɔ. 15E ke: “Be ɔ su; Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ na nyɛ haa! Nyɛɛ kpale kɛ je nyɛ he yayami ɔmɛ a he nɛ nyɛ he sane kpakpa a ye.”
16Benɛ Yesu bee ngɛ Galilea wo ɔ nya a, e na hɛli enyɔ, Simon kɛ e nyɛmi nyumu Andrea nɛ a ngɛ hɛe ngɛ wo ɔ mi. 17Yesu de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ba nyɛɛ ye se, nɛ nyɛɛ hɛ nimli ha mi kaa a hɛɛ lo.” 18Nɛ amlɔ ɔ, a si a ya amɛ nɛ a ba nyɛɛ e se.
19E ya e hɛ mi bɔɔ nɛ e na nyɛmimɛ kpa enyɔ, Yakobo kɛ e nyɛmi Yohane, Zebedeo bimɛ nyumu ɔmɛ. A ngɛ a lɛ ɔ mi ngɛ a ya amɛ dlae. 20Benɛ Yesu na mɛ ɔ, e tsɛ mɛ; lɔ ɔ he ɔ a si a tsɛ Zebedeo kɛ apaatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ lɛ ɔ mi nɛ a ba nyɛɛ e se.
Nyumu ko nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ e mi
(Luka 4.31-37)
21A ba ma nɛ a tsɛɛ Kapernaum ɔ mi, nɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, Yesu ya kpe he ɔ, nɛ e ya tsɔɔ ni. 22Nihi nɛ bu lɛ tue ɔ nya kpɛ a he ngɛ e ni tsɔɔmi ɔ he. E tsɔɔ mɛ ni kaa nɔ nɛ ngɛ he blɔ se tsa pi kaa mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ. 23Jamɛ a be ɔ mi nɔuu ɔ, nyumu ko nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ e mi ba kpe he ɔ. E kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ ke: 24“Mɛni o ngɛ hlae ngɛ wa dɛ, Yesu Nazareno? O ma wa hɛ mi kpatami lo? I le nɔ nɛ ji mo: Mo ji Tsɔlɔ Klɔuklɔu nɛ je Mawu ngɔ ɔ nɛ!” 25Yesu nga mumi yayami ɔ yi ke: “Ma o nya nɛ o je e mi!” 26Nɛ mumi yayami ɔ huanya lɛ, nɛ e kpa mgnlaa wawɛɛ, nɛ e je e mi? 27Ni ɔmɛ tsuo pɛpɛɛpɛ nɛ ngɛ kpe he ɔ he nya si mɛ nɛ a bɔni a he bimi ke: “Mɛni ji nɛ ɔ? Oʼɛ tsɔɔmi he ko nɛ hewami ngɛ mi! Nɔmlɔ nɛ ɔ ngɛ he blɔ nɛ e kɛ keɔ mumi yayamihi a yi nɛ a buɔ lɛ tue!” 28Enɛ ɔ he ɔ Yesu he sane gbɛ fia Galilea zugba a tsuo nɔ.
Yesu tsa hiɔtsɛmɛ fuu
(Mateo 8.14-17; Luka 4.38-41)
29Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu kɛ Simon kɛ Andrea si kpe he ɔ kɛ ho Simon kɛ Andrea we ɔ mi ya, nɛ Yakobo kɛ Yohane hu piɛ a he. 30Simon nganyɛ fɔɔ si kɛ asla, nɛ Yesu lejɛ ɔ sumi pɛ nɛ a de lɛ. 31E ya e ngɔ, nɛ e nu e nine si kɛ wo e nɔ, kɛkɛ nɛ asla a po ngɛ e nɔ, nɛ e bɔni mɛ sɔmɔmi.
32Gbɔkuɛ benɛ pu nɔ si ɔ, nihi ngɔ hiɔtsɛmɛ kɛ nihi nɛ mumi yayamihi ngɛ a mi tsuo kɛ ba Yesu ngɔ. 33Ma a kulaa ba bua a he nya ngɛ agbo ɔ nya. 34Yesu tsa nihi babauu nɛ hiɔhi slɔɔtohi hɛɛ mɛ ɔ, nɛ e hia mumi yayamihi fuu. E ha we mumi yayami ɔmɛ blɔ nɛ a de nɔ́ ko, ejakaa a le nɔ nɛ ji lɛ.
Yesu fiɛ ngɛ Galilea
(Luka 4.42-44)
35Makɛ mla, benɛ je mi tsɔ we lolo ɔ, Yesu te si nɛ e je kpo kɛ ho nga a nɔ he ko banee ya, nɛ e ya sɔle. 36Se Simon kɛ e huɛmɛ ɔmɛ je kpo bɔni lɛ hlami, 37benɛ a ya na lɛ ɔ, a de lɛ ke: “Ni ɔmɛ tsuo ngɛ mo hlae.” 38Se Yesu he nɔ ke: “Nyɛ ha nɛ waa ya kɔpe kpahi nɛ mimla wɔ nɛ ɔmɛ a mi, kone ma ya fiɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔmɛ hulɔ, ejakaa lɔ ɔ he i ba ngɛ.” 39Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, a ya kpa Galilea tsuo, nɛ e fiɛ ngɛ a kpe he ɔmɛ nɛ e hia mumi yayamihi hulɔ.
Yesu tsa tsitsɛ ko
(Mateo 8.1-4; Luka 5.12-16)
40Tsitsɛ ko ba Yesu ngɔ; e ba kpla si ngɛ e hɛ mi nɛ e kpa lɛ pɛɛ ke: “Ke o suɔ ɔ, o ma nyɛ ma ha ye he nɛ tsɔ.” 41Yesu muklii mi sa lɛ ngɛ e he, nɛ e kpa e nine mi nɛ e ta e he, nɛ e de lɛ ke: “I suɔ. O he nɛ tsɔ!” 42Amlɔ ɔ tsi ɔ ta ngɛ e he, nɛ e he tsɔ. 43Keke nɛ Yesu wo lɛ blɔ oya nɛ e bɔ lɛ kɔkɔ ke: 44“Bu tue, ko de nɔ ko enɛ ɔ; se mohu ngɔɔ o he ya tsɔɔ osɔfo ɔ nɛ e sia mo, nɛ o sa bɔ nɛ Mose to ɔ, konɛ kɔlɔ ɔ nɛ pee odase ha nɔ tsuaa nɔ kaa jeha nɛ ɔ lɛɛ o he tsɔ.” 45Se lɛɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho nɛ e ya bɔni sane ɔ fiɛmi ngɛ he tsuaa he. Enɛ ɔ ha sane ɔ gbɛ fia bɔ nɛ Yesu nyɛ we nɛ e je paa kɛ sɛ ma ko mi hu; se e hi nga a nɔ he komɛ banee, nɛ nihi jee he tsuaa he baa engɔ.

Title: MARKO 2
Content:
Yesu tsa nɔ ko nɛ hule pue si
(Mateo 9.1-8; Luka 5.17-26)
1Be bɔɔ ko se ɔ, Yesu kpale e se kɛ ba Kapernaum, nɛ a nu e he kaa e ngɛ we mi. 2Nihi fuu ba bua a he nya bɔ nɛ a nɛ́ blɔ ngɛ agbo ɔ nya tete. Benɛ Yesu ngɛ fiee kɛ ngɛ ni ɔmɛ tsɔɔe ɔ, 3a kɛ nɔ ko nɛ hule pue si nɛ ni eywiɛ tloo lɛ ba. 4Se asafo ɔ he ɔ, a nɛ blɔ nɛ a kɛ lɛ ba su Yesu ngɔ. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, a ya hia tsu ɔ nɛ e ngɛ mi ɔ yi mi ngɛ he nɛ e ngɛ ɔ tutuutu, nɛ bene a gbu puɔ ɔ, a siu hiɔtsɛ ɔ kɛ sa nɛ e hwuɔɔ si ngɛ nɔ ɔ kɛ gu lejɛ ɔ. 5Yesu na a hemi kɛ yemi ɔ hiemi nɛ e de hiɔtsɛ ɔ ke: “Ye bi, a ngɔ o he yayami ɔmɛ ngɔ ke mo!” 6Se mlaa tsɔɔli komɛ nɛ hii si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ susu ngɛ a tsui mi ke: 7“Mɛni e ngɛ dee nɛ ɔ? E ngɛ musu bɔe. Nɔ ko be nyɛe e kɛ yayami maa ke, kaa ja Mawu kɛkɛ.” 8Amlɔ ɔ Yesu kpa a tsui mi susumi ɔ si, lɔ ɔ he ɔ e bi mɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ nyɛ ngɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ susue ngɛ nyɛ tsui mi? 9Te e mi nɔ́ nɛ demi yee nɛɛ, kaa a ma de nɔ nɛ hule pue si ɔ ke: ‘A ngɔ o he yayami ɔmɛ ngɔ ke mo,’ loo kaa a ma de ke: ‘Tee si, wo o sa a nɛ o nyɛɛ?’ ɔ. 10Ma tsɔɔ nyɛ jeha nɛ ɔ kaa Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ngɛ he blɔ ngɛ zugba a nɔ kaa e kɛ yayamihi kee.” Lɔ ɔ he ɔ e de hiɔtsɛ ɔ ke: 11“I ngɛ mo dee ke: Tee si, wo o sa a nɛ o ya we mi!” 12A ngɛ lɛ hyɛe nɔuu nɛ nyumu ɔ te si, e hlue e sa a, nɛ e je kpo. Mɛ tsuo a nya kpɛ a he, nɛ a je Mawu yi ke: “Wa nɛ́ enɛ ɔ eko gblee!”
Yesu tsɛ Levi
(Mateo 9.9-13; Luka 5.27-32)
13Yesu kpale e se ekohu kɛ ho Galilea Wo ɔ nya ya. Asafo ɔ tsuo ba e ngɔ, nɛ e bɔni mɛ ni tsɔɔmi. 14Nɛ benɛ e bee ɔ, e na onia tsulɔ ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Levi nɛ ji Alfeo bi ɔ nɛ e hii si ngɛ e ni tsumi he ɔ. Yesu de lɛ ke: “Ba nyɛɛ ye se!” Levi te si nɛ e nyɛɛ e se. 15Pee se ɔ, Yesu ngɛ ni yee ngɛ Levi we ɔ mi. Onia tsuli kɛ yayami peeli fuu hu nyɛɛ e se nɛ a piɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ a he kɛ ngɛ ni ɔ yee.
16Mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ ekomɛ nɛ ji Farisifo ɔmɛ na kaa Yesu kɛ kikɛmɛ a nimli nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ ni yee; lɔ ɔ he ɔ, a bi e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ nyɛ nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kɛ onia tsuli kɛ yayami peeli ngɛ ni yee ngɛ nue nɛ ɔ?” 17Yesu nu nɛ e ha mɛ heto ke: “Ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ he wami ɔ tsopatsɛ he hia we mɛ, se ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ gboe ɔ mohu. I bɛ́ dali a tsemi se mohu yayami peeli.”
Hwɔhami he sane
(Mateo 9.14-17; Luka 5.33-39)
18Ligbi ko ɔ, Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ kaseli kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a kaseli ɔmɛ ngɛ hwɔ hae. Ni komɛ ba Yesu ngɔ ba bi lɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ Yohane kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a kaseli ɔmɛ haa hwɔ, se o kaseli ɔmɛ lɛɛ a hɛ́ hwɔ ɔ?” 19Yesu ha mɛ heto ke: “Anɛ nyɛ hyɛɛ blɔ kaa yo kpeemi he biali ɔmɛ, loo ayɛflo he nimli ɔmɛ maa ha hwɔ? Kusiɛ! Be abɔ nɛ ayɛflo huno ɔ kɛ mɛ ngɛ nɛ ɔ, a be hwɔ hae. 20Se be maa ba nɛ a maa ngɔ ayɛflo huno ɔ kɛ maa je a ngɔ; lɛ be ɔ loko a maa ha hwɔ.
21“Nɔ ko ngɔɛ bo nya he kɛ ta we tade momo mi. Ke e pee ja a, bo nya he ɔ ma hia tade momo ɔ, nɛ e ma ha puɔ ɔ ma blii. 22Jeha nɛ ɔ hu, nɔ ko ngɔɛ wai he ngɔ wui lohwe he womi tɔ momohi a mi. Ke e pee ja a, lɛɛ wai he ɔ ma pɛ lohwe he womi tɔ ɔmɛ, nɛ wai ɔ ma pue si, nɛ lohwe he womi tɔ ɔmɛ ma puɛ. Dɛbi! Wai he ɔ, lohwe he womi tɔ hehi a mi a kɛ woɔ!”
Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ he sane
(Mateo 12.1-8; Luka 6.1-5)
23E ba mi kaa Yesu ya gu blɛfo ngmɔ komɛ a mi Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ko nɔ. E kaseli ɔmɛ kɛ lɛ nyɛɛ, nɛ a bɔni blɛfo ɔ kpɔmi. 24Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Farisifo ɔmɛ de Yesu ke: “Hyɛ! Nɔ́ nɛ o kaseli ɔmɛ ngɛ pee ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ nɛ ɔ siɔ wa Mlaa a.” 25Yesu ha heto ke: “Anɛ nyɛ kane we nɔ́ nɛ David pe ligbi ko benɛ hwɔ ye lɛ nɛ e hia nɔ́ ko nɛ e ye ɔ; hwɔ ye lɛ kɛ nihi nɛ e kɛ nyɛɛ ɔ, 26lɔ ɔ he ɔ e sɛ Mawu we ɔ, nɛ e ya ye abolo nɛ a kɛ maa Mawu hɛ mi ɔ. Enɛ ɔ ba mi ngɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma Abiatar yi nɔ. Ngɛ wa Mlaa a nya a, osɔfo ɔmɛ pɛ lɛ a ngɛ he blɔ nɛ a yeɔ abolo nɛ ɔ — se David ye eko nɛ e ha e ni ɔmɛ tete eko nɛ a ye.” 27Nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Nɔmlɔ he nɛ a to Hejoɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɛ, se pi Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ he nɛ a bɔ nɔmlɔ. 28Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ po Nyɔmtsɛ ji Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ nɛ.”

Title: MARKO 3
Content:
Nyumu nɛ nine kake gbo ɔ
(Mateo 12.9-14; Luka 6.6-11)
1Nɛ Yesu ba kpe he ɔ ekohu. Nyumu ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ e nine kake gbo. 2Ni komɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ ngɛ lɛ hwɔe kaa e ma tsa lɛ ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ lo, konɛ a ya po e nya.
3Yesu de nɔ nɛ nine gbo ɔ ke: “Tee si nɛ o ba da kpɛti!” 4Nɛ e bi ni ɔmɛ ke: “Anɛ e da kaa a peɔ kpakpa loo a peɔ yayami ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ, kaa a heɔ nɔmlɔ yi wami, aloo a gbee lɛ?” Se mɛɛ lɛɛ a pɛ̃ a nya mi. 5Yesu kɛ abofu hyɛ a hɛ mi kɛ kpe; se lɛ be ɔ mi nɔuu ɔ, e dɔ lɛ kaa a tsui wa kikɛ; kɛkɛ nɛ e de nyumu ɔ ke: “Kpa o nine ɔ mi!” E kpa mi nɛ a tsa e nine ɔ. 6Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Farisifo ɔmɛ je kpo, nɛ amlɔ ɔ a kɛ Herodebi ɔmɛ ya so e yi nɔ bɔ nɛ a maa pee ha nɛ a kpata e hɛ mi.
Asafo jiji ɔ ngɛ wo ɔ nya
(Mateo 12.15-16; Luka 6.17, 19)
7Yesu kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ sa a he si kɛ ho Galilea Wo ɔ nya ya, nɛ nimli asafo babauu nɛ je Galilea kɛ Yudea 8kɛ Yerusalem kɛ Idumea zugba a nɔ kɛ Yordan se kɛ Tiro kɛ Zidon ni ɔmɛ a mi tsuo nyɛɛ e se. Nimli kpekpemi nɛ ɔ ba Yesu ngɔ ejakaa a nu nihi nɛ e ngɛ pee ɔmɛ a he. 9Nimli ɔmɛ a hiemi he ɔ, Yesu de e kaseli ɔmɛ nɛ a dla lɛ ko ha lɛ, kone asafo ɔ ko fifia lɛ. 10E tsa nihi fuu he je ɔ nihi nɛ hiɔhi hɛɛ mɛ tsuo bu kɛ ba e ngɔ kone a ba ta e he. 11Nɛ be tsuaa be nɛ mumi yayami ɔmɛ maa na lɛ ɔ, a tsɔɔ nɔɔ si ngɛ e hɛ mi nɛ a kpaa ngmlaa ke: “Mo ji Mawu Bi ɔ nɛ!” 12Nɛ Yesu bɔɔ mɛ kɔkɔ ke a ko je lɛ si.
Yesu hla kaseli nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ
(Mateo 10.1-4; Luka 6.12-16)
13Nɛ Yesu ya yoku ɔ nɔ nɛ e tsɛ nihi nɛ lɛ nitsɛ e ngɛ hlae ɔ, nɛ a ba e ngɔ. 14Nɛ e hla a kpɛti ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ kone a kɛ lɛ ba hi si nɛ e tsɔ mɛ fiɛmi 15nɛ a na he wami nɛ a kɛ hia mumi yayamihi. 16Ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ nɛ e hla a ji nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ: Simon, nɔ nɛ e wo lɛ Petro ɔ; 17Yakobo kɛ Yohane, Zebedeo bimɛ nyumu ɔmɛ nɛ e wo mɛ Boanerges (e sisi ji oslaba bimɛ) ɔ; 18Andrea kɛ Filipo kɛ Bartolomeo kɛ Mateo kɛ Toma kɛ Yakobo, Alfeo bi ɔ, kɛ Tadeo kɛ Simon, ma he dɔlɔ ɔ, 19kɛ Yuda Iskariot, nɔ nɛ tsɔɔ e se blɔ ɔ.
Yesu kɛ Beelzebul
(Mateo 12.22-32; Luka 11.14-23; 12.10)
20Jeha nɛ ɔ Yesu ba we mi. Nihi fuu ba bua a he nya ekohu bɔ nɛ lɛ kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ na we a dɛ ha ni yemi po. 21Benɛ e wekuli nu he ɔ, a ho konɛ a ya nu lɛ, ejakaa hihi ngɛ dee ke: “E yi mi ngɛ puɛe!”
22Mlaa tsɔɔli komɛ nɛ je Yerusalem ba a ngɛ dee ke: “Beelzebul (mumi yayami) ngɛ e mi.” Ni kpa komɛ hu ke: “Mumi yayamihi a tsɛ ɔ he wami nya e kɛ hiaa mɛ ɔ nɛ.” 23Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yesu tsɛ ni ɔmɛ kɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ e de mɛ ngɛ abɛhi a mi ke: “Kɛ Satan maa pee kɛ hia Satan kɛɛ? 24Ke ma ko gba wo lɛ nitsɛ e he ɔ, jamɛ a ma a be nyɛe si dami. 25Ke we ko gba wo lɛ nitsɛ e he ɔ, jamɛ a we ɔ be nyɛe si dami. 26Nɛ ke Satan te si wo lɛ nitsɛ e he nɛ e gba e mi ɔ, e be nyɛe si dami, se mohu e nyagbe ji kɔlɔ ɔ nɛ. 27Nɔ ko be nyɛe he walɔ ko we mi maa sɛ nɛ e ya ha e nihi, kaa ja e fi lɛ kekle, lɔ ɔ loko e ma nyɛ e we mi nihi maa ha. 28Nyɛ kadi enɛ ɔ faii kaa: A kɛ nimli a he yayamihi tsuo maa pa mɛ, kɛ musu bɔmi munyuhi kulaa nɛ a maa tu. 29Se nɔ nɛ tuɔ musu bɔmi munyu kɛ siɔ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ, a kɛ be lɛ pae gblegbleegblee kɛ maa ya neneene, ejakaa e pee yayami nɛ a kɛ pɛ́.” 30(Yesu de enɛ ɔ ejakaa ni komɛ ke: “Mumi yayami ngɛ e mi.”)
Yesu nyɛ kɛ e nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ
(Mateo 12.46-50; Luka 8.19-21)
31Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu nyɛ kɛ e nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ nɛ ba a ba da we ɔ se, nɛ a tsɔ kɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ a ba tsɛ lɛ. 32Asafo ɔ hii si ngɛ e he, nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Oʼɛ, o nyɛ kɛ o nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ daa si ngɛ we ɔ se ngɛ mo hlae.”
33Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Mɛnɔ ji ye nyɛ, nɛ mɛnɔmɛ ji ye nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ?” 34E hyɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ hii si ngɛ e he ɔmɛ a hɛ mi kɛ kpe, nɛ e ke: “Ne ye nyɛ kɛ ye nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ! 35Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ peɔ Mawu suɔmi nya ni ɔ, lɛ nɔuu ji ye nyɛmi nyumu kɛ ye nyɛmi yo kɛ ye nyɛ.”

Title: MARKO 4
Content:
Nidulɔ ɔ he abɛ ɔ
(Mateo 13.1-9; Luka 8.4-8)
1Yesu bɔni ni tsɔɔmi ekohu ngɛ Galilea Woɔ nya. Nihi fuu ba bua a he nya ngɛ e ngɔ, lɔ ɔ he ɔ e sɛ lɛ ko mi, nɛ e ya hi si. Lɛ ɔ maa si ngɛ nyu ɔ hɛ, nɛ asafo ɔ tsuo pueɔ si ngɛ wo ɔ nya. 2E tsɔɔ mɛ nihi fuu ngɛ abɛhi a mi, nɛ e de mɛ ngɛ e ni tsɔɔmi ɔ mi ke: 3“Nyɛɛ bu tue! oʼɛ, ni dulɔ ko pue nɔ kɛ ho ni dumi ya. 4Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ e ngɛ wu ɔmɛ fiae ɔ, ekomɛ ya pue blɔ tue, nɛ lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ ba ba kukuɔ. 5Ekomɛ ya pue tɛ sahi a nɔ he nɛ zu fuu be. A puɛ oya, ejakaa zu ɔ mi kuɔ we. 6Se benɛ pu je ɔ, e sa mɛ, nɛ akɛnɛ a sipoku ɔmɛ yɛ́ zu mi fuu tsɔ he je ɔ a ngla. 7Wu ɔmɛ ekomɛ ya pue miohi a kpɛti, nɛ mio ɔmɛ puɛ, nɛ nɛ a ngɛ wae ɔ, a gbe tso ɔmɛ nɛ a wui yibilii. 8Se wu ɔmɛ ekomɛ ya pue zugba kpakpa nɔ, nɛ a puɛ, nɛ a wa, nɛ a wo yiblii: eko nyingmi etɛ, eko nyingmi ekpa, kɛ eko lafa.” 9Nɛ Yesu de ke: “Nɔ nɛ ngɛ tue nɛ e kɛ maa nu ɔ, e nu.”
Nɔ he je nɛ Yesu bu abɛhi
(Mateo 13.10-17; Luka 8.9-10)
10Benɛ piɛ Yesu nɔ kake ɔ, ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ e he ɔ kɛ kaseli nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ bi lɛ abɛ ɔ sisi. 11E de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ lɛɛ a kɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ he laami sane ɔ ha nyɛ kaa nyɛɛ le; se ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ se ɔ, abɛhi a mi a kɛ mɛ maa tu munyu ɔmɛ tsuo ngɛ,
12‘Kone nami ɔ a na lɛɛ, se a ko kɔ se.
Nɛ numi ɔ a nu lɛɛ, se a ko nu sisi;
Ke pi ja a, a maa kpale kɛ ba Mawu ngɔ
Nɛ e kɛ a he yayami ɔmɛ maa pa mɛ.’ ”
Yesu tsɔɔ nidulɔ ɔ he abɛ ɔ sisi
(Mateo 13.18-23; Luka 8.11-15)
13Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu bi mɛ ke: “Anɛ nyɛ nui abɛ nɛ ɔ sisi? Lɛɛ kɛ nyɛ maa pee kɛɛ kɛ nu abɛ ɔmɛ tsuo sisi mɔ? 14Ni dulɔ ɔ duɔ Mawu munyu ɔ. 15Be komɛ ɔ, munyu ɔ ya nɔɔ blɔ tue. Ni nɛ ɔmɛ nuɔ, se amlɔ nɔuu nɛ a nu ɔ, Satan baa ba saa munyu nɛ a du ngɛ a mi ɔ. 16Ni komɛ hu ngɛ kaa wuhi nɛ ya nɔ tɛ sa zugba nɔ ɔ. Amlɔ nɔuu nɛ a nu munyu ɔ, a pɛtɛɛ he kɛ bua jɔmi. 17Se e nui si ngɛ a mi, lɔ ɔ he ɔ a se kɛ we; lɔ ɔ he ɔ ke amanehlu loo yi wami te si ngɛ munyu ɔ he ɔ, amlɔ nɔuu nɛ a ngmɛɛ he. 18Ni kpa komɛ hu ngɛ kaa wuhi nɛ a du ngɛ miohi a kpɛti. Ni nɛ ɔmɛ ji nihi nɛ nuɔ munyu ɔ, 19se je nɛ ɔ mi he nya gbami kɛ ni nami he suɔmi kɛ ni kpahi a he akɔnɔ sɛɛ a mi nɛ a gbee munyu ɔ, nɛ a wui yiblii. 20Se ni kpa komɛ hu ngɛ kaa wuhi nɛ a du ngɛ zu kpakpa mi. A nuɔ munyu ɔ, nɛ a pɛtɛɛ he, nɛ a woɔ yiblii: eko nyingmi etɛ, eko nyingmi ekpa, kɛ eko lafa.”
Kane nɛ a kɛ ma sowe sisi
(Luka 8.16-18)
21Nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Anɛ nɔ ko suɔ kane kɛ maa sowe loo sa tso sisi lo? Anɛ pi kane tso nɔ nɛ a kɛ maa lo? 22Nɔ́ ko be nɛ a kɛ laa nɛ a be lɛ kpo jee, nɛ nɔ́ ko be nɛ a ha nɔ nɛ a be nɔ blie. 23Ke nɔ ko ngɛ tue nɛ e kɛ maa nu ɔ, e nu.”
24Nɛ e kpale de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ susu nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nue nɛ ɔ he saminya! Kalemi nɔ́ nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ kaleɔ ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ Mawu ma kɛ kale ha nyɛ, nɛ a maa piɛ he ha nyɛ. 25Nɔ nɛ ngɛ nɔ́ ko ɔ, a ma ha lɛ eko ngɔ piɛ he; se nɔ nɛ be nɔ́ ko tsɔ ko ɔ, bɔɔ nɛ e ngɛ ɔ tete a ma kpɔ ngɛ e dɛ.” Dumi wuhi nɛ puɛ ɔ 26Yesu ya nɔ nɛ e de ke: “Bɔ nɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ ha ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: E ngɛ kaa nyumu ko nɛ fiaa ni ngɛ zugba nɔ. 27E ya hwɔɔ si nyɔ mi, nɛ e tee si ke je na, nɛ (lɛ be ɔ mi tsuo ɔ), dumi wu ɔmɛ ngɛ puɛe nɛ a ngɛ wae, nɛ e li bɔ nɛ peɔ. 28Zugba a nitsɛ lɛ haa ni ɔmɛ waa nɛ a woɔ yiblii: ba mumu ɔ kekle, kɛkɛ ɔ ngma tso ɔ, nɛ lɔ ɔ se ɔ ngma a nitsɛ ngɛ ngma tso ɔ yi. 29Ke ngma a wa a, nyumu ɔ haa nɛ a kɛ ngma kpami ha a yaa, ejakaa ngma kpami be ɔ su.
Sinapi wu ɔ
(Mateo 13.31-32, 34; Luka 13.18-19)
30Yesu bi mɛ ke: “Mɛni he waa kɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ maa to? Aloo mɛni abɛ wa maa bu kɛ tsɔɔ nya? 31E ngɛ kaa sinapi wu nɛ ji wu nyafii pe zugba nɔ wuhi tsuo. 32Se ke a du ɔ, e puɛɛ nɛ e klee pe pui bahi tsuo. E tsɛ̃ɛ kɔni nguahi nguahi, bɔ nɛ hiɔwe lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ ma nyɛ maa pee a tsuhi ngɛ e hɔ ɔ mi.” 33Yesu gu abɛhi fuu nɛ ngɛ kaa enɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ nɛ e kɛ fiɛ munyu ɔ tsɔɔ ni ɔmɛ, bɔ nɛ a ma nyɛ maa nu sisi. 34E kɛ mɛ tu we munyu ja ngɛ abɛhi a mi; se ke piɛ e kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ pɛ ɔ, e tsɔɔ mɛ abɛ ɔmɛ kulaa sisi.
Yesu nga wo nɔ kɔɔhiɔ yi nɛ e he jɔ
(Mateo 8.23-27; Luka 8.22-25)
35Jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔuu, benɛ su gbɔkuɛ nya si ɔ, Yesu de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Nyɛ ha waa po wo ɔ kɛ ya e se je. 36Lɔ ɔ he ɔ a si asafo ɔ, nɛ kaseli ɔmɛ sɛ lɛ nɛ e ngɛ mi ɔ mi, nɛ a ngɔ lɛ bɔ nɛ e ngɛ ngɛ lɛ ɔ mi ɔ nɔuu kɛ ho, nɛ lɛ kpa komɛ hu piɛ e he; 37se wo nɔ kɔɔhiɔ ngua ko ba fia nɛ oslɔkehi ku wo lɛ ɔ mi, nɛ e ngɛ hyie. 38Nɛ Yesu ngɛ lɛ ɔ se je: e tsɔ sɔne nɛ e hwuɔ mahɛ. Nɛ kaseli ɔmɛ tsɛ̃ɛ lɛ nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, nɛ wa hɛ mi ngɛ kpatae nɛ ɔ, pi o he sane ko lo?” 39Yesu te si nɛ e nga kɔɔhiɔ ɔ yi, nɛ e de wo ɔ ke: “Ma o nya nɛ o pee kɔ dii!” Kɔɔhiɔ ɔ jɔɔ fiami nɛ wo ɔ gbo miaa. 40Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ nyɛ ngɛ gbeye yee kikɛ nɛ ɔ? Kɛ pee kɛɛ loko nyɛ be hemi kɛ yemi nɛ ɔ?” 41A ye gbeye nitsɛ, nɛ a de a he ke: “Mɛnɔ po ji nɛ ɔ, nɛ kɔɔhiɔ kɛ wo tete buɔ lɛ tue nɛ ɔ!

Title: MARKO 5
Content:
Yesu tsa nyumu ko nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ e mi
(Mateo 8.28-34; Luka 8.26-39)
1Kɛkɛ nɛ a ba Galilea Wo ɔ se ngɛ Gerasebi ɔmɛ a zugba a nɔ. 2Si nɛ Yesu kple pɛ kɛkɛ nɛ nyumu ko nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ e mi je yɔkɔ ɔmɛ a mi kɛ lɛ ba kpe. 3Kikɛmɛ a nyumu nɛ ɔ, yɔkɔhi a mi e hii nɛ nɔ ko nyɛ we lɛ kɔsɔkɔsɔ nɛ e wo hu, 4ejakaa a ka lɛ pã, nɛ a wo lɛ kɔsɔkɔsɔhi si abɔ, se be tsuaa be nɛ a maa wo lɛ ɔ, e tsɔɔ kɔsɔkɔsɔ ɔmɛ nɛ e kuɔ pa amɛ nɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko nyɛ we e he jɔɔmi: 5nyɔ kɛ pia tsuo ɔ, yɔkɔ ɔmɛ kɛ yoku ɔmɛ a mi e hii, nɛ e kpaa ngmlaa, nɛ e kɛ tɛ poo e he. 6Se benɛ e na Yesu ngɛ lokoo ɔ, e tu fo kɛ ba e ngɔ, nɛ e ba kpla si ngɛ e hɛ mi, 7nɛ e kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ ke: “Yesu, Mawu nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe lokoo ɔ bi, mɛni o ngɛ hlae ngɛ ye dɛ? I na Mawu kaa ko pii mi!” 8(E de enɛ ɔ) ejakaa Yesu ke: “Jee nɔmlɔ nɛ ɔ mi, mo mumi yayami!” 9Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu bi lɛ ke: “O biɛ nɛɛ?” Nyumu ɔ he nɔ ke: “Ye biɛ ji Asafo, ejakaa wa he hiɛ! 10Nɛ e kpa Yesu pɛɛ hluu ke e ko fie mɛ kɛ je lejɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi. 11Kpotoohi a kuu ngua ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ngɛ ni yee ngɛ yoku ɔ he. 12Nɛ mumi yayami ɔmɛ kpa Yesu pɛɛ ke: “Ha waa ya kpotoo ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɛ wa ya sɛ a mi.” 13Nɛ e ngmɛ mɛ blɔ. Mumi yayami ɔmɛ je nyumu ɔ mi nɛ a ya sɛ kpotoo ɔmɛ a mi. Kuu ngua a tsuo, (maa pee akpe enyɔ) sa fo kɛ kple si kɛ ya pue wo ɔ mi nɛ a gbo. 14Kɛkɛ nɛ kpotoo hyɛli ɔmɛ tu fo nɛ a ya sɛɛ ngɛ ma a mi kɛ ngmɔ ɔmɛ a si. Nɛ ni ɔmɛ je kpo ba hyɛ nɔ́ nɛ ba a. 15A ba Yesu ngɔ nɛ a ba na nyumu nɛ jinɛ mumihi asafo ngɛ e mi ɔ nɛ e hii si nɛ e wo tade nɛ e hɛ mi tsɔ lɛ; nɛ e pee mɛ gbeye. 16Nihi nɛ na a sɛɛ nɔ́ nɛ ba nyumu nɛ mumi yayamihi hi e mi ɔ nɔ ɔ kɛ kpotoo ɔmɛ a he sane ɔ ha mɛ. 17Nɛ a kpa Yesu pɛɛ ke e je a kpo ɔmɛ a nɔ. 18Nɛ benɛ Yesu ngɛ lɛ ɔ mi sɛe ɔ, nyumu nɛ jinɛ mumi yayami hi e mi ɔ kpa lɛ pɛɛ nɛ e ha e kɛ lɛ nɛ hi si. 19Se Yesu kplɛɛ we; mohu e de lɛ ke: “Kpale o se nɛ o ya we mi kɛ o wekuli a ngɔ nɛ o ya sɛɛ ni nguahi nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ pee ha mo ɔ, kɛ mɔbɔ nɛ e na mo ɔ ha mɛ!” 20Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyumu ɔ pue nɔ kɛ ho nɛ e ya bɔni ni nguahi nɛ Yesu pee ha lɛ ɔ fiɛmi ngɛ Deɔapoli (Ma Nyɔngma), nɛ e pee mɛ tsuo nyakpɛ.
Yairo bi yo ɔ kɛ yo nɛ ta Yesu tade he ɔ
(Mateo 9.18-26; Luka 8.40-56)
21Yesu kpale e se kɛ lɛ kɛ ya wo ɔ se, nɛ nihi babauu ba bu e he ngɛ wo ɔ nya. 22Kɛkɛ nɛ kpe he ɔ nikɔtɔma amɛ a ti nɔ kake nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Yairo ɔ ba, nɛ benɛ e na Yesu ɔ, e kpla si ngɛ e nane nya, 23nɛ e fa kue ha lɛ wawɛɛ ke: “Ye biyo wayoo miɔ nɛ e ma gbo, he je ɔ ba nɛ o kɛ o ninehi ba pue e nɔ konɛ e na he wami nɛ e yi nɛ na wa.” 24Nɛ Yesu kɛ lɛ ho. Nihi, fuu kɛ lɛ nyɛɛ nɛ a fifia lɛ.
25Yo ko nɛ muɔ demi hiɔ hɛɛ lɛ jeha nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ji nɛ ɔ, 26nɛ e na nɔ́ nitsɛ ngɛ tsopatsɛmɛ fuu a dɛ mi, nɛ e puɛ e dɛ mi nihi kulaa, se nɔ́ nane mi nɛ hiɔ ɔ ko fani ha lɛ ɔ, e nɔ mohu se e ngɛ puee ɔ, 27benɛ e nu Yesu he ɔ, e ba je e se je ngɛ ni ɔmɛ a kpɛti, nɛ e ta e tade ɔ he; 28ejakaa e ke: “Ke i na e tade ɔ he ta kɛkɛ ɔ, ye he maa wa mi.” 29E ta e tade ɔ he, nɛ amlɔ ɔ muɔ demi ɔ se po, nɛ e nu he ngɛ e he womi mi kaa a tsa e hiɔ ɔ. 30Nɛ amlɔ ɔ Yesu nu he ngɛ e mi kaa he wami ko je e mi, nɛ e plɛ e he ngɛ ni ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɛ e bi ke: “Mɛnɔ ta ye tade ɔ he ɔ?” 31E kaseli ɔmɛ ha lɛ heto ke: “O ngɛ hyɛe kaa asafo ɔ ngɛ mo fifiae nɛ o pa ngɛ bie ke: Mɛnɔ ta ye he ɔ?” 32Se Yesu bɔni e he hyemi kone e na nɔ nɛ pee ja a. 33Se akɛnɛ yo ɔ le nɔ́ nɛ a pee ha lɛ he je ɔ, e kɛ gbeye yemi kɛ he domi ba nɔ si ngɛ e hɛ mi, nɛ e de lɛ anɔkuale ɔ tsuo. 34Yesu de lɛ ke: “Biyo, o hemi kɛ yemi tsa mo; yaa ngɛ he jɔmi mi, nɛ o hiɔ ɔ nɛ jɔ.
35Benɛ Yesu ngɛ nɔ ngɛ munyu ɔ tue ɔ, Yairo we mi bi ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ ba ba de lɛ ke: “O biyo ɔ gbo; mɛni he je o pa ngɛ tsɔɔlɔ ɔ nya dooe?” 36Se benɛ Yesu nu munyu nɛ a tu ɔ, e de Yairo ke: “Koo ye gbeye; he ye kɛkɛ!” 37Nɛ e ha we nɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko nɛ nyɛɛ e se, ja Petro kɛ Yakobo kɛ Yohane, Yakobo nyɛmi ɔ kɛkɛ. 38A ba Yairo we ɔ mi nɛ Yesu ba na hoo peemi kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ ya foe nɛ ngɛ kɔmɔ yee fuu ɔ. 39Nɛ benɛ e sɛ we ɔ mi ɔ, e de mɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ nyɛ ngɛ hoo pee nɛ nyɛ ngɛ ya foe kikɛ nɛ ɔ? Jokuɛ ɔ gbo we, mahɛ kɛkɛ e ngɛ hwɔe!” 40Nɛ a muɔ lɛ. Se lɛɛ e fie ni ɔmɛ tsuo kɛ je kpo, nɛ e ngɔ jokuɛ ɔ tsɛ kɛ e nyɛ kɛ nihi nɛ piɛ e he ɔ kɛ ho he nɛ jokuɛ ɔ hwɔɔ si ngɛ ɔ ya. 41E nu e nine si nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Talita kuum!” E sisi ji; “Jokuɛyo, i ngɛ mo dee ke: Tee si!” 42Nɛ amlɔ ɔ, jokuɛ ɔ te si nɛ e bɔni si slami; (e ye jeha nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ.) Nɛ ni ɔmɛ a nya kpɛ a he nitsɛnitsɛ. 43Se Yesu wo mɛ si veveeve ke a ko ha nɔ ko nɛ le enɔ; nɛ e fã ke a ha jokuɛ ɔ nɔ ko nɛ e ye.

Title: MARKO 6
Content:
A kua Yesu ngɛ Nazaret
(Mateo 13.53-58; Luka 4.16-30)
1Yesu si lejɛ ɔ kɛ ho e ma a mi ya, nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ nyɛɛ e se. 2Nɛ benɛ e su Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ, e bɔni ni tsɔɔmi ngɛ kpe he ɔ; nɛ nihi fuu nɛ nu ɔ he nya si mɛ nɛ a bi ke: “Jije nɔ nɛ ɔ ya na ni nɛ ɔmɛ kɛ je? Mɛni ni lemi a kɛ ha lɛ, nɛ mɛni blɔ nɔ e guu kɛ tsuɔ kikɛmɛ a nyakpɛ ni tsumi nɛ ɔmɛ? 3Anɛ pi kapitɛ ɔ ji nɛ ɔ, Maria bi ɔ, kɛ Yakobo kɛ Yose kɛ Yuda kɛ Simonmɛ a nyɛmi nyumu ɔ, nɛ pi e nyemimɛ yihi hu nɛ kɛ wɔ ngɛ hiɛ ɔ?” Nɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ a kua lɛ. 4Nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “A buu gbalɔ ngɛ he tsuaa he, ja e ma mi kɛ e wekuli a kpɛti kɛ e we mi kɛkɛ.” 5Nɛ e nyɛ we he wami ni tsumi ko nɛ e tsu ngɛ Nazaret, pe kaa e kɛ e ninehi pue hiɔtsɛmɛ bɔɔ ko nɔ nɛ e tsa mɛ. 6E hɛ mi pee lɛ yaa ngɛ hemi nɛ a he we yi ɔ he.
Yesu tsɔ kaseli nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ
(Mateo 10.5-15; Luka 9.1-6)
7Nɛ e ya kpa kɔpehi nɛ bɔle lejɛ ɔmɛ a mi nɛ e tsɔɔ ni. E tsɛ e kaseli nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ kɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ e bɔni mɛ tsɔmi enyɔenyɔ, nɛ e ha mɛ he wami ngɛ mumi yayamihi a nɔ. 8Nɛ e wo mɛ mlaa ke a ko hɛɛ̃ nɔ́ ko ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ, kaa ja tso kɛkɛ; a ko hɛɛ abolo loo kotoku loo sika ngɛ a mlɛ mi fimi nihi a mi— 9se a wo tokota, nɛ a ko wo hiɔwe tade enyɔ. 10E kpale de mɛ ke: “He tsuaa he nɛ nyɛ ma ya sɛ we ko mi ngɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ hi lejɛ ɔ kɛ yaa su nyɛ maa je. 11He tsuaa he nɛ ni ɔmɛ he we nyɛ nɛ a bu we nyɛ tue ngɛ ɔ, ke nyɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ jee ɔ, nyɛ blɛ nyɛ nane si zu ngɔ pue si kaa okadi ngɔ ha mɛ.” 12Nɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ a pue nɔ kɛ ho, nɛ a ya fiɛ tsɔɔ ni ɔmɛ ke a kpale kɛ je a he yayami ɔmɛ a he. 13Nɛ a hia mumi yayamihi fuu nɛ a pɔ hiɔtsɛmɛ fuu nu nɛ a tsa mɛ.
Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ gbenɔ
(Mateo 14.1-12; Luka 9.7-9)
14Nɛ matsɛ Herode nu he, ejakaa Yesu biɛ jije. Ni komɛ ke: “Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ lɛ te si kɛ je gbeje, lɔ ɔ he nɛ he wami nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ ni tsue ngɛ e mi ɔ nɛ.” 15Ni komɛ hu ke: “Elia ʼi; nɛ ni kpa komɛ hu ke: “Gbalɔ ʼi, kaa gbali ɔmɛ eko.”
16Benɛ Herode nu ɔ, e ke: “Yohane nɛ i po e yi ɔ, lɛ nɛ e te si kɛ je gbeje nɛ ɔ nɛ!” 17Ejakaa lɛ Herode ɔ nɔuu lɛ e tsɔ nɛ a ya nu Yohane nɛ e fi lɛ nɛ e kɛ lɛ wo tsu mi. Herode pee enɛ ɔ ngɛ Herodia, e nyɛmi Filipo yo ɔ he; ejakaa e ngɔ lɛ ngɔ pee e yo. 18Ejakaa Yohane pɔɔ lɛ demi ke: “E dɛ blɔ kaa o ngɔɔ o nyɛmi ɔ yo ɔ ngɔ peɔ o yo.” 19Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Herodia ngɔ lɛ ninyɛ nɛ e ngɛ lɛ hlae nɛ e gbe, se e nyɛ we; 20ejakaa Herode ngɛ Yohane gbeye yee akɛnɛ e le kaa dalɔ kɛ nɔ klɔuklɔu ji lɛ ɔ, nɛ e ngɔ lɛ ngɔ to sɔkee. E suɔ kaa e bu lɛ tue, se be tsuaa be nɛ e maa bu lɛ tue ɔ, e haoɔ lɛ.
21Ligbi nɛ sa a ba su, benɛ Herode ngɛ e fɔmi ligbi kaie nɛ e ngmɛ okplɔɔ ha e ganɔ ɔmɛ kɛ asafoatsɛme ɔmɛ kɛ Galilea nikɔtɔma amɛ ɔ, 22Herodia biyo ba ba do, nɛ e muɔ Herode kɛ nihi nɛ kɛ lɛ hii si ngɛ okplɔɔ ɔ he ɔ a hɛ. Matsɛ ɔ de jokuɛ yo ɔ ke: “Bi mi nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ o suɔ nɛ ma ha mo!” 23Nɛ e ka lɛ kita ke: “Nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɔ́ o ma bi mi ɔ ma ha mo, ke ye matsɛ yemi ɔ fa tete po.” 24Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jokuɛ yo ɔ je kpo nɛ e ya bi e nyɛ ke: “Mɛni ma bi?” Nɛ e ke: “Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ yi.” 25Nɛ amlɔ ɔ e ba matsɛ ɔ ngɔ oya nɛ e ba de lɛ ke: “I ngɛ hlae nɛ o ngɔ Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ yi ngɔ ha mi amlɔ nɛ ɔ nɔuu ngɛ ka mi.” 26E dɔ matsɛ ɔ wawɛɛ nitsɛ; se e kita a kɛ nihi nɛ kɛ lɛ hii si ngɛ niyeni ɔ si ɔ he ɔ, e sume kaa e ma kua. 27Nɛ amlɔ ɔ matsɛ ɔ tsɔ klawi yelɔ nɛ e fa lɛ ke e kɛ Yohane yi nɛ ba. 28Nɛ e ho nɛ e ya po Yohane yi ngɛ tsu ɔ mi nɛ e kɛ fɔ kã mi kɛ ba ha jokuɛ yo ɔ, nɛ lɛ hu e kɛ ya ha e nyɛ. 29Nɛ benɛ Yohane kaseli ɔmɛ nu he ɔ, a ba nɛ a ba wo e gbogboe ɔ, nɛ a ya pu.
Yesu ha nimli akpe enuɔ niyeni
(Mateo 14.13-21; Luka 9.10-17; Yohane 6.1-14)
30Kaseli ɔmɛ bua a he nya kɛ ba Yesu ngɔ, nɛ a ba bɔ lɛ nihi nɛ a ya pee kɛ nihi nɛ a ya tsɔɔ ɔ tsuo kulaa. 31Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ sɔuu nyɛɛ ba nɛ waa ho nga a nɔ he ko banee ya nɛ nyɛ ya jɔɔ nyɛ he bɔɔ.” Ejakaa nimli nɛ ngɛ bae ngɛ yae ɔ hiɛ tsɔ, nɛ a na we deka kɛ ye ni tete. 32Nɛ a gu lɛ mi kɛ ho nga a nɔ he ko banee ya. 33Nɛ nihi fuu na mɛ nɛ a yaa, nɛ a yo mɛ; nɛ a je ma amɛ kulaa mi tu fo kɛ gu nane kɛ ho lejɛ ɔ ya, nɛ a be a nya. 34Benɛ Yesu kple ɔ, e na asafo gidiglɛmɛ, nɛ e mi mi sa lɛ ngɛ a he, ejakaa a ngɛ kaa tohi nɛ be hyɛlɔ; nɛ e bɔni mɛ nihi fuu tsɔɔmi. 35Benɛ je bɔni jɔmi ɔ, e kaseli ɔmɛ ba e ngɔ ba de lɛ ke: “Nga nɔ ji hiɛ ɔ, nɛ je hu ngɛ jɔe; 36wo ni ɔmɛ blɔ nɛ a ya ngmɔ ɔmɛ a si kɛ kɔpe ɔmɛ nɛ pueɔ si ngɛ wa he ɔmɛ a mi nɛ a ya he nɔ́ ko nɛ a ye.” 37Se e he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ ha mɛ nɔ́ ko nɛ a ye.” A bi lɛ ke: “Anɛ waa ya nɛ wa ya he abolo cedi lafa enyɔ nya ha mɛ nɛ a ye lo?” 38Nɛ e bi mɛ ke: “Abolo nyɛmɛ nyɛ ngɛ? Nyɛɛ ya nɛ nyɛ ya hyɛ.” Benɛ a ya hyɛ ɔ, a ke: “Bɔbɔɛ enuɔ kɛ lo enyɔ.”
39Nɛ Yesu fa mɛ ke a ha ni ɔmɛ tsuo nɛ a hi si kuuhi kuuhi ngɛ nga mumu ɔ nɔ. 40Nɛ a hi si kuuhi kuuhi, lafa lafa, kɛ nyingmi enuɔenuɔ. 41Nɛ Yesu kukuɔ abolo enuɔ ɔ kɛ lo enyɔ ɔ nɛ se hyɛ hiɔwe nɛ e gbaa nɔ. E kuɔ abolo ɔmɛ a mi nɛ e kɛ ha e kaseli ɔmɛ konɛ a kɛ ma ni ɔmɛ a hɛ mi. E dla lo enyɔ ɔ hulɔ ha mɛ tsuo. 42Nɛ mɛ tsuo pɛpɛɛpɛ a ye nɛ a tɔ. 43Nɛ a kukuɔ abolo bibli ɔmɛ kɛ lo bibli ɔmɛ ngɔ wo kusii nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ mi tɔtɔɔtɔ. 44Nɛ nyumuhi nɛ ye ni ɔ a nya ji akpe enuɔ.
Yesu nyɛɛ nyu hɛ mi
(Mateo 14.22-33; Yohane 6.15-21)
45Nɛ amlɔ ɔ Yesu tsɛ̃ e kaseli ɔmɛ a kuɛ se, nɛ a sɛ lɛ mi konɛ a sɛ e hlami kɛ ya wo ɔ se nɛ a ya Betsaida, kɛ maa su benɛ e maa wo asafo ɔ blɔ. 46Nɛ benɛ e wo mɛ blɔ se ɔ, e pue nɔ kɛ ho yoku ɔ nɔ ya konɛ e ya sɔle. 47Benɛ je jɔ ɔ, lɛ ɔ su wo ɔ kpɛti, nɛ Yesu nɔ kake ngɛ kpo. 48E na kaa hluimi ɔ ngɛ kaseli ɔmɛ pɔtɔ woe, ejakaa a ngɛ kɔɔhiɔ kpee; nɛ makɛ mla, maa pee ngmlɛ etɛ loo nɔ́ mi ɔ, e nyɛɛ nyu ɔ hɛ mi kɛ ma a ngɔ, nɛ e ngɛ hlae nɛ e be a he. 49Benɛ a na lɛ nɛ e nyɛɛ nyu ɔ hɛ mi ɔ, a susu kaa kpade, nɛ a kpa ngmlaa, 50ejakaa mɛ tsuo a na lɛ nɛ a tsui po. Nɛ amlɔ ɔ, e kɛ mɛ tu munyu nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ tsui nɛ nɔ nyɛ mi ami ʼi; nyɛ ko ye gbeye!” 51Nɛ e ba a ngɔ ngɛ lɛ ɔ mi, nɛ kɔɔhiɔ ɔ jɔɔ fiami. Nɛ a nya kpɛ a he nitsɛnitsɛ, nɛ a hɛ mi pee mɛ yaa. 52A kɔ we nɔ́ nɛ abolo sane ɔ tsɔɔ ɔ se, ejakaa a juɛmi sui he.
Yesu tsa hiɔtsɛmɛ ngɛ Genezaret
(Mateo 14.34-36)
53Nɛ benɛ a po wo ɔ, a ba kple ngɛ Genezaret zugba a nɔ, nɛ a muɔ lɛ ɔ si. 54Nɛ benɛ a je lɛ ɔ mi ɔ, amlɔ ɔ ni ɔmɛ yo Yesu, 55nɛ a tu fo kɛ ya kpa lejɛ ɔ kpo ɔmɛ tsuo a nɔ, nɛ a bɔni hiɔtsɛmɛ womi ngɛ sahi a nɔ kɛ e ngɔ bami ngɛ he tsuaa he nɛ a nu kaa e ngɛ ɔ. 56Nɛ he tsuaa he nɛ Yesu ya ngɛ kpe hehi loo mahi loo ngmɔ ɔmɛ a si ɔ, a kɛ hiɔtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ba pueɔ blohu ɔmɛ a mi, nɛ a kpaa lɛ pɛɛ konɛ e ha a na e tade ɔ nya kɛkɛ he nɛ a ta. Nɛ nihi abɔ nɛ ta he ɔ he wa mɛ.

Title: MARKO 7
Content:
Blematsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a tsɔɔmihi
(Mateo 15.1-9)
1Farisifo ɔmɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ nɛ je Yerusalem ba a bua a he nya kɛ ba Yesu ngɔ. 2A na kaa e kaseli ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ yeɔ ni kɛ he blemi dɛ nɛ ji dɛ nɛ a fɔ we.
3Ejakaa Farisifo ɔmɛ kɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ tsuo ɔ, ja a kɛ nyu fɔ a dɛ saminya loko a yeɔ ni; (a peɔ enɛ ɔ) kɛ yeɔ nikɔtɔma amɛ a blema tsɔɔmi ɔmɛ a nɔ. 4Nɛ ke a je jua nɔ kɛ ba a, ja a du loko a yeɔ ni. Nɛ ni kpahi fuu hu ngɛ nɛ a to ha mɛ nɛ a peɔ ngɛ kplu kɛ buɛhi kɛ ayawahi a he fɔmi he.
5Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Farisifo ɔmɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ bi Yesu ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ o kaseli ɔmɛ yi nikɔtɔma amɛ a blema tsɔɔmi ɔmɛ anɔ nɛ a kɛ dɛ nɛ a fɔ we yeɔ ni ɔ?” 6Se e he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Niinɛ Yesaia gba ngɛ nyɛ osatotsɛmɛ nɛ ɔmɛ a he, kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a ke:
‘Ma nɛ ɔ, a nya a kɛ puaa mi, se a tsui tsɛ e he
kɛ je ye he kɛ ho lokoo ya.
7Se yaka gu a jaa mi ɔ nɛ, ejakaa a tsɔɔ tsɔɔmihi
nɛ ji nimli a kitahi.’ ”
8“Mawu kita a lɛɛ nyɛ je he, nɛ nimli a blema tsɔɔmi ɔmɛ a nɔ nyɛ yeɔ.”
9Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ pee saminya kaa nyɛ kua Mawu kita a konɛ nyɛɛ ye nyɛ blema tsɔɔmi ɔ nɔ. 10Ejakaa Mose de ke: ‘Buu o tsɛ kɛ o nyɛ;’ kɛ: ‘Nɔ nɛ gbiɛɛ e tsɛ loo e nyɛ ɔ, a maa gbe lɛ!’ 11Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ ke: ‘Ke nɔ ko de e tsɛ loo e nyɛ ke: Nɔ́ nɛ jinɛ o ko na kɛ je ye dɛ mi ɔ, Korban’ (nɔ́ nɛ a kɛ ke Mawu) ɔ, 12lɛɛ nyɛ ha we nɛ e pee nɔ ko ha e tsɛ loo e nyɛ kulaa hu; 13nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛ blema tsɔɔmi ɔmɛ nɛ nyɛ tsɔɔ ɔ gu Mawu munyu ɔ. Nɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ kaa enɛ ɔmɛ fuu nyɛ peɔ.”
Nihi nɛ bleɔ nɔmlɔ
(Mateo 15.10-20)
14Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu tsɛ asafo ɔ tsuo kɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ tsuo nyɛɛ bu mi tue konɛ nyɛɛ nu sisi! 15Nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko be nɛ jee kpo nɔ blɔ sɛɛ nɔmlɔ mi nɛ ma nyɛ lɛ ma yble, se nɔ́ nɛ bleɔ nɔmlɔ ji nɔ́ nɛ jee e mi. [ 16Ke nɔ ko ngɛ tue nɛ e kɛ maa nu ɔ, e nu.]
17Nɛ benɛ e je asafo ɔ ngɔ kɛ ba we mi ɔ, ekaseli ɔmɛ bi lɛ abɛ ɔ sisi. 18E de mɛ ke: “Anɛ kikɛ nɛ ɔ nyɛ hu nyɛ nui nihi a sisi? Nyɛ nɛ kaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ jee kpo nɔ blɔ sɛɛ nɔmlɔ mi ɔ nyɛ we lɛ blemi, 19ejakaa tsa pi e tsui mi nɛ e sɛɛ, se mohu e muklii mi e yaa, nɛ e ya jee kpo ngɛ agbotso mi.” (Yesu de enɛ ɔ kɛ tsɔɔ kaa) ngma tsuaa ngma he tsɔ. 20Nɛ e ya nɔ nɛ e de ke: “Nɔ́ nɛ jee nɔmlɔ mi ɔ, lɔ ɔ nɔuu lɛ bleɔ lɛ. 21Ejakaa mi mi je nɛ ji nimli a tsui mi ɔ, lejɛ ɔ juɛmi yayahi jee: gba puɛmi, ajuama bɔmi, nɔ gbemi, 22jumi, hɛ kɔmi, je mi yaya bami, sisimi, ya homi, ninye, musu bɔmi, he womi, kuasiahi a sane yemi — 23ni yaya nɛ ɔmɛ kulaa a, mi mi je a jee nɛ a kɛ bleɔ nɔmlɔ.”
Yo ko hemi kɛ yemi
(Mateo 15.21-28)
24Nɛ Yesu si lejɛ ɔ nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho Tiro kɛ Zidon ni ɔmɛ a mi ya. E ya sɛ we ko mi, nɛ e sume kaa a le, se e nyɛ we e he nɛ e laa. 25E lejɛ ɔ sumi nɔuu kɛkɛ nɛ yo ko nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ e biyo wayoo ko mi ɔ nu e he nɛ e ba kpla si ngɛ e nane nya. 26Se yo ɔ, maje yo ji lɛ, nɛ he nɛ e je ji Foinike ngɛ Siria. E ba kpa Yesu pɛɛ nɛ e hia mumi yayami ɔ kɛ je e biyo ɔ mi. 27Se Yesu de lɛ ke: “Ha bimɛ ɔmɛ nɛ a tɔ lolo. E dɛ kaa a ngɔɔ bimɛ ɔmɛ abolo ɔ sakee pueɔ si ha gbe bimɛ.” 28Se yo ɔ he nɔ nɛ e ke: “Mawetsɛ e ngɛ mi ja mohu, se tse gbe bi ɔmɛ nɛ ngɛ okplɔɔ ɔ sisi ɔ hu yeɔ bimɛ ɔmɛ a bibli ɔ eko!” 29Yesu de lɛ ke: “O munyu nɛ ɔ he je ɔ, yaa! Mumi yayami ɔ je e mi.”
30Yo ɔ pue nɔ kɛ ho e we mi ya, nɛ e ya na e biyo ɔ nɛ fɔɔ si ngɛ sa nɔ nɛ mumi yayami ɔ je e mi.
Yesu tsa amuɛti tuekpokulɔ ko
31Yesu kpale e se ekohu kɛ je Tiro kpo ɔmɛ a mi kɛ po mi ngɛ Zidon, nɛ e gu Dekapoli kpo ɔmɛ a mi kɛ ba Galilea Wo ɔ nya. 32Nɛ ni komɛ kɛ tuekpokulɔ ko nɛ amuɛti hu ji lɛ ba e ngɔ, nɛ a kpa lɛ pɛɛ konɛ e ngɔ e ninehi ngɔ fɔ e nɔ. 33Nɛ Yesu kɛ lɛ je asafo ɔ kpɛti kɛ ya se, nɛ e kɛ e nine nguɛhi wo e tue puɔ ɔmɛ a mi, nɛ e la lada kɛ sa nyumu ɔ lilɛ he. 34Nɛ e hyɛ hiɔwe, nɛ e ye kɔmɔ ngɛ e mumi mi, nɛ e de amuɛti tuekpokulɔ ɔ ke: “Hefata!” e sisi ji: “Bli!” 35Nɛ amlɔ ɔ, e tue ɔmɛ bli, nɛ e lilɛ kpa amɛ pɛne, nɛ e nyɛ munyu tu pɛpɛɛpɛ. 36Nɛ Yesu wo mɛ si veveeve ke a ko de nɔ ko; se si abɔ nɛ e ngɛ mɛ si woe ɔ, si abɔ nɛ a ngɛ jajee ji kɔlɔ ɔ nɛ. 37Nɛ a nya kpɛ a he nitsɛ nitsɛ nɛ a de ke: “E pee nihi kulaa saminya! E ha tuekpokuli nuɔ nɔ, nɛ amuɛtihi hu tuɔ munyu.”

Title: MARKO 8
Content:
Yesu ha nimli akpe eywiɛ niyeni
(Mateo 15.32-39)
1Jamɛ a be ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, nihi fuu ba bua a he nya ekohu, nɛ benɛ a nɛ nɔ́ ko nɛ a ye ɔ, Yesu tsɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ kɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: 2“Ye muklii mi ngɛ mi sae ngɛ asafo ɔ he, ejakaa a kɛ mi hi si ligbi etɛ sɔuu nɛ a nɛ nɔ́ ko nɛ a ye. 3Ke i ha a kɛ a mi mi hwɔ je hiɛ ɔ kɛ yaa a wehi a mi ɔ, klibi ma ya po mɛ ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ, ejakaa a ti ni komɛ a je hehi kɛ.” 4E kaseli ɔmɛ he nɔ ke: “Jije nɔ ko ma nyɛ ma na abolo ngɛ, ngɛ nga nɛ ɔ nɔ nɛ maa su nimli nɛ ɔmɛ a nya?” 5“E bi mɛ ke: “Abolo nyɛmɛ nyɛ ngɛ?” Nɛ a ke: “Kpaago.”
6Nɛ e fa asafo ɔ ke a hi si ngɛ zugba mi. Kɛkɛ nɛ e kukuɔ abolo kpaago ɔ nɛ e na Mawu si, nɛ e kuɔ mi ngɔ ha e kaseli ɔmɛ konɛ a gba ha asafo ɔ; nɛ a gba ha mɛ. 7A ngɛ lo tsɔwi bɔɔ komɛ hulɔ, nɛ e gbaa nɔ, nɛ e fa ke a gba kɔlɔ ɔ hu ha mɛ. 8Nɛ a ye nɛ a tɔ, nɛ a muɔ bibli nɛ piɛ ɔ kusii kpaago tɔtɔɔtɔ. 9Se nihi nɛ ye ɔ maa pee akpe eywiɛ. Nɛ Yesu wo mɛ blɔ. 10Nɛ amlɔ ɔ, e kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ sɛ lɛ mi, nɛ a ba Dalmanuta ni ɔmɛ a mi.
Farisifo ɔmɛ bi Yesu okadi ko
(Mateo 16.1-4)
11Kɛkɛ nɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ ba nɛ a kɛ lɛ ba bɔni nya sami. A ngɛ hlae nɛ a ka lɛ, lɔɔ he ɔ a bi lɛ hiɔwe okadi ko. 12Yesu la zanue ngɛ e mumi mi nɛ e ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ kikɛmɛ a yi nɔ bi nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ okadi hlae? Niinɛ i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Ke a ma ha yi nɔ bi nɛ ɔmɛ okadi ko fii!” 13Nɛ e si mɛ nɛ e ya sɛ lɛ mi ekohu nɛ e ho wo ɔ se ya.
Farisifo ɔmɛ a ma sasɛ kɛ Herode ma sasɛ ɔ
(Mateo 16.5-12)
14Kaseli ɔmɛ a hɛ je nɔ nɛ a maa hɛɛ abolo kɛ ma a dɛ; a hɛɛ we eko ngɛ lɛ ɔ mi, kaa ja kake kɛkɛ. 15Yesu bɔ mɛ kɔkɔ ke: “Nyɛɛ hyɛ saminya, Tiɛ nyɛ hɛ nɛ hi nyɛ he nɔ ngɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a ma sasɛ kɛ Herode ma sasɛ ɔ he!” 16Nɛ a hla mi ngɛ a kpɛti ke: “Be nɛ ɔ abolo nɛ wa hɛɛ we ɔ he je.” 17Nɛ benɛ Yesu na le ɔ, e bi mɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ nyɛ ngɛ susue kaa abolo nɛ nyɛ hɛɛ we ɔ he je? Anɛ nyɛ kɔ we se, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu nyɛ nɛ́ nihi a nya kɛ mwɔɔ? Anɛ kikɛ nyɛ juɛmi gbo? 18Nyɛ ngɛ hɛngmɛ, anɛ nyɛ hyɛ we nɔ, nyɛ ngɛ tue hulɔ, anɛ nyɛ nui nɔ, nɛ nyɛ kai we nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko lo? 19Benɛ i kuɔ abolo enuɔ ɔ mi ha nimli akpe enuɔ ɔ, bibli kusii nyɛmɛ nyɛ kukuɔ?” A ke: “Nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ.” 20“Nɛ be nɛ i kuɔ kpaago ɔ mi ha nimli akpeywiɛ ɔ hu ɔ nɛɛ, bibli kusii nyɛmɛ nyɛ kukuɔ?” A ke: “Kpaago.” 21Nɛ e bi mɛ ke: “Kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ nyɛ nɛ nihi a nya kɛ mwɔɔ nɛ ɔ.”
Yesu tsa hɛyuyuilɔ ko ngɛ Betsaida
