22A ba Betsaida, nɛ ni komɛ kɛ hɛyuyuilɔ ko ba e ngɔ nɛ a kpa lɛ pɛɛ konɛ e ta e he. 23Yesu nu hɛyuyuilɔ ɔ nine si nɛ e kɛ lɛ je kɔpe ɔ mi, nɛ e la lada pue e hɛngmɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ, nɛ e ngɔ e ninehi ngɔ pue e nɔ nɛ e bi lɛ ke: “O ngɛ nɔ hyɛe lo?” 24Nyumu ɔ wo e hɛ nɔ nɛ e ke: “I ngɛ nimli hyɛe, se a ngɛ kaa tsohi nɛ ngɛ nyɛɛe.” 25Lɔ ɔ se ɔ, e kpale ngɔ e ninehi ngɔ pue hɛyuyuilɔ ɔ hɛngmɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ ekohu; jeha nɛ ɔ hɛyuyuilɔ ɔ hyɛ nɔ paa, nɛ a tsa lɛ, nɛ e na nɔ tsuaa nɔ faii. 26Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu je lɛ blɔ nɛ e ho e we mi ya, nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Koo ya kɔpe ɔ mi.”
Petro odase nɛ e ye ngɛ Yesu he
(Mateo 16.13-20; Luka 9.18-21)
27Nɛ Yesu kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ pue nɔ kɛ ho mahi nɛ ngɛ Kaisaria Filipi ɔ mi ya. E bi mɛ ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ ke: “Mɛnɔ nihi deɔ ke i ji?” 28A ha lɛ heto ke: “Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ; nɛ ni komɛ deɔ ke: Elia; nɛ ni kpa komɛ hu deɔ ke: Gbali ɔmɛ a ti nɔ ko ji mo.” 29Nɛ e bi mɛ ke: “Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ, mɛnɔ nyɛ deɔ ke i ji?” Petro he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Mo ji Kristo ɔ nɛ!” 30Yesu wo mɛ si veveeve ke a ko sɛɛ e he sane ha nɔ ko.
Yesu tu e manehlu kɛ e gbenɔ he munyu
(Mateo 16.21-23; Luka 9.22)
31Nɛ e bɔni mɛ tsɔɔmi ke: “Ja Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ na amanehlu babauu nɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ kua lɛ, nɛ a gbe lɛ, nɛ ligbi etɛ se ɔ nɛ e te si ekohu.” 32E tu munyu nɛ ɔ faii. Enɔ ha Petro kɛ lɛ ya se nɛ e bɔni lɛ kɔkɔ bɔmi. 33Se benɛ Yesu plɛ e he nɛ e na e kaseli ɔmɛ ɔ, e ka Petro hɛ mi ke: “Jee ye nɔ, Satan, ejakaa o susuu we Mawu nihi a he, se nimli a nihi a he mohu o susuu!”
Hekuami
(Mateo 16.24-28; Luka 9.23-27)
34Nɛ benɛ Yesu tsɛ asafo ɔ kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ hu kɛ ba e ngɔ ɔ, e de mɛ ke: “Ke nɔ ko suɔ kaa e nyɛɛ ye se ɔ, e kua e he nɛ e wo e seumi tso ɔ nɛ e nyɛɛ ye se. 35Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ suɔ kaa e baa e klaa yi ɔ, e maa laa lɛ; se nɔ nɛ laa e kla ngɛ imi kɛ sane kpakpa a he ɔ, e ma he e klaa yi wami. 36Mɛni se nɔmlɔ naa, ke e nine su je ɔ kulaa nɔ nɛ e hɛ mi kpata a? 37Nɔ́ ko be nɛ nɔmlɔ ma ha kɛ kpɔ e wami. 38Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ imi kɛ ye munyu ɔmɛ a he peɔ lɛ zo ngɛ yi nɔ bi gba puɛli kɛ yayami peeli nɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ, lɛ hu e he maa pee Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ zo be mi nɛ e maa ba ngɛ e tsɛ nyami ɔ mi kɛ bɔfo klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ ɔ.

Title: MARKO 9
Content:
1Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Niinɛ i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Ni komɛ ngɛ nihi nɛ daa si ngɛ hiɛ ɔ nɛ ɔ a kpɛti nɛ a be gboe kɛ yaa su be nɛ a maa na Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ kaa e ba ngɛ he wami mi.”
Yesu nɔmlɔ tso su tsake
(Mateo 17.1-13; Luka 9.28-36)
2Ligbi ekpa se ɔ, Yesu ngɔ Petro kɛ Yakobo kɛ Yohane pɛ, nɛ e kɛ mɛ ya yoku nɛ ya hiɔwe ko nɔ. Nɛ benɛ a ngɛ hyɛe ɔ, e nɔmlɔ tso su tsake ngɛ a hɛ mi. 3Nɛ e tade ɔmɛ kpɛ nɛ a hiɛ futafuta bɔ nɛ nihi a he fɔlɔ ko be zugba nɛ ɔ nɔ nɛ ma nyɛ ma ha a hiɛ ja. 4Nɛ Elia kɛ Mose je a he kpo tsɔɔ mɛ nɛ a kɛ Yesu ngɛ munyu tue. 5Nɛ Petro de Yesu ke: “Rabi (Tsɔɔlɔ), e hi kaa waa hi hiɛ ɔ, nɛ nyɛ ha waa ma bo tsuhi etɛ, o nɔ kake, kɛ Mose nɔ kake, kɛ Elia nɔ kake.” 6Se e li nɔ nɛ e ngɛ dee ɔ, ejakaa a he mi po. 7Nɛ bɔku ko ba ha a nɔ, nɛ gbi ko je bɔku ɔ mi de ke: “Nɔ nɛ ɔ ji ye suɔmi bi ɔ nɛ, nyɛɛ bu lɛ tue!” 8Nɛ amlɔ ɔ, benɛ a hyɛ a he kɛ kpe ɔ, a nɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko hu ja Yesu kɛ mɛ kɛkɛ.
9Nɛ benɛ a ngɛ yoku ɔ kplee ɔ, Yesu wo mɛ si veveeve ke: “Nyɛ ko sɛɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ na a ngɔ ha nɔ ko, ja Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ te si kɛ je gbeje lolo.” 10A ngɔ munyu nɛ ɔmɛ ngɔ to a yi mi, nɛ a bi a he ke: “Kɛ ji si temi kɛ gbeje jemi nɛ ɔ sisi kɛɛ?” 11Nɛ a bi Yesu ke: “Kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ deɔ ke ja Elia ba lolo ɔ?” 12E ha mɛ heto ke: “Elia maa ba lolo niinɛ nɛ e ba to nihi kulaa blɔ nɔ ekohu. Se kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ a ngma ngɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ he ke e maa na amanehlu babauu, nɛ a maa ngɔ lɛ kaa ma gɔlɔ ɔ? 13Se yi ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Elia ba momo nɛ a pee lɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ a suɔ kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma ngɛ e he ɔ.”
Yesu tsa jokuɛ nyumu ko nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ e mi
(Mateo 17.14-21; Luka 9.37-43)
14Benɛ a ba su e kaseli ɔmɛ a ngɔ ɔ, a na nihi fuu nɛ bu a he kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ nɛ a ngɛ a he ni bie, 15Amlɔ nɛ asafo ɔ tsuo na Yesu ɔ, e pee mɛ nyakpɛ, nɛ a sa fo kɛ ba e ngɔ ba fɔ lɛ. 16Nɛ e bi e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Mɛni nyɛ ngɛ mɛ bie ɔ?” 17Nɛ ni ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake he nɔ nɛ e de ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, i kɛ ye binyumu nɛ mumi nɛ tu we munyu ngɛ e mi ba o ngɔ. 18He tsuaa he nɛ e maa nu lɛ ngɛ ɔ, e tsɛɛ lɛ fiaa si nɛ e nya fiaa hwɔli, nɛ e kpeɔ e lungu nya, nɛ e fiaa. I de o kaseli ɔmɛ nɛ a hia lɛ ɔ, a nyɛ we.” 19Yesu ha mɛ heto ke: “Oo yi nɔ bi nɛ he we yi! Mɛni be i kɛ nyɛ maa hi si kɛ ya su? Mɛni be ma to ye tsui si ha nyɛ kɛ ya su? Nyɛɛ ngɔ jokuɛ nyumu ɔ kɛ ba ye ngɔ.” 20Nɛ a kɛ lɛ ba e ngɔ. Nɛ benɛ mumi ɔ na Yesu ɔ, amlɔ ɔ e ha jokuɛ ɔ hua gɛgɛnii, nɛ e nɔ si, nɛ e longo si, nɛ e nya fia hwɔli. 21Yesu bi e tsɛ ɔ ke: “Mɛni be enɛ ɔ bɔni lɛ peemi?” Nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Kɛ je e jokuɛ mi lokoo. 22Bɔɔ kɛ bɔɔ e sakee lɛ fɔɔ la mi kɛ nyu mi konɛ e tane e yi. Se ke o ma nyɛ he nɔ́ ko pee ɔ, o muklii mi nɛ sa mo ngɛ wa he, nɛ o pee he nɔ́ ko ha wɔ.” 23Yesu de lɛ ke: “O ngɛ dee ke: ‘Ke o ma nyɛ!’ A ma nyɛ maa pee nihi tsuo ha nɔ nɛ heɔ yeɔ ɔ! 24Nɛ amlɔ ɔ jokuɛ ɔ tsɛ ɔ ke kɛ e hɛ mi vo nyu, nɛ e de ke: “I heɔ yeɔ; piɛ ye hemi kɛ yemi nɛ pi ɔ he!”
25Se benɛ Yesu na kaa asafo ɔ wo fo kɛ ma e ngɔ ɔ, e ke mumi ɔ yi nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Mo amuɛti kɛ tuekpoku mumi, i ngɛ mo fae ke: Jee e mi nɛ o ko sɛ e mi hu!” 26Nɛ mumi ɔ kpa ngmlaa nɛ e ha jokuɛ ɔ hua gɛgɛnii, nɛ e je e mi; nɛ jokuɛ ɔ plɛ kaa nɔ gbogboe bɔ nɛ nihi fuu de ke e gbo. 27Se Yesu nu e nine si, nɛ e wo e nɔ, nɛ e te si da si.
28Nɛ benɛ Yesu ba we mi ɔ, e kaseli ɔmɛ bi lɛ ngɛ se ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ wɔɔ lɛɛ wa nyɛ we mumi ɔ nɛ waa hia a?” 29Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Kikɛmɛ a henɔ nɛ ɔ ɔ, a nyɛ we lɛ hiami ngɛ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko nya, kaa ja ngɛ sɔlemi nya kɛkɛ.
Yesu tu e gbenɔ he munyu ekohu
(Mateo 17.22-23; Luka 9.43-45)
30A je lejɛ ɔ nɛ a ya gu Galilea, nɛ e sume kaa nɔ ko leɔ, 31ejakaa e ngɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ni tsɔɔe. E de mɛ ke: “A maa ngɔ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ngɔ wo nimli a dɛ mi, nɛ a maa gbe lɛ, nɛ ke a gbe lɛ ɔ, e maa te si ngɛ ligbi nɛ ji ligbi etɛ ɔ nɔ.” 32Se a nɛ́ jamɛ a munyu ɔ nya, nɛ a ngɛ gbeye yee kaa a ma bi lɛ.
Mɛnɔ ji nɔmlɔ ngua pe nɔ tsuaa nɔ?
(Mateo 18.1-5; Luka 9.46-48)
33Nɛ a ba Kapernaum. Nɛ benɛ e ngɛ we mi ɔ, e bi e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Mɛni he munyu nyɛ ngɛ tue ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ ɔ?” 34Se a pɛ́ a nya mi, ejakaa benɛ a ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ ɔ, a sa nya ngɛ a kpɛti ke mɛnɔ ji nɔmlɔ ngua pe kulaa. 35Yesu be hi si nɛ e tsɛ ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Ke nɔ ko ngɛ hlae nɛ e pee kekle nɔ ɔ, e pee e he nihi kulaa a se kpɛlɔ kɛ nihi kulaa a tsɔlɔ.” 36Nɛ e ngɔ jokuɛ wayoo ko nɛ e kɛ lɛ ba da a kpɛti, nɛ e fua lɛ atuu, nɛ e de mɛ ke: 37“Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ heɔ jokuɛwi nɛ ngɛ kaa ni nɛ ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake ngɛ ye biɛ mi ɔ, e heɔ mi; nɛ nɔ nɛ heɔ mi ɔ, tsa pi imi nɛ e ngɛ hee, se mohu nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ.”
Nɔ nɛ ti si wui wɔ ɔ, e piɛ wa he
(Luka 9.49-50)
38Yohane de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, wa na nɔ ko nɛ e kɛ o biɛ ngɛ mumi yayami hiae nɛ wa tsi lɛ blɔ, ejakaa e piɛ we wa he kɛ nyɛɛ o se.” 39Se Yesu ke: “Nyɛ ko tsi lɛ blɔ, ejakaa znɔ ko be nɛ e kɛ ye biɛ ma tsu he wami ni tsumi ko nɛ e ma nyɛ ye he munyu yaya maa tu oya. 40Ejakaa nɔ nɛ ti si wui wɔ ɔ, e piɛ wa he. 41Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ma ha nyɛ nyu kplu kake maa nu ngɛ ye biɛ mi kaa Kristo nihi ɔ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke e hiɔwo be lɛ fɔe.”
Nanekpatami he kɔkɔbɔmi
(Mateo 18.6-9; Luka 17.1-2)
42Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ma kpata nihi tsɔwi nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ heɔ ye nɔ yeɔ ɔ a ti nɔ kake nane ɔ, afani na a kɛ teji wɛ muɔ e kuɛ nɛ a ya sake lɛ fɔ wo mi. 43Ke o nine ngɛ o nane kpatae ɔ, poo; afani nɛ o kɛ nine kake sɛ wami mi pe nɛ o kɛ nine enyɔ maa sɛ gehena (abosiami a je) ngɛ la nɛ gbo we ɔ mi, [ 44he nɛ ‘a gɔgɔ ɔmɛ gbo we, nɛ a la a hu gbo we ngɛ’ ɔ.] 45Nɛ ke o nane ngɛ o nane kpatae ɔ, poo; afani nɛ o kɛ nane kake sɛ wami mi pe nɛ o hɛɛ nane enyɔ nɛ a ma sake mo ngɔ fɔ gehena mi, ngɛ la nɛ gbo we ɔ mi [ 46he nɛ ‘a gɔgɔ ɔmɛ gbo we, nɛ a la a hu gbo we ngɛ’ ɔ.] 47Nɛ ke o hɛngmɛ ngɛ o nane kpatae ɔ, hia nɛ o sake ngɔ fɔ he; afani nɛ o kɛ hɛngmɛ kake sɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi pe nɛ o hɛɛ hɛngmɛ enyɔ nɛ a ma sake mo ngɔ fɔ gehena la a mi, 48he nɛ ‘a gɔgɔ ɔmɛ gbo we nɛ a la a hu gbo we ngɛ’ ɔ.
49Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ ɔ, a kɛ la maa wo lɛ ngo. 50Ngo ngɔɔ; se ke ngo ngɔmi ta a, mɛni nyɛɛ kɛ maa wo lɛ ngo ekohu? Nyɛ ha ngo nɛ hi nyɛ mi nɛ nyɛɛ hi si ngɛ he jɔmi mi.”

Title: MARKO 10
Content:
Gbamipomi he nitsɔɔmi
(Mateo 19.1-12; Luka 16.18)
1Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu si lejɛ ɔ nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho Yudea ni ɔmɛ a mi kɛ Yordan se blɔ ya. Nihi fuu ba ba bua a he nya ekohu ngɛ e he, nɛ e tsɔɔ mɛ ni ekohu kaa bɔ nɛ e pɔɔ peemi ɔ.
2Nɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ ekomɛ ba e ngɔ, nɛ a da lɛ nɛ a bi lɛ ke: “Anɛ wa Mlaa a ngmɛɛ blɔ kaa nyumu fieɔ e yo lo?” 3Se e he nɔ nɛ e bi mɛ ke: “Mɛni kita Mose wo nyɛ ɔ?” 4A ke: “Mose ha he blɔ kaa a ngma hemi womi nɛ a fie lɛ.” 5Yesu de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ tsui wami he je nɛ Mose ngma kita nɛ ɔ ha nyɛ ɔ nɛ; 6se kɛ je je mi bɔmi sisije ɔ, nyumu kɛ yo Mawu bɔ. 7Enɛ ɔ he je ɔ, nyumu ma si e tsɛ kɛ e nyɛ, nɛ e maa pɛtɛ e yo he, nɛ mɛ ni enyɔ ɔ tsuo a maa pee he lo kake; 8lɛɛ jeha nɛ ɔ ɔ, a pi ni enyɔ hu, se he lo kake. 9Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ́ nɛ Mawu ngɔ tsa a, a ko ha nɔmlɔ nɛ gba mi.”
10Nɛ benɛ a su we ɔ mi ɔ, e kaseli ɔmɛ bi lɛ jamɛ a sane ɔ nɔuu ekohu. 11Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ fieɔ e yo nɛ e ya ngɔɔ nɔ kpa a, e puɛ gba. 12Nɛ ke yo kua e huno nɛ e ya gba nɔ kpa a, e puɛ gba.”
Yesu gbaa jokuɛwi
(Mateo 19.13-15; Luka 18.15-17)
13Nɛ ni komɛ ngɔ jokuɛ tsɔwi kɛ ba Yesu ngɔ konɛ e ta a he; se kaseli ɔmɛ wo a hɛ la. 14Se benɛ Yesu na a, e tsui fia, nɛ e de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Nyɛ ha jokuɛ ɔmɛ nɛ a ba ye ngɔ, nɛ nyɛ ko tsi mɛ blɔ, ejakaa nihi nɛ ngɛ kaa ni nɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ ji Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ nɛ. 15Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ he we Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ kaa jokuɛ nyafii ɔ, e be mi sɛe kulaa.” 16Nɛ e fua mɛ atuu, nɛ e ngɔ e ninehi ngɔ pue a nɔ, nɛ e gbaa mɛ.
Nyumu niatsɛ ɔ
(Mateo 19.16-30; Luka 18.18-30)
17Nɛ benɛ e je kpo kɛ ma blɔ ɔ nɔ ɔ, nɔ ko sa fo kɛ ba na lɛ nɛ e ba kpla si ngɛ e hɛ mi, nɛ e bi lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ kpakpa, mɛni ma pee nɛ ma na neneene wami?” 18Nɛ Yesu bi lɛ ke: “Mɛni he je o ngɛ mi tsɛe ke nɔ kpakpa? Nɔ kpakpa ko be kaa ja Mawu nɔ kake. 19Tse o le kita amɛ: ‘Koo gbe nɔmlɔ, ko puɛ gba, koo ju, koo ye lakpa odase, koo sisi nɔ, buu o tsɛ kɛ o nyɛ!’ ” 20Se nyumu ɔ he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, i ye enɛ ɔmɛ tsuo a nɔ kɛ je ye jokuɛwi a si.” 21Nɛ Yesu hyɛ lɛ nɛ e tsui nu lɛ, nɛ e de lɛ ke: “E piɛ mo nɔ́ kake. Yaa nɛ o ya jua niki tsuo nɛ o ngɛ ɔ nɛ o kɛ ha ohiafohi, nɛ o ma na juetli ngɛ hiɔwe; nɛ o ba nɛ o ba nyɛɛ ye se.” 22Se nyumu ɔ hɛ mi tsake ngɛ munyu ɔ he, nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho kɛ dɔmi, ejakaa e ngɛ nihi fuu.
23Yesu hyɛ e he kɛ kpe, nɛ e de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Nyɛ na bɔ nɛ e wa ha niatsɛmɛ kaa a maa sɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi!” 24Kaseli ɔmɛ a he mi po ngɛ e munyu ɔmɛ a he. Se Yesu tsa nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Bimɛ, tse nyɛ na bɔ nɛ e wa ha nihi nɛ ngɔɔ a hɛ ngɔ fɔɔ a nihi a nɔ ɔ kaa a maa sɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi! 25E wɛ́ hi afukpɔngɔ kaa e maa gu abui hɛngmɛ mi kaa bɔ nɛ e waa haa niatsɛ kaa e maa sɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi ɔ.” 26A he mi po saminya, nɛ a bi a he ke: “Lɛɛ mɛnɔ yi wami a ma nyɛ ma he mɔ?” 27Nɛ Yesu hyɛ mɛ nɛ e ke: “Nimli a blɔfami ɔ a be nyɛe maa pee, se pi ngɛ Mawu blɔfami; ejakaa Mawu blɔfami ɔ lɛɛ a nyɛɔ nihi kulaa peɔ.”
28Kɛkɛ nɛ Petro je nya ke: “Hyɛ, wɔɔ lɛɛ wa si nihi tsuo kulaa nɛ wa ba nyɛɛ o se.” 29Yesu ke: “Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nɔ ko be nɛ e si we loo nyɛmimɛ nyumuhi loo nyɛmimɛ yihi loo tsɛ loo nyɛ loo yo loo bimɛ loo zugbahi ngɛ imi kɛ sane kpakpa a he, 30nɛ e be wehi kɛ nyɛmimɛ nyumuhi kɛ nyɛmimɛ yihi kɛ nyɛmɛ kɛ bimɛ kɛ zugbahi kɛ yi wami hu totoe lafa nae ngɛ be nɛ ɔ mi lokoo kɛ neneene wami hulɔ ngɛ je nɛ maa ba a mi. 31Se kekletsɛmɛ fuu maa pee se kpɛli, nɛ se kpɛli maa pee kekletsɛmɛ.”
Yesu tu e gbenɔ he munyu nɔ́ nɛ ji si etɛ
(Mateo 20.17-19; Luka 18.31-34)
32Jeha nɛ ɔ a ngɛ blɔ nɔ kɛ yaa Yerusalem, nɛ Yesu nyɛɛ a hɛ mi; kaseli ɔmɛ a he nua si mɛ, nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ nyɛɛ se ɔ ngɛ gbeye yee. Nɛ e ngɔ ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ ekohu kɛ ya se nɛ e bɔni mɛ nɔ́ nɛ maa ba e nɔ ɔ demi ke: 33“Oʼɛ, wa yaa Yerusalem, nɛ a maa ngɔ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ngɔ wo osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ a dɛ mi, nɛ a maa bu lɛ gbenɔ fɔ, nɛ a maa ngɔ lɛ ngɔ ha majeli ɔmɛ; 34ni nɛ ɔmɛ maa ye e he fɛu, nɛ a maa la lada ngɔ pue e nɔ, nɛ a maa fia lɛ kplibi, nɛ a maa gbe lɛ; nɛ ligbi etɛ se ɔ, e maa te si ekohu.”
Yakobo kɛ Yohane nibimi ɔ
(Mateo 20.20-28)
35Nɛ Yakobo kɛ Yohane, Zebedeo bimɛ ɔmɛ, ba Yesu ngɔ ba de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, wa maa suɔ nɛ o pee nɔ́ ko ha wɔ.” 36Nɛ e bi mɛ ke: “Mɛni nyɛ suɔ kaa ma pee ha nyɛ?” 37a de lɛ ke: “Ha wɔ he blɔ konɛ wa ti nɔ kake nɛ hi o hiɛ ɔ nɔ, nɛ nɔ kake hu nɛ hi o muɔ nɔ ngɛ o nyami ɔ mi.” 38Yesu de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ li nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ bie ɔ; anɛ nyɛ ma nyɛ ɛye kplu ɔ nɛ ma nu ɛ maa nu, aloo nyɛ ma nyɛ nɛ a baptisi nyɛ kɛ baptisimi nɛ a kɛ maa baptisi mi ɔ lo?”
39Nɛ a ke: “Wa ma nyɛ.” Se Yesu de mɛ ke: “Kplu ɔ nɛ ma nu ɔ nyɛ ma nyɛ maa nu, nɛ baptisimi nɛ a kɛ maa baptisi mi ɔ a kɛ maa baptisi nyɛ lɛɛ, 40se ye hiɛ ɔ nɔ kɛ ye muɔ nɔ himi ɔ, pi ye nɔ nɛ i kɛ haa, se mohu nihi nɛ a dla to ha amɛ a nɔ ʼi.”
41Benɛ ni nyɔngma a nu ɔ, a muklii mi fu Yakobo kɛ Yohane. 42Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yesu tsɛ mɛ kɛ ba e ngɔ, nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ le kaa nihi nɛ a buu mɛ ma amɛ a nɔ yeli ɔ yeɔ a nɔ kaa nyɔmtsɛmɛ, nɛ a kpɛti nimli ngua amɛ ngɛ a nɔ he wami. 43Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ blɔ be jã; se mohu nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ hlaa nɛ e pee nɔmlɔ ngua ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti ɔ e pee e he nyɛ sɔmɔlɔ; 44nɛ nɔ nɛ hlaa nɛ e pee nɔkɔtɔma ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti ɔ, e pee e he ni ɔmɛ a tsɔlɔ. 45Ejakaa Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ hu bɛ́ nɛ a sɔmɔ lɛ, se mohu e ba sɔmɔ konɛ e ngɔ e klaa ngɔ ha kaa kpɔmi nɔ ngɛ nihi fuu a he.”
Yesu tsa Bartimeo hɛyuyuilɔ ɔ
(Mateo 20.29-34; Luka 18.35-43)
46Nɛ a ba Yeriko, nɛ benɛ Yesu kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ kɛ asafo gidiglɛmɛ je lejɛ ɔ kɛ yaa a, Bartimeo, hɛyuyuilɔ ɔ nɛ ji Timeo bi ɔ, hii si ngɛ gbɛjegbɛ ɔ tue ngɛ nɔ bae. 47Nɛ benɛ e nu kaa Yesu Nazareno ɔ ʼi ɔ, e bɔni ngmlaa kpami ke: “Yesu David, bi naa mi mɔbɔ!” 48Nihi fuu ke e yi ke e pee kɔ. Se e kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ mohu pe kekle ɔ ke: “David bi, naa mi mɔbɔ!” 49Yesu da si, nɛ e ke: “Nye tsɛ lɛ kɛ ba!” Nɛ a tsɛ hɛyuyuilɔ ɔ, nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Na tsui, tee si, e ngɛ mo tsɛe!” 50Nɛ e sake e tade nɔha a ngɔ fɔ he, nɛ e te si pam, nɛ e ba Yesu ngɔ. 51Yesu bi lɛ ke: “Mɛni o ngɛ hlae kaa ma pee ha mo?” Nɛ hɛyuyuilɔ ɔ de lɛ ke: “Rabuni, (Nyɔmtsɛ) i ngɛ hlae nɛ ma hyɛ nɔ ekohu.” 52Nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Yaa, o hemi kɛ yemi tsa mo!” Nɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔuu ɔ, e hyɛ nɔ ekohu, nɛ e nyɛɛ Yesu se ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ.

Title: MARKO 11
Content:
Yesu Yerusalem sɛmi
(Mateo 21.1-11; Luka 19.28-40; Yohane 12.12-19)
1Benɛ a ngɛ Yerusalem sue nɛ a su Betfage kɛ Betania ngɛ Nuyoku ɔ he ɔ, Yesu tsɔ e kaseli ɔmɛ a ti ni enyɔ, 2nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ya kɔpe nɛ ngɛ nyɛ hɛ mi haa nɛ ɔ mi. Nyɛ lejɛ ɔ sumi pɛ, nyɛ maa na teji bi nɛ a muɔ lɛ si nɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko hi e nɔ hyɛ; nyɛɛ pɛne lɛ kɛ ba. 3Nɛ ke nɔ ko bi nyɛ ke: ‘Mɛni he je nyɛ ngɛ enɛ ɔ pee’ ɔ, nyɛ de lɛ ke: ‘E he ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hiae, se e be kɛe nɛ a maa kpale lɛ kɛ ba ekohu.’ ” 4Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, a ya nɛ a ya na teji bi ɔ nɛ a muɔ lɛ si ngɛ agbo ɔ nya ngɛ blohu ɔ mi, nɛ benɛ a ngɛ lɛ pɛnee ɔ, 5nihi nɛ daa si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ a ti ni komɛ bi mɛ ke: ‘Mɛni nyɛ ngɛ teji bi ɔ pɛnee ya pee?’ 6Nɛ a de mɛ bɔ nɛ Yesu de mɛ ɔ, nɛ a ngmɛ mɛ blɔ.
7A kɛ teji bi ɔ ba Yesu ngɔ; nɛ a kɛ a tadehi pue e nɔ, nɛ e kuɔ hi e nɔ. 8Nihi fuu kɛ a tadehi ha blɔ ɔ nɔ; nɛ ni komɛ hu po tso kɔnihi kɛ je pu ɔ mi nɛ a kɛ pue blɔ ɔ nɔ. 9Nɛ nihi nɛ nyɛɛ hɛ mi kɛ nihi nɛ nyɛɛ se ɔ wɔ lele ke: “Hosiana! A gbaa nɔ nɛ ma ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ biɛ mi ɔ! 10A gbaa wa tsɛ David matsɛ yemi nɛ ma a! Hosiana ngɛ hiɔwe lokoo!” 11Nɛ Yesu sɛ Yerusalem, nɛ e ya sɔlemi we ɔ; nɛ e hyɛ ni ɔmɛ tsuo kɛ kpe, nɛ benɛ je bɔni jɔmi ɔ, e si lejɛ ɔ nɛ e kɛ ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ ho Betania ya.
Yesu gbiɛ ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ
(Mateo 21.18-19)
12E nɔ je na a, benɛ a je Betania kɛ ma a, hwɔ ye Yesu. 13Nɛ e na ngmɔkɔ tso ko ngɛ lokoo nɛ ba ngɛ yi, nɛ e ho ya hyɛ kaa alinɔ e maa na nɔ ko ngɛ nɔ lo. Se benɛ e su he ɔ, e nɛ nɔ́ ko kaa ja ba sɔuu, ejakaa ngmɔkɔ womi be sui lolo. 14Yesu wo e nya nɔ nɛ e de ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ ke: “Nɔ ko be o nɔ yiblii yee gblee kɛ maa ya neneene!” Nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ nu.
Yesu ya sɔlemi we ɔ
(Mateo 21.12-17; Luka 19.45-48; Yohane 2.13-22)
15Benɛ a su Yerusalem ɔ, Yesu ya sɔlemi we ɔ nɛ e bɔni nihi nɛ ngɛ ni juae kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ ni hee ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ hemi. E sake sika tsakeli ɔmɛ a kplɔɔɔ ɔmɛ kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ lahuɛhi juae ɔmɛ a sɛ̃ ɔmɛ ngɔ fia si. 16Nɛ e ngmɛ́ blɔ kaa nɔ ko nɔ ko nɛ tloo nɔ́ ko kɛ gu sɔlemi we ɔ. 17Nɛ e tsɔɔ mɛ ni ke: “A ngma ke: ‘A ma tsɛ ye we ɔ jejemawɛli kulaa a sɔlemi we.’ Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛɛ kɛ pee ojofiali a kplo.”
18Nɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ nu, nɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ a hla bɔ nɛ a maa pee nɛ a kpata e hɛ mi; se a ngɛ lɛ gbeye yee, ejakaa asafo ɔ kulaa nya kpɛ a he ngɛ e ni tsɔɔmi ɔ he.
19Ke su gbɔkuɛ ɔ, e jee ma a mi.
Ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ he nikasemi
(Mateo 21.20-22)
20Nɛ mɔtu mla, benɛ a bee ɔ, a na kaa ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ ngla kɛ e sipoku tsuo. 21Petro kai nɛ e de Yesu ke: “Rabi, hyɛ, ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ nɛ o gbiɛ ɔ ngla! 22Nɛ Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ he Mawu ye! 23I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Nɔ nɛ ma de yoku nɛ ɔ ke: ‘Hia nɛ o ya nɔ wo mi!’ nɛ e ji nɔ ngɛ e tsui mi, se mohu e heɔ yeɔ kaa nɔ nɛ e de ɔ a maa pee ɔ, e maa ba mi ha lɛ. 24Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nihi abɔ kulaa nɛ nyɛ ma kpa he pɛɛ ngɛ nyɛ sɔlemi mi ɔ, nyɛ he ye kaa nyɛ ma na nɛ a kɛ ma ha nyɛ. 25Nɛ be saa be nɛ nyɛ daa si ngɛ sɔlee ɔ, ke nyɛ ngɛ nɔ ko he sane ko ɔ, nyɛ kɛ ke lɛ, konɛ nyɛ hiɔwe tsɛ ɔ hu kɛ nyɛ tɔmi ɔmɛ nɛ ke nyɛ. [ 26Se ke nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛɛ kɛ ki ɔ, nyɛ tsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ hu kɛ nyɛ tɔmi ɔmɛ be nyɛ kee.”]
He blɔ nɛ Yesu ngɛ
(Mateo 21.23-27; Luka 20.1-8)
27Nɛ a kpale ba Yerusalem ekohu. Nɛ benɛ Yesu ngɛ nyɛɛe ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ ba e ngɔ, 28nɛ a ba bi lɛ ke: “Mɛni he blɔ o ngɛ nɛ o kɛ peɔ kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ, aloo mɛnɔ ha mo he blɔ nɛ o kɛ pee ni nɛ ɔmɛ?” 29Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Imi hu ma bi nyɛ nɔ kake nɛ nyɛ ha mi heto, konɛ ma tsɔɔ nyɛ nɔ he blɔ nɛ i ngɛ nɛ i kɛ peɔ ni nɛ ɔmɛ. 30Yohane baptisimi ɔ, hiɔwe e je aloo nimli a dɛ mi e je? Nyɛ ha mi heto!” 31Nɛ mɛ sɔuu a sa nya ngɛ a kpɛti ke: “Kɛ wa ma de kɛɛ? Ke wa de ke e je hiɔwe ɔ, e ma bi wɔ ke: ‘Mɛni he je nɛ nyɛ he we lɛ yi mɔ?’ 32Nɛ ke wa ke e je nimli a dɛ mi ɔ,” (a ngɛ ma a gbeye yee ejakaa nihi tsuo buu Yohane gbalɔ niinɛ.) 33A he nɔ nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Wa li.” Nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Lɛɛ imi hu i be nyɛ tsɔɔe nɔ he blɔ nɛ i ngɛ nɛ i kɛ peɔ ni nɛ ɔmɛ mɔ.’

Title: MARKO 12
Content:
Wai ngmɔ ɔ mi apaatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a he abɛ ɔ
(Mateo 21.33-46; Luka 20.9-19)
1Nɛ Yesu ya nɔ nɛ e kɛ mɛ tu munyu ngɛ abɛhi a mi ke: “Nyumu ko pee wai ngmɔ, nɛ e po piɛ wo he; e tsua wai tɛ muɔ, nɛ e ma mɔ ngɛ mi, nɛ e kɛ ha huli apaa yemi, nɛ e doma. 2Benɛ e su wai yiblii lami be ɔ, e tsɔ tsɔlɔ ko kɛ ya apaatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a ngɔ, konɛ a ya ngɔ e blɔfami nɔ ngɛ a dɛ kɛ ba. 3Se a nu tsɔlɔ ɔ nɛ a fia lɛ kpa, nɛ a wo lɛ blɔ kɛ e dɛ gu. 4E kpale tsɔ tsɔlɔ kpa ko hu kɛ ya a ngɔ; nɛ a ywia e yi nɛ a pue e hɛ mi si. 5Jeha nɛ ɔ hu e tsɔ nɔ kpa ko ekohu nɛ lɛɛ a gbe lɛ; kɛ ni kpa komɛ hulɔ; a fia ni komɛ kpa, nɛ a gbe ni komɛ. 6Jeha nɛ ɔ e ngɛ nɔ kake nɛ piɛ, e binyumu nɛ e suɔ. Nyagbe ɔ, e tsɔ lɛ a ngɔ nɛ e ke: ‘A ma gbo ye bi ɔ zo.’ 7Se kikɛmɛ a paatsɛmɛ nɛ ɔmɛ de a he ke: Ni yelɔ ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ; nyɛ ha waa gbe lɛ, nɛ gbo si ni ɔmɛ maa pee wa nɔ. 8Nɛ a nu lɛ nɛ a gbe lɛ, nɛ a wo lɛ kɛ je wai ngmɔ ɔ mi sake fɔ he.
9“Lɔ ɔ he je ɔ, mɛni wai ngmɔtsɛ ɔ maa pee? E maa ba kpata apaatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a hɛ mi, nɛ e kɛ wai ngmɔ ɔ ma ha ni kpa komɛ. 10Anɛ nyɛ kane we kikɛmɛ a ngmami nɛ ɔ:
‘Tɛ ɔ nɛ tsu fiali ɔmɛ kua a,
Kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu lɛ plɛ kɔ nya tɛ
11Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ dɛ mi enɛ ɔ je,
Nɛ e ngɛ nyakpɛ ngɛ wa hɛngmɛ mi?’ ”
12Yudafo ɔmɛ a nikɔtɔma amɛ ngɛ lɛ hlae nɛ a nu, ejakaa a le kaa a he nɛ e bu kikɛmɛ a abɛ nɛ ɔ nɛ, se a ngɛ asafo ɔ gbeye yee. Nɛ a si lɛ nɛ a je.
Oniatsumi he sanebimi
(Mateo 22.15-22; Luka 20.20-26)
13Nɛ a tsɔ Farisifo ɔmɛ kɛ Herodebi ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ kɛ ba Yesu ngɔ konɛ a ba da lɛ ngɛ munyu tutui mi. 14Nɛ benɛ a ba a, a ba de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, wa le kaa anɔkualetsɛ ji mo, nɛ o yi nɔ hɛ mi munyu tumi gbeye, ejakaa o hyɛ we nimli a hɛ mi, mohu o tsɔɔ Mawu blɔ ɔ ngɛ anɔkuale mi. Anɛ e da blɔ kaa a tsuɔ onia haa Kaisare aloo e dɛ? Wa ha aloo wa ko ha?” 15Se nɛ e na a osato peemi ɔ, e de mɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ nyɛ ngɛ mi kae? Nyɛɛ kɛ sika ko nɛ ba nɛ ma hyɛ.” 16Nɛ a kɛ ba. Nɛ e bi mɛ ke: “Mɛnɔ foni ji nɛ ɔ, nɛ mɛnɔ biɛ a ngma ngɛ nɔ ɔ?” A de lɛ ke: “Kaisare nɔ ʼi.” 17Nɛ Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ kɛ Kaisare nihi nɛ ha Kaisare, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ Mawu nihi nɛ ha Mawu.” Nɛ e he pee mɛ nyakpɛ kɛ be nɔ.
Ni gbogboehi a sitemi he sanebimi
(Mateo 22.23-33; Luka 20.27-40)
18Nɛ Sadukifohi nɛ deɔ ke ni gboggboehi a si temi ko be hu ba e ngɔ nɛ a ba bi lɛ ke: 19“Tsɔɔlɔ, Mose ngma ha wɔ ke: ‘Ke nɔ ko nyɛmi gbo nɛ e si e yo nɛ e si we bi ɔ́, e nyɛmi ɔ nɛ ngɔ e yo ɔ nɛ e fɔ bimɛ ngɔ ha e nyɛmi ɔ.’ 20Jeha nɛ ɔ, nyɛmimɛ kpaago hi si, nɛ nɔkɔtɔma a ngɔ yo, nɛ e gbo nɛ e si we bi. 21Nɔ nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ hu ngɔ yo ɔ, nɛ e gbo, nɛ lɛ hu e si we bi ko ngɛ e se; nɛ nɔ nɛ ji etɛ ɔ hu ja nɔuu kɛ. 22Ni kpaago ɔ tsuo kɛ yo ɔ hi si, nɛ a si we bimɛ ngɛ a se. Nɛ mɛ tsuo a se ɔ, yo ɔ hu ba gbo. 23Lɔ ɔ ni gbogboehi a sitemi ɔ mi, benɛ a maa te si ɔ, a ti mɛnɔ yo e maa pee, ejakaa ni kpaago ɔ tsuo kɛ lɛ hi si?”
24Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Anɛ pi ngmami ɔ kɛ Mawu he wami nɛ nyɛ li ɔ he nɛ nyɛ ngɛ tɔe nɛ ɔ lo? 25Ejakaa benɛ a maa te si kɛ maa je gbeje ɔ, a be yo ngɔe nɛ pohu a be gbae; se mohu a ma plɛ kaa hiɔwe bɔfohi. 26Se kaa ni gbogboehi maa te si ekohu ɔ, anɛ nyɛ kane we ngɛ Mose womi ɔ mi, bɔ nɛ Mawu de lɛ ngɛ mio tso ɔ he sane ɔ mi ke: ‘Imi lɛɛ, Abraham Mawu kɛ Isak Mawu kɛ Yakob Mawu ji mi’ ɔ? 27Enɛ tsɔɔ kaa, Mawu ɔ pi ni gbogboehi a Mawu ji lɛ, se hɛkali a Mawu ji lɛ. Nyɛ ngɛ tɔe babauu.”
Kita ngua a
(Mateo 22.34-40; Luka 10.25-28)
28Nɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake nɛ nu kaa a ngɛ lɛ sanehi, bie ɔ hu ba, nɛ benɛ e na kaa Yesu ha mɛ heto saminya a e bi lɛ ke: “Te nɔ nɛ ji kita amɛ kulaa a ti kekleekle nɔ́ hu?” 29Yesu he lɛ nɔ ke: “Kekleekle nɔ ji: ‘Bu tue, Israel, Nyɔmtsɛ wa Mawu ɔ, lɛ ji Nyɔmtsɛ kake, 30nɛ suɔ Nyɔmtsɛ o Mawu ɔ kɛ o tsui tsuo kɛ o klaa tsuo kɛ o juɛmi tsuo!’ 31Kita nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ ji: Suɔ o nyɛmi nɔmlɔ kaa mo nitsɛ o he.’ Kita ko be nɛ pe enɛ ɔmɛ.” 32Mlaa tsɔɔlɔ ɔ de lɛ ke: “Saminya, tsɔɔlɔ; o tu anɔkuale kaa Mawu kake pɛ lɛ ngɛ, nɛ nɔ kpa ko be, ja lɛ kɛkɛ ɔ; 33kaa o maa suɔ Mawu kɛ o tsui tsuo kɛ o juɛmi tsuo kɛ o klaa tsuo kɛ o he wami tsuo kɛ o nyɛmi nɔmlɔ kaa mo nitsɛ o he ɔ, e pe sami bɔhi kɛ bɔhi tsuo kulaa.” 34Nɛ benɛ Yesu na kaa e ha lɛ heto ngɛ ni lemi nya a, e de lɛ ke: “O kɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ kpɛti kɛ we.” Enɛ ɔ se ɔ, nɔ ko kɛ́ lɛ sane ko bimi hu.
Mesia a he sanebimi
(Mateo 22.41-46; Luka 20.41-44)
35Nɛ benɛ Yesu ngɛ ni tsɔɔe ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, e wo e nya nɔ nɛ e bi ke: “Kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ deɔ ke Kristo ɔ David bi ji lɛ ɔ? 36Ejakaa David nitsɛ de ngɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ nya ke:
‘Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de ye Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ke:
Hii ye hiɛ ɔ nɔ,
Kɛ yaa su be nɛ ma ngɔ o henyɛli ɔmɛ ngɔ pee
o nane si sɛ.’
37Ke David nitsɛ tsɛɛ lɛ Nyɔmitsɛ ɔ, lɛɛ kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ e ji e bi mɔ?” Nɛ nihi fuu bu lɛ tue kɛ bua jɔmi.
Yesu bɔ kɔkɔ ngɛ mlaatsɔɔli ɔmɛ a he
(Mateo 23.1-36; Luka 20.45-47)
38Nɛ Yesu de mɛ ngɛ e ni tsɔɔmi ɔ mi ke: “Nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ hi ngɛ mlaa tsɔɔli nɛ suɔ tade wuyawuya womi kɛ si slami kɛ jua nɔ ngami ɔmɛ a he. 39Ninɛmɛ nɛ suɔ nikɔtɔmahi a sihi hehi ngɛ kpe he, kɛ okplɔɔ yi himi ngɛ niyeni si, 40nɛ mii yalɔyi a wehi, nɛ he tsɔɔmi he ɔ a sɔlee sɔlemi gagaagahi. Ni nɛ ɔmɛ a fɔbu maa pe nine.”
Yalɔyo ɔ onia a
(Luka 21.1-4)
41Nɛ Yesu ya hi sikato he ɔ hanɔ, nɛ e ngɛ hyɛe bɔ nɛ ni ɔmɛ kɛ sika ngɛ daka a mi woe ɔ. Nɛ niatsɛmɛ babauu kɛ fuu ba wo mi. 42Nɛ yalɔyo ko hu ba nɛ e kɛ kaplɛ enyɔ nɛ sui pɛsɛwa ba wo mi. 43Nɛ Yesu tsɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ kɛ ba nɛ e de mɛ ke: “I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: “Kikɛmɛ a yalɔyo ohiafo nɛ ɔ kɛ fuu ba wo mi pe ni ɔmɛ tsuo nɛ kɛ eko ba wo daka a mi ɔ. 44Ejakaa ni ɔmɛ tsuo ɔ, nɔ́ nɛ a na nɛ be nɔ ɔ eko a kɛ ba wo mi; se nɔ nɛ ɔ lɛɛ, nɔ́ nɛ e ngɛ ngɛ e hia mi nɛ e kɛ ngɛ e he lɛɛ ɔ tsuo e kɛ ba wo mi nɛ ɔ nɛ.”

Title: MARKO 13
Content:
Sɔlemi we ɔ puemi he gbami
(Mateo 24.1-2; Luka 21.5-6)
1Benɛ Yesu ngɛ kpo jee ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, e kaseli ɔmɛ a t inɔ kake de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, hyɛ tɛ komɛ a klemi kake kɛ tsuhi nɛ ngɛ nyakpɛ!” 2Nɛ Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “O ngɛ kikɛmɛ a tsu kpetekpleenyɛ nɛ ɔmɛ hyɛe? A be tɛ kake sie ngɛ eko nɔ nɛ a be tsitsɛɛe ngɔ fia si.”
Nɔnami kɛ yiwamihi
(Mateo 24.3-14; Luka 21.7-19)
3Nɛ bene e hii si ngɛ Nuyoku ɔ nɔ ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ hanɔ ɔ, Petro kɛ Yakobo kɛ Yohane kɛ Andrea bi lɛ ngɛ se ke: 4“Tsɔɔ wɔ be mi nɛ a maa pee ni nɛ ɔmɛ, nɛ ke ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo maa ba mi ɔ, mɛni ji a he okadi?”
5Nɛ Yesu he nɔ nɛ e bɔni mɛ demi ke: “Nyɛɛ hyɛ saminya konɛ nɔ ko ko mlɔɔ nyɛ. 6Nihi fuu maa ba ngɛ ye biɛ mi, nɛ a ma de ke: ‘Ami ji lɛ!’ nɛ a maa mlɔɔ nihi fuu. 7Se ke nyɛ nu tahi kɛ ta sanehi a he ɔ, nyɛ ko hao, ejakaa ja a ba mi, se nyagbe ɔ sui lolo. 8Ma maa te si ngɔ wo ma, nɛ matsɛ yemi maa te si ngɔ wo matsɛ yemi, nɛ zugba mimiɛmi maa ba ngɛ hehi slɔɔtohi, nɛ hwɔ maa ba. Enɛ ɔmɛ ji kɔɔmi ɔmɛ a sisi jemi.
9“Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛɛ le nyɛ he nɔ hyemi, ejakaa a maa ngɔ nyɛ kɛ maa ya guahi a nɔ, nɛ a maa fia nyɛ kpa ngɛ kpe he ɔmɛ, nɛ a kɛ nyɛ maa da ganɔhi kɛ matsɛmɛ a hɛ mi ngɛ ye he, konɛ nyɛɛ ye odase ngɔ tsɔɔ mɛ. 10Nɛ ja a fiɛ Sane Kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ jejemawɛ tsuo lolo. 11Se ke a kpaka nyɛ kɛ ya ha a, nyɛ ko hao nyɛ he ngɔ to ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ ma de he; se mohu nɔ́ nɛ a kɛ ma ha nyɛ ngɛ jamɛ a ngmlɛfia a nɔ ɔ, lɔ ɔ nyɛ de ɔ nɛ; ejakaa tsa pi nyɛ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ munyu ɔ tue ɔ, se mohu mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ ʼi. 12Se nyɛmi maa ngɔ nyɛmi ngɔ ha gbenɔ, nɛ tsɛ hu kɛ bi ma ha; nɛ bimɛ maa te si ngɔ si a fɔli, nɛ a kɛ mɛ ma ha nɛ a gbe mɛ. 13Nɛ nihi tsuo maa nyɛ nyɛ ngɛ ye biɛ ɔ he; se nɔ nɛ hɛɛ mi kɛ gbee nya a, a ma he e yi wami.”
Hehiami ngua a
(Mateo 24.15-28; Luka 21.20-24)
14“Se ke nyɛ na ma doku ninye ni ɔ kaa e maa si ngɛ he nɛ e sɛ kaa e maa a, (nɔ nɛ ngɛ kanee ɔ, e kɔ se,) lɔ ɔ lɛɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ Yudea a, a tu fo kɛ ya yoku ɔmɛ a nɔ; 15nɛ nɔ nɛ ngɛ tsu yi mi ɔ, e ko kple si, aloo nɛ e sɛ we mi ya ngɔ nɔ́ ko; 16nɛ nɔ nɛ ngɛ ngmɔ si ɔ, e ko kpale e se ba ngɔ e tade. 17Se musu tloo yihi nɛ hɛɛ muklii kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ nyɔ hae ngɛ jamɛ a be ɔmɛ a mi. 18Se nyɛɛ sɔle konɛ nyɛ fotumi ɔ nɛ ko ba ngɛ fiɛ be mi. 19Se jamɛ a be ɔ mi ɔ, he hiami nɛ a nɛ́ e nɔ eko hyɛ kɛ je je nɛ Mawu bɔ ɔ sisije hluu kɛ ba su mwɔnɔmwɔnɔ maa ba, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu a be e nɔ nae hu. 20Nɛ ja Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ po ligbi ɔmɛ a nɔ, ke pi jã a, lɛɛ a be he lo ko he lo ko yiwami hee; se nihi nɛ e hla amɛ a he ɔ, e po ligbi ɔmɛ a nɔ.
21“Nɛ lɛ be ɔ mi ɔ, ke nɔ ko de nyɛ ke: ‘Hyɛ, Kristo ɔ ngɛ hiɛ ɔ!’ aloo ‘Hyɛ, e ngɛ lejɛ ɔ!’ ɔ, nyɛ ko he ye. 22Ejakaa lakpa kristohi kɛ lakpa gbali maa te si nɛ a maa pee okadihi kɛ nyakpɛ nihi, konɛ, ke e maa hi ɔ, a mlɔɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ a hla a tete. 23Se Nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛɛ hyɛ saminya; i de nyɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ ngɔ to.”
Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ bami
(Mateo 24.29-31; Luka 21.25-28)
24“Se jamɛ a be ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, ngɛ he hiami nɛ ɔ se ɔ, pu maa tsɔ diblii, nɛ nyɔhiɔ hu be kpee. 25Nɛ dodoehi ma tsɔ kɛ je hiɔwe ba fia si, nɛ a ma mimiɛ he wamihi nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ. 26Kɛkɛ ɔ, a maa na Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ kaa e ma ngɛ bɔkuhi a mi kɛ he wami ngua kɛ nyami. 27Kɛkɛ ɔ, e maa tsɔ e bɔfo ɔmɛ nɛ a ma bua nihi nɛ e hla amɛ a nya kɛ maa je kɔɔhiɔ eywiɛ ɔmɛ a mi, kɛ je zugba nyagbe he kɛ ya si hiɔwe nyagbe he.”
Ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ he nikasemi
(Mateo 24.32-35; Luka 21.29-33)
28“Nyɛɛ kase ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ he abɛ ɔ. Ke e su be nɛ e kɔni ɔmɛ tsɛ̃ nɛ e bɔ ba a, nyɛ le kaa latsa be ɔ su ta. 29Ja nɔuu nyɛ hu ke nyɛ na kaa kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ ba mi ɔ, nyɛ na nɛ nyɛɛ le kaa be ɔ su agbohi a nya ta. 30Anɔkuale mi i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, loko yi nɔ nɛ ɔ maa be ɔ, ja ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo ba mi lolo. 31Hiɔwe kɛ zugba maa be kɛ ho, se ye munyu ɔmɛ be bee kɛ ho.”
Nɔ ko li ligbi ɔ lo ngmlɛfia a
(Mateo 24.36-44)
32Se jamɛ a ligbi ɔ loo ngmlɛfia a, nɔ ko li; hiɔwe bɔfo ɔmɛ li, nɛ Bi ɔ hu li, ja Tsɛ ɔ. 33Nyɛɛ hyɛ saminya, nyɛɛ fɔ nyɔ nɛ nyɛɛ sɔle, ejakaa nyɛ li be mi nɛ be ɔ maa su. 34E ngɛ kaa nyumu ko nɛ hia blɔ, nɛ e si e we, nɛ e ha e webi ɔmɛ he blɔ kɛ a ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ ni tsumi, nɛ e fã agbo nya hyɛlɔ ɔ ke e bu. 35Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛɛ huɔ, ejakaa nyɛ li be mi nɛ wetsɛ ɔ ma, eko ɔ gbɔkuɛ, nyɔ mi kpɛti, loo kungwɔ nɔ kpami be, loo mɔtu; 36konɛ e ko ba tlukaa nɛ e ba na nyɛ kaa nyɛ ngɛ mahɛ hwɔe. 37Nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ nyɛ dee nɛ ɔ, nihi tsuo i ngɛ dee: Nyɛɛ huɔ!”

Title: MARKO 14
Content:
A so Yesu yi nɔ
(Mateo 26.1-5; Luka 22.1-2; Yohane 11.45-53)
1Benɛ e piɛ ligbi enyɔ nɛ a maa ye Hetsɔmi kɛ Akpiti ligbi ɔ, osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ hla bɔ nɛ a maa pee nɛ a nu Yesu ga mi nɛ a gbe lɛ. 2Se a ke: “Pi ngɛ nyami ligbi ɔ nɔ, konɛ basabasa peemi nɛ ko ba ma a mi.”
A pɔ Yesu nu ngɛ Betania
(Mateo 26.6-13; Yohane 12.1-8)
3Benɛ Yesu ngɛ Betania ngɛ Simon, tsitsɛ ɔ we ɔ mi nɛ e hii si ngɛ niye ni he ɔ, yo ko nɛ hɛɛ alabastro tɔ kɛ e mi nardo nu ngmingmiingmi nɛ he jua wa nitse ɔ ba; nɛ e ywia alabastro tɔ ɔ, nɛ e plɛ nu ɔ ngɔ pue Yesu yi mi. 4Se ni komɛ nɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ kɛ mi mi la de a he ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ e puɛ nu ɔ kikɛ nɛ ɔ? 5Ejakaa jinɛ kikɛmɛ a nu nɛ ɔ ɔ, a ma nyɛ maa jua pe cedi lafa etɛ na a kɛ ha ohiafohi!” Nɛ a muklii mi fu lɛ. 6Se Yesu ke: “Nyɛɛ jɔɔ lɛ yɔyɔɔmi! Mɛni he je nɛ nyɛ ngɛ lɛ haoe ɔ? E tsu ni saminyayooyo ha mi. 7Ejakaa ohiafo ɔmɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ kɛ mɛ ngɛ daa, nɛ be tsuaa be nɛ nyɛ suɔ ɔ, nyɛ ma nyɛ mɛ kpakpa maa pee; se imi lɛɛ pi daa nɛ i kɛ nyɛ maa hi si. 8E pee nɔ́ nɛ e ma nyɛ; e sɛ hlami ba pɔ ye nɔmlɔ tso ɔ nu ngɔ to ye pumi. 9Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: He tsuaa he nɛ a maa fiɛ Sane Kpakpa a ngɛ, ngɛ je ɔ mi tsuo ɔ, a maa sɛɛ nɔ́ nɛ yo nɛ ɔ pee nɛ ɔ hu kɛ ma kai lɛ.”
Yuda kplɛɛnɔ kaa e maa tsɔɔ Yesu se blɔ
(Mateo 26.14-16; Luka 22.3-6)
10Kɛkɛ nɛ Yuda Iskariot, ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake ɔ, pue nɔ kɛ ho osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ a ngɔ ya konɛ e ya tsɔɔ mɛ Yesu se blɔ. 11Se mɛɛ lɛɛ benɛ a nu ɔ, a nya, nɛ a wo lɛ si ke a ma ha lɛ sika. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e hla bɔ nɛ e maa pee nɛ e ha a nine nɛ su e nɔ ngɛ be nɛ sa mi.
Yesu kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ye Hetsɔmi niyeni ɔ
(Mateo 26.17-25; Luka 22.7-14; 22.21-23; Yohane 13.21-30)
12Akpiti nyami ligbi ɔmɛ a mi kekleekle ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, benɛ a ngɛ Hetsɔmi to bi ɔ gbee ɔ, Yesu kaseli ɔmɛ bi lɛ ke: “Jije o suɔ kaa wa ya dla ni ngɔ to ha mo nɛ o ya ye Hetsɔmi ɔ ngɛ?” 13Nɛ e tsɔ e kaseli ɔmɛ a ti ni enyɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ya ma a mi, nɛ nyumu ko nɛ tloo nyu kɛ buɛ kɛ nyɛ maa kpe; nyɛɛ nyɛɛ e se; 14nɛ he nɛ e ma ya sɛ ɔ, nyɛ de lejɛ ɔ wetsɛ ɔ ke: ‘Tsɔɔlɔ ɔ ke: Jije nibwɔhi a to he tsu ɔ nɛ i kɛ ye kaseli ɔmɛ maa ye Hetsɔmi ɔ ngɛ mi ɔ ngɛ?’ 15Nɛ e maa tsɔɔ nyɛ hiɔwe asa ngua ko nɛ a wo mi ni nɛ a dla mi; nyɛ dla ni ngɔ to wɔ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ.” 16Nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ pue nɔ kɛ ho ma a mi ya nɛ a ya na bɔ nɛ e de mɛ ɔ, nɛ a dla Hetsɔmi niye ni ɔ ngɔ to.
17Nɛ benɛ e su gbɔkuɛ ɔ, e kɛ ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ ho lejɛ ɔ ya. 18Benɛ a hii si nɛ a ngɛ ni yee ɔ, Yesu ke: “I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Nyɛ ti nɔ kake maa tsɔɔ ye se blɔ — nɔ ɔ kɛ mi ngɛ ni yee.” 19Nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ hao, nɛ a bi lɛ kakaaka ke: “Imi lo?” 20Se e he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ nɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɔ kake ʼi, nɔ nɛ nine nɛ kɛ ye nine ngɛ kpee ngɛ ka a mi ɔ. 21Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ma gbo kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma ngɛ e he ɔ mohu; se musu tloo nɔ nɛ tsɔɔ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ se blɔ ɔ! Afani nɛ a na we nɛ a fɔ jamɛ a nɔmlɔ ɔ.”
Nyɔmtsɛ Niyeni ɔ sisitomi
(Mateo 26.26-30; Luka 22.15-20; 1 Korintobi 11.23-25)
22Nɛ benɛ a ngɛ ni yee ɔ, Yesu ngɔ abolo nɛ e jɔɔ nɔ, nɛ e kuɔ mi, nɛ e kɛ ha mɛ nɛ e ke: “Nyɛ hee. Enɔ ji ye nɔmlɔ tso.” 23Nɛ e wo kplu ɔ hu nɛ e na si, nɛ e kɛ ha mɛ, nɛ mɛ tsuo a nu eko. 24Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Enɛ ɔ ji ye muɔ nɛ ji somi ɔ nɔ nɛ a kɛ puɛ si ngɛ nihi fuu a he ɔ nɛ. 25I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke, i be wai nɛ ɔ eko nue hu kɛ yaa su ligbi nɛ ma nu wai he ɔ ngɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi.” 26Nɛ benɛ a la yijemi la ko ɔ, a je kpo kɛ ho Nuoku ɔ nɔ ya.
Yesu gba Petro kuami ngɔ to
(Mateo 26.31-35; Luka 22.31-34; Yohane 13.36-38)
27Nɛ Yesu de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Nyɛ tsuo nyɛ nane ma kpata ejakaa a ngma ke: ‘Ma fia to hyɛlɔ ɔ nɔ, nɛ to ɔmɛ maa gbe fia.’ 28Se ke a tle mi si se ɔ, ma sɛ nyɛ hlami kɛ maa ya Galilea.” 29Se Petro de lɛ ke: “Ke ni ɔmɛ tsuo maa je o he ɔ, imi lɛɛ i be o he jee.” 30Nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “I ngɛ mo dee anɔkuale mi ke: “Mwɔnɔ nyɔ nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, kungwɔ be nɔ kpae si enyɔ nɛ o ma kpa ngɛ ye se si etɛ.” 31Se Petro tu munyu kɛ kã pe kekle ɔ ke: “Ke i kɛ mo ma gbo tete ɔ, i be kpae ngɛ o se!” Nɛ mɛ tsuo a de ja nɔuu.
Yesu ya sɔle ngɛ Getsemane
(Mateo 26.36-46; Luka 22.39-46)
32Nɛ a ba he ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lejɛ ɔ Getsemane, nɛ e de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ hi si ngɛ hiɛ ɔ konɛ ma ya sɔle lolo.” 33Nɛ e ngɔ Petro kɛ Yakobo kɛ Yohane ngɔ piɛ e he, nɛ gbeye nu lɛ nɛ e hao babauu; 34nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Ye klaa ngɛ haoe wawɛɛ kɛ yaa gbenɔ mi po; nyɛɛ hi si ngɛ niɛ ɔ nɛ nyɛɛ fɔ nyɔ!” 35Nɛ e ya e hɛ mi bɔɔ, nɛ e bu si, nɛ e sɔle, konɛ, ke e maa hi ɔ, ngmlɛfia nɛ ɔ nɛ be e he; 36nɛ e ke: “Abba, Tsaatsɛ! O nyɛɔ nihi tsuo peɔ; je kplu nɛ ɔ ngɛ ye nɔ; se kɛ̃ ɔ pi bɔ nɛ i suɔ, se bɔ nɛ o suɔ.”
37Nɛ e ba ba na mɛ kaa a ngɛ mahɛ hwɔe, nɛ e de Petro ke: “Simon, o ngɛ mahɛ hwɔe? O nyɛ we nyɔ nɛ o fɔ ngmlɛfia kake lo? 38Nyɛɛ fɔ nyɔ nɛ nyɛɛ sɔle, konɛ nyɛ ko sɛ ka mi. Mumi ɔ ngɛ kplɛɛe mohu se he lo ɔ he wɛ́.”
39Nɛ e kpale ho ekohu nɛ e ya sɔle, nɛ e tu jamɛ a munyu ɔ nɔuu. 40Nɛ benɛ e kpale e se kɛ ba ekohu ɔ, e ba na kaa a hwɔ mahɛ, ejakaa nyɔ gbe mɛ, nɛ a li nɔ heto nɛ a ngɛ lɛ hae.
41Nɛ e ba nɔ́ nɛ ji si etɛ, nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ he mi jɔ nyɛ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ mahɛ hwɔe kɛ mwɔɔ nɛ ɔ? E hiɛ! Ngmlɛfia a su, oʼɛ, a ngɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ngɔe kɛ ngɛ yayami peeli a dɛ mi woe. 42Nyɛɛ te si nɛ nyɛ ha waa ho, oʼɛ, ye se blɔ tsɔɔlɔ ɔ su si ta!”
Yesu seblɔtsɔɔmi kɛ e numi
(Mateo 26.47-56; Luka 22.47-53; Yohane 18.3-12)
43Benɛ e ngɛ munyu ɔ tue kɛ mwɔɔ ɔ, Yuda, ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake ɔ ba kɛ nihi fuu nɛ je osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ a ngɔ, nɛ a hɛɛ klaatehi kɛ tsohi. 44Se se blɔ tsɔɔlɔ ɔ to mɛ okadi ko ke: “Nɔ nɛ nya he nɛ ma fiɔ ɔ, lɛ ji nɔ ɔ nɛ; nyɛɛ nu lɛ nɛ nyɛ kpaka lɛ kɛ ho sɔkee.”
45Nɛ benɛ Yuda su si nɔuu pɛ nɛ e ba Yesu ngɔ nɛ e ke: “Rabi!” nɛ e fiɔ e nya he. 46Nɛ a ba pue Yesu nɔ nɛ a nu lɛ. 47Se nihi nɛ daa si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ a ti nɔ kake hia klaate, nɛ e kɛ fia osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a tsɔlɔ ɔ, nɛ e po e tue. 48Nɛ Yesu wo e nya nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Imi numi nyɛ ba kɛ klaatehi kɛ tsohi kaa a nuu ojo fialɔ nɛ ɔ? 49Daa nɛ i kɛ nyɛ ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ nɛ i tsɔɔ nihi a ni ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ nui mi; se benɛ pee nɛ ngmami ɔmɛ nɛ na ba mi he je.” 50Kɛkɛ nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ tsuo tu fo si lɛ.
51Se niheyo ko nɛ sa kploba ngɛ e mlɛ mi ɔ nyɛɛ e se, nɛ a ka lɛ numi; 52se e si kploba a nɛ e tu fo kɛ e he gu.
Yesu ngɛ gua ngua a hɛ mi
(Mateo 26.57-68; Luka 22.54-55; 22.63-71; Yohane 18.13-14; 18.19-24)
53Nɛ a kpaka Yesu kɛ ho osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a ngɔ ya, nɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ tsuo nya ba kpe si ngɛ e ngɔ. 54Nɛ Petro nyɛɛ e se ngɛ tsitsaa kɛ ya sɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a mɔ ɔ kpo ɔ kpɛti, nɛ e kɛ we mi sɔmɔli ɔmɛ ya hii si nɛ e ngɛ la hlue. 55Nɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ gua mluku ɔ tsuo hla Yesu he sane ko konɛ a da nɔ kɛ gbe lɛ; se a nɛ́ eko. 56Nihi fuu ye lakpa odase kɛ si lɛ, se a odase ɔmɛ sɔɛ. 57Nɛ ni komɛ te si nɛ a ye lakpa odase kɛ si Yesu ke: 58“Wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa nu nɛ e de ke: ‘Imi lɛɛ ma ku sɔlemi tsu nɛ ɔ nɛ a kɛ nine pee ɔ, nɛ ligbi etɛ mi ɔ ma ma ekpã nɛ pi nine nɛ a kɛ pee.’ ” 59Se lɔ ɔ tete po hu ɔ, a odase ɔmɛ sɔɛ.
60Nɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a te si dasi ngɛ a kpɛti, nɛ e bi Yesu ke: “O be heto hae lo? Mɛni odase ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ yee kɛ ngɛ mo sie nɛ ɔ?” 61Se e kpɛ we e kuɔ si nɛ e ha we heto. Osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a kpale bi lɛ ekohu ke: “Mo ji Kristo, nɔ nɛ a gbaa a bi ɔ lo?” 62Nɛ Yesu ke: “Imi, nɛ nyɛ maa na Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ kaa e hii si ngɛ Ope ɔ hiɛ ɔ nɔ nɛ e ma ngɛ hiɔwe bɔku ɔmɛ a mi.” 63Osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a hia e tade ɔ nɛ e ke: “Mɛni odasefohi wa kpale ngɛ hlae ekohu? 64Nyɛ nu e musu bɔmi ɔ; kɛ nyɛ susu kɛɛ?” Nɛ mɛ tsuo a bu lɛ fɔ ke e sa gbenɔ. 65Nɛ ni komɛ bɔni lada lami kɛ e nɔ puemi; nɛ a fi e hɛ mi nɛ a hɛɛ lɛ ni, nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Gbaa!” Nɛ we mi sɔmɔli ɔmɛ pue e nɔ kɛ lɛ ma gbami.
Petro kua Yesu
(Mateo 26.69-75; Luka 22.56-62; Yohane 18.15-18; 18.25-27)
66Benɛ Petro ngɛ sisi ɔ ngɛ mɔ ɔ kpɛti ɔ, osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma weyi ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake ba; 67nɛ benɛ e na Petro nɛ e ngɛ la hlue ɔ, e hyɛ lɛ nɛ e ke: “Tse mo hu o kɛ Yesu Nazareno ɔ lɛ ngɛ?” 68Se e kua nɛ e ke: “I li nɔ́ nɛ o ngɛ dee nɛ ɔ, nɛ i nui sisi tete.” Nɛ e je kpo kɛ ho kue ɔ si ya, kɛkɛ nɛ kungwɔ kpã nɔ. 69Nɛ yiheyo ɔ na lɛ ekohu, nɛ e kpale bɔni ninɛmɛ nɛ daa si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ demi kɛ: “A ti nɔ kake ji nɛ ɔ nɛ!” 70Se Petro kua ekohu. Nɛ pee se bɔɔ ɔ, ninɛmɛ nɛ daa si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ de Petro ekohu ke: “Anɔkuale mi ɔ, a ti nɔ kake ji mo, ejakaa Galileano ji mo.” 71Kɛkɛ nɛ Petro bɔni gbiɛmi kɛ kita kami ke: I li nɔmlɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ e he munyu tue nɛ ɔ.” 72Nɛ amlɔ ɔ kungwɔ kpa nɔ nɛ ji si enyɔ; nɛ Petro kai munyu nɛ Yesu de lɛ ɔ ke: “Kungwɔ be nɔ kpae si enyɔ nɛ o ma kpa ngɛ ye se si etɛ” ɔ. Nɛ benɛ e kai ɔ e wo ya.

Title: MARKO 15
Content:
Yesu ngɛ Pilato hɛ mi
(Mateo 27.1-2; 27.11-14; Luka 23.1-5; Yohane 18.28-38)
1Mɔtu mla a, osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ ma nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ kɛ gua ngua a tsuo ya da nɛ a fi Yesu nɛ a kpaka lɛ kɛ ya ha Pilato 2Nɛ Pilato bi lɛ ke: “Mo ji Yudafo ɔmɛ a matsɛ ɔ lo?” Nɛ e he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Ja o de ɔ nɛ.” 3Nɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ po e nya fuu. 4Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Pilato bi lɛ ekohu ke: “O be he nɔ́ ko dee lo? Hyɛ o nya sɔuu nɛ a ngɛ poe!” 5Se Yesu de we nɔ ko hu, nɛ Pilato hɛ mi pee lɛ yaa.
A bu Yesu gbenɔ fɔ
(Mateo 27.15-26; Luka 23.13-25; Yohane 18.39—19.16)
6Se daa ke e su nyami ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, e ngmɛɛ pamino kake nɛ a biɔ ɔ he haa mɛ. 7Jamɛ a be ɔ mi ɔ, nɔ ko ngɛ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Baraba nɛ a wo lɛ tsu mi kɛ atua tsɔli kpa komɛ nɛ gbe nɔmlɔ ngɛ atua tsɔmi ɔ mi. 8Kɛkɛ nɛ asafo ɔ ba ba bɔni lɛ pɛɛ kpami ke e pee kaa bɔ nɛ e peɔ daa a ngɔ ha mɛ. 9Se Pilato he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ suɔ kaa ma ngmɛɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a matsɛ ɔ he ha nyɛ lo?” 10Ejakaa e le kaa ninyɛ he je nɛ esɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ nu lɛ kɛ ba ha lɛ ɔ nɛ. 11Se osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ wo aafo ɔ yi mi ke a ha e ngmɛɛ Baraba mohu he ngɔ ha mɛ. 12Nɛ Pilato he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ekohu ke: “Lɛɛ mɛni nyɛ ngɛ hlae nɛ ma pee nɔ nɛ nyɛ tsɛɛ lɛ Yudafohi a matsɛ ɔ he mɔ? 13Se a kpa huhui ekohu ke: “Sɛu lɛ!” 14Nɛ Pelato bi mɛ ke: “Se mɛni yayami po e pee?” Se a kpa huhui wawɛɛ pe kekle ɔ ke: “Sɛu lɛ!” 15Se akɛnɛ Pilato ngɛ hlae nɛ e sa asafo ɔ hɛ mi he je ɔ, e ngmɛɛ Baraba he ha mɛ; nɛ Yesu ɔ lɛɛ e fia lɛ kplibi, nɛ e ngɔ lɛ ha nɛ a ya sɛu lɛ.
Aslaafo ɔmɛ ye Yesu he fɛu
(Mateo 27.27-31; Yohane 19.2-3)
16Nɛ aslaafo ɔmɛ kpaka Yesu kɛ ho amlaalo mɔ ɔ mi ya, nɛ a tsɛ aslaafohi asafo ɔ tsuo kɛ ba kpe. 17Nɛ a wo lɛ tade tsu ko, nɛ a pee mio jlasi ko kɛ fi e yi. 18Nɛ abɔni lɛ ngami kɛ: “Wa nga mo oo, Yudafohi a matsɛ. 19Nɛ a kɛ paplo fia e yi kpɛti, nɛ a la lada ngɔ pue e nɔ, nɛ a kpla si nɛ a ja lɛ. 20Nɛ benɛ a ye e he fɛu se ɔ, a je e tade tsu ɔ ngɛ e he, nɛ a ngɔ lɛ nitsɛ e tade ɔmɛ ngɔ wo lɛ, nɛ a kpaka lɛ kɛ ho nɛ a ya sɛu lɛ.
Yesu sɛumi kɛ e gbenɔ
(Mateo 27.32-41; Luka 23.26-49; Yohane 19.17-30)
21Nɛ aslaafo ɔmɛ nyɛ Simon Kireneno ko nɛ je ngmɔ si kɛ bee nɛ ji Aleksandro kɛ Rufo mɛ a tsɛ ɔ nɔ ke e wo Yesu sɛumi tso ɔ. 22Nɛ a kpaka lɛ kɛ ya he ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lejɛ ɔ Golgota, e sisi ji Yikoklodonya. 23Nɛ a ha lɛ wai nɛ a kɛ mire (tsopa) futu mi ke e nu; se e kua. 24Nɛ benɛ a sɛu lɛ ɔ, a dla e tade ɔmɛ a mi, nɛ a fɔ nɔ sɔ, nɔ́ nɛ mo nɔ o maa ngɔ. 25Se mɔtu ngmlɛ nɛɛ mi a sɛu lɛ ɔ nɛ. 26Nɛ a ngma sane nɛ a kɛ fɔ e nɔ ɔ ngɛ e yi je ke: “Yudafo ɔmɛ a matsɛ ɔ”. 27Nɛ a sɛu awiyeli enyɔ piɛ e he, nɔ kake ngɛ e hiɛ ɔ nɔ nɛ nɔ kake ngɛ e muɔ nɔ. 28[Nɛ ngmami ɔ nɛ de ke: “Nɛ a bu lɛ ngɔ si yayami peeli a nɔ”] ɔ ba mi. 29Nɛ nihi nɛ bee ɔ tu musu bɔmi munyuhi kɛ si Yesu, nɛ a mimiɛ a yi nɛ a ke: “Ei, mo nɛ o kuɔ sɔlemi tsu nɛ okpaleɔ maa lɛ ligbi etɛ ɔ, 30jee seumi tso ɔ nɔ kɛ kple si nɛ o he mo nitsɛ o yi wami!” 31Ja nɔuu osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ hu ye e he fɛu ngɛ a kpɛti ke: “E he ni kpahi a yi wami, se lɛ nitsɛ e nɔ ɔ lɛɛ e nyɛ we nɛ e he; 32Kristo, Israel matsɛ ɔ, e je sɛumi tso ɔ nɔ kɛ kple si koo, konɛ waa na nɛ wa he ye!” Nɛ nihi nɛ a sɛu ngɔ piɛ e he ɔ hu ye e he fɛu.
33Nɛ benɛ su ngmlɛ nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ, diblii wo ngɛ zugba a tsuo nɔ kɛ ya si ngmlɛ etɛ mi. 34Nɛ ngmlɛ etɛ mi ɔ, Yesu kpa ngmlaa kɛ gbi wawɛɛ ke: “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” E sisi ji: “Ye Mawu, Ye Mawu, mɛ he je nɛ o kua mi?” 35Nɛ benɛ nihi nɛ daa si ngɛ lejɛ ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ nu ɔ, a ke: “Oʼɛ, e ngɛ Elia tsɛe.” 36Nɛ nɔ ko sa fo nɛ e ya ngɔ wosuma kɛ sɔ da nɛ kua mi, nɛ e kɛ ma paplo nya ha lɛ ke e nu nɛ e ke: “Nyɛ ha waa mlɛ nɛ waa hyɛ kaa Elia ma ba je lɛ lo?” 37Nɛ Yesu kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ nɛ e ngɔ e nya.
38Nɛ sɔlemi tsu ɔ mi pomi bo ɔ mi gba kɛ je hiɔwe kɛ ba ma si. 39Se benɛ aslaafohi lafa a nyatsɛ ɔ nɛ daa si ngɛ e hanɔ ɔ na kaa e kpa ngmlaa kikɛ nɛ e ngɔ e nya a, e ke: “Niinɛ kaa kikɛmɛ a nɔmlɔ nɛ ɔ ɔ, Mawu bi ʼi!” 40Nɛ yi komɛ hu ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ daa si ngɛ se banee ngɛ hyɛe; a ti ni komɛ ji Maria Magdalena, kɛ Maria, Yakobo wayo kɛ Yosemɛ a nyɛ ɔ, kɛ Salome, 41nihi nɛ benɛ e ngɛ Galilea nɛ a nyɛɛ e se nɛ a sɔmɔɔ lɛ ɔ, kɛ yi kpa komɛ fuu nɛ kɛ lɛ ba Yerusalem ɔ.
Yesu pumi
(Mateo 27.57-61; Luka 23.50-56; Yohane 19.38-42)
42Nɛ benɛ su gbɔkuɛ ɔ, akɛnɛ e ji he dlami ligbi nɛ nyɛɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ hɛ mi he ɔ, 43Yosef nɛ je Arimatia, nɛ ji gua ngua a mi nɔ ko nɛ ngɛ biɛ nɛ lɛ hu e ngɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ blɔ hyɛe ɔ, ba nɛ e kɛ kã pue nɔ kɛ ya Pilato ngɔ, nɛ e ya bi Yesu gbogboe ɔ. 44Se Pilato hɛ mi pee lɛ yaa kaa e gbo momo; nɛ e tsɛ aslaafohi lafa a yatse ɔ nɛ e bi lɛ ke e gbo kɛ lo? 45Nɛ benɛ e nu kɛ je aslaafohi lafa a nyatsɛ ɔ nya a, e kɛ gbogbo ɔ ke Yosef. 46Nɛ Yosef ya he kploba, nɛ e ba je lɛ kɛ kple si nɛ e kɛ kploba a ha e he, nɛ e kɛ lɛ ya fɔ yɔkɔ nɛ a kpɛ ngɛ tɛ sa mi ɔ mi, nɛ e kpɛne tɛ ko kɛ tsi muɔ ɔ nya. 47Nɛ Maria Magdalena kɛ Maria, Yose nyɛ ɔ ngɛ hyɛe he nɛ a kɛ lɛ fɔ ɔ.

Title: MARKO 16
Content:
Yesu sitemi
(Mateo 28.1-8; Luka 24.1-12; Yohane 20.1-10)
1Nɛ benɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ be ɔ, Maria Magdalena kɛ Yakobo nyɛ Maria kɛ Salome ya he tsopa kɛ e he via konɛ a ba nɛ a kɛ ba kpa Yesu gbogboe ɔ. 2Nɛ otsi ɔ kekleekle ligbi ɔ nɔ mɔtu mla, pu si temi be ɔ, a ba muɔ ɔ nya. 3Nɛ a bi a he ke: “Mɛnɔ ma kpɛne tɛ ɔ kɛ je muɔ ɔ nya ha wɔ?” 4Se benɛ a yaa wo a hɛ nɔ ɔ, a na kaa a kpɛne tɛ ɔ kɛ ho se ya, ejakaa e kle saminya. 5Nɛ benɛ a sɛ yɔkɔ ɔ mi ɔ, a na niheyo ko nɛ hii si ngɛ nɔ hiɛ ɔ nɔ je nɛ e wo tade hiɔ gagaaga; nɛ a hɛli si. 6Se e de mɛ ke. “Nyɛ ko ye gbeye! Nyɛ ngɛ Yesu Nazareno nɛ a sɛu ɔ hlae; e te si, e be hiɛ ɔ; oʼɛ, he nɛ a kɛ lɛ fɔ ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ! 7Jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛɛ ya nɛ nyɛ ya de e kaseli ɔmɛ kɛ Petro, ke e ngɛ nyɛ hlami sɛe kɛ yaa Galilea; lejɛ ɔ nyɛ maa na lɛ ngɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ e de nyɛ ɔ.” 8Nɛ a je kpo oya nɛ a tu fo kɛ je yɔkɔ ɔ he; a nu sawale nɛ a nya kpɛ a he; a de we nɔ ko nɔ́ ko, ejakaa a ngɛ gbeye yee.
Yesu je e he kpo tsɔɔ Maria Magdalena
(Mateo 28.9-10; Yohane 20.11-18)
[ 9Benɛ Yesu te si mɔtu mla ngɛ otsi ɔ kekleekle ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, nɔ kekleekle nɛ e je e he kpo tsɔɔ ji Maria Magdalena, nɔ nɛ mi nɛ pe hia mumi yayamihi kpaago kɛ je ɔ. 10Nɛ lɛ e ya nɛ e ya sɛɛ ngɔ ha nihi nɛ kɛ lɛ hi si nɛ a ngɛ kɔmɔ yee nɛ a ngɛ ya foe ɔ. 11Se mɛɛ lɛɛ, benɛ a nu kaa Yesu hɛ ngɛ nɛ e na lɛ ɔ, a he we lɛ yi.
Yesu je e he kpo tsɔɔ kaseli enyɔ
(Luka 24.13-35)
12Ni nɛ ɔmɛ a se ɔ, Yesu je e he kpo ngɛ su kpa mi tsɔɔ a ti ni enyɔ, benɛ a ngɛ si slae kɛ yaa ngmɔ si ɔ. 13Ni nɛ ɔmɛ kpale a se kɛ ho ya de nihi nɛ piɛ ɔ, se a he we mɛ tete po yi.
Yesu je e he kpo tsɔɔ kaseli nyɔngma kɛ kake ɔ
(Mateo 28.16-20; Luka 24.36-49; Yohane 20.19-23; Bɔfo 1.6-8)
14Pee se ɔ e je e he kpo tsɔɔ ni nyɔngma kɛ kake ɔ nitsɛ, benɛ a hii si ngɛ niye ni he ɔ, nɛ e ka a hɛ mi ngɛ hemi nɛ a he we yi kɛ a tsui wami ɔ he, ejakaa a he we nihi nɛ na lɛ ngɛ e sitemi ɔ se ɔ yi. 15Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ya je ɔ tsuo kulaa mi nɛ nyɛ ya fiɛ Sane Kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ a bɔ ɔ. 16Nɔ nɛ heɔ yeɔ nɛ a baptisi lɛ ɔ, a ma he e yi wami, se nɔ nɛ he we yi ɔ, a maa bu lɛ fɔ. 17Se okadihi nɛ maa nyɛɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ heɔ yeɔ ɔmɛ a se ji nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ: Ye biɛ mi ɔ, sa maa hia mumi yayamihi; a maa tu munyu hehi; 18a ma wo sinɔhi a nɔ; nɛ ke a nu nɔ́ ko nɛ gbee nɔ ɔ, e be mɛ yayami ko pee; a kɛ a ninehi ma pue hiɔtsɛmɛ a nɔ, nɛ a he maa wa mɛ.
Yesu hiɔweyami
(Luka 24.50-53; Bɔfo 1.9-11)
19Kɛkɛ ɔ, benɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu kɛ mɛ tu munyu se ɔ, a ngɔ lɛ kɛ ho hiɔwe ya nɛ we ya hi si ngɛ Mawu hiɛ ɔ nɔ. 20Kaseli ɔmɛ ho nɛ a ya fiɛ ngɛ he tsuaa he, nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kɛ mɛ tsu ni, nɛ e wo munyu ɔ he wami kɛ okadihi nɛ piɛ he ɔ.]
BLEMA NGMAMI NƐ A KƐ GBE NYA A EKO
[ 9 Yi ɔmɛ ya Petro kɛ e huɛmɛ ɔmɛ a ngɔ nɛ a ya bɔ mɛ kpiti nihi kulaa nɛ a de mɛ ɔ. 10 Enɛ ɔ se ɔ, Yesu nitsɛ gu e kaseli ɔmɛ a nɔ ha nɛ munyu klɔuklɔu nɛ ngɛ daa nɛ haa neneene wami ɔ gbɛ fia kɛ je beleku kɛ ya si bonyoku.]

Title: LUKA 1
Content:
Sisijemi
1Akɛnɛ nihi fuu kɔ fɔ a nɔ kaa a maa ngma sanehi nɛ ba mi ngɛ wa kpɛti ɔ, 2kaa bɔ nɛ nihi nɛ na kɛ a hɛngmɛ kɛ je sisije nɛ a ji munyu ɔ he sɔmɔli ɔmɛ fie tsɔɔ wɔ ɔ, 3e sa ye hɛ mi kaa imi hu, nɛ i hla lɛ tsuo mi fitsofitso kɛ je sisije ɔ, ma ngma pɛpeepɛ ha mo, Teofilo kpakpa; 4kone o na munyuhi nɛ a tsɔɔ mo ɔ mi anɔkuale.
Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ fɔmi he siwomi
5Yuda matsɛ Herode yinɔ ɔ, osɔfo ko hi si nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Zakaria nɛ je Abia osɔfohi a weku ɔ mi; nɛ e yo ɔ je Aaron bimɛ yi ɔmɛ a kpɛti, nɛ e biɛ ji Elisabet. 6Nɛ mɛ ni enyɔ ɔ tsuo ɔ dali ji mɛ ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi, nɛ a yeɔ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kitahi kɛ e mlaa amɛ kulaa nɔ, nɛ piami ko be a he. 7Se a be bi, ejakaa Elisabet ɔ yosa ʼi, nɛ mɛ ni enyɔ ɔ tsuo a bwɔ.
8Bene Zakaria ngɛ ni tsue kaa osɔfo ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi 9kaa bɔ nɛ osɔfo yemi blɔnya tomi ɔ ngɛ ɔ, e ba mi kaa a hla lɛ kaa e ya Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ sɔlemi tsu ɔ mi nɛ e ya sa tsopa kɛ e he via, 10nɛ tsopa kɛ e he via sami be ɔ mi ɔ, ma asafo ɔ tsuo ngɛ sɔlee ngɛ agbo ɔ nya. 11Nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bɔfo ko ba je e he kpo tsɔɔ lɛ, nɛ e daa si ngɛ tsopa kɛ e he via sami latɛ ɔ hiɛ ɔ nɔ. 12Nɛ benɛ Zakaria na lɛ ɔ, e tsui po nɛ e ye gbeye. 13Se bɔfo ɔ de lɛ ke:
“Koo ye gbeye, Zakaria, ejakaa a bu o pɛɛ kpami ɔ tue, nɛ o yo Elisabet ma fɔ bi nyumu ha mo, nɛ o wo lɛ biɛ Yohane. 14E maa pee mo buajɔmi kɛ nyami, nɛ nihi fuu ma nya e fɔmi ɔ he. 15Ejakaa e maa pee nɔ ngua ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi; nɛ e be wai loo da nɛ nya wa ko nue, nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ ma hyi lɛ tɔ kɛ maa je e nyɛ muklii mi lokoo. 16Nɛ e maa kpale Israelbi ɔmɛ a ti nihi fuu kɛ maa ba Nyɔmtsɛ, a Mawu ɔ ngɔ. 17Nɛ e maa sɛ e hlami ngɛ Elia mumi kɛ e hewami mi, nɛ e ya dɔ tsɛmɛ a tsui kɛ ba a bimɛ a he, kɛ tue gboli kɛ ba dali a ni lemi mi, nɛ e dla ma a ngɔ to Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ.”
18Zakaria de bɔfo ɔ ke: “Mɛni i kɛ maa le enɛ ɔ? Ejakaa imi lɛɛ nɔmoyo ji mi, nɛ ye yo hu bwɔ.” 19Nɛ bɔfo ɔ ha lɛ heto ke: “Imi ji Gabriel nɛ daa Mawu hɛ mi ɔ nɛ, nɛ a tsɔ mi ke ma ba de mo nɛ ma sɛɛ Sane Kpakpa nɛ ɔ ha mo. 20Nɛ oʼɛ, o nya ma ma nɛ o be nyɛe munyu tumi kɛ maa su ligbi nɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ maa ba mi, ejakaa o he we munyu ɔmɛ nɛ maa ba mi ngɛ a be mi ɔ yi.”
21Nɛ ma a ngɛ Zakaria mlɛe, nɛ a hɛ mi pee mɛ yaa akɛnɛ e se ya kɛ ngɛ sɔlemi tsu ɔ mi ɔ. 22Se bene e je kpo e nyɛ we nɛ e kɛ mɛ nɛ tu munyu, nɛ a kɔ se kaa e ya na nɔ́ ko ngɛ sɔlemi tsu ɔ mi. E fɔ mɛ nine se e nyɛ we munyu nɛ e tu.
23Nɛ benɛ e sɔmɔmi ligbi ɔmɛ a nya ta a, e je kɛ ho lɛ nitse e we ɔ mi ya. 24Nɛ jamɛ a ligbi ɔmɛ a se ɔ, e yo Elisabet ngɔ hɔ, nɛ e laa e he hlami enuɔ nɛ e ke: 25“Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ pee enɛ ɔ kɛ je ye zo ɔ ngɛ nimli a kpɛti.”
Yesu fɔmi he gbami
26Hlami nɛ ji ekpa a nɔ ɔ, Mawu tsɔ bɔfo Gabriel kɛ ya Galilea ma ko nɛ a tsɛɛ Nazaret ɔ mi, 27ngɛ zangmayo ko nɛ a bi e si ha nyumu ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Yosef nɛ je David weku ɔ mi ɔ ngɔ. Zangmayo ɔ biɛ ji Maria. 28Nɛ bɔfo ɔ ba e ngɔ nɛ e ke: “Mo he manye, mo nɔ nɛ a dloo mo, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kɛ mo ngɛ!” 29Se benɛ e nu ɔ, e tsui po, nɛ e susu ke mɛni ngami ji nɛ ɔ? 30Se bɔfo ɔ de lɛ ke: “Koo ye gbeye, Maria, ejakaa o hɛ mi ba nyami ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi. 31Bu tue, lo ma na muklii nɛ o ma fɔ bi nyumu, nɛ o wo lɛ biɛ Yesu. 32E maa pee nɔmlɔ ngua, nɛ a ma tsɛ lɛ Hiɔweno ɔ bi, nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ Mawu maa ngɔ e tsɛ David matsɛ sɛ ɔ ngɔ ha lɛ. 33Nɛ e maa ye Yakob we ɔ nɔ matsɛ kɛ maa ya neneene, nɛ e matsɛ yemi ɔ se be poe.”
34Maria bi bɔfo ɔ ke: “Kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ enɛ ɔ maa ba mi? I li nyumu.” 35Nɛ bɔfo ɔ ha lɛ heto ke: “Mumi Klɔuklɔu maa ba o nɔ, nɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ jamɛ a bi klɔuklɔu ɔ hu nɛ o ma fɔ ɔ, a ma tsɛ lɛ Mawu bi. 36Nɛ oʼɛ, o wekuno Elisabet ɔ hu ngɔ bi nyumu hɔ ngɛ e bwɔmi si, nɛ nɔ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ yosa a na hlami ekpa. 37Ejakaa nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko wɛ́ hi Mawu.”
38Nɛ Maria ke: “Oʼɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ weyo ji mi, e ba mi ngɛ o munyu ɔ nya!” Nɛ bɔfo ɔ si lɛ.
Maria ya slaa Elisabet
39Nɛ Maria te si ngɛ lɛ jamɛ a be ɔ mi nɛ e pue nɔ oya kɛ ho Yudea ma ko ngɛ yoku ɔmɛ a nɔ ɔ mi ya, 40nɛ e ya sɛ Zakaria we ɔ mi nɛ e nga Elisabet. 41Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ Elisabet nu Maria ngami ɔ, bimwɔyo ɔ hua ngɛ e mi mi; nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu hyi Elisabet tɔ. 42Nɛ e kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ ke: “A gbaa mo ngɛ yihi a ti, nɛ a gbaa o mi mi bi ɔ! 43Nɛ jije enɛ ɔ je kɛ ba ha mi nɛ ye Nyɔmtsɛ nyɛ ma ye ngɔ nɛ ɔ? 44Se oʼɛ, amlɔ pɛ nɛ o ngami ɔ pɛ ngɛ ye tue mi ɔ, bimwɔyo ɔ kɛ nyami hua ngɛ ye muklii mi. 45Nɛ sa gbaa mo, mo nɔ nɛ o he ye kaa munyuhi nɛ a je Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ngɔ ba de ɔ maa ba mi ɔ.”
Maria yijemi la
46Nɛ Maria ke:
“Ye klaa ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ agboje ɔ fiɛe,
47Nɛ ye mumi ngɛ Mawu ye yiwami-helɔ ɔ yi jee,
48Kaa e kai e weyo humi nɛ e ji ɔ,
Ejakaa oʼɛ, kɛ je mwɔ nɛ ɔ ligbi nɛ ɔ nɔ
ɔ, yi nɔhi kulaa maa gbaa mi.
49Ejakaa Ope ɔ pee ni nguahi ha mi;
Nɛ klɔuklɔu ji e biɛ ɔ,
50Nɛ e mɔbɔ nami ngɛ nihi nɛ yee lɛ
gbeye ɔmɛ a nɔ kɛ yaa su yi nɔhi a yinɔ.
51E kɛ e nine tsu hewami ni tsumi;
Nihi nɛ woɔ a he ngɛ a tsui mi susumi
mi ɔ, e gbɛ mɛ fia.
52E kpa hewali kɛ je a sɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ,
Nɛ e wo nihi nɛ ji humi ɔmɛ a nɔ.
53E ha hwɔ hwɔli tɔ kɛ ni kpakpahi,
Nɛ he nali ɔmɛ ɔ, e fie mɛ kɛ ho dɛ gu.
54E ye bua e wenyumu Israel,
Konɛ e kai e mɔbɔ nami ɔmɛ,
55Kaa bɔ nɛ e de wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ,
Kɛ ha Abraham kɛ e nina kɛ yaa neneene ɔ.”
56Nɛ Maria kɛ Elisabet hi si maa pee hlami ete, nɛ e kpale kɛ ho e ma a mi ya.
Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ fɔmi
57Jeha nɛ ɔ Elisabet fɔmi be su, nɛ e fɔ bi nyumu. 58Nɛ benɛ e pakabi kɛ e wekuli nu kaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ na lɛ mɔbɔ babauu ɔ, a kɛ lɛ nya. 59Nɛ ligbi nɛ ji ligbi kpaanyɔ ɔ, a ba bimwɔyɔ ɔ pomi, nɛ jinɛ a kɛ e tsɛ biɛ Zakaria a yaa wo lɛ. 60Se e nyɛ he nɔ nɛ e de ke: “Dɛbi, se a wo lɛ Yohane mohu!” 61Nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Nɔ ko be o weku ɔ mi nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ ja!” 62Nɛ a kɛ a nine pee okadi kɛ bi e tsɛ bɔ nɛ e suɔ nɛ a tsɛ lɛ. 63Nɛ e bi tso sleeti ko, nɛ e ngma ngɛ nɔ ke: “Yohane ji e biɛ.” Nɛ e pee mɛ tsuo nyakpɛ. 64Nɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔuu ɔ Zakaria nya bli nɛ e lilɛ kpa pɛne, nɛ e tu munyu kɛ je Mawu yi. 65Nɛ gbeye nu e pakabi ɔmɛ tsuo, nɛ a tu ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo he munyu ngɛ Yudea yoku ɔmɛ kulaa nɔ. 66Nɛ nihi tsuo nɛ nu ɔ ngɔ to a yi mi nɛ a ke: “Mɛni po jokuɛ nɛ ɔ maa pee? Ejakaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nine ngɛ e nɔ.
Zakaria gbami
67Nɛ e tsɛ Zakaria hyi gbagbaagba kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu, nɛ e gba de ke:
68“A gbaa Nyɔmtsɛ, Israel Mawu ɔ,
Kaa de ba slaa e ma a, nɛ e tsu Kpɔmi nihi ha mɛ,
69Nɛ e tle yi wami hemi koli si
Ngɔ ha wɔ ngɛ e wenyumu David we ɔ,
70Kaa bɔ nɛ e de kɛ je blema lokoo ngɛ
e gbali klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a nya a;
71Ke e ma he wa yi wami kɛ maa je
Wa henyɛli kɛ nihi nɛ wa he tsɛɛ mɛ
ɔ a dɛ mi;
72Nɛ e na wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ mɔbɔ.
Nɛ e kai e somi klɔuklɔu ɔ,
73Kita nɛ e ka wa tsɛ Abraham ɔ,
74Ke e ma ha a je wɔ kɛ je wa henyɛli a dɛ mi,
Nɛ wa sɔmɔ lɛ nɛ gbeye yemi ko ko hi mi,
75Ngɛ he tsɔmi kɛ dami mi
Ngɛ e hɛ mi wa ligbihi abɔ tsuo
76Nɛ mo, jokuɛ nɛ ɔ,
A ma tsɛ mo hiɔwe lokoono ɔ gbalɔ;
Ejakaa o maa sɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hlami
Nɛ o ya dla e blɔ ɔmɛ ngɔ to lɛ,
77Konɛ o ngɔ yi wami hemi he ni lemi
Ngɔ ha e ma a ngɛ a he yayami mi,
78Ngɛ wa Mawu ɔ mɔbɔ nami
Nɛ haa e mi mi saa lɛ ɔ nya,
Nɔ́ nɛ ha je nami nɛ je hiɔwe ɔ ba
slaa wɔ nɛ ɔ,
79Konɛ je mi nɛ tsɔ ha nihi
Nɛ hii si ngɛ diblii gbenɔ hɔ mi ɔ,
Nɛ e plɛ wa nane kɛ ya he jɔmi blɔ ɔ nɔ.”
80Nɛ jokuɛ ɔ ba wa, nɛ e he wa ngɛ mumi mi, nɛ e hi nga a nɔ kɛ ya su ligbi nɛ e je e he kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ Israel.

Title: LUKA 2
Content:
Yesu fɔmi
(Mateo 1.18-25)
1Jamɛ a be ɔ mi ɔ, e ba mi kaa hiɔngɔ ko je Kaisare Augusto ngɔ ba ke a kane je ɔ tsuo nɛ a ngma. 2Enɛ ɔ ji kekleekle nɔ kanemi nɛ ba nɔ be mi nɛ Kirenio ngɛ amlaalo yee ngɛ Siria a. 3Nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ ho lɛ nitse e ma mi ya konɛ a ya ngma e biɛ.
4Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yosef hu je Nazaret ma a mi ngɛ Galilea, nɛ e ya Betlehem nɛ ji David ma nɛ ngɛ Yudea a mi, ejakaa e je David we kɛ e weku ɔ mi, 5konɛ a ngma lɛ kɛ Maria, e yo nɛ e bi e si nɛ e mi wa a biɛ. 6Benɛ a ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, e fɔmi be ba su. 7Nɛ pe fɔ bi nyumu, e kekleekle bi ɔ, nɛ e ngɔ bo ngɔ blaa lɛ, nɛ e ngɔ lɛ ngɔ fɔ lohwehi a niye ni nɔ mi, ejakaa a nɛ blɔ ngɛ nibwɔhi a to he ɔ.
Tohyɛli ɔmɛ kɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ
8To hyɛli komɛ ngɛ nga a nɔ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi nɔuu nɛ ngɛ nyɔ fɔe kɛ ngɛ a tohi a he bue nyɔ mi. 9Nɛ oʼɛ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bɔfo ko ba da a kasa nya, nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi nyami kpɛ bɔle mɛ, nɛ a ye gbeye wawɛɛ. 10Nɛ bɔfo ɔ de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ko ye gbeye; ejakaa oʼɛ, ma sɛɛ bua jɔmi sane kpetekpleenyɛ nɛ ji ma tsuo nɔ ɔ ha nyɛ, 11kaa mwɔ nɛ ɔ a fɔ yi wami helɔ nɛ ji Kristo, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ, ngɔ ha nyɛ ngɛ David ma a mi. 12Nɛ enɛ ɔ maa pee okadi ha nyɛ; Nyɛ maa na bimwɔyo ɔ nɛ a kɛ bo blaa e he nɛ e hwɔɔ si ngɛ lohwehi a niye ni nɔ mi.”
13Nɛ tlukaa a, hiɔwe ta ngua ba piɛ bɔfo ɔ he, nɛ a je Mawu yi de ke:
14“Hɛ mi nyami ha Mawu ngɛ hiɔwe lokoo,
Nɛ he jɔmi nɛ ba zugba a nɔ
Ha nihi nɛ sa e hɛ mi.”
15Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ je a ngɔ kɛ ho hiɔwe ya a, to hyɛli ɔmɛ de a he ke: “Nyɛ ha waa ho Betlehem ya koo, nɛ wa ya hyɛ sane nɛ ba nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ je tsɔɔ wɔ nɛ ɔ.” 16Nɛ a ho nɔuu nɛ a ya na Maria kɛ Yosef kɛ bimwɔyo ɔ nɛ hwɔɔ si ngɛ lohwehi a niye ni nɔ mi. 17Nɛ benɛ a ya na lɛ ɔ, a jaje sane nɛ a sɛɛ ngɔ ha mɛ ngɛ jokuɛ ɔ he ɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ mɛ. 18Nɛ nihi tsuo nɛ nu ɔ hɛ mi pee mɛ yaa ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ to hyɛli ɔmɛ sɛɛ ha mɛ ɔ he. 19Se Maria kɛ kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo to nɛ e susuu he ngɛ e tsui mi. 20Nɛ to hyɛli ɔmɛ kpale a se nɛ a wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami, nɛ a je e yi ngɛ nihi tsuo kulaa nɛ a nu nɛ a na a he, kaa bɔ nɛ a sɛɛ ngɔ ha mɛ ɔ.
A wo Yesu biɛ
21Nɛ benɛ ligbi kpaanyɔ su nɛ a maa po jokuɛ ɔ, a wo lɛ Yesu, kaa bɔ nɛ bɔfo ɔ wo lɛ momo loko a ngɔ e hɔ ɔ.
A ngɔ Yesu ngɔ tsɔɔ ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ
22Nɛ benɛ a gbe he tsukɔmi ligbi ɔmɛ a nya ngɛ Mose Mlaa a nya a, a kɛ Yesu ya Yerusalem konɛ a kɛ lɛ ya tsɔɔ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ, 23kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ Mlaa a mi ke: “Nyumu tsuaa nyumu nɛ bliɔ muklii nya a, a ma tsɛ lɛ klɔuklɔu ha Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ.” 24Nɛ a ya sã bɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ a de ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ Mlaa a mi ke: “Lahuɛhi enyɔ loo beleku lahuɛ tsɔwi enyɔ.”
25Jeha nɛ ɔ nyumu ko ngɛ Yerusalem nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Simeon; nɛ lɛ nyumu ɔ dalɔ ji lɛ nɛ e yee Mawu gbeye; e ngɛ Israel bua jɔmi ɔ blɔ hyɛe, nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ngɛ e nɔ. 26Nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ je kpo tsɔɔ lɛ ke e be gboe ja e na Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ Kristo ɔ lolo. 27Nɛ Mumi ɔ kpaka lɛ kɛ ba sɔlemi we ɔ. Nɛ benɛ jokuɛ Yesu fɔli ɔmɛ kɛ lɛ ba konɛ a ba tsu bɔ nɛ ji Mlaa a blɔ nya ngɔ ha lɛ ɔ, 28kɛkɛ nɛ e he lɛ ngɔ fɔ e kɔni bɔkɔ mi, nɛ e gbaa Mawu nɛ e ke:
29“Jeha nɛ ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ, ha o wenyumu nɛ ya,
Ngɛ o munyu ɔ nya ngɛ he jɔmi mi.
30Ejakaa ye hɛngmɛ na o yi wami hemi ɔ”
31Nɔ́ nɛ o dla ngɔ ma ma tsuo hɛ mi,
32La nɛ ma bli majemajeli ɔmɛ a hɛ
Nɛ maa wo o ma Israel hɛ mi nyami ɔ,
33Nɛ Yesu tsɛ kɛ e nyɛ nya kpɛ a he ngɛ nihi nɛ a de ngɛ e he ɔ he. 34Nɛ Simeon gbaa mɛ nɛ e de e nyɛ Maria ke: “Oʼɛ, a kɛ bi nɛ ɔ da si ha nihi fuu a si gbeemi kɛ a si temi ngɛ Israel, kɛ okadi nɛ a maa tu munyu nɔ si, 35nɛ mo nitse hu, ha maa gbɔ o tsui mi; konɛ a je tsuihi fuu a susumihi kpo.”
36Nɛ gbalɔyo ko ngɛ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Hana nɛ ji Fanuel biyo nɛ je Asher weku ɔ mi, nɛ e bwɔ saminya, nɛ e kɛ e huno hi si jeha kpaago kɛ je e yihe mi, 37se jeha nɛ ɔ yalɔ yo ji lɛ, nɛ e ye maa pee jeha nyingmi kpaanyɔ kɛ eywiɛ. E ji sɔlemi we ɔ kulaa, se e jaa Mawu kɛ hwɔ hami kɛ pɛɛ kpami nyɔ kɛ pia. 38Lɛ hu e ba ngɛ jamɛ a ngmlɛfia a mi nɔuu, nɛ e ba je Mawu yi, nɛ e tu jokuɛ ɔ he munyu ngɔ tsɔɔ nihi tsuo nɛ ngɛ Yerusalem kpɔmi ɔ blɔ hyɛe ɔ.
A kpale kɛ ho Nazaret ya
39Nɛ benɛ a gbe ni ɔmɛ tsuo nya ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ Mlaa a nya a, a kpale a se kɛ ho Nazaret, mɛ nitsɛmɛ a ma a mi, ya ngɛ Galilea. 40Nɛ jokuɛ ɔ ba wa, nɛ e he wa ngɛ mumi mi, nɛ e hyi tɔ kɛ nile, nɛ Mawu dloomi ngɛ e nɔ.
Yesu ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ
41Daa jeha a, Yesu fɔli ɔmɛ yaa Yerusalem ya yeɔ Hetsɔmi nyami ligbi ɔ. 42Nɛ benɛ e ye jeha nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ, a ya Yerusalem kaa bɔ nɛ nyami ligbi ɔ yemi blɔ nya toɔmi ngɛ ɔ. 43Nɛ benɛ a gbe ligbi ɔmɛ a nya nɛ a kpale a se ekohu ɔ, jokuɛ Yesu ɔ kpɛ se ngɛ Yerusalem, nɛ e fɔli ɔmɛ li. 44Se a susu kaa e futu asafo ɔ kɛ ho, nɛ a nyɛɛ ligbi kake blɔ nyɛɛmi ya hia lɛ ngɛ a wekuli kɛ a huɛmɛ ɔmɛ a ngɔ. 45Nɛ benɛ a nɛ́ lɛ ɔ, a kpale a se kɛ ba Yerusalem ekohu ba hia lɛ. 46Nɛ e ba mi kaa ligbi etɛ se ɔ, a ya na lɛ ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ nɛ e hii si ngɛ tsɔɔli ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɛ e ngɛ mɛ tue bue, nɛ e ngɛ mɛ ni bie. 47Nɛ nihi tsuo nɛ ngɛ lɛ tue bue ɔ nya kpɛ a he ngɛ e ni lemi kɛ e heto nɛ e ngɛ hae ɔmɛ a he. 48Nɛ benɛ a na lɛ ɔ, a nya kpɛ a he; e nyɛ bi lɛ ke: “Ye bi, mɛ he je o pee wɔ kikɛ? Oʼɛ, i kɛ o tsɛ hia mo kɛ hɛdɔ.” 49Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Mɛ he je nyɛ ngɛ mi hlae? Anɛ nyɛ li kaa e sa kaa ma hi si ngɛ nihi nɛ ji tsaatsɛ nɔ ɔ mi lo?” 50Se mɛɛ lɛɛ a nui munyu nɛ e kɛ mɛ tu ɔ sisi. 51Nɛ e kɛ mɛ pue nɔ kɛ ho Nazaret ya, nɛ e ba e he si ha mɛ. Nɛ e nyɛ ngɔ kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo ngɔ to e tsui mi. 52Nɛ Yesu wa ngɛ ni lemi kɛ nɔmlɔ tso mi, nɛ Mawu kɛ nimli na e he bua jɔmi.

Title: LUKA 3
Content:
Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ fiɛmi
(Mateo 3.1-12; Marko 1.1-8; Yohane 1.19-28)
1Jeha nɛ ɔ, Kaisare Tiberio matsɛ yemi jeha nɛ ji nyɔngma kɛ enuɔ ɔ mi, benɛ Pontio Pilato ngɛ amlaalo yee ngɛ Yudea, nɛ Herode ngɛ amlaalo nɔkɔtɔma yee ngɛ Galilea, nɛ e nyɛmi Filipo hu ngɛ matsɛ ngua yee ngɛ Iturea kɛ Trakɛniti zugba amɛ a nɔ, nɛ Lisania ngɛ amlaalo nɔkɔtɔma yee ngɛ Abileene, 2nɛ Anna kɛ Kaiafa ngɛ osofɔ nikɔtɔmahi yee ɔ, Mawu munyu ba Zakaria bi Yohane ngɔ ngɛ nga a nɔ. 3Nɛ e kpa Yordan kpo ɔmɛ tsuo a mi nɛ e fiɛ baptisimi nɛ a kɛ naa tsui tsakemi kɛ yayami pami; 4kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma ngɛ gbalɔ Yesaia womi ɔ mi ke:
“Nɔ ko ngɛ ngmlaa kpae ngɛ nga a nɔ ke:
‘Nyɛ dla Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ blɔ ɔ,
Nyɛ ha e blɔ ngua amɛ nɛ a da tlɔmɔɔ.
5A maa tsi dɔgba tsuaa dɔgba,
Nɛ a ma ha yoku tsuaa yoku
Kɛ kpongu tsuaa kpongu maa ba si,
Nɛ a ma ha nihi nɛ kpɛ ɔmɛ maa da,
Nɛ blɔ nɛ nɔ ngɛ googãgoogã a maa sɔ;
6Nɛ he lo tsuo kulaa maa na Mawu yiwami hemi ɔ.’ ”
7Kɛkɛ nɛ e de asafo ɔmɛ nɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ e baptisi mɛ ɔ ke: “Sinɔhi a nina, mɛnɔ tu munyu tsɔɔ nyɛ ke nyɛɛ tu muklii mi fumi nɛ ma a nya fo? 8Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛɛ wo yiblii nɛ sa tsui tsakemi; nɛ nyɛ ko bɔni demi ngɛ nyɛ yi mi ke: ‘Wa tsɛ ji Abraham,’ ejakaa i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, Mawu ma nyɛ ma tle bimɛ a si kɛ je tɛ nɛ ɔmɛ a mi ngɔ ha Abraham. 9Se jeha nɛ ɔ hu, gbiɛ ɔ fɔɔ si ngɛ tso ɔmɛ a sipoku ɔmɛ a nɔ momo; lɔ ɔ he ɔ, tso tsuaa tso nɛ wui yiblii kpakpahi ɔ, a maa po nɛ a ma sake ngɔ fɔ la mi.”
10Nɛ asafo ɔmɛ bi lɛ ke: “Lɛɛ mɛni waa pee mɔ?” 11Nɛ e he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nɔ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe tade enyɔ ɔ, e kɛ nɔ nɛ be eko ɔ nɛ dla; nɛ nɔ nɛ ngɛ ngma hu, e pee ja nɔuu.” 12Nɛ onia tsuli hu ba konɛ a baptisi mɛ, nɛ a bi lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, mɛni waa pee?” 13Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ko he pe bɔ nɛ a to ha nyɛ ɔ.” 14Nɛ aslaafohi hu ba bi lɛ ke: “Nɛ wɔ hu, mɛni waa pee?” Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ko hɛɛ nɔ ko soisoi, nɛ nyɛ ko po nɔ ko nya yaka gu; nɛ nyɛ ha nyɛ hiɔwo nɛ sa nyɛ hɛ mi.”
15Se benɛ ma a tsuo hɛ ngɛ nɔ, nɛ ni ɔmɛ tsuo ngɛ susue ngɛ a tsui mi ngɛ Yohane he kaa be nɛ ɔ mi ɔ lɛ ji Kristo ɔ, 16Yohane he nɔ nɛ e de ni ɔmɛ tsuo ke: “Imi lɛɛ, nyu i kɛ baptisi nyɛ; se nɔ ko nɛ he wa pe mi ma, nɛ i sɛ nɔ nɛ pɛneɔ e tokotahi a nya kpa, lɛ e kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu kɛ la maa baptisi nyɛ, 17nɔ nɛ hɛɛ e nɔ mi sami tsine ngɛ e dɛ, nɛ e maa bɛɛ zugba a fitsofitso, nɛ e ma bua ngma a nya ngɔ to e gba a mi, se tsakati ɔ, e kɛ la nɛ gbo we maa sã.”
18Nɛ e de ni kpa komɛ fuu hu kɛ wo mɛ ga, kɛ fiɛ Sane Kpakpa a tsɔɔ mɛ, 19Se amlaalo nɔkɔtɔma Herode ɔ, akɛnɛ Yohane ka e hɛ mi ngɛ e nyɛmi Filipo yo Herodia a he, kɛ ni yayahi tsuo nɛ lɛ Herode ɔ pee he je ɔ, 20e kpale pee enɛ ɔ ngɔ si nɔ kaa e nu Yohane ngɔ wo tsu mi.
Yesu baptisimi
(Mateo 3.13-17; Marko 1.9-11)
21E ba mi kaa benɛ a baptisi ni ɔmɛ tsuo ɔ, a baptisi Yesu hulɔ; nɛ benɛ e ngɛ sɔlee ɔ, hiɔwe nya bli 22nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ kple si kɛ su nɛ ngɛ kaa okpo kɛ ba e nɔ. Nɛ gbi ko je hiɔwe de ke: “Mo ji ye suɔmi bi ɔ nɛ, mo o he ye tsui ngɛ!”
Yesu Wekukpa
(Mateo 1.1-17)
23Nɛ benɛ Yesu je e ni tsumi sisi ɔ, e ye maa pee jeha nyingmi etɛ, nɛ bɔ nɛ a susuu ɔ, e ji Yosef bi, Heli bi, 24Matat bi, Levi bi, Melki bi, Yanai bi Yosef bi, 25Matatia bi, Amos bi, Nahum bi, Esli bi, Nagai bi, 26Maat bi, Matatia bi, Semein bi, Yosek bi, Yoda bi, 27Yohanan bi, Resa bi, Zerubabel bi, Shealtiel bi, Neri bi, 28Melki bi, Adi bi, Kosam bi, Elamadam bi, Er bi, 29Yoshua bi, Eliezer bi, Yorim bi, Matat bi, Levi bi, 30Simeon bi, Yuda bi, Yosef bi, Yonam bi, Eliakim bi, 31Melea bi, Mena bi, Matata bi, Natan bi, David bi, 32Ishai bi, Obed bi, Boaɛ bi, Salmon bi, Nahashon bi, 33Aminadab bi, Admin bi, Arni bi, Hezron bi, Perez bi, Yuda bi, 34Yakob bi, Isak bi, Abraham bi, Tera bi, Nahor bi. 35Serug bi, Reu bi, Peleg bi, Eber bi, Shela bi, 36Kainan bi, Arpakshad bi, Shem bi, Noa bi, Lamek bi, 37Metusela bi, Henok bi, Yared bi, Mahalalel bi, Kainan bi, 38Enos bi, Set bi, Adam bi, Mawu bi.

Title: LUKA 4
Content:
A ka Yesu
(Mateo 4.1-11; Marko 1.12-13)
1Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu, nɛ Mumi klɔuklɔu ɔ hyi lɛ tɔ ɔ kpale e 2se kɛ je Yordan he, nɛ Mumi ɔ kpaka lɛ kɛ ya nga a nɔ, nɛ abosiami ya ka lɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ligbi nyingmi eywiɛ. Nɛ lɛ be ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, e yi nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko nɛ lɔ ɔ se ɔ hwɔ ye lɛ.
3Nɛ abosiami de lɛ ke: “Ke Mawu bi ji mo ɔ, lɛɛ de tɛ nɛ ɔ nɛ e plɛ abolo.” 4Nɛ Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “A ngma ke: Ti abolo kɛke nɔ nɛ nɔmlɔ guu kɛ hii si.’ ”
5Kɛkɛ nɛ abosiami ngɔ lɛ kɛ ya yo gaga ko nɔ, nɛ e ngɔ je mi matsɛ yemi ɔmɛ tsuo ngɔ tsɔɔ lɛ hɛngmɛfia. 6Abosiami de lɛ ke: Mo ma ngɔ hewami nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo kɛ a nyami ɔmɛ ngɔ ha, ejakaa imi a ngɔ ha, nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ i suɔ ɔ, lɛ i kɛ haa. 7Kɛ o ma kpla si nɛ o ja mi ɔ, enɛ ɔmɛ tsuo kulaa maa pee o nɔ.” 8Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “A ngma ke: ‘Ja Nyɔmtsɛ o Mawu ɔ, nɛ lɛ kɛkɛ o sɔmɔ.’ ”
9Kɛkɛ nɛ abosiami ngɔ Yesu kɛ ba Yerusalem nɛ e kɛ lɛ ba da sɔlemi tsu ɔ yi mi poplooplo ɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Ke Mawu bi ji mo ɔ, sakee o he ngɔ fia si, 10ejakaa a ngma ke: ‘Mawu ma fã e bɔfo ɔmɛ nɛ a bu o he,’ 11kɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu: ‘A maa hɛɛ mo ngɛ a dɛ mi konɛ o nane ko si tɛ ko.’ ” 12Se Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “A de ke: ‘Koo ka Nyɔmtsɛ o Mawu ɔ.’ ” 13Benɛ abosiami ka lɛ ngɛ blɔ nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo a nɔ ɔ, e si lɛ lolo.
Yesu je e nitsumi sisi ngɛ Galilea
(Mateo 4.12-17; Marko 1.14-15)
14Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu kpale e se ngɛ Mumi ɔ nya kɛ ba Galilea; nɛ e he sane jije ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi tsuo. 15E tsɔɔ ni ngɛ a kpe he ɔmɛ, nɛ ni ɔmɛ tsuo je e yi.
A kua Yesu ngɛ Nazaret
(Mateo 13.53-58; Marko 6.1-6)
16Nɛ Yesu ba Nazaret he nɛ a lɛ lɛ ngɛ ɔ, nɛ kaa bɔ nɛ e pɔɔ peemi ɔ, e ya kpe he ɔ ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ. E te si konɛ e kane ni, nɛ 17a ngɔ gbalɔ Yesaia womi ɔ ngɔ sɔle lɛ. Nɛ benɛ e bli womi ɔ mi ɔ, e na he nɛ a ngma ngɛ ke:
18“Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mumi ɔ ngɛ ye nɔ.
Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e pɔ mi nu konɛ ma fiɛ
Sane Kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ ohiafohi,
Konɛ ma fiɛ he yemi ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɔgue ɔmɛ,
Kɛ nɔ́ hyemi ha hɛyuyuili.
19Nɛ ma fiɛ jeha ko nɛ sa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi.”
20Nɛ e hluɛ womi ɔ nɛ e ngɔ ha sɔmɔlɔ ɔ, nɛ e be ya hi si; nɛ ni ɔmɛ tsuo nɛ ngɛ kpe he ɔ bɔni lɛ hyemi too. 21Kɛkɛ nɛ e kɛ mɛ bɔni munyu tumi ke; “Mwɔnɛ ɔ ngmami nɛ ɔ ba mi ngɛ nyɛ hɛ mi.” 22Nɛ nihi tsuo ye lɛ odase, nɛ a nya kpɛ a he ngɛ dloomi munyuhi nɛ je e nya a he, nɛ a de ke: “Anɛ pi Yosef bi nyumu ɔ ji nɛ ɔ?” 23Se e de mɛ ke: “Bɔ tsuaa bɔ nɛ pee ɔ nyɛ maa bu mi abɛ nɛ ɔ ke: ‘Tsopatsɛ, tsa mo nitse o he! Nihi abɔ nɛ wa nu kaa o pee ngɛ Kapernaum ɔ, pee ngɛ hiɛ ɔ nɛ ji mo nitse o ma a mi hulɔ.’ ” 24Nɛ e ya nɔ nɛ e de ke: “Niinɛ i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke a bui gbalɔ ko ngɛ lɛ nitse e ma mi. 25Se i ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Yalɔ yi fuu ngɛ Israel ngɛ Elia yinɔ ɔ benɛ a nga hiɔwe nya jeha etɛ kɛ hlami ekpa sɔuu nɛ hwɔ ngua ba zugba a tsuo nɔ ɔ; 26se a tsɔ we Elia kɛ yɛ́ a ti nɔ ko nɔ ko ngɔ kaa ja yalɔ yo ko nɛ ngɛ Zarefat ngɛ Zidon zugba a nɔ ɔ ngɔ. 27Nɛ tsitsɛmɛ fuu ngɛ Israel ngɛ gbalɔ Elisha be ɔ mi, se a tsa we a ti nɔ ko nɔ ko kaa ja Naeman, Siriano ɔ.” 28Nɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ kpe he ɔ tsuo a muklii mi fu benɛ a nu enɛ ɔ ɔ. 29A te si nɛ a tsitsɛɛ le kɛ je ma a mi, nɛ a kpaka lɛ kɛ ho yoku nɛ a ma a maa si ngɛ nɔ ɔ nya ya. 30Se e gblee a kpɛti zaa kɛ je.
Nyumu ko nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ e mi
(Marko 1.21-28)
31Nɛ Yesu ba Kapernaum, ma ko nɛ ngɛ Galilea a mi nɛ e tsɔɔ mɛ ni ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔmɛ a nɔ. 32Nɛ mɛ tsuo a nya kpɛ a he ngɛ e nitsɔɔmi ɔ he, ejakaa e munyu ɔ mi ngɛ hewami. 33Jeha nɛ ɔ nyumu ko ngɛ kpe he ɔ nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ e mi, nɛ e kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ ke: 34“Aa, mɛni sane waa kɛ mo ngɛ, mo Yesu Nazareno? O ba wa hɛ mi kpatami lo? I le nɔ nɛ ji mo, mo ji Mawu Nɔ Klɔuklɔu ɔ nɛ!” 35Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu nga e yi nɛ e ke: “Ma o nya nɛ o je e mi!” Mumi yayami ɔ sake lɛ ngɔ fɔ si ngɛ a hɛ mi, nɛ e je e mi, nɛ e yi lɛ awi ko, 36Ni ɔmɛ tsuo a he nya si mɛ, nɛ a de a he ke: “Mɛni munyu ji nɛ ɔ! Ejakaa he blɔ kɛ hewami e kɛ hiaa mumi yayami ɔmɛ nɛ a jee kpo ɔ nɛ!” 37Nɛ Yesu he sane gbɛ fia lejɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi tsuo.
Yesu tsa nihi fuu
(Mateo 8.14-17; Marko 1.29-34)
38Yesu je kpe he ɔ nɛ e ya sɛ Simon we ɔ mi. Jeha nɛ ɔ Simon nganyɛ fɔɔ si kɛ asla ku ko nɛ a kpa lɛ pɛɛ nɛ e pee he no ko. 39Yesu hɛ lɛ su hiɔtsɛ ɔ he nɛ e nga asla a yi, nɛ asla a po ngɛ e nɔ, nɛ amlɔ ɔ e te si nɛ e sɔmɔ mɛ.
40Pu si nɔmi be ɔ, nihi tsuo nɛ ngɛ nihi nɛ hiɔhi slɔɔtohi hɛɛ mɛ ɔ kɛ mɛ ba Yesu ngɔ. Nɛ e ngɔ e ninehi pue mɛ tsuo a nɔ kakaaka nɛ etsa mɛ. 41Mumi yayamihi hu je nihi fuu a mi nɛ a kpa ngmlaa ke: “Mo ji Mawu bi ɔ nɛ!” Nɛ e nga a yi nɛ e ngmɛ́ mɛ blɔ nɛ a de ke a le kaa lɛ ji Kristo ɔ.
Yesu fiɛ ngɛ Yudea
(Marko 1.35-39)
42Nɛ benɛ je na a, Yesu pue nɔ kɛ ho nga nɔ he ko ya. Asafo ɔ bɔni lɛ hlami nɛ benɛ a na lɛ ɔ, a hla kaa a tsi e nya konɛ e ko je a ngɔ. 43Se e de mɛ ke: “E sa kaa i ya fiɛɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ he Sane Kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ ma kpa kome hulɔ, ejakaa lɔ ɔ he a tsɔ mi kɛ ba ngɛ.” 44Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e tsa e fiɛmi ɔ nɔ ngɛ Yudea kpe he ɔmɛ.

Title: LUKA 5
Content:
Yesu tsɛ kekleekle kaseli ɔmɛ
(Mateo 4.18-22; Marko 1.16-20)
1Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ Yesu daa si ngɛ Genesaret Taku ɔ nya nɛ nihi fuu pueɔ si ngɛ e nɔ nɛ a ngɛ Mawu munyu ɔ tue bue ɔ, 2e na lɛ enyɔ nɛ a muɔ mɛ si ngɛ taku ɔ nya; se hɛli ɔmɛ je mi nɛ a ngɛ a ya amɛ a he fɔe. 3Yesu ya sɛ lɛ ɔ kake nɛ ji Simon nɔ ɔ mi, nɛ e kpa lɛ pɛɛ konɛ e tsɛ̃ kɛ ya hɛ mi bɔɔ. E be hi si nɛ e tsɔɔ mɛ ni kɛ je lɛ ɔ mi.
4Benɛ e jɔɔ munyu ɔ tumi ɔ, e de Simon ke: “Nyɛɛ tsɛ̃ kɛ ya he nɛ mi kuɔ ɔ nɛ nyɛɛ fɔ̃ nyɛ ya amɛ konɛ nyɛɛ gbe lo.” 5Simon de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, nyɔ nɛ ɔ mi tsuo ɔ wa tsu ni gbegbelii se wa nɛ nɔ́ ko; se kɛ ɔ, ngɛ o munyu ɔ nya a, ma fɔ̃ ya a.” 6Nɛ benɛ a pee ja a, a gbe lo babauu bɔ nɛ piɛ bɔɔ nɛ a ya amɛ ko gba. 7Lɔ ɔ he ɔ a fɔ a huɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ lɛ kpa a mi ɔ nine ke a ba nɛ a ba piɛ a he. A ba nɛ a ba wo lɛ enyɔ ɔme tsuo tɔtɔɔtɔ bɔ nɛ piɛ bɔɔ nɛ a ko mu. 8Benɛ Simon Petro na enɛ ɔ ɔ, e nɔ si ngɛ Yesu nane nya nɛ e ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ jee ye kasa nya, ejakaa yayami peelɔ ji mi!” 9Nɛ e kɛ nihi nɛ piɛ e he ɔ tsuo a he mi po ngɛ lo fuu nɛ a gbe ɔ he; 10nɛ ja nɔuu e pee Yakobo kɛ Yohane, Zebedeo bimɛ ɔmɛ nɛ ji Simon he piɛli ɔmɛ. Nɛ Yesu de Simon ke: “Koo ye gbeye! Kɛ je be nɛ ɔ kɛ yaa nɛ ɔ, o ma sa nimli.” 11Nɛ a kɛ lɛ ɔmɛ ba kple, nɛ a si kulaa nɛ a nyɛɛ e se.
Yesu hã tsitsɛ ko he tso
(Mateo 8.1-4; Marko 1.40-45)
12E ba mi kaa benɛ Yesu ngɛ ma a eko mi ɔ, nyumu ko nɛ tsi pue e he tsuo ngɛ lejɛ ɔ; benɛ e na Yesu ɔ, e kɛ e hɛ mi bu si nɛ e kpa lɛ pɛɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, ke o suɔ ɔ, o ma nyɛ kaa o haa ye he tsɔɔ.” 13Yesu kpa e nine mi nɛ e ta e he nɛ e ke: “I suɔ, o he nɛ tsɔ!” Nɛ amlɔ ɔ tsi ɔ ta ngɛ e he. 14Nɛ Yesu bɔ lɛ kɔkɔ ke: “Ko de nɔ ko, se mohu yaa nɛ o kɛ o he ya tsɔɔ osɔfo ɔ nɛ o sa bɔ ngɛ o he tsɔmi ɔ he kaa bɔ nɛ Mose wo kita a, konɛ e pee odase ngɔ ha ni ɔmɛ.’ 15Se e he sane ɔ gbɛ fia babauu mohu. Nihi fuu ba bua a he nya nɛ a ba bu lɛ tue nɛ a tsa a hiɔ ɔmɛ. 16Se ke pee ɔ, e sãa e he si kɛ yaa nga a nɔ he komɛ banee nɛ e ya sɔlee.
Yesu tsa nyumu ko nɛ hule
(Mateo 9.1-8; Marko 2.1-12)
17Jeha nɛ ɔ, ligbi ɔ eko nɔ nɛ Yesu ngɛ ni tsɔɔe ɔ, Farisifohi kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli nɛ je Galilea kɛ Yudea ma amɛ tsuo nɔ kɛ Yerusalem ba a hii si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ. Nɛ a je Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hewami ɔ kpo tsɔɔ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ e kɛ tsa hiɔtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ. 18Nɛ oʼɛ, ni komɛ kɛ nyumu ko nɛ hule nɛ fɔɔ si ngɛ sa nɔ ba, nɛ a ngɛ hlae nɛ a kɛ lɛ nɛ sɛ we ɔ mi konɛ a kɛ lɛ ba fɔ e hɛ mi. 19Nɛ benɛ a nɛ́ bɔ nɛ a maa pee nɛ a kɛ lɛ maa ba ngɛ asafo ɔ he ɔ, a kuɔ kɛ ya tsu ɔ yi mi, nɛ a kpɔ siaudo ɔ nɔ zu ɔ, nɛ a siu lɛ kɛ e sa a kɛ gu mi kɛ ya fɔ̃ ni ɔma a kpɛti ngɛ Yesu hɛ mi. 20Benɛ Yesu na a hemi kɛ yemi ɔ, e de hiɔtsɛ ɔ ke: “Maminyumu, a ngɔ o he yayami ɔmɛ ngɔ pa mo.” 21Mlaatsɔɔli ɔmɛ kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ bɔni susumi ke: “Mɛnɔ ji nɔ nɛ ɔ nɛ tuɔ musu bɔmi munyu nɛ ɔ? Mɛnɔ ma nyɛ yayamihi kɛ pa kaa ja Mawu kɛkɛ?” 22Se benɛ Yesu kpa a susumi ɔmɛ si ɔ, e bi mɛ ke: “Mɛni nyɛ ngɛ susue ngɛ nyɛ tsui mi ɔ? 23Te nɔ́ nɛ demi wɛ hu? Nɔ́ nɛ a ma de ke: ‘A ngɔ o he yayami ɔmɛ ngɔ pa mo,’ aloo nɔ́ nɛ a ma de ke: ‘Tee si nɛ o nyɛɛ ɔ?’ 24Se benɛ pee nɛ nyɛɛ le kaa Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ngɛ he blɔ ngɛ zugba a nɔ kaa e ngɔɔ yayamihi ngɔ paa a,” e de nɔ nɛ hule ɔ ke: “I ngɛ mo dee ke: ‘Tee si nɛ o wo o sa a nɛ o ya o we mi.’ ” 25Nɛ amlɔ ɔ nyumu ɔ te si ngɛ a hɛ mi nɛ e wo nɔ́ nɛ e hwɔɔ si ngɛ nɔ ɔ nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho e we mi ya kɛ Mawu hɛ mi nyami womi. 26Nɛ mɛ tsuo a nya kpɛ a he, nɛ a wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami nɛ a ye gbeye wawɛɛ nɛ a ke: “Wa na nyakpɛ ni mwɔnɛ ɔ.”
Yesu tsɛ Levi
(Mateo 9.9-13; Marko 2.13-17)
27Ni nɛ ɔmɛ a se ɔ, Yesu je kpo nɛ e ya na onia tsulɔ ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Levi nɛ e hii si ngɛ onia tsumi he ɔ, nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ye se.’ ” 28Nɛ e si e ni ɔmɛ tsuo, nɛ e te si nyɛɛ e se.
29Levi ngmɛ okplɔɔ ngua ngɛ e we ɔ mi ha Yesu, nɛ onia tsuli kɛ ni kpahi fuu kɛ mɛ ba ye ni. 30Nɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ tu munyu huitihuiti wo e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nyɛɛ kɛ onia tsuli kɛ yayami peeli ngɛ ni yee nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ mɛ ngɛ nue nɛ ɔ?” 31Yesu ha heto nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nihi nɛ ngɛ hewami ɔ, e hia we mɛ tsopatsɛ, se nihi nɛ ngɛ gboe ɔ mohu e hia. 32I bɛ dali a tsemi, se mohu yayami peeli kɛ ha tsui tsakemi.”
Hwɔhami he sane
(Mateo 9.14-17; Marko 2.18-22)
33Kɛkɛ nɛ a bi Yesu ke: “Mɛ he je nɛ Yohane kaseli ɔmɛ pɔɔ hwɔ hami kɛ sɔlemi, nɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a kaseli ɔmɛ hu peɔ ja nɔuu, nɛ moo lɛɛ o kaseli ɔmɛ yeɔ ni nɛ a nuu ɔ?” 34Yesu de mɛ ke: “Anɛ nyɛ ma nyɛ ha yo kpeemi he biali ɔmɛ nɛ a ha hwɔ benɛ ayɛflo huno ɔ kɛ mɛ ngɛ lolo nɛ ɔ? 35Be maa ba nɛ a maa ngɔ ayɛflo huno ɔ kɛ maa je a ngɔ, nɛ lɛ be ɔ loko a maa ha hwɔ.”
36Yesu bu mɛ abɛ nɛ ɔ hulɔ ke: “Nɔ ko gba we bo he nya kɛ ta we tade momo mi; se ke a pee ja a, e ma gba ehe ɔ, nɛ bo nya nɛ a je ngɛ ehe ɔ nya a kɛ momo ɔ ya be yee. 37Nɛ nɔ ko ngɔɛ wai he wui lohwe he womi tɔ momohi a mi se ke a pee ja a, wai he ɔ ma pɛ lohwe he womi tɔ ɔmɛ nɛ e ma pue si, nɛ lohwe he womi tɔ ɔmɛ hu ma puɛ. 38Wai he ɔ, lohwe he womi tɔ hehi a mi a kɛ woɔ. 39Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu nɔ ko nui wai momo nɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔuu ɔ nɛ e hla ehe, ejakaa e deɔ ke: ‘Momo ɔ hi.’ ”

Title: LUKA 6
Content:
Hejɔɔmi ligbi ɔ he sane
(Mateo 12.1-8; Marko 2.23-28)
1Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ko nɔ ɔ, Yesu ya gu blɛfo ngmɔhi a mi nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ sake blɛfo tso mumu ɔ nɛ a hlue nɛ a kpe. 2Farisifo ɔmɛ ekomɛ bi mɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nyɛ ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ e dɛ blɔ kaa a peɔ ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ pee nɛ ɔ?” 3Nɛ Yesu ha mɛ heto ke: “Anɛ nyɛ kane we nɔ nɛ David pee, benɛ hwɔ ye lɛ kɛ nihi nɛ piɛ e he ɔ, 4bɔ nɛ e sɛ Mawu we ɔ nɛ e ya kukuɔ abolo nɛ a kɛ maa Mawu hɛ mi nɛ e dɛ blɔ kaa a yeɔ kaa ja osɔfo ɔmɛ kɛkɛ ɔ, nɛ e ye nɛ e kɛ e ko ha nihi nɛ piɛ e he ɔ hulɔ ɔ?” 5Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ tete nyɔmtsɛ ji Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ nɛ.”
Nyumu nɛ nine kake gbo ɔ
(Mateo 12.9-14; Marko 3.1-6)
6Jeha nɔ, Hejɔɔmi Ligbi kpa ko hu nɔ ɔ, Yesu ya kpe he ɔ nɛ e ya tsɔɔ ni. Nɛ nyumu ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ e hiɛ ɔ nine gbo. 7Se Mlaatsɔɔli ɔmɛ kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ huɔ lɛ kaa e ma tsa hiɔ ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ lo, konɛ a na nɔ́ ko nɛ a da nɔ kɛ ya po e nyɛ. 8Se Yesu le a susumi ɔmɛ nɛ e de nyumu nɛ nine gbo ɔ ke: “Tee si ba da kpɛti!” Nɛ e te si ba da si. 9Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Ma bi nyɛ nɔ́ ko; anɛ e da blɔ ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ kaa a peɔ kpakpa loo yayami, kaa a heɔ nɔ yiwami loo a kpataa e hɛ mi?” 10Nɛ e hyɛ mɛ tsuo a hɛ mi kɛ kpe, nɛ e de nyumu ɔ ke: “Kpa o nine ɔ mi!” E pee ja, nɛ a tsa e nine ɔ. 11Se mɛɛ lɛɛ a gli nɛ a bɔni Yesu he ga tomi bɔ nɛ a maa pee lɛ ha.
Yesu hla bɔfohi nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ
(Mateo 10.1-4; Marko 3.13-19)
12Jeha nɛ ɔ, e ba mi ngɛ jamɛ a be ɔmi kaa Yesu pue nɔ kɛ ho yoku ɔ nɔ ya nɛ e ya sɔle, nɛ e fɔ nyɔ kɛ sɔle kɛ tsɛ Mawu. 13Nɛ benɛ je na a, e tsɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ kɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ e hla a kpɛti ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ, ninɛmɛ nɛ e tsɛ mɛ bɔfohi hulɔ ɔ: 14Simon nɔ nɛ e wo lɛ Petro hulɔ ɔ, kɛ e nyɛmi Andrea; Yakobo kɛ Yohane, Filipo kɛ Bartolomeo; 15Mateo kɛ Toma; Yakobo, Alfeo bi ɔ, kɛ Simon, nɔ nɛ a tsɛɛ Zelote (Hɛdɔlɔ) ɔ; 16Yuda, Yakobo nyɛmi ɔ, kɛ Yuda Iskariot, nɔ nɛ ba plɛ seblɔtsɔɔlɔ ɔ.
Yesu tsɔɔ ni nɛ e tsa nihi
(Mateo 4.23-25)
17Nɛ Yesu kɛ mɛ kple si kɛ ba, nɛ a ba da he ko gbajaa kɛ e kaseli asafo ɔ, kɛ nihi fuu nɛ je Yudea tsuo kɛ Yerusalem kɛ Tiro kɛ Zidon wo nya ma amɛ a mi nɛ ma lɛ tue bumi kɛ a hiɔhi a tsami ɔ, 18kɛ nihi nɛ mumi yayamihi ngɛ mɛ haoe ɔ, nɛ e tsa mɛ. 19Nɛ asafo mluku ɔ tsuo ngɛ hlae nɛ a ta e he, ejakaa hewami ngɛ e mi jee kɛ ngɛ mɛ tsuo tsae.
Buajɔmi kɛ kɔmɔyemi
(Mateo 5.1-12)
20Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu plɛ e hɛ ngɔ tsɔɔ e kaseli ɔmɛ nɛ e ke:
“A gbaa nyɛ, ohiafo ɔmɛ;
ejakaa nyɛ nɔ́ ji Mawu matsɛyemi ɔ nɛ.
21“A gbaa nyɛ nihi nɛ hwɔ ngɛ nyɛ yee amlɔ nɛ ɔ;
ejakaa a ma ha nyɛ maa tɔ.
“A gba nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ ya foe amlɔ nɛ ɔ;
ejakaa nyɛ maa muɔ.
22“A gbaa nyɛ, ke nihi nyɛ nyɛ, nɛ a kɛ nyɛ po tako mi, nɛ a jɛ nyɛ, nɛ a po nyɛ biɛ mi kaa biɛ yaya ngɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ he ɔ. 23Nyɛ nya ngɛ jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ tuu kɛ buajɔmi ejakaa oʼɛ, nyɛ hiɔwo ngɛ hiɔwe; ejakaa ja nɔuu a tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ pee gbali ɔmɛ.
24“Se nyɛ niatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, musu tloo nyɛ;
ejaka nyɛ na nyɛ buawomi momo.’
25“Musu tloo nyɛ, nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ tɔ amlɔ nɛ ɔ;
ejakaa hwɔ maa ye nyɛ.
Musu tloo nyɛ, nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ
muɔe amlɔ nɛ ɔ;
ejakaa nyɛ maa ye kɔmɔ nɛ nyɛ
ma fo ya.
26“Musu tloo nyɛ ke nihi tsuo tu nyɛ he munyu kpakpa a, ejakaa ja nɔuu a tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ pee lakpa gbali ɔmɛ!”
Henyɛli a suɔmi
(Mateo 5.38-48; 7.12)
27“Se nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ tue bue nɛ ɔ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nyɛɛ suɔ nyɛ henyɛli; nyɛɛ pee nihi nɛ nyɛɛ nyɛ ɔ kpakpa. 28Nyɛɛ gbaa nihi nɛ gbiɛɛ nyɛ; nyɛɛ sɔle ha nihi nɛ waa nyɛ yi mi. 29Nɔ nɛ ma gba o tue kake mi ma a, plɛ kake ɔ hu ngɔ ha lɛ; nɛ nɔ nɛ ma kpɔ o nɔ bɔ ɔ, koo nyɛ lɛ o gugue tade ɔ hu he. 30Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ baa mo nɔ́ ko ɔ, ha lɛ; nɛ nɔ nɛ ma kpɔ o nihi ɔ, ko bi lɛ hu. 31Nɛ bɔ nɛ nyɛ hlaa kaa nihi nɛ pee ngɔ ha nyɛ ɔ, nyɛ hu nyɛɛ pee ja nɔuu ngɔ ha mɛ.
32“Nɛ ke nyɛ suɔ nihi nɛ suɔ nyɛ ɔ, mɛni sina nyɛ ngɛ? Ejakaa yayami peeli hu suɔ nihi nɛ suɔ mɛ. 33Nɛ ke nyɛ peɔ kpakpa ha nihi nɛ peɔ nyɛ kpakpa a, mɛni sina nyɛ ngɛ? Ejakaa yayami peeli hu peɔ ja nɔuu. 34Nɛ ke nyɛɛ kɛ nihi pa nihi nɛ nyɛ hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa a ma ha nyɛ ekohu ɔ, mɛni sina nyɛ ngɛ? Ejakaa yayami peeli hu kɛ nihi paa yayami peeli konɛ a na ja bɔ nɔuu. 35Mohu nyɛɛ suɔ nyɛ henyɛli, nɛ nyɛɛ pee kpakpa nɛ nyɛɛ pa nɛ nyɛ ko hyɛ nɔ́ ko blɔ kulaa, nɛ nyɛ hiɔwo maa hiɛ, nɛ nyɛ ma plɛ Hiɔweno ɔ bimɛ, ejakaa e muklii mi jɔɔ haa tlumuhi kɛ nimli yayamihi. 36Nyɛɛ na mɔbɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ Nyɛ Tsɛ ɔ hu naa mɔbɔ ɔ.”
Kojomi yaya
(Mateo 7.1-5)
37“Nyɛ ko kojo konɛ a ko kojo nyɛ; nyɛ ko bu fɔ, konɛ a ko bu nyɛ fɔ; nyɛ kɛ pa, nɛ a kɛ maa pa nyɛ. 38Nyɛ ha, nɛ a ma ha nyɛ; susumi nɔ́ kpakpa nɛ a nyɛ nɔ nɛ a mimiɛ nɛ e hyi kɛ be nɔ nihi ma ngɔ pue nyɛ tɛ nɔ; ejakaa susumi nɔ́ nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ susuu ɔ, lɔɔ a maa kpale ngɔ susu ha nyɛ.” 39Nɛ Yesu bu mɛ abɛ ko hu ke: “Anɛ hɛyuyuilɔ ma nyɛ tsɔɔ hɛyuyuilɔ blɔ lo? Anɛ pi muɔ mi nɛ mɛ ni enyɔ ɔ tsuo a maa ya nɔ? 40Kaselɔ pa we e tsɔɔlɔ; se nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ a tsɔse lɛ kɛ pi si ɔ maa pee kaa e tsɔɔlɔ.
41“Mɛ he je o naa ngu nyafii nɛ ngɛ o nyɛmi hɛngmɛ nɔ ɔ, nɛ plai nɛ ngɛ mo nitse o hɛngmɛ nɔ ɔ lɛɛ o yo we ɔ? 42Kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ o ma nyɛ de o nyɛmi ke: ‘Mami, ha ma je ngu nyafii nɛ ngɛ o hɛngmɛ nɔ ɔ,’ benɛ o nɛ plai nɛ ngɛ mo nitse o hɛngmɛ nɔ ɔ? osatotsɛ, je plai ɔ ngɛ mo nitsɛ o hɛngmɛ nɔ kekle, nɛ lɔ ɔ loko o maa na paa nɛ o je ngu nyafii ɔ ngɛ o nyɛmi ɔ hɛngmɛ nɔ.
Tso kɛ e yiblii
(Mateo 7.16-20; 12.33-35)
43“Ejakaa tso kpakpa ko be nɛ woɔ yiblii yaya, nɛ jeha nɔ hu tso yaya ko hu be nɛ woɔ yiblii kpakpa. 44Ejakaa tso tsuaa tso nitsɛ yiblii a kɛ leɔ lɛ: Ejakaa a la we ngmɔkɔ ngɛ zezlehi a nɔ, nɛ pohu a la we wai yiblii ngɛ mio tsohi a nɔ. 45Nɔmlɔ kpakpa jeɔ nɔ́ kpakpa kɛ jee e tsui mi juetli kpakpa a mi, nɛ nɔmlɔ yayami hu jeɔ nɔ́ yaya kɛ jee e tsui mi juetli yaya a mi, ejakaa nɔ́ nɛ hyi nɔmlɔ tsui kɛ be nɔ ɔ, lɔ ɔ e nya deɔ.”
Tsumali enyɔ ɔ
(Mateo 7.24-27)
46“Se mɛ he je nyɛ tsɛɛ mi: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, Nyɔmtsɛ,’ nɛ nyɛ pee we nihi nɛ i deɔ ɔ? 47Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ baa ye ngɔ nɛ e nuɔ ye munyu ɔmɛ nɛ e yeɔ nɔ ɔ, ma tsɔɔ nyɛ bɔ nɛ e ngɛ ha: 48E ngɛ kaa nyumu ko nɛ benɛ e maa ma tsu ɔ, e tsua si voo nɛ e to sisi ngɛ tɛ sa nɔ; nɛ benɛ pa hia a, e si tsu ɔ, se e nyɛ we lɛ nɛ e hule, mɛni he je ɔ, a to sisi ngɛ tɛ sa nɔ. 49Se nɔ nɛ nuɔ nɛ e yi nɔ ɔ, e ngɛ kaa nyumu ko nɛ ma tsu ngɛ zugba hɛ mi nɛ a tui sisi; nɛ pa a si lɛ, nɛ amlɔ ɔ e hule, nɛ jamɛ a tsu ɔ hulemi ɔ kle.”

Title: LUKA 7
Content:
Yesu tsa Roma aslaafohi lafa a nyatsɛ ko wenyumu
(Mateo 8.5-13)
1Benɛ Yesu tu munyu ɔmɛ tsuo ngɔ wo ma a tue mi se ɔ, e sɛ Kapernaum. 2Jeha nɛ ɔ Roma aslaafohi lafa a nyatsɛ ko wenyumu nɛ e suɔ saminya ngɛ hiɔ nue nɛ e miɔ nɛ e ma gbo. 3Nɛ benɛ e nu Yesu he ɔ, e tsɔ Yudafo ɔmɛ a nikɔtɔmahi komɛ kɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ a bakpa lɛ pɛɛ ke e ba nɛ e ba tsa e wenyumu ɔ. 4Benɛ a ba Yesu ngɔ ɔ, a kpa lɛ pɛɛ wawɛɛ ke: “Nɔ nɛ o maa pee enɛ ɔ ngɔ ha a, e sa lɛ; 5ejakaa e suɔ wa ma a, nɛ kpe he ɔ, lɛ nɔuu lɛ e ma ha wɔ.” 6Nɛ Yesu kɛ mɛ ho. Nɛ benɛ e piɛ bɔɔ nɛ e maa su we ɔ mi ɔ, aslaafohi lafa a nyatsɛ ɔ tsɔ e huɛmɛ kɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ a ba de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, koo hao o he, ejakaa i sɛ nɔ nɛ o sɛɛ e kue mi; 7lɔ ɔ he hu nɛ i bui ye he kaa e sa mi kaa i baa o ngɔ ɔ nɛ, se mohu tu munyu kɛkɛ nɛ a ma tsa ye wenyumu ɔ. 8Ejakaa imi po nɛ i ji nɔmlɔ nɛ a yeɔ e nɔ ɔ, i ngɛ aslaafohi ngɛ ye sisi, nɛ ke i de nɔ nɛ ɔ ke: ‘Yaa’ a, e yaa; nɛ ke i de nɔ kpa hu ke: ‘Ba’ a, e baa; nɛ ke i de ye tsɔlɔ ke: ‘Pee enɛ ɔ’ ɔ, e peɔ.” 9Se benɛ Yesu nu ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, e hɛ mi pee lɛ yaa, nɛ e plɛ̃ e he nɛ e de asafo nɛ nyɛɛ e he ɔ ke: “I ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, Israel mi tete po i nɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ kle kaa enɛ ɔ lolo.” 10Nɛ benɛ tsɔli ɔmɛ kpale a se kɛ ba we ɔ mi ɔ, a ba na e wenyumu ɔ nɛ e na hewami.
Yesu tle yalɔyo ko bi nyumu ko si
11Nɛ je na nɔ ɔ, e ba mi kaa Yesu pue nɔ kɛ ho ma ko nɛ a tsɛɛ Nain ɔ mi ya, nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ a ti nihi fuu kɛ asafo babauu kɛ lɛ nyɛɛ. 12Nɛ benɛ e su ma a agbo ɔ nyɛ tã a, oʼɛ a tloo nɔ gbogboe ko kɛ ngɛ kpo jee nɛ e nyɛ bi kake pɛ ji lɛ, nɛ yalɔyo ji yo ɔ, nɛ ma a mi bihi fuu piɛ e he. 13Nɛ benɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ na lɛ ɔ, e mi mi sa lɛ ngɛ e he, nɛ e de lɛ ke “Ko fo ya!” 14Nɛ e ba nɛ e ba pɛtɛ daka a he nɛ nihi nɛ tloo ɔ da si. Nɛ Yesu ke: “Niheyo, i ngɛ mo de ke: Tee si!” 15Nɛ nɔ nɛ gbo ɔ te si hi si, nɛ e bɔni munyu tumi; nɛ e ngɔ lɛ ha e nyɛ. 16Nɛ gbeye nu mɛ tsuo, nɛ a wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami ke: “Gbalɔ kpetekpleenyɛ te si ngɛ wa kpɛti, nɛ Mawu ba slaa e ma a.” 17Nɛ Yesu he sane nɔ jije ngɛ Yudea kɛ lejɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi tsuo.
Tsɔli nɛ je Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ ngɔ ɔ
(Mateo 11.2-19)
18Nɛ Yohane kaseli ɔmɛ ya sɛɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo ha lɛ, nɛ Yohane tsɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ a ti ni enyɔ, 19nɛ e tsɔ mɛ Yesu ngɔ ke: “Mo ji nɔ nɛ ma a, aloo waa hyɛ nɔ kpa blɔ?” 20Se benɛ nyumu ɔmɛ ba Yesu ngɔ ɔ, a ke: “Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ tsɔ wɔ o ngɔ ke: ‘Anɛ mo ji nɔ nɛ ma a, aloo waa hyɛ nɔ kpa blɔ’ ” 21Lɛ ngmlɛfia a nɔ nɔuu ɔ, e tsa nihi fuu a hiɔhi kɛ a hehiamihi kɛ mumi yayamihi, nɛ nihi fuu hu nɛ hɛ̃ yu ɔ, e ha a hyɛ nɔ. 22Nɛ Yesu ha tsɔli ɔmɛ heto ke: “Nyɛɛ ya nɛ nyɛ ya sɛɛ ha Yohane nihi nɛ nyɛ na nɛ nyɛ nu ɔ, kaa hɛyuyuili ngɛ nɔ hyɛe, nihi nɛ hule ngɛ nyɛɛe, tsitsɛmɛ a he ngɛ tsɔe, tuekpokuli ngɛ nɔ nuɛ, ni gbogboehi ngɛ si tee, nɛ a ngɛ Sane Kpakpa a fiɛe kɛ ngɛ ohiafohi tsɔɔe; 23nɛ a gbaa nɔ nɛ ye he sane be e nane kpatae ɔ.
24Benɛ Yohane tsɔli ɔmɛ je se ɔ, Yesu bɔni Yohane he munyu tumi kɛ asafo ɔmɛ tsɔɔmi ke: “Mɛni nyɛ je kpo ya hyɛ ngɛ ngɛ a nɔ ɔ? Glã nɛ kɔɔhiɔ ngɛ mimiɛe lo? 25Aloo mɛni hyɛmi ya nyɛ ho? Nɔmlɔ nɛ woɔ tade bɔdɔɔ? oʼɛ, nihi nɛ woɔ tade nɛ ngɛ fɛo nɛ a yeɔ ni kpakpahi ɔ, matsɛmɛ a wehi a mi a hii 26Aloo mɛni hyɛmi ya nyɛ ho? Gbalɔ lo?
