Ee, i ngɛ nyɛ de ke, nɔ nɛ pa gbalɔ tete. 27Nɔ nɛ ɔ he ji bɔ nɛ a ngma ngɛ ke: ‘Oʼɛ i ngɛ ye tsɔlɔ ɔ tsɔe kɛ sɛ o hlami, nɔ nɛ ma dla o blɔ ɔ ngɔ to mo ɔ.’ 28I ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nihi nɛ yihi fɔ ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ, gbalɔ ko be nɛ pã Yohane; se nɔ nɛ ji nyafii ngɛ Mawu matsɛyemi ɔ mi ɔ pã lɛ.”
29Nɛ ma a tsuo nɛ nu ɔ kɛ onia tsuli ɔmɛ bu Mawu bemi akɛnɛ a kɛ Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ baptisimi ɔ baptisi mɛ ɔ. 30Se Farisifo ɔmɛ kɛ mlaatsɔɔli ɔmɛ kua Mawu yi mi tomi nɛ e ngɛ ngɛ a he ɔ, akɛnɛ a ha we nɛ Yohane nɛ baptisi mɛ ɔ.
31“Jeha nɛ ɔ mɛni he ma ngɔ kikɛmɛ a yinɔbi nɛ ɔmɛ ngɔ to mɔ, nɛ a ngɛ kaa mɛni? 32A ngɛ kaa jokuɛwi nɛ hii si ngɛ jua nɔ, nɛ a ngɛ a sibi tsɛe ngɛ dee ke: ‘Wa kpã bɛ ha nyɛ, nɛ nyɛ dui; wa je ya ha nyɛ, nɛ nyɛ fo we.’ 33Ejakaa Yohane, baptisilɔ ɔ ba, nɛ e yi abolo, nɛ e nui wai, nɛ nyɛ ke: ‘Mumi yayami ngɛ e mi.’ 34Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ba nɛ e yeɔ ni nɛ e nuu nɔ́ ko, nɛ nyɛ ke: ‘Oʼɛ, nyumu jiklɔɔtsɛ kɛ danulɔ, onia tsuli kɛ yayami peeli a huɛ;’ 35Nɛ a bu Mawu ni lemi ɔ bemi ngɛ e bimɛ ɔmɛ tsuo a nya.”
Yesu ngɛ Simon Farisifono ɔ we ɔ mi
36Nɛ Farisifono ko tsɛ lɛ konɛ e kɛ lɛ ba ye ni. Nɛ e ya Farisifono ɔ we ɔ mi, nɛ e ya hi si ngɛ niyeni ɔ he. 37Nɛ oʼɛ, yo ko nɛ ji yayami peelɔ ngɛ ma a mi ɔ, benɛ e na le kaa e ngɛ ni yee ngɛ Farisifono ɔ we ɔ mi ɔ, e hɛɛ alabastro tɔ kɛ e mi tsopa kɛ e he via kɛ ba. 38Nɛ e ba da Yesu nane he ngɛ e se je, nɛ e fo ya, nɛ vo nyu ɔ pue e nane ɔmɛ a nɔ, nɛ e kɛ e yi bwɔmi tsu, nɛ e fiɔ e nane ɔmɛ a he, nɛ e kɛ tsopa kɛ e he via a kpa he. 39Se benɛ Farisifono ɔ nɛ tsɛ Yesu ni yemi ɔ na a, e de ngɛ e mi ke: “Nɔmlɔ nɛ ɔ gbalɔ ji lɛ jinɛ e maa le nɔ́ nɔmlɔ kɛ nɔ́ yo nɛ ngɛ e he tae nɛ ɔ kaa yayami peelɔ ji lɛ.” 40Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Simon, i ngɛ sane ko nɛ ma de mo.” Nɛ Simon ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, de!” 41“Ni fliilɔ ko ngɛ hiɔtsɛmɛ enyɔ; nɔ kake hɛɛ lɛ cedi lafa enuɔ, nɛ nɔ kake hu nyingmi enuɔ. 42Se akɛnɛ a be nɔ́ ko nɛ a kɛ maa wo ɔ, e ngɔ ke mɛ ni enyɔ ɔ tsuo. A ti mɛnɔ lɛ maa suɔ lɛ wawɛɛ?” 43Simon ha heto ke: “I susu kaa nɔ nɛ e ngɔ fuu ngɔ ke ɔ.” Nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “O bua he saminya.” 44Kɛkɛ nɛ e plɛ e hɛ mi ha yo ɔ, nɛ e de Simon ke: “O ngɛ kikɛmɛ a yo nɛ ɔ hyɛe? I ba sɛ o we ɔ mi nɛ ɔ, o hi mi nyu nɛ ma kɛ fɔ ye nane he, se yo nɛ ɔ kɛ vo nyu fɔ ye nane he, nɛ e kɛ e yi bwɔmi tsu. 45Ye nya hu o fiɔ we he; se kikɛmɛ a yo nɛ ɔ, kɛ je nɛ i ba nɛ ɔ tsuo nɛ ɔ ɔ, e jɔɔ we ye nane he fiɔmi. 46Nu hu o kɛ kpa we ye yi mi; se kikɛmɛ a yo nɛ ɔ ngɔ tsopa kɛ e he via kɛ kpa ye nane he. 47Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i ngɛ mo dee ke: E he yayamihi nɛ hiɛ ɔ, a kɛ pa lɛ, ejakaa e suɔmi ɔ kle, se nɔ nɛ a ngɔ nyafii ngɔ pa a, e suɔmi ɔ klee we.” 48Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de yo ɔ ke: “A ngɔ o he yayami ɔmɛ ngɔ pa mo!” 49Kɛkɛ nɛ nihi nɛ kɛ lɛ hii si ngɛ niyemi ɔ si ɔ bɔni demi ngɛ a yi mi ke: “Mɛnɔ po ji nɛ ɔ nɛ e ngɔɔ yayami ngɔ paa nɛ ɔ?” 50Se Yesu de yo ɔ ke: “O hemi kɛ yemi ɔ he o yiwami, yaa ngɛ hejɔmi mi!”

Title: LUKA 8
Content:
Yihi nɛ kɛ Yesu nyɛɛ
1Enɛ ɔ se ɔ, Yesu ya kpa mahi kɛ kɔpehi a mi nɛ e fiɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ he Sane Kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ nihi; nɛ e kaseli nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ piɛ e he, 2kɛ yi komɛ hu nɛ a hia a mumi yayamihi nɛ a tsa a hiɔhi: Maria, nɔ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Magdalena, nɔ nɛ mumi yayami kpaago je e mi ɔ, 3kɛ Yohana, Herode tsɔlɔ nɔkɔtɔma Kusa yo ɔ, kɛ Susana, kɛ ni kpahi fuu nɛ kɛ a nihi sɔmɔɔ mɛ ɔ.
Nidulɔ ɔ he abɛ ɔ
(Mateo 13.1-9; Marko 4.1-9)
4Benɛ asafo babauu ba bua a he nya nɛ nihi nɛ je ma slɔɔtohi a nɔ ɔ hu ba e ngɔ ɔ, e bu mɛ abɛ ke:
5“Nidulɔ ko pue nɔ kɛ ho e wuhi fiami ya. Nɛ benɛ e ngɛ wu ɔmɛ fiae ɔ, eko ya nɔ blɔ tue nɛ a naa nɔ, nɛ hiɔwe lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ ba ba kukuɔ. 6Eko ya nɔ tɛ sa nɔ, nɛ amlɔ nɛ e puɛ ɔ, e ngla ejakaa e nɛ zugba jɔjɔɛ. 7Nɛ eko ya nɔ miohi a kpɛti, nɛ mio ɔmɛ kɛ lɛ puɛ nɛ a gbe lɛ. 8Nɛ eko hu ya nɔ zugba kpakpa nɔ, nɛ e puɛ, nɛ e wo yiblii totoe lafa.” Benɛ e de ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, e wo e gbi nɔ nɛ e de ke: “Nɔ nɛ ngɛ tue nɛ e kɛ maa nu ɔ, e nu.”
Nɔ́ nɛ he je nɛ Yesu bu abɛhi
(Mateo 13.10-17; Marko 4.10-12)
9Yesu kaseli ɔmɛ bi lɛ ke: “Kɛ ji abɛ nɛ ɔ sisi kɛɛ?” 10E de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ lɛɛ a ha nyɛ he blɔ kaa nyɛɛ le Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi laami sane ɔmɛ, se ni kpa amɛ lɛɛ ngɛ abɛhi a mi, konɛ a hyɛ, se a ko na, nɛ a nu, se a ko nu sisi.”
Yesu tsɔɔ nidulɔ ɔ he abɛ ɔ sisi
(Mateo 13.18-23; Marko 4.13-20)
11Jeha nɛ ɔ abɛ ɔ sisi ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: “Wu ɔ ji Mawu munyu ɔ nɛ. 12Nihi nɛ ya nɔ blɔ tue ɔ ji ninɛmɛ nɛ nuɔ munyu ɔ, kɛkɛ nɛ abosiami baa ba saa munyu ɔ ngɛ a tsui mi konɛ a ko he ye nɛ a he a yiwami. 13Nihi nɛ ya nɔ tɛ sa nɔ ɔ ji nihi nɛ benɛ a nu ɔ, a heɔ munyu ɔ kɛ buajɔmi, se akɛnɛ a be sipoku he je ɔ a heɔ yeɔ be kpiti kɛkɛ, nɛ ka be mi ɔ a kuaa a hemi kɛ yemi ɔ. 14Nɛ nɔ́ nɛ ya nɔ miohi a kpɛti ɔ ji nihi nɛ benɛ a nu ɔ, a yaa, se je nɛ ɔ mi he nya gbamihi kɛ ni namihi kɛ je mi ngɔmi yemi gbee mɛ nɛ a wui yiblii nɛ hi kɛ pi si. 15Se zugba kpakpa mi nɔ́ ɔ ji nihi nɛ benɛ a nu munyu ɔ, a kɛ toɔ tsui kpakpa mi, nɛ a kɛ tsui si tomi hɛɛ mi nɛ a woɔ yiblii.”
Kane nɛ a kɛ ma sowe sisi
(Marko 4.21-25)
16“Nɔ ko su we kane nɛ e kɛ sowe bu nɔ aloo nɛ e kɛ ma sa tso sisi; se mohu kane tso nɔ e kɛ maa konɛ nihi nɛ ma a nɛ na la a. 17Ejakaa nɔ́ ko be nɛ a kɛ laa nɛ a be kpo jee, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu nɔ́ ko be nɛ a bu nɔ nɛ a be lee nɛ a be nya blie.
18“Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ hi ngɛ bɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nue ɔ he; ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ngɛ nɔ́ ko ɔ, a ma ha lɛ; se nɔ nɛ be nɔ́ ko ɔ, a ma kpɔ nɔ́ nɛ e peɔ lɛ kaa e ngɛ ɔ tete ngɛ e dɛ.”
Yesu nyɛ kɛ e nyɛmimɛ nyumu ɔmɛ
(Mateo 12.46-50; Marko 3.31-35)
19Yesu nyɛ kɛ e nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ ba, se asafo ɔ he ɔ a nyɛ we nɛ a su e he. 20Nɛ a de lɛ ke: “O nyɛ kɛ o nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ daa si ngɛ se ngɛ hlae nɛ a na mo.” 21Se e ha mɛ heto ke: “Ye nyɛ kɛ ye nyɛmimɛ ji ninɛmɛ nɛ nuɔ Mawu munyu ɔ nɛ a yeɔ nɔ!”
Yesu jɔɔ Wo nɔ kɔɔhiɔ ngua ko he
(Mateo 8.23-27; Marko 4.35-41)
22Ligbi ko ɔ, Yesu kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ya sɛ lɛ mi nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ha waa ya taku ɔ se je;” kɛkɛ nɛ a je wo. 23Benɛ a yaa a, mahɛ nɔ e nɔ. Wo nɔ kɔɔhiɔ ngua ko ba fia ngɛ taku ɔ hɛ mi nɛ a lɛ ɔ hyi kɛ nyu nɛ a sɛ haomi mi. 24Nɛ kaseli ɔmɛ ba Yesu ngɔ ba tsɛ̃ɛ lɛ nɛ a ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, Nyɔmtsɛ, wa yi tã tã.” Se nɛ e hɛ tsɛ ɔ, e nga kɔɔhiɔ kɛ wo nɛ gli ɔ yi, nɛ a he jɔ, nɛ a ngmɛ. 25Kɛkɛ nɛ e bi mɛ ke: “Jije nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ngɛ?” Nɛ a ye gbeye nɛ a hɛ mi pee mɛ yaa nɛ a de a he ke: “Mɛni nɔmlɔ slɔɔto ko po je nɛ ɔ nɛ e ngaa kɔɔhiɔ kɛ nyu tete yi nɛ a buɔ lɛ tue nɛ ɔ?”
Yesu tsa nyumu ko nɛ mumi yayamihi ngɛ e mi
(Mateo 8.28-34; Marko 5.1-20)
26A ba su Gergesebi ɔmɛ a zugba nɛ ngɛ Galilea hanɔ ɔ nɔ. 27Nɛ benɛ e ba kple ɔ, nyumu ko nɛ mumi yayamihi ngɛ e mi nɛ je ma a mi kɛ lɛ ba kpe. Nɛ e wui tade gblee, nɛ e hi we mi ja yɔkɔhi a mi kɛkɛ. 28Nɛ be nɛ e na Yesu ɔ, e kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ nɛ e ba kpla si ngɛ e hɛ mi, nɛ e kɛ gbi wawɛɛ de ke: “Mɛni sane i kɛ mo ngɛ, mo Yesu, Mawu nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe lokoo ɔ bi? I kpa mo pɛɛ ko pii mi!” 29Ejakaa Yesu nga mumi yayami ɔ yi ke e je nyumu ɔ mi. E nuu lɛ kpitikpiti, nɛ a woɔ lɛ kɔsɔkɔsɔhi nɛ a kaa lɛ pã kɛ tsiɔ e nya, se etsɔɔ nihi nɛ a kɛ woɔ lɛ ɔmɛ a mi, nɛ mumi yayami ɔ kpakaa lɛ kɛ yaa nga a mi. 30Yesu bi lɛ ke: “Kɛ a tsɛɛ mo kɛɛ?” Nɛ e ke: “Asafo;” ejakaa mumi yayamihi fuu lɛ a ngɛ ye mi ɔ nɛ. 31Nɛ mumi yayami ɔmɛ kpa Yesu pɛɛ ke e ko hia mɛ nɛ e ha a ya sɛ muɔ voo ɔ mi.
32Jeha nɛ ɔ kpotoo asafo kuu ngua ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ngɛ ni yee ngɛ yoku ɔ nɔ; nɛ mumi yayami ɔmɛ kpa Yesu pɛɛ ke e ngmɛ mɛ blɔ nɛ a ya sɛ kpotoo ɔmɛ a mi. Nɛ e ngmɛ mɛ blɔ. 33Lɔ ɔ he ɔ mumi yayami ɔmɛ je nyumu ɔ mi, nɛ a ya sɛ kpotoo ɔmɛ a mi, nɛ mɛ kuu mluku ɔ tsuo wo fo kɛ kple yoku ɔ kɛ ya pue taku ɔ mi nɛ a gbo.
34Nɛ benɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ kpotoo ɔmɛ hyɛe ɔ na nɔ́ nɛ a pee ɔ, a tu fo nɛ a ya sɛ̃ɛ ngɛ ma a kɛ kɔpe ɔmɛ a mi. 35Kɛkɛ nɛ ni ɔmɛ je kpo kɛ ho nɔ́ nɛ a pee ɔ hyɛmi ya; nɛ a ba Yesu ngɔ nɛ a ba na nyumu nɛ mumi yayami ɔmɛ je e mi ɔ nɛ e hii si ngɛ Yesu nane nya nɛ e wo tade, nɛ e hɛ mi tsɔ lɛ, nɛ a ye gbeye. 36Nɛ nihi nɛ na a hu sɛ̃ɛ mɛ bɔ nɛ pee nɛ a tsa nɔ nɛ mumi yayamihi ngɛ e mi ɔ. 37Kɛkɛ nɛ Gergesebi ɔmɛ nɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi ɔ tsuo ba ba kpa Yesu pɛɛ ke e je a ngɔ nɛ e ho, ejakaa gbeye nu mɛ nitsɛnitsɛ. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ e ya sɛ lɛ ɔ mi kɛ kpale e se. 38Nyumu ɔ nɛ mumi yayami ɔmɛ je e mi ɔ kpa Yesu pɛɛ ke e ngmɛ lɛ blɔ nɛ e kɛ lɛ nɛ hi si. Se Yesu wo lɛ blɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: 39“Kpale o se kɛ ho o we mi ya, nɛ o ya sɛ̃ɛ ni nguahi nɛ Mawu pee ha mo ɔ.” Nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho nɛ e ya fiɛ ni nguahi nɛ Yesu pee ha lɛ ɔ ngɛ ma a mi tsuo.
Yairo bi yo ɔ kɛ yo nɛ ta Yesu tade he ɔ
(Mateo 9.18-26; Marko 5.21-43)
40Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ Yesu kpale e se kɛ ba a, asafo ɔ nya e he, ejakaa mɛ tsuo a ngɛ lɛ mlɛe. 41Kɛkɛ nɛ oʼɛ, nyumu ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Yairo nɛ ji kpe he nɔkɔtɔma a ba nɛ e ba kpla si ngɛ Yesu nane nya nɛ e kpa lɛ pɛɛ konɛ e ba e we ɔ mi, 42ejakaa e ngɛ biyo kaketoo pɛ nɛ ye maa pee jeha nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ nɛ e miɔ nɛ ma gbo.
Benɛ Yesu yaa a, asafo ɔ tɔtɔ lɛ. 43Nɛ yo ko nɛ muɔ ngɛ dɛe ngɛ e he jeha nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ, nɛ e puɛ e nihi tsuo kulaa kɛ ha tsopatsɛmɛ, nɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko nyɛ we lɛ nɛ e tsa a, 44ba je Yesu se je nɛ e ta e tade nya fiami ɔ he, nɛ amlɔ ɔ e muɔ dɛmi ɔ se po. 45Yesu bi ke: “Mɛnɔ ji nɔ nɛ ta ye he ɔ?” Benɛ ni ɔmɛ tsuo kua a, Petro kɛ nihi nɛ piɛ e he ɔ ke: “Mawetsɛ, asafo ɔ tɔtɔ mo nɛ a ngɛ mo miae, nɛ o ngɛ bie ke: ‘Mɛnɔ lɛ ta ye he ɔ” 46Se Yesu ke: “Nɔ ko ta ye he, ejakaa i nu he kaa hewami ko je ye mi.’ 47Kɛkɛ nɛ benɛ yo ɔ na kaa e hi lɛ laami hu ɔ, e kɛ hedomi ba ba kpla si ngɛ e hɛ mi, nɛ e ba jaje nɔ́ he je nɛ e ta e he ɔ kɛ bɔ nɛ e he wa lɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔuu ɔ. 48Yesu de lɛ ngɛ asafo ɔ kulaa hɛ mi ke: “Biyo, o tsui nɛ nɔ o mi, o hemi kɛ yemi tsa mo; yaa ngɛ hejɔmi mi!”
49Benɛ Yesu ngɛ munyu ɔ nɔ ɔ, nɔ ko je kpe he nɔkɔtɔma a we ɔ mi ba de lɛ ke: “O biyo ɔ gbo; koo doo tsɔɔlɔ ɔ nya.” 50Se benɛ Yesu nu ɔ, e he nɔ ke: “Koo ye gbeye; he ye kɛkɛ nɛ e yi ma na wa.” 51Nɛ benɛ Yesu ba we ɔ mi ɔ, e ngmɛ́ nɔ ko nɔ ko blɔ nɛ e sɛ tsu ɔ mi kaa ja Petro kɛ Yohane kɛ Yakobo kɛ jokuɛ ɔ tsɛ kɛ e nyɛ pɛ. 52Nɛ ni ɔmɛ tsuo ngɛ ya foe nɛ a ngɛ kɔmɔ yee. Se Yesu ke: “Nyɛ ko fo ya; e gbo we, se mahɛ e ngɛ hwɔe.” 53Nɛ a muɔ lɛ, ejakaa a le kaa e gbo. 54Se Yesu nu e nine si nɛ e tsɛ lɛ ke: “Jokuɛyo, tee si!” 55Nɛ jokuɛ ɔ mumi ɔ kpale ba e mi ekohu, nɛ e te si amlɔ ɔ nɔuu; nɛ Yesu fa ke a ha jokuɛ ɔ nɔ ko nɛ e ye. 56E fɔli ɔmɛ a nya kpɛ a he; se Yesu wo mɛ si veveeve ke a ko sɛɛ nɔ́ nɛ a pee ɔ ngɔ ha nɔ ko.

Title: LUKA 9
Content:
Yesu tsɔ kaseli nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ
(Mateo 10.5-15; Marko 6.7-13)
1Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu tsɛ kaseli nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ kɛ kpe nɛ e ha mɛ hewami kɛ he blɔ ngɛ mumi yayami ɔmɛ tsuo nɔ, nɛ a tsa hiɔhi hulɔ. 2Nɛ e tsɔ mɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ fiɛmi kɛ hiɔtsɛmɛ a tsami 3E de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ko hɛɛ nɔ́ ko kɛ ha nyɛ blɔhiami ɔ, nyɛ ko hɛɛ dɛ hɛɛmi tso loo kotoku loo abolo loo sika loo tade enyɔ. 4We tsuaa we mi nɛ nyɛ ma ya sɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ hi lejɛ ɔ kɛ yaa su nyɛ maa je. 5Nihi abɔ nɛ he we nyɛ ɔ, ke nyɛ maa je jamɛ a ma a mi ɔ, nyɛ blɛ nyɛ nane si zu ɔ kɛ ye mɛ odase.” 6Nɛ kaseli ɔmɛ pue nɔ kɛ ho nɛ a ya kpa ma amɛ a mi ya fiɛ Sane Kpakpa a nɛ a tsa nihi ngɛ he tsuaa he.
Herode pee yoyooyo
(Mateo 14.1-12; Marko 6.14-16)
7Amlaalo nɔkɔtɔma Herode nu nihi nɛ a pee ɔmɛ tsuo he, nɛ e pee yoyooyo, ejakaa ni komɛ de ke Yohane te si kɛ je gbeje. 8Ni komɛ hu de ke Elia je e he kpo, nɛ ni kpa komɛ hu de ke blema gbali ɔmɛ eko te si ekohu. 9Se Herode ke: “Yohane ɔ, i po e yi; se mɛnɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ i ngɛ kikɛmɛ a sane nɛ ɔmɛ nue ngɛ e he nɛ ɔ?” Nɛ e hla kaa e na lɛ.
Yesu ha ni akpe enuɔ niyeni
(Mateo 14.13-21; Marko 6.30-44; Yohane 6.1-14)
10Nɛ benɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ kpale a se kɛ ba a, a ba sɛɛ nihi tsuo nɛ a ya pee ɔ ngɔ ha Yesu. Nɛ e ngɔ mɛ kɛ ho nga a nɔ he ko banee ya ngɛ ma nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Betsaida a kasa nya 11Se benɛ asafo ɔ na lɛ ɔ, a bu e nɔ. E he mɛ hɛmuɔ nɛ e fiɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ he sane tsɔɔ mɛ, nɛ e tsa nihi nɛ tsami he hia mɛ ɔ.
12Benɛ je bɔni jɔmi ɔ, ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ ba e ngɔ nɛ a ba de lɛ ke: “Wo asafo ɔ blɔ konɛ a ya ma amɛ kɛ kɔpehi nɛ bɔle wɔ nɛ ɔmɛ a mi nɛ a ya to lejɛ ɔ nɛ a na niyeni ejakaa nga mi wa ngɛ nɛ ɔ nɛ.” 13Se Yesu de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ ha mɛ nɔ́ ko nɛ a ye.” Se a ke: “Abolo enuɔ kɛ lo enyɔ pɛ wa ngɛ, lɛɛ ja wa ya nɛ wa ya he niyeni ba ha asafo nɛ ɔ tsuo.” 14(Ejakaa ni ɔmɛ a yibɔ maa pee nyumuhi akpe enuɔ). E de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Nyɛ ha nɛ a hi si kutuu kutuu nyingmi enuɔ enuɔ nya.” 15A pee ja nɛ a ha ni ɔmɛ tsuo hi si. 16Kɛkɛ nɛ e kukuɔ abolo enuɔ kɛ lo enyɔ ɔ nɛ e hyɛ hiɔwe nɛ e gbaa nɔ, nɛ e kuɔ nɛ e kɛ ha e kaseli ɔmɛ nɛ a kɛ ma asafo ɔ hɛ mi. 17Nɛ a ye nɛ mɛ kulaa a tɔ, nɛ a kukuɔ bibli nɛ piɛ ɔ kusii nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ.
Petro odase nɛ e ye ngɛ Yesu he
(Mateo 16.13-19; Marko 8.27-29)
18Ligbi ko benɛ Yesu nɔ kake ngɛ sɔlee ɔ, e kaseli ɔmɛ ba bua a he nya ngɛ e ngɔ; nɛ e bi mɛ ke: “Ni ɔmɛ deɔ ke mɛnɔ jimi?”
19A ha lɛ heto ke: “Yohane, baptisilɔ ɔ; nɛ ni komɛ deɔ ke: Elia; nɛ ni kpa komɛ hu deɔ ke: Blema gbali ɔmɛ a ti nɔ ko lɛ e te si ekohu.” 20Nɛ e bi mɛ ke: “Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ, nyɛ deɔ ke mɛnɔ ji mi?” Petro he nɔ nɛ e ke: “Mawu we Kristo ɔ.” 21Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu bɔ mɛ kkɔ ke a ko wo nɔ ta ngɔ de nɔ ko.
Yesu tu e manehlu kɛ e gbenɔ he munyu
(Mateo 16.20-28; Marko 8.30—9.1)
22Nɛ Yesu ke: “Ja Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ na amanehlu babauu, nɛ ma mikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaatsɔɔli ɔmɛ kua lɛ, nɛ a gbe lɛ, nɛ ligbi nɛ ji ligbi etɛ ɔ nɛ a tle lɛ si ekohu.”
23Nɛ e de ni ɔmɛ tsuo ke: “Ke nɔ ko suɔ kaa e nyɛɛ ye se ɔ, e kua e he nɛ e wo e seumi tso ɔ ngɔ tloo daa ligbi kɛ nyɛɛ ye se. 24Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ suɔ kaa e baa e klaa yi ɔ, e maa laa lɛ; se nɔ nɛ laa e klaa ngɛ ye he ɔ, e ma he e yiwami. 25Ejakaa mɛni se nɔmlɔ naa, ke e na je mluku ɔ tsuo, se e laa lɛ nitsɛ e he aloo e sake e he ngɔ fɔ he ɔ? 26Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ imi kɛ ye munyu ɔmɛ a he peɔ lɛ zo ɔ, lɛ hu e he maa pee Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ zo benɛ e maa ba ngɛ lɛ nitse e nyami ɔ kɛ e tsɛ nɔ ɔ kɛ bɔfo klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a nɔ ɔ mi ɔ. 27Se niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: ni komɛ ngɛ nihi nɛ daa si ngɛ hiɛ ɔ nɛ ɔ a kpɛti nɛ a be gboe kɛ yaa su be nɛ a maa na Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ.”
Yesu nɔmlɔ tso su tsake
(Mateo 17.1-8; Marko 9.2-8)
28E ba mi kaa munyu nɛ ɔmɛ a se maa pee ligbi kpaanyɔ ɔ, Yesu ngɔ Petro kɛ Yohane kɛ Yakobo, nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho sɔlemi ya ngɛ yoku ɔ nɔ. 29Nɛ benɛ e ngɛ sɔlee ɔ, e hɛ mi tsake nɛ e tade ɔ hiɛ futaa nɛ e ngɛ kpee klaiklai. 30Nɛ oʼɛ, nyumuhi enyɔ kɛ lɛ ba tu munyu, mɛ ji Mose kɛ Elia, 31nihi nɛ ba je a he kpo ngɛ hɛ hii nyami mi nɛ a kɛ lɛ tu munyu ngɛ e je mi nya nɛ e ma ya gbe ngɛ Yerusalem ɔ he ɔ. 32Se mahɛ gbe Petro kɛ nihi nɛ piɛ e he ɔ; nɛ benɛ a hɛ tsɛ kulaa a, a na e hɛ mi nyami ɔ kɛ nyumuhi enyɔ ɔmɛ nɛ a daa si ngɛ e kasa nya a. 33Nɛ benɛ ni ɔmɛ ngɛ Yesu sie ɔ, Petro de Yesu ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, e hi kaa waa hi hiɛ ɔ, nɛ ha nɛ waa ma bo tsu etɛ, o nɔ kake kɛ Mose nɔ kake kɛ Elia nɔ kake;” se e li nɔ nɛ e ngɛ dee ɔ. 34Nɛ benɛ e ngɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ dee ɔ, bɔku ko ba ha a nɔ; nɛ benɛ a sɛ bɔku ɔ mi ɔ, a ye gbeye. 35Nɛ gbi ko je bɔku ɔ mi de ke: “Ye suɔmi bi ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ, nyɛɛ bu lɛ tue!” 36Benɛ a nu gbi ɔ se ɔ, Yesu nɔ kake pɛ a na. Nɛ a ma a nya, nɛ jamɛ a be ɔmɛ a mi ɔ a sɛɛ we nihi nɛ a na a eko ha we nɔ ko nɔ ko.
Yesu tsa jokuɛ nyumu ko nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ e mi
(Mateo 17.14-18; Marko 9.14-27)
37Nɛ e ba mi kaa e nɔ je na benɛ a je yoku ɔ nɔ kɛ ngɛ si kplee ɔ, nihi fuu kɛ lɛ ba kpe. 38Nɛ oʼɛ, nyumu ko je ni ɔmɛ a kpɛti kpa ngmlaa ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, i kpa mo pɛɛ, hyɛ ye bi ɔ, se lɛ pɛ ji ye bi. 39Oʼɛ, mumi ko nuu lɛ nɛ e kpaa ngmlaa tlukaa, nɛ e haa e huaa gɛgɛnii, nɛ e nya fiaa hwɔli, nɛ e gbɔnyɔɔ lɛ hluu loko e jee e mi. 40I kpa o kaseli ɔmɛ pɛɛ ke a hia lɛ, se a nyɛ we.” 41Yesu he nɔ nɛ e ke: ‘Oo yi nɔ bihi nɛ he we yi nɛ be a jebo nɔ! Mɛni be i kɛ nyɛ maa hi si nɛ ma hɛɛ nyɛ kɛ ya su? O kɛ o bi ɔ nɛ ba hiɛ ɔ!” 42Se benɛ jokuɛ ɔ ma a, mumi yayami ɔ po lɛ fɔ̃ si nɛ e ha e hua. Se Yesu nga mumi ɔ yi, nɛ e tsa jokuɛ ɔ, nɛ e ngɔ lɛ ngɔ ha e tsɛ ɔ ekohu. 43Nɛ mɛ tsuo a nya kpɛ a he ngɛ Mawu he wami kpetekpleenyɛ ɔ he.
Yesu tu e gbenɔ he munyu ekohu
(Mateo 17.22-23; Marko 9.30-32)
Se benɛ ni ɔmɛ tsuo a hɛ mi pee mɛ yaa ngɛ nihi tsu nɛ Yesu pee ɔ he ɔ, e de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: 44“Nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ ha kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ sɛ nyɛ tue mi, ejakaa a maa ngɔ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ngɔ wo nimli a dɛ mi.” 45Se mɛɛ lɛɛ a nɛ́ munyu nɛ ɔ nya, nɛ a kɛ laa mɛ konɛ a ko nu sisi, nɛ a ngɛ gbeye yee kaa a ma bi lɛ munyu ɔ he nɔ ko.
Mɛnɔ ji nɔ ngua pe kulaa?
(Mateo 18.1-5; Marko 9.33-37)
46Nɛ nya sami ko ba te si ngɛ a kpɛti kaa mɛnɔ ji nɔ ngua pe kulaa ngɛ a kpɛti. 47Se benɛ Yesu na le a tsui mi susumi ɔ, e ngɔ jokuɛ nyafii ko nɛ e kɛ lɛ ba da e kasa nya; 48nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ maa ngɔ jokuɛ nyafii nɛ ɔ ngɛ ye biɛ mi ɔ, e ngɔ mi; nɛ nɔ nɛ ngɔ mi ɔ, e ngɔɔ nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ; ejakaa nɔ nɛ ji nyafii ngɛ nyɛ tsuo nyɛ kpɛti ɔ, lɛ nɔuu ji nɔ ngua.”
Nɔ nɛ ti si wui nyɛ ɔ, e piɛ nyɛ he
(Marko 9.38-40)
49Yohane he nɔ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, wa na nɔ ko nɛ e kɛ o biɛ ngɛ mumi yayami hiae, nɛ wa tsi lɛ blɔ, ejakaa e kɛ wɔ nyɛɛ we o se.” 50Nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Nyɛ ko tsi lɛ blɔ, ejakaa nɔ nɛ ti si wui nyɛ ɔ, e ngɛ nyɛ blɔfami.”
Samaria kɔpe ko kua Yesu
51Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ ligbi nɛ a maa ngɔ Yesu kɛ ho hiɔwe ya su ta a, e ngɔ e hɛ mi ngɔ pi Yerusalem nɛ e yaa lejɛ ɔ. 52Nɛ e tsɔ tsɔli kɛ sɛ e hlami; nɛ a ya sɛ Samariabi a ma ko mi konɛ a ya dla he ko ngɔ to lɛ. 53Se a he we lɛ, ejakaa a na ngɛ e hɛ mi kaa e yaa Yerusalem. 54Nɛ benɛ Yakobo kɛ Yohane kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ na enɛ ɔ ɔ, a ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, o suɔ kaa wa de nɛ la nɛ je hiɔwe ba sa mɛ lo?” 55Se Yesu plɛ e he nɛ e ka a hɛ mi, 56nɛ a ho ma kpa ko mi ya.
Yesu senyɛɛmi
(Mateo 8.19-22)
57Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ a yaa ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ ɔ, nɔ ko ba de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, ma nyɛɛ o se kɛ maa ya he tsuaa he nɛ oyaa.” 58Se Yesu de lɛ ke: “Kɔkɔbohi ngɛ muɔhi, nɛ hiɔwe lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ hu ngɛ tsuhi, se Nɔmlɔ Bi o lɛɛ e be he nɛ e kɛ e yi fɔɔ.” 59Nɛ e de nɔ kpa ke: “Nyɛɛ ye se!” Se lɛɛ e ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, ngmɛɛ mi blɔ nɛ ma ya ya pu tsaatsɛ lolo.” 60Se Yesu de lɛ ke: “Ha nɛ ni gbogboehi nɛ pu a ni gbogboehi se mo lɛɛ yaa nɛ o ya fiɛ Mawu matsɛyemi ɔ!” 61Nɛ nɔ kpa hu ke: “Ma nyɛɛ o se, Nyɔmtsɛ, se ngmɛɛ mi blɔ nɛ ma ya ya sɛ ye weli lolo.” 62Se Yesu de lɛ ke: “Nɔ nɛ kɛ e nine pɛtɛɛ na kpakplaa he nɛ e plɛɛ e kuɛ hyɛɛ e se ɔ, e sɛ́ Mawu matsɛyemi ɔ.”

Title: LUKA 10
Content:
Yesu tsɔ ni nyingmi kpaago kɛ enyɔ
1Ni nɛ ɔmɛ a se ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hia ni nyingmi kpaago kɛ enyɔ kpã hu, nɛ e tsɔ mɛ enyɔenyɔ kɛ sɛ e hlami kɛ ya ma tsuaa ma nɔ kɛ he tsuaa he nɛ lɛ nitsɛ e maa ya a. 2Kɛkɛ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Ni kpami ɔ hiɛ, se ni tsuli ɔmɛ pi; lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ kpa ni kpami Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ pɛɛ konɛ e tsɔ ni tsuli kɛ ya e ni kpami ɔ he. 3Nyɛɛ ya! oʼɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ tsɔe kaa to bihi ngɛ ogbeteehi a kpɛti. 4Nyɛ ko hɛɛ sika kpɛɛ loo kotoku loo tokotahi, nɛ nyɛ ko nga nɔ ko ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ. 5Nɛ we tsuaa we mi nɛ nyɛ maa sɛ ɔ, kekleekle ɔ nyɛ de ke: ‘Manye nɛ ba we nɛ ɔ mi!’ 6Nɛ ke hejɔmi bi ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, nyɛ hejɔmi ɔ maa hi e nɔ; se ke pi jã a, e maa kpale e se kɛ ba nyɛ ngɔ ekohu. 7Nɛ nyɛɛ hi jamɛ a we ɔ mi nɔuu, nɛ nyɛɛ ye nɛ nyɛɛ nu nɔ́ nɛ a ma ha nyɛ ɔ ejakaa ni tsulɔ ɔ, e hiɔwo sa lɛ. Nyɛ ko klɛ̃ kɛ je we mi kɛ ya we mi. 8Nɛ ma tsuaa ma mi nɛ nyɛ maa sɛ nɛ a ma he nyɛ ɔ, nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ a kɛ ma nyɛ hɛ mi ɔ nyɛɛ ye. 9Nɛ nyɛ tsa hiɔtsɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ mi ɔ, nɛ nyɛ de mɛ ke: ‘Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ na nyɛ. 10Se ma tsuaa ma mi nɛ nyɛ maa sɛ nɛ a he we nyɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ je kɛ ho gbɛjegbɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ ya nɛ nyɛ de ke: 11‘Wa ngɛ nyɛ ma nɛ ɔ mi bunyuku tete nɛ ngɛ wa nanehi a he ɔ blɛe kɛ ngɛ nyɛ nɔ puee; se kɛ ɔ nyɛ na le kaa Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ na nyɛ.’ 12I ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, e maa fani Sodom tete ngɛ jamɛ a ma a he.”
Mahi nɛ he we yi ɔ
(Mateo 11.20-24)
13“Musu tloo mo, Korazin! Musu tloo mo, Betsaida! Ejakaa kaa hewami ni tsumihi nɛ a tsu ngɛ nyɛ mi nɛ ɔ, Tiro kɛ Zidon a tsu ngɛ jinɛ a hii si ngɛ kpekpe kɛ lazu mi nɛ a tsake a tsui momoomo. 14Se kojomi ɔ mi ɔ, e maa fani Tiro kɛ Zidon ngɛ nyɛ he! 15Nɛ mo, Kapernaum, pi hiɔwe nɛ a wo o nɔ kɛ ho? A maa ba mo si kɛ maa ya gbeje lokoo!
16“Nɔ nɛ buɔ nyɛ tue ɔ, imi tue e buɔ ɔ nɛ; nɛ nɔ nɛ kuaa nyɛ ɔ, imi e kuaa a nɛ; nɛ nɔ nɛ kuaa mi ɔ, nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ e kuaa a nɛ.”
Ni nyingmi kpaago kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ a sekpalemi
17Ni nyingmi kpaago kɛ enyɔ ɔ kpale a se kɛ ba kɛ buajɔmi nɛ a ba de ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, o biɛ ɔ he ɔ mumi yayamihi tete baa a he si haa wɔ.” 18Se e de mɛ ke: “I na Satan kaa oslaba nɛ tsɔ kɛ je hiɔwe ba nɔ si. 19Oʼɛ, i ha nyɛ he blɔ nɛ nyɛɛ naa sinɔhi kɛ nyingmogblakotohi kɛ henyɛlɔ ɔ hewami ɔ kulaa nɔ, nɛ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko be nyɛ yayami pee. 20Se kɛ ɔ, nyɛ ko na enɛ ɔ he buajɔmi kaa mumi ɔmɛ baa a he si ngɔ haa nyɛ ɔ, se mohu nyɛ na buajɔmi kaa a ngma nyɛ biɛ ngɛ hiɔwe.”
Yesu bua jɔ
(Mateo 11.25-27; 13.16-17)
21Jamɛ a ngmlɛfia a nɔ nɔuu ɔ, Yesu bua jɔ ngɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ mi nɛ e ke: “I ngɛ o yi jee, Tsaatsɛ, hiɔwe kɛ zugba Nyɔmtsɛ, kaa o ngɔ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngɔ laa ni leli kɛ ga leli, nɛ o je ngɔ tsɔɔ bimwɔwi. Ee, Tsaatsɛ, ejakaa jã ji bɔ nɛ sa o hɛ mi.
22“Tsaatsɛ tu nihi tsuo kulaa ngɔ wo ye dɛ, nɛ nɔ ko li nɔ nɛ ji Bi ɔ, ja Tsɛ ɔ kɛkɛ, kɛ nɔ nɛ ji Tsɛ ɔ, ja Bi ɔ kɛ nɔ nɛ Bi ɔ suɔ kaa e je lɛ kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ ɔ.”
23Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu plɛ e hɛ mi ha e kaseli ɔmɛ nɛ e de mɛ ngɛ se zaa ke: “A gbaa hɛngmɛhi nɛ naa nihi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nae nɛ ɔ. 24Ejakaa i ngɛ nyɛ de kɛ: Gbali kɛ matsɛmɛ fuu hla kaa a ko na nihi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nae nɛ ɔ, se a nɛ, kɛ jeha nɛ ɔ kaa a ko nu nihi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nue nɛ ɔ se a nui.”
Samariano mɔbɔnalɔ ɔ
25Kɛkɛ nɛ mlaatsɔɔlɔ ko te si da si nɛ e tsɔ e nya kɛ bi lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, mɛni ma pee nɛ ma na neneene wami?” 26Se Yesu bi lɛ ke: “Mɛni a ngma ngɛ Mlaa a mi ɔ, nɛ kɛ o kaneɔ lɛ kɛɛ?” 27Mlaatsɔɔlɔ ɔ ha lɛ heto ke: “Suɔ Nyɔmtsɛ, o Mawu ɔ kɛ je o tsui kulaa, kɛ o klaa kulaa, kɛ o hewami kulaa, kɛ o juɛmi kulaa mi, kɛ o nyɛmi nɔmlɔ hu kaa bɔ nɛ o suɔ mo nitsɛ o he.” 28Yesu de lɛ ke: “Bɔ nɛ o ha heto ɔ da, pee ja nɛ o yi ma na wami.”
29Se mlaatsɔɔlɔ ɔ, akɛnɛ e ngɛ hlae nɛ e bu e he bemi he je ɔ, e bi Yesu ke: Mɛnɔ ji mami?” 30Yesu he nɔ nɛ e ke: “Nyumu ko pue nɔ kɛ je Yerusalem kɛ yaa Yeriko nɛ e ya nɔ ojo fiali komɛ a kpɛti. A kpɔ e he tade ɔ nɛ a plaa lɛ, nɛ a je, nɛ a si lɛ nɛ e gbo fã kɛ fã. 31E ba mi kaa osɔfo ko ba gu lɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ; nɛ benɛ e na lɛ ɔ, e tsɔ e he kɛ be. 32Nɛ ja nɔuu Levino ko hu, benɛ e su lejɛ ɔ nɛ e na lɛ ɔ, e tsɔ e he kɛ be. 33Se Samariano ko nɛ nyɛɛ blɔ ba su he nɛ e ngɛ ɔ, nɛ benɛ e na lɛ ɔ, e muklii mi sa lɛ, 34nɛ e ya e ngɔ, nɛ e ya fi e pa amɛ a nɔ, nɛ e plɛ nu kɛ wai pue nɔ, nɛ e pa wo lɛ ngɔ hi lɛ nitsɛ e lohwe nɔ, nɛ e ngɔ lɛ kɛ ya nibwɔhi a to he nɛ e ya hyɛ e nɔ. 35Nɛ e nɔ je na, benɛ e yaa a, e je cedi enyɔ ngɔ ha nibwɔhi a tohetsɛ ɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: ‘Hyɛ lɛ saminya, nɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ o ma pa puɛ ngɛ e he ɔ, ke i kpale ye se kɛ ba a, ma wo mo hiɔ.’ 36Jeha nɛ ɔ, ni etɛ nɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti mɛnɔ o susu kaa e pee nɔ nɛ ya nɔ ojo fiali a kpɛti nɔ huɛ?” 37E ha heto ke: “Nɔ nɛ na lɛ mɔbɔ ɔ.” Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Mo hu yaa nɛ o ya pee ja nɔuu.”
Yesu ya slaa Marta ke Maria
38E ba mi kaa benɛ a yaa a, Yesu ya sɛ kɔpe ko mi. Nɛ yo ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Marta a ngɔ lɛ kɛ ho e we mi ya. 39Marta ngɛ nyɛmi yo ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Maria, nɛ lɛ hu e ba hi si ngɛ Yesu nane nya nɛ e bu e munyu ɔ tue. 40Se Marta hao e he fuu tsɔ ngɛ sɔmɔmi babauu he, nɛ e ba Yesu ngɔ ba de ke: “Mawetsɛ, o nɛ́ kaa mami ɔ si mi nɛ ye nɔ kake i ngɛ sɔmɔe nɛ ɔ? Lɔ ɔ he ɔ de lɛ nɛ lɛ hu e ba piɛ ye he.” 41Se Yesu ha heto nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Marta, Marta, o ngɛ o he nya gbae nɛ o ngɛ o he haoe ngɛ nihi fuu he; 42se nɔ́ kake lɛ he hia. Nɔ́ nɛ hi ɔ lɔ ɔ Maria ngɔ ɔ nɛ, nɛ a be kpɔe ngɛ e dɛ.”

Title: LUKA 11
Content:
Yesu nitsɔɔmi ngɛ sɔlemi he
(Mateo 6.9-13; 7.7-11)
1Ligbi ko ɔ, Yesu ngɛ sɔlee ngɛ he ko, nɛ benɛ e gbe nya a, e kaseli ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake de lɛ ke: “Mawetsɛ, tsɔɔ wɔ sɔlemi, kaa bɔ nɛ Yohane hu tsɔɔ e kaseli ɔmɛ ɔ.” 2Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Ke nyɛ ngɛ sɔlee ɔ nyɛ de ke:
‘Tsaatsɛ,
O biɛ ɔ he nɛ tsɔ;
O matsɛ yemi ɔ nɛ ba.
3Ha wɔ wa daa ligbi ngma.
4Nɛ o kɛ wa he yayami ɔmɛ nɛ pa wɔ,
Ejakaa wɔ hu waa kɛ paa nɔ tsuaa
nɔ nɛ tɔ́ɔ wa nɔ ɔ.
Nɛ o kɛ wɔ ko ya ka mi.’ ”
5Nɛ ɛ de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ kpɛti mɛnɔ nɛ ngɛ huɛ nɛ e maa ya e ngɔ nyɔ mi kpɛti nɛ e ma ya de lɛ ke: ‘Ye huɛ, paa mi abolo etɛ, 6ejakaa ye huɛ ko nɛ nyɛɛ blɔ ba to mi, nɛ i be nɔ ko nɛ i kɛ maa ma e hɛ mi;’ 7nɛ nɔ nɛ ngɛ tsu ɔ mi ɔ be nɔ hee ke: ‘Koo doo ye nya, a nga sinya a mo, nɛ imi kɛ ye bimɛ sɛ sa mi; i be nyɛe si ma te nɛ ma ba ha mo.’ 8I ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, ke ka e huɛ nɛ ji lɛ ɔ he jinɛ e be si tee nɛ e ha lɛ, se e nya doomi ɔ he ɔ, e maa te si kɛ̃, nɛ e ma ha lɛ bɔ tsuaa bɔ nɛ e ngɛ hlae. 9Nɛ imi hu i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nyɛ bi, nɛ a ma ha nyɛ; nyɛ hla, nɛ nyɛ maa na; nyɛ si, nɛ a ma bli ha nyɛ. 10Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ biɔ ɔ, e nine suu nɔ; nɛ nɔ nɛ hlaa a, e naa; nɛ nɔ nɛ siɔ ɔ, a bliɔ haa lɛ. 11Se tsɛ te nɛ ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti nɛɛ, nɛ ke e bi bi lɛ abolo, nɛ e ma ha lɛ tɛ? Aloo ke e bi lɛ lo ɔ, nɛ e maa ngɔ sinɔ ngɔ pee lo ngɔ ha lɛ? 12Aloo ke e bi lɛ kungwɔ hlui ɔ, nɛ e ma ha lɛ nyingmogblakoto? 13Lɛɛ ke nyɛ nɛ nyɛ ji nimli yayamihi ɔ, nyɛ le bɔ nɛ nyɛ peɔ nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ nike ni kpakpahi kee nyɛ bimɛ ɔ, nyɛmɛ nɔuu nɛ nyɛ tsɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ be Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ ngɔe ha nihi nɛ biɔ lɛ ɔ?”
Yesu kɛ Beelzebul
(Mateo 12.22-30; Marko 3.20-27)
14Nɛ Yesu ngɛ mumi yayami ko nɛ ji amuɛti hiae, nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ mumi yayami ɔ je kpo ɔ amuɛti ɔ tu munyu, nɛ ni ɔmɛ a nya kpɛ a he. 15Se a ti ni komɛ de ke: “Beelzebul, mumi yayami ɔmɛ a tsɛ ɔ he wami nya e hiaa mumi yayami ɔmɛ ngɛ ɔ nɛ.” 16Nɛ ni komɛ hu ka lɛ kɛ ngɛ hiɔwe okadi ko hlae ngɛ e dɛ. 17Se, akɛnɛ Yesu le a juɛmi ɔmɛ ɔ, e de mɛ ke: “Ma tsuaa ma nɛ gbaa woɔ lɛ nitsɛ e he ɔ, e ywiaa, nɛ we nɛ gbaa woɔ lɛ nitsɛ e he ɔ, e ywiaa. 18Nɛ ke Satan hu gba wo lɛ nitsɛ e he ɔ, kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ e matsɛ yemi ɔ maa da si? Ejakaa nyɛ ke Beelzebul he wami nya i hiaa mumi yayami ɔmɛ ngɛ ɔ nɛ. 19Se ke imi lɛɛ, Beelzebul he wami i kɛ hiaa mumi yayami ɔmɛ ɔ, mɛni nyɛ bimɛ ɔmɛ kɛ hiaa mɛ? Lɔ ɔ he ɔ mɛ nɔuu lɛ a maa kojo nyɛ. 20Se ke Mawu nine nguɛ i kɛ hiaa mumi yayami ɔmɛ ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ su nyɛ ngɔ.
21“Ke hewalɔ ko hɛɛ e dade mi kɛ ngɛ e mɔ he bue ɔ, e nihi tsuo kulaa ngɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ; 22se ke nɔ nɛ he wa pe lɛ ba tua lɛ nɛ e ye e nɔ kunimi ɔ, e kpɔɔ e ta hwumi nihi nɛ e ngɔɔ e hɛ fɔɔ nɔ ɔ tsuo ngɛ e dɛ, nɛ e dlaa e ta yibu ni ɔmɛ a mi.
23“Nɔ nɛ be ye blɔfami ɔ, e kɛ mi na, nɛ nɔ nɛ kɛ mi bua we nya a, e ngɛ gbee kɛ ngɛ fiae.”
Mumi yayami ɔ sekpalemi
(Mateo 12.43-45)
24“Ke mumi yayami ko je nɔmlɔ mi ɔ, e ya nyɛɛ hehi nɛ nyu be kɛ hlaa he jɔmi, nɛ ke e nɛ́ eko ɔ, e de ɔ ke: ‘Ma kpale ye se kɛ ya ye we he nɛ i je ɔ.’ 25Nɛ ke e ba a, e ba naa kaa a bɛɛ mi nɛ a dla mi. 26Kɛkɛ ɔ, e yaa nɛ e ya ngɔɔ mumi kpahi kpaago nɛ ji mumi yayamihi pe lɛ ngɔ piɛɔ e he nɛ a ya sɛɛ e mi nɛ a hii lejɛ ɔ, nɛ jamɛ a nɔmlɔ ɔ sekpɛ sihihii ɔ plɛɔ yayami pe kekle nɔ ɔ.”
Buajɔmi nitsɛ
27Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ e ngɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ dee ɔ, yo ko nɛ ngɛ asafo ɔ mi ɔ wo e gbi nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “A gbaa muklii nɛ hɛɛ mo kɛ nyɔ nɛ o pupɔ ɔ!” 28Se Yesu he nɔ ke: “E ngɛ mi ja mohu, se a gbaa ninɛmɛ nɛ nuɔ Mawu munyu ɔ nɛ a yeɔ nɔ ɔ!”
Farisifo ɔmɛ ngɛ okadi hlae
(Mateo 12.38-42)
29Benɛ asafo ɔmɛ ba bua a he nya fuu ɔ, Yesu bɔni demi ke: “Yi nɔ bi nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, yi nɔ bi yayamihi ʼi. A ngɛ okadi hlae, se a be mɛ eko hae kaa ja gbalɔ Yona okadi ɔ. 30Ejakaa bɔ nɛ Yona plɛ okadi ha Ninivebi ɔmɛ ɔ, ja nɔuu kɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ma plɛ ngɔ ha kikɛmɛ a yi nɔ bi nɛ ɔmɛ. 31Leneyi manye ɔ kɛ yi nɔ bi nɛ ɔmɛ maa te si ngɛ kojomi ɔ mi, nɛ e maa bu mɛ fɔ, ejaakɛ e je zugba a nyagbe he lokoo ba bu Salomo ni lemi tue; nɛ oʼɛ, nɔ́ nɛ pe Salomo ni lemi ɔ ngɛ hiɛ ɔji 32Ninivebi ɔmɛ kɛ kikɛmɛ a yi nɔ bi nɛ ɔmɛ maa te si ngɛ kojomi ɔ mi nɛ a maa bu mɛ fɔ, ejakaa a tsake a tsui ngɛ Yona fiɛmi ɔ nya; nɛ oʼɛ, nɔ́ nɛ pe Yona fiɛmi ɔ ngɛ hiɛ ɔ!”
Nɔmlɔ tso ɔ la
(Mateo 5.15; 6.22-23)
33“Nɔ ko su we kane ngɔ mɛ́ kɔkɔɔ mi loo sowe sisi, se mohu kane tso nɔ e kɛ maa, konɛ nihi nɛ ma we ɔ mi sɛmi ɔ, a na e kpɛmi ɔ. 34Nɔmlɔ tso ɔ kane ji hɛngmɛ. Ke o hɛngmɛ nɔ tsɔ ɔ, o nɔmlɔ tso mluku ɔ hu mi tsɔɔ; se ke o hɛngmɛ hi ɔ, o nɔmlɔ tso ɔ hu woɔ diblii. 35Lɔ ɔ he ɔ hyɛ nɛ hi konɛ la nɛ ngɛ o mi ɔ ko plɛ diblii. 36Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ke o nɔmlɔ tso mluku ɔ mi tsɔ nɛ he ko he ko wui diblii ɔ, nɔmlɔ tso mluku ɔ tsuo mi ma tsɔ kaa bɔ nɛ kane kɛ e kpɛmi tsoo haa mo ɔ.”
Yesu kã Farisifo ɔmɛ kɛ Mlaatsɔɔli ɔmɛ a hɛ mi
(Mateo 23.1-36; Marko 12.38-40)
37Yesu munyu ɔ nya gbemi pɛ kɛkɛ nɛ Farisifono ko ba tsɛ lɛ ni yemi. E ya we ɔ mi, nɛ e ya hi si ngɛ niyeni ɔ he. 38Se benɛ Farisifono ɔ na kaa e fɔ we e he loko e maa ye ni ɔ, e hɛ mi pee lɛ yaa. 39Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de lɛ ke: “Mwɔnɛ ɔ mwɔnɛ ɔ ɔ, nyɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ nyɛ tsuɔ kplu he kɛ kã se, se nyɛ mi hyi tɔ kɛ ju kɛ yi mi wami. 40Kuasiahi! Anɛ nɔ nɛ pee semi ɔ, pi lɛ kɛ̃ nɛ e pee mi ɔ hulɔ lo? 41Mohu ɔ, nyɛɛ ngɔ nihi nɛ ngɛ mi ɔ ngɔ ha ohiafohi, nɛ oʼɛ, nihi tsuo he ma tsɔ ha nyɛ.
42“Se musu tloo nyɛ, Farisifohi, kaa nyɛ hãa kowɛ kɛ pui kɛ bahi slɔɔtohi tsuo mi dlami nyɔngma mi kake, nɛ nyɛ siɔ dami sane yemi kɛ Mawu suɔmi ɔ! Jinɛ e sa kaa nyɛ peɔ enɛ ɔmɛ, nɛ nyɛ ko si ekolɔ ɔ hulɔ.
43“Musu tloo nyɛ, Farisifohi, kaa nyɛ suɔ nikɔtɔmahi a sihi hehi ngɛ kpe he ɔmɛ kɛ nɔ ngami ngɛ juahi a nɔ! 44Musu tloo nyɛ, ejakaa nyɛ ngɛ kaa yɔkɔhi nɛ ji si, nɛ nihi nɛ nyɛɛ nɔ ɔ li!”
45Nɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, nihi nɛ o ngɛ dee nɛ ɔ ɔ, o kɛ ngɛ wɔ hu ahlua bɔe.” 46Yesu ke: “Nyɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ hu musu tloo nyɛ, kaa nyɛɛ kɛ tlomihi nɛ hi tloomi tloɔ nihi, se nyɛ nitsɛmɛ lɛɛ, nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛ nine nguɛ kake tɛ tlomi ɔmɛ a he. 47Musu tloo nyɛ, kaa nyɛ maa gbali ɔmɛ nɛ nyɛ tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ gbe ɔ a pu he ɔmɛ; 48lɛɛ niinɛ nyɛ ngɛ nyɛ tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a ni tsumi ɔmɛ a he odase yee, nɛ e ngɔ nyɛ nya ejakaa mɛ lɛ a gbe mɛ mohu, se nyɛ lɛ nyɛ maa a pu he ɔmɛ. 49Enɛ ɔ he nɔuu nɛ Mawu ni lemi ɔ de ke: ‘Ma tsɔ gbali kɛ bɔfohi kɛ ya a ngɔ, nɛ a maa gbe a ti ni komɛ, nɛ a maa wa a ti ni komɛ yi mi, ʼɔ nɛ, 50konɛ gbali ɔmɛ a muɔ tsuo nɛ a pue si kɛ je je mi sisije ɔ, a bi si ngɛ yi nɔ bi nɛ ɔmɛ a dɛ’ 51kɛ je Habel muɔ ɔ nɔ kɛ ya su Zakaria, nɔ nɛ a gbe ngɛ bɔ sami latɛ ɔ kɛ sɔlemi tsu ɔ kpɛti ɔ muɔ ɔ nɔ. Ee, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke a ma bi si ngɛ yi nɔ bi nɛ ɔmɛ a dɛ!
52“Musu tloo nyɛ, mlaa tsɔɔli, ejakaa nyɛ ngɔ ni lemi ɔ nya safe ɔ kɛ je! Nyɛ nitsɛmɛ ɔ nyɛ sɛ we mi, nɛ nihi nɛ hlaa kaa a maa sɛ mi ɔ hu nyɛ tsiɔ mɛ blɔ.”
53Nɛ benɛ Yesu je lejɛ ɔ kɛ ho ɔ, mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ je a hɛ ka lɛ nɛ a bɔni e nya munyu hiɔmi babauu, 54nɛ a da lɛ, nɛ a ngɛ hlae nɛ a wo e nya tso kpɛ konɛ a ya po e nya.

Title: LUKA 12
Content:
Osatopeemi he kɔkɔbɔmi
(Mateo 10.26-27)
1Jamɛ a be ɔ mi nɔuu ɔ, benɛ nihi akpe akpehi abɔ ba bua a he nyɛ nɛ nihi ngɛ nihi a nɔ nae ɔ, Yesu bɔni e kaseli ɔmɛ demi ke: “Kekleekle ɔ, nyɛ hɛ̃ nɛ hi nyɛ he nɔ ngɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a ma sasɛ nɛ ji osato peemi ɔ he. 2Se nɔ́ ko be nɛ a tsi nɔ nɛ a be lɛ kpo jee, aloo nɛ a ngɔ laa nɛ a be lee. 3Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ nɛ nyɛ de ngɛ diblii mi ɔ, a maa nu ngɛ la hɛ mi; nɛ nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ tu ngɔ wo tue mi ngɛ se tsuhi a mi ɔ, a maa fiɛ ngɛ tsuhi a yi mi.”
Nɔ nɛ sa gbeyeyemi
(Mateo 10.28-31)
4“Se nyɛ, ye huɛmɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nyɛ ko ye nihi nɛ gbee nɔmlɔ tso ɔ nɛ kɔlɔ ɔ se ɔ a be nɔ́ ko nɛ a ma nyɛ maa pee hu ɔ gbeye. 5Se ma tsɔɔ nyɛ nɔ nɛ sa nɛ nyɛɛ ye gbeye: Nyɛɛ ye nɔ nɛ ke e gbe se ɔ nɛ e ngɛ he blɔ kaa e ma sake ngɔ fɔ gehena mi ɔ gbeye. Ee, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, lɛ gbeye nyɛɛ ye.
6“Anɛ pi pesewahi enyɔ nɛ a juaa otokliihi enuɔ lo? Se Mawu hɛ ji akpɛti kake ngmelu nɔ. 7Se snyɛ yi bwɔmi tete a kane kulaa. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ ko ye gbeye; nyɛ he jua wa pe otokliihi babauu.”
Yesu he odaseyemi ngɛ nimli a hɛ mi
(Mateo 10.32-33; 12.32; 10.19-20)
8“I ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ gbaa mi woɔ ye ta ngɛ nimli a hɛ mi ɔ, Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ hu ma gba mi nɛ e maa wo e ta ngɛ Mawu bɔfo ɔmɛ a hɛ mi; 9se nɔ nɛ kuaa mi ngɛ nimli a hɛ mi ɔ, a ma kua lɛ ngɛ Mawu bɔfo ɔmɛ a hɛ mi.
10“Nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ maa tu munyu ko ngɔ si Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ, a kɛ maa pa lɛ; se Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ lɛɛ, nɔ nɛ maa tu musu bɔmi munyu ko ngɔ si lɛ ɔ, a kɛ be lɛ pae.
11“Ke a kpaka nyɛ kɛ ya kpe he ɔmɛ kɛ matsɛmɛ kɛ ganɔhi a hɛ mi ɔ, nyɛ ko gba nyɛ he nya ngɛ bɔ nɛ loo nɔ́ nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ ma je nyɛ nya loo nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ ma de ɔ he. 12Ejakaa nɔ́ nɛ sa kaa nyɛ de ɔ. Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ maa tsɔɔ nyɛ ngɛ lɛ ngmlɛfia a nɔ nɔuu.”
Niatsɛ kuasia a he abɛ ɔ
13Kɛkɛ nɛ nɔ ko je asafo ɔ mi ba de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, de ye nyɛmi ɔ nɛ e kɛ mi nɛ dla gbo si ni ɔmɛ.” 14Se Yesu de lɛ ke: “Maminyumu, mɛnɔ wo mi kojolɔ loo ni dlalɔ ngɛ nyɛ nɔ?” 15Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ hɛ nɛ hi nyɛ he nɔ saminya ngɛ hɛ tsumi he; ejakaa pi nɔmlɔ ni nɛ e na nɛ be nɔ ɔ mi nɛ e wami ngɛ.” 16Nɛ e bu mɛ abɛ ke: “Nyumu niatsɛ ko zugba ba ni babauu; 17nɛ e susu ngɛ e yi mi ke: ‘Kɛ ma pee kɛɛ, akɛnɛ i be he nɛ i kɛ ye ngmɔ mi ni maa to nɛ ɔ?’ 18Nɛ e ke: ‘Nɔ nɛ ma pee ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: Ma kuɔ ye gba a ngɔ pue si, nɛ ma ma nguahi, nɛ ma to ye ngmɔ mi ni kɛ ye ni ɔmɛ tsuo ngɛ lejɛ ɔ; 19nɛ ma de ye klaa ke: Ye klaa, o ngɛ nihi babauu nɛ a ngɔ to ha mo jehahi fuu; jɔɔ o he, ye nɛ o nu, nɛ o tsui nɛ nɔ o mi!’ 20Se Mawu de lɛ ke: ‘Kuasia, nyɔ nɛ ɔ mi nɔuu ɔ, a ma bi o klaa si ngɛ o dɛ; nɛ nihi nɛ o dla ngɔ to ɔ, mɛnɔ nihi a maa pee?’ 21Jã nɔ nɛ toɔ juetli ngɔ haa lɛ nitsɛ e he, se e pi niatsɛ ngɛ Mawu blɔfami ɔ ngɛ.”
He kɛ Mawu nɔ fɔmi
(Mateo 6.25-34)
22Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛɛ lɛɛ i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nyɛ ko hao nyɛ he ngɛ nyɛ klaa a he, nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ maa ye, aloo nɔmlɔ tso ɔ he, nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ maa wo. 23Klaa a pe ngma, nɛ nɔmlɔ tso ɔ hu pe tade. 24Nyɛ susu kuakualabite ɔmɛ a he; ejakaa a du we ni, jeha nɛ ɔ hu a kpa we, na a be nito he loo ngma gba po, se Mawu lɛɛ mɛ; nyɛɛ hyɛ bɔ nɛ nyɛ he jua wa hluu pe lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ! 25Se nyɛ ti mɛnɔ nɛ ke e gba e he nya a nɛ e ma nyɛ tsa e kami nya ninekpɔ mi kake? 26Se ke nyɛ nyɛ we nɔ́ nɛ ji nyafii nɛ nyɛɛ pee ɔ, mɛ he je nyɛ gbaa nyɛ he nyɛ ngɛ nihi nɛ piɛ ɔmɛ a he mɔ? 27Nyɛ susu mɔmɔ ɔmɛ a he, bɔ nɛ a puɛɛ; a tsu we ni, nɛ jeha nɔ hu a tsɛ̃ we kpa, se i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, Salomo kɛ e hɛ mi nyami ɔ tete mia we kaa enɛ ɔmɛ a ti kake. 28Jeha nɛ ɔ ke hu nɛ mwɔnɛ ɔ e ngɛ nga nɔ nɛ hwɔɔ nɛ a kɛ woɔ abolo tsu mi ɔ nɛ Mawu miaa lɛ kikɛ ɔ, anɛ e be nyɛ miae hluu pe mɛ, nyɛ nɛ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi pi ɔ! 29Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ ko bi nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ maa ye aloo nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ maa nu, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu nyɛ yi mi nɛ ko pee nyɛ kɔsikɔsi. 30Ejakaa kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo se je nɛ ɔ mi majeli a bimɛ ɔmɛ dii; se nyɛ tsɛ ɔ le kaa ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he ngɛ nyɛ hiae. 31Nyɛ hla Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ se blɔ mohu nɛ a maa ngɔ ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo ngɔ piɛ he ha nyɛ.”
Hiɔwe juetli
(Mateo 6.19-21)
32“Koo ye gbeye, asafo kuu nyafii, ejakaa nyɛ tsɛ ɔ ngɛ he tsui kaa e maa ngɔ matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɔ ha nyɛ. 33Nyɛɛ jua nihi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ ɔ nɛ nyɛ kɛ pee kpakpa. Nyɛ hla sika kpɛɛhi nɛ be momo pee; nyɛɛ to juetli nɛ be tae ngɛ hiɔwe, he nɛ juɔ ko be he sue nɛ wɔyewɔye kpe we ni ngɛ ɔ. 34Ejakaa he nɛ nyɛ juetli ɔ ngɛ ɔ, lejɛ ɔ nyɛ tsui hu maa hi.”
Sɔmɔli nɛ buu
35“Nyɛɛ fi nyɛ Tnlɛ mi nɛ nyɛ ha nyɛ kane ɔmɛ nɛ tso; 36nɛ nyɛɛ pee kaa nihi nɛ ngɛ a nyɔmtsɛ blɔ hyɛe be mi nɛ e maa je yokpeemi ɔ kɛ ba a, konɛ ke e ba nɛ e ba si ɔ, kɛkɛ nɛ a bli lɛ amlɔ. 37A gbaa jamɛ a tsɔli ɔmɛ nɛ benɛ a nyɔmtsɛ ɔ maa ba a nɛ e ma ba na mɛ kaa a ngɛ nyɔ fɔe ɔ! Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke e maa mia nɛ e ma ha a hi si ngɛ niyeni he, nɛ e maa ba ba sɔmɔ mɛ. 38Nɛ ke e ba nyɔ mi kpɛti loo makɛ nɛ e ba na mɛ jã a, a gbaa jamɛ a tsɔli ɔmɛ! 39Se nyɛ na le enɛ ɔ kaa, ke wetsɛ ɔ le ngmlɛfia nɔ nɛ juɔ ɔ baa a jinɛ e maa bu nɛ e be blɔ ngmɛe nɛ a ywia e tsu ɔ ngɔ wo mi. 40Lɔɔ he ɔ nyɛ hu nyɛ dla nyɛ he ngɔ to, ejakaa, ngmlɛfia nɛ nyɛ hɛ be nɔ ɔ nɔ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ maa ba.”
Sɔmɔlɔ anɔkualetsɛ kɛ sɔmɔlɔ lakpatsɛ
(Mateo 24.45-51)
41Petro de Yesu ke: “Mawetsɛ, wɔ o ngɛ kikɛmɛ a abɛ nɛ ɔ bue ɔ, aloo ni ɔmɛ tsuo hu ngɛ mi?” 42Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ha heto ke: “Se mɛnɔ mɔ ji tsɔlɔ nɔkɔtɔma anɔkualetsɛ kɛ ni lelɔ, nɛ e nyɔmtsɛ ɔ maa wo lɛ nɔkɔtɔma ngɛ e webihi a nɔ, konɛ e ha mɛ a niyeni ngɛ be nɛ sa mi ɔ? 43A gbaa jamɛ a tsɔlɔ ɔ, nɔ nɛ ke e nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ba nɛ e ma ba na lɛ kaa e ngɛ jã pee ɔ. 44I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke e maa wo lɛ nɔkɔtɔma ngɛ e ni ɔmɛ kulaa nɔ. 45Se ke jamɛ a tsɔlɔ ɔ de ngɛ e tsui mi ke: ‘Ye nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ngɛ e bami be ɔ tsɛe kɛ ngɛ toe,’ nɛ e ma bɔni wenyumuhi kɛ weyi ɔmɛ gbemi kɛ da numi kɛ da demi ɔ; 46jamɛ a tsɔlɔ ɔ nyɔmtsɛ ɔ maa ba ngɛ ligbi nɛ e hyɛ we lɛ blɔ kɛ ngmlɛfia nɛ e li nɔ, nɛ e ma ba poo e mi, nɛ e ma ha lɛ e blɔfami nɔ kɛ ablaatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ.
47“Se jamɛ a tsɔlɔ ɔ nɛ le e nyɔmtsɛ suɔmi nya ni nɛ e dla we e he ngɔ tui nɛ e pa pee we e suɔmi nyɛ ni ɔ, a maa fia lɛ kpa fuu; 48se nɔ nɛ li nɛ e ya pee kpa fiami ni ɔ, a maa fia lɛ kpa bɔɔ ko. Se nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ a ngɔ fuu ngɔ ha lɛ ɔ, a ma hla fuu ngɛ e dɛ; nɛ nɔ nɛ a tu fuu ngɔ wo e dɛ ɔ, a ma bi nɔ́ nɛ be nɔ si ngɛ e dɛ.”
Migbami nɛ baa ngɛ Yesu he
(Mateo 10.34-36)
49“I ba nɛ ma ba wo la ngɛ je ɔ mi, nɛ ke e hle momo ɔ, mɛni i ngɛ hlae ekohu! 50I ngɛ baptisimi ko nɛ a kɛ maa baptisi mi, nɛ hyɛ bɔ nɛ ye he ngɛ mi hiae kɛ maa su be nɛ a maa gbe nya! 51Anɛ nyɛ susu kaa hejɔmi hami i ba ngɛ je ɔ mi lo? I ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Dɛbi, se mi gbami mohu. 52Ejakaa kɛ je be nɛ ɔ mi kɛ yaa nɛ ɔ ɔ, ni enuɔ maa gba ngɛ we kake mi, ni etɛ maa te si ngɔ wɔ ni enyɔ, nɛ ni enyɔ hu maa te si ngɔ wo ni etɛ; 53mi gbami maa ba tsɛ kɛ e bi nyumu, kɛ binyumu hu kɛ e tsɛ a kpɛti; kɛ nyɛ kɛ biyo kpɛti, kɛ biyo hu kɛ nyɛ kpɛti; nganyɛ kɛ e nganyɛ, e bi ɔ yo ɔ, kpɛti kɛ lɛ hu e kɛ e nganyɛ, e huno nyɛ ɔ, kpɛti.”
Be ɔ lemi
(Mateo 16.2-3)
54Nɛ e de asafo ɔmɛ hu ke: “Ke nyɛ na bɔku nɛ ngɛ e he nya buae ngɛ bonyoku (pu sinɔ he) ɔ, amlɔ ɔ nyɛ deɔ ke: ‘Hiɔmi maa nɛ,’ nɛ e baa mi ja; 55nɛ ke leneyi (wo si) kɔɔhiɔ ngɛ fiae ɔ, nyɛ deɔ ke: ‘Latsa maa ba,’ nɛ e baa mi. 56Osatotsɛmɛ, nyɛ le hiɔwe kɛ je mi nihi a sisi tsɔɔmi; se kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ nyɛ li yi nɔ nɛ ɔ sisitsɔɔmi ɔ?”
O kɛ o pɛbilɔ ɔ nɛ dla
(Mateo 5.25-26)
57“Nɛ mɛ he je nɛ nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ kojo we nɔ́ nɛ da blɔ ha we nyɛ he ɔ? 58Se ke o kɛ o pɛbilɔ yaa kojolɔ hɛ mi ɔ, bɔɔ mɔde nɛ o kɛ lɛ nɛ dla ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ, konɛ e ko sã mo ya ha kojolɔ ɔ, nɛ kojolɔ ɔ hu ngɔ mo ngo ha polisi ɔ, nɛ polisi ɔ wo mo tsu mi. 59I ngɛ mo dee ke: O be lejɛ ɔ jee gblegbleegblee ja o wo nyagbe pesewa a lolo.”

Title: LUKA 13
Content:
Tsakee o blɔ ɔmɛ nɛ o he mi ko kpata
1Jamɛ a be ɔ mi nɔuu ɔ, ni komɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ sɛ̃ɛ Galileabi nɛ Pilato ngɔ a muɔ ngɔ futu a bɔ sami ɔmɛ a mi ɔ he sane ɔ ha lɛ. 2Nɛ Yesu he nɔ nɛ e bi mɛ ke: “Anɛ nyɛ susu kaa kikɛmɛ a Galileabi nɛ ɔmɛ ji yayamipeeli pe Galileabi ɔmɛ tsuo he je nɛ a na kikɛmɛ a amanehlu nɛ ɔ lo? 3Dɛbi, se mohu i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, ke nyɛ tsakee we nyɛ blɔ ɔmɛ ɔ, nyɛ tsuo nyɛ hɛ mi ma kpata ja kɛ̃. 4Aloo nyɛ susu kaa nihi nyɔngma kɛ kpaanyɔ ɔ nɛ Siloa mɔ ɔ hule pue a nɔ nɛ e gbe mɛ ɔ, mɛ kɛkɛ ji yayami peeli pe nimli tsuo nɛ ngɛ Yerusalem ɔ lo? 5Dɛbi, se mohu i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, ke nyɛ tsakee we nyɛ blɔ ɔmɛ ɔ, nyɛ tsuo nyɛ hɛ mi ma kpata jã kɛ.”
Ngmɔkɔ tso nɛ wui yiblii ɔ he abɛ ɔ
6Nɛ e bu mɛ kikɛmɛ a abɛ nɛ ɔ ke: “Nɔ ko du ngmɔkɔ tso ngɛ e wai ngmɔ mi, nɛ e ya e nɔ yiblii hlami, se e nɛ eko. 7Kɛkɛ nɛ e de ngmɔ hulɔ ɔ ke: ‘Oʼɛ jeha etɛ ji nɛ ɔ tsuo ɔ, i baa ba hlaa yiblii ngɛ ngmɔkɔ tso nɛ ɔ nɔ, se i nɛ eko. Poo lɛ ngɔ fɔ si. Mɛ he je hu nɛ e ngɛ zugba a gbee ɔ?’ 8Se ngmɔ hulɔ ɔ he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, ha nɛ e hi si jeha nɛ ɔ hulɔ kɛ maa su be nɛ ma tsua he nɛ ma wo sisi kuku, 9kaa alinɔ e maa wo yiblii lo; se ke pi ja a loko o po lɛ ngɔ fɔ si.’ ”
Yesu tsa yo ko nɛ kpɛ ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ
10Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ eko nɔ ɔ, Yesu ngɛ ni tsɔɔe ngɛ kpe he ɔ eko, 11nɛ oʼɛ, yo ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ mumi yayami wo lɛ hiɔ jeha nyɔngma kɛ kpaanyɔ, nɛ e kpɛ, nɛ enyɛ we e mi nɛ e kpa kulaa po. 12Se benɛ Yesu na lɛ ɔ, e tsɛ lɛ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Yo, a pɛne mo ngɛ o hiɔ ɔ mi!” 13Nɛ e kɛ e ninehi pue e nɔ, nɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔuu ɔ, e da tlɔmɔɔ, nɛ e wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami. 14Se kpe he nɔkɔtɔma a muklii mi wo la akɛnɛ Yesu tsa nɔ ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, nɛ e he nɔ nɛ e de asafo ɔ ke: “Ligbi ekpa lɛ ngɛ nɛ sa kaa a tsuɔ ni ngɛ mi; lɔ ɔ he je ɔ nyɛɛ ba ngɛ lɛ be ɔmɛ a mi konɛ a tsa nyɛ, se pi ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ!” 15Se Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Osatotsɛmɛ! Anɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ pɛne we e na loo e teji ngɛ niyeni nɔ́ ɔ he kpakaa we lɛ ya ha we lɛ nyu lo? 16Oʼɛ, kikɛmɛ a yo nɛ ɔ nɛ ji Abraham bi yo nɛ Satan fi lɛ kikɛmɛ a jeha nyɔngma kɛ kpaanyɔ nɛ ɔ ɔ, anɛ e dɛ́ kaa a pɛneɔ lɛ ngɛ kikɛmɛ a kpa nɛ ɔ mi ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ lo?” 17Nɛ benɛ e de enɛ ɔ ɔ, zo gbe e henyɛli ɔmɛ tsuo, nɛ asafo ɔ tsuo na buajɔmi ngɛ nyakpɛ nihi nɛ e pee ɔ kulaa he.
Sinapi wu ɔ he abɛ ɔ
(Mateo 13.31-32; Marko 4.30-32)
18Jeha nɛ ɔ Yesu ke: “Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ kaa mɛni, nɛ mɛni he ma ngɔ to? 19E ngɛ kaa sinapi wu kake ngmelu nɛ nyumu ko ngɔ nɛ e ya du ngɛ e ngmɔ mi, nɛ e puɛ, nɛ e pee tso kpetekpleenyɛ, nɛ hiɔwe lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ baa ba peɔ tsuhi ngɛ e kɔni ɔmɛ a mi.”
Ma sasɛ ɔ he abɛ ɔ
(Mateo 13.33)
20Nɛ e de ekohu ke: “Mɛni he ma ngɔ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɔ to? 21E ngɛ kaa ma sasɛ nɛ yo ko ngɔ nɛ e ngɔ wo sowe etɛ mi kɛ ya su be nɛ kulaa sa.”
Agbo tokofii ɔ
(Mateo 7.13-14, 21-23)
22Nɛ Yesu ya kpa mahi kɛ kɔpehi a mi tsɔɔ ni, nɛ e po mi kɛ yaa Yerusalem. 23Nɛ nɔ ko bi lɛ ke: “Mawetsɛ, anɛ nihi bɔɔ kɛkɛ yiwami a ma he lo?” Se e de mɛ ke: 24“Nyɛɛ plee agbo tokofii ɔ mi sɛmi he, ejakaa i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, nihi fuu ma hla nɛ a sɛ mi, se a be nyɛe.
25“Be mi nɛ we tsɛ ɔ te si nɛ e ya nga sinya a, nɛ nyɛ ma bɔni sinya a simi ngɛ se je, nɛ nyɛ ma de ke: ‘Nyɔ́mtsɛ, Nyɔmtsɛ, bli wɔ,’ nɛ e ma he nɔ nɛ e ma de nyɛ ke: I li he nɛ nyɛ je’ ɔ, 26kɛkɛ ɔ nyɛ ma bɔni demi ke: ‘Wa ye ni nɛ wa nu ni ngɛ o hɛ mi, nɛ o tsɔɔ ni ngɛ wa magbɛ ɔmɛ a mi.’ 27Nɛ e ma de mɛ ke: ‘I ngɛ nyɛ dee ke i li he nɛ nyɛ je; nyɛɛ je ye nɔ nyɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ nyɛ tsuɔ nihi nɛ dɛ blɔ!’ ɔ, 28lejɛ ɔ ya fomi kɛ lungu nya kpemi maa hi, benɛ nyɛ maa na Abraham kɛ Isak kɛ Yakob kɛ gbali ɔmɛ tsuo ngɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi nɛ nyɛ nitsɛmɛ lɛɛ a fie nyɛ ɔ. 29Nɛ nihi maa je beleku (pu je he) kɛ bonyoku (puisinɔ he) kɛ omlɛyi (hue mi je) kɛ leneyi (wo si je) maa ba nɛ a ma ba hi okplɔɔ he ngɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi. 30Nɛ oʼɛ, sekpɛtsɛmɛ ngɛ nɛ maa pee kekletsɛmɛ, na kekletsɛmɛ hu ngɛ nɛ maa pee sekpɛtsɛmɛ.
Suɔmi nɛ Yesu ngɛ kɛ ha Yerusalem
(Mateo 23.37-39)
31Jamɛ a be ɔ mi nɔuu ɔ, Farisifo ɔmɛ ekomɛ ba e ngɔ ba de lɛ ke: “Jee hiɛ ɔ nɛ o ho, ejakaa Herode ngɛ mo hlae nɛ e gbe.” 32Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ya nɛ nyɛ ya de jamɛ a kɔkɔbo ɔ ke: Oʼɛ, i ngɛ mumi yayamihi hiae, nɛ i ngɛ nihi tsae mwɔnɛ ɔ kɛ hwɔɔ, nɛ ligbi nɛ ji ligbi etɛ ɔ ma gbe nya.’ 33Se kɛ̃ ɔ ja i nyɛɛ mwɔnɛ ɔ kɛ hwɔɔ kɛ hwɔɔ se, ejakaa e be mi bae kaa a maa gbe gbalɔ ko ngɛ he ko kaa ja Yerusalem.
34“Yerusalem, Yerusalem, mo nɛ o gbee gbali ɔmɛ, nɛ o fiaa nihi nɛ a tsɔɔ mɛ o ngɔ ɔ tɛ, si nyɛmɛ i hla kaa i buaa o bimɛ ɔmɛ a nya, kaa bɔ nɛ kungwɔ buaa e bimɛ a nyɛ ngɔ woɔ e pɛlihi a sisi ɔ, nɛ nyɛ kplɛɛ we.’ 35Oʼɛ, a si nyɛ we ɔ we doku ha nyɛ. Se i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nyɛ be mi nae hu kɛ maa su be nɛ e maa ba mi kaa nyɛ ma de ke: ‘A gbaa nɔ nɛ ma ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ biɛ mi ɔ!’ ”

Title: LUKA 14
Content:
Yesu tsa hiɔtsɛ ko
1Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ko nɔ ɔ, Yesu ya ni yemi ngɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a nikɔtɔma amɛ a ti nɔ kake we mi, nɛ a huɔ lɛ. 2Nɛ oʼɛ nyumu ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ ngɛ hulemi hiɔ nue. 3Nɛ Yesu de mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ ke: “Anɛ e da blɔ kaa a tsaa nɔ ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ lo?” 4Se a pui e nya mi. Kɛkɛ nɛ e pɛtɛ e he nɛ e tsa lɛ, nɛ e wo lɛ blɔ ke e ho. 5Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ti mɛnɔ nɛ ke e teji loo e na ya nɔ vu mi ɔ nɛ e ya be lɛ jee amlɔ ɔ nɔuu ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ?” 6Se a nyɛ we enɛ ɔmɛ a heto nɛ a ha hu.
Nibwɔpeemi kɛ hesibami
7Nɛ benɛ Yesu yo bɔ nɛ a ngɛ nikɔtɔmahi a sihi he hlae ɔ, e bu nihi nɛ a kpee ɔ abɛ, nɛedemɛke? 8“Ke nɔ ko kpee mo kɛ yaa yo kpeemi okplɔɔ he ɔ, ko ya hi yimɛ a je; eko ɔ alinɔ e kpee nɔ ko nɛ hɛ mi ngɛ nyami pe mo, 9konɛ nɔ nɛ kpee o kɛ jamɛ a tsɛ ɔ tsuo ɔ ko ba nɛ e ba de mo ke: ‘Ha nɔ nɛ ɔ blɔ,’ nɛ lɔ ɔ lɛɛ o kɛ zo ma ya hi nane si je. 10Se mohu ke a kpee mo ɔ, yaa nɛ o ya hi nane si je, konɛ ke nɔ nɛ kpee mo ɔ ba a, nɛ e ba de mo ke: ‘Huɛ, ba yimɛ a je.’ Lɔ ɔ lɛɛ o hɛ mi maa ba nyami ngɛ nihi nɛ o kɛ hii si ɔmɛ tsuo a hɛ mi. 11Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ woɔ e he nɔ ɔ, a maa ba lɛ si, nɛ nɔ nɛ baa e he si ɔ, a ma wo e nɔ.”
12Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de nɔ nɛ kpee lɛ ɔ ke: “Ke o ngmɛ piani loo gbɔkuɛ okplɔɔ ɔ, ko tsɛ o huɛmɛ loo o nyɛmimɛ loo o wekuli loo o kpɔ mi niatsɛmɛ, konɛ alinɔ mɛ hu a ba kpee mo eko ngɔ ma nya. 13Se ke o ngmɛ okplɔo ɔ, tsɛ ohiafohi kɛ glɔtsɛmɛ kɛ pɔtsɛmɛ kɛ heyuyuili mohu, 14nɛ a maa gbaa mo, akɛnɛ a be nɔ́ ko nɛ a kɛ maa to mo nane mi ɔ; ejakaa a maa to mo nane mi ngɛ dali a si temi ɔ mi.”
Okplɔɔ ngua a he abɛ ɔ
(Mateo 22.1-10)
15Nɛ benɛ nihi nɛ kɛ lɛ hii si ngɛ niyeni si ɔ a ti nɔ kake nu ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, e de Yesu ke: “A gbaa nɔ nɛ yeɔ abolo ngɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi!” 16Se Yesu de lɛ ke: “Nyumu ko ngmɛ okplɔɔ ngua, nɛ e kpee nihi fuu; 17nɛ benɛ e su ni yemi be ɔ, e tsɔ e tsɔlɔ ke e ya de nihi nɛ a kpee ɔ ke: ‘Nyɛɛ ba, ejakaa a gbe nihi kulaa nya’ 18Se mɛ tsuo kulaa a bɔni lakpa kake yemi. Kekle nɔ ɔ de lɛ ke: ‘I he ngmɔ ko nɛ e sa kaa ma ya nɛ ma ya hyɛ; i kpa mo pɛɛ nɛ o na ha mi.’ 19Nɛ nɔ kpa ke: ‘I he na blablɛ enuɔ nɛ i yaa ma ya ka mɛ ma hyɛ; i kpa mo pɛɛ nɛ o na ha mi.’ 20Nɛ nɔ kpa hu ke: ‘I kpee yo nɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ i be nyɛe ma ba.’ 21Nɛ kikɛmɛ a tsɔlɔ nɛ ɔ ba nɛ e ba jaje ni nɛ ɔmɛ kulaa ngɔ tsɔɔ e nyɔmtsɛ ɔ. Kɛkɛ nɛ we tsɛ ɔ muklii mi fu, nɛ e de tsɔlɔ ɔ ke: ‘Jee kpo esɔ kɛ ya ma a mi gbɛjegbɛ ɔmɛ kɛ magbɛ ɔme kɛ puɔ ɔmɛ a kpɛ, nɛ o ya ngɔ ohiafohi kɛ glɔtsɛmɛ kɛ hɛyuyuili kɛ pɔtsɛmɛ kɛ ba hiɛ ɔ.’ 22Nɛ tsɔlɔ ɔ ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, a pee bɔ nɛ o de ɔ, se kɛ ɔ blɔ pa ngɛ.’ 23Nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de tsɔlɔ ɔ ke: ‘Jee kpo nɛ o ya nyɛ a nɔ nɛ a ba, konɛ ye we ɔ nɛ hyi tɔ.’ 24Ejakaa i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: ‘Ke nihi nɛ a kpee ɔmɛ a ti nɔ ko sa e nyɛ ye niyeni ɔ fii!’ ”
Kristo kaselɔ peemi
(Mateo 10.37-38)
25Nihi babauu kɛ Yesu nyɛɛ, nɛ e plɛ e he nɛ e de mɛ ke: 26“Ke nɔ ko ma ye ngɔ nɛ e nyɛ́ e tsɛ kɛ e nyɛ kɛ e yo kɛ e bimɛ kɛ e nyɛmimɛ nyumuhi kɛ lɛ nitsɛ e klaa hu tete ɔ, e be nyɛe ye kaselɔ peemi. 27Nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ wo we e seumi tso ngɔ tloo kɛ nyɛɛ ye se ɔ, e be nyɛe ye kaselɔ peemi. 28Ejakaa nyɛ ti mɛnɔ nɛ ke e ngɛ hlae nɛ e ma mɔ ɔ nɛ e be si hie nɛ e bu nya nɛ e hyɛ lolo kaa e ngɛ nihi bɔ nɛ maa su nya gbemi lo? 29Konɛ e ko ba kaa, benɛ e je sisi nɛ e ya nyɛ we nya nɛ e gbe ɔ, nihi tsuo nɛ na a ba bɔni e he fɛu yemi ke: 30‘Kikɛmɛ a nɔmlɔ nɛ ɔ bɔni mɔ mami, se e nyɛ we nya nɛ e gbe.’ 31Aloo te matsɛ nɛ ke e kɛ matsɛ kpa ko yaa hwu ta a nɛ e be si hie nɛ e susu he nɛ e hyɛ kaa nɔ nɛ hɛɛ nimli akpɛ nyingmi enyɔ kɛ ma e nɔ nɛ ɔ ɔ, e ma nyɛ nɛ e kɛ lɛ ya kpe kɛ nimli akpe nyɔma lo? 32Ke pi ja a, benɛ matsɛ kake ɔ nyɛɛ tsitsa lokoo kɛ ma a, e maa tsɔ tsɔli kɛ ya e ngɔ ya kpa kpatami he pɛɛ. 33Ja nɔuu kɛ nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ kua we nihi kulaa nɛ e ngɛ ɔ, be nyɛe ye kaselɔ peemi.”
Ngo nɛ nya nyu gbo
(Mateo 5.13; Marko 9.50)
34“Ngo hi; se ke ngo nya nyu gbo ɔ, mɛni a ma kɛ wo lɛ ngo ekohu? 35E hi nɛ a maa ngɔ lɛ kaa zu loo kuku tete; a tsɛɛ ngɔ pueɔ he. Nɔ nɛ ngɛ tue nɛ e kɛ maa nu ɔ, e nu.”

Title: LUKA 15
Content:
To nɛ laa a
(Mateo 18.12-14)
1Jeha nɛ ɔ onia tsuli kɛ yayami peeli ɔmɛ tsuo hɛ mɛ su e he nɛ a ba bu lɛ tue. 2Farisifo ɔmɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ tu munyu huitihuiti nɛ a de ke: “Nɔ nɛ ɔ kɛ yayami peeli yeɔ ni.” 3Nɛ e bu mɛ kikɛmɛ a abɛ nɛ ɔ ke:
4“Nyɛ ti mɛnɔ nɛ ke e ngɛ to lafa nɛ a kpɛti kake laa a, e be nyingmi nɛɛ kɛ nɛɛ ɔ sie ngɛ nga a nɔ nɛ e ya hla nɔ́ nɛ laa a kɛ maa su benɛ e maa na lɛ? 5Nɛ ke e na lɛ ɔ, e woɔ lɛ fɔɔ ekonɔ nɛ e naa bua jɔmi; 6nɛ ke e ba we mi ɔ, e tsɛɛ e huɛmɛ kɛ e pakabi kɛ kpee, nɛ e deɔ mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ kɛ mi nɛ na buajɔmi, ejakaa i na ye to ɔ nɛ laa a.’ 7I ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, ja nɔuu buajɔmi maa ba hiɔwe ngɛ yayami peelɔ kake nɛ tsakee e tsui ɔ he pe dali nyingmi nɛɛ kɛ nɛɛ nɛ tsui tsakemi he hia we mɛ ɔ.”
Sika nɛ laa a
8“Aloo te yo nɛ ngɛ sika hiɔ nyɔngma nɛ ke kpɔ kake laa a nɛ e be kane sue nɛ e bɛɛ we ɔ mi nɛ e hla fitsofitso kɛ maa su be nɛ e maa na? 9Nɛ ke e na a, e tsɛɛ e huɛmɛ kɛ e pakabi kɛ kpee nɛ e deɔ mɛ ke: ‘Nyɛɛ kɛ mi nɛ na bua jɔmi, ejakaa i na ye sika kpɔ nɛ laa a.’ 10Ja nɔuu i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, bua jɔmi baa Mawu bɔfo ɔmɛ a kpɛti ngɛ yayami peelɔ kake nɛ tsakee e tsui ɔ he.”
Bi nyumu nɛ laa a
11Nɛ e ke: “Nyumu ko ngɛ bimɛ nyumuhi enyɔ. 12Nɛ a kpɛti jokuɛyo ɔ de e tsɛ ɔ ke: ‘Tsaatsɛ, ha mi o ni ɔmɛ a mi nɔ́ nɛ ji ye blɔfami nɔ.’ Nɛ e dla e ni ɔmɛ a mi ngɔ ha mɛ. 13Nɛ lɔ ɔ se ɔ, e sui be ko kɛkɛ nɛ jokuɛ ɔ bua kulaa nya, nɛ e doma kɛ ho he ko lokoo ya, nɛ Hejɛ ɔ ekɛ je mi bami sakasaka ya kpata e ni ɔmɛ a hɛ mi ngɛ. 14Se benɛ e puɛ kulaa a, hwɔ nɛ nya wa ko ba te si ngɛ jamɛ a zugba a nɔ tsuo, nɛ e bɔni lɛ fimi. 15Nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho nɛ e kɛ e he ya bɔ jamɛ a zugba a nɔ bi ɔmɛ eko he; nɛ e ha e ya e ngmɔ ɔ mi ya lɛ kpotoohi. 16Nɛ e jio lɛ kaa jinɛ e ko na yɔ nɛ kpotoo ɔmɛ yeɔ ɔ eko nɛ e ye nɛ e tɔ, se nɔ ko hi lɛ. 17Nɛ benɛ e hɛ mi tsɔ lɛ ɔ, e ke: ‘Yaa hyɛ tsaatsɛ apaatsɛmɛ abɔ sɔuu nɛ ngɛ niyeni babauu nɛ a pee we he nɔ ko, nɛ imi lɛɛ hwɔ gɛ mi gbee ngɛ hiɛ ɔ nɛ ɔ. 18Ma te si nɛ ma ya tsaatsɛ ngɔ nɛ ma ya de lɛ ke: “Tsaatsɛ, i pee yayami si Mawu kɛ mo, 19nɛ i sɛ́ kaa a tsɛɔ mi o bi hu; ngɔɔ mi ngɔ pee o apaatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ eko.” ’ 20Nɛ e te si nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ba e tsɛ ngɔ.
“Se benɛ e nyɛɛ tsitsa lokoo kɛ ma a, e tsɛ na lɛ, nɛ e muklii mi sa lɛ, nɛ e sa fo kɛ ho ya fua lɛ nɛ e fiɔ e nya he. 21Nɛ e bi ɔ de lɛ ke: ‘Tsaatsɛ, i pee yayami kɛ si Mawu kɛ mo, nɛ i sɛ kaa a tsɛɔ mi o bi hu!’ 22Se e tsɛ ɔ de sɔmɔli ɔmɛ ke: ‘Nyɛ ya je tade nɛ ngɛ fɛu pe kulaa a kɛ ba esɔ, nɛ nyɛ kɛ ba wo lɛ, nɛ nyɛɛ wo e nine si ga kɛ e nane hu tokota; 23nɛ nyɛɛ ngɔ na bi nɛ tu zɔ ɔ kɛ ba nɛ nyɛ ba gbe, nɛ nyɛ ha waa ye ni nɛ wa na bua jɔmi; 24ejaakaa ye bi nɛ ɔ gbo, nɛ e hɛ tsɛ ekohu; e laa nɛ a na lɛ.’ Nɛ a bɔni nyami.
25“Se e bi nɔkɔtɔma a ngɛ ngmɔ mi, nɛ benɛ e ma nɛ e su we ɔ mi ta a, e nu saku kɛ dohi a he. 26E tsɛ sɔmɔli ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake kɛ ba se, nɛ e bi lɛ ke: ‘Mɛni a ngɛ pee nɛ ɔ?’ 27Nɛ e de lɛ ke: ‘O nyɛmi ɔ ba, nɛ o tsɛ gbe na bi nɛ tu zɔ ɔ ejakaa e su e dɛ mi kpɛii nɛ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko be e he.’ 28Nɛ e muklii mi fu, nɛ e kplɛɛ we we ɔ mi sɛmi. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ e tsɛ ɔ je kpo nɛ e ba kpa lɛ pɛɛ. 29Se e he nɔ nɛ e de e tsɛ ɔ ke: ‘Hyɛ jehahi abɔ sɔuu nɛ i sɔmɔ mo, nɛ i tɔ we o kita ko nɔ gblee, nɛ imi lɛɛ o ha we mi to ku ko tete po gblee konɛ i kɛ ye huɛmɛ nɛ nya; 30se mwɔnɛ nɛ o bi nɛ ɔ nɛ kɛ ajuamahi ya ye o ni ɔmɛ ba a, lɛɛ o gbe na bi nɛ tu zɔ ɔ ngɔ ha lɛ.’ 31Nɛ e tsɛ ɔ de lɛ ke: ‘Ye bi, mo lɛɛ o kɛ mi lɛ ngɛ daa nɛ ɔ, nɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ ɔ, o nɔ ʼi, 32se e sa kaa wa nya nɛ wa bua nɛ jɔ wa he, ejakaa o nyɛmi nɛ ɔ gbo, nɛ e hɛ tsɛ ekohu, e laa, nɛ a na lɛ.’ ”

Title: LUKA 16
Content:
Tsɔlɔ nɔkɔtɔma kutupɔtsɛ ɔ
1Yesu de e kaseli ɔmɛ hu ke: “Nyumu niatsɛ ko hi si nɛ e ngɛ tsɔlɔ nɔkɔtɔma ko nɛ a ba po e nya ngɔ ha lɛ ke e ngɛ e ni ɔmɛ a hɛ mi kpatae. 2E tsɛ tsɔlɔ ɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: ‘Kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ i ngɛ enɛ ɔ nue ngɛ o he nɛ ɔ?’ Ba bu o nɔkɔtɔma yemi ɔ he akɔɔtaa ejakaa o be nɔkɔtɔma nyɛe maa ye hu. 3Nɛ tsɔlɔ nɔkɔtɔma a de ngɛ e yi mi ke: ‘Nɛ ye nyɔmtsɛ ngɛ nɔkɔtɔma yemi ɔ kpɔe ngɛ ye dɛ nɛ ɔ, kɛ ma pee kɛɛ? I be nyɛe si ma tsua, nɛ nɔ bami hu ngɛ mi zo pee. 4I na bɔ nɛ ma pee nɛ ke a kpa mi nɔkɔtɔma yemi ɔ nɛ a he mi ngɛ a wehi a mi.’ 5Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e tsɛ e nyɔmtsɛ hiɔtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ tsuo kɛ ba kakaaka; e bi kekle nɔ ɔ ke: ‘Hiɔ nyɛmɛ o hɛɛ ye nyɔmtsɛ ɔ?’ 6Nɛ e ke: ‘Nu tɔ lafa.’ Nɛ e de lɛ ke: ‘He o womi ɔ nɛ o hi si esɔ nɛ o ngma nyingmi enuɔ. 7Nɛ nɔ kpa hu e bi lɛ ke: ‘Nɛ mo nɛɛ, hiɔ nyɛmɛ o hɛɛ?’ E ha heto ke: ‘Ngma kpɛɛ lafa.’ Nɛ e de lɛ ke: ‘He o womi ɔ nɛ o ngma nyingmi kpaanyɔ.’ 8Nɛ nyɔmtsɛ ɔ je tsɔlɔ nɔkɔtɔma kutupɔtsɛ ɔ yi kaa e ye sane ɔ ga mi. Ejakaa je nɛ ɔ mi bi ɔmɛ le a nɔ ɔ mi ga pe la bi ɔmɛ.
9“Nɛ imi hu i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nyɛɛ ngɔ kutupɔ ni nami ɔ eko ngɔ pee huɛmɛ ngɔ ha nyɛ he; konɛ, ke e puɛ nyɛ ɔ, nɛ a he nyɛ kɛ ya neneene si himi mi. 10Nɔ nɛ yeɔ nɔ́ ko nyafii mi anɔkuale ɔ, e yeɔ babauu hu mi anɔkuale. Nɛ nɔ nɛ yi nɔ́ ko nyafii mi anɔkuale ɔ, e yi babauu hu mi anɔkuale. 11Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ke nyɛ yi kutupɔ ni nami ɔ po mi anɔkuale ɔ, nɔ́ nɛ ji ni nami nitsɛ ɔ, mɛnɔ maa tu kɔlɔ ɔ ngɔ wo nyɛ dɛ? 12Nɛ ke nyɛ yi nɔ kpa nɔ́ mi anɔkuale ɔ, mɛnɔ maa ngɔ nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ nɔ́ ɔ ngɔ ha nyɛ?
13“Wenyumu ko be nyɔmtsɛmɛ enyɔ nyɛe ma sɔmɔ, ejakaa eko ɔ e maa nyɛ nɔ kake nɛ e maa suɔ nɔ kpa a, aloo e maa pɛtɛ nɔ kake he, nɛ e maa gbe nɔ kpa a he guɛ. Nyɛ be Mawu kɛ ni nami nyɛe ma sɔmɔ.”
Yesu munyuhi komɛ
(Mateo 11.12-13; 5.31-32; Marko 10.11-12)
14Nɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ nɛ ji sikasuɔli ɔmɛ nu ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo nɛ a muɔ lɛ. 15Nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ji nihi nɛ nyɛ buu nyɛ he bemi ngɛ nimli a hɛ mi; se Mawu lɛɛ e le nyɛ tsuihi a mi, ejakaa nɔ nɛ ji gojoo ngɛ nimli a hɛ mi ɔ, eji nɔ ko nɛ Mawu nyɛɛ.
16“Mlaa a kɛ gbali ɔmɛ gba kɛ ba su Yohane nɔ; kɛ je jamɛ a be ɔ nɔ nɔ, a ngɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi he Sane Kpakpa a fiee, nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ sɛɛ mi ka nya. 17E wɛ hi hiɔwe kɛ zugba kaa a maa be kɛ ho pe nɔ́ nɛ Mlaa a mi ngu kake maa nɔ si.
18“Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ fieɔ e yo nɛ e ya ngɔɔ nɔ kpa a, e puɛ gba; nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ngɔɔ yo nɛ e huno fie lɛ ɔ, lɛ hu e puɛ gba.”
Niatsɛ ɔ kɛ Lazaro
19“Jeha nɔ nyumu niatsɛ ko ngɛ, nɛ e woɔ tade tsu kɛ klala nɛ ngɛ fɛu, nɛ e naa bua jɔmi, nɛ e peɔ afɛu ni daa nɛ ɔ. 20Nɛ ohiafo ko hu ngɛ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Lazaro, nɛ a ngɔ lɛ ba fɔ si ngɛ e gbo ɔ nya kɛ e he pahi fuu bam. 21Nɛ e jloɔ lɛ kaa e na niyeni bibli nɛ jee niatsɛ ɔ okplɔɔ ɔ nɔ pue ɔ si ɔ eko nɛ e ye; se gbehi lɛ baa nɛ a ba lɔɔ e pa amɛ a nɔ. 22Nɛ e ba mi kaa ohiafo ɔ ba gbo, nɛ hiɔwe bɔfohi ba ba wo lɛ kɛ ho Abraham mi si ya; nɛ niatsɛ ɔ hu ba gbo nɛ a pu lɛ. 23Nɛ benɛ e ngɛ he hiami mi ngɛ gbeje nɛ e ma wo e hɛ nɔ ɔ, e na Abraham ngɛ lokoo, kɛ Lazaro ngɛ e mi si. 24Nɛ e kpa ngmlaa kɛ tsɛ ke: ‘Etsɛ Abraham, naa mi mobɔ nɛ o tsɔ Lazaro nɛ e kɛ e nine nguɛ nya ya sɔ nyu mi nɛ e kɛ ba jɔɔ ye lilɛ he, ejakaa i ngɛ nɔ nae ngɛ la lilɛ nɛ ɔmɛ a mi.’ 25Se Abraham de lɛ ke: ‘Ye bi, kaii kaa moo lɛɛ o na o ni kpakpa amɛ ngɛ o wami be ɔ mi, nɛ ja nɔuu Lazaro hu na ni yayahi, se jeha nɛ ɔ a ngɛ e bua jɔɔe ngɛ hiɛ ɔ, nɛ moo lɛɛ a ngɛ mo piie. 26Nɛ enɛ ɔmɛ kulaa se hu ɔ, dɔ kpetekpleenyɛ ko ngɛ waa kɛ nyɛ kpɛti, konɛ nihi nɛ hlaa nɛ a je lejɛ ɔ kɛ po mi kɛ ba wa ngɔ ɔ a ko nyɛ.’ 27Se niatsɛ ɔ ke: ‘Lɛɛ i kpa mo pɛɛ mɔ, tsaatsɛ, nɛ o tsɔ Lazaro tsaatsɛ we ɔ, 28ejakaa i ngɛ nyɛmimɛ enuɔ, benɛ pee nɛ e ya ye odase ngɔ tsɔɔ mɛ, konɛ mɛ hu a ko ba piimi he nɛ ɔ.’ 29Nɛ Abraham de lɛ ke: ‘Mose kɛ gbali ɔmɛ ngɛ a dɛ; ha a bu kɔlɔ ɔmɛ tue! 30Se lɛɛ e ke: ‘Dɛbi, Etsɛ Abraham, ke nɔ ko je gbeje kɛ ya a ngɔ ɔ, lɔ ɔ loko a ma tsake a tsui. 31Se Abraham de lɛ ke: ‘Ke a bui Mose kɛ gbali ɔmɛ tue ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ ke nɔ ko te si kɛ je gbeje tete ɔ, a yi mi be plee.’ ”

Title: LUKA 17
Content:
Yayami
(Mateo 18.6-7, 21-22; Marko 9.42)
1Yesu de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Bɔ tsuaa bɔ nɛ pee ɔ ja nane kpatami nihi ba; se musu tloo nɔ nɛ a guu e nɔ kɛ baa a! 2Afani nɛ a kɛ teji wɛ muɔ e kuɛ nɛ a ya sake lɛ ngɔ fɔ wo mi pe nɛ e ma kpata tsɔwi nɛ ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake nane. 3Nyɛɛ yɛ nɛ hi!
“Ke o nyɛmi tɔ o nɔ ɔ, kã e hɛ mi; nɛ ke e pia e he ɔ, kɛ pa lɛ. 4Nɛ ke si kpaago nɛ e tɔ o nɔ ligbi kake, nɛ e kpale e se kɛ ba o ngɔ si kpaago ligbi kake nɛ e ke: ‘I pia ye he!’ ɔ, kɛ pa lɛ.”
Hemi kɛ yemi
5Nɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ de Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ke: “Piɛ wa hemi kɛ yemi ɔ he ha wɔ!” 6Nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ke: “Ke nyɛ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi kaa sinapi wu ngu kake ɔ, jinɛ nyɛ ma de sikamino tso nɛ ɔ ke: ‘Hia kɛ o sipoku nɛ o ya ma wo mi!’ nɛ e maa bu nyɛ tue.”
Sɔmɔlɔ ko blɔnyanitsumi
7“Se nyɛ ti mɛnɔ lɛ ngɛ sɔmɔlɔ nɛ e kɛ na kpakpla ngɛ hue aloo e ngɛ lohwehi lɛe, nɛ ke e je ngmɔ mi kɛ ba pɛ ɔ, e ma de lɛ ke: ‘Ba hi si esɔ esɔ nɛ o ye ni?’
8Se e be lɛ dee mohu ke: ‘Dla nɔ́ nɛ ma ye ɔ ngɔ ma si, nɛ o mia konɛ o sɔmɔ mi nɛ ma ye ni nɛ ma nu nɔ́ ko lolo, nɛ lɔ ɔ se ɔ konɛ mo hu o ye ni nɛ o nu nɔ́ ko?’ 9Anɛ e maa na jamɛ a sɔmɔlɔ ɔ si kaa e pee nɔ́ nɛ a fa lɛ ɔ? I kpa we si. 10Ja nɔuu nyɛ hu, ke nyɛ pee nihi kulaa nɛ a fa nyɛ ɔ́, nyɛ de ke: ‘Sɔmɔli nɛ he be se nami komɛ ji wɔ; nɔ́ nɛ ji wa blɔ nya kaa wa tsuɔ ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ pɛ wa tsu nɛ ɔ nɛ.’ ”
Yesu tsa tsitsɛmɛ nyɔngma
11Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ Yesu yaa Yerusalem ɔ, e ya gu Samaria kɛ Galilea kpɛti. 12Nɛ benɛ e ya sɛ ma ko mi ɔ, nyumuhi tsitsɛmɛ nyɔngma kɛ lɛ ba kpe, nɛ a daa si ngɛ se tsitsa lokoo. 13Nɛ a kpa ngmlaa ke: “Mawetsɛ Yesu naa wɔ mɔbɔ!” 14Nɛ benɛ e na mɛ ɔ, e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ya nɛ nyɛɛ ngɔ nyɛ he ya tsɔɔ osɔfo ɔmɛ.” Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ a yaa a, a he tsi ɔ ta. 15Se a ti nɔ kake ɔ, benɛ e na kaa a tsa lɛ ɔ, e kpale e se kɛ ba nɛ e wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami kɛ gbi wawɛɛ. 16Nɛ e kɛ e hɛ mi ba bu si ngɛ Yesu nane nya, nɛ e na lɛ si. Se nɔ nɛ ɔ ɔ, Samariano ʼi. 17Nɛ Yesu he nɔ nɛ e bi lɛ ke: “Anɛ pi nimli nyɔngma nɛ he ta a? Se nimli nɛɛ ɔ jije a ngɛ? 18Blɔɔ a nɛ́ a ti nɔ ko nɛ kpaleɔ e se kɛ hɛ mi nyami ba haa Mawu, kaa ja maseno nɛ ɔ lo?” 19Nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Tee si nɛ o ya; o hemi kɛ yemi tsa mo!”
Matsɛyemi ɔ bami
(Mateo 24.23-28, 37-41)
20Nɛ benɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ bi Yesu ke: “Te be nɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ maa ba” a, e ha mɛ heto ke: “Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ bɛ́ kaa nɔ́ ko nɛ a naa; 21nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu a be dee ke: ‘Oʼɛ, e ngɛ hiɛ ɔ! aloo oʼɛ, e ngɛ lejɛ ɔ!’ ejakaa oʼɛ, Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ nyɛ mi.”
22Nɛ e de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Be maa ba nɛ nyɛ ma hla Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ligbi ɔmɛ eko nɛ nyɛɛ na, nɛ nyɛ be nae. 23Nɛ a ma de nyɛ ke: ‘Oʼɛ, e ngɛ hiɛ ɔ, aloo: oʼɛ e ngɛ lejɛ ɔ!’ Nyɛ ko ya, nɛ nyɛ ko nyɛɛ a se. 24Ejakaa bɔ nɛ oslaba ngaa nɛ e haa hiɔwe sisi fa kpɛɛ ɔ, ja nɔuu kɛ̃ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ maa hi ngɛ e ligbi ɔ nɔ. 25Se kekleekle ɔ, ja e na amanehlu babauu, nɛ kikɛmɛ a yi nɔbi nɛ ɔmɛ kua lɛ. 26Nɛ bɔ nɛ e ba mi ngɛ Noa ligbi ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, jã nɔuu e maa ba mi ngɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ligbi ɔmɛ a mi hulɔ. 27A ngɛ ni yee, a ngɛ da nue, a ngɛ yihi ngɔe, nɛ a kɛ mɛ ngɛ gba hae kɛ ya su ligbi nɛ. Noa sɛ daka a mi nɛ nyu afua a ba nɛ e ba kpata mɛ tsuo kulaa a hɛ mi. 28Jeha nɛ ɔ bɔ nɛ e ba mi ngɛ Lot ligbi ɔmɛ a mi hulɔ ɔ, a ngɛ ni yee, a ngɛ da nue, a ngɛ ni hee, a ngɛ ni juae, a ngɛ tsohi due, nɛ a ngɛ tsuhi mae; 29se ligbi nɛ Lot je Sodom ɔ, Mawu nɛ la kɛ suɔɔ kɛ je hiɔwe, nɛ e kpata mɛ tsuo kulaa a hɛ mi. 30Ja nɔuu kɛ e maa ba ligbi nɛ a ma je Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ kpo ɔ.
31“Jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, nɔ nɛ ngɛ tsu yi mi nɛ e nihi ngɛ we mi ɔ, e ko kple si ba kukuɔ, nɛ nɔ nɛ ngɛ ngmɔ si hu e ko kple si kɛ ba we mi. 32Nyɛ kai Lot yo ɔ! 33Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ hlaa kaa e baa e klaa yi ɔ, e maa laa lɛ; se nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ maa laa lɛ ɔ, e ma he e yiwami. 34I ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Jamɛ a nyɔ ɔ mi ɔ, nyumuhi enyɔ maa hwɔ sa kake nɔ, a maa ngɔ nɔ kake nɛ a ma si nɔ kake. 35Yi enyɔ maa wɛɛ ngɛ he kake, a maa ngɔ nɔ kake, nɛ a ma si nɔ kake. [ 36Ni enyɔ maa hi ngmɔ si, a maa ngɔ nɔ kake nɛ a ma si nɔ kake.]” 37Nɛ a bi lɛ ke “Mawetsɛ, jije?” Se e de mɛ ke: “He nɛ nɔ gbogboe fɔɔ si ngɛ ɔ, lejɛ ɔ okpokuhi buaa a he nya ngɛ.”

Title: LUKA 18
Content:
Yalɔyo ɔ kɛ kojolɔ ɔ he abɛ ɔ
1Nɛ Yesu bu mɛ abɛ ko kɛ tsɔɔ kaa e sa kaa a sɔlee daa nɛ e ko gbe nɔ nya. 2Nɛ e ke: “Kojolɔ ko ngɛ ma ko nɔ, nɛ e yi Mawu gbeye, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu e bui nɔmlɔ ko. 3Yalɔyo ko ngɛ jamɛ a ma mi, nɛ e ba e ngɔ ba de ke: ‘Fã ye he kɛ je ye henyɛlɔ ɔ dɛ mi!’ 4Nɛ e kplɛɛ we hluu. Se pee se ɔ, e de ngɛ e yi mi ke: ‘Engɛ mi kaa i yi Mawu gbeye, nɛ i bui nɔmlɔ hulɔ; 5se akɛnɛ kikɛmɛ a yalɔyo nɛ ɔ ngɛ ye nya dooe he je ɔ, ma fã e he, konɛ nyagbe ɔ nɛ e ko ba pue ye hɛ mi si.’ ” 6Nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ke: “Nyɛɛ bu nɔ́ nɛ kojolɔ yi si fialɔ ɔ de ɔ tue! 7Nɛ ke Mawu maa ku e hɛ ngɔ fɔ nihi nɛ e hla nɛ kpaa ngmla kɛ tsɛɛ lɛ nyɔ kɛ pia a nɔ hluu tete po ɔ, anɛ e ba be a he fae? 8I ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, e ma fa a he oya. Se benɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ maa ba a, anɛ e ma ba na hemi kɛ yemi ngɛ zugba a nɔ lo?”
Farisifono ɔ kɛ oniatsulɔ ɔ he abɛ ɔ
9Nɛ e bu ni komɛ nɛ ngɔɔ a hɛ ngɔ fɔɔ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a he nɔ kaa dali ji mɛ nɛ a gbee ni kpahi a he guɛ ɔ hu abɛ nɛ ɔ: 10“Ni enyɔ pue nɔ kɛ ho sɔlemi ya ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ. Nɔ kake ɔ Farisifono ji lɛ, nɛ nɔ kpa a onia tsulɔ ʼi. 11Farisifono ɔ ya da lokoo, nɛ e sɔle kikɛ ngɛ e yi mi: ‘Mawu, i naa mo si kaa i be kaa ni kpa amɛ, jiklɔɔtsɛmɛ, kutupɔtsɛmɛ, gba puɛli, loo kaa kikɛmɛ a onia tsulɔ nɛ ɔ hulɔ. 12I haa hwɔ si enyɔ ngɛ otsi mi; si ngɔɔ ni hi tsuo nɛ i naa a mi dlami nyɔngma ngɔ haa.’ 13Se onia tsulɔ ɔ daa si ngɛ se lokoo, nɛ e mi nɛ e wo e hɛ nɔ kɛ ya hiɔwe tete; se mohu e ngɔ e nine ngɔ fɔ e tsui mi nɛ e ke: ‘Mawu, o kɛ mi nɛ ji yayami peelɔ ɔ nɛ kpata!’ 14I ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Kikɛmɛ a nyumu nɛ ɔ pue nɔ kɛ ho e we mi ya nɛ a wo lɛ nguɔ pe nɔ kaketsɛ ɔ. Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ woɔ e he nɔ ɔ, a maa ba lɛ si; se nɔ nɛ baa e he si ɔ, a ma wo e nɔ.”
Yesu gbaa jokuɛwi tsɔwi
(Mateo 19.13-15; Marko 10.13-16)
15Nɛ ni komɛ hu kɛ bimwɔwi ba Yesu ngɔ konɛ e ta a he; nɛ benɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ na a, a gbɛ wo mɛ. 16Se Yesu tsɛ mɛ kɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ e ke: “Nyɛ ha jɔkuɛwi ɔmɛ nɛ a ba ye ngɔ, nɛ nyɛ ko tsi mɛ blɔ; ejakaa ni nɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ ji Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ nɛ. 17Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ngɔɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ kaa jokuɛ nyafii ko ɔ, e be mi sɛe kulaa.”
Nyumu niatsɛ ɔ
(Mateo 19.16-30; Marko 10.17-31)
18Nɛ nɔkɔtɔma ko ba bi lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ kpakpa, mɛni ma pee konɛ ma na neneene wami?” 19Nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Mɛni he je o ngɛ mi tsɛe ke nɔ kpakpa? Nɔ kpakpa ko be kaa ja nɔ kake; lɛ ji Mawu. 20O le kita amɛ kaa: “Ko puɛ gba; koo gbe nɔmlɔ; koo ju; koo ye lakpa odase; buu o tsɛ kɛ o nyɛ.’ ” 21Se nyumu ɔ ke: “I ye enɛ ɔmɛ tsuo nɔ kɛ je ye jokuɛwi a si.” 22Nɛ benɛ Yesu nu enɛ ɔ ɔ, e de lɛ ke: “E piɛ mo nɔ́ kake. Yaa jua nihi kulaa nɛ o ngɛ ɔ nɛ o dla sika a ha ohiafohi, nɛ o ma na juetli ngɛ hiɔwe; nɛ o ba ba nyɛɛ ye se.” 23Se benɛ e nu enɛ ɔ ɔ, e ye kɔmɔ wawɛɛ ejakaa e ngɛ nihi babauu.
24Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ Yesu na kaa e ngɛ kɔmɔ yee wawɛɛ ɔ, e ke: “Hyɛ bɔ nɛ e wa ha nihi nɛ ngɛ nihi kaa a maa sɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi! 25Ejakaa e wɛ hi afukpɔngɔ kaa e maa gu abui hɛngmɛ mi kaa bɔ nɛ e waa haa niatsɛ kaa e maa sɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi ɔ.” 26Se nihi nɛ nu ɔ ke: “Lɛɛ mɛnɔ yi wami a ma nyɛ ma he mɔ?” 27Yesu ke: “Nihi nɛ nimli nyɛ we nɛ a pee ɔ, Mawu lɛɛ e nyɛɔ peɔ.” 28Kɛkɛ nɛ Petro ke: “Oʼɛ, wɔɔ lɛɛ wa si wa nihi tsuo kulaa nɛ wa ba nyɛɛ o se.” 29Yesu de mɛ ke: “Niinɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nɔ ko nɔ ko be nɛ e si we loo yo loo nyɛmimɛ nyumuhi loo fɔli loo bimɛ ngɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ he, 30nɛ e be nane mi tomi si abɔ nae ngɛ be nɛ ɔ mi, nɛ je nɛ maa ba a mi hu e be neneene wami nae.”
Yesu tu e gbenɔ he munyu nɔ nɛ ji si etɛ
(Mateo 20.17-19; Marko 10.32-34)
31Nɛ Yesu tsɛ ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ kɛ ba e kasa nya nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Oʼɛ, wa yaa Yerusalem, nɛ a maa gbe nihi kulaa nɛ gbali ɔmɛ ngma ngɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ he ɔ nya. 32Ejakaa a ma je lɛ ngɔ wo wɔ jali a dɛ mi, nɛ a maa ye e he fɛu, nɛ a maa wa lɛ yi mi, nɛ a maa la lada ngɔ pue e nɔ, 33nɛ a kɛ kplibi maa fia lɛ, nɛ a maa gbe lɛ, nɛ ligbi nɛ ji ligbi etɛ ɔ, e maa te si ekohu.” 34Se mɛɛ lɛɛ a nui ni nɛ ɔmɛ a ti kake po sisi, nɛ a ngɔ kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔ sisi numi ngɔ laa mɛ, nɛ a kɔ we munyuhi nɛ e tuɔ se.
Yesu tsa hɛyuyuilɔ nɔbalɔ ko
(Mateo 20.29-34; Marko 10.46-52)
35Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ Yesu su Yeriko haa a, hɛyuyuilɔ ko hii si ngɛ blɔ ɔ tue ngɛ nɔ bae. 36Nɛ benɛ e nu kaa nihi fuu bee ɔ, e bi nɔ́ nɛ ji. 37Nɛ a de lɛ ke Yesu Nazareno ɔ lɛ bee. 38Kɛkɛ nɛ e kpa ngmlaa ke: “Yesu, David bi, naa mi mɔbɔ!” 39Nɛ nihi nɛ nyɛɛ hɛ mi ɔ ke e yi ke e ma e nya; se kɔlɔ ɔ mohu ha e kpa ngmlaa pe kekle ɔ ke: “David bi, naa mi mɔbɔ!” 40Yesu da si, nɛ e fa ke a kɛ lɛ nɛ ba e ngɔ. Nɛ benɛ e su e he ɔ, e bi lɛ ke: 41“Mɛni o ngɛ hlae kaa ma pee ha mo?” Nɛ e ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, kaa ma hyɛ nɔ ekohu.” 42Nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Hyɛ nɔ, o hemi kɛ yemi tsa mo!” 43Nɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔuu ɔ, e hyɛ nɔ, nɛ e nyɛɛ e se nɛ e wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami; nɛ benɛ asafo ɔ tsuo na a, a je Mawu yi.

Title: LUKA 19
Content:
Yesu kɛ Zakeo
1Yesu ya sɛ Yeriko nɛ e ngɛ mi poe kɛ yaa. 2Nɛ oʼɛ, nyumu ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Zakeo, nɛ onia tsulɔ nɔkɔtɔma kɛ niatsɛ ji lɛ. 3E ngɛ hlae nɛ e na Yesu nɛ e le lɛ, se nihi babauu ɔ he ɔ, e nyɛ we ejakaa nɔmlɔ kpiti ji lɛ. 4Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e sa fo kɛ sɛ hlami nɛ e ya kuɔ sikamore tso ko, konɛ e hyɛ lɛ, ejakaa lejɛ ɔ blɔ e maa gu. 5Nɛ Yesu su lejɛ ɔ, e wo e hɛ nɔ, nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Zakeo, o he nɛ esɔ nɛ o kple si, ejakaa o we ɔ mi ma to mwɔnɛ ɔ.” 6Nɛ Zakeo he sɔ kɛ kple si nɛ e fua Yesu atuu. 7Nɛ benɛ ni ɔmɛ na a, mɛ tsuo a tu munyu huitihuiti ke: ‘E ya to nyumu yayami peelɔ ngɔ.” 8Se Zakeo da si nɛ e de Nyɔmtsɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, oʼɛ, ma ngɔ ye nihi fa ngɔ ke ohiafohi, nɛ ke i kɛ yaka nya pomi kpɔ nɔ ko nɔ́ ko ngɛ e dɛ ɔ, ma ku ngɔ bɔ he si eywiɛ ha lɛ.” 9Nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Mwɔnɛ yi wami hemi ba we nɛ ɔ mi, ejakaa lɛ hu Abraham bi ji lɛ. 10Ejakaa Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ba nɔ nɛ laa a hlami kɛ yi wami hemi.”
Sika kpɔ ɔ he abɛ ɔ
(Mateo 25.14-30)
11Benɛ a ngɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ tue bue ɔ, e bu abɛ ko kɛ si nɔ, ejakaa e su Yerusalem tã nɛ a susu kaa amlɔ ɔ nɔuu Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ ma je e he si. 12Lɔ ɔ he ɔ e ke: Ablade ko doma kɛ ho lokoo ya konɛ e ya ngɔ e matsɛ yemi nɛ e kpale kɛ ba. 13E tsɛ e sɔmɔli nyɔngma nɛ e je cedi nyingmi enyɔ ngɔ ha mɛ; nɛ e de mɛ ke: ‘Nyɛ plɛ he kɛ ya su ma ba.’ 14Se e ma mi bi ɔmɛ nyɛ lɛ, nɛ a tsɔ tsɔli kɛ fie e se ke: ‘Wa sume nɛ ɔ nɔ nɛ o ba ye wa nɔ matsɛ.’
15“Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ e nine ya su matsɛ yemi ɔ nɔ nɛ e kpale e se kɛ ba a, e fa ke a tsɛ jamɛ a sɔmɔli ɔmɛ nɛ e ngɔ e sika a ngɔ ha a kɛ ba, konɛ e na nɔ́ nɛ a na ngɛ sika a he plɛmi mi’ 16Nɛ kekle nɔ ɔ ba ba de ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, sika a fɔ nyɔngma.’ 17Nɛ e de lɛ ke: ‘Ayekoo, sɔmɔlɔ kpakpa, akɛnɛ o ye anɔkuale ngɛ nɔ nyafii kulaa mi he ɔ, ye ma nyɔngma nɔ.’ 18Nɛ nɔ nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ ba ba de ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, o sika a fɔ enuɔ.’ 19Nɛ lɛ hu e de lɛ ke: ‘Mo hu ye ma enuɔ nɔ.’ 20Nɛ nɔ kake ɔ hu ba ba de ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, oʼɛ o sika a nɛ i fi ngɔ wo duku mi ngɔ to ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ; 21i ya ye mo gbeye ejakaa o yi mi wa; o woɔ nɔ́ nɛ o ngɔ fɔɛ si, nɛ o kpaa nɔ́ nɛ o du we.’ 22Se nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de lɛ ke: ‘Sɔmɔlɔ yayami, mo nitsɛ o nya mi munyu ma kɛ kojo mo.’ Nɛ o le kaa yi mi walɔ ji mi; i woɔ nɔ nɛ i ngɔ fɔɛ si, nɛ i kpaa nɔ nɛ i du we ɔ, 23mɛni he je mɔ nɛ o kɛ ye sika a ya ha we tsakeli ɔmɛ, konɛ ke i ba a nɛ ma ba he ye ni kɛ hekpa?’ 24Kɛkɛ nɛ e de nihi nɛ daa si ngɛ e kasa nya a ke: ‘Nyɛ kpɔ sika a ngɛ e dɛ, nɛ nyɛ ngɔ ha nɔ nɛ ngɛ cedi nyingmi enyɔ ɔ.’ 25Nɛ a de lɛ ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, e ngɛ cedi nyingmi enyɔ.’ 26‘I ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ngɛ nɔ́ ko ɔ, lɛ nɔuu a ma ha; se nɔ nɛ be nɔ́ ko ɔ, nɔ́ nɛ e ngɛ ɔ tete a ma kpɔ ngɛ e dɛ. 27Se jamɛ a ye henyɛli ɔmɛ nɛ sume kaa ma ye a nɔ matsɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ ngɔ mɛ kɛ ba hiɛ ɔ nɛ nyɛ ba gbe mɛ ngɛ ye hɛ mi.’ ”
Yesu Yerusalem sɛmi
(Mateo 21.1-11; Marko 11.1-11; Yohane 12.12-19)
28Nɛ benɛ Yesu de enɛ ɔ ɔ, e be sɛ hlami kɛ ma Yerusalem blɔ ɔ nɔ. 29Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ e su Betfage kɛ Betania ngɛ yoku nɛ a tsɛɛ Nuyoku ɔ he ɔ, e tsɔ e kaseli ɔmɛ a ti ni enyɔ; 30e ke: “Nyɛɛ ya kɔpe nɛ ngɛ nyɛ hɛ mi ɔ mi, nɛ ke nyɛ sɛ mi ɔ, nyɛ maa na teji bi nɛ nɔ ko hi e nɔ hyɛ muɔɔ si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ; nyɛɛ pɛne lɛ nɛ nyɛɛ ngɔ lɛ kɛ ba. 31Nɛ ke nɔ ko bi nyɛ ke: ‘Mɛni he je nyɛ ngɛ lɛ pɛnee’ ɔ, nyɛ de lɛ ke: ‘E he ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hiae.’ ” 32Nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ a tsɔ ɔ pue nɔ kɛ ho, nɛ a ya na kaa bɔ nɛ e de mɛ ɔ. 33Se benɛ a ngɛ teji bi ɔ pɛnɛe ɔ, nɔtsɛ ɔ bi mɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nyɛ ngɛ teji bi ɔ pɛnee?” 34Nɛ a ke: “E he ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hiae.” 35Nɛ a kɛ lɛ ba Yesu ngɔ nɛ a kɛ a tadehi pue teji bi ɔ nɔ, nɛ a wo Yesu ngɔ hi nɔ. 36Nɛ benɛ e yaa a, a kɛ a tadehi ha blɔ ɔ nɔ. 37Nɛ benɛ e su he nɛ a kpleɔ Nuyoku ɔ ngɛ ɔ, e kaseli asafo ɔ tsuo bɔni nyami, nɛ a je Mawu yi wawɛɛ ngɛ he wami ni tsumihi tsuo nɛ a na a he; 38a ke: “A gbaa matsɛ nɛ ma ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ biɛ mi ɔ, hejɔmi ngɛ hiɔwe nɛ hɛ mi nyami ngɛ hiɔwe lokoo!”
39Nɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ je asafo ɔ mi de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, ka o kaseli ɔmɛ.” 40Se Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “I ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, ke ni ne ɔmɛ ma ma a nya a, lɛɛ tɛhi ma kpa ngmlaa.”
Yesu fo ya pue Yerusalem nɔ
41Nɛ benɛ Yesu su ta nɛ e na ma a, e fo ya pue e nɔ, 42nɛ e ke: “E ji ngɛ o ligbi nɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ, o na le nihi nɛ hi ha o he jɔmi jinɛ saii! Se jeha nɛ ɔ a ngɔ laa mo. 43Ejakaa o ligbi hi ma, nɛ o henyɛli ɔmɛ maa tsua muɔ ngɔ wo o he, nɛ a maa po klaangma ngɔ wo o he, nɛ a ma sa o yi ngɛ he tsuaa he, 44nɛ a maa ngɔ mo ngɔ fia si kɛ o bimɛ nɛ ngɛ o mi ɔ, nɛ a be tɛ kake sie ngɛ eko nɔ ngɛ o mi, ejakaa o yo we o slaami be ɔ!”
Yesu ya sɔlemi we ɔ
(Mateo 21.12-17; Marko 11.15-19; Yohane 2.13-22)
45Nɛ Yesu ya sɔlemi we ɔ nɛ e bɔni nihi nɛ ngɛ ni juae ngɛ mi ɔ fiemi; 46e de mɛ ke: “A ngma ke: ‘Ye we ɔ, sɔlemi we ʼi,’ se nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛɛ ngɔ pee ojofiali a kplo!”
47Nɛ Yesu ya tsɔɔ ni daa ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ; se osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ kɛ ma a mi nikɔtɔma amɛ ngɛ hlae nɛ a kpata e hɛ mi; 48se a li blɔ nɔ nɛ a maa gu, ejakaa ma mluku ɔ tsuo heɔ lɛ yeɔ, nɛ a buɔ lɛ tue.

Title: LUKA 20
Content:
He blɔ nɛ Yesu ngɛ
(Mateo 21.23-27; Marko 11.27-33)
1E ba mi kaa ligbi ɔ eko nɔ benɛ Yesu ngɛ Sane Kpakpa a fiɛe kɛ ngɛ ma a tsɔɔe ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, osɔfo nikɔtɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ ba e ngɔ, 2nɛ a ba de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔ wɔ he blɔ nɛ o ngɛ he je nɛ o peɔ ni nɛ ɔmɛ, nɛ mɛnɔ ji nɔ nɛ ha mo kikɛmɛ a he blɔ nɛ ɔ?” 3E ha mɛ heto ke: “Imi hu ma bi nyɛ sane kake nɛ nyɛ ha mi heto: 4Yohane baptisimi ɔ nɛɛ, hiɔwe e je aloo nimli a dɛ mi e je?” 5Se a sa nya ngɛ a kpɛti ke: “Ke wa de ke e je hiɔwe ɔ, e ma de ke: ‘Mɛni he je nɛ nyɛ he we lɛ yi mɔ?’ 6Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ ke wa de ke e je nimli a dɛ mi ɔ, ma a kulaa maa fia wɔ tɛ, ejakaa a kpa si kaa Yohane ɔ, gbalɔ ʼi.” 7Nɛ aha lɛ heto ke a li he nɛ e je. 8Nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Lɛɛ imi hu i be nyɛ tsɔɔe nɔ́ he blɔ nɛ i ngɛ nɛ i kɛ peɔ ni nɛ ɔmɛ.”
Wai ngmɔ ɔ mi apaatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a he abɛ ɔ
(Mateo 21.33-46; Marko 12.1-12)
9Yesu ya nɔ nɛ e bu ma a abɛ nɛ ɔ ke: “Nyumu ko pee wai ngmɔ nɛ e ngɔ ha huli apaa yemi, nɛ e doma, nɛ e se ya kɛ. 10Nɛ benɛ be ɔ su ɔ e tsɔ tsɔlɔ ko kɛ ya huli ɔmɛ a ngɔ konɛ a ha lɛ wai ngmɔ ɔ mi yiblii ɔ eko; se apaatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ fia lɛ ni, nɛ afie lɛ kɛ dɛ̃ gu. 11E kpale tsɔ tsɔlɔ kpa ko hu, se lɛ hu a fia lɛ ni, nɛ a pue e hɛ mi si, nɛ a fie lɛ kɛ dɛ gu. 12E kpale tsɔ nɔ nɛ ji etɛ; se lɛ hu a plaa lɛ, nɛ a tsitsɛɛ e kuɛ se kɛ je kpo 13Nɛ wai ngmɔtsɛ ɔ ke: ‘Kɛ ma pee kɛɛ? Ma tsɔ ye bi nɛ i suɔ ɔ; eko ɔ lɛɛ ke a na lɛ ɔ, a ma gbo lɛ zo.’ 14Se benɛ huli ɔmɛ na lɛ ɔ, a de a he ke: ‘Ni yelɔ ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ; nyɛɛ ba nɛ nyɛ ha waa gbe lɛ, konɛ ni ɔmɛ nɛ pee wa nɔ.’ 15Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, a tsitsɛɛ e kuɛ se kɛ je wai ngmɔ ɔ mi nɛ a ya gbe lɛ. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, kɛ wai ngmɔtsɛ ɔ maa pee mɛ kɛɛ? 16E ma ba kpata huli ɔmɛ a hɛ mi, nɛ e maa ngɔ wai ngmɔ ɔ ngɔ ha ni kpahi.” Se benɛ a nu ɔ a ke: “Kpaoo!” 17Se Yesu hyɛ mɛ kɛ kpe nɛ e ke: “Mɛni ji nɔ́ nɛ a ngma nɛ ɔ mɔ, ke:
‘Tɛ ɔ nɛ tsu fiali ɔmɛ sake fɔ he ɔ,
Kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu lɛ plɛ kɔ nya tɛ nɛ ɔ nɛ.’
18Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ maa nɔ tɛ nɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ, e mi ma tsɔtslɔɔ; se nɔ nɔ nɛ e maa nɔ ɔ, e maa wɛɛ lɛ mɔnyɔmɔnyɔ.”
Oniatsumi he sane
(Mateo 22.15-22; Marko 12.13-17)
19Osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ ngɛ hlae nɛ a nu Yesu ngɛ lɛ ngmlɛfia a nɔ nɔuu se a ya ye ma a gbeye, ejakaa a kɔ se kaa a he nɛ e bu kikɛmɛ a bɛ nɛ ɔ nɛ. 20Nɛ a wo e he ka, nɛ a tsɔ huɔli, nihi nɛ pee a he kaa dali, konɛ a wo e nya tso kpɛ benɛ pee nɛ a ngɔ lɛ ngɔ wo amlaalo hewami kɛ he blɔ ɔ dɛ mi. 21Nɛ a bi lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, wa le kaa o tuɔ munyu nɛ o tsɔɔ ni dami nya, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu o hyɛ we nimli a hɛ mi, se mohu anɔkuale mi o tsɔɔ Mawu blɔ ɔ ngɛ. 22Anɛ e da kaa wa tsuɔ onia haa Kaisare, aloo e dɛ?” 23Se benɛ Yesu kpa a ga a si ɔ, e de mɛ ke: 24“Nyɛɛ ngɔ cedi kɛ ba nɛ ma hyɛ! Mɛnɔ foni kɛ biɛ lɛ ngɛ nɔ nɛ ɔ?” Nɛ a ha lɛ heto ke: “Kaisare nɔ ʼi.” 25Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Lɛɛ nyɛɛ ngɔ Kaisare nihi ngɔ ha Kaisare, nɛ Mawu nihi ɔ nyɛ ngɔ ha Mawu!” 26Nɛ a nyɛ we e nya tso kpɛ ko nɛ a wo ngɛ ma a hɛ mi, nɛ e heto ɔ pee mɛ nyakpe nɛ a ma a nya.
Ni gbogboehi a sitemi he sane
(Mateo 22.23-33; Marko 12.18-27)
27Nɛ Sadukifo ɔmɛ hu nɛ tsɔɔ kaa ni gbogboehi a si temi ko be ɔ, a ti ni komɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ a ba bi lɛ 28ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, Mose ngma ha wɔ ke: ‘Ke nɔ ko nyɛmi nɛ ngɛ yo gbo nɛ e si we bi ɔ, e nyɛmi ɔ nɛ ngɔ e yo ɔ konɛ e wo nina ngɔ ha e nyɛmi ɔ.’ 29Jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛmimɛ kpaago hi si, nɛ a kpɛti nɔkɔtɔma a ngɔ yo, nɛ e gbo nɛ e si we bi. 30Nɛ e se nɔ ɔ ngɔ yo ɔ, nɛ lɛ hu e gbo nɛ e si we bi. 31Nɛ nɔ nɛ ji etɛ ɔ hu ngɔ lɛ, nɛ ja nɔuu ni kpaago ɔ tsuo pee; se a si we bimɛ nɛ a gbo. 32Nɛ mɛ tsuo a se ɔ yo ɔ hu ba gbo. 33Lɛɛ ni gbogboehi a si temi ɔ mi ɔ, a ti mɛnɔ yo e maa pee, ejakaa mɛ ni kpaago ɔ tsuo kɛ lɛ hi si?” 34Yesu ha mɛ heto ke: “Je nɛ ɔ mi bimɛ ngɔɔ yo, nɛ a kɛ yo haa gba; 35se nihi nɛ maa sa je nɛ ma a kɛ ni gbogboehi a si temi ɔ nami ɔ, a ngɔɛ yo, nɛ pohu a kɛ yo ha we gba; 36nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu a be gboe hulɔ, ejakaa a ngɛ kaa hiɔwe bɔfohi nɛ Mawu bimɛ ji mɛ, akɛnɛ si temi bimɛ ji mɛ he je ɔ. 37Se kaa ni gbogboehi maa te si ekohu ɔ, Mose nitsɛ tsɔɔ ngɛ hue kpɔ ɔ sane ɔ mi benɛ e tsɛ Mawu ke, Abraham Mawu kɛ Isak Mawu kɛ Yakob Mawu ɔ. 38Mawu ɔ, e pi ni gbogboehi a Mawu, se mohu hɛ kali a Mawu ji lɛ; ejakaa e hɛ mi ɔ nihi tsuo kulaa hɛ ngɛ.” 39Se mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ he nɔ nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, o munyu ɔ ngɔ.” 40Nɛ a kɛ́ lɛ sane ko bimi hu.
Mesia a he sane
(Mateo 22.41-46; Marko 12.35-37)
41Nɛ Yesu bi mɛ ke: “Kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ a deɔ ke Kristo ɔ David bi ji lɛ ɔ? 42Ejakaa David nitsɛ de ngɛ La womi ɔ mi ke:
‘Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de ye Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ke:
Hii ye hiɛ ɔ nɔ,
43Kɛ maa su be nɛ ma ngɔ o henyɛli ɔmɛ
Ngɔ pee o nane si sɛ̃.’
44Ke David tsɛ lɛ ‘Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ’ lɛɛ kɛ peɔ kɛɛ nɛ e ji e bi mɔ?”
Yesu bɔ mlaatsɔɔli ɔmɛ a he kɔkɔ
(Mateo 23.1-36; Marko 12.38-40)
45Ma a tsuo hɛ mi nɛ Yesu de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: 46“Nyɛ hɛ nɛ hi nyɛ he nɔ ngɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ a he, se a suɔ tade wuyawuyahi a mi nyɛɛmi, nɛ a suɔ jua nɔ ngamihi kɛ nikɔtɔmahi a sihi hehi ngɛ kpe he ɔmɛ kɛ okplɔɔ yi himi ke a tsɛ ni yemi; 47nihi nɛ mii yalɔyi a wehi, nɛ lakpa tomi he ɔ, a sɔlee sɔlemi gagaagahi ɔ; ni nɛ ɔmɛ a fɔ bumi maa pe nine.”

Title: LUKA 21
Content:
Yalɔyo ɔ onia a
(Marko 12.41-44)
1Yesu wo e hɛ nɔ nɛ e na niatsɛmɛ nɛ a ngɔ a nike ni kɛ ngɛ onia daka a mi woe. 2Nɛ e na yalɔyo ohiafo ko hu ba nɛ e kɛ kaplɛ tsɔwi enyɔ nɛ sui pesewa ba wo mi. 3Nɛ e ke: “I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Kikɛmɛ a yalɔyo ohiafo nɛ ɔ kɛ fuu ba wo mi pe ni ɔmɛ tsuo; 4ejakaa ni ɔmɛ tsuo ɔ, nɔ́ nɛ a na nɛ be nɔ ɔ eko a kɛ ba wo Mawu nike ni ɔ mi ɔ nɛ, se nɔ nɛ ɔ lɛɛ, e hia mi ni nɛ e kɛ hyɛɛ e he nɔ ɔ tsuo e kɛ ba wo mi ɔ nɛ.”
Yesu tu sɔlemi we ɔ puɛmi he munyu
(Mateo 24.1-2; Marko 13.1-2)
5Benɛ ni komɛ ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ he munyu tue, bɔ nɛ a kɛ tɛ nɛ ngɛ fɛu kɛ nike ni dla lɛ ɔ, e ke: 6“Enɛ ɔmɛ tsuo nɛ nyɛ ngɛ hyɛe nɛ ɔ, be maa ba nɛ a be e mi tɛ kake sie ngɛ eko nɔ nɛ a be tsitsɛɛe ngɔ fia si.”
Amanehlu kɛ yiwami
(Mateo 24.3-14; Marko 13.3-13)
7Nɛ a bi lɛ ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, lɛɛ mɛni be ni nɛ ɔmɛ maa ba mi, nɛ mɛni okadi maa ba benɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ maa ba mi ɔ?”
8Nɛ Yesu ke: “Nyɛɛ hyɛ saminya, konɛ a ko mlɔɔ nyɛ; ejakaa nihi fuu maa ba ngɛ ye biɛ mi, nɛ a ma de ke: ‘Ami ʼi;’ kɛ jeha nɛ ɔ: ‘Be ɔ su tã.’ Nyɛ ko bu mɛ tue. 9Nɛ ke nyɛ nu tahi kɛ atua tsɔmihi a he ɔ, nyɛ tsui ko po, ejakaa ja kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ ba mi lolo, se kɛ̃ ɔ nyagbe ɔ sui lolo.” 10Kɛkɛ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Ma maa te si ngɔ wo ma, nɛ matsɛ yemi hu maa te si ngɔ wo matsɛ yemi; 11nɛ zugba mimiɛmi nɛ nya wa maa ba hehi slɔɔtohi tsuo kɛ hwɔ kɛ gbenɔ hiɔhi, nɛ gbeye nihi kɛ okadi nguahi maa je hiɔwe kɛ ba.
12“Se loko enɛ ɔmɛ kulaa maa ba a, a maa nu nyɛ, nɛ a maa wa nyɛ yi mi, nɛ a maa ngɔ nyɛ ngɔ ha ngɛ kpe he ɔmɛ kɛ pamitsɛmɛ a tsuhi a mi, nɛ a ma kpaka nyɛ kɛ maa ya matsɛmɛ kɛ ganɔhi a hɛ mi ngɛ ye biɛ ɔ he? 13Nɛ enɛ ɔ ma ha nyɛ he blɔ kɛ ye ye he odase. 14Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛɛ le ngɔ to, konɛ nyɛ ko hao nyɛ he ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ ma fa nyɛ he ɔ he; 15ejakaa ma ha nyɛ nya kɛ ni lemi nɛ nyɛ henyɛli ɔmɛ tsuo be nya nyɛe maa da, nɛ a be nya nyɛe maa ku hulɔ. 16Se fɔli tete kɛ nyɛmimɛ kɛ wekuli kɛ huɛmɛ maa ngɔ nyɛ ngɔ ha, nɛ a ma ha a gbe nyɛ ti ni komɛ; 17nɛ nihi tsuo maa nyɛ nyɛ ngɛ ye biɛ ɔ he. 18Se nyɛ yi bwɔmi kake kike be laae. 19Nyɛ tsui si tomi nyɛ ma kɛ he nyɛ klaa amɛ a yi wami.”
Yesu tu Yerusalem puɛmi he munyu
(Mateo 24.15-21; Marko 13.14-19)
20“Ke nyɛ na kaa a bɔ sada wo Yerusalem he ɔ, lɛɛ nyɛ na le kaa e puemi be ɔ su. 21Jamɛ a be ɔ mi ɔ, nihi nɛ ngɛ Yudea a, a tu fo kɛ ya yoku ɔmɛ a nɔ, nɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ ma a mi ɔ, a je kpo nɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ kɔpe ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, a ko ba ma a mi. 22Ejakaa lueyemi ligbi ɔmɛ ji nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ, konɛ nihi kulaa nɛ a ngma a nɛ ba mi. 23Musu tloo yihi nɛ hɛɛ mi kɛ nyɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ nyɔ hae ngɛ jamɛ a ligbi ɔmɛ a mi ɔ. Ejakaa fimi nɛ nya wa maa ba zugba a nɔ, nɛ mi mi fumi hu maa ba kikɛmɛ a ma nɛ ɔ nɔ. 24Nɛ a maa nɔ ngɛ klaate nya, nɛ a maa ngɔ mɛ nyɔguɛ kɛ maa ya majemaje tsuo, nɛ majeli ɔmɛ maa naa Yerusalem nɔ kɛ maa su be nɛ majemajeli ɔmɛ a be ɔ maa su.”
Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ bami
(Mateo 24.29-31; Marko 13.24-27)
25“Okadihi maa ba pu kɛ nyɔhiɔ kɛ dodoehi a mi, nɛ fimi maa ba majeli ɔmɛ a nɔ ngɛ zugba a nɔ, nɛ a maa do yoyooyo ngɛ wo kɛ oslɔkehi a pɛmi he; 26nɛ nimli maa hɛli ngɛ gbeye kɛ nihi nɛ ma je ɔ mi ɔ blɔ hyɛmi he; ejakaa a ma mimiɛ hiɔwe hewami ɔmɛ tete. 27Kɛkɛ ɔ, a maa na Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ kaa e ma ngɛ bɔku mi kɛ hewami kɛ hɛ mi nyami babauu. 28Ke ni nɛ ɔmɛ bɔni mi bami ɔ, nyɛɛ da si tutuutu nɛ nyɛ wo nyɛ yi nɔ, ejakaa nyɛ kpɔmi ɔ ngɛ sue.”
Ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ he nikasemi
(Mateo 24.32-35; Marko 13.28-31)
29Nɛ Yesu bu mɛ abɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ hyɛ ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ kɛ tsohi tsuo kulaa; 30be mi nɛ a ngɛ ba sue lokoo ɔ, ke nyɛ na a, nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ le kaa latsa be su si ta. 31Ja nɔuu hu ke nyɛ na kaa ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ mi bae ɔ, nyɛ na le kaa Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ su si ta.
32“Niinɛ i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Kikɛmɛ a yi nɔ nɛ ɔ be bee, ja ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo kulaa ba mi lolo. 33Hiɔwe kɛ zugba maa be kɛ ho se ye munyu ɔmɛ be bee kɛ ho.”
E hia kaa a huɔ
34“Nɛ nyɛ hɛ nɛ hi nyɛ he nɔ konɛ jiklɔɔ yemi kɛ da demi kɛ nya mi ngma he haomi nɛ ko he nyɛ tsui nɛ jamɛ a ligbi ɔ ba ti nyɛ si tlukaa; 35ejakaa e maa ba nihi kulaa nɛ ngɛ zugba mluku ɔ tsuo nɔ ɔ nɔ. 36Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛɛ huɔ be tsuaa be nɛ nyɛɛ sɔle konɛ nyɛ nyɛ hihi nɛ maa ba nɛ ɔmɛ kulaa mi nɛ nyɛɛ je, nɛ nyɛ nyɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ hɛ mi nɛ nyɛɛ da.” 37Piani ɔ Yesu tsɔɔ ni ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, nɛ ke je jɔ ɔ, e yaa yoku nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Nuyoku ɔ nɔ nɛ e ya hwɔɔ. 38Nɛ mɔtu mla a, ma a tsuo baa e ngɔ ba buɔ lɛ tue ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ.

Title: LUKA 22
Content:
A so Yesu yi nɔ
(Mateo 26.1-5; Marko 14.1-2; Yohane 11.45-53)
1Jeha nɛ ɔ akpiti nyami ligbi nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Hetsɔmi ɔ ba su. 2Nɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ hla bɔ nɛ a maa pee nɛ a gbe Yesu; se a ngɛ ma a gbeye yee.
Yuda kplɛɛ kaa e maa tsɔɔ Yesu se blɔ
(Mateo 26.14-16; Marko 14.10-11)
3Kɛkɛ nɛ Abosiami ya sɛ Yuda, nɔ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Iskariot nɛ ji ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɔ kake ɔ mi. 4Nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho nɛ e kɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ asafoatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ya tu munyu bɔ nɛ e maa pee nɛ e je Yesu ngɔ ha mɛ. 5Nɛ a nya, nɛ a wo lɛ si ke a ma ha lɛ sika; 6nɛ e kplɛɛ, nɛ e hla be nɛ sa nɛ e kɛ je lɛ ngɔ ha mɛ zaa.
Yesu dla e he kɛ ha Hetsɔmi niyeni ɔ yemi
(Mateo 26.17-25; Marko 14.12-21; Yohane 13.21-30)
7Kɛkɛ nɛ akpiti nyami ligbi nɛ sa kaa a gbee Hetsɔmi to bi ɔ ngɛ nɔ ɔ ba su; 8nɛ Yesu tsɔ Petro kɛ Yohane nɛ e ke: “Nyɛɛ ya nɛ nyɛ ya dla Hetsɔmi niyeni ɔ ngɔ to wɔ konɛ wa ba ye.” 9Nɛ a bi lɛ ke: “Jije o suɔ kaa wa ya dla ngɔ to ngɛ?” 10Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Ke nyɛ sɛ ma a mi ɔ, oʼɛ, nyumu ko kɛ nyɛ maa kpe nɛ e tloo nyu buɛ, nyɛɛ nyɛɛ e se kɛ ya we mi he nɛ e yaa sɛ ɔ, 11nɛ nyɛ ya de wetsɛ ɔ ke: ‘Tsɔɔlɔ ɔ ke wa ba de mo ke: Jije nibwɔhi a tsu ɔ nɛ i kɛ ye kaseli ɔmɛ maa ye Hetsɔmi niyeni ɔ ngɛ mi ɔ ngɛ?’ 12Nɛ e maa tsɔɔ nyɛ hiɔwe asa kpetekpleenyɛ ko nɛ a dla mi; lejɛ ɔ nyɛ ya dla ni ɔ ngɔ to ngɛ.” 13Nɛ a pue nɔ kɛ ho nɛ a ya na kaa bɔ nɛ e de mɛ ɔ, nɛ a ya dla Hetsɔmi niyeni ɔ ngɔ to.
Nyɔmtsɛ niyeni ɔ sisitomi
(Mateo 26.26-30; Marko 14.22-26; 1 Korintobi 11.23-25)
14Nɛ benɛ ngmlɛfia a su ɔ, Yesu ya hi si ngɛ niyeni ɔ he, nɛ bɔfohi nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ hu piɛ e he. 15Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Pe i ngɛ hlae nɛ i kɛ nyɛ maa ye kikɛmɛ a Hetsɔmi nɛ ɔ loko ma na amanehlu ɔ; 16ejakaa i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: I be eko yee hu kɛ yaa su be nɛ e maa ba mi ngɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi.” 17Nɛ e wo kplu ɔ, nɛ e na si, nɛ e ke: “Nyɛ he nɛ nyɛɛ dla; 18ejakaa i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: i be wai tso yiblii nɛ ɔ eko nue hu kɛ yaa su be nɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ maa ba.” 19Nɛ e kɛ̃ abolo, nɛ e na si, nɛ e kuɔ mi, nɛ e ngɔ ha mɛ nɛ e ke: “Enɛ ɔ ji ye nɔmlɔ tso nɛ a ngɔ ha ngɛ nyɛ he ɔ nɛ; nyɛɛ pee enɛ ɔ nɛ nyɛ kɛ kai mi.” 20Ja nɔuu e wo kplu ɔ hu ngɛ niyeni ɔ se, nɛ e ke: “Kikɛmɛ a kplu nɛ ɔ ji somi he ɔ ngɛ ye muɔ nɛ a ngɔ pue si ha nyɛ ɔ mi.
21“Se oʼɛ, nɔ nɛ maa tsɔɔ ye se blɔ ɔ nine kɛ ye nine ngɛ ka a mi; 22ejakaa Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ yaa kaa bɔ nɛ a so ngɔ to momo ɔ lɛɛ, se musu tloo nɔ nɛ maa tsɔɔ e se blɔ ɔ!” 23Nɛ a bɔni a he bimi ke a kpɛti mɛnɔ po maa pee enɛ ɔ.
Agbopeemi he nyasami
24Nya sami ba te si ngɛ a kpɛti kaa a ti mɛnɔ a maa bu agbo pe kulaa. 25Se Yesu de mɛ ke: “Majeli ɔmɛ a nɔ matsɛmɛ ɔmɛ yeɔ a nɔ odehehi a sane, nɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ a nɔ he wami ɔ, a tsɛɛ mɛ kplɔkɔtɔtsɛmɛ. 26Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ e be nyɛ ja; se mohu nɔ nɛ ji nɔ ngua ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti ɔ, e plɛ kaa jokuɛyo, nɛ nɔ nɛ ji nɔkɔtɔma a hu kaa nɔ nɛ sɔmɔɔ. 27Ejakaa te nɔ nɛ pe e nyɛmi nɛɛ: nɔ nɛ hii okplɔɔ he ɔ, aloo nɔ nɛ sɔmɔɔ ɔ? Anɛ pi nɔ nɛ hii okplɔɔ he ɔ lo? Se imi lɛɛ i ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti kaa nɔ nɛ sɔmɔɔ.
28“Se nyɛ ji nihi nɛ kɛ mi hi si ngɛ ye ka amɛ a mi; 29nɛ imi hu i ngɛ matsɛ yemi toe ha nyɛ kaa bɔ nɛ Tsaatsɛ to ha mi ɔ, 30konɛ nyɛɛ ye nɛ nyɛɛ nu ngɛ ye kplɔɔ ɔ he ngɛ ye matsɛ yemi ɔ mi, nɛ nyɛɛ hi sɛhi a nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ kojo Israel wɛtso nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ.”
