Yesu gba Petro kuami ngɔ to
(Mateo 26.31-35; Marko 14.27-31; Yohane 13.36-38)
31“Simon, Simon, oʼɛ, Satan bi blɔ, konɛ e sa nyɛ mi kaa ngma; 32se imi lɛɛ i kpa pɛɛ ha mo, konɛ o hemi kɛ yemi ko ta; nɛ mo hu, ke o kpale ɔ, wo o nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ he wami.” 33Se Petro de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, i dla ye he ngɔ to nɛ ke tsu mi oo, gbenɔ mi oo, nɛ i kɛ mo maa ya.” 34Nɛ Yesu ke: “Petro, i ngɛ mo de ke mwɔnɛ kungwɔ be nɔ kpae, nɛ o ma kua si etɛ ke o li mi.”
Sika kpɛɛ kɛ kotoku kɛ klaate
35Nɛ Yesu bi mɛ ke: “Benɛ i tsɔ nyɛ nɛ nyɛ hɛɛ we sika kpɛɛ kɛ kotoku kɛ tokotahi ɔ, anɛ nɔ ko hia nyɛ lo?” Nɛ a ke: “Nɔ ko nɔ ko hia we wɔ.” 36Kɛkɛ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Se jeha nɛ ɔ ɔ, nɔ nɛ ngɛ sika kpɛɛ ɔ, e ngɔ; ja nɔuu hu nɔ nɛ ngɛ kotoku. Nɛ nɔ nɛ be klaate ɔ, e jua e tade nɛ e kɛ he eko. 37Ejakaa i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke nɔ́ nɛ a ngma nɛ ɔ hu ja e ba mi ngɛ ye he ke: ‘Nɛ a bu lɛ ngɔ si mlaa tɔli ɔmɛ a nɔ;’ ejakaa ye he sane ɔmɛ ma mi.” 38Nɛ a ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, oʼɛ klaatehi enyɔ.” Se e de mɛ ke: “E hiɛ.”
Yesu sɔle
(Mateo 26.36-46; Marko 14.32-42)
39Nɛ Yesu je kpo, nɛ kaa bɔ nɛ e pɔɔ peemi ɔ, e pue nɔ kɛ ho Nuyoku ɔ nɔ ya; nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ nyɛɛ e se. 40Nɛ benɛ e su leje ɔ, e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ sɔle, konɛ nyɛ ko sɛ ka mi.” 41Nɛ e sã e he si kɛ je a ngɔ maa pee tɛ fɔmi kɛmi, nɛ e kpla si, nɛ e sɔle 42ke: “Tsaatsɛ, ke o suɔ ɔ, je kplu nɛ ɔ kɛ je ye nɔ! Se kɛ̃ ɔ pi bɔ nɛ i suɔ, se mohu bɔ nɛ mo o suɔ.” [ 43Nɛ bɔfo ko je hiɔwe ba je e he kpo tsɔɔ lɛ, nɛ e wo lɛ he wami. 44Nɛ benɛ e he ngɛ lɛ hiae ɔ, e ha e sɔlemi ɔ mi wa. Nɛ e he latsa plɛ kaa muɔloku nɛ ngɛ tslee kɛ ngɛ si puee.]
45Nɛ benɛ e te si kɛ je sɔlemi ɔ mi nɛ e ba e kaseli ɔmɛ a ngɔ ɔ, e ba na mɛ kaa a ngɛ mahɛ hwɔe ngɛ aywlɛho nya; 46nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nyɛ ngɛ mahɛ hwɔe? Nyɛɛ te si nɛ nyɛɛ sɔle, konɛ nyɛ ko sɛ ka mi.”
A nu Yesu
(Mateo 26.47-56; Marko 14.43-50; Yohane 18.3-11)
47Benɛ Yesu ngɛ munyu ɔ tue ɔ, oʼɛ asafo ko, nɛ ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɔ kake nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Yuda a nyɛɛ a hɛ mi, nɛ e hɛ lɛ su Yesu he konɛ e fiɔ e nya he. 48Se Yesu de lɛ ke: “Yuda, o kɛ nya he fiɔmi ngɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ se blɔ tsɔɔe?” 49Nɛ benɛ nihi nɛ kɛ lɛ ngɛ ɔ na nɔ nɛ ma a, a de lɛ ke: “Mawetsɛ, wa ja klaate lo?” 50Nɛ a ti nɔ kake ja osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a tsɔlɔ ɔ klaate nɛ e po e hiɛ ɔ nɔ tue. 51Nɛ Yesu he nɔ nɛ e ke: “Enɛ ɔ hiɛ.” Nɛ e ta e tue ɔ he nɛ e tsa lɛ.
52Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ sɔlemi we asafoatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ kɛ ma nikɔtɔma amɛ nɛ ma lɛ numi ɔ ke: “Ye nɔ nyɛ je kpo kɛ ba lɛ klaatehi kɛ tsohi kaa a baa awiyelɔ nɔ nɛ ɔ? 53Daa nɛ i kɛ nyɛ ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ wo we nyɛ nine nɔ ngɛ ye nɔ; se nyɛ ngmlɛfia a kɛ diblii ɔ he wami ji nɛ ɔ nɛ!”
Petro kua Yesu
(Mateo 26.57-58, 69-75; Marko 14.53-54, 66-72; Yohane 18.12-18, 25-27)
54Kɛkɛ nɛ a nu Yesu nɛ a kpaka lɛ kɛ ho osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a we ɔ mi ya. Se Petro nyɛɛ se ngɛ lokoo. 55Nɛ benɛ a slɛ la ngɛ mɔ ɔ kpo ɔ kpɛti nɛ a ho hi si ngɛ he ɔ, Petro hu ho ya hi si ngɛ a kpɛti. 56Nɛ yiheyo ko na lɛ nɛ e hii si ngɛ la a he, nɛ e hyɛ lɛ too nɛ e ke: “Nyumu nɛ ɔ hu kɛ lɛ nɛ ngɛ.” 57Se Petro kua nɛ eke: “Maa, i li lɛ!” 58Lɔ ɔ se bɔɔ ɔ, nɔ kpa hu na lɛ nɛ e ke: “Mo hu a ti nɔ ko ji mo.” Se Petro ke: “Tsaatsɛ, pi a ti nɔ ko ji mi!” 59Lɔ ɔ se maa pee ngmlɛfia kake ɔ, nɔ kpa hu ma nɔ mi veveeve ke: “Niinɛ kaa nyumu nɛ ɔ hu kɛ lɛ nɛ ngɛ; ejakaa Galileano hu ji lɛ!” 60Se Petro ke: “Tsaatsɛ, i li nɔ́ nɛ o ngɛ dee nɛ ɔ!” Nɛ amlɔ nɔuu, benɛ e ngɛ munyu ɔ tue ɔ, kungwɔ kpa nɔ. 61Nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ plɛ e he, nɛ e hyɛ lɛ nɛ Petro kai Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ munyu ɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Kungwɔ be nɔ kpae, nɛ o ma kpa ngɛ ye se si etɛ” ɔ. 62Nɛ Petro je kpo, nɛ e ya fo ya wawɛɛ.
A ye Yesu he fɛu, nɛ a fia lɛ ni
(Mateo 26.67-68; Marko 14.65)
63Nihi nɛ hɛɛ Yesu mi ɔ ye e he fɛu, nɛ a fia lɛ ni. 64Nɛ a fi e hɛ mi, nɛ a gba e hɛ mi ma, nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Gbaa, mɛnɔ ji nɔ nɛ gba mo ma a?” 65Nɛ a de ni kpahi fuu kɛ bɔ musu ngɔ si lɛ.
Yesu ngɛ gua a hɛ mi
(Mateo 26.59-66; Marko 14.55-64; Yohane 18.19-24)
66Benɛ je na a, ma nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ a nya ba bua, nɛ a kpaka lɛ kɛ ho a gua a hɛ mi ya, 67nɛ a ke: “Ke mo ji Kristo ɔ, de wɔ.” Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Ke i de nyɛ ɔ, nyɛ be hee maa ye; 68nɛ ke sane ko nɛ i bi hu, nyɛ be mi heto hae. 69Se kɛ je be nɛ ɔ kɛ yaa nɛ ɔ ɔ, Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ maa hi Mawu he wami ɔ hiɛ ɔ nɔ.” 70Kɛkɛ nɛ mɛ tsuo a ke: “Lɛɛ, tse mo ji Mawu bi ɔ?” Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ nitsɛmɛ lɛ nyɛ ngɛ dee; ami ʼi.” 71Se a ke: “Mɛni wa pa ngɛ odase yeli hlae yaa pee? ejakaa wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa nu kɛ je e nya.”

Title: LUKA 23
Content:
Yesu ngɛ Pilato hɛ mi
(Mateo 27.1-2, 11-14; Marko 15.1-5; Yohane 18.28-38)
1Nɛ asafo mluku ɔ tsuo te si nɛ a kpaka Yesu kɛ ya Pilato ngɔ. 2Nɛ a bɔni e nya pomi ke: “Wa na nyumu nɛ ɔ nɛ e ngɛ wa ma a yi puɛe nɛ e ngɛ onia tsumi kɛ Kaisare hami gue, nɛ e ngɛ dee ke lɛ nitsɛ ji Kristo, matsɛ ɔ nɛ.” 3Nɛ Pilato bi lɛ ke: “Ane mo ji Yudafo ɔmɛ a matsɛ ɔ lo?” Nɛ Yesu ha lɛ heto kɛ: “Mo lɛ o de.” 4Nɛ Pilato de osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ asafo ɔmɛ ke: “I nɛ fɔ bumi sane ko ngɛ nyumu nɛ ɔ he.” 5Se a kã nɔ pe kekle ɔ, nɛ a ke: “E ngɛ ma a mi hliihlii woe kɛ e ni tsɔɔmi ngɛ Yudea tsuo, nɛ e bɔni kɛ je Galilea kɛ ba su hiɛ ɔ.”
Yesu ngɛ Herode hɛ mi
6Se benɛ Pilato nu Galilea he ɔ, e bi ke: “Nyumu ɔ nɛɛ, Galileano ʼi lo?” 7Nɛ benɛ e na le kaa e je Herode nɔ yemi he ɔ, e ha a kɛ lɛ ho Herode nɔ nɛ ba Yerusalem ngɛ jamɛ a be ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, ngɔ ya. 8Benɛ Herode na Yesu ɔ, e na bua jɔmi babauu, ejakaa tsa pi mwɔnɛ nɛ e je bɔni lɛ hlami nɛ e na, ejakaa e nu e he sanehi fuu, nɛ e hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa e maa pee nyakpɛ nɔ ko nɛ e na. 9Nɛ e bi lɛ munyuhi fuu, se e ha we lɛ kake po heto. 10Nɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ ba da si nɛ a po e nya babauu. 11Nɛ benɛ Herode kɛ e aslaafo ɔmɛ bɔ lɛ ahlua nɛ a ye e he fɛu, nɛ a wo lɛ tade saminyayoo ko ɔ, e ha a kɛ lɛ ho Pilato ngɔ ya ekohu. 12Jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔ nɔuu nɛ Pilato kɛ Herode nu huɛ, se jinɛ sa a akɛ a he yi.
A bu Yesu gbenɔ fɔ
(Mateo 27.15-26; Marko 15.6-15; Yohane 18.39—19.16)
13Nɛ Pilato tsɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ ma a kɛ ba kpe, 14nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ kɛ kikɛmɛ a nyumu nɛ ɔ ba ha mi ke e ngɛ ma a yi puɛe, nɛ oʼɛ, i hla e sane ɔ mi ngɛ nyɛ hɛ mi, se i nɛ fɔ bumi sane ko ngɛ e he ngɛ sanehi nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ ba po e nya a eko eko mi. 15Nɛ Herode hu nɛ́ eko, ejakaa e kpale lɛ kɛ ba, akɛnɛ e pee we nɔ ko nɛ sa gbenɔ ɔ. 16Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ma ha nɛ a fia lɛ kpa nɛ ma ngmɛɛ e he.” [ 17Se daa nyami ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, Pilato ngmɛɔ nɔ kake he ngɔ haa mɛ.] 18Se mɛ tsuo a kpa ngmlaa ke: “Gbee nɔ nɛ ɔ nɛ o ngmɛɛ Baraba he ngɔ ha wɔ!” 19(Nɔ ko nɛ atua ko nɛ a tsɔ ngɛ ma a mi kɛ awi yemi he nɛ a wo lɛ tsu mi ɔ.) 20Se akɛnɛ Pilato ngɛ hlae nɛ e ngmɛɛ Yesu he he je ɔ, e kɛ mɛ tu munyu e kohu. 21Se a kpale kpa ngmlaa ekohu ke: “Sɛu, sɛu lɛ!” 22Pilato bi mɛ nɔ nɛ ji si etɛ ke: “Se nɔ nɛ ɔ lɛɛ mɛni yayami e pee? I nɛ́ nɔ́ ko nɛ sa gbenɔ ngɛ e he; lɔ ɔ he ɔ ma ha a fia lɛ kpa nɛ ma ngmɛɛ e he.” 23Se a ka nɔ kɛ gbi wawɛɛ nɛ a ngɛ hlae nɛ a sɛu lɛ; nɛ a gbi ɔ kɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ a nɔ ɔ ye nɔ. 24Kɛkɛ nɛ Pilato po sane ɔ yi ke a pee bɔ nɛ a ngɛ hlae ɔ. 25Nɛ e ngmɛɛ nɔ nɛ atua tsɔmi kɛ awi yemi he nɛ a wo lɛ tsu mi nɛ a ngɛ hlae ɔ he; se Yesu ɔ lɛɛ, e ngɔ lɛ ngɔ ha ngɛ a hlami ɔ nya.
Yesu sɛumi
(Mateo 27.32-44; Marko 15.21-32; Yohane 19.17-27)
26Benɛ a kpaka Yesu kɛ yaa a, a nu Simon, Kireeneno ko, nɛ je ngmɔ si kɛ ma a, nɛ a wo sɛumi tso ɔ ngɔ tloo lɛ, nɛ e kɛ nyɛɛ Yesu se. 27Nɛ ma a mi nihi fuu kɛ yihi hu nɛ ngɛ kɔmɔ yee nɛ ngɛ e he ya foe ɔ nyɛɛ e se. 28Se Yesu plɛ e hɛ mi ngɔ ha mɛ n e ke: “Yerusalem bi yi, nyɛ ko fo ya ha mi; se mohu nyɛ fo ha nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ he kɛ nyɛ bimɛ. 29Ejakaa oʼɛ, be ma nɛ a ma de ke: ‘A gbaa yosahi kɛ muklii nɛ fɔ we hyɛ kɛ nyɔhi nɛ a pupɔ we hyɛ!’ 30Lɛ be ɔ mi ɔ, a ma bɔni yo ɔmɛ demi ke: ‘Nyɛ ba nɔ wa nɔ!’ kɛ yoku ɔmɛ hu ke: ‘Nyɛ ba ha wa nɔ!’ 31Ejakaa ke tso mumu nɛ a pee enɛ ɔ ɔ, tso gbligbli ɔ lɛɛ kɛ a maa pee lɛ kɛɛ?”
32Kɛkɛ nɛ a kpaka yayami peeli kpa enyɔ hu ngɔ piɛ e he kɛ ho nɛ a ya gbe mɛ. 33Nɛ benɛ a su he nɛ a tsɛɛ Yikoklodonya a, a sɛu lɛ kɛ yayami peeli ɔmɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, nɔ kake ngɛ e hiɛ ɔ nɔ, nɛ nɔ kake hu ngɛ e muɔ nɔ. 34Nɛ Yesu de ke: “Tsaatsɛ kɛ pa mɛ, se a li nɔ́ nɛ a ngɛ pee ɔ.” Nɛ a fɔ̃ sɔ kɛ dla e tade ɔmɛ. 35Nɛ ma mi bi ɔmɛ daa si ngɛ hyɛe. Nɛ ma nikɔtɔma amɛ hu li lɛ de ke: “E heɔ ni kpahi a yi wami, ke lɛ ji Kristo nɔ nɛ Mawu hla a, ha nɛ e he lɛ nitsɛ e yi wami!” 36Nɛ aslaafo ɔmɛ hu ye e he fɛu, nɛ a ba e ngɔ nɛ a ba ha lɛ dã nɛ kua, 37nɛ a ke: “Ke mo ji Yudafo ɔmɛ a matsɛ ɔ, he mo nitsɛ o yi wami!” 38Nɛ a ngma a he sane ko hu ngɛ e yi je ke: “Nɔ nɛ ɔ ji Yudafo ɔmɛ a matsɛ ɔ nɛ.”
39Nɛ yayami peeli nɛ a sɛu ɔ a ti nɔ kake bɔ lɛ ahlua ke: “Ke mo ji Kristo ɔ, je mo nitsɛ o he kɛ wɔ hulɔ!” 40Se nɔ kpa a he nɔ nɛ e ka e hɛ mi ke: “Anɛ mo hu nɛ o ngɛ fɔ bumi kake ɔ nɔuu mi nɛ ɔ, o yi Mawu gbeye lo? 41Wɔɔ lɛɛ wa nɔ ɔ sa wɔ, ejakaa wa ni peemi nihi a he hiɔwo wa na a nɛ; se nɔ nɛ ɔ lɛɛ e pee we nɔ ko nɛ sɛ́.” 42Nɛ e de Yesu ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, kaii mi, benɛ o maa ba ngɛ o matsɛ yemi ɔ mi ɔ.” 43Nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Niinɛ, i ngɛ mo dee ke: Mwɔnɛ o kɛ mi maa hi Paradeiso!”
Yesu gbenɔ
(Mateo 27.45-56; Marko 15.33-41; Yohane 19.28-30)
44Nɛ piani maa pee ngmlɛ nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ mi ɔ, diblii wo ngɛ zugba a nɔ tsuo kɛ ya su gbɔkuɛ ngmlɛ etɛ mi; 45nɛ pu tsɔ diblii, nɛ sɔlemi tsu ɔ mi pomi bo ɔ mi gba ngɛ kpɛti tutuutu. 46Nɛ Yesu kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ ke: “Tsaatsɛ, o dɛ mi i ngɛ ye mumi ɔ tue kɛ ngɛ woe nɛ ɔ nɛ!” Nɛ benɛ e de kikɛ ɔ, e ngɔ e nya. 47Se benɛ aslaafohi lafa a nya tsɛ ɔ na nɔ nɛ a pee ɔ, e wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami nɛ e ke: “E ngɛ mi niinɛ kaa kikɛmɛ a nyumu nɛ ɔ ɔ dalɔ ʼi!” 48Nɛ nihi nɛ ba ni hyɛmi ɔ tsuo, benɛ a na nihi nɛ a pee ɔ, a si a gugue nɛ a kpale a se. 49Se nihi nɛ le Yesu ɔ tsuo kɛ “yihi nɛ nyɛɛ e se kɛ je Galilea a hu daa si ngɛ se banee ngɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ hyɛe.
Yesu pumi
(Mateo 27.57-61; Marko 15.42-47; Yohane 19.38-42)
50Nɛ oʼɛ, nyumu ko ngɛ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Yosef, nɛ ji kpe ngua a mi nɔ, nɔmlɔ kpakpa kɛ dalɔ, 51nɛ je Arimatia, Yudafo ɔmɛ a ma a eko nɔ; lɛɛ e kplɛɛ we a yi mi tomi kɛ a nipeemi ni ɔmɛ, na e ngɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ blɔ nyɛɛ. 52Lɛ nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho Pilato ngɔ ya nɛ e ya kpa lɛ pɛɛ nɛ e ngɔ Yesu gbogboe ɔ ngɔ ha lɛ; 53nɛ e je lɛ kɛ kple si, nɛ e ngɔ kploba ngɔ blaa lɛ, nɛ e ya to lɛ ngɛ yɔkɔ nɛ a kpɛ ngɛ tɛ sa nɛ a tui nɔ ko ngɛ mi hyɛ ɔ mi. 54Nɛ lɛ ligbi ɔ Hedlami kɛ tomi ligbi ʼi, nɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ su ta.
55Nɛ yi ɔmɛ nɛ kɛ Yesu je Galilea ba a nyɛɛ se, nɛ a ba hyɛ pumi he ɔ kɛ bɔ nɛ a to e gbogboe ɔ ha a. 56Nɛ a kpale a se nɛ a ya dla tsopa kɛ e he via, nɛ Hejɔɔmi ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ a pee kpoo ngɛ Mlaa a nya.

Title: LUKA 24
Content:
Yesu sitemi
(Mateo 28.1-10; Marko 16.1-8; Yohane 20.1-10)
1Otsi ɔ kekleekle ligbi ɔ nɔ mɔtu mla a, yi ɔmɛ ba yɔkɔ ɔ he, nɛ a hɛɛ tsopa kɛ e he via nɛ a dla to ɔ kɛ ba. 2Nɛ a na kaa a kpɛne tɛ ɔ kɛ je yɔkɔ ɔ nya; 3se benɛ a sɛ mi ɔ, a nɛ́ Mawetsɛ Yesu gbogboe ɔ. 4Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ a pee yaa ngɛ enɛ ɔ he ɔ, oʼɛ, nyumuhi enyɔ nɛ wo tade klaiklai ba da a kasa nya. 5Se benɛ a ngɛ gbeye yee nɛ a ma a hɛ̃ si ɔ, nyumu ɔmɛ de mɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nyɛ ngɛ hɛ kalɔ ɔ hlae ngɛ ni gbogboehi a kpɛti? 6E be hiɛ ɔ, se mohu e te si! Nyɛ kai bɔ nɛ e de nyɛ benɛ e ngɛ Galilea a, 7ke: ‘Ja a ngɔ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ngɔ wo yayami peeli a dɛ mi, nɛ a sɛu lɛ, nɛ ligbi nɛ ji ligbi etɛ ɔ nɛ e te si ekohu.’ ” 8Nɛ a kai e munyu ɔmɛ, 9nɛ a kpale a se kɛ je yɔkɔ ɔ he, nɛ a ya sɛɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo ha ni nyɔngma kɛ kake ɔ kɛ nihi nɛ piɛ ɔ. 10Se Maria Magdalena kɛ Yohane kɛ Yakobo nyɛ Maria kɛ yihi nɛ piɛ a he ɔ ji nihi nɛ ba sɛɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngɔ ha bɔfo ɔmɛ ɔ nɛ. 11Se kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔmɛ pee kaa nyazia ngɛ a tue mi, nɛ a he we yi. 12Se Petro te si nɛ e sa fo kɛ ya yɔkɔ ɔ he; nɛ benɛ e kɔkɔ e yi si nɛ e hyɛ mi ɔ e na kploba amɛ nɛ a pueɔ si ekpa ekpa. Nɛ e je lejɛ ɔ kɛ ho we mi ya, nɛ e nya kpɛ e he ngɛ nɔ nɛ ba a he.
Sislami kɛ Emao yami
(Marko 16.12-13)
13Nɛ oʼɛ, jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔ nɔuu ɔ, a kpɛti ni enyɔ ngɔ pue nɔ kɛ yaa kɔpe ko nɛ kɛ Yerusalem kemi maa pee sitomi nya kpaago nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Emao ɔ mi. 14Nɛ a ngɛ hihi nɛ ba amɛ kulaa a he ni sɛɛe ngɛ a kpɛti. 15Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ a ngɛ ni ɔmɛ sɛɛe nɛ a ngɛ a he sanehi bie ɔ, Yesu nitsɛ ba na mɛ, nɛ e kɛ mɛ nyɛɛ. 16Se a ha a hɛngmɛhi a nɔ nɛ a ko yo lɛ. 17Nɛ Yesu bi mɛ ke: “Mɛni nyɛ ngɛ sɛɛe ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ ɔ?” Nɛ a da si kɛ a hɛ mi mɔbɔmɔbɔ. 18Nɛ a ti nɔ kake nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Kleopa a ha heto nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Anɛ mo pɛ ji nibwɔ ngɛ Yerusalem nɛ li sanehi nɛ ba lejɛ ɔ ngɛ be nɛ ɔmɛ a mi ɔ lo?” 19Nɛ e bi mɛ ke: “Mɛni sanehi?” Nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Yesu Nazareno ɔ nɛ ji gbalɔ nɛ ngɛ he wami ngɛ ni tsumi kɛ munyu tumi mi ngɛ Mawu kɛ ma a tsuo hɛ mi ɔ he sane ɔmɛ, 20kɛ bɔ nɛ wa osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ wa ma nikɔtɔma amɛ ngɔ lɛ ha nɛ a bu lɛ gbenɔ fɔ, nɛ a sɛu lɛ ɔ. 21Se wɔɔ lɛɛ wa hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa jinɛ lɛ ji nɔ nɛ ma kpɔ Israel ɔ nɛ; nɛ enɛ ɔ tsuo se ɔ, mwɔnɛ ji ligbi etɛ nɛ a pee ni nɛ ɔmɛ. 22Se jeha nɛ ɔ wa ti yi komɛ hu ha wa nya kpɛ wa he, ejakaa a ya yɔkɔ ɔ he mla mi, 23nɛ benɛ a nɛ́ e gbogboe ɔ, a ba nɛ a ba de ke bɔfohi komɛ hu je a he kpo tsɔɔ mɛ nɛ a de ke e hɛ ngɛ. 24Nɛ nihi nɛ kɛ wɔ ngɛ ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ ya yɔkɔ ɔ he, nɛ a ya na kaa bɔ nɛ yi ɔmɛ de ɔ nɔuu; se Yesu ɔ nɛ a nɛ.”
25Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Oo kuasiahi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ siɔɔ ngɛ nyɛ tsui mi ngɛ nihi tsuo nɛ gbali ɔmɛ de ɔ hemi kɛ yemi he. 26Anɛ pi nɛ e sa kaa Kristo ɔ nɛ na amanehlu nɛ ɔmɛ konɛ e sɛ e nyami ɔ mi lo?” 27Nɛ e bɔni kɛ je Mose kɛ gbali ɔmɛ kulaa nɔ, nɛ e tsɔɔ mɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ ngmami ɔmɛ tsuo mi ngɛ e he ɔ sisi.
28Nɛ a su kɔpe nɛ a yaa a, nɛ e pee kaa nɔ nɛ e yaa e hɛ kpɛ. 29Nɛ a nyɛ e nɔ, nɛ a ke: “O kɛ wɔ nɛ hi si, ejakaa je ngɛ jɔe nɛ e piɛ bɔɔ nɛ du ma bu.” Nɛ e ya kɔpe ɔ mi, nɛ e kɛ mɛ ya hi si. 30Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ e kɛ mɛ hii si ngɛ niyeni ɔ he ɔ, e kɛ̃ abolo nɛ e gbaa nɔ, nɛ e kuɔ mi nɛ e ngɔ ha mɛ; 31kɛkɛ nɛ a hɛngmɛ bli nɛ a yo lɛ; se e laa ngɛ a hɛ mi, nɛ a nɛ lɛ hu. 32Nɛ a de a he ke: “Anɛ wa tsui he dɔɛ la ngɛ wa mi benɛ e kɛ wɔ ngɛ munyu tue ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ nɛ e tsɔɔ wɔ ngmami ɔmɛ a mi ɔ?”
33Nɛ a te si ngɛ lɛ ngmlɛfia a nɔ nɔuu, nɛ a kpale a se kɛ ba Yerusalem, nɛ a ba na ni nyɔngma kɛ kake ɔ kɛ nihi nɛ kɛ mɛ ngɛ ɔ nɛ a bua a he nya; 34nɛ jamɛ a ni ɔmɛ de mɛ ke: “E ngɛ mi kaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ te si, nɛ e je e he kpo tsɔɔ Simon.” 35Nɛ mɛ hu a bɔ mɛ nɔ́ nɛ ba ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ ɔ kɛ bɔ nɛ pee nɛ a yo lɛ ngɛ abolo mi kuɔmi ɔ mi ɔ.
Yesu je e he kpo tsɔɔ e kaseli ɔmɛ
(Mateo 28.16-20; Marko 16.14-18; Yohane 20.19-23; Bɔfo 1.6-8)
36Nɛ benɛ a ngɛ munyu ɔ tue nɔuu ɔ, Yesu nitsɛ ba da a kpɛti nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ he manye!” 37Se a hɛli si nɛ a ye gbeye, a susu kaa kpade a ngɛ nae ɔ nɛ. 38Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nyɛ tsui ngɛ poe? Nɛ mɛni he je hulɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nɔ́ jee ngɛ nyɛ tsui mi? 39Nyɛɛ hyɛ ye ninehi kɛ ye nanehi kaa imi nitsɛ ʼi; nyɛɛ ta ye he nɛ nyɛɛ hyɛ; ejakaa kpade ko be he lo kɛ wu kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ hyɛe kaa i ngɛ nɛ ɔ.” 40Nɛ benɛ e de enɛ ɔ ɔ, e ngɔ e ninehi kɛ e nanehi ngɔ tsɔɔ mɛ. 41Se benɛ a he we yi kɛ mwɔɔ ngɛ bua jɔmi sɔuu he nɛ a hɛ mi pee mɛ yaa a, e bi mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ngɛ nɔ ko nɛ a yeɔ ngɛ hiɛ ɔ lo?” 42Nɛ a ha lɛ lo kpɔ fã ko nɛ a hoo; 43nɛ e sɔle, nɛ e ye ngɛ a hɛ mi.
44Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Enɛ ɔmɛ ji ye munyuhi nɛ i kɛ nyɛ tu benɛ i kɛ nyɛ ngɛ lolo ɔ nɛ, kaa ja nihi kulaa nɛ a ngma ngɛ Mose Mlaa a kɛ gbali ɔmɛ kɛ La amɛ a mi ngɛ ye he ɔ na ba mi.” 45Kɛkɛ nɛ e bli a juɛmi nya, konɛ a na ngmami ɔmɛ a nya. 46Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Bɔ nɛ a ngma ji nɛ ɔ nɛ, kaa Kristo nɛ na amanehlu nɛ e te si kɛ je gbeje ngɛ ligbi nɛ ji etɛ ɔ nɔ 47nɛ a fiɛ tsui tsakemi kɛ yayami pami ngɛ e biɛ ɔ mi ngɔ tsɔɔ mahi tsuo, nɛ a bɔni kɛ je Yerusalem. 48Nɛ nyɛ ji kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he odase yeli. 49Nɛ oʼɛ, i ngɛ hae nɛ Tsaatsɛ si womi ɔ nɛ ba nyɛ nɔ; lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛɛ hi si ngɛ Yerusalem ma a mi kɛ ya su be nɛ a maa je hiɔwe ba wo nyɛ he wami.”
A ngɔ Yesu kɛ ho hiɔwe ya
(Marko 16.19-20; Bɔfo 1.9-11)
50Nɛ e ngɔ mɛ kɛ je kpo kɛ ho Betania kasa nya ya, nɛ e wo e ninehi a nɔ nɛ e gbaa mɛ. 51Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ e ngɛ mɛ gbaae ɔ, e je a ngɔ nɛ a ngɔ lɛ kɛ ho hiɔwe ya. 52Nɛ a ja lɛ, nɛ a kpale a se kɛ ho Yerusalem ya kɛ bua jɔmi babauu; 53nɛ a ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ daa nɛ ɔ, nɛ a jɔɔ we Mawu yi jemi kɛ lɛ gbaami.

Title: YOHANE 1
Content:
Wami munyu
1Sisi je ɔ mi ɔ Munyu ɔ ngɛ, nɛ munyu ɔ kɛ Mawu lɛ ngɛ, nɛ Munyu ɔ Mawu ʼi. 2Lɛ nɔuu sisije ɔ e kɛ Mawu ngɛ. 3Lɛ e nɔ a gu kɛ pee nihi kulaa, nɛ a si we lɛ se kɛ pee nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko. 4E mi wami ngɛ, nɛ wami ɔ ji nimli a la a nɛ; 5nɛ la a ngɛ tsoe ngɛ diblii ɔ mi, nɛ diblii ɔ nyɛ we nya nɛ e da.
6Nyumu ko ngɛ nɛ Mawu tsɔ lɛ kɛ ba, a tsɛɛ lɛ Yohane. 7Lɛɛ odase yemi he nɛ e ba, nɛ e ba ye la a he odase, kone nihi kulaa nɛ gu e nɔ nɛ a he ye. 8Pi lɛ ji la a; se mohu la a he odase yemi he nɛ e ba. 9La nitse nɛ tsoo haa nɔ tsuaa nɔ ɔ lɛ ma je ɔ mi ɔ nɛ.
10Je ɔ mi e ngɛ, nɛ e nɔ a gu kɛ pee je ɔ, se je ɔ li lɛ. 11Lɛ nitse e nihi a ngɔ e ba, nɛ nihi nɛ ji lɛ nitse e ni ɔmɛ he we lɛ. 12Se nihi abɔ nɛ he lɛ ɔ, nihi nɛ heɔ e biɛ ɔ nɔ ye ɔ, e ha mɛ he blɔ kaa a pee Mawu bimɛ, 13nihi nɛ pi muɔ loo he loo nyumu ko suɔmi nya, se mohu Mawu mi a je kɛ fɔ mɛ.
14Nɛ Munyu ɔ plɛ he lo, nɛ e ba hi wa kpɛti, nɛ wa na e hɛ mi nyami ɔ kaa Tsɛ ɔ Bi kaketoo ɔ hɛ mi nyami, nɛ dloomi kɛ anɔkuale hyi lɛ tɔtɔɔtɔ. 15Yohane ye e he odase nɛ e kpa ngmlaa ke: “Nɔ nɛ ɔ ji nɔ nɛ i ngɛ dee ngɛ e he ke: ‘Nɔ nɛ ma ngɛ ye se ɔ, e pa mi’ ejakaa e ngɛ loko i ngɛ.”
16Ejakaa e hyi mi ɔ mi je nɛ wɔ tsuo wa na dloomi ngɔ si dloomi nɔ. 17Ejakaa Mlaa a Mose nɔ a gu nɛ a ngɔ ha, se dloomi kɛ anɔkuale ɔ, Yesu Kristo nɔ e gu kɛ ba. 18Mawu ɔp nɔ ko nɛ́ lɛ hyɛ; Bi kaketoo nɛ ngɛ Tsɛ o mi si ɔ, lɛ nɛ e ba je lɛ si ngɔ tsɔɔ paa.
Yohane Baptisilɔ ɔ fiɛmi
(Mateo 3.1-12; Marko 1.1-8; Luka 3.1-18)
19Enɛ ɔ ji Yohane odase nɛ e ye, bene Yudafo ɔmɛ tsɔ osɔfohi kɛ Levibihi kɛ je Yerusalem nɛ a ba bi lɛ ke: “Mɛnɔ ji mo?” ɔ. 20Nɛ e gba mi paa nɛ e laa we nɔ, nɛ e gba mi de ke: “Tsa pi imi ji Kristo ɔ.” 21Nɛ a bi lɛ ke: “Mɛnɔ ji mo mɔ? Elia ji mo lo?” Nɛ e ke: “Tsa pi lɛ ji mi.” “Gbalɔ ji mo lo?” Nɛ e he nɔ ke: “Dɛbi.” 22Jeha nɛ ɔ a bi lɛ ke: “Mɛnɔ ji mo? konɛ wa na heto ko kɛ ya ha ninɛmɛ nɛ tsɔ wɔ ɔ. Kɛ o deɔ ngɛ mo nitse o he kɛɛ?” 23E ke: “Imi ji nɔ nɛ gbi nɛ ngɛ pɛe ngɛ nga a nɔ ke: ‘Nyɛ dla Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ blɔ ɔ,’ kaa bɔ nɛ gbalɔ Yesaia de ɔ.”
24Ninɛmɛ nɛ atsɔ ɔ je Farisifo ɔmɛ a kpɛti; 25nɛ a ba bi lɛ ke: “Ke pi mo ji Kristo ɔ, loo Elia loo gbalɔ ɔ, lɛɛ mɛni he je o ngɛ baptisie mɔ?” 26Yohane he nɔ ke: “Imi lɛɛ i baptisii ngɛ nyu mi, se nɔ ko daa si ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti nɛ nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ li lɛ, 27lɛ ji nɔ nɛ ma ngɛ ye se, se e sɛ ye hlami, nɔ nɛ i sɛ kaa i pɛneɔ e tokota nya kpa a.”
28A pee ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ Betania ngɛ Yordan se, he nɛ Yohane ngɛ baptisie ngɛ ɔ.
Mawu To Bi ɔ
29E nɔ je na a, Yohane na Yesu ma e ngɔ nɛ e ke: “Oʼɛ Mawu To bi ɔ nɛ woɔ je ɔ he yayami ɔ kɛ yaa a! 30Nɔ nɛ ɔ ji nɔ nɛ i ngɛ dee ngɛ e he ke: ‘Nyumu ko ma ngɛ ye se, nɛ e pã mi,’ ejakaa e ngɛ loko i ngɛ ɔ nɛ. 31Nɛ imi lɛɛ i li lɛ, se mohu bene pee nɛ a je lɛ kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ Israel he je nɛ i ba ngɛ baptisie ngɛ nyu mi nɔ nɛ.” 32Yohane ye odase ke: “I na Mumi ɔ nɛ kple si kɛ je hiɔwe kaa lahuɛ, nɛ e ba ma e nɔ. 33Nɛ imi lɛɛ i li lɛ, se nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ke ma ba baptisi ngɛ nyu mi ɔ, lɛ nɔuu lɛ e de mi ke: ‘Nɔ nɛ nɔ nɛ o maa na kaa Mumi ɔ ngɛ kplee nɛ e ngɛ e nɔ hie ɔ, lɛ ji nɔ nɛ baptisii ngɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu mi ɔ nɛ.’ 34Nɛ i na, nɛ i ye he odase kaa lɛ ji Mawu Bi ɔ nɛ.”
Yesu kekleekle kaseli ɔmɛ
35E nɔ je na nɔ ɔ, Yohane kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ a ti ni enyɔ daa si, 36nɛ bene Yesu bee ɔ, e hyɛ lɛ nɛ e ke: “Oʼɛ Mawu lo Bi ɔ!” 37Nɛ kaseli enyɔ ɔmɛ nu e munyu ɔ, nɛ a ya nyɛɛ Yesu se. 38Yesu plɛ e he nɛ benɛ e na kaa a nyɛɛ e se ɔ, e bi mɛ ke: “Mɛni nyɛ ngɛ hlae?” Nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Rabi” (e sisi ji Tsɔɔlɔ) “jije o hii?” 39E de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ba nɛ nyɛ ba hyɛ.” A ya nɛ a ya na he nɛ e hii ɔ, nɛ a kɛ lɛ hi si jamɛ a ligbi ɔ. Nɛ gbɔkuɛ ngmlɛ eywiɛ mi ʼi.
40Ni enyɔ ɔmɛ nɛ nu nɛ Yohane tu munyu ɔ nɛ a ya nyɛɛ e se ɔ a ti nɔ kake ji Andrea, Simon Petro nyɛmi ɔ. 41Andrea ya na lɛ nitsɛ e nyɛmi Simon kekle, nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Wa na Mesia a.” (E sisi ji Kristo, loo cnɔ nɛ a pɔ lɛ nu.) 42Nɛ e kɛ lɛ ba Yesu ngɔ. Nɛ benɛ Yesu hyɛ lɛ ɔ, e ke: “Mo ji Simon, Yona bi ɔ, a ma tsɛ mo Kefa.” (E sisi ji Petro loo tɛ sa.)
Yesu tsɛ Filipo kɛ Natanael
43Je na nɔ ɔ, Yesu to e yi mi kaa e maa ya Galilea, nɛ e na Filipo, nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ye se!” 44Filipo je Betsaida, Andrea kɛ Petromɛ a ma a mi. 45Filipo hu na Natanael, nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Wa na nɔ nɛ Mose ngma e he sane ngɛ Mlaa a mi, nɛ gbali ɔmɛ hu ngma e he sane ɔ, Yesu, Yosef bi nɛ je Nazaret ɔ.” 46Nɛ Natanael de Filipo ke: “Anɛ nɔ́ kpakpa ko ma nyɛ Nazaret maa je lo?” Filipo de lɛ ke: “Ba nɛ o ba hyɛ.”
47Yesu na Natanael ma e ngɔ, nɛ e de ngɛ e he ke: “Oʼɛ anɔkuale Israelno, nɔ nɛ sisimi be e mi.” 48Natanael bi Yesu ke: “Jije o le mi ngɛ?” Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “I na mo loko Filipo tsɛ mo, be mi nɛ o ngɛ ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ sisi ɔ.” 49Natanael he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Rabi, mo ji Mawu Bi ɔ nɛ, mo ji Israel matsɛ ɔ nɛ!” 50Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Nɛ i de mo ke i na mo ngɛ ngmɔkɔ tso ɔ sisi ɔ he je o heɔ yeɔ nɛ ɔ? O maa na ni nguahi nɛ pe enɛ ɔ.” 51Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Kɛ je be nɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ, nyɛ maa na kaa hiɔwe nya bli nɛ Mawu bɔfo ɔmɛ ngɛ si kplee ngɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ nɔ.”

Title: YOHANE 2
Content:
Yokpeemi ngɛ Kana
1E nɔ ligbi etɛ ɔ, a kpee yo ngɛ Kana ngɛ Galilea, nɛ Yesu nyɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ. 2Nɛ a kpee Yesu hu kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ kɛ ya yo kpeemi ɔ. 3Nɛ bene wai ɔ sui ɔ, Yesu nyɛ de lɛ ke: “A be wai.” 4Yesu de lɛ ke: “Maa, mɛni sane i kɛ mo ngɛ? Ye ngmlɛfia a sui lolo.” 5E nyɛ de sɔmɔli ɔmɛ ke: “Nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ nɛ e ma de nyɛ ɔ nyɛɛ pee.”
6Ngmawe ekpa maa si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ngɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a he fɔmi he; kake peɔ paya buɛhi enyɔ loo etɛ. 7Yesu de sɔmɔli ɔmɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ wo ngmawe ɔmɛ a mi nyu nɛ a hyi.” Nɛ a wo a mi nyu nɛ a hyi tɔtɔɔtɔ. 8Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ yɛ eko ya ha da nya dalɔ ɔ.” Nɛ a kɛ ya. 9Se bene da nya dalɔ ɔ sa e nya nyu nɛ plɛ wai ɔ nɛ e li he nɛ a kɛ je se sɔmɔli ɔmɛ nɛ yɛ nyu ɔ kɛke lɛ a le ɔ, e tsɛ ayɛflo huno ɔ, 10nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Nɔ tsuaa nɔ ɔ, wai kpakpa e kɛ ba maa si kekle, nɛ bene ni ɔmɛ tɔ ɔ, lɔ ɔ se loko a kɛ nɔ́ nɛ ngɔɛ ɔ baa; se moo lɛɛ o ngɔ wai kpakpa a mohu ngɔ to kɛ ba su be nɛ ɔ.”
11Enɛ ɔ Yesu kɛ je e nyakpɛ ni ɔmɛ a sisi ngɛ Kana ngɛ Galilea, nɛ e ngɔ e hɛ mi nyami ɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ, nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ he e nɔ ye. 12Enɛ ɔ se ɔ, e pue nɔ kɛ ho Kapernaum ya, lɛ kɛ e nyɛ kɛ e nyɛmimɛ kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ, se a yi ligbi fuu ngɛ lejɛ ɔ.
Yesu ya sɔlemi we ɔ
(Mateo 21.12-13; Marko 11.15-17; Luka 19.45-46)
13Yudafo ɔmɛ a Hetsɔmi ɔ su ta nɛ Yesu ya Yerusalem. 14E ya na nihi nɛ ngɛ nahi kɛ tohi kɛ lahuɛhi juae kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ sika tsakee hulɔ nɛ a hii si ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ. 15Nɛ e ngɔ tangme tsɔwi nɛ e kɛ pee kplibi nɛ e kɛ fie mɛ tsuo kɛ je sɔlemi we ɔ, kɛ tohi kɛ na amɛ; nɛ e plɛ sika tsakeli ɔmɛ a sika a ngɔ pue si, nɛ e tsitsɛɛ okplɔɔ ɔmɛ ngɔ fia si; 16nɛ e de ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ lahuɛ ɔmɛ juae ɔ ke: “Nyɛ je ni nɛ ɔmɛ kɛ je hiɛ ɔ; nyɛ ko ngɔ Tsaatsɛ we ɔ ngɔ pee jua nɔ.” 17Kɛkɛ nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ kai kaa a ngma ke: “O we ɔ he hɛdɔ ɔ maa ye mi.”
18Kɛkɛ nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ he nɔ nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Mɛni okadi o kɛ ngɛ wɔ tsɔɔe kaa o ngɛ he blɔ nɛ o peɔ enɛ ɔmɛ?” 19Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ku sɔlemi tsu nɛ ɔ, nɛ ligbi etɛ mi ɔ ma ma ekohu.” 20Kɛkɛ nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ ke: “Jeha nyingmi eywiɛ kɛ ekpa a kɛ ma sɔlemi tsu nɛ ɔ, nɛ moo lɛɛ ligbi etɛ o kɛ maa ma lo?” 21Se lɛɛ e nɔmlɔ tso sɔlemi tsu ɔ he munyu e ngɛ tue ɔ nɛ. 22Lɔ ɔ he ɔ benɛ e te si kɛ je gbeje ɔ, e kaseli ɔmɛ kai kaa e de enɛ ɔ, nɛ a he ngmami ɔ kɛ munyu nɛ Yesu tu ɔ ye.
Yesu le nihi tsuo
23Jeha nɛ ɔ, benɛ Yesu ngɛ Yerusalem ngɛ Hetsɔmi ligbi ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, nihi fuu na nyakpɛ nihi nɛ e pee ɔ, nɛ a he e biɛ ɔ nɔ ye. 24Se Yesu nitsɛ lɛɛ e kɛ e he fɔɛ a nɔ, ejakaa e le mɛ tsuo. 25Nɛ e hia we lɛ kaa nɔ ko nɛ ye nɔmlɔ he odase ngɔ ha lɛ, ejakaa lɛ nitsɛ e le nɔ́ nɛ ngɛ nɔmlɔ mi.

Title: YOHANE 3
Content:
Yesu kɛ Nikodemo
1Nyumu ko ngɛ nɛ je Farisifo ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Nikodemo nɛ ji Yudafo ɔmɛ a nɔkɔtɔma. 2Lɛ lɛ e ba Yesu ngɔ nyɔ mi, nɛ e ba de lɛ ke: “Rabi, wa le kaa tsɔɔlɔ nɛ je Mawu ngɔ ba ji mo, ejakaa nɔ ko nɔ ko be nyɛe maa pee nyakpɛ nihi nɛ o ngɛ pee nɛ ɔmɛ, kaa ja Mawu kɛ nɔ ɔ ngɛ.” 3Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “I ngɛ mo dee anɔkuale mi ke: Ke a ji hiɔwe fɔ we nɔ ko ɔ, e be Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ nae.” 4Nikodemo bi lɛ ke: “Kɛ e maa pee kɛɛ nɛ benɛ nɔmlɔ bwɔ ɔ nɛ a ma fɔ lɛ hu? Anɛ e ma nyɛ e nyɛ muklii mi maa sɛ ekohu nɛ a fɔ lɛ lo?” 5Yesu he nɔ ke: “I ngɛ mo dee anɔkuɛle mi ke: Ke a ji nyu kɛ Mumi mi fɔ we nɔ ko ɔ, e be Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi nyɛe maa sɛ. 6Nɔ́ nɛ a je he lo mi fɔ ɔ, he lo ʼi; nɛ nɔ́ nɛ a je Mumi mi fɔ ɔ, Mumi ʼi. 7O hɛ mi ko pee mo yaa kaa i de mo enɛ ɔ ke: ‘Ja a je hiɔwe fɔ nyɛ’ ɔ. 8Kɔɔhiɔ ɔ, he nɛ e suɔ e fiaa kɛ yaa, nɛ e fiami o nuɔ, se o li he nɛ e jee kɛ he nɛ e yaa: ja ji nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ a je Mumi mi fɔ lɛ.” 9Nikodemo he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ maa ba mi?” 10Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Tse Israel tsɔɔlɔ ji mo nɛ o li enɛ ɔmɛ? 11I ngɛ mo dee anɔkuale mi ke: Nɔ́ nɛ wa le ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ wa deɔ; nɛ nɔ́ nɛ wa na a, kɔlɔ ɔ he odase wa yeɔ, se nyɛ ngɔɛ wa odase ɔ. 12Ke i de nyɛ zugba nɔ nihi nɛ nyɛ he we yi ɔ, kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ ke ide nyɛ hiɔwe nihi ɔ nɛ nyɛ ma he ye? 13Nɔ ko kue kɛ yɛ hiɔwe, kaa ja nɔ nɛ je hiɔwe kple si ɔ, Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ.” 14Nɛ bɔ nɛ Mose wo sinɔ ɔ nɔ ngɛ nga a nɔ ɔ, ja nɔuu sa kaa a wo Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ nɔ. 15Konɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ heɔ e nɔ yeɔ ɔ hɛ mi ko kpata, se mohu e na neneene wami. 16Ejakaa Mawu suɔ je ɔ saminya, nɛ e ngɔ e bi kake ɔ ngɔ ha, konɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ heɔ e nɔ yeɔ ɔ hɛ mi ko kpata, se mohu e na neneene wami. 17Ejakaa Mawu tsɔɛ e bi ɔ kɛ bɛ je ɔ mi konɛ e ba kojo je ɔ, se mohu konɛ a gu e nɔ kɛ he je ɔ yi wami.
18Nɔ nɛ heɔ e nɔ yeɔ, a kojo we lɛ, se nɔ nɛ he we yi ɔ, a kojo lɛ momo, ejakaa e he we Mawu bi kake ɔ nɔ yi. 19Se kojomi ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ, kaa la a ba je ɔ mi, nɛ nimli suɔ diblii ɔ mohu pe la a, ejakaa a ni tsumi ɔmɛ ɔ yayami ʼi; 20nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ tsuɔ ni yayamihi ɔ nyɛɛ la a, nɛ e bɛ la a he, konɛ a ko je e ni tsumi ɔmɛ kpo. 21Se nɔ nɛ peɔ anɔkuale nihi ɔ baa la a he, konɛ e ni tsumi ɔmɛ nɛ je kpo, ejakaa Mawu mi a tsu mɛ ngɛ.
Yesu kɛ Yohane
22Ni nɛ ɔmɛ a se ɔ, Yesu kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ba Yudea zugba a nɔ, nɛ e kɛ mɛ ba hi lejɛ ɔ nɛ e baptisii. 23Nɛ Yohane hu ngɛ baptisie ngɛ Ainon, ngɛ Salim kasa nya, ejakaa nyu fuu ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, nɛ nihi baa nɛ a baptisii mɛ; 24ejakaa lɛ be ɔ mi ɔ a wui Yohane tsu mi lolo.
25Jeha nɛ ɔ nya sami ba te si ngɛ Yohane kaseli ɔmɛ kɛ Yudafono ko kpɛti ngɛ he tsukɔmi he. 26Nɛ a ba Yohane ngɔ nɛ a ba de lɛ ke: “Rabi, nɔ nɛ kɛ mo hi Yordan se nɛ o ye e he odase ɔ, oʼɛ, lɛ nitse e ngɛ baptisie, nɛ nihi tsuo ngɛ e ngɔ yae.” 27Yohane he nɔ nɛ e ke: “Nɔmlɔ be nyɛe ma na nɔ́ ko, ja a je hiɔwe ngɔ ha lɛ. 28Nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ ngɛ odase yee ha mi kaa i de ke ‘Pi imi ji Kristo ɔ, se mohu a tsɔ mi kɛ sɛ e hlami.’ 29Nɔ nɛ nɔ́ ji ayɛflo ɔ, lɛ ji ayɛflo huno; se ayɛflo huno ɔ huɛ nɛ daa si ngɛ lɛ tue bue ɔ, nya e nyaa ngɛ ayɛflo huno ɔ gbi he. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ye kikɛmɛ a nyami nɛ ɔ ba mi. 30Ja lɛɛ e ya nɔ, nɛ imi lɛɛ i ba si.”
Nɔ nɛ je hiɔwe kɛ ba a
31Nɔ nɛ je hiɔwe ba a pe nihi kulaa. Nɔ nɛ je zugba a nɔ ɔ, zugba a nɔ e je, nɛ zugba a he munyu e tuɔ. Nɔ nɛ je hiɔwe ba a pe nihi kulaa, 32nɛ nɔ́ nɛ e na nɛ e nu ɔ, lɔ ɔ he odase e yeɔ; nɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko ngɔɛ e odase ɔ. 33Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ heɔ e odase ɔ yeɔ ɔ maa nɔ mi kaa anɔkualetsɛ ji Mawu. 34Ejakaa nɔ nɛ Mawu tsɔ ɔ, Mawu munyu e tuɔ; ejakaa Mawu haa lɛ e Mumi ɔ faa. 35Tsɛ ɔ suɔ Bi ɔ, nɛ e tu nihi kulaa ngɔ wo e dɛ. 36Nɔ nɛ heɔ Bi ɔ nɔ yeɔ ɔ, e ngɛ neneene wami; se nɔ nɛ bui Bi ɔ tue ɔ, e be wami nae, se mohu Mawu mi mi fumi hii e nɔ.

Title: YOHANE 4
Content:
Yesu kɛ Samaria yo ɔ
1Benɛ Yesu na le kaa Farisifo ɔmɛ nu kaa e ngɛ kaseli nae nɛ e ngɛ nihi babauu baptisie pe Yohane ɔ, 2(pohu Yesu nitse ɔ lɛɛ e baptisi we, se mohu e kaseli ɔmɛ lɛ a baptisii) 3e je Yudea nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ yaa Galilea ekohu. 4Se ja e gu Samaria.
5Jeha nɛ ɔ e ba su ma ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Sikar a he, ngɛ zugba kpɔ ko nɛ Yakob ngɔ ha e bi Yosef ɔ kasa nya. 6Yakob vu ɔ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ. Nɛ akɛnɛ pɔ tɔ Yesu kɛ blɔ ɔ nyɛɛmi he je ɔ, e be ya hi si ngɛ vu ɔ he. E maa pee ngmlɛ nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ mi.
7Samaria yo ko ba nyu yɛmi, nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Ha mi nyu ɔ eko nɛ ma nu.” 8(Ejakaa e kaseli ɔmɛ ho ma a mi ya nɛ e yaa he niyeni.) 9Nɛ Samaria yo ɔ de lɛ ke: “Kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ mo Yudano ɔ, o ngɛ mi Samariano ɔ nyu bae nɛ o nu ɔ?” (Ejakaa Yudafohi kɛ Samariabihi yi.) 10Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Kaa o le Mawu nɔke nɔ́ ɔ kɛ nɔ nɛ ngɛ mo dee ke: ‘Ha mi eko ma nu’ ɔ, jinɛ mo mohu o maa ba lɛ nɛ e ha mo wami nyu.” 11Yo ɔ de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, o be nɔ́ nɛ o kɛ maa yɛ, nɛ vu ɔ hu mi kuɔ; jije o ma na wami nyu ɔ kɛ je mɔ? 12Anɛ o pe wa tsɛ Yakob nɛ ha wɔ vu nɛ ɔ, nɛ lɛ nitse e nu mi nyu, kɛ e bimɛ kɛ e lohwe ɔmɛ ɔ lo?” 13Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ nuu nyu nɛ ɔ eko ɔ, kuma maa ye lɛ ekohu; 14se nɔ nɛ nuu nyu nɛ imi ma ha lɛ ɔ, kuma be lɛ yee gblee kɛ maa ya neneene; se mohu nyu nɛ ma ha lɛ ɔ ma plɛ nyu hɛngmɛ nɛ baa kɛ yaa neneene wami mi ngɛ e mi.” 15Yo ɔ de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, ha mi nyu ɔ eko kone kuma ko ye mi, nɛ i ba hiɛ ɔ ba yɛ nyu hu.” 16Yesu de lɛ ke: “Yaa nɛ o ya tsɛ o huno nɛ o kɛ lɛ nɛ ba hiɛ ɔ.” 17Yo ɔ he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “I be huno.” Yesu de lɛ ke: “O tu anɔkuale kaa o ke: ‘I be huno’ ɔ; 18ejakaa o hi hunomɛ enuɔ, nɛ nɔ nɛ o kɛ ngɛ piɔ nɛ ɔ ɔ, pi o huno; enɛ ɔ lɛɛ o tu anɔkuale.” 19Yo ɔ de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, i na kaa gbalɔ ji mo. 20Yoku nɛ ɔ nɔ wa tsɛmɛ sɔle ngɛ, nɛ nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ ke Yerusalem ji he nɛ sa kaa a sɔle ngɛ.” 21Yesu de lɛ ke: “Maa, he mi ngɔ ye kaa ngmlɛfia a ma nɛ pi yoku nɛ ɔ nɔ, nɛ pohu pi Yerusalem nɛ nyɛ ma ja Tsɛ ɔ ngɛ. 22Nyɛɛ lɛɛ, nyɛ li nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ jae ɔ; wɔɔ lɛɛ, wa le nɔ́ nɛ wa ngɛ jae ɔ, ejakaa yi wami hemi ɔ, Yudafo ɔmɛ a ngɔ e je. 23Se ngmlɛfia a ma nɛ e su momo benɛ anɔkuale jali ɔmɛ ma ja Tsɛ ɔ ngɛ mumi kɛ anɔkuale mi, ejakaa nihi nɛ jaa lɛ kikɛ ɔ Tsɛ ɔ hu ngɛ hlae. 24Mawu ɔ Mumi ji lɛ, nɛ nihi nɛ jaa lɛ ɔ, ja a ja lɛ ngɛ mumi kɛ anɔkuale mi.”
25Yo ɔ de lɛ ke: “I le kaa Mesia nɛ e tsɛɛ lɛ Kristo ɔ ma; nɛ ke e ba a, e maa sɛɛ wɔ nihi tsuo kulaa.” 26Yesu de lɛ ke: “Imi nɛ i kɛ mo ngɛ munyu tue nɛ ɔ, ami ʼi.”
27Kɛkɛ nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ba, nɛ a hɛ mi pee mɛ yaa kaa e kɛ yo ngɛ munyu tue; se kɛ ɔ nɔ ko bi we lɛ ke: “Mɛni o ngɛ lɛ bie ɔ?” loo “Mɛni munyu o kɛ lɛ ngɛ tue ɔ?”
28Kɛkɛ nɛ yo ɔ si e paya buɛ ɔ nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho ma a mi ya, nɛ e ya de ni ɔmɛ ke: 29“Nyɛɛ ba nɛ nyɛ ba hyɛ nyumu ko nɛ jaje nihi tsuo nɛ i pee ɔ ngɔ ha mi, kaa pi Kristo ɔ ji nɛ ɔ lo?” 30Kɛkɛ nɛ a je ma a mi nɛ a ba e ngɔ.
31Lɛ be ɔ mi nɔuu ɔ, e kaseli ɔmɛ kpa lɛ pɛɛ ke: “Rabi, ye nɔ́ ko.” 32Se e de mɛ ke: “I ngɛ ngma nɛ i yeɔ nɛ nyɛ li.” 33Lɔ ɔ he ɔ e kaseli ɔmɛ bi a he ke: “Anɛ nɔ ko ba ha lɛ nɔ́ ko ye lo?” 34Yesu de mɛ ke: “Ye ngma ji kaa ma pee nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ suɔmi nya ni, nɛ ma gbe e ni tsumi ɔ nya.”
35“Anɛ nyɛ de we ke: ‘Epiɛ hlami eywiɛ nɛ blɛfo kpɔmi be maa su’? oʼɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nyɛ wo nyɛ hɛ nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ hyɛ ngmɔ ɔmɛ, bɔ nɛ a gba futaa momo ha ni kpami. 36Nɔ nɛ kpaa a naa e hiɔwo, nɛ e kpaneɔ yiblii ɔmɛ a nya ngɔ toɔ neneene wami, konɛ nɔ nɛ duɔ ɔ kɛ nɔ nɛ kpaa a tsuo a nya si kake. 37Ejakaa enɛ ɔ mi nɛ munyu nɛ a de ke: ‘Nɔ ko duɔ nɛ nɔ ko kpaa’ a baa mi ngɛ. 38Imi lɛɛ i tsɔ nyɛ konɛ nyɛ yakpa nɔ́ nɛ pi nyɛ nɛ nyɛ gbo he dengme; ni kpahi tsu ni ɔ, nɛ nyɛ ba ye mi ni.”
39Nɛ Samariabi ɔmɛ nɛ je jamɛ a ma a mi ɔ a ti nihi fuu he e nɔ ye ngɛ yo ɔ munyu nɛ e kɛ ye odase ke: “E de mi nihi kulaa nɛ i pee hyɛ” ɔ nyɛ. 40Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, benɛ Samariabi ɔmɛ ba e ngɔ ɔ, a ba kpa lɛ pɛɛ ke e kɛ mɛ ba hi si; nɛ e hi lejɛ ɔ ligbi enyɔ. 41Nɛ nihi fuu nɛ pe kekletsɛmɛ ɔmɛ hu he ye ngɛ lɛ nitse e munyu ɔ nya; 42nɛ a de yo ɔ ke: “Jeha nɛ ɔ wa ngɛ hee ngɛ yee, pi ngɛ o munyu ɔ nya hu; ejakaa wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa nu, nɛ wa na le kaa, niinɛ, nɔ nɛ ɔ ji je ɔ yi wami helɔ nɛ ji Kristo ɔ nɛ.”
Yesu tsa ma nɔkɔtɔma ko bi nyumu ko
43Nɛ ligbi enyɔ ɔ se ɔ, Yesu pue nɔ kɛ je lejɛ ɔ kɛ ho Galilea ya. 44Ejakaa Yesu nitse ye odase ke gbalɔ ko hɛ mi be nyami ngɛ lɛ nitse e ma mi. 45Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ e ba Galilea a, Galileabi ɔmɛ nɛ na nihi tsuo nɛ e pee ngɛ Yerusalem ngɛ nyami ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ he lɛ hɛmuɔ, ejakaa mɛ hu a ya nyami ligbi ɔ yemi.
46Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu ba Kana ngɛ Galilea, he nɛ e ha nyu plɛ wai ngɛ ɔ, ekohu. Matsɛ wenyumu ko ngɛ Kapernaum nɛ e bi ngɛ gboe. 47Nɛ benɛ e nu kaa Yesu je Yudea kɛ ba Galilea a, e ya e ngɔ nɛ e ya fa kue ha lɛ ke e ba nɛ e ba tsa e bi ɔ, ejakaa e miɔ nɛ e ma gbo. 48Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Ke nyɛ nɛ́ okadihi kɛ nyakpɛ nihi ɔ, nyɛ he we yi.” 49Matsɛ wenyumu ɔ de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, ba loko ye bi ɔ nɛ gbo.” 50Yesu de lɛ ke: “Yaa, o bi ɔ yi na wa.” Nyumu ɔ he munyu nɛ Yesu de lɛ ɔ ye nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho. 51Nɛ benɛ e yaa a, e sɔmɔli ɔmɛ kɛ lɛ bakpe, nɛ a de lɛ ke: “O bi nyumu ɔ na he wami.” 52Nɛ e bi mɛ ngmlɛfia nɔ nɛ e bɔni he wami nami ɔ; nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Hiɛ piani ngmlɛ kake mi nɛ asla a po ngɛ e nɔ.” 53Kɛkɛ nɛ tsɛ ɔ kɛ na kaa lɛ ngmlɛfia a nɔ nɔuu nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “O bi ɔ he mi wa lɛ” ɔ; nɛ e kɛ e we ɔ tsuo he ye.
54Enɛ ɔ ji nyakpɛ nihi enyɔ nɛ Yesu pee, be nɛ e je Yudea kɛ ba Galilea a.

Title: YOHANE 5
Content:
Yesu tsa nyumu ko
1Enɛ ɔ se ɔ Yudafo ɔmɛ ngɛ nyami ligbi yee, nɛ Yesu ya Yerusalem. 2Jeha nɛ ɔ taku ko ngɛ Yerusalem ngɛ tohi agbo ɔ kasa nya, nɛ Hebri gbi mi ɔ a tsɛɛ lɛ Betesda, nɛ kue enuɔ ngɛ he. 3Enɛ ɔmɛ a mi hiɔtsɛmɛ fuu, hɛ yuyuili, pɔtsɛmɛ kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ hule pueɔ si ngɛ, [nɛ a ngɛ nyu ɔ mi klemi mlɛe. 4Ejakaa be komɛ ɔ, hiɔwe bɔfo ko kpleɔ si kɛ baa taku ɔ mi, nɛ e ba klɛɔ nyu ɔ mi; kɛkɛ ɔ, o mi klemi ɔ se ɔ, nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ya nɔɔ nyu ɔ mi kekle ɔ, hiɔ tsuaa hiɔ nɛ ngɛ e he ɔ tãa.] 5Nyumu ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ hiɔ hɛɛ lɛ jeha nyingmi etɛ kɛ kpaanyɔ. 6Nɛ benɛ Yesu na lɛ nɛ e fɔɔ si, nɛ e le kaa e se kɛ hluu ɔ, e bi lɛ ke: “O suɔ kaa o na he wami lo?” 7Hiɔtsɛ ɔ he nɔ ke: “Mawetsɛ, i be nɔ ko nɛ ke a ba klɛ nyu ɔ mi nɛ e ma wo mi ya fɔ taku ɔ mi; se ke i yaa a, nɔ kpa sɛɛ ye hlami ya nɔɔ mi.” 8Yesu de lɛ ke: “Tee si, wo o sa a nɛ o nyɛɛ!” 9Nɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔmlɔ ɔ he mi wa lɛ, nɛ e wo e sa a, nɛ e nyɛɛ.
Se lɛ ligbi ɔ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ʼi. 10Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yudafo ɔmɛ de nɔ nɛ a tsa a ke: “Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ji nɛ ɔ nɛ; o be he blɔ kaa o tloɔ o sa.” 11E he nɔ ke: “Nɔ nɛ tsa mi ɔ, lɛ nɔuu lɛ de mi ke: ‘Wo o sa a nɛ o nyɛɛ.’ ” 12Jeha nɛ ɔ a bi lɛ ke: “Mɛnɔ ji nɔ nɛ de mo ke: ‘Wo o sa a nɛ o nyɛɛ’ ɔ?” 13Se nɔ nɛ a tsa a li nɔ nɛ ji, ejakaa nihi fuu ngɛ lejɛ ɔ he je ɔ Yesu sã e he si.
14Pee se ɔ Yesu ya na lɛ ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Oʼɛ, o na he wami; koo pee yayami hu, kone nɔ́ ko yaya nɛ pe kekle nɔ́ ɔ ko ba o nɔ.” 15Nyumu ɔ pue nɔ kɛ ho nɛ e ya sɛɛ ha Yudafo ɔmɛ ke Yesu ji nɔ nɛ tsa lɛ ɔ nɛ. 16Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, Yudafo ɔmɛ je a hɛ ka Yesu, nɛ a ngɛ lɛ hlae nɛ a gbe, ejakaa Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ e pee nɔ́ nɛ ɔ ngɛ ɔ nɛ. 17Se Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Tsaatsɛ ngɛ ni tsue kɛ mwɔɔ nɛ imi hu i ngɛ ni tsue.” 18Enɛ ɔ he titli Yudafo ɔmɛ ngɛ lɛ hlae nɛ a gbe ɔ nɛ, ejaksaa pi Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ kɛkɛ nɛ e ble, se mohu e tsɛ Mawu ke lɛ nitse e tsɛ, nɛ e kɛ Mawu sɔ.
Bi ɔ he blɔ nɛ e ngɛ
19Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Bi ɔ nitse be e yi mi nyɛe maa to kɛ pee nɔ ko, ja nɔ nɛ se naa kaa Tsɛ ɔ peɔ ɔ; ejakaa nihi tsuo nɛ Tsɛ ɔ peɔ ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔmɛ nɔuu Bi ɔ hu peɔ. 20Ejakaa Tsɛ ɔ suɔ Bi ɔ, nɛ e tsɔɔ lɛ nihi kulaa nɛ lɛ nitse e peɔ ɔ, nɛ e maa tsɔɔ lɛ ni tsumi nguahi nɛ pe enɛ ɔmɛ tete, nɛ nyɛ nya maa kpɛ nyɛ he. 21Ejakaa bɔ nɛ Tsɛ ɔ tleɔ ni gbogboehi a si nɛ e haa mɛ wami ɔ, ja kɛ̃ Bi ɔ hu haa nihi nɛ e suɔ ɔ wami. 22Ejakaa Tsɛ ɔ kojo we nɔ ko, se e tu kojomi ɔ tsuo ngɔ wo Bi ɔ dɛ; 23konɛ nihi tsuo bu Bi ɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ a buu Tsɛ ɔ. Nɔ nɛ bui Bi ɔ, e bui Tsɛ ɔ nɛ tsɔ lɛ ɔ hulɔ.
24“I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Nɔ nɛ nuɔ ye munyu nɛ e heɔ nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ yeɔ ɔ, e ngɛ neneene wami, nɛ e be kojomi mi yae, se mohu e po mi ngɛ gbenɔ mi kɛ ho wami mi ya. 25I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Ngmlɛfia a ma, nɛ e su ta, nɛ ni gbogboe ɔmɛ maa nu Mawu Bi ɔ gbi, nɛ nihi nɛ nuɔ ɔ yi ma na wa. 26Ejakaa bɔ nɛ Tsɛ ɔ ngɛ wami ngɛ lɛ nitse e mi ɔ, ja kɛ̃ e ha Bi ɔ hu ke e hi wami ngɛ lɛ nitse e mi. 27Nɛ e ha lɛ he blɔ kaa e kojo hulɔ, ejakaa Nɔmlɔ Bi ji lɛ. 28Enɛ ɔ ko pee nyɛ nyakpɛ; ejakaa ngmlɛfia a ma, nɔ́ mi nɛ nihi tsuo nɛ ngɛ yɔkɔ ɔmɛ a mi ɔ maa nu e gbi, 29nɛ a maa je kpo, nihi nɛ pee kpakpa a maa te si kɛ maa ya wami mi, nɛ nihi nɛ tsu ni yayahi ɔ maa te si kɛ maa ya kojomi mi.”
Yesu he odasefohi
30“Imi nitse i be ye yi mi nyɛe maa to kɛ pee nɔ ko; bɔ nɛ i nuɔ ɔ, ja i kojoɔ, nɛ ye kojomi ɔ dami kojomi ʼi, ejakaa i hia we nɔ́ nɛ imi nitsɛ i suɔ, se mohu nɔ nɛ Tsɛ ɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ suɔ? 31Ke imi nitsɛ ye he odase i yeɔ ɔ, ye odase ɔ pi anɔkuale. 32Nɔ kpa ko ngɛ nɛ yeɔ ye he odase, nɛ i le kaa e odase nɛ e yeɔ ngɛ ye he ɔ anɔkuale ʼi! 33Nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ tsɔ kɛ ya Yohane ngɔ, nɛ e ye anɔkuale ɔ he odase. 34Se imi lɛɛ i ngɔɛ nɔmlɔ ko odase; se benɛ pee nɛ a he nyɛ yi wami he je i ngɛ enɛ ɔmɛ dee ɔ nɛ. 35Yohane ji kane nɛ ngɛ tsoe nɛ ngɛ kpee ɔ nɛ, se nyɛɛ lɛɛ, nyɛ suɔ kaa nyɛ bua nɛ jɔ be kpiti kɛkɛ ngɛ e la a mi. 36Se imi lɛɛ, i ngɛ odase nɛ pe Yohane nɔ ɔ, ejakaa ni tsumi ɔmɛ nɛ Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ ha mi kaa ma gbe nya a, lɛ ni tsumi ɔmɛ nɛ i tsuɔ ɔ nɔuu yeɔ ye he odase kaa Tsɛ ɔ lɛ tsɔ mi. 37Nɛ Tsɛ ɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ, lɛ nitsɛ e ye ye he odase. Nyɛ nui e gbi hyɛ ɔ, pohu nyɛ nɛ e subai hyɛ; 38nɛ e munyu ɔ nui si ngɛ nyɛ mi, ejakaa nya he we nɔ nɛ e tsɔ ɔ yi. 39Nyɛ hla ngmami ɔmɛ a mi; ejakaa nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ susuu kaa kɔlɔ ɔmɛ a mi nyɛ naa neneene wami ngɛ, nɛ kɔlɔ ɔmɛ nɔuu ji nihi nɛ yeɔ ye he odase ɔ nɛ. 40Se nyɛ sume kaa nyɛ baa ye ngɔ nɛ nyɛ na wami.
41“I hla we nimli a hɛ mi nyami. 42Se mohu i kpa nyɛ si kaa nyɛ be Mawu suɔmi ngɛ nyɛ mi. 43Imi lɛɛ i ba ngɛ Tsaatsɛ biɛ mi, nɛ nyɛ he we mi; ke nɔ kpa ko ba ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e biɛ mi ɔ, lɛɛ nyɛ ma he lɛ. 44Nyɛ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ hɛ mi nyɛmi he hae ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti, se hɛ mi nyami nɛ jee Mawu kake too ɔ ngɔ ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ di se ɔ, kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ nyɛ ma nyɛ he ye mɔ? 45Nyɛ ko susu kaa ma po nyɛ nya ngɔ ha Tsɛ ɔ; nɔ ko ngɛ nɛ ngɛ nyɛ nya poe, lɛ ji Mose, nɔ nɛ nɔ nɔuu nɛ nyɛ ngɔɔ nyɛ hɛ ngɔ fɔɔ ɔ. 46Se kaa nya he Mose ye jinɛ, imi hu nyɛ ma he mi ye; ejakaa ye he sane e ngma a nɛ. 47Se ke nyɛ he we e ngmami ɔmɛ yi ɔ, kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ nyɛ ma he ye munyu ɔmɛ maa ye mɔ?”

Title: YOHANE 6
Content:
Yesu ha ni akpe enuɔ niyeni
(Mateo 14.13-21; Marko 6.30-44; Luka 9.10-17)
1Enɛ ɔ se ɔ, Yesu pue nɔ kɛ ho Galilea Wo nɛ ji Tiberia Wo ɔ se ya. 2Nɛ nihi fuu nyɛɛ e se, ejakaa a na okadihi nɛ e pee ngɛ hiɔtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a he ɔ. 3Yesu ya yoku ɔ nɔ, nɛ e kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ya hi si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ. 4Hetsɔmi ɔ nɛ ji Yudafo ɔmɛ a nyami ligbi ɔ su ta. 5Benɛ Yesu wo e hɛ nɔ nɛ e na kaa nihi babauu ma e ngɔ ɔ, e bi Filipo ke: “Jije wa ma ya he abolo ngɛ ha ni nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ a ye?” 6Se enɛ ɔ ɔ, e de kɛ ka lɛ, ejakaa lɛ nitsɛ e le nɔ́ nɛ e maa pee. 7Filipo he nɔ ke: “Cedi lafa enyɔ nya abolo be mɛ sue, bɔ nɛ a ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ ma na nyamiwo bɔ kakaaka po.” 8E kaseli ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake, Andrea, nɛ ji Simon Petro nyɛmi ɔ, de lɛ ke: 9“Jokuɛ nyumuyo ko ngɛ hiɛ ɔ nɛ ngɛ ngma abolo enuɔ kɛ lo tsɔwi enyɔ; se nihi fuu nɛ ɔ, jije enɛ ɔ maa su ha mɛ?” 10Se Yesu ke: “Nyɛ ha nɛ ni ɔmɛ a hi si.” (Nga fuu ngɛ lejɛ ɔ.) Kɛkɛ nɛ nyumuhi nɛ a yibɔ maa su akpe enuɔ ɔ be ya hi si. 11Nɛ Yesu kukuɔ abolo ɔmɛ, nɛ benɛ e na si ɔ, e dla ngɔ ha nihi nɛ hii si ɔmɛ kɛ lo ɔ hu eko, bɔ tsuaa bɔ nɛ a ngɛ hlae. 12Benɛ a tɔ ɔ, ɔ de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Nyɛ bua bibli nɛ piɛ ɔ nya konɛ nɔ́ ko ko laa.” 13Kɛkɛ nɛ a bua ngma abolo enuɔ bibli nɛ a ye piɛ ɔ nya wo kusii nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ mi tɔtɔɔtɔ.
14Lɔ ɔ he ɔ benɛ ni ɔmɛ na okadi nɛ Yesu pee ɔ, a ke: “Niinɛ, nɔ nɛ ɔ ji gbalɔ ɔ nɛ ma je ɔ mi ɔ nɛ.” 15Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ Yesu yo kaa a maa ba nɛ a ba nu lɛ ka nya nɛ a ya wo lɛ matsɛ ɔ, e nɔ kake e sã e he si kɛ ho yoku ɔ nɔ ya ekohu?
Yesu nyɛɛ nyu hɛ mi
(Mateo 14.22-23; Marko 6.45-52)
16Benɛ su gbɔkuɛ nya si ɔ, e kaseli ɔmɛ pue nɔ kɛ ho wo ɔ nya ya; 17nɛ a ya sɛ lɛ mi, nɛ a ngɛ wo ɔ poe kɛ yaa Kapernaum. Se nɛ diblii wo nɛ ɔ tsuo ɔ, Yesu bɛ́ a ngɔ. 18Nɛ kɔɔhiɔ ngua ko ba fia he je ɔ wo ɔ puɛ. 19Nɛ benɛ kaseli ɔmɛ hlui lɛ ɔ maa pee si tomi nya etɛ loo eywiɛ ɔ, a na Yesu nɛ nyɛɛ wo ɔ hɛ mi kɛ ma nɛ e miɔ nɛ e maa su lɛ ɔ he, nɛ a ye gbeye. 20Se e de mɛ ke: “Ami ʼi, nyɛ ko ye gbeye.” 21Lɔ ɔ he ɔ a suɔ kaa a ngɔ lɛ kɛ ba lɛ ɔ mi; nɛ amlɔ ɔ, lɛ ɔ ya kple ngɛ he nɛ a yaa a.
Ni ɔmɛ hla Yesu
22Je na nɔ ɔ, asafo nɛ daa si ngɛ wo ɔ se ɔ na kaa lɛ kpa ko be lejɛ ɔ hu, nɛ Yesu kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ sɛ we lɛ ɔ mi, se mohu e kaseli ɔmɛ pɛ lɛ a pue nɔ kɛ ho. 23Lɛ kpa kome je Tiberia ba he nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ na si nɛ a ye abolo ɔ ngɛ ɔ kasa nya. 24Lɔ ɔ he ɔ benɛ asafo ɔ nɛ kaa Yesu loo e kaseli ɔmɛ be lejɛ ɔ, mɛ hu a sɛ lɛhi a mi, nɛ a ba Kapernaum ba ngɛ Yesu hlae.
Yesu ji wami ngma
25Nɛ benɛ a ba na lɛ ngɛ wo ɔ se ɔ, a bi lɛ ke: “Rabi, mɛni be o ba hiɛ ɔ?” 26Yesu he nɔ ke: “I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Tsa pi okadihi nɛ nyɛ na a he nɛ nyɛ ngɛ mi hlae nɛ ɔ, se mohu akɛnɛ nyɛ ye abolo ɔ eko nɛ nyɛ tɔ ɔ he je. 27Nyɛ ko tsu ngma nɛ puɛɛ ɔ he ni, se mohu nyɛ tsu ngma nɛ hii si kɛ yaa neneene wami mi nɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ ma ha nyɛ ɔ he ni, ejakaa lɛ e nya Tsɛ Mawu ɔ sɔu.” 28Kɛkɛ nɛ a bi lɛ ke: “Kɛ wa maa pee kɛɛ nɛ wa ma tsu Mawu ni tsumi ɔmɛ?” 29Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Mawu ni tsumi ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ, kaa nyɛ he nɔ nɛ e tsɔ ɔ nɔ ngɔ ye.” 30Lɔ ɔ he ɔ a bi lɛ ke: “Lɛɛ mɛni okadi o peɔ nɛ waa na konɛ wa he mo ngɔ ye? Mɛni o tsuɔ? 31Wa tsɛmɛ ye mana ngɛ nga a nɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a ke: ‘E ha mɛ abolo kɛ je hiɔwe nɛ a ye’ ɔ.” 32Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Pi Mose ji nɔ nɛ ha nyɛ abolo ɔ kɛ je hiɔwe ɔ se Tsaatsɛ mohu lɛ haa nyɛ abolo nɛ jee hiɔwe ɔ nɛ. 33Ejakaa Mawu abolo ɔ ji nɔ nɛ jee hiɔwe kpleɔ si nɛ ngɔɔ wami ngɔ haa je ɔ nɛ.” 34Jeha nɛ ɔ a de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, ha wɔ abolo nɛ ɔ daa.” 35Se Yesu de mɛ ke: “Imi ji wami ngma a nɛ; nɔ nɛ baa ye ngɔ ɔ, hwɔ be lɛ yee gblegbleegblee, nɛ nɔ nɛ heɔ ye nɔ yeɔ ɔ, kuma be lɛ tɔe gblegbleegblee.
36“Se i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke nyɛ na mi se kɛ ɔ nyɛ he we yi. 37Nihi tsuo nɛ Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ ha mi ɔ maa ba ye ngɔ, nɛ nɔ nɛ baa ye ngɔ ɔ, i be lɛ fiee kɔkɔɔkɔ. 38Ejakaa pi imi nitsɛ ye suɔmi nya ni peemi he nɛ i je hiɔwe kɛ ba ngɛ se mohu nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ suɔmi nya ni peemi he. 39Nɛ enɛ ɔ ji nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ suɔmi nya ni ɔ nɛ, kaa nihi tsuo nɛ e ngɔ ha mi ɔ, ma ko ha nɛ a ti nɔ ko nɛ laa, se mohu ma tle lɛ si ngɛ nyagbe ligbi ɔ nɔ. 40Ejakaa enɛ ɔ ji Tsaatsɛ suɔmi nya ni ɔ nɛ, kaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ hyɛɛ Bi ɔ nɛ e heɔ e nɔ yeɔ ɔ, e na neneene wami, nɛ imi ɔ, ma tle lɛ si ngɛ nyagbe ligbi ɔ nɔ.”
41Kɛkɛ nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ tu e he munyu huhuuhu ke e de ke: “Imi ji abolo nɛ je hiɔwe ɔ nɛ;” 42nɛ a ke: “Anɛ pi Yosef bi Yesu ɔ nɛ wa le e tsɛ kɛ e nyɛ ɔ ji nɛ ɔ lo? Kɛ pee kɛɛ mɔ nɛ e deɔ ke: ‘I je hiɔwe’ ɔ?” 43Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ko tu munyu huhuuhu ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti. 44Nɔ ko be nyɛe nɛ e maa ba ye ngɔ, kaa ja Tsɛ ɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ gbla lɛ lolo, nɛ imi lɛɛ ma tle lɛ si ngɛ nyagbe ligbi ɔ nɔ. 45A ngma ngɛ gbali ɔmɛ a womi ɔ mi ke: ‘Mɛ tsuo kulaa a maa pee nihi nɛ Mawu tsɔɔ mɛ ni.’ Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ nuɔ Tsɛ ɔ munyu nɛ e kaseɔ hulɔ ɔ, baa ye ngɔ. 46Tsa pi kaa nɔ ko na Tsɛ ɔ hyɛ, ja nɔ nɛ je Mawu ngɔ ɔ, lɛ lɛ e na Tsɛ ɔ.
47“I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Nɔ nɛ heɔ yeɔ ɔ, e ngɛ neneene wami. 48Imi ji wami abolo ɔ nɛ. 49Nyɛ tsɛmɛ ye mana ngɛ nga a nɔ nɛ a gbo? 50Enɛ ɔ ji abolo nɛ jee hiɔwe baa a nɛ, konɛ nɔmlɔ nɛ ye nɛ e ko gbo. 51Imi ji abolo nɛ hɛ̃ ngɛ nɛ je hiɔwe ba a nɛ; ke nɔ ko ye abolo nɛ ɔ eko ɔ, e maa hi si kɛ maa ya neneene. Se abolo nɛ i kɛ ma ha a ji ye he lo nɛ i kɛ ma ha ngɛ je ɔ wami he ɔ nɛ.”
52Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yudafo ɔmɛ sa nya ngɛ a kpɛti ke: “Kɛ nɔ nɛ ɔ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ e ma nyɛ ngɔ e he lo ngɔ ha wɔ nɛ waa ye ɔ?” 53Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Ke nyɛ yi Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ he lo nɛ nyɛɛ nu e muɔ ɔ, nyɛ be wami ngɛ nyɛ mi. 54Nɔ nɛ yeɔ ye he lo nɛ e nuu ye muɔ ɔ, e ngɛ neneene wami, nɛ imi lɛɛ ma tle lɛ si ngɛ nyagbe ligbi ɔ nɔ. 55Ejakaa ye he lo ɔ ngma nitsɛ ʼi, nɛ ye muɔ ɔ nunui nɔ́ nitsɛ ʼi. 56Nɔ nɛ yeɔ ye he lo nɛ e nuu ye muɔ ɔ, e hii ye mi nɛ imi hu i hii e mi. 57Bɔ nɛ Tsɛ, hɛ kalɔ, ɔ tsɔ mi, nɛ Tsɛ ɔ he nɛ ye hɛ ngɛ ɔ, ja nɔuu nɔ nɛ yeɔ mi ɔ hu maa hi si ngɛ ye he. 58Abolo nɛ je hiɔwe ba nɛ ɔ, e be kaa nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ye nɛ a gbo ɔ; nɔ nɛ yeɔ abolo nɛ ɔ ɔ, e maa hi si kɛ maa ya neneene.” 59Yesu de ni nɛ ɔmɛ benɛ e ngɛ ni tsɔɔe ngɛ kpe he ko ngɛ Kapernaum ɔ.
Neneene wami munyuhi
60Enɛ ɔ he je ɔ, benɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ a ti nihi fuu nu enɛ ɔ ɔ, a ke: “Munyu nɛ he wa ji nɛ ɔ nɛ; mɛnɔ ma nyɛ tue bu?” 61Se benɛ Yesu yo kaa e kaseli ɔmɛ ngɛ huhuue ngɛ enɛ ɔ he ɔ, e bi mɛ ke: “Anɛ enɛ ɔ lɛ ngɛ nyɛ nane kpatae nɛ ɔ? 62Se ke nyɛ na Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ nɛ yaa hiɔwe he nɛ e ngɛ sa a, kɔlɔ ɔ nɛɛ? 63Mumi ɔ ji nɔ́ nɛ haa wami ɔ nɛ; he lo ɔ he be se nami ko. Munyuhi nɛ i kɛ nyɛ tu ɔ, mumi ʼi, nɛ wami ʼi. 64Se nyɛ ti ni komɛ ngɛ nɛ a he we yi.” Ejakaa Yesu le kɛ je sisije ɔ nihi nɛ he we yi ɔ kɛ nɔ hu nɛ maa tsɔɔ e se blɔ ɔ. 65Nɛ e ke: “Enɛ ɔ he je nɛ i de nyɛ ke: Nɔ ko be ye ngɔ nyɛe maa ba, ja Tsɛ ɔ ha lɛ he blo ɔ nɛ.”
66Kɛ je enɛ ɔ se ɔ, e kaseli ɔmɛ a ti nihi fuu kpale a se nɛ a kɛ lɛ nyɛɛ we hu. 67Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu bi ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ ke: “Nyɛ hu nyɛ suɔ kaa nyɛ maa je lo?” 68Simon Petro he nɔ ke: “Mawetsɛ, mɛnɔ ngɔ wa maa ya? Mo lɛ o ngɛ neneene wami munyu ɔmɛ ɔ nɛ; 69nɛ wɔɔ lɛɛ wa he ye, nɛ wa na le hulɔ kaa mo ji Mawu nɔ klɔuklɔu ɔ nɛ!”
70Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Anɛ pi nyɛ ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ nɛ i hla lo? Se nyɛ kpɛti nɔ kake ɔ abosiami ʼi.” 71Yuda Iskariot, Simon bi ɔ, he munyu e ngɛ tue ɔ nɛ; ejakaa lɛ ji ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake nɛ maa tsɔɔ e se blɔ ɔ nɛ.

Title: YOHANE 7
Content:
Yesu kɛ e nyɛmimɛ nyumu ɔmɛ
1Enɛ ɔ se ɔ, Yesu kpa si ngɛ Galilea, se e sume kaa e ya kpaa si ngɛ Yudea ejakaa Yudafo ɔmɛ ngɛ lɛ hlae nɛ a gbe. 2Jeha nɛ ɔ Yudafo ɔmɛ a ba tsuhi nyami ligbi ɔ su ta. 3Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yesu nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ de lɛ ke: “Jee hiɛ ɔ nɛ o ya Yudea, konɛ o kaseli ɔmɛ hu a na nihi nɛ o tsuo ɔmɛ. 4Ejakaa nɔ nɛ hlaa kaa a le lɛ ɔ pee we nɔ́ ko ngɛ laami mi. Ke ni nɛ ɔmɛ o peɔ ɔ, je o he si ngɔ tsɔɔ je ɔ.” 5Se e nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ tete he we e nɔ yi. 6Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Ye be sui lolo, se nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ be ɔ daa nɛ ɔ e su. 7Je ɔ be nyɛe nyɛ maa nyɛ, se imi lɛɛ e nyɛɛ mi, ejakaa i yeɔ e he odase kaa e ni tsumi ɔmɛ ɔ ni tsumi yayamihi ʼi. 8Nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛɛ ya nyami ligbi nɛ ɔ yemi se imi lɛɛ i na we ma ya, ejakaa ye be ɔ sui lolo.” 9Benɛ e de mɛ ja a, e hi si bɔɔ ko ngɛ Galilea.
Yesu ya ba tsuhi nyami ligbi ɔ yemi
10Se benɛ e nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ ho ɔ, lɔ ɔ se loko lɛ hu e ya nyami ligbi ɔ, se e je we e he si, se mohu kaa laami mi. 11Jeha nɛ ɔ Yudafo ɔmɛ bɔni lɛ hlami ngɛ nyami ligbi ɔ nɔ, nɛ a ke: “Jije e ngɛ?” 12Nɛ munyu kusikusi fuu ba asafo ɔmɛ a mi ngɛ Yesu he. Ni komɛ de ke: “Nɔmlɔ kpakpa ji lɛ;” nɛ ni komɛ hu ke: “Dɛbi, blɔ mohu e haa asafo ɔ tlaa.” 13Pohu nɔ ko ji paa tui e he munyu ngɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a gbeye yemi he.
14Benɛ e su nyami ligbi ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ, Yesu ya sɔlemi we ɔ, nɛ e ya tsɔɔ ni. 15Nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a nyɛ kpɛ a he nɛ a de ke: “Kɛ nɔ nɛ ɔ nɛ kase we ni ɔ pee kɛɛ nɛ e le womihi a mi nihi nɛ ɔ?” 16Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Ye ni tsumi ɔ, tsa pi ye nɔ, se mohu nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ nɔ. 17Ke nɔ ko suɔ kaa e pee e suɔmi nya ni ɔ, lɛ ji nɔ nɛ ma yo ngɛ tsɔɔmi ɔ he kaa Mawu dɛ mi e je aloo imi nitsɛ ye yi mi i toɔ nɛ i tuɔ munyu. 18Nɔ nɛ toɔ lɛ nitsɛ e yi mi nɛ e tuɔ munyu ɔ, lɛ nitsɛ e hɛ mi nyami e ngɛ hlae, se nɔ nɛ hlaa nɔ nɛ tsɔ lɛ ɔ hɛ mi nyami ɔ, lɛɛ anɔkualetsɛ ji lɛ, nɛ nɔ́ nɛ dɛ blɔ ko be e mi. 19Anɛ pi Mose nɛ ha nyɛ Mlaa a lo? Nɛ nyɛ ti nɔ ko yi Mlaa a nɔ. Mɛni he je nyɛ ngɛ mi hlae nɛ nyɛ maa gbe ɔ?” 20Asafo ɔ he nɔ nɛ a ke: “Mumi yayami ngɛ o mi; mɛnɔ ngɛ mo hlae nɛ e gbe?” 21Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Ni tsumi kake i tsu nɛ nyɛ tsuo nyɛ nya kpɛ nyɛ he ngɛ he. 22Mose lɛ ngɔ nɔ pomi ha nyɛ (pi kaa lɛ Mose ɔ ngɔ e je, se mohu e je tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a ngɔ), nɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, nyɛ poo nɔ. 23Ke Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ a poo nɔ benɛ pee nɛ a ko tɔ Mose Mlaa a, mɛni he ne nyɛ mi mi fuɔ mi kaa i tsa nɔmlɔ mluku ɔ ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ? 24Nyɛ ko hyɛ hɛ mi kɛ kojo, se mohu nyɛɛ kojo dami kojomi.”
Anɛ lɛ ji Mesia a lo?
25Kɛkɛ nɛ Yerusalembi ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ ke: “Anɛ pi nɔ nɛ a ngɛ hlae nɛ a gbe ɔ ji nɛ ɔ lo? 26Nɛ oʼɛ, munyu e ngɛ tue pãa nɛ ɔ nɛ, nɛ a de we lɛ nɔ ko. Eko ɔ be nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, nikɔtɔma amɛ ba na le kaa Kristo ɔ ji nɔ nɛ ɔ niinɛ. 27Se nɔ nɛ ɔ lɛɛ wa le he nɛ e je; se Kristo ɔ lɛɛ, benɛ e maa ba a, nɔ ko be lee he nɛ e je.”
28Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ Yesu ngɛ ni tsɔɔe ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, e wo e nya nɔ nɛ e de ke: “Nyɛ le mi, nɛ nyɛ le he nɛ i je hulɔ; i tui imi nitsɛ ye yi mi kɛ bɛ́, se mohu anɔkualetsɛ ji nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi nɛ nyɛ li ɔ nɛ. 29Se imi lɛɛ i le lɛ, ejakaa e ngɔ i je nɛ lɛ lɛ tsɔ mi.” 30Enɛ ɔ he ɔ, a ngɛ lɛ hlae nɛ a nu, se nɔ ko tɛ́ e he, ejakaa e ngmlɛfia a sui lolo. 31Se asafo ɔmɛ a ti nihi fuu he e nɔ ye, nɛ a ke: “Benɛ Kristo maa ba a, anɛ e maa pee okadihi fuu pe nihi nɛ nɔ nɛ ɔ ngɛ pee nɛ ɔmɛ lo?”
A tsɔ nɛ a ya nu Yesu
32Farisifo ɔmɛ nu kaa asafo ɔ ngɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ dee kusikusi ngɛ e he; nɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ kɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ tsɔ tsɔli konɛ a ya nu lɛ. 33Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Be bɔɔ ko pɛ e piɛ nɛ i kɛ nyɛ maa hi si, nɛ ma ya nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ ngɔ. 34Nyɛ ma hia mi, se nyɛ be mi nae, nɛ he nɛ i ngɛ ɔ, nyɛ be lejɛ ɔ nyɛe maa ba.” 35Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yudafo ɔmɛ bi a he ke: “Jije nɔ nɛ ɔ maa ya nɛ wa be lɛ nae? Anɛ nihi nɛ gbɛ fia Helabi ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ ngɔ e maa ya nɛ e ya tsɔɔ Helabi ɔmɛ a ni lo? 36Mɛni munyu e tu nɛ ɔ: ‘Nyɛ ma hla mi nɛ nyɛ be mi nae, nɛ he nɛ i ngɛ ɔ, nyɛ be lejɛ ɔ nyɛe maa ba’ a?”
Wami pa
37Nyagbe ligbi nɛ ji nyami ligbi ɔmɛ a kpɛti ligbi ngua a nɔ ɔ, Yesu ya da si nɛ e wo e nya nɔ nɛ e de ke: “Ke kuma ngɛ nɔ ko tɔe ɔ, e ba ye ngɔ nɛ e ba nu nyu; 38nɔ nɛ heɔ ye nɔ yeɔ ɔ, — bɔ nɛ ngmami ɔ de ɔ, wami pahi maa je e muklii mi kɛ be. 39Mumi ɔ nɛ nihi nɛ heɔ e nɔ yeɔ ɔ ma na a he nɛ e de enɛ ɔ ɔ nɛ; se Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ na we nɛ e ba, ejakaa a na we nɛ a wo Yesu hɛ mi nyami.
Ni ɔmɛ a kpɛti gba
40Benɛ asafo ɔmɛ a kpɛti ni komɛ nu munyu nɛ ɔ ɔ, a ke: “Gbalɔ ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ niinɛ.” 41Ni komɛ ke: “Kristo ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ.” Se ni kpa komɛ hu ke: “Anɛ Kristo ɔ, Galilea e maa je lo? 42Anɛ ngmami ɔ de we ke: ‘David powu ɔ mi kɛ Betlehem ma, he nɛ David hi ɔ, lejɛ ɔ Kristo ɔ maa je’ lo?” 43Kɛkɛ nɛ migbami ba asafo ɔ mi ngɛ e he. 44Se jinɛ a ti ni komɛ ngɛ hlae nɛ a nu lɛ, se kɛ ɔ, nɔ ko nyɛ we e he nɛ e ta.
Yudafo ɔmɛ a nikɔtɔmahi nɛ he we yi ɔ
45Kɛkɛ nɛ tsɔli ɔmɛ kpale a se kɛ ho osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a ngɔ ya, nɛ a bi mɛ ke: “Mɛni he je nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ lɛ bɛ ɔ?” 46Tsɔli ɔmɛ he nɔ ke: “Bɔ nɛ nɔmlɔ nɔ ngɛ munyu tue ɔ, nɔ ko tui munyu ja gblee.” 47Kɛkɛ nɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ he nɔ ke: “Anɛ nyɛ hu a mlɔɔ nyɛ? 48Anɛ nyɛ na nɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ loo Farisifo ɔmɛ a ti nɔ ko he e nɔ ye?” 49Se asafo nɛ li mlaa nɛ ɔ, a gbiɛ mɛ. 50Nikodemo, a kpɛti nɔ kake nɛ ba Yesu ngɔ be ko ɔ, he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: 51“Ke a nui nɔ ko nya mi gbi nɛ a le nɔ́ nɛ e pee ɔ, wa Mlaa a buu lɛ fɔ lo?” 52A he nɔ, nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Anɛ mo hu Galilea o je lo? Hla mi nɛ o hyɛ, se gbalɔ ko ti si kɛ ji Galilea hyɛ.” [ 53Nɛ a ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ ho e we mi ya.

Title: YOHANE 8
Content:
Yo nɛ a nu lɛ ngɛ ajuamabɔmi mi ɔ
1Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu pue nɔ kɛ ho Nuyoku ɔ nɔ ya. 2Nɛ mɔtu mla a, e ba sɔlemi we ɔ ekohu, nɛ ma a tsuo ba e ngɔ, nɛ e ya hi si, nɛ e tsɔɔ mɛ ni. 3Nɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ kɛ yo ko nɛ a nu lɛ ngɛ ajuama bɔmi mi ba e ngɔ, nɛ a ha e ba da a kpɛti, 4nɛ a de Yesu ke: “Tsɔɔlɔ, kikɛmɛ a yo nɛ ɔ ɔ, ajuama bɔmi mi tutuutu a nu lɛ ngɛ. 5Jeha nɛ ɔ Mlaa a mi ɔ, Mose wo wɔ kita ke a fia kikɛmɛ a yihi tɛ; se kɛ mo hu o deɔ kɛɛ?” 6Se enɛ ɔ ɔ, a de kɛ da lɛ konɛ a na nɔ́ ko nɛ a kɛ ya po e nya. Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu sɔ́ si, nɛ e kɛ e nguɛ ngma ni ngɛ zugba mi. 7Se benɛ a ngɛ nɔ ngɛ lɛ bie ɔ, e wo e he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ti nɔ nɛ yayami ko be e he ɔ, lɛ kekle e fia lɛ tɛ ɔ.” 8Nɛ e kpale sɔ̃ si ekohu, nɛ e ngma ni ngɛ zugba mi. 9Se mɛɛ lɛɛ benɛ a nu ɔ, a bɔni kpo jemi kakaaka, kɛ je kekle nɔ ɔ nɔ kɛ ya si sekpɛ nɔ ɔ nɔ, nɛ e ba piɛ Yesu nɔ kake kɛ yo ɔ nɛ daa si ngɛ kpɛti. 10Benɛ Yesu wo e hɛ̃ nɔ nɛ e nɛ́ nɔ ko kaa ja yo ɔ, e bi lɛ ke: “Maa, jije o nya poli ɔmɛ ngɛ? Anɛ nɔ ko bui mo fɔ lo?” 11Nɛ e ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, nɔ ko bui mi fɔ.” Nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Lɛɛ imi hu i bui mo fɔ mɔ. Yaa nɛ o ko ya pee yayami hu.”]
Yesu ji je ɔ la
12Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu kɛ mɛ tu munyu ekohu nɛ e ke: “Imi ji je ɔ la a nɛ. Nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ ye se ɔ, e be diblii mi nyɛe gblegbleegblee, se mohu e ma na wami la a.” 13Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Farisifo ɔmɛ de lɛ ke: “Moo lɛɛ, mo nitsɛ o he odase o ngɛ yee; o dase ɔ be mi.” 14Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Ke i ngɛ imi nitsɛ ye he odase yee hu po ɔ, ye dase ɔ ngɛ mi, ejakaa i le he nɛ i je kɛ he nɛ i yaa, se nyɛɛ lɛɛ, nyɛ li he nɛ i je loo he nɛ i yaa. 15Nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ kojoɔ he lo nya; imi lɛɛ i kojo we nɔ ko. 16Nɛ ke i kojoɔ tete po hu ɔ, ye kojomi ɔ anɔkuale ʼi, ejakaa pi ye nɔ kake ʼi, se mohu i kɛ Tsɛ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ. 17Nɛ pohu nyɛ Mlaa a mi ɔ, a ngma ke: ‘Ni enyɔ a odase ɔ anɔkuale ʼi. 18Imi, lɛɛ i yeɔ imi nitsɛ ye he odase, nɛ Tsɛ ɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ hu yeɔ ye he odase.” 19Jeha nɛ ɔ a bi lɛ ke: “Jije o tsɛ ɔ ngɛ?” Yesu he nɔ ke: “Nyɛ li mi nɛ nyɛ pa li Tsaatsɛ. Kaa nyɛ le mi ɔ, nyɛ ko le Tsaatsɛ hulɔ.”
20Yesu tu munyu nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ nito he ɔ benɛ e ngɛ ni tsɔɔe ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ; nɛ nɔ ko nui lɛ, ejakaa e ngmlɛfia a sui.
Nyɛ be nyɛe he nɛ i yaa a maa ya
21Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu kpale de mɛ ekohu ke: “Imi lɛɛ i yaa, se nyɛ ma hla mi, nɛ nyɛ he yayami mi nyɛ ma gbo ngɛ. He nɛ i yaa a, nyɛ be lejɛ ɔ nyɛe maa ba.” 22Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yudafo ɔmɛ ke: “Anɛ e yaa gbe e he he je nɛ e deɔ ke: ‘He nɛ i yaa a, nyɛ be lejɛ ɔ nyɛe maa ba’ a?” 23Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ je sisi nɛ ɔ, se imi lɛɛ hiɔwe i je. Nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ je je nɛ ɔ mi, se imi lɛɛ i ji je nɛ ɔ mi. 24Lɔ ɔ he nɛ i de nyɛ ke nyɛ ma gbo ngɛ nyɛ he yayami ɔmɛ a mi ɔ nɛ; ejakaa ke nyɛ he we yi kaa imi nɛ ɔ ji lɛ ɔ, nyɛ ma gbo ngɛ nyɛ he yayami ɔmɛ a mi.” 25Jeha nɛ ɔ a bi lɛ ke: “Mɛnɔ ji mo?” Nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Lɔ ɔ nɔuu i de nyɛ kɛ je sisi ɔ nɛ. 26I ngɛ nyɛ he sanehi fuu nɛ ma de nɛ ma kɛ kojo nyɛ; se kɛ̃ ɔ, nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ anɔkualetsɛ ʼi, nɛ imi lɛɛ nihi nɛ i nu kɛ je e nya a, lɔ ɔmɛ nɔuu i deɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ je ɔ nɛ.”
27A li kãa Tsɛ ɔ he munyu e kɛ mɛ ngɛ tue ɔ. 28Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Ke nyɛ na nyɛ wo Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ nɔ ɔ, lɔ ɔ loko nyɛ maa le kaa ami ʼi, nɛ kãa i to we ye yi mi i pee we nɔ́ ko, se mohu nɔ nɛ Tsaatsɛ tsɔɔ mi ɔ ja i deɔ. 29Nɛ nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ kɛ mi ngɛ, Tsɛ ɔ si we ye nɔ kake, ejakaa imi lɛɛ, nɔ́ nɛ sa e hɛ mi i peɔ daa.” 30Benɛ e ngɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ dee ɔ, nihi fuu he e nɔ ye.
Odehehi kɛ nyɔguɛhi
31Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de Yudafo ɔmɛ nɛ he lɛ ye ɔ ke: “Ke nyɛ hi si ngɛ ye munyu ɔ mi ɔ, ye kaseli nitsɛmɛ ji nyɛ, 32nɛ nyɛ maa le anɔkuale ɔ, nɛ anɔkuale ɔ ma ha nyɛ maa ye nyɛ he.” 33A he nɔ ke: “Abraham nina ji wɔ, nɛ wa pee we nɔ ko nyɔguɛhi hyɛ; kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ mo o deɔ ke: ‘Nyɛ maa ye nya he’ ɔ?” 34Yesu he nɔ ke: “I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ peɔ yayami ɔ, yayami ɔ nyɔguɛ ji lɛ. 35Nyɔguɛ hi we mi kɛ yɛ neneene, se bi hii si kɛ yaa neneene. 36Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ke bi ɔ ha nyɛ ye nyɛ he ɔ, lɔ ɔ loko nyɛ maa ye nyɛ he niinɛ. 37I le kaa Abraham nina ji nyɛ; nɛ kɛ̃ ɔ nyɛ ngɛ mi hlae nɛ nyɛɛ gbe, ejakaa ye munyu sɛ we nyɛ mi. 38Ini lɛɛ nihi nɛ i na ngɛ Tsaatsɛ he ɔ, lɔ ɔ i deɔ; nɛ nyɛ hu nihi nɛ nyɛ nu kɛ je nyɛ tsɛ nya a, kɔlɔ ɔ nyɛ peɔ.”
39A he nɔ nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Wa tsɛ ji Abraham.” Yesu de mɛ ke: “Abraham bimɛ ji nyɛ jinɛ nyɛ ma tsu Abraham ni tsumihi. 40Se jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛ ngɛ mi hlae nɛ nyɛɛ gbe, imi nɔmlɔ ko nɛ i de nyɛ anɔkuale nɛ i nu ngɛ Mawu nya a; Abraham pee we enɛ ɔ. 41Nyɛɛ lɛɛ, nyɛ tsɛ ni tsumihi nyɛ tsuɔ.” Kɛkɛ nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Wɔɔ lɛɛ, a fɔ we wɔ ngɛ ajuama bɔmi mi; tsɛ kake wa ngɛ, lɛ ji Mawu.” 42Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Mawu ji nyɛ tsɛ jinɛ nyɛ maa suɔ mi, ejakaa imi lɛɛ, Mawu ngɔ i je kɛ ba; nɛ pohu i to we imi nitsɛ ye yi mi kɛ bɛ, se mohu lɛ nɛ tsɔ mi. 43Mɛni he je nyɛ nɛ́ ye munyu nya a? E je ye munyu tue nɛ nyɛ bui ɔ. 44Nyɛɛ lɛɛ, nyɛ tsɛ nɛ nyɛ je e mi ji abosiami, nɛ nyɛ tsɛ ɔ tsui nya ni nyɛ suɔ kaa nyɛɛ pee. Lɛɛ nɔ gbelɔ ji lɛ kɛ je blema, nɛ e hi si ngɛ anɔkuale ɔ mi, ejakaa anɔkuale be e mi. Ke e ngɛ lakpa yee ɔ, lɛ nitsɛ e nihi a he munyu e tuɔ, ejakaa lakpatsɛ kɛ nya ngɔli a tsɛ ji lɛ. 45Se imi lɛɛ, akɛnɛ i tuɔ anɔkuale he je ɔ, nyɛ he we mi yi. 46Nyɛ ti mɛnɔ buu mi fɔ ngɛ yayami ko he? Se ke anɔkuale i tuɔ ɔ, mɛni he je nyɛ he we mi yi ɔ? 47Nɔ nɛ je Mawu mi ɔ, e nuɔ Mawu munyu; lɔ ɔ he nɛ nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ nui ɔ nɛ, ejakaa nyɛ ji Mawu mi.”
Yesu kɛ Abraham
48Kɛkɛ nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ he nɔ nɛ a de Yesu ke: “Anɛ e be mi kaa wa ke Samariano ji mo, nɛ mumi yayami hu ngɛ o mi ɔ lo?” 49Yesu he nɔ ke: “Mumi yayami be ye mi, se pe i ngɛ Tsaatsɛ puae, nɛ nyɛɛ lɛɛ, nyɛ ngɛ ye he guɛ gbee mohu. 50I hla we imi nitsɛ ye hɛ mi nyami, se nɔ ko ngɛ nɛ hlaa nɛ e kojoɔ. 51I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Ke nɔ ko ye ye munyu ɔ nɔ ɔ, e be gboe gblegbleegblee.” 52Kɛkɛ nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ de lɛ ke: “Kpaako wa na le kãa mumi yayami ngɛ o mi. Abraham gbo, nɛ gbali ɔmɛ hu gbo, nɛ moo lɛɛ o deɔ ke: ‘Ke nɔ ko ye ye munyu ɔ nɔ ɔ, e be gboe ligbi ko ligbi ko kɛ maa ya neneene.’ 53Anɛ o pe wa tsɛ Abraham nɛ gbo ɔ? Nɛ gbali ɔmɛ hu gbo. Kɛ o ngɛ o he tsɛe kɛɛ nɛ ɔ?” 54Yesu he nɔ ke: “Ke i wo imi nitsɛ ye hɛ mi nyami ɔ, ye hɛ mi nyɛmi ɔ pi nɔ́ ko. Tsaatsɛ ji nɔ nɛ woɔ ye hɛ mi nyami, nɔ nɛ nyɛ deɔ ke nyɛ Mawu ji lɛ ɔ, 55nɛ nyɛ yo we lɛ, se imi lɛɛ i le lɛ. Ke i de ke i li lɛ ɔ, ma pee nyangɔlɔ kaa nyɛ; se i le lɛ nɛ i yeɔ e munyu nɔ. 56Nyɛ tsɛ Abraham hia kɛ bua jɔmi kãa e ko na ye ligbi ɔ, nɛ e na nɛ e bua jɔ.” 57Kɛkɛ nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ de lɛ ke: “O na we nɛ o ye jeha nyingmi enuɔ nɛ o na Abraham lo?” 58Yesu de mɛ ke: “I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: I ngɛ loko Abraham ngɛ.” 59Kɛkɛ nɛ da kukuɔ tɛ nɛ a maa fia lɛ; se Yesu laa e he, nɛ e je sɔlemi we ɔ kɛ ho.

Title: YOHANE 9
Content:
Yesu tsa nyumu ko nɛ a fɔ lɛ hɛyuyuilɔ
1Benɛ Yesu bee ɔ, e na nyumu ko nɛ e hɛ yu kɛ je e fomi mi. 2Nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ bi lɛ ke: “Rabi, mɛnɔ lɛ pee yayami, nɔ nɛ ɔ loo e fɔli, he je nɛ a fɔ lɛ hɛ yuyuilɔ nɛ ɔ?” 3Yesu he nɔ ke: “Tsa pi nɔ nɛ ɔ loo e fɔli nɛ pee yayami, se mohu benɛ pee nɛ Mawu ni tsumi ɔmɛ nɛ na je po ngɛ e mi he je. 4Wɔɔ lɛɛ, nɛ je na nɛ ɔ ɔ, ja wa tsu nɔ nɛ tsɔ wɔ ɔ ni tsumi ɔmɛ; je maa jɔ, benɛ nɔ ko be ni nyɛe ma tsu hu. 5Be abɔ nɛ i ngɛ je ɔ mi nɛ ɔ, je ɔ la ji mi.” 6Benɛ e de enɛ ɔ ɔ, e la lada ngɔ fɔ si, nɛ e kɛ lada a pɔtɔ zu, nɛ e ngɔ zu ɔ ngɔ ha hɛ yuyuilɔ ɔ hɛngmɛ nɔ, 7nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Yaa du ngɛ Siloam (e sisi ji: nɔ nɛ a tsɔ lɛ) taku ɔ mi.” Kɛkɛ nɛ e ho nɛ e ya du, nɛ e ba nɛ e ngɛ nɔ hyɛe.
8Kɛkɛ nɛ e kpɔ mi bi kɛ nihi nɛ na lɛ sa kaa nɔ balɔ ji lɛ ɔ de ke: “Anɛ pi nɔ nɛ jinɛ e hii si nɛ e baa nɔ ɔ ji nɛ ɔ?” 9Ni komɛ ke “lɛ ʼi;” ni komɛ hu ke: “E je lɛ;” lɛ nitsɛ lɛɛ e ke: “Ami ʼi.” 10Lɔ ɔ he ɔ a bi lɛ ke: “Kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ o hɛngmɛ bli ɔ?” 11E he nɔ ke: “Nyumu ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Yesu ɔ lɛ pɔtɔ zu, nɛ e kɛ ha ye hɛngmɛ nɔ, nɛ e de mi ke: ‘Yaa Siloam taku ɔ mi nɛ o ya du.’ Nɛ benɛ i ya nɛ i ya du ɔ, i hyɛ nɔ.” 12Kɛkɛ nɛ a bi lɛ ke: “Jije e ngɛ?” E de mɛ ke: “I li.”
Farisifo ɔmɛ bi tsami ɔ he munyu
13Kɛkɛ nɛ a kɛ nɔ nɛ sa nɛ e hɛ yu ɔ yɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a ngɔ. 14Se ligbi nɛ Yesu pɔtɔ zu nɛ e kɛ bli nyumu ɔ hɛngmɛ ɔ, Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ʼi. 15Kɛkɛ nɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ hu kpale bi lɛ bɔ nɛ pee nɛ e hyɛ nɔ ɔ. Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Zu nɛ a pɔtɔ e kɛ ha ye hɛngmɛ ɔ nɔ, nɛ i ya du, nɛ i ngɛ nɔ hyɛe nɛ ɔ nɛ.” 16Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Farisifo ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ de ke: “Nyumu nɛ ɔ ji Mawu ngɔ, ejakaa e yi Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ.” Ni komɛ hu ke: “Kɛ nɔmlɔ ko nɛ ji yayami peelɔ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ e ma nyɛ okadihi kaa enɛ ɔmɛ pee?” Nɛ migbami ba a kpɛti.
17Kɛkɛ nɛ a bi hɛ yuyuilɔ ɔ ke: “Mo hu kɛ o ngɛ dee ngɛ e he kɛɛ, akɛnɛ e bli o hɛngmɛ ɔ?” Nɛ e ke: “Gbalɔ ji lɛ.” 18Se Yudafo ɔmɛ he we yi kaa hɛ yuyuilɔ ji lɛ sa loko e ngɛ nɔ hyɛe nɛ ɔ kɛ ya su be nɛ a ya tsɛ nɔ nɛ hyɛ nɔ ɔ fɔli, 19nɛ a bi mɛ ke: “Anɛ nyɛ bi ɔ nɛ nyɛ deɔ ke a fɔ lɛ hɛ yuyuilɔ ɔ ji nɛ ɔ lo? Kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ e ngɛ nɔ hyɛe nɛ ɔ?” 20E fɔli ɔmɛ he nɔ ke: “Wa le kaa wa bi ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ; wa le kaa a fɔ lɛ hɛ yuyuilɔ; 21se bɔ nɛ pee nɛ e ngɛ nɔ hyɛe jeha nɛ ɔ ɔ, lɛɛ wa li; jeha nɛ ɔ hu, nɔ nɛ bli e hɛngmɛ ɔ, wa li; nyɛ bi lɛ, e wa, lɛ nitsɛ e maa tu munyu ha e he.” 22E fɔli ɔmɛ de enɛ ɔ ejakaa a ngɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ gbeye yee. Se Yudafo ɔmɛ so ngɔ to kaa, ke nɔ ko gba mi de ke, lɛ ji Kristo ɔ, a maa fie lɛ kɛ maa je kpe he ɔ. 23Lɔ ɔ he nɛ e fɔli ɔmɛ de ke: “E wa, nyɛ bi lɛ nitsɛ” ɔ nɛ. 24Kɛkɛ nɛ a tsɛ nyumu nɛ sa nɛ e ji hɛ yuyuilɔ ɔ, nɔ́ nɛ ji si enyɔ, nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Ngɔɔ hɛ mi nyami ngɔ ha Mawu; se wɔɔ lɛɛ wa le kaa nɔmlɔ nɔ yayami peelɔ ji lɛ.” 25Kɛkɛ nɛ e he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Yayami peelɔ ji lɛ jio, i li; nɔ́ kake i le, kaa jinɛ hɛ yuyuilɔ ji mi, se jeha nɛ ɔ i ngɛ nɔ hyɛe.” 26Nɛ a bi lɛ ekohu ke: “Mɛni e pee mo? Kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ e bli o hɛngmɛ ɔ?” 27E he nɔ nɛ e ke: “I de nyɛ momo, nɛ nyɛ nui; mɛni he je nyɛ ngɛ hlae nɛ nyɛɛ bu tue ekohu? Anɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ suɔ kaa nyɛ ma plɛ e kaseli lo?” 28A je lɛ ke: “Mo ji e kaselɔ, se wɔɔ lɛɛ Mose kaseli ji wɔ. 29Wa le kaa Mawu kɛ Mose tu munyu; se nɔ nɛ ɔ lɛɛ, wa li he nɛ e je.” 30Nyumu ɔ he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Ei, enɛ ɔ ji nɔ́ nɛ ngɛ nyakpɛ ɔ nɛ, kaa nyɛ li he nɛ e je, nɛ kɛ̃ ɔ e bli ye hɛngmɛ! 31Wa le kaa Mawu bui yayami peeli tue; se ke nɔ ko yee lɛ gbeye nɛ e peɔ e suɔmi nya ni ɔ, e buɔ lɛ tue. 32Kɛ je nɛ a bɔ je ɔ nɛ ɔ, a nui hyɛ kaa nɔ ko bli nɔ nɛ a fɔ lɛ hɛ yuyuilɔ hɛngmɛ gblee. 33Kãa nɔ nɛ ɔ ji Mawu ngɔ ɔ, jinɛ e be nyɛe nɔ́ ko maa pee.” 34A he nɔ nɛ a de lɛ ke “Moo lɛɛ, yayami mi nitsɛ a fɔ mo ngɛ, nɛ mo mohu o ngɛ wɔ ni tsɔɔe nɛ ɔ?” Nɛ a fie lɛ kɛ je kpe he ɔ.
Mumi mi hɛyumi
35Yesu nu kaa a fie lɛ; nɛ benɛ e na lɛ ɔ, e bi lɛ ke: “O heɔ Mawu Bi ɔ nɔ yeɔ lo?” 36E he nɔ ke: “Mɛnɔ ji lɛ, Mawetsɛ, konɛ ma he e nɔ ma ye?” 37Yesu de lɛ ke: “O na lɛ momo, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ, nɔ nɛ kɛ mo ngɛ munyu tue ɔ, lɛ nɔuu ʼi.” 38Nɛ e ke: “I heɔ yeɔ, Mawetsɛ;” nɛ e ja lɛ.
39Nɛ Yesu ke: “Kojomi he nɛ i ba je nɛ ɔ mi ngɛ, konɛ nihi nɛ hyɛ we nɔ ɔ, a hyɛ, nɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ hyɛe ɔ, a plɛ hɛ yuyuli.” 40Nɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ nɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nu enɛ ɔ, nɛ a bi lɛ ke: “Anɛ wɔ hu wa hɛ yu lo?” 41Yesu de mɛ Ke: “Kaa nyɛ hɛ yu mohu ɔ, jinɛ yayami be nyɛ he; se jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛ deɔ ke: ‘Wa ngɛ nɔ hyɛe;’ lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ he yayami ɔ ngɛ nyɛ he kɛ mwɔɔ.”

Title: YOHANE 10
Content:
To ɔmɛ a he abɛ ɔ
1“Anɔkuale mi i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nɔ nɛ gui sinya a nya nɛ e kɛ se to ɔmɛ a tsu ɔ mi se mohu e guu he kpa kɛ kuɔ ɔ, juɔ kɛ ojofialɔ ji lɛ. 2Se nɔ nɛ guu sinya a nya kɛ sɛɛ mi ɔ, to ɔmɛ a hyɛlɔ ji lɛ. 3Lɛ, sinya nya hyɛlɔ ɔ bliɔ haa, nɛ to ɔmɛ nuɔ e gbi, nɛ e kɛ lɛ nitsɛ e to ɔmɛ a biɛ tsɛɛ mɛ, nɛ e kɛ mɛ jee kpo. 4Nɛ ke e bli e to ɔmɛ ɔ, e nyɛɛ a hɛ mi, nɛ to ɔmɛ nyɛɛ e se, ejakaa a le e gbi. 5Se nɔ kpa a, a be e se nyɛɛe, se mohu a maa tu fo kɛ je e ngɔ, ejakaa a li ni kpahi a gbi.”
6Yesu bu mɛ abɛ nɛ ɔ, se mɛɛ lɛɛ a nui munyu nɛ e kɛ mɛ ngɛ tue ɔ sisi.
Yesu ji tohyɛlɔ kpakpa
7Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, Yesu kpale de mɛ ekohu ke: “I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Imi ji to ɔmɛ a tsu ɔ nya sinya a nɛ. 8Nihi tsuo nɛ sɛ ye hlami kɛ ba a, juɔhi kɛ ojo fiali ji mɛ; se to ɔmɛ bui mɛ tue hulɔ. 9Imi ji sinya a nɛ. Imi lɛɛ, ke nɔ ko gu ye mi kɛ sɛ mi ɔ, a ma he e yi wami, nɛ e maa sɛ mi nɛ e maa je kpo, nɛ e ma na niyeni. 10Juɔ bɛ gu, se jumi kɛ nɔ gbemi kɛ hɛmi kpatami he e baa ngɛ; imi lɛɛ i ba benɛ pee nɛ a na wami nɛ a na nɛ e be nɔ.
11“Imi ji to hyɛlɔ kpakpa a nɛ. To hyɛlɔ kpakpa a ngɔɔ e klaa ngɔ fɔɔ si ngɛ e to ɔmɛ a nane mi. 12Se nɔ nɛ ji apafono nɛ e pi to ɔmɛ a hyɛlɔ, nɔ nɛ to ɔmɛ pi e nihi ɔ, naa kaa ogbetee ma, nɛ e siɔ to ɔmɛ nɛ e tuu fo, nɛ ogbetee, ɔ ba nuu mɛ nɛ e gbɛɛ to ɔmɛ fiaa. 13Apafono ɔ tuu fo, ejakaa apafono ji lɛ, nɛ to ɔmɛ a he nɔ dɔɛ lɛ. 14Imi ji tohyɛlɔ kpakpa a nɛ, nɛ i le ye tohi, nɛ ye to ɔmɛ hu le mi, 15kaa bɔ nɛ Tsɛ ɔ le mi, nɛ imi hu i le Tsɛ ɔ; nɛ i ngɔɔ ye wami ngɔ fɔɔ si ngɛ to ɔmɛ a nane mi. 16I ngɛ to kpa komɛ nɛ ji to tsu nɛ ɔ mi; nɛ kɔlɔ ɔmɛ hu, ja i ngɔ mɛ kɛ ba, nɛ a ba nu ye gbi, nɛ to ɔmɛ pee kuu kake kɛ hyɛlɔ kake.
17“Enɛ ɔ he nɛ Tsɛ ɔ suɔ mi ɔ nɛ, ejakaa i ngɔɔ ye wami ngɔ fɔɔ si, konɛ ma kpale ngɔ. 18Nɔ ko kpɔ we ngɛ ye dɛ, se mohu imi nitsɛ lɛ i ngɔ fɔɔ si. I ngɛ he wami kaa i kɛ haa, nɛ i ngɛ he wami kaa i ngɔɔ ekohu; bɔ nɛ Tsaatsɛ de mi ji nɛ ɔ nɛ.”
19Munyu nɛ ɔmɛ a he je ɔ, mi gbami kpale ba Yudafo ɔmɛ a kpɛti ekohu. 20Nɛ a ti nihi fuu ke: “Mumi yayami ngɛ e mi, nɛ e nu godo; mɛni he je nyɛ ngɛ lɛ tue bue?” 21Ni komɛ hu ke: “Nɔ nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ e mi nya mi munyuhi ji nɛ ɔ lo? Anɛ mumi yayami ma nyɛ hɛ yuyuilɔ hɛngmɛ ma bli lo?”
Yudafo ɔmɛ kua Yesu
22Be su nɛ a ngɛ sɔlemi tsu he tsukɔmi kaimi nyami ligbi yee ngɛ Yerusalem, nɛ fiɛ be ʼi. 23Nɛ Yesu ngɛ si slae ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ ngɛ Salomo ablanaa a nɔ. 24Kɛkɛ nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ ba bua wo e he, nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Kɛ yaa su mɛni be o ma ha wa yi mi maa jɔɔ wɔ kɔsikɔsi peemi ngɛ o he? Ke mo ji Kristo ɔ de wɔ paa.” 25Yesu he nɔ ke: “I de nyɛ nɛ nyɛ he we yi. Ni tsumihi nɛ i tsuɔ ngɛ Tsaatsɛ biɛ mi ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔmɛ lɛ ngɛ ye he odase yee; se nyɛ he we yi, 26mɛni he je ɔ, nyɛ pi ye to ɔmɛ eko. 27Ye to ɔmɛ nuɔ ye gbi, nɛ i le mɛ, nɛ a nyɛɛ ye se, 28nɛ imi nɔuu lɛ i haa mɛ neneene wami, nɛ a hɛ mi be kpatae kɛ maa ya neneene nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu, nɔ ko be mɛ kpɔe ngɛ ye dɛ. 29Tsaatsɛ nɛ ngɔ mɛ ha mi ɔ pe nihi tsuo, nɛ nɔ ko be nyɛe nɛ e ma kpɔ mɛ ngɛ Tsaatsɛ dɛ. 30Imi kɛ Tsaatsɛ tsuo ɔ, kake ʼi.”
31Kɛkɛ nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ kukuɔ tɛ ekohu nɛ a maa fia lɛ. 32Yesu he nɔ ke: “I tsɔɔ nyɛ ni tsumi kpakpahi fuu nɛ je Tsaatsɛ ngɔ. Te jamɛ a ni tsumi ɔmɛ a ti nɔ́ nɛ he nɛ nyɛ maa fia mi tɛ ngɛ ɔ nɛ?” 33Yudafo ɔmɛ he nɔ nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Tsa pi ni tsumi kpakpa ko he nɛ wa maa fia mo tɛ ngɛ ɔ, se mohu musu bɔmi he je, ejakaa mo nɛ nɔmlɔ ji mo ɔ, o tsɛɔ o he ke Mawu.” 34Yesu he nɔ ke: “Anɛ a ngmɛ́ ngɛ nyɛ Mlaa mi ke: ‘I ke, mawuhi ji nyɛ’ ɔ lo? 35Ke e tsɛ nihi nɛ Mawu munyu ɔ ba a ngɔ ɔ tete ke mawuhi, nɛ ngmami ɔ yi lakpa a, 36nyɛ ngɛ dee ngɛ nɔ nɛ Tsɛ ɔ pee lɛ klɔuklɔu nɛ e tsɔ lɛ kɛ ba je ɔ mi ɔ he ke: ‘O bɔ musu;’ mɛni he je ɔ, i de ke: Mawu bi ji mi ɔ lo? 37Ke i tsu we Tsaatsɛ ni tsumihi ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ ko he mi ye; 38se ke i tsuɔ ɔ, nɛ kɛ̃ ɔ nyɛ he we mi yi ɔ, lɛɛ nyɛ he ni tsumi ɔmɛ ye mɔ, konɛ nyɛɛ le nɛ nyɛ he ye kaa Tsɛ ɔ ngɛ ye mi, nɛ imi hu i ngɛ Tsɛ ɔ mi.” 39Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, a ngɛ hlae ekohu nɛ a nu lɛ, se e je a dɛ.
40Yesu pue nɔ kɛ ho Yordan se ya ekohu, he nɛ Yohane baptisi ngɛ kekle ɔ, nɛ e ya hi lejɛ ɔ. 41Nɛ nihi fuu ba e ngɔ nɛ a ke: “Yohane pee we okadi ko mohu, se nihi tsuo nɛ Yohane de ngɛ nyumu nɛ ɔ he ji anɔkuale.” 42Nɛ nihi fuu he e nɔ ye ngɛ lejɛ ɔ.

Title: YOHANE 11
Content:
Lazaro gbenɔ
1Nyumu ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Lazaro, nɛ je Betania, Maria kɛ e nyɛmi Martamɛ a kɔpe ɔ ngɛ gboe. 2(Maria nɛ ngɔ nu kɛ e he via kɛ kpa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɛ e kɛ e yi bwɔmi tsu e nan ehe ɔ nyɛmi Lazaro lɛ ngɛ gboe nɛ ɔ ne.) 3Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e nyɛmi yi ɔmɛ tsɔ kɛ ba Yesu ngɔ ba de lɛ ke: “Mawetsɛ, oʼɛ, nɔ nɛ o suɔ ɔ ngɛ gboe.” 4Se benɛ Yesu nu enɛ ɔ ɔ, e ke: “Kikɛmɛ a hiɔ nɛ ɔ pi gbenɔ hiɔ, se mohu Mawu hɛ mi nyami ɔ he je, benɛ pee nɛ a wo Mawu Bi ɔ hɛ mi nyami.”
5Yesu suɔ Maria kɛ e nyɛmi yo ɔ kɛ Lazaro tsuo. 6Benɛ e nu e hiɔ ɔ he ɔ, e hi si ngɛ he nɛ e ngɛ ɔ ligbi enyɔ. 7Nɛ lɔ ɔ se ɔ, e de e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Nyɛ ha waa ya Yudea ekohu.” 8Kaseli ɔmɛ de lɛ ke: “Rabi, e sui be ko nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ ngɛ hlae nɛ a fia mo tɛ, nɛ o yaa lejɛ ɔ ekohu nɛ ɔ?” 9Yesu he nɔ ke: “Anɛ pi ngmlɛfia nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ nɛ ngɛ ligbi kake mi lo? Ke nɔ ko nyɛɛ piani ɔ, e tɛ we si, mɛni he je ɔ, e naa je nɛ ɔ mi la a. 10Se ke nɔ ko nyɛɛ nyɔ mi ɔ e tɛɔ si, ejakaa la be e mi.” 11Yesu tu munyu nɛ ɔmɛ, nɛ lɔ ɔ se ɔ e de mɛ ke: “Wa huɛ Lazaro hwɔ mahɛ; se i yaa nɛ ma ya tsɛ̃ɛ lɛ ngɛ mahɛ ɔ mi.” 12Kɛkɛ nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, ke mahɛ e ngɛ hwɔeɔ, lɛɛ e ma na he wami mɔ.” 13Se e gbenɔ he munyu Yesu tu ɔ nɛ; se mɛɛ lɛɛ a susu kaa mahɛ nitsɛ he munyu e ngɛ tue ɔ nɛ. 14Jeha nɛ ɔ Yesu de mɛ paa ke: “Lazaro gbo; 15nɛ nyɛ he ɔ e ngɔ ye nya kaa i be lejɛ ɔ, benɛ pee nɛ nyɛ he ye. Nyɛ ha waa ya e ngɔ.” 16Kɛkɛ nɛ Toma, nɔ nɛ a tsɛɛ Didimo ɔ, de e nyamimɛ kaseli ɔmɛ ke: “Nyɛ ha wɔ hu waa ya nɛ waa kɛ lɛ ya gbo.”
Yesu ji sitemi ɔ kɛ wami ɔ
17Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ Yesu su lejɛ ɔ, e ba na kaa Lazaro ye ligbi eywiɛ momo ngɛ muɔ ɔ mi. 18Betania kɛ Yerusalem kpɛti kɛmi maa pee si tomi nya enyɔ. 19Nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a ti nihi fuu ba Marta kɛ Mariamɛ a ngɔ konɛ a ba ye mɛ kɔmɔ ngɛ a nyɛmi nyumu ɔ gbenɔ ɔ he.
20Kɛkɛ nɛ, benɛ Marta nu kaa Yesu ma a, e te si nɛ e kɛ lɛ ya kpe; se Maria lɛɛ e hii si ngɛ we ɔ mi. 21Kɛkɛ nɛ Marta de Yesu ke: “Mawetsɛ, kaa o ngɛ hiɛ ɔ jinɛ, mami ɔ ko gbo we. 22Se jeha nɛ hu ɔ, i le kaa nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ o ma bi Mawu ɔ, e ma ha mo.” 23Yesu de lɛ ke: “O nyɛmi nyumu ɔ maa te si.” 24Marta de lɛ ke: “I le kaa e maa te si ngɛ ni gbogboehi a si temi ɔ mi ngɛ nyagbe ligbi ɔ nɔ.” 25Yesu de lɛ ke: “Imi ji sitemi ɔ kɛ wami ɔ nɛ; nɔ nɛ heɔ ye nɔ yeɔ ɔ, ke e gbo tete po ɔ, e hɛ maa hi ngmengmle, 26nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ hɛ ngɛ nɛ e heɔ ye nɔ yeɔ ɔ, e be gboe gblegbleegblee. O heɔ enɛ ɔ yeɔ lo?” 27Marta de lɛ ke: “Ee, Nyɔmtsɛ, i heɔ yeɔ kaa mo ji Kristo, Mawu Bi nɛ ma je ɔ mi ɔ nɛ.”
Yesu fo ya
28Nɛ benɛ Marta de lɛ kikɛ ɔ, e pue nɔ kɛ ho, nɛ e ya tsɛ e nyɛmi Maria a zaa, nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ba, nɛ e ngɛ mo tsɛe.” 29Benɛ Maria nu ɔ, e te si oya nɛ e ba e ngɔ. 30Se Yesu na we nɛ e su kɔpe ɔ, se e ngɛ he nɛ Marta kɛ lɛ kpe ngɛ ɔ kɛ mwɔɔ. 31Kɛkɛ ɔ, benɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ nɛ kɛ lɛ ngɛ we ɔ mi nɛ a ngɛ lɛ kɔmɔ yee ɔ na kaa Maria sa e he kɛ je kpo ɔ, a fie e se, a susu kaa be nɛ ɔ mi piɔ, e yaa yɔkɔ ɔ nɔ nɛ e ya fo ya ngɛ lejɛ ɔ.
32Benɛ Maria ba he nɛ Yesu ngɛ ɔ nɛ e na lɛ ɔ, e nɔ e nane nya nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, kaa o ngɛ hiɛ ɔ jinɛ, mami ɔ ko gbo we.” 33Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ Yesu na lɛ kaa e ngɛ ya foe kɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ hu nɛ kɛ lɛ ba a, kaa mɛ hu a ngɛ ya foe ɔ, e wo bua ngɛ e mumi mi nɛ e hao. 34Nɛ e bi ke: “Jije nyɛ to lɛ ngɛ?” A de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, ba nɛ o ba hyɛ.” 35Nɛ Yesu fo ya. 36Kɛkɛ nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ ke: “Hyɛ bɔ nɛ e suɔ lɛ ha!” 37Se a ti ni komɛ ke: “Nyumu nɛ ɔ nɛ bli hɛ yuyuilɔ ɔ hengmɛ ɔ, anɛ e be nɔ́ ko nyɛe maa pee konɛ nyumu nɛ ɔ ko gbo lo?”
Yesu tle Lazaro si
38Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu kpale wo bua ngɛ e mi ekohu, nɛ e ya yɔkɔ ɔ nɔ; se tɛ puɔ ʼi, nɛ tɛ tsi nya. 39Yesu ke: “Nyɛ je tɛ ɔ.” Marta, nɔ nɛ gbo ɔ nyɛmi yo ɔ, de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, be nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, nɔ ɔ puɛ, ejakaa e ye ligbi eywiɛ.” 40Yesu de lɛ ke: “Anɛ i de we mo ke ke o he ye ɔ, o maa na Mawu hɛ mi nyami ɔ lo?” 41Kɛkɛ nɛ a je tɛ ɔ ngɛ he nɛ nɔ gbogboe ɔ fɔɔ si ngɛ ɔ. Nɛ Yesu wo e hɛ nɔ nɛ e hyɛ hiɔwe, nɛ e ke: “Tsaatsɛ, i naa mo si kaa o bu mi tue. 42Se imi lɛɛ i le kaa o buɔ mi tue; se asafo ɔ nɛ daa si ɔ he nɛ i ngɛ dee, konɛ a he ye kaa mo lɛ o tsɔ mi.” 43Nɛ benɛ e de kikɛ ɔ, e tsɛ lɛ kɛ gbi wawɛɛ ke: “Lazaro leee, jee kpo!” 44Nɛ nɔ gbogboe ɔ je kpo, bo nɛ a kɛ pu lɛ ɔ blaa e nane, nɛ duku fi e hɛ mi. Yesu de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ pɛne lɛ nɛ nyɛ ha e ya.”
A so Yesu yi nɔ
(Mateo 26.1-5; Marko 14.1-2; Luka 22.1-2)
45Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, Yudafo ɔmɛ nɛ ba Maria ngɔ ɔ a ti nihi fuu he Yesu nɔ ye, benɛ a na nihi nɛ e pee ɔ. 46Se a ti ni komɛ pue nɔ kɛ ho Farisifo ɔmɛ a ngɔ ya nɛ a ya sɛɛ ha mɛ nihi nɛ Yesu pee ɔ. 47Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ tsɛ kpe, nɛ a ke: “Kɛ wa ngɛ pee kɛɛ? Nyumu nɛ ɔ ngɛ okadi slɔɔtohi fuu pee. 48Ke wa ngmɛ lɛ blɔ kikɛ ɔ, ni ɔmɛ tsuo ma he e nɔ maa ye; nɛ Romabi ɔmɛ maa ba nɛ a ma ba kpɔ wa sɔlemi we ɔ kɛ wa zugba a kulaa.” 49Se a ti nɔ kake, Kaifa nɛ ngɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma yee ngɛ jamɛ a jeha a mi ɔ, de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ li nɔ ko kulaa, 50nɛ pohu nyɛ susuu we kaa e hi wa wɔ kaa nɔ kake nɛ gbo ngɛ ma a nane mi, pe nɔ́ nɛ ma a tsuo hɛ mi ma kpata.” 51Se enɛ ɔ ɔ, pi lɛ nitsɛ nɛ e to e yi mi nɛ e de; se mohu osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma nɛ ji lɛ ngɛ jamɛ jeha a nɔ ɔ he je; pe e gba kaa Yesu ma gbo ngɛ ma a nane mi; 52nɛ pi ngɛ ma a kɛkɛ nane mi, se benɛ pee nɛ e bua Mawu bimɛ nɛ gbɛ fia a hu nya ngɔ pee kake. 53Nɛ kɛ je lɛ ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, a to a yi mi ke a maa gbe; lɛ. 54Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yesu ji paa nɛ e nyɛɛ ngɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a kpɛti hu, se e je lejɛ ɔ kɛ ho zugba ko nɛ ngɛ nga a nya a nɔ ya, ngɛ ma ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Efraim ɔ mi, nɛ e kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ ya hi lejɛ ɔ.
55Jeha nɛ ɔ Yudafo ɔmɛ a Hetsɔmi ɔ su ta. Nɛ nihi babauu je zugba a tsuo nɔ kɛ ho Yerusalem ya, konɛ a ya tsukɔ a he loko Hetsɔmi ɔ nɛ su. 56Kɛkɛ nɛ a bɔni Yesu hlami, nɛ benɛ a daa si ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, a de a he ke: “Kɛ nyɛ susuu kɛɛ; anɛ e be Nyami ligbi ɔ bae?” 57Se osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ wo si ke, ke nɔ ko le he nɛ e ngɛ ɔ, e ba wo a tue nɔ, konɛ a ya nu lɛ.

Title: YOHANE 12
Content:
A pɔ Yesu nu ngɛ Betania
(Mateo 26.6-13; Marko 14.3-9)
1Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ e piɛ ligbi ekpa nɛ a maa ye Hetsɔmi ɔ, Yesu ba Betania, he nɛ Lazaro, nɔ nɛ gbo nɛ e tle lɛ si kɛ je gbeje ɔ ngɛ ɔ. 2Kɛkɛ nɛ a ngmɛ lɛ okplɔɔ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, nɛ Marta sɔmɔ; se Lazaro piɛ nihi nɛ kɛ lɛ hii si ngɛ okplɔɔ ɔ he ɔmɛ a he. 3Kɛkɛ nɛ Maria ngɔ nardo nu ngmingmiingmi nɛ he jua wa saminya nɛ ngmɛɛ sɛni tɛ kake, nɛ e kɛ ba kpa Yesu nanehi a he, nɛ e kɛ e yi bwɔmi tsu e nane ɔmɛ a he; nɛ nu ɔ he via kpe we ɔ mi tsuo. 4Kɛkɛ nɛ Yuda Iskariot, e kaseli ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake nɛ maa tsɔɔ e se blɔ ɔ de ke: 5“Mɛni he je a jua we nu nɛ ɔ cedi lafa etɛ nɛ a kɛ ha ohiafohi?” 6Se enɛ ɔ nɛ e de nɛ ɔ, pi ohiafo ɔmɛ a he nɔ́ nɛ ngɛ lɛ dɔe he je, se mohu juɔ ji lɛ, nɛ lɛ lɛ e toɔ sika kpɛɛ ɔ, nɛ e juɔ nɔ́ nɛ a ngɔ woɔ mi ɔ eko. 7Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, Yesu ke: “Koo doo e nya; e pee enɛ ɔ ngɔ to ye pumi ligbi ɔ. 8Ejakaa ohiafo ɔmɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ kɛ mɛ ngɛ daa, se imi lɛɛ, pi daa nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ mi ngɛ.”
A so Lazaro yi nɔ
9Jeha nɛ ɔ, Yudafo ɔmɛ a ti nihi fuu na le kaa Yesu ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, nɛ a ba, pi ngɛ Yesu kɛkɛ he, se mohu konɛ a na Lazaro nɔ nɛ e tle si kɛ je gbeje ɔ hulɔ. 10Nɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ muɔ a yi mi kpɔ kaa a maa gbe Lazaro hulɔ. 11Ejakaa e he nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a ti nihi fuu ya nɛ a ya he Yesu nɔ ye ɔ nɛ.
Yesu Yerusalem sɛmi
(Mateo 21.1-11; Marko 11.1-11; Luka 19.28-40)
12E nɔ je na a, nihi babauu nɛ ba nyami ligbi ɔ yemi ɔ, benɛ a nu kaa Yesu ma Yerusalem ɔ, 13a kukuɔ tã ba, nɛ a je kpo ya kpee lɛ, nɛ a wɔ lele ke: “Hosiana! A gbaa nɔ nɛ ma ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ biɛ mi ɔ, Israel matsɛ ɔ!” 14Se Yesu na teji bi ko nɛ e kuɔ hi nɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a ke:
15“Koo ye gbeye, Zion bi yo;
Oʼɛ, o matsɛ ɔ ma,
E hi teji bi nɔ.”
16Se e kaseli ɔmɛ nɛ́ ni nɛ ɔmɛ a sisi mla mi, se benɛ a wo Yesu hɛ mi nyami se ɔ loko a kai kaa a ngma ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ e he, nɛ lɔ ɔ a pee ha lɛ ɔ nɛ.
17Jeha nɛ ɔ asafo ɔ nɛ kɛ lɛ ngɛ be mi nɛ e tsɛ Lazaro kɛ je yɔkɔ ɔ mi nɛ e tle lɛ si kɛ je gbeje ɔ ye he odase. 18Enɛ ɔ he je hulɔ nɛ asafo ɔ ya kpee lɛ ɔ nɛ, mɛni he je ɔ, a nu kaa e pee nyakpɛ nɔ́ nɛ ɔ. 19Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Farisifo ɔmɛ de ngɛ a kpɛti ke: “Tse nyɛ na kaa nyɛ nyɛ we nɔ́ ko nɛ nyɛɛ pee fɛɛ; oʼɛ, je ɔ iɛ hia hɛ nyɛɛ e se ɔ nɛ.”
Helabi komɛ ba hla Yesu
20Helabi komɛ ngɛ nihi nɛ ba nɛ a ba ja Mawu ngɛ nyami ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔmɛ a kpɛti. 21Ni nɛ ɔmɛ ba Filipo nɛ je Betsaida ngɛ Galilea a ngɔ, nɛ a ba de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, wa ngɛ hlae kaa waa na Yesu.” 22Filipo ba nɛ e ba de Andrea, nɛ Andrea kɛ Filipo tsuo ba de Yesu. 23Nɛ Yesu he nɔ nɛ e ke: “Ngmlɛfia a nɛ a maa wo Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ hɛ mi nyam ɔ su. 24Anɔkuale mi i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Ke ngma ngu nɔɛ zugba nɛ e gbo ɔ, lɛɛ bɔ nɛ e ngɛ ɔ nɔuu e maa hi; se ke e gbo ɔ, e woɔ yiblii fuu. 25Nɔ nɛ suɔ e wami ɔ, e laa lɛ, se nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ e wami ngɛ je nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, e maa to lɛ kɛ maa ya neneene wami mi. 26Ke nɔ ko ngɛ mi sɔmɔe ɔ, e nyɛɛ ye se, nɛ he nɛ i ngɛ ɔ, lejɛ ɔ ye sɔmɔlɔ ɔ hu maa hi. Ke nɔ ko ngɛ mi sɔmɔe ɔ, Tsaatsɛ maa wo lɛ.”
Yesu tu e gbenɔ he munyu
27“Jeha nɛ ɔ ye klaa ngɛ haoe, nɛ mɛni ma de? Tsaatsɛ, he mi ngɛ ngmlɛfia nɛ ɔ mi! Pohu enɛ ɔ he nɔuu i ba ngɛ a ngmlɛfia nɛ ɔ mi. 28Tsaatsɛ, wo o biɛ ɔ hɛ mi nyami!” Kɛkɛ nɛ gbi ko je hiɔwe de ke: “I na wo e hɛ mi nyami momo, nɛ ma kpale wo e hɛ mi nyami ekohu.”
29Kɛkɛ nɛ nihi nɛ daa si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ a nu ɔ de ke: “Hiɔwe si;” ni komɛ hu ke: “Hiɔwe bɔfo ko kɛ lɛ tu munyu.” 30Yesu he nɔ nɛ e ke: “Tsa pi ye he nɛ gbi nɛ ɔ ba ngɛ, se nyɛ mohu nyɛ he. 31Jeha nɛ ɔ je nɛ ɔ mi kojomi ɔ su; kpaako a maa hia je nɛ ɔ mi matsɛ ɔ ngɔ sake ngɔ fɔ he. 32Nɛ imi lɛɛ, ke a wo ye nɔ kɛ je zugba a nɔ ɔ, ma gbla nihi tsuo kɛ maa ba ye ngɔ.” 33Se enɛ ɔ ɔ, e de kɛ tsɔɔ nɔ gbenɔ nɛ e ma gbo ɔ. 34Asafo ɔ he nɔ ke: “Wɔɔ lɛɛ wa nu ngɛ Mlaa a mi ke Kristo ɔ hii si kɛ yaa neneene; nɛ kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ moo lɛɛ o deɔ ke: ‘Ja a wo Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ nɔ ɔ?’ Mɛnɔ ji kikɛmɛ a Nɔmlɔ Bi nɛ ɔ?” 35Yesu de mɛ ke: “Be kpiti kɛkɛ e piɛ ha la a ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti. Be abɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ la a nɛ ɔ ɔ, nyɛɛ nyɛɛ, konɛ diblii ko ba na nyɛ; se nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ diblii mli ɔ, e li he nɛ e yaa. 36Be abɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ la a nɛ ɔ ɔ, nyɛ he la a nɔ ngɔ ye, konɛ nyɛ plɛ la bimɛ.”
Yesu de ni nɛ ɔmɛ, nɛ e ho nɛ e ya laa e he.
Yudafo ɔmɛ he we yi
37E ngɛ mi kaa Yesu pee nyakpɛ ni nguahi ngɛ a hɛ mi, se kɛ ɔ a he we e nɔ yi; 38konɛ gbalɔ Yesaia munyu nɛ e tu ɔ nɛ na ba mi ke:
“Nyɔmtsɛ, mɛnɔ he wa sane ɔ ye,
Nɛ mɛnɔ a je Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nine ɔ kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ?”
39Enɛ ɔ he je nɛ a nyɛ we nɛ a he ye ɔ nɛ, ejakaa Yesaia kpale de ekohu ke:
40“E yu a hɛngmɛ,
Nɛ e wlua a tsui;
Konɛ a ko na kɛ a hɛngmɛ,
Nɛ a na nya kɛ a tsui,
Nɛ a kpale a se, nɛ i tsa mɛ.”
41Ni nɛ ɔmɛ Yesaia de, ejakaa e na e hɛ mi nyami ɔ, nɛ e tu he munyu.
42Se kɛ ɔ, nikɔtɔma amɛ tete a ti nihi fuu he e nɔ ye, se Farisifo ɔmɛ a he ɔ, a ja je we paa, konɛ a ko fie mɛ kɛ je kpe he ɔ; 43ejakaa a suɔ nimli a hɛ mi nyami pe Mawu nɔ́.
Yesu munyu kojoɔ
44Yesu de boboobo ke: “Nɔ nɛ heɔ ye nɔ yeɔ ɔ, pi ye nɔ nɛ e heɔ yeɔ, se mohu nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ. 45Nɛ nɔ nɛ naa mi ɔ naa nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ. 46Imi lɛɛ i ba je ɔ mi kaa la, konɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ heɔ ye nɔ yeɔ ɔ, e ko hi diblii ɔ mi. 47Nɛ ke nɔ ko nu ye munyu nɛ e yi nɔ ɔ, tsa pi imi nɛ ma kojo lɛ, ejakaa i bɛ nɛ ma ba kojo je ɔ, se mohu i ba nɛ ma ba he je ɔ yi wami. 48Nɔ nɛ kuaa mi nɛ e pɛtɛ we ye munyu ɔ he ɔ, e ngɛ nɔ ko nɛ kojo lɛ; munyu nɛ i tu ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu maa kojo lɛ ngɛ nyagbe ligbi ɔ nɔ. 49Ejakaa imi lɛɛ i to we imi nitsɛ ye yi mi i tu we munyu; se Tsɛ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ, lɛ mohu e wo mi kita, nɔ́ nɛ ma de kɛ nɔ́ nɛ ma tu. 50Nɛ i le kaa e kita a neneene wami ʼi; lɔ ɔ he ɔ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ dee ɔ, bɔ nɛ Tsɛ ɔ de mi ɔ, ja i deɔ.”

Title: YOHANE 13
Content:
Yesu fɔ e kaseli ɔmɛ a nane he
1Loko Hetsɔmi nyami ligbi ɔ maa su ɔ, akɛnɛ Yesu le kaa e ngmlɛfia nɛ e kɛ maa je je ɔ mi kɛ ya Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ ɔ su he je ɔ, bɔ nɛ e suɔ e nihi nɛ ngɛ je nɔ mi ɔ, ja e suɔ mɛ kɛ pi si.
2Nɛ benɛ a ngɛ ni yee ɔ, blɔɔ abosiami ngɔ wo Yuda Iskariot, Simon bi ɔ, tsui mi momo kaa e tsɔɔ Yesu se blɔ. 3Nɛ Yesu le kaa Tsɛ ɔ tu nihi tsuo kulaa ngɔ wo e dɛ, nɛ kaa Mawu ngɔ e je nɛ e kpale yaa Mawu ngɔ ɔ, 4e te si ngɛ niyeni ɔ si, nɛ e je e tade ɔmɛ ngɔ pue si, nɛ e ngɔ papahu ngɔ muɔ e mlɛ mi. 5Lɔ ɔ se ɔ, e plɛ nyu ngɔ wo tsɛsi mi, nɛ e bɔni e kaseli ɔmɛ a nane he fɔmi, nɛ e kɛ papahu nɛ muɔ e mlɛ mi ɔ tsu. 6Kɛkɛ nɛ e ba su Simon Petro nɔ, nɛ lɛɛ e de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, mo lɛ o ngɛ ye nane he fɔe nɛ ɔ?” 7Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ pee nɛ ɔ ɔ, amlɔ nɛ ɔ o li, se ke pee se ɔ o maa le.” 8Petro de lɛ ke: “Ko fɔ ye nane he kɔkɔɔkɔ.” Yesu he nɔ ke: “Ke i fɔ we o he ɔ, o be blɔfami nɔ́ ko ngɛ ye ngɔ.” 9Simon Petro de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, lɛɛ pi ye nane he kɛkɛ, se mohu ye nine kɛ ye yi mi hulɔ.” 10Yesu de lɛ ke: “Nɔ nɛ a du e he ɔ, e hia we lɛ he fɔmi, ja e nane he kɛkɛ, se e he je kɛ pi si. Nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ he je mohu, se pi nyɛ tsuo.” 11Ejakaa e le nɔ nɛ maa tsɔɔ e se blɔ ɔ; lɔ ɔ he nɛ e de ke: ‘Tsa pi nyɛ tsuo nɛ nyɛ he je’ ɔ.
12Jeha nɛ ɔ, benɛ e fɔ a nane ɔmɛ a he nɛ e kukuɔ e tade ɔmɛ nɛ e ya hi si ekohu ɔ, e ke: “Nyɛ le nɔ́ nɛ i pee ha nyɛ nɛ ɔ lo? 13Nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ tsɛɛ mi tsɔɔlɔ kɛ Nyɔmtsɛ, na nyɛ tɔ we, ejakaa ja ji mi. 14Jeha nɛ ɔ, ke imi tsɔɔlɔ kɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ, i fɔ nyɛ nane he ɔ, e sa kaa nyɛ hu nyɛ fɔɔ nyɛ sibi a nane he. 15Se okadi i to nyɛ, konɛ bɔ nɛ i pee ha nyɛ nɛ ɔ, nyɛ hu nyɛɛ pee ja. 16I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Nyɔguɛ pa we e nyɔmtsɛ, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu tsɔlɔ pa we nɔ nɛ tsɔ lɛ ɔ. 17Ke nyɛ le ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, a gbaa nyɛ ke nyɛ ye nɔ.
18“Pi nyɛ tsuo nyɛ he munyu nɛ i ngɛ tue ɔ; imi lɛɛ i le nihi nɛ i hla; se mohu benɛ pee nɛ nɔ́ nɛ a ngma a nɛ ba mi ke: Nɔ nɛ yeɔ ye dɛ mi abolo ɔ, e wo e nane seja nɔ ngɔ si mi. 19Jeha nɛ ɔ i ngɛ nyɛ dee ngɔ to loko e ba mi, konɛ ke e ba mi ɔ nɛ nyɛɛ le kaa ami ʼi. 20I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Nɔ nɛ heɔ nɔ nɛ i tsɔ ɔ, imi nɔuu e heɔ ɔ nɛ. Nɛ nɔ nɛ heɔ mi ɔ, e heɔ nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ hulɔ.”
Yesu gba e seblɔtsɔɔmi ngɔ to
(Mateo 26.20-25; Marko 14.17-21; Luka 22.21-23)
21Benɛ e de ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, e hao ngɛ mumi mi, nɛ e gba mi kpoo nɛ e de ke: “I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Nyɛ ti nɔ kake maa tsɔɔ ye se blɔ.” 22Kɛkɛ nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ hyɛ a sibi a hɛ mi, se a nɛ nɔ tutuutu he munyu nɛ e ngɛ tue ɔ. 23Se kaseli ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake nɛ Yesu suɔ ɔ kpasa e gugue. 24Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Simon Petro ma lɛ hɛ̃ ke e bi lɛ nɔ he munyu nɛ e ngɛ tue ɔ. 25Se lɛɛ e be nɔ Yesu gugue mi nɛ e bi lɛ ke: “Mawetsɛ, mɛnɔ ʼi? 26Yesu be nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Lɛ ji nɔ nɛ i kɛ nyamiwo bɔ ɔ maa sɔ mi ngɔ ha a nɛ.” Nɛ e kɛ nyamiwo bɔ ɔ sɔ mi nɛ e ngɔ ha Yuda Iskariot, Simon bi ɔ. 27Nɛ nyamiwo bɔ ɔ se pɛ nɛ Satan sɛ e mi.
