Jeha nɛ ɔ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Nɔ́ nɛ o ngɛ pee ɔ, pee nɛ e sɔ!” 28Se nihi nɛ hii si ngɛ okplɔɔ ɔ he ɔ a ti nɔ ko nɔ ko li nɔ́ he je nɛ e de lɛ ja a. 29A ti ni komɛ susu kaa, akɛnɛ Yuda lɛ toɔ sika kpɛɛ ɔ he nɛ Yesu de lɛ ke: “Ya he nihi nɛ he hia wɔ ngɔ to nyami ligbi ɔ,” aloo kaa e ngɔ nɔ ko ngɔ ha ohiafohi. 30Kɛkɛ nɛ benɛ e he nyamiwo bɔ ɔ nɔuu ɔ, e je kpo. Se je jɔ.
Kita he ɔ
31Benɛ Yuda je kpo se ɔ, Yesu ke: “Jeha nɛ ɔ a wo Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ hɛ mi nyami, nɛ a wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami ngɛ e mi. 32Ke a wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami ngɛ e mi ɔ, Mawu hu maa wo e hɛ mi nyami ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e mi, nɛ e maa wo e hɛ mi nyami oya. 33Bimɛ tsɔwi, be bɔɔ kɛkɛ e piɛ nɛ i kɛ nyɛ maa hi si; nyɛ ma hla mi, nɛ bɔ nɛ i de Yudafo ɔmɛ ke: ‘He nɛ i yaa a, nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ be lejɛ ɔ nyɛe maa bɛ’ a, jã i ngɛ nyɛ hu dee jeha nɛ ɔ nɛ. 34Kita he i ngɛ nyɛ woe, kaa nyɛɛ suɔ nyɛ he. Kaa bɔ nɛ i suɔ nyɛ ɔ, jã nyɛ hu nyɛɛ suɔ nyɛ he. 35Ke nyɛ suɔ nyɛ he ɔ, lɔ ɔ nihi tsuo kɛ maa le kaa ye kaseli ji nyɛ.”
Yesu gba Petro kuami
(Mateo 26.31-35; Marko 14.27-31; Luka 22.31-34)
36Simon Petro bi lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, jije o yaa?” Yesu he nɔ ke: “He nɛ i yaa a, o be nyɛe ye se maa nyɛɛ amlɔ nɛ ɔ, se o maa nyɛɛ ye se hwɔɔ se ko.” 37Petro de lɛ ke: “Mawetsɛ, mɛni he je i be o se nyɛe ma nyɛɛ amlɔ nɛ ɔ ɔ? Ye wami tete ma ngɔ fɔ si ngɛ o he.” 38Yesu he nɔ ke: “O maa ngɔ o wami ngɔ fɔ si ngɛ ye he lo? I ngɛ mo dee anɔkuale mi ke: Kungwɔ be nɔ kpae nɛ o ma kpa ngɛ ye se si etɛ.”

Title: YOHANE 14
Content:
Yesu ji blɔ nɛ a kɛ yaa Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ
1“Nyɛ ko ye nyɛ tsui; nyɛ he Mawu nɔ nyɛɛ ye, nɛ imi hu nyɛ he ye nɔ nyɛɛ ye. 2Sihi hehi fuu ngɛ Tsaatsɛ we ɔ; ke pi ja jinɛ, i de nyɛ momo; ejakaa i yaa nɛ ma ya dla blɔ he ngɔ to nyɛ. 3Nɛ ke i ya nɛ i ya dla blɔ he ngɔ to nyɛ ɔ, ma ba ekohu nɛ ma ba ngɔ nyɛ kɛ ya he nɛ imi nitsɛ i ngɛ ɔ, konɛ he nɛ i ngɛ ɔ, nyɛ hu nyɛɛ hi lejɛ ɔ. 4Nɛ he nɛ i yaa a, nyɛ le, nɛ blɔ ɔ hu, nyɛ le.” 5Toma de lɛ ke: “Mawetsɛ, wa li he nɛ o yaa, nɛ kɛ wa maa pee kɛɛ nɛ wa maa le blɔ ɔ?” 6Yesu de lɛ ke: “Ami ji blɔ ɔ kɛ anɔkuale ɔ kɛ wami ɔ; nɔ ko bɛ́ Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ, kaa ja e gu ye nɔ. 7Kaa nyɛ le mi jinɛ, nyɛ ko le Tsaatsɛ hulɔ; nɛ kɛ je mwɔnɛ kɛ yaa nɛ ɔ, nyɛ le lɛ, ejakaa nyɛ na lɛ.”
8Filipo de lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, tsɔɔ wɔ Tsɛ ɔ, nɛ lɔ ɔ hiɛ ha wɔ.” 9Yesu de lɛ ke: “Pi mwɔnɛ nɛ i kɛ nyɛ ngɛ nɛ ɔ, o li mi lolo lo, Filipo? Nɔ nɛ na mi ɔ, e na Tsɛ ɔ, nɛ kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ o deɔ ke: ‘Tsɔɔ wɔ Tsɛ ɔ?’ 10Anɛ o he we yi kaa i ngɛ Tsɛ ɔ mi nɛ Tsɛ ɔ hu ngɛ ye mi lo? Munyu nɛ i kɛ nyɛ tuɔ, pi imi nitsɛ ye yi mi nɛ i toɔ nɛ i deɔ; se Tsɛ ɔ nɛ hii ye mi ɔ, lɛ lɛ e tsuɔ ni tsumi ɔmɛ ɔ nɛ. 11Nyɛ he mi nyɛɛ ye kaa i ngɛ Tsɛ ɔ mi nɛ Tsɛ ɔ hu ngɛ ye mi; se ke pi ja a, nyɛ he mi nyɛɛ ye ngɛ jamɛ a ni tsumi ɔmɛ nitsɛmɛ a he. 12Anɔkuale mi, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nɔ nɛ heɔ ye nɔ yeɔ ɔ, ni tsumihi nɛ i tsuɔ ɔ, lɛ hu e ma tsu, nɛ e ma tsu nihi nɛ pe kɔlɔ ɔmɛ tete, ejakaa i yaa Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ. 13Nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ ma kpa he pɛɛ ngɛ ye biɛ mi ɔ, lɔ ɔ ma pee, konɛ Tsɛ ɔ hɛ mi nɛ ba nyami ngɛ Bi ɔ mi. 14Ke nyɛ kpa nɔ ko he pɛɛ ngɛ ye biɛ mi ɔ, ma pee.”
Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ he siwomi
15“Ke nyɛ suɔ mi ɔ, nyɛ maa ye ye kita amɛ a nɔ. 16Nɛ imi lɛɛ ma bi Tsɛ ɔ, nɛ e ma ha nyɛ Hepiɛlɔ kpa, konɛ e kɛ nyɛ nɛ hi si kɛ ya neneene; 17anɔkuale mumi ɔ nɛ je ɔ nyɛ we lɛ nɛ e ngɔ ɔ, mɛni he je ɔ, e nɛ́ lɛ, nɛ pohu e li lɛ; se nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ le lɛ, ejakaa e kɛ nyɛ lɛ ngɛ, nɛ e maa hi nyɛ mi.
18“I be nyɛ sie ahusa, i ma nyɛ ngɔ. 19E piɛ bɔɔ kɛkɛ nɛ je ɔ be mi nae hu; se nyɛ lɛɛ nyɛɛ ngɛ mi nae, ejakaa ye hɛ ngɛ, nɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ hɛ maa hi ngmengmle. 20Jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ maa le kaa i ngɛ ye tsɛ mi nɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ ngɛ ye mi nɛ imi hu i ngɛ nyɛ mi.
21“Nɔ nɛ ngɔɔ ye kita amɛ nɛ e yeɔ nɔ ɔ, lɛ ji nɔ nɛ suɔ mi; nɛ nɔ nɛ suɔ mi ɔ, Tsaatsɛ maa suɔ lɛ, nɛ imi hu ma suɔ lɛ, nɛ ma je ye he si ngɔ tsɔɔ lɛ.” 22Yuda, pi Iskariot ɔ, bi lɛ ke “Nyɔmtsɛ, mɛni ba he je nɛ wɔ kɛkɛ o ma je o he si ngɔ tsɔɔ nɛ o be jee ngɔ tsɔɔ je ɔ?” 23Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Ke nɔ ko suɔ mi ɔ, e maa ye ye munyu ɔ nɔ, nɛ Tsaatsɛ maa suɔ lɛ, nɛ wa maa ba e ngɔ, nɛ waa kɛ e ngɔ maa pee wa sihi he. 24Nɔ nɛ sume mi ɔ, e yi ye munyu nɔ. Nɛ munyu nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nue ɔ, pi ye nɔ, se mohu Tsɛ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ nɔ ʼi.
25“I de nyɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ be mi nɛ i kɛ nyɛ ngɛ nɛ ɔ. 26Se Hepiɛlɔ ɔ nɛ ji Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ, nɔ nɛ Tsɛ ɔ maa tsɔ ngɛ ye biɛ mi ɔ, lɛ e maa tsɔɔ nyɛ nihi kulaa, nɛ e ma kai nyɛ nihi tsuo nɛ i de nyɛ ɔ.
27“Hejɔmi i ngɛ sie ha nyɛ; hejɔmi nɛ ji ye nɔ ɔ i kɛ ngɛ nyɛ hae, pi bɔ nɛ je ɔ haa a nɛ i kɛ ngɛ nyɛ hae nɛ ɔ. Nyɛ ko ye nyɛ tsui, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu nyɛ ko ye gbeye. 28Nyɛ nu kaa i de nyɛ ke: ‘I yaa, nɛ ma ba nyɛ ngɔ.’ Nyɛ suɔ mi jinɛ nyɛ ma na bua jɔmi kaa i yaa Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ, ejakaa Tsaatsɛ kle pe mi. 29Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ, i de nyɛ loko e ba mi, konɛ ke e ba mi ɔ, nɛ nyɛ he nyɛɛ ye. 30I kɛ nyɛ be munyu tue fuu hu, ejakaa je ɔ mi matsɛ ɔ ma, se e be he wami ko nyɛ nyɛ nɔ. 31I peɔ bɔ nɛ Tsɛ ɔ fa mi ɔ konɛ je ɔ nɛ na le kaa i suɔ Tsɛ ɔ. Nyɛɛ te si, nyɛɛ ba waa je hiɛ ɔ!”

Title: YOHANE 15
Content:
Yesu ji wai tso nitsɛ ɔ nɛ
1“Imi ji wai tso nitsɛ ɔ nɛ, nɛ Tsaatsɛ ji ngmɔtsɛ ɔ nɛ. 2Ye he kɔni tsuaa kɔni nɛ wui yiblii ɔ, e poo, nɛ eko tsuaa eko nɛ woɔ yiblii ɔ, e sãa he, benɛ pee nɛ e wo yiblii pe kekle ɔ. 3Jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛ he je momo ngɛ munyu nɛ i kɛ nyɛ tu ɔ he. 4Nyɛɛ hi ye mi, nɛ imi hu ma hi nyɛ mi. Kaa bɔ nɛ tso kɔni be nyɛe maa je lɛ nitsɛ e mi nɛ e wo yiblii kaa ja e ma wai tso ɔ he ɔ, ja nyɛ hu nyɛ be nyɛe kaa ja nyɛ hi ye mi.
5“Imi ji wai tsɔ ɔ, nyɛ ji kɔni ɔmɛ. Nɔ nɛ hii ye mi nɛ imi hu i hii e mi ɔ, lɛ nɔuu lɛ e woɔ yiblii fuu; ejakaa ke pi imi ɔ, lɛɛ nyɛ be nɔ ko nyɛe maa pee. 6Ke nɔ ko hi ye mi ɔ, a sakee lɛ fɔɔ he kaa tso kɔni, nɛ e gbliɔ, nɛ a buaa nya ngɔ woɔ la mi, nɛ a sãa. 7Ke nyɛ hi ye mi nɛ ye munyu ɔ hi nyɛ mi ɔ, nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ ma kpa he pɛɛ ɔ, a maa pee ha nyɛ. 8Enɛ ɔ a kɛ woɔ Tsaatsɛ hɛ mi nyami, ke nyɛ wo yiblii fuu, nɛ nyɛ plɛ ye kaseli ɔ. 9Bɔ nɛ Tsɛ ɔ suɔ mi ɔ, ja imi hu i suɔ nyɛ; nyɛɛ hi si ngɛ ye suɔmi ɔ mi. 10Ke nyɛ ye ye kita amɛ a nɔ ɔ, nyɛ maa hi ye suɔmi ɔ mi; kaa bɔ nɛ imi hu i ye Tsaatsɛ kita amɛ a nɔ nɛ i ngɛ e suɔmi ɔ mi ɔ.
11“I de nyɛ enɛ ɔmɛ, konɛ ye bua jɔmi ɔ nɛ hi nyɛ mi, nɛ nyɛ bua jɔmi ɔ nɛ hyi. 12Enɛ ɔ ji ye kita a, kaa nyɛɛ suɔ nyɛ sibi kaa bɔ nɛ i suɔ nyɛ ɔ. 13Nɔ ko be suɔmi nɛ kle pe enɛ ɔ, kaa nɔ nɛ ngɔ e wami ngɔ fɔ si ha e huɛmɛ. 14Ke nyɛ pee nihi nɛ i ngɛ nyɛ he kita woe nɛ ɔ, lɛɛ ye huɛmɛ ji nyɛ. 15I tsɛ we nyɛ nyɔguɛhi hu, ejakaa nyɔguɛ li nɔ nɛ e nyɔmtsɛ peɔ; se mohu huɛmɛ i tsɛ nyɛ, ejakaa nihi tsuo nɛ i nu ngɛ Tsaatsɛ nya a, i wo nɔ ta de nyɛ. 16Tsa pi nyɛ nɛ nyɛ hla mi, se imi mohu lɛ i hla nyɛ, nɛ i to nyɛ konɛ nyɛ hu nyɛɛ ya nɛ nyɛ ya wo yiblii, nɛ nyɛ yiblii ɔ nɛ hi si; konɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ he pɛɛ nɛ nyɛ ma kpa Tsɛ ɔ ngɛ ye biɛ mi ɔ, e ngɔ ha nyɛ. 17Enɛ ɔ i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nyɛɛ suɔ nyɛ sibi.”
Je ɔ nyɛmi
18“Ke je ɔ nyɛ nyɛ ɔ, nyɛ na nɛ nyɛɛ le kaa imi kekle e nyɛ. 19Kaa je ɔ mi nyɛ je jinɛ, je ɔ maa suɔ lɛ nitsɛ e nihi, se akɛnɛ nyɛ ji je ɔ mi se imi mohu lɛ i hla nyɛ kɛ je je ɔ mi ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ he nɛ je ɔ nyɛɛ nyɛ ɔ nɛ. 20Nyɛ hɛ nɛ hi munyu nɛ i tu nyɛ ɔ nɔ ke: ‘Nyɔguɛ pa we e nyɔmtsɛ.’ Ke a wa mi yi mi ɔ, a maa wa nyɛ hu yi mi; ke a ye ye munyu ɔ nɔ ɔ, a maa ye nyɛ hu nyɛ nɔ ɔ nɔ. 21A maa ngɔ enɛ ɔmɛ tsuo ngɔ pee nyɛ ngɛ ye biɛ ɔ he, mɛni he je ɔ, a li nɔ nɛ tsɔ mi ɔ. 22I bɛ nɛ i kɛ mɛ ba tu munyu jinɛ, yayami ko be a he; se enɛ ɔ ɔ, a be a he yayami ɔ he nya jemi ko. 23Nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ mi ɔ, e ngɛ Tsaatsɛ hu nyɛe. 24Kaa i tsu we ni tsumihi nɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko tsu we eko hyɛ ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti jinɛ, yayami ko be a he; se enɛ ɔ lɛɛ a na nɛ kɛ ɔ, a ngɛ mi nyɛe kɛ Tsaatsɛ tsuo. 25Sa nɛ e ba jã benɛ pee nɛ munyu nɛ a ngma ngɛ Mlaa a mi ɔ nɛ ba mi ke: ‘A nyɛ mi gu!’
26“Se Hepiɛlɔ ɔ, nɛ ma tsɔ lɛ nyɛ ngɔ kɛ je Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ ɔ, nɔ nɛ ji anɔkuale Mumi ɔ nɛ jee Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ baa a, lɛ nɛ ke e ba a, e maa ye ye he odase; 27nɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ maa ye odase, ejakaa nyɛɛ kɛ mi lɛ ngɛ kɛ je sisije.”

Title: YOHANE 16
Content:
1I de nyɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ benɛ pee nɛ nyɛ nane nɛ ko kpata. O 2A maa fie nyɛ kɛ maa je kpe he ɔmɛ. Nɛ be maa ba tete nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ gbee nyɛ ɔ a ma susu kaa e kɛ ngɛ Mawu jae. 3Nɛ a maa pee enɛ ɔmɛ, ejakaa a li Tsɛ ɔ loo imi hulɔ. 4Se i de nyɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ, konɛ ke be ɔ su ɔ nɛ nyɛ kai kaa i wo nɔ ta de nyɛ, se kɛ je sisije ɔ i de we nyɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ, ejakaa i kɛ nyɛ lɛ ngɛ.
Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ nitsumi
5“Se jeha nɛ ɔ ɔ, fi yaa nɔ nɛ tso mi ɔ ngɔ, nɛ nyɛ ti nɔ ko bi we mi ke: ‘Jije o yaa?’ 6Se nɛ i wo ni nɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ ta de nya he je ɔ, kɔmɔ yemi hyi nyɛ tsui mi. 7Se kɛ̃ ɔ, i ngɛ nyɛ anɔkuale dee: e hi ha nyɛ kaa ma je; mɛni he je ɔ, ke i ji ɔ, Hepiɛlɔ ɔ be nyɛ ngɔ bae; se ke i je ɔ, ma ha e ba nyɛ ngɔ. 8Nɛ lɛɛ, ke e ba a, e ma kã je ɔ ngɛ yayami he kɛ dami he kɛ kojomi he: 9Yayami he, ejakaa a he we ye nɔ yi; 10dami he, ejakaa i yaa Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ, nɛ nyɛ be mi nae hu; 11kojomi he, ejakaa a kojo je ɔ mi matsɛ ɔ.
12“I ngɛ nihi fuu nɛ piɛ nɛ ma de nyɛ; se nyɛ be nyɛe he maa pɛtɛ amlɔ nɛ ɔ; 13se ke anɔkuale Mumi ɔ na ba a, e maa tsɔɔ nyɛ anɔkuale ɔ kulaa mi blɔ; ejakaa e be lɛ nitsɛ e yi mi toe kɛ tu munyu, se mohu nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ e maa nu ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ e ma de, nɛ nihi nɛ ma a, e maa wo nɔ ta de nyɛ. 14Lɛ e maa wo ye hɛ mi nyami, ejakaa e maa ngɔ ye nɔ ɔ eko nɛ e maa wo nɔ ta de nyɛ. 15Nihi tsuo nɛ ji Tsɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ, ye nɔ ʼi; lɔ ɔ he nɛ i de ke: ‘E maa ngɔ ye nɔ ɔ eko nɛ e wo nɔ ta de nyɛ’ ɔ nɛ.”
Kɔmɔ kɛ buajɔmi
16“E piɛ bɔɔ nɛ nyɛ be mi nae, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu e piɛ bɔɔ nɛ nyɛ maa na mi; ejakaa i yaa Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ.” 17Kɛkɛ nɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ bi a he ke: “Mɛni ji nɔ́ nɛ e ngɛ wɔ dee nɛ ɔ: ‘Epiɛ bɔɔ nɛ nyɛ be mi nae hu, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu, e piɛ bɔɔ nɛ nyɛ maa na mi,’ nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu; ‘I yaa Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ’? 18Lɔ ɔ he ɔ a ke: “Mɛni ji nɔ́ nɛ e ngɛ dee nɛ ɔ: ‘E piɛ bɔɔ’? Wa li nɔ́ nɛ e ngɛ dee nɛ ɔ.” 19Jeha nɛ ɔ Yesu na kaa a ngɛ hlae nɛ a bi lɛ, nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nɛ i ke e piɛ bɔɔ nɛ nyɛ be mi nae hu, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu e piɛ bɔɔ nɛ nyɛ maa na mi ɔ, lɔ ɔ nyɛ ngɛ nyɛ he bie nɛ ɔ? 20I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ ma fo nɛ nyɛ maa wo ya, se je ɔ ma nya. Nyɛ lɛɛ nyɛ maa ye kɔmɔ, se nyɛ kɔmɔ yemi ɔ ma plɛ bua jɔmi. 21Ke yo nu kɔɔmi ɔ, e haoɔ, ejakaa e ngmlɛfia a su. Se benɛ e fɔ bi ɔ se ɔ, e kai we dengme ɔ hu ngɛ bua jɔmi nɛ e naa kaa e fɔ nɔmlɔ kɛ ba je ɔ mi ɔ he. 22Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ hu, jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛ ngɛ kɔmɔ yee mohu, se ma na nyɛ ekohu, nɛ nyɛ tsui maa nɔ nyɛ mi, nɛ nyɛ bua jɔmi ɔ, na ko be kpɔe ngɛ nyɛ dɛ.
23“Jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, nyɛ be mi nɔ́ ko nɔ́ bie. I ngɛ nyɛ dee anɔkuale mi ke: Nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ he pɛɛ nɛ nyɛ ma kpa Tsɛ ɔ ngɛ ye biɛ mi ɔ, e ma ha nyɛ. 24Kɛ ba si amlɔ nɛ ɔ ɔ, nyɛ kpa we nɔ́ ko he pɛɛ ngɛ ye biɛ mi; nyɛ kpa pɛɛ nɛ nyɛ ma na, konɛ nyɛ bua jɔmi ɔ nɛ hyi.”
Je ɔ nɔ kunimiyemi
25“Ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, abɛhi a mi i kɛ nyɛ ngɛ tue ngɛ ɔ nɛ; se be ma nɛ i kɛ nyɛ be munyu tue ngɛ abɛhi a mi hu, se mohu paa ma jaje tsɛ ɔ he sane ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ. 26Jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, nyɛ ma kpa pɛɛ ngɛ ye biɛ mi, se i de we nyɛ ke imi lɛ ma bi Tsɛ ɔ ha nyɛ, 27ejakaa Tsɛ ɔ nitsɛ suɔ nyɛ, mɛni he je ɔ, nyɛ hu nyɛ suɔ mi, nɛ nyɛ he ye kaa Mawu ngɔ i je. 28Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ i je kɛ ba je ɔ mi, jeha nɛ ɔ hu, i ngɛ je ɔ mi jee kɛ yaa Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ.”
29Ekaseli ɔmɛ de lɛ ke: “Oʼɛ, jeha nɛ ɔ o tu munyu faii nɛ o tu we munyu ngɛ abɛhi a mi. 30Jeha nɛ ɔ wa kɔ se kaa o le nihi tsuo nɛ e hia we kaa nɔ ko nɛ bi mo sane ko. Enɛ ɔ waa kɛ heɔ yeɔ kaa Mawu ngɔ o je.” 31Yesu he nɔ nɛ e ke: “Jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛ ngɛ hee ngɛ yee lo? 32oʼɛ, ngmlɛfia a ma, nɛ e su po, nɛ nyɛ maa gbɛ fia nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ maa ngɔ e blɔ, nɛ nyɛ maa je ye nɔ kake he; se pi ye nɔ kake ʼi, ejakaa Tsɛ ɔ kɛ mi ngɛ. 33I de nyɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ, konɛ nyɛɛ wo nyɛ bua ngɛ ye mi. Je nɛ ɔ mi ɔ he hiami nyɛ ma na, se kɛ ɔ, nyɛ tsui nɛ nɔ nyɛ mi. I ye je ɔ nɔ kunimi!”

Title: YOHANE 17
Content:
Yesu kpa pɛɛ kɛ ha e kaseli ɔmɛ
1Benɛ Yesu de ni nɛ ɔmɛ se ɔ, e wo e hɛ nɔ kɛ ya hiɔwe, nɛ e ke: “Tsaatsɛ, ngmlɛfia a su. Wo o bi ɔ hɛ mi nyami, konɛ o bi ɔ hu nɛ wo o hɛ mi nyami. 2Ejakaa o ha lɛ he blɔ ngɛ he lo tsuo nɔ, konɛ nihi tsuo nɛ o ngɔ ha lɛ ɔ, e ha mɛ neene wami. 3Se enɛ ɔ ji neneene wami ɔ nɛ, kaa a le mo, anɔkuale Mawu kake ɔ, kɛ Yesu Kristo nɔ nɛ o tsɔ ɔ. 4Imi lɛɛ i wo o hɛ mi nyami ngɛ zugba a nɔ, akɛnɛ ni tsumi ɔ nɛ o ha mi tsumi ɔ i gbe nya a. 5Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ, Tsaatsɛ, ngɔɔ hɛ mi nyami nɛ i ngɛ ngɛ o ngɔ loko a bɔ je ɔ ngɔ wo ye hɛ mi nyami.
6“I je o biɛ ɔ si ngɔ tsɔɔ nimli nɛ o ngɔ kɛ je je ɔ mi ha mi ɔ. O nihi ji mɛ, nɛ o ngɔ mɛ ngɔ ha mi, nɛ a ye o munyu ɔ nɔ. 7Jeha nɛ ɔ a le kaa nihi kulaa nɛ o ngɔ ha mi ɔ, o ngɔ a je, 8ejakaa munyu ɔmɛ nɛ ɔ ngɔ ha mi ɔ, i ngɔ ha mɛ; nɛ a he, nɛ a na le faii kaa o ngɔ i je, nɛ a he ye kaa mo lɛ o tsɔ mi. 9Imi lɛɛ, mɛ i ngɛ pɛɛ kpae kɛ ngɛ hae; tsa pi je ɔ nɛ i ngɛ pɛɛ kpae kɛ ngɛ hae, se mohu nihi nɛ o ngɔ ha mi ɔ, ejakaa o nihi ji mɛ; 10nɛ ye nihi tsuo kulaa a, o nɔ ʼi, nɛ o nɔ hu ɔ, ye nɔ ʼi, nɛ ye hɛ mi ba nyami ngɛ a mi. 11Nɛ i be je ɔ mi hu, se ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ je ɔ mi, nɛ imi lɛɛ i ma o ngɔ. Tsaatsɛ klɔuklɔu, nihi nɛ o ngɔ ha mi ɔ, to mɛ ngɛ o biɛ ɔ mi, benɛ pee nɛ a pee kake kaa wɔ. 12Benɛ i kɛ mɛ ngɛ je ɔ mi ɔ, i to mɛ ngɛ o biɛ ɔ mi; nihi nɛ o ngɔ ha mi ɔ, i bu a he, nɛ a ti nɔ ko nɔ ko laa we, ja laami bi ɔ, konɛ nɔ́ nɛ a ngma a nɛ ba mi. 13Se jeha nɛ ɔ ɔ, i ma o ngɔ, nɛ i ngɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ dee ngɛ je ɔ mi, konɛ a na ye bua jɔmi ɔ nɛ e nu si ngɛ a mi? 14I ngɔ o munyu ɔ ngɔ ha mɛ, nɛ je ɔ ngɛ mɛ nyɛe, ejakaa a ji je ɔ mi, kaa bɔ nɛ imi hu i ji je ɔ mi ɔ? 15I bi we kaa o je mɛ kɛ je je ɔ mi, se mohu kaa o bu a he kɛ je nɛ ɔ yayami ɔ dɛ mi. 16A ji je ɔ mi kaa bɔ nɛ imi hu i ji je ɔ mi ɔ. 17Pee mɛ klɔuklɔu ngɛ anɔkuale ɔ mi; o munyu ɔ anɔkuale ʼi. 18Kaa bɔ nɛ o tsɔ mi je ɔ mi ɔ, ja nɔuu imi hu i ngɛ mɛ je ɔ mi tsɔe. 19Nɛ a he nɛ imi nitsɛ i peɔ ye he klɔuklɔu ɔ nɛ, konɛ mɛ hu a pee mɛ klɔuklɔu ngɛ anɔkuale mi.
20“Se pi ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he kɛkɛ nɛ i ngɛ pɛɛ kpae ngɛ ɔ, se nihi nɛ ma he ye nɔ maa ye ngɛ a munyu ɔ nya a hulɔ. 21Konɛ mɛ tsuo a pee kake, kaa bɔ nɛ mo, Tsaatsɛ, o ngɛ ye mi nɛ imi hu i ngɛ o mi ɔ, konɛ mɛ hu a pee kake ngɛ wa mi, konɛ je ɔ nɛ he ye kaa mo lɛ o tsɔ mi. 22Nɛ hɛ mi nyami nɛ o ngɔ ha mi ɔ, i ngɔ ha mɛ, konɛ sa pee kake, kaa bɔ nɛ wɔ hu wa ngɛ kake ɔ. 23I ngɛ a mi, nɛ mo hu o ngɛ yɛ mi, konɛ a pee kake kɛ pi si, nɛ je ɔ nɛ le kaa mo lɛ o tsɔ mi, nɛ o suɔ mɛ kaa bɔ nɛ o suɔ mi ɔ.
24“Tsaatsɛ, nihi nɛ o ngɔ ha mi ɔ i suɔ kaa he nɛ i ngɛ ɔ mɛ hu a kɛ mi ba hi lejɛ ɔ, konɛ a na ye hɛ mi nyami nɛ o ngɔ ha mi ɔ, ejakaa o suɔ mi loko a to je ɔ sisi. 25Tsaatsɛ dalɔ, je ɔ li mo, se imi lɛɛ i le mo, nɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ le kaa mo lɛ o tsɔ mi; 26nɛ i je o biɛ ɔ si ngɔ tsɔɔ mɛ, nɛ ma kpale je lɛ si ngɔ tsɔɔ, konɛ suɔmi nɛ o kɛ suɔ mi ɔ nɛ hi a mi nɛ imi hu ma hi a mi.”

Title: YOHANE 18
Content:
Yesu numi
(Mateo 26.47-56; Marko 14.43-50; Luka 22.47-53)
1Benɛ Yesu tu munyu nɛ ɔmɛ se ɔ, e kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ je kpo nɛ a ya po Kedron pa a kɛ ho he nɛ abɔɔ ko ngɛ ɔ ya, nɛ e kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ sɛ mi. 2Se Yuda, nɔ nɛ ya tsɔɔ e se blɔ ɔ, hu le lejɛ ɔ, ejakaa Yesu kɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ pɔɔ kpemi ngɛ lejɛ ɔ. 3Jeha nɛ ɔ Yuda ya ngɔ aslaafohi kɛ tsɔli kɛ je osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a ngɔ, nɛ a hɛɛ kanehi kɛ hahi kɛ dadehi kɛ ba lejɛ ɔ. 4Akɛnɛ Yesu le nihi tsuo nɛ ma e nɔ ɔ, e je kpo nɛ e bi mɛ ke: “Mɛnɔ nyɛ ngɛ hlae?” 5A he nɔ ke: “Yesu Nazareno ɔ.” Yesu de mɛ ke: “Imi ji nɛ ɔ nɛ.” Se Yuda, nɔ nɛ ya tsɔɔ e se blɔ ɔ hu kɛ mɛ daa si. 6Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ e de mɛ ke: “Imi ji nɛ ɔ” ɔ, a gbee senya senya nɛ a ya pue si. 7Kɛkɛ nɛ e kpale bi mɛ ekohu ke: “Mɛnɔ nyɛ ngɛ hlae?” Nɛ a ke: “Yesu, Nazareno ɔ.” 8Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “I de nyɛ ke: Ami ʼi; lɔ ɔ he ɔ ke imi nyɛ ngɛ hlae ɔ, lɛɛ nyɛ ha ni nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ a ya.” 9(Konɛ munyu nɛ a tu ke: “Nihi nɛ o ngɔ ha mi ɔ, i ha we nɛ a ti nɔ ko nɛ laa” a nɛ ba mi.) 10Kɛkɛ nɛ Simon Petro nɛ hɛɛ klaate ɔ hia nɛ e kɛ ja osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a nyɔguɛ ɔ nɛ e po e hiɛ ɔ nɔ tue; se nyɔguɛ ɔ biɛ ji Malko. 11Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yesu de Petro ke: “Ngɔɔ o klaate ɔ ngɔ wo e kpo ɔ mi. Anɛ kplu nɛ Tsaatsɛ ngɔ ha mi ɔ, ma ko nu lo?”
Yesu ngɛ Hana hɛ mi
12Kɛkɛ nɛ aslaafo ɔmɛ kɛ asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a kɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a tsɔli ɔmɛ nu Yesu nɛ a fi lɛ, 13nɛ a kpaka lɛ kɛ ho Hana ngɔ ya kekle, ejakaa Kaiafa nɛ ngɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma yee ngɛ lɛ jeha a nɔ ɔ ngatsɛ ji lɛ. 14Kaiafa ji nɔ nɛ wo Yudafo ɔmɛ ga kaa e hi kaa nɔ kake gboɔ ngɛ ma a nane mi ɔ nɛ.
Petro kua Yesu
(Mateo 26.69-70; Marko 14.66-68; Luka 22.55-57)
15Nɛ Simon Petro kɛ kaselɔ kpa ko hu nyɛɛ Yesu se. Se osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a le jamɛ a kaselɔ ɔ, nɛ e kɛ Yesu sɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a mɔ ɔ kpo ɔ kpɛti; 16se Petro daa si ngɛ agbo ɔ se. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jamɛ a kaselɔ kpã a nɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a le ɔ je kpo, nɛ e ya de yo nɛ ngɛ sinya a nya bue ɔ, nɛ e ngɔ Petro kɛ ba we ɔ mi. 17Kɛkɛ nɛ yiheyo ɔ nɛ ngɛ sinya a nya bue ɔ de Petro ke: “Tse mo hu nyumu nɛ ɔ kaseli ɔmɛ eko ji mo?” E ke: “Dɛbi.”
18Se nyɔguɛ ɔmɛ kɛ sɔmɔli ɔmɛ daa si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, a kɛ hã slɛ la, ejakaa fiɛ ngɛ, nɛ a ngɛ la hluee; nɛ Petro hu kɛ mɛ daa si ngɛ la a eko hluee.
Osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a bi Yesu sane
(Mateo 26.59-66; Marko 14.55-64; Luka 22.66-71)
19Jeha nɛ ɔ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a bi Yesu e kaseli ɔmɛ kɛ e tsɔɔmi ɔ he munyu. 20Yesu he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Pãa i tuɔ munyu kɛ tsɔɔ je ɔ. Daa nɛ ɔ i tsɔɔ ni ngɛ kpe he ɔmɛ kɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, he nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ tsuo kpee ngɛ ɔ, nɛ i de we nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko ngɛ laami mi. 21Mɛni he je o ngɛ imi mohu bie? Bi ninɛmɛ nɛ ba buɔ mi tue ɔ nɔ́n ɛ i deɔ mɛ; oʼɛ, ni nɛ ɔmɛ le nihi nɛ i deɔ ɔ.” 22Se benɛ e de kikɛ ɔ, sɔmɔli nɛ daa si ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake gba Yesu ma nɛ e ke: “Heto nɛ o ha osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a ji nɛ ɔ?” 23Yesu he nɔ ke: “Ke i de nɔ́ yaya ko ɔ, ye nɔ́ yaya a he odase, se ke kpakpa a, mɛni he je o ngɛ mi gbee?”
24Nɛ Hana ha a kɛ lɛ ya osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma Kaiafa ngɔ ngɛ kpa mi.
Petro kua Yesu ekohu
(Mateo 26.71-75; Marko 14.69-72; Luka 22.58-62)
25Se Simon Petro daa si nɛ e ngɛ la hluee. Jeha nɛ ɔ a de lɛ ke: “Tse mo hu e kaseli ɔmɛ e ko ji mo?” E kua nɛ e ke: “Dɛbi.” 26Osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a nyɔguɛ ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake nɛ ji nɔ nɛ Petro po e tue ɔ wekuno ɔ, ke: “Anɛ i nɛ o kɛ lɛ ngɛ abɔɔ ɔ mi lo?” 27Nɛ Petro kua ekohu, kɛkɛ nɛ nɔuu nɛ kungwɔ kpa nɔ.
Yesu ngɛ Pilato hɛ mi
(Mateo 27.1-2, 11-14; Marko 15.1-5; Luka 23.1-5)
28Kɛkɛ nɛ a kpaka Yesu kɛ je Kaiafa ngɔ kɛ ho kojomi he ɔ ya. Nɛ e su makɛ. Mɛ nitsɛmɛ ɔ lɛɛ a sɛ we kojomi he ɔ, konɛ a ko ble a he, benɛ pee nɛ a nyɛ nɛ a ye Hetsɔmi ɔ. 29Jeha nɛ ɔ Pilato je kpo kɛ ba a ngɔ nɛ e ke: “Mɛni sane nyɛɛ kɛ ba ngɛ nyumu nɛ ɔ nɔ fɔe?” 30A he nɔ nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Pi yayami peelɔ ji lɛ jinɛ waa kɛ lɛ ba be mo hae.” 31Kɛkɛ nɛ Pilato de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ngɔ lɛ nɛ nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ ya kojo lɛ ngɛ nyɛ mlaa a nya.” Yudafo ɔmɛ de lɛ ke: “Wɔɔ lɛɛ wa be he blɔ kaa wa gbee nɔ ko.” 32(Konɛ Yesu munyu nɛ e tu kɛ tsɔɔ nɔ gbenɔ nɛ e ma gbo ɔ nɛ ba mi.) 33Kɛkɛ nɛ Pilato kpale sɛ kojomi he ɔ ekohu, nɛ e tsɛ Yesu nɛ e bi lɛ ke: “Anɛ mo ji Yudafo ɔmɛ a matsɛ ɔ lo?” 34Yesu he nɔ ke: “Mo nitsɛ o yi mi o to ngɛ enɛ ɔ dee nɛ ɔ, aloo ni komɛ lɛ a de mo ja ngɛ ye he?” 35Pilato he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Anɛ Yuda no ji mi lo? Mo nitsɛ o ma mi bi kɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ lɛ a ngɔ mo ha mi. Mɛni o pee?” 36Yesu he nɔ ke: “Ye matsɛ yemi ɔ ji je nɛ ɔ mi; ye matsɛ yemi ɔ je je nɛ ɔ mi jinɛ, ye sɔmɔli ɔmɛ maa plee he, konɛ a ko ngɔ mi ngɔ ha Yudafo ɔmɛ; se enɛ ɔ ɔ, ye matsɛ yemi ɔ ji hiɛ ɔ.” 37Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Pilato bi lɛ ke: “Lɛɛ matsɛ ji mo kɛ̃ lo?” Yesu he nɔ ke: “Jã o de ɔ nɛ; ejakaa matsɛ ji mi. Imi lɛɛ enɛ ɔ he a fɔ mi, nɛ enɛ ɔ he nɔuu i ba je ɔ mi ngɛ, konɛ ma ba ye anɔkuale ɔ he odase. Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ je anɔkuale ɔ mi ɔ nuɔ ye gbi.” 38Pilato bi lɛ ke: “Mɛni ji anɔkuale?”
A bu Yesu gbenɔ fɔ
(Mateo 27.15-31; Marko 15.6-20; Luka 23.13-25)
Nɛ benɛ e de enɛ ɔ ɔ, e je kpo kɛ ho Yudafo ɔmɛ a ngɔ ya ekohu, nɛ e ya de mɛ ke: “Imi lɛɛ i nɛ fɔ bumi sane ko kulaa ngɛ e he. 39Se nyɛ ngɛ blɔ nya ko kaa i ngmɛɔ nɔ kake he haa nyɛ ngɛ Hetsɔmi nyami ligbi ɔ nɔ; lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ suɔ nɛ ma ngmɛɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a matsɛ ɔ he ha nyɛ lo?” 40Kɛkɛ nɛ mɛ tsuo a kpa ngmlaa ekohu ke: “Tsa pi nɔ nɛ ɔ, se Baraba mohu!” Kpahu Baraba a ojo fialɔ ji lɛ.

Title: YOHANE 19
Content:
1Kɛkɛ nɛ Pilato ngɔ Yesu nɛ e fia lɛ kplibi, 2nɛ aslaafo ɔmɛ ngɔ mio kɛ pee jlasi nɛ a kɛ fi e yi, nɛ a wo lɛ tade tsutsu ko, 3nɛ a ba e ngɔ ba de ke: “Wa nga mo oo, Yudafohi a matsɛ!” Nɛ a gba e hɛ mi ma.
4Kɛkɛ nɛ Pilato je kpo ekohu nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Oʼɛ, i kɛ lɛ ngɛ kpo jee kɛ ma nyɛ ngɔ, konɛ nyɛ na le kaa i nɛ fɔbumi sane ko ngɛ e he.” 5Jeha nɛ ɔ Yesu je kpo nɛ mio jlasi ɔ fi e yi nɛ e wo tade tsutsu ɔ. Nɛ Pilato de mɛ ke: “Ne nɔmlɔ ɔ!” 6Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ sɔmɔli ɔmɛ na lɛ ɔ, a kpa ngmlaa ke: “Sɛu lɛ, sɛu lɛ!” Pilato de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛɛ ngɔ lɛ nɛ nyɛ ya sɛu mɔ, ejakaa imi lɛɛ i nɛ fɔ bumi sane ko ngɛ e he.” 7Yudafo ɔmɛ he nɔ ke: “Wɔɔ lɛɛ wa ngɛ Mlaa, nɛ wa Mlaa a nya a, e sa gbenɔ, ejakaa e pee e he Mawu bi.”
8Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, benɛ Pilato nu kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔ, e ye gbeye pe kekle ɔ; 9nɛ e sɛ kojomi he ɔ ekohu, nɛ e bi Yesu ke: “Jije o je?” Se Yesu pui e nya mi. 10Nɛ Pilato de lɛ ke: “O be ye nya mi poe? Anɛ o li kaa i ngɛ he blɔ kaa i sɛuu mo, nɛ i ngɛ he blɔ hulɔ kaa i ngmɛɔ o he lo?” 11Yesu de lɛ ke: “Ke pi hiɔwe nɛ a je ngɔ ha mo ɔ, jinɛ o be he wami ko nae ngɛ ye nɔ; lɔ ɔ he ɔ nɔ nɛ je mi wo o dɛ mi ɔ he yayami ɔ kle pe o nɔ ɔ.” 12Kɛ je lɔ ɔ se ɔ Pilato hla kaa e maa ngmɛɛ e he; se Yudafo ɔmɛ kpa ngmlaa ke: “Ke o ngmɛɛ nɔ nɛ ɔ he ɔ, o pi Kaisare huɛ. Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ peɔ e he matsɛ ɔ, e te si ngɔ wo Kaisare.” 13Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, benɛ Pilato nu kekɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔ ɔ, e kɛ Yesu je kpo, nɛ e ya hi kojomi sɛ ɔ nɔ, ngɛ he nɛ a ka tɛ ngɛ, nɛ Hebri mi ɔ a tsɛɛ lɛ Gabata a.
14Se Hetsɔmi ɔ dlami kɛ tomi ligbi ʼi, nɛ maa pee piani ngmlɛ nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ mi. Nɛ Pilato de Yudafo ɔmɛ ke: “Ne nyɛ matsɛ ɔ!” 15Se mɛɛ lɛɛ a kpa ngmlaa ke: “O kɛ lɛ nɛ ya, o kɛ lɛ nɛ ya! Sɛu lɛ!” Pilato bi mɛ ko: “Nyɛ matsɛ ɔ, ma sɛu lɛ lo?” Osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ he nɔ ke: “Wa be matsɛ ko kaa ja Kaisare.”
A sɛu Yesu
(Mateo 27.32-44; Marko 15.21-32; Luka 23.26-43)
16Kɛkɛ nɛ e ngɔ lɛ ngɔ ha mɛ nɛ a ya sɛu. Nɛ a ngo Yesu kɛ ho. 17Nɛ lɛ nitse e tloo e seumi tso ɔ kɛ ya he nɛ a tsɛɛ Yikoklodonya, nɛ Hebri mi ɔ a tsɛɛ lɛ Golgota a. 18Lejɛ ɔ a ya sɛu lɛ ngɛ; nɛ a kɛ ni kpahi enyɔ piɛ e he, nɔ kake ngɛ hiɛ ɔ, nɛ nɔ kɛke hu ngɛ hiɛ ɔ, nɛ Yesu ngɛ a kpɛti. 19Nɛ Pilato ngma womi ko ngɔ mɛtɛ e seumi tso ɔ yi mi; bɔ nɛ e ngma ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: “Yesu, Nazareno, Yudafo ɔmɛ a matsɛ ɔ.” 20Womi nɛ ɔ ɔ, Yudafo ɔmɛ a ti nihi fuu kane, ejakaa he nɛ a sɛu Yesu ngɛ ɔ kɛ ma a mi kɛ we; nɛ a ngma ngɛ Hebri kɛ Hela kɛ Roma gbi mi. 21Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yudafo ɔmɛ a osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ de Pilato ke: “Koo ngma ke: ‘Yudafo ɔmɛ a matsɛ ɔ’ se mohu kaa lɛ lɛ e de ke: ‘Ami ji Yudafo ɔmɛ a matsɛ ɔ.’ ” 22Pilato he nɔ ke: “Nɔ nɛ i ngma a, i ngma.”
23Benɛ aslaafo ɔmɛ sɛu Yesu se ɔ, a kukuɔ e tade ɔmɛ, nɛ a dla mi mi dlami eywiɛ, aslaafo no kake nɔ́ kake, kɛ e gugue tade ɔ hulɔ. Se gugue tade ɔ be tsami he; a lo kɛ je hiɔwe kɛ ba ma si. 24Lɔ ɔ he ɔ a de ngɛ a kpɛti ke: “Nyɛ ko ha nɛ wa gba kɔlɔ ɔ, se nyɛ ha waa fɔ nɔ sɔ, konɛ waa na nɔ nɛ nɔ́ nɛ e maa pee.” Benɛ pee nɛ ngmami ɔ nɛ de ke:
‘A dla ye tade ɔmɛ ngɔ ha a he,
Nɛ ye he bo ɔ a fɔ́ nɔ sɔ’
ɔ nɛ ba mi. Enɛ ɔ ji nɔ́ nɛ aslaafo ɔmɛ pee ɔ nɛ.
25Se Yesu nyɛ kɛ e nyɛ nyɛmi yo, Maria, Klopa yo ɔ, kɛ Maria Magdalena daa si ngɛ Yesu sɛumi tso ɔ kasa nya. 26Nɛ, benɛ Yesu na e nyɛ kɛ kaselɔ nɛ e suɔ ɔ daa si ɔ, e de e nyɛ ke: “Maa, o bi ji nɛ ɔ nɛ!” 27Pee se ɔ, e de kaselɔ ɔ ke: “Oʼɛ, o nyɛ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ!” Nɛ kɛ je lɛ ngmlɛfia a nɔ ɔ, kaselɔ ɔ ngɔ lɛ kɛ ho lɛ nitsɛ e we mi ya.
Yesu gbenɔ
(Mateo 27.45-56; Marko 15.33-41; Luka 23.44-49)
28Nɛ enɛ ɔ se ɔ, akɛnɛ Yesu le kaa a gbe nihi kulaa nya momo ɔ, benɛ pee nɛ ngmami ɔ nɛ na ba mi ɔ, e ke: “Kuma ngɛ mi yee.” 29Jeha nɛ ɔ nɔ́ maa si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ke e mi da nɛ kuã tɔtɔɔtɔ; nɛ a ngɔ wosuma ngɔ sɔ da nɛ kua a mi, nɛ a ngɔ ma paploo nya, nɛ a ngɔ to e nya he. 30Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ Yesu he da nɛ kuã a, e ke: “A gbe nya!” Kɛkɛ nɛ e ma e yi si, nɛ e ngɔ e nya.
A gbɔ Yesu kasa mi nɔ́
31Kɛkɛ nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ ya kpa Pilato pɛɛ ke a kuɔ a nanehi nɛ a je mɛ, benɛ pee nɛ a gbogboe ɔmɛ ko hi seumi tso ɔ nɔ ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ, ejakaa he dlami kɛ tomi ligbi ʼi, nɛ jamɛ a Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ ji ligbi ngua. 32Lɔ ɔ he ɔ aslaafo ɔmɛ ho nɛ a ya kuɔ nihi nɛ a sɛu ngɔ piɛ Yesu he ɔmɛ a nanehi, kekleekle nɔ ɔ kɛ nɔ nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ tsuo. 33Se benɛ a su Yesu nɔ nɛ a na kaa e gbo momo ɔ, lɛɛ a kuɔ we e nanehi; 34se mohu aslaafo ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake kɛ blɔ gbɔ e kasa mi, nɛ amlɔ ɔ muɔ kɛ nyu be kɛ je mi. 35Nɛ nɔ nɛ na a, lɛ e ye he odase nɛ ɔ nɛ, e odase ɔ anɔkuale ʼi, nɛ e le kaa anɔkuale e ngɛ tue, konɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ he ye. 36Ejakaa a pee ni nɛ ɔmɛ, konɛ nɔ́ nɛ a ngma ke: “A be e wu ko kue” ɔ nɛ ba mi. 37Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu, ngmami kpa ko ke: “A maa hyɛ nɔ nɛ a gbɔ lɛ nɔ ɔ.”
Yesu pumi
(Mateo 27.57-61; Marko 15.42-47; Luka 23.50-56)
38Ni nɛ ɔmɛ a se ɔ, Yosef nɛ je Arimatia nɛ ji Yesu kaselɔ, se Yudafo ɔmɛ a he gbeye he ɔ e je we e he si ɔ, ya bi Pilato, konɛ e ha nɛ e ya je Yesu gbogboe ɔ; nɛ Pilato ha lɛ he blɔ. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e ho nɛ e ya je Yesu gebogboe ɔ kɛ ho. 39Nɛ Nikodemo, nɔ nɛ kekle ko nɛ e ba Yesu ngɔ nyɔ mi ɔ, hu kɛ mire kɛ aloe nɛ a futu maa pee sɛni tɛ jiɔmi lafa ba. 40Kɛkɛ nɛ a ngɔ Yesu gbogboe ɔ nɛ a kɛ kploba kɛ tsopa amɛ fi lɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ Yudafohi peɔ kɛ puɔ nɔ ɔ. 41Se he nɛ a sɛu Yesu ngɛ ɔ, abɔɔ ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, nɛ yɔkɔ he ko ngɛ abɔɔ ɔ mi nɛ a tui no ko ngɛ mi hyɛ; 42lɔ ɔ he ɔ, a ya dla Yesu ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ngɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a he dlami kɛ tomi ligbi ɔ he, ejakaa yɔkɔ ɔ he kɛ we.

Title: YOHANE 20
Content:
Yɔkɔ mi gu ɔ
(Mateo 28.1-8; Marko 16.1-8; Luka 24.1-12)
1Jeha nɛ ɔ, otsi ɔ mi kekleekle ligbi ɔ nɔ makɛ mla benɛ zugba mi tɛ̃ lolo ɔ, Maria Magdalena ba yɔkɔ ɔ he, nɛ e na kaa a je tɛ ɔ kɛ je muɔ ɔ nya. 2Kɛkɛ nɛ e sa fo, nɛ e ba Simon Petro kɛ kaselɔ kake nɛ Yesu suɔ ɔ ngɔ, nɛ e ba de mɛ ke: “A wo Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kɛ je muɔ ɔ mi, nɛ wa li he nɛ a kɛ lɛ ya fɔ.” 3Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Petro kɛ jamɛ a kaselɔ kake ɔ je kpo, nɛ a pue nɔ kɛ yaa yɔkɔ ɔ he. 4Mɛ ni enyɔ ɔ tsuo wo fo; se kaselɔ kake ɔ be Petro he, nɛ lɛ kekle e ya su yɔkɔ ɔ he; 5nɛ benɛ e kɔkɔ e yi si nɛ e hyɛ mi ɔ, e na kploba amɛ nɛ a pueɔ si, se e sɛ we yɔkɔ ɔ mi. 6Kɛkɛ nɛ Simon nyɛɛ e se kɛ ba, nɛ e ba sɛ muɔ ɔ mi, nɛ e na kploba amɛ nɛ a pueɔ si; 7se duku nɛ a kɛ fi e yi ɔ fɔ we si ngɛ kploba amɛ a kasa nya, se mohu e fɔɔ si ngɛ he kpa banee bɔ nɛ a fi ɔ. 8Kɛkɛ nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ kaselɔ kake ɔ hu nɛ ba yɔkɔ ɔ he kekle ɔ sɛ mi, nɛ e na, nɛ e he ye; 9(ejakaa a na we nɛ a le ngami ɔ nɛ deɔ ke ja e te si kɛ je gbeje ɔ.) 10Kɛkɛ nɛ kaseli ɔmɛ kpale a se kɛ ho a we mi ya.
Yesu je e he kpo tsɔɔ Maria Magdalena (Mateo 28.9-10; Marko 16.9-11)
11Se Maria daa si ngɛ yɔkɔ ɔ se je ngɛ ya foe. Nɛ benɛ e ngɛ ya a foe ɔ, e kɔkɔ e yi si nɛ e hyɛ muɔ ɔ mi, 12nɛ e na hiɔwe bɔfohi enyɔ nɛ a wo ni hiɔ nɛ a hii si ngɛ he nɛ Yesu gbogboe ɔ fɔ si ngɛ ɔ, nɔ kake ngɛ e yi je, nɛ nɔ kake hu ngɛ e nane si je. 13Nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Maa, mɛni he je o ngɛ ya foe?” E de mɛ ke: “Ejakaa a wo ye Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kɛ ho, nɛ i li he nɛ a kɛ lɛ ya fɔ.” 14Nɛ benɛ e de enɛ ɔ ɔ, e plɛ e he nɛ e hyɛ e se, nɛ e na Yesu daa si, se e li kaa Yesu. 15Yesu bi lɛ ke: “Maa, mɛni he je o ngɛ ya foe? Mɛnɔ o ngɛ hlae?” Maria susu kaa be nɛ ɔ mi ɔ abɔɔ mi dlalɔ ɔ ʼi, nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Etsɛ ke mo lɛ o wo lɛ kɛ je hiɛ ɔ ɔ, tsɔɔ mi he nɛ o kɛ lɛ ya fɔ̃, konɛ ma ya wo lɛ.” 16Yesu de lɛ ke: “Maria!” Nɛ Maria plɛ e he, nɛ e de lɛ ngɛ Hebri mi ke: “Rabuni” (e sisi ji: Tsɔɔlɔ.) 17Yesu de lɛ ke: “Koo ta ye he; ejakaa i na we ma ya hiɔwe ngɛ Tsaatsɛ ngɔ lolo; se yaa ye nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ a ngɔ nɛ o ya de mɛ ke: I yaa hiɔwe ngɛ Tsaatsɛ kɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ tsɛ kɛ ye Mawu kɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ Mawu ɔ ngɔ.” 18Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, Maria Magdalena ba nɛ e ba sɛɛ ha kaseli ɔmɛ ke e na Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ, nɛ bɔ nɛ e kɛ lɛ tu munyu ha ji nɛ ɔ nɛ.
Yesu je e he kpo tsɔɔ e kaseli ɔmɛ
(Mateo 28.16-20; Marko 16.14-18; Luka 24.36-49)
19Jeha nɛ ɔ jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɛ ji otsi ɔ mi kekleekle ligbi ɔ nɔ gbɔkuɛ ɔ nɔuu, benɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a he gbeye he je ɔ a nga he nɛ kaseli ɔmɛ bua a he nya ɔ sinya amɛ ɔ, Yesu ba nɛ e ba da a kpɛti nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ he manye!” 20Nɛ benɛ e de ja a, e ngɔ e dɛ mi kɛ e kasa a ngɔ tsɔɔ mɛ. Kɛkɛ nɛ kaseli ɔmɛ na bua jɔmi kaa a na Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ. 21Jeha nɛ ɔ Yesu kpale de mɛ ekohu ke: “Nyɛ he manye! Bɔ nɛ Tsɛ ɔ tsɔ mi ɔ, ja imi hj i ngɛ nyɛ tsɔe ɔ nɛ.” 22Nɛ benɛ e de ja a, e mu ngɔ pue a nɔ, nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ he Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ! 23Nihi a he yayami nɛ nyɛ ma ngɔ pa a, a ngɔ pa; nɛ nihi a he yayami nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ maa to ɔ, a ngɔ to.”
Yesu kɛ Toma
24Se Toma, ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɔ kake nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Didimo (hayo) ɔ be a kpɛti nɛ Yesu ba a. 25Lɔ ɔ he ɔ kaseli kpa amɛ de lɛ ke: “Wa na Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ.” Se e de mɛ ke: “Ja i na e dɛ mi plɛkobi ɔmɛ a nya, nɛ i kɛ ye nguɛ sia plɛkobi ɔmɛ a nya, nɛ i kɛ ye nine hɔ e kasa mi ɔ loko ma he ye.”
26Nɛ ligbi kpaanyɔ se ekohu ɔ, e kaseli ɔmɛ ngɛ tsu mi, nɛ Toma hu piɛ a he. Nɛ a nga sinya amɛ, nɛ Yesu ba, nɛ e ba da a kpɛti nɛ e ke: “Nyɛ he manye!” 27Lɔ ɔ se ɔ, e de Toma ke: “O kɛ o nine nguɛ nɛ ba hiɛ ɔ nɛ o ba hyɛ ye dɛ mi ɔ, nɛ o kɛ o nine ba hɔ ye kasa mi ɔ, nɛ o ko je nɔ́, se mohu o he ye.” 28Toma he nɔ nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Ye Nyɔmtsɛ kɛ ye Mawu.” 29Yesu de lɛ ke: “Toma, nɛ o na mi he je ɔ o he ye; a gbaa ninɛmɛ nɛ a nɛ se kɛ̃ ɔ a heɔ yeɔ ɔ.”
Nɔ nɛ he je nɛ a ngma womi nɔ
30Jeha nɛ ɔ okadi kpahi fuu hu ngɛ nɛ Yesu pee ngɛ e kaseli ɔmɛ a hɛ mi nɛ a ngmɛ ngɛ womi nɛ ɔ mi; 31se enɛ ɔmɛ lɛɛ a ngma, konɛ nyɛ he ye kaa Yesu ji Kristo, Mawu bi ɔ nɛ, nɛ ke nyɛ he ye ɔ, nɛ nyɛ na wami ngɛ e biɛ ɔ mi.

Title: YOHANE 21
Content:
Yesu je e he kpo tsɔɔ kaseli kpaago
1Ni nɛ ɔmɛ a se ɔ, Yesu kpale je e he kpo tsɔɔ kaseli ɔmɛ ngɛ Tiberia Wo ɔ nya. Nɛ bɔ nɛ e je e he kpo tsɔɔ mɛ ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ. 2Simon Petro kɛ Toma nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Didimo ɔ, kɛ Natanael nɛ je Kana ngɛ Galilea a, kɛ Zebedeo bimɛ ɔmɛ, kɛ kaseli ɔmɛ a ti ni kpahi enyɔ hu ngɛ he kake kutuu. 3Simon Petro de mɛ ke: “I yaa wo.” A de lɛ ke: “Wɔ hu waa kɛ mo maa ya.” A pue nɔ nɛ a ya sɛ lɛ mi, nɛ lɛ nyɔ ɔ mi ɔ a gbi nɔ́ ko. 4Se benɛ je ngɛ nae ɔ, Yesu ba da wo ɔ nya, se kaseli ɔmɛ “li kaa Yesu. 5Jeha nɛ ɔ Yesu bi mɛ ke: “Bimɛ, nyɛ gbe lo ko lo?” A he nɔ ke: “Dɛbi.” 6Nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ fɔ ya a ngɛ lɛ ɔ hiɛ ɔ nɔ je, nɛ nyɛ ma na nɔ́ ko.” Kɛkɛ nɛ a fɔ ya a, nɛ lo ɔmɛ a hiemi nya a, a nyɛ we ya a nɛ a sã? 7Lɔ ɔ he ɔ kaselɔ n Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ suɔ ɔ de Petro ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ʼi.” Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ Simon Petro nu kaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ʼi ɔ, e kɛ e tade ɔ muɔ e mlɛ mi, ejakaa e hii si kɛ e he gu, nɛ e tu nɔ wo ɔ mi. 8Se kaseli kpa amɛ gu lɛ nyafii ɔ mi kɛ ba, ejakaa a kɛ zutgba he kɛ we, maa pee nine kpɔ mi kami lafa enyɔ loo nɔ́ kɛkɛ, nɛ a ngɛ ya a kɛ lo ɔmɛ sãe. 9Nɛ benɛ a ba kple ɔ, a na hã kɛ la ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ lo pueɔ si ngɛ nɔ, kɛ abolo. 10Nɛ Yesu de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ kɛ lo nɛ nyɛ gbe piɔ ɔ eko nɛ ba.” 11Simon Petro ya lɛ ɔ mi nɛ e ya gbla ya a kɛ ba zugba kɛ e mi lo nguahi fuu tɔ, lafa kɛ nyingmi enuɔ kɛ etɛ. Lo ɔmɛ hiɛ kikɛ mohu, se kɛ̃ ɔ ya a gba we. 12Yesu de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ba wo nyɛ nya mi nɔ́ ko.” Kaseli ɔmɛ a ti nɔ ko nɔ ko kɛ́ lɛ bimi ke: “Mɛnɔ ji mo?” Ejakaa a le kaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ. 13Kɛkɛ nɛ Yesu ba nɛ e ba kɛ̃ abolo ɔ, nɛ e ngɔ ha mɛ, kɛ lo ɔ hulɔ.
14Enɛ ɔ ji si etɛ nɛ Yesu je e he kpo tsɔɔ ekaseli ɔmɛ, benɛ e te si kɛ je gbeje ɔ.
Yesu kɛ Petro
15Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ a ye ni ɔ ta a, Yesu bi Simon Petro ke: “Simon, Yona bi, o suɔ mi pe ni nɛ ɔmɛ lo?” Simon de lɛ ke: “Ee, Mawetsɛ, o le kaa i suɔ mo.” Yesu de lɛ ke: “Lɛɛ ye to bi ɔmɛ!” 16Yesu kpale bi lɛ nɔ nɛ ji si enyɔ ke: “Simon, Yona bi, o suɔ mi lo?” E he nɔ ke: “Ee, Mawetsɛ, o le kaa i suɔ mo.” E de lɛ ke: “Hyɛ ye to ɔmɛ!” 17Yesu bi lɛ nɔ́ nɛ ji si etɛ ke: “Simon, Yona bi, o suɔ mi lo?” E dɔ Petro kaa e bi lɛ si etɛ sɔuu ke: ‘O suɔ mo lo?’ ɔ; nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Mawetsɛ, o le nihi kulaa, o le kas i suɔ mo.” Yesu de lɛ ke: “Lɛɛ ye to omɛ! 18I ngɛ mo dee anɔkuale mi ke: Benɛ o ji niheyo ɔ, mo nitsɛ o miaa nɛ o nyɛɛ he nɛ o suɔ; se ke o bwɔ ɔ, o ma kpã o nine mi, nɛ nɔ kpa maa mia mo, nɛ e kɛ mo maa ya he nɛ o sume.” 19(E de enɛ ɔ kɛ tsɔɔ nɔ gbenɔ nɛ e ma gbo kɛ wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami ɔ.) Nɛ benɛ e de lɛ enɛ ɔ ɔ, e de lɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ye se.”
Yesu kɛ kaselɔ kpa a
20Se benɛ Petro plɛ e he ɔ, e na kaselɔ nɛ Yesu suɔ ɔ nyɛɛ se, lɛ ji nɔ nɛ kpasa Yesu gugue ngɛ niyeni ɔ si nɛ e bi lɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, mɛnɔ maa tsɔɔ o se blɔ?” ɔ nɛ. 21Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, benɛ Petro na lɛ ɔ, e bi Yesu ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, se nɔ nɛ ɔ nɛɛ?” 22Yesu de lɛ ke: “Ke i suɔ kaa e hi si kɛ ya su ye bami be ɔ, o he sane mɛni ji kɔlɔ ɔ? Moo lɛɛ nyɛɛ ye se!” 23Kɛkɛ nɛ munyu nɛ ɔ gbɛ fia ngɛ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti ke jamɛ a kaselɔ ɔ be gboe. Kpahu Yesu de we ke e be gboe, se mohu e ke: “Ke i suɔ kaa e hi si kɛ ya su ye bami be ɔ, o he sane mɛni ji kɔlɔ ɔ?”
24Nɔ nɛ ɔ ji nɔ nɛ yeɔ ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he odase, nɛ lɛ lɛ ngma mi nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ nɛ, nɛ wa le kaa e odase ɔ anɔkuale ʼi.
Nyagbe
25Ni kpahi fuu hu ngɛ nɛ Yesu pee, nɛ ke a ke a maa ngma lɛ tsuo kakaaka a, i susu kaa je ɔ nitsɛ be nyɛe womihi nɛ jinɛ a maa ngma a maa to.

Title: BƆFO 1
Content:
1Teofilo, ngɛ ye kekle womi ɔ mi ɔ, i ngma nihi kulaa nɛ Yesu ba pee nɛ e tsɔɔ kɛ je e ni tsumi sisije ɔ, 2kɛ ya su ligbi nɛ a ngɔ lɛ kɛ ho hiɔwe ya a. Loko a ngɔ lɛ kɛ ho hiɔwe ya a, e gu Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ nɔ kɛ wo e kaseli nɛ e hla amɛ kita. 3E amanehlu ɔ se ligbi nyingmi eywiɛ ɔ, e gu blɔhi fuu a nɔ je e he kpo tsɔɔ e kaseli ɔmɛ kaa hɛ kalɔ, nɛ a na lɛ, nɛ e kɛ mɛ tu Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ he munyu. 4Nɛ bene e kɛ mɛ ba kpe ɔ, e wo mɛ hiɔngɔ ke: “Nyɛ ko je Yerusalem, se mohu nyɛɛ mle tsɛ ɔ si womi ɔ nɛ nyɛ nu ngɛ ye nya a; 5ejakaa Yohane ɔ, nyu e kɛ baptisi, se nyɛɛ lɛɛ e be kɛe nɛ a kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu maa baptisi nyɛ.”
A ngɔ Yesu kɛ ho hiɔwe ya
6Jeha nɛ ɔ nihi nɛ ba bua a he nya a bi lɛ ke: “Mawetsɛ, anɛ kikɛmɛ a be nɛ ɔ mi o ma tle o matsɛ yemi ɔ si ngɔ ha Israel ɔ lo?” 7Yesu de mɛ ke: “Pi nyɛ blɔ nya ji kaa nyɛ maa le be ɔmɛ nɛ Tsɛ ɔ to ngɛ lɛ nitse e he wami nya a; 8se ke Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ na ba nyɛ nɔ ɔ, nyɛ ma na he wami nɛ nyɛ ma plɛ ye he odaseyeli ngɛ Yerusalem kɛ Yudea kɛ Samaria tsuo kɛ yaa su zugba a nyagbe he.” 9Benɛ e de enɛ ɔ se ɔ, a ngɛ lɛ hyɛe nɔuu, nɛ a wo lɛ, nɛ bɔku ko ngɔ lɛ kɛ je a hɛ mi kɛ ho.
10Nɛ benɛ e yaa nɛ a ngɛ hiɔwe hyɛe too ɔ, oʼɛ, nyumuhi enyɔ nɛ wo tade hiɔ daa si ngɛ a kasa nya, 11nɛ a ke: “Nyɛ Galilea nyumuhi, mɛni he je nyɛ daa si ngɛ hiɔwe hyɛe kikɛ? Kikɛmɛ a Yesu nɛ ɔ nɛ a ngɔ lɛ kɛ je nyɛ ngɔ kɛ ho hiɔwe ya nɛ ɔ ɔ, ye maa ba ja nɔuu, kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ na kaa e yaa hiɔwe nɛ ɔ.”
Yuda nanemimalɔ
12Kɛkɛ nɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ kpale a se kɛ je yoku nɛ a tsɛɛ Nyuoku nɛ kɛ Yerusalem kɛmi maa pee Hejɔɔmi Ligbi blɔ nyɛɛmi ɔ kɛ ba Yerusalem ekohu. 13Nɛ benɛ a su lejɛ ɔ, a ya hiɔwe tsu ko mi, he nɛ Petro kɛ Yohane kɛ Yakobo kɛ Andrea, Filipo kɛ Toma, Bartolomeo kɛ Mateo, Yakobo, Alfeo bi ɔ kɛ Simon, ma he doolɔ ɔ, kɛ Yakobo bi Yuda hii ɔ. 14Ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo kɛ yi ɔmɛ kɛ Yesu nyɛ Maria kɛ e nyɛmimɛ nyumu ɔmɛ, kɛ juɛmi kake hɛɛ sɔlemi kɛ pɛɛ kpami wawɛɛ.
15Jamɛ a be ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, Petro te si da kaseli ɔmɛ a kpɛti, nihi nɛ bua a he nya a, maa pee nihi lafa kɛ nyingmi enyɔ, nɛ e ke: 16“Tsaatsɛmɛ kɛ mamimɛ, e sa kaa jamɛ a ngmami nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ de to ngɛ David nya ngɛ Yuda nɛ tsɔɔ nihi nɛ ya nu Yesu ɔ blɔ ɔ he ɔ nɛ ba mi. 17Ejakaa a bu lɛ ngɔ si wa nɔ, nɛ e ngɛ e blɔ nya ngɛ kikɛmɛ a sɔmɔmi nɛ ɔ mi.
18“Se kikɛmɛ a nyumu nɛ ɔ ngɔ e yayami nɛ e pee mi hiɔwo ɔ kɛ he abɔɔ, nɛ e ya ma e yi si, nɛ e mi gba enyɔ nɛ e mi ni tsuo pã pue si. 19Nihi tsuo nɛ ngɛ Yerusalem ɔ na le enɛ ɔ, lɔ ɔ he ɔ a tsɛɛ jamɛ a abɔɔ ɔ ngɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a gbi mi ke Akeldama, e sisi ji “muɔ abɔɔ”.
20“Ejakaa a ngma ngɛ Lahi a womi ɔ mi ke:
‘Ha e sihi he ɔ nɛ plɛ we doku,
Nɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko ko hi mi,’
kɛ; jeha nɛ ɔ hu:
‘Nɛ e sɔmɔmi ni tsumi ɔ ha nɔ kpa nɛ ngɔ.’
21“Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e sa kaa nyumuhi nɛ kɛ wɔ nyɛɛ be tsuaa be nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu yaa baa ngɛ wa kpɛti, 22kɛ je Yohane baptisimi ɔ nɔ kɛ ya su ligbi nɛ a ngɔ lɛ kɛ je wa ngɔ kɛ ho hiɔwe ya a, a kpɛti nɔ kake nɛ plɛ e si temi ɔ he odase yelɔ ngɔ piɛ wa he.” 23Nɛ a hla ni enyɔ, Yosef nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Barsaba nɛ a wo lɛ Yusto hulɔ ɔ, kɛ Maria ngɔ da si. 24Nɛ a sɔle ke: “Mo, Nyɔmtsɛ nɛ o le nimli kulaa a tsui mi, tsɔɔ ni enyɔ nɛ ɔmɛ a ti nɔ nɛ o hla, 25kone e ngɔ kikɛmɛ a sɔmɔmi kɛ bɔfo ni tsumi nɛ Yuda je mi ngɔ lɛ nitse e blɔ ɔ.” 26Nɛ pa fɔ́ a nɔ sɔ, nɛ sɔ ɔ ya nɔ Maria nɔ, nɛ a bu lɛ ngɔ si bɔfo nyɔngma kɛ kake ɔ nɔ.

Title: BƆFO 2
Content:
Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ bami
1Benɛ Pentekoste ligbi (loo ligbi nɛ ji nyingmi enyɔ ɔ) su ɔ, mɛ tsuo a nya ba bua kɛ juɛmi kake ngɛ he kake. 2Nɛ si kake ɔ, pɛmi ko nɛ ngɛ kaa kɔɔhiɔ nɛ nya wa ko je hiɔwe ba, nɛ e ba hyi we he nɛ a hii si ngɛ ɔ tɔtɔɔtɔ. 3Nɛ ni kome nɛ a gba mi nɛ ngɛ kaa la lilɛhi pue; nɛ a ba ma a yi kpɛti kakaaka. 4Nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ba hyi mɛ tsuo kulaa tɔtɔɔtɔ, nɛ a bɔni gbi slɔɔto slɔɔtohi tumi, kaa bɔ nɛ Mumi ɔ ngɔ wo a nya a.
5Se Yudafohi Mawu gbeye yeli kome ngɛ Yerusalem, nɛ je majemaje kulaa nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ nɔ. 6Se benɛ a nu kikɛmɛ a pɛmi nɛ ɔ ɔ, nihi babauu ba bua a he nya nɛ a he mi po ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nu kaa a ngɛ lɛ nitse e ma mi gbi tue. 7Nɛ mɛ tsuo a nya kpɛ a he nɛ a hɛ mi pee mɛ yaa, nɛ a de a he ke: “Oʼɛ, anɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ munyu nɛ ɔ tue tsuo nɛ ɔ, pi Galileabihi ʼi lo? 8Se kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ wa ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ ngɛ lɛ nitse e ma mi he nɛ a fɔ lɛ ngɛ ɔ gbi nue nɛ ɔ? 9Partiabihi kɛ Mediabihi kɛ Elambihi, kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ Mesopotamia kɛ Yudea kɛ Kapadokia, Ponto kɛ Asia, 10Frigia kɛ Pamfilia, Mizraim kɛ Libia ni ɔmɛ a mi ngɛ Kireene kasa nya, kɛ nibwɔhi nɛ je Roma, Yudafohi kɛ nihi nɛ plɛ Yudafohi, 11Kretabihi kɛ Arabiabihi: Wa ngɛ nue kaa a ngɛ Mawu ni ngua amɛ jajee ngɛ wa je gbihi a mi.” 12Nɛ mɛ tsuo a nya kpɛ a he nɛ a dɛ yaa, nɛ nɔ nɛ de nɔ nɛ ke: “Kɛ ji enɛ ɔ sisi kɛɛ?” 13Se ni kome hu ye fɛu ke: “A de dã.”
Petro munyu nɛ e tu
14Kɛkɛ nɛ Petro kɛ ni nyɔngma kɛ kake ɔ te si da si, nɛ e wo e nya nɔ nɛ e tu munyu tsɔɔ asafo ɔ ke: “Yuda nyumuhi kɛ nihi kulaa nɛ ngɛ Yerusalem, nyɛ na nɛ nyɛɛ le enɛ ɔ, nɛ nyɛɛ bu ye munyu ɔ tue: 15Tsa pi dã nɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ de kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ susue ɔ, ejakaa mɔtu ngmlɛ nɛɛ kɛkɛ́ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ; 16se mohu enɛ ɔ ji nɔ́ nɛ gbalɔ Yoel de ɔ ke:
17(Mawu ke:)
‘Nɛ e maa ba mi ngɛ nyagbe ligbi ɔmɛ a nɔ,
Kaa ma nɛ ye mumi ɔ ngɔ pue he lo kulaa nɔ,
Nɛ nyɛ bimɛ nyumu ɔmɛ kɛ nyɛ bimɛ yi ɔmɛ maa gba,
Nɛ nyɛ nihewi ɔmɛ maa na ninamihi,
Nɛ nyɛ nikɔtɔma a mɛ maa nla nlamihi,
18Nɛ, ye tsɔli nyumuhi kɛ yi ɔmɛ hu a nɔ
Ma nɛ ye mumi ɔ ngɔ pue
Ngɛ jamɛ a ligbi ɔmɛ a nɔ, nɛ a maa gba.
19Nɛ ma pee nyakpɛ nihi ngɛ hiɔwe
Kɛ okadihi hu ngɛ zugba a nɔ,
Muɔ kɛ la kɛ lakusu.
20Pu maa tsɔ diblii
Nɛ nyɔhiɔ ma plɛ muɔ
Loko Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ligbi ngua nɛ ngɛ nyami ɔ maa ba
21Nɛ e maa ba mi kaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ma kpa
ngmlaa kɛ tsɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ biɛ ɔ, a ma he e yi wami.’
22“Tsaatsɛmɛ Israelbihi, nyɛɛ bu kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔ tue. Yesu Nazare no ɔ ji nyumu nɛ Mawu kɛ he wami ni tsumihi kɛ nyakpɛ nihi kɛ okadihi nɛ e gu e nɔ kɛ pee ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti ɔ ye e he odase ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ le ɔ. 23Yesu nɛ ɔ nɛ a je lɛ ngɛ Mawu yi mi tomi kɛ e ni nɛ e le ngɔ to ɔ nya ngɔ ha a, nyɛ gu nihi nɛ li mlaa amɛ a nine nɔ nyɛ sɛu lɛ nɛ nyɛ gbe lɛ. 24Lɛ nɔuu si Mawu tle nɛ e pɛne gbenɔ piimi kpa amɛ, ejakaa gbenɔ be nyɛe e nya tsimi. 25Ejakaa David de ngɛ e he ke:
‘I naa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ngɛ ye hɛ mi daa,
Ejakaa e ngɛ ye hiɛ ɔ nɔ, kone ma ko dede.
26Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ye tsui nɔ ye mi,
Nɛ ye lilɛ ngɛ nyae,
Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ ye he lo hu maa jɔɔ e he ngɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi mi,
27Ejakaa o be ye klaa sie ngɛ gbeje,
Nɛ o be hae nɛ o nɔ klɔuklɔu ɔ nɛ puɛ.
28O ha i le wami blɔ ɔ,
Nɛ o ma ha ye tsui maa nɔ ye mi faa ngɛ o hɛ mi.’
29“Tsaatsɛmɛ kɛ mamimɛ, nyɛ ha ma tu munyu faii ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ ngɛ blemano David he, kaa e gbo nɛ a pu lɛ, nɛ e yɔkɔ ngɛ wa kpɛti kɛ ba si mwɔnɛ. 30Akɛnɛ gbalɔ ji lɛ nɛ e le kaa Mawu ka lɛ kita ke e mi mi bimɛ ɔmɛ eko maa hi e sɛ̃ ɔ nɔ he je ɔ, 31e na ngɔ to nɛ e tu Kristo si temi ɔ he munyu, kaa a be e klaa sie ngɛ gbeje nɛ e he lo hu be puee. 32Kikɛmɛ a Yesu nɛ ɔ Mawu tle lɛ si; lɔ ɔ he odase yeli ji wɔ kulaa. 33Jeha nɛ ɔ akɛnɛ a wo e nɔ kɛ ho Mawu hiɛ ɔ nine nɔ ya nɛ e na Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ he si womi ɔ kɛ je Tsɛ ɔ dɛ he je ɔ, e nɛ nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nae nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nue nɛ ɔ ngɔ pue si. 34Ejakaa David yɛ hiɔwe, cse lɛ nɔuu lɛ e ke:
‘Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de ye nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ke:
Hii ye hiɛ ɔ nɔ,
35Kɛ yaa su be nɛ ma ngɔ o henyɛli ɔmɛ ngɔ pee
o nane si maangoo.’
36“Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ha Israel we ɔ kulaa nɛ le tutuutu kaa Mawu ngɔ kikɛmɛ a Yesu nɛ nyɛ sɛu lɛ nɛ ɔ ngɔ pee Nyɔmtsɛ kɛ Kristo tsuo.”
37Benɛ a nu enɛ ɔ, e gbɔ a tsui mi, nɛ a de Petro kɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ nɛ piɛ ɔ ke: “Tsaatsɛmɛ kɛ mamimɛ, kɛ wa maa pee kɛɛ?” 38Petro de mɛ ke: Nyɛ tsake nyɛ tsui nɛ nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ha a baptisi lɛ ngɔ wo Yesu Kristo biɛ mi, konɛ a ngɔ nyɛ he yayami ɔmɛ ngɔ pa nyɛ, nɛ nyɛ ma na Mumi Klɔuklɔu nɔke nɔ ɔ. 39Ejakaa si womi ɔ nyɛ kɛ nyɛ bimɛ kɛ nihi tsuo nɛ ngɛ se lokoo, nihi abɔ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ wa Mawu ɔ ma tsɛ kɛ maa ba a, a nɔ ʼi.”
40Nɛ e tu munyu kpahi fuu e kɛ ye odase nɛ e kɛ wo mɛ ga ke: “Nyɛ ha a he nyɛ yi wami kɛ je yi nɔ kpɛ̃kpɛ̃e nɛ ɔ mi.” 41Kɛkɛ nɛ nihi nɛhe e munyu ɔ ye ngɛ tsui mi jɔmi nya a, a baptisi mɛ, nɛ jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔuu ɔ, a ngɔ klaahi maa pee akpe etɛ ngɔ piɛ a he. 42Nɛ a hɛɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ a tsɔɔmi ɔ kɛ huɛ bɔmi ɔ kɛ abolo mi kumi ɔ kɛ sɔlemi kɛ pɛɛ kpami ɔmɛ a mi.
Ninɛmɛ nɛ he ye ɔmɛ a sihimi
43Nɛ gbeye nu nɔ tsuaa nɔ, nɛ a gu bɔfo ɔmɛ a nine nɔ kɛ pee nyakpɛ ni kɛ okadihi fuu. 44Nɛ nihi nɛ he ye ɔ kulaa ngɛ he kake, nɛ a pee a nihi tsuo kulaa kake. 45Nɛ a jua a zugba amɛ kɛ a he ni ɔmɛ, nɛ a dla ngɔ ha ni ɔmɛ tsuo bɔ nɛ he hia nɔ tsuaa nɔ. 46Nɛ daa ligbi ɔ, a kɛ juɛmi kake yaa sɔlemi we ɔ, nɛ a kuɔ abolo ngɛ wehi a mi, nɛ a kɛ bua jɔmi kɛ tsui klɔuu yeɔ ni, 47nɛ a jeɔ Mawu yi, nɛ a hɛ mi ba nyami ngɛ ma mluku ɔ kulaa hɛ mi. Nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ngɔɔ nihi nɛ a he a yi wami ɔ ngɔ piɛɛ asafo ɔ he daa ligbi.

Title: BƆFO 3
Content:
A tsa akpaketsɛ ko
1Ligbi ko gbɔkuɛ ngmlɛ etɛ, sɔlemi yami be ɔ, Petro kɛ Yohane nyɛɛ kɛ yaa sɔlemi we ɔ. 2Nyumu ko ngɛ nɛ ji akpaketsɛ kɛ je e nyɛ muklii mi, nɛ a woɔ lɛ daa kɛ ba hii si ngɛ sɔlemi we sinya nɛ a tsɛɛ sinya saminyayoo ɔ nya, konɛ e ba ni ngɛ nihi nɛ yaa sɔlemi we ɔmɛ a dɛ. 3Benɛ e na Petro kɛ Yohane nɛ a yaa sɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, e ba mɛ nɔ́ ko. 4Se Petro kɛ Yohane hyɛ lɛ too, nɛ Petro de lɛ ke: “Hyɛ wa hɛ mi.” 5E dɔ e hɛngmɛ to a nɔ, e hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa e ma na nɔ́ ko kɛ je a dɛ. 6Se Petro ke: “Sika hiɔ kɛ sika tsu ɔ, i be eko; se nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ i kɛ ngɛ mɔ hae nɛ ɔ nɛ: Ngɛ Yesu Kristo, Nazare no ɔ, biɛ mi ɔ, tee si nɛ o nyɛɛ!” 7Nɛ e pɛtɛ e hiɛ ɔ nine mi nɛ e wo e nɔ da si; nɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔuu ɔ, e nane kɛ e kpɔji nya amɛ a mi wa lɛ; 8nɛ e hlu da si nɛ e bɔni nyɛɛmi, nɛ e kɛ mɛ nyɛɛ kɛ sɛ sɔlemi we ɔ kɛ hlumi kɛ Mawu yi jemi. 9Nɛ ma mluku ɔ tsuo na lɛ nɛ e ngɛ nyɛɛe nɛ e ngɛ Mawu yi jee. 10Benɛ a kpa si kaa lɛ ji nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ sinya saminyayoo ɔ nya nɛ e hii nɔ bae ɔ, a he mi po nɛ a nya kpɛ a he babauu ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ a pee ha lɛ ɔ he.
Petro fiɛmi ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ
11Akɛnɛ akpaketsɛ nɛ a tsa a ngɛ Petro kɛ Yohane bɛbɛ mi he je ɔ, ma a kulaa bu kɛ ba bua a he nyɛ ngɛ a ngɔ ngɛ ablanaa nɛ a tsɛɛ Salomo nɔ́ ɔ nɔ, nɛ a he mi po. 12Se benɛ Petro na enɛ ɔ ɔ, e de ma a ke: “Nyɛ Israel nyumuhi, mɛ he je nyɛ hɛ mi ngɛ nyɛ yaa pee ngɛ enɛ ɔ he? Aloo mɛ he je nyɛ ngɛ wɔ hyɛe too kikɛ, kaa nɔ́ nɛ wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa he wami loo wa Mawu jami nya waa kɛ ha nɔ nɛ ɔ ngɛ nyɛɛe nɛ ɔ? 13Abraham kɛ Isak kɛ Yakob Mawu ɔ nɛ ji wa tsɛmɛ a Mawu ɔ wo e tsɔlɔ Yesu hɛ mi nyami; nɔ nɛ nyɛ je lɛ ngɔ ha nɛ nyɛ kua lɛ ngɛ Pontio Pilato hɛ mi, benɛ lɛɛ e pee e juɛmi kaa e maa ngmɛɛ e he ɔ. 14Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ kua nɔ klɔuklɔu kɛ dalɔ ɔ, nɛ nyɛ kpa pɛɛ ke a ngmɛɛ nɔmlɔ awi yelɔ mohu he ngɔ ha nyɛ, 15nɛ Wami Matsɛ ɔ, nyɛ gbe lɛ. Se Mawu tle lɛ si kɛ je gbeje, kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu he odaseyeli ji wɔ. 16Nɛ e biɛ ɔ nɔ hemi kɛ yemi nya nɛ a tsa nɔ nɛ ɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ hyɛe nɛ nyɛ le ɔ; nɛ e nɔ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ ha e pee kpitikplii ngɛ nyɛ hɛ mi nɛ ɔ nɛ.
17“Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ, mamimɛ, i le kaa fimi nɛ nyɛ li he je nɛ nyɛ pee kaa nyɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ̃. 18Se nihi nɛ Mawu de ngɔ to momo ngɛ we gbali ɔmɛ tsuo a nya, kaa Kristo maa na amanehlu ɔ, e ha e ba mi ja. 19Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ tsake nyɛ tsui nɛ nyɛɛ kpale nyɛ se, kone a gbe nyɛ he yayami ɔmɛ, 20benɛ pee nɛ he jɔmi be nɛ je Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi kɛ ba, konɛ e tsɔ Yesu Kristo nɔ nɛ e je ngɔ to nyɛ momo ɔ; 21nɔ nɛ sa kaa e ya hi hiɔwe kɛ ya su nihi kulaa a blɔnya tomi be nɛ Mawu tu he munyu ngɛ e gbali klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a nya kɛ je blema a. 22Ejakaa Mose de tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ nyɛ Mawu ɔ, ma tle gbalɔ ko nɛ ngɛ kaa imi si kɛ maa je nyɛ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti ngɔ ha nyɛ. Nyɛɛ bu lɛ tue ngɛ nihi kulaa nɛ e ma de ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ ɔ mi. 23Nɛ e maa ba mi kaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ be jamɛ a gbalɔ ɔ tue bue ɔ, a ma kpata e hɛ mi kulaa kɛ maa je ma a mi.’ 24Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ gbali tsuo nɛ tu munyu kɛ je Samuel kɛ nihi nɛ nyɛɛ e se ɔ nɔ ɔ, wo kikɛmɛ a ligbi nɛ ɔmɛ hu tã ngɔ to. 25Nyɛ ji gbali ɔmɛ kɛ somi ɔ bimɛ, somi nɛ Mawu kɛ wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ so, benɛ e de Abraham ke: ‘O nina mi nɛ a maa gbaa zugba a nɔ wekuhi kulaa ngɛ’ ɔ. 26Nɛ Mawu tle e tsɔlɔ Yesu si ɔ, nyɛ kekle nyɛ ngɔ e tsɔ lɛ nɛ e ba gbaa nyɛ nɛ e kpale nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ kɛ je e ni yayami ɔmɛ a he.”

Title: BƆFO 4
Content:
Petro kɛ Yohane ngɛ gua a hɛ mi
1Se benɛ Petro kɛ Yohane ngɛ munyu ɔ tue kɛ ngɛ ma a tsɔɔe ɔ, osɔfo ɔmɛ kɛ sɔlemi we ɔ asafoatsɛ ɔ kɛ Sadukifo ɔmɛ ba pue a nɔ, 2ejakaa a muklii mi fu kaa a ngɛ ma a ni tsɔɔe, nɛ a ngɛ jajee ngɛ tsɔɔe ke Yesu te si kɛ je gbeje. 3Nɛ a nu mɛ, nɛ a wo mɛ tsu mi kɛ ya su e nɔ je na, ejakaa jamɛ a be ɔ mi ɔ je jɔ. 4Se nihi nɛ nu munyu ɔ a kpɛti nihi fuu he ye, nɛ nyumu ɔmɛ a yibɔ maa su akpe enyɔ.
5Jeha nɛ ɔ, e ba mi kaa e nɔ je na a, a ganɔ ɔmɛ kɛ ma nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli ɔmɛ ba bua a he nya ngɛ Yerusalem, 6kɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma Hana, kɛ Kaiafa kɛ Yohane kɛ Aleksandro kɛ nihi abɔ nɛ je osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a weku ɔ mi ɔ. 7Nɛ a ya ngɔ bɔfo ɔmɛ kɛ ba da kpɛti, nɛ a bi mɛ ke: “Mɛnɔ he wami nya, aloo mɛnɔ biɛ mi nyɛ pee enɛ ɔ ngɛ?” 8Kɛkɛ nɛ Petro nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ hyi lɛ tɔtɔɔtɔ ɔ, de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ ma mi ganɔ ɔmɛ kɛ Israel nikɔtɔmahi! 9Ke a kɛ wɔ ngɛ munyu yee mwɔnɛ ligbi nɛ ɔ ngɛ kpakpa nɛ a pee kikɛmɛ a hiɔtsɛ nɛ ɔ he kaa mɛnɔ nɔ a gu kɛ tsa lɛ ɔ, 10lɔ ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ tsuo kɛ Israel ma mluku ɔ kulaa a na nɛ a le kaa, Yesu Kristo, Nazare no ɔ, nɛ nyɛ sɛu, nɛ Mawu tle lɛ si kɛ je gbeje ɔ, lɛ nɔuu e biɛ mi nɔ nɛ ɔ daa si ngɛ nyɛ hɛ mi nɛ e he mi wa lɛ nɛ ɔ nɛ. 11Lɛ nɔuu ji tɛ ɔ nɛ nyɛ nɛ nyɛ ji tsu fiali ɔmɛ gbe he guɛ, nɛ e ba plɛ kɔ nya tɛ ɔ nɛ. 12Ejakaa yi wami hemi be nɔ ko nɔ ko mi; nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu, biɛ kpã ko be hiɔwe sisi nɛ a ngɔ ha nimli nɛ sa kaa a gu nɔ kɛ he wa yi wami.”
13Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ a na Petro kɛ Yohane kã a nɛ a kpa si kaa pi womi mi leli kɛ ni leli kome ji mɛ ɔ, e pee a hɛ mi yaa, nɛ a kɔ se kaa a kɛ Yesu hi si. 14Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu, akɛnɛ a na nɔmlɔ nɛ a tsa lɛ ɔ kɛ mɛ daa si he je ɔ, a nɛ nɔ́ ko nɛ a de. 15Lɔ ɔ he ɔ a fa mɛ ke a je gua a mi kɛ je kpo bɔɔ. A ya dami 16nɛ a ke: “Kɛ wa maa pee nimli nɛ ɔmɛ kɛɛ? ejakaa okadi ngua nɛ a pee ɔ ngɛ pãa ngɛ ni ɔmɛ kulaa nɛ ngɛ Yerusalem ɔ hɛ mi, nɛ wa be nyɛe ma kua. 17Se kɛ̃ ɔ, benɛ pee nɛ e ko gbɛ fia fuu ko hu ngɛ ma a mi he je ɔ, nyɛ ha waa wo a he gbeye, konɛ a ko tu munyu ngɛ kikɛmɛ a biɛ nɛ ɔ mi ngɔ tsɔɔ nɔ ko nɔ ko hu.” 18Nɛ a tsɛ mɛ kɛ ba, nɛ a wo mɛ kita kadikadi ke a ko wo nɔ tã, nɛ a ko tsɔɔ ni ngɛ Yesu biɛ mi kulaa hu.
19Se Petro kɛ Yohane he nɔ nɛ a de mɛ ke: “Ke e da blɔ ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi kaa a bu nyɛ mohu tue pe Mawu ɔ, nyɛɛ kojo. 20Ejakaa wɔɔ lɛɛ wa be nyɛe kaa ja wa de nihi nɛ wa na kɛ nihi nɛ wa nu ɔ.” 21Se mɛɛ lɛɛ, benɛ a kpale wo a he gbeye ɔ, a ngmɛɛ a he, ejakaa a nɛ́ bɔ nɛ a maa pee nɛ a maa pii mɛ ngɛ ma a he, ejakaa nihi tsuo ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi nyami woe ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ a pee ɔ he; 22ejakaa nɔmlɔ nɛ a tsa lɛ nyakpɛ tsami nɛ ɔ ye pe jeha nyingmi eywiɛ.
Asafo ɔ kpa pɛɛ kɛ bi hewamiwomi
23Se benɛ a ngmɛɛ a he ɔ, a ba a nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ a ngɔ, nɛ a ba sɛɛ nihi kulaa nɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ ma nikɔtɔma amɛ de mɛ ɔ ngɔ ha mɛ. 24Benɛ a nu ɔ, a kɛ juɛmi kake wo a gbi nɔ ha Mawu nɛ pee hiɔwe kɛ zugba kɛ wo kɛ nihi kulaa nɛ ngɛ a mi ɔ: 25“Mo nɔ nɛ o gu wa tsɛ David, o tsɔlɔ ɔ, nya de ke:
‘Mɛni he je je ma amɛ ngɛ hoo pee,
Nɛ ma a hu ngɛ yaka nihi susue nɛ ɔ?
26Zugba a nɔ matsɛmɛ ɔmɛ te da si,
Nɛ ganɔ ɔmɛ hu a nya ba bua
Ngɔ wo Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kɛ nɔ nɛ a pɔ lɛ nu ɔ.’
27Niinɛ, Herode kɛ Pontio Pilato kɛ majemajeli ɔmɛ kɛ Israel ma amɛ hu ba bua a he nya ngɛ ma nɛ ɔ mi ngɔ wo o tsɔlɔ klɔuklɔu Yesu, nɔ nɛ o pɔ lɛ nu ɔ, 28konɛ a pee nihi tsuo nɛ o nine kɛ o yi mi tomi ɔ to ngɔ fɔ si ke a pee ɔ. 29Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu Nyɔmtsɛ, hyɛ a he gbeye nɛ a ngɛ woe ɔ, nɛ o ha o sɔmɔli ɔmɛ kɛ kã fuu nɛ jaje o munyu ɔ, 30nɛ o kpã o nine mi nɛ o ha a tsa nihi, nɛ a gu o tsɔlɔ klɔuklɔu Yesu ɔ biɛ mi kɛ pee okadihi kɛ nyakpɛ nihi.” 31Benɛ a sɔle ɔ, he nɛ a nya ba bua ngɛ ɔ mimiɛ, nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ hyi mɛ tsuo tɔtɔɔtɔ, nɛ a kɛ kã jaje Mawu munyu ɔ.
Asafo ɔ pee a nihi kulaa kake
32Nihi babauu nɛ he ye ɔ kulaa hɛɛ tsui kake kɛ mumi kake, nɛ a ti nɔ ko nɔ ko tsɛ we e nihi nɛ e ngɛ ɔ mi eko ke lɛ nitse e nɔ, se mohu a ngɔ kulaa ngɔ pee kake. 33He wami kpetekpleenyɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ kɛ ye Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu sitemi ɔ he odase nɛ dloomi kpetekpleenyɛ ngɛ mɛ tsuo kulaa a nɔ. 34Nɔ ko nɔ ko be a kpɛti nɛ e fiɔ lɛ, ejakaa nihi abɔ nɛ ngɛ zugbahi loo wehi ɔ juaa, nɛ a kɛ nihi nɛ a jua amɛ a nya sika a baa, 35nɛ a kɛ ba pueɔ bɔfo ɔmɛ a nane nya, nɛ a dlaa ngɔ haa nɔ tsuaa nɔ bɔ nɛ he hiaa lɛ ɔ.
36Nɛ Yose, nɔ nɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ wo Barnaba (e sisi ji “Buawomibi”) ɔ, nɛ ji Levi no nɛ e se je Kipro ɔ, 37ngɛ zugba ko, nɛ e jua, nɛ e kɛ sika a ba nɛ e kɛ ba pue bɔfo ɔmɛ a nane nya.

Title: BƆFO 5
Content:
Anania kɛ Safira
1Se nyumu ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Anania nɛ a tsɛɛ e yo hu ke Safira a ya jua zugba ko, 2nɛ e kɛ yi ni ɔ fã ko to se, nɛ e yo ɔ hu le he nɔ́ ko. Nɛ e kɛ fã ko ba nɛ e kɛ ba pue bɔfo ɔmɛ a nane nya. 3Se Petro ke: “Anania, mɛni he je Satan hyi o tsui mi tɔ, nɛ o ye lakpa ngɔ tsɔɔ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ, nɛ o kɛ zugba a yi ni ɔ fã ko to se? 4Benɛ e ngɛ ɔ, pi o nɔ ʼi, nɛ benɛ o jua hu ɔ, sika a pi mo nitse o nɔ lo? Mɛni he je o susu kikɛmɛ a nɔ́ ko ngɛ o tsui mi? Tsa pi nimli nɛ o ye lakpa ngɔ tsɔɔ nɛ ɔ, se Mawu mohu ʼi.” 5Nɛ benɛ Anania nu kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, e nɔ si nɛ e gbo. Nɛ gbeye ngua nu ni ɔmɛ tsuo nɛ nu ɔ. 6Nihewi ɔmɛ te si, nɛ a ba dla gbogboe ɔ, nɛ a wo lɛ kɛ je kpo nɛ a ya pu.
7Nɛ maa pee ngmlɛfia etɛ se ɔ, e ba mi kaa e yo ɔ hu nɛ li sane nɛ ba a ba lejɛ ɔ. 8Nɛ Petro bi lɛ ke: “De mi, anɛ bɔ nɛ nyɛ jua zugba a ha ji nɛ ɔ lo?” Nɛ Safira ke: “Ee ja ʼi.” 9Kɛkɛ nɛ Petro de lɛ ke: “Kɛ pee kɛɛ nɛ nyɛ pee kake nɛ nyɛ ka Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ Mumi ɔ nɛ ɔ? Oʼɛ, nihi nɛ ho ya pu o huno ɔ a nanehi a nya lɛ ngɛ sinya a nya a nɛ, nɛ a ma wo mo hu kɛ ho.” 10Kɛkɛ nɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔuu nɛ e nɔ si ngɛ e nane nya nɛ e gbo. Nɛ benɛ nihewi ɔmɛ ba nɛ a ba na kaa e gbo ɔ, a wo lɛ kɛ ho nɛ a ya pu ngɛ e huno ɔ kasa nya. 11Nɛ gbeye kpetekpleenyɛ nu asafo mluku ɔ tsuo kɛ nihi nɛ nu ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ.
Okadihi kɛ nyakpɛ nihi
12A gu bɔfo ɔmɛ a nine nɔ kɛ pee okadihi kɛ nyakpɛ nihi fuu ngɛ ma a mi; nɛ mɛ tsuo a kɛ juɛmi kake hi Salomo ablanaa a nɔ. 13Nihi nɛ piɛ ɔmɛ a ti nɔ ko nɔ ko kɛ́ kaa e kɛ yi flɛflɛ ma ya bɔ a he, se maa buu mɛ saminya. 14Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu a kɛmihi nɛ heɔ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɔ yeɔ ɔ, nyumuhi kɛ yihi babauu ba piɛ a he, 15hluu tete po nɛ a woɔ hiɔtsɛmɛ kɛ baa blɔ ɔmɛ a he ba pueɔ sahi kɛ sa tsohi a nɔ, konɛ ke Petro bee ɔ, e nini kɛkɛ nɛ pue a ti ni kome a nɔ. 16Nɛ nihi fuu je mahi nɛ bɔle Yerusalem ɔ mi ba bua a he nya, nɛ a hɛɛ hiɔtsɛmɛ kɛ nihi nɛ mumi yayamihi ngɛ mɛ haoe ɔ kɛ ba nɛ a tsa mɛ kulaa.
A wa bɔfo ɔmɛ yi mi
17Kɛkɛ nɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a te si kɛ nihi tsuo nɛ kɛ lɛ ngɛ nɛ ji Sadukifo ɔmɛ a ku ɔ, nɛ a hɛ̃ dɔ wawɛɛ. 18Nɛ a ba nuu bɔfo ɔmɛ, nɛ a ya wo mɛ tsu mi. 19Se nyɔmi ɔ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bɔfo ba bli tsu ɔ sinya amɛ nɛ e je mɛ, nɛ e ke: 20“Nyɛɛ ya sɔlemi we ɔ nɛ nyɛ ya da si nɛ nyɛɛ jaje kikɛmɛ a wami he nɛ ɔ mi munyu ɔmɛ kulaa ngɔ tsɔɔ maa.” 21Nɛ a pee bɔ nɛ a de mɛ ɔ, nɛ a pue nɔ mɔtu mla kɛ ho sɔlemi we ɔ ya nɛ a ya tsɔɔ ni.
Jeha nɛ ɔ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a kɛ nihi nɛ kɛ lɛ ngɛ ɔ ba, nɛ a ba tsɛ gua ngua a kɛ Israelbi ɔmɛ a nikɔtɔma amɛ tsuo kɛ kpe, nɛ a tsɔ kɛ ya tsu ɔ mi konɛ a ya je bɔfo ɔmɛ kɛ ba 22Se benɛ tsɔli ɔmɛ ba lejɛ ɔ, a nɛ mɛ ngɛ tsu ɔ mi, nɛ a kpale a se ba sɛɛ ke: 23“Tsu ɔ wa na kaa a nga nya kpɛii, nɛ buli ɔmɛ hu daa si ngɛ sinya amɛ a nya; se benɛ wa bli ɔ, wa nɛ́ nɔ ko ngɛ mi.” 24Se benɛ osɔfo ɔ kɛ sɔlemi we ɔ asafoatsɛ ɔ kɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ nu kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔ ɔ, a hɛ mi pee mɛ yaa kaa kɛ enɛ ɔ nyagbeni ma ya ba ha kɛɛ? 25Nɛ nɔ ko ba ba sɛɛ ha mɛ ke: “Oʼɛ, nyumu ɔmɛ nɛ nyɛ ngɔ wo tsu ɔ mi ɔ daa si ngɛ sɔlemi we ngɛ ma a ni tsɔɔe.” 26Kɛkɛ nɛ asafoatsɛ ɔ kɛ tsɔli ɔmɛ pue nɔ kɛ ho nɛ a ya kpaka mɛ kɛ ba, pi kã nya, ejakaa a ngɛ ma a gbeye yee nɛ a ko ba fia mɛ tɛ.
27Nɛ benɛ a kɛ mɛ ba a, a kɛ mɛ ba da gua ngua a hɛ mi; nɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a bi mɛ ke: 28“Pi kita nɛ wa wo nyɛ kadikadi ke nyɛ ko tsɔɔ ni ngɛ kikɛmɛ a biɛ nɛ ɔ mi ɔ? Oʼɛ, nyɛ ha Yerusalem hyi tɔ kɛ nyɛ tsɔɔmi ɔ, nɛ nyɛ ngɛ hlae kaa nyɛɛ kɛ kikɛmɛ a nyumu nɛ ɔ muɔ baa wa nɔ.” 29Se Petro kɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ he nɔ nɛ a ke: “E sa kaa a buɔ Mawu mohu tue pe nimli. 30Yesu nɛ nyɛ sɛu ngɛ tso nɔ nɛ nyɛ gbe lɛ ɔ, wa tsɛmɛ a Mawu ɔ tle lɛ si. 31Lɛ e nɔ Mawu wo kɛ ho e hiɛ ɔ nɔ ya, nɛ e wo lɛ ganɔ kɛ yi wami helɔ, konɛ e ha Israel nɛ na tsui tsakemi kɛ yayami pami. 32Nɛ wɔ ji kikɛmɛ a sane nɛ ɔmɛ a he odase yeli, ja nɔuu ji Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ hu nɛ Mawu ngɔ ha nihi nɛ buɔ lɛ tue ɔ.”
33Benɛ a nu ɔ, e gbɔ a tsui mi, nɛ a to a yi mi ke a maa gbe mɛ. 34Se Farisifono ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Gamaliel, mlaa tsɔɔlɔ nɛ ma a kulaa buu lɛ ɔ, te si da si ngɛ gua ngua a kpɛti, nɛ efa ke a kɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ nɛ je kpo bɔɔ, 35nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Tsaatsɛmɛ Israelbi, nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ hi ngɛ kikɛmɛ a nimli nɛ ɔmɛ a he, bɔ nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ mɛ maa ye ha. 36Ejakaa ningmi nɛ ɔ ɔ, Teuda te si nɛ e ke nɔ ko ji lɛ, nɛ nyumuhi maa pee lafa eywiɛ kɛ a he ya bɔ e he; se a gbe lɛ, nɛ nimli abɔ nɛ bu lɛ tue ɔ kulaa gbɛ fia, nɛ a yi hɛ si. 37Nɔ nɛ ɔ se ɔ Yuda, Galilea no ɔ te si ngɛ nihi a kanemi ligbi ɔmɛ ami, nɛ e muɔ asafo babauu ngɔ pue e se. Lɛ hu e hɛ mi kpata, nɛ nihi nɛ bu lɛ tue ɔ tsuo hu gbɛ fia. 38Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Nyɛɛ ngmɛɛ kikɛmɛ a nimli nɛ ɔmɛ a he nɛ nyɛ ko di a se, ejakaa ke nimli a dɛ mi kikɛmɛ a yi mi tomi nɛ ɔ loo kikɛmɛ a ni tsumi nɛ ɔ je ɔ, e ma puɛ. 39Se ke Mawu dɛ mi e je ɔ, nyɛ be nyɛe ma puɛ; konɛ nyɛ ko ba pee nyɛ he kaa nihi nɛ a kɛ Mawu ngɛ ta hwue.” 40Nɛ a bu lɛ tue; nɛ a tsɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ kɛ ba, nɛ a fia mɛ kpa nɛ a wo mɛ kita ke a ko tu munyu ngɛ Yesu biɛ mi hu, nɛ a ngmɛɛ a he. 41Kɛkɛ nɛ a je gua ngua a hɛ mi kɛ ho kɛ bua jɔmi kaa e biɛ ɔ he ɔ, a bu mɛ nihi nɛ sa kaa a bɔ mɛ ahlua. 42Nɛ daa ligbi ɔ, a jɔɔ we ni tsɔɔmi kɛ Yesu Kristo fiɛmi ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ kɛ wehi a mi.

Title: BƆFO 6
Content:
Hepiɛli kpaago ɔ
1Jamɛ a be ɔmɛ a mi, benɛ kaseli ɔmɛ a he ngɛ hiɛe ɔ, munyu huitihuiti ko ba te si ngɛ Helenibi ɔmɛ a kpɛti ngɛ Hebribi ɔmɛ a he, ejakaa hɛ jee a yalɔyi ɔmɛ a nɔ ngɛ a daa hyemi ɔ blɔfami. 2Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ tsɛ kaseli asafo ɔ kɛ ba, nɛ a de mɛ ke: “E sɛ kaa wa siɔ Mawu munyu ɔ nɛ wa ya sɔmɔɔ ngɛ okplɔɔ he. 3Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mamimɛ, nyɛɛ hla nyɛ kpɛti ni kpaago nɛ ngɛ biɛ kpakpa nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu kɛ ni lemi hyi mɛ tɔ, konɛ waa ngɔ mɛ ngɔ to kikɛmɛ a ni tsumi nɛ he hia nɔ nya. 4Wɔɔ lɛɛ, wa maa hɛɛ sɔlemi kɛ munyu ɔ he sɔmɔmi ɔ mi.” 5Munyu ɔ sa asafo mluku ɔ tsuo hɛ mi; nɛ a hia Stefano, nyumu ko nɛ hemi kɛ yemi kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu hyi lɛ tɔ ɔ, kɛ Filipo kɛ Prokoro kɛ Nikanora kɛ Timon kɛ Parmena kɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a he piɛlɔ Nikolao nɛ je Antiokia a, 6nɛ a kɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ba da bɔfo ɔmɛ a hɛ mi; nɛ a sɔle nɛ a kɛ a ninehi pue a nɔ. 7Nɛ Mawu munyu ɔ blɛke, nɛ kaseli ɔmɛ a he ba hiɛ babauu ngɛ Yerusalem; nɛ osɔfo ɔmɛ tete po a kpɛti nihi fuu buɔ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ tue.
A nu Stefano
8Nɛ Stefano, nɔ nɛ hemi kɛ yemi kɛ he wami hyi lɛ tɔtɔɔtɔ ɔ, pee nyakpɛ nihi kɛ okadi nguahi ngɛ ma a mi. 9Se ni kome nɛ je kpe he nɛ a tsɛɛ Nihi nɛ ye a he ɔmɛ a kpe he ɔ, kɛ Kireenebi kɛ Aleksandriabi kɛ nihi nɛ je Kilikia kɛ Asia a, a ti ni kome te si nɛ a kɛ Stefano sa nya. 10Se a nyɛ we ni lemi kɛ mumi nɛ e kɛ ngɛ munyu ɔ tue ɔ nya nɛ a da. 11Lɔ ɔ he je ɔ, a ya wo ni komɛ yi nɛ a ba de ke: “Wa nu kaa e tuɔ Mose kɛ Mawu he musu bɔmi munyuhi.” 12Nɛ a wo ma bi ɔmɛ kɛ ma nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ mlaa tsɔɔli amɛ yi, nɛ a te si kɛ ba pue e nɔ nɛ a ba nu lɛ, nɛ a kpaka lɛ kɛ ya gua ngua a hɛ mi. 13Nɛ a kɛ lakpa odase yeli ba da si, nɛ a de ke: “Kikɛmɛ a nɔmlɔ nɛ ɔ jɔɔ we munyu tumi kɛ He Klɔuklɔu ɔ kɛ Mlaa a simi gblee; 14ejakaa wa nu kaa e de ke: ‘Yesu Nazare no ɔ, ma puɛ hiɛ ɔ, nɛ e ma tsake blɔnyahi nɛ Mose ngɔ ha wɔ ɔ.’ ” 15Nɛ nihi nɛ hii si ngɛ gua ngua a mi ɔ tsuo dɔ a hɛngmɛ ngɔ to e nɔ, nɛ a na e hɛ mi kaa Mawu bɔfo ko hɛ mi.

Title: BƆFO 7
Content:
Stefano fiɛmi
1Nɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a bi Stefano ke: “Anɛ munyu nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ mi ja lo?” 2Nɛ Stefano ke: “Mamimɛ kɛ Tsaatsɛmɛ, nyɛɛ bu tue. Hɛ mi nyami Mawu ɔ je e he kpo tsɔɔ wa tsɛ Abraham, benɛ e ngɛ Mesopotamia, nɛ e na we nɛ e ba hi Haran ɔ, 3nɛ e de lɛ ke: ‘Jee o zugba a nɔ kɛ o weku mi kɛ ya zugba niɛ ma tsɔɔ mo ɔ nɔ.’ 4Kɛkɛ nɛ e je Kaldeabi ɔmɛ a zugba a nɔ, nɛ e ya hi Haran. Nɛ benɛ e tsɛ gbo se ɔ, Mawu ha e je lejɛ ɔ kɛ ba kikɛmɛ a zugba nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nɔ mwɔnɛ mwɔnɛ nɛ ɔ nɔ; 5nɛ e hi lɛ zugba ko, bɔ nɛ a kɛ nane maa nɔ tete. Se e wo lɛ si kaa e ma ngɔ ha lɛ kɛ e nina nɛ ma ngɛ e se ɔ kaa a nɔ́, pohu jamɛ a be ɔ mi ɔ, e be bi po. 6Se bɔ nɛ Mawu kɛ lɛ tu munyu ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: ‘E nina ma ya to nibwɔ ngɛ ma se zugba ko nɔ, nɛ a maa ye mɛ nyɔguɛ, nɛ a maa wa mɛ yi mi jeha lafa eywiɛ.’ 7Nɛ Mawu ke: ‘Ma kojo jamɛ a ma nɛ a ma ya sɔmɔ ɔ, nɛ lɔ ɔ se ɔ a maa je lejɛ ɔ, nɛ a ba ja mi ngɛ hiɛ ɔ nɛ ɔ.’ 8Nɛ Mawu ngɔ nɔ pomi he somi ɔ ngɔ ha lɛ. Nɛ somi nɛ ɔ mi e fɔ Isak ngɛ, nɛ e po lɛ ligbi nɛ ji kpaanyɔ ɔ. Nɛ Isak fɔ Yakob, nɛ Yakob fɔ blematsɛmɛ nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ.
9“Nɛ blematsɛmɛ ɔmɛ kɛ hɛ tsumi jua Yosef kɛ ho Mizraim ya. Se Mawu kɛ lɛ ngɛ, 10nɛ e je lɛ ngɛ dengmehi kulaa mi, nɛ e ha e hɛ mi ba nyami, nɛ e ha e le ni ngɛ Mizraim matsɛ Farao hɛ mi, nɛ e wo lɛ ganɔ ngɛ Mizraim kɛ lɛ nitse e we ɔ kulaa nɔ. 11Se hwɔ kɛ dengme kpetekpleenyɛ ba Mizraim ke Kanaan zugba a tsuo kulaa nɔ, nɛ wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ nɛ́ ni nɛ a ye. 12Nɛ benɛ Yakob nu kaa blɛfo ngɛ Mizraim ɔ, kekleekle ɔ, e tsɔ wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ kɛ ya. 13Nɛ nɔ́ nɛ ji si enyɔ ɔ, Yosef ha e nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ yo lɛ, nɛ Farao hu ba le Yosef weku ɔ. 14Nɛ Yosef tsɔ nɛ a ya ngɔ Yakob kɛ e weku ɔ tsuo kɛ ba, a yi bɔ ji nyingmi kpaago kɛ enuɔ. 15Yakob pue nɔ kɛ ho Mizraim ya, nɛ lɛ kɛ wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ya gbo ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, 16nɛ a kɛ a gbogboe ɔmɛ ba Shekem, nɛ a ba pu mɛ ngɛ gɔ nɛ Abraham je sika kɛ he ngɛ Shekem tsɛ Hemor bi ɔmɛ a dɛ ɔ mi.
17“Se benɛ si womi be ɔ nɛ Mawu ka Abraham he kita a su ɔ, ma a ba kle, nɛ a he ba hiɛ ngɛ Mizraim zugba a nɔ, 18kɛ ya su be nɛ matsɛ kpa nɛ li Yosef ɔ ba ye Mizraim nɔ. 19Lɛ nɛ e kɛ wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ hi si ngɛ sisimi blɔ nɔ nɛ e pee mɛ yayami, kaa e ha a sake a bimɛ bimwɔwi ɔmɛ ngɔ pue he, benɛ pee nɛ a ko hi je mi. 20Jamɛ a be ɔ mi nɔuu a fɔ Mose. E he ngɛ fɛu ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi, nɛ a lɛ lɛ ngɛ e tsɛ we ɔ hlami etɛ. 21Nɛ benɛ a sake lɛ ngɔ fɔ he ɔ, Farao biyo ɔ ya wo lɛ, nɛ e lɛ lɛ, nɛ e kɛ lɛ pee lɛ nitse e bi. 22A tsɔɔ Mose Mizraim nile tsuo, nɛ e na he wami ngɛ munyuhi kɛ ni tsumihi a mi.
23“Benɛ Mose ye jeha nyingmi eywiɛ ɔ, e ba e yi mi kaa e ma ya slaa e nyɛmimɛ Israelbi ɔmɛ. 24Nɛ benɛ e na kaa a ngɛ a kpɛti nɔ kake yayami pee ɔ, e fã e he, nɛ e to Mizraim no nɛ a ngɛ lɛ yayami pee ɔ nane mi, nɛ e gbe Mizraim no ɔ. 25(Jinɛ e susu kaa e nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ ma kɔ se kaa Mawu ngɛ e nine nɔ gue nɛ e kɛ kpɔ mɛ; se a kɔ we se.) 26E nɔ je na a, e ba na nyɛmimɛ enyɔ komɛ nɛ a ngɛ kunɔ nɔe, nɛ e kpata mɛ ke: ‘Tsaatsɛmɛ, nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛmimɛ ji nyɛ, mɛni he je nyɛ ngɛ nyɛ he yayami pee nɛ ɔ?’ 27Se nɔ nɛ pee e nyɛmi yayami ɔ tsɛ̃ lɛ kɛ ya se nɛ e ke: ‘Mɛnɔ lɛ wo mo wa nɔ ganɔ kɛ kojolɔ? 28Anɛ o ngɛ hlae nɛ o gbe mi kaa bɔ nɛ o gbe Mizraim no ɔ hiɛ ɔ?’ 29Munyu nɛ ɔ he ɔ Mose tu fo nɛ e ya to nibwɔ ngɛ Midian zugba a nɔ, nɛ e fɔ bimɛ nyumuhi enyɔ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ.
30“Jeha nyingmi eywiɛ se ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bɔfo ko ba je e he kpo tsɔɔ lɛ ngɛ Sinai yoku ɔ he nga a nɔ ngɛ la lilɛ mi ngɛ pu ko mi. 31Nɛ benɛ Mose na a, e hɛ mi pee lɛ yaa ngɛ ni nami ɔ he. Nɛ benɛ e ngɛ lɛ hɛe kɛ ngɛ he sue konɛ e hyɛ ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ gbi de lɛ ke: 32‘Imi ji o tsɛmɛ a Mawu ɔ, Abraham kɛ Isak kɛ Yakob Mawu ɔ.’ Nɛ Mose he do blibliibli nɛ e ka kaa e ma ya hyɛ. 33Nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de lɛ ke: ‘Je o tokota amɛ ngɛ o nane, ejakaa he nɛ o daa si ngɛ ɔ, zugba klɔuklɔu ʼi. 34I na ye ma nɛ ngɛ Mizraim ɔ a dengme ɔ, nɛ a zanuelami ɔ hu i nu, nɛ i kple si kɛ ma mɛ jemi. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ba nɛ ma tsɔ mo Mizraim.’
35“Jamɛ a Mose ɔ kɛ̃ nɛ a kua nɛ a de ke: ‘Mɛnɔ lɛ wo mo wa nɔ ganɔ kɛ kojolɔ’ ɔ, lɛ kɛ̃ Mawu gu bɔfo ɔ nɛ je e he kpo tsɔɔ le ngɛ pu ɔ mi ɔ nɔ tsɔ lɛ kaa ganɔ kɛ kpɔlɔ. 36Lɛ nɔuu lɛ e kpaka mɛ ke je kpo, nɛ e pee nyakpɛ nihi kɛ okadihi ngɛ Mizraim zugba a nɔ kɛ Wotsu ɔ mi kɛ nga a nɔ jeha nyingmi eywiɛ. 37Lɛ ji jamɛ a Mose nɛ de Israelbi ɔmɛ ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ nyɛ Mawu ɔ ma tle gbalɔ ko nɛ ngɛ kaa imi si kɛ maa je nyɛ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti ngɔ ha nyɛ; nyɛɛ bu lɛ tue.’ 38Mose ji nɔ nɛ kɛ asafo ɔ hi nga a nɔ nɛ e da bɔfo ɔ nɛ kɛ lɛ tu munyu ngɛ Sinai yoku ɔ nɔ ɔ kɛ wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɛ e he wami munyu ɔmɛ ba ha wɔ ɔ nɛ. 39Nɔ nɛ ɔ wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ kplɛɛ we nɛ a bu lɛ tue se mohu a hɛɛ lɛ soisoi, nɛ a tsui kpale kɛ ho Mizraim ya ekohu, 40nɛ a de Aaron ke: ‘Pee mawuhi ngɔ ha wɔ nɛ a nyɛɛ wa hɛ mi, ejakaa kikɛmɛ a Mose nɛ kpakpa wɔ kɛ je Mizraim zugba a nɔ nɛ ɔ, wa li nɔ́ nɛ ya ba e nɔ.’ 41Nɛ jamɛ a be ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, a pee na bi, nɛ a sa bɔ ngɔ ha amaga a, nɛ a na mɛ nitse a nine nya ni tsumi ɔmɛ a he bua jɔmi. 42Se Mawu plɛ e he nɛ e ngmɛɛ a he kaa a ja hiɔwe nihi, kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma ngɛ gbali ɔmɛ a womi ɔ mi ke:
‘Nyɛ Israel we,
Anɛ imi nɛ nyɛ sã lohwehi kɛ ni yeni bɔ ɔ ngɔ ha
Ngɛ nga a nɔ jeha nyingmi eywiɛ ɔ lo?
43Molok bo tsu mohu nyɛ wo tloo
Kɛ nyɛ Mawu Remfan ɔ dodoe ɔ nɛ ji amagahi
Nɛ nyɛ puɛ nɛ nyɛ jaa mɛ ɔ;
Nɛ Babilon se ma muɔ nyɛ kɛ maa ho.’
44“Watsɛmɛ ɔmɛ hɛɛ odase Bo Tsu ɔ ngɛ nga a nɔ. A pee lɛ kaa bɔ nɛ nɔ nɛ kɛ Mose tu munyu ɔ tsɔɔ lɛ ke e pee lɛ ɔ, lɔ ɔ ji kaa bɔ nɛ e na a. 45Benɛ watsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a nine su nɔ ɔ, a kɛ Yosua hɛɛ kɛ ba majeli nɛ Mawu fie ngɛ watsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a hɛ mi ɔ a zugba a nɔ. Hiɛ ɔ e hi kɛ ba su David be ɔ mi. 46Lɛ e hɛ mi ba nyami ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi nɛ e kpa pɛɛ ke e maa pee sihi he ko ngɔ ha Yakob Mawu ɔ. 47Se Salomo ma tsu ha lɛ.
48“Pohu Hiɔwe no ɔ, tsa hi tsuhi nɛ a kɛ ninehi pee ɔmɛ a mi, kaa bɔ nɛ gbalɔ ɔ hu de ɔ ke:
49‘Hiɔwe ɔ ye matsɛ sɛ ʼi,
Nɛ zugba a ye nane si maangoo ʼi.
Mɛni tsu nyɛ maa ma ha mi mɔ?
Jeha nɛ ɔ jije ji ye he jɔɔmi he ɔ?
Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ke:
50Anɛ pi ye nine nɛ pee enɛ ɔmɛ kulaa lo?’
51“Nyɛ kuɛ wali kɛ amaga jali ngɛ tsuihi kɛ tuehi a mi! Nyɛɛ lɛɛ daa nɛ ɔ nyɛ kuɔ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ nya; bɔ nɛ nyɛ tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ pee ɔ, jã nyɛ hu nyɛ peɔ. 52Gbali ɔmɛ a ti mɛnɔ nyɛ tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ wɛ́ lɛ yi mi hyɛ? Nɛ a gbe nihi nɛ gba sa ngɛ dalɔ ɔ bami ɔ he ɔ, nɔ nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛ plɛ e se blɔ tsɔɔli kɛ awi yeli ɔ, 53nyɛ nɛ nyɛ na mlaa a ngɛ bɔfohi a ni tsumi nya nɛ nyɛ yi nɔ ɔ.”
A fia Stefano tɛ
54Se benɛ a nu kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, e gbɔ a tsui mi, nɛ a kpe a lungu nya pue e nɔ. 55Se lɛɛ akɛnɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ hyi lɛ tɔtɔɔtɔ ɔ, e hyɛ hiɔwe too, nɛ e na Mawu hɛ mi nyami ɔ kɛ Yesu nɛ daa si ngɛ Mawu hiɛ ɔ nɔ. 56Nɛ e ke: “Oʼɛ, i ngɛ hyɛe nɛ hiɔwe nya bli kɛ Nɔmlɔ Bi ɔ nɛ daa si ngɛ Mawu hiɛ ɔ nɔ.” 57Se a kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ, nɛ a tsi a tue, nɛ a kɛ juɛmi kake ke kɛ ba e nɔ, 58nɛ a tsitsɛɛ e yi se kɛ je ma a mi, nɛ a ya fia lɛ tɛ. Nɛ odasefo ɔmɛ ngɔ a bo ɔmɛ ngɔ pue niheyo ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Saulo ɔ nane nya.” 59Nɛ benɛ a fia Stefano tɛ ɔ, e fã Yesu nɛ e ke: “Mawetsɛ Yesu, he ye mumi ɔ!” 60Nɛ e kpla si, nɛ e kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ ke: “Mawetsɛ, koo ngɔ kikɛmɛ a yayami nɛ ɔ ngɔ fɔ a nɔ!” Nɛ benɛ e de kikɛ ɔ, e ngɔ e nya.

Title: BƆFO 8
Content:
Saulo wa asafo ɔ yi mi
1Stefano gbemi ɔ ngɔ Saulo hu nya. Nɛ jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔ nɔuu ɔ, yi mi wami kpetekpleenyɛ te si wo asafo nɛ ngɛ Yerusalem ɔ, nɛ mɛ tsuo a gbɛ fia Yudea kɛ Samaria ni ɔmɛ a mi, ja bɔfo ɔmɛ kɛkɛ e piɛ. 2Nyumuhi Mawu gbeye yeli komɛ ya dla Stefano ngɔ to, nɛ a fo lɛ wawɛɛ.
3Se Saulo lɛɛ, e ka asafo ɔ hɛ mi kpatami. E sɛɛ wehi a mi nɛ e ya nuu nyumuhi kɛ yihi nɛ e ya woɔ mɛ tsu mi.
Sane Kpakpa a fiɛmi ngɛ Samaria
4Kɛkɛ nɛ nihi nɛ gbɛ fia a ya kpa si, nɛ a fiɛ sane kpakpa a. 5Nɛ Filipo ya Samaria ma ko nɔ, nɛ e ya fiɛ Kristo he sane ɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ mɛ. 6Nɛ nihi babauu kɛ juɛmi kake bu munyuhi nɛ Filipo ngɛ tue ɔ tue, benɛ a nu nɛ a na okadihi nɛ e pee ɔ. 7Ejakaa nihi fuu nɛ mumi yayamihi ngɛ a mi ɔ mumi ɔmɛ kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ nɛ a je a mi, nɛ a tsa nihi nɛ hule kɛ akpaketsɛmɛ fuu hulɔ. 8Nɛ bua jɔmi babauu ba jamɛ a ma a mi.
9Se nyumu ko ngɛ ma a mi momo nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Simon nɛ tsuɔ kunya nɛ e haa Samariabi ɔmɛ a nya kpɛɛ a he; e tsɔɔ e he kaa nɔmlɔ ngua je lɛ. 10Nimli wawi kɛ nimli nguahi kulaa buɔ lɛ tue nɛ a deɔ ke: “Nɔ nɛ ɔ ji Mawu he wami nɛ a tsɛɛ kpetekpleenyɛ ɔ nɛ.” 11Nɛ akɛnɛ e je kɛ kɛ e kunya tsumi ɔ ha a nya kpɛ a he he je ɔ, a buɔ lɛ tue. 12Se benɛ a he Filipo nɛ fiɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ kɛ Yesu Kristo biɛ ɔ he sane kpakpa a tsɔɔ mɛ ɔ ye ɔ, wa baptisi nyumuhi kɛ yihi. 13Kɛkɛ nɛ Simon nitse hu he ye, nɛ a baptisi lɛ, nɛ e kɛ Filipo bɔni nyɛɛmi, nɛ benɛ e na okadihi kɛ he wami ni tsumi nguahi nɛ a pee ɔ, e nya kpɛ e he.
14Se benɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ nɛ ngɛ Yerusalem ɔ na kaa Samariabi ɔmɛ pɛtɛ Mawu munyu ɔ he ɔ, a tsɔ Petro kɛ Yohane kɛ ya a ngɔ. 15Benɛ a ba lejɛ ɔ, a ba sɔle ha mɛ, benɛ pee nɛ a na Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ. 16Ejakaa Mumi ɔ bɛ a ti nɔ ko nɔ ko nɔ lolo, se baptisimi kɛkɛ a baptisi mɛ wo Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu biɛ mi. 17Kɛkɛ nɛ a kɛ a ninehi pue a nɔ, nɛ a na Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ.
18Benɛ Simon na kaa bɔfo ɔmɛ a ninehi kɛ nihi a nɔ puemi ɔ haa a naa Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ, e kɛ sika ba ba ha mɛ 19nɛ e ke: “Nyɛ ha imi hu kikɛmɛ a he wami nɛ ɔ eko, konɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ i kɛ ye ninehi ma pue e nɔ ɔ, e na Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ.” 20Se Petro de lɛ ke: “O kɛ o sika a tsuo hɛ mi nɛ kpata, ejakaa o susuu kaa Mawu nɔke nɔ ɔ sika a kɛ heɔ! 21O be blɔ nya loo blɔ fami nɔ́ ko ngɛ kikɛmɛ a sane nɛ ɔ mi; ejakaa o tsui dɛ ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi. 22Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jeha nɛ ɔ pia o he ngɛ o nɔ yayami ɔ he, nɛ o kpa Mawu pɛɛ kaa alinɔ a maa ngɔ o tsui mi susumi ɔ ngɔ pa mo lo. 23Ejakaa i na kaa duɔ doomi kɛ nɔ́ yayami kpã a mi o ngɛ nɛ ɔ nɛ.” 24Nɛ Simon he nɔ ke: “Nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ kpa Nyɔmtsɛ pɛɛ ha mi, konɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ de nɛ ɔmɛ eko nɛ ko ba ye nɔ.”
25Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ a ye odase nɛ a tu Nyɔmtsɛ munyu ɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ mɛ nɛ a kpale a se kɛ ma Yerusalem ɔ, a fiɛ sane kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ ngɛ Samariabi ɔmɛ a kɔpehi fuu a mi.
Filipo kɛ Etiopia manye sɔmɔlɔ nɔkɔtɔma a
26Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bɔfo ko ba de Filipo ke: “Tee si nɛ o ya leneyi (wo si je) ngɛ blɔ nɛ je Yerusalem kɛ yaa Gaza nɛ pee ma doku ɔ nɔ.” 27Nɛ e te si nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho. Nɛ oʼɛ, nyumu Etiopia no ko nɛ ji Etiopiabihi a manye Kandake ɔ sɔmɔlɔ nɔkɔtɔma nɛ a ta lɛ nɛ a buu nɛ hyɛɛ e juetli tsuo nɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ. E be kɛ ya Yerusalem ya ja Mawu, 28nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ e kpale e se ngɛ e zugba lɛ mi kɛ yaa, nɛ e ngɛ gbalɔ Yesaia womi ɔ kanee. 29Nɛ Mumi ɔ de Filipo ke: “Yaa e ngɔ nɛ o kɛ lɛ ya hi si.” 30Benɛ Filipo sa fo kɛ yaa a, e nu kaa e ngɛ gbalɔ Yesaia womi ɔ kanee, nɛ e bi lɛ ke: “Anɛ o ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ o ngɛ kanee ɔ sisi nue piɔ?” 31Nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Kɛ ma pee kɛɛ nɛ ma nyɛ hu, kaa ja nɔ ko tsɔɔ mi?” Kɛkɛ nɛ e kpa Filipo pɛɛ ke e ba nɛ e kɛ lɛ ba hi si. 32Se ngmami ɔ he nɛ e ngɛ kanee ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ:
“A kpaka lɛ kɛ ho kaa jijɔ nɛ a yaa gbe lɛ,
Nɛ bɔ nɛ jijɔ bi peɔ kpoo ngɛ e he bwɔmi salɔ hɛ mi ɔ,
Ja nɔuu e kpɛ we e kuɔ si.
33E he si bami ɔ mi ɔ, a je e kojomi ɔ kɛ ho;
Se e nina a, mɛnɔ maa sɛɛ he ni?
Ejakaa a ngɔ e wami ɔ kɛ je zugba a nɔ.”
34Nɛ sɔmɔlɔ nɔkɔtɔma a de Filipo ke: “I kpa mo pɛɛ, mɛnɔ he munyu gbalɔ ɔ ngɛ tue ɔ? Lɛ nitsɛ e he loo nɔ kpa?” 35Filipo pa e nya mi nɛ e bɔni kɛ je kikɛmɛ a ngmami nɛ ɔ nɔ, nɛ e jaje Yesu he sane kpakpa a tsɔɔ lɛ. 36Nɛ benɛ a ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ ɔ, a ba su nyu ko he, nɛ maa je sɔmɔlɔ nɔkɔtɔma a nyɛ a, e ke: “Oʼɛ nyu; mɛni tsiɔ ye baptisimi nya?” [ 37Se Filipo ke: “Ke o heɔ yeɔ kɛ o tsui kulaa a, lɛɛ blɔ ngɛ he.” Nɛ e he nɔ ke: “I heɔ yeɔ kaa Yesu Kristo ji Mawu bi ɔ nɛ.”] 38Nɛ e fa ke zugba lɛ ɔ nɛ da si, nɛ Filipo kɛ sɔmɔlɔ nɔkɔtɔma a tsuo kple si kɛ ho nyu ɔ mi ya, nɛ e baptisi lɛ. 39Nɛ benɛ a je nyu ɔ mi ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ Mumi ɔ sa Filipo kɛ je; nɛ sɔmɔlɔ nɔkɔtɔma a nɛ́ lɛ hu, se e pue nɔ kɛ ho kɛ nyami. 40Se Filipo ɔ lɛɛ a na lɛ ngɛ Azoto; nɛ benɛ e ngɛ mi poe ɔ, e jaje sane kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ ngɛ ma amɛ kulaa a mi kɛ ya si e ba su Kaisarea.

Title: BƆFO 9
Content:
Saulo tsuitsakemi
(Bɔfo 22.6-16; 26.12-18)
1Saulo ngɛ nɔ ngɛ he gbeye womi kɛ nɔ gbemi mumi mue kɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kaseli ɔmɛ a nɔ puee kɛ mwɔɔ. E ya osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a ngɔ, 2nɛ e ya bi lɛ womihi nɛ e kɛ ya Damasko kpe he ɔmɛ, benɛ pee nɛ ke e na ni kome nɛ hɛɛ kikɛmɛ a tsɔɔmi nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, nyumuhi jio, yihi jio, nɛ e fi mɛ nɛ e kpaka mɛ kɛ ba Yerusalem.
3Se bnɛ e nyɛɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ kɛ yaa nɛ e su Damasko ta a, si kake too ɔ, la kpɛ kɛ je hiɔwe kɛ ba bɔle lɛ, 4nɛ e tsɔ fia si, nɛ e nu gbi ko nɛ ngɛ lɛ dee ke: “Saulo, Saulo, mɛ he je o ngɛ mi yi mi wae?” 5Nɛ e ke: “Mo mɛnɔ, Mawetsɛ?” Se Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ke: “Imi ji Yesu, nɔ nɛ o ngɛ lɛ yi mi wae ɔ nɛ. 6Tee si nɛ o ya ma a mi nɛ a maa tsɔɔ mɔ nɔ nɛ sa kaa o pee.” 7Kɛkɛ nɛ nyumuhi nɛ kɛ lɛ nyɛɛ ɔmɛ a nya ma kɛ daa si, a ngɛ gbi ɔ nue mohu se a nɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko. 8Saulo te si; se benɛ e bli e hɛngmɛ ɔ, e hyɛ we nɔ; nɛ a pɛtɛ e nine nya nɛ a kɛ lɛ ya Damasko. 9E hyɛ we nɔ, jeha nɛ ɔ hu e yi ni nɛ e nui nɔ ko hulɔ ligbi etɛ sɔuu.
10Se kaselɔ ko ngɛ Damasko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Anania; nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de lɛ ngɛ ninami mi ke: “Anania!” Nɛ e ke: “Ne mi, Nyɔmtsɛ.” 11Nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de lɛ ke: “Tee si nɛ o ya gbɛjegbɛ nɛ a tsɛɛ Tlɔmɔɔ ɔ nɔ, nɛ o ya bi nɔ ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Saulo nɛ je Tarso ɔ si ngɛ Yuda we ɔ mi; oʼɛ, e ngɛ sɔlee.” 12Nɛ Saulo na ngɛ ninami mi kaa nyumu ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Anania a ma e ngɔ, nɛ e kɛ eninehi ngɛ e nɔ fɔe, benɛ pee nɛ e hyɛ nɔ ekohu. 13Se Anania he nɔ nɛ e ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, i nu kikɛmɛ a nyumu nɛ ɔ he sane ngɛ nihi fuu a nya kaa e pee o ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ nɛ ngɛ Yerusalem ɔ ni yayami babauu. 14Nɛ hiɛ ɔ hu tete, e na he blɔ kɛ je osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ a ngɔ kaa e ba fi nihi tsuo nɛ tɛliɔ ngɛ o biɛ ɔ mi ɔ.” 15Se Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de lɛ ke: “Yaa, ejakaa nɔ nɛ ɔ ji ye dɛ mi dade nɛ a hla ha mi, konɛ e hɛɛ ye biɛ ɔ kɛ ya majemajeli kɛ matsɛmɛ kɛ Israelbi ɔmɛ hu a hɛ mi. 16Ejakaa ma tsɔɔ lɛ dengmehi abɔ nɛ e maa na ngɛ ye biɛ ɔhe.”
17Kɛkɛ nɛ Anania pue nɔ kɛ ho nɛ e ya sɛ we ɔ mi, nɛ e kɛ e ninehi pue e nɔ nɛ e ke: “Maminyumu Saulo, Mawetsɛ Yesu, nɔ nɛ je e he kpo tsɔɔ mo benɛ o ma ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ ɔ tsɔ mi o ngɔ, benɛ pee nɛ o hyɛ nɔ ekohu nɛ o hyi fuu kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ.” 18Nɛ amlɔ ɔ ni komɛ je e hɛngmɛ nɔ pue si kaa lo toto nɛ e hyɛ nɔ́ amlɔ, nɛ e te si nɛ a baptisi lɛ; 19nɛ e ye ni, nɛ e he wa lɛ. Nɛ e kɛ kaseli nɛ ngɛ Damasko ɔ hi si be bɔɔ ko.
Saulo fiɛ ngɛ Damasko
20Nɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔuu, e fiɛ ngɛ kpe he ɔmɛ ke Yesu ji Mawu bi ɔ nɛ. 21Nɛ nihi kulaa nɛ nu ɔ nya kpɛ a he, nɛ a ke: “Anɛ pi nɔ nɛ ɔ nɛ kpataa nihi nɛ tɛliɔ ngɛ kikɛmɛ a biɛ nɛ ɔ mi ɔ a hɛ mi ngɛ Yerusalem ɔ ji nɛ ɔ lo? Nɛ hiɛ ɔ hu tete, lɔ ɔ nɔuu he e ba ngɛ, konɛ e ba fi mɛ nɛ e kpaka mɛ kɛ ya osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ a ngɔ?”
22Se Saulo na hewami babauu, nɛ e ha Yudafohi nɛ ngɛ Damasko ɔmɛ a nya mi munyu ta, ejakaa e tsɔɔ mɛ pãa kaa nɔ nɛ ɔ ji Kristo ɔ nɛ.
23Be saii se ɔ, Yudafo ɔmɛ ya sae yi nɔ ke a maa gbe lɛ. 24Se Saulo ba nu a somi ɔ he. Nɛ a buu ma a agbo ɔmɛ a nya daa nyɔ kɛ pia benɛ pee nɛ a gbe lɛ. 25Se kaseli ɔmɛ ngɔ lɛ wo kusii mi nyɔ mi, nɛ a siu lɛ kɛ gu gli ɔ nɔ kɛ ya ma si.
Saulo ngɛ Yerusalem
26Benɛ Saulo ba Yerusalem ɔ, e ka e he kɛ kaseli ɔmɛ a he bɔmi, se mɛ tsuo a ngɛ lɛ gbeye yee, a he we yi kaa kaselɔ ji lɛ. 27Se Barnaba ngɔ lɛ kɛ ya bɔfo ɔmɛ a ngɔ, nɛ e ya sɛɛ ha mɛ bɔ nɛ Paulo na Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ nɛ e kɛ lɛ tu munyu, kɛ bɔ nɛ e pee kã ngɛ Yesu biɛ ɔ mi ngɛ Damasko. 28Nɛ e kɛ mɛ yaa baa ngɛ Yerusalem nɛ e pee kã ngɛ Yesu biɛ ɔ mi. 29Nɛ e kɛ Helenebi ɔmɛ tu munyu nɛ e kɛ mɛ hla nihi a nya; se mɛɛ lɛɛ a ngɛ lɛ hlae nɛ a gbe. 30Benɛ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ nu he ɔ, a ya sɛ lɛ Kaisarea, nɛ a ha e ho Tarso ya.
31Jeha nɛ ɔ asafo ɔ na he jɔmi ngɛ Yudea kɛ Galilea kɛ Samaria tsuo, nɛ a nane nu si, nɛ a nyɛɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ gbeye yemi mi, nɛ a he sange mɛ ngɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ bua womi mi.
Petro ngɛ Lida kɛ Yopa
32E ba mi kaa benɛ Petro ya kpa he ɔmɛ tsuo ɔ, e ba ni klɔuklɔuhi nɛ ngɛ Lida a hu a ngɔ. 33Nɛ e ba na nyumu ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Ainea nɛ e fɔɔ si ngɛ sa nɔ kɛ kuɔmi hiɔ jeha kpaanyɔ sɔuu. 34Nɛ Petro de lɛ ke: “Ainea, Yesu Kristo ngɛ mo tsae; tee si nɛ mo nitsɛ o dla o sa a!” Nɛ amlɔ ɔ, e te si. 35Nɛ nihi tsuo nɛ ngɛ Lida kɛ Saron ɔ na lɛ, nɛ a tsake kɛ ba Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ngɔ.
36Se yo kaselɔ ko ngɛ Yopa nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Tabita, e sisi ji Dorka (odabɔ). Lɛɛ e hyi tɔ kɛ ni tsumi kpakpahi kɛ ohiafohi a hyemi. 37Se e ba mi kaa jamɛ a be ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, e ba nu hiɔ nɛ e gbo. A du ha lɛ nɛ a kɛ lɛ ya fɔ hiɔwe tsu ko mi. 38Se akɛnɛ Lida kɛ Yopa kɛ we, nɛ kaseli ɔmɛ nu kaa Patro ngɛ lejɛ ɔ he je ɔ, a tsɔ nyumuhi enyɔ kɛ ya e ngɔ ya kpa lɛ pɛɛ ke e ko hlua si, se e ba a ngɔ oya. 39Petro te si nɛ e kɛ mɛ ho. Nɛ benɛ e su lejɛ ɔ, a kɛ lɛ ya hiɔwe tsu ɔ mi, nɛ yaloyi ɔmɛ tsuo ba daa si ngɛ e kasa nya ngɛ ya foe, nɛ a kɛ gugue tadehi kɛ tadehi nɛ Dorka pee benɛ e kɛ mɛ ngɛ ɔ ngɛ lɛ tsɔɔe. 40Nɛ Petro fie mɛ kulaa kɛ je kpo, nɛ e kpla si nɛ e sɔle, nɛ e plɛ e he kɛ ya nɔ gbogboe ɔ ngɔ nɛ e ke: “Tabita, tee si!” Nɛ e bli e hɛngmɛ, nɛ benɛ e na Petro ɔ, e te si hi si. 41Nɛ Petro nu e nine si, nɛ e wo e nɔ; nɛ e tsɛ ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ kɛ yalɔyi ɔmɛ kɛ ba, nɛ e kɛ lɛ ba da a hɛ mi hɛkalɔ. 42Nɛ a nu he ngɛ Yopa tsuo, nɛ nihi fuu he Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɔ ye. 43Nɛ Petro hi Yopa be saii ngɛ Simon, lohwe he womi tsopa wolɔ ɔ ngɔ.

Title: BƆFO 10
Content:
Petro kɛ Kornelio
1Nyumu ko ngɛ Kaisarea nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Kornelio nɛ ji Italia aslaafo ɔmɛ a nɔ Sasafoatsɛ. 2Mawu jalɔ ji lɛ, nɛ e kɛ e we ɔ tsuo yee Mawu gbeye, nɛ e peɔ ma mi bi ɔmɛ kpakpahi fuu, nɛ e kpaa Mawu pɛɛ daa. 3Ligbi ko gbɔkuɛ maa pee ngmlɛ etɛ mi ɔ, e na ngɛ ninami mi paa kaa Mawu bɔfo ko ba e ngɔ ba de lɛ ke: “Kornelio!” 4Nɛ e hyɛ lɛ too, nɛ e ye gbeye nɛ e ke: “Mo mɛnɔ ʼi, Nyɔmtsɛ?” Nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de lɛ ke: “O sɔlemihi kɛ ni kpakpahi nɛ o peɔ ɔ ba su hiɔwe nɛ, e pee kaimi nɔ́ ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi. 5Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ tsɔ nihi kɛ ya Yopa nɛ o ya kpee Simon nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Petro hulɔ ɔ kɛ ba. 6E ya to Simon lohwe he womi tsopa wolɔ ɔ nɛ we ngɛ wo ɔ nya a ngɔ.” 7Benɛ bɔfo ɔ nɛ kɛ lɛ ba tu munyu ɔ je ɔ, e tsɛ e webi ɔmɛ a ti ni enyɔ kɛ aslaafono ko nɛ yee Mawu gbeye nɛ ji nihi nɛ sɔmɔɔ lɛ ɔ a ti nɔ kake, 8nɛ e sɛɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo ngɔ ha mɛ, nɛ e tsɔ mɛ Yopa.
9Enɔ je na a, benɛ a nyɛɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ nɛ e piɛ bɔɔ nɛ a maa su ma a mi ɔ, Petro ho sɔlemi ya ngɛ tsu ɔ yi mi, maa pee ngmlɛ nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ mi. 10Hwɔ ye lɛ wawɛɛ, nɛ e ngɛ nɔ́ ko hlae nɛ e ye. Se benɛ a ngɛ niyeni ɔ pee ɔ, e pee kaa nɔ́ nɛ nɔ́ nɔ e nɔ, 11nɛ e na kaa hiɔwe nya bli, nɛ nɔ́ ko ngɛ si kplee kaa bo ngua nɛ a hɛɛ e kɔ nya eywiɛ ɔ mi nɛ a ngɛ siue kɛ ma zugba. 12Zugba nɔ lohwe nane eywiɛeywiɛtsɛmɛ kɛ waami lohwehi, kɛ hiɔwe lohwe pɛlitsmɛ slɔɔto ɔmɛ tsuo eko ngɛ mi. 13Nɛ gbi ko de lɛ ke: “Petro, tee si, gbee nɛ o ye!” 14Se Petro ke: “Dɛbi, Nyɔmtsɛ, ejakaa i yi yakayaka nɔ́ ko loo nɔ́ ko nɛ he tsɔ we hyɛ.” 15Nɛ gbi ɔ kpale de lɛ nɔ nɛ ji si enyɔ ke: “Nɔ́ nɛ Mawu tsukɔ he ɔ, koo bu lɛ kaa yakayaka nɔ́ ko.” 16A pee ja si etɛ, nɛ a wo nɔ́ ɔ kɛ ho hiɔwe ya ekohu.
17Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ Petro dɛ yaa kaa kɛ ji nɔ́ nɛ e na nɛ ɔ sisi kɛɛ ɔ, oʼɛ, nyumu ɔmɛ nɛ Kornelio tsɔ ɔ ngɛ Simon we ɔ si bie, nɛ a ba da agbo ɔ nya. 18A tsɛ nɛ a bi ke: “Anɛ hiɛ ɔ Simon nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Petro hulɔ ɔ ba to ɔ lo?” 19Se benɛ Petro ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ e na a he susue ɔ, Mumi ɔ de lɛ ke: “Oʼɛ nyumuhi etɛ komɛ ngɛ mo hlae. 20Lɔ ɔ he ɔ tee si nɛ o kple si nɛ o kɛ mɛ nɛ ho, nɛ koo je nɔ, ejakaa imi lɛ i tsɔ mɛ.” 21Kɛkɛ nɛ Petro kple si, nɛ e ya de nyumu ɔmɛ ke: “Oʼɛ, imi ji nɛ ɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ hlae ɔ nɛ; mɛni sane he nyɛ ba ngɛ?” 22Nɛ a ke: “Asafoatsɛ Kornelio, nɛ ji nyumu dalɔ kɛ Mawu gbeye yelɔ nɛ Yudafohi a ma mluku ɔ kulaa tuɔ e he munyu kpakpa a, lɛ hiɔwe bɔfo klɔuklɔu ko de lɛ ke e tsɔ nɛ a ba kpee mo kɛ ba e we ɔ mi, konɛ e bu o nya munyu tue.” 23Kɛkɛ nɛ Petro tsɛ mɛ kɛ ba we ɔ mi nɛ e ba pee mɛ nibwɔ. Nɛ e nɔ je na a, Petro kɛ mɛ pue nɔ kɛ ho, nɛ nyɛmimɛ nɛ ngɛ Yopa a a ti ni komɛ piɛ e he.
24E nɔ je na ekohu ɔ, a ya su Kaisarea. Kornelio ngɛ mɛ blɔ hyɛe, nɛ e tsɛ e wekuli kɛ e huɛmɛ kpakpahi kɛ ba kpe. 25Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ Petro ngɛ we ɔ mi sɛe ɔ, Kornelio kɛ lɛ ba kpe, nɛ e ba bu si ngɛ e nane nya nɛ e ja lɛ. 26Se Petro wo e nɔ, nɛ e ke: “Tee si, se imi hu nɔmlɔ ji mi.” 27Nɛ e kɛ lɛ ngɛ ni sɛɛe kɛ ya sɛ we ɔ mi, nɛ eya na nihi babauu nɛ ba bua a he nya a. 28Nɛ Petro de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ le bɔ nɛ Yuda no be he blɔ kaa e kɛ nɔ ko nɛ ji ma kpã mi no bɔɔ aloo e baa e ngɔ. Se imi lɛɛ, Mawu tsɔɔ mi ke ma ko tsɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko yaka nɔmlɔ, loo nɔ nɛ he tsɔ we. 29Lɔ ɔ he hulɔ nɛ benɛ a tsɔ ba kpee mi ɔ, i je we nya nɛ i ba nɛ ɔ nɛ. Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ i ngɛ nyɛ bie ke: Mɛni sane he je nɛ nyɛ tsɔ kɛ ba kpee mi ɔ?”
30Kornelio ha heto ke: “Mwɔnɔ ji ligbi eywiɛ ɔ, i ngɛ sɔlee ngɛ ye we ɔ mi maa pee gbɔkuɛ ngmlɛ etɛ mi; nɛ oʼɛ, nyumu ko nɛ wo tade klaiklai ba da ye hɛ mi, 31nɛ e ke: ‘Kornelio, a bu o sɔlemi ɔ tue, nɛ o ni kpakpahi nɛ o peɔ ɔ hu a kai ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi. 32Lɔ ɔ he ɔ tsɔ nihi kɛ ya Yopa, nɛ a ya kpee Simon nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Petro hulɔ ɔ kɛ ba. E ya to Simon lohwe he womi tsopa wolɔ ɔ nɛ we ngɛ wo ɔ nya a ngɔ.’ 33Kɛkɛ nɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔuu nɛ i tsɔ o ngɔ, nɛ o pee saminya kaa o ba. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jeha nɛ ɔ wɔ tsuo wa ngɛ hiɛ ɔ ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi, konɛ waa bu nihi tsuo kulaa nɛ Mawu de mo ngɔ to ɔ tue.”
Petro munyu nɛ e tu
34Kɛkɛ nɛ Petro pa e nya mi nɛ e ke: “Niinɛ, i kpa si kaa Mawu pi nimli a hɛ mi hyɛlɔ; 35se mohu ma tsuaa ma mi ɔ, nɔ nɛ yee lɛ gbeye nɛ e tsuɔ dami nihi ɔ, lɛ ji nɔ nɛ saa e hɛ mi. 36Mawu tsɔ nɛ a kɛ munyu ɔ ya ha Israelbi, nɛ a gu Yesu Kristo nɔ kɛ jaje he jɔmi sane kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ mɛ, lɛ ji nihi tsuo a Nyɔmtsɛ. 37Nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ le sane ɔ nɛ ba ngɛ Yudea tsuo, nɛ e je sisi kɛ je Galilea, ngɛ baptisimi nɛ Yohane fiɛ ɔ se ɔ, 38bɔ nɛ Mawu ngɔ Mumi Klɔuklɔu kɛ he wami ngɔ pɔ Yesu nɛ je Nazaret ɔ nu, nɛ e kpaa si peɔ kpakpa, nɛ e tsaa nihi kulaa nɛ abosiami haoɔ mɛ ɔ, ejakaa Mawu kɛ lɛ ngɛ. 39Nɛ wɔ ji nihi tsuo kulaa nɛ e pee ngɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a zugba a nɔ kɛ Yerusalem ɔ he odase yeli; nɔ nɛ a sɛu ngɛ tso nɔ nɛ a gbe lɛ ɔ. 40Lɛ nɔuu Mawu tle si ligbi nɛ ji ligbi etɛ ɔ, nɛ e ha e je e he kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ paa, 41tsa pi ma mluku ɔ tsuo, se mohu odase yeli nɛ Mawu hla ngɔ to momo ɔ, nɛ ji wɔ nihi nɛ waa kɛ lɛ ye ni nɛ waa kɛ lɛ nu, benɛ e te si kɛ je gbeje ɔ se ɔ. 42Nɛ e wo wɔ kita ke waa fiɛ ngɔ tsɔɔ ma a nɛ waa ye odase kaa lɛ ji nɔ nɛ Mawu je ngɔ to nɛ e kojo hɛ kali kɛ ni gbogboehi ɔ nɛ. 43Lɛ e he odase gbali ɔmɛ kulaa yeɔ, kaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ heɔ e nɔ yeɔ ɔ ma na e he yayami pami ngɛ e biɛ ɔ he.”
Majemajeli ɔmɛ na Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ
44Benɛ Petro ngɛ kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔmɛ tue nɔuu ɔ, Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ ba nihi tsuo nɛ nu munyu ɔ nɔ. 45Nɛ Yudafohi nɛ he ye nɛ a kɛ Petro ba a nya kpɛ a he kaa a nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu nɔke nɔ ɔ ngɔ pue majemajeli ɔmɛ hu a nɔ. 46Ejakaa a nu kaa a ngɛ ma se munyuhi slɔɔtohi tue, nɛ a ngɛ Mawu yi jee. Kɛkɛ nɛ Petro he nɔ ke: 47“Anɛ nɔ ko ma nyɛ nyu nya maa tsi, nɛ a ko baptisi ni nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ na Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ ka wɔ kɛ̃ ɔ lo?” 48Nɛ e fa ke a baptisi mɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ biɛ ɔ mi. Kɛkɛ nɛ a kpa lɛ pɛɛ ke e kɛ mɛ nɛ hi si be bɔɔ ko.

Title: BƆFO 11
Content:
Petro amaniɛ nɛ e bɔ Yerusalem asafo ɔ
1Bɔfo ɔmɛ kɛ nyɛmimɛ nɛ ngɛ Yudea a tsuo nu kaa majeli a bimɛ ɔmɛ hu pɛtɛ Mawu munyu ɔ he. 2Nɛ benɛ Petro ba Yerusalem ɔ, nihi nɛ je ninɛmɛ nɛ a po mɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ kɛ lɛ na, 3a ke: “O ya mɔmlɔtɔtsɛmɛ a ngɔ nɛ o kɛ mɛ ya ye ni.” 4Se Petro je sisi nɛ e bɔ mɛ amaniɛ ɔ tsuo ke:
5“I ngɛ Yopa ma a mi i ngɛ sɔlee, nɛ e pee kaa nɔ́ nɛ nɔ nɔ ye nɔ, nɛ i na ninami ko kaa nɔ́ ko je hiɔwe kaa bo ngua ko nɛ a hɛɛ e kɔ nya eywiɛ ɔ mi, nɛ a ngɛ siue kɛ ma zugba, nɛ e ba ye ngɔ tataata. 6Se benɛ i hyɛ mi too ɔ, i na zugba lohwe nane eywiɛtsɛmɛ kɛ nga mi lohwehi kɛ waami nihi kɛ hiɔwe lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ ngɛ mi. 7Nɛ i nu gbi ko hu nɛ de mi ke: ‘Petro, tee si, gbee nɛ o ye!’ 8Se i de ke: ‘Dɛbi, Nyɔmtsɛ, ejakaa i yi yakayaka nɔ́ ko loo nɔ́ ko nɛ he tsɔ we hyɛ.’ 9Se gbi nɛ je hiɔwe ɔ he nɔ nɔ́ nɛ ji si enyɔ ke: ‘Nɔ́ nɛ Mawu tsukɔ he ɔ, mo ko bu lɛ yakayaka nɔ́ ko.’ 10A pee jã si etɛ, nɛ a sa kulaa kɛ ho hiɔwe ya ekohu, 11Jamɛ a be ɔ mi nɔuu ɔ nyumuhi etɛ ba da we he nɛ i ngɛ ɔ agbo ɔ nya; a tsɔ mɛ kɛ je Kaisarea kɛ ba ye ngɔ. 12Nɛ mumi ɔ de mi ke i kɛ mɛ nɛ ya nɛ ma ko to tslee.
