Nyɛmimɛ ekpa nɛ ɔmɛ hu kɛ mi ya; nɛ wa ya sɛ nyumu ɔ we ɔ mi. 13Nɛ e sɛɛ wɔ bɔ nɛ e na bɔfo ɔ ngɛ e we ɔ mi nɛ e daa si nɛ e de lɛ ke: ‘Tsɔ nihi kɛ ya Yopa nɛ o ya kpee Simon nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Petro hulɔ ɔ kɛ ba, 14lɛ e ma de mo munyuhi nɛ a maa gu nɔ kɛ he mo kɛ o we ɔ kulaa yi wami.’ 15Se benɛ i bɔni munyu ɔ tumi ɔ, Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ ba ma a nɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ e ba ma wɔ hu wa nɔ kekle ɔ. 16Nɛ i kai Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ munyu ɔ nɛ e tu ke: ‘Yohane ɔ, e kɛ nyu baptisi, se nyɛɛ lɛɛ a maa baptisi nyɛ kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu’ ɔ. 17Jeha nɛ ɔ ke Mawu ha mɛ jamɛ a nɔke nɔ́ ɔ nɔuu nɛ e ha wɔ nɛ wa heɔ Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu nɔ yeɔ hulɔ ɔ, imi lɛɛ, mɛnɔ ji mi nɛ ma nyɛ Mawu nya ma tsi?” 18Se benɛ a nu munyu nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, a ma a nya, nɛ a wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami de ke: ‘Lɛɛ majeli ɔmɛ hu Mawu ha mɛ tsui tsakemi nɛ a kɛ he a yi wami!’
Antiokia asafo ɔ
19Jeha nɛ ɔ nihi nɛ gbɛ fia ngɛ Stefano amanenlu ɔ mi ɔ po mi kɛ ya Foinike kɛ Kipro kɛ Antiokia lokoo, se a fiɛ we munyu ɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ we nɔ ko nɔ ko kaa ja Yudafo ɔmɛ kɛkɛ. 20Se a ti ni komɛ ɔ, Kiprobihi kɛ Kireenebihi ji mɛ, nɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ba Antiokia ba tu munyu tsɔɔ Helabi ɔmɛ hulɔ, nɛ a fiɛ Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu he sane kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ mɛ. 21Nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ piɛ a he, nɛ nihi babauu he ye, nɛ a tsake kɛ ba Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ngɔ.
22Nɛ a he sane nɛ ɔ ba su Yerusalem asafo ɔ tue mi, nɛ a tsɔ Barnaba Antiokia. 23Nɛ benɛ e su lejɛ ɔ nɛ e ba na Mawu dloomi ɔ, e bua jɔ e he, nɛ e tu munyu tsɔɔ mɛ tsuo ke a kɛ tsui nɛ fi si nɛ pɛtɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ he. 24Nɔmlɔ kpakpa ji lɛ nɛ e hyi tɔ kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu kɛ hemi kɛ yemi. Nɛ a ngɔ nihi babauu kɛ ba Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ngɔ.
25Nɛ Barnaba pue nɔ kɛ ho Tarso ya ya hla Saulo, nɛ benɛ e na lɛ ɔ, e kɛ lɛ ba Antiokia ekohu. 26Nɛ e ba mi kaa a kɛ asafo ɔ hi si jeha mluku, nɛ a tsɔɔ nihi babauu ni, nɛ Antiokia ji he nɛ a wo kaseli ɔmɛ biɛ kekleekle ngɛ ke Kristofohi.
27Se kikɛmɛ a be nɛ ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, gbali komɛ je Yerusalem kɛ ba Antiokia. 28Nɛ a kpɛti nɔ ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Agabo ɔ te si, nɛ e tsɔɔ ngɛ Mumi ɔ nya kaa hwɔ kpetekpleenyɛ maa ba je mi tsuo kulaa, nɛ e ba mi ja ngɛ Kaisare Klaudio yi nɔ. 29Kaseli ɔmɛ kpɛ mi kaa a ma tsu nɔ́ ko ngɔ mane nyɛmimɛ nɛ ngɛ Yudea a nɛ a kɛ ya pɛne mɛ, nɔ tsuaa nɔ bɔ nɛ o ma nyɛ. 30Nɛ a pee ja, nɛ a ngɔ mane nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ gu Barnaba kɛ Saulo nɔ.

Title: BƆFO 12
Content:
A wa asafo ɔ yi mi babauu
1Jamɛ a be ɔ mi nɔuu ɔ, matsɛ Herode wo e nine nɔ, konɛ e pee asafo ɔ mi bi ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ yayami. 2E kɛ klaate gbe Yohane nyɛmi Yakobo. 3Nɛ benɛ e na kaa e ngɔ Yudafo ɔmɛ a nya a, e ya nɔ nɛ e nu Petro hulɔ. Se akpiti ligbi ɔmɛ a mi ʼi. 4Nɛ benɛ e nu lɛ ɔ, e wo lɛ tsu mi, nɛ e tu lɛ ngɔ wo aslaafohi eywiɛeywiɛ kuhi eywiɛ dɛ mi nɛ a bu e he. E susu kaa Hetsɔmi ɔ se ɔ e kɛ lɛ maa ba ma a hɛ mi. 5Lɔ ɔ he ɔ a tsi Petro nya ngɛ tsu ɔ mi mohu, se asafo ɔ hɛɛ sɔlemi mi kɛ ha lɛ wawɛɛ ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi.
A je Petro ngɛ tsu mi
6Se benɛ Herode ke e kɛ lɛ maa ba ma a hɛ mi ɔ, jamɛ a nyɔ ɔ mi ɔ, Petro hwɔɔ si ngɛ aslaafohi enyɔ a kpɛti, nɛ a wo lɛ kɔsɔkɔsɔhi enyɔ, nɛ buli hu daa si ngɛ sinya a nya ngɛ tsu ɔ he bue. 7Nɛ oʼɛ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bɔfo ko ba da e kasa nya, nɛ la kpɛ ngɛ tsu ɔ mi. Bɔfo ɔ gba Petro kasa ma nɛ e tsɛ̃ɛ lɛ ke: “Tee si esɔesɔ!” Nɛ e kɔsɔkɔsɔ ɔmɛ kplɔ ngɛ e nine. 8Kɛkɛ nɛ bɔfo ɔ de lɛ ke: “Mia nɛ o fi o tokota amɛ!” Nɛ Petro pee ja. Nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Haa o bo ɔ nɛ o nyɛɛ ye se!” 9Nɛ Petro nyɛɛ e se kɛ je kpo, se e li kaa nɔ́ nɛ bɔfo ɔ ngɛ pee ɔ ngɛ mi, se e pee lɛ kaa e ngɛ ni nae. 10Se benɛ a be kekle buli ɔmɛ kɛ nihi nɛ ji enyɔ ɔmɛ a he ɔ, a su dade agbo nɛ ngɛ kɛ yaa ma a mi ɔ he nɛ lɛ nitse e bli ha mɛ, nɛ a je kpo kɛ po gbɛjegbɛ kake mi, kɛkɛ nɛ bɔfo ɔ si lɛ.
11Benɛ Petro hɛ mi tsɔ lɛ ɔ, e ke: “Kpaako i na le tutuutu kaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ tsɔ e bɔfo kɛ ba nɛ e ba je mi ngɛ Herode dɛ mi kɛ nɔ́ nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a ma a ngɛ blɔ hyɛe ɔ kulaa mi.”
12Nɛ benɛ e yo enɛ ɔ ɔ, e ba Yohane nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Marko hulɔ ɔ nyɛ Maria we ɔ mi, he nɛ nihi fuu ba bua a he nya ngɛ nɛ a ngɛ sɔlee ɔ. 13Se benɛ Petro si agbo ɔ, yiheyo ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Rode ɔ ba tue bumi. 14Benɛ e yo Petro gbi ɔ, bua jɔmi sɔuu nya a, e bli we agbo ɔ, se mohu e tu fo kɛ ho ya de ke Petro daa si ngɛ agbo ɔ se. 15Se a de lɛ ke: “O nu godo.” Se e ma nɔ mi ke e ngɛ mi ja. Kɛkɛ nɛ a ke: “Lɛɛ e dbɔfo ʼi.” 16Se Petro ngɛ nɔ ngɛ sie, nɛ benɛ a bli ɔ, a na lɛ, nɛ a nya kpɛ a he. 17Se e wo mɛ nine ke a pee kɔ, nɛ e bɔ mɛ bɔ nɛ pee nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ je lɛ ngɛ tsu ɔ mi ɔ; nɛ e ke: “Nyɛɛ ya nɛ nyɛ ya sɛɛ kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngɔ ha Yakobo kɛ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ.” Nɛ e je lejɛ ɔ kɛ ho he kpa ya.
18Benɛ je na a, pi haomi bi nɛ ba aslaafo ɔmɛ a kpɛti akɛnɛ a li nɔ́ nɛ ba Petro nɔ ɔ. 19Se benɛ Herode hla lɛ nɛ e nɛ́ lɛ ɔ, e kojo buli ɔmɛ nɛ e fa ke a gbe mɛ. Nɛ Herode si Yudea kɛ ho Kaisarea ya nɛ e ya hi lejɛ ɔ.
Herode gbenɔ
20Jeha nɛ ɔ Herode muklii mi fu Tirobi ɔmɛ kɛ Zidonbi ɔmɛ wawɛɛ; nɛ a kɛ juɛmi kake ba e ngɔ. A ba hla matsɛ ɔ sɔmɔlɔ Blasto ɔ he blɔ nɛ a ba kpa pɛɛ, ejakaa matsɛ ɔ zugba nɔ ni a yeɔ.
21Se ligbi nɛ a to ko nɔ ɔ, Herode wo e matsɛ tade ɔ, nɛ e ya hi kojomi sɛ ɔ nɔ, nɛ e kɛ mɛ tu munyu. 22Nɛ ni ɔmɛ kpa ngmlaa ke: “Mawu gbi ji nɛ ɔ nɛ, se tsa pi nɔmlɔ gbi ʼi.” 23Nɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔuu ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bɔfo fia lɛ nɔ, ejakaa e kɛ nyami ɔ ha we Mawu, nɛ e wo gɔgɔ, nɛ e gbo.
24Se Mawu munyu ɔ keke nɛ e gbɛ fia.
25Benɛ Barnaba kɛ Saulo gbe a sɔmɔmi ɔ nya a, a kpale a se kɛ je Yerusalem, nɛ a ngɔ Yohane, nɔ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Marko hulɔ ɔ ngɔ piɛ a he.

Title: BƆFO 13
Content:
A hla Saulo kɛ Barnaba nɛ a tsɔ mɛ
1Gbali kɛ tsɔɔli komɛ ngɛ Antiokia asafo ɔ mi, mɛ ji Barnaba kɛ Simeon, nɔ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Niger ɔ, kɛ Lukio Kireene no ɔ, kɛ Manahen, nɔ nɛ a lɛ lɛ kɛ amlalo Herode ɔ, kɛ Saulo. 2Benɛ a ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ jae nɛ a ngɛ hwɔ hae ɔ. Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ ke: “Nyɛ je Barnaba kɛ Saulo ngɔ ha mi kɛ ha ni tsumi nɛ i tsɛ mɛ ngɛ he ɔ.” 3Kɛkɛ nɛ a ha hwɔ nɛ a sɔle, nɛ a kɛ a ninehi pue a nɔ nɛ a wo mɛ blɔ.
Saulo kɛ Barnaba ngɛ Kipro
4Jeha nɛ ɔ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, akɛnɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ tsɔ mɛ ke a ya he je ɔ, a pue nɔ kɛ ho Seleukia ya, nɛ a sɛ lɛ mi ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, nɛ a hia kɛ ho Kipro ya. 5Benɛ a su Salami ɔ, a fiɛ Mawu munyu ɔ ngɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a kpe he ɔmɛ. Nɛ a kɛ Yohane hu nyɛɛ kaa a sɔmɔlɔ.
6Nɛ benɛ a po mi ngɛ zugba kpɔ nɛ nyu bɔle lɛ ɔ nɔ kɛ ba su Pafo ɔ, a na Yuda no kunya yelɔ kɛ lakpa gbalɔ ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Bar-yesu ɔ, 7nɔ nɛ ngɛ amlaalo Sergio Paulo ngɔ lɛ be ɔ mi ɔ. Sergio Paulo ji nyumu hɛ si kalɔ ko; lɛ nɛ e tsɛ Barnaba kɛ Saulo kɛ ba e ngɔ, nɛ e ngɛ hlae nɛ e bu Mawu munyu ɔ tue. 8Se Elima, kunya yelɔ ɔ (ja ji e biɛ ɔ sisi ngɛ Hela gbi mi) ka nɛ e tsi a nya, nɛ e ngɛ hlae nɛ e kpale amlaalo ɔ kɛ je hemi kɛ yemi ɔ he. 9Nɛ Saulo, nɔ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Paulo hulɔ, nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu hyi lɛ tɔtɔɔtɔ ɔ, hyɛ lɛ too, 10nɛ e ke: “Oo, abosiami bi nɛ sisimi kɛ kutupɔ tsuo hyi mo tɔtɔɔtɔ, mo dami kulaa henyɛlɔ; anɛ o be Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ blɔ tlɔmɔɔ ɔmɛ a kpemi jɔɔe? 11nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ oʼɛ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nine fɔɔ si ngɛ o nɔ, nɛ o hɛ ma yu, nɛ o be pu hyɛe kɛ yaa su be ko.” Nɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔuu ɔ afua kɛ diblii wo lɛ, nɛ e lilaa si ngɛ nihi hlae nɛ a ta e dɛ mi nɛ a ya je lɛ blɔ. 12Kɛkɛ nɛ amlaalo ɔ, benɛ e na nɔ́ nɛ a pee ɔ, e he ye, nɛ e he nya si lɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ tsɔɔmi ɔ he.
Paulo ba Antiokia nɛ ngɛ Pisidia a
13Benɛ Paulo kɛ e nimli ɔmɛ hia kɛ je Pafo ɔ, a ba Perge ngɛ Pamfilia; nɛ Yohane kpale ngɛ a se, snɛ e kpale e se kɛ ho Yerusalem ya ekohu. 14Se mɛɛ lɛɛ a je Perge nɛ a po mi kɛ ba Antiokia ngɛ Pisidia. A ya kpe he ɔ ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ nɛ a ya hi si. 15Nɛ benɛ a kane a Mlaa a kɛ gbali ɔmɛ a womi ɔ se ɔ, kpe he ɔ nikɔtɔma amɛ tsɔ ba de mɛ ke: “Tsaatsɛmɛ kɛ mamimɛ, ke nyɛ ngɛ munyu kɛ tsɔɔmi ko nɛ nyɛ maa tu ngɔ tsɔɔ ni ɔmɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ tu.” 16Kɛkɛ nɛ Paulo te si da si, nɛ e fɔ e nine nɛ e ke:
“Tsaatsɛmɛ Israel nyumuhi kɛ nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ yee Mawu gbeye, nyɛɛ bu tue! 17Kikɛmɛ a Israel ma nɛ ɔ Mawu lɛ hla wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ, nɛ benɛ a ya to nibwɔ ngɛ Mizraim zugba a nɔ ɔ, e wo ma a nɔ, nɛ e kɛ e nine nɛ e wo nɔ ɔ je mɛ kɛ je lejɛ ɔ. 18E hɛɛ mɛ nɛ e lɛ mɛ ngɛ nga a nɔ maa pee jeha nyingmi eywiɛ, 19nɛ e kpata majemaje ma kpaago hɛ mi ngɛ Kanaan zugba a nɔ, nɛ ye dla a zugba a mi ngɔ ha mɛ, konɛ e plɛ a nɔ. 20Nɛ lɔ ɔ se maa pee jeha lafa eywiɛ kɛ nyingmi enuɔ ɔ, e ha mɛ kojoli kɛ ba su gbalɔ Samuel nɔ. 21Nɛ kɔlɔ ɔ se ɔ a bi matsɛ, nɛ Mawu ngɔ Kish bi Saul, nyumu ko nɛ je Benyamin wetso ɔ mi ɔ ha mɛ jeha nyingmi eywiɛ. 22Nɛ benɛ e kpa lɛ ɔ, e wo David nɔ, nɛ e wo lɛ a nɔ matsɛ, nɔ nɛ he odase nɛ e ye ke: ‘I na David, Ishai bi ɔ, nyumu nɛ i ngɛ e he tsui, nɔ nɛ maa pee ye suɔmi nya ni ɔmɛ kulaa.’ 23Nɔ nɛ ɔ nina mi Mawu je Yesu kɛ je, dngɛ si womi ɔ nya, nɛ e kɛ lɛ pee Israel yi wami helɔ. 24Yohane sɛ hlami ba fiɛ baptisimi nɛ a kɛ naa tsui tsakemi ngɔ tsɔɔ Israel ma mluku ɔ tsuo kulaa. 25Nɛ loko Yohane maa gbe e nitsumi ɔ nya a, e ke: ‘Mɛnɔ nyɛ susuu kaa i ji? Tsa pi imi ji nɔ nɛ blɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ hyɛe ɔ. Se oʼɛ, nɔ ko ma ngɛ ye se, nɛ i sɛ́ nɔ nɛ pɛneɔ e tokota ngɛ e nane.’
26“Tsaatsɛmɛ kɛ mamimɛ, Abraham nina kɛ nyɛ kpɛti nihi nɛ yee Mawu gbeye, nyɛ a kɛ kikɛmɛ a yi wami hemi muyu nɛ ɔ ba ha. 27Ejakaa nihi nɛ ngɛ Yerusalem ɔ kɛ a ma a mi nikɔtɔma amɛ ɔ, akɛnɛ a li Yesu, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu anui gbali ɔmɛ a munyu nɛ a kaneɔ daa Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɛ ɔ he je ɔ, a bu lɛ fɔ nɛ lɔ ɔ ha gbali ɔmɛ a gbami ɔmɛ ba mi. 28Nɛ pohu a nɛ́ gbenɔ sane ko ngɛ e he mohu, se kɛ ɔ a kpa Pilato pɛɛ ke e gbe lɛ. 29Nɛ benɛ a ha nihi kulaa nɛ a ngma ngɛ e he ɔ ba mi ɔ, a je lɛ ngɛ tso ɔ nɔ, nɛ a ya to lɛ ngɛ yɔkɔ ko mi. 30Se Mawu tle lɛ si kɛ je gbeje; 31nɛ e je e he kpo ligbihi fuu kɛ tsɔɔ nihi nɛ kɛ lɛ je Galilea kɛ ba Yerusalem ɔ, nihi nɛ ji e odase yeli ha ma a. 32Nɛ wɔɔ lɛɛ, si nɛ e wo wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ɔ he sane kpakpa a wa ngɛ fiɛe kɛ ngɛ tsɔɔe nɛ ɔ nɛ, 33kaa kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu Mawu ha e ba mi ha wɔ nɛ wa ji a bimɛ ɔ, kaa nɛ e tle Yesu si kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma ngɛ La nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ mi hu ke: ‘Ye bi ji mo, mwɔnɛ i fɔ mo’ ɔ.
34“Se akɛnɛ e tle lɛ si kɛ je gbeje nɛ e be e se kpalee kɛ ya puɛmi mi hu he je ɔ, e de kikɛ:
‘Ma ngɔ David dloomi nihi nɛ maa si kpɛii ɔ ngɔ ha nyɛ.’ 35Lɔ ɔ he hu nɛ e de ngɛ he kpa ke:
‘O be hae nɛ o nɔ klɔuklɔu ɔ nɛ na puɛmi’ ɔ nɛ.
36Ejakaa David ɔ, benɛ e tsu Mawu yi mi tomi nya ni ngɛ e yi nɔ ɔ, e gbo nɛ a ngɔ lɛ ngɔ piɛ e tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a he nɛ e puɛ. 37Se nɔ nɛ Mawu tle lɛ si ɔ puɛ we. 38Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, tsaatsɛmɛ kɛ mamimɛ, nyɛ na nɛ nyɛɛ le kaa nɔ nɛ ɔ nɔuu nɔ a guu kɛ jajeɔ yayamipami ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ ɔ nɛ; ejakaa nihi kulaa nɛ a be nyɛ nguɔ nyɛe maa wo ngɛ he ngɛ Mose Mlaa a nya a, 39nɔ nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ heɔ yeɔ ɔ, a woɔ lɛ nguɔ. 40Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ hi, konɛ bɔ nɛ gbali ɔmɛ de ɔ ko ba nyɛ nɔ ke:
41‘Nyɛ he guɛ gbeli, nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ nyɛ hɛ mi nɛ pee nyɛ
yaa, nɛ nyɛɛ laa;
Ejakaa ma tsu ni tsumi ko ngɛ nyɛ yi nɔ,
Ni tsumi ko nɛ ke nɔ ko sɛɛ ha nyɛ tete po ɔ,
Nyɛ be hee maa ye kɔkɔɔkɔ.’ ”
42Se benɛ Paulomɛ je Yudafo ɔmɛ a kpe he ɔ, majeli ɔmɛ kpa mɛ pɛɛ ke a ba jaje kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔmɛ ngɔ tsɔɔ mɛ ekohu ngɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi nɛ ma a nɔ. 43Se benɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ kpe he ɔ kpa a, Yudafohi kɛ nihi nɛ a tsake mɛ ngɔ pee Yudafohi nɛ a yee Mawu gbeye ɔmɛ a ti nihi fuu nyɛɛ Paulo kɛ Barnaba se, nɛ a tu munyu tsɔɔ mɛ nɛ a wo mɛ ga ke a pɛtɛ Mawu dloomi ɔ he.
44Nɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi nɛ nyɛɛ se ɔ nɔ ɔ, e piɛ bɔɔ nɛ ma mluku ɔ kulaa ba bua a he nya nɛ a ba bu Mawu munyu ɔ tue. 45Se benɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ na asafo ɔmɛ ɔ, hunga jemi babauu te si ngɛ a mi, nɛ a kɛ munyu tumi-kɛ-simi kɛ musu bɔmi munyu ku nihi nɛ Paulo ngɛ dee ɔ nya. 46Nɛ Paulo kɛ Barnaba tu munyu kɛ kã ke: “Nyɛ kekle e sa kaa a jajeɔ Mawu munyu ɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ, se akɛnɛ nyɛ kua munyu ɔ nɛ nyɛ bui nyɛ he kaa nyɛ sa neneene wami ɔ he je ɔ, oʼɛ, wa dɔ wa yi kɛ yaa majeli ɔmɛ a ngɔ. 47Ejakaa jã Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ wo wɔ kita ke:
‘I ngɔ mo ngɔ to kaa majeli ɔmɛ a la,
Konɛ o plɛ yi wami hemi kɛ ya su zugba a nyagbe he ɔmɛ.”
48Benɛ majeli ɔmɛ nu e nɛ ɔ ɔ, a na bua jɔmi, nɛ a wo Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi nyami, nɛ nihi abɔ nɛ a je ngɔ to neneene wami ɔ he ye.
49Nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ munyu ɔ gbɛ fia ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi tsuo. 50Se Yudafo ɔmɛ wo yihi Mawu gbeye yeli nɛ a buu mɛ ɔ kɛ ma a mi nihi nɛ hɛ mi ka si ɔmɛ a yi mi, nɛ a ha yi mi wami te si ngɔ wo Paulo kɛ Barnaba, nɛ a fie mɛ kɛ je a kpo ɔmɛ a mi. 51Se mɛɛ lɛɛ a blɛ a nane he bunyuku ngɔ pue a nɔ, nɛ a pue nɔ kɛ ho Ikoniom ya. 52Nɛ kaseli ɔmɛ hyi tɔtɔɔtɔ kɛ bua jɔmi kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu.

Title: BƆFO 14
Content:
Paulo kɛ Barnaba ngɛ Ikoniom
1E ba mi kaa benɛ a ngɛ Ikoniom ɔ, Paulo kɛ Barnaba ya Yudafo ɔmɛ a kpe he ɔ nɛ a ya tu munyu tsɔɔ mɛ saminya, nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ kɛ Helabi ɔmɛ a ti nihi babauu he ye. 2Se Yudafohi tue gboli ɔmɛ puɛ majeli ɔmɛ a tue, nɛ a ha a plɛ a hɛ mi ngɔ wo nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ. 3Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, a se kɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ a kɛ kã tu Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ he munyu, nɛ lɛ hu e ye e dloomi munyu ɔ he odase nɛ e ha a gu a nine nɔ pee okadihi kɛ nyakpɛ nihi fuu. 4Se ma a mi bi ɔmɛ a mi gba enyɔ: Fã piɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a he, nɛ fã hu piɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ a he.
5Se benɛ majeli ɔmɛ kɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ kɛ a nikɔtɔma amɛ bu kɛ ba nɛ a ba pee mɛ hãihãi nɛ a fia mɛ tɛ ɔ; 6a na le, nɛ a tu fo kɛ ho Likaonia mahi nɛ ji Listra kɛ Derbe kɛ lejɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi ya, 7nɛ a ya fiɛ Sane Kpakpa a tsɔɔ mɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ hulɔ.
Paulo kɛ Barnaba ngɛ Listra
8Nyumu ko ngɛ Listra nɛ e nyɛ we si nɛ e da, se si e hii nɛ e ji nɔ nɛ hule kɛ je e nyɛ muklii mi lokoo nɛ e nyɛɛ we gblee. 9Nɛ benɛ Paulo ngɛ munyu tue ɔ, e bu lɛ tue. Nɛ benɛ Paulo hyɛ lɛ too nɛ e na kaa e ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi kaa a ma tsa lɛ ɔ, 10e kɛ gbi wawɛɛ de lɛ ke: “Tee si nɛ o da o nane nɔ tlɔmɔɔ!” Nɛ e hlu ma si nɛ e nyɛɛ. 11Nɛ benɛ ni ɔmɛ na nɔ́ nɛ Paulo pee ɔ, a de ngɛ Likaonia gbi mi ke: “Mawu ɔmɛ plɛ a he kaa nimli kɛ kple si kɛ ba wa ngɔ.” 12Nɛ a tsɛ Barnaba ke Dio, kɛ Paulo hu ke Herme, ejakaa lɛ titli lɛ e ngɛ munyu ɔ tue ɔ nɛ. 13Se Dio osɔfo nɛ ngɛ a ma a agbo ɔ nya a hɛɛ nakuhi kɛ nyinyla kɛ ba agbo ɔ nya, konɛ lɛ kɛ asafo ɔ kɛ sa bɔ. 14Se benɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ nɛ ji Barnaba kɛ Paulo nu he ɔ, a gba a tadehi nɛ a sa fo kɛ ya sɛ asafo ɔ kpɛti kɛ ngmlaa 15ke: “Tsaatsɛmɛ, mɛni nyɛ ngɛ pee nɛ ɔ? wɔ hu nimli adesahi ji wɔ kaa nyɛ nɔuu, nɛ wa ngɛ sane kpakpa a fiee kɛ ngɛ nyɛ tsɔɔe, konɛ nyɛɛ kpale nyɛ se kɛ je kikɛmɛ a yakayaka ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he kɛ ba Mawu hɛkalɔ ɔ ngɔ, nɔ nɛ pee hiɔwe kɛ zugba kɛ wo kɛ nihi kulaa nɛ ngɛ a mi ɔ; 16nɔ nɛ blemabi ɔmɛ a yinɔhi nɛ be ɔ mi ɔ, e ha majemajeɔ tsuo nyɛɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a blɔ ɔmɛ a nɔ. 17Se kɛ̃ ɔ, e jɔɔ we lɛ nitsɛ e he odase yemi, se mohu e peɔ kpakpa nɛ e haa hiɔmi jee hiɔwe nɛɛ haa nyɛ, kɛ jehahi nɛ baa ni fuu hulɔ, e kɛ ngma kɛ bua jɔmi woɔ nyɛ tsuihi a mi tɔ.” 18Nɛ a gbo dengme loko a kɛ kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔmɛ tsi bɔ nɛ jinɛ ni ɔmɛ maa sã ha mɛ ɔ nya.
19Se Yudafohi komɛ je Antiokia kɛ Ikoniom ba lejɛ ɔ ba wo asafo ɔmɛ a yi mi; a fia Paulo tɛ, nɛ a sã lɛ si kɛ je ma a mi, a susu kaa e gbo. 20Se benɛ kaseli ɔmɛ ba bɔle lɛ kɛ kpe ɔ, e te si nɛ e ho ma a mi ya. Nɛ e nɔ je na a, e kɛ Barnaba pue nɔ kɛ ho Derbe ya.
Paulo kɛ Barnaba ba Antiokia ekohu
21Benɛ a fiɛ sane kpakpa a tsɔɔ ma a, nɛ a ha nihi fuu tsake pee kaseli ɔ, a kpale a se kɛ ho Listra kɛ Ikoniom kɛ Antiokia ya. 22A kpale wo kaseli ɔmɛ a mumi mi wami ɔ he wami, nɛ a tu munyu tsɔɔ mɛ ke a hɛɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mi, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu e sa kaa wa guu dengme fuu mi kɛ sɛɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi. 23Nɛ a hia nikɔtɔmahi ngɔ to asafo tsuaa asafo nya, nɛ a kɛ sɔlemi kɛ hwɔ hami tu mɛ ngɔ wo Nyɔmtsɛ nɔ nɛ a he ye ɔ dɛ mi. 24Nɛ a po mi ngɛ Pisidia nɛ a ba Pamfilia. 25Nɛ benɛ a fiɛ munyu ɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ ngɛ Perge ɔ, a ngɔ pue nɔ kɛ ba Atalia. 26Nɛ a sɛ lɛ mi ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, nɛ a hia kɛ ba Antiokia, ngɛ he nɛ a tu mɛ ngɔ wo Mawu dloomi ɔ dɛ mi kɛ ha ni tsumi nɛ a tsu gbe nya a ngɛ ɔ.
27Benɛ a ba lejɛ ɔ nɛ a ba bua asafo ɔ nya a, a sɛɛ mɛ nihi nɛ Mawu kɛ mɛ ya tsu ɔ kulaa, kɛ bɔ nɛ e bli blɔ ngɔ ha majeli ɔmɛ. 28Nɛ a kɛ kaseli ɔmɛ hi si be saii.

Title: BƆFO 15
Content:
A kpe ngɛ Yerusalem
1Ni komɛ je Yudea kɛ ba nɛ a ba tsɔɔ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ ke: “Ke a pui nyɛ ngɛ Mose Mlaa a nya a, a be nyɛ yiwami nyɛe ma he.” 2Nɛ benɛ Paulo kɛ Barnaba kɛ mɛ sa nya nɛ a kɛ mɛ je nɔ hluu ɔ, a to kaa Paulo kɛ Barnaba kɛ a ti ni komɛ hu nɛ ya bɔfo ɔmɛ kɛ nikɔtɔmahi nɛ ngɛ Yerusalem ɔmɛ a ngɔ ngɛ kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔ he.
3Lɔ ɔ he ɔ benɛ asafo ɔ ba je mɛ blɔ ɔ, a gu Foinike kɛ Samaria nɛ a sɛɛ majeli ɔmɛ a tsakemi ɔ he sane ha mɛ, nɛ a kɛ ha nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ tsuo na bua jɔmi wawɛɛ. 4Nɛ benɛ a su Yerusalem ɔ, asafo ɔ kɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ he mɛ hɛmuɔ, nɛ a sɛɛ nihi kulaa nɛ Mawu kɛ mɛ tsu ɔ ha mɛ. 5Se ni komɛ nɛ je Farisifo ɔmɛ a ku ɔ mi nɛ he ye ɔ te si nɛ a de ke: “Ja a po mɛ nɛ a wo mɛ kita ke a ye Mose Mlaa a nɔ.”
6Nɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ ba bua a he nya konɛ a hla kikɛmɛ a sane nɛ ɔ mi. 7Se benɛ a sa nya hluu ɔ, Petro te si da si, nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Tsaatsɛmɛ kɛ mamimɛ, nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ le kaa kɛ je lokoo nɛ Mawu hla mi kaa majeli ɔmɛ a nu sane kpakpa a kɛ je ye nya, nɛ a he ye. 8Nɛ Mawu nɛ le tsui mi nihi ɔ ye mɛ odase nɛ e ha mɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ kaa bɔ nɛ e ha wɔ ɔ nɔuu, 9nɛ e hlɛ́ nimli a mi ngɛ waa kɛ mɛ kpɛti, nɛ e kɛ hemi kɛ yemi tsukɔ a tsuihi a he. 10Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, jeha nɛ ɔ, mɛni he je nyɛ ngɛ Mawu kae nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ pã tso nɛ waa kɛ wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ kulaa nyɛ we tloomi fɔ́ɔ kaseli ɔmɛ a ko nɔ? 11Se wa heɔ yeɔ kaa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dloomi ɔ mohu nɔ a maa gu kɛ he waa kɛ mɛ tsuo yiwami.”
12Kɛkɛ nɛ mɛ tsuo a ma a nya nɛ a bu Barnaba kɛ Paulo nɛ sɛɛ mɛ okadihi kɛ nyakpɛ nihi abɔ nɛ Mawu gu a nine nɔ kɛ pee ngɛ majemajeli ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ tue. 13Benɛ a tu munyu ɔta a, Yakobo he nɔ nɛ e ke: “Tsaatsɛmɛ kɛ mamimɛ, nyɛɛ bu mi tue. 14Simeon sɛɛ bɔ nɛ Mawu ba slaa majemajeli ɔmɛ kekle, nɛ e hla a kpɛti ma ko ngɔ ha e biɛ ɔ. 15Nɛ gbali ɔmɛ a munyu ɔmɛ hu kɛ enɛ ɔ sɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ, bɔ nɛ a ngma ke:
16‘Ni nɛ ɔmɛ a se ɔ, ma kpale ye se kɛ ba,
Nɛ ma dla David bo tsu nɛ ku ɔ ma ma;
Nɛ o tsu kokue ɔmɛ hu ma fia ekohu,
Nɛ ma tle lɛ si ngɔ ma si;
17Benɛ pee nɛ nimli nɛ piɛ ɔ kɛ majemajeli ɔmɛ kulaa hu
Nɛ a kɛ ye biɛ wo mɛ ɔ
A hla Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ se blɔ.’
18Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɛ ha a le enɛ ɔmɛ kulaa kɛ je lokoo ɔ lɛ de.
19“Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ dee ji kaa a ko doo nihi nɛ kpale a se kɛ je majeli ɔmɛ a kpɛti kɛ ba Mawu ngɔ ɔ nya tsɔ. 20Se mohu a ngma mɛ ke a nyɛ wɔ nihi kɛ a ajuama bɔmi kɛ lohwehi nɛ a kika mɛ kɛ gbe kɛ dmuɔ. 21Ejakaa kɛ je blema lokoo ɔ Mose ngɛ nihi nɛ fiɛɔ lɛ ngɛ ma tsuaa ma nɔ, nɛ daa Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ a kaneɔ e womi ɔmɛ ngɛ kpe he ɔmɛ.”
Womi nɛ a ngma mane mejeli nɛ he ye ɔ
22Kɛkɛ nɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ asafo mluku ɔ kulaa ma nya si kaa a hia nyumuhi komɛ kɛ je mɛ nitsɛmɛ a kpɛti, nɛ a tsɔ mɛ kɛ Paulo kɛ Barnaba kɛ ya Antiokia. Mɛ ji Yuda, nɔ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Barsaba hulɔ ɔ, kɛ Sila, nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti nikɔtɔma amɛ. 23Nɛ a ngma womi ngɔ ha mɛ ke:
“Bɔfo ɔmɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ biɔ nyɛmimɛ nɛ je majeli ɔmɛ a kpɛti ngɛ Antiokia kɛ Siria kɛ Kilikia a saminya. 24Akɛnɛ wa nu kaa wa ti nikomɛ pue nɔ kɛ ba ba doo nyɛ nya kɛ munyuhi komɛ nɛ a kɛ puɛ nyɛ juɛmi de ke a po nyɛ nɛ nyɛɛ ye Mose Mlaa a nɔ, pohu wa wui mɛ jamɛ a kita ko he je ɔ, 25e sa wa hɛ mi kaa, nɛ wa nya pee kake nɛ ɔ ɔ, waa hia nihi ngɔ piɛ Barnaba kɛ Paulo nɛ wa suɔ ɔ he 26nihi nɛ ji nimli nɛ ngɔ a wami ngɔ ha ngɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu biɛ ɔ he ɔ, konɛ waa tsɔ mɛ nyɛ ngɔ. 27Lɔ ɔ he ɔ wa tsɛ Yuda kɛ Sila, konɛ mɛ hu a kɛ a nya mi munyu ba jaje kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ nɔuu ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ. 28Ejakaa e sa Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ hɛ mi, nɛ e sa wɔ hu wa hɛ mi kaa, waa kɛ tlomi ko nɛ ko fɔ nyɛ nɔ hu, kaa ja nihi nɛ he hia nɛ ɔmɛ nɔuu. 29Kaa nyɛɛ nyɛ lo nɛ a gbe ha wɔhi kɛ muɔ kɛ lohwehi nɛ a kika a kuɛ kɛ ajuama bɔmi. Ke nyɛ nyɛ enɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, nyɛ pee saminya. Nyɛɛ hi si saminya!”
30Jeha nɛ ɔ, benɛ a wo bɔfo ɔmɛ blɔ ɔ, a ba Antiokia, nɛ a ba bua asafo ɔ nya nɛ a je womi ɔ ngɔ ha mɛ. 31Nɛ benɛ a kane ɔ, a bua jɔ a he ngɛ a bua womi munyu ɔ he. 32Se Yuda kɛ Sila a, akɛnɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ hu gbali ji mɛ he je ɔ, a kɛ munyuhi babauu jɔɔ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ a bua nɛ a wo mɛ he wami. 33Nɛ benɛ a se kɛ bɔɔ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ wo mɛ blɔ ngɛ he jɔmi mi kɛ ho nihi nɛ tsɔ mɛ ɔmɛ a ngɔ ya. [ 34Se Sila lɛɛ, e suɔ kaa e maa hi lejɛ ɔ.]
35Paulo kɛ Barnaba hi Antiokia nɛ a tsɔɔ ni nɛ a fiɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ he sane kpakpa a, nɛ ni kpa komɛ fuu hu pee ja.
Paulo kɛ Barnaba gba a mi
36Be ko se ɔ Paulo de Barnaba ke: “Ha waa kpale wa se ya slaa wa nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ ma tsuaa ma nɛ wa fiɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ munyu ɔ ngɛ mi ɔ, nɛ waa hyɛ bɔ nɛ a ngɛ.” 37Barnaba hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa a maa ngɔ Yohane nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Marko ɔ ngɔ piɛ a he. 38Se Paulo lɛɛ, e susu kaa e sɛ́ kaa a ngɔ nɔ nɛ kpale ngɛ a se ngɛ Pamfilia nɛ e kɛ mɛ yɛ́ ni tsumi ɔ ngɔ piɛ a he. 39Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, enɛ ɔ pee mɛ nya sami babauu nɛ e ha a gba a mi, nɛ Barnaba ngɔ Marko ngɔ piɛ e he, nɛ a gu lɛ mi kɛ ho Kipro ya. 40Se Paulo lɛɛ, e hia Sila ngɔ piɛ e he, nɛ benɛ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ tu lɛ ngɔ wo Mawu dloomi ɔ dɛ mi ɔ, e pue nɔ kɛ ho. 41Nɛ e gu Siria kɛ Kilikia ya wo asafo ɔmɛ he wami.

Title: BƆFO 16
Content:
Paulo kɛ Sila ngɔ Timoteo
1Kɛkɛ nɛ Paulo ba Derbe kɛ Listra. Nɛ oʼɛ, kaselɔ ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Timoteo, Yudayo ko nɛ he ye ɔ bi, se e tsɛ ɔ Helano ʼi. 2Nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ nɛ ngɛ Listra kɛ Ikoniom ɔ yeɔ e he odase kpakpa. 3Paulo hla kaa e kɛ Timoteo nɛ ya, lɔ ɔ he ɔ e ngɔ lɛ nɛ e po lɛ ngɛ Yudafohi nɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi ɔ he; ejakaa mɛ kulaa a le kaa e tsɛ ɔ Helano ʼi. 4Se benɛ a ngɛ ma amɛ a nɔ kpae ɔ, a kɛ mlaahi nɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ nɛ ngɛ Yerusalem ɔ wo ɔ ha mɛ, konɛ a ye nɔ. 5Lɔ ɔ he ɔ asafo ɔ na he wami ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi mi, nɛ a he hiɛɛ daa ligbi.
Paulo ninami ngɛ Troia
6Akɛnɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ tsi mɛ blɔ ke a ko fiɛ munyu ɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ ngɛ Asia he je ɔ, a po mi ngɛ Frigia kɛ Galatia zugba a nɔ. 7A ba Misia ni ɔmɛ a mi, nɛ a ka kaa a maa ya Bitinia, se Yesu Mumi ɔ ngmɛ́ mɛ blɔ. 8Kɛkɛ nɛ a gu Misia nɛ a ba Troia. 9Nɛ nyɔ ɔ mi ɔ Paulo na ni, kaa nyumu Makedonia no ko daa si ngɛ lɛ pɛɛ kpae ke: “Ba Makedonia nɛ o ba ye bua wɔ!” 10Se benɛ e na ni ɔ pɛ ɔ, amlɔ ɔ wa hla kaa waa ya Makedonia, ejakaa wa na le tutuutu kaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ tsɛ wɔ kɛ yaa lejɛ ɔ, konɛ wa ya fiɛ sane kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ mɛ.
Lidia tsakemi ngɛ Filipi
11Lɔ ɔ he ɔ wa hia kɛ lɛ kɛ je Troia nɛ wa nyɛɛ tɛ̃ɛ kɛ ya Samotrake, nɛ e nɔ je na a wa ba Neapoli. 12Nɛ wa je lejɛ ɔ, wa ya Filipi nɛ ji Makedonia zugba a nɔ ma ngua kɛ Romabi a nɔ yemi he. Wa hi ma nɛ ɔ mi be saii. 13Nɛ Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, wa je ma a mi kɛ ya pa nya he nɛ wa juɛmi de wɔ ke a pɔɔ sɔlemi ngɛ ɔ, nɛ wa hi si nɛ waa kɛ yihi nɛ ba bua a he nyɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ tu munyu. 14Nɛ yo ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Lidia nɛ ji kɔjai jualɔ ko nɛ je Tiatira ma a mi nɛ yee Mawu gbeye ɔ hu nu. Nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bli e tsui nya, kaa e bu nihi nɛ Paulo ngɛ dee ɔ tue. 15Nɛ benɛ a baptisi lɛ kɛ e we ɔ, e kpa wɔ pɛɛ ke: “Ke nyɛ bu mi kaa i he Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ye anɔkuale mi ɔ, lɛɛ nyɛɛ ba ye we ɔ nɛ nyɛ ba hi lejɛ ɔ.” Nɛ e hɛɛ wɔ hluu nɛ wa kplɛɛ nɔ.
A wo Paulo kɛ Sila tsu mi
16E ba mi kaa ligbi ko benɛ wa yaa he nɛ a sɔlee ngɛ ɔ, tsɔlɔyo ko nɛ klaami mumi ngɛ e mi kɛ wɔ ba kpe; e kɛ e klaami ɔ haa e nyɔmtsɛmɛ naa ni fuu. 17E nyɛɛ waa kɛ Paulo se, nɛ e kpa ngmlaa ke: “Kikɛmɛ a nimli nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, Mawu nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe lokoo ɔ tsɔli ji mɛ, nɛ a ngɛ yi wami hemi blɔ ɔ jajee kɛ ngɛ nyɛ tsɔɔe.” 18Nɛ e pee ja ligbihi fuu. Se e dɔ Paulo wawɛɛ, nɛ e plɛ e he nɛ e de mumi ɔ ke: “I ngɛ mo fae ngɛ Yesu Kristo biɛ mi kaa o je e mi.” Nɛ e je kpo ngɛ jamɛ a ngmlɛfia a nɔ nɔuu. 19Se benɛ e nyɔmtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ na kaa a ni nami hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ɔ be hu ɔ, a nu Paulo kɛ Sila nɛ a sã mɛ kɛ ya ganɔ ɔmɛ a hɛ mi ngɛ jua a nɔ. 20Benɛ a kpaka mɛ kɛ ya asafoatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a hɛ mi ɔ, a ke: “Kikɛmɛ a nimli nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ ji Yudafohi ɔ ngɛ wa ma a mi hliihlii woe. 21Nɛ a ngɛ kusumihi komɛ tsɔɔe nɛ wa be he blɔ ka wa pɛtɛɛ he loo wa yeɔ nɔ, ejakaa Romabi ji wɔ.” 22Nɛ ma mi bi ɔmɛ hu te si wo mɛ nɛ a po klaangma wo a he, nɛ asafoatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ha a je a tade ɔmɛ ngɛ a he, nɛ a fa ke a fia mɛ kpa. 23Nɛ benɛ a fia mɛ kpa saminya a, a wo mɛ tsu mi, nɛ a wo pa mi tsɛmɛ a nɔ hyɛlɔ ɔ kita ke e ngɔ mɛ ngɔ to sɔkee. 24Nɛ akɛnɛ a wo lɛ kikɛmɛ a kita he je ɔ, e kɛ mɛ ya wo tsu nɛ ngɛ se je ɔ mi, nɛ e bɔ a nanehi pa.
25Se nyɔ mi kpɛti ɔ Paulo kɛ Sila ngɛ sɔlee nɛ a ngɛ lae kɛ ngɛ Mawu yi jee; nɛ pa mi tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ mɛ tue bue. 26Nɛ tlukaa a, zugba mimiɛ wawɛɛ; nɛ tsu ɔ fanesi ɔmɛ mimiɛ, nɛ amlɔ ɔ sinya amɛ kulaa bli, nɛ mɛ tsuo a kɔsɔkɔsɔ ɔmɛ kplɔ ngɛ a he. 27Se benɛ pa mi tsɛmɛ a nɔ hyɛlɔ ɔ hɛli si kɛ je mahɛ mi nɛ e na kaa tsu ɔ sinya amɛ kulaa a nya fɔɔ si ɔ, e hia klaate nɛ jinɛ e maa gbe e he, ejakaa e susu kaa pa mi tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ tu fo. 28Se Paulo nga ke: “Koo pee o he yayami ko, se wɔ tsuo wa ngɛ hiɛ ɔ.” 29Kɛkɛ nɛ pã mi tsɛmɛ a nɔ hyɛlɔ ɔ tsɛ nɛ a ba ha lɛ la, nɛ e sa fo kɛ sɛ tsu ɔ mi, nɛ e kɛ hedomi be nɔ Paulo kɛ Sila hɛ mi; 30nɛ e kɛ mɛ je kpo nɛ e ke: “Nyɔmtsɛmɛ, kɛ ma pee kɛɛ nɛ ma na yi wami hemi?”
31Nɛ a ke: “He Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo nɔ ngɔ ye, nɛ a ma he o kɛ o we ɔ kulaa yi wami.” 32Nɛ a jaje Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ munyu ɔ tsɔɔ lɛ kɛ nihi kulaa nɛ ngɛ e we ɔ mi ɔ. 33Nɛ e ngɔ mɛ jamɛ a nyɔ ɔ mi ngmlɛfia a nɔuu, nɛ e fɔ a kpa amɛ a nya ha mɛ, nɛ a baptisi lɛ kɛ e we ɔ mi bimɛ kulaa amlɔ ɔ nɔuu. 34Nɛ e kɛ mɛ ya e we ɔ mi, nɛ e ya ngmɛ mɛ okplɔɔ, nɛ e kɛ e we ɔ kulaa nya kaa e he Mawu ye.
35Se benɛ je na a, asafoatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ tsɔ aslaafohi ba de ke: “Ngmɛɛ nimli ɔmɛ a he nɛ a ho”. 36Se pa mi tsɛmɛ a nɔ hyɛlɔ ɔ jaje kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ Paulo ke: “Asafoatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ tsɔ kɛ ba ke a ngmɛɛ nyɛ he, lɔ ɔ he ɔ jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛɛ je kpo, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛɛmi saminya.” 37Se Paulo de mɛ ke: “Wɔ nɛ Romabi ji wɔ nɛ a bui wɔ fɔ ɔ, a fia wɔ kpa, nɛ a wo wɔ tsu mi hulɔ, nɛ kpaako a ngɛ wɔ fiee zaa lo? Dɛbi, se mohu ha mɛ nitsɛmɛ a ba nɛ a ba je wɔ.” 38Nɛ aslaafo ɔmɛ ya jaje kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ asafoatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ. Nɛ benɛ a nu kaa Romabi ji mɛ ɔ, a ye gbeye. 39Nɛ a ba ba kpa mɛ pɛɛ, nɛ benɛ a je mɛ ɔ, a kpa mɛ pɛɛ ke a je ma a mi. 40Se benɛ a je tsu ɔ mi ɔ, a ho Lidia we ɔ mi ya. Nɛ benɛ a na nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ nɛ a jɔɔ a bua a, a pue nɔ kɛ ho.

Title: BƆFO 17
Content:
Paulo kɛ Sila ngɛ Tesalonika
1Jeha nɛ ɔ a gu Amfipoli kɛ Apolonia, nɛ a ba Tesalonika, he nɛ Yudafohi a kpe he ko ngɛ ɔ. 2Nɛ Paulo ya a ngɔ kaa bɔ nɛ e pɔɔ peemi ɔ, nɛ e kɛ mɛ ya sa nya Hejɔɔmi Ligbi etɛ sɔuu ngɛ ngmami ɔmɛ a he. 3E blɛke munyu ɔ mi tsɔɔ mɛ faii kaa ja Kristo ɔ na amanehlu nɛ e te si kɛ je gbeje, nɛ kaa “kikɛmɛ a Yesu, nɛ i ngɛ e he sane jajee kɛ ngɛ nyɛ tsɔɔe nɛ ɔ, ji Kristo ɔ nɛ.” 4Nɛ a ti ni komɛ kplɛɛ nɛ a kɛ a he bɔ Paulo kɛ Sila he, kɛ Helabi Mawu gbeye yeli ɔmɛ a kpɛti nihi babauu, kɛ yihi nɛ a buu mɛ hu fuu.
5Se e pee Yudafo ɔmɛ tai, nɛ a ya kpaka yakayaka nimli ɔmɛ a kpɛti dikali komɛ ngɔ piɛ a he, nɛ benɛ a nya ba kpane fuu ɔ, a wo ma a mi hliihlii. A ya tua Yason we ɔ, nɛ a ngɛ hlae nɛ a kpaka Paulo kɛ Sila ya ha ma a. 6Se benɛ a nɛ́ mɛ ɔ, a kpaka Yason kɛ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ kɛ ya ma a mi nikɔtɔma amɛ a hɛ mi nɛ a kpa ngmlaa ke: “Ni nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ plɛ je mi hɛ mi ngɔ bu si nɛ ɔ ba hiɛ ɔ hulɔ, 7nɛ Yason he mɛ to. Ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo kuɔ Kaisare mlaa a nya deɔ ke matsɛ kpa ko ngɛ nɛ ji Yesu ko.” 8Nɛ a ha ma a mi bi ɔmɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ tsuo nu sawale kɛ kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔmɛ. 9Nɛ benɛ a he se dami ni ngɛ Yason kɛ ni kpa amɛ a dɛ ɔ, a ngmɛɛ a he.
Paulo kɛ Sila ngɛ Beroia
10Nɛ amlɔ ɔ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ je Paulo kɛ Sila blɔ nyɔ mi kɛ ho Beroia ya. Nɛ benɛ a su lejɛ ɔ a ya sɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a kpe he ɔ. 11Ni nɛ ɔmɛ a su hi pe ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ Tesalonika a, mɛɛ lɛɛ a je a yi mi pɛtɛ munyu ɔ he, nɛ daa a kpaa ngmami ɔmɛ a mi hyɛɛ kaa ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ mi ja lo? 12Lɔ ɔ he ɔ a ti nihi fuu he ye, kɛ Helayi nɛ ngɛ biɛ kɛ nyumuhi hu fuu. 13Se benɛ Yudafohi nɛ ngɛ Tesalonika a nu he kaa Paulo ya jaje Mawu munyu ɔ ngɛ Beroia hulɔ ɔ, a ba lejɛ ɔ hu nɛ a ba wo ni ɔmɛ yi, nɛ a pee basabasa. 14Kɛkɛ nɛ amlɔ ɔ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ ya je Paulo blɔ nɛ e ya gu wo hɛ mi; se Sila kɛ Timoteo hi lejɛ ɔ. 15Se nihi nɛ ya sɛ Paulo ɔ kɛ lɛ ya su Atene tɔɔ. Akɛnɛ Paulo sɛ mɛ ke a ha Sila kɛ Timoteo nɛ a ba e ngɔ oya he je ɔ, a pue nɔ kɛ ho.
Paulo ngɛ Atene
16Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ Paulo ngɛ mɛ mlɛe ngɛ Atene ɔ, e mumi mi wo la ngɛ e mi, benɛ e na ma a nɛ mi hyi tɔ kɛ amagahi sɔuu ɔ. 17Lɔ ɔ he ɔ e kɛ Yudafohi nɛ ngɛ kpe he ɔ kɛ Mawu gbeye yeli ɔmɛ kɛ nihi nɛ kɛ lɛ kpee daa nɛ ɔ ngɛ jua a nɔ ɔ saa nya. 18Se ni leli nɛ je Epikurotsɛmɛ kɛ Stoatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ kɛ lɛ sa nya; nɛ ni komɛ ke: “Mɛni nyapuutsɛ nɛ ɔ ma de po?” Ni komɛ hu ke: “E ngɛ kaa nɔ ko nɛ jajeɔ ma se wɔhi a he sane tsɔɔ;” ejakaa e jaje Yesu kɛ e si temi he sane kpakpa a tsɔɔ mɛ. 19Nɛ a ngɔ lɛ kɛ ya Areopago (kojomi he) ɔ, nɛ a ke: “Anɛ o ma ha waa le tsɔɔmi he nɛ o ngɛ he munyu tue nɛ ɔ lo? 20Ejakaa o ha wa tue nu ma se sanehi; lɔ ɔ he ɔ wa ngɛ sisi hlae nɛ waa le.” 21Se Atenebihi tsuo kɛ nibwɔhi nɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, nɔ́ nɛ piɛ mɛ pɛ ji sane he ko sɛɛmi kɛ tue bumi.
22Paulo ya da Areopago ɔ kpɛti nɛ e ke: “Tsaatsɛmɛ Atenebihi, i naa ngɛ nihi kulaa mi kaa nyɛ jaa wɔhi pɛpɛɛpɛ. 23Ejakaa benɛ i bee nɛ i hyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ jae ɔ, i na bɔ sami latɛ ko hu nɛ a ngma ngɛ nɔ ke: ‘Mawu nɛ a li ɔ nɔ ʼi.’ Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ nɛ nyɛ li lɛ se kɛ̃ ɔ nyɛ jaa lɛ ɔ, lɛ nɔuu e he sane i ngɛ jajee kɛ ngɛ nyɛ tsɔɔe ɔ nɛ. 24Mawu nɛ pee je ɔ kɛ e mi nihi kulaa, nɛ ji hiɔwe kɛ zugba nyɔmtsɛ ɔ, e hi sɔlemi tsuhi nɛ a kɛ nine pee mi, 25nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu a kɛ nimli a ninehi ja we lɛ, kaa nɔ ko nɛ nɔ́ ko fiɔ lɛ; lɛ mohu e dɛ mi wami kɛ mumi kɛ nihi tsuo jee kɛ baa haa nimli kulaa. 26Muɔ kake e kɛ pee nimli adesahi kulaa nɛ a hi zugba a tsuo hɛ mi, nɛ yinɔhi nɛ e to ɔ kɛ a sihi he ɔmɛ a huzu ɔmɛ ɔ, e kpɛ mi ngɔ to momo, 27konɛ a hla Mawu se blɔ, kaa eko ɔ ke a lilaa si ɔ, a maa na lɛ lo; pohu e kɛ wa ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ kpɛti kɛ we. 28Ejakaa
‘E mi nɔuu wa hɛ ngɛ ngɛ, nɛ wa tsɛ̃ɛ wa he,
nɛ wa ngɛ ngɛ.’
Kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ latsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ekomɛ hu de ɔ ke:
‘Se lɛ nɔuu e nina ji wɔ hulɔ’ ɔ.
29Se ke Mawu nina ji wɔ ɔ, e sɛ kaa wa susuu kaa Mawu su ɔ ngɛ kaa sika tsu loo sika hiɔ loo tɛ ko nɛ nɔmlɔ kɛ e ga kɛ e juɛmi pee. 30Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, be nɛ a li ɔ Mawu ku e hɛ ngɔ fɔ nɔ, se jeha nɛ ɔ lɛɛ e ngɛ nimli kulaa nɛ ngɛ he tsuaa he ɔ kita woe kaa a tsake a tsui. 31Ejakaa e to ligbi ko nɛ e maa gu nyumu ko nɛ e to ɔ nɔ kɛ kojo je mluku ɔ tsuo ngɛ dami nya; e ha nɔ tsuaa nɔ le enɛ ɔ, ejakaa e tle lɛ si kɛ je gbeje.”
32Se benɛ a nu ni gbogboehi a si temi he ɔ, ni komɛ ye e he fɛu, nɛ ni komɛ hu ke: “Wa maa kpale bu mo tue ekohu ngɛ enɛ ɔ he.” 33Bɔ nɛ pee nɛ Paulo je a kpɛti ji nɛ ɔ nɛ. 34Se nyumuhi komɛ kɛ a he bɔ e he nɛ a he ye. A kpɛti ni komɛ ji Dionisio, Areopagono ɔ, kɛ yo ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Damari ɔ, kɛ ni kpa komɛ nɛ piɛ a he.

Title: BƆFO 18
Content:
Paulo ngɛ Korinto
1Enɛ ɔ se ɔ Paulo je Atene nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho Korinto ya. 2Nɛ e ya na Yudano ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Akwila nɛ a fɔ lɛ ngɛ Ponto nɛ e je Italia kɛ ba kɛ we, kɛ e yo Priskila (ejakaa Kaesare Klaudio fa Yudafohi tsuo ke a je Roma), nɛ e ya a ngɔ. 3Nɛ akɛnɛ e kɛ mɛ tsuo tsuɔ ni tsumi kake he je ɔ, e kɛ mɛ hi si, nɛ a tsuɔ ni; a ni tsumi ji bo tsu peemi. 4Se daa Hejɔɔmi Ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, e ya tuɔ munyu ngɔ tsɔɔ nihi ngɛ kpe he ɔ, nɛ e bɔɔ mɔde kaa e tsake Yudafohi kɛ Helabi ɔmɛ.
5Benɛ Sila kɛ Timoteo je Makedonia ba a, munyu ɔ nyɛ Paulo nɔ, nɛ e ye odase veveeve ngɔ tsɔɔ Yudafo ɔmɛ ke Yesu ji Kristo ɔ nɛ. 6Benɛ a ku e nya nɛ a tu musu bɔmi munyuhi kɛ si lɛ ɔ, e huanya e tade ɔ mi nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ muɔ nɛ tloo nyɛ. Imi lɛɛ musu ko be ye nɔ, kɛ je be nɛ ɔ kɛ yaa nɛ ɔ, ma ya majemajeli a bimɛ ɔmɛ a ngɔ.” 7Kɛkɛ nɛ e je lejɛ ɔ nɛ e ho Mawujalɔ ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Titio Yusto nɛ e we tsa kpe he ɔ nɔ ɔ ngɔ ya. 8Se kpe he ɔ nɔkɔtɔma Krispo ɔ kɛ e we mluku ɔ kulaa he Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɔ ye, nɛ Korintobi ɔmɛ a ti nihi fuu hu nɛ nu ɔ, a he ye, nɛ a baptisi mɛ.
9Nyɔ ko mi ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de Paulo ngɛ ninami mi ke: “Koo ye gbeye, se mohu de, nɛ o ko ma o nya, 10ejakaa i kɛ mo ngɛ, nɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko be o he tae, nɛ e be mo yayami ko pee; ejakaa yi ngɛ nihi fuu ngɛ ma nɛ ɔ mi.” 11Nɛ Paulo hi akpɛti jeha kake kɛ hlami ekpa, nɛ e tsɔɔ Mawu munyu ɔ.
12Benɛ Galio ngɛ amlaalo yee ngɛ Akaia a, Yudafo ɔmɛ kɛ juɛmi kake te si wo Paulo, nɛ a kpaka lɛ kɛ ya kojomi sɛ ɔ hɛ mi; 13a ya de ke: “Nyumu nɛ ɔ woɔ ni ɔmɛ a yi mi nɛ a je mlaa a se kɛ ja Mawu.” 14Se benɛ Paulo ma bli e nya pɛ ɔ, Galio de Yudafo ɔmɛ ke: “Yudafohi, e ji ju kɛ fɔ̃ sane ko ʼi jinɛ, e sa kaa ma bu nyɛ tue. 15Se ke munyu loo biɛhi loo nyɛ mlaa a he sane komɛ ʼi ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛɛ hyɛ nɔ; ejakaa i sume kaa i kojoɔ kikɛmɛ a sanehi.” 16Nɛ e fie mɛ kɛ je kojomi sɛ ɔ hɛ mi. 17Kɛkɛ nɛ Helabi ɔmɛ tsuo nu kpe he ɔ nɔkɔtɔma Sostene ɔ, nɛ a fia lɛ ni ngɛ kojomi sɛ ɔ hɛ mi, se enɛ ɔmɛ eko eko dɔɛ Galio.
Paulo kpale kɛ ba Antiokia
18Se benɛ Paulo hi lejɛ ɔ be saii se ɔ, e sɛ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ, nɛ e sɛ lɛ mi kɛ yaa Siria; nɛ Priskila kɛ Akwila kɛ lɛ ho. Nɛ e ya sɛ e yi ngɛ Kenkrea, ngɛ e si womi ko nya. 19Nɛ e ba Efeso, nɛ e si mɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ. Se lɛ nitse lɛɛ e ya kpe he ɔ, nɛ e kɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ ya sa nya. 20Nɛ benɛ a kpa lɛ pɛɛ ke e kɛ ngɛ a ngɔ bɔɔ ɔ, e kplɛɛ we. 21Se mohu e sɛ mɛ ke: “Bɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ pee ɔ ja i ya ye nyami ligbi nɛ ma nɛ ɔ ngɛ Yerusalem; se ke Mawu suɔ ɔ, ma kpale ye se kɛ ba nyɛ ngɔ ekohu.” Nɛ e hia kɛ je Efeso.
22Benɛ e ya kple ngɛ Kaisarea a, e ya Yerusalem nɛ e ya nga asafo ɔ, nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho Antiokia ya. 23E hi lejɛ ɔ bɔɔ, nɛ kɔlɔ ɔ se ɔ, e pue nɔ ekohu nɛ e ya kpa Galatia kɛ Frigia zugba amɛ a nɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ, nɛ e wo kaseli ɔmɛ kulaa he wami.
Apolo ngɛ Efeso kɛ Korinto
24Yudano ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Apolo nɛ e se je Aleksandria nɛ ji nyumu nya mi tsɔlɔ nɛ ngɛ he wami ngɛ ngmami ɔmɛ a mi hulɔ ɔ ba Efeso. 25A tsɔɔ nyumu nɛ ɔ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ blɔ ɔ he ni, nɛ e ngɛ kã ngɛ mumi mi, nɛ e tsɔɔ Yesu he ni fitsofitso, pohu Yohane baptisimi ɔ kɛkɛ e le. 26Nɛ e bɔni kã nya munyu tumi ngɛ kpe he ɔ. Se benɛ Akwila kɛ Priskila nu e he ɔ, a ngɔ lɛ kɛ ba a ngɔ, nɛ a tsɔɔ lɛ Mawu blɔ ɔ fitsofitso. 27Benɛ Apolo susu kaa e maa po mi kɛ ya Akaia a, nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ na kã nɛ a ngma womi ya ha kaseli ɔmɛ kɛ wo mɛ ga ke a he lɛ hɛmuɔ. Benɛ e ba lejɛ ɔ, e ye bua nihi nɛ gu dloomi ɔ nɔ he ye ɔ babauu. 28Ejakaa e kɛ he wami ku Yudafo ɔmɛ a nya nɛ e kɛ ngmami ɔmɛ tsɔɔ mɛ faii kaa Yesu ji Kristo ɔ nɛ.

Title: BƆFO 19
Content:
Paulo ngɛ Efeso
1Benɛ Apolo ngɛ Korinto ɔ, Paulo ya kpa mahi nɛ ngɛ yo ɔmɛ a ɔ nɔ mi kɛ ba je Efeso. Nɛ e ba na kaseli komɛ, 2nɛ e bi mɛ ke: “Benɛ nyɛ he ye ɔ nyɛ na Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ lo?” Nɛ a de lɛ ke Mumi Klɔuklɔu ko ngɛ he ko jio, wa nui tete.” 3Nɛ e bi mɛ ke: “Lɛɛ mɛni mi a baptisi nyɛ ngɔ wo mɔ?” Nɛ a ke: “Yohane baptisimi ɔ mi.” 4Nɛ Paulo ke: “Yohane ɔ, tsuitsakemi baptisimi e kɛ baptisi, se e de ma a ke, a he nɔ nɛ ma ngɛ e se ɔ mohu nɔ ngɔ ye, lɛ ji Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu ɔ nɛ.” 5Nɛ benɛ a nu enɛ ɔ ɔ, a ha a baptisi mɛ ngɔ wo Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu biɛ mi. 6Nɛ benɛ Paulo kɛ e ninehi pue a nɔ ɔ, Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ kple a nɔ, nɛ a tu munyu slɔɔtohi nɛ a gba. 7Se nyumu ɔmɛ tsuo maa pee nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ.
8Paulo ya kpe he ɔ, nɛ e ya tu munyu kɛ kã, nɛ e tsɔɔ mɛ ni hlami etɛ sɔuu, nɛ e bɔ mɔde nɛ e ha a le Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ he sane ɔ. 9Se benɛ ni komɛ wlua a tsui nɛ a bui tue nɛ a tu tsɔɔmi ɔ he munyu yaya ngɛ asafo ɔ hɛ mi ɔ, e je a ngɔ nɛ e je kaseli ɔmɛ hu kɛ je a kpɛti, nɛ daa nɛ ɔ e ya tuɔ munyu tsɔɔ nihi ngɛ nɔ ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Tirano ɔ ni kasemi he ɔ. 10Nɛ e pee enɛ ɔ jeha enyɔ sɔuu, nɛ nihi tsuo nɛ ngɛ Asia, Yudafohi nɛ Helabi kulaa, nu Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu munyu ɔ.
Skeva bimɛ ɔmɛ
11Nɛ Mawu gu Paulo nine nɔ e kɛ tsu he wami ni tsumihi hulɔ nɛ pɔɛ he, 12hluu po nɛ a ngɔɔ e dukuhi kɛ e tade hɛ mi hami bohi tete ya haa hiɔtsɛmɛ a nɔ nɛ a hiɔ ɔmɛ jɔɔ, nɛ mumi yayami ɔmɛ hu jee a mi. 13Se Yudafohi klaali nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ kpaa si ɔ, a ti ni komɛ hu ka nɛ a kɛ Yesu biɛ nɛ ke nihi nɛ mumi yayamihi ngɛ a mi ɔmɛ a yi ke: “I na Yesu nɛ Paulo ngɛ fiɛɛe ɔ.” 14Osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma Skeva, Yuda no ɔ, bimɛ nyumuhi kpaago ɔmɛ ji nihi nɛ peɔ kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ nɛ. 15Se mumi yayami ɔ he nɔ nɛ e de mɛ ke: “Yesu ɔ, i le lɛ, nɛ Paulo hu i le lɛ; se nyɛɛ lɛɛ mɛnɔmɛ ji nyɛ?” 16Nɛ nɔmlɔ nɛ mumi yayami ngɛ e mi ɔ tua mɛ, nɛ e nine gu a nɔ nɛ e pee mɛ pasaa, nɛ a kɛ a he gu kɛ plaamihi tu fo kɛ je jamɛ a we ɔ mi. 17Nɛ benɛ Yudafohi kɛ Helabihi tsuo nɛ ngɛ Efeso ɔ nu enɛ ɔ ɔ, gbeye nu mɛ, nɛ a wo Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu biɛ ɔ hɛ mi nyami nitsɛnitsɛ. 18Nɛ nihi nɛ he ye ɔmɛ a kpɛti nihi fuu hu ba nɛ a ba jaje a ni peemi ni ɔmɛ paa ngɔ tsɔɔ. 19Nɛ kunya tsuli ɔmɛ hu a ti nihi babauu ba nɛ a kɛ a womi ɔmɛ ba pue si nɛ a sã ngɛ ni ɔmɛ tsuo a hɛ mi; nɛ benɛ a bu nya a e pee sika hiɔ kpɔ akpe-nyingmi enuɔ. 20Blɔ nɔ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ munyu ɔ gu nɛ e kɛ wa nɛ e kɛ ye kunimi ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ.
Basabasapeemi ba te si ngɛ Efeso
21Benɛ a gbe ni nɛ ɔmɛ a nya a, Paulo to e yi mi ngɛ mumi ɔ nya kaa e ma ya gu Makedonia kɛ Akaia kɛ ya Yerusalem, nɛ e ke: “Ke i su lejɛ ɔ, ja i ya slaa Roma hulɔ.” 22Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e tsɔ nihi nɛ sɔmɔɔ lɛ ɔ a ti nihi enyɔ, Timoteo kɛ “Erasto, Makedonia, se lɛ nitse lɛɛ e hi Asia be bɔɔ.
23Se jamɛ a be ɔ mi nɔuu ɔ, basabasa peemi wawɛɛ ko ba te si ngɛ tsɔɔmi ɔ he. 24Sika hiɔ galɔ ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Demetrio ɔ kɛ sika hiɔ peɔ Artemi sɔlemi tsuhi nɛ haa jamɛ a gali ɔmɛ naa ni fuu ngɛ mi. 25E tsɛ ni ɔmɛ kɛ nihi tsuo nɛ tsuɔ jamɛ a ni ɔ eko ɔ kɛ ba kpe, nɛ e ke: “Tsaatsɛmɛ, nyɛ le kaa kikɛmɛ a ga nɛ ɔ waa kɛ naa wa ni fuu ɔ, 26nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛ ngɛ hyɛe nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nue kaa, pi Efeso nɛ ɔ kɛkɛ, se mohu piɛ bɔɔ nɛ e su Asia kulaa nɛ kikɛmɛ a Paulo nɛ ɔ plɛ nihi babauu yi mi nɛ e deɔ ke: ‘Nihi nɛ a kɛ nine pee ɔ pi mawuhi ji mɛ’. 27Nɛ pi wa ni tsumi nɛ ɔ kɛkɛ he guɛ nɛ ma gbo, se mohu mawuyo Artemi ngua a sɔlemi we ɔ hu a be lɛ bue ha nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko, nɛ e nyami kpetekpleenyɛ ɔ nɛ Asia kɛ je mluku ɔ hu jaa a nya maa ba si.”
28Benɛ a nu enɛ ɔ ɔ, a mi mi wo la saminya nɛ a kpa ngmlaa ke: “Efesobi Artemi ɔ, he walɔ ngua ʼi!” 29Nɛ ma a mi kulaa pee basabasa; nɛ a kɛ juɛmi kake sa kɛ ho ni hyemi he ɔ ya, nɛ a ya nuu Gaio kɛ Aristarko nɛ ji Makedoniabi nɛ piɛ Paulo he kɛ hia blɔ ɔ. 30Se benɛ Paulo susu kaa e maa ya ni ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ, kaseli ɔmɛ kplɛɛ we lɛ; 31nɛ Asia ganɔ ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ hu nɛ ji Paulo huɛmɛ ɔ tsɔ e ngɔ ba wo lɛ ga ke e ko ka kãa e maa ya ni hyemi he ɔ. 32Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ ni komɛ ngɛ ngmlaa kpae kikɛ ɔ, ni komɛ hu ngɛ ekpã dee; ejakaa ni ɔmɛ kulaa ngɛ gidigidi pee, se a ti nihi fuu li nɔ́ nɛ he je nɛ a ba kpe ɔ tete. 33Nɛ a sã Aleksandro kɛ je ni ɔmɛ a kpɛti, ejakaa Yudafo ɔmɛ ngɛ e kuɛ se tsitsɛe kɛ ma hɛ kpɛ. Se Aleksandro fɔ̃ e nine; e ngɛ hlae nɛ e je e nya kɛ tsɔɔ ni ɔmɛ. 34Se benɛ a kpa si kaa Yudano ji lɛ ɔ, mɛ kulaa a kɛ gbi kake kpa ngmlaa maa pee ngmlɛfia enyɔ sɔuu ke: “Efesobi Artemi ɔ he walɔ ngua ʼi!”
35Se benɛ ma a mi womi ngmalɔ ɔ kpata ni ɔmɛ ɔ, e ke: “Tsaatsɛmɛ Efesobi, mɛnɔ po lɛ li kaa Artemi ngua a kɛ amaga nɛ kple si kɛ je Dio ngɔ ɔ Efesobi a ma nɛ ɔ mi nɛ e wɔnɔ ɔ ngɛ? 36Jeha nɛ ɔ akɛnɛ enɛ ɔ he be nɔ́jemi ko he je ɔ e sa kaa nyɛɛ pee kɔ dii, nɛ nyɛ ko pee gidigidi ko. 37Nyɛɛ kɛ kikɛmɛ a nyumu nɛ ɔmɛ ba hiɛ ɔ nɔ; a pi sɔlemi we ɔ ni juli ɔ, a pi nyɛ mawuyo ɔ he musu bɔli hulɔ. 38Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ke Demetrio aloo e huɛmɛ gali ɔmɛ kɛ nɔ ko ngɛ sane ko ɔ, kojomi ligbihi ngɛ, nɛ amlaalofo ɔmɛ hu ngɛ; nyɛ ha a kɛ sane ɔ nɛ ya a hɛ mi. 39Se ke munyu kpa komɛ a nya nyɛ ngɛ hlae ɔ, ma gua a nɛ ye ngɛ mlaa nya. 40Ejakaa piɛ nguɛ nya nɛ wa ko na sane, ke mwɔnɛ ligbi nɛ ɔ nɔ hoo peemi nɛ ɔ he nɛ a ya po wa nya kaa atua wa ngɛ tsɔe ɔ, mɛni nya jemi wa ngɛ?” 41Nɛ benɛ e de enɛ ɔ se ɔ, e wo asafo ɔ blɔ.

Title: BƆFO 20
Content:
Paulo ya Makedonia kɛ Hela
1Se benɛ gidigidi peemi ɔ se po ɔ, Paulo tsɔ ya tsɛ kaseli ɔmɛ kɛ ba kpe, nɛ e tu munyu tsɔɔ mɛ nɛ e sɛ mɛ, nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ yaa Makedonia. 2Nɛ benɛ e ya gu lejɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi nɛ e wo mɛ ga kɛ munyuhi fuu ɔ, e ba Hela, 3nɛ e ye hlami etɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ. Akɛnɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ wo lɛ ka benɛ e ngɛ hlae nɛ e hia kɛ ya Syria a he je ɔ, e to e yi mi kaa e maa kpale e se kɛ ya gu Makedonia ekohu. 4Nɛ Sopatre, Beroia no ɔ nɛ ji Pirho bi ɔ, kɛ Aristarko kɛ Sekundo, Tesalonikabi ɔmɛ, kɛ Gaio, Derbe no ɔ, kɛ Timoteo, kɛ Tihiko kɛ Tromfimo, Asiabi ɔmɛ, kɛ lɛ ya Asia. 5Ni nɛ ɔmɛ sɛ hlami nɛ a ya mlɛ wɔ ngɛ Troia. 6Se wɔɔ lɛɛ wa hia kɛ je Filipi ngɛ akpiti ligbi ɔmɛ a se, nɛ ligbi nɛ ji ligbi enuɔ ɔ, wa ya su a ngɔ ngɛ Troia, nɛ wa hi lejɛ ɔ ligbi kpaago.
Paulo kɛ Troia asafo ɔ ye sɛ
7Otsi ɔ mi kekleekle ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, benɛ kaseli ɔmɛ kpane a he nya konɛ a kuɔ abolo ɔ, Paulo tu munyu tsɔɔ mɛ, nɛ e ngɛ nɔ kɛ ya su nyɔ mi kpɛti, ejakaa e nɔ je na mɔtu ɔ e maa je. 8A su kane fuu ngɛ hiɔwe tsu ɔ mi he nɛ a kpane a he nya ngɛ ɔ. 9Se niheyo ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Eutiko ɔ hii si ngɛ saflɛ ɔ nya, nɛ mahɛ gbe lɛ, ejakaa Paulo munyu ɔ se kɛ. Mahɛ ɔ sɔuu ha e tsɔ kɛ je siaudo etɛ ɔ nɔ kɛ ba nɔ si, nɛ a ya wo lɛ nɛ e gbo. 10Se Paulo kple si nɛ e ya bu e nɔ, nɛ e fua lɛ nɛ e ke: “Nyɛ ko pee hoo, ejakaa wami ngɛ e mi.” 11Nɛ benɛ e kuɔ kɛ ba ekohu ɔ, e ba ku abolo ɔ, nɛ e ye eko, nɛ e tsa e munyu ɔ nɔ hluu kɛ ba su je nami, kɛkɛ nɛ e pue nɔ. 12Nɛ a kɛ niheyo ɔ ho hɛ kalɔ nɛ a bua jɔ a he nitse.
Paulo si Troia kɛ ya Mileeto
13Se wɔɔ lɛɛ wa sɛ hlami kɛ ya sɛ lɛ mi, nɛ wa hia kɛ ya Aso nɛ wa ya ngɔ Paulo ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, ejakaa e de wɔ ngɔ to momo ke e maa gu zugba. 14Nɛ benɛ e ba na wɔ ngɛ Aso ɔ, wa ngɔ lɛ kɛ ba lɛ ɔ mi, nɛ wa ba Mitilene. 15Wa hia kɛ je lejɛ ɔ, nɛ e nɔ je na a, wa ba su Kio hanɔ. Nɛ e nɔ je na nɔ ekohu ɔ wa ba su Samo, nɛ wa hi Trogilo, nɛ e nɔ je na a wa ba Mileeto. 16Paulo pee e juɛmi kaa e maa tsɔ Efeso he, benɛ pee nɛ e ko kɛ ngɛ Asia; ejakaa e ngɛ esɔ mie, nɛ ke e ma nyɛ ɔ nɛ e ya ye Pentekoste ligbi ɔ ngɛ Yerusalem.
Paulo kɛ Efeso nikɔtɔma amɛ ye sɛ
17Paulo tsɔ kɛ je Mileeto nɛ a ya tsɛ Efeso nikɔtɔma amɛ ba ha lɛ. 18Nɛ benɛ a ba e ngɔ ɔ, e de mɛ ke: “Nyɛ le bɔ nɛ i kɛ nyɛ hi si be mluku ɔ tsuo, kɛ je kekleekle ligbi nɛ i ba Asia a. 19I sɔmɔ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kɛ he si bami juɛmi tsuo kɛ vo nyu fuu kɛ kahi nɛ ba ye nɔ ngɛ Yudafohi a ka womi ɔmɛ a mi, 20bɔ nɛ i laa we nyɛ nihi nɛ he ngɛ se nami ha nyɛ ɔ eko nɔ, nɛ i jaje tsɔɔ nyɛ faii ngɛ ma nɔ kɛ we tsuaa we mi hulɔ; 21nɛ i ye tsui tsakemi kɛ Mawu hami kɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo nɔ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ he odase ngɔ tsɔɔ Yudafohi kɛ Helabihi kulaa. 22Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ, oʼɛ e fi mi ngɛ mumi mi he je ɔ i yaa Yerusalem, nɛ i li nihi nɛ maa ba ye nɔ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, 23kaa ja nɔ́ nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ yeɔ odase faii ngɛ ma tsuaa ma mi kaa kpa kɛ amanehluhi lɛ ngɛ mi mlɛe ɔ? 24Se kɛ̃ ɔ, i bui enɛ ɔmɛ a mi kake ngmelu, nɛ ye wami hu i bui kaa e he jua wa ngɛ ye hɛ mi, benɛ pee nɛ i kɛ bua jɔmi nɛ gbe ye blɔ nyɛɛmi ɔ kɛ sɔmɔmi nɛ i na kɛ je Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu dɛ mi, kaa ma ye Mawu dloomi sane kpakpa a he odase faii, ɔ nya.
25“Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ, oʼɛ, i le kaa, nyɛ nihi tsuo nɛ i nyɛɛ nyɛ kpɛti kɛ fiɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ he sane ɔ, nyɛ be ye hɛ mi nae hu. 26Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mwɔnɛ ligbi nɛ ɔ i ngɛ odase yee kɛ ngɛ nyɛ tsɔɔe, kaa i yi nyɛ ti nɔ ko nɔ ko muɔ yi musu. 27Ejakaa i jaje Mawu yi mi tomi mluku ɔ tsuo ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ nɛ i laa we eko nɔ. 28Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛɛ le nyɛ he nɔ hyemi kɛ tohi a kuu ɔ kulaa nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu wo nyɛ a nɔ hyɛli ɔ, konɛ nyɛɛ lɛ Mawu asafo ɔ nɛ e kɛ lɛ nitsɛ e muɔ he ɔ. 29Ejakaa i le kaa ke i je ɔ, ogbetee ni hali maa sɛ nyɛ kpɛti, nɛ a be tohi a kuu ɔ yi baae. 30Nɛ nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ kpɛti hu ɔ, nyumuhi nɛ tuɔ nihi nɛ dɛ maa te si, nɛ a ma kpaka kaseli ɔmɛ ngɔ pue a se. 31Lɔ ɔ he je ɔ nyɛɛ huɔ nɛ nyɛ kai kaa jeha etɛ sɔuu i kɛ vo nyu jɔɔ we nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ kɔkɔ bɔmi nyɔ kɛ pia.
32“Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ, mamimɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ tue kɛ ngɛ Mawu kɛ e dloomi munyu ɔ dɛ mi woe, lɛ lɛ e ngɛ he wami nɛ e kɛ ma ha nyɛ nane nɛ pi si nɛ e ngɔ wɔfase ni ɔmɛ ngɔ ha nyɛ ngɛ nihi tsuo nɛ a tsukɔ a he ɔmɛ a kpɛti. 33Ye hɛ kɔɛ nyɛ ti nɔ ko sika hiɔ loo sika tsu loo tade nɔ. 34Nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ le kaa, nihi nɛ hiaa mi kɛ nihi nɛ kɛ mi ngɛ ɔ, kikɛmɛ a nine nɛ ɔmɛ nɔuu i kɛ tsu he ni. 35I kɛ kulaa tsɔɔ nyɛ kaa jã e sa kaa a tsu ni nɛ a kɛ ye bua nihi nɛ be he wami, nɛ a kai Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu munyu ɔmɛ kaa lɛ nitsɛ e ke: ‘Nɔ hami mi ngɛ gbaami pe hemi.’ ”
36Nɛ benɛ e de kikɛ ɔ, e kplã si nɛ mɛ tsuo a sɔle. 37Nɛ mɛ tsuo a fo ya wawɛɛ, nɛ a nɔ Paulo kuɛ nɔ, nɛ a fiɔ e nya he. 38Nɛ nɔ́ nɛ dɔ mɛ titli ji munyu nɛ e de ke a be e hɛ mi nae hu ɔ. Nɛ a ya je lɛ blɔ ngɛ lɛ ɔ mi.

Title: BƆFO 21
Content:
Paulo ya Yerusalem
1Jeha nɛ ɔ e ba mi kaa benɛ waa kɛ mɛ ye sɛ nɛ wa gba mi ɔ, wa hia tɛ̃ɛ kɛ ba Koo, nɛ e nɔ je na a waba Rodo, nɛ wa je lejɛ ɔ kɛ ba Patara. 2Nɛ benɛ wa ya na lɛ ko nɛ yaa Foinike ɔ, wa sɛ mi nɛ wa pue nɔ. 3Se benɛ wa ngɛ Kipro hyɛe ngɛ wa hɛ mi ɔ, wa fia lɛ fɔ muɔ nɔ nɛ wa ba Siria, nɛ wa ba kple ngɛ Tiro, ejakaa lejɛ ɔ a ma je lɛ ɔ mi ni ngɛ. 4Wa bi kaseli ɔmɛ a si, nɛ benɛ wa na mɛ ɔ, wa hi lejɛ ɔ ligbi kpaago. Nɛ a gu mumi ɔ nɔ de Paulo ke e ko ya Yerusalem. 5Nɛ e ba mi kaa benɛ wa ye ligbi ɔmɛ tã a, wa pue nɔ, nɛ a kɛ a yihi kɛ a bimɛ kulaa ba je wɔ blɔ kɛ je ma a mi, nɛ wa kpla si ngɛ wo ɔ nya nɛ wa sɔle. 6Nɛ benɛ waa kɛ wa he ye sɛ ɔ, wa sɛ lɛ mi, nɛ mɛ hu a kpale a se kɛ ho a wehi a mi ya.
7Se wɔɔ lɛɛ wa je Tiro kɛ ba Ptolemai nɛ waa kɛ gbe wo hɛ mi nyɛɛmi ɔ nya. Wa ya nga nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ nɛ waa kɛ mɛ hi si ligbi kake. 8E nɔ je na a wa pue nɔ kɛ ho Kaisarea ya, nɛ wa ya sɛ sane kpakpa fiɛlɔ Filipo nɛ ji ni kpaago ɔ a kpɛti nɔ kake ɔ we mi, nɛ waa kɛ lɛ hi si. 9E ngɛ bimɛ yihewi eywiɛ nɛ gbaa. 10Benɛ wa hi lejɛ ɔ be saii ɔ, gbalɔ ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Agabo ɔ je Yudea ba. 11Benɛ e ba wa ngɔ ɔ, e ngɔ Paulo mlɛ mi fimi nɔ́ ɔ nɛ e kɛ fi lɛ nitse e ninehi kɛ e nanehi nɛ e ke: Bɔ nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ de ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: Nyumu nɔ nɛ nɔ́ nɛ ji mlɛ mi fimi nɔ́ nɛ ɔ ɔ, kikɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ maa fi lɛ ngɛ Yerusalem, nɛ a maa ngɔ lɛ ngɔ wo majemajeli a bimɛ ɔmɛ a dɛ mi. 12Se benɛ wa nu enɛ ɔ ɔ, waa kɛ lejɛ ɔ bi ɔmɛ tsuo kpa lɛ pɛɛ ke e ko ya Yerusalem ɔ. 13Kɛkɛ nɛ Paulo he nɔ nɛ e ke: “Mɛni nyɛ ngɛ pee nɛ ɔ, nyɛ ngɛ ya foe kɛ ma tsɔ ye tsui? Se imi lɛɛ, pi fimi kɛkɛ nɛ i dla ye he ngɔ to, se mohu gbenɔ nitse ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu biɛ ɔ he ngɛ Yerusalem.” 14Se akɛnɛ e kplɛɛ we he je ɔ, wa pee kɔ nɛ wa ke: “A pee nɔ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ suɔ.”
15Enɛ ɔ se ɔ wa bo tlomi nɛ wa pue nɔ kɛ ho Yerusalem ya. 16Kaseli nɛ je Kaisarea a a ti ni komɛ kɛ wɔ ho, nɛ a ha wa yato Mnason, Kipro no ko nɛ ji kaselɔ kɛ je kɛ ɔ ngɔ.
Paulo ya slaa Yakobo
17Benɛ wa su Yerusalem ɔ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ he wɔ hɛmuɔ. 18Nɛ e nɔ je na a Paulo kɛ wɔ ya Yakobo ngɔ; nɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ tsuo hu ngɛ lejɛ ɔ. 19Nɛ benɛ e nga mɛ ɔ, e bɔ mɛ nihi nɛ Mawu gu e sɔmɔmi ɔ nɔ tsu ngɛ majemajeli ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ kakaaka. 20Benɛ a nu ɔ, a wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami, nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Mami, hyɛ Yudafohi akpehi abɔ nɛ a he ye nɛ ɔ; mɛ tsuo ɔ, Mlaa a he hɛdɔli ji mɛ. 21Se a ba sɛɛ o he sane ha mɛ kaa o tsɔɔ Yudafohi nɛ ngɛ majemajeli ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ ke a kua Mose, nɛ o deɔ ke a ko po a bimɛ, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu a ko nyɛɛ a kusumi nɛ ɔmɛ a se. 22Jeha nɛ ɔ kɛ a maa pee kɛɛ? Bɔ tsuaa bɔ nɛ pee ɔ, ma a nya ma ba kpane sa; ejakaa a maa nu kaa o ba. 23Lɔ ɔ he ɔ pee nɔ́ nɛ wa ngɛ mo de nɛ ɔ: Wa ngɛ nyumuhi eywiɛ nɛ wo si. 24Ngɔɔ mɛ nɛ o kɛ mɛ tsuo ya tsukɔ nyɛ he, nɛ o wo nɔ́ nɛ a haa a ngɔ ha mɛ, konɛ a sɛ a yi nɛ ni ɔmɛ kulaa nɛ na kaa, nihi nɛ a ba sɛɛ ngɛ o he ɔ be mi, se mohu mo nitsɛ po o baa o je mi ngɛ Mlaa a nya, nɛ o yeɔ nɔ. 25Se majemajeli a bimɛ nɛ he ye ɔ a he ɔ, wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa ngma nɛ wa kpɛ mi kaa a ko ye kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ eko nɔ, se mohu a nyɛ bɔ nɛ a sa ha wɔhi kɛ muɔ kɛ lohwehi nɛ a kita a kuɛ kɛ ajuama bɔmi kɛkɛ.” 26Kɛkɛ nɛ e nɔ je na a Paulo kpaka nyumu ɔmɛ kɛ ho, nɛ benɛ e kɛ mɛ kulaa tsukɔ a he ɔ, e kɛ mɛ sɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, nɛ e ya fiɛ he tsukɔmi ligbi ɔmɛ a nyagbe ɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ faii kɛ ya su be nɛ a sa bɔ ɔ ha a ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ.
A nu Paulo ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ
27Benɛ e piɛ bɔɔ nɛ a maa gbe ligbi kpaago ɔ nya a, Yudafohi nɛ je Asia a na lɛ ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, nɛ a su asafo ɔ ngɔ wo e he. 28Nɛ a kpa ngmlaa ke: “Tsaatsɛmɛ Israelbi, nyɛ ba piɛ wa he! oʼɛ nyumu ɔ nɛ tuɔ ma nɛ ɔ kɛ Mlaa a kɛ hiɛ ɔ he munyu yaya ngɔ tsɔɔ nihi tsuo ngɛ he tsuaa he ɔ; nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ e kɛ Helabi ba sɔlemi we ɔ ba ble he klɔuklɔu nɛ ɔ hulɔ.” 29Ejakaa a na lɛ kɛ Trofimo nɛ je Efeso ɔ ngɛ ma a mi mo he je ɔ, a susu kaa lɛ nɛ Paulo kɛ ba sɔlemi we ɔ nɛ. 30Nɛ ma mluku ɔ kulaa bu, nɛ ma mi bi ɔmɛ sa fo kɛ ba kpane a he nya; nɛ a nu Paulo nɛ a sa lɛ kɛ je sɔlemi we ɔ kɛ je kpo, nɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔuu ɔ, a nga sinya amɛ. 31Se benɛ a ngɛ hlae nɛ a gbe lɛ ɔ, a ya ju si sɛɛ ha asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a ke Yerusalem kulaa pee gidigidi. 32Nɛ amlɔ ɔ, e ngɔ aslaafohi kɛ asafoatsɛmɛ nɛ e kɛ mɛ kple si kɛ fo kɛ ba na mɛ. Se benɛ a na asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a kɛ aslaafo ɔmɛ ɔ, a jɔɔ Paulo ni fiami. 33Kɛkɛ nɛ asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a hɛ lɛ su e he nɛ e pɛtɛ e he, nɛ e fa ke a wo lɛ kɔsɔkɔsɔhi enyɔ, nɛ e bi nɔ nɛ ji lɛ kɛ nɔ́ nɛ e pee. 34Se asafo ɔ mi ni komɛ ngɛ ngmlaa kpae kikɛ, nɛ ni komɛ hu ngɛ ekpa dee. Nɛ akɛnɛ e nɛ́ mi anɔkuale ngɛ hoo peemi ɔ he ɔ, e fa ke a kɛ lɛ nɛ ya mɔ ɔ mi. 35Nɛ benɛ e su atlaakpe ɔ nya a, e ba mi kaa asafo ɔ gidigidi peemi he je ɔ aslaafo ɔmɛ wo lɛ, 36ejakaa ma bi asafo jiji ɔ nyɛɛ se ngɛ ngmlaa kpae ke: “Agbe lɛ!”
Paulo je e nya
37Benɛ a kɛ Paulo ba sɛ mɔ ɔ mi ɔ, e bi asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a ke: “I ngɛ he blɔ kaa i kɛ mo tuɔ munyu ko lo?” Asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtama a ke: “O tuɔ Hela gbi lo? 38Lɛɛ pi mo ji Mizraim no ɔ nɛ lingmi nɛ ɔ nɛ e kɛ atua tsɔmi ba nɛ e kpaka nyumuhi awiyeli akpe eywiɛ ngɔ pue e se kɛ ho nga a nɔ ya a lo?” 39Nɛ Paulo ke: “Imi lɛɛ Yuda no ji mi, nɛ i je Tarso, Kilikia ma ko nɛ ngɛ biɛ ɔ mi. Se i kpa mo pɛɛ, ha mi blɔ nɛ ma tu munyu ngɔ tsɔɔ ma a.” 40Nɛ benɛ a ha lɛ blɔ ɔ, Paulo da atlaakpe ɔ nɔ, nɛ e fɔ ma a nine, nɛ benɛ lejɛ ɔ jɔ klanaa a, e tu munyu ngɛ Hebri gbi mi de ke:

Title: BƆFO 22
Content:
1“Mamimɛ kɛ tsaatsɛmɛ, nyɛɛ bu ye nya jemi nɛ ɔ tue.” 2Nɛ benɛ a nu kaa Hebri gbi e kɛ mɛ ngɛ tue ɔ, a pee kɔ dii pe kekle ɔ. Nɛ e ke: 3“I mi lɛɛ Yuda no ji mi, nɛ a fɔ mi ngɛ Tarso ngɛ Kilikia mohu, se ma nɛ ɔ mi a lɛ mi ngɛ, nɛ Gamaliel nane nya a tsɔse mi ngɛ, ngɛ wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a Mlaa a nya fitsofitso, nɛ ye hɛ dɔɔ ngɛ Mawu sane he, kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ tsuo nyɛ ngɛ pee mwɔnɛ nɛ ɔ. 4I waa nihi nɛ hɛɛ kikɛmɛ a tsɔɔmi nɛ ɔ yi mi kɛ ya suu gbenɔ mi, nɛ i fiɔ nyumuhi kɛ yihi tsuo ngɔ haa nɛ a woɔ mɛ tsu mi, 5bɔ nɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a tete kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ kulaa yeɔ mi odase ɔ. Ni nɛ ɔmɛ nɔuu hu lɛ a ha mi womi nɛ jinɛ ma kɛ ya ha nyɛmimɛ nɛ ngɛ Damasko ɔ, nɛ ma fi nihi nɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ hu kɛ ba Yerusalem, konɛ a gbla a tue.”
Paulo sɛɛ e tsakemi
6“Se e ba mi kaa benɛ i nyɛɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ nɛ i su Damasko ta maa pee pudami be mi ɔ, tlukaa a la ko nɛ kpemi nya wa je hiɔwe ba bɔle mi; 7nɛ i tsɔ fia si, nɛ i nu gbi ko de mi ke: ‘Saulo, Saulo, mɛ he je o ngɛ mi yi mi wae?’ 8Nɛ i he nɔ ke: ‘Mo mɛnɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ?’ Nɛ e de mi ke: ‘Imi Yesu, Nazareno ɔ, nɛ o ngɛ lɛ yi mi wae ɔ ʼi.’ 9Nihi nɛ kɛ mi nyɛɛ ɔ na la a, nɛ a ye gbeye, se a nui nɔ nɛ kɛ mi tu munyu ɔ gbi. 10Nɛ i ke: ‘Mɛni ma pee, Nyɔmtsɛ?’ Nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de mi ke: ‘Tee si nɛ o ya Damasko, nɛ lejɛ ɔ a maa tsɔɔ mo nihi kulaa nɛ a to kaa o pee ɔ.’ 11Nɛ benɛ i hyɛ we nɔ́ hu ngɛ jamɛ a la a kpemi ɔ nya a, nihi nɛ kɛ mi nyɛɛ ɔ pɛtɛ ye nine mi nɛ a ya sɛ mi Damasko.
12“Nyumu ko ngɛ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Anania nɛ yee Mawu gbeye ngɛ Mlaa a nya, nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ kulaa nɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ tuɔ e he munyu kpakpa. 13Lɛ nɛ e ba ye ngɔ nɛ e ba da ye kasa nyɛ nɛ e de mi ke: ‘Maminyumu Saulo, hyɛ nɔ!’ Nɛ jamɛ a ngmlɛfia a nɔ nɔuu ɔ i na lɛ. 14Nɛ e ke: ‘Wa tsɛmɛ a Mawu ɔ hla mo ngɔ to nɛ o le e suɔmi nya ni nɛ o na Dalɔ ɔ nɛ o nu e nya mi gbi ko; 15ejakaa o ma plɛ e he odaseyelɔ, konɛ o ye nihi tsuo kulaa nɛ o na nɛ o nu ɔmɛ a he odase ngɔ tsɔɔ nimli kulaa. 16Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ mɛ he je o ngɛ tslee toe? Tee si nɛ o ha a baptisi mo nɛ a fɔ o he yayami ɔmɛ ngɔ pue he nɛ o tsɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ biɛ.’
A tsɛ Paulo kɛ ha majemaje fiɛmi
17“Benɛ i kpale ye se kɛ ba Yerusalem ekohu nɛ i ngɛ sɔlee ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, e pee kaa nɔ́ nɛ nɔ́ nɔ ye nɔ, 18nɛ i na lɛ nɛ e ngɛ mi dee ke: ‘Pee esɔ nɛ o je Yerusalem, ejakaa a be ye he odase nɛ o ngɛ yee ɔ tue bue.’ 19Nɛ i ke: ‘Nyɔmtsɛ, mɛ nitsɛmɛ a le kaa imi nɔuu ji nɔ nɛ sa a i woɔ nihi nɛ heɔ o nɔ yeɔ ɔ tsu mi, nɛ i fiaa mɛ ni ngɛ kpe he tsuaa kpe he, 20nɛ benɛ a pue Stefano, o he odaseyelɔ ɔ, muɔ si ɔ, imi hu i daa si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, nɛ ye bua jɔ e gbenɔ he, nɛ i bu nihi nɛ gbe lɛ ɔmɛ a bo ɔmɛ a he.’ 21Nɛ e de mi ke: ‘Yaa, ejakaa ma tsɔ mo majemajeli nɛ ngɛ lokoo ɔmɛ a ngɔ.’ ”
22Nɛ a bu lɛ tue kɛ ba su kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔ nɔ, nɛ a wo a gbi nɔ nɛ a de ke: “A kɛ kikɛmɛ a nɔmlɔ nɛ ɔ nɛ je zugba a nɔ! Ejakaa e sɛ́ kaa e hii je mi.” 23Se benɛ a ngɛ ngmlaa kpae nɛ a ngɛ a tadehi kpɔe nɛ a ngɛ bunyuku gbee kɛ ngɛ kɔɔyɔ mi woe ɔ, 24asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a fa ke a kɛ lɛ nɛ ya mɔ ɔ mi, nɛ e de ke a ngɔ kplibi kɛ hla e yi mi, konɛ e le nɔ́ sane he je nɛ a ngɛ ngmlaa kpae kɛ ngɛ lɛ woe kikɛ nɛ ɔ. 25Se benɛ a fi lɛ nɛ a maa fia lɛ kpa a, Paulo bi asafoatsɛ nɛ daa si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ke: “Nyɛ ngɛ he blɔ kaa nyɛ fiaa Roma no ko nɛ a bui lɛ fɔ ɔ kplibi lo?” 26Se benɛ asafoatsɛ ɔ nu enɛ ɔ ɔ, e ya asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a ngɔ nɛ e ya de lɛ ke: “Mɛni o maa pee nɛ ɔ? Ejakaa kikɛmɛ a nɔmlɔ nɛ ɔ Roma no ʼi.” 27Asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a ba nɛ e ba bi lɛ ke: “De mi, anɛ Roma no ji mo lo?” Nɛ Paulo ke: “Ee.” 28Nɛ asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a he nɔ ke: “Sika fuu i kɛ he kikɛmɛ a ma mi no plɛmi nɛ ɔ.” Nɛ Paulo ke: “Se imi lɛɛ pe a kɛ fɔ mi.” 29Kɛkɛ nɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔuu nɛ nihi nɛ yaa hla e yi mi ɔ je e kasa nya. Asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a hu, akɛnɛ e fi lɛ he je ɔ, benɛ e na le kaa Roma no ji lɛ ɔ, e tsui po.
Paulo ngɛ gua ngua a hɛ mi
30Se akɛnɛ asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a ngɛ hlae nɛ e le nɔ́ tutuutu he je nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ po e nya a, e nɔ je na nɔ ɔ, e pɛne lɛ, nɛ e fa ke osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ gua ngua a kulaa nɛ ba. Nɛ e kɛ Paulo kple si, nɛ e kɛ lɛ ya da a hɛ mi.

Title: BƆFO 23
Content:
1Paulo tɛ̃tɛ̃ e hɛ mi nɛ e hyɛ gua ngua a kɛ kpe nɛ e ke: “Tsaatsɛmɛ kɛ mamimɛ, imi lɛɛ he nile kpakpa sɔuu i kɛ ba ye je mi ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi kɛ ba su mwɔnɛ ligbi nɛ ɔ.” 2Kɛkɛ nɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma Anania fa nihi nɛ daa si ngɛ e kasa nya a ke a gba e nya ma. 3Kɛkɛ nɛ Paulo de lɛ ke: “Ma kɛ̃ Mawu ma gba mo, mo gli nɛ a sa he kalo! O hii si ngɛ mi kojoe ngɛ Mlaa a nya, nɛ o pa jee Mlaa a se faa ke a gba mi ma?” 4Se nihi nɛ daa si ngɛ e kasa nya a de lɛ ke: “Ee! Mawu osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a o ngɛ jɛe nɛ ɔ?” 5Nɛ Paulo ke: “Mamimɛ, i li kaa osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma ʼi; ejakaa a ngma ke: ‘Koo tu o ma mi nɔkɔtɔma he munyu yaya.’ ”
6Se benɛ Paulo kpa si kaa fã kake ɔ Sadukifohi ji mɛ, nɛ fã kpa a Farisifohi ʼi ɔ, e nga ngɛ gua ngua a kpɛti ke: “Tsaatsɛmɛ kɛ mamimɛ, imi lɛɛ Farisifo no ji mi kɛ Farisifo no bi hulɔ. Hɛ nɔ kami kɛ ni gbogboehi a si temi ɔ he a ngɛ mi kojoe nɛ ɔ nɛ.” 7Benɛ e de kikɛ ɔ, kɛkɛ nɛ pɛ sɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ kɛ Sadukifo ɔmɛ a kpɛti, nɛ aafo ɔ mi gba enyɔ. 8Ejakaa Sadukifo ɔmɛ deɔ ke ni gbogboehi a si temi ko be nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu hiɔwe bɔfo loo mumi ko hu be. Se Farisifo ɔmɛ deɔ ke enyɔ ɔ tsuo ngɛ. 9Nɛ huhui babauu ba te si, nɛ mlaatsɔɔli ɔmɛ nɛ ngɛ Farisifo ɔmɛ a se ɔ te si nɛ a pɛ de ke: “Wa nɛ nɔ ko yaya ko ngɛ kikɛmɛ a nɔmlɔ nɛ ɔ he. Se ke alinɔ mumi ko loo hiɔwe bɔfo ko nɛ e kɛ lɛ tu munyu ɔ nɛɛ?”
10Se benɛ pɛ ɔ mi ba wa a, asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a ye gbeye kaa eko ɔ a ma tsɔtslɔɔ Paulo mi he je ɔ, e fa aslaafo ɔmɛ ke a kple si nɛ a ya kpɔ lɛ ngɛ a dɛ, nɛ a kɛ lɛ nɛ ba mɔ ɔ mi.
11Se e nɔ nyɔ ɔ mi ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ba da e kasa nyɛ nɛ e ke: “Paulo, ha o tsui nɛ nɔ o mi, ejakaa bɔ nɛ o ye hye odase ngɛ Yerusalem nɛ ɔ ɔ, ja o ya ye odase jã nɔuu ngɛ Roma hulɔ.”
A so Paulo yi nɔ
12Se e nɔ je na a, Yudafo ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ ya so, nɛ a kã a he kita kaa a be ni yee nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu a be nɔ́ ko nue ja a gbe Paulo lolo. 13Nihi nɛ ya so nɛ a kã a he kita nɛ ɔmɛ pe nimli nyingmi eywiɛ. 14Nɛ a ya osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ ma nikɔtɔma amɛ a ngɔ ya de ke: “Waa kɛ kita kami so kaa, wa be wa nya mi nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko woe ja wa gbe Paulo lolo. 15Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛɛ kɛ gua ngua a tsuo ya de asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a, konɛ e kɛ Paulo nɛ kple si kɛ ba nyɛ ngɔ, kaa nɔ́ nɛ e sane ɔ mi nyɛ ma hyemi fitsofitso. Se wɔɔ lɛɛ loko e maa su nyɛ ngɔ ɔ, wa dla wa he nɛ wa maa gbe lɛ.”
16Se Paulo nyɛmiyo bi ko nu a ka womi ɔ he, nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ya mɔ ɔ mi, nɛ e ya wo Paulo tue nɔ. 17Paulo tsɛ asafoatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɔ kake kɛ ba e ngɔ, nɛ e ke: “Ngɔɔ kikɛmɛ a niheyo nɛ ɔ nɛ o kɛ lɛ nɛ ya asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a ngɔ, ejakaa e ngɛ munyu ko nɛ e maa sɛɛ ha lɛ.” 18Kɛkɛ nɛ e ngɔ lɛ nɛ e kɛ lɛ ya asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a ngɔ nɛ e ya de ke: “Pamino Paulo ɔ tsɛ mi kɛ ya e ngɔ, nɛ e kpa mi pɛɛ ke i kɛ kikɛmɛ a niheyo nɛ ɔ nɛ ba o ngɔ, ejakaa e ngɛ munyu ko nɛ e maa sɛɛ ha mo.” 19Nɛ asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a nu e nine si, nɛ e kɛ lɛ ya se, nɛ e bi lɛ ke: “Mɛni sane o ngɛ nɛ o ma de mi?” 20Nɛ e ke: “Yudafo ɔmɛ pee kake ke a ma ba bi mo nɛ hwɔɔ ɔ nɛ o kɛ Paulo nɛ kple si kɛ ba gua ngua a hɛ mi, kaa nɔ́ nɛ e sane ɔ mi a ma hlami fitsofitso. 21Se moo lɛɛ koo kplɛɛ ha mɛ, ejakaa a kpɛti nihi pe nyingmi eywiɛ wo ka, a kɛ kita kami ya so kaa a be ni yee, hɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu a be nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko nue ja a gbe lɛ lolo. Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ a dla a he, nɛ a ngɛ o nya tue bue.” 22Kɛkɛ nɛ asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a wo niheyo ɔ blɔ, nɛ e wo lɛ hiɔngɔ ke: “Ko de nɔ ko nɔ ko ke o wo sane nɛ ɔ nɔ tã de mi.”
A kɛ Paulo ya ha amlaalo Felike
23Nɛ e tsɛ asafoatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti ni enyɔ kɛ ba e ngɔ, nɛ e ke: “Nyɛ dla aslaafohi lafa enyɔ kɛ okpɔngɔtsɛmɛ nyingmi kpaago kɛ hlɔtsɛmɛ hu lafa enyɔ nɛ a ya Kaisarea gbɔkuɛ ngmlɛɛ nɛɛ mi.” 24Nɛ e de ke, a dla okpɔngɔhi hulɔ ngɔ to nɛ a ha Paulo nɛ hi nɔ, nɛ a kɛ lɛ ya ha amlaalo Felike sɔkee. 25Nɛ e ngma womi nɛ e de ngɛ mi ke:
26“Klaudio Lisia biɔ amlaalo kpakpa Felike saminya! 27Kikɛmɛ a nyumu nɛ ɔ ɔ, Yudafo ɔmɛ nu lɛ nɛ jinɛ a maa gbe lɛ. Se benɛ i na le kaa Roma no ji lɛ ɔ, ikɛ aslaafohi ya ya kpɔ lɛ. 28Nɛ akɛnɛ i ngɛ hlae nɛ ma le nɔ́ sane he je nɛ a ngɛ e nya poe ɔ, i kɛ lɛ ya a gua ngua a hɛ mi, 29nɛ i na kaa a Mlaa a he nguane jemi sane komɛ a he nɛ a ngɛ e nya poe ɔ nɛ, se sane ko nɛ sa gbenɔ aloo tsu mi womi ko be e he. 30Se benɛ a ba ju si de mi ke Yudafo ɔmɛ wo nyumu ɔ ka a, amlɔ ɔ, i tsɔ ke a kɛ lɛ nɛ ba o ngɔ, nɛ i fa le nya poli ɔmɛ hu ke a ba o hɛ mi nɛ a ba jaje sanehi nɛ a kɛ lɛ ngɛ ɔ. He manye!”
31Kɛkɛ nɛ aslaafo ɔmɛ ngɔ Paulo kaa bɔ nɛ a fa mɛ ɔ, nɛ a nyɛɛ nyɔ ɔ mi nɛ a kɛ lɛ ba Antipatri. 32E nɔ je na a, a ha okpɔngɔtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ kɛ lɛ ho, se mɛɛ lɛɛ a kpale a se kɛ ba mɔ ɔ mi ekohu. 33Benɛ a su Kaisarea nɛ a kɛwomi ɔ ya ha amlaalo ɔ, a kɛ Paulo hu ba da e hɛ mi. 34Nɛ benɛ amlaalo ɔ kane womi ɔ, e bi ke jije zugba nɔ e je, nɛ benɛ e na le kaa Kilikia e je ɔ, 35e ke: “Ke o nya poli ɔmɛ hu ba a, kɔlɔ ɔ loko ma bu mo tue saminya.” Nɛ e fa ke a kɛ lɛ ya to Herode mɔ ɔ mi.

Title: BƆFO 24
Content:
Yudafo ɔmɛ po Paulo nya
1Ligbi enyɔ se ɔ, osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma Anania kɛ ma nikɔtɔma amɛ ekomɛ kɛ otsiame ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Tertulo ɔ ba lejɛ ɔ, nɛ a ba jaje Paulo he sane ngɔ tsɔɔ amlaalo ɔ. 2Nɛ benɛ a ya tsɛ Paulo kɛ ba a, Tertulo bɔni e nya pomi, nɛ e ke: “Wa nɔmo Felike, akɛnɛ o yinɔ nɛ ɔ wa tue mi jɔ wɔ babauu, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu o nɔ hyɛmi ɔ nya a o ha nihi fuu ba hɛngmɛ nɔ ngɛ kikɛmɛ a zugba nɛ ɔ nɔ he ɔ, 3wa naa mo si babauu daa nɛ ɔ ngɛ he tsuaa he ngɛ enɛ ɔmɛ kulaa he. 4Se benɛ pee nɛ ye munyu se nɛ ko kɛ fuu tsɔ he je ɔ, i kpa mo pɛɛ nɛ o bu wɔ tue bɔɔ ngɛ o mi mi himi nya. 5E ji anɔkuale kaa wa na nyumu nɛ ɔ kaa e ji nihi a tue puɛlɔ, e woɔ Yudafohi tsuo nɛ ngɛ zugba mluku ɔ kulaa nɔ ɔ yi mi nɛ a tsɔ atua, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu e ji Nazaretsɛmɛ a kuu ɔ nya kpa. 6E ka sɔlemi we ɔ blemi nɛ wa nu lɛ. [Nɛ jinɛ wa ngɛ hlae nɛ waa kojo lɛ ngɛ wa Mlaa a nya. 7Se asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma Lisia ba nɛ e ba kpɔ lɛ ngɛ wa dɛ ka nya, nɛ e kɛ lɛ ho, 8nɛ e fa e nya poli ɔmɛ ke a ba o ngɔ], nɛ ke mo nitsɛ o bi e nya mi munyu ɔ, o maa na sanehi nɛ wa ngɛ e nya poe ngɛ he ɔ kulaa.” 9Nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ hu ka nɔ, nɛ a ma nɔ mi ke munyu nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ mi ja.
Paulo je e nya ngɛ Felike hɛ mi
10Se benɛ amlaalo ɔ fɔ Paulo nine ke e tu munyu ɔ, e wo e nya nɔ nɛ e ke: “Akɛnɛ i le kaa tsa pi mwɔnɛ nɛ o je bɔni zugba nɛ ɔ nɔ amlaalo yemi he je ɔ, i na bua jɔmi nɛ ma kɛ je ye nya. 11Ke o bu ɔ, o maa na kaa ligbi nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ pɛ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ i ba be kɛ ho Yerusalem ya ke ma ya ja Mawu. 12Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu a nɛ mi hyɛ kaa i kɛ nihi ngɛ nya sae, aloo i ngɛ nihi bue ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, aloo kpe he ɔmɛ, aloo ma a mi. 13Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu sanehi nɛ a kɛ ngɛ ye nɔ fɔe nɛ ɔ, a be nya nyɛe maa tsɔɔ. 14Nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ mi gbae pãa ngɛ dee ji enɛ ɔ kaa, tsɔɔmi nɛ a ngɛ tsɛe ke nyangɔ tsɔɔmi ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu nya i jaa wa tsɛmɛ a Mawu ɔ ngɛ; i heɔ nihi kulaa nɛ a ngma ngɛ Mlaa a kɛ gbali ɔmɛ a mi ɔ yeɔ. 15I ngɛ Mawu nɔ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi kaa ni gbogboehi a si temi maa ba, nɛ dali kɛ nihi nɛ dɛ́ kulaa maa te si, kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu blɔ ni nɛ ɔmɛ hu ngɛ hyɛe. 16Enɛ ɔ he nɛ i kɛ ye he fɔɛ si ɔ nɛ, benɛ pee nɛ ma na he nile nɛ yobu be he ngɛ Mawu kɛ nimli a hɛ mi ngɛ nihi kulaa mi.
17“Nɛ jehahi fuu a se ɔ, i ba nɛ i kɛ nike ni ba ha ye ma a nɛ ma sã bɔ hulɔ. 18Enɛ ɔ mi nɛ a na mi kaa i ngɛ ye he tsukɔe ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, se a nɛ́ mi kɛ asafo ko ɔ, a n nɛ́ mi kɛ hoopeemi ko hulɔ. 19Se Yudafohi komɛ nɛ je Asia a ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, jinɛ mɛ nɛ sa kaa a ba o hɛ mi, nɛ ke a ngɛ ye he sane ko ɔ nɛ a ba jaje. 20Aloo ni nɛ ɔmɛ nitsɛmɛ po, ke a na nɔ́ ko nɛ dɛ ngɛ ye he benɛ i daa si ngɛ gua ngua a hɛ mi ɔ, a de; 21kaa ja kikɛmɛ a munyu kake nɛ benɛ i da a kpɛti nɛ i wo ye gbi nɔ de ke: Ni gbogboehi a sitemi he je nyɛ ngɛ mi kojoe mwɔnɛ ligbi nɛ ɔ’ ɔ he kɛkɛ.”
22Se akɛnɛ Felike le kikɛmɛ a tsɔɔmi nɛ ɔ he sane pɛpɛɛpe he je ɔ, e tsɛ̃ mɛ ngɔ to, nɛ e ke: “Ke asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma Lisia ba a, ma hyɛ nyɛ sane ɔ ma ye.” 23Nɛ e fa asafoatsɛ ɔ ke e ngɔ Paulo ngɔ to, nɛ e ha e na hejɔmi, nɛ ke e he nimli ma lɛ sɔmɔmi loo slaami ɔ e ko tsi mɛ blɔ.
Paulo ngɛ Felike kɛ Drusila hɛ mi
24Se be saii se ɔ, Felike kɛ e yo Drusila nɛ ji Yudayo ɔ ba, nɛ e ha a ya tsɛ Paulo kɛ ba, konɛ e bu Kristo nɔ hemi kɛ yemi he sane ɔ tue. 25Se benɛ e ngɛ dami kɛ he nɔ yemi kɛ kojomi nɛ maa ba a he munyu tue ɔ, Felike ye gbeye wawɛɛ, nɛ e de lɛ ke: “Yaa lolo; se ke i na ye he deka hu ɔ, ma tsɛ mo ekohu.” 26Se jamɛ a be ɔ mi nɔuu ɔ, e hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa Paulo ma ha lɛ sika konɛ e ngmɛɛ e he, kɔlɔ ɔ he nɛ e tsɛɛ lɛ kpitikpiti nɛ e kɛ lɛ ba sɛɛ ni ɔ nɛ.
27Se jeha enyɔ se ɔ, Porkio Festo ba ye Felike nane mi; nɛ akɛnɛ Felike suɔ kaa e pee nɔ́ nɛ sa Yudafo ɔmɛ a hɛ mi he je ɔ, e si Paulo ngɛ tsu ɔ mi.

Title: BƆFO 25
Content:
Paulo ngɔ e sane ɔ ngɔ ha Kaisare yemi
1Festo ba ye amlaalo, ligbi etɛ se pɛ kɛkɛ nɛ e je Kaisarea kɛ ho Yerusalem ya. 2Kɛkɛ nɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a nikɔtɔma amɛ ba po Paulo nya ha lɛ, nɛ a kpa lɛ pɛɛ, 3nɛ a bi ke e hyɛ a hɛ mi nɛ e tsɔ nɛ a ya ngɔ Paulo kɛ ba Yerusalem; ejakaa a wo e he ka konɛ a gbe lɛ ngɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ. 4Se Festo he nɔ ke, Paulo nɛ hi tsu ɔ mi ngɛ Kaisarea, se lɛ nitsɛ hu e be kɛe nɛ e maa ya lejɛ ɔ, 5he je ɔ e ke: “Nyɛ ha nyɛ nya dali ɔmɛ nɛ a kɛ mi nɛ ya lejɛ ɔ, nɛ ke sane yaya ko ngɛ nyumu ɔ he ɔ nɛ a de.”
6Nɛ benɛ e ye maa pee ligbi kpaanyɔ loo nyɔngma ngɛ a ngɔ ɔ, e pue nɔ kɛ ho Kaisarea ya, nɛ e nɔ je na a e ya hi kojomi sɛ ɔ nɔ, nɛ e fa ke a kɛ Paulo nɛ ba. 7Se benɛ e ba lejɛ ɔ, Yudafohi nɛ je Yerusalem ba a ba bɔle lɛ kɛ kpe nɛ a kɛ nya pomi sanehi fuu nɛ nya wa ba pue Paulo nɔ, se a nyɛ we nya nɛ a tsɔɔ. 8Paulo je e nya de ke: “I tɔ́ we Yudafohi a mlaa ko ɔ, jeha nɛ ɔ hu, i tɔ́ we sɔlemi we ɔ loo Kaisare nɔ.” 9Se akɛnɛ Festo suɔ kaa e pee nɔ́ nɛ sa Yudafo ɔmɛ a hɛ mi he je ɔ, e bi Paulo ke: “O suɔ kaa o ya Yerusalem nɛ ma ya kojo mo ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ngɛ kikɛmɛ a sane nɛ ɔmɛ a he lo?” 10Se Paulo ke: “Kaisare kojomi sɛ ɔ hɛ mi i daa si ngɛ nɛ ɔ nɛ, he nɛ sa kaa a kojoɔ mi ngɛ ɔ. Yudafo ɔmɛ ɔ, i tɔ́ we a ɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ o le saminya a. 11Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ke i ye sane yaya ko nɛ i pee nɔ́ ko nɛ sa gbenɔ ɔ, i kua we gbenɔ. Se ke sanehi nɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ ye nya poe ngɛ he nɛ ɔ eko eko be mi ɔ, nɔ ko be nyɛe maa ngɔ mi ngɔ wo a dɛ mi. I ngɔ ye sane ɔ ngɔ ha Kaisare yemi.” 12Kɛkɛ nɛ Festo kɛ e ga woli ɔmɛ hla mi, nɛ e ke: “Nɛ o kɛ o sane ɔ ha Kaisare yemi nɛ ɔ ɔ, Kaisare ngɔ nɔuu o maa ya.”
Paulo ngɛ Agripa kɛ Bernike hɛ mi
13Be ko se ɔ, matsɛ Agripa kɛ Bernike ba Kaisarea nɛ a ba nga Festo. 14Nɛ benɛ a ye be saii ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, Festo jaje Paulo sane ɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ matsɛ ɔ nɛ e ke: “Nyumu ko ngɛ hiɛ ɔ nɛ Felike si lɛ ngɛ tsu mi; 15benɛ i ya Yerusalem ɔ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a nikɔtɔma amɛ ba ye ngɔ kɛ e nya pomi, nɛ a kpa mi pɛɛ ke ma bu lɛ fɔ. 16I ha mɛ heto ke, e be Romabi a mlaa mi kaa a gbaa nɔ ko nɔ ngɔ haa gbenɔ, ja nɔ nɛ a po e nya a kɛ e nya poli ɔmɛ kpe hɛ mi kɛ hɛ mi nɛ nɔ ɔ na he blɔ je e nya ngɛ sane nɛ a ngɔ fɔ e nɔ ɔ he lolo. 17Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, benɛ a nya ba bua ngɛ hiɛ ɔ ɔ, i tui tslee, se je na nɔ ɔ, i ya hi kojomi sɛ ɔ nɔ, nɛ i fa ke a ngɔ nyumu ɔ kɛ ba. 18Se benɛ e nya poli ɔmɛ ba da si ɔ, a kɛ sanehi nɛ i susu ɔmɛ a kpɛti ngu kake bɛ́ ba pui e nya, 19se mohu mɛ nitsɛmɛ a Mawu jami he nguane jemi sanehi komɛ kɛ Yesu ko nɛ e gbo nɛ Paulo ma nɔ mi ke e hɛ ngɛ ɔ he sanehi a hɛɛ kɛ ba. 20Se akɛnɛ i li bɔ nɛ ma pee kɛ hla kikɛmɛ a sane nɛ ɔmɛ a mi he je ɔ, i bi lɛ ke e maa suɔ kaa e ya Yerusalem nɛ a ya ye kikɛmɛ a sane nɛ ɔ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ lo? 21Se akɛnɛ Paulo dai e sane ɔ ngɔ ha Kaisare nitsɛ yemi he je ɔ, i fa ke a ngɔ lɛ ngɔ to kɛ ya su be nɛ ma ha a ngɔ lɛ kɛ ya Kaisare ngɔ.” 22Kɛkɛ nɛ Agripa de Festo ke: “Jinɛ imi hu ma suɔ kaa ma bu nɔmlɔ ɔ tue.” Nɛ e ke: “Hwɔɔ ɔ o maa bu lɛ tue.”
23Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e nɔ je na a, benɛ Agripa kɛ Bernike mia gbegbelii kɛ ba nɛ a kɛ asafoatsɛmɛ nikɔtɔmahi kɛ ma a mi nimli ngua amɛ ba sɛ sane tue bumi he ɔ, Festo fa, nɛ a kɛ Paulo ba. 24Nɛ Festo ke: “Matsɛ Agripa, kɛ nyɛ nihi tsuo nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ wɔ ngɛ hiɛ ɔ, nyɛ ngɛ kikɛmɛ a nyumu nɛ ɔ nɛ Yudafohi asafo mluku ɔ kulaa ba kpa mi pɛɛ ngɛ Yerusalem kɛ hiɛ ɔ tsuo nɛ a kpa ngmlaa wo mi ke e sɛ́ kaa e hii je mi hu ɔ hyɛe. 25Se imi lɛɛ i na kaa e pee we nɔ́ ko nɛ sa gbenɔ, nɛ akɛnɛ lɛ nitsɛ e tu e sane ɔ ngɔ wo Kaisare dɛ mi he je ɔ, i ma nya si kaa a kɛ lɛ ya ha lɛ. 26Se i be sane tutuutu ko nɛ jinɛ ma ngma ya ha nyɔmtsɛ ɔ, lɔ ɔ he hulɔ nɛ i kɛ lɛ ba nyɛ hɛ mi, benɛ pee nɛ ke a hla sane ɔ mi ɔ, nɛ ma na nɔ́ ko ma ngma. 27Se e peɔ mi kaa e dɛ́ kaa a ngɔɔ pamino ko ngɔ maneɔ nɛ a tsɔɔ we nɔ́ nɛ a ke e pee.”

Title: BƆFO 26
Content:
Paulo je e nya ngɛ Agripa hɛ mi
1Kɛkɛ nɛ Agripa de Paulo ke: “A ngmɛ mo blɔ kaa o ja o gbi.” Kɛkɛ nɛ Paulo fɔ e nine nɛ e je e nya ke:
2“Matsɛ Agripa, e ngɔ ye nya kaa ma je ye nya mwɔnɛ ngɛ o hɛ mi, ngɛ nihi tsuo nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ kɛ ngɛ ye nya poe ɔ he. 3O le Yudafo ɔmɛ a blɔ nya ni ɔmɛ kɛ nguane jemi sane ɔmɛ kulaa mi pɛpɛɛpɛ; lɔ ɔ he ɔ i kpa mo pɛɛ nɛ o to tsui nɛ o bu mi tue.
4“Yudafo ɔmɛ tsuo le bɔ nɛ i hi si ha kɛ je ye nihe mi, bɔ nɛ i hi ye ma a mi kɛ Yerusalem ha kekle ɔ. 5Ke a suɔ kaa a maa ye he odase ɔ, a le mi sa kɛ je sisije ɔ, kaa i ba ye je mi ngɛ wa jami ɔ mi kuu nɛ ngɛ veveeve pe kulaa nya, kaa Farisifono. 6Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ, si nɛ Mawu wo wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ɔ he nɛ i daa si ngɛ hiɛ ɔ, nɛ a ngɛ mi kojoe nɔ nɛ. 7Kɔlɔ ɔ nɔ wa wetso nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ hɛ ngɛ he je nɛ a hɛɛ nyɔ kɛ pia jami nɛ nya wa a mi, benɛ pee nɛ a nine nɛ su nɔ. Matsɛ Agripa, kikɛmɛ a hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ ɔ he je nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ ngɛ ye nya poe nɛ ɔ nɛ. 8Mɛni he je mɔ nɛ nyɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ nyɛ buu kaa e be mi kaa Mawu tleɔ ni gbogboehi a si ɔ?
9“Imi nitsɛ hu e pee mi kaa e sa kaa ma pee nihi fuu nɛ ma kɛ te si ngɔ si Yesu, Nazareno ɔ biɛ ɔ. 10I na pee ja hulɔ ngɛ Yerusalem, nɛ akɛnɛ i na he blɔ kɛ je osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ a ngɔ he je ɔ, i wo ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a kpɛti nihi fuu tsu mi, nɛ ke a maa gbe mɛ ɔ, ye nya ngɛ mi eko. 11Nɛ i pɔɔ mɛ yi mi wami ngɛ kpe he ɔmɛ kulaa, nɛ i waa mɛ yi mi kaa a tu musu bɔmi munyuhi, nɛ i nuu a he godo wawɛɛ nitsɛ, nɛ i waa mɛ yi mi kɛ yaa ma se mahi a mi tete.
Paul sɛɛ e tsakemi ɔ
12“Enɛ ɔ nɔ nɔuu i nyɛɛ nɛ i hia blɔ kɛ yaa Damasko ngɛ osɔfo nikɔtɔma amɛ a he wami blɔ ngmɛmi nya. 13Nɛ piani katakata, benɛ i nyɛɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ ɔ, matsɛ, i na la ko nɛ ngɛ kpɛe pe pu je hiɔwe ba bɔle mi kɛ nihi nɛ kɛ mi nyɛɛ ɔ. 14Nɛ benɛ wɔ tsuo wa ya nɔ si ɔ, i nu gbi ko nɛ kɛ mi tu munyu ngɛ Hebri gbi mi ke: ‘Saul, Saul, Mɛni he je o ngɛ mi yi mi wae? E wa ha mo kaa o maa hia nazi ngɔ si lohwehi a kpakami tso nya dade ɔ.’ 15Nɛ i ke: ‘Mo mɛnɔ ʼi, Nyɔmtsɛ?’ Nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ke: ‘Imi Yesu nɛ o ngɛ lɛ yi mi wae ɔ ʼi. 16Tee si nɛ o da o nane nɔ; enɛ ɔ he nɛ i je ye he kpo tsɔɔ mo nɛ ɔ nɛ, konɛ ma pee mo sɔmɔlɔ kɛ odase yelɔ ngɛ nihi nɛ o na kɛ nihi nɛ ma je ye he kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ mo ngɛ he ɔmɛ a he. 17Ma je mo kɛ maa je ma a kɛ majemajeli nɛ i ngɛ mo a ngɔ tsɔe ɔ a dɛ mi, 18nɛ o ya bli a hɛngmɛ komɛ a kpale kɛ je diblii mi kɛ ba la he, kɛ je abosiami he wami mi kɛ ba Mawu ngɔ, nɛ a na a he yayami pami kɛ gbo si ni ngɛ nihi nɛ a kɛ ye nɔ hemi kɛ yemi pee mɛ klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a kpɛti.’ ”
Paulo sɛɛ e nitsumi he ni
19“Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, Matsɛ Agripa, i gbo we kikɛmɛ a hiɔwe kpo jemi nɛ ɔ nɔ tue; 20se mohu i jaje ngɔ tsɔɔni hi nɛ ngɛ Damasko ɔ kekle, kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ Yerusalem kɛ Yudea zugba a nɔ kulaa, kɛ majeli ɔmɛ hulɔ, ke a tsake a tsui nɛ a kpale kɛ ba Mawu ngɔ nɛ a tsu nihi nɛ sa tsui tsakemi. 21Enɛ ɔmɛ a he je nɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ nu mi ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, nɛ a ka mi gbemi ɔ nɛ. 22Se Mawu yemi kɛ buami nya i kɛ daa si kɛ ba su mwɔnɛ ligbi nɛ ɔ nɔ, nɛ i ngɛ odase yee kɛ ngɛ nimli tsɔwi kɛ nimli nguahi tsɔɔe nɛ ɔ nɛ. I tu we munyu ko kaa ja nihi nɛ gbali ɔmɛ kɛ Mose hu de ke a maa ba a, 23kaa Kristo ɔ maa na amanehlu, nɛ e ba plɛ kekleekle nɔ ngɛ ni gbogboehi a sitemi ɔ mi, nɛ e ba jaje la a he sane ngɔ tsɔɔ ma a kɛ majeli ɔmɛ.”
24Benɛ Paulo je e nya kikɛ ɔ, Festo de kɛ gbi wawɛɛ ke: “Paulo, godo o ngɛ nue nɛ ɔ! Womi kasemi sɔuu lɛ ha o ngɛ godo nue nɛ ɔ nɛ.” 25Se Paulo ke: “I nui godo, wa nɔmo Festo, se anɔkuale kɛ hɛ si kami munyu i ngɛ tue nɛ ɔ nɛ. 26Matsɛ ɔ nɛ i ngɛ munyu tue kɛ kã kɛ ngɛ lɛ tsɔɔe nɛ ɔ le sane nɛ ɔmɛ a mi. I kpa we si kaa ni nɛ ɔmɛ eko ngɛ nɛ a kɛ laa lɛ; ejakaa tsa pi laami mi nɛ a pee enɛ ɔ ngɛ. 27Tse o heɔ gbali ɔmɛ yeɔ, Matsɛ Agripa? I le kaa o heɔ yeɔ.” 28Agripa de Paulo ke: “Piɛ bɔɔ nɛ o ko ha ye yi mi plɛ nɛ i pee Kristofono.” 29Se Paulo ke: “I na nɛ jinɛ Mawu ha ba mi kaa, e piɛ bɔɔ jio, e piɛ fuu jio, pi mo o nɔ kake kɛkɛ, se mohu nihi kulaa nɛ ngɛ mi tue bue mwɔnɛ nɛ ɔ hu ko plɛ kaa i mi, se pã nɛ ɔmɛ eko kɛkɛ nɛ a ko ka mɛ.”
30Nɛ benɛ e de kikɛ ɔ, matsɛ ɔ kɛ amlaalo ɔ kɛ Bernike kɛ nihi nɛ kɛ mɛ hii si ɔ te si, 31nɛ a ya se, nɛ a ya da, nɛ a ke: “Nyumu nɔ pee we nɔ́ ko nɛ sa gbenɔ loo tsu mi womi.” 32Nɛ Agripa de Festo ke: “Kaa nyumu nɛ ɔ ngɔɛ e sane ɔ ngɔ ha we Kaisare yemi jinɛ, a ma nyɛ e he maa ngmɛɛ.”

Title: BƆFO 27
Content:
Paulo Roma yami
1Bɛnɛ a ma nya si kaa wa maa ya Italia a, a ngɔ Paulo kɛ pamitsɛmɛ kpa komɛ hu ngɔ wo asafoatsɛ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Yulio nɛ je Agusto ta asafo ɔ mi ɔ dɛ mi. 2Benɛ wa sɛ Adramitio lɛ ko nɛ maa hia kɛ ya gu Asia wo nya ma amɛ a nɔ ɔ mi ɔ, wa hia, nɛ Aristarko, Makedonia no ko nɛ je Tesalonika a piɛ wa he. 3Nɛ e nɔ je na a, wa ya da Zidon, nɛ akɛnɛ Yulio hɛɛ Paulo dɔdɔɔdɔ he je ɔ, e ngmɛ lɛ blɔ ke e ya jɔɔ e he. 4Nɛ wa hia ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, wa tsɔ Kipro zugba nɛ wo bɔle lɛ ɔ he, ejakaa wa ngɛ kɔɔhiɔ kpee. 5Nɛ benɛ wa po Kilikia kɛ Pamfilia wo ɔ, wa ba da Mira ngɛ Likia. 6Asafoatsɛ ɔ na Aleksandria lɛ ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ yaa Italia, nɛ e je wɔ ngɔ wo mi.
7Wa nyɛɛ blɛoo be saii, nɛ beble loko wa su Knido hanɔ, nɛ akɛnɛ kɔɔhiɔ ɔ ngmɛ́ wɔ blɔ he je ɔ, wa tsɔ Kreta he kɛ ba Salmone. 8Nɛ beble loko wa po mi ngɛ lejɛ ɔ kɛ ba he ko nɛ a tsɛɛ Lɛsimuɔmi he kpakpa nɛ kɛ Lasea ma a he kɛ we ɔ. 9Se jeha nɛ ɔ, benɛ wa puɛ be fuu nɛ wo hɛ mi nyɛɛmi ɔ hu pee dengme, ejakaa hwɔhami be ɔ be mo he je ɔ, Paulo wo mɛ ga. 10E ke: “Tsaatsɛmɛ, i na kaa dengme gbomi kɛ nihi a hɛ mi kpatami babauu maa ba blɔ hiami nɛ ɔ mi, pi lɛ mi ni ɔmɛ kɛ lɛ ɔ kɛkɛ, se mohu wa wami nitsɛ hulɔ.” 11Se asafoatsɛ ɔ heɔ kudɔɔtsɛ ɔ kɛ lɛtsɛ ɔ yeɔ pe munyu nɛ Paulo ngɛ tue ɔ. 12Se akɛnɛ lɛ si muɔmi he ɔ hi saminya bɔ nɛ a ma nyɛ maa ye fiɛ be ɔ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ he je ɔ, a ti nihi fuu wo ga ke a hia kɛ je lejɛ ɔ nɛ a hyɛ kaa a ma nyɛ su Foinike nɛ ji Kreta lɛ si muɔmi he nɛ ngɛ leneyi-bonyoku kɛ omleyi-bonyoku kpɛti ɔ lo, konɛ a ya ye fiɛ be ɔ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ.
Wo nɔ kɔɔhiɔ ngua
13Nɛ benɛ leneyi kɔɔhiɔ bɔni fiami blɛoo ɔ, e pee mɛ kaa nɔ́ nɛ a ngɛ hlae ɔ ba mi, nɛ a hia kɛ be ngɛ Kreta he tataata. 14Se e kɛ we kɛkɛ nɛ wo nɔ kɔɔhiɔ ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ omleyi-beleku kɔɔhiɔ ɔ hia kɛ ba kpee mɛ. 15Se benɛ kɔɔhiɔ ɔ sɛ lɛ ɔ mi nɛ e nyɛ we nya dami hu ɔ, wa ngmɛɛ he nɛ e fɔ nɔ. 16Nɛ benɛ wa sa fo kɛ tsɔ zugba kpɔ nyafii ko nɛ wo bɔle lɛ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Klaudia, kɔɔhiɔ ya he ɔ he ɔ, dengme kɛ pɔtɔ loko wa nyɛ boto ɔ nu. 17Nɛ benɛ a wo boto ɔ nɔ ɔ, a kɛ kpahi fi lɛ, nɛ akɛnɛ a ngɛ gbeye yee kaa alinɔ a ma ya nɔ zia mɔsɔ (Sirti) ɔ mi he je ɔ, a gbe abalaa a, nɛ a fɔ́ nɔ kɛkɛ. 18Nɛ akɛnɛ wo nɔ kɔɔhiɔ ɔ ngɛ wɔ fiae basabasa wawɛɛ he je ɔ, je na nɔ ɔ, a je lɛ ɔ mi ni ɔmɛ eko ngɔ pue he. 19Nɛ ligbi nɛ ji ligbi etɛ ɔ waa kɛ wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa ninehi je lɛ ɔ he ni ɔmɛ ngɔ pue he. 20Akɛnɛ wa nɛ́ pu loo dodoehi ligbihi fuu, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu kɔɔhiɔ ɔ nɛ ngɛ fiae ngɛ wɔ kpee ɔ nya wa wawɛɛ he je ɔ, jeha nɛ ɔ wa hɛ̃ bé nɔ kaa wa maa yɛ.
21Se benɛ a yi ni be saii ɔ, Paulo te si da a kpɛti nɛ e ke: “Tsaatsɛmɛ, jinɛ e sa kaa nyɛ buɔ mi tue nɛ a ko hia ngɛ Kreta nɛ a ba na kikɛmɛ a dengme kɛ nihi a hɛ mi kpatami nɛ ɔ. 22Jeha nɛ ɔ hu i ngɛ nyɛ ga woe ke nyɛ na tsui; ejakaa nyɛ ti nɔ ko yi be tae, ja lɛ ɔ kɛkɛ. 23Ejakaa nyɔ nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, Mawu nɔ nɔ́ nɛ i ji kɛ nɔ hu nɛ i sɔmɔɔ ɔ bɔfo ba da ye kasa nya, 24nɛ e ke: ‘Koo ye gbeye, Paulo! Ja a kɛ mo ya da Kaisare hɛ mi kɛ̃. Nɛ oʼɛ, Mawu ngɔ nihi kulaa nɛ kɛ mo nyɛɛ lɛ ɔ mi ɔ ngɔ ke mo.’ 25Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ na tsui, tsaatsɛmɛ, ejakaa i heɔ Mawu yeɔ kaa bɔ nɛ a ba de mi ɔ, ja nɛ e maa ba mi. 26Se bɔ tsuaa bɔ nɛ pee ɔ, wa ma ya sa si ngɛ zugba kpɔ nɛ wo bɔle lɛ ko nɔ kɛ.”
27Se benɛ nyɔ nɛ ji nyɔngma kɛ eywiɛ ɔ su, nɛ wa ngɛ kpakae kɛ ngɛ yae kɛ ngɛ bae ngɛ Adria wo ɔ nɔ, maa pee nyɔ mi kpɛti ɔ, lɛ mi nitsuli ɔmɛ susu kaa a su zugba ko he. 28A fɔ kalemi kpa, nɛ a na gugue nyingmi enyɔ; nɛ benɛ a ya a hɛ mi bɔɔ ɔ, a f ɔ ekohu, nɛ a na gugue nyɔngma kɛ enuɔ. 29Kɛkɛ nɛ a ye gbeye kaa alinɔ wa ma ya nɔ tɛ sahi a nɔ, nɛ a fɔ osɛkɛhi eywiɛ ngɛ lɛ ɔ se je, a kɛ ngɛ je nami mlɛe. 30Se benɛ lɛ mi nitsuli ɔmɛ ngɛ hlae nɛ a tu fo kɛ je lɛ ɔ mi ɔ, a bua nɛ a si boto ɔ ngɔ ma wo ɔ hɛ kaa nɔ́ nɛ pe a yaa fɔ́ osɛkɛhi ngɛ lɛ ɔ yi je. 31Kɛkɛ nɛ Paulo de asafoatsɛ ɔ kɛ aslaafo ɔmɛ ke: “Ke ni nɛ ɔmɛ je lɛ ɔ mi ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ yi be wami nae.” 32Kɛkɛ nɛ aslaafo ɔmɛ po boto ɔ he kpa amɛ, na a ha e ya nɔ si.
33Kɛ ma je nami mi ɔ, Paulo kpa mɛ tsuo pɛɛ ke a ye nɔ́ ko, nɛ e ke: “Mwɔnɛ ji ligbi nyɔngma kɛ eywiɛ sɔuu nɛ nyɛ yi ni, nɛ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko yɛ nyɛ nya mi. 34Lɔ ɔ he ɔ i kpa nyɛ pɛɛ nɛ nyɛɛ ye ni; ejakaa lɔ ɔ lɛ ma ha nyɛ yi ma na wa, ejakaa nyɛ ti nɔ ko nɔ ko yi bwɔmi kake be e yi mi jee ngɔ nɔ si.” 35Nɛ benɛ e de jã a e kɛ̃ loo e wo abolo nɛ e na Mawu si ngɛ mɛ kulaa a hɛ mi, nɛ e ku mi nɛ e bɔni yemi. 36Kɛkɛ nɛ mɛ kulaa a na tsui, nɛ mɛ hu a ye ni. 37Wɔ kula ngɛ lɛ ɔ mi ɔ wa nya suu nimli lafa enyɔ kɛ nyingmi kpaago kɛ ekpa. 38Se benɛ a ye ni nɛ a tɔ ɔ, a sake blɛfo nɛ a wo ɔ ngɔ pue wo ɔ mi, nɛ a ha lɛ ɔ pee huyɛhuyɛ.
Lɛ ɔ butumi
39Nɛ benɛ je na a, a li zugba a, se a na wo nya kɔkɔɔmi he ko kɛ e nya zia, nɛ a to a yi mi kaa, ke a ma nyɛ ɔ, a ma ha lɛ ɔ ya sa si ngɛ lejɛ ɔ. 40Lɔ ɔ he ɔ a po osɛkɛ ɔmɛ ngɔ wo wo ɔ mi, nɛ a pɛne kudɔɔ ɔ he kpa amɛ hulɔ, nɛ a wo kpɛti a balaa a kɛ kpee kɔɔhiɔ nɛ ngɛ fiae ɔ, nɛ a plɛ lɛ ɔ yi ngɔ ha wo nya blɔ. 41Se akɛnɛ a ya nɔ wo enyɔ kpe he he je ɔ, a kɛ lɛ ɔ ya sa si; e yi je ɔ ya hɛ si kpɛii, se e supa a, oslɔke ɔmɛ a nyawami ɔ ywia lɛ. 42Aslaafo ɔmɛ a yi mi tomi ji kaa a maa gbe pamitsɛmɛ ɔmɛ konɛ a ti nɔ ko nɛ ko sle kɛ ho nɛ e ba tu fo. 43Se akɛnɛ asafoatsɛ ɔ ngɛ hlae nɛ e he Paulo yi wami he je ɔ, e tsi a yi mi tomi ɔ nya, nɛ e fa ke ninɛmɛ nɛ le slemi ɔ kekle a tu ngɔ pue wo ɔ mi, nɛ a ya nu kpo; 44se ninɛmɛ nɛ piɛ ɔ a ti ni komɛ a bu gbegbelihi a nɔ. Bɔ nɛ pee nɛ Tnɛ kulaa a nu kpo sɔkee ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ.

Title: BƆFO 28
Content:
Paulo ngɛ Melita
1Nɛ benɛ wa je mi sɔkee ɔ loko wa ba le kaa zugba kpɔ nɛ wo bɔle lɛ ɔ biɛ ji Melita. 2Lejɛ ɔ tsɛmɛ pee wɔ kpakpa babauu; ejakaa a slɛ la nɛ a he wɔ tsuo kulaa kɛ hɛmuɔ ngɛ hiɔmi nɛmi babauu kɛ fiɛ ɔ he. 3Se benɛ Paulo bua lɛ tsɔwi nya nɛ e kɛ yaa wo la a mi ɔ, sinɔ ko je la gligli ɔ mi mla e nine he. 4Se benɛ lejɛ ɔ tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ na lohwe ɔ nɛ mla Paulo nine he ɔ, a de a he ke: “Bɔ tsuaa bɔ nɛ pee ɔ, kikɛmɛ a nyumu nɛ ɔ awiyelɔ ji lɛ, nɛ a he e yi wami kɛ je wo ɔ mi lɛɛ, se lueyemi ngmɛ́ lɛ blɔ nɛ e yi nɛ na wa.” 5Se Paulo huanya lohwe ɔ ngɔ wo la a mi, nɛ e yi lɛ awi ko. 6Se a hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa e maa fuu loo e maa fia si gbo tlukaa. Se benɛ a hyɛ blɔ hluu nɛ a na kaa nɔ́ ko slɔɔto ko pee we lɛ ɔ, a tsake a juɛmi nɛ a ke mawu ko ji lɛ.
7Jeha nɛ ɔ zugba kpɔ nɛ wo bɔle lɛ ɔ nɔ nɔkɔtɔma nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Publio ɔ ngɛ a bɔɔ ko ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi. Lɛ lɛ e he wɔ kɛ hɛmuɔ nɛ e kɛ tsui mi jɔmi pee wɔ nibwɔ ligbi etɛ sɔuu. 8Se e ba mi kaa asla kɛ muklii mi pa nu Publio tsɛ kɛ fɔɔ si. Paulo ya e ngɔ, nɛ e sɔle nɛ e ngɔ e ninehi ngɔ pue e nɔ nɛ e tsa lɛ. 9Jeha nɛ ɔ benɛ a pee enɛ ɔ ɔ, ni kpa komɛ hu nɛ ngɛ gboe ngɛ zugba kpɔ nɛ wo bɔle lɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ ba, nɛ a tsa mɛ. 10Nɛ mɛ hu a wo wa hɛ mi nyami babauu, nɛ benɛ wa hia kɛ je lejɛ ɔ, a ha wɔ nihi nɛ hia wɔ.
Paulo je Melita kɛ ya Roma
11Hlami etɛ se ɔ wa ya sɛ Aleksandria lɛ ko nɛ e he so ji Dioskurioi (aloo hawi) nɛ ba ye fiɛ be ɔ ngɛ zugba kpɔ nɛ wo bɔle lɛ ɔnɔ ɔ mi, nɛ wa hia kɛ ho. 12Nɛ benɛ wa ya da si ngɛ Sirakusa a, wa hi lejɛ ɔ ligbi etɛ. 13Nɛ wa je lejɛ ɔ, wa lɔgɔ si kɛ ba Regio; nɛ je na nɔ ɔ, benɛ leneyi kɔɔhiɔ ɔ ba fia a, wa pue nɔ, nɛ ligbi nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ wa su Putueli. 14Wa ba na nyɛmimɛ komɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ. A kpa wɔ pɛɛ ke waa kɛ mɛ nɛ hi si ligbi kpaago. Kɛkɛ nɛ wa ba su Roma. 15Nɛ benɛ nyɛmimɛ nɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nu wa he ɔ, a ba kpee wɔ ngɛ Apiiforo kɛ Tretaberna. Benɛ Paulo na mɛ ɔ e na Mawu si nɛ e na tsui.
Paulo ngɛ Roma
16Benɛ wa ba su Roma a, asafoatsɛ ɔ je pamitsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ngɔ ha asafoatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a, se Paulo lɛɛ, a ngmɛ lɛ blɔ kaa e hi he nɛ e suɔ, se aslaafono ko buu e he. 17Nɛ e ba mi kaa ligbi etɛ se ɔ Paulo ha a tsɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a nikɔtɔmahi nɛ ngɛ ɔ kɛ ba kpe; nɛ benɛ a nya ba bua a, e de mɛ ke: “Tsaatsɛmɛ kɛ mamimɛ, i tɔ̃ we ma a loo wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ blɔ nya ni ɔmɛ a nɔ, kɛ̃ ɔ, a ngɔ mi ngɔ wo Romabi ɔmɛ a dɛ mi ngɛ Yerusalem kaa pamino. 18Benɛ a hla ye sane ɔ mi ɔ, a suɔ kaa a ngmɛɛ ye he, ejakaa gbenɔ sane ko be ye he kulaa. 19Se akɛnɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ kplɛɛ we he je ɔ, e fi mi kaa ma ngɔ ye sane ɔ ngɔ ha Kaisare yemi, se pi kaa i ngɛ nɔ́ ko nɛ i kɛ maa po yema a nya. 20Jeha nɛ ɔ kikɛmɛ a sane nɛ ɔ he je nɛ i tsɛ nyɛ kɛ ba, konɛ ma na nyɛ nɛ ma kɛ nyɛ nɛ tu munyu; ejakaa Israel hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ɔ he je nɛ a wo mi kikɛmɛ a kɔsɔkɔsɔ nɛ ɔ nɛ.” 21Nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Wɔɔ lɛɛ wa na we womi komɛ kɛ ji Yudea ngɛ o he, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ a ti nɔ ko bɛ́ hiɛ ɔ ba sɛɛ we o he sane ko aloo o he munyu yaya ko. 22Se wa suɔ kaa wa maa bu o juɛmi ɔ tue; ejakaa kikɛmɛ a kuu nɛ ɔ wa le kaa a tuɔ e he munyu yaya ngɛ he tsuaa he.”
23Nɛ benɛ a to lɛ ligbi ɔ, a ti nihi fuu ba e ngɔ ngɛ e to he ɔ, nɛ e jaje Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ he sane ɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ mɛ, nɛ e ye he odase faii, nɛ e je Mose Mlaa a kɛ gbali ɔmɛ a mi hla konɛ a yi mi nɛ plɛ̃ kɛ ba Yesu blɔfami kɛ je mɔtu kɛ ya su gbɔkuɛ. 24Ni komɛ he e munyuhi nɛ e tu ɔmɛ ye, se ni komɛ hu he we yi. 25Nɛ akɛnɛ a nya ya pee we kake he je ɔ, a je benɛ Paulo tu nyagbe munyu kake nɛ ɔ: “Niinɛ nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu de ngɛ gbalɔ Yesaia nya tsɔɔ wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ke:
26‘‘Yaa ma nɔ ngɔ nɛ o ya de ke:
Numi ɔ nyɛ maa nu lɛɛ, se nyɛ be sisi nue,
Nɛ nami ɔ nyɛ maa na lɛɛ, se nyɛ be se kɔe.
27Ejakaa ma nɛ ɔ tsui ti,
Nɛ a tue wa kɛ nɔ numi,
Nɛ a mia a hɛngmɛ
Konɛ a ko na kɛ a hɛngmɛ
Nɛ a ko nu kɛ a tue,
Nɛ a tsui hu ko na sisi,
Nɛ a kpale nɛ i tsa mɛ.’
28“Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ na nyɛɛ le kaa, a tsɔ nɛ a kɛ Mawu Yi wami hemi sane ɔ ya ha majeli ɔmɛ, nɛ mɛɛ lɛɛ a maa bu tue hulɔ.” [ 29Nɛ benɛ Paulo tu munyu nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ Yudafo ɔmɛ je, nɛ a je nɔ babauu ngɛ a kpɛti.]
30Nɛ Paulo hi we nɛ a ba ha lɛ ɔ mi jeha mluku enyɔ, nɛ e heɔ nihi kulaa nɛ baa e ngɔ ɔ, 31nɛ e fiɛɔ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ he sane ɔ, nɛ e kɛ kã babauu jajeɔ Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo he sane ɔmɛ tsɔɔ mɛ, nɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko tsi lɛ blɔ.

Title: ROMABI 1
Content:
1Womi nɛ ɔ je Paulo, nɛ ji Yesu Kristo sɔmɔlɔ kɛ bɔfo nɛ a tsɛ lɛ nɛ a je lɛ ngɔ to kɛ ha Sane Kpakpa a fiɛmi ɔ ngɔ. 2Sane Kpakpa nɛ ɔ ɔ, Mawu wo he si ngɔ to momo kɛ gu e gbali ɔmɛ a nɔ ngɛ Ngmami Klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a mi. 3Sane nɛ ɔ kɔɔ e Bi ɔ, nɔ nɛ a je David nina mi fɔ lɛ ngɛ he lo blɔfami ɔ he, 4nɔ nɛ ngɛ he tsɔmi mumi ɔ nya a, a gu ni gbogboehi a si temi nɔ je lɛ tsɔɔ ngɛ he wami mi kaa Mawu bi, Yesu Kristo, wa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ. 5E nɔ i gu nɛ i na dloomi kɛ bɔfo ni tsumi ɔ kone ma ha majemaje ɔ kulaa nɛ bu hemi kɛ yemi ɔ tue, ngɛ e biɛ ɔ he: 6nihi a kpɛti nɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ ngɛ, nyɛ nihi nɛ a tsɛ nyɛ nɛ nyɛ ba pee Yesu Kristo nihi ɔ.
7I ngɛ enɛ ɔ ngmae ya ha nihi nɛ Mawu suɔ nɛ ji ni klɔuklɔuhi nɛ a tsɛ mɛ nɛ a ngɛ Roma a kulaa:
Dloomi kɛ hejɔmi nɛ je wa tsɛ Mawu ɔ kɛ Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu dɛ mi ɔ ha nyɛ!
Sina sɔlemi
8Kekleekle ɔ, i ngɛ Yesu Kristo nɔ gue kɛ ngɛ ye Mawu ɔ si nae ngɛ nyɛ kulaa nyɛ he, ejakaa a gbaa nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ he sane ngɛ je ɔ mi tsuo. 9Ye dase ji Mawu, nɔ nɛ i sɔmɔɔ ngɛ ye mumi mi ngɛ e Bi ɔ Sane Kpakpa a mi ɔ, kaa i jɔɔ we nyɛ kaimi ligbi ko ligbi ko. 10I kpaa pɛɛ daa ngɛ ye sɔlemihi a mi, kaa alinɔ Mawu suɔmi nya a, hwɔɔ se ko ɔ, blɔ ma bli ha mi nɛ ma ba nyɛ ngɔ lo. 11Ejakaa ye hɛ ngɛ jae ngɛ nyɛ he, konɛ ikɛ mumi mi dloomi nike ni ɔ eko ba ha nyɛ, bene pee nɛ a kɛ wo nyɛ he wami. 12Lɔ ɔ ji kaa, konɛ a wo i kɛ nyɛ tsuo he wami ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ ngɛ i kɛ nyɛ tsuo wa mi ɔ mi.
