13Se mamimɛ, i suɔ kaa nyɛɛ le kaa i pɔɔ ye yi mi tomi kaa ma ba nyɛ ngɔ kone ma ba na yiblii komɛ ngɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ kpɛti, kaa bɔ nɛ i na ke je majeli kpa amɛ a kpɛti ɔ, se a tsi ye nya kɛ ba ta piɔ. 14I hɛɛ Helabi kɛ nihi nɛ a pi Helabi, ni leli kɛ nihi nɛ a li ni kulaa hiɔ. 15Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ke ka ye nɔ kake ye he ɔ, i ko suɔ kaa nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ Roma a hulɔ ɔ, ma ba fiɛ Sane Kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ.
Sane Kpakpa a hewami
16Ejakaa Kristo Sane Kpakpa a he zo pee we mi, mɛni he je ɔ, e ji Mawu he wami nɛ a kɛ heɔ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ heɔ yeɔ ɔ yi wami, Yuda no kekle kɛ Hela no hulɔ. 17Ejakaa kɔlɔ ɔ mi a jeɔ Mawu dami kpo ngɛ, kɛ jee hemi kɛ yemi mi kɛ yaa hemi kɛ yemi mi; kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma ke: “Dalɔ nɛ guu hemi kɛ yemi nɔ ɔ yi ma na wa.”
Adesahi a fɔyemi
18Ejakaa a jeɔ Mawu mi mi fumi kpo kɛ jee hiɔwe kɛ baa nimli nɛ kɛ ni yayamihi kɛ musu bɔmi tsiɔ anɔkuale ɔ blɔ ɔ kulaa nɔ, 19ejakaa Mawu he nihi nɛ a ma nyɛ le ɔ jee kpo paa ngɛ a mi, ejakaa Mawu je tsɔɔ mɛ paa. 20Mɛni he je ɔ, e he nihi nɛ a nɛ́ nɛ ji e neneene hewami kɛ e Mawu nɛ e ji ɔ kulaa a, kɛ je adebɔ sisije lokoo ɔ, a guu e nihi nɛ e pee ɔmɛ a nɔ yɔseɔ nɛ a naa paa, lɔ ɔ he ɔ, a be nya jemi ko. 21A le Mawu lɛɛ, se a wui e hɛ mi nyami kaa Mawu nɛ a nɛ lɛ si hulɔ, se a epe posoposo ngɛ a juɛmihi a mi, nɛ a tsui nɛ kɔ we sane se ɔ mi wo diblii. 22A tsɛɛ a he ni leli, se a plɛ kuasiahi. 23Mawu nɛ puɛ we ɔ hɛ mi nyami ɔ a tsake ngɔ ha nɔmlɔ nɛ puɛɛ ɔ subai henɔ ko kɛ lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ kɛ lohwe nane eywiɛ eywiɛtsɛmɛ kɛ waami nihi anɔ. 24Akɛnɛ kuasiahi ji mɛ he je ɔ Mawu ngmɛɛ a he ngɛ a kɔnɔhi nɛ ngɛ tai ɔ mi, nɛ a kɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a he peɔ zo nihi. 25A ngɔɔ Mawu anɔkuale ɔ kɛ tsakee lakpa, nɛ a jaa nɛ a sɔmɔɔ nɔ nɛ Mawu bɔ ɔ pe Bɔlɔ ɔ, nɔ nɛ a gbaa kɛ yaa neneene ɔ! Amen.
26Enɛ ɔ he je nɛ Mawu ngmɛɛ a he ngɔ ha zo nihi a he hɛdɔmi ɔ nɛ; ejakaa nɔ nɛ a to nɛ a peɔ ɔ, a yi ɔmɛ tsake hɛ mi ngɔ ha nɔ nɛ a pee we. 27Nɛ ja nɔuu a nyumu ɔmɛ hu jɔɔ yo he nɔ nɛ a to nɛ a peɔ ɔ peemi nɛ a hɛ dɔɔ ngɛ a kɔnɔ yayami ɔ mi kɛ nyɛɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a se, nɛ nyumuhi kɛ nyumuhi tsuɔ zo ni, nɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ a na a tɔmi ɔ he hiɔwo nɛ sa ngɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a he.
28Nɛ kaa bɔ nɛ a bui kaa e sa kaa a leɔ Mawu ngɛ a ni lemi mi ɔ, Mawu hu ngmɛɛ a he ha juɛmi nɛ sɛ, konɛ a pee nihi nɛ sɛ. 29A hyi tɔ kɛ ni yayamihi, yiwitso, hɛ tsumi, yayami; a hyi tɔ kɛ nyɛmi, awi yemi, pɛ, sisimi, nihi a he munyu tumi; 30sieku yeli, Mawu nyɛli, nɔ buili, he tsɔɔli, fiali, nɔ́ yayami he ga tsɔli, fɔli a nɔ tue gboli, 31nihi nɛ be yi mi, kutupɔtsɛmɛ, nihi nɛ nɛ mɔbɔ; 32nihi nɛ le Mawu mlaa a tutuutu, kaa nihi nɛ tsuɔ lɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, a sa gbenɔ, nɛ kɛ ɔ pi peemi kɛkɛ nɛ a peɔ, se mohu a naa ni nɛ tsuɔ jamɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he tsui hulɔ.

Title: ROMABI 2
Content:
Mawu kojomi
1Lɔ ɔ he ɔ mo, nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ o kojoɔ ɔ, o be nya jemi ko; ejakaa nɔ he nɛ o kojoɔ nɔ kpa ngɛ ɔ, o kɛ buu mo nitsɛ o he fɔ; ejakaa mo nɛ o kojoɔ nihi ɔ, jamɛ a ni ɔmɛ nɔuu o tsuɔ. 2Wa le kaa Mawu fɔ bumi ɔ sa nihi nɛ tsuɔ jamɛ a ni ɔmɛ pɛ. 3Se mo nɔmlɔ nɛ o kojoɔ nihi nɛ tsuɔ jamɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ o peɔ ja nɔuu ɔ, anɛ o susuu kaa moo lɛɛ o he maa je Mawu kojomi ɔ mi lo? 4Aloo pe o ngɛ e mi mi himi kɛ e nɔ he tsui nami kɛ e tsui si tomi babauu ɔ he guɛ gbee, se o li kaa Mawu mi mi jɔmi ɔ pe e ngɛ o he piɛe nɛ o pia o he lo? 5Se o kɛ o tsui wami kɛ o he nɛ o pia we ɔ ngɛ mi mi fumi nyɛ buae ngɔ ha mo nitsɛ o he ngɔ to mi mi fumi kɛ Mawu dami kojomi kpo jemi ligbi ɔ. 6Ejakaa e maa wo nɔ tsuaa nɔ hiɔ bɔ nɛ sa e ni tsumi ɔmɛ: 7Nihi nɛ kɛ kpakpa peemi kɛ tsui si tomi hlaa hɛ mi nyami kɛ bu kɛ si himi nɛ puɛ we ɔ, Mawu ma ha mɛ neneene wami. 8Se nihi nɛ suɔ pɛ nɛ a bui anɔkuale ɔ tue, se a buɔ ni yayahi mohu tue ɔ, a nɔ ji mi mi fumi kɛ mi mi la. 9Dengme kɛ he hiami maa ba nɔmlɔ tsuaa nɔmlɔ nɛ tsuɔ ni yaya nɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ, Yuda no nɔ kekle kɛ Hela no hu nɔ. 10Se hɛ mi nyami kɛ bu kɛ he jɔmi maa ba nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ tsuɔ ni kpakpahi ɔ nɔ, Yuda no kekle kɛ Hela no hulɔ. 11Ejakaa Mawu hlɛ nimli a mi.
12Ejakaa nihi abɔ nɛ be Mlaa nɛ a pee yayami ɔ, a maa laa hulɔ nɛ a be mlaa; nɛ nihi abɔ nɛ gu mlaa a nɔ pee yayami ɔ, Mlaa a nɔuu a kɛ maa kojo mɛ. 13Ejakaa pi mlaa nuli ɔmɛ ji dali ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi, se mlaa nɔ yeli mohu ji ninɛmɛ nɛ a maa bu kaa dali. 14Ejakaa, ke maje li a bimɛ nɛ be mlaa a kɛ a fɔmi mi su ɔ tsuɔ Mlaa a nya ni ɔ, mɛ nihi nɛ a be mlaa a, a ji mlaa ha mɛ nitsɛmɛ a he; 15kɔlɔ ɔ a kɛ tsɔɔ kaa a ngma Mlaa a ni tsumi ɔ ngɛ a tsui mi, nɛ a he nile hu yeɔ odase, nɛ a susumi ɔmɛ poo a nya aloo a jeɔ a nya 16ngɛ ligbi nɛ Mawu maa gu Yesu Kristo nɔ kɛ kojo nimli a laami mi ni ɔmɛ ngɛ ye Sane Kpakpa a nya a.
Yudafo ɔmɛ kɛ Mlaa a
17Se ke moo lɛɛ a tsɛɛ mo Yuda no, nɛ o hɛ ngɛ Mlaa a nɔ, nɛ o fiaa fɔɔ Mawu nɔ, 18nɛ o le e suɔmi nya ni ɔmɛ, nɛ o le nihi nɛ hi, ejakaa a je Mlaa a mi kɛ tsɔɔ mo, 19nɛ o buu o he kaa o ji hɛ yuyuili a blɔ tsɔɔlɔ kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ diblii mi ɔmɛ a la, 20kɛ nihi nɛ li ni a tsɔselɔ, kɛ bimwɔwi a tsɔɔlɔ, nɔ nɛ hɛɛ nile kɛ anɔkuale nɛ ngɛ Mlaa a mi ɔ su ɔ, 21jeha nɛ ɔ mo nɛ o tsɔɔ ni kpahi a ni ɔ, o tsɔɔ we mo nitsɛ o he lo? O fiɛɔ ke “a ko ju,” se o ju we lo? 22O deɔ ke “a ko bɔ ajuama,” se o bɔɛ ajuama lo? O nyɛɛ amagahi, se o ju we a sɔlemi we nihi lo? 23Mo nɛ o kɛ Mlaa a fia a, o kɛ Mlaa a nɔ tɔmi ɔ gbee Mawu he guɛ. 24Ejakaa nyɛ he ɔ, a tuɔ Mawu biɛ ɔ he musu bɔmi munyuhi ngɛ majeli ɔmɛ a kpɛti, kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a.
25Se ke o yeɔ Mlaa a nɔ ɔ, jinɛ nɔ pomi he ngɛ se nami; se ke o pee o he Mlaa a nɔ tɔlɔ ɔ, o pomi ɔ plɛ mɔmlɔtɔ. 26Se ke mɔmlɔtɔsɛ yeɔ Mlaa a blɔnya amɛ a nɔ ɔ, anɛ a be e mɔmlɔtɔ ɔ bue kaa pomi lo? 27Fɔmi mi mɔmlɔtɔsɛ nɛ yeɔ Mlaa a nɔ ɔ maa kojo mo nɛ o gu ngmami okadi kɛ nɔ pomi nɔ kɛ pee o he mlaa nɔ tɔlɔ ɔ. 28Ejakaa pi nɔ nɛ a naa lɛ kaa Yuda no kɛkɛɛkɛ ɔ ji Yuda no, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu pi kpo nɔ nɔ nɛ ngɛ he lo mi ɔ ji pomi; 29se mohu nɔ nɛ ji Yudafo no ngɛ mi mi je ɔ lɛ ji Yuda no; nɛ tsui mi nɔ pomi nɛ ngɛ mumi mi, nɛ pi ngmami okadi mi ɔ, ji nɔ pomi nɛ e yi jemi ɔ ji nimli a ngɔ, se mohu Mawu ngɔ e jee.

Title: ROMABI 3
Content:
1Jeha nɛ ɔ mɛni ji Yuda no ni nɛ e na kɛ be nɔ mɔ? Aloo mɛni se nami lɛ ngɛ nɔ pomi mi? 2E hiɛ ngɛ blɔ tsuaa blɔ nɔ. Kekleekle nɔ ji kaa a tu Mawu munyu ɔ ngɔ wo Yudafo ɔmɛ a dɛ. 3Se ke ni komɛ he we yi ɔ, mɛni ʼi? A he nɛ a he we yi ɔ ma ha Mawu anɔkuale yemi ɔ maa pee yaka lo? 4Dɛbi! Mawu ɔ, anɔkualetsɛ ʼi, se snɔmlɔ tsuaa nɔmlɔ ɔ, nya ngɔlɔ ʼi, kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a ke:
“Bene pee nɛ o ye manye ngɛ o munyu ɔmɛ a mi,
Nɛ o ye nguɔ ngɛ o kojomi ɔ mi.”
5Se ke wa ni yayami ɔmɛ haa Mawu dami ɔ jee kpo ɔ, kɛ wa ma de kɛɛ? Anɛ Mawu tɔ ke e kɛ mimifumi ba wa nɔ ɔ lo? (I ngɛ munyu tue kaa bɔ nɛ nimli tuɔ munyu.) 6Dɛbi! Ejakaa ke ja a, kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ Mawu maa kojo je ɔ?
7Se ke ye nya ngɔmi ɔ haa Mawu anɔkuale hiɛɛ kɛ bee nɔ ha e hɛ mi nyami ɔ, mɛni he je mɔ nɛ a yaa nɔ kojoɔ mi kaa yayami peelɔ? 8Mɛni he je nɛ e sɛ kaa waa pee yayami konɛ nɔ́ kpakpa nɛ ba? Enɛ ɔ ji nɔ́ nɛ ni komɛ poo ngɔ fɔɔ wa nɔ ke wa deɔ. Jamɛ a tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a fɔ bumi ɔ da pɛ.
Nɔ ko be nɛ da
9Lɛɛ kɛ ji lɛ kɛɛ? Anɛ wɔ Yudafo ɔmɛ wa hi pe ni kpa amɛ lo? Tsa pi ja kulaa; ejakaa wa po Yudafohi kɛ Helabi tsuo a nya momo kaa mɛ tsuo a ngɛ yayami sisi; 10kaa bɔ nɛ wa ngma a ke:
“Dalɔ ko be, nɔ kake ngmelu be;
11Ni lelɔ ko be, nɔ ko nɔ ko be nɛ hlaa Mawu se blɔ.
12Mɛ tsuo kulaa a tla blɔ,
Mɛ tsuo kulaa a puɛ;
Nɔ ko nɔ ko be nɛ peɔ nɔ kpakpa,
Nɔ kake po be.
13Yɔkɔ nɛ a bli nya ji a kuɔ si;
A kɛ a lilɛ sisiɔ nɔ,
Sinɔ duɔ ngɛ a nya mi.
14Gbiɛmi kɛ doomi hyi a nya mi tɔ.
15A he sɔɔ ke muɔ si puemi.
16Hɛ mi kpatami kɛ kɔmɔ yemi ngɛ a blɔhi a nɔ,
17Nɛ he jɔmi blɔ ɔ a li.
18Mawu gbeye yemi ko be a hɛ mi.”
19Jeha nɛ ɔ wa le kaa nihi kulaa nɛ Mlaa a deɔ ɔ, nihi nɛ ngɛ Mlaa a sisi ɔ e ngɛ dee, konɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko ko na nya, nɛ je mluku ɔ tsuo nɛ ye fɔ ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi. 20Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, a be mlaa ni tsumi nɔ gue kɛ wo he lo ko he lo ko nguɔ ngɛ e hɛ mi; ejakaa mlaa a nɔ a guu kɛ leɔ yayami.
Yayamipami nɛ jee Kristo nɔhemikɛyemi mi
21Se jeha nɛ ɔ, a si Mlaa a se nɛ a je Mawu dami ɔ kpo paa, nɛ lɔ ɔ he odase Mlaa a kɛ gbali ɔmɛ yeɔ; 22kɔlɔ ɔ ji Mawu dami nɛ a guu Yesu Kristo nɔ hemi kɛ yemi nɔ a kɛ haa nihi tsuo nɛ heɔ yeɔ ɔ. 23Ejakaa slɔɔto ko be: ejakaa nihi tsuo peɔ yayami, nɛ Mawu hɛ mi nyami ɔ bɔ mɛ, 24nɛ a kɛ e dloomi ɔ woɔ mɛ nguɔ yaka kɛ guu kpɔmi nɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ nɔ. 25Lɛ ji nɔ nɛ Mawu je ngɔ to kaa kpatami nɔ kɛ gu e muɔ ɔ nɔ hemi kɛ yemi nɔ, konɛ e je e dami ɔ kpo ngɛ e hɛ nɛ e je kɛ je yayamihi nɛ a pee sa a nɔ ngɛ Mawu tsui si tomi ɔ he; 26konɛ e je e dami ɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ ngɛ be nɛ ɔ mi, nɛ e ye nguɔ nɛ e wo nɔ nɛ heɔ Yesu nɔ yeɔ ɔ hu nguɔ.
27Jeha nɛ ɔ jije fiami ɔ ngɛ? A je lɛ kɛ je. Mɛni mlaa nɔ a gu? Ni tsumi hi a nɔ lo? Dɛbi, hemi kɛ yemi mlaa nɔ mohu a gu. 28Lɔ ɔ he ɔ wa ngɔɔ lɛ kaa hemi kɛ yemi nɔ a guu kɛ woɔ nɔmlɔ nguɔ, se pi mlaa ni tsumihi a nɔ. 29Anɛ Mawu ɔ, e ji Yudafohi kɛkɛ a Mawu lo? Anɛ pi majeli ɔmɛ hu a Mawu lo? Ee, majeli ɔmɛ hu a nɔ ʼi. 30Ke e ngɛ mi kaa Mawu ɔ Mawu kake ʼi, nɛ hemi kɛ yemi nya e buu nɔ pomi bemi, nɛ e kpale guu hemi kɛ yemi ɔ nɔ buu mɔmlɔtɔ bemi ɔ, 31lɛɛ wa ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɔ gue nɛ wa ha Mlaa a nɛ pee yaka lo? Dɛbi, waa kɛ ngɛ Mlaa a nɔ mi mae mohu.

Title: ROMABI 4
Content:
Abraham hemi kɛ yemi
1Lɛɛ mɛni wa ma de ke wa tsɛ Abraham na ngɛ he lo blɔfami mɔ? 2Ejakaa ke ni tsumihi a nɔ a gu kɛ wo Abraham nguɔ ɔ, jinɛ e ngɛ nɔ ko nɛ e maa fia ngɔ fɔ nɔ, se lɛɛ pi ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi. 3Se kɛ ngmami ɔ deɔ kɛɛ?
“Abraham he Mawu ye,
Nɛ a bu kɔlɔ ɔ dami ha lɛ.”
4Nɔ nɛ tsuɔ ni ɔ, a bui e hiɔwo ɔ kaa dloomi nɔ ko, se mohu e blɔ nya ʼi. 5Se nɔ nɛ tsu we ni, se e heɔ nɔ nɛ woɔ yayami peelɔ nguɔ ɔ yeɔ ɔ, a buu e hemi kɛ yemi ɔ kaa dami kɛ haa lɛ. 6Kaa bɔ nɛ David hu deɔ ngɛ nɔmlɔ nɛ Mawu siɔ ni tsumihi a se nɛ e buu dami haa lɛ ɔ he ke:
7“A gbaa nihi nɛ a ngɔ a mlaa tɔmi ɔmɛ ngɔ pa mɛ,
Nɛ a tsi a he yayami ɔmɛ a nɔ ɔ;
8A gbaa nyumu nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bui e he yayami
ɔmɛ ngɔ hi lɛ ɔ.”
9Jeha nɛ kikɛmɛ a gbaami nɛ ɔ, ninɛmɛ nɛ a po mɛ ɔ kɛkɛ a kɛ gbaa aloo mɔmlɔtɔtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ hulɔ? Ejakaa wa deɔ ke a bu Abraham hemi kɛ yemi ɔ kaa dami ngɔ ha lɛ. 10Mɛni be mi a pee enɛ ɔ? Be nɛ a po lɛ ɔ, aloo be nɛ a pui lɛ ɔ? Tsa pi be mi nɛ a po lɛ ɔ, se mohu be mi nɛ e ji mɔmlɔtɔtsɛ ɔ. 11Nɛ be mi nɛ a po lɛ ɔ, e nine su nɔ pomi he okadi ɔ nɔ kaa dami nya sɔumi nɔ nɛ a kɛ sɔu he nɛ e he ye be mi nɛ e ji mɔmlɔtɔtsɛ lokoo ɔ nya, konɛ e pee tsɛ kɛ ha nihi kulaa nɛ heɔ yeɔ benɛ a ji mɔmlɔtɔtsɛmɛ ɔ nɛ a bu dami ɔ ngɔ ha mɛ hulɔ, 12nɛ jeha nɛ e pee ninɛmɛ nɛ a po mɛ ɔ a tsɛ hulɔ kɛ ha nihi nɛ a pui mɛ se mohu a ngɔ wa tsɛ Abraham nane ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ e ngɛ be mi nɛ e ji mɔmlɔtɔtsɛ lokoo ɔ.
Mawu siwomi nɛ je hemi kɛ yemi mi
13Pi mlaa nɔ nɛ Mawu gu kɛ wo Abraham loo e nina si kaa e maa ye je ɔ nɔ ɔ, se mohu hemi kɛ yemi dami nɔ a gu. 14Ejakaa ke mlaa sisibi ɔmɛ ji ni yeli ɔ, lɛɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ pee yaka, nɛ si womi ɔ hu be nɔ hu. 15Se Mlaa a tsɛɔ Mawu mi mi fumi kɛ baa, mɛni he je ɔ, he nɛ mlaa be ɔ, mlaa nɔ tɔmi hu be.
16Se enɛ ɔ he je nɛ e je hemi kɛ yemi mi ɔ nɛ, benɛ pee nɛ e pee dloomi sane, konɛ si womi ɔ nɛ ma si kpɛii ngɔ ha e nina tsuo, pi Mlaa sisibi ɔmɛ kɛkɛ, se mohu nihi nɛ je Abraham, nɛ ji wɔ tsuo wa tsɛ ɔ, hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mi ɔ hulɔ, 17kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a ke: “I ngɔ mo ngɔ pee majeli fuu a tsɛ,” ngɛ Mawu nɔ nɛ e he yeɔ ɔ hɛ mi, nɔ nɛ tsɛɛ ni gbogboehi a hɛ, nɛ e tsɛɔ nihi nɛ be ɔ kaa nihi nɛ ngɛ momo ɔ. 18Nɛ jinɛ he nɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ko be ɔ, Abraham hɛ ngɛ nɔ kɛ̃ nɛ e he ye, konɛ e plɛ majeli fuu a tsɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ a de lɛ ke: “Ja o nina maa hi” ɔ. 19Nɛ e hemi kɛ yemi gbɔjɔɔ we, nɛ e susuu we lɛ nitsɛ e nɔmlɔ tso gbomi nɛ e gbo momo ɔ, akɛnɛ e ye maa pee jeha lafa, kɛ Sara fɔmi nɛ e fɔ we ɔ he. 20E yi mi pee we lɛ enyɔ enyɔ ngɛ Mawu si womi ɔ he kaa nɔ nɛ e he we yi, se mohu e na he wami ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi mi, nɛ e wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami, 21nɛ e ngɛ he wami ngɛ nɔ saminya kaa nɔ nɛ e wo he si ɔ, e ma nyɛ maa pee hulɔ. 22Kɔlɔ ɔ he hu nɛ a bu lɔ ɔ dami ha lɛ ɔ nɛ. 23Se pi lɛ kɛkɛ e he nɛ a ngma ke, “a bu dami ngɔ ha lɛ” ɔ, 24se mohu wɔ nihi nɛ a maa bu ngɔ ha a hu wa he, wɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ wa heɔ nɔ nɛ tle wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu si kɛ je gbeje ɔ nɔ yeɔ ɔ. 25A ngɔ lɛ ngɔ ha ngɛ wa tɔmi ɔmɛ a he, nɛ a tle lɛ si ekohu ngɛ wa nguɔ womi ɔ he.

Title: ROMABI 5
Content:
Waa kɛ Kristo huɛbɔmi
1Jeha nɛ ɔ akɛnɛ a gu hemi kɛ yemi nɔ wo wɔ nguɔ he je ɔ, waa kɛ Mawu kpɛti ngɛ he jɔmi ngɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo he. 2Lɛ e nɔ wa gu nɛ waa kɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ na blɔ kɛ ba dloomi nɛ wa daa si ngɛ mi ɔ mi, nɛ wa fiaa fɔɔ Mawu hɛ mi nyami ɔ nɛ wa hɛ ngɛ nɔ ɔ nɔ. 3Pi enɛ ɔ kɛkɛ, se mohu wa fiaa ngɛ dengme gbomihi a mi hulɔ, ejakaa wa le kaa dengme gbomi ɔ tsɛɛ tsui si tomi kɛ baa, 4nɛ tsui si tomi ɔ hu tsɛɛ nihi a si kpami kɛ baa, nɛ nihi a si kpami ɔ tsɛɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi kɛ baa. 5Hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ɔ gbi nɔ zo, ejakaa a gu Mumi Klɔuklɔu nɛ a ngɔ ha wɔ ɔ nɔ plɛ Mawu suɔmi ɔ ngɔ wo wa tsui mi.
6Ejakaa be mi nɛ wa he wɛ ɔ lokoo nɛ Kristo ba gbo ngɛ be nɛ sa mi ha yayami peeli. 7Ejakaa e maa wa loko nɔ ko ma gbo ha dalɔ ko; se nɔ́ kpakpa ko he ɔ, eko ɔ, nɔ ko ma si e gugue kaa e maa gbo. 8Se Mawu jeɔ e suɔmi nɛ e kɛ suɔ wɔ kpo tsɔɔ, kaa be mi nɛ wa ji yayami peeli lokoo nɛ Kristo ba gbo ngɛ wa nane mi. 9Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jeha nɛ ɔ, nɛ a wo wɔ nguɔ ngɛ e muɔ ɔ he he je ɔ, a maa gu e nɔ kɛ he wa yi wami hluu kɛ je mi mi fumi ɔ mi. 10Ejakaa ke be mi nɛ wa ji henyɛli ɔ nɛ a kɛ Mawu bi ɔ gbenɔ ba kpata waa kɛ Mawu kpɛti ɔ, jeha nɛ nɛ a kpata nɛ ɔ, a ma he wa yi wami hluu ngɛ e wami ɔ mi. 11Pi lɔ ɔ kɛkɛ, se mohu wa fiaa fɔɔ Mawu nɔ hulɔ ngɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo he, nɔ nɛ nɔ nɛ wa gu jeha nɛ kɛ na kpatami ɔ.
Adam kɛ Yesu Kristo
12Enɛ ɔ he ɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ nɔmlɔ kake nɔ yayami gu kɛ ba je ɔ mi, nɛ gbenɔ gu yayami nɔ kɛ ba a, lɔ ɔ ha gbenɔ sa nimli tsuo, mɛni he je ɔ, mɛ tsuo a pee yayami. 13Yayami ngɛ je ɔ mi loko a ha Mlaa a; se akɛnɛ Mlaa be he je ɔ a bui yayami ɔ. 14Se kɛ ɔ gbenɔ ye tsɛ kɛ je Adam yi nɔ kɛ ba su Mose yi nɔ ngɛ nihi po nɛ pee we yayami nɛ ngɛ kaa Adam tɔmi ɔ nɔ, nɛ Adam ji nɔ nɛ maa ba a he okadi.
15Se bɔ nɛ si gbeemi ɔ ngɛ ɔ, pi ja nɛ dloomi nɔke nɔ ɔ hu ngɛ. Ejakaa ke nɔ kake si gbeemi he je nɛ nihi fuu gbo ɔ, Mawu dloomi kɛ nɔke nɔ nɛ gu nɔmlɔ kake nɛ ji Yesu Kristo ɔ dloomi nɔ kɛ ba a hiɛ kɛ be nɔ babauu ha nihi fuu. 16Bɔ nɛ si gbeemi ɔ gu nɔ kake nɛ pee yayami ɔ nɔ kɛ ba a, pi ja nɛ dloomi ɔ ngɛ: ejakaa kojomi ɔ je nɔ kake mi nɛ e plɛ fɔ bumi, se dloomi nɔke nɔ ɔ je si gbeemihi fuu a mi nɛ e plɛ nyɔguɛ yemi. 17Ejakaa ke nɔ kake si gbeemi ɔ he je nɛ gbenɔ gu lɛ nɔ kake ɔ nɔ ye tsɛ ɔ, lɛɛ nihi nɛ na dloomi kɛ dami nɔke nɔ nɛ hiɛ kɛ be nɔ ɔ maa gu nɔ kake nɛ ji Yesu Kristo ɔ nɔ maa ye tsɛ ngɛ wami mi.
18Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jeha nɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ a gu nɔ kake si gbeemi nɔ bu nimli tsuo fɔ ɔ, ja nɔuu kɛ a gu nɔ kake dami nɔ wo nimli kulaa wami nguɔ. 19Ejakaa kaa bɔ nɛ a gu nɔmlɔ kake tue gbomi ɔ nɔ ha nihi fuu plɛ yayami peeli ɔ, ja nɔuu kɛ a maa gu nɔ kake ɔ tue bumi ɔ nɔ a ma ha, nihi fuu hu ma plɛ dali. 20Se Mlaa a ba hɔ kpɛ konɛ si gbeemi ɔ nɛ hiɛ kɛ be nɔ. Se he nɛ yayami hiɛ ngɛ ɔ, lejɛ ɔ Mawu dloomi ɔ hiɛ kɛ be nɔ babauu ngɛ; 21konɛ bɔ nɛ yayami ɔ ye tsɛ ngɛ gbenɔ mi ɔ, ja nɔuu dloomi ɔ maa gu dami nɔ kɛ ye tsɛ hulɔ kɛ maa ya neneene wami mi ngɛ Yesu Kristo wa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ he.

Title: ROMABI 6
Content:
Kristo mi wami kɛ yayami mi gbenɔ
1Lɛɛ kɛ wa ma de kɛɛ? Waa hi yayami ɔ mi konɛ Mawu dloomi nɛ hiɛ lo? 2Dɛbi! Wɔ nɛ wa gbo ngɔ ha yayami ɔ, kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ wa hɛ maa tsa nɔ hi ngmengmle ngɛ e mi? 3Aloo nyɛ li kaa wa ti nihi abɔ nɛ a baptisi ngɔ wo Kristo Yesu mi ɔ, e gbenɔ ɔ mi a baptisi wɔ ngɔ wo lo? 4Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, a kɛ baptisimi nɛ a baptisi wɔ ngɔ wo e gbenɔ ɔ mi ɔ pu waa kɛ lɛ tsuo, konɛ kaa bɔ nɛ a tle Yesu si kɛ je gbeje ngɛ Tsɛ ɔ hɛ mi nyɛmi nya a, ja nɔuu kɛ wɔ hu waa nyɛɛ ngɛ wami nɛ plɛ ehe mi.
5Ejakaa ke waa kɛ lɛ pee kake ngɛ e gbenɔ nɛ e gbo ɔ mi ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ waa kɛ lɛ maa pee kake ngɛ e si temi ɔ mi hulɔ. 6Wa le enɛ ɔ kaa a sɛu wa nɔmlɔ tso momo ɔ ngɔ piɛ e he konɛ yayami nɔmlɔ tso ɔ hɛ mi nɛ kpata nɛ wa ko sɔmɔ yayami hu. 7Ejakaa ke nɔ ko gbo ɔ, e kɛ yayami gba mi. 8Ke waa kɛ Kristo gbo ɔ, wa heɔ yeɔ kaa waa kɛ lɛ ma na wami hulɔ, 9ejakaa wa le kaa nɛ a tle Kristo si kɛ je gbeje nɛ ɔ ɔ, e be gboe hu; gbenɔ be e nɔ nyɔmtsɛ yee hu. 10Ejakaa nɛ e gbo ɔ, yayami e gbo ha si kake pɛ; se nɛ e hɛ ngɛ nɛ ɔ ɔ, Mawu e hɛ ngɛ ha. 11Ja nyɛ hu nyɛɛ bu nyɛ he kaa nihi nɛ a gbo ha yayami nɛ a hɛ ngɛ kɛ ha Mawu ngɛ Yesu Kristo wa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi.
12Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ ko ha yayami nɛ ye nyɛ nɔmlɔ tso nɛ ma gbo ɔ nɔ tsɛ nɛ nyɛ bu lɛ tue ngɛ e kɔnɔ ɔmɛ a mi. 13Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛ ko ngɔ nyɛ he ni ɔmɛ ngɔ ha yayami kaa ni yayami ɔmɛ a tahwumi nihi, se mohu nyɛɛ ngɔ nyɛ he ngɔ ha Mawu kaa ninɛmɛ nɛ a hɛ tsɛ kɛ je gbeje, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛ he ni ɔmɛ nɛ pee dami tahwumi nihi ngɔ ha Mawu. 14Ejakaa yayami be nyɛ nɔ he wami nae, ejakaa pi mlaa sisi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ, se mohu dloomi sisi nyɛ ngɛ.
Dami mi nyɔguɛhi
15Lɛɛ kɛ ji lɛ kɛɛ? Waa pee yayami akɛnɛ wa be Mlaa sisi se dloomi mohu sisi wa ngɛ ɔ lo? Dɛbi! 16Anɛ nyɛ li kaa nɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɔɔ nyɛ he ngɔ peɔ nyɔguɛhi haa nɛ nyɛ buɔ lɛ tue ɔ, lɛ nɔuu e nyɔguɛhi ji nyɛ nɛ nyɛ buɔ lɛ tue ɔ lo? — yayami nɛ kɛ nɔ yaa gbenɔ mi ɔ jio, loo tuebumi nɛ kɛ nɔ yaa dami mi ɔ jio. 17Se sina ha Mawu kaa jinɛ sa a yayami nyɔguɛhi ji nyɛ, se jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛ je nyɛ tsui tsuo mi kɛ bu kikɛmɛ a tsɔɔmi nɛ a ngɔ nyɛ ngɔ wo mi nɛ ɔ tue. 18A kpɔ nyɛ kɛ je yayami dɛ mi nɛ nyɛ ye nyɛ he nɛ nyɛ plɛ dami nyɔguɛhi. 19Bɔ nɛ nɔmlɔ tuɔ munyu i ngɛ tue nɛ ɔ nɛ, ngɛ nyɛ he lo gbedemi ɔ he. Ejakaa kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɔ nyɛ he ni ɔmɛ ngɔ pee hiemi nihi kɛ mlaa tɔmi nyɔguɛhi kɛ sɛ mlaa tɔmi mi ɔ, ja nɔuu kɛ jeha nɛ ɔ nyɛɛ ngɔ nyɛ he ni ɔmɛ ngɔ pee dami nyɔguɛhi kɛ ha klɔuklɔu peemi.
20Be mi nɛ nyɛ ji yayami nyɔguɛhi ɔ, nyɛ ye nyɛ he kɛ je dami ɔ dɛ mi. 21Lɛɛ mɛni yiblii nyɛ wo ngɛ lɛ be ɔ mi? Yiblii nɛ zo gbe nyɛ ngɛ he jeha nɛ; ejakaa kɔlɔ ɔmɛ a nyagbe ji gbenɔ. 22Se jeha nɛ ɔ, nɛ a kpɔ nyɛ kɛ je yayami dɛ mi nɛ nyɛ plɛ Mawu nyɔguɛhi nɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ wo yiblii ha klɔuklɔu peemi nɛ we nyagbe ji neneene wami ɔ. 23Ejakaa yayami dɛ mi hiɔwe ɔ gbenɔ ʼi; se Mawu dloomi nike ni ɔ neneene wami ʼi ngɛ Kristo Yesu wa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi.

Title: ROMABI 7
Content:
Gbasihimi nɔhyɛmi nɔ
1Mamimɛ, tse nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ le Mlaa a le kaa Mlaa a yeɔ nɔmlɔ nɔ ngɛ e wami be ɔ kulaa mi lo? 2Ejakaa yo nɛ ngɛ huno ɔ, mlaa fi lɛ ngɔ mɛtɛ e huno nɛ hɛ ngɛ ɔ he; se ke e huno ɔ gbo ɔ, e kɛ e huno ɔ mlaa a be sane ko hu. 3Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jeha nɛ, ke e huno ɔ ngɛ je mi nɛ e ya gba nɔ kpa a, a tsɛɛ lɛ yo gba puɛlɔ. Se ke e huno ɔ gbo ɔ, lɛɛ e ye e he kɛ je mlaa a mi, nɛ ke e ya gba nyumu kpa a, e pi yo gba puɛlɔ hu. 4Mamimɛ, ja nɔuu nyɛ hu a kɛ Kristo nɔmlɔ tso ɔ gbe nyɛ ngɔ ha Mlaa a, konɛ nyɛ plɛ nɔ kpa na ji nɔ nɛ a tle lɛ si kɛ je gbeje ɔ nihi, konɛ waa wo yiblii ha Mawu. 5Ejakaa bene wa ngɛ he lo mi ɔ, yayamihi a he hɛdɔ ɔmɛ guu mlaa a nɔ tsuɔ ni ngɛ wa he ni ɔmɛ a mi, nɛ waa kɛ wo yiblii ha gbenɔ. 6Se jeha nɛ waa kɛ Mlaa a be sane ko hu, ejakaa wa gbo ngɔ ha nɔ nɛ hɛɛ wami ɔ, bene pee nɛ wa sɔmɔ ngɛ mumi nɛ plɛ ehe ɔ mi, se pi ngɛ Mlaa momo ɔ nya.
Mlaa kɛ yayami
7Lɛɛ kɛ wa ma de kɛɛ? Anɛ Mlaa a yayami ʼi lo? Dɛbi! Se mohu ke pi Mlaa a he jinɛ i li yayami. Ejakaa jinɛ i li nɔ́ nɛ ji hɛ̃kɔ, ke pi Mlaa a nɛ de ke: “O hɛ ko kɔ nihi a nɔ.” 8Se kita a nɔ yayami gu kɛ na he blɔ nɛ e kɛ tsɛ akɔnɔ nihi tsuo wo ye mi; ejakaa ke Mlaa be ɔ, yayami hu gbo. 9I hi si hyɛ nɛ i be mlaa, se bene kita a ba a, yayami ɔ hɛ tsɛ ekohu. 10Se imi lɛɛ i gbo, nɛ i na kaa kita a nɛ a kɛ ha mi ngɛ wami he ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu lɛ tsɛ gbenɔ ngɔ ha mi. 11Ejakaa yayami gu kita a nɔ na he blɔ nɛ e kɛ sisi mi nɛ e kɛ lɔ ɔ nɔuu gbe mi.
12Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, Mlaa a ngɛ klɔuklɔu, nɛ Kita a hu ngɛ klɔuklɔu nɛ e da nɛ e hi. 13Lɛɛ nɔ́ kpakpa a plɛ gbenɔ ha mi lo? Dɛbi! Se mohu bene pee nɛ yayami ɔ nɛ je si kaa yayami he ɔ, e kɛ nɔ́ kpakpa a nɔuu tsɛ gbenɔ ngɔ ha mi, konɛ yayami ɔ nɛ gu kita a nɔ nɛ e plɛ yayami nɛ be nɔ.
Nɔmlɔ mi suhi enyɔ
14Wa le kaa Mlaa a mumi mi nɔ́ ʼi; se imi lɛɛ he lo nɔmlɔ ji mi, nɛ a jua mi ngɔ ha yayami. 15Nɔ nɛ i tsuɔ ɔ i li; ejakaa nɔ́ nɛ i suɔ ɔ, pi lɔ ɔ nɛ i peɔ, se nɔ́ nɛ i nyɛɛ mohu ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ i peɔ. 16Se ke nɔ́ nɛ i sume ɔ nɔuu i peɔ ɔ, i kplɛɔ kaa Mlaa a hi. 17Lɛɛ jeha nɛ pi imi nɛ i tsuɔ kɔlɔ ɔ hu, se mohu yayami nɛ hii ye mi ɔ lɛ tsuɔ. 18Ejakaa i le kaa ye mi, lɔ ɔ ji ye he lo ɔ mi ɔ, nɔ́ ko kpakpa ko be lejɛ ɔ; ejakaa suɔmi ɔ i ngɛ eko mohu, se kpakpa peemi lɛ bɔ mi. 19Ejakaa nɔ́ kpakpa nɛ i suɔ ɔ, i pee we, se nɔ́ yayami nɛ i sume ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ mohu i peɔ. 20Se ke nɔ́ nɛ i sume ɔ kɛ̃ i peɔ ɔ, lɛɛ tsa pi imi nɛ i peɔ kɔlɔ ɔ hu, se mohu yayami nɛ ngɛ ye mi ɔ lɛ peɔ.
21Lɛɛ i naa mlaa nɛ ɔ kaa imi nɛ i suɔ kaa ma pee nɔ́ nɛ hi ɔ, yayami mohu mɛtɛ ye he. 22Ejakaa ye mi blɔ nɔmlɔ ɔ bua jɔɔ ngɛ Mawu Mlaa a he. 23Se i naa mlaa muno ko ngɛ ye nɔmlɔ tso he ni ɔmɛ a mi nɛ kɛ ye juɛmi mlaa a hwuɔ ta, nɛ e ngɔɔ mi nyɔguɛ ngɔ haa yayami mlaa a nɛ ngɛ ye nɔmlɔ tso he ni ɔmɛ a mi ɔ. 24Nɔmlɔ nɛ ni ngɛ mɔbɔ ji mi; mɛnɔ lɛ ma je mi kɛ maa je kikɛmɛ a gbenɔ nɔmlɔ tso nɛ ɔ dɛ mi? 25Sina ha Mawu kɛ gu wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo nɔ. Jeha nɛ imi nɔuu i kɛ ye juɛmi sɔmɔɔ Mawu mlaa a lɛɛ, se i kɛ ye he lo sɔmɔɔ yayami mlaa.

Title: ROMABI 8
Content:
Mumi mi wami
1Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jeha nɛ fɔ ko fɔ ko be nɛ a kɛ maa bu nihi nɛ ngɛ Kristo mi ɔ. 2Ejakaa mlaa nɛ ji wami kɛ mumi mlaa a nɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ kpɔ mi ngɛ yayami kɛ gbenɔ mlaa a dɛ mi. 3Ejakaa nɔ́ nɛ mlaa a nyɛ we nɛ e pee ngɛ gbedemi nɛ he lo ɔ gbede he je ɔ, Mawu tsɔ lɛ nitsɛ e bi ɔ ngɛ su nɛ ngɛ kaa yayami he lo su mi, nɛ ngɛ yayami he hulɔ, konɛ e bu yayami ɔ fɔ ngɛ he lo ɔ mi, 4konɛ a gbe mlaa a dami ɔ nya ngɛ wa mi, wɔ nihi nɛ wa nyɛɛ we ngɛ he lo nya, se mohu mumi nya wa nyɛɛ ngɛ ɔ. 5Ejakaa nihi nɛ hii si ngɛ he lo nya a, he lo nihi a he a susuu, se nihi nɛ hii si ngɛ mumi nya a susuu mumi mi nihi a he. 6Ejakaa he lo juɛmi ɔ lɛɛ gbenɔ ʼi, se mumi juɛmi ɔ, wami kɛ he jɔmi ʼi. 7Ejakaa he lo juɛmi ɔ Mawu nyɛmi ʼi, ejakaa e bɛ e he si ha we Mawu mlaa a, nɛ pohu e be nyɛe tete. 8Nihi nɛ hii si ngɛ he lo mi ɔ be nyɛe nɛ a sa Mawu hɛ mi.
9Se ke e ngɛ mi kaa Mawu Mumi hii nyɛ mi ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ be he lo ɔ sisi, se mohu mumi ɔ sisi nyɛ ngɛ. Ke nɔ ko be Kristo Mumi ɔ, lɛɛ tsa pi Kristo nɔ́ ji lɛ. 10Se ke Kristo ngɛ nyɛ mi ɔ, nɔmlɔ tso ɔ gbo ngɛ yayami he lɛɛ, se mumi ɔ ji wami ngɛ dami he. 11Se ke nɔ nɛ tle Yesu si kɛ je gbeje ɔ Mumi ɔ hii nyɛ mi ɔ, nɔ nɛ tle Kristo si kɛ je gbeje ɔ ma ha nyɛ nɔmlɔ tsohi nɛ ma gbo ɔ hu yi ma na wami ngɛ e Mumi nɛ hii nyɛ mi ɔ he.
12Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mamimɛ, hiɔtsɛmɛ ji wɔ, se pi he lo hiɔ nɛ wa hɛɛ nɛ wa maa hi si ngɛ he lo nya. 13Ejakaa ke he lo nya nyɛ hii si ngɛ ɔ, nyɛ ma gbo. Se ke nyɛɛ kɛ Mumi ɔ gbee he lo ɔ ni tsumi ɔmɛ ɔ, nyɛ yi ma na wa. 14Ejakaa nihi abɔ nɛ Mawu Mumi ɔ kpakaa mɛ ɔ, mɛ ji Mawu bimɛ. 15Ejakaa pi nyɔguɛ yemi mumi nɛ nyɛ na nɛ nyɛ ma pa ye gbeye, se mohu nyɛ na bimɛ a plɛmi mumi, nɔ́ mi nɛ wa kpaa ngmlaa ngɛ ke: “Abba,” Tsaatsɛ! ɔ. 16Mawu Mumi ɔ nitsɛ kɛ wa mumi ɔ yeɔ odase kaa Mawu bimɛ ji wɔ. 17Nɛ ke bimɛ ji wɔ ɔ, lɛɛ we ni yeli hu ji wɔ, Mawu we ni yeli kɛ Kristo nyɛmimɛ we ni yeli, ke e ngɛ mi kaa waa kɛ lɛ naa amanehlu ɔ, konɛ a wo waa kɛ lɛ hɛ mi nyami hulɔ.
Hwɔɔ se nyami
18Ejakaa i susuu kaa mwɔnɛ mwɔnɛ amanehlu nɛ ɔmɛ kɛ nyami nɛ hwɔɔ se a ma je kpo ha wɔ ɔ sɔɛ. 19Ejakaa adebɔ ni ɔmɛ a blɔ hyemi kpikpimaa a ngɛ Mawu bimɛ ɔmɛ wa kpo jemi ɔ mlɛe. 20Ejakaa a ngɔ adebɔ ni ɔmɛ ngɔ wo yakayaka ni a sisi, pi ngɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a suɔmi nya, se mohu ngɛ nɔ nɛ ba mɛ si ɔ he, ngɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi mi, 21ejakaa adebɔ ni ɔmɛ hu maa ye a he kɛ maa je puemi nyɔguɛ yemi ɔ mi kɛ maa ya Mawu bimɛ ɔmɛ a nyami he yemi ɔ mi. 22Ejakaa wa le kaa adebɔ ni ɔmɛ tsuo kɛ wɔ ngɛ kɛmɛe nɛ a kɛ wɔ ngɛ kɔɔe kɛ ba su mwɔnɛ mwɔnɛ. 23Nɛ tsa pi mɛ kɛkɛ, se mohu wɔ nitsɛmɛ tete, wɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ wa na Mumi ɔ kekle yiblii ɔmɛ, wɔ nitsɛmɛ hu wa laa zanue ngɛ wa mi, nɛ wa hyɛɛ bimɛ a plɛmi nɛ ji wa nɔmlɔ tso kpɔmi ɔ blɔ. 24Ejakaa hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nya a he wa yi wami ngɛ. Hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ a naa a, e pi hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi. Ejakaa mɛnɔ hɛ hii nɔ́ nɛ a naa a nɔ? 25Se ke nɔ́ nɛ wa nɛ́ ɔ nɔ wa hɛ ngɛ ɔ, lɛɛ wa kɛ tsui si tomi hyɛɛ lɛ blɔ.
26Ja nɔuu Mumi ɔ hu yeɔ buaa wa gbedemi ɔ; ejakaa bɔ nɛ sa kaa wa ko sɔle kɛ bi nɔ nɛ da a, wa li; se Mumi ɔ nitsɛ kɛ kɔmɔ yemi nɛ a be nyɛe maa kale daa mi haa wɔ. 27Se Mawu nɛ hlaa tsuihi a mi ɔ le nɔ́ nɛ ji Mumi ɔ juɛmi ɔ, ejakaa e daa mi haa ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ bɔ nɛ sa Mawu hɛ mi.
28Se wa le kaa, nihi tsuo mi ɔ, Mawu yeɔ buaa nihi nɛ suɔ lɛ ɔ konɛ e hi ha mɛ, mɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ a tsɛ mɛ ngɛ e yi mi tomi nya a. 29Ejakaa nihi nɛ e le mɛ momo ɔ, mɛ e je ngɔ to konɛ a subai nɛ hi kaa e bi ɔ nɔ ɔ, konɛ Bi ɔ e pee nyɛmimɛ fuu a kpɛti bi nɔkɔtɔma. 30Nihi nɛ e je ngɔ to ɔ, mɛ nɔuu e tsɛ; nɛ nihi nɛ e tsɛ ɔ, mɛ nɔuu nguɔ e wo; nɛ nihi nɛ e wo nguɔ ɔ, mɛ nɔuu a hɛ mi nyami e wo.
Mawu suɔmi ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi
31Lɛɛ kɛ wa ma de kɛɛ ngɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he mɔ? Ke Mawu ngɛ wa se ɔ, mɛnɔ maa te si ngɔ wo wɔ? 32Mawu nɛ kamaa we wɔ elɛ nitsɛ e Bi ɔ, se mohu e ngɔ lɛ ngɔ ha ngɛ wɔ tsuo wa nane mi ɔ, anɛ e be nihi tsuo kulaa ngɔe ngɔ piɛ e he kɛ ke wɔ lo? 33Mɛnɔ maa po nihi nɛ Mawu hla amɛ a nya? Mawu ji nɔ nɛ woɔ nguɔ. 34Mɛnɔ ji nɔ nɛ buu fɔ ɔ? Yesu Kristo nɔ nɛ e gbo, se nɔ́ nɛ pe kɔlɔ ɔ, nɔ nɛ a tle lɛ si hulɔ, nɛ e ngɛ Mawu hiɛ ɔ nɔ, nɛ e pa daa mi haa wɔ. 35Mɛnɔ ma gba waa kɛ Kristo suɔmi ɔ mi? Amanehlu loo tsui pomi loo yi wami loo hwɔ loo he gu nyɛɛmi loo he gbeye womi loo klaate? 36Kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma ke:
“O he ɔ, a gbee wɔ hluu je nami kɛ ya siɔ du bubui,
A buu wɔ kaa tohi nɛ a yaa gbe mɛ.”
37Se kɛ̃ ɔ, enɛ ɔmɛ kulaa mi ɔ, wa guu nɔ nɛ suɔ wɔ ɔ nɔ yeɔ kunimi babauu. 38Ejakaa i ngɛ nɔ mi mami kaa gbenɔ jio, wami jio, hiɔwe bɔfohi jio, nɔ yeli jio, he wamihi jio, nihi nɛ ngɛ nɛ ɔmɛ jio, nihi nɛ maa ba amɛ jio, 39hiɔwe jio, sisi jio, aloo nihi nɛ a bɔ ɔmɛ a mi nɔ́ kpa ko jio, a be nyɛe ma gba waa kɛ Mawu suɔmi nɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu, wa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ, mi ɔ mi.

Title: ROMABI 9
Content:
Mawu hla Israel
1Anɔkuale i ngɛ dee ngɛ Kristo mi, i yi lakpa, nɛ ye he ni lemi hu yeɔ mi odase ngɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ mi, 2kaa i ngɛ kɔmɔ yee babauu, nɛ ye tsui yeɔ daa. 3Ejakaa i na nɛ jinɛ a je mi ngɛ Kristo he kaa musutsɛ ngɛ ye nyɛmimɛ nɛ ji ye wekuli ngɛ he lo blɔfami ɔmɛ a nane mi, 4nihi nɛ ji Israelbi nɛ a nɔ ji bimɛ a plɛmi ɔ kɛ nyami ɔ kɛ somi ɔ, kɛ mlaa hami kɛ jami ɔ kɛ si womi ɔ, 5ninɛmɛ nɛ a nɔ́ nɛ ji tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ, nihi a mi hu nɛ Kristo tete je ngɛ he lo blɔfami ɔ, lɛ nɛ ji Ope ngɛ nihi kulaa nɔ, Mawu nɛ a gbaa kɛ yaa neneene ɔ. Amen.
6Se pi kaa Mawu munyu ɔ pee yaka. Ejakaa tsa pi nihi nɛ je Israel mi ɔ tsuo ji Israel; 7nɛ jeha nɛ hu, pi kaa nɛ Abraham nina ji mɛ ɔ he je ɔ, bimɛ ji mɛ tsuo kulaa, se mohu: “Nihi nɛ je Isak mi ɔ, a ma tsɛ mɛ o nina.” 8Lɔ ɔ ji kaa, tsa pi he lo nya bimɛ ɔmɛ ji Mawu bimɛ, se si womi bimɛ ɔmɛ mohu a buu kaa nina. 9Ejakaa si womi munyu ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: “Hiɛ ɔ jeha nya kpemi ɔ ma ba, nɛ Sara ma na bi nyumu.”
10Se pi enɛ ɔ kɛkɛ, se mohu wa tsɛ Isak kake ɔ nɔuu nɛ Rebeka kɛ na muklii. 11Se benɛ a na we nɛ a fɔ bimɛ, nɛ jeha nɛ a tsu we nɔ kpakpa loo nɔ yaya ko ɔ, benɛ pee nɛ Mawu yi mi nɛ e to ngɛ e hlami nya a nɛ ma si, 12nɛ e ko je ni tsumihi a mi, se mohu e je nɔ nɛ tsɛɛ nɔ ɔ, Mawu de lɛ ke: “Nɔkɔtɔma a ma sɔmɔ jokuɛ ɔ.” 13Kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a ke: “Yakob ɔ, i suɔ lɛ, se Esau ɔ, i nyɛ lɛ” ɔ.
14Lɛɛ kɛ wa ma de kɛɛ? Anɛ Mawu yeɔ sane ko nɛ dɛ lo? Dɛbi! 15Ejakaa Mawu de Mose ke: “Nɔ nɛ i naa lɛ mɔbɔ ɔ, lɛ nɔuu mɔbɔ ma na, nɛ nɔ nɛ ye mi mi saa mi haa lɛ ɔ, lɛ nɔuu ye mi mi maa sa mi ha.” 16Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jeha nɛ pi nɔmlɔ suɔmi nya aloo e mɔdebɔmi nya, se mohu Mawu nɛ naa mɔbɔ ɔ sane ʼi. 17Ejakaa ngami ɔ de Farao ke: “Enɛ ɔ nɔuu he je nɛ i tle mo si konɛ ma je ye he wami kpo kɛ gu o nɔ, konɛ a wo ye biɛ ta ngɛ zugba a kulaa nɔ.” 18Lɔ ɔ he je ɔ, nɔ nɛ e suɔ ɔ, e naa lɛ mɔbɔ; nɛ nɔ nɛ e suɔ hu ɔ, e wluaa e tsui.
Mawu mimifumi kɛ e mɔbɔnami
19Se jeha nɛ o ma bi mi ke: “Mɛni he je Mawu piaa nɔ mɔ?” Ejakaa mɛnɔ ma nyɛ e yi mi tomi ɔ nya maa ku? 20Se mɛnɔ ji mo, mo nɔmlɔ, nɛ o kɛ Mawu tsuaa nuku? Anɛ buɛ ɔ ma de nɔ nɛ puɛ lɛ ɔ ke: “Mɛni he je o puɛ mi kikɛ” ɔ lo? 21Aloo buɛpuɛlɔ ɔ be he wami ngɛ zu ɔ nɔ, kaa e kɛ zu kake nɛ a pɔtɔ ɔ nɔuu eko maa puɛ nɔ́ ko nɛ hɛ mi ngɛ nyami, nɛ e kɛ eko hu maa puɛ nɔ́ ko nɛ hɛ mi be nyami lo?
22Se ke Mawu suɔ kaa e je e mi mi fumi kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ nɛ e ha a le e he wami ɔ, se kɛ̃ ɔ, e toɔ e tsui si babauu kɛ hɛɛ mi mi la womi nihi nɛ sa hɛ mi kpatami ɔ, 23nɛ jeha nɛ hu ke e haa a leɔ e hɛ mi nyami hiɛmi ɔ hu ngɛ e mɔbɔ nami nihi nɛ e dla ngɔ to ha hɛ mi nyami ɔ, mɛni o ma de? 24Se jã e tsɛ wɔ hulɔ, pi ninɛmɛ nɛ je Yudafo ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ kɛkɛ, se nihi nɛ je majeli ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ hulɔ. 25Kaa bɔ nɛ e de ngɛ Hosea womi ɔ mi ke:
“Ma tsɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ pi ye nihi ɔ ke ye nihi,
Nɛ ma nɛ a sume lɛ ɔ ke ma nɛ a suɔ.
26Nɛ e maa ba mi kaa,
He nɛ a de mɛ ngɛ ke:
‘Pi ye ma ji nyɛ’ ɔ,
Lejɛ ɔ nɔuu a ma tsɛ mɛ Mawu hɛkalɔ ɔ
bimɛ ngɛ.”
27Se Yesaia kpa ngmlaa ngɛ Israel he ke: “Ke Israelbi ɔmɛ a yibɔ ngɛ kaa wo nya zia a, nihi nɛ piɛ ɔmɛ kɛkɛ a yi wami a ma he. 28Ejakaa sane kpiti Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ maa ye ngɛ zugba a nɔ.” 29Nɛ kaa bɔ nɛ Yesaia de ngɔ to momo ɔ ke: “E ji e ya pee kaa tahi a Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ piɛ́ nina ko ngɔ hi wɔ jinɛ, wa ngɛ kaa Sodoma, nɛ wa plɛ kaa Gomora pɛ.”
Israel kɛ Sane Kpakpa a
30Lɛɛ kɛ wa ma de kɛɛ? Lɔ ɔ ji majeli a bimɛ nɛ di dami se ɔ na dami nɛ ji dami nɛ je hemi kɛ yemi mi ɔ; 31se Israel mohu nɛ dii dami mlaa a se ɔ, e nine sui dami mlaa a nɔ. 32Mɛni he je? Ejakaa a gui hemi kɛ yemi nɔ kɛ hla we, se mohu kaa nihi nɛ guu ni tsumihi a nɔ kɛ hlaa. 33Ejakaa a tɛ tɛmi tɛ ɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a ke:
“Oʼɛ, i kɛ tɛ kɛ nane kpatami tɛ sa ko
Ngɛ si mae ngɛ Zion,
Nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ heɔ e nɔ yeɔ ɔ,
Zo be lɛ gbee.”

Title: ROMABI 10
Content:
1Mamimɛ, nɔ́ nɛ ye tsui hlaa kɛ pɛɛ nɛ i kpaa Mawu haa Israel ji kaa a he a yi wami. 2Ejakaa i ngɛ he odase yee kaa a hɛ dɔɔ ngɛ Mawu he mohu, se pi ngɛ ni lemi nya. 3Ejakaa a li Mawu dami ɔ, se mɛ nitsɛmɛ a dami mohu a hlaa nɛ a ngɔ ma si he je ɔ, a bɛ́ a he si hi Mawu dami ɔ. 4Ejakaa Kristo ji Mlaa a nyagbe, nɛ lɛ ji dami kɛ ha nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ heɔ yeɔ ɔ.
Yiwamihemi ngɛ kɛ ha nɔ tsuaa nɔ
5Ejakaa Mose ngma ngɛ dami nɛ je Mlaa mi ɔ he ke: “Nɔmlɔ nɛ yeɔ enɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ ɔ yi ma na wa ngɛ mi.” 6Se bɔ nɛ dami nɛ je hemi kɛ yemi mi ɔ deɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: “Ko de ngɛ o tsui mi ke: ‘Mɛnɔ maa kuɔ kɛ ya hiɔwe?’ (lɔ ɔ ji, konɛ e ya ngɔ Kristo kɛ kple si); 7aloo: ‘Mɛnɔ ma kple si kɛ ya sisi muɔ nɛ ɔ mi?’ ” (lɔ ɔ ji, konɛ e ya ngɔ Kristo kɛ je gbeje kɛ ba). 8Se mohu kɛ e deɔ kɛɛ? Mawu munyu ɔ na mo ngɛ o nya mi kɛ o tsui mi tsuo; (kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu ji hemi kɛ yemi munyu nɛ wa fiɛɛ ɔ nɛ). 9Ke o kɛ o nya jaje ke Yesu ji Nyɔmtsɛ, nɛ o he ye ngɛ o tsui mi kaa Mawu tle lɛ si kɛ je gbeje ɔ, a ma he o yi wami. 10Ejakaa tsui a kɛ heɔ yeɔ kɛ yaa dami mi, nɛ nya a kɛ jajeɔ kɛ yaa yi wami hemi mi. 11Ejakaa ngmami ɔ deɔ ke: “Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ heɔ e nɔ yeɔ ɔ, zo be lɛ gbee.” 12Ejakaa slɔɔto ko be Yuda no kɛ Hela no kpɛti; ejakaa Nyɔmtsɛ kake mɛ kulaa a ngɛ, nɛ niatsɛ hu ji lɛ ha nihi tsuo nɛ kpaa ngmlaa kɛ tsɛɛ lɛ ɔ. 13Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ma kpa ngmlaa kɛ tsɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ biɛ ɔ, a ma he e yi wami.
14Se kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ a ma kpa ngmlaa kɛ tsɛ nɔ nɛ a he we lɛ yi ɔ? Nɛ kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ a ma he nɔ nɛ a nui e he sane ɔ ngɔ ye? Nɛ jeha nɛ hu, kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ a maa nu ke fiɛlɔ ko be ɔ? 15Nɛ kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ a maa fiɛ ke a tsɔ we mɛ ɔ? Kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a ke: “Hyɛ bɔ nɛ he jɔmi sane kpakpa fiɛli nɛ fiɛɛ ni kpakpa amɛ a nanehi ngɛ fɛu ha!” 16Se kɛ̃ ɔ, pi nihi tsuo nɛ bu sane kpakpa a tue. Ejakaa Yesaia deɔ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ, mɛnɔ he wa sane ɔ ye?” 17Lɔ ɔ he ɔ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ, sane tue bumi mi e jee, nɛ sane tue bumi hu guu Mawu munyu ɔ nɔ kɛ baa.
18Se i ngɛ bie ke: “Anɛ numi nɛ a nui lo?” Niinɛ kaa a gbi jije kɛ ho zugba mluku ɔ tsuo nɔ ya, nɛ a munyu ɔ su je mi nyagbe he ɔmɛ. 19I ngɛ bie ekohu ke: “Anɛ Israel li lo?” Mose sɛ hlami de ke:
“Ma ha nyɛ maa je ma nɛ pi ma ko he hunga;
Nɛ i kɛ ma ko nɛ li nɔ́ ko maa wo nyɛ mi mi la.”
20Nɛ Yesaia kɛ kã de ke:
“I ha nihi nɛ hla we mi ɔ na mi,
Nɛ i je ye he kpo tsɔɔ nihi nɛ bi we ye si ɔ.”
21Se Israel ɔ, e de mɛ ke:
“Daa je nami i tsɛɛ ye nine mi haa
Ma tue gboli kɛ sane nya jeli.”

Title: ROMABI 11
Content:
Mawu mɔbɔnami kɛ ha Israel
1Jeha nɛ i ngɛ bie ke: Anɛ Mawu kua e ma a lo? Dɛbi! Ejakaa imi hu Israel no ji mi, nɛ i je Abraham nina kɛ Benyamin weku ɔ mi. 2Mawu kua we e ma nɛ e le to momo ɔ. Aloo nyɛ li nɔ́ nɛ ngmami ɔ de ngɛ Elia yi nɔ ɔ, benɛ e da Mawu hɛ mi nɛ e po Israel nya ke: 3“Nyɔmtsɛ, o gbali ɔmɛ ɔ, a gbe mɛ, nɛ o bɔ sami latɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, a hule mɛ pue si, nɛ e piɛ ye nɔ kaketoo, nɛ a ngɛ mi hlae nɛ a gbe.” 4Se mɛni heto Mawu ha lɛ? “I si nyumuhi aakpe kpaago ngɔ ha ye he nɛ na we nɛ a kɛ a nakutsohi nɛ kpla si ngɔ ha Baal.” 5Jã kɛ̃ mwɔnɛ mwɔnɛ be nɛ ɔmɛ a mi hu e piɛ ni komɛ nɛ a hla mɛ ngɛ dloomi nya. 6Se ke dloomi nya ʼi ɔ, lɛɛ pi ngɛ ni tsumihi a nya hu; ejakaa lɔ ɔ lɛɛ dloomi ɔ pi dloomi hu.
7Lɛɛ kɛ ji lɛ kɛɛ? Nɔ́ nɛ Israel ngɛ hlae ɔ, e nine sui nɔ; se ninɛmɛ nɛ a hla a, a nine su nɔ; ninɛmɛ nɛ piɛ ɔ, a wlua a tsui, 8kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a ke: “Mawu ngɔ kɔnuɛ demi mumi ko ngɔ fɔ a nɔ, hɛngmɛhi nɛ a kɛ hyɛ we nɔ, kɛ tuehi nɛ a kɛ nui nɔ kɛ ba su mwɔnɛ ligbi nɛ ɔ nɔ.” 9Nɛ David de ke:
“Ha a ni yemi okplɔɔ ɔ nɛ pee lohwe pɛlitsɛ dumi kpa,
Kɛ klama kɛ temi nɔ́ kɛ tue gblami ha mɛ.
10Ha a hɛ mi nɛ wo diblii, nɛ a ko hyɛ nɔ́,
Nɛ daa nɛ ɔ o ha a dɔ kɔmɔɔ.”
11Jeha nɛ i ngɛ bie ke: “Blɔɔ pe a tɛ si nɛ a nɔ si butuu lo?” Dɛbi! Se mohu a gu a sigbeemi ɔ nɔ kɛ he maje li ɔmɛ a yi wami, konɛ e ha a je hunga. 12Se ke a si gbeemi ɔ plɛ je ɔ ni nami, nɛ a nɔ gbɔmi ɔ hu plɛ majeli ɔmɛ a ni nami ɔ, lɛɛ kɛ a gbaami ɔ maa hiɛ ha kɛɛ, ke Israel tsuo tsake ɔ?
Majeli ɔmɛ a yiwamihemi
13Se nyɛ majeli a bimɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: Be abɔ nɛ imi ji maje li ɔmɛ a bɔfo nɛ ɔ ɔ, ma wo ye sɔmɔmi ɔ hɛ mi nyami, 14kaa eko ɔ, i kɛ ma ha ye wekuli ɔmɛ maa je hunga, nɛ ma he a ti ni komɛ a yi wami lo. 15Ejakaa ke a kuami ɔ ji je ɔ kɛ Mawu kpɛti kpatami ɔ, lɛɛ a yi wami hemi ɔ anɛ pi si temi kɛ gbeje jemi ʼi lo?
16Ke ma nɛ a sa a ngɛ klɔuklɔu ɔ, lɛɛ jã ma mluku ɔ kulaa hu ngɛ; nɛ ke tso sipoku ɔ ngɛ klɔuklɔu ɔ, lɛɛ jã kɔni ɔmɛ hu ngɛ. 17Ke a po tso kɔni ɔmɛ ekomɛ, nɛ a ngɔ mo nɛ o ji nga mi nu tso ɔ ngɔ ta he, nɛ o na nu tso ɔ poku ɔ kɛ e mi nyu ɔ eko ɔ, 18koo fia ngɛ kɔni ɔmɛ a nɔ; ke o fia ngɛ a nɔ ɔ, oʼɛ, tsa pi mo nɛ o hɛɛ poku ɔ, se poku ɔ mohu lɛ hɛɛ mo.
19Jeha nɛ eko ɔ, o ma de ke: Pe a po kɔni ɔmɛ, benɛ pee nɛ a ngɔ mi ngɔ ta tso ɔ he. 20Saminya; hemi nɛ a he we yi he je nɛ a po mɛ; nɛ moo lɛɛ hemi kɛ yemi o kɛ daa si nɛ ɔ nɛ. O yi ko fu, se mohu yee o he gbeye. 21Ejakaa, ke Mawu baa we tso ɔ nitsɛ kɔni ɔmɛ a yi ɔ, eko ɔ, mo hu e be o yi baae. 22Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, hyɛ Mawu mi mi himi kɛ e sane wami ɔ tsuo. E sane wa ngɛ nihi nɛ gbee si ɔmɛ a nɔ, se moo lɛɛ e mi mi hi ngɛ o nɔ, ke o hi e mi mi himi ɔ mi ɔ; ke pi ja a, a maa po mo ngɔ sake ngɔ fɔ he. 23Nɛ mɛ hu, ke a ngmɛɛ hemi nɛ a he we yi ɔ he ɔ, a maa ngɔ mɛ ngɔ ta he; ejakaa Mawu ma nyɛ maa ngɔ mɛ ngɔ ta he. 24Nɛ ke moo lɛɛ pe a po mo ngɛ tso nɛ ji nga mi nu tso ngɛ bɔ su nya a he, nɛ a ngɔ mo ngɔ ta nu tso kpakpa a he, nɔ́ ko nɛ a pɔɛ peemi ɔ, nihi nɛ a ji tso ɔ nitsɛ kɔni ɔmɛ ɔ, a nɛ a be mɛ ngɔe ngɔ ta mɛ nitsɛmɛ a nu tso ɔ he hluu lo?
Mawu mɔbɔnami kɛ ha nimli
25I sume kaa ma laa nyɛ kikɛmɛ a sane nɛ ɔ nɔ, mamimɛ, konɛ nyɛ ko bu nyɛ he ni leli, ke: Pe a wlua Israel tsui fa kɛ fa kɛ yaa si be nɛ majemajeli ɔmɛ a hiɛmi ɔ maa su, 26nɛ lɔ ɔ loko a ma he Israel tsuo yi wami kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a ke:
“Jelɔ ɔ maa je Zion kɛ maa ba,
Nɛ e ma ba je Yakob he nɔ yayami peemi ɔ kɛ je lejɛ ɔ,
27Nɛ enɛ ɔ ji i kɛ mɛ wa kpɛti somi ɔ,
Kaa ma je a he yayami ɔmɛ kɛ ho.”
28Ngɛ Sane Kpakpa a blɔfami ɔ, he nyɛli ji mɛ ngɛ nyɛ he. Se ngɛ hlami ɔ blɔfami ɔ, a suɔ mɛ ngɛ tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a he. 29Ejakaa Mawu pia we e he ngɛ e dloomi ni ɔmɛ kɛ e tsɛmi ɔ he. 30Ejakaa kaa bɔ nɛ sa a nyɛ hu nyɛ bui Mawu tue, se jeha nɛ a na nyɛ mɔbɔ ngɛ a tuegbenɔ ɔ he ɔ, 31ja nɔuu kɛ̃ mɛ hu a tue gbo, konɛ bɔ nɛ a na nyɛ mɔbɔ ɔ mɛ hu a na mɛ mɔbɔ. 32Ejakaa Mawu nga nihi kulaa a yi ngɔ wo tuegbenɔ mi, benɛ pee nɛ e na mɛ kulaa mɔbɔ.
Mawu yijemi
33Oo, bɔ nɛ Mawu Ni hiɛhiɛ kɛ ga kɛ ni lemi mi kuɔ ha ji nɛ ɔ nɛ! E kojomi ɔmɛ ɔ, a nyɛ we sisi nami, nɛ e blɔ ɔmɛ bu, a nyɛ we hiɔmi!
34“Ejakaa mɛnɔ le Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ juɛmi ɔ,
Aloo mɛnɔ wo lɛ ga hyɛ?
35Aloo mɛnɔ sɛ hlami ha lɛ nɔ́ ko,
Nɛ jinɛ a ko to lɛ nane mi?”
36Ejakaa e dɛ mi nihi tsuo je, nɛ e nɔ a gu kɛ ba, nɛ lɛ nɔuu a ngɛ kɛ ha. A ngɔ hɛ mi nyami ngɔ ha lɛ kɛ ya neneene! Amen.

Title: ROMABI 12
Content:
Wami ngɛ Mawu sɔmɔmi mi
1Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mamimɛ, i kɛ Mawu mɔbɔ nami ngɛ nyɛ pɛɛ kpae, kaa nyɛɛ ngɔ nyɛ nɔmlɔ tso ɔmɛ ngɔ da si kaa bɔ klɔuklɔu nɛ hɛ ngɛ nɛ he tsɔ nɛ sa Mawu hɛ mi nɛ nyɛ jami ɔ nɛ pee mumi mi jami. 2Nɛ nyɛ je mi bami ko pee kaa je mi bihi a je mi bami, se mohu nyɛ ha Mawu nɛ tsake nyɛ juɛmi, konɛ nyɛ yɔse nihi nɛ ji Mawu suɔmi nya ni kpakpahi nɛ sa e hɛ mi saminya nɛ hi kɛ pi si ɔ.
3Se i kɛ dloomi nɛ a kɛ dloo mi ɔ ngɛ nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ dee ke e ko bu lɛ nitsɛ e he babauu tsɔ pe bɔ nɛ sa kaa e buu e he, se mohu e susu hɛ si kami susumi, nɔ tsuaa nɔ ɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ Mawu kale hemi kɛ yemi kalemi ɔ ngɔ ha lɛ ɔ. 4Ejakaa kaa bɔ nɛ nɔmlɔ tso kake he ɔ wa ngɛ he nihi fuu, se he ni ɔmɛ tsuo tsu we ni tsumi kake ɔ, 5ja nɔuu wɔ fuu nɛ ɔ, nɔmlɔ tso kake ji wɔ ngɛ Kristo mi, nɛ wa ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ ɔ, e nyɛmi he nɔ́ ji lɛ. 6Nɛ ngɛ dloomi nɛ a ngɔ ha wɔ ɔ nya a, wa ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ ngɛ dloomi ke ni slɔɔtohi slɔɔtohi: Ke gbami ʼi ɔ, waa gba ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi kalemi ɔ nya. 7Ke sɔmɔmi ʼi ɔ, waa hɛɛ sɔmɔmi ɔ nɔuu mi; ke ni tsɔɔmi ɔ, wa hɛɛ ni tsɔɔmi ɔ mi; 8nɔ nɛ tuɔ munyu tsɔɔ nihi ɔ, e hɛɛ munyu tumi kɛ tsɔɔmi ɔ mi; nɔ nɛ dlaa ni ngɔ haa nihi ɔ, e pee kɛ tsui jɔjɔɛ. Nɔ nɛ yeɔ nɔkɔtɔma a, e bɔ mɔde. Nɔ nɛ naa mɔbɔ ɔ, e pee kɛ tsui mi jɔmi.
9Suɔmi ɔ, osato ko hi mi. Nyɛɛ nyɛ yayami kulaa; nyɛɛ pɛtɛ nɔ kpakpa he. 10Nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛmimɛ a suɔmi nɛ suɔ nyɛ he; nɔ tsuaa nɔ kɛ bu nɛ ha e nyɛmi kekle. 11Nyɛ mɔde bɔmi ɔ nya ko ba si; nyɛ mumi ɔ he nɛ dɔ la; nyɛ sɔmɔ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ. 12Nyɛ nya ngɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi mi; nyɛ mia nyɛ hɛ mi ngɛ dengme gbomi mi; nyɛɛ hɛɛ sɔlemi mi daa. 13Ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a kɔmɔ ɔ e pee nyɛ kɔmɔ; nyɛɛ bɔ nibwɔ peemi he mɔde.
14Nyɛɛ gbaa nihi nɛ waa nyɛ yi mi ɔ, nyɛɛ gbaa nɛ nyɛ ko gbiɛ. 15Nyɛɛ kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ nyae ɔ nɛ nya, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ ya foe ɔ nɛ fo. 16Nyɛ susu nɔ́ kake; nyɛ ko susu ni nguahi, se mohu nyɛɛ kɛ he si bali ɔmɛ nɛ bɔ. Nyɛ ko bu nyɛ he nileli.
17Nyɛ ko ngɔ yayami ngɔ ma nɔ ko nɔ ko yayami nane mi. Nyɛ susu nɔ́ nɛ ngɛ fɛu ngɛ nimli kulaa a hɛ mi ɔ he. 18Ke e maa hi ɔ, nyɛ blɔfami ɔ, nyɛɛ kɛ nimli tsuo nɛ hi si ngɛ he jɔmi mi. 19Suɔli, nyɛ ko ye nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ he lue, se mohu nyɛɛ ngmɛ mi mi fumi ɔ blɔ; ejakaa a ngma ke:
“Ye nɔ ji lue yemi,
Imi ma to nane mi, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ lɛ de.”
20Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ke hwɔ ngɛ o he nyɛlɔ yee ɔ, ha lɛ ni nɛ e ye. Ke kuma ngɛ lɛ tɔe ɔ, ha lɛ nyu nɛ e nu; ejakaa ke o pee ja a, o ma kpane hã kɛ la nya ngɔ pue e yi kpɛti. 21Ko ha yayami nɛ ye o nɔ, se mohu o kɛ kpakpa peemi nɛ ye yayami nɔ.

Title: ROMABI 13
Content:
Blɔnyanitsumi ngɛ ma mi
1Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ba e he si ngɔ ha nɔ yeli nɛ yeɔ nɔ ɔ. Ejakaa he blɔ ko be nɛ e ji Mawu ngɔ; se he blɔhi nɛ ngɛ ɔ Mawu nɛ to. 2Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ tee si siɔ he blɔ ɔ, Mawu blɔ nya tomi ɔ e ngɛ si tee kɛ ngɛ woe ɔ nɛ; nɛ nihi nɛ tee si ja a ma na a kojomi. 3Ejakaa nɔ yeli ɔmɛ ɔ tsa pi tsumi kpakpahi a he gbeye nɛ a woɔ, se ni tsumi yayahi mohu. Anɛ o suɔ nɛ o ko ye nɔ yelɔ ɔ gbeye lo? Lɛɛ pee nɔ kpakpa, nɛ o ma na yi jemi kɛ maa je e dɛ mi; 4ejakaa Mawu sɔmɔlɔ ji lɛ ngɛ o he, konɛ e hi ha mo. Se ke o pee nɔ́ nɛ ji nɔ́ yayami ɔ, yee gbeye! Ejakaa tsa pi yaka nɛ e hɛɛ hiɔ ɔ; se e ji Mawu sɔmɔlɔ nɛ kɛ mi mi fumi yeɔ lue ngɛ nɔ nɛ tsuɔ ni yayahi ɔ nɔ. 5Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e sa kaa a baa he si, pi ngɛ Mawu abofu ɔ kɛkɛ he, se mohu ngɛ he ni lemi he hulɔ.
6Enɛ he je hulɔ nɛ nyɛ tsuɔ onia a nɛ. Ejakaa Mawu tsɔli ji mɛ, nɛ kikɛmɛ a sɔmɔmi nɛ ɔ nɔuu he nɛ a ngɛ ɔ nɛ. 7Lɔ ɔ he ɔ bɔ nɛ ji nɔ tsuaa nɔ blɔ nya a, nyɛɛ pee ha lɛ; onia tsumi jio, ma onia womi jio, gbeye yemi jio, nɔ bumi jio.
Nyɛmimɛ a suɔmi
8Nyɛ ko hɛɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko hiɔ, kaa ja suɔmi nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ maa suɔ nyɛ sibi ɔ. Ejakaa nɔ nɛ suɔ e nyɛmi ɔ, e ye Mlaa a nɔ ta. 9Ejakaa nɔ́ nɛ a de ke: “Koo bɔ ajuama! Koo gbe nɔmlɔ! Koo ju! Koo ye lakpa odase! O hɛ ko kɔ nɔ́ ko nɔ!” ɔ, enɛ ɔmɛ kulaa, kɛ ekpa komɛ hu nɛ ngɛ ɔ, hɔ kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ji: “Suɔ o nyɛmi kaa bɔ nɛ o suɔ mo nitsɛ o he” ɔ mi. 10Suɔmi pee we e nyɛmi nɔ yayami ko, lɔ ɔ he je ɔ, suɔmi pɛ ji Mlaa a nɔ yemi.
11Enɛ ɔ se ɔ wa le be ɔ kaa jeha nɛ ngmlɛfia nɛ waa kɛ maa te si kɛ je mahɛ mi ɔ su; ejakaa jeha nɛ wa yi wami hemi ɔ na wɔ pe kekle benɛ wa he ye ɔ. 12Nyɔ ɔ be ta, na je nami na wɔ. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ ha nɛ waa ngmɛɛ diblii mi ni tsumi ɔmɛ a he, nɛ waa wo la ta hwumi ni ɔmɛ. 13Nyɛ ha nɛ waa ba wa je mi saminya bɔ nɛ sa piani, pi ngɛ yakayaka fiɛmi kɛ da demi mi; pi ngɛ ajuama bɔmi kɛ ya homi mi; pi ngɛ pɛ kɛ hunga jemi mi; 14se mohu nyɛɛ wo Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo, nɛ nyɛ ko ha he lo ɔ he susumi ɔ ba plɛ he lo ɔ se dimi.

Title: ROMABI 14
Content:
Koo kojo o nyɛmi
1Nɔ nɛ gbɔjɔ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi mi ɔ, nyɛ he lɛ atuu, se nyɛ ko kojo e susumi ɔmɛ. 2Nɔ ko ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ e kɛ yeɔ nɔ tsuaa nɔ; se nɔ nɛ gbɔjɔ ɔ, pui kɛkɛ e yeɔ. 3Nɔ nɛ yeɔ ɔ, e ko gbe nɔ nɛ yi ɔ he guɛ; nɛ nɔ nɛ yi ɔ, e ko kojo nɔ nɛ yeɔ ɔ, ejakaa Mawu ngɔ lɛ. 4Moo lɛɛ mɛnɔ ji mo nɛ o kojoɔ nɔ kpa sɔmɔlɔ? Lɛ nitsɛ e nyɔmtsɛ ɔ e daa si aloo e nɔɔ si haa; se a ma ha e maa da si, ejakaa Mawu ngɛ he wami nɛ e ma ha e da si. 5Nɔ ko buu ligbi ko pe eko, nɛ nɔ ko hu buu ligbi tsuaa ligbi pɛpɛɛpɛ. Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ na lɛ nitsɛ e juɛmi ɔ nɔ he wami. 6Nɔ nɛ buu ligbi ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ e buu haa; nɛ nɔ nɛ yeɔ ni ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ eyeɔ haa, ejakaa e naa Mawu si. Nɛ nɔ nɛ yi ni ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ e yi ha, nɛ e naa Mawu si hulɔ. 7Ejakaa wa ti nɔ ko hɛ ka we hi lɛ nitsɛ e he. 8Se ke wa hɛ ngɛ ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ wa hɛ ngɛ kɛ ha; nɛ ke wa gbo hu, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ wa gbo kɛ ha. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ wa hɛ ngɛ jio, wa gbo jio, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nihi ji wɔ. 9Ejakaa enɛ ɔ he je nɛ Kristo gbo nɛ e te si nɛ e hɛ ngɛ benɛ pee nɛ e plɛ ni gbogboehi kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ a hɛ ngɛ kulaa a Nyɔmtsɛ. 10Se moo lɛɛ mɛni he je nɛ o kojoɔ o nyɛmi? Aloo mo hu mɛni he je nɛ o gbee o nyɛmi he guɛ? Ejakaa wɔ tsuo kulaa wa maa da Kristo kojomi sɛ ɔ hɛ mi. 11Ejakaa a ngma ke:
“Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ke:
Akɛnɛ ye hɛ ngɛ nɛ ɔ ɔ,
Nakutso tsuaa nakutso ma kpla si ha mi;
Nɛ lilɛ tsuaa lilɛ maa jaje Mawu ngɔ tsɔɔ.”
12Lɛɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ wa ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ maa bu lɛ nitsɛ e he akɔtaa ngɛ ha Mawu.
Ko ha nɛ onyɛmi nɛ gbee si
13Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ ko ha nɛ waa kojo wa he hu; se enɛ ɔ mohu nyɛɛ kojo, kaa nɔ ko ko to tɛmi nɔ́ loo kpangmi ko ngɔ ha e nyɛmi. 14I le, nɛ jeha nɛ hu i ngɛ nɔ he wami ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu mi, kaa nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko be nɛl ɛ nitsɛ e ji he blemi nɔ́ ja nɔ nɛ buu nɔ́ ko kaa he blemi nɔ́ ɔ, lɛ nɛ e plɛɛ he blemi nɔ́ kɛ haa. 15Se ke niyeni ko he je nɛ o haa o nyɛmi yeɔ kɔmɔ ɔɔ lɛɛ tsa pi suɔmi nya nɛ o ngɛ o je mi bae ngɛ ɔ hu. O kɛ o niyeni ɔ ko kpata nɔ nɛ Kristo ba gbo ha lɛ ɔ hɛ mi. 16Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ ko ha nɛ a tu nyɛ nɔ kpakpa a he munyu yaya. 17Ejakaa Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ, e pi ni yemi kɛ ni numi, se mohu e ji dami kɛ he jɔmi kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu mi bua jɔmi. 18Ejakaa nɔ nɛ sɔmɔɔ Kristo ngɛ enɛ ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, Mawu naa e he tsui, nɛ e saa nimli a hɛ mi hulɔ.
19Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jeha nɛ, nyɛ ha waa di he jɔmi nihi kɛ nihi nɛ waa kɛ ma ha wa nyɛmimɛ a nane maa nu si ɔ mohu a se. 20Ko puɛ Mawu ni tsumi ɔ ngɛ niyeni ko he. Nihi tsuo he tsɔ lɛɛ, se kɛ ɔ, e ji yayami ha nɔ nɛ yeɔ kɛ toɔ kpangmi ɔ. 21E hi kaa o yi lo nɛ jeha nɛ hu o nui wai loo nɔ́ ko nɛ maa to o nyɛmi kpangmi loo nɛ e ma ha e nane ma kpata aloo nɛ e ma ha e kɔni mi maa jɔ. 22Moo lɛɛ o ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi. Kɛ to ha mo nitsɛ o he ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi. A gbaa nɔ nɛ kojo we lɛ nitsɛ e he ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ e buu kaa e hi ɔ mi ɔ. 23Se nɔ nɛ yi mi tɛ̃ lɛ ɔ, ke e ye ɔ, e yeɔ fɔ, mɛni he je ɔ, e ji hemi kɛ yemi mi; nɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ ji hemi kɛ yemi mi ɔ, yayami ʼi.

Title: ROMABI 15
Content:
Pee ha ni kpahi
1Wɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ wa ngɛ he wami ɔ, e sa kaa wa kpeɔ ɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ a be he wami ɔ kɛ a gbɔjɔmi ɔmɛ, nɛ wa ko susu wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa he. 2Wa ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ sa e nyɛmi hɛ mi, konɛ e hi ha lɛ nɛ e nane nɛ nu si. 3Ejakaa Kristo hu susu we lɛ nitsɛ e he; se mohu kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a: “Ninɛmɛ nɛ bɔ mo ahlua a, a hlua bɔmi ɔ ba nɔ ye nɔ.” 4Ejakaa nihi abɔ nɛ a ngma ngɔ to momo ɔ, wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa he ni tsɔɔmi he a ngma ngɔ to ngɛ ɔ nɛ, konɛ waa kɛ tsui si tomi kɛ ngmami ɔmɛ a mi bua jɔmi ɔ nɛ na hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi. 5Se tsui si tomi kɛ bua jɔmi Mawu ɔ, e ha nɛ nyɛ na juɛmi kake ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti kaa Kristo Yesu; 6konɛ nyɛɛ kɛ juɛmi kake kɛ nya kake nɛ wo Mawu kɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo Tsɛ ɔ hɛ mi nyami.
Sane Kpakpa nɛ a kɛ ha majeli ɔmɛ
7Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ he nyɛ he kaa nyɛmimɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ Kristo he nyɛ kɛ ba Mawu hɛ mi nyami ɔ mi ɔ. 8Se i ngɛ dee ke Yesu Kristo plɛ sɔmɔlɔ kɛ ha Yudafo ɔmɛ ngɛ Mawu anɔkuale ɔ he, konɛ e kɛ ma si nɛ a wo tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ɔ a nɔ mi, 9konɛ majeli ɔmɛ a wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami ngɛ mɔbɔ nami he, kaa bɔ nɛ sa ngma a ke:
“Enɛ ɔ he ɔ ma je o yi ngɛ majeli ɔmɛ a kpɛti,
Nɛ ma wo o biɛ ta kɛ la.”
10Nɛ e pa de ke:
“Nyɛ majeli, nyɛɛ kɛ e ma a nɛ nya!”
11Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu:
“Nyɛ je Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ yi, nyɛ majeli kulaa,
Nɛ nyɛ je e yi wawɛɛ, nyɛ mahi kulaa!”
12Nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ Yesaia de ke:
“Isai sipoku ɔ maa ba,
Nɔ nɛ maa te si konɛ e baye majeli ɔmɛ a nɔ ɔ;
Lɛ e nɔ majeli ɔmɛ maa ngɔ a hɛ ngɔ fɔ.”
13Jeha nɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi Mawu ɔ nɛ ngɔ bua jɔmi kɛ he jɔmi tsuo ngɔ wo nyɛ tɔtɔɔtɔ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi mi, konɛ nyɛ na hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ be nɔ ngɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu he wami mi.
Nɔ he je nɛ Paulo ngma womi kɛ kã
14Se mamimɛ, imi nitsɛ hu i ngɛ he wami ngɛ nɔ ngɛ nyɛ he kaa nyɛ nitsɛmɛ tete nyɛ hyi tɔtɔɔtɔ kɛ mi mi himi, nɛ ni lemi kulaa hyi nyɛ tɔ, nɛ nyɛ nyɛɔ tuɔ munyu tsɔɔ nyɛ he hulɔ. 15Se i kɛ kã fuu ngma munyu nɛ ɔmɛ ekomɛ mane nyɛ, konɛ ma kɛ kai nyɛ ngɛ dloomi nɛ Mawu ngɔ ha mi ɔ he, 16konɛ ma plɛ Yesu Kristo sɔmɔlɔ ha majeli ɔmɛ, nɛ ma tsu Mawu Sane Kpakpa a he osɔfo ni tsumi ɔ, konɛ majeli ɔmɛ nɛ plɛ bɔ nɛ sa Mawu hɛ mi saminya nɛ a tsukɔ he ngɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu mi. 17Lɔ ɔ he ɔ i ngɛ fiami nihi ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ngɛ Mawu blɔfami ni ɔmɛ a mi. 18Ejakaa i be kae kaa ma de nɔ́ ko kaa ja nɔ́ nɛ Kristo gu ye nɔ tsu ngɔ ha majeli ɔmɛ a tue bumi, ngɛ munyu kɛ ni peemi nihi a mi, 19ngɛ okadihi kɛ nyakpɛ nihi a he wami mi, ngɛ Mawu Mumi he wami mi; enɛ ɔ he nɛ i je Yerusalem kɛ bɔle si hluu kɛ ya su Ilirikum, nɛ i fiɛ Kristo Sane Kpakpa a kɛ gbe nya a nɛ. 20Nɔ́ nɛ i kɛ ma ye hɛ mi ji kaa, he nɛ a wui Kristo biɛ ta ngɛ ɔ, lejɛ ɔ ma jaje Sane Kpakpa a ngɛ, benɛ pee nɛ ma ko ya fia ngɔ to nɔ kpa sisitomi nɔ. 21Se mohu kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a ke:
“Nihi nɛ a jaje we e he sane ko ngɔ tsɔɔ we mɛ ɔ,
A maa na,
Nɛ nihi nɛ nui ɔ,
A maa nu sisi.”
Paulo Romayami he blɔnyatomi
22Enɛ ɔ nɔuu lɛ tsi mi blɔ hluu nɛ i bɛ nyɛ ngɔ ɔ nɛ. 23Se jaha nɛ akɛnɛ i be nɔ́ ko peemi ngɛ hiɛ ɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi hu, nɛ jeha nɛ i je jehahi fuu hla kaa ma ba nyɛ ngɔ he ɔ, 24be tsuaa be nɛ ma hia blɔ kɛ maa ya Spania a, ma ba nyɛ ngɔ; ejakaa ye hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa ke ma gu lejɛ ɔ blɔ ɔ, ma ba na nyɛ hɛ mi konɛ, ke i na bua jɔmi bɔɔ ngɛ nyɛ ngɔ se ɔ, nɛ nyɛ ya je mi blɔ kɛ ya lejɛ ɔ. 25Se jeha nɛ ɔ, i hia blɔ kɛ yaa Yerusalem, nɛ ma ya sɔmɔ klɔuklɔu bi ɔmɛ lolo. 26Ejakaa Makedonia kɛ Akaia tsuo kɛ tsui mi jɔmi tsu onia ko kɛ yaa ha klɔuklɔu bihi nɛ ngɛ Yerusalem ɔ a kpɛti ohiafo ɔmɛ.
27Tsui mi jɔmi nya a pee ngɛ niinɛ mohu, se jeha nɛ a hɛɛ mɛ hiɔ. Ejakaa ke majeli ɔmɛ na a mumi mi ni kpakpa amɛ eko ɔ, lɛɛ e sa kaa mɛ hu a kɛ he lo mi ni kpakpa amɛ eko nɛ sɔmɔ mɛ. 28Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ke i gbe enɛ ɔ nya nɛ i ngɔ nike ni nɛ ɔ kɛ ya ha mɛ ɔ, ma ba gu nyɛ ngɔ kɛ ya Spania. 29I le kaa ke i ba nyɛ ngɔ ɔ, Kristo gbaami hiɛmi ɔ mi ma ba ngɛ.
30Se i kpa nyɛ pɛɛ, mamimɛ, ngɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo he kɛ Mumi ɔ suɔmi he, kaa nyɛɛ piɛ ye he kɛ plee ngɛ nyɛ sɔlemihi nɛ nyɛ sɔlee ngɔ haa mi ngɛ Mawu hɛ ni ɔ mi, 31konɛ a je mi kɛ je tue gboli nɛ ngɛ Yudea amɛ a dɛ mi, konɛ sɔmɔmi nɛ i yaa sɔmɔ ngɛ Yerusalem ɔ, e sa ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a hɛ mi saminya, 32konɛ ngɛ Mawu suɔmi nya a, i kɛ bua jɔmi nɛ ba nyɛ ngɔ, nɛ ma ba wo ye tsui ngɛ nyɛ ngɔ. 33He jɔmi Mawu ɔ kɛ nyɛ tsuo nɛ hi si! Amen.

Title: ROMABI 16
Content:
Paulo sɛmanemi munyuhi
1I ngɛ wa nyɛmi yo Foibe nɛ ji Kenkrea asafo ɔ sɔmɔlɔ ɔ yi jee kɛ ngɛ nyɛ hae, 2konɛ nyɛ he lɛ hɛ muɔ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi bɔ nɛ sa ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ, nɛ nyɛɛ piɛ e he ngɛ ni tsumi tsuaa ni tsumi nɛ nyɛ he maa hia lɛ ngɛ mi ɔ mi; ejakaa lɛ nitsɛ hu, e ji nihi fuu kɛ imi nitsɛ hu ye he piɛlɔ.
3Nyɛ nga Priska kɛ Akwila, nɛ ji ye huɛmɛ ni tsuli ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ ha mi, 4nihi nɛ kɛ a he wo gbenɔ mi ngɛ ye wami he, nɛ pi imi kɛkɛ nɛ i naa mɛ si, se mohu majeli ɔmɛ a mi asafo ɔmɛ kulaa hu ngɛ mɛ si nae. 5Nyɛ nga asafo nɛ ngɛ a we ɔ hulɔ.
Nyɛ nga ye suɔlɔ Epaineto nɛ ji kekleekle nɔ ngɛ Asia nɛ kɛ e he ha Kristo ɔ. 6Nyɛ nga Maria nɛ gbo wa he dengme fuu ɔ. 7Nyɛ nga Androniko kɛ Yunia, ye wekuli nɛ a wo i kɛ mɛ tsu mi, nɛ a ngɛ biɛ ngɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ akpɛti nɛ a sɛ ye hlami ngɛ Kristo mi ɔ.
8Nyɛ nga Amplia, nɔ nɛ i suɔ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi ɔ. 9Nyɛ nga Urbano nɛ ji wa huɛ ni tsulɔ ngɛ Kristo mi ɔ, kɛ ye suɔlɔ Staki. 10Nyɛ nga Apele nɔ nɛ he nu si ngɛ Kristo mi ɔ. Nyɛ nga nihi nɛ je Aristobulo we mi bi ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ. 11Nyɛ nga ye wekuno Herodion ɔ. Nyɛ nga nihi nɛ je Marsiko we mi bi ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɛ a ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi ɔ.
12Nyɛ nga Trifaina kɛ Trifosa nɛ bɔɔ mɔde ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi ɔ. Nyɛ nga Persi, nɔ nɛ a suɔ nɛ e tsu ni fuu ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi ɔ. 13Nyɛ nga Rufo, nɔ nɛ a hla ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi ɔ nɛ e nyɛ pee mi bi hulɔ ɔ. 14Nyɛ nga Asinkrito, Felgon, Herma, Patroba, Herme kɛ nyɛmimɛ nɛ kɛ mɛ ngɛ ɔ. 15Nyɛ nga Filogo kɛ Yulia, Nerea kɛ e nyɛmi yo ɔ, kɛ Olimpa kɛ ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ nɛ kɛ mɛ ngɛ ɔ kulaa.
16Nyɛɛ kɛ nya he fiɔmi klɔuu nɛ nga nyɛ he. Kristo asafo ɔ tsuo biɔ nyɛ.
Nyagbe nitsɔɔmi
17Jeha nɛ, mamimɛ, i kpa nyɛ pɛɛ nɛ nyɛ hɛ nɛ hi nihi nɛ jee tsɔɔmi nɛ nyɛ kase ɔ se nɛ a kɛ mi gbamihi kɛ kpangmi tomi nihi baa amɛ a he, nɛ nyɛɛ hɛ nyɛ he kɛ je a he. 18Ejakaa nihi nɛ ngɛ kikɛ ɔ, pi wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo nɛ a sɔmɔɔ, se mohu mɛ nitsɛmɛ a muklii; nɛ a kɛ nya mi dɔkɔɔ kɛ sisimi munyuhi mlɔɔ nihi nɛ li yayami ɔmɛ a tsui. 19Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ, nyɛ tue bumi ɔ nihi tsuo nu he, lɔ ɔ he ɔ i na nyɛ he bua jɔmi. Se i suɔ kaa nyɛɛ pee nyɛ he ni leli ngɛ nɔ kpakpa blɔfami; se nɔ yayami blɔfami ɔ, nihi nɛ a li nɔ́ ko. 20Se e be kɛe nɛ he jɔmi Mawu ɔ maa naa Satan nɔ kulaa ngɛ nyɛ nane si.
Wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dloomi ɔ kɛ nyɛ nɛ hi si!
21Ye huɛ ni tsulɔ Timoteo kɛ ye wekuli Lukio kɛ Yason kɛ Sosipatre biɔ nyɛ.
22Imi Tortio hu nɛ i ngma kikɛmɛ a womi nɛ ɔ i biɔ nyɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi.
23Gaio nɛ ji i kɛ asafo ɔ kulaa wetsɛ ɔ biɔ nyɛ. Erasto nɛ ji ma sika tolɔ ɔ, kɛ wa nyɛmi Kwarto biɔ nyɛ.
24[Wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dloomi ɔ kɛ nyɛ tsuo kulaa nɛ hi si! Amen.]
Nyagbe yijemi sɔlemi
25Se nɔ nɛ ma nyɛ ma ha nɛ nyɛ fi si wawɛɛ ngɛ Sane Kpakpa a kɛ Yesu Kristo fiɛmi ɔ nya, ngɛ laami sane nɛ a ngɔ laa kɛ je neneene lokoo ɔ kpo jemi nya a, 26nɔ́ nɛ jeha nɛ je ngɔ tsɔɔ paa ngɛ neneene Mawu ɔ kita nya a, nɛ a gu gbali ɔmɛ a ngmami ɔmɛ a nɔ wo nɔ ta tsɔɔ majeli ɔmɛ kulaa konɛ a bu hemi kɛ yemi ɔ tue — 27lɛ Mawu nɛ ji ni lelɔ kake too ɔ, a ngɔ nyami ngɔ ha ngɛ Yesu Kristo mi kɛ ya neneene! Amen.

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 1
Content:
1Paulo, Yesu Kristo bɔfo nɛ a tsɛ ngɛ Mawu suɔmi nya a, kɛ wa nyɛmi Sostene 2ngma ya ha Mawu asafo nɛ ngɛ Korinto ɔ, nihi nɛ a tsukɔ a he ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi nɛ ji ni klɔuklɔuhi nɛ a tsɛ mɛ kɛ nihi kula nɛ tsɛɛ waa kɛ mɛ tsuo Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo biɛ ngɛ he tsuaa he ɔ:
3Dloomi kɛ hejɔmi nɛ je wa tsɛ Mawu ɔ kɛ Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dɛ mi ɔ ha nyɛ.
Gbaami ngɛ Kristo mi
4I naa ye Mawu ɔ si daa nɛ ɔ ngɛ nyɛ nyɛ he, ngɛ Mawu dloomi nɛ a ngɔ ha nyɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ he, 5kaa nihi kulaa mi ɔ, a ha nyɛ plɔke ngɛ e mi, ngɛ munyu tsuaa munyu kɛ ni lemi tsuaa ni lemi blɔfami. 6Kaa bɔ nɛ a ma Kristo he odase ɔ nɔ mi ngɛ nyɛ mi, 7nɛ e piɛ́ nyɛ dloomi ke nɔ ko, nyɛ nɛ nyɛ hyɛɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo kpojemi ɔ blɔ ɔ, 8lɛ nɔuu e ma wlua nyɛ kɛ maa ya nyagbe konɛ piami ko ko hi nyɛ he ngɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo ligbi ɔ nɔ. 9Anɔkualetsɛ ji Mawu, nɔ nɛ tsɛ nyɛ kɛ ba e bi Yesu Kristo, wa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hue bɔmi ɔ mi ɔ.
Migbami ngɛ asafo ɔ mi
10Se, mamimɛ, i kpa nyɛ pɛɛ ngɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo biɛ mi, kaa nyɛ nya nɛ pee kake nɛ mi gbami ko ba nyɛ kpɛti, se mohu nyɛ kulaa nyɛ yi mi kɛ nyɛ juɛmi nɛ pee kake. 11Ejakaa mamimɛ, Kloe we mi bi ɔmɛ ba wo ye tue nɔ ke pɛ ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti. 12Nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ dee nɛ ɔ ji kaa nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ deɔ ke: “Ami lɛɛ, Paulo nɔ ji mi; ami lɛɛ, Apolo nɔ ji mi; ami lɛɛ, Kefa nɔ ji mi, ami lɛɛ Kristo nɔ ji mi.” 13Anɛ a gba Kristo mi lo? Anɛ Paulo a sɛu ha nyɛ ɔ lo? Aloo Paulo biɛ mi a baptisi nyɛ ngɔ wo ɔ lo?
14I naa Mawu si kaa i baptisi we nyɛ ti nɔ ko, kaa ja Krispo kɛ Gaio 15konɛ nɔ ko ko de ke i baptisi nihi ngɔ wo imi nitsɛ ye biɛ mi. 16Nɛ i baptisi Stefana we ɔ se nɛ ɔ ɔ, i li kaa i baptisi nɔ ko piɛ he hu lo. 17Ejakaa Kristo tsɔ we mi baptisimi, se mohu sane kpakpa a fiɛmi, nɛ pi ngɛ ni lemi munyuhi a mi tete, kone Kristo seumi tso ɔ nɛ ko pee yaka.
Kristo ji Mawu hewami kɛ e nilemi
18Ejakaa seumi tso ɔ he sane ɔ ji kuasiahi a sane ha nihi nɛ hɛ mi kpataa a, se wɔ nihi nɛ a heɔ wa yi wami ɔ, e ji Mawu he wami ha wɔ. 19Ejakaa fa ngma ke:
“Ma puɛ ni leli a ni lemi,
Nɛ ga leli a ga a hu ma ha e pee yaka.”
20Jije ni lelɔ ngɛ? Jije womi mi lelɔ ngɛ? Jije je nɛ ɔ mi sanemi hlalɔ ngɛ? Anɛ Mawu ha we nɛ je ɔ mi ni lemi ɔ nɛ plɛ kuasiahi a sane lo?
21Se akɛnɛ je ɔ gui Mawu ni lemi ɔ nɔ nɛ e kɛ e ni lemi ɔ nɛ le Mawu he je ɔ, e sa Mawu hɛ mi kaa e kɛ kuasiahi a sane ɔ nɛ a ngɛ fiɛe ɔ nɛ he nihi nɛ heɔ ye ɔ a yi wami. 22Ejakaa Yudafo ɔmɛ ɔ, okadihi a si a biɔ, nɛ Helabi hu hlaa ni lemi 23se wɔɔ lɛɛ, Kristo nɛ a sɛu ɔ wa fiɛɔ, nɔ nɛ plɛ kpangmi ha Yudafohi kɛ kuasiahi a sane ha majemajeli ɔmɛ; 24se nihi nɛ a tsɛ mɛ ɔ tsuo, Yudafohi jio, Helabihi jio, Kristo nɛ ji Mawu he wami kɛ Mawu ni lemi ɔ wa fiɛɔ ngɔ haa mɛ. 25Ejakaa Mawu kuasiahi a sane ɔ mi ngɛ ni lemi pe nimli a ni lemi, nɛ Mawu gbɔjɔmi ɔ he wa pe nimli a he wami.
26Mamimɛ, nyɛɛ hyɛ kaa nyɛ tsɛmi ɔ, tsa pi he lo blɔfami ni leli fuu nɛ a tsɛ, tsa pi he wali fuu, tsa pi odehehi fuu. 27Se mohu je nɛ ɔ mi kuaisa amɛ Mawu hla, kone e kɛ gbe ni leli ɔmɛ zo. Nɛ je nɛ ɔ mi gbɔjɔmi ni ɔmɛ hu Mawu hla konɛ e kɛ gbe nihi nɛ he wa amɛ zo. 28Nɛ je nɛ ɔ mi nihi nɛ a bui kɛ nihi nɛ a gbe he guɛ ɔ Mawu hla, kɛ nihi nɛ pi nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko ɔ tete, konɛ e ha nihi nɛ ji nɔ́ ko ɔmɛ nɛ pee yaka; 29benɛ pee nɛ he lo ko he lo ko ko fia ngɛ e hɛ mi. 30Se Mawu lɛ pee nɛ nyɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi, nɔ nɛ plɛ ni lemi nɛ je Mawu ngɔ kɛ dami kɛ he tsukɔmi kɛ kpɔmi ha wɔ ɔ, 31konɛ: “Nɔ nɛ ngɛ fiae ɔ, e fia ngɔ fɔ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɔ,” kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a.

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 2
Content:
Kristo ngɛ seumi tso ɔ nɔ he sane
1Imi hu, mamimɛ, benɛ i ba nyɛ ngɔ ɔ, pi nyamitsɔmi loo nilemi fuu nɛ i kɛ ba ba jaje Mawu laami sane ɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ; 2ejakaa i to we imi nitsɛ ye yi mi kaa ma le nɔ ko ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti, kaa ja Yesu Kristo, nɔ nɛ a sɛu ɔ. 3Nɛ i kɛ nyɛ hi si ngɛ gbɔjɔmi kɛ gbeyeyemi kɛ hedomi babauu mi; 4nɛ ye munyu kɛ ye sanefiɛmi ɔ hu ji nimli a nilemi munyuhi nɛ plɛɛ nɔ yi mi mi, se mohu e je mumi kɛ hewami tsɔɔmi mi, 5benɛ pee nɛ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ ko da nimli a nilemi nɔ, se mohu e da Mawu hewami nɔ.
Mawu nilemi
6Se kɛ ɔ, wa tuɔ nilemi munyu ngɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ a hi kɛ pi si ɔmɛ a kpɛti, se tsa pi je nɔ mi nilemi aloo je nɔ mi nikɔtɔmahi nɛ bee kɛ yaa amɛ a nɔ ʼi; 7se mohu Mawu nilemi nɛ a kɛ laa ngɛ laami sane mi ɔ wa deɔ, nɔ nɛ Mawu dla to ha wa hɛminyamiwomi loko a bɔ je ɔ, 8nɔ nɛ je nɔ mi nikɔtɔma amɛ a ti nɔ ko nɔ ko li ɔ; ejakaa a le jinɛ a be hɛminyami Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ sɛue. 9Se kaa bɔ nɛ pa ngma a:
“Nihi nɛ hɛngmɛ nɛ, nɛ tue hu nui,
Nɛ e bɛ nɔmlɔ ko tsui mi hyɛ
Ji nihi nɛ Mawu dla ngɔ to nihi nɛ suɔ lɛ ɔ.”
10Se wɔɔ lɛɛ, Mawu gu E mumi ɔ nɔ je kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ wɔ; ejakaa Mumi ɔ hlaa nihi kulaa mi, Mawu nihi nɛ mi kuɔ tete. 11Se nimli a kpɛti mɛnɔ le nihi nɛ ngɛ nɔmlɔ mi, kaa ja nɔmlɔ ɔ mumi nɛ ngɛ e mi ɔ? Ja nɔuu kɛ̃ Mawu mi ni ɔmɛ hu nɔ ko nɔ ko li, kaa ja Mawu mumi ɔ. 12Wɔɔ lɛɛ, pi je nɔ mi mumi ɔ nɛ wa na, se mohu mumi nɛ je Mawu mi ɔ, konɛ waa le nihi nɛ Mawu kɛ dloo wɔ ɔ.
13Kɔlɔɔmɛ hu wa deɔ, pi nimli a nilemi munyuhi nɛ waa kɛ deɔ, se mohu munyuhi nɛ Mumi ɔ tsɔɔ ɔ, nɛ waa kɛ mumi mi nihi toɔ mumi mi nihi a he. 14Se nɔmlɔ su nɛ a kɛ fɔ lɛ ɔ he we Mawu Mumi ɔ ni ɔmɛ; ejakaa e peɔ lɛ kaa kuasiahi a sane ʼi, nɛ e nɛ́ nya, ejaka mumi a kɛ hlaa nya. 15Mumi mi nɔmlɔ ɔ kojoɔ nihi kulaa, se lɛɛ, nɔ ko nɔ ko kojo we lɛ. 16“Ejakaa mɛnɔ lɛ le Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ juɛmi, nɛ e maa tsɔɔ lɛ ni?” Se wɔɔ lɛɛ wa hɛɛ Kristo juɛmi.

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 3
Content:
Mawu sɔmɔli
1Mamimɛ, i be nyɛe nɛ i kɛ nyɛ maa tu munyu kaa mumi mi nimli, se mohu kaa he lo mi nimli, kaa bimwɔwi ngɛ Kristo mi. 2Nyɔ i ha nyɛ, se tsa pi ngma nɛ jiɔ, ejakaa nyɛ nyɛ́ we. Nɛ jeha nɛ hu tete nyɛ nyɛ́ we kɛ mwɔɔ, 3ejakaa he lo mi nimli ji nyɛ kɛ mwɔɔ. Se be abɔ nɛ hungajemi kɛ pɛ ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti kɛ mwɔɔ nɛ ɔ, anɛ pi he lo mi nimli ji nyɛ nɛ nimli a je mi nyɛ ngɛ bae ɔ lo? 4Ejakaa benɛ nɔ ko ke: “Ami lɛɛ, Paulo nɔ ji mi; nɛ nɔ ko hu ke: Ami lɛɛ, Apolo nɔ ji mi” ɔ, anɛ pi he lo mi nimli ji nyɛ lo?
5Jeha nɛ Apolo ji mɛnɔ? Paulo ji mɛnɔ? Mɛ ji sɔmɔli nɛ nyɛ gu a nɔ he ye, nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ ɔ, bɔ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kɛ ha lɛ ɔ.
6Imi lɛɛ i ma; Apolo pue nɔ nyu; se Mawu ha e wa. 7Blɔɔ jeha nɛ tsa pi nɔ nɛ ma a ji nɔ ko, nɛ pi nɔ nɛ pue nɔ nyu ɔ hulɔ, se mohu nɔ nɛ ha e wa nɛ ji Mawu ɔ. 8Se nɔ nɛ ma kɛ nɔ nɛ pue nɔ nyu ɔ tsuo ɔ kake ʼi; nɔ tsuaa nɔ ma na lɛ nitsɛ e hiɔwo ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e ni tsumi nya. 9Ejakaa Mawu he piɛli ni tsuli ji wɔ; Mawu cngmɔ, Mawu tsu ji nyɛ.
10Mawu dloomi nɛ e kɛ dloo mi ɔ nya a, i to tsu ɔ sisi kaa tsu fialɔ galɔ ko, se nɔ kpa lɛ fia nɔ. Se nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ hyɛ bɔ nɛ e ngɛ nɔ fiae ha a konɛ e hi. 11Ejakaa nɔ ko be sisi kpa ko nɛe maa to pe nɔ́ nɛ a to momo nɛ ji Yesu Kristo ɔ. 12Ke nɔ ko kɛ sika tsu, sika hiɔ, tɛ nɛ he jua wa, tsohi, nga loo go ma sisi tomi nɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ, 13a maa na nɔ tsuaa nɔ ni tsumi ɔ paa, ejakaa ligbi ɔ ma je lɛ kpo, ejakaa la mi e maa je kpo ngɛ, nɛ bɔ tsuaa bɔ nɛ nɔ ni tsumi ngɛ ɔ, la a nɔuu ma je lɛ si. 14Ke nɔ ko ni tsumi nɛ e fia ngɔ ma nɔ ɔ maa da si ɔ, e ma na hiɔwo; 15se ke nɔ ko ni tsumi maa sã a, e nine maa nyɛ si; se lɛ nitsɛ lɛɛ, a ma he e yi wami, se kɛ ɔ kaa nɔ ko nɛ gu la mi.
16Anɛ nyɛ li kaa Mawu sɔlemi tsu ji nyɛ nɛ Mawu Mumi ɔ hii nyɛ mi lo? 17Ke nɔ ko puɛ Mawu sɔlemi tsu ɔ, Mawu ma puɛ lɛ. Ejakaa Mawu sɔlemi tsu ɔ ngɛ klɔuklɔu, lɔ ɔ ji nyɛ.
18Nyɛ ti nɔ ko nɔ ko ko mlɔɔ lɛ nitsɛ e he. Ke nɔ ko susu kaa ni lelɔ ji lɛ ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti ngɛ je nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, e pee e he kuasia, konɛ e plɛ ni lelɔ. 19Ejakaa je nɛ ɔ mi ni lemi ɔ ji kuasiahi a sane ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi. Ejakaa a ngma ke: “Enuu ni leli ɔmɛ ngɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a hɛ mi temi ɔ mi.” 20Kɛ jeha nɛ hu: “Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ le ni leli a juɛmi ɔmɛ kaa yaka nihi.” 21Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nɔ ko nɔ ko ko fia ngɔ fɔ nimli a nɔ: se nihi kulaa a nyɛ nɔ ʼi, 22Paulo jio, Apolo jio, Kefa jio, je ɔ jio, wami jio, gbenɔ jio, nihi nɛ ngɛ nɛ ɔmɛ jio, nihi nɛ maa ba amɛ jio, kulaa a nyɛ nɔ ʼi; 23se nyɛɛ lɛɛ, Kristo nihi ji nyɛ, nɛ Kristo ɔ, Mawu nɔ ʼi.”

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 4
Content:
Kristo sɔmɔli
1Bɔ pɛ nɛ sa nɛ nimli nɛ bu wɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ, kaa Kristo sɔmɔli kɛ Mawu laami sane ɔmɛ a nɔ sɔmɔli nikɔtɔmahi. 2Nɔ nɛ piɛ nɛ a hlaa ngɛ sɔmɔli nikɔtɔma amɛ a dɛ ji kaa, a na a ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ kaa anɔkualetsɛ. 3Se imi lɛɛ i bui lɛ sane slɔɔto ko kaa nyɛ kojoɔ mi aloo kaa a kɛ nimli a kojomi maa kojo mi; se imi nitsɛ ɔ, i kojo we ye he. 4Ejakaa i li nɔ ko yaya ko ngɛ imi nitsɛ ye he mohu, se kɛ ɔ pi lɔ ɔ he nɛ a maa wo mi nguɔ ngɛ; nɔ nɛ kojoɔ mi ji Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ. 5Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ ko kojo nɔ ko loko e su be ɔ, kɛ yaa su be nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ maa ba, nɔ nɛ kɛ diblii mi nihi nɛ a kɛ laa a tete maa ba la hɛ mi nɛ e ma je tsuihi a mi juɛmi ɔmɛ a si ɔ. Lɔ ɔ mi ɔ, nɔ tsuaa nɔ ma na e yi jemi kɛ maa je Mawu dɛ mi.
6Mamimɛ, nyɛ he nɛ i kɛ kikɛmɛ a ni nɔmɛ ngɛ i kɛ Apolo he toeɔ nɛ, konɛ nyɛɛ kase wɔ nɛ nɔ ko ko susu pe nɔ nɛ a ngma a, konɛ nyɛ ti nɔ ko kɛ he nɔ womi ko bu nɔ ko pe nɔ ko. 7Mɛnɔ ha eslo mo? Nɛ jeha nɛ mɛni o ngɛ nɛ pi nɛ a kɛ ha mo? Se ke pe a kɛ ha mo ɔ, mɛ he je o fiaa kaa nɔ nɛ pi nɛ pe a kɛ ha mo ɔ?
8Nyɛ tɔ mo, nyɛ na ni mo, nyɛ si wɔ se nɛ nyɛ ngɛ matsɛ yee. I na nɛ jinɛ nyɛ ngɛ matsɛ yee niinɛ, konɛ wɔ hu waa kɛ nyɛ nɛ ye! 9Ejakaa e peɔ mi kaa Mawu ngɔ wɔ nihi nɛ wa ji bɔfo ɔmɛ mohu ngɔ pee se kpɛli, kaa nihi nɛ a gbaa a nɔ ngɔ ha gbenɔ ejakaa a kɛ wɔ pee hyɛmi nihi ha je ɔ kɛ hiɔwe bɔfohi kɛ nimli. 10Wɔɔ lɛɛ, kuasiahi ji wɔ ngɛ Kristo he, se nyɛɛ lɛɛ ni leli ji nyɛ ngɛ Kristo mi. Wɔɔ lɛɛ, gbɔjɔli ji wɔ, se nyɛɛ lɛɛ, he wali ji nyɛ; nyɛ lɛ nyɛ hɛ mi ngɛ nyami, se wɔɔ lɛɛ wa hɛ mi be nyami. 11Kɛ ba su be nɛ ɔ tsuo ɔ, hwɔ kɛ kuma yee wɔ, nɛ wa nyɛɛ wa he gu, nɛ a gbaa wɔ mahi, nɛ wa be hi he tutuutu ko, 12nɛ wa gboɔ dengme waa kɛ wa ninehi tsuɔ ni; benɛ a ngɛ wɔ jɛe ɔ, wa ngɛ gbaae; benɛ a ngɛ wɔ yi mi wae ɔ, wa toɔ wa tsui si; 13benɛ a ngɛ wa biɛ puee ɔ, wa ngɛ pɛɛ kpae. Wa plɛ kaa je ɔ kuku nɔ nihi, nihi kulaa a dwɔmi kɛ ba su be nɛ ɔ.
14I ngmɛ́ nyɛ enɛ ɔmɛ nɛ ma kɛ gbe nyɛ zo, se mohu i ngɛ munyu tue kɛ ngɛ nyɛ tsɔɔe kaa ye bimɛ nɛ i suɔ. 15Ejakaa ke nyɛ ngɛ nɔ hyɛli akpe-nyɔngma tete ngɛ Kristo mi ɔ, kɛ ɔ pi tsɛmɛ fuu nɛ nyɛ ngɛ. Ejakaa i gu Sane Kpakpa a nɔ kɛ fɔ nyɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi. 16Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i kpaa nyɛ pɛɛ nɛ nyɛɛ kase mi. 17Enɛ ɔ he hulɔ nɛ i tsɔ Timoteo nɛ ji ye suɔmi bi kɛ anɔkualetsɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi ɔ nyɛ ngɔ ɔ nɛ; e ma kae nyɛ bɔ nɛ i baa ye je mi haa ngɛ Kristo mi, kaa bɔ nɛ i tsɔɔ ngɛ asafo tsuaa asafo mi, ngɛ he tsuaa he ɔ.
18Se akɛnɛ nyɛ ti ni komɛ susu kaa i be nyɛ ngɔ bae he je ɔ, a wo a he nɔ. 19Ke Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ suɔ ɔ, e be kɛe nɛ ma ba nyɛ ngɔ nɛ ma ba na ninɛmɛ nɛ woɔ a he nɔ ɔmɛ a he wami, se pi a munyu. 20Ejakaa tsa pi munyu mi nɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ, se mohu he wami mi. 21Kɛ nyɛ ngɛ lɛ hlae kɛɛ? Ma hɛɛ tso kɛ ba nyɛ ngɔ, aloo ma ba ngɛ suɔmi kɛ mi mi jɔmi mumi mi?

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 5
Content:
Ajuamabɔmi ngɛ asafo ɔ mi
1Angɛ de ngɛ nyɛ he niinɛ kaa ajuama bɔmi ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti, ajuama bɔmi nɛ be majemajeli ɔmɛ a mi tete, kaa nɔ ko maa ngɔ e tsɛ yo. 2Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ, mɛni he je nyɛ woɔ nyɛ he? Sa nɛ nyɛɛ ye kɔmɔ benɛ pee nɛ a je nɔ nɛ tsu kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ kɛ je nyɛ kpɛti. 3Imi nɛ i be nyɛ ngɔ ngɛ nɔmlɔ tso mi se mohu mumi mi i ngɛ ngɛ ɔ, i kojo nɔ nɛ tsu kikɛmɛ a nɔ́ nɛ ɔ mo, kaa nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ nyɛ ngɔ, nɛ i ke, 4ke nyɛ kpe ngɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo biɛ mi, nɛ ye mumi ɔ kɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo he wami piɛ nyɛ he ɔ, 5nyɛɛ ngɔ kikɛmɛ a nɔmlɔ nɛ ɔ ngɔ wo Satan dɛ mi, konɛ e he lo ɔ hɛ mi nɛ kpata, nɛ a he e mumi ɔ yi wami ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu ligbi ɔ nɔ.
6Nyɛ fiami ɔ be fɛu. Nyɛ li kaa ma sasɛ nyafii saa ma mluku ɔ kulaa lo? 7Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ je ma sasɛ momo ɔ, konɛ nyɛ plɛ ma he, kaa bɔ nɛ ma akpiti ji nyɛ ɔ; ejaaa a gbe wa Hetsɔmi To Bi nɛ ji Kristo ɔ ha wɔ. 8Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ ha waa ye Hetsɔmi bua jɔmi ligbi ɔ, pi kɛ ma sasɛ momo, nɛ jehanɛ hu pi kɛ yayami loo nɔ yayami peemi ma sasɛ, se mohu kɛ anɔkuale akpiti ngmingmiingmi.
9Ye womi nɛ i ngma nyɛ ɔ mi ɔ, i ke nyɛɛ kɛ ajuama bɔli ko bɔ. 10Pi je nɛ ɔ mi bimɛ a ti ya holi loo hɛ tsuli loo amim yeli loo wɔ jali a he munyu kulaa nɛ i ngɛ tue nɛ ɔ, ejakaa kaa mɛ jinɛ, ja nyɛ je je ɔ mi. 11Se jehanɛ, i ngma nyɛ ke ke nɔ ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ nyɛmi ɔ ji ajuama bɔlɔ loo hɛ tsulɔ loo wɔ jalɔ loo nɔ jɛlɔ, loo da delɔ loo amim yelɔ ɔ, lɛɛ nyɛɛ kɛ lɛ ko ye ni tete. 12Se ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ se ɔ, mɛni a kojomi kɔɔ ngɛ ye he? Anɛ pi ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ mi ɔ nɛ nyɛ kojoɔ lo? 13Ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ se ɔ, Mawu ji nɔ nɛ kojoɔ mɛ. Nyɛ je nɔ yayami ɔ ke je nyɛ kpɛti.

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 6
Content:
Munyu nɛ a kɛ nyɛmimɛ yeɔ
1Tse ke nyɛ ti nɔ ko kɛ e nyɛmi na sane ko ɔ, e jee blɔ nɛ e kɛ lɛ ya yeɔ ngɛ nihi nɛ ja we Mawu ɔ a ngɔ, se e kɛ lɛ yɛ ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a ngɔ lo? 2Anɛ nyɛ li kaa ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ ji ninɛmɛ nɛ maa kojo je ɔ lo? Nɛ ke nyɛ maa piɛ he nɛ a kojo je ɔ, anɛ nyɛ sɛ́ nihi nɛ kojoɔ munyu tsɔ wi lo? 3Anɛ nyɛ li kaa wa maa kojo hiɔwe bɔfohi tete po hluu nɛ e ba slɔ je nɛ ɔ mi munyuhi? 4Jehanɛ, ke nyɛ ngɛ je nɛ ɔ mi munyuhi komɛ a yemi ɔ, mɛ he je nyɛ haa nihi nɛ a bui mɛ ngɛ asafo ɔ mi yeɔ mɔ? 5Zo gbi nyɛ piɔ? Anɛ ni lelɔ kaketoo po be nyɛ kpɛti, nɔ nɛ ma nyɛ e nyɛmimɛ a kpɛti munyu nɛ e tu lo? 6Se mohu nɔ kɛ e nyɛmi yaa kojomi ngɛ nihi nɛ he we yi ɔmɛ po a ngɔ!
7Enɛ ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ gbee si mo, akɛnɛ nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛ he yeɔ munyu ɔ. Mɛ he je nyɛ ha we nɛ a ye nyɛ amim mohu? Mɛni he je nyɛ ha we nɛ a sisi nyɛ mohu? 8Se nyɛ mohu nyɛ peɔ nihi nɛ dɛ, nɛ nyɛ sisiɔ nihi nɛ ji nyɛ nyɛmimɛ tete. 9Anɛ nyɛ li kaa yayami peeli a nine be Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ nɔ sue lo? Nyɛ ko ha nɛ a mlɔɔ nyɛ! Ajuama bɔli loo wɔ jali loo gba puɛli loo nyumuhi nɛ kɛ nyumuhi peɔ yakayakani, 10loo juɔhi loo hɛ dooli loo da deli loo nɔ jɛli loo amim yeli a nine be Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ nɔ sue kulaa. 11Sa a, nyɛ ti ni komɛ ngɛ kikɛ; se jahanɛ a du nyɛ he, nɛ a kpale tsukɔ nyɛ he, nɛ a wo nyɛ nguɔ hulɔ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo biɛ kɛ wa Mawu ɔ Mumi ɔ mi.
Nyɛɛ ngɔ nyɛ nɔmlɔ tso ɔmɛ kɛ wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami
12I ngɛ nihi kulaa he blɔ mohu, se kɛ ɔ pi nihi kulaa nɛ hi. I ngɛ nihi kulaa he blɔ mohu, se i be hae nɛ nɔ́ ko nɛ ye ye nɔ. 13Ngma ngɛ ha muklii, nɛ muklii hu ngɛ ha ngma, se Mawu ma ha enyɔ ɔ kulaa se maa po. Nɔmlɔ tso ɔ, pi ajuama bɔmi he nɛ e ngɛ ngɛ, se mohu Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ he e ngɛ ngɛ, nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hu ngɛ ha nɔmlc tso ɔ. 14Nɛ bɔ nɛ Mawu tle Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ si kɛ je gbeje ɔ, ja e ma tle wɔ hu si ngɛ e he wami nya.
15Anɛ nyɛ li kaa nyɛ nɔmlɔ tso ɔmɛ ɔ Kristo he nihi ji mɛ lo? Lɛɛ ma ngɔ Kristo he ni ɔmɛ ngɔ pee ajuama he nihi lo? Dɛbi! 16Aloo nyɛ li kaa nɔ nɛ kɛ e he ya bɔɔ ajuama he ɔ, e kɛ lɛ plɛ nɔmlɔ tso kɛke lo? Ejakaa ngmami ɔ ke: “Mɛ ni enyɔ ɔ kulaa a ma plɛ he lo kake.” 17Se nɔ nɛ kɛ e he bɔɔ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ he ɔ, e kɛ lɛ peɔ mumi kake.
18Nyɛɛ tu ajuama bɔmi nya fo! Yayami tsuaa yayami nɛ nɔmlɔ peɔ ɔ, pi e nɔmlɔ tso ɔ mi nɛ e ngɛ; se nɔ nɛ bɔɔ ajuama a, e peɔ yayami siɔ lɛ nitsɛ e nɔmlɔ tso ɔ. 19Anɛ nyɛ li kaa nyɛ nɔmlɔ tso ɔ Mumi Klɔuklɔu nɛ ngɛ nyɛ mi nɛ nyɛ na kɛ je Mawu ngɔ ɔ sɔlemi tsu ʼi, nɛ nyɛ pi nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ nɔ lo? 20Ejakaa a he nyɛ kɛ jua wawɛ. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛ nɔmlɔ tso ɔ nɛ wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami.

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 7
Content:
Gbasihimi he sane
1Jehanɛ, ngɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ ngma ba ha mi ɔmɛ a he ɔ: E hi ha nyumu kaa e ko ta yo he; 2se ajuama bɔmi he ɔ, nyumu tsuaa nyumu nɛ ngɔ lɛ nitsɛ e yo, nɛ yo tsuaa yo nɛ gba lɛ nitsɛ e huno. 3Yotsɛ ɔ nɛ pee e yo ɔ blɔ nya ni ngɔ ha lɛ, nɛ yo ɔ hu nɛ pee ja nɔuu ngɔ ha e huno. 4Yo ɔ be he wami ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e nɔmlɔ tso nɔ, se mohu e huno ɔ lɛ ngɛ. Ja nɔuu kɛ̃ huno ɔ hu be he wami ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e nɔmlɔ tso nɔ, se e yo ɔ lɛ ngɛ. 5Nyɛ ko kua nyumu kɛ yo buami ja nyɛ ni enyɔ ɔ tsuo nyɛ kplɛɛ kaa nyɛ maa pee ja, kɛ ya su be ko, konɛ nyɛ na deka nɛ nyɛɛ sɔle; nɛ lɔ ɔ se ɔ nyɛɛ pee kake ekohu, konɛ Satan ko tsɔ nyɛ nya ngɛ nyɛ he nɔ nɛ nyɛ nyɛ we nɛ nyɛɛ ye ɔ he.
6I ngɛ enɛ ɔ dee ngɛ ga womi nya se pi ngɛ kita nya. 7Ke ka ye he ɔ jinɛ nimli kulaa nɛ hi si kaa bɔ nɛ i ngɛ nɛ ɔ; se nɔ tsuaa nɔ ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e dloomi nike ni kɛ je Mawu dɛ mi, nɔ ko nɔ́ kikɛ, nɛ nɔ ko hu ekpa.
8Nyumukuyo ɔmɛ kɛ yalɔyi ɔmɛ ɔ, i ngɛ mɛ dee ke: E hi ha mɛ ke a hi si kaa bɔ nɛ imi hu i ngɛ nɔ. 9Se ke a nyɛ we a he nɔ nɛ a ye ɔ, a sɛ gba si himi mi; ejakaa gba si himi hi pe nɔ́ nɛ akɔnɔ maa hao mo.
10Ninɛmɛ nɛ sɛ gba si himi mi ɔ, imi, nɛ tsa pi imi tete, se Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mohu lɛ ngɛ mɛ kita woe ke, yo ko je gba. 11Nɛ ke e je gba tete po ɔ, e hi si ja, nɛ e ko gba, aloo e kɛ e huno ɔ ya dla; nɛ yotsɛ ɔ hu e ko ngmɛɛ e yo he.
12Se ninɛmɛ nɛ piɛ ɔ, pi Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ, se imi i ngɛ mɛ dee ke: ke nyɛmi ko ngɛ yo ko nɛ he we yi, nɛ kɛ̃ ɔ yo ɔ kplɛɛ kaa e kɛ lɛ maa hi si ɔ, e ko ngmɛɛ e he. 13Nɛ ke yo ko hu ngɛ huno ko nɛ he we yi, nɛ kɛ̃ ɔ nyumu ɔ kplɛɛ kaa e kɛ lɛ maa hi si ɔ, e ko kua lɛ gbami. 14Ejakaa a tsukɔɔ nyumu nɛ he we yi ɔ hu he ngɛ yo ɔ mi, nɛ a tsukɔɔ yo nɛ he we yi ɔ hu he ngɛ huno ɔ mi. Ejakaa ke pi ja jinɛ nyɛ bimɛ ɔmɛ hu a he sɛ mu; se jehanɛ ɔ, a he tsɔ. 15Se ke nɔ nɛ he we yi ɔ ngɛ e he si sae kɛ yaa a, e ya; a yi nyɛmi nyumu lo nyɛmi yo nyɔguɛ ngɛ kikɛmɛ a sane nɛ ɔmɛ a mi. He jɔmi mi Mawu tsɛ wɔ ngɛ. 16Yo, mo o ma he o huno ɔ yi wami jio, o le? Aloo nyumu, mo hu lɛ o ma he o yo ɔ yi wami jio, o le?
Hii si bɔ nɛ Mawu tsɛ mo ɔ
17Bɔ nɛ Mawu dla ngɔ ha nɔ tsuaa nɔ kɛ bɔ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ tsɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ ha a, e hi si ja. Ja i to hulɔ ngɛ asafo ɔmɛ kulaa mi. 18Kɛ a po nɔ ko nɛ a tsɛ lɛ ɔ, e ko pee e he mɔmlɔtɔtsɛ; mɔmlɔtɔ mi a tsɛ nɔ ko ngɛ hu, e ko po e he. 19Nɔpomi pi nɔ́ ko, nɛ mɔmlɔtɔ hu pi nɔ́ ko, se Mawu kita amɛ a nɔ yemi mohu ji nɔ́ nɛ he hia. 20Nɔ tsuaa nɔ tsɛmi nɛ a tsɛ lɛ ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ mi nɔuu e hi. 21Ke nyɔguɛ ji mo nɛ a tsɛ mo jio, ko ha lɔ ɔ nɛ dɔ mo; se ke o ma nyɛ o he kpɔ ɔ, bɔɔ he mɔde. 22Nɔ nɛ a tsɛ lɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi nɛ e ji nyɔguɛ ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ odehe ʼi. Ja nɔuu kɛ̃ nɔ nɛ a tsɛ lɛ nɛ e ji odehe ɔ, Kristo nyɔguɛ ʼi. 23A he nyɛ kɛ jua wawɛ; nyɛ ko pee nyɛ he nimli a nyɔguɛhi. 24Mamimɛ, nɔ tsuaa nɔ ɔ, nɔ́ mi nɛ a tsɛ lɛ ngɛ ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ mi nɔuu e hi ngɛ Mawu mi.
Yihewi nɛ gba we kɛ yalɔyi a he sane
25Jehanɛ yihewi nɛ gba we ɔ, i be Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kita ko ha mɛ, se nɔ́ nɛ wi susuu ɔ i ngɛ dee, kaa nɔ ko nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ na lɛ mɔbɔ konɛ e ye anɔkuale.
26Jehanɛ, nɔ́ nɛ i susuu kaa e hi ji: Amlɔ nɛ ɔ he hiami nɛ ɔ he ɔ, e hi ha nɔmlɔ kaa e hi si bɔ nɛ e ngɛ ɔ. 27Ke a fi mo mɛtɛ yo he jio, ko hia pɛnemi; a pɛne mo kɛ je yo he jio, ko hia yo. 28Se ke o ngɔ yo hu ɔ, o pee we yayami; nɛ ke yiheyo hu gba a, e pee we yayami; se he lo blɔfami dengme ni nɛ ɔmɛ ma na, se imi lɛɛ, nyɛ he ya i ngɛ foe.
29Mamimɛ, nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ dee ji kaa, be ɔ pi hu; nɔ́ nɛ piɛ ji kaa, yitsɛmɛ tete a pee kaa ninɛmɛ nɛ be eko; 30nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ ya foe ɔ hu a pee kaa ninɛmɛ nɛ fo we ya; nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ nyae ɔ hu a pee kaa ninɛmɛ nɛ nya we; nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ heɔ hu a pee kaa ninɛmɛ nɛ be nɔ́ ko; 31nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ tsuɔ je nɛ ɔ he ni ɔ, a pee kaa ninɛmɛ nɛ tsu we he ni; ejakaa je nɛ ɔ, bɔ nɛ wa naa a bee kɛ yaa.
32Se i suɔ kaa nyɛ ko na haomi. Nɔ nɛ ngɔɛ yo ɔ, e kɛ e he tsuo haa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ni tsumi ɔ, bɔ nɛ e maa pee nɛ e sane nɛ sa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi. 33Se nɔ nɛ ngɛ yo ɔ, haoɔ e he ngɛ je nɛ ɔ mi nihi a he, bɔ nɛ e maa pee nɛ e sane nɛ sa e yo ɔ hɛ mi. 34Eslo yogbayo, nɛ jehanɛ hu eslo zangmayo. Nɔ nɛ gba we ɔ kɛ e he tsuo haa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ni tsumi ɔ, konɛ e pee klɔuklɔu ngɛ nɔmlɔ tso kɛ mumi tsuo blɔfami. Se nɔ nɛ gba a haoɔ e he ngɛ je nɛ ɔ mi nihi a he, benɛ pee nɛ e sane nɛ sa e huno hɛ mi.
35Enɛ ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ kpakpa he i ngɛ dee ngɛ, pi nyɛ kuɛ kpa nɛ i ngɛ woe, se mohu benɛ pee nɛ e pee fɛu, konɛ nyɛ sɔmɔ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ, nɛ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko nɛ ko doo nyɛ nya.
36Ke nɔ ko susu kaa e bi yo nɛ nɔ zangma a, e ko wa tsɔ loko e gba, nɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ e sa nɛ a pee he nɔ́ ko ɔ, e pee bɔ nɛ e suɔ; e pee we yayami ko ke e ya gba. 37Se nɔ nɛ daa si kpɛii ngɛ e tsui mi, nɛ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko fi we lɛ, se e ngɛ he wami ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e suɔmi nɔ ɔ, nɛ e ma nya si ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e tsui mi kaa e maa baa e bi zangmayo ɔ yi ɔ, e pee saminya. 38Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ nɛ ngɔ lɛ ha gba a e pee saminya, se nɔ nɛ kɛ lɛ ha we gba a pee saminya pe nɔ kaketsɛ ɔ.
39Yo ɔ, be abɔ nɛ e huno hɛ ngɛ nɛ ɔ ɔ, a kɛ mlaa fi lɛ; se ke e huno ɔ gbo ɔ, e ngɛ he blɔ kaa e gbaa nɔ nɛ e suɔ, se ja a pee ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi. 40Se ke e hi si bɔ nɛ e ngɛ ɔ, ye juɛmi nya a, e ngɛ bua jɔmi babauu; nɛ e peɔ mi kaa imi hu i ngɛ Mawu mumi.

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 8
Content:
Wɔhi a nya bɔsami niyeni
1Jehanɛ ngɛ wɔhi a nya bɔ sami niyeni ɔmɛ a he ɔ, wa le kaa “wɔ kulaa wa le ni.” Ni lemi haa nɔ woɔ e he nɔ, se suɔmi haa nɔ nane nuu si. 2Ke nɔ ko susu kaa e le nɔ́ ko ɔ, e li nɔ́ ko bɔ nɛ sa kaa e le. 3Se ke nɔ ko suɔ Mawu ɔ, lɛ Mawu le.
4Jehanɛ ngɛ wɔhi a nya bɔ sami niyeni a yemi he ɔ, wa le kaa wɔ ko wɔ ko pi nɔ́ ko ngɛ je nɛ ɔ mi, nɛ jehanɛ mawu ko mawu ko be ja Mawu kake kɛkɛ. 5Ejakaa ke ni komɛ ngɛ nɛ a tsɛɛ mɛ “mawuhi” ɔ, hiɔwe a ngɛ jio, zugba a nɔ a ngɛ jio, kaa bɔ nɛ “mawuhi” pɔ he nɛ “nyɔmtsɛmɛ” hu pɔ he ɔ, 6kɛ̃ ɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ, Mawu kaketoo wa ngɛ, Tsɛ ɔ, nɔ mi nɛ nihi kulaa je nɛ wa ngɛ ha lɛ ɔ, kɛ Nyɔmtsɛ kake hu nɛ ji Yesu Kristo ɔ, nɔ nɔ nɛ nihi kulaa gu kɛ ba nɛ wɔ hu wa gu e nɔ ɔ.
7Se kɛ ɔ pi nihi tsuo a mi nɛ kikɛmɛ a ni lemi nɛ ɔ ngɛ. Ni komɛ ngɛ kɛ ba su mwɔnɛ nɛ a kɛ wɔhi a nɔ hemi kɛ yemi yeɔ wɔhi a nya bɔ sami niyeni, nɛ akɛnɛ a he ni lemi gbɔjɔ he je ɔ, a bleɔ lɛ. 8Ngma kɛ wɔ yɛ Mawu hɛ mi; ke wa yeɔ ɔ, e ha we nɛ waa hi pe nine, nɛ jehanɛ ke wa yi hu, wa laa we nɔ ko.
9Nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ hi konɛ nyɛ he blɔ nɛ ɔ ko ba plɛ kpangmi ha nihi nɛ gbɔjɔ ɔmɛ. 10Ejakaa ke nɔ ko na mo nɛ ji “ni lelɔ” ɔ kaa o hii si ngɛ wɔ piɛ mi ngɛ ni yee ɔ, anɛ pi he wami nɛ o ngɛ nɔ nɛ gbɔjɔ ɔ he ni lemi woe konɛ e ya ye wɔhi a nya bɔ sami niyeni ɔmɛ lo? 11Lɔ ɔ lɛɛ, o “ni lemi” ɔ ma nyɛ ma ha nyɛmi nɛ gbɔjɔ nɛ Kristo ba gbo ngɛ lɛ hu e he ɔ hɛ mi ma kpata. 12Se ke nyɛ peɔ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ yayami kikɛ, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ plaa a he ni lemi nɛ he wɛ ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ Kristo nyɛ ngɛ yayami ɔ pee kɛ ngɛ sie ɔ nɛ. 13Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ke ngma ma ha ye nyɛmi nane ma kpata a, lɔɔ lɛɛ i be lo yee gblegbleegblee hu, konɛ ma ko ha ye nyɛmi ɔ nane nɛ kpata.

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 9
Content:
Bɔfo blɔ nya kɛ e nitsumi
1Anɛ i hɛɛ we ye he lo? Anɛ pi bɔfo ji mi lo? Anɛ i nɛ Yesu Kristo, wa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ lo? Pi ye nine nya ni tsumi ji nyɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi lo? 2Ke pi bɔfo ji mi kɛ ha ni kpahi ɔ, nyɛɛ lɛɛ i ji kɛ ha nyɛ; ejakaa ye bɔfo ni tsumi ɔ nya sɔumi nɔ ji nyɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi.
3Enɛ ɔ ji nɔ́ nɛ i kɛ faa ye he ngɛ nihi nɛ biɔ ye he sane ɔmɛ a hɛ mi. 4Anɛ wa be he blɔ kaa wa yeɔ ni nɛ wa nuu lo? 5Anɛ wa be he blɔ kaa waa kɛ nyɛmi yo nɛ ji wa yo nvɛɛ kaa bɔfo kpa amɛ hu kɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ kɛ Kefa? 6Aloo i kɛ Barnaba kɛkɛ lɛ be he blɔ kaa wa jɔɔ ni tsumi lo? 7Aslaafono te nɛɛ nɛ bɔ lɛ nitsɛ e he apaa kɛ ya ta hyɛ? Mɛnɔ lɛ peɔ wai ngmɔ nɛ e yi e mi yiblii ɔ eko? Aloo mɛnɔ lɛ lɛɛ lohwehi a kuu nɛ e nui a nyɔ nyu ɔ eko?
8Nɔ nɛ i ngɛ dee nɛ ɔ, anɛ nimli kɛkɛ lɛ peɔ ja? Anɛ mlaa hu de we ja nɔuu lo? 9Ejakaa a ngma ngɛ Mose Mlaa a mi ke: “Koo wo na nɛ gblɛɛ blɛfo ɔ nya kotoku.” Anɛ nahi a he nɛ dɔɔ Mawu he je 10nɛ pi wa he munyu nɛ e ngɛ tue nɛ ɔ lo? Ejakaa wa he nɔuu nɛ a ngma ke, nɔ nɛ huɔ ɔ, e kɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ hu, nɛ nɔ nɛ hluɛɛ blɛfo hu e hɛ nɛ hi nɔ kaa e maa ye eko. 11Ke wɔɔ lɛɛ wa duɔ mumi mi nihi haa nyɛ ɔ, anɛ e ji nɔ ko tsɔ kaa wa ma kpa he lo mi nihi lo? 12Jehanɛ hu ke ni kpahi ngɛ kikɛmɛ a he blɔ ngɛ nyɛ nɔ ɔ, anɛ pi wɔ mohu nɛ wa ngɛ pe mɛ po lo? Se kɛ ɔ, wa pee we kikɛmɛ a he blɔ nɛ ɔ he nɔ ko, se mohu wa to wa tsui si ngɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ mi, konɛ wa ko tsi Kristo Sane Kpakpa a blɔ? 13Anɛ nyɛ li kaa nihi nɛ tsuɔ ni ngɛ sɔlemi we ɔ, sɔlemi we ni ɔmɛ eko nɔuu a yeɔ lo? Nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ sɔmɔɔ ngɛ bɔ sami latɛ ɔ he ɔ, bɔ sami latɛ ɔ nɔ ni ɔmɛ eko nɔuu a naa lo? 14Jã nɔuu kɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ to kaa ninɛmɛ nɛ jajeɔ Sane Kpakpa a, a ye sane kpakpa a he ni.
15Se imi lɛɛ, i pee we kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ kake po he nɔ ko. Nɛ i ngmɛ́ enɛ ɔ konɛ a pee ja ngɔ ha mi, ejakaa ke ka nɔ́ nɛ nɔ ko ma ha ye fiami ɔ nɛ pee yaka a, afani nɛ i gbo mohu. 16Ejakaa ke i jaje sane kpakpa a po hu ɔ, e pee we mi fiami; ejakaa a ngɔ fi ye nɔ kaa ma jaje, ejakaa ke i jaje we sane kpakpa a, kusiɛ ha mi! 17Ejakaa ke imi nitsɛ ye suɔmi nya nɛ i tsu enɛ ɔ ɔ, i ngɛ hiɔwo, se ke pi suɔmi nya tete ɔ, a tu sɔmɔlɔ nɔkɔtɔma yemi ni tsumi ngɔ wo ye dɛ kɛ̃. 18Jehanɛ mɛni ji ye hiɔwo mɔ? Lɔ ɔ ji kaa ke i ngɛ sane kpakpa a jajee ɔ, ma jaje lɛ yaka, nɛ i he we nɔ ko ngɛ Kristo Sane Kpakpa a he, benɛ pee nɛ ma ko pee ye he blɔ nɛ i ngɛ ngɛ Sane Kpakpa a fiɛmi mi ɔ he nɔ ko tsɔ ko.
19Pohu i hɛɛ ye he nɛ i pi nɔ ko nɔ ko nyɔguɛ, kɛ̃ ɔ, i kɛ ye he pee nihi tsuo a sɔmɔlɔ, benɛ pee nɛ ye nine nɛ su nihi babauu a nɔ. 20I plɛ Yudafono ha Yudafo ɔmɛ benɛ pee nɛ ye nine nɛ su Yudafohi a nɔ. Ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ mlaa sisi hulɔ ɔ, i pee kaa nɔ ko nɛ ngɛ mlaa sisi ngɔ ha mɛ, pohu imi nitsɛ ɔ, i be mlaa sisi, benɛ pee nɛ ye nine nɛ su ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ mlaa sisi ɔmɛ a nɔ. 21I plɛ kaa nɔ ko nɛ be mlaa ngɔ ha ninɛmɛ nɛ be mlaa a, pohu i pi nɔ ko nɛ be Mawu mlaa; se mohu i ngɛ Kristo mlaa sisi, benɛ pee nɛ ye nine nɛ su ninɛmɛ nɛ be mlaa amɛ a nɔ. 22I plɛ kaa nɔ nɛ gbɔjɔ ha gbɔjɔli ɔmɛ benɛ pee nɛ ye nine nɛ su gbɔjɔli ɔmɛ a nɔ. I plɛ ye he nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ ngɔ ha nihi kulaa konɛ bɔ tsuaa bɔ nɛ pee ɔ ma kɛ he ni komɛ a yi wami.
23Sane Kpakpa a he nɛ i peɔ enɛ ɔmɛ kulaa ngɛ, benɛ pee nɛ imi hu ma na e mi ni ɔmɛ eko. 24Anɛ nyɛ li kaa ninɛmɛ nɛ tuu fo ɔ, mɛ kulaa a tuu mohu se nɔ kake kɛkɛ nɛ naa ayekoo ni ɔ lo? Nyɛɛ tu fo ɔ ja konɛ nyɛ nine nɛ su nɔ. 25Nɔ tsuaa nɔ hu nɛ kaa e he mi kɛ kunɔ ɔ, e hɛ kaa si ngɛ nihi kulaa mi. Jehanɛ mɛɛ lɛɛ a peɔ ja konɛ a na jlasi nɛ puɛɔ, se wɔɔ lɛɛ konɛ wa na nɔ nɛ puɛ we. 26Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, fo nɛ i ngɛ tue nɛ ɔ, i tui lɛ putuputu; kunɔ nɛ i ngɛ nɔe nɛ ɔ, pi kɔɔhiɔ nɛ i kɛ ngɛ nɔe; 27se mohu i gbaa imi nitsɛ ye nɔmlɔ tso ɔ mahi nɛ i yeɔ lɛ nyɔguɛ, konɛ imi nɛ i fiɛɛ ngɔ tsɔɔ ni kpahi ɔ, imi nitsɛ lɛɛ a ko sake mi ngɔ fɔ he.

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 10
Content:
Amagahi a he kɔkɔbɔmi
1Se, mamimɛ, i suɔ kaa nyɛ kai kaa wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ tsuo hi bɔ ku ɔ sisi, nɛ mɛ tsuo a po wo ɔ, 2nɛ a baptisi mɛ kulaa ngɔ wo Mose mi ngɛ bɔ ku ɔ kɛ wo ɔ mi, 3nɛ mɛ kulaa a, mumi mi niyeni kake ɔ nɔuu a ye, 4nɛ mɛ kulaa a nu mumi mi tɛ sa nɛ kɛ mɛ nyɛɛ ɔ mi nyu, nɛ tɛ sa a ji Kristo? 5Se kɛ̃ ɔ Mawu na we a ti nihi fuu a he tsui, ejakaa a kpata a hɛ mi ngɛ nga a nɔ.
6Se a kɛ enɛ ɔmɛ to wɔ okadi konɛ wa ko ha ni yayahi nɛ pee wɔ akɔnɔ kaa bɔ nɛ e pee mɛ ɔ. 7Jehanɛ hu nyɛ ko plɛ amaga jali kaa a ti ni komɛ pee ɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a ke: “Ma a be hi si, nɛ a ye ni, nɛ a nu da, kɛkɛ nɛ a te si nɛ a bɔni fiɛmi.” 8Nɛ jehanɛ hu wa ko bɔ ajuama kaa bɔ nɛ a ti ni komɛ bɔ nɛ ligbi kake nɔ ɔ nihi akpe nyingmi enyɔ kɛ etɛ yi tã a. 9Nɛ jehanɛ hu wa ko ka Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kaa bɔ nɛ a ti ni komɛ ka lɛ nɛ sinɔhi ba kpata a hɛ mi ɔ. 10Nɛ jehanɛ hu nyɛ ko tu munyu huitihuiti kaa bɔ nɛ a ti ni komɛ tu munyu huitihuiti nɛ nɔ́ puɛlɔ ɔ ba kpata a hɛ mi ɔ.
11A pee mɛ enɛ ɔmɛ kulaa nɛ a kɛ to okadi ha ni kpahi; nɛ a ngma kaa kɔkɔ bɔmi nɔ́ kɛ ha wɔ, wɔ nihi nɛ je ɔ nyagbe ligbi ɔmɛ na wɔ ɔ; 12benɛ pee nɛ nɔ nɛ susuu kaa e daa si ɔ, e hyɛ e he nɛ hi konɛ e ko nɔ si. 13Ka ko bɛ nyɛ nɔ nɛ pi nɔmlɔ he nɔ́; se anɔkualetsɛ ji Mawu, nɔ nɛ be hae nɛ a ka nyɛ pe bɔ nɛ nyɛ ma nyɛ, se mohu e kɛ ka a nɔuu maa je blɔ ha nyɛ nɛ nyɛɛ je mi hulɔ, konɛ nyɛ nyɛ nya nɛ nyɛɛ da.
14Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mamimɛ, nyɛɛ tu wɔ jami nya fo! 15I kɛ nyɛ ngɛ munyu tue kaa a kɛ ni leli tuɔ munyu; nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ kɔ nɔ nɛ i ngɛ dee ɔ se. 16Gbaami kplu ɔ nɛ wa gbaa a, anɛ pi waa kɛ Kristo kake peemi ngɛ e muɔ ɔ mi lo? Abolo nɛ wa kuɔ ɔ, anɛ pi waa kɛ Kristo kake peemi ngɛ e nɔmlɔ tso ɔ mi lo? 17Ejakaa abolo kake ʼi, nɛ wɔ fuu ɔ, nɔmlɔ tso kake ji wɔ, ejakaa wɔ kulaa wa yeɔ abolo kake ɔ eko.
18Nyɛɛ hyɛ he lo blɔfami Israel ɔ; anɛ nihi nɛ yeɔ bɔ sami ni ɔmɛ ɔ pi huɛ nɛ a kɛ bɔ sami latɛ ɔ ngɛ bɔe ɔ lo? 19Lɛɛ kɛ i ngɛ tsɔɔe kɛɛ ɔ? Kaa amaga ji nɔ ko, aloo kaa amaga bɔ ji nɔ ko? 20Dɛbi, se mohu i ngɛ dee ke bɔ nɛ wɔ jali ɔmɛ saa a, mumi yayamihi a saa ngɔ haa se pi Mawu; se i sume kaa nyɛɛ kɛ mumi yayamihi bɔɔ huɛ. 21Nyɛ be Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kplu ɔ kɛ mumi yayamihi a kplu ɔ nyɛe maa nu si kake. Nyɛ be Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ okplɔɔ ɔ nɔ ni kɛ mumi yayamihi a nɔ ɔ nɔ ni nyɛe maa ye si kake. 22Aloo Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi mi la wa ngɛ woe? Anɛ wa he wa pe lɛ lo?
23“Wa ngɛ nihi tsuo he blɔ,” se pi nihi tsuo nɛ hi. “Wa ngɛ nihi tsuo he blɔ,” se pi nihi tsuo nɛ haa nɔ nane nuu si. 24Nɔ ko nɔ ko nɛ ko plee ngɔ ha lɛ nitsɛ e he, se mohu nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ plee ngɔ ha e nyɛmi.
25Nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ a ngɛ juae ngɛ lo jua nɔ ɔ, nyɛɛ ye; se he ni lemi he ɔ, nyɛ ko bi mi; 26ejakaa “zugba a kɛ e mi ni ɔmɛ kulaa a, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɔ ʼi.”
27Ke nihi nɛ he we yi ɔmɛ a ti nɔ ko kpee nyɛ ni yemi nɛ nyɛ suɔ kaa nyɛ maa ya a, nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ a kɛ maa ma nyɛ hɛ mi ɔ, nyɛɛ ye nɛ nyɛ ko bi mi, ngɛ he ni lemi he. 28Se ke nɔ ko de nyɛ ke: “Enɛ ɔ lɛɛ amaga bɔ sami nihi ʼi” ɔ, nyɛ ko ye ngɛ nɔ nɛ wo nyɛ tue nɔ ɔ kɛ he ni lemi he je. 29Se he ni lemi nɛ i ngɛ dee nɛ ɔ ɔ, pi mo nitsɛ o nɔ ɔ, se mohu nɔ kpa nɔ ɔ. Se mɛ he je nɔ kpa he ni lemi maa kojo ye he yemi ɔ? 30Ke sina i kɛ ye ɔ, mɛ he je a tuɔ ye he munyu yaya ngɛ nihi nɛ i na si ngɛ he ɔmɛ a he?
31Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ke ni nyɛ ngɛ yee jio, ni nyɛ ngɛ nue jio, aloo nɔ kpa ko nɛ nyɛ ngɛ pee jio, nyɛɛ pee kulaa kɛ wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami. 32Nyɛ ko pee kpangmi ngɔ ha Yudafohi kɛ Helabihi kɛ Mawu asafo ɔ kulaa; 33kaa bɔ nɛ imi hu i suɔ kaa nihi kulaa mi ɔ ma sa nihi kulaa a hɛ mi, nɛ i hla we nɔ́ nɛ hi ha imi nitsɛ ye he, se mohu nɔ́ nɛ hi ha nihi fuu, konɛ a he a yiwami.

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 11
Content:
Yinɔhami ngɛ sɔlemi
1Nyɛɛ kase mi kaa bɔ nɛ imi hu i kaseɔ Kristo ɔ. 2Se, mamimɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ yi jee kaa nyɛ kaii mi ngɛ nihi tsuo mi, nɛ tsɔɔmihi nɛ i kɛ ha nyɛ ɔ, nyɛ hɛɛ mi bɔ pɛ nɛ i kɛ ha nyɛ ɔ. 3Se i suo kaa nyɛɛ le kaa nyumu tsuaa nyumu yi ji Kristo, nɛ yo tsuaa yo hu yi ji nyumu, nɛ Kristo yi ji Mawu. 4Nyumu nɛ sɔlee aloo e gbaa nɛ e kɛ nɔ́ ko haa e yi ɔ nɔ ɔ, e ngɛ e yi ɔ he guɛ gbee. 5Se yo tsuaa yo nɛ sɔlee aloo e gbaa nɛ e hɛ̃ɛ e yi ɔ nɔ gu ɔ, lɛ hu e ngɛ e yi ɔ he guɛ gbee; ejakaa e ngɛ kaa nɔ́ nɛ e sɛ e yi nɔuu kɛ. 6Ejakaa ke yo hɛ́ e yi ɔ nɔ ɔ, lɛɛ e sã e yi ɔ nɔ mɔ.
