Se ke e ngɛ lɛ zo pee kaa e ma sã eyi ɔ nɔ loo e maa sɛ e yi ɔ, lɛɛ e ha e yi ɔ nɔ mɔ. 7Se nyumu lɛɛ, e sɛ kaa e haa e yi ɔ nɔ, ejakaa Mawu subai kɛ e hɛ mi nyami ji lɛ; se yo lɛɛ, nyumu hɛ mi nyami ji lɛ. 8Ejakaa nyumu ji yo mi, se yo mohu lɛɛ je nyumu mi. 9Nɛ jehanɛ hu, a bɔɛ nyumu ngɛ yo he se yo mohu a bɔ ngɛ nyumu he. 10Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ngɛ hiɔwe bɔfo ɔmɛ a he ɔ, e sa nɛ yo nɛ na he wami he okadi ko ngɛ e vi ɔ nɔ. 11Ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi ɔ, nyumu ko si yo se, nɛ ɔ hu ko si nyumu se. 12Ejakaa kaa bɔ nɛ yo je nyumu mi ɔ, ja nɔuu kɛ nyumu hu gu yo mi kɛ ba; se nihi kulaa je Mawu mi.
13Nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ hla mi ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti. Anɛ e ngɛ fɛu kaa yo maa sɔle ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi nɛ e hɛ́ e yi nɔ lo? 14Anɛ fɔmi su nitsɛ tsɔɔ we nyɛ kaa, ke nyumu fia e yi kusuu ɔ, e ngɛ zo ha lɛ, 15se yo lɛɛ ke e fia e yi kusuu ɔ, e ji hɛ mi nyami ha lɛ lo? Ejakaa a kɛ yi bwɔmi ɔ ha lɛ kaa he hami nɔ. 16Se ke nɔ ko suɔ kaa e pee e he nya sãlɔ ngɛ enɛ ɔ he ɔ, wɔɔ lɛɛ wa pee we ja, nɛ Mawu asafo ɔmɛ hu pee we ja.
Nyɔmtsɛ Niyeni ɔ
17Kita nɛ i ngɛ nyɛ woe nɛ ɔ, pi nyɛ yi nɛ i kɛ ngɛ jee, ejakaa ke nyɛ kpe ɔ, nɔ́ kpakpa ko ji mi, se mohu nɔ́ yaya lɛ jee mi. 18Se kekleekle ɔ, i nuɔ kaa ke nyɛ ya bua nyɛ he nyɛ ngɛ asafo ɔ mi ɔ, mi gbamihi ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti, nɛ i heɔ yeɔ fã kɛ fã; 19ejakaa e sa kaa migbami nɛ te si ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti konɛ ni kpakpa amɛ a je a he si paa ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti. 20Jehanɛ ke nyɛ nya ba bua ngɛ he kake ɔ, pi Nyɔmtsɛ Niyeni ɔ yemi nɛ nyɛ ba; 21ejakaa kikɛmɛ a nyɛ ni yemi nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, nɔ tsuaa nɔ ngɔɔ lɛ nitsɛ e ni ye ni nɛ e yeɔ, nɛ benɛ hwɔ ngɛ nɔ ko yee ɔ, blɔɔ nɔ ko de da. 22Anɛ nyɛ be wehi nɛ nyɛ maa ye ni nɛ nyɛ maa nu ngɛ lejɛ ɔmɛ lo? Aloo Mawu asafo ɔ he guɛ nyɛ ngɛ gbee, nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nihi nɛ be nɔ́ ko ɔmɛ a hɛ mi si puee ɔ? Kɛ ma de nyɛ kɛɛ? Ma je nyɛ yi lo? Enɛ ɔ lɛɛ i be nyɛ yi jee ngɛ he.
23Ejakaa imi nitsɛ nɔ́ nɛ i na kɛ je Nyɔmtsɛ dɛ mi nɛ i kɛ ha nyɛ ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ, kaa: Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu ɔ, jamɛ a nyɔ ɔ mi nɔuu nɛ a tsɔɔ e se blɔ ɔ, e kɛ̃ abolo, 24nɛ e na si, nɛ e kuɔ mi, nɛ e ke: “Enɛ ɔ ji ye nɔmlɔ tso nɛ a kuɔ ngɛ nyɛ ke. Nyɛɛ pee e nɛ ɔ nɛ nyɛ kɛ kai mi.” 25Ja nɔuu e wo kplu ɔ hu ngɛ niyeni ɔ se, nɛ e ke: “Kikɛmɛ a kplu nɛ ɔ ji somi he ɔ ngɛ ye muɔ ɔ mi. Nyɛɛ pee enɛ ɔ; si abɔ nɛ nyɛ maa nu ɔ nɛ nyɛ kɛ kai mi.” 26Ejakaa si abɔ nɛ nyɛ yeɔ kikɛmɛ a bolo nɛ ɔ, nɛ nyɛ nuu kikɛmɛ a kplu nɛ ɔ hulɔ ɔ, nyɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ gbenɔ ɔ jajee kɛ ngɛ tsɔɔe kɛ maa su be nɛ e maa ba.
27Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ yeɔ kikɛmɛ a abolo nɛ ɔ nɛ e nuu Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kplu ɔ bɔ nɛ sɛ́ ɔ, e ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɔmlɔ tso ɔ kɛ e muɔ ɔ nɔ tɔe. 28Nɔmlɔ nɛ ka lɛ nitsɛ e he loko e ye abolo nɛ ɔ eko nɛ e nu kplu nɛ ɔ eko; 29ejakaa nɔ nɛ yeɔ nɛ e nuu bɔ nɛ sɛ́ ɔ, kojomi mohu e yeɔ nɛ e nuu haa e he ejakaa e bui Nyɔmtsɛ e nɔmlɔ tso ɔ. 30Kɔlɔ ɔ he hu nɛ nyɛ ti nihi fuu ngɛ gboe nɛ a he wɛ mɛ, nɛ nihi babauu hu gbo nɛ ɔ nɛ. 31Se e ji wa kaa wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa he hyɛɛ jinɛ a be wɔ kojoe. 32Se ke a kojo wɔ ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ tsɔsemi ʼi, benɛ pee nɛ a ko bu wɔ kɛ je ɔ kulaa fɔ.
33Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mamimɛ, ke nyɛ nya ba bua nɛ nyɛ maa ye ni ɔ, nyɛɛ mlɛ nyɛ sibi. 34Se ke hwɔ ngɛ nɔ ko yee ɔ, e ye ni ngɛ we mi lolo, benɛ pee nɛ nyɛ he nya buami ɔ ko tsɛ kojomi ha nyɛ. Nihi nɛ piɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, ke i ba a, ma to mɛ blɔ nɔ.

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 12
Content:
Mumi mi dloomi nike nihi
1Jehanɛ, mamimɛ, i suɔ kaa ma ha nyɛɛ le nɔ́ ko ngɛ mumi mi nihi a he. 2Nyɛ le kaa benɛ nyɛ ji wɔ jali ɔ, amaga mumuihi a ngɔ a kpaka nyɛ kɛ ya, bɔ tsuaa bɔ nɛ a kpaka nyɛ ha a. 3Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i ngɛ hae nɛ nyɛɛ le kaa, nɔ nɛ tuɔ munyu ngɛ Mawu mumi mi ɔ, de we ke Yesu ɔ musutsɛ ji lɛ, nɛ nɔ ko be nyɛe ma de ke Yesu ji Nyɔmtsɛ hulɔ, kaa ja Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ kpaka lɛ.
4Dloomi nike nihi slɔɔtohi ngɛ, se mumi kake ɔ nɔuu lɛ haa. 5Sɔmɔmi ni tsumihi slɔɔtohi hu ngɛ, se Nyɔmtsɛ kake ɔ nɔuu a kɛ sɔmɔɔ; 6nɛ ni tsumihi slɔɔtohi hu ngɛ, se Mawu kake ɔ nɔuu ji nɔ nɛ tsuo kulaa ngɛ nihi kulaa mi. 7Se nɔ tsuaa nɔ ɔ, a haa Mumi ɔ jeɔ e he kpo ngɛ e mi konɛ e hi ha nihi. 8Mumi ɔ haa nɔ ko ni lemi munyu; nɛ nɔ ko hu jamɛ a Mumi ɔ nɔuu haa lɛ nihi a sisi nami he ni lemi. 9Lɛ Mumi ɔ nɔuu haa nɔ ko hemi kɛ yemi; nɛ nɔ kpa hu tsami dloomi nike nihi, 10Nɔ ko ɔ, he wami nihi a tsumi; nɔ ko ɔ gbami; nɔ ko hu mumihi a si kpami; nɔ ko hu gbi slɔɔtohi a tumi; nɛ nɔ kpa hu munyuhi a sisi tsɔɔmi. 11Se kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ kulaa a, Mumi kake ɔ nɔuu lɛ tsuo, nɛ e dlaa ngɔ haa nɔ tsuaa nɔ kakaaka, bɔ nɛ e suɔ.
Nɔmlɔ tso kake kɛ e he nihi slɔɔtohi
12Ejakaa kaa bɔ nɛ nɔmlɔ tso ɔ kake ʼi, se e hɛɛ he nihi fuu, nɛ nɔmlɔ tso ɔ he nihi fuu ɔ kulaa ji nɔmlɔ tso kake ɔ, ja nɔuu hu ji Kristo. 13Ejakaa Yudafohi ji wɔ jio, Helabihi ji wɔ jio, nyɔguɛhi jio, he yeli jio, wɔ tsuo ɔ Mumi kake mi a gu a baptisi wɔ ngɔ wo nɔmlɔ tso kake mi; nɛ wɔ tsuo Mumi kake akɛ ha wɔ nɛ waa nu.
14Ejakaa nɔmlɔ tso ɔ hu pi he nɔ kake ʼi, se fuu ʼi. 15Ke nane ma de ke: “Akɛnɛ i pi nine he je ɔ, i pi nɔmlɔ tso ɔ he ni ɔmɛ eko” ɔ, anɛ enɛ ɔ he je ɔ, e pi nɔmlɔ tso ɔ he ni ɔmɛ eko lo? 16Nɛ ke tue hu ma de ke: “Akɛnɛ i pi hɛngmɛ he je ɔ, i pi nɔmlɔ tso ɔ he ni ɔmɛ eko” ɔ, anɛ enɛ ɔ he je ɔ, e pi nɔmlɔ tso ɔ he ni ɔmɛ eko lo? 17Ke nɔmlɔ tso mluku ɔ kulaa ji hɛngmɛ ɔ, jije nɔ numi ngɛ? Ke nɔ numi sɔuu ʼi ɔ, jije nɔ he fu numi ɔ ngɛ? 18Se jehanɛ Mawu kɛ he nɔ́ tsuaa he nɔ́ ma nɔmlɔ tso ɔ he bɔ nɛ e suɔ. 19Se ke mɛ kulaa ji he nɔ́ kake ɔ, jije nɔmlɔ tso ɔ ngɛ? 20Se jehanɛ he nihi fuu ʼi mohu, se nɔmlɔ tso kake ʼi.
21Hɛngmɛ be nyɛe ma de nine ke: “I be o he ni tsumi;” nɛ jehanɛ hu yi be nyɛe ma de nanehi ke: “I be nyɛ he ni tsumi.” 22Nɔmlɔ tso ɔ he nihi nɛ peɔ wɔ kaa a he wɛ́ kulaa a, mɛ mohu a he hiaa wɔ titli, 23nɛ nihi nɛ e peɔ wɔ kaa a ji nɔmlɔ tso he nihi nɛ hɛ mi be nyami kulaa a, kɔlɔ ɔmɛ titli a hɛ mi nyami wa woɔ, nɛ wa he nihi nɛ be fɛu ɔ mohu naa he fɛu; 24se wa he nihi nɛ ngɛ fɛu momo ɔ, a hia we hɛ mi nyami womi. Se Mawu tsla nɔmlɔ tso ɔ ngɛ blɔ nɔ nɛ nɔ́ nɛ piɛ lɛ nɔ́ ko ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ titli e kɛ bu haa; 25konɛ mi gbami nɛ ko ba nɔmlɔ tso ɔ mi, se mohu he ni ɔmɛ nɛ baa a sibi a yi pɛpɛɛpɛ. 26Nɛ ke he nɔ kake ngɛ nɔ nae ɔ, he ni ɔmɛ kulaa kɛ lɛ naa nɔ. Nɛ ke he nɔ kake hɛ mi ba nyami hu, he ni ɔmɛ kulaa kɛ lɛ naa bua jɔmi.
27Jehanɛ nyɛ tsuo ɔ, Kristo nɔmlɔ tso ji nyɛ, nɛ kakaaka a, e he nihi. 28Nɛ kekleekle ɔ, Mawu wo ni komɛ bɔfohi ngɛ asafo ɔ mi, nɔ́ nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ, gbali, nɔ́ nɛ ji etɛ ɔ, tsɔɔli; kɔlɔ ɔ se ɔ he wami ni tsuli, kɔlɔ ɔ se ɔ, hiɔhi a tsami dloomi nike nihi, yemi kɛ buami, nɔyemihi, gbi slɔɔtohi a tumi. 29Anɛ nihi tsuo ji bɔfohi lo? Anɛ nihi tsuo ji gbali lo? Anɛ nihi tsuo ji tsɔɔli lo? Anɛ nihi tsuo ji he wami ni tsuli lo? 30Anɛ nihi tsuo lɛ ngɛ hiɔhi a tsami dloomi nike nihi lo? Anɛ nihi tsuo lɛ tuɔ munyu slɔɔtohi lo? Anɛ nihi tsuo lɛ tsɔɔ munyuhi a sisi lo? 31Nyɛ hɛ nɛ dɔ ngɛ dloomi nike nihi nɛ hi saminya amɛ a he. Nɛ ma kpale tsɔɔ nyɛ blɔ nɛ hi pe kulaa.

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 13
Content:
Suɔmi
1Ke i kɛ nimli kɛ hiɔwe bɔfohi a lilɛ tuɔ munyu se be suɔmi ɔ, lɛɛ i ngɛ kaa ayawa nɛ jijeɔ loo ngmlɛ nɛ pɛɛ. 2Nɛ ke i ngɛ gbami, nɛ i naa laami mi nihi kulaa nya, nɛ i le nihi kulaa, nɛ ke i ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi kulaa hulɔ, bɔ nɛ ma nyɛ yokuhi ma hia, se i be suɔmi ɔ, lɛɛ i pi nɔ́ ko? 3Nɛ ke i ngɔ ye nihi kulaa ngɔ ke nihi, nɛ ke i ngɔ ye nɔmlɔ tso ngɔ ha nɛ a sa mi, se i be suɔmi ɔ, i na we se ko.
4Suɔmi toɔ e tsui si, e mi mi hi; suɔmi ji hunga; suɔmi fiɛ̃, e pee we pupuupu, 5e pee we nihi nɛ sɛ, e plee we lɛ nitsɛ e nɔ he, e mi mi wui la, e kɛ nɔ tɔmi wui e mi. 6E nya we nɔ yayami he, se mohu e nyaa anɔkuale he? 7Suɔmi maa e nya ngɛ nihi kulaa mi, e heɔ nihi kulaa yeɔ, e ngɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi, e miaa e hɛ mi ngɛ nihi kulaa mi.
8Suɔmi se pui gblegbleegblee. Se ke gbamihi ʼi ɔ, a se maa po; ke munyuhi slɔɔtohi a tumi ʼi ɔ, a maa jɔɔ; ke ni lemi ʼi ɔ, e se maa po. 9Ejakaa wa ni nɛ wa le ɔ, fã kɛ fã ʼi, nɛ wa gbami hu fa kɛ fa ʼi. 10Se ke nɔ́ nɛ hi kɛ pi si ɔ ba a, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ nɔ́ nɛ ji fa kɛ fa a se maa po.
11Benɛ i ji bimwɔyo ɔ, i tuɔ munyu kaa bimwɔyo, i juɛɛ ni a he kaa bimwɔyo, i susuu kaa bimwɔyo; se benɛ i ba plɛ nyumu nɔkɔtɔma a, i sake bimwɔwi a ni ɔmɛ ngɔ pue se. 12Ejakaa mwɔnɛ mwɔnɛ ɔ, ahuhuɛ mi wa guu kɛ hyɛɛ nɔ tsuu, se jamɛ a be ɔ mi ɔ, hɛ mi kɛ hɛ mi. Mwɔnɛ mwɔnɛ ɔ, i le ni fã kɛ fã, sɛ jamɛ a bɛ ɔ ɔ mi ɔ, ma lɛ ni kɛ pi si kaa bɔ nɛ a le mi kɛ pi si ɔ.
13Se jehanɛ hemi kɛ yemi, hɛ kɛ nɔ tɔmi, suɔmi, kikɛmɛ a nihi etɛ nɛ ɔmɛ hii si; se suɔmi ji a kpɛti nɔ nɛ pe kulaa.

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 14
Content:
Mumi mi dloomi nike nihi
1Nyɛɛ di suɔmi se. Nyɛ hɛ nɛ dɔ ngɛ mumi mi nihi a he, se titli ɔ, gbami. 2Ejakaa nɔ nɛ tuɔ munyu kɛ lilɛ slɔɔto ko ɔ, pi nimli nɛ e kɛ ngɛ tue, se Mawu mohu, ejakaa nɔ ko nɔ ko nui, se mumi mi e ngɛ laami munyu ɔmɛ tue ngɛ. 3Nɔ nɛ gbaa a, nimli e gbaa ngɔ tsɔɔ konɛ e kɛ ha a nane nɛ nu si nɛ e bɔ mɛ kɔkɔ nɛ e jɔɔ a bua. 4Nɔ nɛ tuɔ munyu kɛ lilɛ slɔɔto ko ɔ, yeɔ buaa lɛ nitsɛ e he, se nɔ nɛ gbaa a, e yeɔ buaa asafo ɔ.
5Se i ko suɔ nɛ nyɛ tsuo nyɛ ko tu munyu kɛ lilɛ slɔɔtohi Se nɔ́ nɛ i ko suɔ titli ji kaa nyɛɛ gba, ejakaa nɔ nɛ gbaa a, e pe nɔ nɛ tuɔ munyu kɛ lilɛ slɔɔtohi, ja e tsɔɔ sisi hulɔ konɛ e ye bua asafo ɔ kulaa. 6Jehanɛ, mamimɛ, ke i ba nyɛ ngɔ ba tu munyu kɛ lilɛ slɔɔtohi nɛ pi kpo jemi loo ni lemi loo gbami loo ni tsɔɔmi ko ɔ, mɛni se i haa nyɛ naa?
7Kaa bɔ nɛ nihi nɛ wami be mi ɔ pɛɛ ɔ, bɛ jio, saku jio, ke e pɛmi ɔ mi tsɔ we ɔ, kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ a maa le nɔ nɛ a ngɛ kpae aloo nɔ nɛ a ngɛ fiae ɔ nɛɛ? 8Ejakaa ke titimati pɛ́ pɛmi nɛ ngɛ faii ɔ, mɛnɔ ma dla e he ngɔ to ta? 9Ja nɔuu kɛ nyɛ hu, ngɛ munyu tumi blɔfami ɔ, ke nyɛ tu we munyu nɛ sisi ngɛ faii ɔ, kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ a maa le nɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ dee ɔ? Ejakaa kɔlɔ ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ ngɛ kaa nihi nɛ ngɛ munyu tue woɔ kɔhiɔ mi. 10Gbi slɔɔtohi fuu ngɛ je ɔ mi mohu, se eko eko be nɛ be sisi. 11Se jehanɛ ke i nui munyu ɔ sisi ɔ, lɛɛ ma plɛ maje no ngɛ nɔ nɛ ngɛ munyu ɔ tue ɔ hɛ mi, nɛ nɔ nɛ ngɛ munyu ɔ tue ɔ hu ma plɛ maje no ngɛ ye hɛ mi. 12Be abɔ nɛ nyɛ hɛ dɔɔ ngɛ mumi mi nihi a he ɔ, ja nɔuu hu nyɛɛ bɔ mɔde konɛ nyɛɛ be nɔ ngɛ nihi nɛ ma ha asafo ɔ maa wa a mi.
13Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ nɛ tuɔ munyu kɛ lilɛ slɔɔto ko ɔ, e sɔle konɛ e nyɛ sisi hu nɛ e tsɔɔ. 14Ejakaa ke i sɔlee kɛ lilɛ slɔɔto ɔ, ye mumi ɔ sɔlee lɛɛ, se ye juɛmi ɔ piɛ we he. 15Jeha nɛ kɛ ma pee kɛɛ? I kɛ mumi maa sɔle, nɛ i kɛ juɛmi hu maa sɔle. Ma fia kɛ mumi, nɛ ma la kɛ juɛmi hulɔ. 16Ejakaa ke o kɛ mumi ngɛ Mawu yi jee ɔ, kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ li mi eko ɔmɛ a blɔ he ɔ ma de Amen ngɔ si o sina a nɔ, akɛnɛ e li nɔ nɛ o ngɛ dee ɔ? 17Moo lɛɛ, o ngɛ si nae saminya mohu, se kɛ ɔ, o yi bua we nɔ kpa a kulaa.
18I naa ye Mawu ɔ si kaa i pe nyɛ tsuo ngɛ gbi slɔɔtohi a tumi mi. 19Se ke ɔ, ngɛ asafo ɔ mi ɔ, i suɔ kaa i kɛ ye juɛmi nɛ tu munyu kakaaka enuɔ, konɛ ma kɛ tsɔɔ ni kpahi a ni mohu, pe nɔ nɛ ma tu munyu kakaaka akpe nyɔngma ngɛ gbi slɔɔtohi a mi.
20Mamimɛ, nyɛ ko pee nyɛ he jokuɛwi ngɛ juɛmi blɔfami, se yayami blɔfami ɔ, nyɛɛ pee nyɛ he bimwɔwi, se juɛmi blɔfami ɔ, nyɛɛ pee nyɛ he nihi nɛ a wa. 21A ngma ngɛ Mlaa a mi ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ke:
Gbi slɔɔtohi a mi kɛ nya slɔɔtohi a nɔ
Ma gu nɛ i kɛ kikɛmɛ a ma nɛ ɔ maa tu munyu,
Se lɔ ɔ hu tete a be mi tue bue.”
22Lɔ ɔ he ɔ gbi slɔɔtohi ɔmɛ ɔ a pi okadi ha ninɛmɛ nɛ heɔ yeɔ, se mohu a ji okadi ha ninɛmɛ nɛ he we yi. Gbami ɔ, e pi ninɛmɛ nɛ he we yi ɔmɛ a nɔ, se mohu ninɛmɛ nɛ heɔ ye ɔmɛ a nɔ.
23Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jehanɛ, ke asafo mluku ɔ tsuo nya ba bua ngɛ he kake, nɛ ni ɔmɛ tsuo kɛ gbi slɔɔtohi ngɛ munyu tue, nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ li mi eko aloo ninɛmɛ nɛ he we yi ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ hu ba lejɛ ɔ, anɛ a be dee ke nyɛ ngɛ godo nue lo? 24Se ke ni ɔmɛ kulaa ngɛ gbae, nɛ nɔ ko nɛ he we yi aloo e li mi eko ba lejɛ ɔ, ni ɔmɛ tsuo ma kã lɛ, ni ɔmɛ tsuo maa kojo lɛ, 25a ma je e tsui mi laami nihi a kpo paa nɛ lɔ ɔ ma ha e kɛ e hɛ mi ma bu si nɛ e ja Mawu, nɛ e maa jaje ke Mawu ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti niinɛ.
Blɔnyatomi ngɛ asafo ɔ mi
26Lɛɛ mɛni mɔ, mamimɛ? Ke nyɛ nya ba bua, nɛ nyɛ ti nɔ ko ngɛ la ko, nɔ ko hu ngɛ tsɔɔmi ko, nɔ ko ngɛ gbi slɔɔto ko, nɔ ko ngɛ kpo jemi ko, nɔ ko ngɛ sisi tsɔɔmi ko ɔ, a pee kulaa bɔ nɛ e maa ye bua nihi. 27Ke a ngɛ gbi slɔɔto tue ɔ, nyɛ ha ni enyɔ loo ke e hiɛ hluu ɔ, ni etɛ pɛ nɛ tu, kakaaka, nɛ nɔ kake hu nɛ tsɔɔ sisi. 28Ke sisi tsɔɔlɔ ko be ɔ, e ma e nya ngɛ asafo ɔ mi, se e tu munyu ha lɛ nitsɛ e he kɛ Mawu. 29Se gbali ɔmɛ ɔ, ni enyɔ loo ni etɛ nɛ tu munyu, nɛ nihi nɛ piɛ ɔ a susu he. 30Se ke a je nɔ ko kpo tsɔɔ nɔ ko nɛ hii si ɔ, nɔ nɛ ngɛ munyu ɔ tue ɔ e jɔɔ tumi. 31Ejakaa nyɛ tsuo nyɛ maa gba, kakaaka, konɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ kase nɔ ko nɛ a tu munyu ngɔ tsɔɔ nihi kulaa kɛ wo mɛ he wami. 32Gbali a mumi baa a he si haa gbali ɔmɛ, 33ejakaa Mawu ɔ, e pi basabasa peemi Mawu, se mohu he jɔmi Mawu, kaa bɔ nɛ e ngɛ ngɛ he tsɔli asafo ɔmɛ kulaa mi ɔ.
34Nyɛ ha yi ɔmɛ nɛ pee kɔ ngɛ asafo kpehi a mi, ejakaa a ngmɛ mɛ blɔ nɛ a tu munyu, se mohu a ba a he si kaa bɔ nɛ Mlaa a hu deɔ ɔ. 35Ke a suɔ kaa a kase nɔ ko ɔ, a bi mɛ nitsɛmɛ a hunomɛ ngɛ we mi. Ejakaa e ngɛ zo ha yihi kaa a maa tu munyu ngɛ asafo kpehi a mi.
36Anɛ nyɛ ngɔ Mawu munyu ɔ je? Aloo nyɛ kɛkɛ nyɛ ngɔ e ba? 37Ke e peɔ nɔ ko kaa gbalɔ loo mumi mi nɔmlɔ ji lɛ ɔ, e sa nɛ e le kaa nɔ nɛ i ngma nyɛ nɛ ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kita ʼi; 38se ke nɔ ko li enɛ ɔ ɔ, nyɛ ko le lɛ. 39Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mamimɛ, nyɛ hɛ nɛ dɔ ngɛ gbami he, nɛ gbi slɔɔtohi a tumi hu nyɛ ko tsi nya. 40A pee nɔ tsuaa nɔ bɔ nɛ ngɛ fɛu ngɛ blɔ nya blɔ nya.

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 15
Content:
Kristo sitemi
1Jehanɛ, mamimɛ, i ngɛ nyɛ kaie kaa Sane Kpakpa a nɛ i jaje tsɔɔ nyɛ nɛ nyɛ pɛtɛ he hulɔ nɛ nyɛ hɛɛ mi ɔ, 2kɔlɔ ɔ a kɛ heɔ nyɛ yi wami hulɔ, ke nyɛ pɛtɛ he bɔ nɛ i jaje tsɔɔ nyɛ ɔ, ke pi ja a lɛɛ nyɛ he ye yaka gu.
3Ejakaa sanehi nɛ he hia pe kulaa nɛ a kɛ ha mi nɛ imi hu i kɛ ha nyɛ ɔ ji kaa, Kristo gbo ngɛ wa he yayami ɔmɛ a he ngɛ ngmami ɔmɛ a nya, 4kaa a pu lɛ, nɛ a tle lɛ si ekohu ngɛ ligbi nɛ ji ligbi etɛ ɔ nɔ ngɛ ngmami ɔmɛ a nya; 5nɛ kaa e je e he kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ Kefa, lɔ ɔ se ɔ, ni nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ. 6Lɔ ɔ se ɔ, e je e he kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛmimɛ pe lafa enuɔ si kake, nihi nɛ a ti nihi fuu ngɛ kɛ ba su mwɔnɛ, se ni komɛ hu gbo. 7Lɔ ɔ se ɔ, e je e he kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ Yakobo, lɔ ɔ se ɔ bɔfo ɔmɛ tsuo kulaa.
8Se mɛ kulaa a se ɔ, e je e he kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ imi hulɔ nɛ i ngɛ kaa nɔ ko nɛ a kpatu fɔ lɛ ɔ. 9Ejakaa imi lɛɛ, i ji enɔ wayo kulaa ngɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ a kpɛti, nɛ i sɛ́ tete kaa a tsɛɛ mi bɔfo po, ejakaa i wa Mawu asafo ɔ yi mi. 10Se Mawu dloomi nya i kɛ ji nɔ nɛ i ji nɛ ɔ nɛ, nɛ e dloomi nɛ e kɛ dloomi ɔ pee we yaka; se mohu, i tsu ni wawɛɛ pe mɛ tsuo pɛpɛɛpɛ, se pi imi tete, se mohu Mawu dloomi nɛ kɛ mi ngɛ ɔ. 11Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jehanɛ, imi jio, mɛ jio, enɛ ɔ ji wa fiɛmi, nɛ enɛ ɔ hu ji nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ he ye.
Wa sitemi
12Jehanɛ ke a fiɛ ngɛ Kristo he kaa a tle lɛ si kɛ je gbeje ɔ, mɛni he je nɛ nyɛ ti ni komɛ deɔ ke ni gbogboehi a si temi ko be ɔ? 13Se ke ni gbogboehi a si temi ko be ɔ, lɛɛ Kristo hu a tle we lɛ si. 14Nɛ ke a tle we Kristo si ɔ, lɛɛ wa fiɛmi ɔ pee yaka, nɛ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ hu pee yaka gu. 15Jeha nɛ a kpa wɔ si kaa Mawu he lakpa odase yeli ji wɔ, ejakaa wa ye Mawu he odase kaa e tle Kristo si, nɔ nɛ, ke e ngɛ mi kaa ni gbogboehi ti si ɔ, lɛɛ e tle we lɛ si? 16Ejakaa ke a tle we ni gbogboehi a si ɔ, lɛɛ Kristo hu a tle we lɛ si. 17Nɛ jehanɛ ke a tle we Kristo si ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ pee yaka nɛ nyɛ fɔɔ si ngɛ nyɛ he yayami ɔmɛ a mi kɛ mwɔɔ; 18lɔ ɔ lɛɛ nihi nɛ gbo ngɛ Kristo mi ɔ hu laa. 19Ke wami nɛ ɔ mi kɛkɛ wa hɛ ngɛ Kristo nɔ ngɛ ɔ, wa ni ngɛ mɔbɔ pe nimli kulaa.
20Se anɔkuale ɔ ji kaa, a tle Kristo si kɛ je gbeje, e pee kekleekle nɔ ngɛ nihi nɛ gbo ɔmɛ a kpɛti. 21Ejakaa bɔ nɛ gbenɔ gu nɔmlɔ nɔ kɛ ba a, ja nɔuu si temi ɔ hu gu nɔmlɔ nɔ kɛ ba. 22Ejakaa, kaa bɔ nɛ Adam mi nɛ nihi kulaa gboɔ ngɛ ɔ, ja nɔuu kɛ̃ Kristo mi nɛ mɛ kulaa a yi ma na wa ngɛ. 23Nɔ tsuaa nɔ ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e blɔ he: Kekleekle nɔ ji Kristo, lɔ ɔ se ɔ nihi nɛ ji Kristo ni ɔmɛ ngɛ e bami ɔ mi. 24Lɔ ɔ se loko nyagbe ɔ maa ba, benɛ e maa ngɔ matsɛ yemi ɔ ngɔ ha Mawu nɛ ji Tsɛ ɔ; nɛ e maa po nɔ yemi kulaa kɛ he blɔ kulaa kɛ he wami kulaa se ɔ. 25Ejakaa ja Kristo ye matsɛ kɛ maa su be nɛ Mawu maa ngɔ henyɛli kulaa ngɔ wo e nane si. 26Nyagbe henyɛlɔ nɛ a ma kpata e hɛ mi ji gbenɔ. 27Ejakaa ngmami ɔ ke: “Mawu ngɔ nihi tsuo kulaa ngɔ wo e nane si.” Se ke e de ke a ngɔ nihi kulaa ngɔ wo e sisi ɔ, blɔɔ e ngɛ paa kaa nɔ nɛ ngɔ nihi kulaa ngɔ wo e sisi ɔ be mi. 28Se e benɛ a ngɔ nihi kulaa ngɔ wo Bi ɔ sisi ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ Bi ɔ nitsɛ hu maa ngɔ e he ngɔ wo nɔ nɛ ngɔ nihi kulaa ngɔ wo e sisi ɔ sisi, konɛ Mawu nɛ pee nihi kulaa yi.
29Ejakaa, kɛ nihi nɛ haa a baptisii mɛ ngɛ ni gbogboehi a nane mi ɔ maa pee kɛɛ? Ke ni gbogboehi be si tee kulaa a, mɛ he je mɔ nɛ a haa a baptisii mɛ ngɛ ni gbogboehi a nane mi ɔ? 30Mɛ he je wɔ hu wa naa amane ngmlɛfia tsuaa ngmlɛfia a? 31I na nyɛ he fiami nɛ i ngɛ ngɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ, kaa i gboɔ daa nɛ ɔ. 32Ke nimli a blɔfami nɛ i kɛ “lohwe dikali” hwu ta ngɛ Efeso ɔ, jinɛ mɛni se i naa? Ke ni gbogboehi ti si ɔ, “Nyɛ ha waa ye ni nɛ waa nu ni, ejakaa hwɔɔ ɔ wa ma gbo!”
33Nyɛ ko ha nɛ a sisi nyɛ. “Huɛ yaya bɔmi puɛɔ je mi bami kpakpa.” 34Nyɛ ha nyɛ hɛ mi nɛ tsɔ nyɛ saminya, nɛ nyɛ ko pee yayami; ejakaa nyɛ ti ni komɛ li nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko ngɛ Mawu he. I ngɛ enɛ ɔ dee nɛ ma kɛ gbe nyɛ zo.
Nɔmlɔ tso nɛ a kɛ maa te si
35Se eko ɔ nɔ ko ma bi ke: “Kɛ ni gbogboehi maa pee kɛ te si kɛɛ? Nɛ jehanɛ mɛni nɔmlɔ tso a ma kɛ ba?” 36Lohwe! Nɔ́ nɛ mo nitsɛ o du ɔ, ja e gbo lolo loko e yi ma na wa. 37Nɛ jehanɛ hu, nɔ́ nɛ o duɔ ɔ, pi tso nɛ maa puɛ ʼi, se mohu dumi wu ngmelu kɛkɛ, ke ngma jio, nihi nɛ piɛ ɔmɛ eko ʼi jio. 38Mawu haa wu ɔ tso bɔ nɛ e suɔ, nɛ wu tsuaa wu ɔ, e haa lɛ lɛ nitsɛ e tso.
39Pi he lo tsuo ji he lo kake, se mohu eslo nimli a he lo, nɛ e slo lohwehi a he lo, eslo nyu mi lohi a nɔ, nɛ eslo lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ a nɔ hulɔ.
40Hiɔwe nɔmlɔ tsohi ngɛ, nɛ zugba nɔ nɔmlɔ tsohi hu ngɛ; se kɛ ɔ eslo hiɔwe nihi a hɛ mi nyami, nɛ eslo zugba nɔ ni ɔmɛ hu a nɔ. 41Eslo pu hɛ mi nyami, nɛ eslo hlami hu hɛ mi nyami, nɛ eslo dodoehi a hɛ mi nyami; ejakaa eslo dodoe kake hɛ mi nyami ngɛ dodoe kpa hɛ mi nyami he.
42Jã nɔuu ji ni gbogboehi a sitemi ɔ hulɔ. A duɔ lɛ ngɛ puemi mi, a tleɔ lɛ si ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ puɛ we mi; 43a duɔ lɛ ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ be nyami mi, a tleɔ lɛ si ngɛ nyami mi; a duɔ lɛ ngɛ gbɔlemi mi, a tleɔ lɛ si ngɛ he wami mi. 44A duɔ klaa nɔmlɔ tso, a tleɔ mumi nɔmlɔ tso si. Ke klaa nɔmlɔ tso ngɛ ɔ, mumi nɔmlɔ tso hu ngɛ. 45Jã a ngma hulɔ ke: “Adam nɛ ji kekle nɔmlɔ ɔ plɛ klaa nɛ hɛ ngɛ; nyagbe Adam ɔ plɛ mumi nɛ haa nɔ yi naa wa.” 46Se tsa pi mumi nɔ ɔ ji kekle nɔ, se mohu klaa nɔ ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ se ɔ mumi nɔ ɔ. 47Kekle nɔmlɔ nɛ je zugba a mi ɔ, zu ʼi, nɔmlɔ nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ je hiɔwe. 48Bɔ nɛ zugba nɛ ɔ nɔ no ɔ ngɛ ɔ, jã zugba nɛ ɔ nɔ bi ɔmɛ hu ngɛ; nɛ bɔ nɛ hiɔwe no ɔ ngɛ ɔ, ja hiɔwe bi ɔmɛ hu ngɛ. 49Nɛ kaa bɔ nɛ wa hɛɛ zugba nɛ ɔ nɔ no ɔ subai ɔ, jã nɔuu wa maa hɛɛ hiɔwe no ɔ hu subai.
50Mamimɛ, nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ tsɔɔe ji kaa, he lo kɛ muɔ nine be Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ nɔ sue, nɛ jehanɛ puemi hu nine be nɔ́ nɛ puɛ we ɔ nɔ sue.
51Oʼɛ, laami sane i ngɛ nyɛ dee nɛ ɔ nɛ: Tsa pi wɔ tsuo kulaa nɛ wa ma gbo ɔ, se a ma tsake wɔ tsuo, 52tlukaa ngɛ hɛngmɛfia mi, benɛ a ma kpa nyagbe titimati ɔ; ejakaa a ma kpa titimati, nɛ a ma tle ni gbogboehi a si nɛ a be puɛe hu, nɛ wɔɔ lɛɛ, a ma tsake wɔ. 53Ejakaa ja puɛmi nɔ́ nɛ ɔ wo nɔ́ nɛ puɛ we ɔ, nɛ kikɛmɛ a gbomi nɔ́ nɛ ɔ wo nɔ́ nɛ gbo we ɔ. 54Se benɛ kikɛmɛ a puemi nɔ́ nɛ ɔ wo nɔ́ nɛ puɛ we ɔ, nɛ kikɛmɛ a gbomi nɔ́ nɛ ɔ wo nɔ́ nɛ gbo we ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ munyu nɛ a ngma a maa ba mi ke:
“A mi gbenɔ ngɛ kunimi yemi mi.
55Mo gbenɔ, jije o kɛ̃ɛ ɔ ngɛ?
Mo gbeje, jije o kunimi yemi ɔ ngɛ?”
56Se gbenɔ kɛ̃ɛ ji yayami, nɛ yayami he wami ji Mlaa a. 57Se sina ha Mawu, nɔ nɛ guu wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo nɔ haa wa yeɔ kunimi ɔ. 58Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mamimɛ nɛ i suɔ, nyɛ fi si nɛ nyɛ ko gbɔle, nɛ nyɛɛ ya nɔ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ni tsumi ɔ mi daa nɛ ɔ, ejakaa nyɛ le kaa nyɛ dengme gbomi ɔ be yaka pee ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi.

Title: 1 KORINTOBI 16
Content:
Oniatsumi kɛ ha Yerusalem asafo ɔ
1Jehanɛ ngɛ onia nɛ a tsuɔ kɛ haa Mawu webi ɔmɛ a he ɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ i to ha Galatia asafo ɔmɛ ɔ, nyɛ hu nyɛɛ pee ja. 2Daa otsi kekleekle ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ je nɔ́ ko ngɔ to, ngɛ bɔ nɛ e naa a nya, konɛ ma ko ba loko a tsu onia a. 3Nɛ ke i ba a, ma tsɔ nihi nɛ nyɛ buu kaa a sa kɛ womi nɛ a hɛɛ nyɛ nike ni ɔmɛ kɛ ya Yerusalem. 4Se ke e sa kaa imi hu ma ya a, i kɛ mɛ maa ya.
Paulo yimitomi
5Se ma ya gu Makedonia loko ma ba nyɛ ngɔ, ejakaa Makedonia ma ya gu. 6Eko ɔ ma hi nyɛ gɔ bɔɔ, nɛ eko ɔ ma ye fiɛ̃ be ɔ hu ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, konɛ he tsuaa he nɛ i yaa a nɛ nyɛ ya je mi blɔ. 7Ejakaa i sume kaa ma na nyɛ ngɛ blɔ kpɛ kɛkɛ, se ye hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa ke Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ maa ngmɛ mi blɔ ɔ, ma kɛ bɔɔ ngɛ nyɛ ngɔ.
8Se ma hi Efeso kɛ maa su Pentekoste ligbi ɔ nɔ. 9Ejakaa a bli sinya kpetekpleenyɛ nya ha mi, kɛ ha ni tsumi fuu nɛ maa wo yiblii, se ninɛmɛ nɛ kuɔ nya a hu hiɛ.
10Ke Timoteo ba nyɛ ngɔ ɔ, nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ nyɛ he lɛ hɛmuɔ, ejakaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ni tsumi nɔuu e ngɛ tsue kaa imi. 11Kɔlɔ ɔ he ɔ nɔ ko ko bu lɛ kaa pi nɔ ko ji lɛ; se nyɛ je lɛ blɔ ngɛ he jɔmi mi konɛ e ba ye ngɔ. Ye hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa e kɛ nyamimɛ ɔmɛ maa ba.
12Wa nyɛmi Apolo ɔ, i kpa lɛ pɛɛ hluu nɛ e kɛ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ nɛ ba nyɛ ngɔ, se e kplɛɛ we kulaa kaa e maa ba amlɔ nɛ ɔ, se ke e na e he deka hu e maa ba.
Nyagbe munyuhi
13Nyɛɛ huɔ, nyɛɛ da si kpɛii ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mi, nyɛɛ pee nyumu, nɛ nyɛ he nɛ wa! 14Nyɛɛ pee nyɛ nihi kulaa ngɛ suɔmi mi.
15Mamimɛ, nyɛ le Stefana we mi bi ɔmɛ kaa mɛ ji Akaia kekleekle yiblii, nɛ a ngɔ Mawu webi ɔmɛ a sɔmɔmi ɔ ngɔ fɔ a nɔ. 16I kpa nyɛ pɛɛ konɛ nyɛ hu nyɛɛ ba nyɛ he si ha ni nɛ ɔmɛ, kɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ kɛ mɛ tsuɔ ni nɛ e bɔɔ mɔde ɔ.
17I na buajɔmi ngɛ Stefana kɛ Fortunato kɛ Akaiko bami ɔ he, ejakaa nɛ nyɛ be ye ngɔ nɛ ɔ, mɛ lɛ a ba ye nyɛ nɛne mi. 18Ejakaa a ba wo ye bua kaa bɔ nɛ a wo nyɛ hu nyɛ bua a. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nimli nɛ ngɛ kaa ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ nyɛɛ le mɛ saminya.
19Asia asafo ɔmɛ biɔ nyɛ. Akwila kɛ Priskila kɛ asafo nɛ ngɛ a we ɔ mi ɔ biɔ nyɛ saminya ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi. 20Nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ kulaa biɔ nyɛ. Nyɛ nga nyɛ he kɛ nya he fiɔmi klɔuklɔu.
21Ami Paulo nitsɛ ye nine nya biɔmi ji nɛ ɔ nɛ.
22Ke nɔ ko sume Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo sane ɔ, jamɛ a nɔ ɔ e plɛ musutsɛ! Wa Nyɔmtsɛ, ba! (Maran ata.)
23Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dloomi ɔ kɛ nyɛ nɛ hi si!
24Ye suɔmi ɔ kɛ nyɛ tsuo nɛ hi si ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi! Amen.

Title: 2 KORINTOBI 1
Content:
1Imi Paulo, nɛ ji Yesu Kristo bɔfo ngɛ Mawu suɔmi nya a, kɛ wa nyɛmi Timoteo ɔ ngma ya ha Mawu asafo nɛ ngɛ Korinto kɛ he tsɔli kulaa nɛ ngɛ Akaia tsuo ɔ:
2Dloomi kɛ he jɔmi nɛ je wa tsɛ Mawu kɛ Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dɛ mi ɔ ha nyɛ.
Paulo naa Mawu si
3A gbaa Mawu kɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo Tsɛ ɔ, nɔ nɛ ji mi mi sali a tsɛ, kɛ ɛbua womi kulaa Mawu ɔ, 4nɔ nɛ jɔɔ wa bua ngɛ wa nɔ nami ɔmɛ kulaa mi, konɛ wɔ hu wa nyɛ nɛ waa kɛ bua womi nɛ Mawu kɛ woɔ wa bua a nɛ wo nihi nɛ naa amanehlu tsuaa amanehlu ɔmɛ a bua. 5Nɛ bɔ nɛ Kristo amanehlu ɔmɛ baa wa nɔ kɛ bee nɔ ɔ, ja nɔuu kɛ Kristo he ɔ, wa bua womi ɔ hu hiɛɛ kɛ bee nɔ. 6Se ke amanehlu wa naa a, nyɛ bua womi kɛ yi wami hemi he ʼi; nɛ ke wa bua a woɔ hu, e ji nyɛ bua womi nɛ haa nyɛ toɔ nyɛ tsui si kpoo kɛ naa amanehlu nɛ wa naa a nɔuu eko. 7Nɛ wa hɛ nɛ ngɛ nyɛ nɔ ɔ gbɔle we, ejakaa wa le kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ naa amanehlu ɔ eko ɔ, ja nɔuu kɛ nyɛ naa bua womi ɔ hu eko.
8Mamimɛ, wa sume kaa waa ngɔ wa nɔ́ nɛ wa na ngɛ Asia a kɛ laa nyɛ. Wa na nɔ tsɔ, pe bɔ nɛ wa ma nyɛ po, nɛ wa hɛ be je mi himi nɔ tete. 9Wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa na ngɛ wa mi paa kaa wa ma gbo, konɛ wa ko ngɔ wa hɛ ngɔ fɔ wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa he nɔ, se mohu wa ngɔ fɔ Mawu nɛ tleɔ ni gbogboehi a si ɔ nɔ, 10Mawu nɛ je wɔ kɛ je gbenɔ nɛ ngɛ gbeye nɛ ɔ mi, nɛ e ngɛ wɔ jee kɛ mwɔɔ, nɛ wa hɛ ngɛ e nɔ kaa e maa kpale je wɔ kulaa. 11Nyɛ hu nyɛɛ piɛ wa he kɛ kpa pɛɛ konɛ nihi fuu nɛ na si ha wɔ ngɛ dloomi nike nihi nɛ a kɛ ha wɔ ngɛ nihi fuu a pɛɛ kpami ɔ he.
Paulo tsake e yimitomi ɔmɛ
12Se wa fiami ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: wa he ni lemi odase nɛ e yeɔ wɔ, kaa Mawu klɔuklɔu peemi kɛ he tsɔmi mi wa ba wa je mi ngɛ ngɛ je nɛ ɔ mi, titli ɔ, ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti, nɛ pi he lo mi ni lemi nya, se mohu Mawu dloomi nya. 13Ejakaa wa ngmɛ́ ni kpahi ha we nyɛ, pe nihi nɛ nyɛ kaneɔ nɛ jehanɛ hu nyɛ le, nɛ ye hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa nyɛ maa le kɛ maa ya nyagbe hulɔ ɔ. 14Kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ na le wɔ hulɔ fa kɛ fa, kaa nyɛ fiami nɔ́ ji wɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ ji wa nɔ́ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ.
15Kikɛmɛ a hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ ɔ he je nɛ i to ye yi mi kaa ma ba nyɛ ngɔ kekle ɔ nɛ, konɛ nyɛ na dloomi si enyɔ. 16Ma ba gu nyɛ ngɔ kɛ ya Makedonia, nɛ jehanɛ hu ma kpale ye se kɛ je Makedonia kɛ ba nyɛ ngɔ ekohu, konɛ nyɛ ya je mi blɔ kɛ ya Yudea. 17Blɔɔ nɛ i to ye yi mi kikɛ ɔ, yi flɛflɛ i kɛ pee lo? Aloo ye yi mi nɛ i to ɔ, he lo nya i to ngɛ konɛ ma de “Ee,” kɛ “Dɛbi,” ngɛ be kake mi lo? 18Mawu ji wa odase, kaa wa munyu nɛ waa kɛ nyɛ tu ɔ, e pi “Ee” kɛ “Dɛbi” ngɛ be kake mi. 19Ejakaa Mawu bi Yesu Kristo, nɔ nɛ i kɛ Silvano kɛ Timoteo fiɛ e he sane ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti ɔ, e pi “Ee” kɛ “Dɛbi” se mohu e ji “Ee”. 20Ejakaa Mawu si womihi abɔ nɛ ngɛ ɔ, e mi “Ee” ɔ ngɛ, nɛ e mi nɔuu “Amen” ɔ ngɛ, konɛ a gu e nɔ kɛ wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami. 21Se Mawu ji nɔ nɛ haa waa kɛ nyɛ tsuo nane pii si ngɛ Kristo mi, nɛ e pɔ wɔ nu, 22nɛ e sɔu wa nya, nɛ e kɛ Mumi ɔ yi ba pomi nɔ́ ha wɔ ngɛ wa tsui mi hulɔ.
23Se imi lɛɛ i ngɛ Mawu tsɛe nɛ ba ye ye klaa he odase kaa yɛ yi baami he je nɛ i na we ma ba Korinto ɔ nɛ. 24Wa yi nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi nyɔguɛ, ejakaa nyɛ daa si tutuutu ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mi, se mohu wa piɛ nyɛ he kɛ ngɛ nyɛ bua jɔmi he ni tsue.

Title: 2 KORINTOBI 2
Content:
1Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i pee ye juɛmi kaa i kɛ kɔmɔ yemi be nyɛ ngɔ bae hu. 2Ejakaa ke i ha nyɛ ye kɔmɔ ɔ, mɛnɔ ji nɔ nɛ haa ye bua jɔɔ mɔ, kaa ja nɔ nɛ i ha e ye kɔmɔ ɔ nɔuu? 3Enɛ ɔ he je nɛ i ngma nyɛ enɛ ɔ, konɛ, ke i ba a, ma ko ba ye kɔmɔ ngɛ nihi nɛ jinɛ sa kaa i naa a he bua jɔmi ɔmɛ a he, ejakaa ye hɛ ngɛ nyɛ tsuo nyɛ nɔ kaa ye bua jɔmi ji nyɛ tsuo nyɛ bua jɔmi. 4Se tsui yemi kɛ fimi babauu mi i je kɛ ngma nyɛ, kɛ gu vo nyu babauu hu mi, tsa pi nɛ nyɛɛ ye kɔmɔ he je, se mohu nɛ nyɛɛ na suɔmi babauu nɛ i suɔ nyɛ.
Nɔtɔlɔ he yayamipami
5Se ke nɔ ko ha a ye kɔmɔ ɔ, pi imi nɛ e ha i ye kɔmɔ se (kone ye nya nɛ ko wa tsɔ ɔ) e ha nyɛ kulaa nyɛ ye kɔmɔ ko kɛ. 6Jamɛ a tsɛ ɔ, e hɛ mi nɛ nihi fuu kã a hiɛ ha lɛ, 7lɔ ɔ he ɔ, jehanɛ nyɛ kɛ pa lɛ, nɛ nyɛɛ jɔɔ e bua mohu, konɛ kɔmɔ yemi fuu tsɔ ɔ ko ba ha e nine mi nɛ wo nyu. 8Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i kpaa nyɛ pɛɛ nɛ nyɛ ha e le kaa nyɛ suɔ lɛ, 9ejakaa enɛ ɔ he hulɔ nɛ i ngma nyɛ womi ɔ nɛ, konɛ ma kɛ ka nyɛ kaa nyɛ buɔ tue ngɛ nihi kulaa mi lo? 10Nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ nɔ́ ko paa lɛ ɔ, imi hu i kɛ paa lɛ, ejakaa imi hu, ke i kɛ nɔ́ ko pa a, nɔ́ nɛ i kɛ pa a, i kɛ pa ngɛ nyɛ he ngɛ Kristo hɛ mi, 11konɛ Satan nine nɛ ko su wa nɔ, ejakaa e juɛmi ɔmɛ ɔ a kɛ laa wɔ.
Paulo tsuiyemi ngɛ Troa
12Bene i ba Troa ngɛ Kristo sane kpakpa a he nɛ ya bli sinya ha mi ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi ɔ, 13i hao ngɛ mumi mi, ejakaa i nɛ́ ye nyɛmi Tito; lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i sɛ mɛ nɛ i pue nɔ kɛ ba Makedonia.
Kunimiyemi kɛ gu Kristo nɔ
14Se sina ha Mawu, ejakaa ngɛ waa kɛ Kristo kake peemi mi ɔ, e haa wa yeɔ kunimi daa, nɛ e haa e he nilemi he via a guu wa nɔ jee kpo ngɛ he tsuaa he. 15Ejakaa Kristo he viami kpakpa ji wɔ ha Mawu ngɛ nihi nɛ a heɔ a yi wami kɛ nihi nɛ a hɛ mi kpataa a kulaa mi: 16ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, wa ji gbenɔ via ha mɛ kɛ yaa gbenɔ mi, se ni kpa amɛ ɔ, wa ji wami via ha mɛ kɛ yaa wami mi. Nɛ mɛnɔ lɛ sa ha enɛ ɔmɛ? 17Ejakaa wa be kaa ni komɛ nɛ juaa Mawu munyu ɔ, se mohu wa tuɔ lɛ ngmingmiingmi bɔ nɛ e je Mawu mi ɔ ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi, ngɛ Kristo mi.

Title: 2 KORINTOBI 3
Content:
Somi He ɔ he sɔmɔli
1Anɛ pe wa kpale ngɛ wa he yi jee? Aloo e hia kaa wa hɛɛ yi jemi womi, kaa bɔ nɛ ni komɛ hɛɛ kɛ ba haa nyɛ loo kɛ jee nyɛ ngɔ ɔ lo? 2Nyɛ nitsɛmɛ ji wa womi nɛ a ngma ngɔ wo wa tsui mi nɛ nihi tsuo le nɛ a kaneɔ. 3A je nyɛ ngɔ tsɔɔ paa kaa nyɛ ji Kristo womi nɛ wa ngma, pi kɛ ni ngmami nyu, se mohu Mawu hɛ kalɔ ɔ mumi ɔ a kɛ ngma, pi ngɛ tɛ sleetihi a nɔ, se mohu tsui nɛ ji he lo sleeti nɔ.
4Kristo he nɛ wa ngɛ kikɛmɛ a hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ ɔ ngɛ Mawu blɔfami: 5pi kaa wɔ nitsɛmɛ ɔ wa sa nɛ wa susu kaa nɔ ko je wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa mi, se wa sami ɔ Mawu mi nɛ e je; 6lɛ nɔuu lɛ e ha wa sa, nɛ wa plɛ Somi He ɔ he sɔmɔli, pi ngmami okadi nɔ́ se mohu mumi nɔ́, ejakaa ngmami okadi ɔ gbee nɔ, se mumi ɔ haa nɔ yi naa wami.
7Se ke gbenɔ sɔmɔmi nɛ a kpɛ ngɛ tɛhi a nɔ ɔ hɛ mi ba nyami bɔ nɛ Israelbi ɔmɛ nyɛ we Mose hɛ mi nɛ a hyɛ po ngɛ nyami nɛ se poo ɔ he ɔ, 8anɛ mumi sɔmɔmi ɔ be nyami pee hluu pe kɔlɔ ɔ lo? 9Ejakaa, ke fɔ bumi sɔmɔmi ɔ hɛ mi ba nyami ɔ, anɛ dami sɔmɔmi ɔ hɛ mi be nyami bae kɛ be nɔ lo? 10Niinɛ, ngɛ enɛ ɔ mi ɔ, nɔ́ nɛ ngɛ hɛ mi nyami sa a, hɛ mi be nyami bae hu ngɛ hɛ mi nyami kpã nɛ pã lɛ ɔ he. 11Ejakaa ke nɔ́ nɛ se poo ɔ ba kɛ hɛ mi nyami ɔ, lɛɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ɔ mohu hɛ mi nyami ɔ hiɛ hluu.
12Jehanɛ, akɛnɛ wa ngɛ kikɛmɛ a hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ ɔ he je ɔ, wa peɔ ka babauu, 13nɛ wa pee we kaa Mose nɛ kɛ hɛ mi hami nɔ ha e hɛ mi, konɛ Israelbi ɔmɛ ko hyɛ nɔ nɛ se poo ɔ nya gbemi ɔ. 14Se mohu a nga a juɛmi nya. Ejakaa kɛ ba su mwɔnɛ ligbi nɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ, jamɛ a hɛ mi hami nɔ́ ɔ nɔuu lɛ ha Somi Momo ɔ kanemi ɔ nɔ; ejakaa Kristo mi pɛ nɛ e se poo ngɛ. 15Se kɛ ba su mwɔnɛ ligbi nɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ, be tsuaa be nɛ a ngɛ Mose Womi ɔ kanee ɔ, hɛ mi hami nɔ́ ha a tsuihi a nɔ; 16se ke a kpale a se kɛ ba Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ngɔ ɔ, a ma je hɛ mi hami nɔ́ ɔ. 17Jehanɛ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ji Mumi ɔ nɛ; nɛ he nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ Mumi ɔ ngɛ ɔ, lejɛ ɔ he yemi ngɛ. 18Se wɔ kulaa nɛ waa kɛ hɛ mi kpetekplee hyɛɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi nyami ɔ, kaa a hyɛɛ ahuhuɛ mi ɔ, wa ngɛ tsakee kɛ ngɛ jamɛ a subai ɔ nɔuu plɛe kɛ ngɛ hɛ mi nyami mi jee kɛ yaa hɛ mi nyami mi, ejakaa enɛ ɔ je Nyɔmtsɛ nɛ ji Mumi ɔ ngɔ.

Title: 2 KORINTOBI 4
Content:
Mumi mi juetli ngɛ zu buɛhi a mi
1Akɛnɛ wa hɛɛ kikɛmɛ a sɔmɔmi nɛ ɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ a na wɔ mɔbɔ ɔ, wa ji fɔ́, 2Wa kua zo nihi nɛ a kɛ laa a, nɛ wa bɛ wa je mi ngɛ kutupɔ mi, nɛ jehanɛ hu wa futuu we Mawu munyu ɔ, se mohu waa kɛ anɔkuale ɔ kpo jemi ɔ jeɔ wa he yi ngɔ tsɔɔ ni mli a he nilemi tsuo ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi. 3Se ke pe a ha wa Sane Kpakpa a nɔ tete po ɔ, nihi nɛ a hɛ mi ngɛ kpatae ɔmɛ a mi kɛkɛ a ha nɔ ngɛ, 4nihi a mi nɛ je nɛ ɔ mi mawu ɔ yu nihi nɛ he we yi ɔmɛ a hɛngmɛ ngɛ, konɛ Kristo, nɛ ji Mawu subai ɔ, hɛ mi nyami ɔ sane kpakpa a la nɛ ngɛ tsoe ɔ nɛ ko kpɛ ha mɛ. 5Ejakaa pi wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa he nɛ wa ngɛ fiee, se mohu Kristo Yesu, kaa lɛ ji Nyɔmtsɛ, se wɔɔ lɛɛ, nyɛ sɔmɔli ji wɔ ngɛ Yesu he. 6Ejakaa Mawu nɛ de ke: “La nɛ je diblii mi nɛ e kpɛ” ɔ, lɛ nɔuu lɛ e kpɛ ngɛ wa tsui mi hulɔ, konɛ Mawu hɛ mi nyami he ni lemi ɔ nɛ kpɛ ngɛ Yesu Kristo hɛ mi.
7Se wa hɛɛ kikɛmɛ a juetli nɛ ɔ ngɛ zu buɛhi a mi, konɛ he wami nɛ hiɛ kɛ be nɔ ɔ nɛ pee Mawu nɔ́, se pi wa nɔ́. 8A haoɔ wɔ ngɛ he tsuaa he, se kɛ̃ ɔ, a yi wa nɔ; wa yi mi peɔ wɔ enyɔ enyɔ, se kɛ̃ ɔ, wa nine mi wui nyu; 9a waa wɔ yi mi, se kɛ̃ ɔ, a kua we wɔ; a fiaa wɔ si, se kɛ̃ ɔ, wa gbo we; 10daa nɛ ɔ wa hɛɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ gbenɔ ɔ ngɛ wa nɔmlɔ tso ɔ mi kɛ nyɛɛ, konɛ Yesu wami ɔ hu nɛ je kpo ngɛ wa nɔmlɔ tso ɔ mi. 11Ejakaa wɔ nɛ wa hɛ ngɛ nɛ ɔ ɔ, daa nɛ ɔ, a tu wɔ ngɔ wo gbenɔ dɛ mi ngɛ Yesu he, konɛ Yesu wami ɔ hu nɛ je kpo ngɛ wa he lo nɛ ma gbo ɔ mi. 12Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jehanɛ, gbenɔ tsuɔ ni ngɛ wa mi, se nyɛɛ lɛɛ, wami tsuɔ ni ngɛ nyɛ mi.
13Se akɛnɛ wa ngɛ jamɛ a hemi kɛ yemi mumi ɔ nɔuu, kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma ke: “I he ye, nɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ i de” ɔ, wɔ hu wa heɔ yeɔ, nɛ lɔ ɔ he je ɔ wa deɔ hulɔ; 14ejakaa wa le kaa nɔ nɛ tle Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu si ɔ, e ma tle waa kɛ Yesu si, nɛ e kɛ waa kɛ nyɛ tsuo ma ba da e hɛ mi. 15Ejakaa nyɛ he nɛ a ngɛ enɛ ɔ kulaa pee, konɛ dloomi nɛ hiɛ babauu nɛ gu nihi fuu a sina nɔ kɛ be nɔ kɛ ha Mawu hɛ mi nyami womi.
Hemi kɛ yemi nya sihimi
16Lɔ ɔ he nɛ wa tsui pui ɔ nɛ, se ke wa kpo nɔ blɔ nɔmlɔ ɔ puɛɔ kulaa tete po ɔ, kɛ̃ ɔ, wa mi nɔmlɔ ɔ plɛɔ ehe daa ligbi. 17Ejakaa wa nɔ nami nɛ nya wa nɛ se kɛ we nɛ ɔ ngɛ neneene hɛ mi nyami babauu nɛ be nɔ nɛ he jua wa hluu nya buae ha wɔ. 18Wɔ nɛ wa pi nihi nɛ hyɛɛ nihi nɛ a naa a, se mohu nihi nɛ a nɛ ɔ wa hyɛɛ ɔ; ejakaa nihi nɛ a naa a hii si be bɔɔ ko kɛkɛ, se nihi nɛ a nɛ́ ɔ hii si kɛ yaa neneene.

Title: 2 KORINTOBI 5
Content:
1Ejakaa wa le kaa, ke a ku wa zugba nɛ ɔ nɔ bo tsu nɔ hu, wa ngɛ tsu ko nɛ je Mawu ngɔ, we ko nɛ pi nine nɛ a kɛ pee, nɛ hii si kɛ yaa neneene, ngɛ hiɔwe. 2Ejakaa anɔkuale mi ɔ, wa laa zanue tete ngɛ enɛ ɔ mi, nɛ wa hɛ jaa kaa a ngɔ wa tsu nɛ je hiɔwe ɔ ngɔ wo wɔ, 3nɛ ke a ngɔ wo wɔ kikɛ ɔ, lɔɔ lɛɛ a be wɔ nae kaa nihi nɛ hɛɛ a he gu. 4Ejaka wɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ wa ngɛ bo tsu ɔ mi ɔ hu, akɛnɛ wa he hiaa wɔ he je ɔ, wa laa zanue, ejakaa wa sume kaa a je wa he nihi, se mohu wa suɔ kaa a wo wɔ ni ngɔ pue nɔ, konɛ wami ɔ nɛ mi nɔ nɛ gboɔ ɔ. 5Se nɔ nɛ dla wɔ ha tsakemi nɛ ɔ nɔuu ji Mawu, nɔ nɛ ha wɔ Mumi ɔ kaa se dami nɔ ɔ.
6Lɔ ɔ he ɔ wa naa tsui daa, nɛ wa le kaa be abɔ nɛ wa ngɛ nɔmlɔ tso ɔ mi nɛ ɔ ɔ, wa doma kɛ je Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ngɔ 7(ejakaa hemi kɛ yemi nya wa nyɛɛ ngɛ, se pi ni nami nya); 8se wa ngɛ tsui, nɛ e sa wa hɛ mi mohu kaa waa doma kɛ je nɔmlɔ tso nɛ ɔ mi, nɛ wa ya hi we ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ngɔ. 9Lɔ ɔ he ɔ oti nɛ wa ngɔ ma wa hɛ mi ji kaa, we wa ngɛ jio, pe wa doma jio, nɛ waa sa e hɛ mi. 10Ejakaa ja wɔ kulaa wa pue paa ngɛ Kristo kojomi sɛ ɔ hɛ mi, konɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ na nihi nɛ e pee ngɛ nɔmlɔ tso mi ɔ he hiɔwo, bɔ nɛ e pee ɔ, kpakpa ʼi jio, yaya ʼi jio.
Mawu kɛ huɛbɔmi ngɛ Kristo mi
11Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, akɛnɛ wale Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ he nɛ ngɛ gbeye he je ɔ, wa tuɔ munyu tsɔɔ nimli, se Mawu le bɔ nɛ wa ngɛ, nɛ ye hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa nyɛ he ni lemi mi hu ɔ nyɛ le wɔ. 12Tsa pi wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa yi nɛ wa ngɛ jee kɛ ngɛ nyɛ hae ekohu, se mohu waa kɛ ngɛ nyɛ blɔ hae konɛ nyɛ kɛ fia ngɔ fɔ wa nɔ, konɛ nyɛ na eko nɛ nyɛ kɛ de ninɛmɛ nɛ fiaa ngɛ hɛ mi se pi tsui mi ɔ. 13Ejakaa ke godo wa ngɛ nue ɔ, Mawu wa ngɛ nue kɛ ngɛ hae, nɛ ke wa ngɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ hu ɔ, e ngɛ ha nyɛ. 14Ejakaa Kristo suɔmi ɔ nyɛɛ wa nɔ nɛ wa ngɔɔ lɛ kaa ke nɔ kake gbo nihi kulaa a yi gbenɔ ɔ, lɛɛ ni ɔmɛ kulaa gbo. 15Nɛ e gbo nihi kulaa a yi gbenɔ, konɛ nihi nɛ a hɛ ngɛ ɔ, a hɛ ko hi ngmengmle ha mɛ nitsɛmɛ a he hu, se mohu a hɛ nɛ hi ngmengmle ha nɔ nɛ gbo nɛ a tle lɛ si ekohu ngɔ ha mɛ ɔ.
16Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, kɛ je mwɔnɛ ligbi nɛ ɔ nɔ kɛ yaa nɛ ɔ, wa kojo we nɔ ko nɔ ko ngɛ he lo nya hu; nɛ ke be nɛ be ɔ mi ɔ wa le Kristo ngɛ he lo nya tete ɔ, kɛ̃ ɔ jehanɛ wa li lɛ ja hu. 17Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ke nɔ ko ngɛ Kristo mi ɔ, bɔ nɔ́ he ji lɛ; blema ni ɔmɛ be kɛ ho; oʼɛ, nihi kulaa plɛ ehe. 18Ni nɛ ɔmɛ kulaa je Mawu dɛ mi, nɔ nɛ gu Yesu Kristo nɔ dla waa kɛ Tsɛ ɔ kpɛti, nɛ e kɛ kpatami sɔmɔmi ɔ ha wɔ ɔ; 19lɔ ɔ ji kaa Mawu gu Kristo nɔ nɛ e kɛ je ɔ ngɛ huɛ pee, nɛ e bui a nɔ tɔmi ɔmɛ hi mɛ, nɛ e tu huɛ peemi munyu ɔ ngɔ wo wa dɛ.
20Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, wa ji bɔfohi ngɛ Kristo nane mi, kaa nɔ́ nɛ Mawu gu wa nɔ nɛ e kɛ nihi ngɛ munyu tue: Wa daa si ngɛ Kristo nane mi ngɛ nyɛ pɛɛ kpae ke: Nyɛ ha a dla nyɛɛ kɛ Mawu kpɛti! 21Ejakaa nɔ nɛ li yayami ɔ, wa he ɔ Mawu ha e plɛ yayami, konɛ wɔɔ lɛɛ wa plɛ Mawu dami ngɛ e mi.

Title: 2 KORINTOBI 6
Content:
1Akɛnɛ wa ji Mawu hepiɛli ngɛ e ni tsumi ɔ mi he je ɔ, wa tuɔ munyu tsɔɔ nyɛ konɛ nyɛ ko he Mawu dloomi ɔ yaka; 2ejakaa e ke:
“Be nɛ sa mi i bu mo tue ngɛ,
Nɛ yi wami hemi ligbi nɔ hu i ye bua mo ngɛ.”
Oʼɛ, be nɛ sa saminya ji nɛ ɔ nɛ; oʼɛ, yi wami hemi ligbi ji nɛ ɔ nɛ.
3Jehanɛ hu, wa pi kpangmi ha nɔ ko nɔ ko ngɛ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko mi, konɛ a ko gbe sɔmɔmi ɔ he guɛ, 4se mohu nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ mi ɔ, waa kɛ wa he nɛ tsɔɔ kaa Mawu sɔmɔli ngɛ tsui si tomi babauu mi, ngɛ nɔ namihi a mi, ngɛ fimihi a mi, ngɛ he hiamihi a mi, 5ngɛ ni fiamihi a mi, ngɛ pamitsɛmɛ a tsuhi a mi, ngɛ hoo peemihi a mi, ngɛ dengme gbomihi a mi, ngɛ nyɔ fɔmihi a mi, ngɛ hwɔ hamihi a mi, 6ngɛ he tsɔmi mi, ngɛ ni lemi mi, ngɛ juɛmi nɛ se kɛɛ mi, ngɛ mi mi himi mi, ngɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu mi, ngɛ suɔmi klɔuu mi, 7ngɛ anɔkuale munyu tumi mi, ngɛ Mawu he wami mi, kɛ gu dami ta hwumi nihi kɛ ha hiɛ ɔ kɛ muɔ, 8kɛ gu hɛ mi nyami kɛ heguɛ gbemi mi; kɛ gu nɔ he munyu yaya tumi kɛ nɔ he munyu kpakpa tumi mi; kaa nɔ sisili, kɛ̃ ɔ anɔkualetsɛmɛ ji wɔ; 9kaa nihi nɛ a li mɛ, kɛ̃ ɔ nɔ tsuaa nɔ le wɔ; kaa nihi nɛ a gbo, nɛ oʼɛ, wa hɛ ngɛ; kaa nihi nɛ ra gblaa a tue, se kɛ ɔ a gbi wɔ; 10kaa kɔmɔ yeli, se wa bua jɔɔ daa; kaa ohiafohi, se wa tsakee nihi fuu ngɔ peɔ niatsɛmɛ; kaa nihi nɛ be nɔ́ ko, se kɛ̃ ɔ wa ngɛ nihi kulaa.
11Waa kɛ nyɛ tu munyu faii, Korintobi, wa pã wa tsui mi hu ha nyɛ. 12Blɔ ngɛ wa mi ha nyɛ, se nyɛ mohu lɛ nyɛ nga nyɛ tsui nya wo wɔ. 13Nyɛ hu nyɛ ha nyɛ tsui mi nɛ bli ja nɔuu nɛ nyɛ kɛ to wɔ nane mi (i kɛ nyɛ ngɛ munyu tue kaa ye bimɛ.)
Wɔjami he kɔkɔbɔmi
14Nyɛɛ kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ he we yi ɔ ko pee kake. Ejakaa mɛni bɔmi dami kɛ mlaatɔmi ngɛ? Aloo mɛni bɔmi la kɛ diblii ngɛ? 15Nɛ mɛni gbi kake peemi Kristo kɛ Belial ngɛ? Aloo mɛni ni dlami nɔ nɛ heɔ yeɔ ɔ kɛ nɔ nɛ he we yi ɔ ngɛ? 16Nɛ jehanɛ hu, mɛni kake peemi Mawu sɔlemi we ɔ kɛ amagahi ngɛ? Ejakaa Mawu hɛ kalɔ ɔ sɔlemi tsu ji nyɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ Mawu de ke:
“Ma hi a mi, nɛ ma nyɛɛ a kpɛti,
Nɛ ma pee a Mawu, nɛ mɛ hu a maa pee ye ma.”
17Kɔlɔ ɔ he ɔ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ke:
“Nyɛɛ je a kpɛti, nɛ nyɛ tsɔ nyɛ he
Nɛ nyɛ ko ta mu nɔ́ ko he,
Nɛ ma he nyɛ atuu.
18Nɛ ma pee nyɛ tsɛ,
Nɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ maa pee ye bimɛ nyumuhi kɛ ye bimɛ yihi,
Bɔ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ, ope ɔ, de ha ji nɛ ɔ nɛ.”

Title: 2 KORINTOBI 7
Content:
1Jehanɛ, mamimɛ nɛ a suɔ, akɛnɛ wa na si womi nɛ ɔmɛ he je ɔ, nyɛ ha wa fɔ wa he kɛ je he lo kɛ mumi mi mu kulaa mi, nɛ waa hi kɛ pi si ngɛ he tsɔmi mi ngɛ Mawu gbeye yemi mi.
Paulo bua jɔmi
2Nyɛ ha wɔ blɔ ngɛ nyɛ tsui mi! Wa pee we nɔ ko nɔ ko yayami ko; wa puɛ we nɔ́ ko, wa yi nɔ ko amimi. 3I de we enɛ ɔ nɛ ma kɛ bu nyɛ fɔ, ejakaa i de momo ke nyɛ ngɛ wa tsui mi, konɛ nyɛɛ kɛ wɔ nɛ gbo nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ wɔ yi nɛ na wami. 4I ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi babauu ngɛ nyɛ mi, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ, i fiaa fɔɔ nyɛ nɔ babauu. I hyi tɔ kɛ bua jɔmi, i hyi tɔ kɛ be nɔ kɛ bua jɔmi nɛ i ngɛ ngɛ wa nɔ nami ɔmɛ kulaa mi ɔ.
5Ejakaa bene wa ba Makedonia a hu ɔ, wa nɔmlɔ tso na we he jɔmi kulaa, se mohu he tsuaa he ɔ, nɔ́ sɔuu wa na; wa kpo nɔ blɔ ɔ, pɛ; wa mi blɔ ɔ, gbeye yemi. 6Se Mawu, nɔ nɛ jɔɔ nihi nɛ baa a he si ɔmɛ a bua a, e kɛ Tito bami ɔ jɔɔ wa bua. 7Se pi e bami ɔ kɛkɛ, se mohu bua womi nɛ e na kɛ je nyɛ ngɔ ɔ hulɔ, ejakaa e ba bɔ wɔ bɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ hlae nɛ nyɛ maa na mi, kɛ nyɛ kɔmɔ yemi ɔ, kɛ ye he mɔde nɛ nyɛ ngɛ bɔe ɔ, enɛ ɔ he ɔ i na bua jɔmi babauu pe keklee ɔ.
8Ke ye womi ɔ ha nɔ́ ko dɔ nyɛ po ɔ, kɛ̃ ɔ i pia we ye he. E dɔ mi kɛ̃, ejakaa jamɛ a womi ɔ dɔ nyɛ mohu, se be kpiti kɛkɛ e dɔ nyɛ. 9Se jehanɛ ɔ, ye bua jɔ, pi ngɛ dɔmi nɛ e dɔ nyɛ ɔ he, se mohu akɛnɛ e dɔ nyɛ nɛ e ha nyɛ pia nyɛ he ɔ he je. Ejakaa e dɔ nyɛ bɔ nɛ sa Mawu hɛ mi konɛ e ko je wɔ nɛ nɔ́ ko laa nyɛ. 10Ejakaa dɔmi nɛ sa Mawu hɛ mi ɔ tsɛɛ he piami nɛ kɛ nɔ yaa yi wami hemi mi kɛ baa, nɔ́ nɛ nɔ ko pia we e he ngɛ he ɔ; se je nɛ ɔ mi dɔmi ɔ tsɛɛ gbenɔ kɛ baa. 11Ejakaa oʼɛ, kikɛmɛ a dɔmi nɛ e dɔ nyɛ bɔ nɛ sa Mawu hɛ mi nɛ ɔ nɔuu ɔ, nyɛɛ hyɛ mɔde bɔmi, nya jemi, tsui la womi, gbeye yemi, hɛja, hɛ dɔmi kɛ lue yemi tete nɛ e tsɛ ngɔ wo nyɛ mi! Nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ mi ɔ nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛ he tsɔɔ wɔ kaa nyɛ he tsɔ ngɛ kikɛmɛ a sane nɛ ɔ mi.
12Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ke i ngma nyɛ tete po ɔ, tsa pi nɔ nɛ tɔ ɔ he je, jehanɛ hu tsa pi nɔ nɛ a tɔ e nɔ ɔ he je, se mohu benɛ pee nɛ wa he mɔde nɛ nyɛ ngɛ bɔe ɔ nɛ je kpo paa ha nyɛ ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi. 13Lɔ ɔ he ɔ wa bua jɔ.
Se wa bua womi ɔ be nɔ babauu kɛ bua jɔmi nɛ wa na ngɛ Tito bua jɔmi ɔ he, ejakaa nyɛ tsuo nyɛ ha e tsui nɔ e mi. 14Ejakaa ke i ngɔ nyɛ kɛ fia ngɔ tsɔɔ lɛ ɔ, nyɛ gbi mi zo. Se kaa bɔ nɛ wa de nihi tsuo ngɛ anɔkuale mi ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ ɔ, ja nɔuu kɛ wa fiami hu nɛ wa fia ngɔ tsɔɔ Tito ɔ pee anɔkuale. 15Nɛ e ngɛ nyɛ he tsui babauu pe kekle ɔ, ejakaa e kaii nyɛ kulaa nyɛ tue bumi ɔ, bɔ nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ gbeye yemi kɛ he domi he lɛ hɛmuɔ ɔ. 16I na bua jɔmi kaa ma nyɛ ma ngɔ ye he ngɔ fɔ nyɛ nɔ kulaa ngɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ mi.

Title: 2 KORINTOBI 8
Content:
Kristofohi a nɔhami
1Se, mamimɛ, wa ngɛ hae nɛ nyɛɛ le dloomi nɛ Mawu ngɔ ha ngɛ Makedonia asafo ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, 2kaa nɔ nami ka babauu mi ɔ, a bua jɔmi ɔ be nɔ kɛ̃, nɛ a hia nɛ mi kuɔ ɔ hu be nɔ kɛ je e he kpo ngɛ mi mi himi ni hami mi, 3ejakaa i ngɛ odase yee kaa a ha bɔ nɛ a ma nyɛ, nɛ a ha pe bɔ nɛ a ma nyɛ tete ngɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a suɔmi nya, 4nɛ a kɛ hɛdɔ babauu kpa wɔ pɛɛ ke waa kɛ kikɛmɛ a dloomi nɛ ɔ kɛ huɛ bɔmi nɛ ngɛ sɔmɔmi nɛ ɔ mi ɔ ya ha klɔuklɔubi ɔmɛ, 5nɛ pi kaa bɔ nɛ wa hɛ ngɛ nɔ ɔ kɛkɛ, se mohu, ngɛ Mawu suɔmi nya a, a ngɔ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a he ngɔ ha Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kekle kɛ wɔ hulɔ. 6Enɛ ɔ ha wa kpa Tito pɛɛ, konɛ bɔ nɛ e je sisi momo sa a, ja nɔuu e gbe kikɛmɛ a dloomi nɛ ɔ hu nya ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti. 7Nɛ jehanɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ bee nɔ ngɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ mi: ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi kɛ munyu tumi kɛ ni lemi kɛ mɔde bɔmi kulaa kɛ suɔmi nɛ je nyɛ mi nɛ ngɛ wa mi ɔ mi ɔ, nyɛɛ hyɛ konɛ kikɛmɛ a dloomi nɛ ɔ mi hu ɔ nyɛɛ be nɔ.
8Tsa pi mlaa nɛ i ngɛ nyɛ hae; se mohu ni kpahi a mɔde bɔmi i kɛ ngɛ nyɛ suɔmi ɔ kae ngɛ hyɛe, kaa e ngɛ klɔuu lo. 9Ejaka nyɛ le wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dloomi ɔ, kaa lɛ nɛ ji niatsɛ ɔ, e plɛ ohiafo ngɛ nyɛ he, konɛ nyɛɛ gu e hia a nɔ kɛ plɛ niatsɛmɛ.
10Ga kɛkɛ i ngɛ nyɛ woe ngɛ enɛ ɔ mi, ejakaa enɛ ɔ hi ha nyɛ kaa nyɛɛ gbe nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ je sisi jeha ji nɛ ɔ nɛ ɔ nya, tsa pi ngɛ peemi mi kɛkɛ, se mohu ngɛ suɔmi mi hulɔ. 11Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, jehanɛ, nyɛɛ gbe ni tsumi ɔ nya; nyɛɛ kɛ hɛdɔ nɛ gbe nya kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ je sisi ɔ, nɛ nyɛ ha bɔ nɛ nyɛ ma nyɛ. 12Ejakaa ke tsui ngɛ he ɔ, bɔ nɛ mo nɔ o ngɛ ɔ, maa muɔ Mawu hɛ, pi bɔ nɛ o be.
13I de we enɛ ɔ nɛ ma kɛ ha ni komɛ he jɔmi nɛ nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛɛ hao, se mohu konɛ lɛ tsuo nɛ pee pɛpɛɛpɛ; 14kikɛmɛ a be nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, nyɛ nɔ́ nɛ be nɔ ɔ ya ye bua ninɛmɛ nɛ e fi mɛ ɔ, konɛ mɛ hu a nɔ́ nɛ be nɔ ɔ ba ye bua nyɛ konɛ lɛ tsuo nɛ sɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ. 15Kaa bɔ nɛ pa ngma a ke:
“Nɔ nɛ buaa fuu nya, a,
E na we eko ngɛ se,
Nɔ nɛ buaa bɔɔ nya hu ɔ,
E piɛ́ eko hi lɛ.”
16Se sina ha Mawu, nɔ nɛ ngɔ nyɛ he mɔde bɔmi nɛ ɔ ngɔ wo Tito tsui mi ɔ. 17E bu wa pɛɛ nɛ wa kpa lɛ ɔ tue mohu se akɛnɛ lɛ nitsɛ ɔ mɔde bɔlɔ ji lɛ he je ɔ, e ba nyɛ ngɔ ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e suɔmi nya. 18Nyɛmi nɛ wa tsɔ piɛ e he nɛ ɔ, ngɛ yi jemi ngɛ Sane Kpakpa a he ngɛ asafo ɔmɛ kulaa mi. 19Nɛ pi enɛ ɔ kɛkɛ, se asafo ɔmɛ hia lɛ to hulɔ nɛ e kɛ wɔ nɛ nyɛɛ, nɛ e hɛɛ kikɛmɛ a dloomi nɛ wa ngɛ sɔmɔe ngɛ he nɛ ɔ kɛ wo Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi nyami, nɛ a kɛ tsɔɔ ni tsumi ɔ he suɔmi nɛ wa ngɛ; 20ejakaa wa ngɛ hlae nɛ waa tsi enɛ ɔ nya nɛ nɔ ko nɛ ko tu wa he munyu yaya ngɛ kikɛmɛ a nike ni agbo nɛ wa ngɛ sɔmɔe ngɛ he nɛ ɔ he. 21Wa yi mi tomi ji kaa waa pee nɔ́ nɛ da, pi ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi kɛkɛ, se mohu ngɛ nimli a hɛ mi hulɔ.
22Lɔ ɔ he ɔ wa tsɔ wa nyɛmi ɔ hu kɛ piɛ a he, nɔ nɛ wa ka lɛ si abɔ ngɛ nihi fuu mi, nɛ wa na kaa e bɔɔ mɔde, se jehanɛ e ngɛ mɔde bɔe pe kekle ɔ ngɛ e hɛ nɛ e kɛ fɔɔ nyɛ nɔ fuu ɔ he, 23Tito ɔ, ye he piɛlɔ kɛ mami ni tsulɔ ji lɛ ha nyɛ, nɛ wa nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ hu, asafo ɔmɛ a bɔfohi kɛ Kristo hɛ mi nyami ji mɛ. 24Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ je nyɛ suɔmi kɛ fiami nɛ wa fiaa fɔɔ nyɛ nɔ ɔ kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ mɛ ngɛ asafo ɔmɛ a hɛ mi.

Title: 2 KORINTOBI 9
Content:
Nyɛmimɛ a yemi kɛ buami
1E hia we kaa ma ngma nyɛ nɔ́ ko kɛ piɛ sɔmɔmi nɛ a kɛ ya sɔmɔɔ klɔuklɔubi ɔmɛ a he. 2Ejakaa i le bɔ nɛ nyɛ na he tsui ha, nɛ i fia fɔ nyɛ nɔ ngɛ he ngɔ tsɔɔ Makedoniabi ɔmɛ kaa Akaiabi dla a he ngɔ to lingmi jeha a lokoo; nɛ nyɛ mɔde bɔmi ɔ wo nihi fuu kã. 3I ngɛ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ tsɔe konɛ wa fiami nɛ wa fia ngɔ fɔ nyɛ nɔ ɔ e ko pee yaka ngɛ enɛ ɔ blɔfami, nɛ nyɛ dla nyɛ he kaa bɔ nɛ wa de ɔ; 4nɛ ke Makedoniabi ɔmɛ ekomɛ kɛ mi ba a, a ko ba na nyɛ kaa nyɛ dla we nyɛ he nɛ wa hɛ mi (wa ko de ke nyɛ hɛ mi) ba pue si ngɛ kikɛmɛ a hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ ɔ mi. 5Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i susu kaa ma kpa nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ pɛɛ nɛ a sɛ ye hlami kɛ ba nyɛ ngɔ nɛ a ba dla kikɛmɛ a nike ni nɛ nyɛ wo si momo nɔ ngɔ to, konɛ e pee nɔ́ ko nɛ a dla ngɔ to momo kaa jɔɔmi nɔ́ ko se pi nɔ nyɛmi nɔ́ ko.
6Nyɛ kai enɛ ɔ kaa, nɔ nɛ luɛɛ nihi a he kɛ duɔ ɔ, e kɛ he luɛmi hu ma kpa; nɛ nɔ nɛ duɔ fuu ɔ, fuu nɔuu e ma kpa. 7Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ha bɔ nɛ e ma nya si momo ngɛ e tsui mi nɛ e ko je kɔmɔ yemi loo fimi mi; ejakaa nɔ nɛ haa ngɛ tsui mi jɔmi nya a Mawu suɔ. 8Se Mawu ngɛ he wami nɛ e ma ha nyɛ ni kpakpahi kulaa kɛ be nɔ, konɛ nyɛ he nɛ kpe nyɛ kulaa ngɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ mi daa nɛ ɔ nɛ nyɛɛ be nɔ ngɛ ni tsumi kpakpa tsuaa ni tsumi kpakpa mi, 9kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma a ke:
“E gbɛɛ fiaa ngɔ haa ohiafo ɔmɛ;
E mɔbɔ nami ɔ hii si kɛ yaa neneene.”
10Se, nɔ nɛ kɛ dumi wuhi kee dulɔ nɛ e kɛ abolo hu haa yemi ɔ, e ma ha nyɛ dumi wuhi nɛ hiɛ, nɛ e ma ha dami yiblii ɔmɛ hu maa fu 11nɛ nyɛ plɛ niatsɛmɛ ngɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ mi nɛ nyɛɛ pee muklii mi hili kɛ pi si, nɛ a gu wa nɔ nɛ a kɛ sina nɛ ha Mawu. 12Ejakaa kikɛmɛ a yemi kɛ buami nɛ ɔ he sɔmɔmi ɔ, tsa pi klɔuklɔubi ɔmɛ a fimi kɛkɛ nɛ e pɛneɔ, se mohu e haa a naa Mawu si babauu kɛ bee nɔ hulɔ. 13Ejakaa kikɛmɛ a sɔmɔmi nɛ ɔ mi yiblii he ɔ, a woɔ Mawu hɛ mi nyami ngɛ tue bumi nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ jajeɔ Kristo sane kpakpa a kɛ huɛ bɔmi klɔuu nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ mɛ kɛ nihi kulaa bɔɔ ɔ he. 14Nɛ mɛ hu a kɛ pɛɛ kpami kɛ nyɛ hami tsɔɔ bɔ nɛ a suɔ nyɛ ngɛ Mawu dloomi nɛ ngɛ nyɛ nɔ kɛ be nɔ ɔ he. 15Se sina ha Mawu ngɛ e nike ni nɛ a be nyɛe he ni maa sɛɛ ɔ he!

Title: 2 KORINTOBI 10
Content:
Paulo fa e fiɛmi nitsumi ɔ he
1Imi Paulo nitsɛ i kɛ Kristo mi mi jɔmi kɛ kpoo peemi ɔ ngɛ nyɛ pɛɛ kpae, imi nɛ nyɛ hɛ mi ɔ i ji humi ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti, se ke i be nyɛ ngɔ ɔ i hiaa kã woɔ nyɛ ɔ. 2I ngɛ pɛɛ kpae kaa, ke i ba nyɛ ngɔ ɔ, nyɛ ko ha ma hia kã ngɔ wo nyɛ ejakaa i le kaa ma nyɛ kã ma hia ngɔ wo nihi nɛ susuu kaa wa ngɛ kaa nihi nɛ nyɛɛ ngɛ he lo nyɛ a. 3E ngɛ mi kaa he lo mi wa ngɛ mohu, se wa hwui wa ta a ngɛ he lo nya. 4Ejakaa wa tahwumi ni ɔmɛ ɔ, tsa pi he lo mi nihi ʼi, se mohu he wami nihi ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi, nɛ a kɛ kuɔ mɔ nguahi; 5wa kuɔ susumihi kɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ woɔ e he nɔ siɔ Mawu ni lemi ɔ, nɛ wa ngɔɔ juɛmi tsuaa juɛmi nyɔguɛ haa Kristo tue bumi; 6ke nyɛ tue bumi ɔ hyi ɔ, wa dla wa he ngɔ to konɛ waa gbla tuegbenɔ tsuo he tue.
7Nyɛ ngɛ nihi hyɛe kaa bɔ nɛ a ngɛ ngɛ kpo nɔ. Ke nɔ ko ngɔɔ e hɛ fɔɔ lɛ nitsɛ e he nɔ kaa Kristo nɔ ji lɛ ɔ, e susu he ekohu, kaa bɔ nɛ lɛ nitsɛ e ji Kristo nɔ ɔ, ja nɔuu kɛ wɔ hu wa ji Kristo nihi. 8Ejakaa ke fiami po ma fia kɛ be nɔ ngɛ he blɔ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ngɔ ha wɔ nɛ wa kɛ ha nyɛ nane nɛ nu si nɛ pi kaa waa kɛ ma kpata nyɛ hɛ mi po he ɔ, zo be mi gbee,— 9konɛ ma ko pee kaa nɔ ko nɛ woɔ nyɛ he gbeye ngɛ womihi a mi kɛkɛ. 10Ejakaa a deɔ ke: “E womi ɔmɛ a mi munyu ɔmɛ jiɔ, nɛ a mi wa mohu, se ke lɛ nɔmlɔ ɔ nitsɛ e ngɛ hiɛ ɔ ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ e he wɛ́, nɛ e munyu ɔ he be akɔnɔ ko.” 11Jamɛ a tsɛ ɔ e le kaa, bɔ nɛ wa munyu ngɛ ngɛ womihi a mi ke wa be ɔ, ja nɔuu kɛ, ke wa ngɛ ɔ, wa ni peemi nihi hu ngɛ.
12Wa kɛ́ kaa wa maa bu wa he ngɔ si ni komɛ a nɔ, aloo waa kɛ wa he maa to ni komɛ nɛ jeɔ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a he yi ɔmɛ a he; mɛɛ lɛɛ, akɛnɛ a kɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a he kaleɔ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a he, nɛ a kɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a he toɔ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a he he je ɔ, a be juɛmi. 13Se wɔɔ lɛɛ, wa be fiae tsɔ, se mohu ngɛ susumi kpa nɛ Mawu susu ngɔ ha wɔ, nɛ wa kɛ su nyɛ hu nyɛ ngɔ ɔ nya. 14Ejakaa wa kpã we wa mi tsɔ kaa nihi nɛ sui nyɛ ngɔ, ejakaa waa kɛ Kristo sane kpakpa a su nyɛ ngɔ hulɔ. 15Wa fiɛ pe nine ngɛ ni kpahi a nitsumihi a he; se wa hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa, ke nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ wae ɔ, wa ma plɛ nimli nguahi ngɛ wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa ni tsumi nya, nɛ wa maa be nɔ tete, 16konɛ wa ya fiɛ sane kpakpa a ngɛ nyɛ se je ni ɔmɛ a mi nɛ wa ko fia ngɔ fɔ hehi nɛ ni kpahi tsu ni ngɛ momo ɔmɛ a nɔ. 17“Se nɔ nɛ fiaa a, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ e fia ngɔ fɔ!” 18Ejakaa pi nɔ nɛ jeɔ e he yi ɔ ji nɔ nɛ sa, se mohu nɔ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ jeɔ e yi ɔ.

Title: 2 KORINTOBI 11
Content:
Paulo kɛ lakpa bɔfo ɔmɛ
1I na nɛ jinɛ nyɛ ko na ha ye biɛmi ɔ bɔɔ, kɛ̃ ɔ nyɛɛ na ha mi. 2Ejakaa i jee nyɛ he hunga haa Mawu; ejakaa i bi nyɛ si ha Kristo, konɛ ma ngɔ zangmayo nɛ he tsɔ ya ha nyumu kake. 3Se i ngɛ gbeye yee kaa alinɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ sinɔ ɔ kɛ e kutupɔ ɔ mlɔɔ Hawa a, ja nɔuu a ma puɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ juɛmi kɛ je klɔu peemi nɛ nyɛ je tsɔɔ Kristo ɔ mi. 4Ejakaa ke nɔ nɛ ma a ba fiɛɛ yesu kpã nɛ wa fiɛ we, aloo mumi kpa ko nɛ nyɛ na we sa, aloo sane kpakpa kpã ko nɛ nyɛ he we ɔ, nyɛ heɔ lɛ saminya.
5Ejakaa i susuu kaa e piɛ́ mi nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko loko i kɛ bɔfo ngua amɛ maa sɔ. 6Se ke i ji nɔmlɔ ko nɛ li nɔ ko ngɛ munyu tumi blɔfami tete ɔ, i pi ja ngɛ ni lemi blɔfami; se mohu nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ mi ɔ, wa je enɛ ɔ kpo paa ngɔ tsɔɔ ngɛ nihi kulaa mi. 7Aloo blɔɔ, nɛ i ba ye he si konɛ a wo nyɛ nɔ, nɛ i fiɛ Mawu sane kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ yaka a, i pee yayami lo? 8Benɛ i ngɛ ni tsue ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti ɔ, asafo kpahi lɛ wo mi hiɔ. E ngɛ kaa nɔ nɛ i ngɛ mɛ jue konɛ ma kɛ ba sɔmɔ nyɛ. 9Nɛ benɛ i kɛ nyɛ ngɛ nɛ e fi mi tete ɔ, i hɛ wi nɔ ko nɔ ko, ejakaa nihi nɛ hia mi ɔ, nyɛmimɛ nɛ je Makedonia ba a ha su ye dɛ. I le ye he nɔ hyemi konɛ ma ko plɛ tlomi ha nyɛ. 10Be abɔ nɛ Kristo anɔkuale ɔ ngɛ ye mi nɛ ɔ, nɔ ko nɔ ko be ye fiami nɛ ɔ nya tsie ngɛ Akaia ni ɔmɛ a mi. 11Mɛni he je? Kaa i sume nyɛ he je loo? Mawu le. 12Nɔ nɛ i ngɛ pee ɔ, ma pee, konɛ ma kɛ tsi nihi nɛ ngɛ ye he sane hlae ɔmɛ a nya, konɛ a ko na he blɔ nɛ a fia kɛ de ke mɛ hu a ngɛ ni nɛ wa ngɛ tsueɔ nɔuu tsue. 13Ejakaa kikɛmɛ a nimli nɛ ɔmɛ ji lakpa bɔfohi ni tsuli sisili nɛ tsakee a he peɔ Kristo bɔfohi. 14Enɛ ɔ be nyakpɛ tete; ejakaa Satan nitsɛ tsakee e he peɔ la bɔfo. 15Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ke e sɔmɔli ɔmɛ hu tsakee a he peɔ kaa dami sɔmɔli ɔ, e pi nɔ́ ko ngua ko; mɛɛ lɛɛ a nyagbe maa pee bɔ nɛ a ni tsumi ɔmɛ ngɛ ɔ.
Paulo amanehlu nɛ e na kaa bɔfo
16I ngɛ dee ekohu ke: Nɔ ko ko bu mi kuasia, se ke pi ja a, lɛɛ nyɛɛ ngɔ mi kaa kuasia mɔ, konɛ imi hu ma fia bɔɔ ko. 17Nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ dee nɛ ɔ, i de we kaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nya mi munyu, se mohu kaa kuasia tuɔ munyu, ngɛ kikɛmɛ a fiami hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ ɔ mi. 18Akɛnɛ nihi fuu fiaa ngɛ he lo nya he je ɔ, imi hu ma fia eko. 19Akɛnɛ nyɛ nitsɛmɛ ɔ ni leli ji nyɛ he je ɔ, nyɛ heɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ be yi mi ɔmɛ hɛmuɔ. 20Ejakaa, ke nɔ ko ngɛ nyɛ nyɔguɛ yee, ke nɔ ko ngɛ nyɛ adufude yee, ke neɔ ko ngɛ nyɛ klama tsɔe, ke nɔ ko ngɛ e he nɔ woe ngɛ nyɛ nɔ, ke nɔ ko ngɛ nyɛ hɛ mi ma gbae ɔ, nyɛ kplɛɔ lɛ. 21I kɛ zo ngɛ dee ke, wa pee gbedee tsɔ!
Se nɔ́ mi nɛ nɔ ko peɔ ka ngɛ ɔ — I ngɛ munyu tue kaa kuasia — imi hu i peɔ ka ngɛ mi. 22Hebribi ji mɛ lo? Imi hu eko ji mi. Israelbi ji mɛ lo? Imi hu eko ji mi. Abraham nina ji mɛ lo? Imi hu eko ji mi. 23Kristo sɔmɔli ji mɛ lo? — i ngɛ munyu tue kaa nɔ nɛ yi mi puɛ — i pe mɛ; ngɛ pɔtɔ ni tsumihi nɛ be nɔ mi, ngɛ ni fiamihi nɛ hiɛ tsɔ mi, ngɛ tsu mi womi babauu mi, ngɛ gbenɔ muɔ nya kpitikpiti. 24Yudafohi fia mi kpa, si enuɔ, eko tsuaa eko ɔ, piɛ kake nɛ maa pee nyingmi eywiɛ. 25A fia mi tso si etɛ, a fia mi tɛ si kake, i kɛ lɛ butu si etɛ, i ye je nami kɛ je jɔmi ngɛ wo mi; 26i hia blɔ kpitikpiti, i na nɔ ngɛ pahi a hɛ mi, i na nɔ ngɛ ojo fiali a dɛ mi, i na nɔ ngɛ ye wekubi a dɛ mi, i na nɔ ngɛ majeli a dɛ mi, i na nɔ ngɛ ma mi, i na nɔ ngɛ nga nɔ, i na nɔ ngɛ wo hɛ mi, i na nɔ ngɛ lakpa nyɛmimɛ a kpɛti; 27ngɛ ni tsumi kɛ pɔtɔ mi, ngɛ nyɔ fɔmihi a mi kpitikpiti, ngɛ hwɔ kɛ kuma mi, ngɛ hwɔ hamihi a mi kpitikpiti, ngɛ fiɛ̃ kɛ he gu nyɛɛmi mi? 28e slo nihi nɛ ngɛ se; kɛ jehanɛ hu haomi nɛ i naa daa kɛ asafo ɔmɛ kulaa a he susumi. 29Mɛnɔ gbɔleɔ, nɛ i mi lɛɛ i gbɔle we? Mɛnɔ nane a kpataa, nɛ ye mi mi sɛ̃ mi ha lɛ?
30Ke e hia kaa ma fia kɛ ɔ, ma fia ngɔ fo ye gbɔlemi nihi a nɔ. 31Mawu kɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Tsɛ, nɔ nɛ a gbaa kɛ ya siɔ neneene ɔ, le kaa i yi lakpa. 32Benɛ i ngɛ Damasko ɔ, ganɔ nɛ ngɛ matsɛ Areta sisi ɔ ha a huɔ ngɛ Damaskobi ɔmɛ a ma a mi ngɛ mi hlae nɛ e nu, 33nɛ a kɛ mi gu saflɛ mi ngɛ plɔ mi kɛ kple si ngɛ gli ɔ nɔ, nɛ i tu fo kɛ je e dɛ.

Title: 2 KORINTOBI 12
Content:
Paulo ni namihi kɛ kpo jemihi
1E hia kaa ma fia, se se nami ko be he; kɛ̃ ɔ ma sɛɛ ni namihi kɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kpo jemihi a he ni. 2I le nɔmlɔ ko ngɛ Kristo mi; jeha nyɔngma kɛ eywiɛ ji nɛ ɔ ɔ, a sa kikɛmɛ a nɔmlɔ nɛ ɔ kɛ ho hiɔwe nɛ ji etɛ ɔ ya; e ngɛ nɔmlɔ tso mi jio, i li; e be nɔmlɔ tso mi hu jio, i li; Mawu lɛ le. 3I le kikɛmɛ a nɔmlɔ nɛ ɔ — e ngɛ nɔmlɔ tso mi jio, e be nɔmlɔ tso mi jio, i li, Mawu lɛ le — 4kaa a sa lɛ kɛ ho Paradeiso ya nɛ e ya nu munyuhi nɛ a be nyɛe maa tu nɛ nɔmlɔ ko be he blɔ kaa e woɔ ta. 5Nɔmlɔ nɛ ɔ he ma fia ngɛ, se i be fiae ha imi nitsɛ ye he, kaa ja ngɛ ye gbɔlemi ɔmɛ a he. 6Ejakaa ke i ngɛ hlae nɛ ma fia a, i be kuasia ejakaa ma tu anɔkuale; se ye hɛ i ngɛ kue kɛ ngɛ nɔ fɔe, konɛ nɔ ko nɛ ko bu mi pe bɔ nɛ e naa mi ɔ aloo nɔ́ nɛ e ko ɔ e nuɔ ngɛ ye nya a.
7Se benɛ pee nɛ ma ko wo ye he nɔ tsɔ ko ngɛ kpo jemihi nɛ kle saminya nɛ ɔmɛ a he ɔ, a ha mi mio ko ngɛ ye he womi mi, nɛ ji Satan bɔfo, konɛ e gba mi mahi, nɛ ma ko wo ye he nɔ tsɔ. 8Enɛ ɔ he je ɔ, i kpa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ pɛɛ si etɛ sɔuu konɛ e je ye nɔ; 9nɛ e de mi ke: “Ye dloomi ɔ hiɛ ha mo, ejakaa ye he wami ɔ gbedee peemi mi e pii si ngɛ.” Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i suɔ saminya kaa ma fia ngɔ fɔ ye gbɔlemi ɔmɛ a nɔ mohu, konɛ Kristo he wami ɔ nɛ bu ye he. 10Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ngɛ Kristo he ɔ, ye bua jɔɔ ngɛ gbedee peemihi a mi, ngɛ hɛdo nihi a nami mi, ngɛ haomihi a mi, ngɛ yi wamihi a mi, ngɛ fimihi a mi; ejakaa ke i pee gbedee ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ mohu i naa he wami.
Paulo ye Korintobi ɔmɛ a he kɔmɔ
11I ye kuasiahi a sane kɛ fiami nɛ ɔ; nyɛ lɛ nyɛ nyɛ ye nɔ kikɛ nɛ ɔ nɛ. Ejakaa sa nɛ nyɛ mohu lɛ nyɛ jeɔ ye yi; ejakaa e piɛ́ mi nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko nɛ i kɛ bɔfo ngua amɛ nɛ sɔ, pohu i pi nɔ ko tete. 12Bɔfo peemi he okadi ɔmɛ mohu ɔ, a pee ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti ngɛ tsui si tomi tsuo mi, ngɛ okadihi kɛ nyakpɛ nihi kɛ he wami ni tsumihi a mi. 13Ejakaa mɛni ji nɔ́ nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ kpɛ asafohi nɛ piɛ omɛ a se, kaa ja yemi kɛ buami nɛ i kɛ doo we nyɛ nya kɛkɛ ɔ? Nyɛɛ ngɔ kikɛmɛ yayami nɛ ɔ ngɔ pa mi!
14Oʼɛ enɛ ɔ ji si etɛ nɛ i dla ye he kaa i ma nyɛ ngɔ, se i kɛ ye he ba be nyɛ nɔ fɔe; ejakaa tsa pi nyɛ sika nɛ i ngɛ hlae, se mohu nyɛ nitsɛmɛ. Ejakaa e sɛ́ kaa bimɛ buaa nihi a nya ngɔ toɔ a fɔli, se mohu fɔli lɛ buaa nihi a nya ngɔ toɔ a bimɛ. 15Se i suɔ babauu kaa ma puɛ nihi kulaa nɛ i ngɛ kɛ imi nitsɛ ye he tete ngɛ nyɛ klaa amɛ a he. Ke i suɔ nyɛ babauu kikɛ ɔ, e sɛ́ kaa nyɛ hu nyɛɛ suɔ mi ja lo?
16Se akɛnɛ i kɛ ye he fɔɛ nyɛ nɔ he je ɔ, nyɛ ma de ke i nu nyɛ ngɛ ga mi; ejakaa ye hɛ mi tɛ̃ pe nyɛ. 17Anɛ i gu nihi nɛ i tsɔɔ mɛ nyɛ ngɔ ɔ eko nɔ ye nyɛ amimi lo? 18I kpa Tito pɛɛ nɛ i tsɔ lɛ kɛ wa nyɛmi ɔ; anɛ Tito ba ye nyɛ amimi lo? Anɛ pi lɛ mumi ɔ nɔuu nɛ waa kɛ nyɛɛ? Pi kɔlɔ ɔ nanema he ɔmɛ a mi nɔuu nɛ wa nyɛɛ?
19Nyɛ susuu kaa wa nya sɔuu wa ngɛ jee kɛ ngɛ nyɛ hae nɛ ɔ lo? Pi ja, Mawu hɛ mi wa ngɛ dee ngɛ, ngɛ Kristo mi, se, mamimɛ, ni nɛ ɔmɛ kulaa a, nyɛ nane si numi he je nɛ wa ngɛ dee. 20Ejakaa i ngɛ gbeye yee kaa alinɔ ke i ba a, i ba be nyɛ nae bɔ nɛ i ko suɔ, nɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ be mi nae bɔ nɛ nyɛ ko suɔ; kaa eko ɔ pɛ, hunga jemi, mi mi la, huhui, sieku yemi, munyu huitihuiti tumi, he nɔ womi, basabasa peemi ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti. 21I ngɛ gbeye yee kaa ke i ba a, ye Mawu ɔ maa ba mi si ekohu ngɛ nyɛ he, nɛ ma ye kɔmɔ ha nihi nɛ pee yayami sa nɛ a tsakee we a tsui ɔmɛ a ti nihi fuu, ngɛ a mu nihi kɛ ajuama bɔmi kɛ ya homi ɔ he.

Title: 2 KORINTOBI 13
Content:
Nyagbe kɔkɔbɔmi kɛ sɛyemi
1Enɛ ɔ ji si etɛ nɛ i ma nyɛ ngɔ. Odase yeli enyɔ loo etɛ nya a, sane tsuaa sane nya nɛ ma si. 2I de to mo, nɛ jehanɛ i ngɛ dee ngɔ to, kaa bɔ nɛ i de benɛ i ba nyɛ ngɔ nɔ́ nɛ ji si enyɔ ɔ, ja nɔuu jehanɛ hu, nɛ i be nyɛ ngɔ nɛ ɔ ɔ, i ngɛ nihi nɛ pee yayami sa a kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ piɛ ɔ kulaa dee ke, ke i ba ekohu ɔ, i kɛ nyɛ he be nyɛ kee; 3akɛnɛ nyɛ ngɛ okadi ko hlae nɛ nyɛ kɛ na kaa Kristo lɛ ngɛ munyu tue ngɛ ye mi, nɔ nɛ gbɔle we ngɛ nyɛ mi, se mohu e he waa ngɛ nyɛ mi ɔ; 4ejakaa gbedemi he a sɛu lɛ ɔ nɛ, se kɛ̃ ɔ Mawu he wami nya a, e hɛ ngɛ; nɛ wɔ hu wa gbɔleɔ ngɛ e mi; se Mawu he wami nɛ ngɛ ha nyɛ ɔ nya a, waa kɛ lɛ hɛ maa hi ngmengmle.
5Nyɛɛ ka nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ he hyɛ kaa nyɛ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi mi lo. Nyɛɛ hyɛ nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ he nɛ hi. Aloo nyɛ li nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ he kaa Yesu Kristo ngɛ nyɛ mi lo? Ke pi ja a, lɛɛ nihi nɛ sɛ kulaa ji nyɛ. 6Se ye hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa nyɛ maa le kaa, wɔɔ lɛɛ wa pi nihi nɛ sɛ́. 7Se i ngɛ Mawu pɛɛ kpae, konɛ nyɛ ko pee yayami ko kulaa, tsa pi kaa konɛ wɔɔ lɛɛ waa pee kaa nihi nɛ sa he je, se mohu konɛ nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛɛ pee nɔ́ nɛ da, ke po a maa ngɔ lɛ kaa wɔɔ lɛɛ wa nyɛ we. 8Ejakaa wa be nɔ́ ko nyɛe maa pee ngɔ si anɔkuale ɔ, se mohu ke nɔ́ ko nɛ wa maa pee ɔ, wa maa pee ngɔ ha anɔkuale ɔ. 9Wa naa bua jɔmi ke wa pee gbedee, nɛ nyɛ mohu nyɛ ngɛ he wami ɔ. Enɛ ɔ he pɛɛ hu wa kpaa, kɔlɔ ɔ ji nyɛ himi kɛ si pimi ɔ nɛ. 10Kɔlɔ ɔ he hu nɛ i ngma enɛ ɔ benɛ i be nyɛ ngɔ ɔ nɛ, konɛ ke i ba nyɛ ngɔ ɔ, i kɛ nyɛ ko ye wawɛɛ ngɛ he blɔ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ha mi ngɛ dlami se pi puemi he ɔ nya.
11Nyagbe ɔ, mamimɛ, nyɛ bua nɛ jɔ, nyɛɛ hi kɛ pi si, nyɛɛ wo nyɛ sibi ga, nyɛ juɛmi nɛ pee kake, nyɛɛ hi si ngɛ he jɔmi mi, nɛ suɔmi kɛ he jɔmi Mawu ɔ kɛ nyɛ maa hi si.
12Nyɛ nga nyɛ he kɛ nya he fiɔmi klɔuklɔu. Ni Klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ kulaa ke a biɔ nyɛ.
13Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dloomi ɔ, kɛ Mawu suɔmi ɔ, kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu huɛ bɔmi ɔ kɛ nyɛ tsuo nɛ hi si! Amen.

Title: GALATABI 1
Content:
1Paulo nɛ ji bɔfo nɛ pi nimli nɛ wo lɛ, nɛ pi nɔmlɔ ko nɔ hu nɛ e gu, se mohu, Yesu Kristo kɛ Tsɛ Mawu nɛ tle lɛ si kɛ je gbeje ɔ, nɔ e gu ɔ, 2kɛ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ kulaa nɛ kɛ mi ngɛ ɔ, ngma ya ha Galata asafo ɔmɛ:
3Dloomi kɛ he jɔmi nɛ je Tsɛ Mawu ɔ kɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dɛ mi ɔ ha nyɛ; 4nɔ nɛ ngɔ lɛ nitsɛ e he ngɔ ha ngɛ wa he yayami ɔmɛ a he, konɛ e je wɔ kɛ je je yaya nɛ ngɛ mwɔnɛmwɔnɛ nɛ ɔ mi ngɛ Mawu kɛ wa Tsɛ ɔ suɔmi nya; 5nɔ nɛ nɔ́ nɛ ji hɛ mi nyami ɔ kɛ je neneene kɛ yaa neneene ɔ! Amen.
Sane Kpakpa kake ɔ
6Ye hɛ mi pee mi yaa kaa amlɔ nɛ ɔ nɔuu ɔ nyɛ ngɛ nyɛ he tsɔe kɛ ngɛ nɔ nɛ tsɛ nyɛ ngɛ Kristo dloomi ɔ nya a he jee kɛ yaa sane kpakpa kpa ko he; 7nɛ kɛ ɔ, ekpa ko be, mohu ni komɛ ngɛ nɛ ngɛ nyɛ yi mi puee, nɛ a ngɛ hlae kaa a plɛ Kristo sane kpakpa a hɛ mi ngɔ bu si. 8Se ke wɔ po, loo bɔfo nɛ je hiɔwe tete, ba ba jaje sane kpakpa kpa ko tsɔɔ nyɛ, ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ wa jaje tsɔɔ nyɛ nɛ ɔ se ɔ, jamɛ a tsɛ ɔ e pee musutsɛ! 9Kaa bɔ nɛ wa de momo ɔ, ja nɔuu i ngɛ dee ekohu ke: Ke nɔ ko ba ba jaje sane kpakpa kpa ko tsɔɔ nyɛ ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ he nɛ ɔ se ɔ, jamɛ a tsɛ ɔ e pee musutsɛ!
10Blɔɔ jehanɛ nimli a hɛ mi i ngɛ hlɛe nɛ ma sa loo Mawu? Aloo i ngɛ nimli a hɛ mi hlae ma sa? Ejakaa ke i ngɛ nɔ ngɛ nimli a hɛ mi sae kɛ mwɔɔ ɔ, lɛɛ pi Kristo tsɔlɔ ji mi.
Bɔ nɛ pee nɛ Paulo plɛ bɔfo
11Se i ngɛ hae nɛ nyɛɛ le, mamimɛ, kaa sane kpakpa nɛ i jaje ɔ, pi nimli a nya nɛ e je. 12Ejakaa pi nɔmlɔ ko dɛ mi nɛ i na kɛ je, nɛ pi tsɔɔmi hu nɛ a tsɔɔ mi; se mohu Yesu Kristo kpo jemi nya i na ngɛ.
13Ejakaa nyɛ nu ye sa je mi bami he ngɛ Yudafohi a jami ɔ mi, bɔ nɛ i wa Mawu asafo ɔ yi mi babauu nɛ i kpata e hɛ mi, 14nɛ i pã wa juahi fuu ngɛ Yudafohi a jami ɔ mi ngɛ ye wɛli a kpɛti, nɛ ye hɛ dɔ wawɛɛ ngɛ wa tsɛmɛ a blema sanehi nɛ a kɛ ha wɔ ɔmɛ a he.
15Se benɛ e sa Mawu nɛ je mi to kɛ je maa muklii mi lokoo nɛ e kɛ e dloomi ɔ tsɛ mi kɛ ba a hɛ mi, 16kaa e ma je lɛ nitsɛ e bi ɔ kpo ngɛ ye mi, konɛ ma jaje e he sane kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ ngɛ majeli ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ, amlɔ ɔ, i kɛ he lo kɛ muɔ yɛ he dami, 17nɛ jehanɛ i yɛ́ Yerusalem hu ngɛ nihi nɛ ji bɔfohi loko ji imi hu i ba plɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ a ngɔ, se mohu i pue nɔ kɛ ho Arabia ya, nɛ lɔ ɔ se ɔ, i kpale ye se kɛ ba Damasko ekohu. 18Kɛkɛ nɛ lɔ ɔ se jeha etɛ ɔ, i ya Yerusalem nɛ i kɛ Petro ya sɛɛ ni, nɛ i hi e ngɔ ligbi nyɔngma kɛ enuɔ. 19I nɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kpa ko kaa ja Yakobo, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nyɛmi ɔ. 20Nihi nɛ i ngɛ nyɛ ngmae nɛ ɔ, oʼɛ, Mawu hɛ mi i ngɛ dee ngɛ, i yi lakpa.
21Lɔ ɔ se ɔ, i ba Siria kɛ Kilikia ni ɔmɛ a mi. 22Se nɛ i ngɛ nɛ ɔ, a li ye hɛ mi ngɛ Yudea Kristo asafo ɔmɛ a mi; 23se mohu a nuɔ kɛkɛ kaa nɔ nɛ wa wɔ yi mi sa a, jehanɛ e ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ sa nɛ e kpata hɛ mi ɔ he sane kpakpa a jajee kɛ ngɛ tsɔɔe; 24nɛ a wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami ngɛ ye he.

Title: GALATABI 2
Content:
Paulo kɛ bɔfo kpa amɛ
1Kɛkɛ nɛ, lɔ ɔ se jeha nyɔngma kɛ eywiɛ sɔuu ɔ, i kɛ Barnaba kpale kɛ ya Yerusalem, nɛ i ngɔ Tito hu ngɔ piɛ ye he. 2I ya ngɛ kpo jemi ko nya, nɛ i kɛ sane kpakpa nɛ i ngɛ fiɛe ngɛ majeli ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ ya fɔ a hɛ mi, se titli ɔ nihi nɛ a buu mɛ ɔ a hɛ mi, benɛ pee nɛ fo nɛ i tuu ɔ aloo i ngɛ tue ɔ nɛ e ko pee yaka. 3Se Tito tete nɛ e kɛ mi ngɛ nɛ e ji Hela no ɔ, a nyɛ́ we enɔ kaa a po lɛ, 4ejakaa lakpa nyɛmimɛ komɛ ju si sɛ asafo ɔ mi kulɔɔ, konɛ a ba huɔ wa he nɛ wa ye ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ, konɛ a ye wɔ nyɔguɛ; 5se mɛɛ lɛɛ wa kplɛɛ we nɛ waa bu mɛ tue ngmlɛfia kake tete, konɛ sane kpakpa a anɔkuale ɔ nɛ e hi si sɔkee ha nyɛ.
6Se ninɛmɛ nɛ a buu mɛ kaa a ngɛ biɛ ɔ, — bɔ tsuaa bɔ nɛ a ngɛ sa a, pi ye he sane ko, Mawu hyɛ we nimli a hɛ mi, — ejakaa imi lɛɛ, ninɛmɛ nɛ a buu mɛ ɔ tsɔɔ we mi nɔ́ ko ngɔ piɛ we he; 7se mohu, a na kaa a tu mɔmlɔtɔtsɛmɛ a kpɛti sane kpakpa a fiɛmi ngɔ wo ye dɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ a tu nɔ poli ɔmɛ a nɔ ɔ ngɔ wo Petro dɛ ɔ. 8Ejakaa nɔ nɛ tsu ni ngɛ Petro mi nɛ e ha e ye bɔfo ngɛ nɔ poli ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ, lɛ nɔuu lɛ e tsu ni ngɛ imi hu ye mi ngɛ majeli ɔmɛ a kpɛti. 9Benɛ a yo dloomi nɛ a kɛ ha mi ɔ, Yakobo kɛ Kefa kɛ Yohane nɛ a buu mɛ kaa titimahi ɔ, kɛ huɛ bɔmi hiɛ ɔ nine sa i kɛ Barnaba dɛ, konɛ wɔɔ lɛɛ waa ya majeli ɔmɛ a ngɔ nɛ mɛɛ lɛɛ a ya nɔ poli ɔmɛ a kpɛti; 10se ohiafohi kɛkɛ a ke wa kai, kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu he mɔde i bɔ kaa ma pee.
Paulo kã Kefa hɛ mi ngɛ Antiokia
11Se benɛ Kefa ba Antiokia a, i da e hɛ mi nɛ i kã e hɛ mi, ejakaa e nɔ be mi. 12Ejakaa loko ni komɛ maa je Yakobo ngɔ kɛ ba a, e kɛ majeli a bimɛ ɔmɛ yeɔ ni; se benɛ a ba a, e sã e he si, nɛ e tsɔ e he, ejakaa e ngɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ je nɔ poli ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ gbeye yee. 13Nɛ Yudafohi nɛ piɛ ɔ hu kɛ lɛ pee jamɛ a osato ɔ, nɛ a gbla Barnaba tete ngɔ wo a sato peemi ɔ mi. 14Se benɛ i na kaa a nyɛɛ we tutuutu ngɛ sane kpakpa a mi anɔkuale ɔ nya a, i de Kefa ngɛ mɛ kulaa a hɛ mi ke: “Ke mo nɛ o ji Yuda no ɔ, o peɔ o nihi kaa maje no se pi kaa Yuda no ɔ, mɛni he je o nyɛɛ majeli ɔmɛ a nɔ kaa a pee a nihi kaa Yudafohi ɔ?”
Hemi kɛ yemi a kɛ he Yudafohi kɛ majeli a yiwami
15A fɔ wɔ Yudafohi, nɛ wa pi yayami peeli nɛ je majeli ɔmɛ a mi. 16Se kɛ̃ ɔ, wa le kaa a wui nɔmlɔ nguɔ kɛ ji mlaa ni tsumihi a mi, kaa ja a gu Yesu Kristo nɔ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ kɛkɛ nɔ; enɛ ɔ he je ɔ, wɔ hu wa he Kristo Yesu nɔ ye, konɛ a wo wɔ nguɔ kɛ je Kristo nɔ hemi kɛ yemi mi, nɛ pi mlaa ni tsumihi a mi; ejakaa a be he lo ko he lo ko nguɔ woe kɛ je mlaa ni tsumihi a mi. 17Jehanɛ, ke wɔ nɛ wa hlaa kaa a wo wɔ nguɔ ngɛ Kristo mi ɔ, a na wɔ kaa wɔ nitsɛmɛ hu yayami peeli ji wɔ ɔ, blɔɔ lɔ ɔ tsɔɔ kaa Kristo fiɔ yayami se lo? Pi ja! 18Ejakaa ke nihi nɛ i kuɔ pueɔ si ɔ i kpaleɔ maa ekohu ɔ, blɔɔ i tsɔɔ ye he kaa nɔ tɔlɔ ji mi. 19Ejakaa imi lɛɛ i gu mlaa a nɔ kɛ gbo ha mlaa a, konɛ ye hɛ nɛ hi ngmengmle ha Mawu. 20A sɛu mi kɛ Kristo; he je ɔ pi imi nɛ ye hɛ ngɛ hu, se Kristo lɛ hɛ ngɛ ngɛ ye mi; se ye hɛ nɛ ngɛ ngɛ he lo mi jehanɛ ɔ, Mawu Bi ɔ nɛ suɔ mi nɛ e ngɔ e he ngɔ ha ngɛ ye he ɔ nɔ hemi kɛ yemi mi ye hɛ ngɛ ngɛ. 21I kua we Mawu dloomi ɔ, ejakaa, ke mlaa nɔ dami guu kɛ baa a, lɛɛ Kristo gbo yaka gu.

Title: GALATABI 3
Content:
Mlaa loo hemi kɛ yemi
1Oo, Galatabi nɛ be yi mi! Mɛnɔ gbiɛ nyɛ ke nyɛ ko bu anɔkuale ɔ tue — nihi a hɛ mi nɛ a tɛni Yesu Kristo ngɛ kaa nɔ nɛ a sɛu. 2Nyɛ ha ma bi nyɛ nɔ́ kake: Mlaa ni tsumihi a mi nyɛ na Mumi ɔ kɛ je, aloo hemi kɛ yemi tue bumi mi? 3Anɛ kikɛ nyɛ be yi mi lo? Nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ Mumi je sisi ɔ, jehanɛ he lo nyɛɛ kɛ maa gbe nya lo? 4Nɔ babauu nɛ nyɛ na nɛ ɔ, yaka gu nyɛ na lo? Ke yaka gu hu po ʼi ɔ, 5blɔɔ Mawu nɛ kɛ Mumi ɔ kee nyɛ nɛ e tsuɔ he wami nihi ngɛ nyɛ mi ɔ, mlaa ni tsumihi a mi e tsuɔ ngɛ aloo hemi kɛ yemi tue bumi mi?
6A ngma ke: “Abraham he Mawu ye, nɛ a bu enɛ ɔ dami ngɔ ha lɛ.” 7Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ na nyɛɛ le kaa nihi nɛ je hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mi ɔ, mɛ nɔuu ji Abraham bimɛ. 8Se akɛnɛ ngmami ɔ na momo kaa hemi kɛ yemi mi Mawu maa wo majeli ɔmɛ nguɔ ngɛ he je ɔ, e jaje sane kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ Abraham ngɔ to kaa: “O mi a maa gbaa majemaje li ɔmɛ kulaa ngɛ.” 9Lɛɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ je hemi kɛ yemi mi ɔ, a gbaa mɛ kɛ Abraham nɛ he ye ɔ.
10Ejakaa nihi abɔ nɛ je mlaa ni tsumihi a mi ɔ, gbiɛmi ngɛ a nɔ; ejakaa a ngma ke: “A gbiɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ hi si ngɛ nihi tsuo nɛ a ngma ngɛ Mlaa Womi ɔ mi ɔ nɛ e ye nɔ ɔ.” 11Jehanɛ e ngɛ paa kaa mlaa a mi ɔ, a be nɔ ko nɔ ko nguɔ woe ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi, ejakaa dalɔ ɔ, hemi kɛ yemi mi e yi ma na wami ngɛ. 12Se mlaa a, pi hemi kɛ yemi mi nɛ e je, se mohu nɔ nɛ yeɔ nɔ ɔ yi ma na wami ngɛ mi.
13Kristo kpɔ wɔ kɛ je mlaa a gbiɛmi ɔ mi, akɛnɛ e plɛ gbiɛmi ngɔ ha wɔ ɔ, ejakaa a ngma ke: “A gbiɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ kplaa si ngɛ tso nɔ” ɔ; 14konɛ Abraham gbaami ɔ nɛ ba maje li ɔmɛ a nɔ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi, nɛ waa kɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ nɛ na Mumi ɔ si womi ɔ.
Mlaa a kɛ si womi ɔ
15Mamimɛ, nyɛ ha ma ngɔ nimli a si himi mi nɔ ko kɛ tsɔɔ nyɛ nya. Nɔmlɔ si womi tete ɔ, ke a ma nɔ mi ɔ, nɔ ko kua we, nɛ jehanɛ hu nɔ ko piɛ we he nɔ ko. 16Jehanɛ Abraham ɔ, a tu si womi munyu ɔmɛ ngɔ ha lɛ kɛ e nina a. E de we ke: “Kɛ e nina amɛ,” kaa nɔ nɛ nihi fuu a nɔ ʼi, se mohu kaa nɔ kake nɔ, ke: “Kɛ o nina a,” nɔ nɛ ji Kristo ɔ. 17Se nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ tsɔɔe nɛ ɔ ji: Mlaa nɛ a wo jeha lafa eywiɛ kɛ nyingmi etɛ se ɔ, e gui somi nɛ Mawu dla ngɔ to Kristo ɔ nɛ e ha si womi ɔ nɛ pee yaka. 18Se ke gbo si ni ɔ je mlaa a mi ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ tsa pi si womi ɔ mi nɛ e je mɔ; se Mawu kɛ ke Abraham kɛ gu si womi nɔ.
19Jehanɛ mɛni ji mlaa a mɔ? Nɔ tɔmihi a he nɛ a kɛ piɛ he, kɛ maa su be nɛ Abraham nina nɛ a wo si ngɔ ha a maa ba; Hiɔwe bɔfohi a nɔ a gu kɛ wo si kɛ gu mi dalɔ nɔ. 20Se mi dalɔ he hia we ha nɔ kake, nɛ Mawu ɔ nɔ kake ʼi.
Nɔ́ nɛ mlaa tsuɔ
21Anɛ mlaa a kuɔ Mawu si womi ɔmɛ a nya lo? Dɛbi! Ejakaa e ji a wo mlaa ko nɛ ma nyɛ wami ma ha jinɛ e ngɛ mi niinɛ kaa mlaa mi dami ɔ je. 22Se mohu ngmami ɔ ngɔ je ɔ kulaa ngɔ wo yayami sisi, konɛ a gu Yesu Kristo nɔ hemi kɛ yemi nɔ nɛ a kɛ si womi ɔ nɛ ha nihi nɛ he yeɔ ɔ.
23Se loko hemi kɛ yemi ɔ ba a, a kɛ wɔ wo mlaa sisi, nɛ a nga wa yi ngɔ to hemi kɛ yemi nɛ a ma je kpo ɔ. 24Lɔ ɔ he ɔ mlaa a plɛ wa tsɔselɔ kɛ yaa Kristo ngɔ, konɛ a wo wɔ nguɔ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi mi. 25Se nɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ ba nɛ ɔ, wa be tsɔselɔ ɔ sisi hu.
26Ejakaa nyɛ tsuo ɔ Mawu bimɛ ji nyɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi kɛ gu hemi kɛ yemi ɔ nɔ; 27ejakaa nyɛ nihi abɔ nɛ a baptisi nyɛ ngɔ wo Kristo mi ɔ, nyɛ wo Kristo. 28Yudano be ɔ, Helano hu bé hu; nyɔguɛ bé ɔ, odehe hu bé hu; nyumu be ɔ, yo hu be hu; ejakaa nyɛ tuso ɔ, nɔ kake ji nyɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi. 29Se ke Kristo nihi ji nyɛ ɔ, lɛɛ Abraham nina ji nyɛ, kɛ gbo si ni yeli hulɔ ngɛ si womi ɔ nya.

Title: GALATABI 4
Content:
1Nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ tsɔɔe ɔ ji, be abɔ nɛ gbo si ni yelɔ ɔ ji bimwɔyo ɔ slɔɔto ko be e kɛ sɔmɔlɔ kpɛti, kpahu lɛ ji ni ɔmɛ tsuo a tsɛ; 2se e ngɛ nɔ hyɛli kɛ sɔmɔli nikɔtɔmahi a sisi kɛ yaa su be nɛ Tsɛ ɔ to ɔ. 3Ja nɔuu kɛ̃ wɔ hu, benɛ wa ji bimwɔwi ɔ, a kɛ wɔ wo je nɛ ɔ mi adebɔ mumihi a nyɔguɛ yemi ɔ sisi. 4Se benɛ be nɛ a to ɔ su ɔ, Mawu tsɔ lɛ nitsɛ e bi ɔ kɛ ba, yo ko ba fɔ lɛ, e ba mlaa sisi, 5konɛ e ba kpɔ nihi nɛ ngɛ mlaa sisi ɔ, nɛ wa na bi peemi he blɔ.
6Se akɛnɛ bimɛ ji nyɛ he je ɔ, Mawu tsɔ e bi ɔ Mumi ɔ kɛ ba nyɛ tsui mi, nɔ nɛ kpaa ngmlaa ke: “Abba, Tsaatsɛ!” 7Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, o pi sɔmɔlɔ hu, se mohu bi ji mo. Nɛ ke bi ji mo ɔ, lɛɛ Mawu ni yelɔ hu ji mo ngɛ Kristo he.
Paulo ye Galatabi ɔmɛ a he kɔmɔ
8Se be nɛ be ɔ mi ɔ, nyɛ li Mawu, nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛ he pee nyɔguɛhi ngɔ ha nihi nɛ pi mawu ji mɛ ngɛ a bɔmi su nya a; 9se jehanɛ, nɛ nyɛ le Mawu, aloo mohu, nɛ Mawu le nyɛ nɛ ɔ, kɛ peɔ kɛɛ nɛ nyɛ pa kpaleɔ nyɛ se kɛ yaa sisi jemi nihi nɛ nyɛ we nɔ́ ko nɛ a pee nɛ a ye ohia amɛ a ngɔ, nɛ nyɛ pa hlaa kaa nyɛɛ kpale sɔmɔ mɛ ekohu ɔ nɛɛ? 10Nyɛ buu ligbihi kɛ hlamihi kɛ behi kɛ jehahi a he akɔɔtaa fitso-fitso. 11I ngɛ gbeye yee, kaa nyɛ ma ha ma gbo nyɛ he yaka dengme.
12I ngɛ nyɛ pɛɛ kpae, mamimɛ, nyɛɛ pee kaa imi, ejakaa imi hu i ngɛ kaa nyɛ. Nyɛ pee we mi yayami ko; 13se nyɛ le kaa he lo gbedemi mi i je kɛ jaje sane kpakpa a ngɛ ngɔ ha nyɛ kekle ɔ, 14nɛ nɔ́ nɛ ji nya tsɔmi nɔ́ ha nyɛ ngɛ he lo mi ɔ, nyɛ gbi he guɛ, nɛ jehanɛ hu nyɛ nyangee we mi; se mohu nyɛ he mi kaa Mawu bɔfo, kaa Kristo Yesu nitsɛ. 15Jehanɛ jije nyɛ bua jɔmi ɔ ngɛ? Ejakaa i ngɛ nyɛ he odase yee kaa, e maa hi jinɛ, nyɛ ko hia nyɛ hɛngmɛhi tete ha mi. 16Nɛ i tuɔ anɔkuale tsɔɔ nyɛ he je ɔ, blɔɔ i plɛ nyɛ henyɛlɔ lo?
17Pi nyɛ he dengme kpakpa ko nɛ ni kpa amɛ ngɛ gboe nɛ ɔ; se mohu a ngɛ hlae nɛ a tsi nyɛ wa ngɔ blɔ, konɛ nyɛ gbo mɛ mohu a he dengme. 18E sa kaa nyɛ gbo dengme ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ ngɛ fɛu he daa; nɛ pi benɛ i kɛ nyɛ ngɛ ɔ kɛkɛ. 19Ye bimɛ kpakpahi, i nu kɔɔmi ngɛ nyɛ fɔmi he ekohu kɛ maa su be nɛ a maa bɔ Kristo subai ɔ ngɛ nyɛ mi. 20I na nɛ jinɛ i ngɛ nyɛ kasa nya amlɔ nɛ ɔ nɛ ma tsake blɔ nɔ nɛ i kɛ nyɛ tuɔ munyu ngɛ, ejakaa i ngɛ haoe ngɛ nyɛ he!
Hagar kɛ Sara kaa nɔhyɛmi nɔ
21Nyɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ nyɛ hlaa kaa nyɛɛ hi mlaa sisi ɔ, nyɛ de mi, anɛ nyɛ nui nɔ nɛ mlaa a de ɔ lo? 22A ngma ke Abraham ngɛ bimɛ enyɔ, nɔ kake ɔ, e kɛ sɔmɔlɔyo ɔ lɛ fɔ; nɔ kake hu e kɛ odehe ɔ lɛ fɔ. 23Se jehanɛ ɔ, nɔ nɛ e kɛ sɔmɔlɔyo ɔ fɔ ɔ, a fɔ lɛ ngɛ he lo nya; se nɔ nɛ e kɛ odehe ɔ fɔ ɔ, a fɔ lɛ ngɛ si womi ɔ nya. 24Kikɛmɛ a nɔ́ nɛ ɔ, a kɛ buu abɛ. Yi nɛ ɔmɛ ji somi enyɔ ɔ nɛ; kake ɔ je Sinai yoku ɔ nɔ, nɛ nyɔguɛ yemi mi e fɔɔ woɔ; lɛ ji Hagar. 25Hagar ji Sinai yoku ɔ ngɛ Arabia; se e kɛ mwɔnɔmwɔnɔ Yerusalem ɔ tsa we nɔ, ejakaa e kɛ e bimɛ ɔmɛ ji nyɔguɛhi. 26Se hiɔwe Yerusalem ɔ ji odehe ɔ nɛ, nɔ nɛ ji wɔ kulaa wa nyɛ ɔ. 27Ejakaa sa ngma ke:
“La nyami la, mo yosa nɛ o fɔ we;
Nɛ o hwɔ lele kɛ bua jɔmi, mo nɛ o kɔɔ we;
Ejakaa nɔ nɛ a kua lɛ ɔ mohu bimɛ maa hiɛ pe nɔ nɛ ngɛ huno ɔ po!”
28Jehanɛ, mamimɛ, wɔɔ lɛɛ Si womi ɔ bimɛ ji wɔ kaa Isak. 29Se kaa bɔ nɛ lɛ be ɔ mi hu, nɔ nɛ a fɔ lɛ ngɛ he lo nya a waa nɔ nɛ a fɔ lɛ ngɛ mumi nya a yi mi ɔ, jã nɔuu kɛ̃ e ngɛ mwɔnɔmwɔnɔ hu. 30Se kɛ ngmami ɔ de kɛɛ? “Fie sɔmɔlɔyo ɔ kɛ e bi ɔ, ejakaa e sɛ́ kaa nyɔguɛyo ɔ bi ɔ kɛ odehe ɔ bi ɔ nɛ ye gbo si ni ɔ.” 31Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mamimɛ, wa pi sɔmɔlɔyo ɔ bimɛ, se mohu odehe ɔ bimɛ ji wɔ.

Title: GALATABI 5
Content:
Nyɛ ko ngmɛɛ nyɛ heyemi ɔ he
1Kristo pee wɔ odehehi, nɛ e ha wa ye wa he, lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛɛ da si kpitikplii nɛ nyɛ ko ha a bɔ nyɛ nyɔguɛ yemi pã a hu. 2Oʼɛ, imi Paulo, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke, ke nyɛ ha a po nyɛ ɔ Kristo he be se nami ko ha nyɛ. 3Se i pa ngɛ odase yee kɛ ngɛ nɔmlɔ tsuaa nɔmlɔ nɛ a po lɛ ɔ tsɔɔe kaa e hɛɛ hiɔ kaa é ye mlaa mluku ɔ kulaa nɔ. 4Nyɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ nyɛ hlaa kaa a wo nyɛ nguɔ ngɛ mlaa mi ɔ, nyɛɛ kɛ Kristo be sane ko; nyɛ gbee si kɛ je dloomi ɔ mi. 5Ejakaa wɔɔ lɛɛ, Mumi ɔ nɔ wa guu waa kɛ hemi kɛ yemi mlɛɛ dami hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ɔ. 6Ejakaa Kristo Yesu mi ɔ, pi nɔ pomi nɛ nyɛɔ nɔ́ ko peɔ, nɛ pi mɔmlɔtɔ hulɔ, se mohu hemi kɛ yemi nɛ guu suɔmi nɔ tsuɔ ni ɔ ʼi.
7Nyɛ ngɛ mɔde bɔe saminya; mɛnɔ po lɛ tsi nyɛ blɔ kaa nyɛ ko bu anɔkuale ɔ tue? 8Juɛmi tsakemi nɛ ɔ ɔ, tsa pi Mawu nɛ tsɛ nyɛ ɔ mi nɛ e je. 9Ma sasɛ nyafii saa ma mluku ɔ tsuo. 10Imi lɛɛ i ngɔ ye hɛ ngɔ fɔ nyɛ nɔ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi, kaa nyɛ be juɛmi kpa ko juɛe, se nɔ nɛ ngɛ nyɛ puee ɔ, nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ e ji ɔ, e musu maa tloo lɛ.
11Imi lɛɛ, mamimɛ, ke nɔ pomi i ngɛ fiee kɛ mwɔɔ ɔ, mɛni he je mɔ nɛ a ngɛ mi yi mi wae kɛ mwɔɔ? Ke ja a, lɛɛ seumi tso ɔ he sane ɔ, e pi nya tsɔmi nɔ́ hu. 12Oo, i na jinɛ nihi nɛ woɔ nyɛ yi mi ɔ puɛ̃ loo ta mɛ nitsɛmɛ a he.
13Ejakaa he yemi mi a tsɛ nyɛ kɛ ba ngɛ, mamimɛ; se nyɛ he yemi ɔ kɛkɛ nɛ nyɛ ko ha e plɛ he blɔ ha he lo ɔ, se mohu nyɛɛ gu suɔmi mi kɛ sɔmɔ nyɛ he. 14Ejakaa mlaa mluku ɔ kulaa nɔ yemi ngɛ munyu kake nɛ ɔ mi ke: “Suɔ o nyɛmi kaa bɔ nɛ o suɔ mo nitsɛ o he.” 15Se ke nyɛ kɔɔ nyɛ he nɛ nyɛ plaa nyɛ he ɔ, nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ nyɛ ko puɛ nyɛ he!
Mumi ɔ kɛ nɔmlɔ su
16Se i ke: Ke nyɛ nyɛɛ ngɛ mumi nya a, nyɛ be he lo akɔnɔ ɔmɛ a nya ni pee. 17Ejakaa nihi nɛ he lo ɔ dii se ɔ kɛ mumi ɔ yi, nɛ nihi nɛ mumi ɔ hu dii se ɔ kɛ he lo ɔ yi. Ni nɛ ɔmɛ kɛ a he yi, konɛ nyɛ ko pee nihi nɛ nyɛ suɔ. 18Se ke mumi ɔ lɛ kpakpaa nyɛ ɔ, nyɛ be mlaa sisi.
19Se he lo ɔ ni tsumi ɔmɛ jee kpo paa, kɔlɔ ɔmɛ ji gba puemi, ajuama bɔmi, mu ni tsumi, ya homi 20wɔ jami, nyuami, nyɛmi, pɛ, hunga jemi, mi mi la womi, ngmlaa kpami, atua tsɔmi, mi gbami, hɛ tsumi, 21da demi, fiɛmi yaya kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛkaa enɛ ɔmɛ, nihi nɛ i de nyɛ ngɔ to, kaa bɔ nɛ i de nyɛ momoɔ, ke: nihi nɛ peɔ kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, a nine be Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ nɔ sue.
22Se Mumi ɔ yiblii ji suɔmi, bua jɔmi, he jɔmi, tsui si tomi, mi mi himi, kpakpa peemi, hemi kɛ yemi, 23he si bami, hɛ si kami; enɛ ɔmɛ ɔ mlaa ko gui. 24Se nihi nɛ ji Kristo Yesu nihi ɔ, a sɛu he lo ɔ kɛ e he numi nihi kɛ e kɔnɔ ɔmɛ kulaa. 25Ke wa hɛ ngɛ ngmengmle ngɛ Mumi ɔ mi ɔ, nya ha waa nyɛɛ ngɛ Mumi ɔ nya hulɔ. 26Wa hɛ ko kɔ yakayaka hɛ mi nyami nɔ, nɛ wa ko wo wa sibi a muklii mi la nɛ wa he ba tsɛ̃ wa sibi.

Title: GALATABI 6
Content:
Nyɛɛ kpee nyɛ he kɛ tloo nyɛ tlomihi
1Mamimɛ, ke tlukaa nɛ nɔ ko tɔ ɔ, nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ ji mumi mi nimli ɔmɛ ɔ, nyɛ dla jamɛ a nɔ ɔ ekohu ngɛ mi mi jɔmi mumi mi; nɛ o le o he nɔ hyemi konɛ mo hu a ko ka mo. 2Nyɛ tlomi ɔmɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ kpee nyɛ he kɛ tloo, nɛ lɔ ɔ loko nyɛ maa ye Kristo mlaa a nɔ. 3Ejakaa ke e peɔ nɔ ko kaa nɔ ko ji lɛ nɛ e pi nɔ ko ɔ, lɛ nitsɛ e he e ngɛ sisie. 4Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ka lɛ nitsɛ e ni tsumi nɛ e hyɛ, nɛ lɔ ɔ loko e maa na nɔ́ ko ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e mi nɛ e fia ngɔ fɔ nɔ, se pi nɔ kpa nɔ́ ɔ nɔ. 5Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ maa tloo lɛ nitsɛ e tlomi.
6Nɔ nɛ a ngɛ lɛ Mawu munyu ɔ tsɔɔe ɔ, e kɛ nɔ nɛ ngɛ lɛ tsɔɔe ɔ nɛ dla ni kpakpahi nɛ e ngɛ ɔ. 7Nyɛ ko mlɔɔ nyɛ he: Mawu ɔ, a yi e he fɛu yaka. Ejakaa nɔ́ nɛ nɔmlɔ duɔ ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu e ma kpa hulɔ. 8Ejakaa nɔ nɛ duɔ ni ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e he lo mi ɔ, e he lo ɔ mi e ma kpa puemi kɛ je. Se nɔ nɛ duɔ ni ngɛ Mumi mi ɔ, Mumi ɔ mi nɔuu e ma kpa neneene wami kɛ je. 9Nyɛ ko ha nɛ pɔ nɛ tɔ nyɛ kɛ kpakpa peemi, ejakaa ke wa nine mi wui nyu ɔ, wa ma kpa hulɔ ngɛ be nɛ sa mi. 10Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, akɛnɛ wa ngɛ deka he je ɔ, nyɛ ha waa pee nihi tsuo kpakpa, se titli ɔ, ninɛme nɛ ji hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mi bi ɔmɛ.
Nyagbe kɔkɔbɔmi kɛ sɛyemi
11Nyɛɛ hyɛ womi sɔuu nɛ i kɛ imi nitsɛ ye nine ngma nyɛ ngɛ ningma nguahi a mi. 12Nihi nɛ hlaa kaa a hɛ mi nɛ ba nyami ngɛ he lo mi ɔ, mɛ lɛ a nyɛɛ nyɛ nɔ kaa a po nyɛ, benɛ pee nɛ a ko wa mɛ yi mi ngɛ Kristo sɛumi tso ɔ he. 13Nihi nɛ a po mɛ ɔ nitsɛmɛ tete yi mlaa a nɔ; se mohu a ngɛ hlae nɛ a po nyɛ, konɛ a fia ngɔ fɔ nyɛ he lo ɔ nɔ. 14Se imi lɛɛ e ya je ngɛ se lokoo kaa ma fia ngɔ fɔ nɔ́ ko nɔ kaa ja wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo sɛumi tso ɔ nɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu nɔ a gu kɛ sɛu je ɔ ha mi, nɛ imi hu a sɛu mi ha je ɔ. 15Ejakaa Kristo mi ɔ, nɔ pomi pi nɔ́ ko, nɛ mɔmlɔtɔ hu pi nɔ́ ko, se mohu bɔmi he kɛkɛ ji nɔ́ ko. 16Nɛ nihi abɔ nɛ maa nyɛɛ ngɛ kikɛmɛ a mlaa nɛ ɔ nya a, he jɔmi kɛ mɔbɔnami nɛ ba mɛ kɛ Mawu webi kulaa a nɔ!
17Jehanɛ, nɔ ko ko doo ye nya hu; ejakaa i hɛɛ Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu plaami okadi ɔmɛ ngɛ ye nɔmlɔ tso ɔ he.
18Wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dloomi ɔ kɛ nyɛ mumi ɔ nɛ hi si, mamimɛ! Amen.

Title: EFESOBI 1
Content:
1Paulo, nɛ ji Yesu Kristo bɔfo ngɛ Mawu suɔmi nya a, ngma ya ha ni klɔuklɔuhi nɛ ngɛ Efeso ɔ kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ heɔ Kristo Yesu nɔ yeɔ ɔ:
2Dloomi kɛ he jɔmi nɛ je wa Tsɛ Mawu ɔ kɛ Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dɛ mi ɔ ha nyɛ!
Mumi mi gbaami ngɛ Kristo mi
3A gbaa Mawu, wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo Tsɛ ɔ, nɔ nɛ kɛ mumi mi gbaami tsuaa mumi mi gbaami gbaa wɔ ngɛ hiɔwe nihi a mi ngɛ Kristo mi ɔ. 4E hla wɔ ngɛ Kristo mi loko a to je ɔ sisi, konɛ waa pee klɔuklɔu nɛ piami ko ko hi wa he ngɛ e hɛ mi. 5E je wɔ ngɛ suɔmi mi ngɔ to ha e he nɛ waa pee e bimɛ ngɛ Yesu Kristo he, kaa bɔ nɛ sa e hɛ mi ngɛ e suɔmi nya a, 6konɛ a kɛ je e dloomi hɛ mi nyami ɔ yi, nɔ́ nɛ e kɛ dloo wɔ ngɛ nɔ nɛ a suɔ lɛ ɔ mi ɔ. 7Ejakaa Kristo mi nɔuu wa na kpɔmi ɔ ngɛ nɛ ji yayamihi a pami ɔ, ngɛ e muɔ ɔ he ngɛ e dloomi hiɛmi ɔ nyɛ, 8nɔ́ nɛ e ha kɛ be nɔ ha wɔ ngɛ ni lemi kɛ nɔ sisi numi kulaa mi. 9E ha wa le e yi mi tomi ɔ mi laami sane nɛ e to kaa e maa gbe nya ngɛ Kristo mi, 10ha be ɔmɛ a yinɔ ɔ blɔ nya tomi, konɛ e ngɔ nihi kulaa ngɔ to yi kake sisi ngɛ Kristo mi, nihi nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ke nihi nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ kulaa.
11Lɛ e mi nɔuu wa na gbo si ni ɔmɛ hu ngɛ, wɔ nihi nɛ a je ngɔ to ngɛ nɔ nɛ tsuɔ nihi kulaa a yi mi tomi nya, bɔ nɛ sa lɛ nitsɛ e suɔmi ga womi ɔ hɛ mi ɔ, 12benɛ pee nɛ wɔ nihi nɛ wa sɛ hlami ngɔ wa hɛ ngɔ fɔ Kristo nɔ ɔ, wa plɛ e he mi nyami ɔ yi jemi.
13Kristo ɔ nɔuu nɔ nyɛ hu nyɛ ngɔ nyɛ hɛ ngɔ fɔ, benɛ nyɛ nu anɔkuale munyu ɔ nɛ ji nyɛ yi wami hemi ɔ he sane kpakpa a; lɛ nɔuu e mi a kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ nɛ a wo he si ɔ sɔu nyɛ nya ngɛ benɛ nyɛ he ye ɔ, 14nɔ nɛ ji wa gbo si ni ɔmɛ a yi ba pomi nɔ ɔ, konɛ a kɛ kpɔ e nihi nɛ ji lɛ nitsɛ e ni ɔmɛ, nɛ a kɛ je e hɛ mi nyami ɔ yi.
Paulo pɛɛ kpami
15Enɛ ɔ he je ɔ, imi hu, benɛ i nu nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo mi, kɛ nyɛ suɔmi nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ suɔ ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ kulaa he ɔ, 16i jɔɔ we si nami ngɛ nyɛ he, se i kaii nyɛ ngɛ ye pɛɛ kpamihi a mi. 17I kpaa pɛɛ konɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo Mawu nɛ ji hɛ mi nyami Tsɛ ɔ nɛ ha nyɛ ni lemi kɛ nɔ kpo jemi mumi ngɛ lemi nɛ nyɛ maa le lɛ saminya a mi, 18nɛ nyɛ mi hɛngmɛ ɔ nɛ bli, konɛ nyɛɛ le nɔ nɛ ji e tsɛmi ɔ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ɔ, kɛ e weye ni ɔ hiɛmi ngɛ ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a mi, 19kɛ nɔ́ nɛ ji e he wami ɔ klemi nɛ be nɔ babauu ha wɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ wa heɔ yeɔ ngɛ e nyɛmi ɔ he wami ni tsumi ɔ nya, 20nɔ́ nɛ e tsu ngɛ Kristo mi benɛ e tle lɛ si kɛ je gbeje nɛ e kɛ lɛ hi e hiɛ ɔ nɔ ngɛ hiɔwe nihi a mi, 21ngɛ nɔkɔtɔma yemi kɛ he blɔ kɛ he wami kɛ nɔ yemi tsuo kɛ biɛ tsuaa biɛ nɛ a wo, pi ngɛ be nɛ ɔ mi kɛkɛ, se be nɛ maa ba a mi hulɔ ɔ; 22Mawu ngɔ nihi kulaa ngɔ to Kristo nane si, nɛ e ngɔ lɛ ngɔ to nihi kulaa yi ngɔ ha asafo ɔ. 23Asafo ɔ ji Kristo nɔmlɔ tso kɛ nɔ nɛ woɔ nihi tsuo tɔtɔɔtɔ ngɛ nihi kulaa mi ɔ.

Title: EFESOBI 2
Content:
Kɛ je gbenɔ mi kɛ ba wami mi
1Sa a, nyɛ ji ni gbogboehi ngɛ tue gbomi kɛ yayamihi a mi. 2Jamɛ a be ɔ mi ɔ, nyɛ nyɛɛ ngɛ je nɛ ɔ mi kɔɔhiɔ mi he wami ɔ nɔ yelɔ, nɛ ji mumi nɛ tsuɔ ni mwɔnɛmwɔnɛ ngɛ tuegbenɔ bihi a mi ɔ su ɔ nya; 3kɔlɔ ɔmɛ a mi wɔ tsuo hu wa ba wa je mi ngɛ sa ngɛ wa he lo akɔnɔ ɔmɛ a mi, nɛ wa tsu nihi nɛ he lo kɛ juɛmi suɔ ɔ, nɛ wa ji Mawu muklii mi fumi bimɛ ngɛ wa fɔmi su ɔ nya kaa nihi nɛ piɛ ɔmɛ nɔuu.
4Se Mawu nɛ e mɔbɔ nami hiɛ babauu ɔ, gu lɛ nitsɛ e suɔmi babauu nɛ e kɛ suɔ wɔ ɔ nɔ, 5nɛ wɔ nɛ wa ji ni gbogboehi ngɛ tuegbenɔ mi ɔ, e tsɛ̃ɛ waa kɛ Kristo tsuo hɛ; dloomi a kɛ he nyɛ yi wami! 6E tle waa kɛ lɛ si, nɛ e ngɔ waa kɛ lɛ tsuo ngɔ hi hiɔwe nihi a mi ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi, 7konɛ be nɛ maa ba a mi ɔ, e je lɛ nitsɛ e dloomi ɔ hiɛmi nɛ be nɔ ɔ kpo, kɛ e mi mi himi nɛ e ngɛ ha wɔ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ. 8Ejakaa dloomi a kɛ he nyɛ yi wami kɛ gu hemi kɛ yemi nɔ, nɛ enɛ ɔ lɛɛ, pi nyɛ mi nɛ e je, Mawu nɔke nɔ ʼi, 9pi ni tsumihi a mi nɛ e je, konɛ nɔ ko nɛ ko fia. 10Mawu nine nya ni tsumi nihi ji wɔ, a bɔ wɔ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi kɛ ha ni tsumi kpakpahi nɛ Mawu dla ngɔ to konɛ waa nyɛɛ ngɛ mi ɔ.
Kakepeemi ngɛ Kristo mi
11Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ kai kaa nyɛ nɛ sa nɛ nyɛ ji wɔ jali ngɛ he lo blɔfami nɛ nihi nɛ a po mɛ ngɛ he lo mi ɔ tsɛɛ nyɛ mɔmlɔtɔtsɛmɛ ɔ, 12jamɛ a be ɔ mi ɔ nyɛ be Kristo, nɛ nyɛ ji ni kpahi ngɛ Israel kɛ nibwɔhi ngɛ si womi somi ɔmɛ a blɔfami hulɔ; nyɛ be hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ko, nɛ nyɛ be Mawu tete ngɛ je nɛ ɔ mi. 13Se jehanɛ, Kristo Yesu mi ɔ, nyɛ nɛ sa nɛ nyɛ ngɛ lokoo ɔ, nyɛ gu Kristo muɔ ɔ nɔ hɛ kɛ ba. 14Ejakaa lɛ ji wa he jɔmi, nɔ nɛ ngɔ wɔ majeli kɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ kulaa ngɔ pee kake, nɛ e ku gli piɛ nɛ ngɛ kpɛti nɛ ji ninye ɔ, 15nɛ e kɛ lɛ nitsɛ e he lo gu Mlaa a nɛ ngɛ kita amɛ a mi ɔ, konɛ e kɛ ni enyɔ ɔmɛ kulaa nɛ bɔ nɔmlɔ he kake ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e mi nɛ e ha he jɔmi nɛ ba, 16nɛ e gu sɛumi tso ɔ nɔ kɛ dla mɛ ni enyɔ ɔmɛ kulaa a kɛ Mawu kpɛti ngɛ nɔmlɔ tso kake mi, nɛ e gbe ninye ɔ ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e mi. 17E ba ba jaje he jɔmi sane kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ lokoo ɔ kɛ nihi nɛ hɛ mɛ kɛ ba a hulɔ; 18ejakaa e nɔ wɔ ni enyɔ ɔmɛ kulaa guu kɛ naa blɔ ngɛ mumi kake mi kɛ yaa Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ.
19Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jehanɛ, nyɛ pi nibwɔhi kɛ ni kpahi hu, se mohu nyɛ ji ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a huɛmɛ ma mi bi kɛ Mawu we bi 20nɛ a fia nyɛ ngɔ ma bɔfo ɔmɛ kɛ gbali ɔmɛ a sisi tomi ɔ nɛ e kɔ nya tɛ ji Kristo Yesu ɔ nɔ, 21nɔ nɛ nɔ nɛ a gu kɛ tsɛ̃ tsu mluku ɔ tsuo ngɔ wo mi pee kake, nɛ e ngɛ klee ngɛ sɔlemi tsu klɔuklɔu pee ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi, 22nɔ nɛ mi nɛ a fia nyɛ hu ngɔ wo ngɔ pee Mawu sihi he ngɛ Mumi ɔ mi ɔ.

Title: EFESOBI 3
Content:
Paulo nitsumi ha majeli
1Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, imi Paulo, nɛ ji Kristo Yesu pa mi no ha nyɛ maje li a bimɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, 2eko ɔ nyɛ maa nu Mawu dloomi nɛ a ngɔ ha mi ngɛ nyɛ he ɔ blɔ nya tomi ɔ he, 3kaa kpo jemi nɔ Mawu gu kɛ ha i kɛ le laami sane ɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ i ngma nyɛ bɔɔ ko momo ɔ, 4nɔ́ nɛ ke nyɛ kane ɔ, nyɛ ma nyɛ nyɛ kɛ na bɔ nɛ i nu Kristo laami sane ɔ sisi ha. 5Laami sane nɛ ɔ, yinɔhi nɛ be ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, a ha we nimli a bimɛ nɛ a le, kaa bɔ nɛ jehanɛ ɔ a je kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ e bɔfohi kɛ gbali klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ ngɛ Mumi mi, 6kaa maje li a bimɛ ɔmɛ hu ji ni yeli ɔmɛ ekomɛ, kɛ nɔmlɔ tso ɔ he ni ɔmɛ ekomɛ, kɛ nihi nɛ a wo mɛ si ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ hu ekomɛ ngɛ sane kpakpa a he.
