7Sane kpakpa nɛ ɔ he sɔmɔlɔ ji mi ngɛ Mawu dloomi nike nihi nɛ a gu e he wami ni tsumi nɔ ngɔ ha mi ɔ nya. 8Imi nɛ i ji nɔ wayo pe he tsɔli ɔmɛ kulaa a, a ngɔ kikɛmɛ a dloomi nɛ ɔ ngɔ ha mi, kaa ma jaje Kristo nihiɛmi nɛ a be sisi nyɛe maa na kɛ gbe nya a he sane kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ maje li ɔmɛ, 9nɛ ma ha nihi kulaa a hɛ mi nɛ tsɔ mɛ nɛ a le nɔ́ nɛ ji laami sane nɛ a ngɔ laa ngɛ Mawu nɔ nɛ bɔ nihi kulaa a blɔ nya tomi ɔ mi, 10konɛ jehanɛ a gu asafo ɔ nɔ nɛ a ha nikɔtɔmahi kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ he blɔ ngɛ hiɔwe nihi a mi ɔ nɛ a le Mawu ni lemi nɛ hiɛ babauu ɔ, 11ngɛ neneene yi mi nɛ e to ngɛ Kristo Yesu, wa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ, mi ɔ nya, 12nɔ nɛ nɔ hemi kɛ yemi mi wa gu kɛ na kã kɛ he blɔ ngɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi mi ɔ. 13Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i ngɛ pɛɛ kpae, konɛ nyɛ tsui ko po ngɛ ye nɔ́ nɛ i ngɛ nae ngɛ nyɛ he ɔ he, ejakaa nyɛ hɛ mi nyami ʼi.
Kristo suɔmi
14Enɛ ɔ he je ɔ, i kplaa si haa Tsɛ ɔ, 15nɔ mi nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe kɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ naa e biɛ nitsɛ ɔ, 16konɛ ngɛ e hɛ mi nyɛmi hiɛmi ɔ nya a, e ha nyɛɛ gu e Mumi ɔ nɔ nɛ nyɛ he nɛ wa kpitikplii ngɛ nyɛ mi nɔmlɔ ɔ blɔfami, 17nɛ a gu hemi kɛ yemi nɔ nɛ Kristo nɛ hi si ngɛ nyɛ tsui mi nɛ nyɛ sipoku nɛ pi si nɛ nyɛɛ ma si gbugbuugbu ngɛ suɔmi mi, 18konɛ nyɛ na he wami, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ kulaa nɛ yɔse nɔ́ nɛ ji blimi kɛ kami kɛ mi kuɔmi kɛ hiɔwe yami ɔ, 19nɛ nyɛɛ le Kristo suɔmi nɛ pa ni lemi tsuo ɔ, konɛ Mawu himi kɛ si pimi ɔ nɛ hyi nyɛ tsuo tɔtɔɔtɔ.
20Se nɔ nɛ nyɛɔ peɔ kɛ bee nɔ babauu pe nihi kulaa nɛ wa kpaa he pɛɛ loo wa susuu, ngɛ e he wami nɛ tsuɔ ni ngɛ wa mi ɔ nya a, 21lɛ a ngɔ hɛ mi nyami ngɔ ha ngɛ asafo nɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ngɛ yi nɔhi kulaa mi kɛ ya neneene kɛ neneene! Amen.

Title: EFESOBI 4
Content:
Nɔmlɔ tso ɔ kake ʼi
1Imi nɛ i ji pa mi no ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi ɔ, i ngɛ nyɛ pɛɛ kpae kaa nyɛɛ nyɛɛ bɔ nɛ sa tsɛmi nɛ a kɛ tsɛ nyɛ ɔ, 2ngɛ he si bami kɛ humi peemi tsuo mi, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ tsui si tomi nɛ suɔ nyɛ he, 3nɛ nyɛɛ bɔ mɔde nɛ nyɛɛ to mumi kake peemi ɔ ngɛ he jɔmi kpa nɛ fi nyɛ ɔ mi, 4kaa nɔmlɔ tso kake kɛ mumi kake, kaa bɔ nɔuu nɛ a tsɛ nyɛ hulɔ ngɛ nyɛ tsɛmi hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi kake ɔ mi ɔ: 5Nyɔmtsɛ kake, hemi kɛ yemi kake, baptisimi kake, 6Mawu kɛ nihi kulaa a Tsɛ kake nɛ ngɛ nihi kulaa nɔ, nɛ e guu nihi tsuo mi nɛ e ngɛ nihi tsuo mi ɔ.
7Se wa ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ ɔ, a ngɔ dloomi ɔ ngɔ ha lɛ ngɛ Kristo nike ni ɔmɛ a kalemi ɔ nyɛ. 8Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Ngmami ɔ ke:
“E kuɔ kɛ ho hiɔwe ya
Nɛ e ngɔ nyɔguɛhi fuu ngɔ piɛ e he,
Nɛ e kɛ nike nihi ha nimli.”
9Se nɛ a ke “E kuɔ” ɔ, kɛ ji e sisi kɛɛ? E sisi ji e kple si kɛ ya zugba a sisi ni ɔmɛ a mi kekle. 10Nɔ nɛ kple si ɔ, lɛ nɔuu hu ji nɔ nɛ kuɔ kɛ ya hiɔwehi kulaa a yi mi, konɛ e hyi je ɔ kulaa tɔtɔɔtɔ. 11Nɛ lɛ nɔuu lɛ e ha ni komɛ plɛ bɔfohi, ni komɛ gbali, ni komɛ hu sane kpakpa fiɛli, nɛ ni komɛhu nɔ hyɛli kɛ tsɔɔli, 12konɛ a kɛ gla he tsɔli ɔmɛ ngɔ ha sɔmɔmi ni tsumi ɔ, kɛ Kristo nɔmlɔ tso ɔ fiami, 13kɛ maa su be nɛ wɔ kulaa wa maa su Mawu Bi ɔ nɔ hemi kɛ yemi kɛ e he ni lemi kake peemi ɔ he nɛ waa pee nyumu nɛ su kɛ pi si ngɛ Kristo klemi muzaamu ɔ susumi nya; 14konɛ wa ko ya nɔ nɛ waa pee bimwɔwi nɛ tsɔɔmi kɔɔhiɔ tsuaa tsɔɔmi kɔɔhiɔ mimiɛɛ mɛ, nɛ a kpakaa mɛ kɛ yaa kɛ baa ngɛ nimli a ga yaya tomi mi, ngɛ sisimi ga kɛ kutupɔ nya. 15Se mohu waa pee anɔkualetsɛmɛ ngɛ suɔmi mi, nɛ waa wa ngɛ nihi kulaa blɔfami, ngɛ lɛ Kristo ɔ nɔuu nɛ ji yi ɔ he; 16lɛ e mi nɛ nɔmlɔ tso mluku ɔ tsuo nuu e he siɔ nɔ, nɛ kpɔ nya tsuaa kpɔ nya tsuɔ ni kaa bɔ nɛ a to ha lɛ ɔ, nɛ e haa nɔmlɔ tso ɔ waa nɛ e heɔ si ngɛ suɔmi mi.
Wami he ngɛ Kristo mi
17Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i ngɛ dee, nɛ i ngɛ nɔ mi mae ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi, kaa nyɛ ko nyɛɛ kaa bɔ nɛ majeli a bimɛ kpa amɛ hu nyɛɛ ngɛ a yaka juɛmi ɔ mi ɔ hu; 18ejakaa a juɛmi ɔ mi wo diblii, nɛ nibwɔhi ji mɛ ngɛ wami nɛ Mawu haa a blɔfami, akɛnɛ nɔ lemi bɔ́ mɛ nɛ a tsui hu ti ɔ. 19Nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko pee we mɛ zo hu he je ɔ, a ngɔ a he ngɔ ha ya homi, nɛ a kɛ hɛ tsumi tsuɔ tai nihi tsuo kulaa.
20Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ pi ja nɛ nyɛ kase ngɛ Kristo he ɔ, 21ke e ngɛ mi kaa nyɛ nu e he, nɛ a tsɔɔ nyɛ ngɛ e mi hulɔ, bɔ nɛ ji anɔkuale ngɛ Yesu mi ɔ, 22nyɛ sake nyɛ sa je mi bami ɔ nya nɔmlɔ momo nɛ puɛ ngɛ sisimi se dimi ɔmɛ a nya a ngɔ fɔ he, 23nɛ nyɛ plɛ nimli hehi ngɛ nyɛ juɛmi kɛ mumi mi, 24nɛ nyɛɛ wo nɔmlɔ he nɛ a bɔ ngɛ Mawu subai nɔ ngɛ anɔkuale dami kɛ he tsɔmi mi ɔ.
25Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ sake lakpa ngɔ fɔ he nɛ nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ kɛ e nyɛmi nɛ tu anɔkuale, ejakaa nɔmlɔ tso kake he nihi ji wɔ. 26Nyɛ muklii mi nɛ fu, se nyɛ ko pee yayami; pu ko nɔ si ngɛ nyɛ mi mi fumi ɔ nɔ, 27nɛ jehanɛ hu, nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛ he ko fɔ si ha Abosiami. 28Juɔ ɔ, e ko ju hu, se mohu e bɔ mɔde nɛ e kɛ e ninehi nɛ tsu ni tsumi kpakpa, konɛ e na nɔ́ ko nɛ e kɛ ha nɔ nɛ e fi lɛ ɔ. 29Munyu yaya ko nɛ ko je nyɛ nya kulaa; se mohu munyu nɛ hi nɛ e hia, konɛ e ha nɔ nane nɛ pi si, konɛ a kɛ dloo nihi nɛ nuɔ ɔ. 30Nɛ nyɛ ko pee Mawu Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ nɔdɔ nɔ́, nɔ mi nɛ pa sɔu nyɛ nya ngɛ ngɔ to kpɔmi ligbi ɔ. 31Nyɛ ha mi mi doomi kɛ mi mi la kɛ muklii mi fumi kɛ huhui kɛ musu bɔmi kulaa se nɛ po ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti, kɛ yayami tsuaa yayami. 32Nyɛ mi mi nɛ jɔ ha nyɛ sibi, nyɛ muklii mi nɛ sa nyɛ ha nyɛ sibi, nyɛ ngɔ pa nyɛ sibi, kaa bɔ nɛ Mawu ngɔ pa nyɛ ngɛ Kristo mi ɔ.

Title: EFESOBI 5
Content:
Nyɛɛ nyɛɛ kaa la bimɛ
1Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛɛ pee Mawu kaseli kaa bimɛ nɛ e suɔ, 2nɛ nyɛɛ nyɛɛ ngɛ suɔmi mi kaa bɔ nɛ Kristo hu suɔ wɔ nɛ e ngɔ lɛ nitsɛ e he ngɔ ha ngɛ wa he kaa nɔ́ke nɔ́ kɛ bɔ nɛ he via nɛ a kɛ ha Mawu.
3Se ajuama bɔmi kɛ mu ni tsumi tsuo loo he tsemi ɔ, a ko wo ta tete ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti, kaa bɔ nɛ sa ni klɔuklɔuhi, 4kɛ zo ni tsumi kɛ yakayaka munyu kɛ fɛu yemi hu nɛ sɛ́ ɔ; se mohu sina. 5Ejakaa nyɛ le enɛ ɔ momo kaa, ajuama bɔlɔ ko ajuama bɔlɔ ko loo mu ni tsulɔ ko loo hɛ tsulɔ ko nɛ ji wɔ jalɔ be blɔ nya ngɛ Kristo kɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ mi.
6Nyɛ ko ha nɛ nɔ ko kɛ munyu gu nɛ mlɔɔ nyɛ; ejakaa jamɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he nɛ Mawu muklii mi fumi baa tuegbenɔ bi ɔmɛ a nɔ ɔ nɛ. 7Lɔ ɔ he je ɔ, nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛ he ko bɔ a he. 8Ejakaa sa a diblii ji nyɛ, se jahanɛ ɔ nyɛ plɛ la ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi. Lɛɛ nyɛɛ nyɛɛ kaa la bimɛ mɔ. 9Ejakaa la a yiblii ji mi mi himi kɛ dami kɛ anɔkuale tsuo. 10Nyɛɛ ka nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ hyɛ kaa e sa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi lo. 11Nyɛɛ kɛ diblii ni tsumi ɔmɛ nɛ wui yiblii ɔ ko bɔ, se mohu nyɛ je mɛ si. 12Ejakaa nihi nɛ a juɔ si peɔ ɔ ngɛ zo kaa a maa wo ta tete. 13Se nihi tsuo nɛ a jeɔ si ɔ, la a a kɛ jeɔ mɛ si paa; ejakaa nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ kpɛɛ ɔ la ʼi. 14Lɔ ɔ he nɛ a de ke:
“O hɛ nɛ tsɛ, mo nɔ nɛ o ngɛ mahɛ hwɔe ɔ,
Nɛ o te si kɛ je gbeje,
Nɛ Kristo maa tso ha mo” ɔ, nɛ!
15Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛɛ hyɛ bɔ nɛ nyɛ maa hi si ha, pi kaa nihi nɛ li nɔ́, se mohu kaa ni leli, 16nihi nɛ tsuɔ a deka he ni, ejakaa yi nɔ nɛ ɔ, yi nɔ yaya ʼi. 17Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ ko pee nyɛ he nihi nɛ be yi mi, se mohu nyɛ yo nihi nɛ ji Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ suɔmi nya ni ɔmɛ.
18Nyɛ ko de da, nɔ́ mi nɛ sakasaka peemi ngɛ ɔ, se mohu nyɛ hyi tɔ kɛ Mumi ɔ. 19Nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛ he nɛ tu munyu ngɛ saku fiami kɛ yi jemi lahi kɛ mumi mi lahi a mi; nyɛ la nɛ nyɛɛ fia saku ngɛ nyɛ tsui mi ha Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ. 20Nyɛɛ na Mawu kɛ Tsɛ ɔ si daa ngɛ nihi kulaa he ngɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo biɛ mi.
Yigbayi kɛ a hunomɛ
21Nyɛɛ ba nyɛ he si ngɔ ha nyɛ he ngɛ Kristo gbeye yemi mi? 22Nyɛ yigbayi ɔmɛ, nyɛɛ ba nyɛ he si ha nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ hunomɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ peɔ ngɔ haa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ. 23Ejakaa huno ɔ ji yo ɔ yi, kaa bɔ nɛ Kristo hu ji asafo ɔ yi, nɛ lɛ nɔuu ji nɔmlɔ tso ɔ yi wami helɔ ɔ. 24Se kaa bɔ nɛ asafo ɔ baa e he si ngɔ haa Kristo ɔ, ja nɔuu yi ɔmɛ hu a pee ha mɛ nitsɛmɛ a hunomɛ ngɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ mi.
25Nyɛ, hunomɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ suɔ nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ yihi, kaa bɔ nɛ Kristo hu suɔ asafo ɔ nɛ e ngɔ lɛ nitsɛ e he ngɔ ha ngɛ e he ɔ, 26konɛ e kɛ nyu he dumi ɔ nɛ tsukɔ e he ngɛ munyu mi nɛ e ha e pee klɔuklɔu, 27konɛ e ngɔ lɛ ngɔ da si ha lɛ nitsɛ e he kaa hɛ mi nyami asafo nɛ he be piami ko loo hɛ mi kuami ko loo jamɛ a nɔ́ ko, se mohu e pee klɔuklɔu nɛ piami ko ko hi e he. 28Jã sa kaa hunomɛ hu nɛ suɔ a yihi kaa bɔ nɛ a suɔ mɛ nitsɛ a nɔmlɔ tsohi. Nɔ nɛ suɔ e yo ɔ, lɛ nitsɛ e he e suɔ. 29Ejakaa nɔ ko nyɛ́ lɛ nitsɛ e he lo hyɛ, se mohu e lɛɛ lɛ, nɛ e hɛɛ lɛ dɔdɔɔdɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛɛ asafo ɔ; 30ejakaa e nɔmlɔ tso he nihi nɛ je e he lo kɛ e wuhi a mi ji wɔ. 31Enɛ ɔ he nɛ nyumu ma si e tsɛ kɛ e nyɛ, nɛ e maa mɛtɛ e yo he, nɛ mɛ ni enyɔ ɔmɛ kulaa a ma plɛ he lo kake. 32Kikɛmɛ a laami sane nɛ ɔ mi jiɔ, se imi lɛɛ i ngɛ enɛ ɔ dee kɛ ngɛ Kristo kɛ asafo ɔ he toe. 33E sa kaa nyɛ hu nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ suɔ e yo ja, kaa lɛ nitsɛ e he, konɛ yo ɔ hu nɛ bu e huno ɔ.

Title: EFESOBI 6
Content:
Bimɛ kɛ a fɔli
1Bimɛ, nyɛɛ bu nyɛ fɔli ɔmɛ tue ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi; ejakaa enɛ ɔ da. 2“Buu o tsɛ kɛ o nyɛ,” kɔlɔ ɔ ji kekleekle kita nɛ hɛɛ si womi ke: 3“Konɛ e hi ha mo, nɛ o se nɛ kɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ.”
4Nyɛ tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, nyɛ ko wo nyɛ bimɛ ɔmɛ a mi mi la, se mohu nyɛɛ lɛ mɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ tsɔsemi kɛ ga womi mi.
Sɔmɔli kɛ a nyɔmtsɛmɛ
5Nyɛ sɔmɔli ɔmɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ bu nyɛ he lo blɔfami nyɔmtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ tue kɛ gbeye yemi kɛ he domi ngɛ tsui klɔu peemi mi, kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ peɔ ngɔ haa Kristo ɔ; 6pi kɛ hɛ mi hɛ mi sɔmɔmi kaa nihi nɛ hlaa nimli a hɛ mi nyami, se mohu kaa Kristo tsɔli nɛ jee a tsui mi peɔ Mawu suɔmi nya ni, 7nɛ a kɛ bua jɔmi sɔmɔɔ kaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ʼi, se tsa pi nimli, 8nɛ nyɛ kai kaa nɔ́ ko kpakpa nɛ mo nɔ o peɔ ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu he hiɔ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ maa wo mo, sɔmɔlɔ jio, odehe jio.
9Nɛ nyɛ nyɔmtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ pee mɛ ja nɔuu, nɛ nyɛɛ jɔɔ mɛ haihai hɛɛmi, nɛ nyɛɛ le kaa nyɛɛ kɛ mɛ kulaa ngɛ nyɔmtsɛ ngɛ hiɔwe, nɛ e hyɛ we nimli a hɛ mi.
Mawu ta hwumi ni ɔmɛ kulaa
10Nyagbe ɔ, mamimɛ, nyɛ he nɛ wa ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kɛ e he wami nyɛmi ɔ mi. 11Nyɛɛ wo Mawu ta hwumi ni ɔmɛ kulaa, konɛ nyɛ nyɛ Abosiami ga tsɔmi ɔmɛ a nya nɛ nyɛɛ da. 12Ejakaa tsa pi he lo kɛ muɔ nɛ waa kɛ ngɛ ta hwue ɔ, se mohu waa kɛ nɔkɔtɔma yemihi kɛ he blɔhi kɛ je nɛ ɔ mi nɔ yemihi nɛ ngɛ mwɔnɔmwɔnɔ diblii ɔ mi ɔ, kɛ mumi yayami asafo nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe nihi a mi ɔ. 13Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛɛ hɛɛ Mawu ta hwumi ni ɔmɛ kulaa mi konɛ nyɛ nyɛ ligbi yaya a nya nɛ nyɛɛ da, nɛ benɛ nyɛ gbe kulaa nya a nɛ nyɛ nyɛ si nɛ nyɛɛ da.
14Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛɛ da si, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ anɔkuale nɛ fi nyɛ mlɛ mi, nɛ nyɛɛ wo dami dama a, 15nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ he jɔmi sane kpakpa a fiɛmi he nyami nɛ wo nyɛ nane. 16Lɛ tsuo se ɔ, nyɛɛ hɛɛ hemi kɛ yemi tsɛi ɔ mi, nɔ nɛ nyɛ ma kɛ nyɛ nɔ yayami kɛɛ mi bihi nɛ tsoo ɔ kulaa gbe ɔ. 17Nɛ yi wami hemi dade pɛɛ ɔ hu nyɛ bu kɛ mumi mi klaate nɛ ji Mawu munyu ɔ; 18nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ sɔlemi kɛ pɛɛ kpami tsuo sɔle daa ha klɔuklɔubi ɔmɛ kulaa 19kɛ imi hulɔ, konɛ, ke i bli ye nya a, a ha mi munyu nɛ ma kɛ ka nɛ fiɛ sane kpakpa a mi laami sane ɔ, 20nɔ he nɛ i ngɛ bɔfo yee ngɛ kɔsɔkɔsɔ mi nɛ ɔ, konɛ ma tu munyu kɛ ka ngɛ mi, bɔ nɛ sa kaa ma tu ɔ.
Nyagbe sɛyemi
21Se benɛ pee nɛ nyɛ hu nyɛɛ le bɔ nɛ i ngɛ kɛ nihi nɛ i ngɛ tsue ɔ, wa suɔmi nyɛmi Tihiko, nɛ ji sɔmɔlɔ anɔkualetsɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi ɔ, maa bɔ nyɛ kulaa; 22ejakaa enɛ ɔ nɔuu he nɛ i tsɔ lɛ nyɛ ngɔ ɔ nɛ, benɛ pee nɛ nyɛɛ le bɔ nɛ wa ngɛ ha, nɛ e wo nyɛ bua.
23Hejɔmi, kɛ suɔmi kɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ je Tsɛ Mawu ɔ kɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo dɛ mi ɔ ha nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ!
24Dloomi nɛ je wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo dɛ mi ɔ kɛ nihi kulaa nɛ suɔ le kɛ pii si ɔ nɛ hi si! Amen.

Title: FILIPIBI 1
Content:
1Paulo kɛ Timoteo, Yesu Kristo sɔmɔli ɔmɛ, ngma ya ha ni klɔuklɔuhi nɛ ngɛ Yesu Kristo mi ngɛ Filipi kɛ a nɔ hyɛli kɛ a sɔmɔli ɔmɛ kulaa:
2Dloomi kɛ he jɔmi nɛ je wa Tsɛ Mawu kɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo dɛ mi ɔ ha nyɛ!
Paulo pɛɛ kpami kɛ ha e womi ɔ kaneli
3I naa ye Mawu ɔ si be tsuaa be nɛ e kaii nyɛ, 4ngɛ ye daa pɛɛ kpamihi tsuo nɛ i kpaa ngɔ haa nyɛ kulaa a mi, nɛ i kɛ bua jɔmi kpaa pɛɛ 5ngɛ wa he nɛ nyɛ piɛɔ ngɛ sane kpakpa a fiɛmi mi kɛ je kekleekle ligbi ɔ nɔ kɛ ba su amlɔ nɛ ɔ he; 6i ngɔ ye hɛ ngɔ fɔ enɛ ɔ nɔuu nɔ, kaa nɔ nɛ bɔni ni tsumi kpakpa ngɛ nyɛ mi ɔ, lɛ nɔuu e ma tsa nɔ kɛ maa su e maa gbe nya ngɛ Yesu Kristo ligbi ɔ nɔ. 7E sa kaa ma susu enɛ ɔ ngɛ nyɛ kulaa nyɛ he, ejakaa i suɔ nyɛ, ejakaa benɛ a wo mi tsu mi ngɛ sane kpakpa a he ɔ, i kɛ nyɛ tsuo na Mawu dloomi ɔ eko. 8Mawu ji ye dase kaa ye hɛ jaa ngɛ nyɛ kulaa nyɛ he ngɛ Yesu Kristo mi mi sami ɔ nya.
9Enɛ ɔ he pɛɛ i kpaa kaa, nyɛ suɔmi ɔ nɛ hiɛ kɛ ya nɔ, nɛ e be nɔ pe kekle ɔ ngɛ ni lemi kɛ nɔ se kɔmi tsuo blɔfami, nɛ nyɛ yo nihi nɛ hi nitsɛ, 10konɛ nyɛɛ hi klɔuu nɛ piami ko ko hi nyɛ blɔfami kɛ yaa su Kristo ligbi ɔ nɔ, 11nɛ dami yiblii nɛ a woɔ ngɛ Yesu Kristo mi ɔ nɛ hyi nyɛ tɔtɔɔtɔ kɛ ha Mawu hɛ mi nyami womi kɛ yi jemi.
Kristo ji wami
12Se, mamimɛ, i suɔ kaa nyɛɛ le kaa sanehi nɛ ba ye nɔ ɔ ha sane kpakpa a ya nɔ mohu, 13nɛ e ha ye tsu mi womi ngɛ Pretorio (Kaisare aslaafohi a mɔ) ɔ mi ngɛ Kristo he ɔ pee nɔ́ nɛ nihi kulaa le. 14Nyɛmimɛ nɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi ɔ a ti nihi fuu gu ye tsu mi womi ɔ nɔ na kã babauu pe kekle ɔ kɛ ngɛ Mawu munyu ɔ jajee nɛ a yi gbeye.
15Ni komɛ lɛɛ ninye kɛ hluɛnu he a fiɛɔ Kristo ɔ nɛ; se ni komɛ hu kɛ juɛmi kpakpa fiɛɔ. 16Ni nɛ ɔmɛ jee suɔmi mi kɛ fiɛɔ, ejakaa a le kaa sane kpakpa a he fami he je nɛ i fɔɔ si ngɛ hiɛ ɔ nɛ; 17se ni kpa komɛ ɔ, hluɛnu mi a jee kɛ fiɛɔ Kristo, nɛ pi fiɛmi nitsɛ ʼi, se mohu a juɛmi ji kaa a kɛ dengme maa piɛ ye tsu mi womi ɔ he.
18Lɔ ɔ he ɔ mɛni? Bɔ tsuaa bɔ nɛ pee ɔ, lakpa tomi nya jio, anɔkuale nya jio, Kristo kɛ̃ a ngɛ fiɛe ɔ nɛ; nɛ enɛ ɔ he je ɔ, i ngɛ bua jɔmi. Nɛ jehanɛ hu ma na bua jɔmi. 19Ejakaa i le kaa enɛ ɔ ma plɛ ye yi wami hemi ngɛ nyɛ pɛɛ kpami kɛ Yesu Kristo Mumi ɔ yemi kɛ buami nya, 20ngɛ ye blɔ hyemi kɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ɔ nya, kaa zo be mi gbee ngɛ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko mi, se mohu, bɔ nɛ a peɔ daa a, jã jehanɛ hu a kɛ kã tsuo maa wo Kristo hɛ mi nyami ngɛ ye nɔmlɔ tso mi, ngɛ wami mi jio, gbenɔ mi jio. 21Ejakaa imi lɛɛ Kristo ji ye wami, nɛ gbenɔ ɔ ye se nami ʼi. 22Se ke he lo mi wami nɛ ɔ nɔuu haa ye ni tsumi woɔ yiblii ɔ, lɛɛ i li e mi nɔ́ nɛ ma ngɔ; 23i ngɛ haoe ngɛ ni enyɔ nɛ ɔmɛ a he: I ngɛ hlae nɛ ma je je nɛ ɔ mi nɛ i kɛ Kristo ya hi si, ejakaa kɔlɔ ɔ hi hluu. 24Se nyɛ he ɔ, he lo mi si himi nɛ ɔ he hia pe kɔlɔ ɔ. 25I ngɛ enɛ ɔ nɔ mi mami kaa i kɛ nyɛ maa hi si nɛ ma piɛ nyɛ he nɛ nyɛɛ ya hɛ mi, konɛ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ nɛ fu, nɛ nyɛ na bua jɔmi ngɛ mi, 26konɛ nyɛ mimifliimi ɔ nɛ hiɛ kɛ be nɔ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi, ngɛ ye he, ngɛ kpe nɛ i kɛ nyɛ maa kpe ekohu ɔ he.
27Jehanɛ ngɛ nyɛ ma sane blɔfami ɔ, nyɛɛ ba nyɛ je mi sbɔ nɛ sa Kristo sane kpakpa a kɛkɛ, konɛ, ke i ba ba na nyɛ jio, i kɛ nyɛ be jio, ma nu nyɛ he kaa nyɛ daa si ngɛ mumi kake mi, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ juɛmi kake ngɛ sane kpakpa a hemi kɛ yemi ɔ he plee. 28Nɛ nyɛ ko ha nɛ henyɛli ɔmɛ nɛ wo nyɛ he gbeye ngɛ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko mi, kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu ji hɛ mi kpatami okadi ha mɛ, se nyɛɛ lɛɛ, e ji yi wami hemi okadi ha nyɛ, nɛ enɛ ɔ je Mawu dɛ mi. 29Ejakaa nyɛɛ lɛɛ a dloo nyɛ ngɛ Kristo he, pi ngɛ e nɔ hemi kɛ yemi mi kɛkɛ, se mohu kaa nyɛ na nɔ ngɛ e he hulɔ, 30nɛ jamɛ a pleemi kake ɔ nɔuu nɛ nyɛ na ngɛ ye he nɛ jehanɛ hu nyɛ nuɔ ngɛ ye he ɔ mi i ngɛ nɛ ɔ nɛ.

Title: FILIPIBI 2
Content:
Kristo hesibami kɛ e gbojemi
1Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ke Kristo mi munyu tumi kɛ tsɔɔmi ko ngɛ ke suɔmi bua womi ko ngɛ, ke mumi mi huɛ bɔmi ko ngɛ, ke muklii mi sami kɛ mɔbɔ nami ko ngɛ ɔ, 2nyɛ ha ye bua jɔmi ɔ nɛ hyi tɔ, kaa nyɛ hɛɛ susumi kake, nyɛ hɛɛ suɔmi kake, klaa kake, juɛmi kake. 3Nyɛ ko ngmɛ mi gbami loo yaka hɛ mi nyami hlami blɔ, se mohu nyɛɛ kɛ he si bami juɛmi nɛ bu nyɛ sibi pe nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ he; 4nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ko fo e nɔ mi, se e fo e nyɛmi nɔ mi. 5Juɛmi nɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu nɛ pee nyɛ hu nyɛ juɛmi, 6nɔ nɛ Mawu su ɔ mi e ngɛ mohu, se e bui sɔmi nɛ e kɛ Mawu sɔ ɔ kaa nɔ́ ko nɛ sa kaa e pɛtɛ he wawɛɛ; 7se mohu e kpa ngɛ e he ngɔ fɔ si, e ngɔ sɔmɔlɔ su ngɔ fɔ e nɔ, e plɛ kaa nɔmlɔ, nɛ e si himi blɔfami hu a na lɛ kaa nɔmlɔ. 8E ba e he si nɛ e bu tue kɛ ya gbenɔ mi, kɛ ya sɛumi tso nɔ gbenɔ mi tete. 9Enɛ ɔ he hulɔ nɛ Mawu wo e nɔ gojoo nɛ e dloo lɛ biɛ nɛ pa biɛ tsuaa biɛ, 10konɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ zugba a sisi ɔ a ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ nakutso nɛ kpla si ha Yesu biɛ ɔ, 11nɛ lilɛ tsuaa lilɛ nɛ jaje paa ke Yesu Kristo ji Nyɔmtsɛ kɛ wo Tsɛ Mawu ɔ hɛ mi nyami.
Lakpɛmi ngɛ je ɔ mi
12Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mamimɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ buɔ tue daa nɛ ɔ, pi benɛ i kɛ nyɛ ngɛ ɔ kɛkɛ, se mohu titli ɔ, jehanɛ nɛ i be nyɛ ngɔ nɛ ɔ hu ɔ, nyɛɛ kɛ gbeye yemi kɛ he domi nɛ tsu nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ yi wami hemi ɔ he ni, 13ejakaa suɔmi nɛ a maa suɔ jio, peemi nɛ a maa pee jio, Mawu ji nɔ nɛ tsuɔ lɛ tsuo ngɛ nyɛ mi ngɛ e suɔmi nya.
14Nyɛɛ pee nyɛ nihi kulaa nɛ munyu huitihuiti kɛ nɔ jemi ko ba mi; 15konɛ nyɛ he ko hi piami, nɛ nyɛɛ pee he tsɔli, Mawu bimɛ nɛ a he be piami ko ngɛ yi nɔ kpɛkpɛɛ nɛ be e jebo nɔ nɛ ɔ mi, nihi a kpɛti nɛ nyɛ tsoo kaa kane ngɛ je nɛ ɔ mi, 16nɛ nyɛɛ hɛɛ wami munyu ɔ mi, konɛ e plɛ fiami nɔ ha mi ngɛ Kristo ligbi ɔ nɔ, kaa ye fotumi ɔ pee we yaka, nɛ ye dengme gbomi ɔ hu pee we gu.
17Se ke a plɛ ye muɔ ngɔ pue nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi bɔ kɛ jami ɔ nɔ po ɔ, i ngɛ he tsui nɛ i kɛ nyɛ tsuo ma na bua jɔmi; 18ja nɔuu kɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ bua nɛ jɔ nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ mi nɛ na bua jɔmi.
Timoteo kɛ Epafrodito
19Ye hɛ ngɛ nɔ ngɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu mi kaa e be kɛe nɛ ma tsɔ Timoteo kɛ ba nyɛ ngɔ, konɛ ke i nu bɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ ɔ, nɛ imi hu ma na tsui. 20Ejakaa i be nɔ ko nɛ e juɛmi kɛ ye juɛmi sɔ nɛ nyɛ he sane dɔɔ lɛ nitsɛnitsɛ kaa lɛ; 21ejakaa ni ɔmɛ kulaa a, mɛ nitsɛmɛ a nihi a he a pleɔ, se pi Kristo Yesu nihi. 22Se nyɛ le e ni tsumi, kaa e kɛ mi sɔmɔɔ ngɛ sane kpakpa a he kaa bi kɛ e tsɛ. 23Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ye hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa ke i na ye sane ɔ nya pɛ ɔ, ma tsɔ lɛ kɛ ba nyɛ ngɔ. 24Se ye hɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɔ, kaa imi nitsɛ hu, e be kɛe nɛ ma ba.
25Se kɛ ɔ, i susu kaa e hia kaa ma tsɔ wa nyɛmi Epafrodito, nɛ ji ye huɛ ni tsulɔ kɛ ta bulɔ kɛ nyɛ tsɔlɔ kɛ ye hia a he sɔmɔlɔ ɔ kɛ ba nyɛ ngɔ, 26ejakaa e hɛ ngɛ jae ngɛ nyɛ tsuo nyɛ he, nɛ akɛnɛ nyɛ nu kaa e be he wami he je ɔ, e ngɛ haoe. 27E ngɛ mi kaa e nu hiɔ wawɛɛ, nɛ piɛ bɔɔ nɛ e ko gbo, se kɛ ɔ Mawu na lɛ mɔbɔ, nɛ pi lɛ kɛkɛ, se mohu imi hu, konɛ ma ko ye kɔmɔ ngɔ to kɔmɔ nɔ. 28Lɔ ɔ he titli nɛ i bɔ mɔde tsɔ lɛ ɔ nɛ, konɛ ke nyɛ na lɛ ekohu ɔ, nɛ nyɛ na bua jɔmi nɛ imi hu ma ko ye kɔmɔ tsɔ. 29Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ he lɛ hɛmuɔ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi, kɛ bua jɔmi babauu, nɛ nyɛɛ bu kikɛmɛ a nimli nɛ ɔmɛ kaa nihi nɛ sa bumi; 30ejakaa Kristo ni tsumi ɔ he ɔ, e su gbenɔ he tataata, nɛ e sake e wami ngɔ fɔ he, konɛ e kɛ gbe nɔ́ nɛ piɛ ha nyɛ ngɛ sɔmɔmi nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ ma sɔmɔ mi ɔ nya.

Title: FILIPIBI 3
Content:
Anɔkuale dami
1Nɛ nyagbe ɔ, mamimɛ, nyɛ bua nɛ jɔ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi! Pɔ tɔɛ ye he kaa ma ngma nyɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ekohu, ejakaa nyɛɛ lɛɛ e haa nyɛ fiɔɔ si. 2Nyɛɛ hyɛ saminya ngɛ gbe ɔmɛ a he. Nyɛɛ hyɛ saminya ngɛ ni tsuli yaya amɛ a he, nyɛɛ hyɛ saminya ngɛ nɔ pomi he! 3Ejakaa wɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ wa jaa Mawu ngɛ mumi nya, nɛ waa kɛ wa hɛ fɔɛ he lo nɔ, se Kristo Yesu nɔ mohu wa fiaa ngɔ fɔɔ ɔ, wɔ mohu ji ninɛmɛ nɛ a po mɛ ɔ nɛ. 4Pohu imi hu i ngɛ nɔ ko ngɛ he lo blɔfami nɛ jinɛ i kɛ ye hɛ maa fɔ nɔ. Ke e peɔ nɔ ko kaa e ngɛ nɔ́ ko nɛ e ngɔɔ e hɛ ngɔ fɔɔ nɔ ngɛ he lo blɔfami ɔ, ye nɔ ɔ pe. 5Ligbi nɛ ji ligbi kpaanyɔ ɔ nɔ a po mi, Israel fɔfɔɛ kɛ Benyamin wetso ɔ mi no ji mi, Hebri no mi Hebri no, nɛ Mlaa a nya a Farisifo no hulɔ, 6mɔde bɔmi blɔfami ɔ, asafo ɔ yi mi walɔ ji mi, nɛ dami ngɛ Mlaa a nya a, piami ko be ye he. 7Se kɛ ɔ, nihi nɛ ji senami ha mi sa a, i bu kɔlɔ ɔmɛ kaa nihi nɛ laa ngɛ Kristo he. 8Niinɛ kaa i buu lɛ tsuo kaa nihi nɛ laa ngɛ Kristo Yesu, ye Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ, he ni lemi nɛ pe kulaa a he, lɛ e he nɛ nihi kulaa bɔ mi, nɛ i buu mɛ kaa kuku nɔ nihi, konɛ Kristo mohu nɛ pee ye nɔ, 9nɛ a na mi ngɛ e mi kaa i be imi nitsɛ ye dami nɛ je Mlaa mi, se mohu nɔ́ nɛ gu Kristo nɔ hemi kɛ yemi nɔ nɛ ji dami nɛ je Mawu dɛ mi ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi nya a i ngɛ, 10nɛ ma le lɛ kɛ e si temi ɔ he wami ɔ kɛ e manehlu ɔmɛ a mi huɛ bɔmi ɔ, nɛ ma pee kaa lɛ ngɛ e gbenɔ ɔ blɔfami, 11kaa alinɔ, ye nine maa su ni gbogboehi a si temi ɔ nɔ lo.
Paulo kunimi yemi
12Pi kaa ye nine su nɔ momo aloo i hi kɛ pi si mo, se mohu i ngɛ fo tue konɛ ye nine nɛ su nɔ, ligbi abɔ nɛ Kristo Yesu nine su imi hu ye nɔ ɔ. 13Mamimɛ, i bui ye he kaa ye nine su nɔ, se nɔ́ nɛ ma de ji: nihi nɛ ngɛ se blɔ ɔ, i ngɛ ye hɛ jee ngɛ nɔ, se nihi nɛ ngɛ hɛ kpɛ ɔ a he mohu i ngɛ plee, 14nɛ i ngɛ fo tue kɛ yaa hɛ kpɛ kɛ maa su Mawu tsɛmi nɛ je hiɔwe ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ jlasi ɔ he.
15Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, wa kpɛti nihi abɔ nɛ hi kɛ pi si ɔ, nyɛ ha waa hɛɛ kikɛmɛ a juɛmi nɛ ɔ; nɛ ke nɔ ko ngɛ nɛ susuu lɛ ekpa a, Mawu ma je kɔlɔ ɔ hu kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ. 16E he hia kaa waa ya wa hɛ mi ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ wa nine su nɔ mo ɔ mi nɛ waa nyɛɛ ngɛ jamɛ a susumi kpa a nɔuu nya nɛ wa susu nɔ kake.
17Mamimɛ, nyɛɛ kase mi, nɛ nihi nɛ nyɛɛ bɔ nɛ wa toɔ nyɛ okadi ɔ, nyɛɛ hyɛ mɛ. 18I de nyɛ enɛ ɔ si abɔ, nɛ jeha nɛ ɔ hu i kɛ vo nyu ngɛ dee, ke Kristo sɛumi tso ɔ henyɛli ji mɛ. 19Mɛɛ lɛɛ a nyagbe ji hɛ mi kpatami, nɛ a muklii ji a mawu, nɛ a zo nihi a mi a hɛ mi nyami ngɛ, nɛ je mi nihi a he kɛkɛ a susuu. 20Se wɔɔ lɛɛ wa ma a hiɔwe e ngɛ, he nɛ wa hyɛɛ yi wami helɔ nɛ ji Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo ɔ blɔ kɛ jee ɔ, 21nɔ nɛ ma tsake wa nɔmlɔ tso nɛ hɛ mi be nyami ɔ, konɛ e pee kaa e numinyami nɔmlɔ tso ɔ su, ngɛ e he wami ni tsumi nɛ ekɛ nyɛɛ ngɔɔ nihi kulaa ngɔ toɔ e sisi hu ɔ nya a.

Title: FILIPIBI 4
Content:
Nyagbe gawomi
1Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mamimɛ nɛ i suɔ nɛ ye hɛ jaa ngɛ nyɛ he, ye bua jɔmi kɛ ye jlasi, nyɛɛ da si ja ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi, nyɛ nihi nɛ i suɔ.
2I ngɛ Evodia ga woe, nɛ i ngɛ Sintika hu ga woe kaa a juɛmi nɛ pee kake ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi. 3Nɛ mo hu, i kpa mo pɛɛ, ye huɛ sɔmɔlɔ kpakpa, kaa o ye bua yi nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ kɛ mi tsu sane kpakpa a he ni ɔ, kɛ Klemente hu kɛ ye huɛmɛ ni tsuli kpahi nɛ a biɛ ngɛ wami womi ɔ mi ɔ.
4Nyɛ bua nɛ jɔ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi daa! Nɛ ma de ekohu ke: Nyɛ bua nɛ jɔ! 5Nyɛ mi mi jɔmi ɔ nyɛ ha nimli kulaa nɛ le! Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ su si ta. 6Nyɛ ko hao ngɛ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko he, se mohu nɔ tsuaa nɔ mi ɔ, nyɛɛ kɛ sɔlemi kɛ pɛɛ kpami kɛ sina nɛ wo nyɛ hiami ni ɔmɛ a ta ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi; 7nɛ Mawu he jɔmi nɛ pe juɛmi kulaa a maa bu nyɛ tsuihi kɛ nyɛ juɛmi ɔmɛ a he ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi!
8Nyagbe ɔ, mamimɛ, nihi nɛ da, nihi nɛ sa bu, nihi nɛ hi, nihi nɛ he tsɔ, nihi nɛ a suɔ, nihi nɛ ngɛ biɛ kpakpa amɛ kulaa, ke je mi bami kpakpa ko ngɛ, ke yi jemi ko hu ngɛ ɔ, enɛ ɔmɛ a he nyɛ susu! 9Nihi hu nɛ nyɛ kase nɛ nyɛ pɛtɛ he nɛ nyɛ nu nɛ nyɛ na ngɛ ye he ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔmɛ nɔuu nyɛɛ pee, nɛ he jɔmi Mawu ɔ kɛ nyɛ maa hi si.
Nike ni he sina
10I na bua jɔmi babauu ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi kaa jehanɛ nyɛ ya nɔ ekohu ngɛ ye he susumi mi; nyɛ susu ye he lɛɛ, se he blɔ nɛ nyɛ ya na we. 11Pi kaa fimi nya nɛ i ngɛ munyu tue nɛ ɔ, ejakaa imi lɛɛ i kase kaa si himi tsuaa si himi nɛ i ngɛ mi ɔ ye bua nɛ jɔ ye he. 12I le ohia mi si himi, nɛ i le ni kpɔtɔɔ mi si himi hulɔ; i gblee nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ kɛ nihi kulaa mi, tɔ jio, huɔ jio, ni nami jio, ohia jio, 13I nyɛɔ nihi kulaa peɔ ngɛ kristo, nɔ nɛ woɔ ni he wami ɔ mi. 14Se kɛ̃ ɔ nyɛ pee saminya kaa nyɛ ba ye bua mi ngɛ ye nɔ nami ɔ mi. 15Jehanɛ nyɛ Filipibi ɔmɛ nitsɛmɛ hu ɔ, nyɛ le kaa sane kpakpa a sisi jemi mi, benɛ i pue nɔ kɛ je Makedonia a, asafo ko be nɛ kɛ mi bɔɔ huɛ ngɛ nɔ́ hami kɛ hemi blɔfami kaa ja nyɛ kɛkɛ; 16ejakaa benɛ i ngɛ Tesalonika a hu ɔ, nyɛ mane mi nihi nɛ hiaa mi ɔmɛ si kake kɛ si enyɔ kulaa. 17Pi kaa nike ni i ngɛ hlae, se mohu i ngɛ se nami nɛ ma ha nyɛ kɔtaa a maa su kɛ be nɔ ha nyɛ ɔ hlae. 18I na nihi kulaa kɛ be nɔ, i tɔ kɛ nihi nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ mane Epafrodito kɛ ba ha mi ɔ nɛ ji via jemi kpakpa kɛ bɔ nɛ sa Mawu hɛ mi ɔ. 19Ye Mawu ɔ ma ha nyɛ nihi kulaa nɛ hiaa nyɛ ɔ ngɛ e hɛ mi nyami hiɛmi ɔ nya, ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi. 20Anuminyami ha wa Tsɛ Mawu ɔ kɛ yaa neneene kɛ neene. Amen.
Nyagbe sɛyemi
21Nyɛ nga he tsɔlɔ tsuaa he tsɔlɔ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi. Nyɛmimɛ nɛ kɛ mi ngɛ ɔ ke a biɔ nyɛ. 22He tsɔli ɔmɛ kulaa, se titli ɔ, ninɛmɛ nɛ je Kaisare we ɔ, ke a biɔ nyɛ.
23Wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dloomi ɔ kɛ nyɛ mumi ɔ nɛ hi si! Amen.

Title: KOLOSEBI 1
Content:
1Paulo nɛ ji Yesu Kristo bɔfo ngɛ Mawu suɔmi nya, kɛ wa nyɛmi Timoteo ɔ, 2ngma ya ha he tsɔli nɛ ngɛ Kolose ɔ kɛ nyɛmimɛ nɛ he ye nɛ ngɛ Kristo mi ɔ:
Dloomi kɛ hejɔmi nɛ je wa Tsɛ Mawu ɔ kɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo dɛ mi ɔ ha nyɛ.
Sina sɔlemi
3Wa naa Mawu, wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo Tsɛ ɔ, si daa nɛ ngɛ nyɛ he ngɛ wa sɔlemihi a mi, 4ejakaa wa nu nyɛ Kristo Yesu nɔ hemi kɛyemi kɛ nyɛ suɔmi nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ suɔ he tsɔli ɔmɛ kulaa a he, 5ngɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ a ngɔ to ha nyɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ he. Nyɛ nu momo ngɛ sane kpakpa a anɔkuale munyu ɔ mi, 6nɔ́ nɛ su nyɛ ngɔ kaa bɔ nɛ e ngɛ ngɛ je mluku ɔ kulaa mi, nɛ e woɔ yiblii nɛ e kekee kaa bɔ nɛ e peɔ ngɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ kpɛti kɛ je ligbi nɛ nyɛ nu nɛ nyɛ na le Mawu dloomi ɔ ngɛ anɔkuale mi ɔ: 7kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ kase hulɔ ngɛ Epafra, nɔ nɛ ji wa huɛ sɔmɔlɔ nɛ wa suɔ, nɛ ji Kristo anɔkuale sɔmɔlɔ ha nyɛ ɔ nya a, 8lɛ nɔuu e ba bɔ wɔ nyɛ Mumi ɔ mi suɔmi he sane. 9Enɛ ɔ he je ɔ wɔ hu, kɛ je ligbi nɛ wa nu ɔ, wa jɔɔ we sɔlemi kɛ pɛɛ kpami kɛ nyɛ hami, konɛ nyɛ hyi tɔtɔɔtɔ kɛ e suɔmi nya nihi a lemi ngɛ mumi mi ni lemi kɛ sisinami tsuo mi; 10konɛ nyɛɛ nyɛɛ bɔ nɛ sa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɛ e sa e hɛ mi saminya, nɛ nyɛɛ wo yiblii ngɛ ni tsumi kpakpa tsuaa ni tsumi kpakpa mi; 11nɛ nyɛɛ ya nɔ ngɛ Mawu he ni lemi mi, nɛ a kɛ he wami tsuo nɛ wo nyɛ he wami ngɛ e hɛ mi nyami nyɛmi ɔ nya ngɛ tsui si tomi nɛ se kɛɛ ɔ kulaa mi. 12Nyɛɛ kɛ bua jɔmi nɛ na Tsɛ ɔ si, nɔ nɛ ha wa sa nihi nɛ yeɔ klɔuklɔu bimɛ a gbo si ni ɔ eko ngɛ la mi, 13nɛ e je wɔ kɛ je diblii he wami ɔ mi, nɛ e kɛ wɔ ba to e suɔmi bi ɔ matsɛ yemi ɔ mi ɔ, 14lɛ nɔuu e mi wa na kpɔmi ɔ nɛ ji wa he yayami pami ɔ ngɛ, ngɛ e muɔ ɔ he.
Kristo kɛ e nitsumi
15Kristo ji Mawu nɛ a nɛ́ ɔ subai, bɔ nihi kulaa a kpɛti tete ɔ; 16ejakaa e mi a bɔ nihi tsuo kulaa ngɛ, nihi nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ, nihi nɛ a naa kɛ nihi nɛ a nɛ́, matsɛ sɛhi jio, nɔ yemihi jio, nɔkɔtɔma yemihi jio, he blɔhi jio, ni ɔmɛ kulaa a, e nɔ a gu nɛ a bɔ, nɛ lɛ nɔuu a bɔ ha. 17Lɛ nɔuu lɛ ngɛ loko nihi tsuo kulaa ngɛ, nɛ nihi tsuo kulaa a, e mi a ngɛ. 18Lɛ nɔuu ji nɔmlɔ tso ɔ nɛ ji asafo ɔ yi, nɔ nɛ ji sisije ɔ, ni gbogboehi a kpɛti tete ɔ, konɛ lɛ e pee kekleekle nɔ ngɛ nihi tsuo kulaa mi. 19Ejakaa e sa Mawu hɛ mi kaa fuu hyimi kulaa nɛ hi e mi; 20nɛ e gu lɛ nɔuu e nɔ kɛ dla e kɛ nihi tsuo kulaa a kpɛti, nihi nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ, akɛnɛ lɛ nitsɛ e gu e sɛumi tso nɔ gbenɔ ɔ nɔ ha he jɔmi ba a.
21Nyɛ nɛ sa nɛ nyɛ jir ni kpahi kɛ shenyɛli ngɛ nyɛ juɛmi kɛ ni tsumi yaya amɛ a mi ɔ, 22jehanɛ, e kɛ e he lo nɔmlɔ tso ɔ gu gbenɔ mi kɛ kpata ha nyɛ, konɛ e kɛ nyɛ nɛ da si kaa ni klɔuklɔuhi nɛ he be piami ko loo nya pomi ko ngɛ e hɛ mi. 23Nyɛɛ hɛɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mi nɛ nyɛɛ da si kpitikplii, nɛ nyɛ ko sã nyɛ he kɛ je sane kpakpa a nɛ nyɛ nu nɛ a fiɛ tsɔɔ bɔ nihi kulaa nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe sisi, nɛ imi Paulo hu i sɔmɔɔ ngɛ he ɔ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ɔ he.
Paulo sɔmɔmi ngɛ asafo ɔ mi
24Jehanɛ ye bua jɔɔ ngɛ ye nɔ namihi nɛ i naa ngɛ nyɛ he ɔmɛ a mi, nɛ i haa nihi nɛ piɛ ngɛ Kristo amanehulu ɔmɛ a mi ɔ hyiɔ tɔ ngɛ ye he lo ɔ mi ha e nɔmlɔ tso nɛ ji asafo ɔ. 25A pee mi sɔmɔlɔ ngɛ Mawu blɔ nya tomi nɛ a tu ngɔ wo ye dɛ mi ngɛ nyɛ blɔfami ɔ nya, kaa ma ha Mawu munyu ɔ nɛ ba mi, 26nɔ́ nɛ ji laami sane nɛ a ngɔ laa kɛ je blema lokoo kɛ yi nɔ ɔmɛ a nɔ, se jehanɛ a je kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ e ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ, 27nihi nɛ Mawu suɔ kaa a ha a le nɔ́ nɛ ji kikɛmɛ a laami sane nɛ ɔ hɛ mi nyami hiɛmi ɔ ngɛ ma jeli ɔmɛ a kpɛti, nɛ ji Kristo ngɛ nyɛ mi, nɛ ji hɛ mi nyami hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ɔ. 28Lɛ e he sane wa fiɛɔ, nɛ wa woɔ nɔmlɔ tsuaa nɔmlɔ ga, nɛ wa tsɔɔ nɔmlɔ ni ngɛ ni lemi tsuaa ni lemi mi, konɛ waa kɛ nɔmlɔ tsuaa nɔmlɔ nɛ da si kaa nɔ́ nɛ hi kɛ pi si ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi. 29Kɔlɔ ɔ he dengme i ngɛ gboe nɛ i ngɛ plee ngɛ ni tsumi nɛ a kɛ he wami tsuɔ ngɛ ye mi ɔ nya.

Title: KOLOSEBI 2
Content:
1I suɔ kaa ma ha nyɛɛ le nyɛ he dengme babauu nɛ i ngɛ gboe ngɛ nyɛɛ kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ Laodikea kɛ nihi abɔ nɛ nɛ́ ye hɛ mi ngɛ he lo mi ɔmɛ a he, 2konɛ a na tsui, nɛ a pee kake ngɛ suɔmi mi kɛ pɛtɛ sisi numi nɛ mi kuɔ nɛ a ngɛ he wami ngɛ nɔ ɔ kulaa mi, nɛ a le Mawu kɛ Kristo laami sane ɔ, 3nɔ́ mi nɛ a ngɔ ga kɛ ni lemi juetli ɔ kulaa ngɔ laa ngɛ ɔ.
4I ngɛ enɛ ɔ dee konɛ nɔ ko kɛ nya mi ngɔngɔɛ munyu ko ko sisi nyɛ. 5Ejakaa ke i kɛ nyɛ be ngɛ he lo blɔfami hu, mumi blɔfami ɔ, i kɛ nyɛ ngɛ, nɛ ye bua jɔɔ, nɛ i naa nyɛ blɔ nya tomi kɛ si fimi nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ daa si ngɛ Kristo nɔ hemi kɛ yemi mi ɔ.
Kristo mi wami hiɛmi
6Akɛnɛ nyɛ he Kristo Yesu, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ, atuu nɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ nyɛɛ ngɛ e mi, nɛ nyɛ sipoku nɛ pi si, 7nɛ a ma nyɛ ngɛ e nɔ, nɛ nyɛɛ du si ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mi, kaa bɔ nɔuu nɛ a tsɔɔ nyɛ ɔ, nɛ nyɛ tsui nɛ hyi tɔ kɛ sina.
8Nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ hi, konɛ nɔ ko kɛ je mi ni lemi kɛ yaka sisimi ko ngɔ nyɛ nyɔgue, ngɛ nimli a blema sanehi kɛ je nɛ ɔ mi mumihi nɛ ji Kristo mi ɔ nya. 9Ejakaa e mi Mawu fuu hyimi ɔ kulaa hii ngɛ nɔmlɔ tso su mi; 10nɛ nyɛ hyi tɔtɔɔtɔ ngɛ e mi, lɛ nɔ nɛ ji nɔkɔtɔma yemi kɛ he blɔ tsuo yi ɔ, 11nɔ mi nɛ a po nyɛ hu ngɛ, kɛ nɔ pomi nɛ pi he lo mi pomi, se mohu Kristo pomi nɛ jeɔ wɔ kɛ jee he lo nɔmlɔ tso yayami mi ɔ; 12ejakaa a pu nyɛ ngɔ piɛ e he ngɛ baptisimi ɔ mi, nɔ mi hu nɛ a tle nyɛ si ngɛ, ngɛ Mawu nɛ tle lɛ si kɛ je gbeje ɔ he wami ni tsumi ɔ nɔ hemi kɛ yemi nya a. 13Nɛ nyɛ nɛ nyɛ ji ni gbogboehi ngɛ nyɛ nɔ tɔmi ɔmɛ kɛ nyɛ he lo mɔmlɔtɔ ɔ mi ɔ, e ha nyɛɛ kɛ lɛ tsuo wami, nɛ e kɛ nyɛ nɔ tɔmi ɔmɛ kulaa pa nyɛ; 14nɛ e gba wa he womi nɛ a ngma, nɛ ngɛ Mlaa amɛ a mi nɛ da si si wɔ ɔ, nɛ kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu e je ngɛ kpɛti kɛ ho, nɛ e ka ngɔ mɛtɛ sɛumi tso ɔ he. 15E kplɔ nɔkɔtɔma yemihi kɛ he blɔ ɔmɛ a he nihi, nɛ e bɔ mɛ ahlua pãa, nɛ e sã mɛ kɛ nyɛɛ e se ngɛ e kunimi yemi ɔ mi.
16Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ ko ha nɛ nɔ ko nɛ kojo nyɛ ngɛ ni yeni, loo ni numi, loo nyami ligbi, loo hluami he, loo Hejɔɔmi Ligbihi a blɔfami, 17ejakaa nihi nɛ maa ba amɛ a he nini kɛkɛ ʼi, se nɔmlɔ tso ɔ ji Kristo nɔ ɔ nɛ. 18Nyɛ ko ha nɛ nɔ ko nɛ buu e he kaa e pe nihi kulaa ngɛ ni nami ko he ɔ nɛ bu nyɛ fɔ nɛ e fi nɔ ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e hlami nya kaa a kɛ he si bami juɛmi nɛ ja hiɔwe bɔfohi; e he lo juɛmi ɔ hãa e woɔ e he nɔ yakatsuaa; 19kikɛmɛ a nɔmlɔ ɔ, e hɛɛ we Kristo nɛ ji yi ɔ mi, nɔ mi nɛ nɔmlɔ tso ɔ kulaa naa nihi nɛ hiaa lɛ, kɛ guu kpɔjihi kɛ panihi a nɔ kɛ waa bɔ nɛ Mawu to ɔ.
Gbomi kɛ wami ngɛ Kristo mi
20Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ke nyɛɛ kɛ Kristo gbo kɛ ha je nɛ ɔ mi sisije ni ɔmɛ ɔ, mɛni he je mɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ kaa nihi nɛ a hɛ ngɛ ngɛ je ɔ mi, nɛ nyɛ haa a woɔ nyɛ mlaa kɛ mwɔɔ ke: 21“Koo pɛtɛ he, nɛ koo sa o nya, nɛ koo ta he tete” ɔ? 22Jamɛ a ni ɔmɛ kulaa a, a he ni tsumi mi nɔuu a hɛ mi kpataa ngɛ, ni nɛ ɔmɛ ji nimli a kitahi kɛ tsɔɔmihi, 23nɛ a ji nihi nɛ hɛɛ ni lemi munyu ngɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a suɔmi nya jami kɛ he si bami juɛmi kɛ nɔmlɔ tso yi mi wami mi mohu, se a pi nihi nɛ he ngɛ se nami nɛ kuɔ he lo ɔ he numi nihi a nya.

Title: KOLOSEBI 3
Content:
1Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ke a tle nyɛɛ kɛ Kristo tsuo si ɔ, nyɛ hla nihi nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe, he nɛ Kristo ngɛ nɛ e hii si ngɛ Mawu hiɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ. 2Nihi nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔmɛ a he nyɛ susu, pi nihi nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ. 3Ejakaa nyɛ gbo nɛ a ngɔ nyɛ wami ɔ kɛ Kristo tsuo ngɔ laa ngɛ Mawu mi. 4Benɛ Kristo, nɔ nɛ ji wa wami ɔ ma pue ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ hu nyɛɛ kɛ lɛ ma pue ngɛ anuminyami mi.
Wami momo kɛ ehe ɔ
5Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛɛ gbe nyɛ he nihi nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ: ajuama bɔmi, mu ni tsumi, mi mi la, akɔnɔ yaya, kɛ hɛ tsumi nɛ ji wɔ jami ɔ, 6nihi a he nɛ Mawu muklii mi fumi baa tuegbenɔ bi ɔmɛ a nɔ ɔ, 7nihi a mi nɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ nyɛɛ sa, benɛ nyɛ ngɛ nihi nɛ peɔ ja amɛ a kpɛti ɔ.
8Se jehanɛ ɔ nyɛ hu nyɛ sake kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ kulaa ngɔ pue he, nihi nɛ ji muklii mi fumi, mi mi la, hetsɛ, musu bɔmi munyu, zo munyu ɔmɛ kɛ je nyɛ nya mi. 9Nyɛ ko ye nyɛ sibi lakpa, ejakaa nyɛ je nɔmlɔ momo ɔ kɛ e ni tsumi ɔmɛ ngɔ pue he; 10nyɛɛ wo nɔmlɔ he nɛ plɛɔ ehe ekohu kɛ yaa ni lemi mi ngɛ nɔ nɛ bɔ lɛ ɔ subai ɔ nya; 11he nɛ Hela no kɛ Yuda no, nɔ nɛ a po lɛ kɛ mɔmlɔtɔtsɛ, jekɔno kɛ Skite no, nyɔguɛ kɛ odehe ko be hu, se mohu Kristo ji nihi kulaa ngɛ nihi kulaa mi ɔ.
12Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, akɛnɛ bimɛ nɛ Mawu hia, ni klɔuklɔuhi kɛ suɔli ji nyɛ he je ɔ, nyɛɛ wo mi mi jɔmi, mɔbɔ nami, he si bami, kpoo peemi, tsui si tomi kaa tade, 13nɛ ke nɔ ko kɛ nɔ ko na sane ko ɔ, nyɛɛ na ha nyɛ sibi nɛ nyɛ kɛ pa nyɛ he, kaa bɔ nɛ Kristo hu kɛ pa nyɛ ɔ, ja nyɛ hu nyɛɛ pee. 14Se enɛ ɔmɛ tsuo se ɔ, nyɛɛ wo suɔmi nɛ ji kpa nɛ fiɔ nihi kulaa peɔ kake ɔ kaa tade. 15Nɛ nyɛ ha Mawu he jɔmi ɔ nɛ ye tsɛ ngɛ nyɛ tsui mi, nɔ́ nɛ he nɛ a tsɛ nyɛ kɛ ba ngɛ nɔmlɔ tso kake mi ɔ, nɛ nyɛɛ le si nami. 16Nyɛ ha Kristo munyu ɔ nɛ hi nyɛ mi babauu ngɛ ni lemi tsuaa ni lemi mi; nɛ nyɛɛ tsɔɔ nyɛ he ni nɛ nyɛɛ tu munyu ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ he ngɛ saku fiamihi kɛ yi jemi lahi kɛ mumi mi lahi a mi, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ sina nɛ la ngɛ nyɛ tsui mi ha Mawu. 17Nɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ pee ngɛ munyu tumi loo ni tsumi blɔfami ɔ, nyɛɛ pee kulaa ngɛ Yesu Kristo biɛ mi, nɛ nyɛɛ gu e nɔ kɛ na Mawu kɛ Tsɛ ɔ si.
Wami he ɔ mi sihimi
18Yigbayi, nyɛɛ ba nyɛ he si ngɔ ha nyɛ hunomɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ sa ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi. 19Hunomɛ, nyɛɛ suɔ nyɛ yihi, nɛ nyɛ yi mi ko wa ngɛ a nɔ.
20Bimɛ, nyɛɛ bu nyɛ fɔli a tue ngɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ blɔfami, ejakaa kɔlɔ ɔ lɛ sa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi saminya.
21Tsɛmɛ, nyɛ ko wo nyɛ bihi a muklii mi la, konɛ a nine mi nɛ ko wo nyu.
22Sɔmɔli, nyɛɛ bu nyɛ he lo blɔfami nyɔmtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a tue ngɛ nihi kulaa mi, pi kɛ hɛ mi sɔmɔmi, kaa nihi nɛ hlaa nimli a hɛ mi nyami, se mohu ngɛ tsui kpakpa mi kaa nihi nɛ yee Mawu gbeye. 23Nɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ pee ɔ, nyɛɛ je nyɛ tsui mi kɛ pee, kaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nyɛ ngɛ pee kɛ ngɛ hae se pi nimli, 24nɛ nyɛɛ le kaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ dɛ mi nyɛ nine maa su gbo si ni ɔmɛ a nɔ ngɛ kaa nyɛ hiɔwo, ejakaa Nyɔmtsɛ Kristo nyɛ ngɛ sɔmɔe. 25Nɔ nɛ peɔ nihi nɛ dɛ́ blɔ ɔ ma na nihi nɛ dɛ́ blɔ ɔ he hiɔwo, nɛ hɛ mi hyemi ko be mi.

Title: KOLOSEBI 4
Content:
1Nyɔmtsɛmɛ, nyɛɛ ngɔ nɔ́ nɛ da kɛ nɔ́ nɛ sa pɛ ngɔ ha nyɛ sɔmɔli ɔmɛ, nɛ nyɛɛ le kaa nyɛ hu nyɛ ngɛ nyɔmtsɛ ngɛ hiɔwe.
Nyagbe gawomi
2Nyɛɛ sɔle daa, nyɛɛ fɔ nyɔ ngɛ mi kɛ sina; 3nɛ jehanɛ snyɛɛ sɔle ha wɔ hulɔ, konɛ Mawu nɛ bli munyu ɔ sinya a ha wɔ nɛ wa kɛ fiɛ Kristo laami sane ɔ, nɔ́ he nɛ i fɔɔ si ngɛ kpa mi nɛ ɔ, 4konɛ ma je kɔlɔ ɔ si paa bɔ nɛ da kaa ma de ɔ.
5Nyɛɛ nyɛɛ ngɛ ni lemi nya, ngɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ se ɔmɛ a hɛ mi, nɛ nyɛ tsu nyɛ deka a he ni. 6Nyɛ ha nyɛ munyu he nɛ tsɔ daa, nɛ ngo nɛ hi mi, nɛ nyɛɛ le bɔ nɛ sa kaa nyɛ ha nɔ tsuaa nɔ heto.
Nyagbe sɛyemi
7Tihiko, nɛ ji suɔmi nyɛmi kɛ anɔkuale sɔmɔlɔ kɛ huɛ tsɔlɔ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi ɔ, maa bɔ nyɛ ye he sane ɔmɛ tsuo. 8Enɛ ɔ he nɔuu nɛ i tsɔ lɛ nyɛ ngɔ, konɛ ma nu nyɛ he, nɛ e wo nyɛ bua, 9nɛ i ngɔ Onesimo nɛ ji anɔkualetsɛ kɛ nyɛmi nɛ a suɔ nɛ je nyɛ kpɛti ɔ ngɔ piɛ e he; a ma ba bɔ nyɛ hiɛ ɔ sanehi kulaa.
10Aristarko, ye huɛ pa mi no ɔ, kɛ Marko nɛ ji Barnaba nyɛmi bi ɔ, (nɔ nɛ he nɛ nyɛ na womi ɔmɛ ɔ, ke e ba nyɛ ngɔ ɔ, nyɛ he lɛ hɛmuɔ), 11kɛ Yesu nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Yusto ɔ, nihi nɛ je ninɛmɛ nɛ a po mɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ, ke a biɔ nyɛ. Ni nɛ ɔmɛ pɛ ji ye huɛmɛ ni tsuli ngɛ Mawu matsɛ yemi ɔ he; a ji bua womi kɛ ha mi.
12Epafra nɛ je nyɛ kpɛti nɛ ji Kristo sɔmɔlɔ nɛ daa nɛ ɔ e kaii nyɛ ngɛ e sɔlemihi a mi, konɛ nyɛɛ da si nɛ nyɛɛ hi kɛ pi si nɛ nyɛ hyi tɔtɔɔtɔ ngɛ Mawu suɔmi nya nihi kulaa mi ɔ, ke e biɔ nyɛ. 13I ngɛ e he odase yee kaa e gboɔ dengme wawɛɛ ngɛ nyɛɛ kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ Laodikea kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ Hierapoli ɔmɛ a he. 14Luka, tsopatsɛ nɛ a suɔ ɔ, kɛ Dema ke a biɔ nyɛ.
15Wa biɔ nyɛmimɛ nɛ ngɛ Laodikea a, kɛ Nimfa kɛ asafo nɛ ngɛ e we ɔ. 16Nɛ ke a kane womi nɛ ɔ ngɛ nyɛ ngɔ ɔ, nyɛ ha a kane ngɛ Laodikea asafo ɔ mi hulɔ, nɛ a ha nyɛ hu nyɛɛ kane Laodikea nɔ ɔ. 17Nɛ nyɛ de Arkipo ke: “Hyɛ nɛ o tsu sɔmɔmi ni tsumi nɛ a tu ngɔ wo o dɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi ɔ, nɛ o gbe nya kɛ pi si!”
18Imi Paulo nitsɛ ye nine nya womi nɛ i ngma ji nɛ ɔ nɛ. Nyɛ kai ye kɔsɔkɔsɔ ɔmɛ! Dloomi ɔ kɛ nyɛ nɛ hi si! Amen.

Title: 1 TESALONIKABI 1
Content:
1Paulo kɛ Silvano kɛ Timoteo ngma ya ha Tesalonika asafo nɛ ngɛ Mawu, Tsɛ ɔ, kɛ Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo mi ɔ: Dloomi kɛ he jɔmi nɛ je wa Tsɛ Mawu ɔ kɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo dɛ mi ɔ ha nyɛ!
Tesalonikabi ɔmɛ a sihihii kɛ a hemi kɛ yemi
2Wa naa Mawu si daa ngɛ nyɛ tsuo nyɛ he, nɛ wa woɔ nyɛ ta ngɛ wa pɛɛ kpamihi a mi, nɛ wa jɔɔ we. 3Wa kaii nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ni tsumi ɔmɛ kɛ nyɛ suɔmi mɔde bɔmi ɔ kɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo he hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi mi tsui si tomi ɔ ngɛ Mawu kɛ wa Tsɛ ɔ hɛ mi. 4Ejakaa mamimɛ nɛ Mawu suɔ, wa le hlami nɛ a hla nyɛ ɔ, 5kaa wa sane kpakpa a bɛ́ nyɛ ngɔ ngɛ munyu tumi mi kɛkɛ, se mohu ngɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ he wami kɛ nɔ mi mami babauu mi, kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ le, bɔ nɛ wa plɛ ba wa je mi ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti ngɛ nyɛ he ɔ. 6Nɛ nyɛɛ lɛɛ, nyɛ plɛ waa kɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kaseli, akɛnɛ nyɛɛ kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu mi bua jɔmi he munyu ɔ ngɛ dengme babauu mi ɔ, 7nɛ e ha nyɛ plɛ okadi ha nihi kulaa nɛ he ye ngɛ Makedonia kɛ Akaia a. 8Ejakaa nyɛ ngɔ Nyɔmtsɛ munyu ɔ je nɛ e gbɛ fia, pi ngɛ Makedonia kɛ Akaia kɛkɛ, se mohu nyɛ hemi nɛ nyɛ heɔ Mawu nɔ yeɔ ɔ jije kɛ ho he tsuaa he ya, nɛ e hia we wɔ nɔ́ ko demi tete. 9Ejakaa mɛ nitsɛmɛ a gbɛ wa slaami ɔ he munyu ɔ fia kɛ bɔ nɛ nyɛ kpale kɛ je amagahi a he kɛ ba Mawu ngɔ nɛ nyɛ ba sɔmɔ Mawu hɛ kalɔ ɔ, 10nɛ nyɛ ngɛ e bi ɔ nɛ e tle lɛ si kɛ je gbeje ɔ blɔ hyɛe kɛ je hiɔwe, Yesu ne je wɔ kɛ je mi mi fumi nɛ maa ba a mi ɔ.

Title: 1 TESALONIKABI 2
Content:
Paulo nitsumi ngɛ Tesalonika
1Mamimɛ, nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ le kaa slaami nɛ wa ba slaa nyɛ ɔ pee we yaka, 2se mohu wa na ka ngɛ wa Mawu ɔ mi, nɛ waa kɛ fiɛ Mawu sane kpakpa a tsɔɔ nyɛ ngɛ nya tsimi babauu mi; pohu wa na nɔ kɛ be, nɛ a wa wɔ yi mi hulɔ ngɛ Filipi, kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ le ɔ. 3Ejakaa wa munyu tumi kɛ tsɔɔmi ɔ, pi sisimi loo mu ni tsumi loo lakpa mi nɛ e je; 4se mohu kaa bɔ nɛ Mawu bu wɔ nihi nɛ sa kaa a tu sane kpakpa a ngɔ wo wa dɛ mi ɔ, ja wa deɔ, pi bɔ nɛ sa nimli a hɛ mi, se mohu bɔ nɛ sa Mawu nɛ kaa tsuihi hyɛ ɔ hɛ mi. 5Ejakaa wa tu we nya mi ngɔngɔɛ munyu ko hyɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ le ɔ, nɛ wa to we hɛ tsumi he lakpa ko hulɔ, Mawu ji odase; 6jehanɛ wa hla we nimli a hɛ mi nyami ngɛ nyɛ ngɔ aloo ni kpa komɛ a ngɔ, 7pohu wa ngɛ he blɔ kaa waa kɛ wa he fɔɔ nyɛ nɔ, akɛnɛ Kristo bɔfohi ji wɔ ɔ. Se mohu wa mi mi jɔɔ ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti, kaa bɔ nɛ bimɛ a nyɛ hɛɛ lɛ nitsɛ e bimɛ dɔdɔɔdɔ ɔ. 8Akɛnɛ wa suɔ nyɛ saminya he je ɔ, wa ngɛ he tsui kaa pi Mawu sane kpakpa a kɛkɛ nɛ waa kɛ ma ha nyɛ, se mohu wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa wami tete, ejakaa wa suɔ nyɛ wawɛɛ.
9Mamimɛ, nyɛ hɛ ngɛ wa pɔtɔ kɛ wa dengme gbomi ɔ nɔ, kaa benɛ pee nɛ wa ko pee tlomi ngɔ ha nyɛ ti nɔ ko he je ɔ, nyɔ kɛ pia tsuo wa ngɛ ni tsue, nɛ wa pa ngɛ Mawu sane kpakpa a jajee kɛ ngɛ nyɛ tsɔɔe. 10Nyɛ nitsɛmɛ kɛ Mawu ji odase yeli kaa wa je mi nɛ wa ba ngɛ nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ he yeɔ ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ ngɛ klɔuu, e da, nɛ piami ko be he. 11Nyɛ le bɔ nɛ wa hɛɛ nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ tsɛ ko hɛɛ e bimɛ. 12Wa wo nyɛ he wami, wa wo nyɛ bua, nɛ wa su nyɛ kaa nyɛɛ nyɛɛ bɔ nɛ sa Mawu nɛ tsɛ nyɛ kɛ ba lɛ nitsɛ e matsɛ yemi kɛ e hɛ mi nyami ɔ mi ɔ hɛ mi.
13Enɛ ɔ he je nɛ wɔ hu wa naa Mawu si nɛ wa jɔɔ we ɔ nɛ, ejakaa benɛ nyɛ nine su Mawu munyu nɛ nyɛ nu ngɛ wa nya a nɔ ɔ, nyɛ pɛtɛ he kaa Mawu munyu, kaa bɔ nɛ e ngɛ hu niinɛ ɔ, se pi kaa nimli a munyu ko ʼi; se mohu e ji Mawu munyu nɛ tsuɔ he wami nihi ngɛ nyɛ nɛ nyɛ heɔ yeɔ ɔmɛ a kpɛti. 14Ejakaa nyɛɛ lɛɛ, mamimɛ, nyɛ plɛ Mawu asafo nɛ ngɛ Yudea a kaseli ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi, ejakaa dengme nɛ nyɛ na ngɛ nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ ma mi bi ɔmɛ a dɛ mi ɔ, lɔ ɔ nɔuu mɛ hu a na ngɛ Yudafo ɔmɛ a dɛ mi, 15nihi nɛ gbe Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu kɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a gbali ɔmɛ hulɔ, nɛ a waa wɔ hu yi mi, nɛ a sɛ́ Mawu hɛ mi, nɛ a kɛ nimli tsuo yi, 16nihi nɛ tsiɔ wɔ blɔ hulɔ kaa wa ko tu munyu ngɔ tsɔɔ maje li ɔmɛ konɛ a he a yi wami. Enɛ ɔ a kɛ woɔ a he yayami ɔmɛ fuu tɔ daa nɔ; se jehanɛ Mawu mi mi fumi na mɛ.
Paulo suɔ nɛ e ya slaa Tesalonikabi ɔmɛ ekohu
17Se wɔɔ lɛɛ, mamimɛ, akɛnɛ waa kɛ nyɛ mi gba be kpiti ko ngɛ he lo mi se pi tsui mi he je ɔ, waa kɛ hɛja babauu bɔ mɔde nitsɛ konɛ waa na nyɛ hɛ mi ekohu. 18Lɔ ɔ he ɔ wa hla kaa waa ba nyɛ ngɔ — imi, Paulo ɔ, i hla si kake kɛ si enyɔ sɔuu — se Satan tsi wɔ blɔ. 19Ejakaa mɛni ji wa hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi loo wa bua jɔmi loo wa fiami jlasi ngɛ wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo hɛ mi ngɛ e bami be ɔ mi ɔ? Anɛ pi nyɛ nɔuu lo? 20Ejakaa nyɛ nyɛ ji wa hɛ mi nyami kɛ wa bua jɔmi.

Title: 1 TESALONIKABI 3
Content:
1Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, benɛ wa nyɛ we hu ɔ, wa kplɛɛ kaa a je wa he kɛkɛ ngɛ Ateene, 2nɛ wa tsɔ wa nyɛmi Timoteo, nɛ ji Mawu sɔmɔlɔ kɛ wa huɛ ni tsulɔ ngɛ Kristo sane kpakpa a mi ɔ, konɛ e ba wo nyɛ he wami nɛ e ha nyɛ fi si ngɛ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mi, 3konɛ kikɛmɛ a nɔ nami nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ ko ha nɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko nane nɛ kpata. Ejakaa nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ le kaa nɔ́ nɛ fɔɔ si ha wɔ nɔuu ji kɔlɔ ɔ nɛ. 4Benɛ waa kɛ nyɛ ngɛ ɔ, wa de nyɛ ngɔ to ke wa maa na nɔ kaa bɔ nɛ e ba mi nɛ nyɛ le ɔ. 5Enɛ ɔ he je nɛ imi hu, benɛ i nyɛ we hu ɔ, i tsɔ konɛ ma kɛ le nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ, kaa alinɔ nɔ kalɔ ɔ ba ka nyɛ nɛ e ha wa dengme nɛ wa gbo ɔ pee yaka lo?
6Se jehanɛ nɛ Timoteo je nyɛ ngɔ ba wa ngɔ nɛ e ba bɔ wɔ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ kɛ nyɛ suɔmi kɛ kaimi kpakpa nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ kaii wɔ daa a, kɛ nyɛ hɛ̃ nɛ ngɛ jae kaa nyɛ ma na wɔ kaa bɔ nɛ wɔ hu wa hɛ̃ jaa ngɛ nyɛ he ɔ, 7e nɛ ɔ he je ɔ, mamimɛ, wa nɔ nami kɛ wa haomi ɔmɛ kulaa mi ɔ, nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ ha wa bua jɔ ngɛ nyɛ he. 8Jehanɛ wa na he wami he, akɛnɛ nyɛ daa si ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi ɔ. 9Kɛ wa maa na Mawu si ngɛ nyɛ he ngɛ bua jɔmi tsuo nɛ wa na ngɛ wa Mawu ɔ hɛ mi ɔ he kɛɛ? 10Nyɔ kɛ pia kulaa wa kpaa pɛɛ babauu, konɛ waa na nyɛ hɛ mi nɛ wa ha nyɛ nɔ nɛ piɛ ngɛ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mi ɔ.
11Jehanɛ, Mawu kɛ wa Tsɛ ɔ nitsɛ kɛ wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo nɛ ha wa blɔ ɔ nɛ da kɛ ba nyɛ ngɔ. 12Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɛ wo nyɛ tɔtɔɔtɔ, nɛ e ha nyɛɛ be nɔ kɛ suɔmi nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ suɔ nyɛ he kɛ nihi kulaa a, kaa bɔ nɛ wɔ hu wa suɔ nyɛ ɔ; 13benɛ pee nɛ e ha nyɛ tsui nɛ pi si ngɛ klɔuklɔu peemi mi nɛ piami ko ko hi nyɛ he, ngɛ Mawu kɛ wa Tsɛ ɔ hɛ mi, ngɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo kɛ e ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ kulaa a bami be ɔ mi.

Title: 1 TESALONIKABI 4
Content:
Sihimi nɛ sa Mawu hɛ mi
1Nyagbe ɔ, mamimɛ, wa kpa nyɛ pɛɛ, nɛ wa ngɛ nyɛ ga woe ngɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu mi, kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ kase kɛ je wa ngɔ ɔ, bɔ nɛ sa kaa nyɛɛ ba nyɛ je mi ha ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ pee hulɔ ɔ, nyɛɛ ya nɔ ja. 2Ejakaa nyɛ le kita nɛ wa wo nyɛ ngɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu biɛ mi ɔ. 3Enɛ ɔ ji Mawu suɔmi nya ni kaa nyɛ he nɛ tsɔ, lɔ ɔ ji kaa nyɛɛ tsi nyɛ he nya kɛ je ajuama bɔmi he, 4nɛ nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ le lɛ nitsɛ e nɔ ɔ hɛɛmi ngɛ he tsɔmi kɛ bu mi, 5pi ngɛ akɔnɔ hɛ dɔmi mi, kaa bɔ nɛ maje li a bimɛ nɛ li Mawu ɔ peɔ ɔ; 6konɛ nɔ ko ko ye e nyɛmi amimi nɛ e sisi lɛ ngɛ sane ko mi ejakaa enɛ ɔmɛ tsuo a he tue gblalɔ ji Mawetsɛ ɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ wa de nyɛ ngɔ to nɛ wa ye he odase ɔ. 7Ejakaa Mawu tsɛ we wɔ ngɔ hi mu ni tsumi, se mohu he tsɔmi. 8Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jehanɛ, nɔ nɛ bui tsɔɔmi nɛ ɔ ɔ, pi nɔmlɔ ko nɛ e bui ɔ, se mohu Mawu nɔ nɛ ngɔ e Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ ngɔ wo nyɛ mi ɔ ʼi.
9E hia we kaa ma ngma nyɛ ngɛ nyɛmimɛ a suɔmi he, ejakaa nyɛ nitsɛmɛ ɔ, Mawu tsɔɔ nyɛ kaa nyɛɛ suɔ nyɛ he; 10ejakaa nyɛ peɔ ja hulɔ haa nyɛmimɛ nɛ ngɛ Makedonia tsuo kulaa a. Se wa kpa nyɛ pɛɛ, mamimɛ, kaa nyɛɛ ya nɔ pe kekle ɔ, 11nɛ nyɛɛ bɔ mɔde nɛ nyɛɛ hi si kpoo nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛ he ko wo ni kpahi a sane mi, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛ nine nɛ tsu ni, kaa bɔ nɛ wa de nyɛ ɔ, 12konɛ nyɛɛ ba nyɛ je mi bɔ nɛ ngɛ fɛu ngɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ se ɔmɛ a hɛ mi, nɛ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko ko hia nyɛ.
Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bami
13Se, mamimɛ, wa suɔ kaa nyɛɛ le ninɛmɛ nɛ a gbo ɔmɛ a he sane, konɛ nyɛ ko ye kɔmɔ kaa ninɛmɛ nɛ piɛ ɔmɛ, nihi nɛ be hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ko ɔ. 14Ejakaa ke wa heɔ yeɔ kaa Yesu gbo nɛ e te si ɔ, ja nɔuu Mawu maa gu Yesu nɔ, nɛ e ngɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ gbo ɔmɛ hu ngɔ piɛ e he kɛ ba.
15Wa ngɛ nyɛ enɛ ɔ dee ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ munyu ko nya, kaa wɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ wa hɛ maa hi ngmengmle nɛ maa piɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bami be ɔ mi ɔ, be ninɛmɛ nɛ a gbo ɔmɛ a hlami sɛe. 16Ejakaa lɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nitsɛ kɛ ose hemi kɛ hiɔwe bɔfo nɔkɔtɔma gbi kɛ Mawu titimati maa je hiɔwe kɛ kple si, nɛ ni gbogboehi nɛ ngɛ Kristo mi ɔ kekle maa te si, 17lɔ ɔ se ɔ, wɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ wa hɛ ngɛ nɛ piɛ ɔ, a ma sa waa kɛ mɛ kulaa ngɛ bɔkuhi a mi kɛ maa ya Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kpeemi ngɛ kɔɔhiɔ mi, nɛ jã waa kɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ maa hi si daa. 18Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛɛ kɛ kikɛmɛ a munyu nɛ ɔmɛ nɛ wo nyɛ bua.

Title: 1 TESALONIKABI 5
Content:
Nyɛ dla nyɛ he ngɔ to Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bami ɔ
1Se be kɛ yi nɔ ɔmɛ a he ɔ, mamimɛ, e hia we kaa waa ngma nyɛ. 2Ejakaa nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ le tutuutu kaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ligbi ɔ maa ba kaa juɔ baa nyɔ mi ɔ. 3Ejakaa be mi nɛ a ma de ke: “He jɔmi ngɛ, nɛ wa ngɛ sɔkee!” ɔ, lɛ be ɔ mi nɔuu hɛ mi kpatami ma ba tua mɛ si kake too, kaa kɔɔmi tuaa yo nɛ muklii wa a, nɛ a be mi jee gblegbleegblee. 4Se, mamimɛ, nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ be diblii mi nɛ ligbi ɔ ma ba ti nyɛ si kaa juɔ. 5Ejakaa nyɛ tsuo ɔ la bimɛ ji nyɛ kɛ piani bimɛ hulɔ; wa pi nyɔ loo diblii bimɛ. 6Lɛɛ, lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ ko ha waa hwɔ mahɛ kaa ninɛmɛ nɛ piɛ ɔmɛ, se mohu nyɛ ha waa fɔ nyɔ nɛ wa hɛ nɛ ka si. 7Ejakaa ninɛmɛ nɛ hwɔɔ mahɛ ɔ, nyɔ mi a hwɔɔ, nɛ nihi nɛ deɔ da a, nyɔ mi a deɔ. 8Se wɔɔ lɛɛ akɛnɛ piani bimɛ ji wɔ he je ɔ, nyɛ ha wa hɛ nɛ ka si, nɛ waa wo hemi kɛ yemi kɛ suɔmi dama a, nɛ wa bu dade pɛɛ nɛ ji yi wami hemi hɛ kɛ nɔfɔmi ɔ. 9Ejakaa Mawu to we wɔ ha mi mi fumi, se mohu e to wɔ nɛ wa na yi wami hemi ngɛ wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo mi, 10nɔ nɛ gbo wa yi gbenɔ konɛ wa hɛ ngɛ jio, wa gbo jio, waa kɛ lɛ nɛ hi si. 11Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛɛ wo nyɛ sibi he wami, nɛ nyɛɛ ye bua mɛ kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ pee ɔ.
Nyagbe gawomi kɛ sɛyemi
12Se, mamimɛ, wa kpa nyɛ pɛɛ kaa znyɛɛ le nihi nɛ tsuɔ ni ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti nɛ a ji nyɛ hɛ mi nyɛɛli ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi nɛ a tuɔ munyu tsɔɔ nyɛ ɔ, 13nɛ nyɛɛ bu mɛ saminya ngɛ suɔmi mi ngɛ a ni tsumi ɔ he. Nyɛɛ hi si ngɛ he jɔmi mi.
14Wa kpa nyɛ pɛɛ, mamimɛ, nyɛɛ tu munyu ngɔ tsɔɔ he jɔli ɔmɛ; nyɛɛ wo ninɛmɛ nɛ fɔɔ ɔmɛ he wami; nyɛɛ ye bua ninɛmɛ nɛ gbɔjɔ ɔmɛ; nyɛɛ to nyɛ tsui si ha nihi kulaa. 15Nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ hi konɛ nɔ ko ko ngɔ yayami ngɔ to yayami nane mi, se mohu daa nɛ ɔ nyɛɛ di kpakpa peemi se ngɔ ha nyɛ he kɛ nihi kulaa.
16Nyɛ bua nɛ jɔ daa; 17nyɛɛ sɔle be tsuaa be; 18nyɛɛ na si ngɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ mi; ejakaa lɔ ɔ ji Mawu suɔmi nya ni ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ngɛ nyɛ blɔfami.
19Nyɛ ko gbe Mumi ɔ; 20nyɛ ko bu gbali ɔmɛ a munyu ɔmɛ kaa pi nɔ́ ko nɛ sa bumi. 21Nyɛɛ ka nihi kulaa hyɛ, nɛ nɔ́ nɛ hi ɔ, nyɛɛ pɛtɛ he. 22Nyɛɛ sa nyɛ he kɛ je nɔ́ fɛɛ nɔ́ nɛ hɛɛ yayami su ɔ he.
23He jɔmi Mawu ɔ nitsɛ nɛ tsukɔ nyɛ he kulaa kɛ pi si, nɛ e hyɛ nyɛ mumi kɛ nyɛ klaa kɛ nyɛ nɔmlɔ tso ɔ kulaa nɔ nɛ piami ko ko hi he ngɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo bami be ɔ mi. 24Anɔkualetsɛ ji Mawu nɛ tsɛɔ nyɛ ɔ nɛ, nɛ lɛ nɔuu e maa pee hulɔ.
25Mamimɛ, nyɛ kpa pɛɛ ha wɔ.
26Nyɛ nga nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ tsuo kɛ nya he fiɔmi klɔuklɔu.
27I ngɛ nyɛ kita kae ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ biɛ mi kaa nyɛ ha a kane kikɛmɛ a womi nɛ ɔ ngɔ ha nyɛmimɛ klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ kulaa!
28Wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dloomi ɔ kɛ nyɛ nɛ hi si! Amen.

Title: 2 TESALONIKABI 1
Content:
1Paulo kɛ Silvano kɛ Timoteo ngma ya ha Tesalonika asafo nɛ ngɛ wa Tsɛ Mawu kɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo mi ɔ:
2Dloomi kɛ hejɔmi nɛ je wa Tsɛ Mawu ɔ kɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo dɛ mi ɔ ha nyɛ!
Kojomi ngɛ Kristo bami be ɔ mi
3E sa kaa wa naa Mawu si daa ngɛ nyɛ he bɔ nɛ sa, mamimɛ, ejakaa nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ klee wawɛɛ nitsɛ, nɛ nyɛ tsuo nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ suɔmi nɛ e kɛ suɔ e nyɛmimɛ ɔ ngɛ hiɛe kɛ ngɛ nɔ yae hulɔ, 4lɔ ɔ he ɔ, wɔ nitsɛmɛ tete wa fiaa ngɔ fɔɔ nyɛ nɔ ngɛ Mawu asafo ɔmɛ a mi, ngɛ nyɛ tsui si tomi kɛ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ nyɛ hɛɛ ngɛ nyɛ yi mi nɛ a waa kɛ nyɛ nɔ namihi nɛ nyɛ miaa nyɛ hɛ mi ngɛ mi ɔmɛ a he.
5Enɛ ɔ ji Mawu kojomi nɛ da a he okadi nɛ a naa paa, konɛ a bu nyɛ kaa nyɛ sa Mawu matsɛ yemi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nɔ nae ngɛ he ɔ. 6E da ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi kaa ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ nyɛ haoe ɔ, e maa hao mɛ ngɔ to nane mi; 7nɛ nyɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ a ngɛ nyɛ haoe ɔ, e ma ha waa kɛ nyɛ tsuo he jɔɔmi, benɛ a ma je Mawetsɛ Yesu kpo kɛ maa je hiɔwe kɛ e he wami bɔfo ɔmɛ ɔ, 8nɔ nɛ kɛ la nɛ ngɛ tsoe maa gbla nihi nɛ li Mawu kɛ nihi nɛ bui wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo sane kpakpa a tue ɔmɛ a tue. 9A ma na hiɔwo nɛ ji neneene hɛ mi kpatami kɛ maa je Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi kɛ e he wami ɔ hɛ mi nyami ɔ he, 10benɛ e maa ba nɛ a maa wo e hɛ mi nyami ngɛ e ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a mi, nɛ a maa na e nyakpɛ nihi ngɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ he e nɔ ye ɔ kulaa mi ngɛ jamɛ a ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, ejakaa a he wa dase nɛ wa ye ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ ɔ ye.
11Enɛ ɔ he je hu nɛ wa kpaa pɛɛ daa haa nyɛ ɔ nɛ, konɛ wa Mawu ɔ nɛ ha nyɛɛ sa tsɛmi ɔ, nɛ ngɛ e he wami nya a, e ha nyɛɛ hi kɛ pi si ngɛ nɔ́ kpakpa tsuaa nɔ́ kpakpa kɛ hemi kɛ yemi mi, 12benɛ pee nɛ a wo wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo biɛ ɔ hɛ mi nyami ngɛ nyɛ mi, nɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ hɛ mi nɛ ba nyami ngɛ e mi, ngɛ wa Mawu ɔ kɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo dloomi ɔ nya.

Title: 2 TESALONIKABI 2
Content:
Dikalɔ ɔ
1Ngɛ wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo bami ɔ kɛ wa nya nɛ a ma bua ngɛ e ngɔ ɔ he ɔ, wa kpa nyɛ pɛɛ, mamimɛ, 2kaa nyɛ ko ha nɛ a kɛ mumi ko loo munyu ko loo womi ko nɛ a ma de ke e je wa ngɔ ɔ nɛ puɛ nyɛ juɛmi kaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ Ligbi ɔ ba momo. 3Nyɛ ko ha nɔ ko nɛ e sisi nyɛ ngɛ blɔ ko blɔ ko nɔ, ejakaa ja Mawu jami kuami ɔ ba lolo, nɛ a je dikalɔ nɛ ji hɛ mi kpatami bi ɔ kpo, 4nɔ nɛ maa wo e he nɔ nɛ e maa te si ngɔ si nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ a tsɛɛ mawu loo mawu jami ɔ, nɛ lɛ nitsɛ e ma ya hi Mawu we ɔ kaa mawu ko nɛ e ma tsɛ e he kaa lɛ ji Mawu ɔ.
5Nyɛ kai we kaa, benɛ i kɛ nyɛ̃ ngɛ ɔ, i de nyɛ kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ lo? 6Nɛ jehanɛ ɔ, nyɛ le nɔ́ nɛ ngɛ e kpo jemi ɔ blɔ tsie ɔ. 7Ejakaa mlaa kuami laami sane ɔ ngɛ ni tsue momo; se ja a je nɔ́ nɛ ngɛ nɔ ngɛ blɔ tsie ɔ kɛ je blɔ mi lolo. 8Nɛ lɔ ɔ loko a ma je dikalɔ ɔ kpo paa, nɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu kɛ e nya mi mumi ɔ maa gbe lɛ, nɛ e kɛ e bami ɔ kpɛmi ɔ ma kpata e hɛ mi. 9Dikalɔ ɔ maa be kɛ Satan ni tsumi nɛ mi wa ngɛ lakpa he wami kɛ okadihi kɛ nyakpɛ nihi tsuo mi, 10kɛ nihi nɛ dɛ blɔ kulaa nɛ a kɛ mlɔɔ nihi nɛ laa amɛ, ejakaa a pɛtɛ we anɔkuale suɔmi ɔ he konɛ a kɛ he a yi wami. 11Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Mawu maa tsɔ sisimi nɛ nya wa kɛ maa ba a ngɔ konɛ a he lakpa a nɛ a ye, 12konɛ a kojo nihi kulaa nɛ he we anɔkuale ɔ yi, se a naa nihi nɛ dɛ blɔ ɔmɛ mohu a he tsui ɔ.
A hla nyɛ ha yi wami hemi
13Se wɔɔ lɛɛ, e sa kaa wa naa Mawu si daa ngɛ nyɛ he, mamimɛ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ suɔ, ejakaa Mawu hla nyɛ kɛ je sisije ngɔ ha yi wami hemi ngɛ mumi ɔ klɔuklɔu peemi kɛ anɔkuale ɔ hemi kɛ yemi mi, 14enɛ ɔ he nɛ e gu wa sane kpakpa a nɔ tsɛ nyɛ kɛ ba, konɛ nyɛ na wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo hɛ mi nyami ɔ. 15Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mamimɛ, nyɛɛ da si, nɛ nyɛɛ hɛɛ nihi nɛ wa tsɔɔ nyɛ ngɛ munyu mi loo womi mi ɔmɛ a mi.
16Se lɛ wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo ɔ nitsɛ, kɛ wa Tsɛ Mawu nɛ suɔ wɔ nɛ e kɛ neneene bua womi kɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi kpakpa ha wɔ ngɛ dloomi nya a, 17lɛ nɔuu e maa wo nyɛ bua, nɛ e maa wo nyɛ he wami ngɛ munyu kpakpa kɛ ni tsumi kpakpa tsuo mi.

Title: 2 TESALONIKABI 3
Content:
Nyɛ kpa pɛɛ ha wɔ
1Nyagbe ɔ, mamimɛ, nyɛ kpa pɛɛ ha wɔ, konɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ munyu ɔ nɛ gbɛ fia kɛ fo kɛ ya nɔ, nɛ a wo e hɛ mi nyami, kaa bɔ nɛ e ngɛ ngɛ nyɛ ngɔ hulɔ ɔ; 2nyɛ kpa pɛɛ nɛ a je wɔ kɛ je yi mi wali kɛ nimli yayamihi a dɛ mi, ejakaa pi nimli tsuo nɛ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi.
3Se anɔkualetsɛ ji Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ, nɔ nɛ maa wo nyɛ he wami, nɛ e maa bu nyɛ he kɛ maa je dikalɔ ɔ dɛ mi ɔ. 4Se wa hɛ ngɛ nyɛ nɔ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi kaa, nihi nɛ wa wo nyɛ he kita a, nyɛ ngɛ pee nɛ nyɛ maa pee hulɔ.
5Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɛ plɛ nyɛ tsui kɛ ya Mawu suɔmi kɛ Kristo tsui si tomi ɔ he.
Bɔ nɛ e hia kaa a tsu ni
6Se, mamimɛ, wa ngɛ nyɛ fae ngɛ wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo biɛ mi kaa nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛmi tsuaa nyɛmi nɛ tsu we ni nɛ nyɛɛ we ngɛ nihi nɛ wa tu ngɔ wo nyɛ dɛ mi ɔ nya a ko bɔ. 7Ejakaa nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ le kaa e sa kaa nyɛ kaseɔ wɔ; ejakaa wa pee we hejɔ benɛ waa kɛ nyɛ ngɛ ɔ, 8nɛ jehanɛ hu wa yi nɔ ko ku yaka, se mohu waa kɛ mɔde bɔmi kɛ pɔtɔ tsuɔ ni nyɔ kɛ pia, benɛ pee nɛ wa ko pee tlomi ngɔ ha nyɛ ti nɔ ko. 9Tsa pi kaa wa be jamɛ a he blɔ, se mohu, konɛ waa ngɔ wa he ngɔ pee nɔ hyemi nɔ ha nyɛ. 10Ejakaa benɛ waa kɛ nyɛ ngɛ hu ɔ, wa wo nyɛ kita ke, ke nɔ ko sume kaa e tsuɔ ni ɔ, lɛɛ e ko ye ni hu mɔ.
11Ejakaa wa nuɔ kaa ni komɛ ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti nɛ peɔ hejɔ nɛ a tsu we ni se mohu a ngɔɔ a nya ngɔ woɔ nihi a sanehi a mi. 12Kikɛmɛ a nimli nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, wa ngɛ mɛ fae nɛ wa ngɛ mɛ ga woe ngɛ wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo mi kaa a tsu ni kpoo nɛ a ye mɛ nitsɛmɛ a dɛ mi ngma.
13Mamimɛ, nyɛ ko ha pɔ nɛ tɔ nyɛ kɛ kpakpa peemi. 14Se ke nɔ ko bui wa munyu nɛ ngɛ womi nɛ ɔ mi ɔ tue ɔ, nyɛ kadi lɛ, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ lɛ ko bɔ, konɛ zo nɛ gbe lɛ. 15Nyɛ ko bu lɛ kaa henyɛlɔ, se mohu nyɛɛ tu munyu ngɔ tsɔɔ lɛ kaa nyɛmi.
Nyagbe sɛyemi
16Lɛ he jɔmi Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nitsɛ nɛ ha nyɛ he jɔmi daa ngɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ mi. Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kɛ nyɛ kulaa nɛ hi si!
17Imi Paulo nitsɛ ye nine nya biɔmi nɛ ji okadi ngɛ ye womi tsuaa womi mi ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: Bɔ nɛ i ngmaa ji nɛ ɔ nɛ.
18Wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dloomi ɔ kɛ nyɛ kulaa nɛ hi si! Amen.

Title: 1 TIMOTEO 1
Content:
1Paulo nɛ ji Yesu Kristo bɔfo ngɛ Mawu, wa yi wami helɔ ɔ, kɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo, wa hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ɔ, kita nya a, 2ngma ya ha Timoteo nɛ ji e bi nitsɛ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi mi ɔ:
Dloomi, mɔbɔ nami, kɛ he jɔmi nɛ je wa Tsɛ Mawu kɛ Yesu Kristo, wa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ, dɛ mi ɔ ha mo!
Tsɔɔmi yaya he kɔkɔbɔmi
3Kaa bɔ nɛ benɛ i yaa Makedonia nɛ i kpa mo pɛɛ ke o hi si ngɛ Efeso konɛ o bɔ ni komɛ kɔkɔ ke a ko tsɔɔ tsɔɔmi kpahi, 4nɛ jehanɛ hu a ko di nyaziahi kɛ weku sisi tsɔɔmi tslalaa se, ejakaa enɛ ɔmɛ kɛ nɔ jemi baa mohu pe Mawu blɔ nya tomi nɛ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi mi ɔ, jamɛ a pɛɛ ɔ i ngɛ mo kpae ekohu. 5Kita a nya gbemi ji suɔmi nɛ je tsui nɛ mi tsɔ kɛ he nile kpakpa kɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ lakpa ko be mi ɔ mi, 6nihi nɛ ni komɛ je se, nɛ a kpale kɛ ho yaka munyu he ya. 7A ngɛ hlae nɛ a pee a he mlaa tsɔɔli, pohu a nɛ nihi nɛ a ngɛ dee ɔ loo nihi nɛ a ngɛ nɔ mi mae tutuutu ɔmɛ a sisi.
8Wa le kaa mlaa a hi ha nɔ nɛ tsuɔ he ni bɔ nɛ sa mlaa, 9nɛ e le enɛ ɔ, kaa dalɔ ɔ a wui lɛ mlaa, se mohu mlaa nɔ tɔli kɛ tue gboli, mlaa a woɔ: nihi nɛ ja we Mawu kɛ yayami peeli, nihi nɛ hɛ mi be nyami kɛ he bleli, tsɛ gbeli kɛ nyɛ gbeli, awi yeli, 10ajuama bɔli, nyumuhi nɛ kɛ nyumuhi hwɔɔ si, nɔmlɔ juli, nya ngɔli, kita mi kuli kɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ kɛ tsɔɔmi kpakpa yi ɔ, 11ngɛ Mawu nɛ a gbaa lɛ ɔ nyami sane kpakpa nɛ a tu ngɔ wo ye dɛ mi ɔ nya.
Mawu mɔbɔnami he sina
12I naa wa Nyɔmtsɛ Kristo Yesu nɛ wo mi he wami ɔ si, kaa e bu mi anɔkualetsɛ nɛ e ngɔ mi ngɔ wo sɔmɔmi ɔ mi, 13imi nɛ kekle ɔ i ji musu bɔlɔ kɛ yi mi walɔ kɛ nɔ builɔ; se kɛ ɔ, a na mi mɔbɔ, ejakaa i li nɛ i pee, ngɛ hemi nɛ i he we yi ɔ he. 14Se wa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ plɛ e dloomi nɛ hiɛ babauu kɛ be nɔ ɔ pue ye nɔ, nɛ e ha i hyi kɛ hemi kɛ yemi kɛ suɔmi nɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ. 15E ji anɔkuale munyu nɛ sa kaa a pɛtɛ he kulaa, kaa Kristo Yesu ba je nɛ ɔ mi, nɛ e ba he yayami peeli a yi wami, nihi a kpɛti nɛ imi ji titima a; 16se kɛ ɔ, enɛ ɔ he nɛ a na mi mɔbɔ ɔ nɛ, konɛ imi kekle ye mi nɛ Kristo nɛ je e tsui si tomi ɔ kulaa kpo ngɛ, nɛ a kɛ to okadi ha nihi nɛ ma he e nɔ ngɔ ye, nɛ a na neneene wami. 17Neneene Matsɛ ɔ, nɔ nɛ gbo we, nɔ nɛ ji Mawu kake ɔ, a ngɔ bu kɛ hɛ mi nyami ngɔ ha lɛ kɛ ya neneene kɛ neneene! Amen.
18Ye bi Timoteo, i ngɛ mo kita nɛ ɔ woe, ngɛ gbamihi nɛ a gba sa ngɛ o he ɔmɛ a nya, konɛ o kɛ hwu ta kpakpa a, 19nɛ o hɛɛ hemi kɛ yemi kɛ he ni lemi kpakpa, nɔ́ nɛ ni komɛ sake fɔ he nɛ a kɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ ya sa si ɔ; 20a ti ni komɛ ji Himeneo kɛ Aleksandro, nihi nɛ i tu ngɔ wo Satan dɛ mi, konɛ a gbla a tue nɛ a ko tu musu bɔmi munyuhi hu ɔ.

Title: 1 TIMOTEO 2
Content:
Asafo mi jami
1Kekleekle ɔ, nɔ nɛ i ngɛ he ga woe ji kaa a hɛɛ spɛɛ kpamihi, sɔlemihi, mi damihi, sinamihi a mi ha nimli kulaa, 2ngɔ ha matsɛmɛ kɛ nihi kulaa nɛ hɛɛ blɔ nya, konɛ waa hi si kpoo ngɛ he jɔmi mi, ngɛ Mawu jami kɛ je mi bami kpakpa nɛ sa mi. 3Ejakaa enɛ ɔ hi nɛ e ngɔɔ Mawu nɛ ji wa yi wami helɔ ɔ nya, 4nɔ nɛ suɔ kaa e he nimli tsuo a yi wami, konɛ a le anɔkuale ɔ. 5Ejakaa Mawu kake lɛ ngɛ, kɛ Mawu kɛ nimli a mi dalɔ kake hu nɛ ji nɔmlɔ Kristo Yesu ɔ, 6nɔ nɛ ngɔ e he ngɔ ha kaa kpɔmi nɔ ha nimli tsuo, nɛ ji odase nɛ a yeɔ ngɛ be nɛ sa mi ɔ; 7enɛ ɔ he nɛ a wo mi fiɛlɔ kɛ bɔfo (anɔkuale i ngɛ tue ngɛ Kristo mi, i yi lakpa!), maje li a tsɔɔlɔ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi kɛ anɔkuale mi ɔ nɛ.
8Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i ngɛ hlae kaa nyumuhi nɛ a sɔle ngɛ he tsuaa he, nɛ a wo a ninehi nɛ he tsɔ nɔ nɛ mi mi fumi loo nya sami ko hi mi. 9Ja nɔuu yihi hu, a kɛ tade nɛ sa kɛ humipeemi kɛ juɛmi nɛ mi tsɔ nɛ dla a he, pi kɛ yi hɔɔmi slɔɔto ko loo sika loo adiagba loo tade nɛ he jua wa 10se mohu kɛ ni tsumi kpakpahi nɛ sa yihi nɛ tsɔɔ a he kaa Mawu jali ji mɛ ɔ. 11Yo nɛ pee kpoo nɛ e kase ni ngɛ tue bumi tsuo mi. 12I ngmɛ́ yo blɔ kaa e tsɔɔ ni aloo e ye nyumu nɔ, se mohu e pee kpoo. 13Ejakaa Adam kekle a bɔ, lɔ ɔ se ɔ Hawa. 14Nɛ pi Adam nɛ a sisi ɔ, se yo ɔ a sisi, nɛ e sɛ tɔmi mi. 15Se a ma he e yi wami kɛ maa gu bimɛ a fɔmi mi, ke a hi si ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi kɛ suɔmi kɛ he tsɔmi kɛ juɛmi hu nɛ sa mi ɔ.

Title: 1 TIMOTEO 3
Content:
Asafo nɔ hyɛli
1Anɔkuale munyu ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: “Ke nɔ ko ngɛ nɔ hyɛmi ni tsumi hlae ɔ, e ngɛ ni tsumi kpakpa hlae.” 2Se e sa kaa nɔ hyɛlɔ ɔ nɛ hi si bɔ nɛ a be e he sane ko nae, nɔ nɛ ngɛ yo kake, hɛ si kalɔ, nɔ nɛ juɛmi mi tsɔ, nɔ nɛ baa e je mi saminya, nibwɔ peelɔ, nɔ nɛ le ni tsɔɔmi; 3pi da delɔ, pi nine kpokpookpo tsɛ, se mohu nɔ nɛ he jɔ, nɔ nɛ pɛ́, nɔ nɛ hɛ kɔɛ sika nɔ; 4nɔ nɛ yeɔ lɛ nitsɛ e we nɔ saminya, nɛ e bimɛ buɔ lɛ tue nɛ a buu lɛ. 5Se ke nɔ ko li lɛ nitsɛ e we nɔ hyɛmi ɔ, kɛ e maa pee kɛ hyɛ Mawu asafo ɔ nɔ kɛɛ? 6Jehanɛ pi nɔ nɛ sɛ Mawu jami mi kɛ we, konɛ e ko wo e he nɔ nɛ e nɔ abosiami kojomi mi. 7E sa kaa ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ se ɔ hu a ye e he odase kpakpa, konɛ e ko na biɛ yaya nɛ e sɛ abosiami klama mi.
Asafo mi sɔmɔli a hepiɛli
8Asafo mi sɔmɔli ɔmɛ hu, e sa kaa a pee nimli nɛ a hɛ mi jiɔ, pi nya enyɔenyɔtsɛmɛ, pi da deli, pi hɛ tsuli, 9se nihi nɛ hɛɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ laami sane ɔ ngɛ he nile nɛ he tsɔ mi. 10Se ni nɛ ɔmɛ hu a ka mɛ nɛ a hyɛ lolo; lɔ ɔ se ke sane ko be a he ɔ, a sɔmɔ. 11Yi ɔmɛ hu ja nɔuu; a pee nihi nɛ a hɛ mi jiɔ, pi sieku yeli, se a hɛ nɛ ka si, a ye anɔkuale ngɛ́ nihi kulaa mi. 12Asafo mi sɔmɔli ɔmɛ nɛ pee yo kakaakatsɛmɛ, nihi nɛ yeɔ a bimɛ kɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a nihi a nɔ saminya. 13Ejakaa ninɛmɛ nɛ sɔmɔɔ saminya a, a naa bu, kɛ kã babauu ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ mi.
Laami sane ngua a
14I ngɛ mo enɛ ɔmɛ ngmae, nɛ ye hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa e be kɛe nɛ ma ba o ngɔ. 15Se ke ye se ya kɛ ɔ nɛ o le bɔ nɛ sa nɛ nihi nɛ a ba je mi ha ngɛ Mawu we, nɛ ji Mawu hɛ kalɔ ɔ asafo ɔ anɔkuale ɔ titima kɛ e sepimi nɔ́ ɔ mi. 16Nɔ jemi be he kaa Mawu jami laami sane ɔ, e mi kuɔ.
Mawu je e he si paa ngɛ he lo mi,
E ye nguɔ ngɛ mumi mi,
E je e he kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ bɔfohi,
A fiɛ lɛ ngɛ majeli a kpɛti,
A he e nɔ ye ngɛ je mi,
A ngɔ lɛ kɛ ho hiɔwe ya ngɛ nyami mi.

Title: 1 TIMOTEO 4
Content:
Lakpa tsɔɔli
1Mumi ɔ deɔ paa ke, nyagbe ligbi ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, ni komɛ ma kua hemi kɛ yemi ɔ, nɛ a ma ya nyɛɛ sisimi mumihi kɛ mumi yayamihi a tsɔɔmihi a se, 2ngɛ nya ngɔli a sato peemi mi, nihi nɛ a he nile gbo kaa nɔ nɛ a sã kɛ dade kɛ la, 3nɛ a tsiɔ yo ngɔmi blɔ, nɛ a deɔ ke a nyɛ ngma nɛ Mawu bɔ kaa nihi nɛ heɔ yeɔ nɛ le anɔkuale ɔ kɛ sina nɛ ye ɔ. 4Ejakaa nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ Mawu bɔ ɔ e hi, nɛ a nyɛ́ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko nɛ a kɛ sina yeɔ ɔ, 5ejakaa a kɛ Mawu munyu kɛ sɔlemi tsukɔɔ he.
Kristo Yesu sɔmɔlɔ kpakpa
6Ke o tsɔɔ nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ enɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, o maa pee o he Yesu Kristo sɔmɔlɔ kpakpa, nɔ nɛ lɛɛ e he kɛ hemi kɛ yemi kɛ tsɔɔmi kpakpa nɛ o nyɛɛ se ɔ. 7Se yimowi a yakayaka nyazia amɛ ɔ guu. Bɔɔ Mawu jami mohu he mɔde. 8Ejakaa nɔmlɔ tso he mɔde bɔmi he se nami pi, se Mawu jami he ngɛ se nami ngɛ nihi tsuo kulaa mi, nɛ e ngɛ wami nɛ ngɛ amlɔ nɛ ɔ kɛ nɔ nɛ maa ba a he si womi. 9Enɛ ɔ ji anɔkuale munyu nɛ sa kaa a pɛtɛ he saminya. 10Enɛ ɔ he je nɛ wa gboɔ dengme nɛ wa haa a jɛɛ wɔ ɔ nɛ, ejakaa wa ngɔ wa hɛ ngɔ fɔ Mawu hɛ kalɔ ɔ nɔ, nɔ nɛ ji nimli kulaa a yi wami helɔ, titli ɔ, ninɛmɛ nɛ heɔ yeɔ ɔ.
11Wo ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he kita nɛ o tsɔɔ. 12Ko ha nɔ ko nɛ gbe o he guɛ ngɛ niheyo nɛ o ji ɔ he, se mohu o kɛ o he nɛ pee nɔ hyemi nɔ ngɔ ha ninɛmɛ nɛ heɔ yeɔ ɔ, ngɛ munyu tutui mi, ngɛ jemi bami mi, ngɛ suɔmi mi, ngɛ mumi, mi ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi mi, ngɛ he tsɔmi mi. 13Hii womi kanee kɛ ga womi kɛ ni tsɔɔmi kɛ ya su be nɛ ma ba. 14Koo ngmɛɛ o dloomi ke nɔ nɛ a ngɔ ha mo kɛ gu gbami kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ a ninehi nɛ a kɛ pue o nɔ ɔ he. 15Mo gbo ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he dengme, o kɛ ohe nɛ wo mi kulaa, konɛ nihi tsuo nɛ na o nɔ yami paa. 16O hɛ nɛ hi o he nɔ kɛ o tsɔɔmi ɔ, hii si ngɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ a mi; ejakaa ke o pee enɛ ɔ ɔ, o ma he mo nitsɛ kɛ nihi nɛ buɔ mo tue ɔ kulaa yi wami.

Title: 1 TIMOTEO 5
Content:
Asafo nɔhyɛmi
1Koo tu nɔkɔtɔma ko hɛ mi munyu wawɛɛ, se mohu o tu munyu ngɔ tsɔɔ lɛ kaa o tsɛ; nihewi hu kaa nyɛmimɛ; 2yi nikɔtɔma amɛ kaa nyɛmɛ; yihewi ɔmɛ hu kaa nyɛmimɛ yihi ngɛ he tsɔmi tsuo mi.
3Yalɔyi nitsɛnitsɛmɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, buu mɛ. 4Ke yalɔyo ko ngɛ bimɛ loo bibimɛ ɔ, a kase Mawu gbeye yemi ngɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a we mi kekle, nɛ a to a fɔli ɔmɛ nane mi pɛpɛɛpɛ, ejakaa enɛ ɔ ngɛ fɛu nɛ e sa Mawu hɛ mi. 5Nɔ nɛ ji yalɔyo niinɛ nɛ e piɛ e nɔ kake too ɔ, ngɔɔ e hɛ ngɔ fɔɔ Mawu nɔ, nɛ e hɛɛ pɛɛ kpami kɛ sɔlemi mi nyɔ kɛ pia. 6Se yo nɛ fiɛɛ nyumu fiɛmi ɔ, e hɛ ngɛ mohu se e gbo. 7Wo mɛ mlaa ngɛ enɛ ɔmɛ a he konɛ a ko na a he munyu ko nɛ a tu. 8Ke nɔ ko hyɛ we lɛ nitsɛ e nihi, titli ɔ, lɛ nitsɛ e we mi bimɛ ɔ, e kpa ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ se, nɛ afani nɔ nɛ he we yi ɔ ngɛ e he.
9Koo ngɔ yalɔyo nɛ na we nɛ e ye jeha nyingmi ekpa ngɔ wo sɔmɔmi ɔ mi, ja nɔ nɛ gba nyumu kake, 10nɔ nɛ a tuɔ e he munyu kpakpa kaa e tsu ni kpakpahi, lɔ ɔ ji: ke e lɛ bimɛ, ke e pee nihi nibwɔ, ke e fɔ ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a nane he, ke e ye bua nihi nɛ naa amanehlu ɔ, ke e di ni tsumi kpakpa tsuaa nitsumi kpakpa se ɔ.
11Se yalɔyi nɛ wɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, koo ngɔ mɛ, ejakaa ke nyumu sumi sɛ a hɛ mi ɔ, a jee Kristo se ya hlaa gba; 12nɛ a naa kojomi ejakaa a ngmɛɛ a kekle hemi kɛ yemi ɔ he. 13Nɛ enɛ ɔ se ɔ a kaseɔ hejɔ peemi kɛ si pomi ngɛ wehi a mi, nɛ pi hejɔ kɛkɛ nɛ a peɔ, se a peɔ a he sieku yeli, kɛ si jeli nɛ tuɔ munyu nɛ sɛ. 14Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i suɔ kaa yalɔyihi nɛ wɛ́ lolo ɔ a gba, nɛ a fɔ bimɛ, nɛ a ye a we nɔ, nɛ a ko ha he nyɛlɔ ɔ nɛ na sane ko nɛ e kɛ jɛ wɔ; 15ejakaa ni komɛ kpale ya nyɛɛ Satan se momo. 16Se ke nyumu lo yo nɛ heɔ yeɔ ngɛ yalɔyihi ɔ, e hyɛ mɛ nɛ e ko pee tlomi kɛ ha asafo ɔ, konɛ asafo ɔ nɛ hyɛ yalɔyihi nitsɛnitsɛmɛ ɔmɛ.
17Nikɔtɔmahi nɛ tsuɔ a ni saminya a, e sa kaa a ngɔ bu totoe enyɔ ngɔ ha mɛ, titli ɔ, ninɛmɛ nɛ bɔɔ munyu tumi kɛ tsɔɔmi he mɔde ɔ. 18Ejakaa ngmami ɔ deɔ ke:
“Koo wo na nɛ gblɛɔ blɛfo ɔ nya kotoku;”
kɛ: “Nitsulɔ ɔ, e hiɔwo sa lɛ.”
19Ke a po nɔkɔtɔma ko nya a, ko he kplɛɛ kaa ja ngɛ odasefohi enyɔ loo etɛ nya lolo. 20Ninɛmɛ nɛ peɔ yayami ɔ, ka mɛ ngɛ nihi kulaa a hɛ mi, konɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ piɛ ɔ hu nɛ ye gbeye.
21I ngɛ mo mlaa woe ngɛ Mawu kɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo kɛ e bɔfohi nɛ e hia amɛ a hɛ mi, kaa o ye ni nɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ nɛ o ko hyɛ nihi a hɛ mi kɛ kojo, nɛ jehanɛ hu, o ko hia nɔ mi. 22Koo ngɔ po nine ngɔ pue nɔ ko nɔ oya, nɛ jehanɛ hu, koo ngɔ o he ngɔ futu ni kpahi a he yayamihi a mi. To o he nyaii.
23Koo nu nyu sɔuu, se nuu wai bɔɔ ngɛ o muklii kɛ o hiɔhi nɛ nuu mo kpitikpiti ɔmɛ a he.
24Ni komɛ a he yayamihi jee kpo paa mla, nɛ a sɛɛ a hlami kɛ yaa kojomi mi, se ni komɛ a nɔ hu kpɛɛ se. 25Ja nɔuu ni tsumi kpakpahi hu jee kpo paa, nɛ nihi nɛ ji kpo paa a hu a be nyɛe nɛ a kɛ maa laa.

Title: 1 TIMOTEO 6
Content:
Lakpa tsɔɔmi
1Sɔmɔli tsuo nɛ ngɛ nyɔguɛ yemi mi ɔ, a bu mɛ nitsɛmɛ a nyɔmtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ kaa nihi nɛ bu tsuo sa mɛ, konɛ a ko tu Mawu biɛ ɔ kɛ tsɔɔmi ɔ he musu bɔmi munyu. 2Se nyɔguɛhi nɛ ngɛ nyɔmtsɛmɛ nɛ he ye ɔ, a ko gbe a he guɛ, se mohu a sɔmɔ mɛ saminya akɛnɛ nyɛmimɛ ji mɛ he je ɔ, ejakaa ninɛmɛ nɛ naa ni tsumi ɔ mi nihi ɔ, nihi nɛ he ye kɛ suɔli ʼi. Tsɔɔ mɛ enɛ ɔmɛ nɛ o wo mɛ ga ngɛ he.
Lakpa tsɔɔmi kɛ ninami nitsɛ
3Ke nɔ ko tsɔɔ tsɔɔmi kpa ko, nɛ e ngɔɛ wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo munyuhi nɛ tsaa nɔ ɔ kɛ Mawu jami nya tsɔɔmi ɔ, 4lɔ ɔ lɛɛ e wo e he nɔ, nɛ e li nɔ ko, se mohu e ngɛ gboe kɛ nɔ jemi kɛ nya sami nɛ hɛkɔ, pɛ, musu bɔmi munyuhi, nihi a he susumi yaya jee mi ɔ, 5nɛ ji yakayaka ngmlaa kpami nɛ nimli nɛ a juɛmi puɛ nɛ a kpɔ anɔkuale ɔ ngɛ a dɛ nɛ a susuɔ kaa Mawu jami ji ni nami ɔ.
6Se niinɛ, ni nami agbo ji Mawu jami, ke nɔ ko bua jɔ e nihi a he ɔ. 7Ejakaa waa kɛ nɔ ko nɔ́ ko bɛ je nɛ ɔ mi, lɔ ɔ he ɔ e fɔɔ si paa kaa wa be nyɛe waa kɛ nɔ ko maa ya hulɔ. 8Se ke wa ngɛ ngma kɛ he hami nihi kɛkɛ ɔ, e sa kaa wa bua nɛ jɔ he. 9Nihi nɛ hlaa nɛ a na ni fuu ɔ, nɔɔ ka kɛ klama kɛ kuasiahi akɔnɔhi fuu nɛ puɛɔ nɔ nɛ tsɛɛ nihi ngɔ woɔ hɛ mi kpatami kɛ laami mi ɔ mi. 10Ejakaa ni yayahi kulaa sipoku ji sika suɔmi nɛ ni komɛ di se nɛ a tla blɔ kɛ je hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mi, nɛ a kɛ piimi babauu gbɔ a tsui mi ɔ.
Nitsɔɔmi kɛ ha Timoteo nitsɛ
11Se moo lɛɛ, oo Mawu nɔmlɔ, tuu ni nɛ ɔmɛ a nya fo, nɛ o nyɛɛ dami, Mawu jami, hemi kɛ yemi, suɔmi, tsui sitomi kɛ mi mi jɔmi se. 12Hwu hemi kɛ yemi ta kpakpa a, pɛtɛ neneene wami ɔ he, nɔ́ he hulɔ nɛ a tsɛ mo kɛ ba benɛ o jaje jajemi kpakpa ngɛ odasefohi fuu a hɛ mi, ɔ. 13I ngɛ mo kita woe ngɛ Mawu nɛ haa nihi tsuo kulaa wami ɔ kɛ Kristo Yesu nɛ ye jajemi kpakpa a he odase ngɛ Pontio Pilato yi nɔ ɔ hɛ mi, 14kaa o ye kita a nɔ, nɛ kpa ko loo piami ko ko hi he kɛ yaa su wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo bami ɔ mi. 15Nɔ nɛ hewami nɔyelɔ kake nɛ da gbaa, matsɛmɛ a matsɛ, kɛ nyɔmtsɛmɛ a nyɔmtsɛ ɔ maa je kpo ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e be mi ɔ; 16nɔ nɛ lɛ e nɔ kake lɛ ngɛ neneene si himi nɛ gbenɔ be mi, nɛ e hii la nɛ a be nyɛemaa su he ɔ mi ɔ, nɔ nɛ nɔmlɔ ko nɔmlɔ ko nɛ́ lɛ hyɛ, nɛ e be lɛ nyɛe maa na hulɔ ɔ, nɔ nɛ nɔ́ nɛ ji neneene bu kɛ he wami ɔ. Amen.
17Niatsɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ je nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, wo mɛ kita konɛ a ko susu ni nguahi, nɛ a ko ngɔ a hɛ ngɔ fɔ ni nami nɛ be sɔkee ɔ nɔ, se mohu Mawu hɛ kalɔ ɔ nɔ, nɔ nɛ ngɔɔ nihi kulaa ngɔ haa wɔ babauu ke waa ye mi ngɔmi ɔ. 18A pee kpakpa, nɛ a plɛ niatsɛmɛ ngɛ kpakpa peemi blɔfami, a suɔ nɔ hami, a ko pee kpɛle, 19a to juetli ngɔ ha a he, nɛ e pee sisi tomi kpakpa ha be nɛ maa ba a, konɛ a pɛtɛ anɔkuale wami ɔ he.
20Oo Timoteo! nihi nɛ a tu ngɔ wo o dɛ mi ɔ baa yi, nɛ o kua yakayaka ni sɛɛmi nɛ bleɔ nɔ kɛ nɔ jemi munyu nɛ je lakpa ni lemi mi ɔ, 21nɔ́ nɛ ni komɛ tsɔɔ kaa a ngɛ nɛ a tla blɔ kɛ je hemi kɛ yemi ɔ he ɔ.
Dloomi ɔ kɛ mo nɛ hi si! Amen.

Title: 2 TIMOTEO 1
Content:
1Paulo nɛ ji Yesu Kristo bɔfo ngɛ Mawu suɔmi nya kɛ wami nɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ he si womi nya a, 2ngma ya ha e suɔmi bi Timoteo ɔ: Dloomi, mɔbɔ nami kɛ he jɔmi nɛ je tsɛ Mawu ɔ kɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Kristo Yesu dɛ mi ɔ ha mo!
Sinami kɛ he wami womi
3I naa Mawu nɛ i kɛ ye nimeli jaa ngɛ he nile klɔuu mi ɔ si, kaa i jɔɔ we mo kaimi gblee ngɛ ye pɛɛ kpamihi a mi nyɔ kɛ pia, 4nɛ ke i kai o hɛ mi vo nyu ɔ, i hlaa kaa ma na mo, konɛ ye bua nɛ jɔ. 5Ye hɛ ngɛ o hemi kɛ yemi nɛ lakpa be mi ɔ nɔ, nɔ́ nɛ kekle nɛ e ngɛ o na Loise kɛ o nyɛ Eunike mi, nɛ i ngɛ he wami ngɛ nɔ kaa e ngɛ mo hu o mi ɔ. 6Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, i ngɛ mo kaie kaa, Mawu dloomi ke nɔ́ nɛ ngɛ o mi ngɛ ye nine nɛ i kɛ pue o nɔ ɔ nya a, tle lɛ si nɛ e tso, 7ejakaa Mawu hi wɔ gbeye yemi mumi, se mohu he wami kɛ suɔmi kɛ juɛmi nɛ sa mumi ekɛ ha wɔ.
8Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, zo ko pee mo ngɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ he odase yemi ɔ he aloo ngɛ imi nɛ i ji e pa mi no ɔ he, se mohu o kɛ mi gbo dengme ngɛ sane kpakpa a he ngɛ Mawu he wami nya. 9Nɔ nɛ he wa yi wami nɛ e kɛ tsɛmi klɔuklɔu tsɛ wɔ, pi ngɛ wa ni tsumihi a nya, se mohu ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e yi mi tomi kɛ e dloomi nya, nɔ́ nɛ e ngɔ ha wɔ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi loko a bɔ je ɔ, 10nɛ jehanɛ a gu wa yi wami helɔ Yesu Kristo he kpo jemi ɔ nɔ je lɛ si paa a; nɔ nɛ po gbenɔ se nɛ e je wami kɛ neneene si himi kpo tsɔɔ wɔ ngɛ sane kpakpa a mi, 11nɔ́ he nɛ a wo mi fiɛlɔ kɛ bɔfo kɛ maje li ɔmɛ a tsɔɔlɔ ɔ, 12kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu he nɛ i ngɛ nɛ ɔ nae nɔ nɛ. Se kɛ ɔ, e pee we mi zo, ejakaa i le nɔ nɛ i he ye ɔ, nɛ i ngɛ he wami ngɛ nɔ kaa e ma nyɛ nihi nɛ e to ha mi ɔmɛ a he maa bu kɛ ya si jamɛ a Ligbi ɔ nɔ. 13Pɛtɛ tsami munyu nɛ o nu kɛ je ye nya a nɔ hyɛmi nɔ́ ɔ he ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi kɛ suɔmi nɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ mi. 14Ni kpakpahi nɛ a tu wo o dɛ ɔ buu he ngɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu nɛ hii wa mi ɔ he wami nya!
15O le enɛ kaa nihi nɛ ngɛ Asia a tsuo kpa ngɛ ye se, a ti ni komɛ ji Fegelo kɛ Hermogene. 16Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɛ na Onesiforo we ɔ mɔbɔ, ejakaa e baa kpitikpiti, ba haa mi tsui, nɛ zo pee we lɛ ngɛ ye tsu mi womi ɔ he; 17se benɛ e ba Roma a e bɔ mɔde ba hla mi nɛ e na mi. 18Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɛ ha e na Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ dɛ mi mɔbɔnami ngɛ jamɛ a Ligbi ɔ nɔ. Nɛ bɔ nɛ e plɛ kɛ sɔmɔ mi ngɛ Efeso ɔ, o le pɛpɛɛpɛ.

Title: 2 TIMOTEO 2
Content:
Kristo Yesu ta bulɔ anɔkualetsɛ
1Jehanɛ moo lɛɛ, ye bi, o he nɛ wa ngɛ dloomi nɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ mi. 2Nihi nɛ o nu ngɛ ye nya ngɛ odasefohi fuu a nya a, kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu o tu ngɔ wo nimli anɔkualetsɛmɛ a dɛ, nihi nɛ ngɛ he wami nɛ a ma kɛ tsɔɔ ni kpahi hulɔ.
3Mia o hɛ mi ngɛ nɔ nami mi, kaa Yesu Kristo ta bulɔ kpakpa ko. 4Nɔ ko nyɛɛ we ta blɔ nɛ e kɛ e he wo we mi munyuhi a mi, ejakaa e suɔ kaa e sa e tatsɛ ɔ hɛ mi. 5Nɛ ke nɔ ko ngɛ nɔ́ ko ngɛ nɔ ko he plee hu ɔ, a be lɛ manye jlasi fie, kaa ja e plee he ngɛ mlaa nya. 6Ngmɔ hulɔ nɛ tsuɔ ni ɔ, lɛ kekle sa kaa e ye ngmɔ ni ɔ eko. Susuu nɔ nɛ i ngɛ mo dee nɛ ɔ he. 7Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ma ha o na nihi kulaa sisi.
8O hɛ nɛ hi Yesu Kristo nɔ nɛ te si kɛ je gbeje nɛ je David nina mi ɔ nɔ, bɔ nɛ i fiɛ ngɛ ye sane kpakpa a mi ɔ, 9nɔ́ nɛ he amane nɛ i ngɛ nae, kɛ yaa su kpa mi tete, kaa yayami peelɔ ko; se kɛ ɔ, Mawu munyu ɔ, a wui lɛ kpa 10Enɛ ɔ he je ɔ i miaa ye hɛ mi ngɛ sanehi kulaa mi ngɛ nihi nɛ ahla mɛ ɔ a he, konɛ mɛ hu a nine nɛ su yi wami hemi nɛ ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ kɛ neneene hɛ mi nyami ɔ nɔ. 11Anɔkuale munyu ji nɛ ɔ nɛ:
“Ke waa kɛ lɛ gbo ɔ, waa kɛ lɛ ma na wami hulɔ.
12Ke wa mia wa hɛ mi ngɛ nɔ nami mi ɔ, waa kɛ lɛ maa ye matsɛ hulɔ;
Ke wa kpa ngɛ e se ɔ, lɛ hu e ma kpa ngɛ wa se.
13Ke wa pee we wa he anɔkualetsɛmɛ ɔ, lɛɛ e maa hi si
anɔkualetsɛ, ejakaa e be nyɛe ma je lɛ nitsɛ e he se.”
Nitsulɔ kpakpa
14Kaii mɛ kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ, nɛ o ma nɔ mi ha mɛ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi, ykonɛ a ko hwu lilɛ ta nɛ se nami ko be he, se e butuu nihi nɛ nuɔ ɔ mohu ɔ. 15Bɔɔ mɔde nɛ o da si ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi kaa znɔ ko nɛ sa, ni tsulɔ nɛ gbo we zo nɛ tsɔɔ anɔkuale munyu ɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ. 16Se yakayaka ni sɛɛmi nɛ bleɔ nɔ ɔ, sã o he kɛ je he; ejakaa e fieɔ nihi kɛ jee Mawu he kɛ yaa lokoo, 17nɛ a munyu ɔ ma sã nɔ kaa hiɔ yaya sãa nɔ ɔ: a ti ni komɛ ji Himeneo kɛ Fileto, 18nihi nɛ tla blɔ kɛ je anɔkuale ɔ he, nɛ a deɔ ke si temi ɔ be momo, nɛ a butuu ni komɛ a hemi kɛ yemi ɔ. 19Se Mawu sisi tomi tɛ na he wa a maa si kpɛii, nɛ e hɛɛ kikɛmɛ a nyasɔomi nɔ nɛ ɔ: “Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ le lɛ nitsɛ e ni ɔmɛ,” kɛ: “Ha nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ woɔ Kristo biɛ ɔ ta a nɛ sã e he kɛ je nihi nɛ dɛ blɔ ɔmɛ a he.”
20We ngua ko mi ɔ pi sika tsu nihi kɛ sika hiɔ nihi kɛkɛ nɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, se mohu tso nihi kɛ zu nihi hu ngɛ mi, ekomɛ ɔ a buo, se ekomɛ hu a bui. 21Jehanɛ ke nɔ ko tsukɔ e he kɛ je kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he ɔ, e ma plɛ nɔ́ ko nɛ a buu nɛ a tsukɔ he klɔuu nɛ hi ha wetsɛ ɔ saminya nɛ a dla lɛ kɛ ha ni tsumi kpakpa tsuaa ni tsumi kpakpa. 22Se nihewi a kɔnɔ ɔmɛ ɔ, tuu nya fo, nɛ o kɛ nihi nɛ tsɛɔ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kɛ jee tsui nɛ mi tsɔ mi ɔ nɛ nyɛɛ dami, hemi kɛ yemi, suɔmi kɛ he jɔmi se. 23Se kuasiahi a nɔ jemi nɛ a kɛ kase we nɔ ko ɔ guu, ejakaa o le kaa e kɛ pɛ baa. 24Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ sɔmɔlɔ ɔ, e sɛ kaa e pɛɛ, se mohu e mi nɛ jɔ ha nihi kulaa, nɔ nɛ le ni tsɔɔmi, nɔ nɛ toɔ e tsui si haa yayami, 25nɔ nɛ kɛ mi mi jɔmi tuɔ munyu tsɔɔ nihi nɛ tee si siɔ lɛ ɔ, kaa alinɔ Mawu ma ha mɛ tsui tsakemi nɛ a le anɔkuale ɔ lo? 26nɛ a hɛ mi nɛ tsɔ mɛ kɛ je abosiami klama a mi, ejakaa e kɛ du mɛ nɛ a pee e suɔmi nya ni.

Title: 2 TIMOTEO 3
Content:
Nyagbe ligbi ɔmɛ
1Se na nɛ o le kaa nyagbe ligbi ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, he hiami be maa ba. 2Ejakaa nimli ma plɛ a he hesuɔli, sikasuɔli, fiali, he woli, musu bɔli, fɔli a nɔ tue gboli, otlumuhi, nihi nɛ a he tsɔ we, 3nihi nɛ plee we nɔ he, somi mi kuli, sieku yeli, nihi nɛ nyɛ we a kɔnɔ nɔ nɛ a ye, nihi nɛ a hɛ jɔɛ, nihi nɛ sume nɔ́ kpakpa, 4nɔ se blɔ tsɔɔli, yi mi wali, he nɔ woli, nihi nɛ suɔ fiɛmi nɛ ngɔɔ pe Mawu, 5nihi nɛ hɛɛ Mawu jami su, se a kua e mi he wami ɔ. Sã o he kɛ je kikɛmɛ a nimli a he? 6Ejakaa ni nɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti ni komɛ ji nihi nɛ juɔ si sɛɛ wehi a mi nɛ a ya ngɔɔ yihi nɛ be yi mi nɛ yayami ye a nɔ nɛ akɔnɔ slɔɔtohi kpakaa mɛ 7nɛ a hlaa ni kasemi, se kɛ ɔ, a nyɛ we nɛ a le anɔkuale ɔ. 8Se kaa bɔ nɛ Yane kɛ Yambre te si si Mose ɔ, ja nɔuu kikɛmɛ a nimli nɛ ɔmɛ kuɔ anɔkuale ɔ nya, nihi nɛ a yi mi puɛ, nihi nɛ pi ni komɛ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ blɔfami. 9A be a hɛ mi yae tsɔ ko, ejakaa a kuasia peemi ɔ maa je kpo paa ngɛ nihi tsuo a hɛ mi, kaa bɔ nɛ Yane kɛ Yambremɛ a nɔ ɔ hu je kpo ɔ.
Nyagbe ni tsɔɔmi
10Se moo lɛɛ, o le ye tsɔɔmi, ye je mi bami, ye yi mi tomi, ye hemi kɛ yemi, ye tsui si tomi, ye suɔmi, ye hɛ mi miami, 11ye nɔ namihi, ye omane hluhi nɛ i na ngɛ Antiokia kɛ Ikonium kɛ Listra a; yi mi wamihi abɔ nɛ i na nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ je mi kɛ je kulaa mi ɔ. 12Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nihi kulaa hu nɛ hlaa kaa a hi si ngɛ Mawu jami nya ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ, a maa wa mɛ yi mi. 13Se nimli yayamihi kɛ sisili maa ya hɛ mi ngɛ yayami peemi mi; a sisiɔ nihi, nɛ mɛ hu a sisiɔ mɛ. 14Se moo lɛɛ hii si ngɛ nihi nɛ o kase nɛ o ngɛ he wami ngɛ nɔ ɔmɛ a mi, ejakaa o le nɔ nɛ nya nɛ o kase kɛ je, 15nɛ o jokuɛwi a si o je nɛ o le ngmami klɔuklɔu ɔ, nɛ ma nyɛ ma ha o le nihi nɛ maa gu Kristo Yesu nɔ hemi kɛ yemi nɔ kɛ ya yi wami hemi mi ɔ. 16Ngmami tsuaa ngmami nɛ je Mawu mumi mi ɔ, e hi ha ni tsɔɔmi kɛ hɛ mi kami kɛ nɔ dlami kɛ tsɔsemi nɛ ngɛ dami mi ɔ, 17konɛ Mawu nɔmlɔ ɔ nɛ hi kɛ pi si, nɛ a dla lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ ha ni tsumi kpakpa tsuaa ni tsumi kpakpa.

Title: 2 TIMOTEO 4
Content:
1I ngɛ mo dee faii ngɛ Mawu kɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo nɛ maa ba ba kojo hɛ kali kɛ ni gbogboehi ngɛ e bami kɛ e matsɛ yemi ɔ mi ɔ hɛ mi ke: 2Fiɛ munyu ɔ, koo jɔɔ, deka ngɛ jio, deka be jio, ka hɛ mi, wo ga, bɔɔ kɔkɔ ngɛ tsui si tomi kɛ ni tsɔɔmi kulaa mi. 3Ejakaa be ko maa ba nɛ a be anɔkuale tsɔɔmi ɔ tue bue hu, ngɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a kɔnɔ ɔmɛ a nya, se mohu a ma bua tsɔɔli a nya ngɔ wo a he, ninɛmɛ nɛ ma de mɛ nihi nɛ a suɔ kaa a nu. 4A ma blɛ anɔkuale ɔ ngɔ pue a tue se, nɛ a maa kpale ya bu nyaziahi mohu tue. 5Se moo lɛɛ, o hɛ nɛ ka si ngɛ nihi kulaa mi, mia o hɛ mi ngɛ dengme gbomihi a mi, tsu sane kpakpa jajelɔ ni tsumi ɔ, nɛ gbee o sɔmɔmi ni tsumi ɔ nya kulaa!
6Ejakaa ami lɛɛ, a ngɛ ye muɔ plee kɛ ngɛ si puee mo kaa bɔ, nɛ ye jemi be ɔ su. 7Ta kpakpa a, i hwu; fo ɔ, i tu gbe nya; hemi kɛ yemi ɔ i hɛɛ mi; 8nɔ nɛ piɛ nɛ fɔɔ si ha mi ji dami jlasi ɔ, nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ nɛ ji dami kojolɔ ɔ ma ha mi ngɛ jamɛ a Ligbi ɔ nɔ ɔ, nɛ pi ye nɔ kake nɛ e ma ha, se mohu nihi kulaa nɛ suɔ e bami ɔ hulɔ ɔ.
Slɔmi ha Timoteo nitsɛ
9Bɔɔ mɔde nɛ o ba ye ngɔ mla. 10Ejakaa nɛ Dema suɔ amlɔ amlɔ je nɛ ɔ mi he je ɔ, e je ye he kɛ ho Tesalonika ya; Kreske ho Galata ya, Tito ho Dalmatia ya; 11Luka pɛ lɛ e kɛ mi ngɛ. Ngɔɔ Marko nɛ o kɛ lɛ nɛ ba, ejakaa e hi ha mi ngɛ sɔmɔmi ɔ he. 12Tihiko ɔ lɛɛ i tsɔ lɛ Efeso. 13Kotoku ɔ nɛ i je he ngɛ Troia ngɛ Karpo ngɔ ɔ, o kɛ ba, kɛ womi ɔmɛ hulɔ, se titli ɔ lohwehi a he womi nɛ a ngmaa ni ngɛ nɔ ɔ. 14Aleksandro, sɔlɔ ɔ, peemi yayami wawɛɛ nitsɛ. Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɛ to lɛ nane mi ngɛ e ni tsumi ɔmɛ a nya. 15Mo hu hyɛ o he nɔ nɛ hi ngɛ e he, ejakaa e te si ngɔ si wa munyu ɔmɛ wawɛɛ. 16Ngɛ ye kekle nya jemi ɔ mi ɔ, a ti nɔ ko nɔ ko ya sɛ mi, se mohu mɛ kulaa a si mi, a ko bu enɛ ɔ ngɔ fɔ a nɔ. 17Se Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ fi ye se nɛ e wo mi he wami, konɛ a gu ye nɔ kɛ ma fiɛmi ɔ nɔ mi, nɛ maje li ɔmɛ kulaa a nu, nɛ a je mi kɛ je jata a nya mi. 18Nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ma je mi kokooko kɛ maa je ni yayahi kulaa mi, nɛ e ma he ye yi wami kɛ maa ya e hiɔwe matsɛ yemi ɔ mi: Lɛ a ngɔ anuminyami ngɔ ha kɛ ya neneene kɛ neneene! Amen.
Nyagbe sɛyemi
19I biɔ Priska kɛ Akwila kɛ Onesiforo we ɔ. 20Erasto ngɛ Korinto; se Trofimo ɔ, i si lɛ ngɛ Mileto nɛ e ngɛ gboe. 21Bɔɔ mɔde nɛ o ba loko fiɛ be ɔ nɛ su. Eubulo kɛ Pude kɛ Lino kɛ Klaudia kɛ nyamimɛ ɔmɛ kulaa ke a biɔ mo.
22Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo kɛ o mumi ɔ nɛ hi si! Mawu dloomi ɔ kɛ nyɛ nɛ hi si! Amen.

Title: TITO 1
Content:
1Paulo, Mawu sɔmɔlɔ, kɛ Yesu Kristo bɔfo. Ahla mi nɛ a tsɔ mi nɛ ma ya ye bua ninɛmɛ nɛ Mawu hla amɛ a hemi kɛ yemi, nɛ ma kɛ mɛ nɛ ba anɔkuale nɛ wa jami ɔ tsɔɔ, 2nɛ maa si ngɛ neneene wami ɔ he hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ɔ mi. Mawu nɛ yi lakpa a wo wɔ kikɛmɛ a wami nɛ ɔ he si loko a bɔ je mi be ɔmɛ, 3nɛ ngɛ be nɛ sa mi ɔ, e je lɛ si ngɛ e munyu ɔ mi. Fiɛmi sane nɛ ɔ a tu ngɔ wo ye dɛ ngɛ Mawu nɛ ji wa yi wami helɔ ɔ fami nya.
4I ngma ya ha Tito nɛ ji ye bi nitsɛ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi kake ɔ nɔuu blɔfami ɔ:
Dloomi, mɔbɔ nami kɛ he jɔmi nɛ je Tsɛ Mawu ɔ kɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo, wa yiwami helɔ ɔ, dɛ mi ɔ ha mo!
Tito nitsumi ngɛ Kreta
5Nɔ́ nɛ he je nɛ i si mo ngɛ Kreta a ji konɛ o to nihi nɛ piɛ ɔ blɔ nɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ, nɛ o wo nikɔtɔmahi ngɛ ma tsuaa ma mi, kaa bɔ nɛ i de mo momo ɔ: 6lɔ ɔ ji, a ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ pee nɔ ko nɛ piami ko be e he, nɛ e ji nɔ nɛ ngɛ yo kake, nɛ e ngɛ bimɛ nɛ heɔ yeɔ nɛ a tui a he munyu yaya kaa yaholi loo tuegboli ji mɛ. 7Ejakaa nɔ hyɛlɔ ɔ, e sɛ kaa piami ko hii e he, akɛnɛ Mawu we mi sɔmɔlɔ nɔkɔtɔma ji lɛ he je ɔ; pi nɔ nɛ peɔ lɛ nitsɛ e tsui nya ni, pi mi mi latsɛ, pi da nulɔ, pi nine kpokpookpotsɛ, pi kpɛletsɛ, 8se mohu nibwɔ peelɔ, nɔ nɛ suɔ nɔ́ nɛ hi, nɔ nɛ juɛmi ka si, dalɔ, nɔ nɛ he tsɔ, nɔ nɛ hɛ mi ka si, 9nɔ nɛ hɛɛ anɔkuale tsɔɔmi ɔ mi, konɛ e nyɛ nɛ e tu munyu ngɔ tsɔɔ nihi ngɛ ni tsɔɔmi nɛ tsaa nɔ ɔ mi, nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ tee si siɔ munyu ɔ hu, e ka a hɛ mi.
10Ejakaa nihi fuu ngɛ nɛ ji atua tsɔli kɛ yakayaka munyu tuli nɛ sisiɔ nɔ, titli ɔ, ninɛmɛ nɛ je nihi nɛ a po mɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ; 11nihi nɛ sa kaa a ku a nya, ejakaa a butuu we mlukuhi kulaa, nɛ zo nihi a se nami he ɔ a tsɔɔ tsɔɔmihi nɛ dɛ. 12A ti nɔ ko nɛ ji mɛ nitsɛmɛ a gbalɔ ɔ de ke: “Kretabi yeɔ lakpa daa; lohwe yayamihi kɛ jiklɔɔtsɛmɛ kɛ hejɔli.” 13Odase nɛ ɔ ɔ anɔkuale ʼi. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, kã a hɛ mi veveeve, konɛ a he nɛ wa ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mi, 14nɛ a ko bu Yudafohi a nyazia amɛ kɛ nimli nɛ kpaleɔ kɛ jee anɔkuale ɔ mi ɔ a kita amɛ tue. 15Nihi nɛ a he tsɔ ɔ, nihi kulaa he tsɔ ha mɛ; se nihi nɛ a he tsɔ we kɛ nihi nɛ he we yi ɔ, nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko be nɛ he tsɔ ha mɛ, se mohu a yi mi kɛ a he nile kulaa mi sɛ mu. 16A deɔ ke a le Mawu, se a kɛ a ni tsumihi kuaa lɛ, nɛ a ji musutsɛmɛ, kɛ tue gboli, nihi nɛ hi ha ni tsumi kpakpa ko kulaa.

Title: TITO 2
Content:
Tsɔɔmi kpakpa
1Se moo lɛɛ tsɔɔ tsɔɔmi kpakpa a. 2Nimowi ɔmɛ ɔ, kãa a hɛ nɛ ka si, a pee nihi nɛ a hɛ mi jiɔ, a juɛmi nɛ ka si, a he nɛ wa ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi kɛ suɔmi kɛ tsui si tomi mi. 3Yimowi hu ja nɔuu kãa a ba a je mi bɔ nɛ sa ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ. A ko tu nihi a he munyu a ko pee dadeli, a pee nihi nɛ tsɔɔ ni kpakpahi, 4konɛ a tsɔɔ yihewi ɔmɛ nɛ a suɔ a hunomɛ, a suɔ a bimɛ, 5a hɛ nɛ ka si, a he nɛ tsɔ, a baa a we yi saminya, a mi mi nɛ jɔ, a ba a he si ha a hunomɛ, konɛ a ko tu Mawu munyu ɔ he musu bɔmi munyu.
6Nihewi hu ja nɔuu, tu munyu tsɔɔ mɛ konɛ a juɛmi nɛ ka si. 7Nɛ nihi kulaa blɔfami ɔ, ngɔɔ mo nitsɛ o he ngɔ to mɛ okadi ngɛ ni tsumi kpakpahi a he, nɛ ni tsɔɔmi mi ɔ, o tsɔɔ tsɔɔmi klɔuu, nihi nɛ haa nɔ hɛ mi jiɔ, 8munyu kpakpa nɛ a be he nɔ yaya ko nae nɛ a ma de, benɛ pee nɛ zo nɛ gbe nɔ nɛ kɛ wɔ yi ɔ, ejakaa e be wa he nɔ́ yaya ko nɛ e ma de.
9Sɔmɔli ɔmɛ ɔ, de mɛ ke a ba a he si ngɔ ha a nyɔmtsɛmɛ ɔmɛ, a sa a hɛ mi ngɛ nihi tsuo mi, a ko je munyu nya, 10a ko ju, se mohu a kɛ anɔkuale yemi nitsɛ nɛ tsɔɔ mɛ, konɛ a kɛ wo Mawu nɛ ji wa yi wami helɔ ɔ tsɔɔmi ɔ hɛ mi nyami ngɛ nihi kulaa mi.
11Ejakaa Mawu dloomi nɛ a kɛ heɔ nimli kulaa a yi wami ɔ je kpo, 12nɛ e tsɔseɔ wɔ konɛ wa kua nɔ yaya peemi kɛ je nɛ ɔ mi akɔnɔ ɔmɛ, nɛ waa kɛ juɛmi kpakpa kɛ dami kɛ Mawu gbeye yemi nɛ hi si ngɛ je nɛ ɔ mi, 13nɛ waa hyɛ Mawu Ope ɔ kɛ wa yiwami helɔ Yesu Kristo gbaami nɛ wa hɛ ngɛ nɔ ɔ kɛ e hɛ mi nyami ɔ he kpo jemi ɔ blɔ; 14nɔ nɛ ngɔ nitsɛ e he ngɔ ha ngɛ wa nane mi, konɛ e kpɔ wɔ kɛ je nɔ tɔmi kulaa mi, nɛ e tsukɔ wa he ngɔ pee lɛ nitsɛ e ma klɔuu nɛ hɛ dɔɔ ngɛ ni tsumi kpakpahi a he.
15De mɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ, nɛ o wo mɛ ga ngɛ he, nɛ o kã a hɛ mi ngɛ he kɛ he wami tsuo. Ko ha nɔ ko nɛ ngɔ mo kaa nɔ nɛ sɛ bumi.

Title: TITO 3
Content:
Kristofohi a jemibami
1Kaii mɛ nɛ a ba a he si ngɔ ha nikɔtɔmahi kɛ nɔ yeli ɔmɛ, a bu mɛ tue, a dla a he kɛ ha ni tsumi kpakpa tsuaa ni tsumi kpakpa, 2a ko tu nɔ ko he munyu yaya, a ko hla pɛ; se mohu a pee kpoo, nɛ a kɛ a he nɛ tsɔɔ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ kaa a he jɔ. 3Ejakaa sa a wɔ hu wa li nɔ́ ko, tue gboli, blɔ dali, nihi nɛ sɔmɔɔ akɔnɔ ni kɛ helo se di ni slɔɔtohi fuu, nɛ wa baa wa je mi ngɛ ni yayahi kɛ he tsɛmi mi, wa he ngɛ tai, nɛ wa nyɛɛ wa he. 4Se benɛ Mawu nɛ ji yi wami helɔ ɔ mi mi jɔmi kɛ e nimli a he dɔmi ɔ je kpo ɔ, 5lɔ ɔ lɛɛ pi dami ni tsumihi nɛ wa tsu nya, se mohu lɛ nitsɛ e mɔbɔ nami nya, kɛ gu ehe fɔmi, he dumi kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ ehe peemi ɔ nɔ he wa yiwami, 6nɔ nɛ gu Yesu Kristo wa yi wami helɔ ɔ nɔ plɛ pue wa nɔ babauu ɔ, 7konɛ bɔ nɛ a wo wɔ nguɔ ngɛ lɛ nɔuu e dloomi nya a, a ha waa pee neneene wami ɔ yeli ngɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ɔ nya. 8Anɔkuale munyu ji nɛ ɔ nɛ.
Kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ mi i ngɛ hlae kaa o ma, konɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ a he Mawu nɔ ye ɔ, a bɔ nitsumi kpakpahi a he mɔde. Enɛ ɔmɛ ji nihi nɛ ngɛ fɛu nɛ hi ha nimli. 9Se kuasiahi a nɔ jemi kɛ weku sisi tsɔɔmi kɛ pɛ kɛ mlaa he kunɔ nɔmi ɔ, sã o he kɛ je he, ejakaa a he be senami nɛ a pi nɔ́ ko. 10Nɔ ko nɛ kɛ mi gbami baa a, ke o bɔ lɛ kɔkɔ si kake kɛ si enyɔ ɔ, kua lɛ; 11ejakaa o le kaa nɔ ko nɛ ngɛ ja a e je e glɔ nɔ, nɛ e he yayami ɔ buu lɛ fɔ.
Nyagbe nitsɔɔmi
12Ke i tsɔ Artema loo Tihiko kɛ ba o ngɔ ɔ, bɔɔ mɔde nɛ o ba ye ngɔ ngɛ Nikopoli, ejakaa lejɛ ɔ i to kaa ma ya ye fiɛ be ɔ ngɛ. 13Bɔɔ mɔɔde nɛ o wo Zena, mlaa tsɔɔlɔ ɔ kɛ Apolo blɔ saminya nɛ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko he ko hia mɛ. 14Se ha nɛ wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa ni ɔmɛ hu nɛ kase ni tsumi kpakpahi a he mɔde bɔmi, ke e fi loo e hia nɔ ko ɔ, konɛ a ko pee nihi nɛ wui yiblii.
15Ninɛmɛ nɛ kɛ mi ngɛ ɔ kulaa ke a biɔ mo. Wa biɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ suɔ wɔ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi mi ɔ.
