Mawu dloomi ɔ kɛ nyɛ tsuo nɛ hi si! Amen.

Title: FILEMON 1
Content:
1Paulo nɛ ji Kristo Yesu opa mi no ɔ, kɛ wa nyɛmi Timoteo ngma ya ha Filemon, wa suɔlɔ kɛ wa huɛ ni tsulɔ ɔ, kɛ asafo nɛ kpee ngɛ o we ɔ tsuo 2kɛ wa nyɛmi yo Apia, kɛ Arkipo nɛ ji wa huɛ ta bu lɔ ɔ.
3Dloomi kɛ hejɔmi nɛ je wa Tsɛ Mawu ɔ kɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo ɔ dɛ mi ɔ ha nyɛ!
Filemon suɔmi kɛ hemi kɛ yemi
4I naa ye Mawu ɔ si daa, nɛ i woɔ o ta ngɛ ye pɛɛ kpamihi a mi, 5akɛnɛ i nuɔ o suɔmi kɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ o hɛɛ ngɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu kɛ ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ tsuo a he ɔ; 6nɛ i kpaa pɛɛ kaa kikɛmɛ a huɛ bɔmi nɛ je hemi kɛ yemi mi ɔ nɛ ha mo sisi numi ngɛ ni tsumi kpakpa tsuaa ni tsumi kpakpa nɛ wa nyɛɔ tsuɔ ha Kristo Yesu ɔ mi. 7Ejakaa i na bua jɔmi babauu kɛ tsui ngɛ o suɔmi ɔ he, mami, akɛnɛ o ha ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a tsui nɔ a mi ɔ.
Pɛɛkpami ha Onesimo
8Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e ngɛ mi kaa i ngɛ kã babauu ngɛ Kristo mi nɛ ma kɛ wo mo kita ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ sa he, 9kɛ̃ ɔ, suɔmi he ɔ, pɛɛ mohu i ngɛ mo kpae. Hyɛ imi nɔmoyo Paulo bɔ nɛ i ngɛ nɛ ɔ, nɛ jehanɛ hu i ji Yesu Kristo pa mi no nɛ ɔ; 10i kpa mo pɛɛ ngɛ yebi Onesimo nɛ i fɔ ngɛ ye tsu mi womi ɔ mi ɔ he, 11nɔ nɛ sa a e he be se nami ko ha mo, se jeha nɛ ɔ e he ngɛ se nami saminya ha i kɛ mo tsuo ɔ.
12I ha e ngɛ kpalee kɛ ma o ngɔ. He lɛ kaa bɔ nɛ o ma he imi nitsɛ. 13I ko suɔ kaa e kɛ mi nɛ hi si konɛ e sɔmɔ mi ngɛ o nane mi ngɛ sane kpakpa a fiɛmi mi. 14Se i sume kaa ma je o se kɛ pee nɔ́ ko, benɛ pee nɛ nɔ́ kpakpa nɛ o maa pee ɔ e ko ba pee nɔ nyɛmi nya ni, se mohu tsui mi jɔmi nya ni.
15Ejakaa eko ɔ enɛ ɔ he nɛ nyɛ kpɛti gba bɔɔ ɔ nɛ, konɛ jehanɛ e hi o ngɔ kulaa, 16pi kaa sɔmɔlɔ hu, se mohu nɔ nɛ pe sɔmɔlɔ tete, nɔ nɛ ji suɔmi nyɛmi, nɛ i fiɛ we e he, nɛ mo mohu e ji o nɔ kulaa ngɛ he lo kɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ blɔfami ɔ.
17Lɔ ɔ he ɔ jehanɛ ke o buu mi kaa o nyɛmi ɔ, he lɛ kaa o ma he imi nitsɛ. 18Ke e ye mo sane yaya ko aloo ke e hɛɛ mo hiɔ ko ɔ, buu jamɛ a akɔtaa a ba ha mi. 19Imi Paulo nitsɛ, i ngɛ enɛ ɔ ngmae kɛ ye nine kaa, ma wo mo hiɔ (e hia we kaa ma kai mo ke o hɛɛ mi mo nitsɛ o yi hiɔ tete.) 20Ee, mami, ha ma na o he se ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi; ha ye tsui nɛ nɔ ye mi ngɛ Kristo mi.
21Akɛnɛ ye hɛ ngɛ o nɔ kaa o maa bu mi tue he je nɛ i ngma mo nɛ ɔ nɛ, ejakaa i le kaa o maa pee pe bɔ nɛ i de mo nɛ ɔ tete. 22Jehanɛ dla he ko ngɔ to mi, ejakaa ye hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa nyɛ pɛɛ kpami ɔmɛ a he ɔ, a maa ngmɛɛ ye he ha nyɛ ekohu.
Nyagbe sɛyemi
23Epafra, nɛ ji ye huɛ pa mi no ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ ke e biɔ mo, 24kɛ Marko hulɔ kɛ Aristarko kɛ Dema kɛ Luka, nihi nɛ ji ye huɛmɛ ni tsuli.
25Wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dloomi ɔ kɛ nyɛ mumi ɔ nɛ hi si! Amen.

Title: HEBRIBI 1
Content:
Mawu munyu nɛ e kɛ gu e Bi ɔ nɔ
1Blema be ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, Mawu kɛ wa tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ tu munyu kɛ gu gbali ɔmɛ a nɔ, ngɛ blɔ slɔɔtohi a nɔ, 2se ngɛ nyagbe ligbi nɛ ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, e Bi ɔ nya e kɛ wɔ tu munyu ngɛ, nɔ nɛ e ngɔ lɛ ngɔ pee nihi kulaa yelɔ ɔ, nɔ nɛ nɔ hu nɛ e gu kɛ bɔ je ɔ kɛ e mi ni ɔmɛ; 3nɔ hu nɛ ji e hɛ mi nyami ɔ kpɛmi ɔ su ɔ henɔ, nɛ e kɛ lɛ nitsɛ e he wami munyu ɔ hɛɔ nihi kulaa a, benɛ e tsukɔ wa he kɛ je wa he yayami ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, e ho ya hi si ngɛ hɛ mi nyamitsɛ agbo ɔ hiɛ ɔ nɔ ngɛ hiɔwe.
Bi ɔ kle pe hiɔwe bɔfo ɔmɛ
4Enɛ ɔ he ɔ Bi ɔ kle pe hiɔwe bɔfo ɔmɛ akɛnɛ biɛ nɛ Mawu ha lɛ ɔ kle pe a nɔ ɔ. 5Ejakaa te bɔfo nɛ Mawu de lɛ hyɛ ke:
“Ye bi ji mo,
Mwɔnɛ i fɔ mo?”
Loo,
“Ma pee e tsɛ,
Nɛ lɛ hu e maa pe ye bi?” ɔ nɛɛ?
6Nɛ benɛ e kɛ e bi Tete ɔ ma je ɔ mi ɔ, e kpale de ke:
“Ha Mawu bɔfo ɔmɛ kulaa nɛ a ja lɛ.”
7Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo ɔmɛ ɔ, e de ngɛ a he ke:
“Nɔ nɛ plɛɛ e bɔfo ɔmɛ ngɔ peɔ kɔɔhiɔhi,
Nɛ e sɔmɔli ɔmɛ hu e peɔ mɛ la lilɛhi” ɔ.
8Se Bi ɔ lɛɛ e de ngɛ e he ke:
“Oo Mawu, o matsɛ sɛ ɔ maa si kɛ yaa neneene kɛ neneene
Nɛ o matsɛ yemi tso ɔ, dami matsɛ yemi tso ʼi,
9O suɔ nɔ́ nɛ da, o nyɛɛ nɔ́ yaya peemi
Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Mawu nɛ ji o Mawu ɔ
Kɛ bua jɔmi nu ɔ pɔ mo pe o nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ.”
10Kɛ jehanɛ:
“Nyɔmtsɛ, sisije ɔ, Mo lɛ o to zugba a sisi,
Nɛ hiɔwe ɔ, o nine nya ni tsumi ʼi.
11Mɛɛ lɛɛ a hɛ mi ma kpata, se moo lɛɛ, o ngɛ daa, nɛ mɛ tsuo a maa bwɔ kaa tade;
12Nɛ o ma koklo mɛ kaa bo, nɛ a ma tsake;
Se moo lɛɛ o ngɛ bɔ nɛ o ngɛ ɔ nɔuu, nɛ o jeha amɛ tɛ̃.”
13Se hiɔwe bɔfo ɔmɛ a ti mɛnɔ po nɛ e de ngɛ e he hyɛ ke:
“Hii ye hiɛ ɔ nɔ
Kɛ yaa su be nɛ ma ngɔ
O he nyɛli ɔmɛ ngɔ pee o nane si sɛ?” ɔ nɛɛ?
14Anɛ mɛ kulaa a, pi mumihi nɛ sɔmɔɔ ji mɛ, nɛ nihi nɛ ma na yi wami hemi ɔ a sɔmɔmi he je nɛ a tsɔ mɛ?

Title: HEBRIBI 2
Content:
Yi wami hemi ngua a
1Lɔ ɔ he ɔ e sa kaa waa pɛtɛ nihi nɛ wa nu ɔmɛ a he wawɛɛ konɛ wa ko tsɔ kɛ je he. 2Ejakaa ke munyu nɛ a tu ngɛ hiɔwe bɔfohi a nya a maa si kpɛii, nɛ a wo nɔ tɔmi tsuaa nɔ tɔmi kɛ tuegbenɔ tsuaa tuegbenɔ he hiɔ bɔ nɛ sa a, 3kɛ wa maa pee kɛ tu nya fo kɛɛ, ke wa bui kikɛmɛ a yi wami hemi kpetekpleenyɛ nɛ ɔ? Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nitsɛ ji nɔ nɛ tu he munyu kekle, nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ nu ɔ hu ma nɔ mi ha wɔ, 4nɛ Mawu nitsɛ hu kɛ okadihi kɛ nyakpɛ nihi kɛ hewami nihi slɔɔtohi kɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu hami ɔ ngɛ he odase yee kɛ ngɛ nɔ sie, ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e suɔmi nya.
Yi wami hemi mi hɛminyɛɛlɔ
5Ejakaa pi hiɔwe bɔfohi a sisi nɛ e kɛ je nɛ maa ba nɛ wa ngɛ he munyu tue ɔ wo. 6Nɔ ko ye he odase faii ngɛ he ko ke:
“Mɛnɔ ji nɔmlɔ adesa nɛ o kaii lɛ?
Loo nɔmlɔ bi hu nɛ o hɛ ngɛ e he nɔ?
7Piɛ bɔɔ kɛkɛ nɛ o ha e kɛ hiɔwe bɔfohi nɛ sɔ;
O kɛ hɛ mi nyami kɛ bu fi lɛ jlasi.”
8O ngɔ nihi kulaa ngɔ woʼe nane si. Ejakaa ke e kɛ nihi kulaa wo e nane si ɔ, e piɛ́ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko nɛ a kɛ wui e sisi. Jehanɛ wa na we nɛ waa na kaa a kɛ nihi tsuo wo e sisi. 9Se nɔ nɛ a ha nɛ piɛ bɔɔ nɛ e kɛ hiɔwe bɔfo ɔmɛ nɛ sɔ ɔ, wa na kaa Yesu ʼi, nɔ nɛ gbenɔ mi amanehlu ɔ he nɛ a kɛ hɛ mi nyami kɛ bu fi lɛ jlasi ɔ, benɛ pee nɛ Mawu dloomi nya a e sa e nya gbenɔ ha nɔ tsuaa nɔ. 10Ejakaa e sa lɛ, nɔ nɛ he nɛ nihi kulaa ngɛ kɛ nɔ nɛ nɔ nɛ a gu nɛ nihi kulaa ngɛ ɔ, nɔ nɛ ngɔɔ bimɛ babauu kɛ baa hɛ mi nyami mi ɔ, kaa e ha a yi wami hemi tatsɛ nɔkɔtɔma a nɛ gu amanehluhi a mi nɛ e hi kɛ pi si.
11Ejakaa nɔ nɛ tsukɔɔ nihi a he kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ a tsukɔɔ a he ɔ kulaa je nɔ kake mi, lɔɔ he je nɛ zo pee we lɛ kaa e ma tsɛ mɛ nyɛmimɛ ɔ nɛ. 12Nɛ eke:
“Ma wo o biɛ ɔ tã ngɔ tsɔɔ ye nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ;
Asafo kpɛti hu ma la kɛ je o yi ngɛ.”
13Kɛ jehanɛ hu:
“Ma ngɔ ye hɛ ngɔ fɔ e nɔ.”
Kɛ jehanɛ: “Oʼɛ mi kɛ bimɛ nɛ Mawu ngɔ ha mi ɔ.”
14Lɔ ɔ he ɔ akɛnɛ bimɛ ɔmɛ hɛɛ he lo kɛ muɔ he je ɔ, lɛ hu e ngɔ kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu eko kaa mɛ, konɛ e gu gbenɔ nɔ kɛ kpata nɔ nɛ ngɛ gbenɔ nɔ he wami nɛ ji abosiami ɔ hɛ mi, 15nɛ e kpɔ nihi nɛ gbenɔ gbeye yemi he ɔ a plɛ pee nyɔguɛhi ngɛ a wami be kulaa mi ɔ. 16Ejakaa e fɔɔ si faii kaa, tsa pi hiɔwe bɔfohi nɛ e yeɔ buaa, se mohu Abraham nina e yeɔ buaa. 17Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nihi kulaa blɔfami ɔ, e sa kaa e hi kaa e nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ, konɛ e plɛ mɔbɔ nalɔ kɛ anɔkuale osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi, konɛ e kpa ma a yi musu. 18Ejakaa akɛnɛ lɛ nitsɛ ɔ e na amanehlu nɛ a ka lɛ he je ɔ, e nyɛɔ e yeɔ buaa ninɛmɛ nɛ a kaa mɛ ɔ.

Title: HEBRIBI 3
Content:
Yesu kle pe Mose
1Enɛ ɔ he ɔ, mamimɛ, nyɛɛ tɛ̃tɛ̃ nyɛ hɛ mi, nyɛ ni klɔuklɔuhi nɛ na hiɔwe tsemi ɔ eko, nɛ nyɛɛ hyɛ Yesu wa hemi kɛ yemi jajemi ɔ he bɔfo kɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a; 2nɔ nɛ yeɔ nɔ nɛ hla lɛ ɔ anɔkuale, kaa bɔ nɛ Mose hu ye Mawu we ɔ kulaa nɔ anɔkuale ɔ. 3Kaa bɔ nɛ nɔ nɛ bɔɔ we ko ɔ bu hiɛ pe we ɔ nɔ́ ɔ, ja nɔuu Yesu hu hɛ mi ngɛ nyami pe Mose. 4We tsuaa we ɔ nɔ ko kɛ̃ lɛ bɔɔ, se nɔ nɛ bɔɔ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ ji Mawu. 5Mose ye anɔkuale ngɛ Mawu we mluku ɔ kulaa nɔ kaa sɔmɔlɔ, konɛ e ye nihi nɛ a ma de ɔmɛ a he odase; 6se Kristo ɔ e ye anɔkuale kaa bi ngɛ Mawu we ɔ nɔ; lɛ e we ji wɔ, ke wa hɛɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi kã kɛ fiami ɔ mi kpɛii kɛ ya su nyagbe ɔ.
Hejɔɔmi ha Mawu webi
7Lɔ ɔ he ɔ kaa bɔ nɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ de ɔ:
“Mwɔnɛ, ke nyɛ nu e gbi ɔ,
8Nyɛ ko wlua nyɛ tsui,
Kaa bɔ nɛ a pee ngɛ mi mi la womi ɔ mi,
Ngɛ nyatsɔmi ligbi ɔ nɔ ngɛ nga a nɔ ɔ,
9He nɛ nyɛ tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ tsɔ ye nya nɛ a ka mi,
Nɛ a na ye ni tsumi ɔmɛ ngɛ, jeha nyingmi eywiɛ sɔuu ɔ.
10Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ye mi mi fu jamɛ a yi nɔ bi ɔmɛ
Nɛ i ke: ‘Daa nɛ ɔ a tlaa blɔ ngɛ a juɛmi mi,
Nɛ a li ye blɔ ɔmɛ.’
11Lɔ ɔ ha ye mi mi fu nɛ i ka kita
Ke: ‘Ke a sɛ ye he jɔɔmi ɔ mi fii!’ ”
12Nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ hi, mamimɛ, konɛ nyɛ ti nɔ ko ko hi tsui nɛ he we yi nɛ e kpale kɛ je Mawu hɛ kalɔ ɔ he; 13se mohu nyɛɛ tu munyu ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ he ligbi tsuaa ligbi nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ “mwɔnɛ” ɔ, konɛ yayami ko sisi nyɛ nɛ nyɛ wlua nyɛ tsui. 14Ejakaa Kristo he piɛli ji wɔ ke wa hɛɛ wa he nɛ waa kɛ fɔɔ e nɔ kɛ je sisije ɔ mi kpɛii kɛ ya su nyagbe ɔ. 15Ngmami ɔ de ke:
“Mwɔnɛ ke nyɛ nu e gbi ɔ,
Nyɛ ko wlua nyɛ tsui
Kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ pee
Benɛ nyɛ tsɔ ye hɛ mi atua a.”
16Nihi nɛ nu ɔ a ti mɛnɔmɛ lɛ a wo e mi mi la a? Anɛ pi ninɛmɛ nɛ kɛ Mose je Mizraim ɔ tsuo ʼi? 17Nɛ mɛnɔmɛ e mi mi fu jeha nyingmi eywiɛ sɔuu ɔ? Anɛ pi ninɛmɛ nɛ pee yayami nɛ a fia si gbo ngɛ nga a nɔ ɔ lo? 18Nɛ mɛnɔmɛ a nɔ e kã kita ngɔ fɔ kaa a be e he jɔɔmi ɔ mi sɛe ɔ? Anɛ pi tuegboli ɔmɛ lo? 19Nɛ wa naa kaa hemi nɛ a he we yi ɔ he nɛ a nyɛ we mi nɛ a sɛ ɔ nɛ.

Title: HEBRIBI 4
Content:
1Nɛ Mawu si e he jɔɔmi ɔ mi sɛmi he si womi ngɔ ha wɔ nɛ ɔ, nyɛ ha waa hyɛ nɛ hi konɛ alinɔ e ko ba mi kaa e fɔ wa ti nɔ ko. 2Ejakaa wɔ hu a fiɛ Sane kpakpa a ngɔ ha wɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ a fiɛ tsɔɔ mɛ ɔ nɔuu; se kɛ̃ ɔ munyu nɛ a nu ɔ he ya bɛ́ se nami ha mɛ, ejakaa ninɛmɛ nɛ nu ɔ kɛ hemi kɛ yemi pɛtɛ we he. 3Ejakaa wɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ wa he ye ɔ wa ngɛ jamɛ a he jɔɔmi ɔ mi sɛe, kaa bɔ nɛ e de ɔ ke:
“Lɔ ɔ ha i kɛ mi mi fumi ka kita ke:
‘Ke a sɛ ye he jɔɔmi ɔ mi fii!’ ”
pohu a gbe Mawu ni tsumi ɔmɛ a nya kɛ je je mi sisije lokoo. 4Ejakaa bɔ nɛ e de ngɛ he ko ngɛ ligbi nɛ ji ligbi kpaago ɔ he ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: “Nɛ Mawu jɔɔ e he ngɛ ligbi nɛ ji ligbi kpaago ɔ nɔ ngɛ e ni tsumi ɔmɛ kulaa mi;” 5nɛ hiɛ ɔ nɛ ɔ e kpale de ke: “Ke a sɛ ye he jɔɔmi ɔ mi fii!” 6Lɔ ɔ he ɔ akɛnɛ e fɔɔ si kaa ni komɛ maa sɛ mi, nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ a fiɛ Sane kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ kekle ɔ sɛ we mi ngɛ hemi nɛ a he we yi ɔ he je ɔ, 7Mawu kpale to ligbi kpa ko ekohu, nɛ e de ngɛ David nya, ngɛ be babauu nɛ ɔ se ke, Mwɔnɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ la de sa a,
“Mwɔnɛ ke nyɛ nu e gbi ɔ,
Nyɛ ko wlua nyɛ tsui.’ ”
8Ejakaa kaa Yosua na ha mɛ he jɔɔmi jinɛ, pee se ɔ Mawu ko tu we ligbi kpa ko he munyu hu. 9Lɔ ɔ he ɔ he jɔɔmi ligbi yemi ko fɔɔ si kɛ ha Mawu ma a. 10Ejakaa nɔ nɛ sɛ e he jɔɔmi ɔ mi ɔ, lɛ nitsɛ hu e jɔɔ e he ngɛ e ni tsumi ɔmɛ a mi, kaa bɔ nɛ Mawu jɔɔ e he ngɛ e nɔ ɔ mi ɔ. 11Lɔɔ he ɔ nyɛ ha waa bɔ mɔde, konɛ waa sɛ jamɛ a he jɔɔmi ɔ mi, nɛ nɔ ko ko nyɛɛ jamɛ a tue gbomi blɔ ɔ nɔ nɛ e laa.
12Ejakaa Mawu munyu hɛ ngɛ nɛ e ngɛ he wami nɛ e nya ba pe klaate nya enyɔtsɛ, nɛ e gbuu kɛ sɛɛ mi kɛ ya suu be nɛ e gbaa klaa kɛ mumi ɔ kɛ kpɔji nya amɛ kɛ wu mi zɔ ɔmɛ a mi, nɛ e ji tsui mi susumihi kɛ juɛmi ɔmɛ a kojolɔ. 13A laa we bɔ nɔ́ ko ngɛ e hɛ mi, se nihi kulaa ngɛ paa nɛ a bli nɔ ngɛ lɛ nɔ nɛ waa kɛ ngɛ sane ɔ hɛngmɛ mi.
Yesu osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma ngua a
14Jehanɛ, akɛnɛ wa ngɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma ngua nɛ po mi kɛ gu hiɔwe nihi a mi, nɛ ji Yesu, Mawu bi ɔ nɛ ɔ ɔ, nyɛ ha waa pɛtɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ he wawɛɛ. 15Ejakaa wa osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma nɛ wa ngɛ ɔ, e pi nɔ nɛ be nyɛe maa nu wa gbɔjɔmi ɔmɛ a he ha wɔ, se e ji nɔ ko nɛ a ka lɛ ngɛ nihi kulaa blɔfami kaa wɔ, nɛ kɛ̃ ɔ yayami ko yayami ko be e he. 16Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ ha waa kɛ kã nɛ hɛ wɔ kɛ su dloomi sɛ ɔ he, konɛ wa nine nɛ su mɔbɔ nami nɔ nɛ wa na dloomi nɛ maa ye bua wɔ ngɛ be nɛ sa mi.

Title: HEBRIBI 5
Content:
1Ejakaa osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma tsuaa osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma nɛ a hia ngɛ nimli a kpɛti ɔ, a wo lɛ osɔfo konɛ e da nimli a nane mi ngɛ Mawu nihi a blɔfami, konɛ e kɛ nike nihi kɛ bɔhi ba ha ngɛ yayamihi a he, 2kaa nɔ ko nɛ nyɛɔ e nuɔ nɔ́ he haa nihi nɛ li ni kɛ nihi nɛ tla blɔ ɔ, akɛ nɛ lɛ nitsɛ hu ɔ gbedemi bɔle e he kɛ kpe ɔ. 3Nɛ enɛ ɔ he ɔ, e hia kaa, kaa bɔ nɛ e peɔ haa ma a, e pee ja nɔuu ngɔ ha lɛ nitsɛ e he, nɛ e sa yayamihi a he bɔ. 4Nɛ nɔ ko ngɔɛ hɛ mi nyami nɔ ha we lɛ nitsɛ e he, kaa ja Mawu tsɛ lɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ e tsɛ Aaron hu ɔ.
5Ja nɔuu Kristo hu, pi lɛ nitsɛ nɛ e wo e hɛ mi nyami ngɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma yemi mi, se mohu Mawu nɛ de lɛ ke:
“Ye bi ji mo, mwɔnɛ i fɔ mo”
ɔ, lɛ wo e hɛ mi nyami. 6Kaa bɔ nɛ e de ngɛ he kpa hu ke:
“Osɔfo ji mo kɛ yaa neneene
Ngɛ Melkizedek blɔ ɔ nɔ.”
7Ngɛ Yesu he lo be ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, e ngɔ sɔlemi kɛ pɛɛ kpami nɛ ngmlaa kpami nɛ nya wa kɛ vo nyu piɛ he sa bɔ ha nɔ nɛ ngɛ he wami nɛ e kɛ ma he lɛ kɛ je gbenɔ mi ɔ, nɛ a bu lɛ tue hulɔ, ejakaa e buu Mawu. 8Nɛ pohu Mawu bi ji lɛ, se kɛ̃ ɔ e kase tue bumi ngɛ amanehluhi nɛ e na amɛ a mi, 9nɛ benɛ a ha e hi kɛ pi si ɔ, e plɛ nɔ nɛ mi nɛ neneene yi wami hemi jee kɛ haa nihi tsuo nɛ buɔ lɛ tue ɔ, 10ejakaa Mawu wo lɛ osɔfo kaa Melkizedek.
Sigbeemi he kɔkɔbɔmi
11Wa ngɛ munyuhi fuu nɛ wa maa tu ngɛ enɛ ɔ he, se a sisi tsɔɔmi hu wa, ejakaa nyɛ tue mi ti; 12ejakaa nyɛ nɛ jinɛ e sa kaa nyɛ plɛ tsɔɔli mohu ngɛ be ɔ nya a, e hia kaa a tsɔɔ nyɛ Mawu munyu ɔ mi sisije ni ɔmɛ ekohu, nɛ nyɛ plɛ nihi nɛ nyɔ nyu hia mɛ, se pi niyeni nitsɛ. 13Ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ pupɔɔ nyɔ ɔ li nɔ́ nɛ da kɛ nɔ́ nɛ dɛ, ejakaa bimwɔyo ji lɛ. 14Se ninɛmɛ nɛ wa a, a nɔ ji niyeni nitsɛ, nihi nɛ tsɔse a he numi ni ɔmɛ le slɔɔto nɛ ngɛ kpakpa kɛ yayami kpɛti.

Title: HEBRIBI 6
Content:
1Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ ha wa si Kristo he sisije ni tsɔɔmi ɔmɛ, nɛ waa po mi kɛ ya tsɔɔmihi nɛ sa kɛ ha nikɔtɔmahi a he; nɛ wa ko kpale to nitsumihi nɛ gbo a he tsui tsakemi kɛ Mawu nɔ hemi kɛ yemi, 2kɛ baptisimihi a he ni tsɔɔmi kɛ ninehi kɛ nɔ nɔ puemi, kɛ gbogboehi a si temi kɛ neneene kojomi he sane ɔmɛ a sisi ekohu. 3Enɛ ɔ wa maa pee ke Mawu ngmɛ blɔ.
4Ejakaa nihi nɛ la tso ngɛ a nɔ hyɛ nɛ a sa a nya hiɔwe nɔ́ke nɔ́ ɔ nɛ a na Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ eko 5nɛ a sa a nya Mawu munyu kpakpa a kɛ je nɛ maa ba a mi hewami ɔmɛ, 6nɛ lɔ ɔ se nɛ a gbee si ɔ, a be nyɛe ma tsake mɛ ngɔ pee ni hehi ekohu ha tsui tsakemi, akɛnɛ a ngɛ Mawu bi ɔ sɛue ekohu kɛ ngɛ a he hae nɛ a ngɛ lɛ ahlua bɔe he ɔ.
7Zugba nɛ mii nyu nɛ nɛɛ pueɔ e nɔ kpitikpiti nɛ baa ni nɛ hi ha ninɛmɛ nɛ huɔ nɔ ɔ naa Mawu gbaami ɔ eko; 8se ke mio kɛ hu e puɛɛ ɔ, a kuaa lɛ, nɛ Mawu gbiɛmi baa e nɔ, nɛ e nyagbe ji a kɛ la maa sa.
9Se mamimɛ, wa ngɛ kikɛ dee mohu, se kɛ̃ ɔ wa hɛ ngɛ nyɛ nɔ kaa nyɛ sane hi pe ja, nɛ yi wami hemi maa nyɛɛ nyɛ se. 10Ejakaa Mawu pi nɔ nɛ yeɔ sane nɛ dɛ́ nɛ e hɛ maa je nyɛ ni tsumi ɔ nɔ kɛ suɔmi he dengme nɛ nyɛ gbo ngɛ e biɛ ɔ he, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ sɔmɔ ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ, nɛ nyɛ pa kɛ ngɛ mɛ sɔmɔe kɛ mwɔ ɔ. 11Wa ngɛ hlae kaa nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ tsɔɔ kikɛmɛ a mɔde bɔmi nɛ ɔ nɔuu, konɛ a ma hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ɔ nɔ mi kɛ ya su nyagbe, 12konɛ nyɛ ko pee hejɔ se mohu nyɛɛ kase ninɛmɛ nɛ guu hemi kɛ yemi kɛ tsui si tomi nɔ naa si womi ɔ.
Mawu siwomi nɛ tsakee we
13Benɛ Mawu wo Abraham si ɔ, akɛnɛ e be nɔ ko nɛ pe lɛ nitsɛ nɛ e ma kã lɛ kita he je ɔ, e ka lɛ nitsɛ e he kita, 14nɛ e ke: Niinɛ, ma gbaa mo, nɛ ma ha o nina maa hiɛ. 15Nɛ akɛnɛ Abraham to e tsui si he je ɔ, e nine su si womi ɔ nɔ. 16Ejakaa nimli ngɛ nɛ ɔ, nɔ nɛ pe mɛ ɔ kita a kaa, nɛ a nya sami nyagbe tsuo ji kita kami nɛ a kɛ maa sane tsuaa sane nɔ mi. 17Lɔ ɔ he hulɔ nɛ benɛ Mawu hia kaa e tsɔɔ si womi ɔ yeli ɔmɛ kaa e yi mi tomi ɔ tsakee we kulaa a, e kɛ kita ma nɔ mi, 18konɛ waa gu sanehi enyɔ nɛ tsakee we nɛ Mawu be nyɛe maa ngɔ nya ngɛ mi ɔ nɔ kɛ na bua womi nɛ wa, konɛ wɔ nihi nɛ wa ya sawe ɔ, wa kɛ hɛɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ ngɛ wa hɛ mi ɔ mi; 19wa hɛɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɔ kaa wa klaa sɛkɛ nɛ tsɔ we nɛ pi si kpɛii kɛ sɛ mi kɛ ho tsu mi pomi bo ɔ se ya tɔɔ, 20he nɛ hɛ mi nyɛɛlɔ ɔ ji Yesu, nɔ nɛ plɛ neneene osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma kaa Melkizedek ɔ sɛ ha wɔ ɔ.

Title: HEBRIBI 7
Content:
Osɔfo Melkizedek
1Se Melkizedek nɛ ɔ ɔ, lɛ ji Salem matsɛ, Mawu ope ɔ, osɔfo nɛ kɛ Abraham ya kpe benɛ e kpale e se kɛ je matsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a gbemi mi ngɛ ta mi nɛ e gbaa lɛ, 2nɛ Abraham ha lɛ ni ɔmɛ kulaa mi dlami nyɔngma mi kake ɔ nɛ. Melkizedek biɛ ɔ, e kekle sisi tsɔɔmi ji “Dami Matsɛ” nɛ jehanɛ hu e ji “Salem Matsɛ,” nɛ kɔlɔ ɔ sisi hu ji “Hejɔmi Matsɛ.” 3E be tsɛ, e be nyɛ, e be weku kpa, nɛ e be ligbihi a sisije loo wami nyagbe tete, e ngɛ kaa Mawu Bi ɔ; e hii si kaa osɔfo kɛ yaa neneene.
4Jehanɛ nyɛ susu he, bɔ nɛ nɔ nɛ ɔ agbo jemi ngɛ ha: Blemano Abraham ɔ tete ngɔ ta yi bu ni kpakpa amɛ a mi dlami nyɔngma mi kake ngɔ ha lɛ! 5Wa le kaa Levibi ɔmɛ a kpɛti nihi nɛ tsuɔ osɔfo ni tsumi ɔ hu ngɛ kita ko ngɛ Mlaa a nya, kaa a he mi dlami nyɔngma mi kake ngɛ ma a dɛ, lɔ ɔ ji ngɛ a nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ a dɛ, pohu mɛ hu a je Abraham mi. 6Se Melkizedek nɛ be weku sisi tsɔɔmi ko ngɛ Levibi ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɛ ɔ ɔ, e he midlami mi nyɔngma a mi kake ngɛ Abraham po dɛ, nɛ e gbaa nɔ nɛ ngɛ si womi ɔmɛ tete. 7Nguane jemi ko be he kulaa kaa nɔ nɛ kle pe e nyɛmi ɔ lɛ e gbaa nɔ nɛ klee we ɔ. 8Jehanɛ ɔ hiɛ ɔ, nimli nɛ gboɔ ɔmɛ ji nihi nɛ heɔ mi dlami nyɔngma mi kake ɔ, se lejɛ ɔ, nɔ ko nɛ ngmami ɔ ye e he odase kaa e hɛ ngɛ ngmengmle ɔ lɛ he. 9Nɛ, ke ma de jã a, kɛ gu Abraham nɔ ɔ, a he mi dlami nyɔngma mi kake ɔ ngɛ Levi nɛ heɔ lɔ ɔ hu dɛ; 10ejakaa e ngɛ e tsɛ Abraham ɔ mi mi momo bene Melkizedek kɛ lɛ ba kpe ɔ.
11Jehanɛ ke himi kɛ si pimi gu Levi osɔfo yemi ɔ nɔ kɛ ba a (ejakaa e yi nɔ a wo ma a mlaa ngɛ), lɛɛ mɛni he je e hia kɛ̃ kaa osɔfo kpa ko nɛ te si nɛ ngɛ kaa Melkizedek, nɛ pi kaa Aaron ɔ mɔ? 12Ejakaa ke a tsake osɔfo yemi ɔ, lɛɛ e hia kaa a tsake Mlaa a hulɔ. 13Ejakaa nɔ nɛ he nɛ a de ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ ɔ, je wɛtso kpa ko mi, nɔ mi nɛ nɔ ko ji kɛ ba tsu we bɔ sami latɛ ɔ he ni hyɛ. 14Nɔ tsuaa nɔ le kaa Yuda mi nɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ je, jamɛ a wetso ɔ Mose de we he nɔ́ ko ngɛ osɔfo yemi he.
Osɔfo kpã ko kaa Melkizedek
15Nɔ́ nɛ haa sane ɔ jee kpo paa a ji kaa osɔfo kpã ko te si nɛ ngɛ kaa Melkizedek, 16nɔ nɛ pi he lo kita mlaa nya nɛ a wo lɛ osɔfo ngɛ, se mohu wami nɛ puɛ we ɔ he wami nya. 17Ejakaa ngmami ɔ yeɔ odase ke: Osɔfo ji mo kɛ yaa neneene kaa Melkizedek. 18Ejakaa kita nɛ sɛ hlami ɔ, akɛnɛ e be he wami nɛ e he be se nami ko he ɔ a gu, 19ejakaa Mlaa ha we nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko nɛ hi kɛ pi si, se jehanɛ a kɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ hi pe lɔ ɔ nɛ waa kɛ suu Mawu he ɔ ba je mi.
20Enɛ ɔ peemi mi ɔ a si we Mawu kita a se. Ni kpa amɛ ɔ, a wo mɛ osɔfohi mohu se a ka we kita ko. 21Se Yesu lɛɛ, kita kami a kɛ wo lɛ, benɛ Mawu de lɛ ke:
“Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ka kita
Nɛ e be e he piae:
Osɔfo ji mo kɛ yaa neneene” ɔ.
22Jehanɛ somi nɛ Yesu daa si ngɛ mi ɔ hi pe kulaa. 23Slɔɔto kpa ko hu ji, mɛɛ lɛɛ, akɛnɛ gbenɔ ha we nɛ a se nɛ kɛ he je ɔ, mɛ fuu a ye osɔfo; 24se Yesu lɛɛ, akɛnɛ e hii si kɛ yaa neneene he je ɔ, e sɔfo yemi ɔ se pui. 25Lɔ ɔ he hu ɔ e nyɛɔ nihi nɛ guu e nɔ kɛ baa Mawu ngɔ ɔmɛ a yi wami heɔ, ejakaa e ngɛ daa konɛ e da mi ha mɛ.
26Yesu ji Osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma nɛ sa wɔ pɛ: nɔ nɛ he tsɔ, nɛ yayami ko be e he, nɛ e he be piami ko, nɛ e tsɔ e he kɛ je yayami peeli a he, nɛ a wo e nɔ kɛ be hiɔwe, he; 27nɔ nɛ e hia we lɛ, kaa osɔfo nikɔtɔma kpa amɛ, kaa daa ligbi ɔ e sã lɛ nitsɛ e he yayami ɔmɛ a he bɔ kekle loko e sã ma a hu nɔ; ejakaa e pee enɛ ɔ si kake nyɔngloo, benɛ e ngɔ lɛ nitsɛ e he ngɔ sã bɔ ɔ. 28Ejakaa Mose Mlaa a, nimli gbɔjɔli e ngɔ woɔ osɔfo nikɔtɔmahi ɔ nɛ, se Mawu kita nɛ ba ngɛ Mlaa a se ɔ he munyu ɔ wo Bi nɛ hi kɛ pi si kɛ yaa neneene ɔ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma.

Title: HEBRIBI 8
Content:
Yesu wa sɔfo nɔkɔtɔma
1Se nihi nɛ wa ngɛ dee ɔ kulaa yi ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: Wa ngɛ kikɛmɛ a osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma, nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ he walɔ ngua a matsɛ sɛ ɔ hiɛ ɔ nɔ ngɛ hiɔwe, 2kaa he klɔuklɔu ɔ kɛ anɔkuale bo tsu nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nitsɛ lɛ ma nɛ pi nɔmlɔ ko nɛ ma a mi sɔmɔlɔ.
3Ejakaa osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma tsuaa osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a, a wo lɛ konɛ e ngɔ nike nihi kɛ bɔ sami nihi kɛ ba ha, lɔ ɔ he je ɔ e hia kaa nɔ nɛ ɔ hu e na nɔ́ ko nɛ e kɛ ba ha. 4Se kaa zugba a nɔ e ngɛ jinɛ, e be osɔfo tete pee, ejakaa osɔfohi nɛ kɛ nike nihi ya haa ngɛ Mlaa nya a ngɛ; 5nihi nɛ hiɔwe ni ɔmɛ a henɔ kɛ a nini kɛkɛ a sɔmɔɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ a tu munyu tsɔɔ Mose, benɛ e maa ma bo tsu ɔ ke: “Hyɛ nɛ hi, konɛ o pee ni ɔmɛ kulaa ngɛ henɔ nɛ a tsɔɔ mo ngɛ yoku ɔ nɔ ɔ nya.” 6Se jehanɛ ɔ, Yesu na osɔfo yemi nɛ hi pe kekle nɔ ɔ, ejakaa somi nɛ hi pe kekle nɔ ɔ nɛ a da si womihi nɛ hi pe kekle ni ɔmɛ a nɔ kɛ kã kita a mi dalɔ ji lɛ.
7Ejakaa kaa kekle somi ɔ hi kɛ pi si jinɛ a be blɔ hlae ngɔ ha nɔ́ nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ. 8Ejakaa Mawu piaa mɛ: E ke:
“Oʼɛ, ligbihi ma,
Nɛ i kɛ Israel we ɔ kɛ Yuda we ɔ
Maa so somi he ko,
9Pi kaa somi nɛ i kɛ a tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ so
Benɛ i pɛtɛ a nine mi nɛ i kɛ mɛ je
Mizraim zugba a nɔ ɔ;
Ejakaa a yi ye somi ɔ nɔ
Nɛ imi hu i bui a he akɔtaa, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ lɛ de.
10Ejakaa enɛ ɔ ji somi nɛ i kɛ Israel we ɔ maa so
Ngɛ jamɛ a ligbi ɔmɛ a se ɔ nɛ,
Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ de ke:
I kɛ ye mlaahi maa wo a juɛmi mi,
Nɛ ma ngma ngɔ wo a tsui mi,
Nɛ ma pee a Mawu
Nɛ mɛ hu a maa pee ye ma.
11Nɛ a ti nɔ ko be e huɛ loo e nyɛmi tsɔɔe ke:
‘Le Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ.’
Ejakaa mɛ kulaa a maa le mi,
Kɛ maa je a kpɛti nɔ nyafii nɔ
Kɛ yaa su nɔ ngua nɔ.
12Ejakaa ma na mɛ mɔbɔ ngɛ a nɔ tɔmi ɔmɛ a he,
Nɛ a he yayami ɔmɛ hu i be kaie ligbi ko ligbi ko.”
13Somi he nɛ ɔ he munyu ɔ, ha kekle nɔ ɔ pee momo. Se nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ pee momo kɛ nɔ́ nɛ bwɔ ɔ, e be kɛe nɛ e maa laa.

Title: HEBRIBI 9
Content:
Hiɔwe kɛ Zugba nɔ nɔ jami
1Jehanɛ kekle somi ɔ hu ngɛ Mawu jami blɔ nya nihi kɛ He klɔuklɔu nɛ ji je nɛ ɔ mi nɔ́ ɔ. 2A ma bo tsu ko ngɔ ma si, nɛ e kpo nɔ je ɔ, kane tso kɛ okplɔɔ kɛ hɛ mi mami abolohi ngɛ lejɛ ɔ; a tsɛɛ lejɛ ɔ ke He klɔuklɔu. 3Nɛ tsu mi pomi bo nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ se bo tsu ɔ a tsɛɛ lɛ He klɔuklɔu pe kulaa. 4Lejɛ ɔ tsopa kɛ e he via sami nɔ́ kɛ somi daka nɛ a kɛ sika ha he kulaa a ngɛ, lɔ ɔ mi sika kplu kɛ mana a kɛ Aaron tso nɛ su ba a kɛ somi tɛ tɛtlɛɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ ɔ ngɛ; 5nɛ lɔ ɔ nɔ nyami kerubim nɛ ha kpatami sɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ ngɛ, nihi nɛ amlɔ nɛ ɔ wa be nyɛe a he munyu tumi kakaaka a.
6Bɔ nɛ a dlaa kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ haa ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: osɔfo ɔmɛ yaa kekle bo tsu ɔ mi daa ligbi ya tsuɔ Mawu jami he ni; 7se bo tsu nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ, osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a kɛkɛ lɛ yaa mi si kake daa jeha, nɛ e si we muɔ nɛ e ya, nɔ́ nɛ e kɛ ya haa ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ kɛ ma a tɔmihi nɛ a li ɔmɛ a he ɔ. 8Enɛ ɔ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ kɛ tsɔɔ pãa kaa be abɔ nɛ kekle bo tsu ɔ maa si kɛ mwɔ nɛ ɔ ɔ, lɛɛ blɔ nɛ a kɛ yaa he klɔuklɔu ɔ a na we nɛ a bli. 9Enɛ ɔ ji mwɔnɛ mwɔnɛ be nɛ ɔ he abɛ nɛ a bu. Lɔ ɔ tsɔɔ kaa a kɛ nike nihi kɛ bɔ sami nihi be nyɛe ma ha nɔ́ nɛ dɛ́ ɔ nɛ hi kɛ pi si ngɛ he nile blɔfami 10nihi nɛ kɔɔ niye ni kɛ numi nihi kɛ he dumi slɔɔtohi nɛ ji he lo blɔ nya nihi a he nɛ a to ke a pee kɛ ya su ehe peemi be ɔ.
11Se Kristo nɛ ba ba ye ni kpakpahi nɛ maa ba amɛ a he osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a, gu bo tsu nɛ kle nɛ hi kɛ pi si nɛ pi nine nɛ a kɛ pee, lɔ ɔ ji kaa pi je nɛ ɔ mi bɔ nihi a mi nɛ e je ɔ mi, 12nɛ pohu, pi tokuhi loo na bimɛ a muɔ, se mohu lɛ nitsɛ e muɔ ɔ e kɛ sɛ he klɔuklɔu ɔ mi si kake nyɔngloo, nɛ e kɛ na neneene kpɔmi ɔ. 13Ejakaa ke nahi kɛ tokui a muɔ kɛ na bimɛ a lazu nɛ a kɛ fiãa nihi nɛ bleɔ a he ɔ nɔ ɔ fɔɔ a he nɛ a he tsɔɔ ngɛ he lo blɔfami ɔ, 14si nyɛmɛ nɔuu nɛ Kristo, nɛ gu neneene mumi ɔ nɔ ngɔ e he nɛ piami ko be he ngɔ ha Mawu ɔ muɔ be wa he ni lemi he fɔe kɛ je ni tsumi gbogboehi a mi, konɛ wa sɔmɔ Mawu hɛ kalɔ ɔ?
15Enɛ ɔ nɔuu he je nɛ e ji somi he ɔ mi dalɔ ɔ nɛ, benɛ pee nɛ e gu gbenɔ nɔ kɛ kpata kekle somi ɔ nɔ tɔmi ɔmɛ, konɛ nihi nɛ a tsɛ ɔmɛ a nine nɛ su neneene gbo si ni ɔmɛ a he si womi ɔ nɔ.
16Ejakaa he nɛ si womi nɛ haa a yeɔ gbo si ni ngɛ ɔ, e hia kaa nɔ nɛ wo si ɔ e gbo lolo, 17ejakaa si womi nɛ haa a yeɔ gbo si ni ɔ, ja si wolɔ ɔ gbo loko e naa he wami, se ke e hɛ ngɛ kɛ mwɔ ɔ, e be he wami. 18Enɛ ɔ he nɛ kekle nɔ́ ɔ hu a si we muɔ se kɛ wui ɔ nɛ. 19Ejakaa benɛ Mose fiɛ kita amɛ tsuo ngɔ tsɔɔ ma mluku ɔ kulaa ngɛ mlaa a nya a, e ngɔ na bimɛ kɛ tokuhi a muɔ kɛ nyu kɛ jijɔ he bwɔmi tsutsu kɛ hisopo, nɛ e kɛ fia womi ɔ nitsɛ kɛ ma mluku ɔ kulaa nɔ, 20e ke: “Oʼɛ, somi ɔ nɛ Mawu kã nyɛ he kita a muɔ ɔ ji nɛ ɔ nɛ.” 21Nɛ bo tsu ɔ hu kɛ Mawu jami he ni ɔmɛ kulaa, e kɛ muɔ ɔ fia nɔ ja nɔuu. 22Nɛ anɔkuale mi ɔ, e piɛ bɔɔ nɛ a kɛ muɔ tsukɔɔ nihi kulaa he ngɛ mlaa a nya; nɛ ke a pue we muɔ si ɔ, a kɛ pɛ́.
Kristo bɔsami ɔ jeɔ yayami
23Lɛɛ e hia kaa nihi nɛ ji hiɔwe ni ɔmɛ a henɔ nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, a ngɔ enɛ ɔmɛ kɛ tsukɔ he; se hiɔwe ni ɔmɛ nitsɛmɛ ɔ, bɔhi nɛ hi pe kɔlɔ ɔmɛ a kɛ tsukɔɔ he. 24Ejakaa pi he klɔuklɔu nɛ a kɛ ninehi pee nɛ ji nɔ́ ɔ nitsɛ henɔ kɛkɛ mi nɛ Kristo ya sɛ ɔ, se mohu hiɔwe nitsɛ e ya sɛ, konɛ jehanɛ ya je e he kpo ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi ha wɔ. 25Pohu e ya sɛ we lejɛ ɔ konɛ e ngɔ e he ngɔ ha daa daa, kaa bɔ nɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a ya sɛɛ he klɔuklɔu ɔ daa jeha kɛ muɔ nɛ pi lɛ nitsɛ e nɔ ɔ; 26ejakaa ke ja a, jinɛ sa kaa e na amanehlu kpiti kpiti kɛ je je mi siiije lokoo; se jehanɛ ɔ, si kake kɛkɛ a je lɛ kpo ngɛ je mi be ɔmɛ a nyagbe mi, konɛ e ngɔ lɛ nitsɛ e he nɛ e kɛ sa bɔ ɔ kɛ je yayami ɔ. 27Nɛ be abɔ nɛ e fɔɔ si ha nimli kaa si kake a gboɔ nɛ lɔ ɔ se ɔ a maa kojo mɛ ɔ, 28ja nɔuu Kristo hu, a ngɔ lɛ ngɔ ha si kake, konɛ e tloo nihi fuu a he yayami kɛ ho. E ma je e he kpo nɔ́ nɛ ji si enyɔ, pi ngɛ yayami he, se mohu konɛ e ba he ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ lɛ blɔ hyɛe ɔ a yi wami.

Title: HEBRIBI 10
Content:
1Ejakaa ni kpakpahi nɛ maa ba amɛ a nini kɛkɛ Mlaa a hɛɛ, se pi ni ɔmɛ a subai nitsɛ, lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e be nyɛe nɛ e kɛ daa jeha bɔhi nɛ a saa nɔtonɔto ɔ nɛ ha nihi nɛ baa Mawu ngɔ ɔ nɛ a hi kɛ pi si. 2Jinɛ a ko jɔɔ bɔ ɔmɛ sami, ejakaa nihi nɛ ba jaa Mawu ɔ, ke a tsukɔ a he si kake pɛ ɔ, a be fɔ ko nɛ a yeɔ ngɛ a he yayamihi a he kulaa hu. 3Se mohu bɔ ɔmɛ ɔ, kaimi a kɛ kaii yayamihi daa jeha, 4ejakaa a be nyɛe maa ngɔ nahi kɛ tokuhi a muɔ kɛ je yayamihi.
5Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, benɛ Kristo ma je nɔ mi ɔ, ye de Mawu ke:
“Bɔ kɛ nike ni ɔmɛ ɔ, o sume,
Se nɔmlɔ tso o dla ha mi
6Bɔ nɛ a kɛ lohwehi saa kɛ yayami he bɔ ɔmɛ
Sɛ́ o hɛ mi.
7Kɛkɛ nɛ i de ke: ‘Oʼɛ, i ba, Oo Mawu,
Nɛ ma ba pee o suɔmi nya ni
Kaa bɔ nɛ a ngma ngɛ ye he ngɛ Mlaa womi ɔ mi ɔ.’ ”
8Kekle ɔ e ke: “Bɔ kɛ nike nihi kɛ lohwehi a bɔhi kɛ yayami he bɔ ɔmɛ ɔ o sume, nɛ e sɛ́ o hɛ mi hulɔ,” (nihi nɛ a kɛ ba haa ngɛ Mlaa a nya a); 9kɛkɛ nɛ e ke: “Oʼɛ, i ba nɛ ma ba pee mo, Mawu, o suɔmi nya ni.” Lɔ ɔ Mawu jeɔ kekle bɔ sami ni ɔmɛ konɛ e ngɔ Kristo nɔ ɔ ngɔ ma nane mi. 10A kɛnɛ Yesu Kristo pee Mawu suɔmi nya ni he je ɔ, a tsukɔ wa he kɛ gu e nɔmlɔ tso nɛ e kɛ ha si kake nyɔngloo ɔ nɔ.
11Osɔfo tsuaa osɔfo ɔ, ligbi tsuaa ligbi ɔ, e daa si nɛ e sɔmɔɔ, nɛ e saa jamɛ a bɔ ɔmɛ nɔuu kpitikpiti, nihi nɛ nyɛ we yayami nɛ a je ligbi ko ligbi ko ɔ. 12Kristo lɛɛ e sa yayamihi a he bɔ si kake nyɔngloo, nɛ e ya hi si ngɛ Mawu hiɛ ɔ nɔ; 13nɛ nɔ́ nɛ piɛ ji kaa, e ngɛ mlɛe kɛ maa su be nɛ a maa ngɔ e henyɛli ɔmɛ kɛ maa pee e nane si maangoo. 14Ejakaa bɔ kake nɛ e sa a, e kɛ ha nihi nɛ a tsukɔ a he ɔ hi kɛ pi si nyɔngloo.
15Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ hu yeɔ wɔ odase. Kekleekle ɔ, e ke:
16“Enɛ ɔ ji somi nɛ i kɛ mɛ maa so
Ngɛ jamɛ a ligbi ɔmɛ a se, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ lɛ de:
I kɛ ye mlaa amɛ maa wo a tsui mi,
Nɛ ma ngma ngɔ wo a juɛmi mi
17Nɛ a he yayami ɔmɛ kɛ a nɔ tɔmi ɔmɛ ɔ, i be kaie kulaa hu.”
18Nɛ he nɛ a kɛ enɔmɛ pa ngɛ ɔ, yayami he bɔ sami ko be hu.
Nyɛ ha waa hɛ kɛ su Mawu he
19Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mamimɛ, akɛnɛ wa ngɛ he blɔ ngɛ Yesu muɔ ɔ nya nɛ wa kɛ maa sɛ he klɔuklɔu ɔ 20ngɛ blɔ he nɛ hɛ ngɛ nɛ e je ha wɔ ɔ kɛ gu tsu mi pomi bo ɔ nɛ ji lɛ nitsɛ e he lo ɔ mi, 21nɛ jehanɛ wa ngɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma ngua nɛ yeɔ Mawu we ɔ nɔ he je ɔ, 22nyɛ ha waa hɛ kɛ su Mawu he kɛ tsui klɔuu ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ wa ngɛ he wami ngɛ nɔ ɔ mi, kɛ tsui hu nɛ a tsukɔ he nɛ e be he ni lemi yaya ko hulɔ, kɛ nɔmlɔ tso nɛ a kɛ nyu nɛ mi tsɔ du he. 23Nyɛ ha waa pɛtɛ wa hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ wa jaje ɔ mi wawɛɛ, ejakaa nɔ nɛ wo si ɔ anɔkualetsɛ ji lɛ. 24Nyɛ ha wa susu wa sibi a he, konɛ wa hɛ nɛ e dɔ ngɛ suɔmi kɛ ni tsumi kpakpahi a he. 25Nyɛ ko ha waa jɔɔ wa he nya buami, kaa bɔ nɛ ni komɛ pɔɔ peemi ɔ, se mohu waa wo wa he ga, nɛ titli ɔ, akɛnɛ nyɛ na kaa Ligbi ɔ ngɛ sue nɛ ɔ.
26Ejakaa ke wa bua nɛ wa peɔ yayami ngɛ benɛ wa le anɔkuale ɔ se ɔ, lɛɛ yayamihi a he bɔsami ko be hu, 27kojomi blɔ hyemi nɛ ngɛ gbeye kɛkɛ, kɛ la gligli nɛ maa sa nihi nɛ nyɛɛ Mawu ɔ. 28Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ kuaa Mose Mlaa a, a gbee lɛ, nɛ a nɛ́ lɛ mɔbɔ ngɛ ni enyɔ loo ni etɛ a dase yemi nya. 29Mɛni tuegblami nɛ nya wa po nyɛ susu kaa e sa nɔmlɔ ko nɛ bui Mawu Bi ɔ, nɛ e bu somi muɔ nɛ a kɛ tsukɔ e he ɔ kaa yaka nɔ ko, nɛ e pee dloomi mumi ɔ nidɔ ni ɔ? 30Ejakaa wa le nɔ nɛ de ke: “Ye nɔ ji tue gblami, imi ma wo he hiɔ” ɔ. Nɛ jehanɛ: “Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ maa kojo lɛ nitsɛ e ma a.” 31Mawu hɛ kalɔ ɔ dɛ mi nɔmi ngɛ gbeye pam.
32Se nyɛ kai kekle be ɔmɛ, benɛ Mawu la a tso ngɛ nyɛ nɔ ɔ, bɔ nɛ nyɛ mia nyɛ hɛ mi ngɛ amanehlu babauu mi. 33Be komɛ ɔ jemi kɛ amanehlu sɔuu ha nyɛ plɛ hyemi nihi, nɛ be komɛ hu nyɛ plɛ nihi nɛ a pee mɛ ja amɛ a huɛmɛ nɔnali. 34Nyɛ muklii mi sa nyɛ ngɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ a bɔ mɛ pa amɛ a he, nɛ nyɛ nihi nɛ a ha amɛ hu nyɛɛ kɛ bua jɔmi kplɛɛ, akɛnɛ nyɛ le kaa nyɛ ngɛ juetli nɛ hi pe kɔlɔ ɔ babauu nɛ hii si daa ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ. 35Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ ko ngmɛɛ nyɛ mi kã a he, ejakaa e ngɛ hiɔwo ngua. 36Tsui si tomi he hia nyɛ, konɛ nyɛɛ pee Mawu suɔmi nya ni, nɛ nyɛ nine nɛ e su siwomi ɔ nɔ. 37Ejakaa kaa bɔ nɛ ngmami ɔ de ɔ:
“E piɛ bɔɔ kɛkɛ
Nɛ nɔ nɛ ma a maa ba,
Nɛ e be kɛe kulaa;
38Se zdalɔ nɛ je hemi kɛ yemi mi ɔ
Yi ma na wa;
Nɛ ke e kpale kɛ je ye se ɔ
Ye klaa be e he buajɔmi nae.”
39Se wɔɔ lɛɛ tsa pi nihi nɛ kpaleɔ kɛ yaa hɛ mi patami mi mi ɔ a ti nikomɛ ji wɔ se mohu wɔ ji nihi nɛ kɛ hemi kɛ yemi naa a klaa yi wami hemi ɔ a ti ni komɛ.

Title: HEBRIBI 11
Content:
Hemi kɛ yemi
1Hemi kɛ yemi ji nihi nɛ wa hɛ ngɛ nɔ ɔmɛ a nɔ he waminami kɛ nihi nɛ a nɛ́ ɔmɛ a nɔ mi mami. 2Ejakaa lɔ ɔ mi a ye blemabi ɔmɛ a he odase kpakpa ngɛ.
3Hemi kɛ yemi waa kɛ yoɔ kaa Mawu munyu a kɛ bɔ je ɔ, lɔ ɔ he ɔ nihi nɛ a naa amɛ a mi a je kɛ pee nihi nɛ a nɛ́ ɔmɛ.
4Hemi kɛ yemi Habel kɛ sa bɔ nɛ pe Kain nɔ ɔ ha Mawu, nɛ lɔ ɔ he hulɔ nɛ a ye e he odase kaa dalɔ ji lɛ ɔ nɛ, ejakaa Mawu he e nike ni ɔmɛ; nɛ kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu e kɛ ngɛ munyu tue kɔ mwɔ pohu e gbo.
5Hemi kɛ yemi he a ngɔ Henok kɛ ho hiɔwe ya, konɛ e ko gbo, nɛ a nɛ lɛ hu, ejakaa Mawu ngɔ lɛ kɛ ho. Ngmami ɔ ye e he odase kaa loko a maa ngɔ lɛ kɛ ho ɔ, Henok sa Mawu hɛ mi. 6Ke hemi kɛ yemi be ɔ, a be Mawu hɛ mi nyɛe maa sa, ejakaa nɔ nɛ baa Mawu ngɔ ɔ, ja e he ye kaa e ngɛ, nɛ e ji ninɛmɛ nɛ hlaa e se blɔ ɔ a hiɔ wolɔ hulɔ.
7Hemi kɛ yemi Noa hu kɛ bu Mawu tue, benɛ e fa lɛ ngɛ nihi nɛ a nɛ́ ɔmɛ a he ɔ, nɛ e kɛ dla daka kɛ ha e we ɔ yi wami hemi; e hemi kɛ yemi nɛ ɔ nɔ hu e gu nɛ e bu je ɔ fɔ, nɛ e kɛ na dami nɛ je hemi kɛ yemi mi.
8Hemi kɛ yemi Abraham kɛ bu tue, benɛ a tsɛ lɛ ɔ, nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho he nɛ Mawu wo lɛ si ke e ma ngɔ ha lɛ ɔ ya; nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho, pohu e li he nɛ e yaa. 9Hemi kɛ yemi e kɛ ya to nibwɔ ngɛ si womi zugba a nɔ kaa nɔ kpa, nɛ e kɛ Isak kɛ Yakob nɛ e kɛ mɛ ji jamɛ a si womi ɔ nɔuu yeli ɔ hi si ngɛ bo tsuhi a mi; 10ejakaa Abraham ngɛ ma nɛ ngɛ sisi tomi nɛ he wa nɛ e tolɔ kɛ e malɔ ji Mawu ɔ blɔ hyɛe.
11Hemi kɛ yemi Sara hu kɛ na he wami nɛ e kɛ na muklii, nɛ lɛ nɛ e bwɔ tsɔ kɛ be nɔ ɔ fɔ, ejakaa nɔ nɛ wo si ɔ, e bu lɛ anɔkualetsɛ. 12Lɔ ɔ he hulɔ nɛ a je nɔ kake nɛ ngɛ kaa nɔ nɛ gbo mo ɔ mi nɛ a fɔ nihi nɛ hiɛ babauu kaa hiɔwe dodoehi loo wo nya zia nɛ a be nyɛe maa kane ɔ nɛ.
13Hemi kɛ yemi mi ni nɛ ɔmɛ kulaa gbo ngɛ. Lokoo kɛkɛ a na nihi nɛ a wo he si ɔmɛ ngɛ, nɛ a nya he, pohu a nine sui nɔ, nɛ a ye odase kaa nibwɔhi kɛ masetsɛmɛ ji mɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ? 14Ejakaa nihi nɛ deɔ jamɛ a ni ɔmɛ ɔ, a tsɔɔ faii kaa a ngɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a ma hlae. 15Nɛ kaa a hɛ ngɛ ma nɛ a je mi ɔ nɔ jinɛ, a ko na he blɔ kɛ ko kpale a se kɛ ho lejɛ ɔ ya ekohu. 16Se jehanɛ, a ngɛ ma ko nɛ hi pe lɔ ɔ nɛ ji hiɔwe nɔ ɔ hlae. Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e pee we Mawu zo kaa a ma tsɛ lɛ a Mawu, ejakaa e dla ma ngɔ to mɛ.
17Hemi kɛ yemi nya Abraham ngɔ Isak ngɔ ha kaa bɔ, benɛ a ka lɛ ɔ, nɛ e kɛ e bi kake ɔ ba ha, benɛ e nine su si womi ɔ nɔ momo ɔ, 18lɛ nɔ nɛ Mawu de lɛ ke: “Isak mi a maa je kɛ tsɛ o nina,” a. 19Abraham ngɔ lɛ kaa Mawu ngɛ he wami nɛ e kɛ ma tle Isak si kɛ je gbeje tete, nɛ niinɛ, ke a ma de ngɛ blɔ ko nɔ ɔ, e nine su e nɔ kɛ je lejɛ ɔ.
20Hemi kɛ yemi Isak kɛ gbaa Yakob kɛ Esau ngɛ nihi nɛ maa ba amɛ a he.
21Hemi kɛ yemi Yakob kɛ gbaa Yosef bi ɔmɛ a ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ benɛ e miɔ nɛ e ma gbo ɔ, nɛ e ma e yi si ngɛ e dɛma tso ɔ nɔ nɛ e sɔle.
22Hemi kɛ yemi Yosef hu kɛ wo Israelbi ɔmɛ a Mizraim jemi ɔ nɔ ta benɛ e su e gbenɔ be ɔ, nɛ e wo lɛ nitsɛ e wu ɔmɛ a he kita a.
23Hemi kɛ yemi Mose fɔli ɔmɛ ngɔ lɛ ngɔ laa hlami etɛ, benɛ a fɔ lɛ ɔ, ejakaa a na kaa jokuɛ ɔ he ngɛ fɛu, nɛ a yi matsɛ hiɔngɔ nɛ e wo ɔ gbeye.
24Hemi kɛ yemi he nɛ Mose nitsɛ, benɛ e wa a, e kua ke a ko tsɛ lɛ Farao biyo ɔ bi, 25e suɔ mohu kaa e kɛ Mawu ma a nɛ na amanehlu, pe nɔ́ nɛ e maa ye yayami mi ngɔmi be bɔɔ ko. 26E bu Kristo ahluabɔmi ɔ kaa ni babauu pe Mizraim juetli, ejakaa e ngɛ hiɔwo ɔ hyɛe.
27Hemi kɛ yemi Mose kɛ je Mizraim nɛ e yi matsɛ ɔ mi mi fumi ɔ gbeye; e kpale we e se, kaa nɔ nɛ ngɛ Mawu nɛ a nɛ́ lɛ ɔ hyɛe. 28Hemi kɛ yemi Mose kɛ to Hetsɔmi ɔ kɛ muɔ dikimi ɔ sisi, konɛ bɔfo nɔ hɛ mi kpatalɔ ɔ ko ba gbe Israelbi ɔmɛ a bi tete ɔmɛ.
29Hemi kɛ yemi Israelbi ɔmɛ kɛ po Wo Tsu ɔ kaa zugba gbligbli, nɔ́ nɛ Mizraimbi ɔmɛ hu ka peemi se wo ɔ ngɔ mɛ kɛ ho ɔ.
30Hemi kɛ yemi nya Yeriko gli ɔmɛ kuɔ pue si, benɛ Israelbi ɔmɛ bɔle lɛ ligbi kpaago ɔ. 31Hemi kɛ yemi he nɛ Rahab, yaholɔ ɔ, kɛ nihi nɛ piɛ e he nɛ he we Mawu yi ɔ gbo we ɔ nɛ, ejakaa e he slaali ɔmɛ kɛ bua jɔmi.
32Nɛ mɛni ma de ekohu? Ejakaa i be ye he deka nae bɔ nɛ ma kɛ sɛɛ Gideon kɛ Barak, Samson kɛ Yefta, David kɛ Samuel, kɛ gbali ɔmɛ hulɔ a he sane, 33nihi nɛ gu hemi kɛ yemi nɔ ye matsɛ yemihi a nɔ kunimi, a tsu dami nihi, a nine su si womihi a nɔ, a tsi jatahi a nya, 34a gbe la he wami, a je klaatehi a nya, a na he wami kɛ je gbɔlemi mi, a he wa ngɛ ta mi, a bu masetsɛmɛ a ta a. 35Yihi a nine su a nihi nɛ gbo ɔmɛ a nɔ ekohu kɛ gu si temi nɔ. Se ni kpa komɛ hu, a kɛ piimi gbe mɛ, akɛnɛ a kplɛɛ we kpɔmi, konɛ a te si kɛ ya wami kpakpa mi ɔ. 36Ni komɛ hu a ye a he fɛu nɛ a fia mɛ kplibi. Nɛ a bɔ mɛ pa nɛ a wo mɛ tsu mi; 37a fia mɛ tɛ, a kɛ sau poo a mi, a kɛ klaate gbe mɛ; a ha a wo jijɔhi kɛ apletsihi a he womi kɛ nyɛɛ, ohia hia mɛ, a wa mɛ yi mi, a pee mɛ ni yeyee; 38je ɔ hi ha mɛ. A wo lalaalo ngɛ nga kɛ yokuhi a nɔ kɛ tɛ puɔhi kɛ zugba puɔhi a mi.
39Nɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo ɔ, a ye a he odase kpakpa ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ he mohu, se a nine sui si womi ni ɔmɛ a nɔ, 40ejakaa Mawu dla nɔ́ ko kpakpa ngɔ to wɔ, konɛ a ko hi kɛ pi si si wɔ.

Title: HEBRIBI 12
Content:
Wa Tsɛ Mawu
1Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, jehanɛ wɔ hu, be abɔ nɛ wa ngɛ odase yeli babauu nɛ mimla wɔ kaa bɔku nɛ ɔ, nyɛ ha wa je nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ tsiɔ wa nya kɛ yayami nɛ fi wɔ ɔ, nɛ waa kɛ hɛ mi miami nɛ tu fo nɛ fɔɔ si ngɛ wa hɛ mi ɔ, 2nɛ waa hyɛ hemi kɛ yemi sisi jelɔ kɛ nya gbelɔ nɛ ji Yesu ɔ, nɔ nɛ nyami nɛ fɔɔ si ngɛ e hɛ mi ɔ he ɔ, e mia e hɛ mi ngɛ seumi tso ɔ he amanehlu ɔ mi, nɛ e bui zo ɔ, nɛ e kɛ ya hi si ngɛ Mawu matsɛ sɛ ɔ hiɛ ɔ nɔ.
3Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ susu nɔ mi nɛ e gblee, bɔ nɛ e to e tsui si ngɛ si nɛ yayami peeli te ngɔ si lɛ ɔ mi, konɛ nyɛ nine mi ko wo nyu nɛ nyɛ ngmɛɛ he. 4Ngɛ nyɛɛ kɛ yayami ta nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, nyɛ sui he nɛ a ma pue nyɛ muɔ si ngɛ ɔ lolo. 5Anɛ nyɛ hɛ je bua womi munyu nɛ kɛ nyɛ tuɔ munyu kaa bɔ nɛ a kɛ bimɛ tuɔ munyu ɔ nɔ? ke:
“Ye bi, koo ngɔ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ tsɔsemi ɔ kaa
nɔ ko nyafii,
Nɛ jehanɛ ke e ka o hɛ mi ɔ, ko ha o nine mi nɛ wo nyu;
6Ejakaa nɔ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ suɔ ɔ, lɛ e tsɔseɔ,
Nɛ e fiaa bi tsuaa bi nɛ e ngɔ peɔ e nɔ ɔ kpa.”
7Nyɛ mia nyɛ hɛ mi ngɛ nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ nae ɔ mi kaa e ji Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ tsɔsemi; ejakaa te bi nɛ ngɛ nɛ e tsɛ tsɔse we lɛ nɛɛ? 8Ke nyɛ na we tsɔsemi nɛ nihi tsuo naa a eko ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ ajuama bimɛ ji nyɛ, se pi bimɛ nitsɛmɛ. 9Jehanɛ wa ngɛ he lo blɔfami tsɛmɛ nɛ tsɔseɔ wɔ nɛ wa buu mɛ; anɛ e sɛ́ kaa waa ba wa he si ngɔ ha mumihi a tsɛ ɔ mohu babauu konɛ wa yi nɛ e na wa? 10Ejaka mɛɛ lɛɛ, be bɔɔ ko kɛkɛ a tsɔseɔ wɔ bɔ nɛ sa a hɛ mi; se Mawu lɛɛ, e tsɔseɔ wɔ, konɛ e hi ha wɔ konɛ wa na e klɔuklɔu peemi ɔ eko. 11Se tsɔsemi tsuaa tsɔsemi ɔ, a mlɔ nɛ ɔ ɔ, e pee we nɔ kaa bua jɔmi nɔ́, se dɔmi nɔ́ mohu; se ke pee se ɔ, e woɔ he jɔmi yiblii nɛ ji dami ɔ haa nihi nɛ gu nɔ kase nɔ́ ko ɔ.
Nitsɔɔmi kɛ kɔkɔbɔmi
12Lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ wo ninehi nɛ mi jɔ ɔmɛ a nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ kpa nakutsohi nɛ gbɔle ɔmɛ a mi, 13nɛ nyɛɛ nyɛɛ blɔ nɛ da nɔ, konɛ pɔtsɛ ko nɛ ko sane si, se mohu a tsa lɛ.
14Nyɛɛ bɔ mɔde nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ nihi kulaa nɛ hi si ngɛ he jɔmi mi, kɛ he tsɔmi nɛ ke nɔ ko si nɛ e be Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nae ɔ. 15Nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ hi, konɛ nɔ ko ko ngmɛɛ Mawu dloomi ɔ he, konɛ poku kɛ doomi ko ko puɛ nɛ e hao nyɛ nɛ e ble nihi fuu kɛ e duɔ ɔ; 16konɛ nɔ ko ko pee e he ajuama bɔlɔ, loo yaka nɔmlɔ kaa Esau nɛ jua e bi tete blɔ nya a kɛ he si kake niye ni ɔ. 17Ejakaa nyɛ le kaa, benɛ pee se nɛ e hla kaa e na gbaami ɔ, a kua lɛ; ejakaa e na we tsui tsakemi he blɔ, pohu e kɛ vo nyu hla se blɔ.
18Ejakaa nyɛ bɛ yoku nɛ a taa he nɛ ngɛ sae kɛ la, kɛ bɔku kɛ diblii kɛ kɔɔhiɔ ngua, 19kɛ titimati pɛmi, kɛ gbi pɛmi nɛ nihi nɛ nu ɔ kpa pɛɛ ke a ko tu e ko piɛ he hu ɔ he; 20ejakaa mlaa nɛ a wo ke: “Ke lohwe ko tete ta yoku ɔ he ɔ, a fia lɛ tɛ” ɔ, a nyɛ we nɔ nɛ a ye; 21nɛ nɔ́ nɛ e na a ngɛ gbeye babauu tsɔ nɛ Mose ke: “I ngɛ gbeye yee, nɛ i he ngɛ doe blibliibli.”
22Se mohu, Zion yoku ɔ he nyɛ ba, kɛ Mawu hɛ kalɔ ma nɛ ji hiɔwe Yerusalem ɔ, kɛ hiɔwe bɔfohi akpe akpehi abɔ, 23kɛ kekleekle bimɛ nɛ a ngma a biɛ ngɛ hiɔwe, kɛ Mawu nɛ ji nihi kulaa a kojolɔ ɔ, kɛ dali nɛ hi kɛ pi si ɔmɛ a mumi ɔmɛ, 24kɛ Yesu nɛ ji somi he midalɔ ɔ, kɛ muɔ nɛ a kɛ fia nɛ tuɔ munyu kpakpa pe Habel nɔ ɔ ngɔ.
25Nyɛɛ hyɛ nɛ hi konɛ nyɛ ko kua nɔ nɛ ngɛ munyu tue ɔ munyu ɔ, ejakaa ke nihi nɛ kua nɔ nɛ tu munyu tsɔɔ mɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ munyu ɔ a he ji mi ɔ, lɛɛ ke wa kpale kɛ je nɔ nɛ jee hiɔwe tuɔ munyu ɔ se ɔ, wɔ mohu wa he be mi jee kɔkɔɔkɔ; 26nɔ gbi nɛ mimiɛ zugba a ngɛ lɛ be ɔ mi ɔ, se jehanɛ e wo si ke: “E piɛ si kake nɛ ma mimiɛ, pi zugba a kɛkɛ, se hiɔwe hulɔ,” ɔ. 27Munyu nɛ ke: “E piɛ si kake” ɔ, e kɛ tsɔɔ faii kaa, nihi nɛ a mimiɛ ɔmɛ ma tsake, ejakaa nihi nɛ a bɔ ʼi, konɛ nihi nɛ be mimiɛe ɔmɛ nɛ hi si.
28Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, akɛnɛ wa na matsɛ yemi nɛ a be nyɛe ma mimiɛ nɛ ɔ ɔ, nyɛ ha waa na si, nɛ wa kɛ sɔmɔ Mawu bɔ nɛ sa e hɛ mi kɛ bu kɛ gbeye yemi; 29ejakaa wa Mawu ɔ la nɛ puɛɔ nɔ hu ji lɛ.

Title: HEBRIBI 13
Content:
Mawu hɛ mi sami
1Nyɛɛ ya nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ suɔ nyɛ he daa kaa nyɛmimɛ. 2Nibwɔ peemi hu, nyɛ hɛ ko je nɔ, ejakaa lɔɔ nɔ ni komɛ gu kɛ pee hiɔwe bɔfohi nibwɔ, nɛ a li. 3Nyɛ kai ninɛmɛ nɛ a wo mɛ tsu mi ɔ kaa nɔ́ nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ mɛ lɛ ngɛ tsuɔ mi, kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ nɔ nae ɔ, akɛnɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ ngɛ nɔmlɔ tso mi kɛ mwɔ ɔ.
4A wo gba hɛ mi nyami ngɛ nyɛ kulaa nyɛ kpɛti, nɛ a ko ble gba sa a hulɔ; se ajuama bɔli kɛ gba puɛli ɔmɛ ɔ, Mawu maa kojo mɛ.
5Sika suɔmi nɛ ko sɛ nyɛ si himi mi, nɛ nyɛ bua nɛ jɔ nihi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ ɔ he, ejakaa Mawu ke: “I be mo sie, nɛ jehanɛ hu i be mo kuae ligbi ko ligbi ko.” 6Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, wa ma de kɛ kã ke:
“Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ji ye he piɛlɔ,
I be gbeye yee;
Mɛni nɔmlɔ ma nyɛ mi pee?”
7Nyɛ kai nyɛ hɛ mi nyɛɛli, nihi nɛ tu Mawu munyu tsɔɔ nyɛ ɔ; nyɛɛ hyɛ a je mi si himi ɔ nyagbe, nɛ nyɛɛ kase a hemi kɛ yemi ɔ. 8Yesu Kristo ɔ, bɔ nɛ e ngɛ hiɛ̃ kɛ mwɔnɛ ɔ, ja nɔuu e ngɛ kɛ yaa neneene. 9Nyɛ ko ha nɛ Tsɔɔmi slɔɔtohi kɛ tsɔɔmi kpahi kɛ nyɛ nɛ lilaa si; ejakaa e hi kaa a kɛ Mawu dloomi nɛ wo wa tsui he wami, se pi niye ni nɛ ha we nɛ nihi nɛ tsuɔ he ni ɔmɛ a na se ko ɔ.
10Wa ngɛ bɔ sami latɛ ko nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ sɔmɔɔ ngɛ bo tsu ɔ mi ɔ be he blɔ kaa a yeɔ e nɔ ni; 11ejakaa lohwehi nɛ osɔfo nɔkɔtɔma a ngɔɔ a muɔ kɛ yaa he klɔuklɔu ɔ ngɛ yayami he ɔ a gbogboe ɔmɛ ɔ, a ya sãa ngɛ sada a se. 12Lɔ ɔ he ɔ Yesu hu, benɛ pee nɛ e kɛ lɛ nitsɛ e muɔ ɔ nɛ tsukɔ ma a he ɔ, a gbo ɔ se e na amanehlu ɔ ngɛ. 13Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, jeha nɛ, nyɛ ha waa je kpo kɛ ya e ngɔ ngɛ sada a se nɛ wa ya tloo e ahlua bɔmi ɔ. 14Ejakaa wa be ma nɛ ngɛ daa ngɛ hiɛ ɔ, se ma nɛ maa ba a mohu se blɔ wa ngɛ hlae. 15Lɛɛ nyɛ ha nɛ waa gu Yesu nɔ nɛ waa kɛ yi jemi bɔ ba ha Mawu daa; kɔlɔ ɔ ji waa jaje e biɛ ɔ yi jemi kɛ wa nya. 16Nyɛ hɛ ko je kpakpa peemi kɛ ni kemi nɔ, ejakaa jamɛ a bɔ ɔmɛ saa Mawu hɛ mi saminya.
17Nyɛɛ bu nyɛ tsɔɔli ɔmɛ tue nɛ nyɛɛ ba nyɛ he si ngɔ ha mɛ; ejakaa mɛ lɛ a buu nyɛ klaa amɛ a he kaa nihi nɛ maa bu he akɔtaa, konɛ a kɛ bua jɔmi nɛ pee ni nɛ ɔmɛ, se pi kɛ zanue lami, ejakaa kɔlɔ ɔ hi ha nyɛ.
18Nyɛɛ sɔle ha wɔ, ejakaa wa ngɛ nɔ mi mami kaa wa ngɛ he nile kpakpa, nɛ wa ngɛ hlae kaa waa ba wa je mi saminyayoo ngɛ nihi kulaa mi. 19Nɛ i kpa nyɛ pɛɛ babauu kaa nyɛ kpa pɛɛ ha mi, konɛ a kpale mi ha nyɛ mla.
Sɔlemi
20He jɔmi Mawu ɔ, nɔ nɛ je to ɔmɛ a hyɛlɔ ngua nɛ ji wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu kɛ je gbeje ngɛ neneene somi ɔ muɔ ɔ mi ɔ, 21lɛ e dla nyɛ ngɔ ha ni tsumi kpakpa tsuaa ni tsumi kpakpa, nɛ nyɛɛ pee e suɔmi nya ni, nɛ e gu Yesu Kristo nɔ nɛ e pee nɔ́ nɛ sa lɛ nitsɛ e hɛ mi ngɛ nyɛ mi; lɛ a ngɔ hɛ mi nyami ngɔ ha kɛ ya si neneene kɛ neneene ɔ! Amen.
Nyagbe sɛyemi
22Se, mamimɛ, i kpa nyɛ pɛɛ nɛ nyɛɛ pɛtɛ munyu tumi kɛ tsɔɔmi nɛ ɔ he, ejakaa munyu kpiti i ngma mane nyɛ nɛ ɔ nɛ. 23I ngɛ hlae nɛ nyɛɛ le kaa a ngmɛɛ wa nyɛmi Timoteo he, nɛ ke e ba mla a, i kɛ lɛ maa ba ba na nyɛ.
24Wa biɔ nyɛ tsɔɔli ɔmɛ kulaa kɛ ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ tsuo pɛpɛɛpe. Ninɛmɛ nɛ je Italia a ke a biɔ nyɛ.
25Dloomi ɔ kɛ nyɛ kulaa nɛ hi si! Amen.

Title: YAKOBO 1
Content:
1Yakobo, nɛ ji Mawu kɛ Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo sɔmɔlɔ ɔ, ngma ya ha wɛtso nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ nɛ gbɛ fia a:
Nyɛ he manye!
Hemi kɛ yemi kɛ nilemi
2Mamimɛ, ke nyɛ sɛ ka slɔɔtohi fuu a mi ɔ, nyɛɛ bu lɛ kaa bua jɔmi sɔuu; 3ejakaa nyɛ le kaa kami nɛ a kaa nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ tsɛɛ tsui si tomi kɛ baa. 4Nyɛ ha tsui si tomi ɔ nɛ gbe e nitsumi nya kɛ pi si, konɛ nyɛɛ hi kɛ pi si, nɛ nyɛɛ su, nɛ e ko piɛ nyɛ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko. 5Se ke e hia nyɛ ti nɔ ko ni lemi ɔ, e kpa Mawu nɛ haa nihi kulaa faa kɛ bua jɔmi nɛ e ka we nɔ hɛ mi ɔ pɛɛ, nɛ e ma ngɔ ha lɛ. 6Se e kpa pɛɛ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi mi, nɛ e ko je nɔ́, ejakaa nɔ jelɔ ɔ e ngɛ kaa oslɔke nɛ kɔɔhiɔ fiaa kɛ yaa kɛ baa. 7Jamɛ a nɔmlɔ ko ko susu kaa e ma na nɔ́ ko kɛ je Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ dɛ mi; 8juɛmi enyɔenyɔtsɛ ko nyɛɛ we tutuutu ngɛ e blɔhi a nɔ.
Ohia kɛ ninami
9Nyɛmi nɛ ji ohiafo ɔ, e fia ke Mawu wo e nɔ ɔ, 10nɛ niatsɛ ɔ, e fia ke Mawu ba lɛ si, ejakaa e ma ngla kaa nga mi mɔmɔ. 11Ejakaa pu tee si nɛ e tsoo nɛ e gbliɔ nga a, nɛ e mɔmɔ ɔmɛ wɔleɔ pueɔ si nɛ e fɛu ɔ puɛɔ. Ja nɔuu niatsɛ hu hɛ mi ma kpata ngɛ e blɔ ɔmɛ a nɔ.
Kami
12Agbaa nyumu nɛ toɔ e tsui si ngɛ ka mi, ejakaa ke a ka lɛ nɛ e nyɛ nya da a, e ma na wami jlasi nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ wo he si ha ninɛmɛ nɛ suɔ lɛ ɔ. 13Ke a ka nɔ ko ɔ, e ko de ke: ‘Mawu ngɔ a je kɛ ka mi.’ Ejakaa Mawu ɔ a kɛ́ lɛ ngɛ ni yayamihi a mi, nɛ lɛ nitsɛ hu e kɛ́ nɔ ko. 14Se nɔ tsuaa nɔ ɔ, lɛ nitsɛ e kɔnɔ nɛ gblaa lɛ nɛ mlɔɔ lɛ ɔ lɛ kaa lɛ. 15Lɔ ɔ se ɔ akɔnɔ ɔ, ke e ngɔ ho ɔ, e fɔɔ yayami, nɛ yayami hu, ke e wa a, e fɔɔ gbenɔ.
16Nyɛ ko ha nɛ a mlɔɔ nyɛ, mamimɛ nɛ i suɔ.
17Dloomi ni kpakpahi kulaa kɛ nike ni nɛ hi kɛ pi si kulaa a, hiɔwe e jee kɛ kpleɔ si, kɛ jee Mawu nɛ ji lahi a tsɛ ɔ ngɔ, nɔ nɛ mi nɛ su tsakemi kɛ plɛmi ko be ɔ. 18Lɛ nitsɛ e suɔmi nya a kɛ anɔkuale munyu ɔ fɔ wɔ, konɛ waa pee e nibɔ ni ɔmɛ a mi kekleekle yiblii.
Numi kɛ peemi
19Mamimɛ nɛ i suɔ, nyɛ kai enɛ ɔ nɛ nyɛ hɛ nɛ ko je nɔ. Nɔ tsuaa nɔ he nɛ sɔ kɛ nɔ numi, e humi si kɛ munyu tumi, e muklii mi nɛ ko fu mla. 20Ejakaa nyumu muklii mi fumi tsu we Mawu dami nya ni. 21Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ sake mu ni tsumi kɛ subai yayamihi kulaa ngɔ pue he, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ he si bami nɛ he munyu ɔ nɛ a du ngɛ nyɛ mi nɛ ngɛ he wami nɛ e kɛ ma he nyɛ klaa yi wami ɔ.
22Nyɛɛ pee munyu ɔ nɔ yeli, se pi munyu ɔ nuli kɛkɛ, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ mlɔɔ nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ he. 23Ejakaa ke nɔ ko ji munyu ɔ nulɔ kɛkɛ se pi e nɔ yelɔ hulɔ ɔ, kikɛmɛ a nɔmlɔ nɛ ɔ ngɛ kaa nyumu ko nɛ hyɛɛ e hɛ mi su ɔ ngɛ ahuhuɛ mi; 24ejakaa e hyɛɛ e he, nɛ e jee kɛ yaa nɛ amlɔ ɔ nɔuu ɔ, e hɛ jee bɔ nɛ e ngɛ ɔ nɔ. 25Se nɔ nɛ hyɛɛ he yemi mlaa nɛ hi kɛ pi si kãii, nɛ e hɛ hii he be tsuaa be, nɛ e pi nɔ nɛ nuɔ nɛ e hɛ jee nɔ, se mohu e ji e nɔ yelɔ nɛ tsuɔ he ni ɔ, jamɛ a tsɛ ɔ Mawu maa gbaa lɛ ngɛ e nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ peemi mi.
26Se ke e peɔ nyɛ ti nɔ ko kaa Mawu jalɔ ji lɛ nɛ e kɔɛ e lilɛ mi ɔ, e ngɛ e he sisie, nɛ kikɛmɛ a nɔmlɔ nɔ jami ɔ ji yaka. 27Mawu jami nɛ he tsɔ nɛ he be mu ko ngɛ Mawu tsɛ ɔ hɛ mi ji nɛ ɔ nɛ, kaa a slaa ahusahi kɛ yalɔyi ngɛ a hiamihi a mi, nɛ e to e he nɛ je ɔ ko wo e he mu.

Title: YAKOBO 2
Content:
Hɛ mi hyɛmi he kɔkɔ bɔmi
1Mamimɛ, nyɛɛ kɛ nihi a hɛ mi hyɛmi ko futu wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo nɛ ji hɛ mi nyami Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mi. 2Ejakaa ke nyumu ko nɛ wo sika ga kɛ tade nɛ ngɛ fɛu ba sɛ nyɛ kpe he ɔ, nɛ ohiafo ko hu nɛ wo tade yaya ba sɛ mi, 3nɛ nyɛ bu nɔ nɛ wo tade nɛ ngɛ fɛu ɔ, nɛ nyɛ de lɛ ke: “Moo lɛɛ ba hi he kpakpa nɛ ɔ;” nɛ ohiafo ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ de lɛ ke: “Moo lɛɛ da lejɛ ɔ,” aloo “Ba hi ye nane nya ngɛ hiɛ ɔ” ɔ, 4anɛ pi nihi a mi nɛ nyɛ ngɛ hlae ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ juɛmi yayami ngɛ kojoe nɛ ɔ lo?
5Mamimɛ nɛ i suɔ, nyɛɛ bu tue! Anɛ pi je nɛ ɔ mi ohiafohi nɛ ji niatsɛmɛ ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi blɔfami ɔ nɛ Mawu hla, konɛ matsɛyemi nɛ e wo he si ngɔ ha ninɛmɛ nɛ a suɔ lɛ ɔ nɛ e pee a nɔ lo? 6Nɛ nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ gbee ohiafo ɔ he guɛ. Anɛ pi niatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ nɛ yeɔ nyɛ nɔ wawɛɛ, nɛ mɛ nɔuu lɛ a kpakaa nyɛ kɛ yaa kojomi he ɔmɛ? 7Anɛ pi mɛ nɔuu nɛ a gbee biɛ kpakpa nɛ a kɛ tsɛɔ nyɛ ɔ he guɛ ɔ lo?
8Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ke nyɛ ye kita nɛ ji Mlaa a mi go nɛ deɔ ke: “Suɔ o nyɛmi kaa bɔ nɛ o suɔ mo nitsɛ o he” ɔ nɔ ngɛ ngmami ɔ nya a, lɛɛ nyɛ ngɛ pee saminya. 9Se ke nihi a hɛ mi nyɛ hyɛɛ ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ ngɛ yayami pee nɛ Mlaa a buu nyɛ fɔ kaa mlaa tɔli. 10Ejakaa nɔ nɛ maa ye Mlaa mluku ɔ kulaa nɔ tete, se e ma tɔ ngɛ kake mi ɔ, e tɔ kulaa nɔ. 11Ejakaa nɔ nɛ de ke: “Koo bɔ ajuama” a, lɛ nɔuu lɛ de ke: “Koo gbe nɔmlɔ.” Nɛ ke o bɔɛ ajuama, se o gbee nɔmlɔ ɔ, mlaa tɔlɔ ji mo. 12Nyɛɛ tu munyu nɛ nyɛɛ pee nyɛ nihi kaa nihi nɛ he yemi mlaa a kɛ maa kojo mɛ. 13Ejakaa kojomi mi ɔ, nɔ nɛ nɛ́ mɔbɔ ɔ, a be lɛ mɔbɔ nae; mɔbɔ nalɔ yi kojomi gbeye.
Hemi kɛ yemi kɛ ni tsumi
14Mamimɛ, ke nɔ ko ke e ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi, se e be ni tsumihi ɔ mɛni se nami lɛ ngɛ mi? Anɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ ma nyɛ e yi wami ma he lo? 15Ke nyɛmi nyumu ko loo nyɛmi yo ko hɛɛ e he gu nɛ e nɛ e nya mi ngma, 16nɛ nyɛ ti nɔ ko ya de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ ya ngɛ he jɔmi mi; nyɛ ya hlue la, nɛ nyɛ ya ye ni nɛ nyɛɛ tɔ” — se e ha we mɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ nɔmlɔ tso ɔ hiae ɔ, mɛni se nami lɛ ngɛ mi? 17Ja nɔuu hemi kɛ yemi hu, ke ni tsumihi be he ɔ, e ji hemi kɛ yemi gbogboe.
18Se nɔ ko ma de ke: “Moo lɛɛ o ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi, nɛ imi lɛɛ, i ngɛ ni tsumihi;” tsɔɔ mi o hemi kɛ yemi nɛ ni tsumihi be he ɔ, nɛ imi hu ma je ye ni tsumi ɔmɛ a mi ma tsɔɔ mo ye hemi kɛ yemi ɔ. 19Moo lɛɛ o heɔ yeɔ kaa Mawu ɔ nɔ kake ʼi. O pee saminya! Mumi yayami ɔmɛ hu heɔ yee ja, nɛ a he doo kɛ gbeye yemi. 20Oo, kuasia, o ngɛ hlaɔ nɛ o le kaa hemi kɛ yemi nɛ ni tsumihi be he ɔ, hemi kɛ yemi gbogboe ʼi lo? 21Wa tsɛ Abraham ɔ, anɛ pi ni tsumihi a nɔ nɛ a da kɛ wo lɛ nguɔ, benɛ e kɛ e bi Isak ya fɔ bɔ sami latɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ lo? 22Tse o na kaa hemi kɛ yemi kɛ e ni tsumi ɔmɛ nɛ nyɛɛ, nɛ e ni tsumi ɔmɛ a mi e je nɛ e hemi kɛ yemi ɔ hi kɛ pi si ɔ nɛ, 23nɛ ngmami ɔ nɛ deɔ ke: “Nɛ Abraham he Mawu nɛ ɔ ye nɛ a bu enɛ ɔ dami ha lɛ” ɔ ba mi, nɛ a tsɛ lɛ ke “Mawu huɛ.” 24Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ na kaa ni tsumihi a mi a jee kɛ woɔ nɔmlɔ nguɔ, se pi hemi kɛ yemi kɛkɛ mi.
25Ja nɔuu Rahab, ajuama a hu, anɛ pi ni tsumihi a nɔ nɛ a da kɛ wo lɛ nguɔ, benɛ e he bɔfo ɔmɛ atuu nɛ e je mɛ blɔ kɛ gu blɔ kpa nɔ ɔ lo? 26Ejakaa kaa bɔ nɛ nɔmlɔ tso nɛ mumi be mi ɔ ji gbogboe ɔ, ja nɔuu hemi kɛ yemi nɛ ni tsumihi be he ɔ ji hemi kɛ yemi gbogboe.

Title: YAKOBO 3
Content:
Lilɛ
1Mamimɛ, nyɛ fuu nyɛ ko pee nyɛ he tsɔɔli, ejakaa nyɛ le kaa wɔ tsɔɔli ɔmɛ ɔ, wa kojomi nya maa wa. 2Ejakaa wɔ tsuo kulaa wa tɔɔ fuu. Ke nɔ ko tɔ we ngɛ munyu mi ɔ, lɛɛ nɔmlɔ nɛ hi kɛ pi si ji lɛ, nɛ e ngɛ he wami nɛ e kɛ maa ye e nɔmlɔ tso mluku ɔ kulaa nɔ. 3Ke waa kɛ okpɔngɔ nya mi dade woɔ a nya mi konɛ a bu wɔ tue ɔ, wa ma nyɛ kpaka mɛ kɛ ya he nɛ wa suɔ. 4Oʼɛ, lɛhi hu, e ngɛ mi kaa a kle hluu, nɛ kɔɔhiɔ nɛ nya wa kpakaa mɛ, se kudɔɔ nyafii ko kɛkɛ a kɛ kudɔɔ mɛ kɛ yaa he tsuaa he nɛ lɛ kudɔɔtsɛ ɔ suɔ. 5Ja nɔuu lilɛ hu, e ji nɔmlɔ tso he nɔ ko nyafii, se efiãa ni nguahi, oʼɛ, la nyafii hu, nyɛɛ hyɛ hue abɔ sɔuu nɛ e saa! 6Nɛ lilɛ ɔ hu la ʼi, wa he ni ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ, lilɛ ji ni yayahi a je nɛ bleɔ nɔmlɔ tso mluku ɔ kulaa. E maa ma je mi si himi kulaa nya la kɛ la nɛ jee abosiami a je nitsɛ. 7Nɔmlɔ nyɛɔ jɔɔ nga mi lohwehi kɛ lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ kɛ nihi nɛ waa kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ wo mi ɔmɛ a su tsuaa su he; 8se lilɛ ɔ, nɔmlɔ ko nɔmlɔ ko nyɛ we e he jɔɔmi; nɔ́ yayami nɛ plegeje nɛ e hyi tɔ kɛ duɔ nɛ gbee nɔ ʼi. 9Lɔ ɔ nɔuu waa kɛ gbaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kɛ Tsɛ ɔ, nɛ lɔ ɔ nɔuu hulɔ waa kɛ gbiɛɛ nimli nɛ a bɔ ngɛ Mawu subai nɔ ɔ. 10Nya kake ɔ nɔuu mi gbaami kɛ gbiɛmi jee. Mamimɛ, enɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, e sɛ́ nɛ e baa ja. 11Anɛ nyu hɛngmɛ baa nyu mua kɛ ngo nyu kɛ jee e hɛngmɛ kake ɔ nɔuu mi lo? 12Mamimɛ, anɛ ngmɔkɔ tso ma nyɛ nu tso yiblii maa wo, aloo wai tso maa wo ngmɔkɔ? Ja nɔuu kɛ́ ngo nyu ko be nyu mua nyɛe maa pee.
Ni lemi nɛ je hiɔwe
13Mɛnɔ ji ni lelɔ kɛ sane se kɔlɔ ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti? Ha nɛ e kɛ je mi bami kpakpa nɛ tsɔɔ lɛ nitsɛ e nitsumi ɔmɛ ngɛ kpoo peemi kɛ ni lemi mi. 14Se ke hunga jemi yaya kɛ pɛ, kɛ he suɔmi ngɛ nyɛ mi ɔ, nyɛ ko fia nɛ nyɛɛ ye lakpa ngɔ si anɔkuale ɔ. 15Kikɛmɛ a ni lemi nɛ ɔ, pi hiɔwe nɛ e je, se mohu zugba nɛ ɔ nɔ nɔ́ ʼi, he lo nya nɔ́ ʼi, mumi yayamihi a nɔ́ ʼi. 16Ejakaa he nɛ hunga jemi kɛ pɛ ngɛ ɔ, lejɛ ɔ sakasaka peemi kɛ ni yayahi kulaa ngɛ. 17Se ni lemi nɛ je hiɔwe ɔ, kekleekle ɔ, e he tsɔ, lɔ ɔ se ɔ, e he jɔ, e hɛ ka si, e buɔ tue, e hyi tɔtɔɔtɔ kɛ mɔbɔ nami kɛ yiblii kpakpahi, e ji nɔ́, e pee we osato. 18Dami yiblii ɔ, nihi nɛ peɔ he jɔmi nihi ɔ, mɛ lɛ a duɔ ngɛ he jɔmi mi.

Title: YAKOBO 4
Content:
Je ɔ kɛ huɛbɔmi
1Jije tahi kɛ kunɔhi nɛ ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti ɔ je? Anɛ pi nyɛ kɔnɔhi nɛ hwuɔ ta ngɛ nyɛ he ni ɔmɛ a mi ɔ mi nɛ a je lo? 2Nihi peɔ nyɛ akɔnɔ, se nyɛ na we; lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ gbee nɔ; nyɛ jee hunga, se nyɛ nine nyɛ we nɔ nɛ e su; lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ nɔɔ kunɔ nɛ nyɛ pɛɛ; nyɛ na we nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ hlae ɔ, ejakaa nyɛ kpa we he pɛɛ. 3Nyɛ kpaa pɛɛ, nɛ nyɛ na we, ejakaa nyɛ kpaa pɛɛ yaya konɛ nyɛ kpata ni ɔmɛ a hɛ mi ngɛ nyɛ kɔnɔ ɔmɛ a mi. 4Gbapuɛli! Nyɛ li kaa je nɛ ɔ kɛ huɛbɔmi ɔ Mawu nyɛmi ʼi lo? Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ suɔ nɛ e kɛ je ɔ nɛ bɔ huɛ ɔ, e ji Mawu henyɛlɔ. 5Aloo nyɛ susu kaa yaka nɛ ngmami ɔ deɔ ke: “Hunga jemi se mumi nɛ hii wa mi ɔ dii” ɔ? 6Se Mawu dloɔ nɔ babauu. Ejakaa ngmami ɔ deɔ ke: “Mawu ɔ, e kuɔ he woli a nya, se he si bali e dloɔ.” 7Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛɛ ba nyɛ he si ha Mawu; nyɛɛ te si ngɔ wo Abosiami, nɛ e maa tu nyɛ nya fo. 8Nyɛɛ hɛ nyɛ kɛ su Mawu he, nɛ e maa hɛ lɛ kɛ su nyɛ he Nyɛ fɔ nyɛ dɛ, nyɛ yayami peeli, nɛ nyɛ ha nyɛ tsui he nɛ tsɔ, nyɛ juɛmi enyɔenyɔtsɛmɛ. 9Nyɛɛ ye kɔmɔ, nyɛɛ wo ya nɛ nyɛ fo; nyɛ muɔ ɔ nɛ plɛ kɔmɔ yemi, nɛ nyɛ bua jɔmi ɔ hu nɛ plɛ hɛ mi si puemi. 10Nyɛɛ ba nyɛ he si ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi, nɛ e ma wo nyɛ nɔ.
Nyɛmi kojomi he kɔkɔbɔmi
11Nyɛ ko ye nyɛ sibi a he sieku, mamimɛ. Nɔ nɛ tuɔ e nyɛmi he munyu aloo e kojoɔ e nyɛmi ɔ, Mlaa a e ngɛ munyu tue kɛ ngɛ sie, nɛ Mlaa a e ngɛ kojoe ɔ nɛ. Ke o ngɛ Mlaa a kojoe, ɔ pi Mlaa a nɔ yelɔ ji mo, se Mlaa a kojolɔ mohu ji mo. 12Nɔ kake ji mlaa wolɔ kɛ kojolɔ, nɔ nɛ ngɛ he wami nɛ e kɛ heɔ nɔ yi wami nɛ e kɛ kpataa nɔ hɛ mi hulɔ; se moo lɛɛ, mɛnɔ ji mo nɛ o kojoɔ o nyɛmi?
Fiami he kɔkɔbɔmi
13Jehanɛ, nyɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ nyɛ deɔ ke: “Mwɔnɛ loo hwɔɔ ɔ wa maa ya kikɛmɛ a ma nɛ ɔ loo kikɛmɛ a ma nɛ ɔ mi, nɛ wa ya ye jeha kake ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, nɛ wa ya ye jua, nɛ wa na se,” 14kpahu nyɛ li hwɔɔ sane. Ejakaa mɛni ji nyɛ wami ɔ? E ji afua nɛ woɔ be bɔɔ ko, nɛ ke pee se ɔ e laa. 15Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e sa mohu nɛ nyɛ deɔ ke: “Ke Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ suɔ nɛ wa yi na wami ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ wa maa pee enɛ ɔ loo enɛ.” 16Se jehanɛ nyɛ fiaa ngɛ nyɛ he womi ɔmɛ a mi; kikɛmɛ a fiami nɛ ɔ kulaa a yayami ʼi. 17Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ nɛ le kpakpa peemi nɛ e pee we ɔ, e ji yayami ha lɛ.

Title: YAKOBO 5
Content:
Kɔkɔbɔmi ha niatsɛmɛ
1Jehanɛ, nyɛ niatsɛmɛ, nyɛɛ bu tue, nyɛ fo ya nɛ nyɛ wɔ lele ngɛ dengmehi nɛ maa ba nyɛ nɔ ɔmɛ a he! 2Nyɛ ni babauu ɔ sa, nɛ nyɛ tade ɔmɛ hu wɔyewɔyehi ye. 3Nyɛ sika tsu kɛ nyɛ sika hiɔ ɔmɛ nɔ kana, nɛ a he kana amɛ maa ye nyɛ he odase, nɛ e maa sã nyɛ he womi mi kaa la. Nyɛ bua juetli nya ngɔ to ngɛ nyagbe ligbi ɔmɛ a mi. 4Oʼɛ, ni tsuli nɛ kpa nyɛ ngmɔ ni nɛ nyɛ wui mɛ hiɔ ngɛ sisimi nya a ngɛ ngmlaa kpae, nɛ nihi nɛ bua nyɛ ni ɔmɛ a nya amɛ a ngmlaa a sɛ Asafo Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ tue mi. 5Nyɛ ye nyɛ nya ni ngɛ zugba a nɔ, nɛ nyɛ ho ya. Nyɛ lɛ nyɛ tsui hluu kɛ ya su gbemi ligbi ɔ nɔ. 6Nyɛ bu dalɔ ɔ fɔ, nɛ nyɛ gbe lɛ, nɛ e tsi we nyɛ nya.
Tsuisitomi kɛ sɔlemi
7Lɔ ɔ he ɔ mamimɛ, nyɛɛ to nyɛ tsui si, kɛ ya su Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bami be ɔ. Nyɛɛ hyɛ bɔ nɛ hulɔ ɔ mlɛɔ zugba a ni bami nɛ he jua wa, nɛ e toɔ e tsui si ngɛ he kɛ ya suu be nɛ gbo kɛ gbiɛ nyu nɛɛ ɔ; 8nyɛ hu nyɛɛ to nyɛ tsui si; nyɛɛ da si tutuutu, ejakaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bami be ɔ su ta.
9Mamimɛ, nyɛ ko pia nyɛ sibi konɛ Mawu ko kojo nyɛ. Oʼɛ, kojolɔ ɔ daa si ngɛ sinya a nya. 10Mamimɛ, nyɛɛ ngɔ gbali nɛ tu munyu ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ biɛ mi ɔ ngɔ pee amanehlu kɛ tsui si tomi nɔ hyɛmi nɔ. 11Wa tsɛɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ toɔ a tsui si ɔ ke nihi nɛ a gbaa. Nyɛ nu Hiob tsui si tomi ɔ he, nɛ nyɛ na bɔ nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ to lɛ ha ngɛ nyagbe mi ɔ, ejakaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi mi saa lɛ babauu nɛ e muklii mi jɔ hulɔ.
12Se titli ɔ, mamimɛ, nyɛ ko ka kita, hiɔwe jio, zugba jio, aloo kita kpa ko jio; nyɛ “Ee” nɛ pee ee, nɛ “Dɛbi” nɛ pee dɛbi, konɛ nyɛ ko sɛ kojomi mi.
13Ke nyɛ ti nɔ ko ngɛ amanehlu mi ɔ, e sɔle; kɛ nɔ ko bua jɔ ɔ, e la yi jemi la. 14Ke nyɛ ti nɔ ko be he wami ɔ, e tsɛ asafo ɔ mi nikɔtɔma amɛ kɛ ba e ngɔ nɛ a pɔ lɛ nu ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ biɛ mi nɛ a sɔle ha lɛ, 15nɛ hemi kɛ yemi sɔlemi nɛ ɔ ma he hiɔtsɛ ɔ yi wami, nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ma tle lɛ si, nɛ ke e pee yayami ɔ, a kɛ maa pa lɛ. 16Nyɛɛ jaje nyɛ he yayami ɔmɛ ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ he, nɛ nyɛɛ sɔle ngɔ ha nyɛ he, konɛ a tsa nyɛ. Dalɔ sɔlemi nɛ mi wa a nyɛɔ nihi babauu tsuɔ. 17Elia ji nɔmlɔ adesa kaa wɔ nɔuu, nɛ e sɔle sɔlemi ko konɛ hiɔmi ko nɛ, nɛ e nɛ́ ngɛ zugba a nɔ jeha etɛ kɛ hlami ekpa sɔuu. 18Nɛ e kpale sɔle, nɛ Mawu ha hiɔmi nɛ, nɛ zugba a ba ni.
19Mamimɛ, ke nyɛ ti nɔ ko tla blɔ kɛ je anɔkuale ɔ mi nɛ nɔ ko ngɛ lɛ kpalee ekohu ɔ, 20ha nɛ e le kaa nɔ nɛ kpaleɔ yayami peelɔ kɛ jee e blɔ tlami mi ɔ ma he yayami peelɔ ɔ klaa yi wami kɛ je gbenɔ mi, nɛ e maa ha yayamihi fuu nɔ.

Title: 1 PETRO 1
Content:
1Petro nɛ ji Yesu Kristo bɔfo ɔ, ngma ya ha nibwɔhi nɛ gbɛ fia Ponto, Kapodokia, Asia kɛ Bitinia a. 2Nimli nɛ ɔmɛ ji nihi nɛ a hla, ngɛ Tsɛ Mawu ɔ yi mi tomi nya, ngɛ Mumi ɔ he tsukɔmi mi, kɛ ha Yesu Kristo tue bumi kɛ he fɔmi ngɛ e muɔ ɔ mi.
Dloomi kɛ hejɔmi nɛ e hiɛ fuu ha nyɛ!
Hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ hɛ ngɛ
3A gbaa Mawu kɛ wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo Tsɛ ɔ, nɔ nɛ fɔ wɔ ehe ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e mɔbɔnami babauu ɔ nya, ngɔ ha hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ngɛ Yesu Kristo si nɛ ete kɛ je gbeje ɔ he. 4Enɛ ɔ haa wɔ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ngɛ gbo si ni nɛ puɛ we, nɛ mu be he, nɛ kpa we, nɛ a ngɔ to ngɛ hiɔwe ha nyɛ ɔ he, 5nyɛ nihi nɛ a gu hemi kɛ yemi nɔ buu nyɛ he ngɛ Mawu he wami nya ngɔ toɔ yi wami hemi nɛ a dla ngɔ to nɛ a ma je kpo ngɛ nyagbe be ɔmɛ a mi ɔ.
6Nyɛ bua nɛ jɔ ngɛ enɛ ɔ he, pohu e maa hia kaa nyɛ maa ye kɔmɔ bɔɔ ko amlɔ nɛ ngɛ kahi slɔɔtohi a mi; 7konɛ a na nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi sami ɔ kaa e he jua wa babauu. Sika tsu po nɛ puɛɛ ɔ, a kaa ngɛ la mi; nɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ he jua wa pe sika tsu ɔ hu sa nɛ a ka lɛ konɛ e nyɛ nɛ e hi si. Lɛɛ, nyɛ nine maa su yi jemi kɛ hɛ mi nyami kɛ bu nɔ ngɛ Yesu Kristo kpo jemi ɔ mi, 8nɔ nɛ nyɛ nɛ́ lɛ mohu, se nyɛ suɔ lɛ, nɔ nɛ amlɔ nɛ ɔ hu nyɛ nɛ lɛ mohu, se nyɛ he e nɔ ye, lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ mi mi fliɔ nyɛ kɛ bua jɔmi kɛ nyami babauu nɛ a be nyɛe maa kale, 9ejakaa nyɛ nine maa su hemi kɛ yemi nyagbe nɛ ji nyɛ klaa amɛ a yi wami hemi ɔ nɔ.
10Kikɛmɛ a yi wami hemi nɛ ɔ gbali nɛ gba ngɛ dloomi nɛ ba nyɛ nɔ ɔ he ɔ hla se blɔ, nɛ a bi si; 11nɛ a kpale bi be ɔ si, be nɛ kɛ bɔ nɛ Kristo Mumi nɛ ngɛ a mi ɔ je tsɔɔ, benɛ Mumi ɔ ngɛ amanehlu nɛ maa ba Kristo nɔ kɛ hɛ mi nyami nɛ maa ba ngɛ kɔlɔ ɔmɛ a se ɔ he odase yee kɛ ngɛ toe ɔ. 12Nɛ Mawu je tsɔɔ gbali ɔmɛ ke, tsa pi mɛ nitsɛmɛ a he ʼi, se nyɛ mohu nyɛ he nɛ a sɔmɔ ngɛ kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he, nihi nɛ jehanɛ nihi nɛ jaje sane kpakpa a tsɔɔ nyɛ ngɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu nɛ a tsɔ kɛ je hiɔwe ɔ jaje tsɔɔ nyɛ ɔ. Ni nɛ ɔmɛ ji nihi nɛ hiɔwe bɔfohi tete hɛ jaa ngɛ he kaa a ko na mi.
Sihimi klɔuklɔu
13Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ dla nyɛ juɛmi kɛ ha ni tsumi, nyɛ hɛ nɛ ka si, nɛ nyɛɛ ngɔ nyɛ hɛ ngɔ fɔ dloomi nɛ a kɛ ma ha nyɛ ngɛ Yesu Kristo kpo jemi ɔ mi ɔ nɔ kulaa. 14Nyɛɛ pee nyɛ he kaa bimɛ tue buli, nɛ nyɛ ko ba nyɛ je mi ngɛ sa benɛ nyɛ li nɔ́ ko ɔ mi akɔnɔ ɔmɛ a nya hu, 15se mohu ɔ, bɔ nɛ nɔ nɛ tsɛ nyɛ ɔ ngɛ klɔuklɔu ɔ, nyɛ hu nyɛɛ pee klɔuklɔu ngɛ nyɛ je mi bami tsuo mi. 16Ejakaa pa ngma ke: “Nyɛɛ pee klɔuklɔu ejakaa klɔuklɔu ji mi.”
17Nɛ ke nyɛ tsɛɔ nɔ nɛ hyɛ we nihi a hɛ mi se e kojoɔ ngɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ ni tsumi nya a ke nyɛ tsɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ kɛ gbeye yemi nɛ ba nyɛ je mi ngɛ nyɛ wami be nɛ piɛ nɛ ɔ mi. 18Nyɛ le kaa pi nihi nɛ puɛɔ, kaa juɛtɛɛ loo sika tsu, a kɛ kpɔ nyɛ kɛ je nyɛ yakayaka je mi bami nɛ nyɛ na kɛ je nyɛ tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a ngɔ ɔ mi, 19se mohu, Kristo, nɔ nɛ ngɛ kaa to bi nɛ he be piami loo mu ko ɔ muɔ nɛ he jua wa a. 20A hla lɛ momo sa loko a to je ɔ sisi, se e a je lɛ kpo ngɛ be ɔmɛ a nyagbe mi ngɛ nyɛ he. 21Nyɛ gu e nɔ he Mawu, nɔ nɛ tle lɛ si kɛ je gbeje nɛ e wo e hɛ mi nyami ɔ ye, benɛ pee nɛ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi kɛ nyɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ hi Mawu nɔ.
22Jehanɛ, akɛnɛ nyɛ tsukɔ nyɛ klaa amɛ a he ngɛ anɔkuale tue bumi mi ha nyɛmimɛ a he dɔmi nɛ lakpa be mi he je ɔ, nyɛɛ kɛ tsui klɔuu nɛ suɔ nyɛ he saminya. 23Ejakaa a fɔ nyɛ ehe, nɛ pi munyu nɛ puɛɔ, se mohu nɔ́ nɛ puɛ we mi a je kɛ fɔ nyɛ kɛ gu Mawu hɛ kalɔ, nɔ nɛ hii si daa a munyu ɔ nɔ. 24Ejakaa
“He lo kulaa ngɛ kaa nga.
Nɛ e hɛ mi nyami ɔ kulaa ngɛ kaa nga mi mɔmɔ.
Nga gbliɔ nɛ e mi mɔmɔ ɔmɛ wɔleɔ;
25Se Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ munyu ɔ hii si kɛ yaa neneene.”
Enɛ ɔ ji munyu nɛ a jaje tsɔɔ nyɛ ke Sane Kpakpa a nɛ.

Title: 1 PETRO 2
Content:
Wami tɛ kɛ ma klɔuklɔu ɔ
1Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ sake yayami tsuo kɛ kutupɔ tsuo kɛ osato kɛ ninyɛ kɛ nihi a he munyu tumi kulaa ngɔ pue he. 2Nyɛɛ pee kaa bimwɔwi nɛ a fɔ he nɛ ngɛ mumi mi nyɔ nyu klɔuu hlae nɛ a nu, konɛ nyɛɛ wa kɛ na yi wami hemi. 3Ejakaa kaa bɔ nɛ ngmami ɔ de ɔ: “Nyɛ sa nyɛ nya Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mimijɔmi ɔ.”
4Nyɛɛ ba Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ngɔ kaa tɛ nɛ hɛ ngɛ nɛ nimli kua lɛ mohu, se Mawu lɛɛ, e hla lɛ nɛ e he jua wa ngɛ e hɛ mi, 5nɛ nyɛ hu, nyɛ ha a ngɔ nyɛ kaa tɛ nɛ hɛ ngɛ nɛ a kɛ fia mumi mi sɔlemi tsu nɛ nyɛɛ pee osɔfohi a weku konɛ nyɛɛ sã mumi mi bɔ nɛ sa Mawu hɛ mi kɛ gu Yesu Kristo nɔ. 6Ejakaa e ngɛ ngmami ɔ mi ke:
“Oʼɛ, i kɛ kɔ nya tɛ ngɛ si mae ngɛ Zion,
Tɛ nɛ a hla nɛ he jua wa,
Nɛ nɔ nɛ heɔ e nɔ yeɔ ɔ, zo be lɛ gbee kɔkɔɔkɔ.”
7Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ heɔ yeɔ ɔ, tɛ nɛ ɔ he jua wa ha nyɛ; se ninɛmɛ nɛ he we yi ɔ, “tɛ nɛ tsu fiali ɔmɛ kua a, kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu lɛ plɛ kɔ nya tɛ kɛ si tɛmi tɛ kɛ nane kpatami tɛ sa ha mɛ.” 8Nɛ ngmami kpã ko hu de ke:
“Enɛ ɔ ji si tɛmi tɛ
Kɛ nane kpatami tɛ sa ha mɛ.”
Ejakaa akɛnɛ a bui munyu ɔ tue he je ɔ, a tɛ si nɛ kɔlɔ ɔ nɔuu Mawu to ha mɛ.
9Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ, weku nɛ a hla ji nyɛ, matsɛmɛ nɛ yeɔ osɔlohi, je ma klɔuklɔu, ma nɛ e ngɔ pee e nɔ, konɛ nyɛɛ jaje nɔ nɛ tsɛ nyɛ kɛ je diblii ɔ mi kɛ ba lɛ nitsɛ e nyakpɛ la a he ɔ agbo jemi ɔ. 10Sa a, nyɛ pi ma, se jehanɛ ɔ, Mawu ma ji nyɛ; sa a, a nɛ nyɛ mɔbɔ, se jehanɛ ɔ, a na nyɛ mɔbɔ.
Mawu nyɔguɛhi
11Mamimɛ, i ngɛ munyu tue kɛ ngɛ nyɛ tsɔɔe kaa nibwɔhi kɛ blɔ hiali kaa nyɛɛ nyɛ he lo se dimi nihi nɛ kɛ klaa hwuɔ ta, 12nɛ nyɛɛ ba nyɛ je mi saminya ngɛ maje li a bimɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti, konɛ nɔ́ mi nɛ a tuɔ nyɛ he munyu ngɛ kaa yayami peeli ɔ, nyɛ ni tsumi kpakpahi nɛ a naa a, a kɛ wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami ngɛ e bami ligbi ɔ nɔ.
13Nyɛɛ ba nyɛ he si ha nimli a blɔ nya tomi tsuaa blɔ nya tomi, ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ he, matsɛ nɔ nɛ yeɔ nɔ ɔ jio, 14amlaalofohi nɛ e tsɔ ngɛ yayami peeli a tue gblami he kɛ kpakpa peeli a yi jemi he ɔ jio. 15Ejakaa ja ji Mawu suɔmi nya ni, kaa nyɛɛ kɛ kpakpa peemi nɛ tsi nihi nɛ be yi mi ɔmɛ a kuasia peemi ɔ nya. 16Kaa sodehehi, se pi ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɔɔ odehe yemi nɛ ɔ kɛ peɔ yayami nɔ hami nɔ, se mohu kaa Mawu sɔmɔli. 17Nyɛɛ bu nɔ tsuaa nɔ; nyɛɛ suɔ nyɛ nyɛmimɛ; nyɛɛ ye Mawu gbeye; nyɛɛ bu matsɛ.
Kristo amanehlu ɔ kaa nɔhyɛmi nɔ́
18Sɔmɔli, nyɛɛ kɛ gbeye yemi tsuo nɛ ba nyɛ he si ha nyɛ nyɔmtsɛmɛ, pi nimli kpakpahi kɛ mi mi hili kɛkɛ, se mohu nimli yayamihi hulɔ. 19Ejakaa enɛ ɔ ji dloomi ke Mawu he nilemi he je nɛ nɔ ko nyɛɔ nidɔ ni nya daa, nɛ e naa amanehlu nɛ sɛ ɔ. 20Ejakaa ke nyɛ tɔ nɛ a fia nyɛ ni ngɛ he, nɛ nyɛ to nyɛ tsui si ngɛ mi ɔ, mɛni se nami lɛ ngɛ mi? Se ke nɔ́ kpakpa nyɛ pee nɛ nyɛ na amanehlu ngɛ he, nɛ nyɛ to nyɛ tsui si ngɛ mi ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔ ji dloomi ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi. 21Enɛ nɔuu he nɛ a tsɛ nyɛ, ejakaa Kristo hu na amanehlu ha nyɛ nɛ e kɛ to okadi kɛ fɔ̃ si ha nyɛ, konɛ nyɛɛ nyɛɛ e nane ma he ɔmɛ a se, 22lɛ nɔ nɛ e pee we yayami nɛ jeha nɛ hu lakpa ko ji e nya mi ɔ, 23nɔ nɛ benɛ a ngɛ lɛ jɛe ɔ, e jɛ we nɔ ko tui nane mi, benɛ e ngɛ amanehlu nae ɔ, e gbiɛ́ nɔ ko, se mohu e tu e sane ngɔ wo nɔ nɛ kojoɔ dami nya a dɛ mi. 24Yesu nitsɛ tloo wa he yayami ɔmɛ ngɛ e nɔmlɔ tso ɔ hi kɛ ya sɛumi tso ɔ nɔ, konɛ wa gbo ha yayami nɛ wa hɛ hi ngmengmle ha dami, nɔ nɛ he pahi nɛ a kɛ tsa nyɛ ɔ. 25Ejakaa jinɛ nyɛ ngɛ kaa tohi nɛ laa, se jeha-nɛ ɔ, nyɛ kpale kɛ ba nyɛ klaa amɛ a lɛlɔ kɛ nɔhyɛlɔ ɔ ngɔ.

Title: 1 PETRO 3
Content:
Yigbayi kɛ hunomɛ
1Ja nɔuu kɛ̃ nyɛ yigbayi ɔmɛ hu, nyɛɛ ba nyɛ he si ha nyɛ nitsɛmɛ nyɛ hunomɛ, konɛ ke ni komɛ he we munyu ɔ yi tete po ɔ, a si munyu ɔ se nɛ a gu yi ɔmɛ a je mi bami nɔ nɛ nine nɛ su a nɔ, 2ejakaa a naa nyɛ je mi bami nɛ he tsɔmi kɛ gbeye yemi ngɛ mi ɔ. 3Nyɛɛ kɛ yi gbɔmi kɛ sika ni womi kɛ tade womi nɛ ko lua nyɛ he, 4se mohu nyɛ he fɛu ɔ, a na ngɛ nyɛ tsui mi, ngɛ mumi nɛ he jɔ nɛ ngɛ kpoo nɛ puɛ we ɔ mi, kɔlɔ ɔ ji nɔ nɛ he jua wa ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi. 5Ejakaa sa a, jã yi klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ hu nɛ hɛ ngɛ Mawu nɔ ɔ dla a he, nɛ a ba a he si ha mɛ nitsɛmɛ a hunomɛ; 6kaa bɔ nɛ Sara bu Abraham tue nɛ e tsɛ lɛ e nyɔmtsɛ tete ɔ; Sara bi yihi ji nyɛ ke nyɛ peɔ kpakpa nɛ nyɛ yi haomi ko gbeye ɔ.
7Nyɛ, hunomɛ ɔ, ja nɔuu kɛ nyɛɛ kɛ nyɛ yi ɔmɛ nɛ hi si ngɛ ni lemi nyɛ, nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ bu nɛ bu yo ɔ kaa nɔ́ nɛ he wɛ tsɔ ko, akɛnɛ a kɛ nyɛ tsuo ji wami dloomi ɔ ni yeli ɔ, konɛ a ko tsi nyɛ sɔlemi ɔmɛ a blɔ.
Kpakpapeemi he nɔnami
8Nyagbe ɔ, nyɛ tsuo nyɛɛ hɛɛ juɛmi kake, nyɛɛ na ha nyɛ sibi, nyɛɛ suɔ nyɛ he kaa nyɛmimɛ, nyɛ mi mi nɛ jɔ ha nyɛ sibi, nyɛɛ ba nyɛ he si. 9Nyɛɛ kɛ yayami ko ma yayami nane mi aloo jɛmi ngɛ jɛmi nane mi, se mohu nyɛɛ gbaa, ejakaa nyɛ le kaa enɛ ɔ he nɛ a tsɛ nyɛ, konɛ nyɛ nine nɛ su gbaami ɔ nɔ. 10Kaa bɔ nɛ ngmami ɔ de ɔ:
“Nɔ nɛ ngɛ hlae nɛ e na wami
Nɛ e na ligbi kpakpahi ɔ,
E kɔ e lilɛ mi
Nɛ e ko ye lakpa.
11E sa e he kɛ je yayami he nɛ e pee kpakpa.
E hla he jɔmi nɛ e nyɛɛ kɔlɔ ɔ se.
12Ejakaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛngmɛ ngɛ dali a he,
Nɛ e buɔ a pɛɛ kpamihi tue;
Se nihi nɛ peɔ ni yayamihi ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ je e hɛ̃ ka mɛ.”
13Nɛ ke nyɛ bɔɔ nɔ kpakpa peemi he mɔde ɔ, mɛnɔ maa pee nyɛ yayami? 14Se ke dami he nɛ nyɛ ngɛ amanehlu nae tete po ɔ, a gbaa nyɛ! Nyɛ ko ye mɛ gbeye, nɛ nyɛ ko hao hulɔ, 15se Nyɔmtsɛ Kristo ɔ, nyɛɛ bu lɛ klɔuklɔu ngɛ nyɛ tsui mi. Nyɛ dla nyɛ he ngɔ to daa nɛ, konɛ ke nɔ ko bi nyɛ hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi nɛ ngɛ nyɛ mi ɔ sisi ɔ, nɛ nyɛ nyɛ lɛ heto nɛ nyɛ ha; se nyɛɛ pee kɛ mi mi jɔmi kɛ bu. 16Nyɛɛ hɛɛ he nile kpakpa, konɛ nɔ mi nɛ a tu nyɛ he munyu ngɛ kaa yayami peeli ɔ, zo nɛ gbe nihi nɛ gbe nyɛ je mi bami kpakpa nɛ ngɛ Kristo mi ɔ he guɛ ɔ. 17Ejakaa ke Mawu suɔ kaa nyɛɛ na amanehlu ɔ, e hi mohu kaa nyɛ maa na kaa kpakpa peeli pe nɔ nɛ nyɛ maa na kaa yayami peeli. 18Ejakaa Kristo nitsɛ hu na amanehlu si kake nyɔngloo ngɛ yayamihi a he, lɛ dalɔ ɔ, ngɛ nihi nɛ dɛ ɔmɛ a nane mi, konɛ e kɛ wɔ nɛ ya Mawu ngɔ. A gbe lɛ ngɛ he lo blɔfami mohu, se a ha lɛ wami ngɛ mumi blɔfami. 19Nɛ lɛ Mumi ɔ nɔuu mi e gu kɛ ya mumihi nɛ a wo mɛ tsu mi ɔmɛ a ngɔ, nɛ e ya fiɛ tsɔɔ mɛ. 20Nimli nɛ ɔmɛ ji nihi nɛ blema a, a bui Mawu tue benɛ e to e tsui si nɛ e mlɛ mɛ hluu ngɛ Noa be ɔmɛ a mi, benɛ a ngɛ daka ngua a kpɛe ɔ. Nihi bɔɔ nɛ ngɛ deka a mi — nihi kpaanyɔ — aklaahi a yi wami a he kɛ gu nyu mi. 21Enɛ ji baptisimi nyu ɔ he okadi nɛ a kɛ heɔ wa yi wami, nɔ́ nɛ pi he womi nɔ mu jemi, se mohu e ji he nile kpakpa somi nɛ e kɛ Mawu soɔ, kɛ guu Yesu Kristo si temi ɔ nɔ, 22nɔ nɛ ho hiɔwe ya nɛ e hii si ngɛ Mawu hiɛ ɔ nɔ nɛ a ngɔ hiɔwe bɔfohi kɛ he blɔhi kɛ he wamihi ngɔ wo e sisi ɔ.

Title: 1 PETRO 4
Content:
Wami he
1Akɛnɛ Kristo na amanehlu ha wɔ ngɛ he lo mi he je ɔ, nyɛ hu nyɛɛ kɛ jamɛ a juɛmi ɔ nɔuu nɛ mia kaa ta hwumi nihi, ejakaa nɔ nɛ na amanehlu ngɛ he lo mi ɔ, e jɔɔ yayami peemi, 2konɛ be nɛ piɛ ha lɛ ngɛ he lo mi si himi nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, e ko hi si ngɛ nimli a kɔnɔhi a nya, se mohu ngɛ Mawu suɔmi nya nihi a nya. 3Ejakaa wa puɛ be babauu ngɛ be nɛ be momo ɔ mi kɛ pee nihi nɛ wɔ jali ɔmɛ peɔ, nɛ wa ba wa je mi ngɛ ya homi, akɔnɔhi, da demi, fiɛmi sakasakahi, jiklɔɔ kɛ wɔ jami ninyɛ nihi a mi. 4E peɔ wɔ jali ɔmɛ nyakpɛ kaa nyɛɛ kɛ mɛ yɛ́ kikɛmɛ a sakasaka peemi titãa nɛ ɔ nɔuu mi nɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ, a tuɔ nyɛ he munyu yaya; 5se a maa bu akɔtaa ngɔ ha nɔ nɛ dla e he ngɔ to nɛ e maa kojo hɛ kãli kɛ ni gbogboehi tsuo ɔ. 6Ejakaa enɛ he je nɛ a jaje sane kpakpa a ngɔ tsɔɔ ni gbogboehi tete hu, ninɛmɛ nɛ a kojo mɛ ngɛ nimli a kojomi nya ngɛ he lo blɔfami mohu, se a hɛ maa hi ngmengmle kaa Mawu ngɛ mumi blɔfami.
Mawu nike nihi a nɔ hyɛli kpakpahi
7Nihi tsuo a nyagbe ɔ su ta; lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ juɛmi mi nɛ tsɔ nɛ nyɛ hɛ nɛ ka si kɛ ha sɔlemi. 8Se titli ɔ, suɔmi nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ suɔ nyɛ he ɔ mi nɛ wa, ejakaa suɔmi haa yayamihi babauu nɔ. 9Nyɛɛ pee nyɛ sibi nibwɔ nɛ zanue lami ko hi mi. 10Bɔ nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ na dloomi ke ni ɔ, nyɛ kɛ sɔmɔ nyɛ he, kaa Mawu dloomi nihi slɔɔto ɔmɛ a nɔ hyɛli kpakpahi. 11Ke munyu nɔ ko ngɛ tue ɔ, e tu lɛ kaa Mawu munyu; ke sɔmɔmi nɔ ko ngɛ sɔmɔe ɔ, e je he wami nɛ Mawu dloo lɛ ɔ mi; konɛ a gu Yesu Kristo nɔ nɛ a wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami ngɛ nihi kulaa mi, nɔ nɛ nɔ́ nɛ ji nyami ɔ, kɛ he wami ɔ, kɛ yaa neneene kɛ neneene ɔ! Amen.
Kristofono nɔnami
12Suɔli, nyɛ ko ha amanehlu la nɛ a kɛ ngɛ nyɛ kae ɔ nɛ pee nyɛ sane slɔɔto ko, kaa nɔ nɛ nɔ́ ko slɔɔto ko lɛ ngɛ nyɛ pee ɔ, 13se mohu si abɔ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ Kristo amanehlu ɔ eko nae ɔ, nyɛ bua nɛ jɔ, konɛ e hɛ mi nyami kpo jemi ɔ mi hu nyɛ bua nɛ jɔ nɛ nyɛ mi nɛ flii nyɛ. 14Ke Kristo biɛ ɔ he nihi jɛɛ nyɛ ɔ, da gbaa nyɛ, ejakaa hɛ mi nyami Mumi kɛ Mawu Mumi ɔ kpleɔ si kɛ baa nyɛ nɔ. 15Nyɛ ti nɔ ko nɔ ko ko na amanehlu kaa awiyelɔ loo juɔ loo yayami peelɔ aloo nɔ ko nɛ e kɛ e he woɔ ni kpahi a sanehi a mi. 16Se ke nɔ ko ngɛ amanehlu nae kaa Kristofono ɔ, zo ko pee lɛ, se mohu e wo Mawu hɛ mi nyami ngɛ kikɛmɛ a biɛ nɛ ɔ he.
17Ejakaa be nɛ a maa je kojomi sisi kɛ maa je Mawu we ɔ su ta. Ke wa nɔ kekle e je ɔ, ninɛmɛ nɛ bui Mawu sane kpakpa a tue ɔ, kɛ a nyagbe maa pee kɛɛ? 18Kaa bɔ nɛ ngmami ɔ de ɔ,
“Ke dengme loko a ma he dalɔ yi wami ɔ,
Lɛɛ, nɔ nɛ yi Mawu gbeye kɛ yayami peelɔ ɔ, jije e maa da?”
19Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ninɛmɛ nɛ naa amanehlu ngɛ Mawu suɔmi nya a hu a tu a klaahi ngɔ wo bɔlɔ anɔkualetsɛ ɔ dɛ mi nɛ a ya nɔ ngɛ kpakpa peemi mi.

Title: 1 PETRO 5
Content:
Mawu asafo ɔ
1Jehanɛ, nikɔtɔmahi nɛ ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti ɔ, imi nɛ ji nyɛ nyɛmi nɔkɔtɔma kɛ Kristo amanehlu ɔmɛ a he odase yelɔ nɛ ma na hɛ mi nyami nɛ a ma je kpo ɔ hu eko ɔ, i ngɛ nyɛ dee ke: 2Nyɛɛ lɛ Mawu asafo nɛ a ngɔ ha nyɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ hyɛ nɔ, pi ngɛ nɔ nyɛmi nya, se mohu ngɛ suɔmi nya; jehanɛ hu, pi ngɛ se nami nɛ ngɛ zo he, se mohu tsui mi jɔmi nya; 3jehanɛ hu, pi kaa nihi nɛ yeɔ asafo ɔmɛ a nɔ nyɔmtsɛmɛ a sane, se mohu nihi nɛ toɔ okadi haa asafo kuu ɔ. 4Nɛ benɛ to hyɛlɔ nɔkɔtɔma a ma je e he kpo ɔ, nyɛ nine maa su hɛ mi nyami jlasi nɛ ngla we ɔ nɔ.
5Ja nɔuu nyɛ, jokuɛwi ɔmɛ, nyɛɛ ba nyɛ he si ha nikɔtɔma amɛ. Nɛ nyɛ tsuo nyɛɛ ba nyɛ he si ngɔ ha nyɛ sibi nɛ nyɛɛ wo he si bami kaa tade, ejakaa “Mawu kuɔ he woli a nya, se e dloɔ he si bali.” 6Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛɛ ba nyɛ he si ngɛ Mawu nine nɛ he wa a sisi, konɛ e wo nyɛ nɔ ngɛ be nɛ sa mi. 7Nyɛɛ ngɔ nyɛ haomi kulaa ngɔ fɔ e nɔ, ejakaa lɛ lɛ juɛii nyɛ he.
8Nyɛ hɛ nɛ ka si, nyɛɛ huɔ; ejakaa nyɛ he nyɛlɔ, abosiami ɔ, ngɛ si poe kaa jata nɛ ngɛ huae ngɛ nɔ nɛ e maa mi hlae. 9Nyɛɛ da si kpitikplii ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mi nɛ nyɛɛ tsi lɛ blɔ, ejakaa nyɛ le kaa jamɛ a amanehlu ɔmɛ nɔuu nyɛ nyɛmimɛ nɛ ngɛ je ɔ mi hu ngɛ nae. 10Se dloomi tsuo kulaa Mawu nɛ tsɛ nyɛ kɛ ba e neneene hɛ mi nyami ɔ mi ngɛ Kristo Yesu mi ɔ, ke nyɛ na amanehlu bɔɔ nɔ tã a, lɛ nitsɛ e ma dla nyɛ pɛ, nɛ e maa waje nyɛ, nɛ e maa wo nyɛ he wami, nɛ e ma ha nyɛ maa pi si. 11Lɛ nɔuu a maa ngɔ nyami kɛ he wami ngɔ ha kɛ maa ya nenene kɛ neneene! Amen.
Nyagbe sɛyemi
12I gu wa nyɛmi Silvano nɛ ji anɔkualetsɛ kaa bɔ nɛ i buu lɛ ɔ nɔ ngma nyɛ bɔɔ nɛ ɔ i kɛ ngɛ munyu tue kɛ ngɛ nyɛ tsɔɔe, nɛ i ngɛ odase yee kɛ ngɛ se fiee kaa enɛ ɔ ji Mawu anɔkuale dloomi ɔ nɛ; nyɛɛ da si ngɛ mi.
13Asafo nɛ a hla ngɛ Babilon ngɔ piɛ wa he ɔ kɛ ye bi Marko hu ke a biɔ nyɛ. 14Nyɛ nga nyɛ sibi kɛ suɔmi nya he fiɔmi. Nyɛ he manye, nyɛ tsuo nɛ nyɛ ngɛ Kristo mi ɔ! Amen.

Title: 2 PETRO 1
Content:
1Simon Petro nɛ ji Yesu Kristo sɔmɔlɔ kɛ bɔfo ɔ, ngma ya ha nihi nɛ nine su hemi kɛ yemi nɛ he jua wa kaa wa nɔ ɔ nɔuu nɔ, ngɛ wa Mawu kɛ wa yi wami helɔ Yesu Kristo dami ɔ mi ɔ.
2Dloomi kɛ he jɔmi nɛ hiɛ ha nyɛ ngɛ Mawu kɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo he ni lemi ɔ mi!
Mawu nɔtsɛmi kɛ nɔhlami
3E mawu he wami ɔ ngɔ nihi kulaa nɛ hi ha wami kɛ Mawu jami ngɔ ke wɔ ngɛ nɔ nɛ gu lɛ nitsɛ e hɛ mi nyami kɛ e himi nɔ kɛ tsɛ wɔ ɔ mi. 4Blɔ nɛ ɔ nɔ a gu nɛ a ngɔ si womi nguahi nguahi nɛ a he jua wa amɛ ngɔ ke wɔ, konɛ nyɛɛ gu kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ nɛ nyɛ na Mawu fɔmi su ɔ eko nɛ nyɛɛ tu je nɛ ɔ mi puɛmi nɛ ngɛ akɔnɔ mi ɔ nya fo. 5Enɛ ɔ nɔuu he je ɔ, nyɛɛ kɛ mɔde bɔmi tsuo nɛ ngɔ kpakpa peemi ngɔ piɛ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi he, nɛ nyɛɛ tsɔɔ nyumu peemi ngɛ nyɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ mi; se ngɛ nyɛ nyumu peemi ɔ mi hu ɔ, nyɛ je ni lemi kpo; 6nɛ ni lemi ɔ mi hu ɔ, hɛ si kami; nɛ hɛ si kami ɔ mi ɔ, tsui si tomi; nɛ tsui si tomi ɔ mi ɔ mawu jami; 7nɛ mawu jami mi ɔ, nyɛmimɛ a he dɔmi; nɛ nyɛmimɛ a he dɔmi mi ɔ, suɔmi. 8Ejakaa ke kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ hiɛ ngɛ nyɛ mi ɔ, e be hae nɛ nyɛ maa pee hejɔli aloo nihi nɛ wui yiblii ngɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo he ni lemi ɔ blɔfami. 9Se nɔ nɛ be kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ, lɛɛ hɛyuyuilɔ ji lɛ, nɛ e nɛ́ tsitsaa ni, akɛnɛ e hɛ je nɔ kaa a fɔ e sa yayami ɔmɛ pue he ɔ.
10Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mamimɛ, nyɛɛ bɔ mɔde nɛ nyɛɛ wa je nyɛ tsɛmi kɛ nyɛ hlami ɔ, ejakaa ke nyɛ pee enɛ ɔ ɔ, nyɛ be si gbee gblegbleegblee. 11Ejakaa kikɛmɛ a blɔ ɔ nɔ a maa gu kɛ ngmɛ nyɛ blɔ kɛ sɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ kɛ yi wami helɔ Yesu Kristo neneene matsɛ yemi ɔ mi.
12Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ma kai nyɛ daa nɛ ngɛ kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he, pohu nyɛ le momo nɛ nyɛ nane pi si ngɛ anɔkuale nɛ ngɛ ɔ mi. 13Se be abɔ nɛ i ngɛ kikɛmɛ a bo tsu nɛ ɔ mi nɛ ɔ, i buu lɛ kaa e da kaa i kɛ kaimi nɛ tsɛ̃ɛ nyɛ hɛ; 14ejakaa i le ka aye bo tsu nɛ ɔ kpami maa pee oya, kaa bɔ nɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo hu je kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ mi ɔ. 15Se ma bɔ he mɔde konɛ ye je mi jemi se ɔ, nyɛ hɛ nɛ hi ni nɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ be tsuaa be.
Kristo hɛ mi nyami ɔ he odase yeli
16Ejakaa pi nyaziahi nɛ a sia ngɛ ga mi ɔ, se wa nyɛɛ kɛ jaje wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo he wami kɛ e bami ɔ he sane tsɔɔ nyɛ, se mohu wɔ ji odase yeli nɛ na e hɛ mi nyami kpete-kpleenyɛ ɔ kɛ wa hɛngmɛ. 17Ejakaa e na bu kɛ hɛ mi nyami kɛ je Tsɛ Mawu ɔ ngɔ, benɛ jamɛ a gbi ɔ je hɛ mi nyami kpetekpleenyɛ ɔ mi ba e ngɔ ke: “Nɔ nɛ ji ye suɔmi bi nɛ i naa e he tsui ɔ nɛ.” 18Nɛ kikɛmɛ a gbi nɛ ɔ, wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa nu kaa hiɔwe e je, benɛ waa kɛ lɛ ngɛ yoku klɔuklɔu ɔ nɔ ɔ.
19Nɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ, wa na gbali ɔmɛ a munyu ɔmɛ a nɔ mi mami. E maa hi ha nyɛ ke nyɛ bu tue, ejakaa e ngɛ kaa la ko nɛ ngɛ tsoe ngɛ he ko nɛ wo diblii, kɛ maa su be nɛ je maa na nɛ nɔkɔ ɔ maa te si ngɛ nyɛ tsui mi. 20Kekleekle ɔ, nyɛɛ le enɛ kaa nɔ ko be nyɛe nɛ e maa tsɔɔ ngmami ɔ mi gbami ko sisi kɛ lɛ nitsɛ e sisi tsɔɔmi. 21Ejakaa gbami ko bɛ́ ngɛ nɔmlɔ suɔmi nya hyɛ, se mohu Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ lɛ kpleɔ Mawu nimli klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a nɔ nɛ a tuɔ munyu.

Title: 2 PETRO 2
Content:
Lakpa tsɔɔli
1Lakpa gbali te si hyɛ ngɛ Israelbi ɔmɛ a kpɛti, kaa bɔ nɔuu nɛ lakpa tsɔɔli maa ba nyɛ hu nyɛ kpɛti ɔ. A kɛ hɛ mi kpatami tsɔɔmihi ma ba hɔ mi zaa, nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɛ kpɔ mɛ ɔ po, a ma kua lɛ, nɛ a kɛ hɛ mi kpatami nɛ he ngɛ oya maa ba mɛ nitsɛmɛ a nɔ. 2Nɛ nihi fuu maa nyɛɛ a ya homi ɔ se, nɛ a he ɔ, a maa tu anɔkuale blɔ ɔ he munyu yaya. 3Nɛ a kɛ kutupɔ munyuhi maa jua nyɛ ngɛ hɛ tsumi mi, nihi nɛ kɛ je blema lokoo ɔ, a kojomi hlua we si, nɛ a hɛ mi kpatami ɔ hu be mahɛ hwɔe.
4Ejakaa Mawu ngɔɛ bɔfohi nɛ pee yayami ɔmɛ a he ngɔ ki mɛ, se mohu e tsitsɛɛ mɛ wo gbeje muɔ mi, he nɛ a fi mɛ kɛ diblii kpa ngɔ to ha kojomi. 5Mawu ngɔɛ blema je ɔ he ngɔ ki lɛ; se mohu Noa nɛ fiɛ dami sane ɔ kɛ ni kpaago ɔ kɛkɛ yi e baa; nɛ e kɛ nyu afua a ba nihi nɛ kua Mawu ɔmɛ a je ɔ nɔ. 6Mawu puɛ Sodom kɛ Gomora ma amɛ, nɛ e sa mɛ kɛ la kɛ to odadi ha nihi nɛ ma kua Mawu ɔ. 7Nɛ e je Lot, dalɔ ɔ, nɔ nɛ hao ngɛ nɔ tɔli ɔmɛ a ya homi je mi bami he ɔ kɛ je mi; 8ejakaa a mlaa tɔmi ni tsumi ɔmɛ nɛ dalɔ ɔ na nɛ e nu, benɛ e ngɛ a kpɛti ɔ, pii e tsui nɛ da a daa nɛ ɔ. 9Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ le bɔ nɛ e peɔ nɛ e jeɔ dali ngɛ ka mi, kɛ bɔ nɛ e peɔ nɛ e haa nimli yayamihi hii piimi mi kɛ maa su kojomi ligbi ɔ nɔ, 10se titli ɔ, nihi nɛ nyɛɛ he lo se ngɛ he blemi akɔnɔ mi, nɛ a gbee Mawu nɔ yemi he guɛ ɔ.
Kikɛmɛ a lakpa tsɔɔli nɛ ɔmɛ a tsui wa, nɛ a woɔ a he, nɛ a bui hiɔwe bɔfohi tete, nɛ a tuɔ a he munyu yaya. 11Pohu hiɔwe bɔfo ɔmɛ po nɛ ngɛ he wami nɛ a kle pe kikɛmɛ a lakpa tsɔɔli nɛ ɔmɛ kojo we mɛ kɛ he guɛ gbemi ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi. 12Se kikɛmɛ a nimli nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ kaa lohwehi nɛ be juɛmi nɛ a fɔ mɛ ha numi kɛ gbemi. A tuɔ nihi nɛ a li he nɔ́ ko ɔmɛ a he munyu yaya, nɛ a hɛ mi ma kpata kaa nga mi lohwehi; 13a kɛ nɔ nami maa wo mɛ nihi nɛ dɛ blɔ ɔmɛ a he hiɔ. A buu kpo nɔ ya homi kaa nɔ́ nɛ ngɔɔ; mutsɛmɛ nɛ he ngɛ tai ji mɛ, a hoɔ ya ngɛ a blɔ laami ɔmɛ a mi benɛ a kɛ nyɛ ngɛ ni yee ɔ. 14A hyɛ we nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko kaa ja yi ya holi, nɛ a hɛ jɔɛ kɛ yayami peemi; a mlɔɔ nihi nɛ nane pi si ɔmɛ; a ngɛ hɛ tsumi tsui; musu bimɛ ji mɛ. 15A je blɔ nɛ da a nɔ, nɛ a tla blɔ kɛ ya nyɛɛ Bosor bi Bileam, nɔ nɛ suɔ nɔ yayami peemi mi hiɔwo ɔ, blɔ ɔ nɔ; 16se lɛɛ, a kã e hɛ mi ngɛ e mlaa tɔmi ɔ he; teji nɛ tu we munyu ɔ kɛ nɔmlɔ gbi tu munyu, nɛ e tsi gbalɔ ɔ kuasia peemi ɔ nya.
17Nimli nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ kaa nyu vuhi nɛ nyu be a mi, bɔkuhi nɛ kɔɔhiɔ fiaa kɛ yaa, nihi nɛ a kɛ diblii tsitsliitsli ɔ to ha mɛ kɛ yaa neneene ɔ. 18Akɛnɛ nya puu munyu nguahi jee a nya mi he je ɔ, a guu he lo akɔnɔhi a nɔ nɛ a kɛ ya homi mlɔɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ je wɔ jami mi kɛ we ɔ. 19A woɔ mɛ si ke a maa ye a he, pohu mɛ nitsɛ mɛ ɔ puemi nyɔguɛhi ji mɛ, ejakaa nɔmlɔ peɔ nyɔguɛ ngɔ haa nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ yeɔ e nɔ ɔ. 20Ejakaa ke a gu Nyɔmtsɛ kɛ yi wami helɔ Yesu Kristo he ni lemi ɔ nɔ nɛ a kɛ tu je nɛ ɔ mi mu ni ɔmɛ a nya fo, nɛ lɔ ɔ ɔmɛ ami nɔuu a kpale du mɛ ngɛ, nɛ a ye a nɔ ekohu ɔ, a nyagbe si himi ɔ peɔ yayami pe kekle ɔ. 21Ejakaa afani nɛ a na we nɛ a le dami blɔ ɔ pe nɛ a le nɛ kɛ̃ ɔ, a kpale kɛ je kita klɔuklɔu nɛ a tu ngɔ wo a dɛ mi ɔ he. 22Abɛ ɔ ba mi niinɛ ngɛ a he ke: “Gbe kpaleɔ e se kɛ yaa lɛ nitsɛ e vie he, nɛ kpotoo nɛ a du ha lɛ ɔ ya wuɔ mɔsɔ.”

Title: 2 PETRO 3
Content:
Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ bami ɔ he siwomi
1Mamimɛ, enɛ ɔ ji womi nɛ ji enyɔ sɔuu nɛ i ngɛ nyɛ ngmae, nɛ lɛ tsuo mi ɔ, i kɛ kaimi tsɛ̃ɛ nyɛ juɛmi klɔuu ɔ hɛ. 2I suɔ kaa nyɛ kai gbali klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a munyuhi nɛ a tu sa a, kɛ Nyɔmtsɛ kɛ yi wami helɔ ɔ kita nɛ bɔfohi nɛ a tsɔ mɛ nyɛ ngɔ ɔ kɛ ha nyɛ ɔ. 3Kekleekle ɔ, nyɛɛ le enɛ ɔ kaa nyagbe ligbi ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, nɔ he fɛu yeli maa ba kɛ he fɛu yemi, nihi nɛ maa nyɛɛ ngɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a kɔnɔ ɔmɛ a nya, 4nɛ a ma de ke: “Jije e bami ɔ he si womi ɔ ngɛ? Ejakaa kɛ je be nɛ tsɛmɛ ɔmɛ gbo nɛ ɔ ɔ, bɔ nɛ nihi ngɛ kɛ je je ɔ bɔmi sisije mi ɔ, ja nɔuu a ngɛ nɛ ɔ nɛ.” 5Pe a bua nɛ a jeɔ a hɛ ngɛ enɛ nɔ kaa hiɔwe ngɛ kɛ je blema lokoo, nɛ zugba hu je nyu mi, nɛ e gu nyu mi kɛ ba ma si ngɛ Mawu munyu nya; 6nɛ nyu nɔuu nɔ e gu nɛ nyu afua ngɔ jamɛ a be ɔ mi je ɔ, nɛ e hɛ mi kpata a nɛ. 7Se hiɔwe kɛ zugba nɛ ngɛ nɛ ɔ, lɛ nɔuu e munyu lɛ hɛɛ mɛ kɛ to ha la, nɛ a kɛ mɛ to kɛ yaa su kojomi kɛ nimli nɛ kua Mawu ɔ a hɛ mi kpatami ligbi ɔ.
8Se, mamimɛ, nyɛ hɛ ko je sane kake nɛ ɔ nɔ, kaa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi ɔ, ligbi kake ngɛ kaa jeha akpe, nɛ jeha akpe hu ngɛ kaa ligbi kake. 9Tsa pi kɛmi nɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ha e si womi ɔ se ngɛ kɛe, kaa bɔ nɛ ni komɛ buu kaa e se ngɛ kɛe ɔ, se mohu e tsui si e ngɛ toe kɛ ngɛ wɔ hae, ejakaa e sume kaa ni komɛ nɛ laa, se mohu kaa nihi tsuo a tsake a tsui.
10Se Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ligbi ɔ maa ba ka juɔ baa nyɔ mi, nɛ jamɛ a be ɔ, hiɔwe maa be kɛ ho kɛ huami wawɛɛ, nɛ je nɛ ɔ mi sisije ni ɔmɛ maa sle ngɛ la mi, nɛ je ɔ kɛ e mi ni tsumi ɔmɛ maa sã. 11Jehanɛ, akɛnɛ kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ tsuo hɛ mi ma kpata he je ɔ, mɛni nimli sa kaa nyɛ pee ngɛ je mi bami klɔuklɔu kɛ Mawu jami mi? 12Sa nɛ nyɛɛ pee nihi nɛ hyɛɛ Mawu ligbi ɔ bami ɔ blɔ, lɛ be ɔ mi nɛ hiɔwe ma mle kɛ la nɛ e maa sã, nɛ je mi sisije nihi hu maa sle ngɛ la mi. 13Se ngɛ e si womi ɔ nya a, wa ngɛ hiɔwe he ko kɛ zugba he nɛ dami hii mi ɔ blɔ hyɛe.
14Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, mamimɛ, akɛnɛ nyɛ ngɛ kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ a blɔ hyɛe nɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ bɔ mɔde konɛ nyɛɛ kɛ lɛ kpɛti nɛ hi he jɔmi nɛ a na nyɛ nɛ mu loo piami ko ko hi nyɛ he ngɛ e hɛ mi. 15Nyɛɛ bu wa Nyɔmtsɛ tsui si tomi ɔ kaa yi wami hemi, kaa bɔ nɛ wa suɔmi nyɛmi Paulo ɔ hu ngma nyɛ ngɛ ni lemi nɛ a kɛ ha lɛ ɔ nya a. 16E tuɔ enɛ ɔmɛ a he munyu ngɛ e womi ɔmɛ tsuo a mi. E womi ɔmɛ a mi ni komɛ a sisi numi yee, nɛ nihi nɛ kase we nɔ́ ko kɛ nihi nɛ a nane pi si ɔ tsɔɔ sisi kpa, kaa bɔ nɛ a peɔ ngmamihi nɛ piɛ ɔmɛ hu, kɛ kpataa mɛ nitsɛmɛ a hɛ mi ɔ.
17Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ, mamimɛ, akɛnɛ nyɛ le momosa he je ɔ, nyɛɛ huɔ, konɛ a kɛ nimli yayamihi a sisimi sane ɔ ko ba gbla nyɛ hu, nɛ nyɛ ba gbee si kɛ je nyɛ blɔ ɔ nɔ. 18Se nyɛ keke ngɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ kɛ yi wami helɔ Yesu Kristo dloomi kɛ ni lemi ɔ mi. Lɛ nɔuu a ngɔ hɛ mi nyami ngɔ ha jehanɛ kɛ daa. Amen.

Title: 1 YOHANE 1
Content:
Wami Munyu ɔ
1Wa ngma nyɛ Wami Munyu ɔ nɛ ngɛ kɛ je sisije ɔ; nɔ́ nɛ wa nu nɛ wa na kɛ wa hɛngmɛ; nɔ́ nɛ wa hyɛ nɛ wa nine ta he. 2Nɛ wami ɔ je e he kpo ngɔ tsɔɔ: nɛ wa na, nɛ wa yeɔ he odase, nɛ wa jajeɔ neneene wami ɔ, nɔ nɛ kɛ Tsɛ ɔ ngɛ nɛ e je e he kpo tsɔɔ wɔ ɔ he sane ɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ. 3Nɔ́ nɛ wa na nɛ wa nu ɔ, lɔ ɔ wa jajeɔ ngɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ, konɛ nyɛ hu nyɛɛ kɛ wɔ nɛ bɔ huɛ. Se oʼɛ, wa huɛ bɔmi ɔ, Tsɛ ɔ ke e Bi Yesu Kristo ɔ waa kɛ bɔɔ. 4Wa ngɛ nyɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngmae konɛ nyɛ bua jɔmi ɔ nɛ hi kɛ pi si.
Mawu ji la
5Enɛ ɔ ji bɔfo sane nɛ wa nu kɛ je e ngɔ nɛ wa kpale ngɛ jajee kɛ ngɛ nyɛ tsɔɔe ɔ nɛ, kaa Mawu ɔ la ji lɛ, nɛ diblii ko be e mi kulaa. 6Ke wa de ke waa kɛ lɛ ngɛ huɛ bɔe, se wa nyɛɛ diblii ɔ mi ɔ, wa ngɛ lakpa yee nɛ wa tu we anɔkuale. 7Se ke wa nyɛɛ ngɛ la a mi, kaa bɔ nɛ lɛ nitsɛ e ngɛ la a mi ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ waa kɛ wa he ngɛ huɛ bɔe, nɛ e Bi Yesu Kristo muɔ ɔ tsukɔɔ wa he kɛ jee yayami tsuaa yayami mi.
8Ke wa de ke yayami ko be wa he ɔ, wɔ nitsɛmɛ wa he wa ngɛ sisie, nɛ anɔkuale ɔ be wa mi. 9Ke wa jaje wa he yayami ɔmɛ ɔ, anɔkualetsɛ kɛ dalɔ ji Mawu, e kɛ wa he yayami ɔmɛ maa pa wɔ, nɛ e maa tsukɔ wa he kɛ maa je nihi, nɛ dɛ blɔ kulaa mi. 10Ke wa ke wa pee we yayami ɔ, lɛɛ wa ngɛ Mawu lakpatsɛ bue, nɛ e munyu ɔ be wa mi.

Title: 1 YOHANE 2
Content:
Kristo wa hepiɛlɔ
1Ye bimɛ tsɔwi, i ngɛ nyɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngmae, konɛ nyɛ ko pee yayami. Se ke nɔ ko pee yayami po hu ɔ, wa ngɛ mi dalɔ ngɛ Tsɛ ɔ ngɔ, Yesu Kristo, dalɔ ɔ; 2iɛ ji wa he yayami ɔmɛ a he kpatami nɔ́; se pi ngɛ wa nɔ́ ɔ kɛkɛ he, se mohu je mluku ɔ tsuo nɔ́ ɔ he hulɔ.
3Nɛ enɛ ɔ waa kɛ maa nɔ mi kaa wa le lɛ, ke wa yeɔ e kita amɛ a nɔ ɔ. 4Nɔ nɛ deɔ ke: “I le lɛ,” nɛ e yi e kita amɛ a nɔ ɔ, lakpatsɛ ji lɛ, nɛ anɔkuale ɔ be e mi. 5Se nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ yeɔ e munyu ɔ nɔ ɔ, niinɛ, lɛ e mi Mawu suɔmi ɔ pi si ngɛ. Enɛ ɔ waa kɛ leɔ kaa wa ngɛ e mi. 6Nɔ nɛ deɔ ke e ngɛ Mawu mi ɔ, bɔ nɛ Yesu Kristo nyɛɛ ɔ, lɛ hu e nyɛɛ ja nɔuu.
Kita he ɔ
7Mamimɛ, pi kita he ko nɛ i ngɛ nyɛ ngmae nɛ ɔ, se mohu kita momo nɛ nyɛ ngɛ kɛ je sisije ɔ: Kita momo ɔ ji munyu nɛ nyɛ nu kɛ je sisije ɔ. 8Se kɛ ɔ kita he i ngɛ nyɛ ngmae, nɔ́ nɛ ji anɔkuale ngɛ Kristo mi kɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ mi ɔ, ejakaa diblii ɔ ngɛ bee, nɛ anɔkuale la a ngɛ tsoe jehanɛ.
9Nɔ nɛ deɔ ke e ngɛ la a mi nɛ e nyɛɛ lɛ nitsɛ e nyami ɔ, diblii ɔ mi e ngɛ kɛ mwɔɔ. 10Nɔ nɛ suɔ e nyɛmi ɔ, e hii la a mi, nɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nane kpatami nɔ́ ko be e mi; 11se nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ e nyɛmi ɔ, diblii ɔ mi e ngɛ, nɛ diblii ɔ mi e nyɛɛ, nɛ e li he nɛ e yaa, ejakaa diblii ɔ yu e hɛ.
12I ngɛ nyɛ ngmae, bimɛ tsɔwi, ejakaa a ngɔ nyɛ he yayami ɔmɛ ngɔ pa nyɛ ngɛ Kristo biɛ ɔ he. 13I ngɛ nyɛ ngmɛe, tsaatsɛmɛ, ejakaa nyɛ le nɔ nɛ ngɛ kɛ je sisije ɔ. I ngɛ nyɛ ngmae, nihewi, ejakaa nyɛ ye nɔ yayami ɔ nɔ kunimi. I ngɛ nyɛ ngmae, jokuɛwi, ejakaa nyɛ le Tsɛ ɔ.
14I ngɛ nyɛ ngmae, tsaatsɛmɛ, ejakaa nyɛ le nɔ nɛ ngɛ kɛ je sisije ɔ. I ngɛ nyɛ ngmae, nihewi, ejakaa nyɛ he wa, nɛ Mawu munyu ɔ hii nyɛ mi, nɛ nyɛ ye nɔ yayami ɔ nɔ kunimi.
15Nyɛ ko suɔ je ɔ aloo nihi hu nɛ ngɛ je ɔmi ɔ. Ke nɔ ko suɔ je ɔ, lɛɛ Tsɛ ɔ suɔmi ɔ be e mi. 16Ejakaa nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ ngɛ je ɔ mi ɔ, he lo ɔ se dimi ni ɔmɛ kɛ hɛngmɛ ɔ se dimi ni ɔmɛ kɛ si himi ɔ mi he womi ɔ, ji Tsɛ ɔ mi, se mohu je ɔ mi e je. 17Je ɔ bee kɛ yaa kɛ e mi se dimi ni ɔmɛ, se nɔ nɛ peɔ Mawu suɔmi nya ni ɔmɛ ɔ, e hii si kɛ yaa neneene.
Lakpa kristo
18Ye bimɛ, nyagbe ngmlɛfia a ji nɛ ɔ nɛ; nɛ bɔ nɛ nyɛ nu kaa lakpa kristo ɔ ma, nɛ jehanɛ lakpa kristohi fuu ba, he je ɔ, wa le kaa nyagbe ngmlɛfia a ji nɛ ɔ nɛ. 19Wa kpɛti a je kɛ ho, se kɛ ɔ, pi wa ti ni komɛ ji mɛ, ejakaa wa ti ni komɛ ji mɛ jinɛ a kɛ wɔ ko hi si; se a je benɛ pee nɛ a je a he si kaa tsa pi mɛ tsuo ji wa kpɛti nihi.
