20Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ, nyɛ na nu pɔmi kɛ je Nɔ klɔuklɔu ɔ dɛ mi, nɛ nyɛ le anɔkuale ɔ. 21Tsa pi kaa nyɛ li anɔkuale ɔ he je nɛ i ngɛ nyɛ ngmae nɛ ɔ, se mohu kaa nyɛ le, nɛ nyɛ le kaa lakpa ko lakpa ko ji anɔkuale ɔ mi.
22Lɛɛ mɛnɔ ji lakpatsɛ? Lɛ ji nɔ nɛ deɔ ke pi Yesu ji Kristo ɔ. Nɔ nɛ kuaa Tsɛ ɔ kɛ Bi ɔ, lɛ ji lakpa kristo ɔ nɛ. 23Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ kuaa Bi ɔ, e kuaa Tsɛ ɔ hulɔ. Se nɔ nɛ heɔ Bi ɔ, e ngɛ Tsɛ ɔ hulɔ.
24Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛɛ lɛɛ, nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ nu kɛ je sisije ɔ, nyɛ ha kɔlɔ ɔ nɛ hi nyɛ mi. Ke nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ nu kɛ je sisije ɔ ngɛ nyɛ mi ɔ, lɔ ɔ lɛɛ nyɛ hu nyɛ maa hi Bi ɔ kɛ Tsɛ ɔ mi. 25Nɛ enɛ ɔ ji si nɛ Kristo wo wɔ ɔ nɛ; neneene wami ɔ.
26I ngɛ nyɛ enɛ ɔ ngmae ngɛ nihi nɛ hlaa kaa a puɛ nyɛ tue ɔ he. 27Se nyɛɛ lɛɛ nu pɔmi nɛ nyɛ na kɛ je e ngɔ ɔ hii nyɛ mi, nɛ e hia we nyɛ nɔ ko nɛ tsɔɔ nyɛ ni, se mohu bɔ nɛ e nu pɔmi ɔ tsɔɔ nyɛ nihi kulaa, nɛ e ji anɔkuale se pi lakpa a, he je ɔ, bɔ nɛ e tsɔɔ nyɛ ɔ, nyɛɛ hi e mi.
28Nɛ jehanɛ, bimɛ tsɔwi, nyɛɛ hi e mi, konɛ e puemi ɔ mi ɔ, wa na kã nɛ zo ko gbe wɔ ngɛ e hɛ mi ngɛ e bami ɔ mi. 29Ke nyɛ le kaa dalɔ ji Kristo ɔ, nyɛ na nɛ nyɛɛ le kaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ytsuɔ dami ni ɔ, Mawu bi ji lɛ.

Title: 1 YOHANE 3
Content:
Mawu bimɛ
1Nyɛɛ hyɛ suɔmi abɔ sɔuu nɛ Tsɛ ɔ kɛ suɔ nyɛ, kaa a tsɛ wɔ Mawu bimɛ nɛ wa ji nɛ! Enɛ he ɔ, je ɔ li wɔ, ejakaa e li lɛ hulɔ. 2Mamimɛ, jehanɛ ɔ, Mawu bimɛ ji wɔ, nɛ a na we nɛ a je bɔ nɛ wa maa hi ha a si; se wa le kaa benɛ Kristo ma pue ɔ, wa maa hi kaa lɛ, ejakaa wa maa na lɛ bɔ nɛ e ngɛ ɔ. 3Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ngɛ kikɛmɛ a hɛ kɛ nɔ fɔmi ngɛ Kristo mi ɔ peɔ e he klɔuklɔu kaa bɔ nɛ lɛ hu e ngɛ klɔuklɔu ɔ.
4Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ peɔ yayami ɔ, e ngɛ Mawu mlaa nɔ tɔe, ejakaa yayami ji mlaa nɔ tɔmi. 5Nɛ nyɛ le kaa Kristo je e he kpo konɛ e wo wa he yayami ɔmɛ kɛ ho, nɛ yayami ko be e mi. 6Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ hii Kristo mi ɔ, e pee we yayami. Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ peɔ yayami ɔ, e nɛ lɛ, nɛ jehanɛ hu e li lɛ.
7Bimɛ tsɔwi, nyɛ ko ha nɛ nɔ ko nɛ mlɔɔ nyɛ. Nɔ nɛ tsuɔ dami nihi ɔ, dalɔ ji lɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ Kristo hu ji dalɔ ɔ. 8Nɔ nɛ peɔ yayami ɔ, e je abosiami mi, ejakaa kɛ je sisije lokoo nɛ abosiami pee yayami. Enɛ ɔ he nɛ Mawu Bi ɔ je e he kpo konɛ e puɛ abosiami ni tsumi ɔmɛ ɔ nɛ.
9Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ji Mawu bi ɔ, e pee we yayami, ejakaa Mawu su ngɛ e mi, lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e be yayami nyɛe maa pee, ejakaa Mawu bi ji lɛ. 10Enɔ mi nɛ slɔɔto nɛ ngɛ Mawu bimɛ kɛ abosiami bimɛ a kpɛti ɔ jeɔ e he si paa ngɛ. Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ tsu we dami nihi ɔ, nɛ e sume e nyɛmi hulɔ ɔ, pi Mawu bi ji lɛ.
Nyɛɛ suɔ nyɛ sibi
11Ejakaa enɛ ɔ ji fiɛmi nɛ nyɛ nu kɛ je sisije ɔ kaa waa suɔ wa sibi; 12wa ko pee kaa Kain nɔ nɛ je nɔ yayami ɔ mi nɛ e gbe e nyɛmi ɔ. Mɛni he je nɛ e gbe e nyɛmi ɔ? Ejakaa lɛ nitsɛ e ni tsumi ɔmɛ ɔ yayami ʼi, se e nyɛmi ɔ nɔ ɔ da.
13Mamimɛ, ke je ɔ ngɛ nyɛ nyɛe ɔ, nyɛ hɛ mi nɛ ko pee nyɛ yaa. 14Wa le kaa wa po mi kɛ je gbenɔ mi kɛ ho wami mi ya, ejakaa wa suɔ wa nyɛmimɛ. Nɔ nɛ sume e nyɛmi ɔ, e hii gbenɔ mi. 15Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ e nyɛmi ɔ, nɔmlɔ gbelɔ ji lɛ; nɛ nyɛ le kaa nɔmlɔ gbelɔ ko nɔmlɔ gbelɔ ko be neneene wami ngɛ e mi. 16Enɛ ɔ mi wa naa suɔmi ngɛ, kaa Kristo ngɔ e wami ngɔ fɔ si ngɛ wa he, lɔ ɔ he ɔ e sa kaa wɔ hu waa kɛ wa wami fɔɔ si ngɛ wa nyɛmimɛ a he. 17Ke nɔ ko na je nɔ mi ni, nɛ e na kaa e fi nyɛmi, nɛ e nga e tsui nyɛ wo lɛ ɔ, kɛ Mawu suɔmi ɔ maa pee kɛ hi e mi kɛɛ? 18Bimɛ tsɔwi, nyɛ ko ha waa suɔ nimli ngɛ munyu tutui mi loo ngɛ lilɛ nɔ kɛkɛ, se mohu ngɛ ni tsumi kɛ anɔkuale mi.
Mawu hɛ mi kãpeemi
19Enɛ waa kɛ maa le kaa anɔkuale ɔ mi wa je, nɛ wa ma tsɔ wa tsui ngɔ fɔ wa mi ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi. 20Ke wa tsui buu wɔ fɔ ɔ, wa le kaa Mawu kle pe wa tsui, nɛ e le nihi tsuo pɛpɛɛpɛ. 21Mamimɛ, ke wa tsui bui wɔ fɔ ɔ, wa ngɛ ka ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi. 22Nɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ wa baa iɛ ɔ, wa naa kɛ jee e dɛ mi, ejakaa e kita amɛ ɔ, wa yeɔ nɔ, nɛ wa peɔ nihi nɛ sa e hɛ mi. 23Nɛ enɛ ji e kitaa a nɛ, kaa wa he e Bi Yesu Kristo biɛ ɔ nɔ ngɔ ye, nɛ waa suɔ wa sibi, kaa bɔ nɛ e wo wɔ kita a. 24Nɔ nɛ yeɔ e kita amɛ a nɔ ɔ hii Mawu mi, nɛ Mawu hu hii emi. Nɛ nɔ́ nɛ waa kɛ leɔ kaa e hii wa mi ji mumi nɛ e ngɔ ha wɔ ɔ.

Title: 1 YOHANE 4
Content:
Anɔkuale mumi kɛ lakpa mumi
1Suɔli, nyɛ ko he mumi tsuaa mumi ngɔ ye, se mohu nyɛɛ ka mumi ɔmɛ nɛ nyɛɛ hyɛ kaa Mawu mi a je lo; ejakaa lakpa gbali fuu je kpo kɛ ba je ɔ mi. 2Enɛ nyɛɛ kɛ ma yo Mawu mumi ɔ: Mumi tsuaa mumi nɛ jajeɔ paa kaa Yesu Kristo ba ngɛ he lo mi ɔ, e je Mawu mi. 3Nɛ mumi tsuaa mumi nɛ jaje we kaa Yesu Kristo ba ngɛ he lo mi ɔ, pi Mawu mi nɛ e je, se mohu e ji lakpa kristo mumi ɔ nɛ nyɛ nu e he kaa e ma a, nɛ jehanɛ tete e ngɛ je ɔ mi momo. 4Bimɛ tsɔwi, nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ je Mawu mi, nɛ nyɛ ye lakpa gbali ɔmɛ a nɔ kunimi; ejakaa mumi nɛ ngɛ nyɛ mi ɔ kle pe mumi nɛ ngɛ je ɔ mi ɔ. 5Mɛɛ lɛɛ je ɔ mi a je, lɔ ɔ he ɔ a tuɔ munyu kaa ninɛmɛ nɛ je je ɔ mi, nɛ je ɔ buɔ mɛ tue. 6Se wɔɔ lɛɛ Mawu mi wa je; nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ le Mawu ɔ, e buɔ wɔ tue; nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ e ji Mawu mi ɔ e bui wɔ tue. Lɔ ɔ waa kɛ naa anɔkuale mumi ɔ kɛ lakpa mumi ɔ.
Mawu Suɔmi
7Mamimɛ, nyɛ ha waa suɔ wa sibi, ejakaa suɔmi ɔ Mawu mi e je, nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ suɔ nɔ ɔ, Mawu bi ji lɛ, nɛ e le Mawu. 8Nɔ nɛ sume nɔ ɔ, e li Mawu; ejakaa Mawu ɔ suɔmi ji lɛ.
9Enɛ ɔ mi Mawu suɔmi nɛ e kɛ suɔ wɔ ɔ jee kpo ngɛ, kaa Mawu tsɔ iɛ nitsɛ e Bi kake ɔ kɛ ba je ɔ mi, konɛ waa gu e nɔ nɛ wa na wami. 10Enɛ ɔ mi suɔmi ɔ ngɛ: pi kaa wɔ iɛ wa suɔ Mawu se mohu kaa lɛ nɛ e suɔ wɔ, nɛ e tsɔ e Bi ɔ ke e ba pee wa he yayami ɔmɛ a he kpatami nɔ.
11Mamimɛ, ke Mawu suɔ wɔ kikɛ ɔ, esa kaa wɔ hu waa suɔ wa sibi. 12Mawu ɔ, nɔ ko nɛ́ lɛ hyɛ. Ke wa suɔ wa he ɔ, Mawu hii wa mi, nɛ e suɔmi ɔ hii kɛ pii si ngɛ wa mi.
13Enɛ ɔ waa kɛ leɔ kaa wa hii Mawu mi nɛ lɛ hu e hii wa mi, ejakaa e ngɔ lɛ nitsɛ e Mumi ɔ eko ngɔ ha wɔ. 14Nɛ wɔɔ lɛɛ wa na, nɛ wa ngɛ odase yee kaa Tsɛ ɔ tsɔ e Bi ɔ kaa je ɔ yi wami helɔ. 15Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ jajeɔ paa kaa Yesu ji Mawu Bi ɔ, Mawu hii e mi, nɛ lɛ hu e hii Mawu mi. 16Nɛ wɔɔ lɛɛ wa le, nɛ wa he Mawu suɔmi nɛ e kɛ suɔ wɔ ɔ ye.
Mawu ɔ suɔmi ji lɛ, nɛ nɔ nɛ hii suɔmi mi ɔ, e hii Mawu mi, nɛ Mawu hu hii e mi. 17Enɛ ɔ mi suɔmi ɔ hi kɛ pi si ngɛ ngɛ wa mi, konɛ wa na kã ngɛ kojomi ligbi ɔ nɔ; ejakaa bɔ nɛ e ngɛ ɔ, jã wɔ hu wa ngɛ ngɛ je nɛ mi. 18Gbeye be suɔmi mi, se mohu suɔmi nɛ hi kɛ pi si ɔ fieɔ gbeye, ejakaa piimi ngɛ gbeye yemi mi, se nɔ nɛ yee gbeye ɔ, e na we nɛ e hi kɛ pi si ngɛ suɔmi mi.
19Wa suɔ lɛ ejakaa lɛ kekle e suɔ wɔ. 20Ke nɔ ko de ke: “I suɔ Mawu,” nɛ e nyɛɛ lɛ nitsɛ e nyɛmi ɔ, lakpatsɛ ji lɛ. Ejakaa nɔ nɛ sume lɛ nitsɛ e nyɛmi nɛ e naa a, Mawu nɛ e nɛ́ ɔ, kɛ maa pee kɛɛ nɛ e ma nyɛ lɛ maa suɔ? 21Kita nɛ ji nɔ nɛ waa kɛ je Kristo ngɔ, konɛ nɔ nɛ suɔ Mawu ɔ, e suɔ lɛ nitsɛ e nyɛmi hulɔ.

Title: 1 YOHANE 5
Content:
Je ɔ nɔ kunimiyemi
1Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ heɔ yeɔ kaa Yesu ji Kristo ɔ, Mawu bi ji lɛ. Nɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ suɔ fɔlɔ ɔ, suɔ bi ɔ nɛ e fɔ ɔ hulɔ. 2Enɛ waa kɛ leɔ kaa wa suɔ Mawu bimɛ, ke wa suɔ Mawu nɛ wa yeɔ e kita amɛ a nɔ ɔ. 3Ejakaa enɛ ji suɔmi nɛ wa suɔ Mawu kaa waa ye e kita amɛ a nɔ; nɛ e kita amɛ a nya wɛ́, 4ejakaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ a je Mawu mi kɛ fɔ lɛ ɔ yeɔ je ɔ nɔ kunimi; nɛ wa hemi kɛ yemi ɔ ji nɔ́ nɛ waa kɛ yeɔ je ɔ nɔ kunimi ɔ nɛ. 5Mɛnɔ ji nɔ nɛ yeɔ je ɔ nɔ kunimi ɔ, kaa ja nɔ nɛ heɔ yeɔ kaa Yesu ji Mawu Bi ɔ?
Yesu Kristo he odaseyemi
6Yesu Kristo ji nɔ nɛ gu nyu kɛ muɔ mi kɛ ba a nɛ; pi nyu ɔ mi kɛkɛ se mohu ngɛ nyu kɛ muɔ ɔ mi. Nɛ Mumi ɔ ji nɔ nɛ yeɔ odase, ejakaa Mumi ɔ ji anɔkuale ɔ nɛ. 7Odase yeli etɛ lɛ ngɛ, 8Mumi ɔ, kɛ Nyu ɔ, kɛ Muɔ ɔ; nɛ mɛ ni etɛ ɔ tsuo kake ʼi. 9Ke wa he nimli a odase ɔ, Mawu odase ɔ kle pe kɔlɔ ɔ; nɛ enɛ ji odase nɛ Mawu ye ngɛ e Bi ɔ he. 10Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nɔ nɛ heɔ Mawu Bi ɔ nɔ yeɔ ɔ, e ngɛ odase ngɛ lɛ nitsɛ e tsui mi; se nɔ nɛ he we Mawu yi ɔ, ha e plɛ lakpatsɛ, ejakaa e he we odase nɛ Mawu ye ngɛ e Bi ɔ he ɔ yi. 11Enɛ ɔ ji odase ɔ, kaa Mawu ngɔ neneene wami ngɔ ha wɔ, nɛ kikɛmɛ a wami nɛ ɔ peɔ wa nɔ ngɛ e Bi ɔ mi. 12Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ngɛ Bi ɔ, e ngɛ wami; nɔ nɛ be Bi ɔ e be wami hulɔ.
Neneene wami
13I ngɛ nyɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ ngmae konɛ nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ heɔ Mawu Bi ɔ biɛ ɔ nɔ yeɔ ɔ, nyɛ na nɛ nyɛɛ le kaa nyɛ ngɛ neneene wami. 14Nɛ enɛ ɔ ji ka nɛ wa ngɛ ngɛ e hɛ mi ɔ, kaa, ke wa ba nɔ́ ko ngɛ e suɔmi nya a, e buɔ wɔ tue. 15Nɛ ke wa le kaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ wa baa lɛ ɔ e buɔ wɔ tue ɔ, blɔɔ wa le kaa nihi nɛ wa baa lɛ ɔ, wa nine su nɔ.
16Ke nɔ ko na e nyɛmi nɛ e ngɛ yayami pee nɛ pi gbenɔ yayami ɔ, e bi Mawu, nɛ e ma ha lɛ wami, enɛ kɔɔ nihi nɛ peɔ yayami nɛ pi gbenɔ yayami ɔmɛ a he. Gbenɔ yayami ko ngɛ, se pi enɛ ɔ he nɛ i ngɛ dee ke e bi ɔ. 17Nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ dɛ blɔ ɔ yayami ʼi, se yayami ko ngɛ nɛ pi gbenɔ yayami.
18Wa le kaa nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ ji Mawu bi ɔ, e pee we yayami; se mohu Mawu Bi ɔ buu e he, nɛ nɔ yayami ɔ tɛ e he.
19Wa le kaa wa je Mawu mi nɛ je mluku ɔ tsuo ngɛ nɔ yayami ɔ sisi.
20Wa le kaa Mawu Bi ɔ ba, nɛ e ba ha wɔ juɛmi konɛ waa le anɔkualetsɛ ɔ. Wa ngɛ anɔkualetsɛ ɔ mi, ngɛ e Bi Yesu Kristo mi; lɛ ji anɔkuale Mawu ɔ kɛ neneene wami ɔ. 21Bimɛ tsɔwi, nyɛɛ hyɛ nyɛ he nɛ hi ngɛ wɔhi a he.

Title: 2 YOHANE 1
Content:
1Nɔkɔtɔma a ngma ya ha Awula nɛ a hia lɛ kɛ e bimɛ ɔmɛ, nihi nɛ i suɔ ngɛ anɔkuale mi, nɛ pi ye nɔ kake kɛkɛ, se nihi kulaa nɛ a le anɔkuale ɔ, 2ngɛ anɔkuale nɛ hii wa mi nɛ e kɛ wɔ maa hi si kɛ maa ya neneene ɔ he.
3Dloomi, mɔbɔ nami kɛ he jɔmi nɛ je tsɛ Mawu ɔ, nɛ jehanɛ e je Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo, Tsɛ ɔ Bi ɔ, dɛ mi ɔ kɛ nyɛ nɛ hi si ngɛ anɔkuale kɛ suɔmi mi.
Anɔkuale kɛ suɔmi
4I na bua jɔmi babauu kaa i na o bimɛ ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ kaa a nyɛɛ anɔkuale ɔ mi, kaa bɔ nɛ Tsɛ ɔ wo wɔ kita a. 5Lɔ ɔ he ɔ i ngɛ mo pɛɛ kpae, Awula, pi kita he ko nɛ i ngɛ mo ngmae, se mohu nɔ nɛ wa ngɛ kɛ je sisije ɔ: kaa waa suɔ wa he. 6Enɛ ɔ ji suɔmi ɔ nɛ, kaa waa nyɛɛ ngɛ e kita amɛ a nya. Enɛ ɔ ji kita a nɛ, kaa bɔ nɛ nyɛ nu kɛ je sisije ɔ, nɛ nyɛɛ hi si ngɛ suɔmi mi.
7Ejakaa sisili tuu ba je ɔ mi, nihi nɛ jaje we kaa Yesu Kristo ba ngɛ he lo mi; nɔ nɛ ɔmɛ ji sisilɔ kɛ lakpa kristo ɔ nɛ. 8Nyɛɛ hyɛ nyɛ he saminya, konɛ nyɛ ko laa nihi nɛ wa tsu ɔ, se mohu nyɛ na hiɔwo nɛ sa.
9Nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ jee nɛ e hi si ngɛ Kristo tsɔɔmi ɔ mi ɔ, e be Mawu. Nɔ nɛ hii Kristo tsɔɔmi ɔ mi ɔ, lɛ lɛ ngɛ Tsɛ ɔ kɛ Bi ɔ. 10Ke nɔ ko ba nyɛ ngɔ nɛ e hɛɛ we kikɛmɛ a tsɔɔmi nɛ ɔ, nyɛ ko he lɛ kɛ ba nyɛ we mi, nɛ nyɛ ko fɔ lɛ tete; 11ejakaa nɔ nɛ fɔɔ lɛ ɔ, e kɛ lɛ pe ɔ kake ngɛ e ni tsumi yaya amɛ ami.
Nyagbe sɛyemi
12I ngɛ nihi fuu nɛ ma ngma nyɛ mohu, se i sume kaa i kɛ womi kɛ ningma nyu ngmaa, se mohu ye he ngɛ nɔ kaa ma ba nyɛ ngɔ nɛ i kɛ nyɛ ba tu munyu hɛ mi kɛ hɛ mi, konɛ wa bua jɔmi ɔ nɛ hyi.
13O nyɛmi yo nɛ a hia a bimɛ ɔmɛ ke a biɔ mo.

Title: 3 YOHANE 1
Content:
1Nɔkɔtɔma a ngma ya ha Gaio nɛ a suɔ ɔ, nɔ nɛ imi hu i suɔ ngɛ anɔkuale mi ɔ.
2Mami nɛ i suɔ, i kpa mo pɛɛ kaa o ya nɔ ngɛ nihi kulaa mi nɛ o he nɛ wa mo kaa bɔ nɛ i le nɛ o klaa hu ngɛ ɔ. 3Ejakaa i na bua jɔmi babauu benɛ nyɛmimɛ komɛ ba nɛ a ba ye o nɔkuale ɔ he odase, bɔ nɛ o nyɛɛ ngɛ anɔkuale ɔ mi ɔ. 4Nɔ ko pee we mi bua jɔmi pe enɛ kaa ma nu kaa ye bimɛ ɔmɛ nyɛɛ ngɛ anɔkuale ɔ mi.
A je Gaio yi
5Mami nɛ i suɔ, nɔ nɛ o tsuɔ kɛ haa nyɛmimɛ nɛ ji nibwɔ ɔmɛ ɔ, anɔkuale mi o peɔ ngɛ. 6A ba ye o suɔmi ɔ he odase ngɛ asafo ɔ hɛ mi. O maa pee saminya ke ɔ wo mɛ blɔ bɔ nɛ sa Mawu hɛ mi ɔ. 7Ejakaa Kristo biɛ ɔ he ɔ, a je kpo kɛ ho, nɛ da he we nɔ ko ngɛ maje li ɔmɛ a dɛ. 8Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, e sa kaa wɔ Kristofo ɔmɛ wa he kikɛmɛ a nimli nɛ ɔmɛ atuu, konɛ waa kɛ mɛ nɛ dla anɔkuale ɔ he ni tsumi ɔ.
Diotrefe kɛ Demetrio
9I ngma womi kpiti ko ngɔ mane asafo ɔ, se Diotrefe nɔ nɛ hlaa nɔkɔtɔma yemi ɔ bui nɔ nɛ i ngɛ dee ɔ. 10Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ke i ba hu, ma wo e ni tsumi ɔmɛ a he sane nɔ, bɔ nɛ e tuɔ wa he munyu yaya, nɛ enɛ ɔmɛ tete pi ha lɛ. Lɛ nitsɛ ɔ, e he we nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ, nɛ jehanɛ hu nihi nɛ suɔ kaa a pee ja a, e tsiɔ mɛ blɔ, nɛ e fieɔ mɛ kɛ jee asafo ɔ mi.
11Mami nɛ i suɔ, koo kase nɔ yaya, se moo kase nɔ kpakpa mohu. Nɔ nɛ peɔ nɔ kpakpa a, e je Mawu mi; nɔ nɛ peɔ nɔ yaya a, e nɛ Mawu.
12Demetrio ɔ lɛɛ, nihi tsuo kɛ anɔkuale ɔ nitsɛ tuɔ e he munyu kpakpa, nɛ wɔ hu wa ngɛ e he odase yee, nɛ nyɛ le kaa wa odase ɔ anɔkuale ʼi.
Nyagbe sɛyemi
13I ngɛ nihi fuu nɛ ma ngma, se i sume kaa i kɛ ningma nyu kɛ ningma tso ngmaa. 14Ye hɛ ngɛ nɔ kaa e piɛ bɔɔ kɛkɛ nɛ ma na mo, nɛ wa maa tu munyu hɛ mi kɛ hɛ mi.
15He manye! O huɛmɛ ɔmɛ tsuo ke a biɔ mo. Nga wa huɛmɛ ɔmɛ tsuo kakaaka ha wɔ.

Title: YUDA 1
Content:
1Yuda, nɛ ji Yesu Kristo sɔmɔlɔ kɛ Yakobo nyɛmi ɔ ngma ya ha nihi nɛ a tsɛ mɛ nɛ a pee mɛ klɔuklɔu ngɛ Tsɛ Mawu ɔ mi nɛ a ngɔ mɛ ngɔ to ha Yesu Kristo ɔ.
2Mɔbɔ nami kɛ he jɔmi kɛ suɔmi babauu ha nyɛ!
Lakpa tsɔɔli
3Mamimɛ, akɛnɛ i ngɛ mɔde bɔe nitsɛ nɛ ma ngma nyɛ wɔ tsuo wa yi wami hemi ɔ he sane ɔ he je ɔ, i na kaa e sa nɛ ma ngma nɛ ma kɛ wo nyɛ he wami konɛ nyɛɛ plee hemi kɛ yemi nɛ a tu ngɔ wo klɔuklɔu bi ɔmɛ a dɛ mi si kake nyɔngloo ɔ he. 4Ejakaa ni komɛ ju si kɛ sɛ mi, nihi nɛ blema lokoo a je nɛ a ngma a he sane ngɔ fɔ si ha kikɛmɛ a fɔ bumi nɛ, nɔ yaya peeli nɛ ngɔɔ wa dloomi ɔ kɛ bɔɔ ajuama, nɛ a kuaa Mawu nɛ ji nɔ yelɔ kake pɛ ɔ, kɛ wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo ɔ.
5Nyɛ le enɛ lɛɛ, se i ngɛ hlae nɛ ma kai nyɛ, kaa benɛ Nyɔmtsɛ je e ma a kɛ je Mizraim ɔ, lɔ ɔ se ɔ, e kpata nihɛmɛ nɛ he we yi ɔmɛ a hɛ mi. 6Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfohi hu nɛ hɛɛ we mɛ nitsɛmɛ a nɔkɔtɔma yemi ɔ mi, se mohu a je mɛ nitsɛmɛ a si himi he ɔ, e kɛ neneene kpahi fi mɛ ngɔ to diblii tsitsliitsli mi ha Ligbi ngua a nɔ kojomi ɔ. 7Nyɛ kai Sodoma kɛ Gomora kɛ mahi nɛ bɔle mɛ nɛ a bɔ ajuama nɛ a nyɛɛ he lo se hluu kaa bɔfo ɔmɛ nɔuu ɔ; a neneene la ami hiɔwo nɛ a naa a ngɛ kaa okadi ko kɛ ha nihi tsuo.
8Ja nɔuu ni nɛ ɔmɛ hu bleɔ he lo ɔ ngɛ a nlamihi a mi, nɛ a gbee Mawu nɔ yemi ɔ he guɛ, nɛ a tuɔ bɔfohi a he munyu yaya. 9Se bɔfo nɔkɔtɔma Mikael tete po, pee we enɛ. E kɛ abosiami pɛ nɛ e kɛ lɛ sa nya ngɛ Mose flu ɔ he. Mikael gbiɛ́ abosiami kɛ musu bɔmi munyu ko, se mohu e ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɛ kã o hɛ mi!” 10Se ni nɛ ɔmɛ tuɔ munyu siɔ nihi kulaa nɛ a li, se nihi nɛ a le ngɛ a fɔmi su ɔ nya kaa lohwehi nɛ li ni ɔ, kɔlɔ ɔmɛ nɔuu lɛ kpataa a hɛ mi. 11Musu tloo mɛ! a ngɔ Kain blɔ ɔ, nɛ a kɛ a he ya wo Bileam sisimi he hiɔwo ɔ mi, nɛ Kora atua tsɔmi ɔ mi a hɛ mi kpata ngɛ. 12Ni nɛ ɔmɛ ji nihi nɛ woɔ nyɛ suɔmi niye ni ɔ he mu, ejakaa a kɛ nyɛ yeɔ ni nɛ zo pee we mɛ; a lɛɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a he. A ngɛ kaa bɔku nɛ nyu be mi nɛ kɔɔhiɔ kpakaa kɛ bɔleɔ si, tsohi nɛ a yi ba amɛ wɔle nɛ a wui yiblii; a gbo si enyɔ nɛ a hia mɛ kɛ a sipokuhi. 13A ngɛ kaa wo mi oslɔkehi hulɔ nɛ ngɛ hamahama nɛ jeɔ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a zo ni ɔmɛ ngɔ pueɔ he. A ngɛ ka dodoehi nɛ laa blɔ, nihi nɛ Mawu dla diblii tsitsliitsli ɔ ngɔ to kɛ yaa neneene ɔ.
14Nimli nɛ ɔmɛ a he nɛ Henok nɔ nɛ ji nɔ kapaago kɛ je Adam nɔ ɔ gba ngɛ ke: “Oʼɛ, Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ma kɛ e klɔuklɔu bihi akpe nyɔngma nyɔngmahi abɔ, 15nɛ e maa kojo nimli tsuo, nɛ e ma ka nɔ yayami peeli ngɛ a ni yayami hi tsuo nɛ a tsu ɔ kɛ musu bɔmi munyu tsuo nɛ yayami peeli Mawu kuali tu ngɛ Mawu he ɔ he.” 16Nimli nɛ ɔmɛ ji nihi nɛ tuɔ munyu yaya, sieku yeli kɛ nɔ piali nɛ nɔ muɛ́ a hɛ nɛ a nyɛɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a kɔnɔ yayahi a se; a peɔ nya puu, nɛ a gbee nimli a yi mi ngɛ se nami he.
Kɔkɔbɔmi kɛ nitsɔɔmi
17Se, mamimɛ, nyɛɛ lɛɛ nyɛ kai munyuhi nɛ wa Mawetsɛ Yesu Kristo bɔfo ɔmɛ tu sa a; 18ejakaa a de nyɛ ke: “Nyagbe be ɔ mi ɔ, nɔ he fɛu yeli nɛ nyɛɛ ngɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a kɔnɔ yaya amɛ a nya a maa ba.” 19Nimli nɛ ɔmɛ ji nihi nɛ kɛ mi gbami baa a nɛ, he lo mi nimli nɛ be mumi. 20Se, mamimɛ, nyɛɛ lɛɛ, nyɛ ha nyɛ nane nɛ pi si ngɛ hemi kɛ yemi nɛ ngɛ klɔuklɔu pe kulaa a mi, nɛ nyɛɛ sɔle ngɛ Mumi Klɔuklɔu ɔ mi, 21nɛ nyɛɛ to nyɛ he ngɛ Mawu suɔmi ɔ mi, nɛ nyɛɛ hyɛ wa Mawetsɛ Yesu mɔbɔ nami ɔ blɔ, konɛ nyɛ na neneene wami.
22Nyɛɛ na ninɛmɛ nɛ a yi mi peɔ mɛ kɔsikɔsi ɔ mɔbɔ: 23nyɛ je mɛ kɛ je la a mi. Nyɛɛ na ni kpahi hu mɔbɔ kɛ mɔbɔ nami nɛ gbeye yemi ngɛ mi; se nyɛɛ hie sa tade nɛ a kɛ he lo akɔnɔ wo lɛ mu ɔ.
Yijemi sɔlemi
24Lɛ, nɔ nɛ e ngɛ he wami nɛ e kɛ maa bu nyɛhe nɛ nyɛ ko tɛ si, nɛ e kɛ nyɛ ya da e nyami ɔ hɛ mi nɛ piami ko ko hi nyɛ he ngɛ bua jɔmi mi ɔ, 25Mawu nɛ ji ni lelɔ kake kɛ wa yi wami helɔ ngɛ Yesu Kristo wa Mawetsɛ ɔ he ɔ, lɛ a ngɔ hɛ mi nyami kɛ agboje, nɔ yemi kɛ he blɔ kulaa ngɔ ha jehanɛ kɛ daa. Amen.

Title: KPOJEMI 1
Content:
1Yesu Kristo kpo jemi nɛ Mawu ngɔ ha lɛ nɛ e kɛ tsɔɔ e sɔmɔli ɔmɛ nihi nɛ sa kaa e ba mi ngɛ be kpiti mi, nɛ e kɛ tsɔ e bɔfo ɔ nɛ e kɛ ba tsɔɔ e sɔmɔlɔ Yohane, 2nɔ nɛ ye Mawu munyu ɔ kɛ Yesu Kristo odase ɔ he odase ngɛ nihi tsuo nɛ e na a he ɔ. 3A gbaa nɔ nɛ kaneɔ ɔ kɛ nihi nɛ nuɔ gbami munyu ɔmɛ ɔ, kɛ nihi nɛ ngɔɔ nihi nɛ a ngma ngɛ mi ɔ ngɔ toɔ ɔ, ejakaa be ɔ su ta.
Munyuhi nɛ a kɛ nga Asafohi kpaago ɔ
4Yohane ngma ya ha asafohi kpaago nɛ ngɛ Asia a: Dloomi kɛ he jɔmi ha nyɛ, kɛ je nɔ nɛ ngɛ ɔ, kɛ nɔ nɛ hi si sa a, kɛ nɔ nɛ maa ba a dɛ mi, nɛ kɛ je mumihi kpaago nɛ ngɛ e matsɛ sɛ ɔ hɛ mi ɔ ngɔ, 5nɛ kɛ je Yesu Kristo, nɛ ji odaseyelɔ anɔkualetsɛ ɔ, ni gbogboehi a kpɛti kekleekle bi kɛ zugba a nɔ matsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a nɔyelɔ ɔ dɛ mi.
Nɔ nɛ suɔ wɔ, nɛ e kɛ lɛ nitsɛ e muɔ tsukɔ wa he kɛ je wa he yayami ɔmɛ a mi, 6nɛ e ngɔ wɔ pee matsɛmɛ a weku [kɛ] osɔfohi ngɔ ha e Tsɛ Mawu ɔ, lɛ a ngɔ hɛ mi nyami kɛ nɔ yemi ɔ ngɔ ha kɛ ya neneene kɛ neneene! Amen. 7Oʼɛ, e ma kɛ bɔku ɔmɛ, nɛ hɛngmɛ tsuaa hɛngmɛ maa na lɛ kɛ nihi nɛ gbɔɔ lɛ ni ɔ hulɔ, nɛ zugba a nɔ weku ɔmɛ kulaa maa wo ya ngɛ e he. Ee, Amen.
8Nyɔmtsɛ Mawu ɔ nɛ ji nɔ nɛ ngɛ ɔ, kɛ nɔ nɛ hi si sa a, kɛ nɔ nɛ maa ba, nɛ ji ope ɔ, ke: “Ami ji Alfa a kɛ Omega a” (kekleekle nɔ kɛ nyagbe nɔ).
Kristo he ninami
9Imi Yohane nɛ ji nyɛ nyɛmi kɛ nyɛ huɛ ngɛ Yesu Kristo amanehlu ɔ kɛ e matsɛ yemi ɔ kɛ e tsui si tomi ɔ mi ɔ, i ngɛ zugba kpɔ nɛ wo bɔle lɛ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Patmo ɔ nɔ ngɛ Mawu munyu ɔ kɛ Yesu Kristo he odase yemi he. 10Mumi ɔ ba ye nɔ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ligbi ɔ nɔ, nɛ i nu gbi ngua ko ngɛ ye se kaa titimati 11nɛ de mi ke: “Ngmaa nɔ́ nɛ o ngɛ nae ɔ ngɔ wo womi mi, nɛ o kɛ mane asafohi kpaago nɛ ngɛ Efeso, kɛ Smirna, kɛ Pergami, kɛ Tiatira kɛ Sarde, kɛ kɛ Filadelfia, kɛ Laodikea a.
12I plɛ ye he kone ma hyɛ gbi nɛ kɛ mi ngɛ munyu ɔ tue ɔ. Nɛ bene i plɛ ye he ɔ, i na sika kane tsohi kpaago, 13kɛ nɔ ko ngɛ kane tso kpaago ɔmɛ sa kpɛti nɛ ngɛ kaa Nɔmlɔ Bi, nɛ e wo tade klɔii nɛ e kɛ sika kpa fi e gugue; 14nɛ e yi kɛ e yi bwɔmi hiɛɛ kaa to he bwɔmi hiɔ, kaa snoo, nɛ e hɛngmɛhi ngɛ kaa la lilɛhi, 15nɛ e nanehi ngɛ kaa ayawa klaiklai nɛ tsu ngɛ flɔnɔɔ mi, nɛ e gbi ngɛ kaa nyu babauu pɛmi. 16Nɛ e hɛɛ dodoehi kpaago ngɛ e hiɛ ɔ nine mi, nɛ hiɔ kɛ e nya enyɔ nɛ nya mi ba je kpo ngɛ e nya mi, nɛ e hɛ mi ngɛ kaa pu nɛ ngɛ tsoe wawɛɛ. 17Nɛ benɛ i na lɛ ɔ, i nɔ si ngɛ e nane nyɛ kaa nɔ gbogboe; nɛ e kɛ e hiɛ ɔ nine fɔ ye nɔ, nɛ e de mi ke: “Koo ye gbeye; ami ji kekleekle nɔ ɔ kɛ nyagbe nɔ ɔ, 18kɛ hɛkalɔ. I gbo, nɛ oʼɛ, ye hɛ ngɛ kɛ yaa neneene kɛ neneene, nɛ i hɛɛ gbeje kɛ gbenɔ nya safe ɔmɛ. 19Lɔ ɔ he ɔ ngmaa nihi nɛ o na a, kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ ɔ, kɛ nihi nɛ maa ba ngɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ a se ɔ: 20dodoehi kpaago nɛ o na ngɛ ye hiɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ laami sane ɔ, kɛ sika kane tsohi kpaago ɔ. Dodoehi kpaago ɔ ji asafohi kpaago ɔmɛ a bɔfohi, kɛ kane tsohi kpaago nɛ o na a ji asafohi kpaago ɔmɛ ɔ nɛ.”

Title: KPOJEMI 2
Content:
Sɛ kɛ ha Efeso asafo ɔ
1“Ngmaa ya ha Efeso asafo ɔ bɔfo ɔ, ke:
“Nihi nɛ nɔ nɛ hɛɛ dodoehi kpaago ɔ ngɛ e hiɛ ɔ nine mi nɛ e nyɛɛ sika kane tso kpaago ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ de ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: 2I le o ni tsumi ɔmɛ kɛ o dengme gbomi ɔ, kɛ o tsui si tomi ɔ, kɛ bɔ nɛ o kplɛɛ we nimli yayami ɔmɛ a ni peepee ɔmɛ a nɔ, se ɛo ka nihi nɛ deɔ ke bɔfohi ji mɛ se a pi ja a, nɛ o na kaa lakpatsɛmɛ ji mɛ. 3Nɛ o hɛɛ mi, nɛ o toɔ o tsui si, nɛ ye biɛ ɔ he ɔ, o bɔɔ mɔde, nɛ pɔ tɔɛ mo. 4Se kɛ ɔ, i kɛ mo ngɛ sane ko, lɔ ɔ ji kaa, o sume mi kaa bɔ nɛ o suɔ mi sa a. 5Lɔ ɔ he ɔ kaii he nɛ o je kɛ nɔ si ɔ, nɛ o tsake o tsui, nɛ o tsu kekle ni tsumi ɔmɛ; se ke pi ja a, ma ba o ngɔ oya, nɛ ma je o kane tso ɔ kɛ maa je e ma he ɔ, ja o pia o he. 6Se kɛ ɔ, o ngɛ enɛ, kaa o nyɛɛ Nikolaimɛ a ni tsumi ɔmɛ nɛ imi hu i nyɛɛ ɔ.
7“Nɔ nɛ ngɛ tue ɔ, e nu nɔ́ nɛ Mumi ɔ ngɛ asafo ɔmɛ dee ɔ.
“Nɔ nɛ yeɔ kunimi ɔ, ma ha lɛ wami tso ɔ nɛ ngɛ ye Mawu ɔ Paradeiso ɔ mi ɔ nɔ yiblii ɔ eko nɛ e ye.”
Sɛ kɛ ha Smirna asafo ɔ
8“Nɛ Smirna asafo ɔ bɔfo ɔ, ngmaa ya ha lɛ ke:
“Nihi nɛ kekleekleno ɔ kɛ nyagbeno ɔ, nɔ nɛ gbo nɛ e hɛ ngɛ ekohu ɔ de ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: 9I le o ni tsumi ɔmɛ kɛ o dengme gbomi ɔmɛ kɛ o hia a, — se kɛ ɔ niatsɛ ji mo — nɛ i le ni yayahi nɛ nihi nɛ deɔ ke Yudafohi ji mɛ se a pi ja se mohu a ji Satan kpe mi bimɛ ɔ deɔ ngɛ o he ɔ. 10Koo ye amanehlu nɛ o maa na eko eko gbeye, oʼɛ, abosiami maa ngɔ nyɛ ti ni komɛ ngɔ wo tsu mi, kone a kɛ ka nyɛ, nɛ nyɛ maa na amanehlu ligbi nyɔngma. Pee anɔkualetsɛ kɛ ya su gbenɔ mi, nɛ ma ha mo wami jlasi ɔ.
11“Nɔ nɛ ngɛ tue ɔ, e nu nɔ́ nɛ Mumi ɔ ngɛ asafo ɔmɛ dee ɔ.
“Kunimi yelɔ ɔ, a be lɛ nɔ ko yaya ko pee ngɛ gbenɔ nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ mi.”
Sɛ kɛ ha Pergamo asafo ɔ
12“Nɛ Pergamo asafo ɔ bɔfo ɔ, ngmaa yaha lɛ ke:
“Nihi nɛ snɔ nɛ hɛɛ hiɔ kɛ e nya mi enyɔ nɛ nya ba a de ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: 13I le he nɛ o hii ɔ, he nɛ Satan matsɛ sɛ ɔ ngɛ ɔ. O hɛɛ ye biɛ ɔ mi, nɛ o kua we o hemi kɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ jamɛ a ligbi ɔmɛ a mi po, bene a gbe Antipa, ye o daseyelɔ anɔkualetsɛ ɔ ngɛ nyɛ kpɛti, he nɛ Satan hii ɔ. 14Se kɛ ɔ, i kɛ mo ngɛ sane bɔɔ ko: ejakaa o ngɛ nihi ngɛ lejɛ ɔ nɛ hɛɛ Bileam nɔ nɛ tsɔɔ Balak kaa e tsɔ Israelbi ɔmɛ klama nɛ a ye nihi nɛ a kɛ sa bɔ ha wɔhi nɛ a bɔ ajuama a tsɔɔmi ɔ mi. 15Ja nɔuu hu o ngɛ nihi nɛ hɛɛ Nikolaibihi a tsɔɔmi ɔ mi. 16Lɔ ɔ he ɔ tsakee o tsui; se ke pi ja a, ma ba o ngɔ mla, nɛ i kɛ ye nya mi hiɔ́ ɔ kɛ mɛ ma ba hwu ta.
17“Nɔ nɛ ngɛ tue ɔ, e nu nɔ́ nɛ Mumi ɔ ngɛ asafo ɔmɛ dee ɔ.
“Nɔ nɛ yeɔ kunimi ɔ, ma ha lɛ mana nɛ a kɛ laa a eko nɛ e ye, nɛ ma ha lɛ tɛ hiɔ, nɛ tɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ, a ngma biɛ he nɛ nɔ ko li ja nɔ nɛ naa a.”
Sɛ kɛ ha Tiatira asafo ɔ
18“Nɛ Tiatira asafo ɔ bɔfo ɔ, ngmaa ya ha lɛ ke:
“Nihi nɛ Mawu Bi ɔ nɛ e hɛngmɛ ngɛ kaa la lilɛ nɛ e nanehi ngɛ kaa ayawa nɛ kpɛɔ nylamnylam ɔ de ji nɛ ɔ nɛ. 19I le o ni tsumi ɔmɛ kɛ o suɔmi ɔ kɛ o sɔmɔmi ɔ kɛ o hemi kɛ yemi ɔ kɛ o tsui si tomi ɔ, nɛ i le o ni tsumi ɔmɛ kaa sekpɛ ni ɔmɛ pe kekle ni ɔmɛ tete. 20Se kɛ ɔ, i kɛ mo ngɛ sane ko, kaa o ngmɛ yo Yesabel nɛ tsɛɛ e he gbalɔ ɔ blɔ, nɛ e tsɔɔ ye sɔmɔli ɔmɛ ni, nɛ e mlɔɔ mɛ, nɛ a bɔ ajuama, nɛ a ye ni nɛ a kɛ sa bɔ ha wɔhi. 21I ha lɛ be konɛ e kɛ tsake e tsui, se e sume nɛ e tsake kɛ je ajuama bɔmi ɔ mi. 22Oʼɛ, i kɛ lɛ maa fɔ sa nɔ, nɛ i kɛ nihi nɛ kɛ lɛ puɛ gba a hu maa wo nɔ nami kpatekpleenyɛ mi, ja a tsake a tsui kɛ je e ni tsumi ɔmɛ a mi. 23Ma gbe e bimɛ ɔmɛ, nɛ asafo ɔmɛ kulaa ma na maa le kaa imi ji nɔ nɛ leɔ juɛmi kɛ tsui mi susumihi, nɛ ma wo nyɛ ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ hiɔ bɔ nɛ e ni tsumi ɔmɛ ngɛ ɔ.
24“Se i ngɛ nyɛ dee, nyɛ nihi nɛ piɛ ngɛ Tiatira a, nihi abɔ nɛ hɛɛ we tsɔɔmi nɛ ɔ mi, nɛ li ‘Satan muɔhi nɛ a mi kuɔ ɔ’ (kaa bɔ nɛ a deɔ ɔ) I kɛ tlomi kpã ko be nyɛ nɔ fɔe. 25Se nɔ́ nɛ nyɛ ngɛ ɔ nyɛɛ hɛɛ mi ka ya su be nɛ ma ba. 26Nɛ kunimi yelɔ ɔ kɛ nɔ nɛ hɛɔ ye ni tsumi ɔmɛ a mi kɛ ya suu nyagbe ɔ, ma ha lɛ he wami ngɛ je ma amɛ a nɔ, 27nɛ e kɛ dade tso ma kpaka mɛ, nɛ e maa ywia mɛ kaa a ywiaa zu buɛhi, kaa bɔ nɛ imi hu i na kɛ je Tsaatsɛ ngɔ ɔ; 28nɛ ma ngɔ nɔkɔ ɔ ngɔ ha lɛ.
29“Nɔ nɛ ngɛ tue ɔ e nu nɔ́ nɛ Mumi ɔ ngɛ asafo ɔmɛ dee ɔ.”

Title: KPOJEMI 3
Content:
Sɛ kɛ ha Sarde asafo ɔ
1“Nɛ Sarde asafo ɔ bɔfo ɔ, ngmaa ya ha lɛ ke:
“Nihi nɛ nɔ nɛ ngɛ Mawu mumihi kpaago ɔ kɛ dodoehi kpaago ɔ de ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: I le o ni tsumi ɔmɛ kaa o hɛɛ biɛ kaa o hɛ ngɛ, se o gbo. 2Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, fo hɛ nɛ tsɛ, nɛ o waje nihi nɛ piɛ nɛ ngɛ hlae nɛ a gbo ɔ. Ejakaa i nɛ o ni tsumi ɔmɛ eko nɛ hi kɛ pi si ngɛ ye Mawu ɔ hɛ mi. 3Lɔɔ he ɔ kaii nɔ́ nɛ a tsɔɔ mo kɛ bɔ nɛ o nu ɔ nɛ o kɛ to, nɛ o tsake o tsui. Se jehanɛ ke o hɛ tsɛ́ ɔ, ma tua mo kaa juɔ, nɛ o be lee ngmlɛfia nɔ nɛ ma ba a kulaa. 4Se kɛ ɔ, o ngɛ nihi bɔɔ ko ngɛ Sarde, nihi nɛ wui a tade ɔmɛ mu; a kɛ mi maa nyɛɛ ngɛ tade hiɔhi a mi, ejakaa a sa ja. 5Kunimi yelɔ ɔ, a maa wo lɛ tade hiɔ, nɛ i be e biɛ gbee ngɛ wami womi ɔ mi gblegbleegblee, nɛ ma wo e biɛ ta ngɛ Tsaatsɛ hɛ mi kɛ e bɔfo ɔmɛ a hɛ mi.
6“Nɔ nɛ ngɛ tue ɔ, e nu nɔ́ nɛ Mumi ɔ ngɛ asafo ɔmɛ deɔ ɔ.
Sɛ kɛ ha Filadelfia asafo ɔ
7“Nɛ Filadelfia asafo ɔ bɔfo ɔ, ngmaa ya ha lɛ ke:
“Nihi nɛ nɔ klɔuklɔu ɔ kɛ anɔkualetsɛ ɔ, nɔ nɛ hɛɛ David safe ɔ, nɔ nɛ bliɔ nɛ nɔ ko nga we, nɛ e ngaa hulɔ nɛ nɔ ko bli we ɔ de ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: 8I le o ni tsumi ɔmɛ; nɛ oʼɛ, i bi sinya ngɔ fɔ si ngɛ o hɛ kpɛ, nɛ nɔ ko be nyɛe ma nga, ejakaa he wami bɔɔ ngɛ, se o ye ye munyu ɔ nɔ, nɛ o kua we ye biɛ ɔ. 9Oʼɛ, i kɛ ni komɛ nɛ je Satan kpe he ɔ nɛ deɔ ke Yudafohi ji mɛ se e be mi ja, se mohu lakpa mohu a ngɛ yee ɔ maa ba o hɛ mi; oʼɛ, ma ha nɛ a ba nɛ a ba nu o nane nɛ a ja mo, konɛ a le kaa imi lɛɛ i suɔ mo. 10Ejakaa o ye ye munyu nɛ deɔ ke o to o tsui si ɔ nɔ he je ɔ, ma baa o yi ngɛ ka ngmlɛfia nɛ maa ba je mluku ɔ kulaa nɔ nɛ a kɛ maa ka nihi nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ mi. 11Oʼɛ, i ma oya; pɛtɛ nɔ nɛ o ngɛ ɔ he nɛ wa, konɛ nɔ ko ko kpɔ o jlasi ɔ! 12Kunim yelɔ ɔ, ma ngɔ lɛ ngɔ pee Titima ngɛ ye Mawu ɔ sɔlemi tsu ɔ mi, nɛ e be kpo jee hu, nɛ ma ngma ye Mawu ɔ biɛ, kɛ ye Mawu ɔ ma nɛ ji Yerusalem he nɛ jee ye Mawu ngɔ ɔ biɛ, kɛ mi nitsɛ ye biɛ he ɔ ngɛ e nɔ.
13“Nɔ nɛ ngɛ tue ɔ, e nu nɔ́ nɛ Mumi ɔ ngɛ asafo ɔmɛ dee ɔ!”
Sɛ kɛ ha Laodikea asafo ɔ
14“Nɛ Laodikea asafo ɔ bɔfo ɔ, ngmaa ya ha lɛ ke:
“Nihi nɛ Amen ɔ nɛ ji odase yelɔ anɔkualetsɛ ɔ kɛ anɔkua leyelɔ ɔ kɛ Mawu adebɔ ɔ sisije ɔ de ji nɛɔ nɛ: 15I le oni tsumi ɔmɛ kaa o be yluduu nɛ o be kɛlakɛla hulɔ. Oo, jinɛ o ko pee yluduu loo o ko pee kɛlakɛla! 16Se kikɛ nɛ ɔ, akɛnɛ o ngɛ kulɔkulɔ nɛ o be yluduu nɛ o be kɛlakɛla hulɔ he je ɔ, ma la mo ngɛ ye nya mi ngɔ pue he. 17Ejakaa o deɔ ke: ‘Niatsɛ ji mi nɛ i ngɛ ni, nɛ nɔ́ ko nɔ́ ko hia we mi,’ nɛ o li kaa o ngɛ dengme mi nɛ o ni hu ngɛ mɔbɔ, nɛ ohiafo kɛ hɛ yuyuilɔ kɛ hegutsɛ ji mo, 18i ngɛ mo ga woe ke o he sika nɛ a tsu he ngɛ la mi kɛ je ye ngɔ, kone o na ni, kɛ tade hiɔ, kone o wo nɛ o he gu nɛ ngɛ zo ɔ nɛ ko fɔ si, kɛ hɛngmɛ tsopa nɛ o kɛ nga o hɛngmɛ nɔ, kone o hyɛ nɔ. 19Imi lɛɛ, nihi abɔ nɛ i suɔ ɔ, i kãa mɛ nɛ i gblaa a tue; lɔ ɔ he ɔ, o hɛ nɛ dɔ nɛ o tsake o tsui! 20Oʼɛ i daa si ngɛ sinya a se nɛ i ngɛ sie; ke nɔ ko nu ye gbi nɛ e bli sinya a, ma ba e ngɔ nɛ i kɛ lɛ ma ba ye ni nɛ lɛ hu e kɛ mi maa ye. 21Kunimi yelɔ ɔ, ma ha lɛ blɔ nɛ e kɛ mi nɛ hi ye matsɛ sɛ ɔ nɔ, kaa bɔ nɛ imi hu i ye kunimi nɛ i kɛ Tsaatsɛ hii si ngɛ e matsɛ sɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ.
22“Nɔ nɛ ngɛ tue ɔ, e nu nɔ́ nɛ Mumi ɔ ngɛ asafo ɔmɛ dee o.”

Title: KPOJEMI 4
Content:
Hiɔwe Ma wu jami
1Ni nɛ ɔmɛ a se ɔ i hyɛ, nɛ oʼɛ, sinya ko nɛ a bli ngɛ hiɔwe. Kekleekle gbi nɛ i nu nɛ ngɛ kaa titimati nɛ kɛ mi tu munyu ɔ ke: “Kuɔ kɛ ba hiɛ ɔ nɛ ɔ nɛ ma tsɔɔ mo nihi nɛ maa ba mi ngɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ a se.” 2Nɛ amlɔ ɔ Mumi ɔ ba ye nɔ, nɛ oʼɛ, matsɛ sɛ ko maa si ngɛ hiɔwe, nɛ nɔ ko hii si ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ nɔ. 3Nɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ nɔ ɔ, ke o hyɛ lɛ ɔ, e ngɛ kaa tɛ nɛ he jua wa kaa yaspi kɛ sardi, nɛ alale bɔle matsɛ sɛ ɔ he, nɛ ke o hyɛ ɔ, e ngɛ kaa smaragde tɛ. 4Nɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ he ɔ, matsɛ sɛhi nyingmi enyɔ kɛ eywiɛ bɔle lɛ kɛ kpe, nɛ nikɔtɔmahi nyingmi enyɔ kɛ eywiɛ hii si ngɛ sɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ; sa wo tade hiɔhi, nɛ sika jlasi fi a yi. 5Nɛ oslaba gbami kɛ gbi kɛ hiɔwe simi je matsɛ sɛ ɔ mi, nɛ la hahi kpaago nɛ ngɛ tsoe nɛ ji Mawu mumihi kpaago ɔ ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ hɛ mi. 6Nɛ nɔ́ ko kaa ahuhuɛ wo nɛ hɛ mi tsɔ kaa kristolo ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ hɛ mi, nɛ hɛ kali eywiɛ nɛ hɛngmɛhi hyi a hɛ mi kɛ a se tɔtɔɔtɔ ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ kpɛti kɛ e he kulaa. 7Kekleekle hɛ kalɔ ɔ ngɛ kaa jata, nɛ hɛ kalɔ nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ ngɛ kaa na, ne hɛ kalɔ nɛ ji etɛ ɔ ngɛ kaa nɔmlɔ, nɛ hɛ kalɔ nɛ ji eywiɛ ɔ ngɛ kaa kɔle nɛ e ngɛ tee. 8Nɛ hɛkali eywiɛ ɔmɛ a ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ ngɛ ple ekpa ekpa, nɛ a he kɛ a mi tsuo hyi tɔtɔɔtɔ kɛ hɛngmɛ sɔuu, nɛ a jɔɔ we lami nyɔ kɛ pia ke:
“Klɔuklɔu, klɔuklɔu, klɔuklɔu ji Nyɔmtsɛ Mawu Ope,
Nɔ nɛ ngɛ sa a, kɛ nɔ nɛ ngɛ ɔ, kɛ nɔ nɛ maa ba a.”
9Nɛ benɛ hɛ kali ɔmɛ ngɔ nyami kɛ agboje kɛ sina kɛ ngɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ matsɛ ɔ nɔ nɛ hɛ ngɛ kɛ je neneene kɛ yaa neneene ɔ hae ɔ, 10nikɔtɔmahi nyingmi enyɔ kɛ eywiɛ ɔ buɔ si ngɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ hɛ mi, nɛ a ngɛ nɔ nɛ hɛ ngɛ kɛ je neneene kɛ yaa neneene ɔ jae, nɛ a sakee a jlasi ɔmɛ ngɔ pueɔ matsɛ sɛ ɔ hɛ mi nɛ a deɔ ke:
11“Wa Nyɔmtsɛ kɛ wa Mawu, mo ji nɔ nɛ sa kaa
O ngɔ hɛ mi nyami kɛ agboje kɛ he wami ɔ
Ejakaa mo lɛ ɔ bɔ nihi kulaa,
Nɛ o suɔmi nya a ngɛ nɛ a bɔ mɛ ngɛ.”

Title: KPOJEMI 5
Content:
Womi ɔ kɛ Tobi ɔ
1I na womi kpo ko ngɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ hiɛ ɔ nɔ, nɛ a ngma ni ngɛ e mi kɛ e se tsuo, nɛ a sɔu nya kɛ nya sɔumi ni kpaago. 2Nɛ i na bɔfo ngua ko nɛ e ngɛ fiɛe kɛ gbi ngua ke: “Mɛnɔ ji nɔ nɛ sa kaa e bli womi ɔ nya nɛ e tsɔ e nya sɔumi ni ɔmɛ?” 3Se nɔ ko nɔ ko be hiɔwe loo zugba a nɔ loo zugba a sisi nɛ ma nyɛ womi ɔ nya nɛ e bli loo nɛ e hyɛ mi. 4Nɛ i fo ya hluu, ejakaa a nɛ́ nɔ ko nɔ ko nɛ sa kaa e bli womi ɔ nya nɛ e kane loo nɛ e hyɛ mi. 5Kɛkɛ nɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ a ti nɔ kake de mi ke: “Ko fo ya! oʼɛ jata a nɛ je Yuda wɛtso ɔ mi ɔ, nɔ nɛ ji David nina a, ye kunimi, nɛ e bli womi ɔ nya, nɛ e tsɔ e nya sɔumi ni kpaago ɔ.”
6Nɛ i hyɛ nɛ oʼɛ, matsɛ sɛ ɔ kɛ hɛ kali eywiɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti, kɛ nikɔtɔmahi nyingmi enyɔ kɛ eywiɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti ɔ, Tobi ko daa si kaa nɔ nɛ a gbe lɛ, nɛ e ngɛ koli kpaago kɛ hɛngmɛ kpaago nɛ ji Mawu mumi kpaago ɔ nɛ a tsɔ kɛ ya zugba a tsuo nɔ ɔ. 7Nɛ Tobi ɔ ba, nɛ e ba he womi kpo ɔ kɛ je nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ hiɛ ɔ nine mi. 8Nɛ benɛ e ngɛ womi ɔ hee ɔ, hɛ kali eywiɛ ɔ kɛ nikɔtɔmahi nyingmi enyɔ kɛ eywiɛ ɔ bu si ngɛ Tobi ɔ hɛ mi, nɛ a ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ hɛɛ kpã saku kɛ sika tɔhi kɛ a mi tsopa kɛ e he via tɔtɔɔtɔ nɛ ji klɔuklɔu bi ɔmɛ a sɔlemi ɔmɛ. 9Nɛ a la la he ko de ke:
“Mo lɛ sa kaa o heɔ womi ɔ
Nɛ o tsɔɔ e nya sɔumi ɔmɛ,
Ejakaa a gbe mo,
Nɛ o kɛ o muɔ ɔ kpɔ wɔ ha Mawu
Kɛ je wetso tsuaa wetso kɛ munyu tsuaa munyu
Kɛ ma tsuaa ma kɛ je ma tsuaa je ma mi.
10Nɛ ɔ ngɔ wɔ ngɔ pee matsɛmɛ kɛ osɔfohi
Ha wa Mawu ɔ,
Nɛ wa maa ye matsɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ.”
11Nɛ i hyɛ, nɛ i nu bɔfohi fuu nɛ bɔle matsɛ sɛ ɔ kɛ hɛ kali ɔmɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ a he kɛ kpe ɔmɛ a gbi, nɛ a nya ji akpe nyɔngma totoe akpe nyɔngma kɛ akpe totoe akpe, 12nɛ a kɛ gbi ngua de ke:
“Tobi nɛ a gbe ɔ,
Sa nɛ e ngɔ he wami kɛ ni nami
Kɛ ni lemi kɛ nyɛmi kɛ agboje kɛ hɛ mi
nyami kɛ gbaami.”
13Nɛ i nu kaa bɔ ni ɔmɛ kulaa nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe kɛ zugba a nɔ kɛ zugba a sisi kɛ wo hɛ mi kɛ nihi kulaa nɛ ngɛ a mi ɔ ke:
“A ngɔ gbaami kɛ agboje kɛ hɛ mi nyami
Kɛ nɔ yemi ngɔ ha nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ nɔ
Kɛ Tobi ɔ kɛ je neneene kɛ ya neneene!”
14Nɛ hɛ kali eywiɛ ɔ ke: “Amen.” Nɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ bu si, nɛ a ja nɔ nɛ hɛ ngɛ kɛ je neneene kɛ yaa neneene ɔ.

Title: KPOJEMI 6
Content:
Nya sɔumi nihi
1Kɛkɛ nɛ i na kaa Tobi ɔ tsɔ nya sɔumi kpaago ɔ kake; nɛ i nu kaa hɛ kali eywiɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɔ kake kɛ gbi nɛ ngɛ kaa hiɔwe simi de ke: “Ba nɛ o ba hyɛ!” 2I hyɛ, nɛ oʼɛ, okpɔngɔ hiɔ nɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ e nɔ ɔ hɛɛ kɛɛ, nɛ a ha lɛ jlasi, nɛ e je kpo kaa kunimi yelɔ, konɛ e ya ye kunimi.
3Nɛ benɛ Tobi ɔ tsɔ nya sɔumi nɔ́ nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ, i nu nɛ hɛ kalɔ nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ de ke: “Ba nɛ o ba hyɛ!” 4Nɛ okpɔngɔ kpa ko nɛ tsuɔ je kpo, nɛ a ha nɔ nɛ hi e nɔ ɔ he blɔ ke e je he jɔmi kɛ je zugba a nɔ, konɛ nimli nɛ a gbe a he, nɛ a ha lɛ klaate ngua ko.
5Nɛ benɛ Tobi ɔ tsɔ nya sɔumi nɔ́ nɛ ji etɛ ɔ, i nu nɛ hɛ kalɔ nɛ ji etɛ ɔ de ke: “Ba nɛ o ba hyɛ!” I hyɛ, nɛ oʼɛ, okpɔngɔ yumu, nɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ e nɔ ɔ hɛɛ sɛni ngɛ e dɛ mi. 6Nɛ i nu gbi ko kɛ je hɛ kali eywiɛ ɔmɛ a kpɛti ke: “Ngma susumi nɔ́ kake ligbi kake hiɔwo, blɛfo susumi nihi etɛ ligbi kake hiɔwo, se nu kɛ wai ɔ lɛɛ koo ta he!”
7Benɛ Tobi ɔ tsɔ nya sɔumi nɔ́ nɛ ji eywiɛ ɔ, i nu hɛ kalɔ nɛ ji eywiɛ ɔ gbi ke: “Ba nɛ o ba hyɛ!” 8I hyɛ, nɛ oʼɛ, okpɔngɔ lazu lazu; nɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ e nɔ ɔ biɛ ji Gbenɔ, nɛ Gbeje nyɛɛ e se; nɛ a ha mɛ he blɔ konɛ a kɛ klaate kɛ hwɔ kɛ gbenɔ hiɔ kɛ zugba a nɔ awi yemi lohewehi nɛ gbe zugba a mi dlami eywiɛ mi kake.
9Kɛkɛ nɛ Tobi ɔ tsɔ nya sɔumi nɔ́ nɛ ji enuɔ ɔ, nɛ i na nihi nɛ a gbe ngɛ Mawu munyu ɔ kɛ odase nɛ a ye ɔ he ɔ a klaahi ngɛ bɔsami latɛ ɔ sisi; 10nɛ a kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ ke: “Nyɔmtsɛ Klɔuklɔu kɛ Anɔkuayelɔ, mɛni be o maa kojo nɛ o maa gbla nihi nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ nɛ gbe wɔ ɔmɛ a tue?” 11A hã a ti nɔ tsuaa nɔ tade hiɔ klɔii, nɛ a de mɛ ke a jɔɔ a he be bɔɔ ko lolo kɛ ya su be nɛ a nyɛmimɛ sɔmɔli ɔmɛ kɛ anyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ hu nɛ a maa gbe mɛ kaa bɔ nɛ a gbe mɛ nitsɛmɛ hu ɔ a hiemi maa sɔ.
12Nɛ i na benɛ Tobi ɔ tsɔ nya sɔumi nɔ́ nɛ ji ekpa a, nɛ oʼɛ, zugba mimiɛ wawɛɛ, nɛ pu plɛ kaa kpekpe kotoku yumu, nɛ nyɔhiɔ mluku ɔ plɛ kaa muɔ, 13nɛ hiɔwe dodoehi tsɔ fia si kaa bɔ nɛ ngmɔkɔ tso yiblii ngmlikiti wɔleɔ pueɔ si benɛ kɔɔhiɔ ngua ngɛ fiae ɔ. 14Nɛ hiɔwe hɛ lɛ kɛ ho kaa womi nɛ a hluɛ; nɛ a tsitsɛɛ yoku tsuaa yoku kɛ wo kpɔ tsuaa wo kpɔ kɛ je e blɔ he. 15Nɛ zugba a nɔ matsɛmɛ ɔmɛ kɛ nimli ngua amɛ kɛ asafoatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ kɛ niatsɛmɛ ɔmɛ kɛ he wali ɔmɛ, kɛ nyɔguɛ tsuaa nyɔguɛ kɛ odehe tsuaa odehe ya laa a he ngɛ muɔhi a mi kɛ tɛkplohi a mi, 16nɛ fa de yoku ɔmɛ kɛ tɛ sa amɛ ke: “Nyɛ ba nɔ wa nɔ nɛ nyɛɛ laa wɔ kɛ je nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ hɛ mi kɛ Tobi ɔ mi mi fumi ɔ nya. 17Ejakaa e mi mi fumi ligbi ngua a su, nɛ mɛnɔ ma nyɛ si maa da?”

Title: KPOJEMI 7
Content:
Israelbi akpe lafa nyingmi eywiɛ kɛ eywiɛ ɔ
1Enɛ ɔ se ɔ, i na hiɔwe bɔfohi eywiɛ nɛ a daa si ngɛ zugba kɔ nya eywiɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ, nɛ a hɛɛ zugba a nɔ kɔɔhiɔ eywiɛ ɔ mi, konɛ kɔɔhiɔ ɔ ko fia ngɛ zugba a nɔ loo wo nɔ loo tso ko nɔ. 2Nɛ i na bɔfo kpa ko nɛ e ngɛ kuɔe kɛ ngɛ pu site he jee kɛ ma, nɛ e hɛɛ Mawu hɛ kalɔ ɔ nya sɔumi nɔ. E kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ kɛ de bɔfohi eywiɛ nɛ a ha mɛ he wami kaa a pee zugba a kɛ wo ɔ yayami ɔ 3ke: “Nyɛ ko pee zugba a loo wo ɔ loo tso ɔmɛ yayami ko kɛ maa su be nɛ waa kɛ nya sɔumi nɔ ma kadi wa Mawu ɔ sɔmɔli ɔmɛ a hɛ nya lolo.” 4Nɛ a demi nihi nɛ a kɛ nya sɔumi nɔ́ ɔ kadi mɛ ɔ a yibɔ; nimli akpe lafa nyingmi eywiɛ kɛ eywiɛ nɛ a kɛ nya sɔumi nɔ́ ɔ kadi mɛ kɛ je Israelbi ɔmɛ a wetso tsuaa wetso mi. 5Yuda wɛtso ɔ mi ɔ, a kɛ nya sɔumi nɔ́ ɔ kadi nimli akpe nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ; Ruben wɛtso ɔ mi ɔ, nimli akpe nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ; Gad wɛtso ɔ mi ɔ, nimli akpe nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ, 6Aser wɛtso ɔ mi ɔ, nimli akpe nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ, Nafatali wɛtso ɔ mi ɔ, nimli akpe nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ, Manase wɛtso ɔ mi ɔ, nimli akpe nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ, 7Simeon wɛtso ɔ mi ɔ, nimli akpe nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ, Levi wɛtso ɔ mi ɔ, nimli akpe nyɔngma lɛ enyɔ, Isakar wɛtso ɔ mi ɔ, nimli akpe nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ, 8Zebulon wɛtso ɔ mi ɔ, nimli akpe nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ, Yosef wɛtso ɔ mi ɔ, nimli akpe nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ, Benyamin wɛtso ɔ mi ɔ, nimli akpe nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ.
Asafo kuu ngua a
9Enɛ ɔ se ɔ i hyɛ, nɛ oʼɛ, nimli asafo nɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko be nyɛe maa kane nɛ je je mi ma tsuaa je mi ma kɛ wɛtsohi kɛ mahi kɛ mahi a nɔ gbihi a mi nɛ a daa si ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ hɛ mi kɛ Tobi ɔ hɛ mi, nɛ a wo tade hiɔ, nɛ a hɛɛ tã kuɔmihi ngɛ a dɛ, 10nɛ a kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ ke: “Yi wami hemi ɔ ji wa Mawu nɛ hii si ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ kɛ Tobi ɔ nɔ́!” 11Nɛ bɔfo ɔmɛ tsuo daa si ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ kɛ nikɔtɔmahi hɛ kali eywiɛ ɔmɛ a he kɛ kpe, nɛ a kɛ a hɛ mi bu si ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ hɛ mi, nɛ a ja Mawu 12ke: “Amen! Gbaami kɛ hɛ mi nyami kɛ ni lemi kɛ sina kɛ agboje kɛ he wami kɛ nyami ha wa Mawu ɔ kɛ je neneene kɛ ya neneene! Amen!”
13Nɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ a ti nɔ kake he nɔ nɛ e bi mi ke: “Ninɛmɛ nɛ a wo tade hiɔ nɛ ɔ, mɛnɔmɛ ʼi, nɛ jije a je?” 14Nɛ i de lɛ ke: “Ye Nyɔmtsɛ, mo lɛ o le.” Nɛ e de mi ke: “Nimli nɛ ɔmɛ ji nihi nɛ a je nɔ nami kpetekpleenyɛ ɔ mi ɔ nɛ; nɛ a fɔ a tade ɔmɛ a he, nɛ a ha a hiɛ futaa ngɛ Tobi ɔ muɔ ɔ mi. 15Lɔ ɔ he nɛ a ngɛ Mawu matsɛ sɛ ɔ hɛ mi, nɛ a jaa lɛ nyɔ kɛ pia ngɛ se sɔlemi tsu ɔ mi ɔ nɛ; nɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ maa ma e bo tsu ɔ ngɔ to anɔ. 16Hwɔ be mɛ yee hu, nɛ kuma hu be mɛ tɔe hu, nɛ jeha nɛ hu, pu loo latsa ko be a he sae hu; 17ejakaa Tobi ɔ nɛ ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ kpɛti ɔ maa lɛ mɛ, nɛ e maa tsɔɔ mɛ blɔ kɛ maa ya wami nyu vuhi a he, nɛ Mawu ma tsu a hɛ mi vo nyu kulaa.

Title: KPOJEMI 8
Content:
Nya sɔumi nɔ nɛ ji kpaago ɔ
1Benɛ Tobi ɔ tsɔ nya sɔumi nɔ́ nɛ ji kpaago ɔ, a pee dii ngɛ hiɔwe maa pee ngmlɛfia fa. 2Nɛ i na hiɔwe bɔfohi kpaago ɔ nɛ daa si ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi ɔ, nɛ a ngɔ Titimati kpaago ngɔ ha mɛ.
3Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo kpa ko ba nɛ e ba da bɔ sami latɛ ɔ he, nɛ e hɛɛ sika tsopa ke e he via sami nɔ́, nɛ a ha lɛ tsopa kɛ e he via fuu konɛ e kɛ piɛ klɔuklɔu bi ɔmɛ kulaa a sɔlemi ɔmɛ a he ngɛ sika bɔ sami latɛ nɛ maa si ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ hɛ mi ɔ nɔ. 4Nɛ tsopa kɛ e he via a lasuku ɔ te si kɛ je hiɔwe bɔfo ɔ dɛ mi kɛ ya piɛ klɔuklɔu bi ɔmɛ a kue fami ɔmɛ a he kɛ ho Mawu hɛ mi ya. 5Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo ɔ wo tsopa kɛ e he via sami nɔ́ ɔ, nɛ e je bɔ sami latɛ ɔ nɔ la a eko ngɔ wo mi tɔtɔɔtɔ, nɛ e ngɔ hɛ pue zugba a nɔ, nɛ hiɔwe simi kɛ gbihi kɛ oslaba gbami kɛ zugba mimiɛmi ba.
Titimati ɔmɛ
6Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfohi kpaago ɔ nɛ hɛɛ titimati kpaago ɔ dla a he konɛ a ma kpa.
7Kekleekle hiɔwe bɔfo ɔ kpa, nɛ gbiɛ ngo ngu loo hiɔmi tɛ kɛ la nɛ muɔ futu mi ba nɛ e ba pue zugba a nɔ, nɛ zugba a mi dlami etɛ mi kake sã, nɛ ba mumuhi tsuo sã.
8Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ kpa, nɛ a sake nɔ́ ko nɛ ngɛ kaa yoku nɛ ngɛ tsoe kɛ la ngɔ fɔ wo mi, nɛ wo ɔ midlami etɛ mi kake plɛ muɔ, 9nɛ wo ɔ mi nihi nɛ a bɔ nɛ ngɛ wami ɔ a midlami etɛ mi kake gbo, nɛ lɛhi a mi dlami etɛ mi kake hɛ mi kpata.
10Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo nɛ ji etɛ ɔ kpa, nɛ dodoe ngua nɛ ngɛ tsoe kaa ha tsɔ kɛ je hiɔwe ba nɔ si, nɛ e nɔ pa amɛ a mi dlami etɛ mi kake kɛ nyu hɛngmɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ. 11Dodoe ɔ biɛ ji Doodoomi, nɛ nyu ɔmɛ a mi dlami etɛ mi kake plɛ nɔ́ ko nɛ duɔ, nɛ nimli babauu nɛ nu ɔ gbo, ejakaa e duɔ.
12Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo nɛ ji eywiɛ ɔ kpa, nɛ a fia pu mi dlami etɛ mi kake kɛ nyɔhiɔ mi dlami etɛ mi kake kɛ dodoehi a mi dlami etɛ mi kake nɔ́, nɛ a mi dlami etɛ mi kakaaka a wo diblii, nɛ piani mi dlami etɛ mi kake ɔ, je mi tsɔ we nɛ nyɔ mi hu ja kɛ.
13Nɛ i na, nɛ i nu kɔle ko he nɛ ngɛ tee ngɛ hiɔwe, nɛ e kɛ gbi wawɛɛ ngɛ dee ke: “Musu tloo, musu tloo, musu tloo nihi nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ,” benɛ hiɔwe bɔfohi etɛ nɛ piɛ ɔ ma kpa a titimati ɔmɛ ɔ.

Title: KPOJEMI 9
Content:
1Kɛkɛ nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo nɛ ji enuɔ ɔ kpa e titimati ɔ, nɛ i na dodoe ko je hiɔwe ba nɔ zugba a nɔ, nɛ a ngɔ muɔ voo ɔ nya safe ɔ ngɔ ha lɛ. 2Nɛ e bli muɔ voo ɔ nya, nɛ lasuku te si kɛ je muɔ ɔ mi kaa abolo tsu ngua mi lasuku, nɛ pu kɛ hiɔwe wo diblii ngɛ muɔ ɔ mi lasuku ɔ he. 3Nɛ baalɛhi je lasuku ɔ mi kɛ ba zugba a nɔ; nɛ a ha mɛ he wami kaa he wami nɛ nyingmogblakotohi hɛɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ. 4Nɛ a de mɛ ke a ko pee zugba a nɔ nga loo ba mumu loo tso ko yayami ko, kaa ja nimli nɛ be Mawu nya sɔumi nɔ́ ɔ okadi ngɛ a hɛ nya a kɛkɛ. 5Nɛ a tsi a nya kaa a ko gbe nimli ɔmɛ, se mohu a pii mɛ hlami enuɔ. Nɛ a nya yeyee ɔ ngɛ kaa nyingmogblakoto nɛ tsɛ̃ɔ nɔ nya yemi. 6Lɛ hlami enuɔ nɛ ɔ mi ɔ, nimli ma hia gbenɔ, se a be nae, nɛ a maa suɔ kaa a ko gbo, se gbenɔ maa tu a nya fo.
7Baalɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ kaa okpɔngɔhi nɛ a dla mɛ kɛ yaa ta, nɛ ni komɛ fi a yi kaa sika jlasi, nɛ a hɛ mi ngɛ kaa nimli a hɛ mi; 8nɛ a yi bwɔmi ngɛ kaa yihi a yi bwɔmi, nɛ a lunguhi ngɛ kaa jatahi a nɔ. 9A wo damihi kaa dade demahi, nɛ a plehi a mi pɛmi ngɛ kaa okpɔngɔhi babauu kɛ zugba lɛhi nɛ hɛɛ fo kɛ yaa ta; 10nɛ a ngɛ hlemi kaa nyingmogblakotohi, nɛ kɛ̃ɛ ngɛ a hlemi ɔmɛ a nya, nɛ a ngɛ he wami kaa a pee nimli yayami hlami enuɔ. 11Nɛ a matsɛ ji muɔ woo ɔ mi bɔfo ɔ, nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ ngɛ Hebri gbi mi ke Abadon, nɛ ngɛ Hela gbi mi ɔ, a tsɛɛ lɛ Apolion (Hɛmikpatalɔ).
12Kekleekle musu ɔ be; oʼɛ, musuhi enyɔ ma ngɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ a se.
13Kɛkɛ nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo nɛ ji ekpa a kpa e titimati ɔ, nɛ i nu gbi ko kɛ je sika tsu bɔ sami latɛ nɛ maa si ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi ɔ kolohi eywiɛ ɔmɛ a mi 14de hiɔwe bɔfo nɛ ji ekpa a nɛ hɛɛ titimati ɔ ke: “Pɛne hiɔwe bɔfohi eywiɛ nɛ a fi mɛ ngɛ Eufrate pa ngua a nya a!” 15A pɛne hiɔwe bɔfohi eywiɛ ɔ nɛ a dla to ngmlɛfia a kɛ ligbi ɔ kɛ hlami ɔ kɛ jeha a, konɛ a gbe nimli a mi dlami etɛ mi kake. 16Nɛ aslaafohi nɛ hi okpɔngɔhi a nɔ ɔ, i nu kaa a nya ji akpe nyingmi enyɔ totoe akpe nyɔngma. 17Nɛ bɔ nɛ i na okpɔngɔ ɔmɛ kɛ a nɔ hili ɔmɛ ngɛ ni nami ɔ mi ji nɛ ɔ nɛ: A damahi nɛ a wo ɔ su ngɛ kaa la kɛ alamua yumu kɛ kungwɔ zɔ; nɛ okpɔngɔ ɔmɛ a yihi ngɛ kaa jatahi a yi, nɛ la kɛ lasuku kɛ suɔɔ ngɛ hiae kɛ ngɛ a nya mi jee. 18Kikɛmɛ a haomi etɛ nɛ ji la kɛ lasuku kɛ suɔɔ nɛ ngɛ hiae kɛ ngɛ a nya mi jee nɛ ɔ, a kɛ gbe nimli a mi dlami etɛ mi kake. 19Ejakaa okpɔngɔ ɔmɛ a he wami ngɛ a nya mi kɛ a hlemihi a mi, ejakaa a hiemi ɔmɛ ngɛ kaa sinɔhi, nɛ yihi ngɛ a he, nɛ kɔlɔ ɔmɛ a kɛ peɔ yayami.
20Nɛ nimli nɛ piɛ nɛ a gbi mɛ ngɛ kikɛmɛ a haomi nɛ ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, a tsakee we a tsui kɛ ji a nine nya ni tsumi ɔmɛ a he, konɛ a jɔɔ mumi yayamihi kɛ sika tsu kɛ sika hiɔ kɛ ayawa kɛ tɛ kɛ tso amagahi nɛ hyɛ we nɔ́ nɛ a nui nɔ́ nɛ a nyɛ we nɛ a nyɛɛ ɔ jami. 21Jehanɛ hu, a tsake we a tsui kɛ ji a awi yemi kɛ a nyuami kɛ ajuama bɔmi kɛ a jumi ɔmɛ a mi.

Title: KPOJEMI 10
Content:
Hiɔwe Bɔfo ɔ kɛ womi kpo wayo ɔ
1Kɛkɛ nɛ i na hiɔwe bɔfo kpa ko nɛ he wa nɛ e je hiɔwe kɛ ngɛ si kplee, nɛ e ha bɔku, nɛ alale ngɛ e yi kpɛti, nɛ e hɛ mi ngɛ kaa pu, nɛ e nanehi ngɛ kaa la titimahi. 2Nɛ e hɛɛ womi kpo wayo ko nɛ a bli nya ngɛ e dɛ mi; nɛ e kɛ e hiɛ ɔ nane ma wo nɔ, nɛ e kɛ e muɔ nane hu ma zugba nɔ. 3Nɛ e kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ kaa jata huaa; nɛ benɛ e ngɛ huae ɔ, hiɔwe simi kpaago ɔ wo a gbi mi. 4Benɛ hiɔwe simi kpaago ɔ wo a gbi mi ɔ, jinɛ i miɔ nɛ ma ngma; nɛ i nu gbi ko nɛ je hiɔwe de mi ke: “Sɔuu nihi nɛ hiɔwe simi kpaago ɔ de ɔ nya, nɛ o ko ngma.”
5Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo ɔ nɛ i na kaa e daa si ngɛ wo ɔ nɔ kɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ wo e hiɛ ɔ nine nɔ kɛ ya hiɔwe, 6nɛ e tsɛ nɔ nɛ hɛ ngɛ kɛ je neneene kɛ yaa neneene nɛ bɔ hiɔwe kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ mi ɔ kɛ zugba kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ mi ɔ kɛ wo kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ mi ɔ nɛ e kɛ ka kita ke: “Be ko be ko be hu! 7Se mohu ke hiɔwe bɔfo nɛ ji kpaago ɔ kpa e titimati ɔ, kɛkɛ lɛɛ a gbe Mawu laami sane ɔ hu nya, bɔ nɛ e jaje Sane Kpakpa a tsɔɔ lɛ nitsɛ e tsɔli nɛ ji gbali ɔmɛ ɔ.”
8Nɛ gbi nɛ i nu kɛ je hiɔwe ɔ kɛ mi tu munyu ekohu, nɛ e ke: “Yaa nɛ o ya he womi ɔ nɛ a bli nya a ngɛ bɔfo nɛ daa si ngɛ wo ɔ nɔ kɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ dɛ.” 9I ya bɔfo ɔ ngɔ, nɛ i ya de lɛ ke: “Ngɔɔ womi kpo wayo ɔ ngɔ ha mi.” Nɛ e de mi ke: “He nɛ o ye; e maa duɔ ngɛ o mi mi, se e maa ngɔɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ ngɛ o nya mi kaa hwo.” 10Kɛkɛ nɛ i he womi kpo wayo ɔ ngɛ bɔfo ɔ dɛ nɛ i ye, nɛ e ngɔɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ ngɛ ye nya mi kaa hwo, nɛ benɛ i ye ɔ, e duɔ ngɛ ye mi mi.
11Nɛ e de mi ke: “E sa kaa o gba ekohu ngɛ nimli kɛ majamaje kɛ mahi a nɔ gbihi kɛ matsɛmɛ fuu a he.”

Title: KPOJEMI 11
Content:
Odaseyeli enyɔ ɔ
1Nɛ a ha mi gla tso ko nɛ ngɛ kaa kalemi tso ko nɛ a ke: “Tee si nɛ o kale Mawu sɔlemi tsu ɔ kɛ bɔ sami latɛ ɔ kɛ nihi nɛ jaa Mawu ngɛ mi ɔ; 2se kpo nɛ ngɛ sɔlemi tsu ɔ agbo ɔ nya a, si kɔlɔ ɔ, nɛ o ko kale, ejakaa a kɛ ha majemaje li ɔmɛ konɛ a naa ma klɔuklɔu ɔ nɔ hlami nyingmi eywiɛ kɛ enyɔ. 3Nɛ ma ha ye odaseyeli enyɔ ɔ ma bu kpekpe nɛ a maa gba ligbihi akpe kɛ lafa enyɔ kɛ nyingmi ekpa.”
4Odaseyeli enyɔ nɛ ɔmɛ ji nu tsohi enyɔ ɔ kɛ kane tsohi enyɔ ɔ nɛ daa si ngɛ zugba a nɔ nyɔmtsɛ ɔ hɛ mi ɔ nɛ. 5Nɛ ke nɔ ko ngɛ hlae nɛ e pee mɛ yayami ɔ, la jee a nya mi saa a he nyɛli ɔmɛ; nɛ ke nɔ ko ngɛ hlae nɛ e pee mɛ yayami ɔ, ja nɔuu a maa gbe lɛ. 6Nimli nɛ ɔmɛ ngɛ he blɔ kaa sa ngaa hiɔwe nya konɛ hiɔmi ko nɛ ngɛ a gbami ligbi ɔmɛ a mi; nɛ a ngɛ he blɔ hulɔ ngɛ nyu ɔmɛ a nɔ kaa a haa a plɛɔ peɔ muɔ, nɛ a kɛ haomi haoɔ zugba a si abɔ nɛ a suɔ.
7Nɛ ke a gbe a odaseyemi ɔ nya a, lohwe ɔ nɛ je muɔ voo ɔ mi ɔ kɛ mɛ maa hwu ta, nɛ e maa ye a nɔ, nɛ e maa gbe mɛ; 8nɛ a gbogboe ɔmɛ ma pue si ngɛ ma ngua nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ ngɛ mumi mi ke Sodoma kɛ Mizraim ɔ, he nɛ a sɛu a Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ ngɛ ɔ magbɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ. 9Nɛ ma amɛ kɛ wɛtso ɔmɛ kɛ gbihi slɔɔto ɔmɛ kɛ majemaje li ɔmɛ a ti ni komɛ maa hyɛ a gbogboe ɔmɛ ligbi etɛ̃ kɛ fa, nɛ a be kplɛe nɛ a pu mɛ. 10Nɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ ma nya ngɛ a gbenɔ ɔ he, nɛ a mi mi maa flii mɛ, nɛ a maa ke a he nihi, ejakaa kikɛmɛ a gbali enyɔ nɛ ɔmɛ hao ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ. 11Nɛ ligbi etɛ kɛ fa a se ɔ, wami mumi je Mawu ngɔ ba a mi, nɛ a te si da a nane nɔ, nɛ gbeye nɛ nya wa nu nihi nɛ na mɛ ɔ. 12Nɛ gbali enyɔ ɔmɛ nu gbi kpetekpleenyɛ je hiɔwe de mɛ ke: “Nyɛɛ kuɔ kɛ ba hiɛ ɔ nɛ ɔ!” Nɛ a kuɔ kɛ ho hiɔwe ya ngɛ bɔku ɔ mi, nɛ a he nyɛli ɔmɛ na mɛ. 13Nɛ lɛ ngmlɛfia a nɔ nɔuu ɔ, zugba mimiɛ wawɛɛ, nɛ ma a mi dlami nyɔngma mi kake hule, nɛ zugba mimiɛmi ɔ mi ɔ, a gbe nimli akpe kpaago. Ninɛmɛ nɛ piɛ ɔ ye gbeye, nɛ a ngɔ hɛ mi nyami ngɔ ha hiɔwe Mawu ɔ.
14Musu nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ be; nɛ oʼɛ musu nɛ ji etɛ ɔ ma oya.
Titimati nɛ ji kpaago ɔ
15Kɛkɛ nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo nɛ ji kpaago ɔ kpa e titimati ɔ, nɛ a nu gbi nguahi ngɛ hiɔwe ke: “Je nɛ mi matsɛ yemi ɔ plɛ wa Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kɛ e Kristo ɔ nɔ, nɛ e maa ye matsɛ kɛ maa ya neneene kɛ neneene!” 16Kɛkɛ nɛ nikɔtɔmahi nyingmi enyɔ kɛ eywiɛ nɛ hii si ngɛ a matsɛ sɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi ɔ kɛ a hɛ mi bu si, nɛ a ja Mawu 17de ke:
“Wa naa mo si, mo Nyɔmtsɛ Mawu Ope,
Mo nɔ nɛ o ngɛ nɛ o hi si ɔ,
Kaa o ngɔ o he wami kpetekpleenyɛ ɔ
Nɛ o bɔni matsɛyemi,
18Nɛ majemaje li ɔmɛ a mi mi fu,
Ejakaa o mi mi fumi be ɔ su
Nɛ a maa kojo ni gbogboe ɔmɛ
Nɛ a maa wo o sɔmɔli nɛ ji gbali ɔmɛ
Kɛ klɔuklɔu bi ɔmɛ kɛ nihi nɛ yee mo gbeye ɔ hiɔ, nimli wawi kɛ nimli nguahi
Nɛ yee o biɛ ɔ gbeye ɔ.
Be su nɛ a ma puɛ nihi nɛ puɛɔ zugba a.”
19Nɛ a bli Mawu sɔlemi tsu ɔ nya ngɛ hiɔwe, nɛ a na e somi daka a ngɛ sɔlemi tsu ɔ mi, nɛ oslaba, kɛ gbi kɛ hiɔwe simi kɛ zugba mimiɛmi kɛ gbiɛ ngo ngu loo hiɔmi tɛ babauu ba.

Title: KPOJEMI 12
Content:
Yo ɔ kɛ sinɔ ngua a
1Kɛkɛ nɛ a na okadi ngua ko ngɛ hiɔwe: yo ko nɛ e kɛ pu ha e he, nɛ nyɔhiɔ ngɛ e nane si, nɛ dodoe nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ jlasi fi e yi; 2nɛ e mi wa, nɛ e ngɛ ngmlaa kpae, nɛ e ngɛ kɔɔe, nɛ e ngɛ nɔ nae nɛ e ma fɔ.
3Nɛ a na okadi kpa ngɛ hiɔwe, nɛ oʼɛ, sinɔ ngua tsutsuutsu kpetekpleenyɛ nɛ ngɛ yi kpaago kɛ koli nyɔngma, nɛ matsɛ pɛɛ kpaago bu e yi ɔmɛ a nɔ. 4Nɛ ehlemi ngɛ hiɔwe dodoehi a midlami etɛ mi kake gblae, nɛ e tsɔ mɛ ngɔ pue zugba a nɔ. Nɛ sinɔ ngua a ba da yo nɛ ma fɔ ɔ hɛ mi, konɛ, ke e fɔ ɔ nɛ e mi e bi ɔ. 5Nɛ yo ɔ fɔ bi nyumu nɔ nɛ kɛ dade tso ma kpaka maje li ɔmɛ kulaa a; nɛ a sa e bi ɔ kɛ ho Mawu ngɔ ya ngɛ e matsɛ sɛ ɔ kasa nya. 6Nɛ yo ɔ tu fo kɛ ho nga nɔ he ko ya, he nɛ Mawu dla to ngɔ ha lɛ ɔ, konɛ a ya lɛ lɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ ligbihi akpe kɛ lafa enyɔ kɛ nyingmi ekpa.
7Nɛ ta te si ngɛ hiɔwe: Mikael kɛ e bɔfo ɔmɛ hia sinɔ ngua a yi nɔ ta. Nɛ sinɔ ngua a bɔfo ɔmɛ piɛ e he kɛ hwu, 8se a ye a nɔ, nɛ a nɛ blɔ ngɛ hiɔwe ha mɛ hu. 9Nɛ a sake sinɔ ngua kpetekpleenyɛ ɔ, nɔ nɛ ji blema sinɔ ɔ nɛ a tsɛɛ lɛ Nyapolɔ loo Abosiami nɛ sisiɔ je mluku ɔ tsuo ɔ, ngɔ fɔ zugba a nɔ, nɛ a sake e bɔfo ɔmɛ hu ngɔ fɔ zugba a nɔ ngɔ piɛ e he.
10Nɛ i nu gbi ngua ko ngɛ hiɔwe ke: “Jehanɛ yi wami hemi ɔ kɛ he wami ɔ kɛ matsɛ yemi ɔ plɛ wa Mawu ɔ nɔ, nɛ a kɛ he blɔ ɔ ha e Kristo (nɔ nɛ a pɔ lɛ nu) ɔ, ejakaa a sake wa nyɛmimɛ ɔmɛ a nya polɔ ɔ nɛ poo a nya ngɛ wa Mawu ɔ hɛ mi nyɔ kɛ pia a ngɔ fɔ he. 11Nɛ mɛɛ lɛɛ, Tobi ɔ muɔ ɔ kɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a odase yemi munyu ɔ, a kɛ ye e nɔ, nɛ a klɔɛ mɛ nitsɛmɛ a wami he kɛ ya su gbenɔ mi tete. 12Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, nyɛ hiɔwe kɛ nyɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ lejɛ ɔ, nyɛ na bua jɔmi! Musu tloo je ɔ kɛ wo! Ejakaa Abosiami kple si kɛ ba nyɛ ngɔ, e gli wawɛɛ, ejakaa e le kaa be bɔɔ kɛkɛ e piɛ ha lɛ.”
13Nɛ benɛ sinɔ ngua a na kaa a sake lɛ ngɔ fɔ zugba a nɔ ɔ, e tiu yo ɔ nɛ fɔ bi nyumu ɔ. 14Se a ngɔ kɔle ngua a ple enyɔ ɔmɛ ngɔ ha yo ɔ, konɛ e te kɛ ya nga a nɔ ngɛ e blɔ he ɔ, he nɛ a maa lɛ lɛ ngɛ jeha etɛ kɛ fa nɛ sinɔ ɔ be lɛ nae hu ɔ. 15Nɛ sinɔ ɔ su nyu nɛ ngɛ kaa pa kɛ je e nya mi kɛ pue yo ɔ se, konɛ nyu ɔ nɛ sa lɛ kɛ ho. 16Se zugba a ye bua yo ɔ; nɛ zugba a bli e nya mi nɛ e mii nyu ɔ nɛ sinɔ ngua a su kɛ je e nya mi ngɔ pue he ɔ. 17Kɛkɛ nɛ sinɔ ngua a mi mi fu yo ɔ, nɛ e pue nɔ kɛ ho konɛ e kɛ yo ɔ nina nɛ piɛ nɛ yeɔ Mawu kita amɛ a nɔ nɛ a hɛɛ Yesu Kristo he odase yemi ɔ mi ɔ ya hwu ta. 18Nɛ e ya da wo nya zia a nɔ.

Title: KPOJEMI 13
Content:
Lohwe enyɔ ɔmɛ
1Kɛkɛ nɛ i na lohwe ko nɛ e ngɛ kpo jee kɛ ngɛ wo ɔ mi jee kɛ ma, nɛ e ngɛ koli nyɔngma kɛ e yi kpaago, nɛ matsɛ pɛɛhi nyɔngma bu e koli ɔmɛ a nɔ, nɛ musubɔmi biɛhi ngɛ e yi ɔmɛ a nɔ. 2Nɛ lohwe ɔ nɛ i na a ngɛ kaa ogbetee, nɛ e nanehi ngɛ kaa osisibliisii nanehi, nɛ e nya ngɛ kaa jata nya. Nɛ sinɔ ngua a ngɔ lɛ nitsɛ e he wami ɔ kɛ e matsɛ sɛ ɔ kɛ he blɔ ngua a ngɔ ha lɛ. 3Nɛ i na e yi ɔmɛ a kpɛti kake nɛ ngɛ kaa nɔ nɛ a plaa lɛ gbenɔ plaami, se a tsa e gbenɔ plaami ɔ, nɛ je mluku ɔ kulaa nya kpɛ a he ngɛ lohwe ɔ he. 4Nɛ ni ɔmɛ tsuo ja sinɔ ngua a nɛ ngɔ he blɔ ɔ ngɔ ha lohwe ɔ, nɛ a ke: “Mɛnɔ ngɛ kaa lohwe, ɔ nɛ mɛnɔ ma nyɛ nɛ e kɛ lɛ maa hwu ta?”
5A ha lohwe ɔ nya nɛ e kɛ tu munyu nguahi kɛ musu bɔmi munyuhi, nɛ a ha lɛ he blɔ nɛ e pee enɛ hlami nyingmi eywiɛ kɛ enyɔ. 6Nɛ e pã e nya mi nɛ e tu musu bɔmi munyui kɛ si Mawu, nɛ etu e biɛ ɔ kɛ he nɛ e hii ɔ kɛ nihi nɛ hii hiɔwe ɔ a he musu bɔmi munyuhi. 7Nɛ a ha lɛ he blɔ nɛ e kɛ klɔuklɔu bi ɔmɛ nɛ hwu ta nɛ e ye a nɔ, nɛ a ha lɛ he blɔ ngɛ wɛtso tsuaa wɛtso kɛ ma tsuaa ma kɛ mahi a nɔ gbihi tsuo kɛ je ma tsuaa je ma nɔ. 8Nɛ nihi kulaa nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ ma ja lɛ, nihi nɛ a ngmɛ́ a biɛ ngɛ Tobi nɛ a gbe ɔ wami womi ɔ mi kɛ je je mi sisije ɔ.
9“Ke nɔ ko ngɛ tue ɔ, e nu! 10Ke a to nɔ ko kɛ ha nyɔguɛ yemi ɔ, nyɔguɛ yemi mi e maa ya; ke nɔ ko kɛ klaate gbe nɔ ɔ, ja a kɛ klaate gbe lɛ. Hiɛ ɔ klɔuklɔu bi ɔmɛ a tsuisitomi kɛ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ ngɛ.”
11Kɛkɛ nɛ i na lohwe kpa ko nɛ e ngɛ kpo jee kɛ ngɛ zugba a mi jee, nɛ e ngɛ koli enyɔ kaa to bi, nɛ e tuɔ munyu kaa sinɔ ngua. 12Nɛ e tsuɔ kekle lohwe ɔ he blɔ ɔmɛ kulaa he ni ngɛ e hɛ mi, nɛ e haa zugba a kɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ nɔ ɔ jaa kekle lohwe ɔ nɛ a tsa e gbenɔ plaami ɔ. 13Nɛ e peɔ okadi nguahi, nɛ e haa la po jee hiɔwe baa zugba a nɔ ngɛ nimli a hɛ mi. 14Nɛ e kɛ nyakpɛ nihi nɛ e na he blɔ kaa e pee ngɛ lohwe ɔ hɛ mi ɔ sisiɔ ninɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ, nɛ e deɔ nihi nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ ke, a pee amaga ngɔ ha lohwe ɔ nɛ a kɛ klaate plaa lɛ nɛ e hɛ ngɛ ɔ. 15Nɛ a ha lɛ he wami nɛ e kɛ mumi nɛ ha lohwe ɔ amaga a, konɛ lohwe ɔ amaga a nɛ tu munyu nɛ e ha a gbe nimli kulaa nɛ ja we lohwe ɔ amaga a. 16Nɛ e haa nimli tsuo, nimli tsɔwi kɛ nimli nguahi, niatsɛmɛ kɛ ohiafohi, odehehi kɛ nyɔguɛhi kplɛɔ nɛ a kadi mɛ ngɛ a hiɛ ɔ nine loo a hɛ̃ nya. 17Nɔ ko nɔ ko nyɛ we nɔ́ ko nɛ e he loo e jua, ja nɔ nɛ ngɛ okadi ɔ loo lohwe ɔ biɛ loo e biɛ ɔ yibɔ ɔ kɛkɛ.
18Hiɛ ɔ nilemi ɔ ngɛ. Nɔ nɛ ngɛ juɛmi ɔ, e bu lohwe ɔ yibɔ ɔ he akaɔtaa, ejakaa yibɔ ɔ daa si ha nɔmlɔ biɛ; nɛ yibɔ ɔ ji lafa ekpa kɛ nyingmi ekpa kɛ ekpa.

Title: KPOJEMI 14
Content:
Nihi nɛ a kpɔ ɔmɛ a la
1Kɛkɛ nɛ i hyɛ, nɛ oʼɛ, Tobi ɔ daa si ngɛ Zion yoku ɔ nɔ, nɛ nimli akpe lafa nyingmi eywiɛ kɛ eywiɛ nɛ a ngma e biɛ kɛ e Tsɛ biɛ ngɛ a hɛ nya a piɛ e he. 2Nɛ i nu gbi ko kɛ je hiɔwe kaa nyu babauu pɛmi, nɛ jehanɛ hu kaa hiɔwe simi wawɛɛ pɛmi. Gbi nɛ i nu ɔ ngɛ kaa sakufiali nɛ hɛɛ a sakuhi nɛ a ngɛ fiae ɔ a gbi. 3Nɛ a ngɛ Ta he ko lae ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ hɛ mi kɛ hɛ kali eywiɛ kɛ nikɔtɔma amɛ a hɛ mi; nɛ nɔ ko nyɛ we la a nɛ e kase, ja nimli akpe lafa nyingmi eywiɛ kɛ eywiɛ ɔ nɛ a kpɔ kɛ je zugba a nɔ ɔ kɛkɛ. 4Nimli nɛ ɔmɛ ji nihi nɛ kɛ yihi ble we a he, ejakaa nihewi nɛ ngɔɛ yihi ji mɛ, nɛ a nyɛɛ Tobi ɔ se kɛ yaa he tsuaa he nɛ e yaa a. Nimli nɛ ɔmɛ ji nihi nɛ a kpɔ kɛ je nimli a kpɛti nɛ a plɛ kekleekle yiblii ha Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ kɛ Tobi ɔ. 5A nɛ́ lakpa ko ngɛ a nya mi, ejakaa piami ko be a he.
Hiɔwe bɔfohi etɛ ɔ
6Kɛkɛ nɛ i na hiɔwe bɔfo kpa ko nɛ e ngɛ tee ngɛ kɔɔhiɔ mi, nɛ e hɛɛ neneene Sane Kpakpa nɛ e yaa jaje ngɔ tsɔɔ nihi nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ kɛ je ma tsuaa je ma kɛ wɛtso tsuaa wɛtso kɛ mahi a nɔ gbi slɔɔtohi kɛ ma tsuaa ma a, nɛ e kɛ gbi ngua de ke: 7“Nyɛɛ ye Mawu gbeye nɛ nyɛɛ kɛ hɛ mi nyami nɛ ha lɛ, ejakaa e kojomi ngmlɛfia a su. Nyɛ ja nɔ nɛ pee hiɔwe kɛ zugba kɛ wo kɛ nyu hɛngmɛhi nɛ baa a.”
8Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo kpa nɛ ji enyɔ nyɛɛ se nɛ e ke: “E ywia, Babilon ma ngua a ywia, ejakaa e ha majemaje ɔ kulaa nu e ajuama bɔmi ɔ he mi mi fumi da a eko.”
9Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo kpa nɛ ji etɛ nyɛɛ a se, nɛ e kɛ gbi ngua de ke: “Ke nɔ ko ja lohwe ɔ kɛ e maga a, nɛ e heɔ e kadi ɔ ngɛ e hɛ nya loo e nine nɔ ɔ, 10lɛ hu e maa nu Mawu cmi mi fumi da nɛ a tsa we mi nɛ ngɛ e mi mi fumi kplu ɔ mi ɔ eko, nɛ a ma pii lɛ ngɛ la gligliigli ɔ mi ngɛ hiɔwe bɔfo klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a hɛ mi kɛ Tobi ɔ hɛ mi. 11Nɛ a plaami ɔ lasuku ɔ tee si kɛ yaa neneene kɛ neneene; nɛ nihi nɛ ja lohwe ɔ kɛ e maga, a kɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ he e biɛ ɔ okadi ɔ na we he jɔmi nyɔ kɛ pia. 12Hiɛ ɔ klɔuklɔu bi ɔmɛ nɛ yeɔ Mawu kita amɛ kɛ Yesu nɔ hemi kɛ yemi ɔ nɔ ɔ a tsui si tomi ɔ ngɛ.
13Nɛ i nu gbi kɛ je hiɔwe ngɛ dee ke: “Ngmaa: A gbaa ni gbogboehi nɛ gboɔ ngɛ Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ mi ɔ, kɛ je mwɔnɛ kɛ yaa nɛ ɔ. Ee, Mumi ɔ ke, konɛ a jɔɔ a he kɛ je a haomi ɔmɛ a mi; se a ni tsumi ɔmɛ nyɛɛ a se.”
Ngma kpami ngɛ je ɔ mi
14Kɛkɛ nɛ i hyɛ, nɛ oʼɛ, bɔku hiɔ, nɛ nɔ ko hii si ngɛ bɔku ɔ nɔ kaa Nɔmlɔbi ɔ, nɛ e kle e yi si kɛ sika jlasi, nɛ e hɛɛ ngma kpami ha nɛ nya ba ngɛ e dɛ mi. 15Nɛ bɔfo kpa ko je kpo kɛ je sɔlemi tsu ɔ mi nɛ e kɛ gbi ngua kpa ngmlaa kɛ de nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ bɔku ɔ nɔ ke: “O kɛ o ngma kpami ha a nɛ wo mi nɛ o kpa ni, ejakaa ngma kpami ngmlɛfia a su, nɛ zugba a nɔ ngma a gbli.” 16Nɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ bɔku ɔ nɔ ɔ sake e ngma kpami ha a ngɔ fɔ zugba a nɔ, nɛ a kpa zugba a nɔ ngma a.
17Nɛ bɔfo kpa ko je kpo kɛ je sɔlemi tsu nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ mi, nɛ lɛ hu e hɛɛ ha nɛ nya ba.
18Nɛ bɔfo kpa ko je kpo kɛ je bɔ sami latɛ ɔ mi, nɔ nɛ ngɛ la nɔ he wami, nɛ e kpa ngmlaa kɛ tsɛ nɔ nɛ hɛɛ ha nɛ nya ba a ke: “O kɛ o ha nɛ nya ba a nɛ wo mi nɛ o poo nɛ o bua zugba a nɔ wai yiblii sawe ɔmɛ a nya, ejakaa wai yiblii ɔ fu.” 19Nɛ bɔfo ɔ sake e ha a ngɔ fɔ zugba a nɔ, nɛ e bua zugba a nɔ wai yiblii ɔmɛ a nya, nɛ e kɛ wo Mawu mi mi la wai ngami nɔ kpetekpleenyɛ ɔ mi. 20Nɛ a naa wai ngami nɔ ɔ nɔ ngɛ ma a se, nɛ muɔ je wai ngami nɔ ɔ mi kɛ kuɔ kɛ ya su okpɔngɔhi a nya mi dade ɔmɛ a he maa pee si tomi lafa enyɔ.

Title: KPOJEMI 15
Content:
Hiɔwe bɔfo ɔmɛ kɛ nyagbe haomi ɔ
1Kɛkɛ nɛ i na okadi kpa ko ngɛ hiɔwe; e kle nɛ e ngɛ nyakpɛ: hiɔwe bɔfohi kpaago nɛ a hɛɛ haomi kpaago nɛ ji nyagbe ni ɔmɛ, ejakaa kɔlɔ ɔmɛ a kɛ maa gbe Mawu mi mi fumi ɔ nya.
2Kɛkɛ nɛ i na nɔ́ ko nɛ ngɛ kaa wo nɛ ngɛ kaa ahuhuɛ nɛ a kɛ la futu mi, nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ ye lohwe ɔ kɛ e maga a kɛ e kadi ɔ kɛ e biɛ ɔ yibɔ ɔ nɔ kunimi ɔ daa si ngɛ wo nɛ ngɛ kaa ahuhuɛ ɔ nya, nɛ a hɛɛ Mawu saku ɔmɛ. 3Nɛ a la Mawu tsɔlɔ Mose la a kɛ Tobi ɔ la a ke:
“Nyɔmtsɛ Mawu Ope,
O ni tsumi ɔmɛ kle, nɛ a ngɛ nyakpɛ!
Mo je ma amɛ a nɔ matsɛ,
O blɔ ɔmɛ da, nɛ anɔkuale ji mɛ.
4Mɛnɔ po lɛ be mo gbeye yee Nyɔmtsɛ,
Nɛ e be o biɛ ɔ hɛ mi nyami woe?
Ejakaa mo o nɔ kake too ji nɔ klɔuklɔu.
Nɛ je ma amɛ kulaa maa ba nɛ a ba ja ngɛ o hɛ mi,
Ejakaa a je o dami ni ɔmɛ a si paa.”
5Ni nɛ ɔmɛ a se ɔ i hyɛ, nɛ oʼɛ, a bli odase bo tsu sɔlemi tsu ɔ nya ngɛ hiɔwe, 6nɛ hiɔwe bɔfohi kpaago ɔ nɛ hɛɛ haomi kpaago ɔ je kpo kɛ je sɔlemi tsu ɔ mi, nɛ a wo kploba nɛ he tsɔ nɛ ngɛ kpɛe, nɛ a fi a gugue kɛ sika kpɛti fimi nihi. 7Nɛ hɛ kali eywiɛ ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake ngɔ sika tsinesa kpaago nɛ a hyi tɔtɔɔtɔ kɛ Mawu nɛ hɛ ngɛ kɛ yaa neneene kɛ neneene ɔ mi mi la a ngɔ ha hiɔwe bɔfohi kpaago ɔ. 8Nɛ sɔlemi tsu ɔ mi hyi tɔ kɛ lasuku nɛ je Mawu hɛ mi nyami ɔ kɛ e he wami ɔ mi ɔ, nɛ nɔ ko nyɛ we sɔlemi tsu ɔ mi nɛ e sɛ kɛ maa su be nɛ a maa gbe hiɔwe bɔfohi kpaago ɔmɛ a haomi kpaago ɔmɛ a nya.

Title: KPOJEMI 16
Content:
Mawu mi mi fumi tsinesa amɛ
1Kɛkɛ nɛ i nu gbi ngua ko nɛ je sɔlemi tsu ɔ mi nɛ e ngɛ hiɔwe bɔfohi kpaago ɔ dee ke: “Nyɛɛ ya nɛ nyɛ ya plɛ Mawu mi mi fumi tsinesa kpaago ɔmɛ ngɔ pue zugba a nɔ!”
2Nɛ kekleekle nɔ ɔ pue nɔ kɛ ho, nɛ e ya plɛ e tsinesa a mi ni ɔmɛ ngɔ pue zugba a nɔ; nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ lohwe ɔ okadi ɔ ngɛ a he ɔ kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ jaa e maga a hia pa yayahi nɛ yee nɔ.
3Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ plɛ e tsinesa a mi ni ɔmɛ ngɔ wo wo mi, nɛ e plɛ muɔ kaa nɔ gbogboe nɔ́, nɛ nɔ́ tsuaa nɔ́ nɛ hɛ ngɛ ngɛ wo ɔ mi ɔ gbo.
4Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo nɛ ji etɛ ɔ plɛ e tsinesa a mi ni ɔmɛ ngɔ wo pahi kɛ nyu hɛngmɛ ɔmɛ a mi, nɛ nyu ɔ plɛ muɔ. 5Nɛ i nu nɛ nyu ɔmɛ a nɔ bɔfo ɔ ngɛ dee ke: “Dalɔ ji mo, Nyɔmtsɛ, nɔ nɛ ngɛ kɛ nɔ nɛ hi si sa kɛ nɔ nɛ ji nɔ klɔuklɔu ɔ, ejakaa o nɔ da ngɛ o kojomi nɛ ɔmɛ a mi. 6A pue klɔuklɔu bi ɔmɛ kɛ gbali ɔmɛ a muɔ si, nɛ lɔ ɔ he ɔ muɔ nɔuu o ha mɛ nɛ a nu, ejakaa e sa mɛ ja.” 7Kɛkɛ nɛ i nu nɛ bɔ sami latɛ ɔ ngɛ dee ke: “Ee, Nyɔmtsɛ Mawu Ope, anɔkuale kɛ dami ji o kojomi ɔmɛ ɔ nɛ.”
8Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo nɛ ji eywiɛ ɔ plɛ e tsinesa a mi ni ɔmɛ ngɔ pue pu ɔ nɔ; nɛ a ha lɛ he wami nɛ e kɛ la nɛ sa nimli. 9Nɛ e la dɔmi babauu ɔ sa nimli nɛ tu musu bɔmi munyuhi kɛ si Mawu nɛ ngɛ he wami ngɛ kikɛmɛ a haomi nɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ ɔ biɛ ɔ, se a tsakee we a tsui nɛ a wo e hɛ mi nyami.
10Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo nɛ ji enuɔ ɔ plɛ e tsinesa a mi ni ɔmɛ ngɔ pue lohwe ɔ matsɛ sɛ ɔ nɔ; nɛ e matsɛ yemi he ɔ wo diblii, nɛ nimli ta a lilɛ ngɛ nɔ nami he, 11nɛ a tu musu bɔmi munyuhi kɛ si Mawu ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ ngɛ a nɔ nami kɛ a pa amɛ a he, se a tsakee we a tsui kɛ ji a ni tsumi ɔmɛ a mi.
12Kɛkɛ nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo nɛ ji ekpa a plɛ e tsinesa a mi ni ɔmɛ ngɔ wo Eufrate pa ngua a mi, nɛ e mi nyu ɔ mii, konɛ a kɛ dla blɔ ngɔ ha matsɛmɛ nɛ je puje he ɔ. 13Kɛkɛ nɛ i na mumi yayami etɛ nɛ ngɛ kaa ovɔnɔhi loo kuɔwihi ngɛ kpo jee kɛ ngɛ sinɔ ngua a nya mi kɛ lohwe ɔ nya mi kɛ lakpa gbalɔ ɔ nya mi jee; 14ejakaa mumi yayamihi a mumi ji mɛ, nɛ a peɔ nyakpɛ nihi, nɛ a yaa matsɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ je mluku ɔ kulaa mi ɔ ngɔ, konɛ a ya bua a nya kɛ ya Mawu Ope ɔ ligbi ngua a nɔ ta a. 15“Oʼɛ i ma kaa juɔ. A gbaa nɔ nɛ huɔɔ nɛ e hyɛɛ e tade ɔmɛ a nɔ saminya a, konɛ e ko nyɛɛ he gu nɛ e zo ba je kpo.”
16Kɛkɛ nɛ mumi yayami ɔmɛ bua matsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a nya kɛ ho he ko nɛ a tsɛɛ lejɛ ɔ ngɛ Hebri gbi mi ke Harmagedon ɔ ya.
17Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo nɛ ji kpaago ɔ plɛ e tsinesa a mi ni ɔmɛ ngɔ wo kɔɔhiɔ mi; nɛ gbi ngua ko je hiɔwe sɔlemi tsu ɔ mi kɛ je matɛ sɛ ɔ mi de ke: “A gbe nya!” 18Nɛ oslaba kɛ pɛmi kɛ hiɔwe simi ba, nɛ zugba mimiɛ wawɛɛ, bɔ nɛ kɛ je be nɛ nimli ba zugba a nɔ nɛ ɔ, a nɛ́ jamɛ a zugba mimiɛmi ngua nɛ ngɛ kaa enɛ hyɛ. 19Nɛ ma ngua a mi gba etɛ, nɛ maje li ɔmɛ a ma amɛ hule, nɛ a kai Babilon kpetekpleenyɛ ɔ ngɛ Mawu hɛ mi, konɛ a ngɔ e mi mi fumi nɛ nya wa a kplu ɔ mi da a ngɔ ha lɛ. 20Nɛ zugba kpɔ tsuaa zugba kpɔ nɛ wo bɔle lɛ ɔ tu fo, nɛ yoku ɔmɛ ɔ a nɛ́ mɛ hu. 21Nɛ gbiɛ ngo ngu loo hiɔmi tɛ babauu nɛ kake jiɔmi maa pee sɛni mi tɛ jiɔmi pau lafa nɛ kɛ je hiɔwe ba pue nimli a nɔ; nɛ nimli ɔmɛ tu musu bɔmi munyuhi kɛ si Mawu ngɛ gbiɛ ngo ngu ɔmɛ a haomi ɔ he, ejakaaa a haomi ɔ nya wa tsɔ.

Title: KPOJEMI 17
Content:
Ajuama kpanaaku ɔ
1Kɛkɛ nɛ hiɔwe bɔfohi kpaago ɔ nɛ a hɛɛ tsinesa kpaago ɔmɛ a ti nɔ kake ba nɛ e kɛ mi ba tu munyu ke: “Ba nɛ ma tsɔɔ mo ajuama kpanaaku ɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ nyu babauu ɔ nɔ ɔ kojomi ɔ, 2nɔ nɛ zugba a nɔ matsɛmɛ ɔmɛ kɛ bɔ ajuama, nɛ nihi nɛ ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ de da kɛ e ajuama bɔmi da a.”
3Nɛ e kpaka mi kɛ ho nga nɔ ya ngɛ mumi mi; nɛ i na yo ko nɛ hii si ngɛ lohwe nɛ tsuɔ kaa muɔ ko nɔ nɛ musu bɔmi biɛhi kpe e he, nɛ e ngɛ yi kpaago kɛ koli nyɔngma. 4Nɛ yo ɔ wo tade nɛ hɛɛ alamua yumu su kɛ tade nɛ tsuɔ kaa muɔ, nɛ a kɛ sika kɛ tɛ nɛ he jua wa kɛ adiagba wo lɛ, nɛ e hɛɛ sika kplu nɛ hyi tɔ kɛ e ajuama bɔmi ɔ mi ninye nihi kɛ mu ni ɔmɛ ngɛ e dɛ mi; 5nɛ a ngma biɛ ko ngɛ e hɛ nya nɛ ji laami sane ke: “Babilon ngua a, zugba a nɔ ajuama a kɛ ninye ni ɔmɛ a nyɛ.” 6Nɛ i na yo ɔ kaa klɔuklɔu bi ɔmɛ a muɔ ɔ kɛ Yesu he odase yeli ɔmɛ a muɔ ɔ de lɛ da.
Benɛ i na lɛ ɔ ye nya kpɛ ye he wawɛɛ nitsɛ. 7Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo ɔ de mi ke: “Mɛni he je o nya ngɛ o he kpɛe? Ma sɛɛ mo yo ɔ kɛ lohwe nɛ e hii si ngɛ nɔ nɛ ngɛ yi kpaago kɛ koli nyɔngma a he laami sane ɔ. 8Lohwe ɔ nɛ o na a hi si hyɛ, se e be hu. E maa je muɔ voo ɔ mi kɛ je kpo kɛ ba be kɛ ho hɛ mi kpatami mi ya; nɛ nihi nɛ a ngɛ zugba a nɔ nɛ a ngmɛ́ a biɛ ngɛ wami womi ɔ mi kɛ je je mi sisije ɔ nya maa kpɛ a he, ke a na lohwe ɔ nɛ hi si hyɛ nɛ e be hu nɛ e maa ba a.
9“Hiɛ ɔ juɛmi nɛ ni lemi ngɛ mi ɔ ngɛ. Yi kpaago ɔ ji yoku kpaago nɛ yo ɔ hii si ngɛ nɔ ɔ nɛ, nɛ matsɛmɛ kpaago hu ji mɛ: 10nihi enuɔ ɔ gbee si, nɛ nɔ kake ngɛ, nɛ nɔ kpa a na we nɛ e ba, nɛ ke e ba a, ja e hi si bɔɔ. 11Nɛ lohwe ɔ nɛ hi si sa nɛ e be ɔ ji matsɛ nɛ ji kpaanyɔ, nɛ e je kpaago ɔmɛ a mi, nɛ e yaa shɛ mi kpatami mi.
12“Koli nyɔngma nɛ o na a, matsɛmɛ nyɔngma ʼi, nihi nɛ matsɛ yemi ko sui a dɛ, se kɛ ɔ, a kɛ lohwe ɔ na he blɔ kaa matsɛmɛ ngmlɛfia kake. 13Nimli nɛ ɔmɛ hɛɛ juɛmi kake, nɛ a kɛ a he wami kɛ a blɔ nya a ha lohwe ɔ kulaa. 14Ni nɛ ɔmɛ kɛ Tobi ɔ maa huw ta, nɛ Tobi ɔ maa ye a nɔ, ejakaa lɛ ji nyɔmtsɛmɛ a Nyɔmtsɛ kɛ matsɛmɛ a Matsɛ, nɛ nihi nɛ a kɛ lɛ ngɛ ɔ ji ninɛmɛ nɛ a tsɛ kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ a hia kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ heɔ yeɔ ɔ.”
15Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo ɔ de mi ke: “Nyu ɔ nɛ o na nɛ yo ajuama a hii si ngɛ nɔ ɔ ji mahi kɛ asafohi kɛ je mahi kɛ mahi a nɔ gbihi. 16Nɛ koli nyɔngma nɛ o na a, kɛ lohwe ɔ, maa nyɛ ajuama a, nɛ a ma kpɔ e nihi kulaa nɛ e ngɛ ɔ, nɛ a ma kpa e he bo, nɛ a maa ye e he lo, nɛ a kɛ la maa sa lɛ. 17Ejakaa Mawu kɛ wo a tsui mi konɛ a pee e yi mi tomi ni ɔmɛ, nɛ a hɛɛ juɛmi kake, nɛ a kɛ a matsɛ yemi ɔ nɛ ha lohwe ɔ kɛ ya su be nɛ a maa gbe nihi nɛ Mawu de ɔmɛ a nya.
18“Nɛ yo ɔ nɛ o na a ji ma ngua nɛ yeɔ je ɔ mi matsɛmɛ ɔmɛ a nɔ ɔ nɛ.”

Title: KPOJEMI 18
Content:
Babilon butumi
1Ni nɛ ɔmɛ a se ɔ, i na hiɔwe bɔfo kpa ko nɛ e ngɛ si kplee kɛ ngɛ hiɔwe jee, nɛ e ngɛ he blɔ ngua, nɛ e hɛ mi nyami ɔ hã je ɔ mi kulaa tsɔ. 2E kɛ̃ e he nɛ e kpa ngmlaa kɛ gbi ngua ke: “E ywia, Babilon ngua a ywia, nɛ e plɛ mumi yayamihi a si himi he, kɛ mumi yayamihi kulaa a tsu, kɛ lohwe pɛlitsɛ tsuaa lohwe pɛlitsɛ nɛ he tsɔ we nɛ he ngɛ tai ɔ hu tsu. 3Ejakaa e ha je ma amɛ kulaa nu e ajuama bɔmi he mi mi fumi da a eko, nɛ zugba a nɔ matsɛmɛ ɔmɛ kɛ lɛ bɔ ajuama, nɛ zugba a nɔ jua yeli ɔmɛ plɛ niatsɛmɛ ngɛ e ya homi ɔ he wami ɔ mi.”
4Kɛkɛ nɛ i nu gbi kpa ko kɛ je hiɔwe nɛ ngɛ dee ke:
“Nyɛɛ je e mi, ye ma,
Konɛ nyɛɛ kɛ lɛ ko pee kake ngɛ e he yayami ɔmɛ a mi,
Nɛ nyɛ ko na e haomi ɔ eko.
5Ejakaa e he yayami ɔmɛ su hiɔwe lokoo,
Nɛ Mawu kai e ni yayami ɔmɛ
6Nyɛɛ wo lɛ hiɔ kaa bɔ nɛ lɛ hu e wo nyɛ hiɔ ɔ,
Nɛ nyɛɛ ku ngɔ bɔ he totoe enyɔ ha lɛ.
Kaa bɔ nɛ sa e ni tsumi ɔmɛ;
Kplu ɔ nɛ e futu ha nyɛ ɔ,
Nyɛ futu lɛ totoe enyɔ ngɔ ha lɛ.
7Nyɛ pii lɛ nɛ nyɛɛ wo lɛ aywlɛho
Kaa bɔ nɛ e wo lɛ nitsɛ e hɛ mi nyami kɛ ya homi ɔ
Ja nɔuu nyɛ ha e piimi kɛ e ywlɛho ɔ nɛ pee.
Ejakaa e deɔ ngɛ e tsui mi ke:
‘I hii si kaa manye!
I pi yalɔyo,
Nɛ i be aywlɛho ko nae!’
8Lɔ ɔ he ɔ, ligbi kake nɔ e haomi ɔmɛ maa ba,
Gbenɔ kɛ aywlɛho kɛ hwɔ,
Nɛ a kɛ la maa sa lɛ,
Ejakaa Nyɔmtsɛ Mawu nɛ kojoɔ ɔ he wa.”
9Nɛ zugba a nɔ matsɛmɛ ɔmɛ nɛ a kɛ lɛ bɔ ajuama nɛ a kɛ lɛ ho ya a ma fo lɛ, nɛ a maa wo ya ngɛ e he, benɛ a maa na e sami ɔ lasuku ɔ. 10A maa da se lokoo ngɛ e piimi ɔ he gbeye yemi ɔ he, nɛ a ma de ke: “Musu tloo, musu tloo, ma kpetekpleenyɛ ɔ, Babilon, ma nɛ he wa a! ejakaa ngmlɛfia kake mi nɛ o kojomi ɔ ba nɛ ɔ nɛ.
11Zugba a nɔ jua yeli ɔmɛ ma fo lɛ nɛ a maa ye lɛ kɔmɔ, ejakaa nɔ ko nɔ ko he we a jua yemi ni ɔmɛ hu: 12Sika tsu kɛ sika hiɔ, kɛ tɛhi nɛ a he jua wa, kɛ adiagba, kɛ kploba nɛ ngɛ fɛu kɛ bo nɛ ngɛ kaa alamua yumu, kɛ seda kɛ bo nɛ tsuɔ tsutsuutsu, kɛ tso tsuaa tso nɛ jee via, kɛ suɔ wu nihi tsuo, kɛ tso nɛ he jua wa nitsɛnitsɛ, kɛ akɔblee kɛ dade marmara tɛ nihi tsuo, 13kɛ sinamon kɛ amomon kɛ tsopahi kɛ a he viahi kɛ mimɛ kɛ ohɛ nɛ jee via, kɛ da kɛ nu, kɛ sikisiai kɛ ngma, kɛ nahi kɛ tohi, kɛ okpɔngɔhi kɛ zugba lɛhi, kɛ nyɔguɛhi kɛ nimli a klaahi. 14Nɛ yiblii nɛ jloɔ mo ɔ je o nya mi, nɛ nihi nɛ ngɔɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ kɛ nihi nɛ kpɛɔ nylamnylam ɔ bɔ mo, nɛ o be mɛ nae kulaa hu. 15Jua yeli nɛ plɛ niatsɛmɛ ngɛ mi ɔ maa da se lokoo ngɛ e nɔ nami ɔ gbeye yemi ɔ he, nɛ a ma fo ya nɛ a maa ye kɔmɔ; 16nɛ a ma de ke: “Musu tloo, musu tloo ma kpetekpleenyɛ ɔ nɛ buɔ kploba nɛ ngɛ fɛu kɛ bo nɛ ngɛ kaa alamua yumu kɛ bo nɛ tsuɔ tsutsuutsu, nɛ dlaa e he kɛ sika tsu kɛ tɛhi nɛ a he jua wa kɛ adiagba a; ejakaa ngmlɛfia kake pɛ mi ɔ kikɛmɛ a ni babauu nɛ ɔ kulaa plɛ ma doku.”
17Nɛ lɛ kudɔlɔ tsuaa lɛ kudɔlɔ kɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ hii lɛ mi kɛ yaa he ko, kɛ lɛ mi bi kɛ nihi abɔ nɛ tsuɔ wo nɔ ni ɔ da si ngɛ se lokoo, 18nɛ benɛ a na e sami ɔ lasuku ɔ, a kpa ngmlaa ke: “Te ma nɛ ngɛ kaa ma kpetekpleenyɛ nɛ ɔ nɛɛ?” 19Nɛ a kɛ bunyuku wo a yi mi, nɛ a kɛ ya kɛ kɔmɔyemi kpa ngmlaa ke: “Musu tloo, musu tloo ma kpetekpleenyɛ ɔ, nɛ nihi kulaa nɛ a ngɛ lɛhi ngɛ wo hɛ mi ɔ plɛ niatsɛmɛ ngɛ e mi jua yemi nihi nɛ a he jua wa a he; ejakaa ngmlɛfia kake pɛ mi nɛ e plɛ ma doku nɛ ɔ nɛ.”
20Mo hiɔwe, kɛ nyɛ klɔuklɔu bihi kɛ bɔfohi kɛ gbali, nyɛ nya ngɛ e butumi ɔ he, ejakaa Mawu kojo lɛ ha nyɛ.
21Kɛkɛ nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo ko nɛ he wa wo tɛ ko nɛ ngɛ kaa wɛ ngua, nɛ e sake ngɔ fɔ wo mi nɛ e ke: “Kikɛ nɛ ɔ a ma sake Babilon ma ngua a ngɔ fɔ he tlukaa, nɛ a be lɛ nae kulaa hu. 22Nɛ a be saku fiali kɛ latsɛmɛ kɛ bɛ kpali kɛ titimati kpali ɔmɛ a gbi nue kulaa hu ngɛ o mi, nɛ a be galɔ ko galɔ ko nɛ le ga nae kulaa hu ngɛ o mi, nɛ a be wɛɛmi nya nue kulaa hu ngɛ o mi, 23nɛ kane la be tsoe kulaa hu ngɛ o mi, nɛ a be ayɛflo huno kɛ ayɛflo gbi nue kulaa hu ngɛ o mi, ejakaa o jua yeli ɔmɛ ji zugba a nɔ nimli nguahi, ejakaa o kunya yemi ɔ, a kɛ sisi ma jeli ɔmɛ kulaa.
24Babilon mi a na gbali kɛ klɔuklɔu bihi kɛ nihi tsuo nɛ a gbe ngɛ zugba a nɔ ɔ a muɔ ɔ ngɛ.”

Title: KPOJEMI 19
Content:
1Ni nɛ ɔmɛ a se ɔ, i nu gbi ngua nɛ ngɛ kaa nimli asafo babauu gbi ngɛ hiɔwe nɛ ngɛ dee ke: “Haleluya! Yi wami hemi kɛ hɛ mi nyami kɛ agboje kɛ he wami ɔ ji Nyɔmtsɛ wa Mawu ɔ nɔ! 2Ejakaa zanɔkuale kɛ dami ji e kojomi ɔmɛ, akɛnɛ e kojo ajuama kpanaaku ɔ nɛ kɛ e juama bɔmi ɔ puɛ zugba a, nɛ Mawu ye e sɔmɔli ɔmɛ a muɔ ɔ he lue.” 3Nɛ a kpa ngmlaa nɔ́ nɛ ji si enyɔ ke: “Haleluya! E lasuku ɔ tee si kɛ yaa neneene kɛ neneene.” 4Nɛ nikɔtɔmahi nyingmi enyɔ kɛ eywiɛ ɔ kɛ hɛ kali eywiɛ ɔ bu si nɛ a ja Mawu nɛ hii si ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ, nɛ a ke: “Amen, Haleluya!”
Tobi ɔ yokpeemi okplɔɔ ɔ
5Nɛ gbi ko je matsɛ sɛ ɔ mi de ke: “Nyɛ je wa Mawu ɔ yi, nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ ji e sɔmɔli ɔmɛ tsuo kɛ nyɛ nihi nɛ nyɛ yee lɛ gbeye ɔ, nimli tsɔwi kɛ nimli nguahi kulaa!” 6Nɛ i nu gbi ko kaa nimli asafo babauu gbi kɛ nyu babauu pɛmi kɛ hiɔwe simi nɛ nyɛ wa pɛmi nɛ ngɛ dee ke: “Haleluya! Ejakaa Nyɔmtsɛ, wa Mawu Ope ɔ, ngɛ matsɛ yee. 7Nyɛ ha wa bua nɛ jɔ nɛ wa mi nɛ flii wɔ nɛ waa wo e hɛ mi nyami; ejakaa Tobi ɔ yokpeemi ɔ su, nɛ e yo ɔ dla e he ngɔ to. 8Nɛ a hã lɛ kploba nɛ he tsɔ nɛ ngɛ kpee nylamnylam konɛ e bu.” (Ejakaa kploba ji klɔuklɔu bi ɔmɛ a ni tsumi kpakpa amɛ ɔ nɛ.)
9Kɛkɛ nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo ɔ de mi ke: “Ngmaa: A gbaa nihi nɛ a tsɛ mɛ kɛ ba Tobi ɔ yo kpeemi okplɔɔɔ ɔ he ɔ.” Nɛ e de mi ke: “Mawu anɔkuale munyuhi ji nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ nɛ.” 10Kɛkɛ nɛ i bu si ngɛ e nane nya konɛ ma ja lɛ. Nɛ e de mi ke: “Koo pee! O nyɛmi sɔmɔlɔ kɛ o nyɛmimɛ nɛ hɛɛ Yesu odase mi ɔ a ti nɔ ko ji mi. Ja Mawu mohu!” Ejakaa Yesu odase ɔ ji gbami mumi ɔ nɛ.
Nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ okpɔngɔ hiɔ ɔ nɔ ɔ
11Kɛkɛ nɛ i na nɛ a bli hiɔwe nya, nɛ oʼɛ, okpɔngɔ hiɔ, nɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ nɔ ɔ, a tsɛɛ lɛ ke: Anɔkualetsɛ kɛ Dalɔ; dami nya e kojo ɔ nɛ e hwuɔ ta ngɛ. 12E hɛngmɛhi ngɛ kaa la lilɛhi, nɛ e bu matsɛ pɛɛhi fuu, nɛ a ngma e biɛ ko nɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko li ja lɛ nitsɛ kɛkɛ; 13nɛ e wo tade ko nɛ a kɛ sɔ muɔ mi, nɛ a tsɛɛ e biɛ ke: “Mawu Munyu ɔ.” 14Nɛ tahi nɛ ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ hi okpɔngɔ hiɔhi a nɔ kɛ nyɛɛ e se, nɛ a wo kploba nɛ he tsɔ. 15Nɛ klaate nɛ nya ba ngɛ e nya mi jee konɛ e kɛ kɔlɔ ɔ nɛ fia majeli a bimɛ ɔmɛ ni; nɛ e kɛ dade tso nɛ kpaka mɛ. Nɛ lɛ nɔuu e maa naa Mawu Ope ɔ mi mi fumi nɛ nya wa a wai ngami nɔ ɔ nɔ. 16Nɛ a ngma biɛ ko ngɛ e tade kɛ e fiɔ he ke: “Matsɛmɛ a Matsɛ kɛ nyɔmtsɛmɛ a Nyɔmtsɛ.”
17Kɛkɛ nɛ i na hiɔwe bɔfo ko nɛ daa si ngɛ pu mi, nɛ e kpa ngmlaa wawɛɛ kɛ de lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ nɛ ngɛ tee ngɛ hiɔwe ɔ tsuo ke: “Nyɛɛ ba nɛ nyɛ ba bua nyɛ he nya ngɛ Mawu okplɔɔ ngua a he, 18konɛ nyɛ ba ye matsɛmɛ a lo kɛ asafoatsɛmɛ a lo kɛ he wali a lo kɛ okpɔngɔhi a lo kɛ nihi nɛ hii a nɔ ɔmɛ a lo kɛ odehehi kɛ nyɔguɛhi kɛ nimli tsɔwi kɛ nimli nguahi kulaa a lo.”
19Kɛkɛ nɛ i na lohwe ɔ kɛ zugba a nɔ matsɛmɛ ɔmɛ kɛ a ta nɛ a bua nya a, konɛ a kɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ okpɔngɔ ɔ nɔ ɔ kɛ e ta a ya hwu ta. 20Nɛ a nu lohwe ɔ kɛ lakpa gbalɔ ɔ nɛ pee nyakpɛ nihi ngɛ e hɛ mi nɛ e kɛ sisi nihi nɛ he lohwe ɔ okadi ɔ kɛ nihi nɛ jaa e maga a. A ngɔ ni enyɔ nɛ ɔmɛ kulaa hɛ ngmengmle ngɔ wo la taku nɛ ngɛ tsoe gligliigli ɔ mi. 21Nɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ piɛ ɔ, a kɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ okpɔngɔ ɔ nɔ ɔ klaate nɛ jee e nya mi ɔ gbe mɛ, nɛ lohwe pɛlitsɛmɛ tsuo ye a lo ɔ nɛ a tɔ.

Title: KPOJEMI 20
Content:
Jeha akpe ɔ
1Kɛkɛ nɛ i na bɔfo ko nɛ e ngɛ si kplee kɛ ngɛ hiɔwe jee, nɛ e hɛɛ muɔ voo ɔ nya safe ɔ kɛ kɔsɔkɔsɔ ngua ko ngɛ e dɛ mi. 2Nɛ e nu sinɔ ngua a, blema sinɔ nɛ ji Abosiami loo Satan ɔ, nɛ e fi lɛ jeha akpe, 3nɛ e ngɔ lɛ ngɔ wo muɔ voo ɔ mi, nɛ e nga e yi nɛ e sɔu nya, konɛ e ko sisi je mi ma amɛ hu kɛ yaa su be nɛ a maa gbe jeha akpe ɔ nya. Lɔ ɔ se ɔ ja a pɛne lɛ be bɔɔ ko.
4Kɛkɛ nɛ i na matsɛ sɛhi kɛ nihi nɛ hii si ngɛ a nɔ ɔ; a ngɔ kojomi ngɔ ha mɛ. Nɛ i na nihi nɛ a po a yi ngɛ Yesu he odase yemi ɔ kɛ Mawu munyu ɔ he ɔ a klaa amɛ, kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ ja we lohwe ɔ loo e maga a nɛ a he we e kadi ɔ ngɛ a hɛ nya loo a dɛ mi ɔ. A hɛ ngɛ, nɛ a kɛ Kristo ye matsɛ jeha akpe. 5Se ni gbogboehi nɛ piɛ ɔ, a hɛ na we nɛ e tsɛ kɛ maa su be nɛ a maa gbe jeha akpe ɔ nya. E nɛ ji kekleekle si temi ɔ nɛ. 6Nɔ nɛ a gbaa kɛ nɔ klɔuklɔu ji nɔ nɛ ma na blɔ nya ngɛ kekleekle si temi ɔ mi; gbenɔ nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ be he wami ko ngɛ jamɛ a nimli ɔmɛ a nɔ; se mohu a ma plɛ Mawu kɛ Kristo osɔfohi, nɛ a kɛ lɛ maa ye matsɛ jeha akpe.
A ye Satan nɔ
7Jeha akpe ɔ se ɔ, a maa pɛne Satan kɛ maa je e tsu ɔ mi, 8nɛ e maa je kpo konɛ e ya sisi je mahi nɛ ngɛ zugba kɔ nya eywiɛ ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, Gog kɛ Magog, konɛ e bua a nya kɛ kpe nɛ a ya ta, nihi a hiemi nɛ ngɛ kaa wo nya zia a. 9Nɛ a gbɛ fia zugba a nɔ, nɛ a ya bɔle ni klɔuklɔu ɔmɛ a ta a kɛ ma nɛ a suɔ ɔ kɛ kpe. Nɛ la je Mawu ngɔ ngɛ hiɔwe, nɛ e ba sa mɛ butuu. 10Nɛ Abosiami ɔ nɛ sisi mɛ ɔ, a ngɔ lɛ ngɔ wo la gligliigli taku ɔ mi, he nɛ lohwe ɔ kɛ lakpa gbalɔ ɔ hu ngɛ ɔ, nɛ a ma pii mɛ nyɔ kɛ pia kɛ maa ya neneene kɛ neneene.
Nyagbe kojomi ɔ
11Kɛkɛ nɛ i na matsɛ sɛ hiɔ ngua ko, kɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ nɔ ɔ, nɛ zugba kɛ hiɔwe tu fo ngɛ e hɛ mi, nɛ a nɛ blɔ ha mɛ.
12Nɛ i na ni gbogboe ɔmɛ, ni tsɔwi kɛ ni nguahi nɛ a daa si ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ hɛ mi. A bli womihi a nya, nɛ a bli womi kpa ko nɛ ji wami womi ɔ hu nya. Nɛ akojo ni gbogboe ɔmɛ, ni tsɔwi kɛ ni nguahi, ngɛ nihi nɛ a ngma ngɛ womi ɔmɛ a mi ɔ nya, bɔ nɛ sa a ni tsumi ɔmɛ. 13Nɛ wo je ni gbogboehi nɛ ngɛ e mi ɔ ngɔ ha, nɛ gbenɔ kɛ gbeje je ni gbogboehi nɛ ngɛ a mi ɔ ngɔ ha; nɛ a kojo mɛ, nɔ tsuaa nɔ bɔ nɛ sa e ni tsumi ɔmɛ. 14Nɛ gbenɔ kɛ gbeje lɛɛ, a sake mɛ ngɔ pue la taku ɔ mi. Enɛ ɔ ji gbenɔ nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ nɛ. 15Nɛ ke nɔ ko ngɛ nɛ a nɛ́ kaa a ngma e biɛ ngɛ wami womi ɔ mi ɔ, a sakee lɛ ngɔ fɔɔ la taku ɔ mi.

Title: KPOJEMI 21
Content:
Hiɔwe he kɛ zugba he
1Kɛkɛ nɛ i na dhiɔwe he kɛ zugba he, ejakaa kekle hiɔwe ɔ kɛ kekle zugba a be kɛ ho, nɛ wo be hu. 2Nɛ imi Yohane i na ma klɔuklɔu ɔ nɛ ji Yerusalem he ɔ je Mawu ngɔ ngɛ hiɔwe kɛ ngɛ si kplee, nɛ a dla lɛ kaa ayɛflo nɛ a wo lɛ ni ha e huno. 3Nɛ i nu gbi ngua ko je matsɛ sɛ ɔ mi de ke: “Oʼɛ Mawu bo tsu ɔ ngɛ nimli a kpɛti, nɛ e maa hi a kpɛti, nɛ a maa pee e ma, nɛ Mawu nitsɛ kɛ mɛ maa hi si, nɛ e maa pee a Mawu. 4Nɛ Mawu ma tsu a hɛ mi vo nyu kulaa, nɛ gbenɔ be si hie hu, nɛ kɔmɔ yemi ko kɛ ya fomi ko kɛ nɔ nami ko hu be si hie hu, ejakaa kekle ni ɔmɛ be kɛ ho.”
5Kɛkɛ nɛ nɔ nɛ hii si ngɛ matsɛ sɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ de ke: “Oʼɛ, i ngɛ nihi kulaa ehe pee.” Nɛ e de mi ke: “Ngmaa, ejakaa kikɛmɛ a munyuhi nɛ ɔmɛ ji munyuhi nitsɛ nɛ maa si kpɛii. 6Nɛ e de mi ke: “A gbe nya. Ami ji Alfa a kɛ Omega a nɛ, sisije ɔ kɛ nyagbe ɔ. Nɔ nɛ kuma ngɛ lɛ tɔe ɔ, ma ha lɛ wami nyu vu ɔ mi nyu ɔ eko nɛ e nu yaka gu. 7Kunimi yelɔ ɔ maa pee kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ kulaa yelɔ, nɛ ma pee e Mawu, nɛ lɛ hu e maa pee ye bi. 8Se ninɛmɛ nɛ ji sfɔli kɛ ninɛmɛ nɛ he we yi kɛ nihi nɛ peɔ ninyɛ nihi kɛ awi yeli kɛ ya holi kɛ nyuali kɛ wɔ jali kɛ lakpatsɛmɛ kulaa a, a ma na a blɔ nya ngɛ taku ɔ nɛ ngɛ tsoe kɛ la gligliigli ɔ mi, nɔ́ nɛ ji gbenɔ nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ.”
Yerusalem he ɔ
9Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfohi kpaago nɛ hɛɛ tsinesa kpaago nɛ hyi tɔtɔɔtɔ kɛ nyagbe haomi kpaago ɔ a kpɛti nɔ kake ba ye ngɔ nɛ e kɛ mi ba tu munyu ke: “Ba, nɛ ma tsɔɔ mo ayɛflo ɔ nɛ ji Tobi ɔ yo ɔ.” 10Nɛ e ngɔ mi ngɛ mumi mi kɛ ho yoku ngua ko nɛ ya hiɔwe nɔ ya, nɛ e tsɔɔ mi ma ngua a nɛ ji Yerusalem klɔuklɔu ɔ nɛ je Mawu ngɔ ngɛ hiɔwe kɛ ngɛ si kplee, 11nɛ ye hɛɛ Mawu hɛ mi nyami ɔ; nɛ e ngɛ kpee kaa tɛ nɛ he jua wa pe kulaa, kaa yaspi tɛ nɛ mi tsɔ kaa kristalo ahuhuɛ. 12E ngɛ gbogbo ngua ko nɛ ya hiɔwe, kɛ agbohi nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ, nɛ bɔfohi nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ daa si ngɛ agbo ɔmɛ a nya, nɛ a ngma biɛhi ngɛ a nɔ nɛ ji Israel bi ɔmɛ a wɛtsohi nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ a biɛhi. 13Agbohi etɛ ngɛ beleku je (pu je he), nɛ agbohi etɛ ngɛ omlɛyi (hue mi je), nɛ agbohi etɛ ngɛ leneyi (wo si je), nɛ agbohi etɛ ngɛ bonyoku (pu sinɔ he). 14Nɛ ma a he gli ɔ ngɛ sisi tomihi (aloo fanesihi) ɔnyɔngma kɛ enyɔ, nɛ Tobi ɔ bɔfohi nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔmɛ a biɛhi ngɛ a mi.
15Nɛ nɔ nɛ kɛ mi tu munyu ɔ hɛɛ sika tsu glã kalemi tso konɛ e kɛ kale ma a kɛ e gbo ɔmɛ kɛ e he gli ɔ. 16Ma a fɔɔ si kɔ nya eywiɛ nɛ e kami ngɛ kaa e blimi nɔuu. Nɛ e kɛ glã a kale ma a, nɛ e pee si tomi nya akpe kake kɛ lafa enuɔ. E kami kɛ e blimi kɛ e hiɔwe yami sɔ. 17Nɛ e kale e gli ɔ nɛ e pee nane kami lafa enyɔ kɛ nyɔngma kɛ ekpa ngɛ nɔmlɔ kalemi nɔ́ nɛ bɔfo ɔ hɛɛ ɔ nya. 18Nɛ nɔ́ nɛ a kɛ fia e gli ɔ ji yaspi tɛ, nɛ ma a sika tsu nɛ ngɛ kaa ahuhuɛ nɛ hɛ mi tsɔ ʼi. 19Nɛ ma a gli ɔ sisi tomi ɔ, a dla lɛ kɛ tɛ nɛ he jua wa slɔɔtohi kulaa: Kekleekle sisi tomi ɔ yaspi, nɔ́ nɛ ji enyɔ ɔ safiro, nɔ́ nɛ ji etɛ ɔ kalkedon, nɛ nɔ́ nɛ ji eywiɛ ɔ smaragdo, 20nɔ́ nɛ ji enuɔ ɔ sardoniki, nɔ́ nɛ ji ekpa a sadio, nɔ́ nɛ ji kpaago ɔ krisolito, nɔ́ nɛ ji kpaanyɔ ɔ berilo, nɔ́ nɛ ji nɛɛ ɔ topasion, nɔ́ nɛ ji nyɔngma a krisopraso, nɔ́ nɛ ji nyɔngma kɛ kake ɔ hiakinto, nɔ́ nɛ ji nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ ametisto. 21Nɛ agbohi nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ɔ, adiagba nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ ʼi, nɛ agbo kake ɔ adiagba kake a kɛ pee. Nɛ ma a mi blɔ ɔ sika tsu nitsɛ ʼi, nɛ e mi tsɔ kaa ahuhuɛ.
22I nɛ sɔlemi tsu ko ngɛ ma a mi, ejakaa Nyɔmtsɛ Mawu Ope ɔ kɛ Tobi ɔ ji e sɔlemi tsu. 23Nɛ pu loo nyɔhiɔ kpemi hia we ngɛ ma a mi, ejakaa Mawu hɛ mi nyami ɔ tsoo ngɛ mi, nɛ Tobi ɔ ji la nɛ kpɛɛ ngɛ mi. 24Nɛ maje li ɔmɛ maa nyɛɛ ngɛ e la a mi, nɛ zugba a nɔ matsɛmɛ ɔmɛ maa ngɔ a hɛ mi nyami kɛ ba mi. 25Nɛ e gbo ɔmɛ ɔ, a be ngae ligbi ko ligbi ko; ejakaa nyɔ be lejɛ ɔ; 26nɛ a kɛ je mi ma amɛ a hɛ mi nyami ɔ kɛ a bu ɔ maa ba mi. 27Nɛ nɔ́ ko nɛ he tsɔ we kɛ nɔ nɛ peɔ ninyɛ nihi kɛ nɔ nɛ yeɔ lakpa be mi sɛe kulaa, kaa ja ninɛmɛ nɛ a ngma a biɛ ngɛ Tobi ɔ wami womi ɔ mi ɔ?

Title: KPOJEMI 22
Content:
1Nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo ɔ tsɔɔ mi wami nyu pa klɔuu nɛ mi tsɔ kaa kristalo ahuhuɛ nɛ ngɛ Mawu kɛ Tobi ɔ matsɛ sɛ ɔ mi jee kɛ ngɛ ma a gbejegbɛ ɔ mi gue, 2nɛ ma a kpɛti kɛ pa a tue hiɛ ɔ kɛ hiɛ ɔ kulaa a wami tso ɔ maa si, nɛ e woɔ yiblii si nyɔngma kɛ enyɔ, hlami tsuaa hlami ɔ, e woɔ yiblii si kake, nɛ tso ɔ yi ba amɛ ɔ, a kɛ tsaa je ma amɛ. 3Nɛ musu ko musu ko be lejɛ ɔ hu. Mawu kɛ Tobi ɔ matsɛ sɛ ɔ maa ma si ngɛ e mi, nɛ e sɔmɔli ɔmɛ ma sɔmɔ lɛ, 4nɛ a maa na e hɛ mi, nɛ e biɛ ɔ maa hi a hɛ nya. 5Nɛ nyɔ be lejɛ ɔ hie, nɛ kane loo pu kpemi he be mɛ hiae, ejakaa Nyɔmtsɛ Mawu ɔ ma kpɛ ha mɛ, nɛ a maa ye matsɛ kɛ maa ya neneene kɛ neneene.
Yesu bami
6Kɛkɛ nɛ hiɔwe bɔfo ɔ de mi ke: “Anɔkuale munyu nɛ maa si pim ji nɛ ɔ nɛ. Nyɔmtsɛ ɔ nɛ ji gbali ɔmɛ a mumi ɔmɛ a Mawu ɔ tsɔ e bɔfo ɔ konɛ e ba tsɔɔ e sɔmɔli nihi nɛ sa kaa a ba nɔuu ɔ.”
7“Oʼɛ i ma nɔuu. A gbaa nɔ nɛ kɛ kikɛmɛ a womi nɛ mi gbami munyu ɔmɛ toɔ ɔ.”
8Nɛ imi, Yohane, ji nɔ nɛ na nɛ e nu ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ nɛ. Nɛ benɛ i nu nɛ i na a, i bu si nɛ ma ja ngɛ hiɔwe bɔfo ɔ nɛ tsɔɔ mi ni nɛ ɔmɛ ɔ nane nya. 9Nɛ e de mi ke: “Koo pee! ejakaa o nyɛmi sɔmɔlɔ kɛ gbali kɛ nihi nɛ toɔ kikɛmɛ a womi nɛ mi munyu ɔmɛ a kpɛti nɔ ko ji mi; ja Mawu mohu!” 10Nɛ e de mi ke: “Koo sɔu kikɛmɛ a womi nɛ mi gbami munyu ɔmɛ a nya, ejakaa be ɔ su. 11Nɔ nɛ dɛ ɔ, ha e ya nɔ nɛ e pee nihi nɛ dɛ ɔ; nɛ nɔ nɛ ji mutsɛ ɔ, ha e ya nɔ nɛ e wo e he mu; nɛ nɔ nɛ ji dalɔ ɔ, ha e ya nɔ nɛ e tsu dami ni ɔmɛ; nɛ nɔ nɛ ji nɔ klɔuklɔu ɔ, ha e ya nɔ nɛ e hi klɔuklɔu.”
12“Oʼɛ, i ma nɔuu, nɛ i hɛɛ ye hiɔwo ɔ kɛ ma, nɛ ma wo nɔ tsuaa nɔ hiɔ ngɛ e ni tsumi ɔ nya. 13Ami ji Alfa a kɛ omega a nɛ, sisije ɔ kɛ nyagbe ɔ, kekleekle nɔ ɔ kɛ nyagbe nɔ ɔ.”
14A gbaa nihi nɛ fɔɔ a tade ɔmɛ a he ɔ, konɛ a na wami tso ɔ nɔ yiblii ɔ yemi he blɔ, nɛ a gu a gbo ɔmɛ a mi kɛ sɛ ma a mi. 15Se ma a se ɔ, gbe ɔmɛ kɛ nyuali ɔmɛ kɛ ya holi ɔmɛ kɛ awi yeli ɔmɛ kɛ amaga jali ɔmɛ kɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ suɔ lakpa nɛ ngɔɔ nya a ngɛ lejɛ ɔ.
16“Imi Yesu, i tsɔ ye bɔfo ɔ konɛ e ba ye ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he odase ngɔ tsɔɔ ngɛ asafo ɔmɛ a mi. Ami ji David sipoku ɔ kɛ e nina a, nɔkɔ nɛ ngɛ kpee ɔ.”
17Mumi ɔ kɛ Ayɛflo ɔ ke: “Ba!” Nɛ nɔ nɛ nuɔ ɔ, e de ke: “Ba!”
Nɔ nɛ kuma ngɛ lɛ tɔe ɔ, e ba, nɛ nɔ nɛ suɔ ɔ, e ba nɛ e ba yɛ wami nyu ɔ yaka gu.
Nyagbe
18Imi Yohane i ngɛ nɔ tsuaa nɔ nɛ nuɔ kikɛmɛ a womi nɛ mi gbami munyu ɔmɛ kɔkɔ bɔe ke: Ke nɔ ko kɛ nɔ́ ko piɛ ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he ɔ, Mawu maa ngɔ haomihi nɛ a ngma ngɛ womi nɛ mi ɔ ngɔ piɛ he ngɔ ha lɛ. 19Nɛ ke nɔ ko je nɔ́ ko kɛ je kikɛmɛ a gbami womi nɛ mi munyu ɔmɛ a mi ɔ, Mawu ma je e blɔ nya kɛ maa je wami tso ɔ yiblii ɔ yemi kɛ ma klɔuklɔu ɔ kɛ nihi nɛ a ngma ngɛ womi nɛ mi ɔ mi.
20Nɔ nɛ yeɔ kikɛmɛ a ni nɛ ɔmɛ a he odase ɔ ngɛ dee ke: “Ee, i ma nɔuu.” Amen. Ee, ba, Mawetsɛ Yesu!
21Wa Nyɔmtsɛ Yesu Kristo dloomi ɔ kɛ nyɛ tsuo nɛ hi si! Amen.
